What a lovely spot! Sparkling clean, a well-appointed kitchen, comfortable bed, and beautiful neighborhood... All these were topped off by Julie’s warm hospitality and special touches like homemade granola and warm sourdough bread. We were able to truly relax here. Julie went above and beyond!

Julie’s place was perfect! Their loft space had everything we needed, and the property/ neighborhood is GORGEOUS.
She left us homemade cookies, and was very kind throughout the duration of our stay.
Beautiful space in a lovely, quiet neighborhood. Would certainly recommend this to others.

I spent 3 nights in Julie and Bill’s loft and it was perfect! It’s peaceful, beautifully decorated and set up with everything you should need. As others have said, the bed is super comfortable and the shower is amazing (I didn’t want to get out!), but beyond that, it’s all the little touches that make this suite special. From the baked treat that was left for my arrival, to the extras like granola, honey, milk and raspberry jam. Bill and Julie are both very friendly and welcoming and their property is gorgeous. Looking forward to staying again this week.

We stayed one night in the chauffeurs room. Julie was there to greet us when we arrived and when we left. There was fresh bread and granola along with other organic breakfast offerings. The bed was super comfortable and the room was very clean. A few things to note, there is a steep staircase leading to the room and the shower has a very low ceiling and entrance-I had to duck to get in it at 5’5”.

I had another great stay and Julie and Bill’s loft. I love the neighborhood and the location is perfect; so close to downtown, Bush Park and Minto Brown Park. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a unique place to stay in Salem.
Wonderful stay on a wonderful property with wonderful hosts. Thank you!
Beautiful stay, great location, right next to Salem's downtown. There's some good restaurants an easy 30 minute walk away
My parents stayed for the holidays and this space was perfect for their needs and ideally located! Julie was extremely thoughtful and made them feel welcome.

I can’t say enough good things about this place. We travel a lot and stay at Airbnb’s all over. This was one of the best places I’ve stayed.
From the beautiful property to the baked goods, this place is better than a nice hotel.
Clean private room (and I’m picky.. it was spotless), quiet, nice hot shower with great water pressure, did I mention the baked goods?!? Gave recommendations for local food, met us and chatted a bit and gave me tips for bread baking! Everything about this place was amazing. Would definitely stay again.
The chauffeur's was adorable,  cozy and the perfect place for a quiet weekend getaway. The baked goods Julie made were delicious.
One of the most genuine and sweetest hosts through all my Airbnb experiences. The place is quaint, clean, and in a great location. Hope to be back in the near future!
beautiful cozy little spot. right near downtown and a lot of good spots close by. the bed was super comfortable and I got a great night's sleep.

The Chauffeur's room was so charming, cozy, and clean! One of the nicest airbnb's we've stayed at. Beautiful home and neighborhood. Enjoyed all the thoughtful touches and amenities provided. Julie and her husband warmly welcomed us upon our arrival and ensured we had everything we needed.

This is a perfect home base for all that Salem has to offer, and it's conveniently located near the wineries in Eola-Amity Hills. Highly recommend a stay here!
Great location. Charming, comfortable space. Julie was very hospitable. Recommend the place and would stay again.
Comfortable, safe and inviting! Couldn't ask for more!
Julie puts the "super" in super host for Airbnb. Her attention to detail is extraordinary and the space is delightfully decorated and appointed. Great place to stay!
Great, clean, cute place to stay!
Wonderful spot, wonderful accommodations. Julie is a fantastic host and she's thought of everything to make the stay delightful!

I’ve traveled all over the world and stayed in several Airbnb‘s and Julie and Bill’s is by far the finest. It’s a quiet, private, immaculate space. The bed is luxurious and the shower is outstanding. Located in a beautiful neighborhood in Salem. The hosts are friendly and accommodating and Julie’s baked treats amazing.
I plan to return again and again.

It was a delight to stay here for two nights. Host was very sweet & hospitable. Julie made the most delicious home made pizza topped with fresh garden veggies. It was prefect in every way.
The location was in a nice neighborhood in which you felt safe to walk about. This a great place to stay if you’re in Salem!
This is a really lovely, super clean little apartment with a lot of attention to detail and perfect furnishings- everything one needs for a nice stay. very friendly host as well!

We enjoyed our stay! The room is charming and equipped with all the essentials. The neighborhood is peaceful and is only a short drive from downtown Salem. Julie was very neighborly, offering us slices of freshly baked sourdough bread and some cookies when we first arrived! If you want a calm place to stay while you enjoy what Salem has to offer this is what you’re looking for!

Small thing worth mentioning: The room is compact and parts of the ceiling, particularly in the bathroom, have an angle which can make it slightly challenging if you’re a tall person. Again, the room is very cozy and has all the essentials but if you’re especially tall this Airbnb may pose some challenges.
Julie was an incredible host and her space was exactly what I was looking for. Hope I can stay there again soon!
A beautiful, cozy space that is perfect for a visit to Salem. Julie is an exceptional hostess. I always feel like I am staying with family at her chauffeurs room. We will be back!
This place was perfect. It had so much character in a lovely neighborhood.  Julie provided home cooked goodies and was friendly and helpful but completely respectful of my privacy. I loved it.
Julie is a lovely host and the suite was comfortable and clean. the baked goods were a bonus treat! if you are taller than 5'10", beware the shower has a low ceiling!

I had a great stay at the Chauffer's Room @ the Villa. The room was super clean and cozy, with many lovely touches. Julie is the consummate hostess who went out of her way to make me feel welcomed and comfortable. Added plus was the fact that my favorite morning beverage (coffee) was available in the room, as were staples like salt, pepper, olive oil, vinegar, etc. Five (5) stars all around!

This is a beautiful, cozy space. Julie left homemade cookies and bread and was very responsive on Airbnb and a gracious hostess.  She has thought of details that make the apartment unique and homey. The shower is gorgeous!  Definitely recommend and would stay again.

Julie’s place is perfection. I almost hesitate to give too good of a review because I want it to be available for the next time I’m in town. She is a kind and accommodating host and her homemade goodies are ridiculously good.

Located in a lovely neighborhood with easy access to everything, The Chauffeur's Room at the Villa has all the creature comforts of home along with delicious baked treats to greet you upon arrival. The hosts are welcoming and accessible. I look forward to staying here again!
Really cozy and well appointed. Beautiful neighborhood. Safe and private.

Staying here was a great experience. It’s a great neighborhood, the accommodations are cozy and private and very well taken care of.  I would absolutely recommend staying here. Julie is a wonderful person and an amazing baker. Sourdough home made bread in several flavors, cookies that are out of this world and home made granola. I loved it.

We came to Salem for me to take a huge exam & I needed great Wi-Fi & a very quiet & relaxed place to study & rest. 100% thrilled at how charming the space was. So cute & the bed so comfortable & the shower so amazing. We really appreciate the special touches of the homemade cookies, bread & ensuring almond milk was available for Chris. Stay here, it’s beautiful and the host is so lovely and amazing. Thank you Julie 🙏🏻

Super cute landing spot!  Great location, lovely neighborhood, darling loft with everything you need.  Julie had a book of recommendations around the area and thought of everything.  I will definitely be staying here again if I am in the area.
The place is clean and tidy and perfectly situated in a quiet neighborhood.  The host was kind and communicative.  Will stay here again soon.
Julie is an ultimate host.  I can tell she loves hosting people and make others feel welcomed.  Thank you, Julie, for your hospitality!

What a great place. We really enjoyed our time at this charming location. It had everything we needed; so clean, quiet & comfortable. The hosts were terrific - very accomodating & responsive.  The chocolate chip cookies were a delicious surprise. When you're in Salem, Minto-Brown Island Park is a must stop destination to walk or bike.
Remarkable Hosts, delightful environment.

Located in a lovely neighborhood fun for a walk. This is a very small studio apt. Very clean, super comfy bed. Host is delightful. Only downside is small windows not a lot of light from outside narrow stairway and requires to park on the street which is down a long driveway in a rainy part of the state.
A charming little place. Everything was clean and had lots of nice touches. Julie is a wonderful host. Warm cookies right out of the oven were much appreciated and delicious! Fun place to stay!
I peaceful place to rest and fall asleep… and a fragrant beautiful garden in the morning
The Airbnb is in a beautiful and serene neighborhood that is convenient distance to the riverfront, downtown Salem, and many wineries. Julie was friendly and gave us helpful tips for our stay.

LOVED IT! Everything about our stay was easy and comfortable. Julie was a terrific host and made us feel very welcome. We enjoyed coffee each morning on the back patio and listened to the bird's chirp and the sun come up. The personal touches were very appreciated. 10/10
Consistently cozy and comfortable

Such a great place to stay.  Perfect location in a quiet neighborhood and close to everything we wanted to do.  Julie thought of every last detail to make our stay perfect.  Would definitely stay here again!
Gracious host, impeccably clean, gorgeous home and gardens, quiet lovely neighborhood, walking distance to downtown.  We throughly enjoyed our stay.  5 stars.

Terrific stay at Julie’s place. The studio apartment over the garage was sparkling clean, bed was comfortable and the kitchenette was well stocked. There was enough room for two people but no more than that. Julie left us homemade muffins that were outstanding and homemade granola as well as coffee and tea. The studio does have A/C that worked well on 95+ degree days in Salem. They also allowed us to store our bikes in their garage instead of keeping them on the back of our Jeep. Quiet, beautiful neighborhood and very convenient to the center of Salem. Julie provides information on local restaurants and other things to do in the area. Highly recommend.

Julie and Bill are wonderful hosts. Responsive, engaged if you want them to be but not intrusive. The room is beautiful with every little touch I would want. The neighborhood is quiet and close to everything by car. I would happily stay again.

This was a perfect little getaway spot, located above a gorgeous garden in a beautiful neighborhood. The location was convenient to downtown. The suite had everything you could need, and the host was so thoughtful. Exceptional stay. I hope to stay again next time I’m in town!

It is a charming place. Super clean and comfy, and has everything you need. I fell in love with the cookies and homemade granola. They are a very nice couple.
The garden is very relaxing and very quiet neighborhood. Highly recommended.☺️
Great place to stay! Very historic places nearby

Everything was perfect about this place. Incredibly clean, comfortable and plenty of room for 1-2 people. There were even some pastries left for me. Which were really welcoming after all the traveling. The neighborhood was beautiful as well. Also, really loved the little natural grocery store right down the road.
A very clean and conveniently located room. Julie is a wonderful host!
Absolutely lovely little studio apartment in a beautiful location. Hosts were friendly and thoughtful. I will definitely stay again next time I have business in Salem.
Second stay and just as perfect as the first. Lovely, charming, clean and well-appointed little space in a great location. Hoping to return again!
Very comfortable space. Quiet neighborhood and very convenient to stores and restaurants.
This was a great place to stay in a convenient location and nice neighborhood. Julie and Bill were excellent hosts - responsive, thoughtful, and kind. (And, Julie makes wonderful baked goods!)
I had a nice extended stay. Julie was a fantastic host - so generous and helpful. Thank you! I hope to return someday! I highly recommend Julie's place.

There’s not much to say about Julie’s place other than that it’s perfection.

The room felt more spacious to me than I expected from the photos. Everything is wonderful in this cozy studio: a shower with good water pressure (and amazing Oregon water!), a comfortable bed, spotless new kitchen, and the nicest host in the world.

Hotel options in Salem are generally mediocre anyway, so I’m delighted to have found this is luxury for less than a hotel room! I’m planning to be back in Salem this summer and I’ll absolutely be staying with Julie again.
Comfortable, cozy, and extremely clean space hosted by friendly and proactive guests. Everything about the space and experience here was top notch, would definitely stay here again.
Perfectly functional & efficient.  The additional surprise of fresh bread on the random moment was wonderful.

Let me start with "I am so thankful to Nancy and this wonderful experience".  I stayed 2 nights at this place for photographing solar eclipse, which was an amazing event. but my soul was enriched and received more than that,  Nancy's warmness, kindness, sincerity truly made me felt like family while I stayed there.  Her communication was always right on, she did extra mile effort to make sure I was comfortable at her house.  Her cooking was awesome and delicious, plenty of food, fresh fruit, Zen garden, quiet environment, friendly nice neighborhood.  I really enjoyed this stay so much.  I will give 10 stars on all category easily.   Nancy, Thank You so very much for all you'd done.   I am so thankful, and definitely and absolutely recommend this place to everyone. and I definitely will stay at this place again when I revisit Oregon.  :)

Nancy's place is lovely and modern. ..well appointed and a great location.  Nancy was very hospitable and sharing.  You need to provide your own breakfast but that's not a problem as a fantastic supermarket is very close.  Great host...great stay.

Nancy was very generous with her beautiful home. Her home was extremely comfortable especially the bed. I slept quite well while there. She made 2 lovely breakfasts during my week stay. If I was to visit Salem again there would be no doubt in my mind to stay at Nancy’s home again. I give my stay there an A+

Our stay in Christy's home was wonderful. This home is an inviting and comfortable home with oodles of charm. The front covered porch allowed us to enjoy the evenings relaxing even in the winter. The cats that belonged to Christy's tenant, hung out with us on the front porch as well. The home was newly remodeled on the inside with the exterior in the process of being completed. Christy had setup a beautiful Christmas tree that was enjoyed over our holiday stay. The restroom has a charm just like the rest of the home, with a claw foot tub and shower, a little bit to get use due to shower curtain surrounding you. The kitchen was nicely appointed with everything you would need to make a meal.

Christy was a wonderful and attentive host, very quick in responding to my questions about the house and the surrounding area. The neighborhood was quiet and a few minutes drive to downtown Salem. We found a great breakfast place close to the house called The Word of Mouth Bistro. A must visit, just be prepared to wait, as this restaurant can get busy but the bloody Mary's and coffee are worth the wait! Christy provided us with a list recommendations of places to eat, drink and visit in the area that was very helpful. We never got to meet Christy personally but I feel like I know a little about this world traveler. A very gracious host and a charming older home set in a quaint neighborhood, we will stay here again the next time we are in Salem.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had a great long weekend at Christy's house: perfect for the quiet retreat I was looking for. Just as advertised: cozy and recently renovated inside, work still going on outside, but I didn't mind that, and I look forward to seeing how it turns out. Roomy and comfortable, and Christy was welcoming, flexible, and helpful with suggesting local highlights. (The Word of Mouth breakfast was as good as advertised.) And the location is ideal: a low-key residential neighborhood a short, pretty walk away from the train station and downtown Salem. I'd be happy to return.

Super friendly host, very welcoming and accommodating. Great location, very close to downtown Salem. Front porch is awesome space to kind of feel like you're outside, but you're still protected from the rain. I look forward to renting the house again in the future.

My husband and I stayed in Christy's house and it was great! Her home was cozy, clean and in a convenient location in Salem. Christy was easy to communicate with and made our stay very relaxed! We would definitely stay at Christy's again!

Our stay at Christy's home was very comfortable. We had everything we needed. The outside of the home is still a bit of a work in progress but the inside is lovely with many charming artistic touches. The backyard was serene, it was enjoyable to hang out under the flowering fruit trees. The neighborhood is quiet but still within walking distance of all necessities including a charming Farmer's Market. I would definitely recommend this home when visiting Salem or surrounds.
Had a great time staying at Christy's place, it fit exactly what we needed. Nice quite neighborhood, within walking distance of downtown.

We really enjoyed staying in Christy's Salem house.  It was spacious, and we really liked the funky cool interior colors and decor.   We used the kitchen to cook dinner for friends.  And as advertised, WOM is just a few blocks away - an easy walk.

The place was as described, and although we were there for only one day, we enjoyed the stay.  Christy opened her home to us and made us feel welcome.  As stated by Christy, the outside of the house is being renovated, but the inside presents well and quite comfortable.  I would recommend it for the warmth of the host, the quiet neighborhood and proximity to the centre of town, walking tracks etc.
Christy was great to communicate with and the house worked great for us. The cherries in the fridge from the tree out front was a nice touch!

Christy is a wonderful host! Together we were able to figure out some last minute snafus with our schedule of arriving and getting into the house, and she was both understating and flexible. Four of us stayed two nights so that we could do the PetalPedal bicycle ride in Silverton. Her home is great, beds comfy and the claw foot tub a dream after a long bike ride!  The house and the backyard are a project of love for her, and are both lovely and vibey by Oregon standards. Our friends are musicians and really hit it off with Chad, the downstairs lodger, so we had a superb night of built in entertainment. Christy's recommendation of the bottle shop and  Word of Mouth were big hits. Sunday morning at WOM was certainly one of the best breakfasts we have ever had. We love AirBnB because it gives us the ability to drop into a new place and neighborhood. We will definitely look forward to next years ride with a stay at Christy's!
We came down for a wedding and we were so glad we stayed at Christy's house. It was close to where we were going, spacious,  and the back hard was super cool. We would stay there again.

Although we did not meet her, Christy was in contact with us during our stay and made us feel very welcome.  We loved the house and neighborhood.  The furnishings were very comfortable and it felt like home.  The backyard was a nice place to hang out in the evening.  We wish we could have stayed longer.

Super cute house with amazing backyard. The garden/pool/fire pit was by far the best part, we could have stayed out there all weekend! The house was close to bars/restaurants so we could walk everywhere and Christy was very responsive and prompt. We enjoyed everything about our stay and would definitely stay there again!
Christy's home is comfy and cozy. The backyard was just the spot after weeks of work on sons wedding.
Christy's house was great! We would stay there again!

The house is charming and clearly in transition per Christy's description. Her vision for the space is evident, and her personality shines throughout.

Though we visited Salem on one of the hottest days this year, Christy provided several fans to make our stay more comfortable and the backyard was a lovely place to visit and cool off in the evening.

We would definitely stay here again and recommend Christy's place to other potential guests.

Great communication! This comfy home is very close to downtown, Willamette University and the State Capital. Christy is delightful to work with, and is fixing her adorable place up to make it even more adorable. Would be perfect for families visiting their kids at Willamette.

This has to have been one of the most warm, easy-going, relaxed home-away-from-home feeling venues we have ever stayed in. It was clean, colorful, and cozy. Christine met us, explained a few things, and left our little family of four to enjoy our weekend together. Nice neighborhood, great location, and a host who definitely knows how to pay attention to detail.
Super quiet little house, very cozy. Cute home in progress but you can see it being worked on. Terrific value with four people! Christina was lovely to work with.
This is a beautiful home. Christina was very friendly and helpful. The neighborhood was quiet with lots of neat things to walk to.

We enjoyed our stay at Christina's place.  It was very convenient for our trip to Salem and this warm and inviting home had a lot of character!  It was great to be able to walk around the neighborhood and even walk to some restaurants and breweries.  Loved the gas stove and oven for heating up meals and warm drinks.  Thanks!
A warm and comfortable home. I highly recommend
Great place in a wonderful neighborhood, and the host was a pleasure to deal with.
Christina's Airbnb was fantastic! A wonderful place to stay in Salem.

Very comfortable home.  We were traveling with my three year old granddaughter.  Furnishes were sturdy, nice and comfortable, but not so fancy that we were constantly worried that she would damage something.  The bathtub was amazing for me -- what a wonderful soak -- but did present a challenge for bathing the little one, as the tub was so deep it was hard to get her in and out.  If you have a little one, the large kitchen sink might be a better bath choice.
Charming and comfortable. Neighbors were very friendly. Quiet street. Very close to Dutch Bros. A great place to unwind and relax after our day of family activities.

Three words to describe this place: unsanitary, filthy and dirty. I was amaized by the poor condition in terms of cleaning and clutter. Bathroom sink didn't drain, had mold and toothpaste all over including mirror. Toilet had yellow ring inside bowl. Bad, bad experience!

Had a good stay during the eclipse. Backyard was perfect to enjoy it. Price went up for the eclipse week-end but that was the rules of the game.
Very pleasant and welcoming attentions were waiting for us in the house, it felt like arriving in a friend's place with everything you need handy.
We would have appreciated to better undestand that the backyard was shared with lower level tenants before arriving. But everybody was nice and easy.
We had a very good WE.
Beautiful hime, tons of room to enjoy your stay.

Good place a 5 months
Minute drive from downtown Salem. It's a nicely upgraded Craftsman home and very cozy.
I was extremely happy with my experience! I loved Christina’s home. Everything was clean and there was plenty of space for all of us. I would absolutely recommend this home!
The house was really cute and quaint. Christina and her husband were great!

Cozy, charming home. Just as advertised. Perfect spot for us with three teens. Everyone had their own bed and space to stretch out. We enjoyed being able to walk to breakfast (Word of Mouth is a MUST) and check out the state capitol. Great backyard to enjoy the weather. Just what we needed!
Great place to spend the weekend at.

Christina was a great host, quick to respond and very accommodating. She and her husband were great hosts! We were able to check in early, much appreciated. I absolutely loved the home. So much character, thoughtful details to make it homey and comfortable, a great space overall. My kids are already asking to go back! The location is also excellent! Close to everything, yet removed from busy streets. We will definitely be returning on our next trip to Oregon!

a lovely old home in a quiet part of town close to downtown.  Very comfortable with a huge backyard. Christina was a great communicator and was very nice about our flights being delayed and changing plans and trying to coordinate six of us getting there and leaving.
We all (including our happy hound Goose) felt really comfortable staying here, and would do it again.

Nothing less than amazing. A great value with amazing communication. This is definitely one of the best experiences my family has ever had with a vacation home. I would definitely recommend this home and host again to anyone.
Christina's place is very comfortable with everything you need. The beds were good. The neighborhood is quiet. Christina and Alex responded promptly to our emails.

We had a lovely stay at the Craftsman for our college reunion! The location is walkable to the Willamette campus and several nice local restaurants, some of which were pretty nostalgic spots for us. (The giant French toast at the Sassy Onion hasn't gotten any smaller in the last ten years!) Christina was traveling during our stay, but she went out of her way to keep in touch and make sure we checked in safely without any issues.

The house itself is cute and homey, with plenty of helpful instructions set out to help you settle in (although we never did quite figure out the entertainment center). The mattresses are a bit hard, but other than that, it was a delightful place to stay with lots of personality and charm. And you can't beat the value!
Super cute house with plenty of space to spread out! My kids loved the chickens, and the fire pit was great! Thanks for a great stay.

Christina's place was the perfect spot to stay for our visit to Willamette University.   It was only a few minutes away from the school and a short drive to the downtown area with a variety of shops and restaurants.   If you get a chance walk to the local restaurant Word of Mouth.   It is worth the wait!   We loved the frames in each room with instructions and helpful tips.    Any time I contacted Christina she was quick to respond.   If we are in the area again we hope her place  is available for future stays.
Christina's place is a great house for a family to see Salem and have their own space! Close to many things and lovely backyard.
Cute home in Salem.  Very well stocked kitchen and close to a grocery store.  We loved the front porch and all the books!

This Airbnb is bright, clean, and comfortable. The perfect place for 6 people to stay in downtown Salem. We absolutely loved this home, and will definitely request this home again if we are ever in the area.
My girlfriend and I had an excellent stay at Christina's house. It was very comfortable and the neighborhood was quiet. If we were to stay in Salem again, I would definitely book Christina's house!

We enjoyed this space very much. Quite clean and welcoming. Lots of cozy places to relax. We played board games and looked through the books on the shelves. We found everything we needed and were satisfied with our accommodations. Christina was easy to reach and responded quickly. We highly recommend her as a host!
Quaint and comfortable home. Convenient location to downtown Salem and to Willamettte University. Christina is a great host and quick  to respond to any questions you  may  have.
The location was great, near everything we were doing in Salem and in a pleasant neighborhood. The backyard was really fun and the house has lots of character. We had a great stay.

Christina's Craftsman home is a treat for those who can appreciate a comfortable, 100+ year old home. It is a small museum of very touchable antiques. The luxury sheets on the bed were superb, the middle bedroom had an amazingly comfortable bed. The kitchen was well stocked if you planned any significant cooking, even a French press coffeemaker and coffeebean grinder. While their recent upgrade to Nest style controls for the air/heat mystified us, Christina could immediately adjust it remotely using her phone.
The location is quite close to historic downtown and good restaurants, quite walkable.
One word of warning, the side and back stairs leading to the back yard are not recommended for those with translocation issues, no railing, and if you need to use their washer/dryer, it is down in the basement.
Thank you Christina, for all your thoughtful touches and quick responses. Hope you enjoyed the California oranges and homegrown tomatoes we left for you.
Easy to get comfortable. Super cute older home with lots of character.

Christina’s home was perfect for my work trip. My husband and dog also stayed at Christina’s house. It had amazing AC and entertainment options. We felt secure letting our dog in the back yard because it is fully fenced. The bed was comfortable too! I will definitely stay again whenever the need and opportunity arises again.

This beautiful home is charming and cozy, and surprised us with modern amenities for being an older house. Great place to relax.. I wish my home looked like this one! Christina and Alex are both amazing hosts and the check-in process was painless. I hope that I can stay again in the future!
Christina's house is even more beautiful in person! It is in a great location and had lots of wonderful unexpected touches.
Truly an enchanting house. Filled with many books and as many great places to relax and read those books. We had a whole lot of fun staying here.

Communication was awesome and easy. It is a super cute historic house. We had everything we needed. Super cozy blankets! Access was simple. The location is great. There is loads to do in the area. Super close to Willamette Heritage Center and Word of Mouth, bonus!

This charming cottage is everything you need for a stay in the Salem area. Ambiance is very homey and close to stores and shopping. I would definitely recommend a stay at this house for any future guest looking for a quiet but enjoyable stay in Salem.

We absolutely enjoyed staying at Christina and Arnaud’s place. She provided detailed information about the home and communicated regularly. The hosts checked in on us throughout our stay and were very helpful. We loved the warm and cozy feeling which was perfect for the holidays. We were traveling with our dogs and they were very accommodating of our dogs as well! They have a nice yard and well equipped kitchen so we were able to cook meals. They also provided tips on things to do in Salem. Christina and Arnaud are very thoughtful hosts and we will definitely return if we visit Salem again!
Christina was very accommodating to our family needs and her special Christmas touches during our visit made our experience extra special.

Christina was super easy to communicate with. This is an excellent location with shopping of all sorts  just minutes away. The style and charming character of the house makes you feel right at home.  Would definitely rent again.
Great place to stay! Christy was great with communication. Would definitely stay again!
Great hosts! They reply quickly and very accommodating. The back yard is a great place to spend a sunny day with the family and the area is a great neighborhood.
Salem is a great place to visit.  This charming house is close to everything.

A look into the past!  The house is as they mention, a Craftsman house from the Sears Catalogue.....The area around the house is also a joy to see.  It was like living in the past seeing the great historical homes that are being cared for.....the TREE'S are beyond compare.....We had a very nice time there.....
This house is quaint, comfortable, and extremely quiet and worked perfectly for my family's needs. Christy was communicative and kind. Thank you so much Christy and Arnaud!
Christy and Arnaud’s home is a good example of a craftsman home. Clear directions and easy going hosts make your trip easy an straightforward. Great location in a nice quite neighborhood!
Wonderful house with all the amenities. We'd absolutely stay here again.

This place is accurately described as a charming craftsman bungalow on a quiet, shady street. It also has a huge back yard, where we had a few very pleasant meals outside. Although the center of our activities was in McMinnville, the drive from Salem was short and lovely and posed no problem whatsoever. In fact I would guess we were happier in Salem than we would have been in McMinnville. C and A were perfect hosts in every way.

The house is decorated very tasteful and nice. We didn't miss anything and liked the well-equipped kitchen. The yard is very big and there's always a shady place available when it's hot. The neighbourhood is very quiet and close to central Salem which makes it easy to discover the region.
Christy and Arnaud are wonderful superhosts. The communication with them worked very friendly and quickly. We met Christy and Arnaud once and it was great to get to know them personally. We would recommend the house anytime! Thank you for hosting us in your wonderful historical house!

Great place in the heart of Salem, we loved that we could get anywhere in town within 10 or so minutes. It was great place to have our dogs with us to and the backyard was plenty spacious for them! Having fresh eggs from the chicken coop was fun and unexpected. Then the fire pit was a great place to end every night! Check in and out were easy and we found great directions in the house for anything else we needed.

What a great space. My family and I were in the area for a wedding at a local winery. The place was comfortable and big enough for us all to relax, cook meals both inside and out. The kitchen was well stocked. We would definitely recommend this place to others.

This was an amazing long weekend! The house was exactly as described, but the back yard was not! We LOVED the backyard, the grill, picnic tables and hanging lights! We enjoyed our local pinot and had an incredible time!

Very cute home and the perfect location! We used this home as a go between for our wedding eve and wedding night and everything was perfect!

It’s a little older of a home, but they did a wonderful job making it modern and the way they style it made it feel very
home-y!

Will definitely recommend them!
Great location and wonderful hosts.  This house is very nice and close to downtown,  great breakfast  place,  Word of a Mouth, within walking distance.
Quaint house close to downtown with friendly owners.
Great cozy home!!
Very cute home and great location!
Christy and Arnaud’s place really is a charming old craftsman house with lots of wonderful details.  They really took the time to make sure ours was a pleasant stay.

We all loved Christy and Arnaud’s home. It truly has “rustic charm”. We traveled as a family of five and there was plenty of space and comfort and the outdoor areas are a bonus. Definitely would stay here again and definitely recommend it to anyone visiting the Salem area.
Christy and Arnaud were great communicators. We loved the plants and location of the home. Thanks very much!
Lovely home an easy walk to Willamette’s campus. Fresh eggs and a great snack basket made us feel at home. Very comfortable beds.

As described, the house is a charming old place full of travel information and artifacts.  Wish we had more people and warmer weather to use the house to its potential with all the rooms, the pool and backyard.  Very convenient quick drive to downtown Salem / Willamette University.
This is a lovely property within close proximity to several attractions. Great for families!

Amazing host. Amazing house. Amazing details. Amazing character. Amazing plants. Amazing books. Amazing curation. Amazing bed. Amazing black-out curtains. Amazing piano. Amazing yard. Amazing fire pit. Amazing neighborhood. Amazing q-tips (seriously, when was the last time an airbnb actually provided q-tips…or chocolates or tea or eggs or…). This is a shining star in the dulling sky of airbnbs. Quite possibly the best one we’ve ever stayed at; felt like home. Walkable to everything. Thank you Christy and Arnaud!

We were in town for the half Ironman triathlon. In our group was myself, my wife and our two young adult kids. Christy’s place was wonderful and met all of our needs and much more. The kitchen was very well equipped with everything we needed for cooking (oils, spices and even some basic staple items). We enjoyed a couple of fresh eggs each day to supplement what we brought with us from the “gals” (2 chickens) out in the back pen. Having laundry facilities was a god send. The ac worked great. And Christy also left a care basket with lots of yummy treats to welcome us. Great place! Hope to return again!

This place is amazing. A shady back yard with BBQ, a pool, chickens, a comfortable area to sit and chill. The kitchen is very well equipped, and you can cook nice meals here. It's very quiet and conveniently located. The hosts are friendly, they gave us a bottle of red wine and chocolate as a welcome gift! We'll be back!
This IS a charming home in which to spend some time in Oregon. It is in a quiet neighborhood and feels very homey. The backyard and front porch only add to the appeal and cozy vibes of this home.

Christy's home was absolutely perfect for our stay in Salem. It is a cozy, spacious, and beautiful home, located close to downtown Salem which was perfect for me as my family owns businesses there that I was visiting. Check-in was smooth and Christy was super thoughtful and easy to reach throughout our stay. My two chihuahuas were very comfortable and loved the huge back yard.

I would definitely recommend this beautiful home if you are in the Salem/Keizer area! 10/10

My wife, son, and I visited this lovely apartment on Thanksgiving Day. We were actually the first to stay with Steven and Robin. Based upon our visit, I expect many more visits to come both from us and from the AirBnB community. Lovely space, well priced, no hassle, and great hosts. What's not to love? We look forward to visiting again!
Steven and Robin were wonderful hosts and we greatly enjoyed our time in Salem. Their house was clean and lovely. They even left little chocolates for us. Great stay!
Great experience! The apartment was very well stocked and tastefully decorated. Robin and Steve were very accommodating and communicative. Would definitely stay again. A++

We were visting my brother in Salem and it was also my 22 year old granddaughter's birthday.  Although our visit was short it was quite nice. The space fit our needs perfectly.  We even took advantage of the sauna tucked away in the laundry/bath area.  At first we were quite chilly, but per our host's instructions we texted him and he upped the heat.  Then it was quite comfy. They provided some coffee and oatmeal for the morning.  They also have a piano which we tried our minimal repertoire on.  Their floors were lovely and came with numerous caveats about getting them wet.  I imagine they wish they had installed something less beautiful and more durable.

John greeted us after a long day on the road and showed us the spotless and very comfortable accommodations on our arrival.  Their suite has all the expected conveniences AND a super-inviting sauna (that, unfortunately, we didn’t have the time to enjoy). If you like a Tempurpedic mattress (not just the pad-over-the -mattress kind) you’ll sleep well here! We enjoyed talking with John and Robin and our short stay at their home on our trip moving our daughter from San Francisco to Seattle. Highly recommended.
Steve and Robin are kind, respectful and a sizable if you need them. Sauna is very relaxing. Beautiful, quiet home.

Felt like I was I my own home. Safe, beautiful neighborhood close to everything but also quiet. You will not find kinder, more respectful, caring people than Steve And Robin. Apartment has beautiful patio and sauna in your private bathroom. Thank you for everything Steve and Robin.

After reading many discouraging hotel reviews, we turned to Air bnb and found Steve & Robin's place.  It was as all of the other guests had written.  Very clean, quiet, and we were free to come and go as we pleased.  We briefly met Steve who kindly invited in for a glass of wine, but then our dinner guests showed up so we left.  We are sorry we didn't get a chance to visit with them more.  We didn't make use of the sauna, but maybe next time.  Very spacious.  We will most definitely stay with them again, and hopefully this time, we can visit with them more.

This space was awesome - we LOVED the sauna after a long night of helping an artist friend put on a food event at a local winery. The mattress is firm, high-quality memory foam and it was super comfortable! As stated, this Air B&B is located in a neighborhood, so we did hear a dog barking in the early morning. The space is completely separate from the living space of the owners of the home - it's located underneath their house, so we did hear footsteps once or twice, which was no big deal for us. When we arrived there were breakfast burritos in the freezer, a wine bottle opener, sparkling mineral water, and thick, fluffy towels in the bathroom. Also, a small dish of chocolates! Very well-appointed space, and the hosts were really kind, cool people. Since it's on the West side of Salem, it's closer to the wineries located in the area then other places located in the Salem area. All in all, a great experience, and we will totally go back there if we ever need a place to stay in Salem!
Beautiful sweet space. We weren't there long but Steve and Robin were friendly and their space was inviting!

Steve and Robin were at the place when we arrived and what a sweet couple they are! There were some welcome gifts and breakfast supplies ready to go. The apartment is very comfortable, great bed and bedding, and a sauna that was a real treat. Whilst Steve and Robin maintained our privacy, they let us know that if we needed anything, they were just upstairs (we didn't but it was nice to know). All in all, a delightful stay in a very nice apartment in quiet neighborhood close to downtown. Perfect, and many thanks!
Robin and Steve made us feel welcome from the very start. They contacted us ahead of time giving us access info. They have a beautiful home. Very clean and details for comfort were thought through.

I thoroughly enjoyed staying at Steve and Robins' listing! From the start to the finish they were very good as regards timely communication, making me feel very comfortable about where I would be staying. This was my first Airbnb stay, and it was a good experience. And this listing is larger than I had imagined it would be. It's very well maintained and kept superbly clean! I felt very comfortable and most importantly- safe. If I ever need to stay in Salem again, I'd love to stay here-and this time enjoy the sauna!

Steve and Robin were very kind.  They brought by some delicious decaf and homebaked muffins one morning and even provided a blender for making smoothies!  Communication was good and they made us feel welcome.  The rooms are very spacious, and the bed in the bedroom was comfortable (the sofa bed not so much, beware).  Despite the description, there isn't a kitchen, just a microwave and a small frig, so I wouldn't plan on preparing any food.  Currently there isn't really a cozy spot to hang out and read a book, have a glass of wine, play a game, or just enjoy some conversation -- just a couple of bar chairs at the bar and two couches with no tables or reading lamps.  But this could easily be remedied with a little furniture rearrangement and the addition of a reading lamp, a coffee or end table, and an armchair to the love seat.

We enjoyed our stay in Steve and Robin's lovely suite. It was clean and comfortable. Communication was clear and prompt anytime we needed anything. We would love to stay again the next time we visit Salem.

The space is in a downstairs area below the main house where the hosts stay. With the layout of the house, we were presented with a very spacious and cozy feeling living space, and we also felt a great sense of privacy. The space is well complimented by the nice hard wood flooring and the sauna was a nice touch to unwind after a long day.

The room is nice and spacious with the bed offering a warm and cozy night's rest.

The bar style counter with bar stools was a nice area to do work in the middle of the night with excellent lighting.

Having this visit be a quick one night stay, we didn't have much time to interact with the hosts, but they definitely made us feel very welcome and were easy to reach through text messaging. Before checking out, they came an introduced themselves making the experience more personable and greatly appreciated.

GORGEOUS suite, perfect location for Salem and surrounding areas!  Steve and Robin have provided everything you could want and the sauna is icing on the cake!  Privacy galore, but Robin and Steve were readily available for any questions.  We needed something sent from home and they went out of their way to assist!   5 stars!

We enjoyed our stay here in West Salem. The house was as described and we were welcomed with sparkling water and chocolate. Shampoo, soap etc. was offered in the bathroom. Coffee, breakfast and tea was offered as well. Robin and Steve were really nice to us and took my girlfriend to church, while I was working. Thank you for a pleasant stay! We might be back this summer

This place was fantastic. The directions for getting in were spot on, there was a nice welcome sign with candy for us. Steve and Robin came down to meet us and brought a bottle of sparkling water. Breakfast was provided. Fantastic stay. Thanks!
What a great space!  Well cared for with lots of little touches (Keurig coffee pods, chocolates, etc.).  Steve and Robin made us feel very welcome and take pride in being good hosts.

This space was the perfect R&R place for us-clean, cozy & quiet! We loved the sauna and kitchen addition. The location was ideal to downtown and we would recommend this Airbnb location to anyone! We will stay here again for sure.
Fantastic place to stay. Beautiful part of Salem and the house was nicer than advertised. You can't go wrong.

We were greeted with a welcome sign in the rental upon arrival. The neighborhood is very quite and accessible. The hosts were gracious and provided breakfast foods for our convenience. They were extremely responsive to emails. The unit looked as described in the listing. I would have no problem recommending this location to other renters.
The room was clean, well appointed and welcoming, thanks.

Great little apartment close to the freeway, but not too close. We only stayed one night but it was a great experience ! Beautiful home with a nice, clean, roomy apartment attached. We had the opportunity to have a nice chat with Robin and she was delightful! I would defiantly recumbent this apartment for anyone looking for a luxury apartment to stay in, but still nice and cozy.

First off - me and my girlfriend were traveling from Seattle, and had spent a couple nights in Portland before getting into Salem for a wedding at 3pm. We contacted Steve and Robin about the possibility of checking in a little early seeing as how usually check-ins aren't until 3 or 4pm. They were prompt and responded quickly and let us know that if the previous guests were leaving early they would do their best to have it ready earlier. 5 stars for customer service alone! We were in luck and the previous guests had checked out early, so Steve and Robin let us know right away that they would have the suite ready for us when we arrived in at 2pm. This saved us a lot of trouble, and put our minds at east so we wouldn't have to be frantically getting ready as soon as we arrived.

Robin greeted us upon arrival and showed us the Suite, which looks even better in person. She was super friendly and even wrote a welcome note laid out with chocolates and a stocked breakfast bar.

Couldn't ask for more hospitality, stay was superb all across the board. Great location, only a 10 minute drive to Zenith vineyards where our friend's wedding was.

Thank you Steve and Robin!

Steve and Robin met us when we parked, and were warm and welcoming. Their home is beautiful, on a tucked-away street. The lower level is yours and it's updated, tastefully decorated and relaxing. They left breakfast burritos, oatmeal, tea and coffee, and some chocolates for us to enjoy the night and next morning. The sauna is lovely, soap/shampoo, towels are provided, and the bed was very comfortable! I would definitely come back to this peaceful, deluxe location. Thank you Robin and Steve!
The hosts were wonderful, as was the space. The neighborhood was especially nice with the listing being on a quiet & lovely flower-filled block.

This is a lovely little downstairs suite in a quiet neighborhood. Steve and Robin showed us in and made us feel right at home. The information says they provide "necessities" like shampoo and soap, but there were so many other little things that made this place special, like being greeted with chocolates and sparkling water, and the yummy breakfast burritos and hot chocolate in the morning, and the fancy soaps and comfortable bedding. We highly recommend the location and the hosts!

We spent three nights at Steve and Robins lovely room. Our son was graduating from OSU in Corvallis and we were welcomed with a sign congratulating him. Very thoughtful! The room was so clean, spacious and comfortable! It was just like the pictures that were posted. One surprise that I enjoyed was the little garden sitting area just outside the sliding door. A great place to drink some tea or read for a while.  They had everything we needed and it was decorated beautifully, especially the bedroom and bathroom. We had an extra day after the graduation so we took their suggestion and drove to Silver Falls State Park. That was a highlight of our trip and was only about an hour away. We really enjoyed our stay in Salem!
Steve & Robbin are really nice people and were very interested in us (where we come from, where we planned to go to). We were very welcome to use their house en would come back again !

Steve & Robin were very accommodating and their apartment was exceptionally clean and comfortable for our family of four. We especially enjoyed the sauna during our three-night stay. The kitchenette includes a sink, microwave and flatware and allowed for making simple meals. A brand new grill awaited us on the patio which we made great use of. We would definitely stay here again!

Steve and Robin were awesome and great host. They made us feel right at home and their place was absolutely beautiful. This was my first time using Airbnb and was blown away with how easy and great of a home this was. Would do it again.
Really nice place. Comfortable bed and relaxing environment. Will definitely stay here again.

Well we got to Robin and Steves home in the PM coming from Az and everything was set up for  us. We came to Orgon for our oldest Gdaughters wedding and did not get back to their home until  late. Not a problem. Robin met us in the morning, how sweet and caring Lady. Steve came to meet us and he is cool guy. The home was set up super, well what we wanted, west Salem close to everything,

Wonderfully clean and well appointed, the owners provide a super-clean BnB with soft bedding and fresh new towels. The sauna was a delightful treat after a long bike ride. You can hear footsteps upstairs, so light sleepers should take note, but otherwise it is comfortable, spacious and far above the usual BnB. An elegant daylight basement retreat! Robin was a gracious and welcoming host. I recommend!
A very nice space! Close enough to the highway to get around, but far enough away to feel homey. Loved the sauna! Instructions were clear, and everything was clean and safe.
very quiet and peaceful.

Steve and Robin were incredibly friendly and welcoming, even providing us with some sparkling water on arrival. It served as an excellent home base for Silver Falls and Eola-Amity and lower Wilamette Valley AVA. Only downside which was minor was the house transits sound easily from upstairs, but this was not a problem during normal sleeping hours. Overall, nice people and a nice place to stay.

Steve and Robin were great hosts for our family of four. Their home was just as described and our family felt right at home in this space. We chose to stay here because it was close to both Portland and Eugene. The neighborhood was nice and seemed very safe. My wife particularly enjoyed the colorful flowers and seating area outside. If we had spent longer we would have used the grill outside too.

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to my family and friends.
Steve and Robin were very personal, warm, and welcoming to us. They provided everything they said, and the space was exactly as expected and lovely.

We had a rejuvenating stay at Steve and Robins, the space was beautiful and super clean. Steve and Robin were very kind, offering us treats and taking time to listen to a bubbling 8 year old. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom was lovely and the spa was well appreciated.
The hostess came out and greeted us. She was very nice. The neighborhood was lovely and convenient for our destination.

Lovely basement level flat. Very clean and comfortable with a thoughtful bottle of sparkling water in the fridge and a nice kitchen setup. I was in town for work and enjoyed staying at their very comfortable apartment / flat. Kindly provided instructions on parking and entry ahead of time to make the arrival easy.
We meant Steve and Robin on our arrival and they were gracious and helpful. Everything was as described and extremely clean, a huge plus. Beautiful, quiet setting.
We had great stay.

Robin and Steve were great!  Prompt communication.  Suite was absolutely clean and they left chocolates and sparkling water on arrival.  Easy to come and go.  Robin gave a great park run recommendation and both owners were friendly.  I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it :)

Great place to stay! Comfortably sleep 4 people, clean, well appointed and location was excellent to local wineries. We attended a wedding at a neighboring winery, and had no problem getting there and back.  Regretfully didn't have time to try sauna, will definitely stay here again if in the area.   Host had a great selection of teas and coffee for the morning along with breakfast burritos. All around great experience.
Great, we got in late and it was no problem. We had privacy and the space was very nice.

Steve and Robin are absolutely great - you can tell they care a lot about their guests comfort. We were very fortunate to be able to meet them during our stay.

The suite maybe the nicest Airbnb accommodation that I've experienced. It's spacious, has a lovely living room space, and the outdoor patio was perfect for a morning coffee.

I highly recommend staying here if you're looking to explore Salem and the surrounding area!
They were great hosts and made me feel super welcome and at home in this new town! Such a cozy spot!
Beautiful property! Loved the sauna and breakfast snacks/coffee.

We had a great stay at Steve and Robin's! We came to Salem for a vineyard wedding, and the suite is a convenient drive away from everything. The neighborhood is very peaceful and quiet. The suite is quite spacious for 2 people and having the kitchenette is convenient. We would definitely stay here again.
Large, quiet, clean space.  I loved hopping in the dry sauna after my shower.

I had a lovely stay at Steve and Robin's place. It was super nice, clean and cozy. The bathroom was very well-appointed and the coffee/breakfast station was perfect. Robin thoughtfully left a little greeting for us, chilled sparkling water and homemade oatmeal cookies!

The location was very convenient to Willamette University and local amenities like grocery and drug stores.

We took the slow route to Portland and visited small wineries on the way, very close to Steve and Robin's place. A nice side trip!

Robin and Steve were very welcoming! The pictures are great but the actual space is amazing! We had more space than we needed, the property was private and the location was extremely peaceful! We couldn't have asked for a better experience.
We loved it so much we even stayed an extra night

We arrived to fresh homemade cookies and beverages in the fridge! The suite was spacious, clean and updated. Steve and Robin were very kind and made us feel welcomed. We had 100% privacy and felt right at home. We had all the amenities we needed and then some. Would highly recommend for your Salem stay!!!
They baked us fresh oatmeal cookies! They were amazing! The place was clean and quiet. Very close to Salem downtown. We loved it!
Exceptional airbnb! Probably the best I've been to. It felt like a premium hotel. Every area was clean. The sauna was a bonus!
Steve and Robin are soo warm and their property is so lovely, with their permission & generosity, I've extended my stay!!! More to come...

Robin and Steve were such gracious hosts! They were leaps and bounds more than accommodating, so whether you're more of an independent traveler who would appreciate privacy, or a social traveler who welcomes their company---they know how to read their guests. I was in town for work and when I needed my quiet time I had it; and when I needed some friendly conversation they were great enough to chat. All in all, I'd HIGHLY recommend them!
P.s. The sauna such an awesome treat!!

Steve and Robin's suite was one of the nicest and most comfortable places I've stayed. Everything was super clean and well taken care of. Their house is in a lovely neighborhood that was very convenient to everything we had planned. Robin sent detailed check-in info to me the morning of our arrival so I didn't have to follow up or reach out to her with questions. Everything listed in their posting is completely accurate. I highly recommend staying here!
Steve and Robin were such gracious hosts! I would totally recommend staying in their suite if you find yourself in Salem. Such thorough communication and well-appointed amenities! 5 stars!!
It was a beautiful space to stay. Steve and Robin have created an oasis for travelers. My only regret is that we only were able to stay one night.
Nice quiet place to spend a few nights.

Steve and Robin's home is absolutely spotless! I had a wonderful stay from the moment I arrived. They have thought of everything and have gone above and beyond to make their guests comfortable. There is a private entrance to the home for easy access to come and go as you please. The bed is top notch and there is even a sauna in the bathroom. I am an Airbnb host myself and couldn't have asked for a better place to stay. Thank you for sharing your beautiful home.
Easy communication and in/out. Clean space, comfortable bed and sauna as a lovely bonus.  I hope to stay again if work brings me back to the area!

We had a lively stay. The house is in a great location. The living area and bedroom are spacious and very comfy. Robin and Steve provide all the amenities you could hope for. Thanks for the hospitality.
Great place. Super comfortable and really cute! Easy to find and access. Steve and Robin were amazingly quick to respond to my very last minute booking request.

My daughter and I were very pleased with the  rooms they were private, spacious and the neighborhood was very pleasant. We were able to go for a beauitful walk and take a great photos of the morning sunrise. The rooms were clean quiet and spacious, the sauna was an extra bonus.  We enjoyed our stay very much. Thanks for sharing your home with us!
Steve and Robin were super accommodating and their suite is incredibly nice. I would love to come back to Salem and stay with them again.

Robin was very welcoming and helpful. The space was clean, cozy and spacious. We were very impressed with the newly remodeled basement apartment. Steve and Robin were both very nice and made us feel at home.
The hosts we gracious and the space was very nice.
Great home away from home. 6-7 minutes from downtown. Very clean, pleasant space with lots of accommodations. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
The descriptions and pictures were completely accurate.  Large bedroom with a comfortable bed, en suite bathroom with sauna, and a large living room with a patio.
A good place to stay in Salem.
Steve & Robin made us feel very welcome for our stay. Convenient location near grocery, etc. and downtown Salem. Sauna a nice treat!

Robin and Steve we're super nice, and they have the cutest puppy in the world. House was great, quite, secluded, and easy.

The sauna was awesome!
Owners were friendly and helpful.
Wow! Great experience, extremely spacious and well-furnished apartment with wonderful amenities. Steve is a great host! Easy to communicate. Wish we would have stayed longer!
What a comfortable suite.  Home away from home.  A true retreat.  Highly recommend!
Steve and Robin's place was incredible! It was extremely comfortable and the Sauna was amazing. It exceeded our expectations!
Great place to stay! Nicely decorated and very comfortable. Great communication from the hosts yet private.

Highly recommended if your plans take you to Salem.

I had a very pleasant stay with Steve & Robin. Their space is very clean and spacious. I wish I would have made time to use the sauna!

The bed is very comfortable and the home and neighborhood are quite.

Steve and Robin's place was perfect for our daughter's visit to Willamette University. The location was great and the place was spotless. Great communication with the hosts. Even though they were right above us, they were super quiet and not intrusive whatsoever. They provided plenty of linens, towels, blankets, and pillows. We were perfectly taken care of! We didn't get a chance to use the sauna, but it looked amazing. We enjoyed the coffee and oatmeal provided by the hosts. It was a great place to stay. We will definitely be back!

We used the space almost entirely for sleep between conference days and thus didn't take advantage of the sauna or patio. Well-lit stairs down to daylight basement. Met Robin briefly but didn't have time to talk.

Great for our stay in Salem. Beautiful West Salem downstairs spot that was warm and inviting. We were lucky enough to be able to meet our hosts and were grateful for their dinning suggestions. Will definitely stay again if in the area!

Steve and Robin were very friendly and accommodating, but when it came down to the sleeping hours the place was a little less than desirable primarily due to the pull out sofa bed. The mattress was so thin or old that you could see (and consequently feel) every spring. There was also no tv as advertised. All other details were fabulous, from the availability of soaps and shampoos to breakfast and coffee. They did have an ant problem though. It wasn't breakfast worth bragging about (frozen Jimmy dean egg sandwiches and packaged oatmeal. .which we mostly avoided) but the sentiment was there. The coffee was nice. The place was not as private as we had expected, so know that if you were to step outside, it is within view of the host and neighbors. That was fine for our situation, but if you're looking for a truly private affair this is likely not it. The host friendliness made it most worth it, but other than that I've stayed in finer establishments for this cost. I give them the high Stars for the friendliness in the communication and the effort (greetings messages, candy bowl, etc.) but the lack of comfort and privacy will not have me returning.

Everything was so easy and all the details made us feel welcomed and so we'll taken care of. It's a very quiet neighborhood but still within minutes of city center.  We appreciated all the extras like breakfast items, bathroom toiletries, lots of extra pillows and blankets, and space heaters. Robin and Steve were always available for questions and very friendly.
Steve greeted us upon arrival! Everything we needed to be comfortable for the night was provided.  Thanks so much Steve and Robin.

Quiet, comfortable, private accommodations exactly as described.  Well-appointed and the sauna is very nice.  Super-clean.  Nice sheets, extra bedding.  Hosts helpful if needed but not intrusive.  Traveled to Salem for an interview and had a very nice trip.  Would definitely stay here again.
We had an amazing time staying at Steve and Robin's place! They were very warm and inviting and the sauna was a big plus! I would highly recommend this Air B&B location to everyone!

Steve and Robin's place is beautiful and cozy. They were perfect hosts who made sure we were comfortable. And you will be comfortable staying here! It is peaceful and quiet and feels like a home away from home. Lots of good food is a short trip away, too.

All around, a very nice stay awaits you here.
Great place awesome hosts!
Great little spot for a quick business trip, easy access to the Capitol
A comfy private space in a beautiful neighborhood. Hosts are lovely people!
Great, cozy space.
Do yourself a favor and stay here.

Steve and Robin were very helpful and kind. The room was above and beyond what we expected and the extra touches they put towards the home showed. I sleep on the pull out sofa, and it was as comfortable as my bed at home. If I ever go through Salem again I would stay with them again in a heart beat
This a great home in a great area that was so beautiful and peaceful. Steve and Robin are great hosts.
Place was just as Robin &  Steve described. First rate and would go there again!

The apartment was exactly what we needed, very clean and everything you'd need for a decent few nights was there. Also perfectly situated not far from downtown so I could walk in in the mornings. Steve and Robin were very friendly as was their adorable little puppy and we would definitely stay here again!

Perfect for the traveler who values quiet and access to Willamette University and other downtown locations.

The suite is as clean and well-equipped as a hotel room.No need to squabble over who gets the fold-out sleeper; it's as good as a regular bed thanks to the new foam mattress.

Steve and Robin (and their exuberant puppy) were on hand to greet us. After checkout, they alerted us right away when they saw we'd left an item in the suite.

When I travel to Salem for business, this is where I want to stay.  Steve and Robin are wonderful hosts.  The place is private, with easy check-in and check-out.  The unit is impeccable from the amenities and decor to the small thoughtful details.
Have a nice time visiting this B&B the mattress is super comfortable we slept extremely well and it is very clean definitely would stay here again!

This location was better then described! Steve and Robin go above and beyond to make their guess feel welcome. Beautiful private space that is comfortable and modern. The bedroom bathroom were well equipped and spacious: the living area was larger then expected and included a great patio area. ( watched the robins gather food for their chics). We will definitely stay agin!

Steve a Robin's place was perfect for my girlfriend and me. It was located close to some of the hikes we wanted to check out. Robin recommended Silver Falls and it didn't disappoint. There were also some quick breakfast items available which was a nice perk.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at your beautiful home! We really appreciated the little extras (Mini-moos, breakfast stuff, personal size bath soap, etc) that you provided! It was a great time! So convenient and perfect access to our space! Thank you!
Steve and Robin's home is gorgeous! Just as pictured and described. They are easy to communicate with and are such wonderful people. I highly recommend staying in their gorgeous suite :)

My girlfriend and I stayed for a night in early May 2017 with Steve & Robin. The space was great and was better than advertised. I feel like this is the kind of rental that makes AirBNB a wonderful platform.

Steve & Robin were so easy to communicate with leading up to our stay and we even had the pleasure of saying hi when we met them. Their space was wonderful, tons of open room and amenities. Quiet, incredibly comfortable, plus the hosts were kind enough to leave some breakfast snacks in the minifridge. Made staying there a breeze. Their location was super close to downtown, close to wineries, and close to outdoor parks.

I would highly recommend Steve & Robin to other travelers, and I would stay here again. Fantastic space and experience all around.

Very well stocked with quality touches (the bed sheets were so soft!) The studio was very clean and spacious. The owners have thought of absolutely every detail and amenity to provide a comfy stay. I loved that I could wake up and have both coffee and real half and half provided for me!

Steve and Robin's suitewas absolutely comfortable for our visit to see our family in Salem. The sauna is a beautiful luxury at the end of the day, and everything was perfectly clean and thoughtfully composed -- from extra toiletries in the bathroom to a thoughtfully stocked fridge. Would absolutely recommend to anyone. Car required!
Very nice place, clean and a sauna in the room! Perfect for business travel

Steve and Robin's suite was perfect for our four day stay. Very spacious, private, and very clean! Didn't get to meet Robin, but Steve was great and even received two packages for us. Will definitely book again on our next visit to Salem.
Beautiful, peaceful, clean. Truly a retreat atmosphere. Gacious hosts. You can't ask for more.
Very comfortable and spacious flat that was ideal for business travel - easy check in, good location, good wifi, ample privacy. I would definitely stay here again.
The suite is beautiful and well-thought out. Steve and robin were excellent hosts. We only stayed one night and throughly enjoyed it.
I have been a a lot of places on airBNB and all have been great. But this one was almost perfect. If I ever go to Salem again, I know where I will be staying.

This spacious, tastefully decorated basement suite  was immaculate and stocked with everything we needed for a relaxing visit.  We appreciated the small fridge and Keurig coffee maker.  Both beds were comfortable, and we slept very well. Steve and Robin were great communicators, making us feel completely welcome in their home.  Their home is west of the river with easy access (3-4 minutes by car) to downtown Salem.  We'd definitely return and highly recommend this to other travelers.
Super clean, very nice, spacious suite. Will definitely recommend to friends and family!

People will love to stay their place. They were very friendly and made us feel like home. coincidently, Steve graduated the same school as I just graduated and grew up the same town where I live now. It was meant to be to stay that house to meet them. It was lovely and comfortable family vacation. Thank you Steve and Robin!
Nice clean private place. Hosts are attentive and the location is great for walking.
Absolutely lovely space with great amenities and a relaxed atmosphere. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
The place is a wonderful and quiet place to be considered to stay for vacation in Oregon.

Excellent place to stay. The rooms were large, incredibly clean and well furnished. I enjoyed the sauna and the place was stocked with a few goodies for us to enjoy. I would stay here again for sure. Steve and Robin were friendly and kind, but also provided us with privacy.

Thank you for sharing your lovely guest suite with us.
We especially appreciated the coffee, creamer and breakfast treats!
GREAT location, beautiful grounds.
Just lovely

Excellent!  Peaceful and beautiful. Immaculate and with quality furnishings and special touches.  I especially enjoyed the sauna!  We are in between homes and from the area.  We were lucky to find this jewel and magnificent hosts.  It was a well needed retreat. You'll love it too!

This is a perfectly located bnb. Really close to downtown Salem. Easy access to to the Willamette River. Walking and Biking trails. Nice and quiet but yet close to restaurants and stores.

Robin and Steve were great hosts. The bnb was clean with nice touches like bathroom amenities and a sauna.

The living room area was incredible. Nice couches and dining table. A great kitchenette setup with nice extras like snacks and coffee.

Definitely go back again. We really appreciated all the nice touches.

Steve and Robin have created a beautiful hideaway on their property. Our party flew in for a busy wedding weekend, and their little retreat met all of our needs and proved to be a calm and thoughtful balance to the chaos around us. If you stay you'll find a warm welcome and lovely attention to detail! It is easy to tell that inviting folks into their home is not only second nature, but also a joy to them.
Very nice, quiet place. Hosts were very hospitable.
lovely daylight downstair room. great recommendations. such a warm and wonderful welcome.
Spacious, very clean, great living area with TV for relaxing, excellent breakfast provisions.
Beautiful comfortable space and the sauna was such a nice bonus! I would love to stay here again!
Very nice place. Pleasant outdoor area - nice and shady for a cool place to relax in the evening. Indoor sauna is a treat. Good walking opportunities to park by river and through neighborhood.
Great hosts!
Great space at a great price.
Enjoyed staying here. It's spacious and clean. The sauna was wonderful!

Steve and Robin's daylight basement apartment wasn't just clean, it was immaculate. We were welcomed and given a brief tour when we arrived. We had a spot in the driveway, any ammenity we could have hoped for, and plenty of space. This home is a residential area and removed from any hustle and bustle, but also a walk-able distance from Starbucks, groceries, and some other businesses. It was a very nice spot for a couple or small family!
Steve and Robin has a wonderful place to stay, while we were at Salem. It was air conditioned, clean, and relaxing. I highly recommend you to stay at their beautiful place.
Convenient location, close to town and yet in a quiet residential area. High quality finishes from the furnishings through to the linen. Nice coffee machine,  but limited kitchen facilities.

Steve & Robin's place was quiet, clean, comfortable and very professionally managed. I booked this for my dad and his family for my wedding weekend and I couldn't have asked for a better experience for my folks.
It is a wonderful place! Steve and Robin are friendly and hospitable.
A comfortable stay, very clean
Great owners, great place, highly recommended.

Great hosts and great suite. Was easy to make safe for our active baby and for our 4 year old to be in. Best breakfast spread and coffee we have had yet in our Air BnB travels. Highly recommended for anyone but was a great place for our family of 4.
Steve and Robin's place was an amazing spot to retreat to after working all day! Highly recommended!
A very friendly and personal atmosphere! Very recommendable! We would definitely stay again when in town. Thanks again!
Everything was perfect! The place was clean and spacious; Robin and Steve had everything ready and provided all necessities - including some extras :).
Steve and Robin were great host. Their apartment is very clean and tasteful!
As described, a nice, private get away space in an established Salem neighborhood. Great access to grocery, shopping, restaurants--many within walking distance.
Steve and Robin were excellent hosts.  The space is very nice and quiet, and they were so generous to provide us eclipse glasses for the big solar eclipse event.

We had a great time at Steve and Robin's. Our Job took us to the state fair for 10 days and it was great to have such a quiet private space to enjoy during the craziness of state fair.

Our only mistake was not realizing how many stairs were involved to get in and out of the space. My roommate has trouble with lots of stairs so in hindsight we should have found a place with minimal stairs. This was not the host's fault at all, they were wonderful, and the space itself was perfect!
Great location, beautiful property and Steve and Robin are oh so sweet! We will definitely be staying again!!

This space was certainly big enough to expand beyond a hotel room. Lovely spacious bedroom, a living space that has two nice big couches and a small wet bar with microwave and grill so meal prep could be done with a little planning no problem!
My wife and I  stayed 10 days with Robin and Steve and the experience was great. The apartment  was clean and comfortable. I highly recommend their place.
Clean, comfy and exceeded our expectations. Would highly recommend. Steve and Robin go the extra mile to ensure a comfortable stay.

Steve and Robin's Suite is spacious, beautiful and sparkling.  Located below and in back of their beautiful house, it has lots of light and a lovely patio outside, complete with a grill and seating.  There were lots of thoughtful touches included too (coffee, real cream, food treats, a nice steamer for wrinkled clothes) LOTS of space, great TV, great water pressure in shower, fluffy comforter and pillows, etc.   It is conveniently located to WU, shopping and easy access to our favorite hikes, wineries, etc.  Although we'd prefer to keep it a secret (so we can stay there often!) we give this space the highest of high recommendations for a stay in the Salem area.  It was perfect in every way.  And the bonus was meeting their cute little pooch, Anna!
It was a lovely space and the restaurant suggestions  were  awesome.  The sauna was great.
