We booked Leigh's place a few hours before getting there. She responded quickly and the place was ready for us when we arrived late in the evening. The place was cozy and the heater turned on so the place was warm when we arrived. The highlight was the heated bed!  It was the best night sleep of our 6 day road trip! We definitely would stay there again.

Much more than we expected!
Ultra clean, nice and thoughtful touches everywhere we looked and great place!

Leigh and Robert are wonderful hosts. The place was perfect for our needs...a super comfy bed, quiet, and all the WiFi we could use. Parking was a breeze. If you are headed to the Oregon State Fair and Expo grounds it’s perfect! Walking distance!

Be sure to check out the drawers of the table. There are all sorts of helpful info about Salem.

We will definitely be back!

Very comfortable, private space. I liked the special touches.
Although our visit was very short we still got to meet Leigh and her sweet dog.
She was the perfect host!

We had a great one night stay here with our dog. The yard was great and perfect for our dog to run around after our long drive stuck in the car all day!

The place was nicely decorated and clean and the bed was very comfortable. Leigh was very friendly and helpful if we needed anything.

Thanks again for having us!
The space was fabulous... heated bed with super soft sheets, waterfall shower, and great lighting. Leigh was really friendly!
Such a great spot! Leigh has thought of everything and more. Loved the comfy bed, thoughtful amenities for our dog, spaciousness, cute neighborhood, great shower, and more.
Wonderful, cozy and darling! Quiet neighborhood and great location.

Leigh and Robert were fantastic hosts! They were both so easy to visit with and fun to talk to. Ryder (the dog) was a huge sweetheart and so very friendly. Their place is wonderful and cozy, private and comfortable. They had numerous suggestions for us for wineries, restaurants and activities, all of them were spot on. We are definitely staying again next time we are anywhere near Salem.

This is such an amazing place to stay! Leigh is a fantastic host and the space is super cute and stylish. We could not recommend this place more. Thanks for letting us spend a couple of days here, Leigh!
The space was adorable and the neighborhood was great!
Very enjoyable stay and Leigh was great!

This is a great AirBnb! Exactly the reason we choose these types of properties over a hotel room. Very clean, cute space with everything we needed for a great weekend in Salem. Great host.  Highly recommend this spot!

I loved this place. Clean, nice, and super comfy. I loved the hosts. Also, bonus points for their super sweet dog. All the attention to detail and thoughtful amenities made it the perfect place to relax after a long day. The bed and the sheets were outstanding! Definitely the best AirBnb I have stayed in.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this charming boathouse.  The space included so many fun and helpful details; it was obvious the hosts went out of their way to make guests comfortable.  The bed was super comfortable and the decor very stylish and interesting.  We also enjoyed sitting outside in their lovely back yard. Hosts were friendly, fun and very helpful.  I highly recommend.
Wonderful guesthouse, super clean, easy to find, simple check-in experience, and just as pictured! We will definitely consider staying here again anytime we’re in the area.
A lovely place and the most well behaved dog!
Leigh's home was lovely!  The house was much bigger then it looks in pictures and very comfortable. Leigh and her husband were very kind and helpful.

This place is so cute and cozy! Central location is nice - we were in town for my brothers graduation just south in Lebanon, OR but wanted to explore Portland as well.

Leigh communicates so quickly! This was a huge blessing as we changed our dates last minute to stay our final night right by the Portland airport to catch an early flight.

The bed is SO comfy! We had a very peaceful nights rest. The decor is very farmhouse (which we LOVE).

We would definitely come back to stay again!

Thanks!

This was a wonderful place to have as a home base for our Silver Falls trip. Leigh and her husband are super friendly and went out of their way to help (even lent my friend a pair of shoes!). The space was immaculate and well-designed. Their pupper is the cutest and the backyard is charming. We had everything we needed. I would stay here again if ever back in Salem!

A wonderful place to stay! The bed was AMAZING first off. It’s the little details that matter to us as we travel often and stay in hotels weekly. Just a few details we loved: the locally made hand soap that smelled of lavender, the fire pit and wood provided, the small dog bed for any pet you may bring, and the coffee and teas provided were all such lovely touches. We will definitely be back:)

Great place.
Excellent host.

This is a lovely little place in a quiet neighborhood.  It was raining much of the time we were there (just one night) but if the weather was better you could walk downtown (about a mile) to various bars and restaurants. Leigh is a great host and loves your dogs!  We met her Great Dane and he was super cute as well!

What a great place to stay. Leigh was in constant communication and gave us some great tips to make our hike to Abiqua Falls as seamless as possible. She was so nice to us and wanted to make sure we had everything we needed to be comfortable. Her place was perfect to come home to after a long exhausting day of hiking, set just right for some relaxing. Thanks for the hospitality Leigh!

Perfectly positioned in Salem.  The neighborhood is quaint and quiet.  Leigh and her husband are great hosts, welcoming and helpful, but respect your privacy.  The Urban Boathouse is adorable, immaculate, spacious, and well appointed.
Leigh's place is amazing. It is spacious, comfortable, super clean and quiet. It is also withing walking distance to great restaurants. I can't wait to stay here again.

Leigh's place is in a great part of Salem. It's really close to a cool part of town with good restaurants and bars but it's far enough away that it is really quiet at night. It was clean and very comfortable.
Beautiful space and great hosts!

Leigh and her husband are fantastic hosts!  This is my second stay at their Urban Boathouse and I am already looking to book my third.  This time I had my dog with me and it worked out beautifully.  Usually, my pup is a bit anxious at a new spot, but by the second day, she was relaxed and secure in her surroundings.  I could not ask for my gracious and responsive hosts!  See you both soon.
Absolutely worth every single penny! Hands down better than any hotel in the area.
The space was cute and private. Leigh gave us great suggestions for dinner and adventure. Check in was easy and we would definitely stay here again.
Leigh’s place is super cute! It’s very clean, well put together and stylish. It’s the perfect little place! We would definitely stay here again.

Super clean, comfortable space fused with spectacular hosting-craft. IMMACULATELY CLEAN, they must somehow autoclave the entire unit between guests. Soft sheets, chilled glasses, fancy soap...so many neat, unexpected, welcome touches after a long bike ride up The Willamette.

And it’s not just the comforting physical space: Ryder, Leigh, and Robert’s natural quirky welcoming vibe made us feel like we were not visitors. For three days, We Were Home.

Recommend you throw the fuzzy pineapple to Ryder a few times, stroll the friendly neighborhood, and try a cool local wine or coffee on the patio next to the vintage travel-trailer. Robert, Leigh, and Ryder have many insightful ideas how to enjoy Salem and The Willamette.

Very well appointed house, even nicer than as presented on the site which is rare. Checking in and out was a breeze. Highly appreciate houses that are dog friendly but so clean you aren’t sure if a dog’s ever stayed there before.
Great, friendly, adorable dog.
A great place to stay

Leigh's place is fantastic.... private, quiet, roomy, stylish, comfortable and clean. On street parking was easy (free) and close to the cottage. Nice touches like a small drink selection, dishes for two, a microwave and small refrigerator.  Leigh was a wonderful hostess.

I would go back in a minute. Leigh communicated quickly, was so very kind and respectful, and the space she and Robert have created is stylish, peaceful and homie.  It is  located close to downtown, Willamette, waterfront park and the capital.

Leigh's place was such a wonderful getaway. The room was so clean and made for the  comfort of others. Beautiful decor and earthy accents. My partner and I both woke feeling super rested and it was so peaceful and quiet in the guest house. We are definitely open to staying again!
Rad lil spot. Super cozy with a friendly dog in the yard that likes to play fetch.
Cool little house in heart of city. Easy communication and check in. Will definitely stay again.
Leigh's boathouse was great!  Private, priced right, and close enough to Silver Falls State Park.  Highly recommend.

Leigh's place was very nice and close to local spots. She greeted us upon arrival and showed us around!
Thanks so much for having us!
Beautiful space in a great location! We had a great stay at the Boat House. Very comfortable, easy check in, friendly and helpful hosts. Would definitely stay again!
Clean, comfortable and really pretty, caters to dogs so nicely too!
This is a charming Airbnb with lovely furnishings, great ambience, and a wonderful host. Leigh has attended to every detail. She deserves five stars for her attention to details and graciousness.

Loved this place! Cozy and private. Clean, stylish,  comfortable and thoughtful touches throughout! Booked last minute. Quick responses, friendly and extremely easy! I would stay again in a heartbeat! Highly recommend!
Great place for dog owners. These hosts LOVE dogs!
This is the most amazing little house. Very roomy, cozy and clean. The hosts were so gratuitous. We had everything we could need or ask for. We'll be keeping this spot on our list for future visits.
Stylish, comfortable and relaxing.
Leigh's place is just magic. It is peaceful, beautiful, comfortable, and easy. I couldn't have asked for a better, more relaxing weekend. This is my new Salem go-to, and it should be yours too!
“The Boat House” is a great little spot in Salem. I will stay here again.
What a great spot to stay for a trip to Salem! Loved the decor & hope to return some day. Rider, the big, beautiful pup, was a special treat!

Thanks Leigh for a fabulous stay!! We were very well looked after with thoughtful touches such as fresh baked zuchini loaf and local beers to enjoy. The space is very well thought out with everything you would need. We were also travellling with our pups which were welcomed with treats and just loved the yard to play. We would stay again and would recommend dog families this special spot. Thanks again!
Great little place to stay and get away from things

Leigh is a great host who accommodated our weird arrival time and we are so grateful! I wish we could have stayed longer. The guest house was very clean and the bed was so soft and comfortable! There is not a kitchen, but a coffee maker is provided, which was all we needed since we were only visiting for a day. Thoughtful touches include local craft beer in the fridge and a perfectly placed full length mirror. This house is close to downtown, too! There are train tracks nearby and we heard one train at night, so be aware if you're a light sleeper. This was a lovely space for our short and sweet visit to Salem. I would definitely stay here again if I'm back in Salem!
Such a cozy comfortable place to stay! Great location in a charming neighborhood. Very private with a large fenced in yard. Extremely dog friendly with thoughtful amenities.
Awesome place. Very private. Wonderful, safe, appealing neighborhood.  Hosts were very accommodating
Wonderfully cozy and comfortable. Excellent communication and directions.

Clean, cozy, and everything you need. Great linens for a nice sleep. For TV viewers and cooks, this isn't your space. But relishing in conversations and music, by the fire pit, or inside enjoying the coffee and provided beers/Hansen's, you can't beat it. Love it. WE'll be back next time in Salem.

Leigh and Robert were great hosts. Very warm and welcoming. The fenced in backyard was perfect for our puppy. Leigh's dog Ryder was very well bahaved and played well with our pup. Anything we needed Leigh was more than happy to help with. The fire pit was a great touch and let us enjoy ourselves in the evenings. Definitely recommend if you have a pup of your own and want a laid back stay!

Thank you guys!
-Dan, Luba and Sharik

This is a beautiful guest house, provided with absolutely outstanding service by a conscientious and gracious host. I simply cannot say enough glowing things about the service and accommodations! If we are ever in the area again this will be an auto-book, and it should be for you as well.

My dog and I loved this place. Leigh was so welcoming and the entire guest house was set up with thoughtful touches. There were even dog treats and bowls for my pup. The location was great- easy to get downtown and the actual street was tree-lined and cozy. I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to anyone (especially dog owners!).

WONDERFUL! The location is tucked away with easy access to wherever you’d like to go - shopping, walking, food. Quiet space to relax and unwind. My pup had a wonderful time playing with the resident puppy.
Wonderful communication and great advice on dinner options. Super easy access, clean, and comfortable. Great place to stay.
Very beautiful home and welcoming hosts
A very beautiful, calm and relaxing environment, with a super-comfortable bed!

Super great space. Booking this Airbnb last minute I was worried, but Leigh was immediately responsive and was able to let me check in early. No problems upon arrival and  was pleasantly surprise by all the simple details. Very cool space I felt like I was in a fancy little hotel room. Minimalist yet every touch thought out. No TV not and wasn’t an issue when you’re feeling romantic and have amazing food recommendations of going to Christo’s. Truly a great staycation for anyone. Not a place to take long showers 🚿 but everything was very nice.
Leigh and Robert were amazing hosts.  Overall, a great stay.
Great place, very dog friendly, great hosts, well-thought out place.
Great location, beautiful room, thoughtful touches. Super comfy bed
Second time staying at this fabulous abode! Leah is the best host, and it was like seeing an old friend! Super clean and private! Relaxing and zen! Thank you!!
Wonderful and clean place to stay! Leigh was great and responsive. And the bed has a heated mattress pad- lovely! Would highly recommend!

This was a cozy and quiet get away place for our 4 day stay! Very central location to most things in Salem. Leigha is a wonderful hostess, and our dogs enjoyed access to her yard to play around a little bit. Oh yes, the heated bed was a very nice surprise! Would definitely stay here again !!
Fabulous spot
Great place, great host!

Excellent location, great cottage, exceptionally cool hosts - overall an A+ Airbnb experience. Leigh was attentive and easy to talk to. We were traveling through Salem gathering intel on the city (we hope to relocate to Oregon in the future) and the surrounding areas. Leigh popped over and provided some useful insider info, as well as good company in general. Definitely the place to stay.
Leigh’s place is great! She provided an excellent local tip for cuisine as well :) Wonderful place to stay.

Our stay was great! It was even more stylish in person and there were lots of thoughtful small touches. It was great to stay in a place with our pup and to have our own space separate space. I LOVED the shower head (want to get one for myself!) and loved having a heated blanket on the bed for use. My only tip to future visitors is to wear your socks in the winter- the floors get chilly! 😃

This cozy guest house will be a home away from home. The boat house has such cozy features and is quite stylish. My girlfriend and I were so impressed with the living space and the hospitality of the host. The location too is perfect for getting around Salem. Highly recommend staying here when in Salem.

Wonderful location! This is a beautiful space that's centrally located. The home has so many intentional details. She and her husband even included cold beverages like La Criox in the fridge - it warms my hipster millennial heart. We really found the space to be comfortable, convenient and easy to access. The check-in and overall communication was top notch. I would highly recommend Leigh's boathouse to anyone looking for a comfortable space in the Salem area.
I would recommend staying here to anyone heading to Salem for a visit.
Everything was so clean and comfortable and the little touches like the dog bowl and treats made for a great overnight stay. Thanks!
Very lovely guest house. Stylish and cozy! Very nice little get away. 10 out of 10 would recommend.

Staying at the boat house was great! My boyfriend and I are planning to move to Salem and needed a reasonably priced place to stay for 2 nights to look for apartments. The location was right in the middle of everywhere we needed to go. The place was charming with a separate enterance. Leigh was very quick with all responses. She greeted as we arrived a few minutes early with Ryder (he is adorable) to make sure we got settled. She was very personable and made sure to give us pointers on food and areas to check out. It was very cold out and she even turned on the heater for us. The place was clean, the bed comfy, and had everything we needed. As others mentioned, your showers need to be quick due to hot water running out, but Leigh mentions that in the instructions and it didn't bother us much. Overall it was a great way to be greeted in Salem and we would definitely recommend!

Unbelievable bed as many reviewers mentioned! Loved the rain shower and bathroom. Overall a very warm, open space with cool local touches (soaps, drinks, dog treats). Wonderful and beautiful backyard for the pup & an enjoyable walkable neighborhood. The hosts were very accommodating, welcoming, and helpful. Highly recommend!

If only I could give 6 stars! Perfect location, amenities, and quiet private space with lovely hosts. I couldn't have survived my very stressful stay in Salem without thier home and support. With warmest Mahalo, Jen from Oahu
Great spot!

Leigh was a great host and her airbnb is very comfortable and also thoughtfully appointed and decorated!  She met me when I arrived, and then I was able to settle in for a quiet and cozy evening.  I'd go back in a second if I visit the area again!
This was such a nice little private place with super wonderful hosts. I would 100% stay here again.
Nice, clean, private place.  Hosts very friendly.  Nice neighborhood for walks. Good tips on restaurants in salem.
Such a cute, clean, and comfortable space! The heated bed was so wonderful and all of the amenities were local which is a great touch! Can’t wait to come back.
Great little spot near everything in Salem.  Comfortable, cozy and stylish.  Perfect for what I needed.  I will definitely see if it is available next time I'm in Salem
Such a cute little home and very convenient location.

This is a phenomenal place. Adorable guest house, such a cute vibe. The hosts were amazing in accommodating our request for a slightly early check-in due to a wedding we were attending. They always responded promptly and we a delight to work with. We'll be back!
Quiet place to sleep and work. no TV!
Leigh's guest house was a perfect spot for my quick stay in Salem! The place was clean, quiet, and comfortable. Thanks!

This was the first road-trip with my pup. We used a few Airbnb’s along the way, and this was *by far* the best. Some places “accept” dogs (with fees), but this place is dog centric, and one of the few places my dog actually felt comfortable in. The boat house is awesome. Great amenities. Great hosts. Can’t say enough.
Very stylish place in a great location! Was perfect for my quick weekend stay in Salem.
A sparkling clean, charming place! Great bed, etc.  Highly recommended!!!
Clean, private, good Wi-Fi , nice outside area! Nice neighborhood !
Clean, quiet, and cozy space. Leigh is an amazing host who is super responsive. I enjoyed my time at the “Boat House” and would highly recommend it to anyone.
Lots of privacy and a nice roomy feeling. Very cute neighborhood. Perfect location near my son's home!
Gracious hosts, wonderful space, comfortable and extremely clean. My first Airbnb experience and I'm completely spoiled! Loved the local touches in the space too. Can't wait to go back!

Great find! I was in Salem for a few days on business and Leigh’s place was a delight. Quick and helpful communication, spacious and clean guesthouse, plenty of linens and creature comforts, and even a few libations in the fridge. Short walk to a nice coffee shop, good internet connection, and a lovely backyard space.
Clean and cute guesthouse. Had what we needed for a quick stay in Salem. Great value for such a nice place. Our brief interaction with Leigh and her dog Ryder were great.
This was a very nice place. So nice I wish we could have stayed longer. Very clean and spacious. It's in a quiet and cool neighborhood, but only a few minutes from down town.
Cozy and Clean. Perfect stylish little space. Easy street parking and felt very safe.
Leigh is a super host! She quickly responded to every inquiry, and made sure we knew our way around upon arrival. The cozy backyard cottage was sparkling clean. The perfect overnight stay.
A wonderful  airbnb and they are wonderful host's. great location. awesome amenities,  highly recommend if you are visiting the area.
Perfect spot for a stay in Salem. Beautiful neighborhood. Super clean space with plenty of room to spread out. Hopefully you will get to meet her beautiful dog. Highly recommend!

This home was wonderful, we enjoyed the space, it was everything we needed. A comfortable bed, nice bathroom, coffee and glasses, private separate entrance, etc. the experience was great as was communication and everything else. Thanks so much for hosting us!

Leigh's communication was wonderful, the hosts were very nice, and check in was super clear and simply.  The place was super cute, and perfect for my quick overnight after an event in town.  Thank you!

The hosts were amazing.  My dog and theirs played great together. The studio is very private, clean, and was a great hub for me to work out of for a few days while I was in Salem for business. I would definitely stay here again, and would recommend to anyone!
Super awesome

Very cute and cozy place in Salem! Easy to get to, super clean and well organized!!! Leigh was such a great host and even wrote my husband and I a nice note on the door which was so great! We would definitely recommend this place!!!
Great location and place!

We stayed at Leigh’s place while visiting Willamette University and exploring Salem—what a find!  The cottage is stylish, spotless, and comfy.  Leigh gave us excellent local recommendations, and check-in/out was a breeze.  The house is in a safe and quiet residential neighborhood with lots of restaurants within walking or short driving distance.  Highly recommend!

The boat house was perfect for our long weekend in Salem.  It's a cozy yet spacious spot for couples and with a side entrance we had plenty of privacy yet at the same time feel like your staying at a friend's house.  Leigh is also very quick to respond if we had any questions.  Centrally located in a very safe, walkable neighborhood.  We even are using Leigh as our realtor to help us find our next home in Salem!  Highly recommend!
Great place! Very quiet and comfortable.
Great hosts and great space. Quiet and stylish.
Leigh was a great host! We enjoyed our stay very much. Will be visiting again when we’re back in town. Ryder, their dog, was also a great bonus to be around as well.
Leigh’s place is great! Close to some great hiking and some amazing food and coffee in Salem. Would love to come back and stay longer sometime.
This was an amazing experience and Leigh went out of her way to make her space dog friendly.
Good taste interiors and cozy space. Leigha and Robert were friendly and helpful. Oh, the dog was also very friendly and pretty. Highly recommend home!

Clean, comfortable place within a short bike ride to Capitol Building ( and other points of interest).
Really cute, giant size dog is a bonus too!

Leigh and Robert have a wonderful place and were nice to meet along with their dog. Me and my family had a great stay and with it being close to the riverfront for a concert we were attending and in a nice, quiet neighborhood it made for a comfortable and convenient stay. The home was really nice and very clean and they have done a great job with it as a whole. Having a fully fenced yard for our dog was awesome and I felt very comfortable walking him around the neighborhood as well. Although not advertised as suitable for kids it was just fine for us who have a baby who's not very mobile yet. There was plenty of room for a pack and play. We'd definitely stay again if we end up coming back to Salem and are in need of a place to stay.

I loved this place - the nice decor, the thoughtful touches, and the hosts were really present and available. It was clean, quiet, and the perfect place to put my feet up at the end of the day. There is a little kitchenette, but not meant for cooking, other than for having a little bite of breakfast, so definitely plan on eating most meals out during your stay.
Well maintained stylish space
Wonderful host's and a great comfortable guest house, I would recommend if you are visiting the area,  close to everything.

Leigh and her husband are awesome, generous hosts. They can answer any local questions and give great suggestions on what to see or do. Their dog is absolutely adorable and super friendly. The guest house is extremely cozy and if we ever need to stay in Salem again, we will try to book this every time!
The place was adorable and perfect! It was so stylish and the bed very comfortable! The local touches throughout were wonderful!
This was a beautiful and welcoming place to stay
Perfect getaway.  Gracious hosts who have thought of everything.  Wonderful experience.
Great little space; perfect for a quick trip!
Leigh was a wonderful and fun host.  The space couldn't have been more idyllic for our stay in Salem.  Would absolutely consider this BnB for future trips to Wine Country Oregon!

Leigha and Robert were fantastic from check in to check out, giving lots of great suggestions about the area and where to visit. My girlfriend and I both were in town for a Skydiving trip and their place was cozy, quiet the perfect place to rest our heads after checking out the local wineries and night life. We are already talking about our next trip to Salem and this place will see us again!

Thank you
Paul and Debbie
We had a great stay here. Very clean place  with lots of thought and care put into every detail.
Leigh’s place is super stylish and very clean.  Soft bed and hot shower were lovely.

This place was so charming! Tastefully decorated, private and in a great location near downtown. Great if you are traveling with pets. The yard was a great break for our critters after traveling all say!
Wonderful space, always clean and so comfortable. Love the special touches - the guest soap especially! Great location, superb hosts. I'll be back for sure!

The boathouse is a perfect place to stay! Very chic, comfortable and clean! I LOVED how comfortable the bed was! The space was perfectly decorated and the personal touches where very appreciated (unique beer/sparking water in the fridge along with chilled glasses). The location is perfect for concerts at the amphitheater or exploring the downtown area. Leigh was very responsive and accommodating! I can’t wait to stay again in the future.
Beautiful, clean, cozy & comfortable little place! Everything was perfect! I highly recommend staying here!

Our stay with Leigh was so peaceful and relaxing. It was just what we needed. Leigh’s place was very accommodating and the location was convenient to see things in and around Salem. It was a lovely stay and a very comfortable place. We were very happy with Leigh’s place.

Super cute space in a great location -- just 5 minutes away from downtown in a cute neighborhood. The space is stylish, comfy, and relaxing. We loved sitting in the adirondack  chairs in the yard while reading and having a glass of wine. Leigh is a great host, and Ryder is the best doggo.
Easy to get to, very clean and comfortable.

The boat house was even better than I pictured! A ridiculously comfortable bed, a strong hot shower and hot coffee, as well as many other little touches contributed to a very pleasant stay in a tastefully furnished house.

The neighborhood was also quite pretty and I enjoyed walking my dog in the morning.
The place is very quaint and dog friendly! Always a great experience.

Great little cottage in the back of the house.  Nice sleepy neighborhood close to everything you need!  I was very happy with my stay, the bathroom shower was great, huge shower head gives you a spa like shower at the end of the day was my favorite part of the stay.  Cold beer glasses in the mini fridge, along with a few bonus beers.  Wine glasses and coffee ready to go.  Loved my stay here I would be happy to come back !
Always love staying ar this airbnb, always feel so welcome and such a nice space, plus their dog is a rockstar  :)
Simple, clean...all we needed.

Awesome place to stay.  Very thoughtful on ammenities, comfy bed, great towels and great communication.  Lovely touches have been added to make play comfortable. Great location!  Would definitely stay there again. Great host!
A great stay in Salem! There's a fun and unique neighborhood pub that we walked to, F. Stop Fitzgerald's, and we felt super comfortable in the space. Would definitely stay there again!

This is a great place to stay! Hosts are very welcoming and helpful.  Space is private, very comfortable and quiet with a lovely yard and is close to downtown.  This was our first airbnb experience and we were very impressed.  We definitely recommend it.   If we are ever back in the Salem area, we will not hesitate to stay here again.
Beautiful property! Great space! 👍
It's bigger than the photos lead you to believe

We loved this little space! It was perfect & had everything we needed for a weekend stay. Leigh met us upon arrival and showed us the space. She is the best host we’ve ever had! Highly recommend this space.
Leigh’s space is beautiful and restful - with the most amazing bed ever!! Very welcoming hosts who were so kind to my dog and me! I will definitely return if I’m in the area!!
Well kept and hosts were very kind. Their dog is adorable.
This is a wonderful guest studio, very private and perfectly clean and comfortable
The place was very peaceful and serene, we really enjoyed our stay! The place was immaculately clean too! Would absolutely stay again :).
Really really comfortable bed. Excellent shower. we loved it!

Really great space that would be comfortable for an extended stay if that's what you need. Very comfortable bed, very spacious, lots of thoughtful touches like some sparkling water and a couple of beers in the fridge when you arrive. It's a really neat converted old barn. Great for bike travelers;  rolk your bikes right in with plenty of space to park. Leigh was there when I arrived and made sure I knew how to operate the temperature control and everything else.
If you want to stay at a place that feels like home, I definitely recommend staying here! Very close to many locations, very clean, very friendly and beautiful.

Very comfortable and private space. Clean as a whistle. Great location. Good bargain compared to local hotels. Leigh is an especially friendly and kind hostess. We will return next time we visit Salem.
Loved our stay! Leigh was super nice & get to communicate with. We had a short visit, but felt at home. Everything was super clean & was such a cute lil private place.
Stylish, comfortable and cozy. The yard was great for my dog. And the neighborhood was great for morning walks. Hosts are very responsive and welcoming. Two thumbs up.
Super cute place!!!
Great place. Thoughtful touches. Thanks Leigh!

Such a cute clean and private cottage! Very well appointed with everything you will need. The host is very kind and accommodating. The bed was soft and even has a heated option!! Best place I have stayed so far! You will not be disappointed in this little gem.

A fantastic place to stay in Salem! Super dog friendly, great recommendations on restaurants and activities to do, comfy bed & a relaxing space to chill out during the calmer parts of our trip. Really clean and fantastic at communicating/really quick response. Would recommend to all our friends heading to Salem!

Leigh’s place was great! Conveniently located and chock full of thoughtful touches. Leigh responded quickly and the space was stylish and different, but in the best way! Would definitely recommend staying here whenever you’re in Salem!
Lovely place to stay in Salem! Would definitely stay again if we were back down. Thank you!

Leigh’s place is amazing! It’s in a really cute guesthouse behind the main house. The neighborhood feels really safe and nice. It’s very close to everything in Salem as well. When I first arrived Leigh let me know she had refreshments waiting for me in the fridge which was a really nice touch. The place itself is really clean and nice. The bed is super comfy, nice bathroom and sitting area. Leigh and her husband provided great tips about the area which were much appreciated. I highly recommend staying here!
Great place, good location!
I have stay here before and it is fabulous.   Great location.   Cozy and stylish this space is a great and the welcoming feel makes it a keeper!!!!
Great place stay if you want to be close to the city. Leigh and Robert made a great place to make you feel right at home!

This is a sweet spot, very stylish with everything you need for a great stay--even a couple beers in the frig! Nice walkable residential neighborhood not far from downtown, quiet. Comfy bed, soft linens, great shower--we will stay here again when we visit our daughter in Salem.

Leigh's place was great! It was cozy and private in the back of her property and was a great place to stay on our drive from Seattle to the Bay. The guest house had all the amenities we needed  and out dog enjoyed running around in the fenced yard. On top of the place being wonderful, Leigh was a very attentive and hospitable host! We would highly recommend this stay :)

Leigh's place is very attractive. Good bed, very clean. It was very nice that Leigh had left lights on and that she received me when I arrived after dark and after a very long day of driving. I would love to stay again.

Leigh’s property is beautiful. Private, clean, and very comfortable. A great place to end a long day of discovering the local sites. Leigh will tell you anything you want to know about Salem and surrounding areas. What a treat to have such a resource! If anyone if considering staying at her property they should jump at the chance. You will not be disappointed.
Always a favorite Airbnb to stay on my work trips
The Boathouse is a fantastic place to stay for you and your pets! Very clean and comfortable, would definitely come back 👍
Place was great to stay at for the night!
Such a cute space! Very quiet and in a great location.

We enjoyed our stay at Leigh's place a lot. It was very comfortable, modern and clean. The bed was super comfortable, and the rain style shower was awesome! Leigh was super easy to communicate with.

Wee had our dog with us, which Leigh went out if her way to make him feel right at home. If you're traveling to Salem with your dog this is definitely an Airbnb you should consider!
Leigh was very accommodating. We would definitely book again!

My stay at Leigh’s was just lovely. She was extremely welcoming upon my arrival, the accommodations were adorable, very clean, and I loved the shower! Her pup is super cute too! I will definitely stay at Leigh’s place again if the opportunity arises.
Clean, cozy space with convenient access to government buildings. Very comfortable and easy to access. Highly recommended.
Great space in a great location. The fenced yard for the pup was just what we needed! Everything was exactly as the listing stated. Thanks for everything!

A very stylish place, full of thoughtful touches. We had everything we needed (and even a few things we didn't know we needed until we got there!) Had a great time staying here and will definitely seek this place out again next time we are in town!

This was on of the most amazing air b&b’s I have ever had the pleasure of staying. It was cozy and very comfortable. Close to down town. Perfect place to prepare for a test or for just a relaxing getaway. I would definitely stay here again.

Leigh's place is great!  I really appreciated the little touches:   such as the sample size home-made soap, having extra amenities in case I forgot something, and great beverage in the refrigerator.  I appreciated her showing me the heater system, and loved the little bed warmer she has.  Also it was nice she loaned me an i-phone charger when I forgot mine.  Definitely will be back.

Staying at the boat house was a true pleasure! With all the thoughtful touches and well communicated tips, Leigh really made sure we felt comfortable and had a great stay. Would stay again without a doubt.

Super cozy and comfortable place to stay in Salem. I was in the area several days for work and this air Bnb was wonderful. Leigh is the kindest and most welcoming host. Would definitely stay here again.
Really nice place.  SO quiet and very well thought out and appointed...I wish all AirBnB places were like this.
Clean and stylish place. Easy check in and great communication. Will stay here again!

I greatly enjoyed staying at this place. It is a very peaceful and quiet space, with a comfortable bed, and a nice yard. It’s also just a short distance from downtown and the train station, as well as a short walk to a coffee shop and a convenience store. I will definitely stay here again.
Nice space. Was close to the place I needed to be in the morning.
Very nice place. Very friendly hosts.
Wonderful place and great rate. Definitely plan on staying here again!
A quite cozy place in a lovely little neighborhood.  This will be a go to place for me if I'm ever in Salem again.

Leigh's place is perfect!  Private entry and space, cute touches (the fire-simulated heater is super neat), cozy, no TV (which is a plus, in my book!), had everything we could have needed or forgot at home, and a convenient location for our travel purposes.  Only downside is that the hot water only lasts 10 minutes or so before needing to reset, so showers were slightly hurried, but that wasn't enough to make this anything less than a 10/10.
We really enjoyed our stay there!  As advertised.
Enjoyable host and hostess
Clean, quiet, comfortable accommodation !
Beautiful space, very cute and super cozy. Wonderful hospitable host.
Such a cute space - super clean and very cozy. Perfect for a weekend getaway!  Next time I need a place to stay in Salem I will definitely check here first.
Very  lovely place. I unfortunately had something come up so I had to leave early but very nice people I would love  to stay again in the future.

This backyard cottage was wonderful! Super spacious, clean, and comfortable. Leigh was a great host and checking-in was simple and easy. Would definitely recommend this spot for 1-2 people. coming through Salem. Very clean and stylish!

The boat house is a really cool place to stay. It was built close to 100 years ago, it’s been refurbished nicely and it’s very well appointed, it also has reclaimed wood from the original barn structure.

The little comforts (TP, shampoo & conditioner, towels, etc.) were all high quality.

The checkin process was easy. And Leigh checked up on us to see if everything was ok.

Highly recommend this place!

The bed was awesome.
The pillow was awesome.
The sheets were awesome.

The shower rocked! Was like a night at the spa. Great folks! Concerned about my health and safety. Highly recommend.

Very thankful they accommodated me for a one night stay.

Even a cold beer glass in the fridge! Yea!
Highly recommended for a Salem getaway! Leigh made us feel welcome & at home at her place. Super cozy cottage with attention to every little detail.

What great place to stay! If your looking for a nice quiet weekend romantic getaway this is the place to go. Beautifully decorated, comfortable, quiet, a dream come true! Recommend to anyone looking for a great little place to relax and unwind in!
Leigh’s place is adorable, comfortable and impeccably clean. She is so welcoming and responsive, it feels like you’re staying with a good friend. I will most certainly be back.

Leigh and her husband are very welcoming and have such a cute little guest home called the “boat house”. It is very private and clean and has a lot of very cute little touches that made my stay in Salem so fun. There dog is so friendly and sweet to!
Leigh gave me so many local recommendations which gave us a lot to do she a realtor so she knows the town like the back of her hand

Next time I come to Salem I will definitely be coming to stay here! Thanks you guys!
The hosts were so amazing and friendly. The property was adorable and they were very accommodating to our pups! If we are in town again we will definitely be coming back.
The boat house is a great place to stay! There’s a private entrance and a lovely backyard for your dog. The boat house is super cute inside and out with everything you need for a nice relaxing visit.

Beautiful place, great hospitality and a very sweet dog! This place was perfect for my fiancee and I. It was perfectly clean, quiet and relaxing. I loved all the thoughtful little touches! They had everything we needed and then some. It's also more spacious than I thought it would be. Absolutely a five star experience and I hope to go back in the future!

Leigh’s place was great. Perfect size, stylish, dog friendly and in walking distance of shops and restaurants.

So many thoughtful touches in and outside the apartment.

It was perfect for our 2 night stay in Salem. Would definitely recommend.

Thanks for everything y’all!

Cutest place we’ve stayed so far! Leigh and her husband were so nice and accommodating! It was styled SO cute and very clean! Plus they’re dog is absolutely adorable, so that’s an added bonus! Will definitely be staying here again!

Leigh's guesthouse was an excellent place to stay. I stayed here the night before my NCLEX exam and I had a very comfortable and restful evening. Lovely space, very clean, and very accommodating. I highly recommend for those wanting to visit Salem.
So many thoughtful touches. Sparkling clean and great hosts. Cant ask for anything more.

This is a wonderful spot! Really cute, clean and just all around great accommodations. Leigh & Robert are wonderful and were very gracious to us. My only small wish is that there was a t.v. but other than that, it was a perfect stay! Thank you!!!!
Had such an amazing stay!
Enjoy our stay. Perfect place for a couple to stay while exploring Salem and the surrounding areas.
Guys, this place is ADORABLE! Location is great. So cozy and the hosts were incredibly kind.

Probably one of the best AirBnbs I have ever stayed at. The place was cute and quirky with stylish design features on the inside. Leigh and Robert have done an amazing job of creating a space that emulates the best parts of Oregon and just makes you want to hang out inside –– or outside on the lawn–– all day. They were incredibly friendly and giving and had great advice for activities and food. The neighborhood is also very cool and the neighbors are very friendly. Only a 20-minute walk from downtown. Leigh recommended we check out the farmer's market and we were so glad that we did. 100% recommend this wonderful AirBnb experience.

Leigh's place was a great place to stay for the night on our Pacific Northwest road trip.  It's a very nice and thoughtfully decorated cottage situated in the backyard of their home.  Leigh was very helpful in getting us checked in and providing some tips for Salem and the neighborhood.  We also enjoyed sitting out in the backyard with some complementary drinks she provided.

Nice clean quiet space in pretty neighborhood, close to everything & nice to just walk around the area & look at houses. Comfy bed, very clean. Nice fenced yard for my dogs to just be let out for their morning constitutional without concern. -- I feel I should mention the train, though, in case that's not just temporary. (I'm hoping Leigh will comment on this, if I'm wrong.) The place is near enough the train tracks that the (prolonged) 3am whistle/horn as it comes through town can be clearly heard & woke me both nights. Just FYI, if you're a light sleeper.  Otherwise, great.

Super comfortable little place. Lovely neighborhood, quiet space. Easy to find and easy check in. The space was clean and the amenities made it feel homey. Leigh responded quickly to us and helped make our travel plans simple! The dog is very well behaved too.
Very comfy, and thoughtful. Definitely recommend!!
Such a nice couple there. I was so comfortable staying there. It was a beautiful place to stay. The dog was so cute too! Thank you for making us feel like a home. Definitely coming back!

The space is massive and absolutely stunning. It was incredibly clean and includes everything you could ever want in an Airbnb. This would be a great place for an extended stay. Leigh was prompt with her responses and clear with check-in instructions. I would absolutely stay here again.
Our stay in Salem was fantastic, and Leigh was a great host. She gave us a few ideas for things to do in the area, and the room itself was lovely. We would definitely recommend a stay.

Leigh and her husband and adorable dog Ryder were the best! So nice and friendly and gave us some great tips on local restaurants! The house was very cute and creatively designed, and had everything we needed for our short stay in Salem. We would definitely come back again!
Wonderful place with phenomenal amenities! Fantastic place to relax!

Stylish and comfortable. The perfect host. There was nothing we needed to ask for because she thought of everything, even shipped me my charger when I forget it after check out. Truly a gracious host.

Leigh was a great hostess! I stayed with my partner and senior dog, and we all felt extremely welcomed and at-home the whole time. She offered local tips, guidance, and went above and beyond to make us comfortable (even offering her washer/dryer for us to use after we had been camping for three days!). I would 100% stay here again next time I’m in the area!

Leigh’s space was awesome! She called me after I arrived and we chatted for awhile. I also was craving some tea and found a little tin with peppermint in it and was so happy. It’s a safe and lovely little space!
Stylish boat house in the backyard! Close to downtown Salem and local eateries. We loved biking around downtown. Comfortable bed and amenities.

Leigh is a Superhost among Superhosts! Her place is sparking clean, very private, very well appointed and a spectacular value for the comfort and convenience provided by the Boat House in Salem. Bed was big and cozy, rain shower was awesome, back yard was perfect for us and our dog, and as a bonus her majestic great dane Rider got along fine with our 14 year old grumpy border collie :D
Leigh left us to our own when we wanted privacy, but make herself available for advice on local restaurants, wineries and parks. Place is perfectly situated for bike rides and walks to local coffee shops and restaurants, and is a short drive from beautiful Oregon Wine Country.
Leigh takes COVID preparation very seriously, and all precautions were taken -- we felt very safe and taken care of staying at her place for the weekend.
You'd be hard pressed to find a nicer place in the Salem area. If you're road-tripping north or south through Oregon and want to take a peaceful break, this is where you want to be!

Leigh was an amazing, kind, and knowledgable host. Her suggestions for places to eat were just what we needed (we chose Basil & Board), and she was extremely generous to chat with us about Salem and the neighborhood. As for the tiny house, it was immaculate, spacious, and very comfortable! Everything from the bed, to the extra cleaning amenities, to the outside sitting area was perfect for our short stay. Thank you Leigh and family!
Had a great stay, thank you!
If you would like a very clean and comfortable, quiet place to stay, with a great backyard to relax in this is the place. Very nice hosts and host dog is great as well.  Highly recommend!
Perfect for us! We will be back.

Our stay at The Boat House was very comfortable and enjoyable. The house was very clean and included lots santizing wipes and other supplies to stay safe during this time. Leigh is a very thoughful host who was very communicative about local events which could impact our trip, and was around to make sure that we had everything we needed for our stay. We would definitely book this guesthouse on our next trip to Salem!

As our first AIR BNB experience, we are so grateful to Leigh for making it so amazing! The place was beautiful inside and out and honestly we could not have asked for a better host. Not to mention their cute fur baby Ryder. Thank you so much for the experience and we look forward to more great experiences like the one Leigh has given us!
Leigh's place is quaint and cool. We even walked around the neighborhood and felt very comfortable. At Leigh's suggestion we found a local park to enjoy our morning walk as well.
We loved our stay, it was very private and quiet . Very nice towels, and cute little touches.
Super great host and the room was very nice and comfortable.
Cute and quaint spot perfect for my staycation!

This is an incredibly well-thought out space and stay experience.  I had all the information and clear expectations at my finger tips - in the description, at check-in, and in the space.  The appointments in the space are luxurious and convenient.  I highly recommend this space - for a short or extended stay.
Thanks so much for the beer and super comfy bed!!

Our stay at Leigh’s guest house was great! The space is very easy to access and in a private location, as it’s located within a fenced in yard. The house is super cute, very clean, and cozy. Overall very comfortable, and Leigh has all the right touches to make it feel like home. We would definitely stay here again!
Clean, comfortable and safe.  The bed was equal to a four star hotel!  The shower is great.  Overall a great value and we recommend highly.
Stylish space in a very cool neighborhood. Space was clean, check in/check out was very easy, and amenities were exactly as advertised.
Lovely space, perfect for what we were looking for. Would definitely stay again.
Awesome place! Just what I needed for a quiet stay.

Leigh's guest suite was a perfect stay for us for a quick stop on our trip along I-5. Easy check-in instructions - very cute and stylish space that was a little larger than I was expecting. Very nice touches too for our dog - some treats and a designated space for her bowls. Nice shower - easy to use and good pressure. Leigh was very direct and communicative. She went above and beyond to call us just after we'd left to let us know we forgot our dog's food in the fridge. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.

Leigh’s place was welcoming and the space was very stylish! The bed was very comfortable and there were lots of amenities. I get cold easily so I was pleased that there were many sources of heat available :)
lovely, clean space, great location near downtown!
This stylish spot is as clean and well appointed as it looks in the photos. Very quiet, great location near downtown Salem, and helpful hosts.
Wonderful place would recommend to anyone making their way through Oregon
Modern and good location!
Leigh’s place was so cute and nice to stay in! I didn’t get to meet the host in person, but they seemed very nice via messaging!

This is the perfect stop for travelers with dogs! The space is comfortable and stylish, with many thoughtful touches! Overall, our stay was extremely pleasant and exceeded our expectations (including the dog)!
Leigh was so welcoming! Place was very cute and clean.
Leigh's place was fantastic. We were arriving a bit late, and she was kind enough to start the heater and help with the lockbox before we even arrived. The space was great, would def stay again!
Leigh’s place was exactly what we needed for our trip. Leigh was incredibly quick to respond and so welcoming and friendly.
The space was just as it was described, extremely clean and stylish. It had everything we needed for our short stay in Salem. Lorrie and her husband were both very helpful and responded quickly.
Loved this place! Comfortable bed and cute little space!

Leigh’s place is amazing! It is extremely clean and decorated like a boutique hotel. There are lots of thoughtful touches throughout such as dog treats for your pup. Leigh was quick to respond and made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. The big backyard is also great if traveling with a dog. I highly recommend Leigh’s place if you’re staying in Salem. One of the best AirBnb’s I’ve ever visited.
Wonderful guest house. Very cozy. Would highly recommend.

Everything you see and just as the space is described...with lovely additions for a very comfortable stay. The bed was the coziest ever! The space was impeccably clean and instructions provided creatively for managing one's stay in the small cabin. The host was prompt in communication, even the spouse came to greet me upon arrival. A truly lovely and comfortable space with easy access to areas around the city of Salem. Everything about this place was cozy and charming, including the host Leigh! Thank you for a pleasurable space!

Super cozy, relaxing stay in a great location! It was perfect for me, my partner, and our puppy. Fully fenced yard meant that we could relax and enjoy our stay without worrying about our doggo or having to keep him on leash. Plenty of space in the shared backyard, and thoughtful touches everywhere! Leigh was very quick to respond, even when I had late-night questions! Incredible value for the price, we would stay here again!
Leigh is a very gracious hostess. We would recommend her place anytime.

We really enjoyed our stay at Leigh's guest house! Great price, very clean and cozy. There are some very nice touches and attention to detail.  Easy check in and check out.  All around a great stay.  We will definitely book here again whenever we need to stay in Salem.  Thanks Leigh!
Leigh is an amazing, responsive, and helpful host. You will not be disappointed, especially if you have a dog. I will definitely come back if I have a chance.
This was the perfect little getaway for my partner and I. It had everything we needed, was stylish, and very comfortable.
Leigh’s accommodations were thoughtful and convenient.  The history of their home was fun to learn and the space is spotless.  Great dog area and their pup Rider is a joy to meet!
Wonderful little space!
Leigh’s place was awesome. It had lots of thoughtful touches. We are considering moving to the area and she was very helpful in offering suggestions and advice.

Leigh’s space is extremely clean, and VERY dog friendly. We were so happy to find this spot and loved having the yard for the dogs, a comfortable bed, and one of the best cups of coffee on our 2-week trip (just k cups, but it’s the little things!!) Thank you, Leigh!
What a cute, cozy place!
thoughtfully renovated barn to make for a comfortable and welcoming space, even has a mini fridge and a microwave which is helpful when there is not a kitchen, perfect for commuting to work,
Leigh’s place was wonderful! She has thought of all the details, and was especially generous in her hospitality. Would 100% look to stay here again my next time in Salem 🖤
good

Wow this place was AMAZING!! It is the nicest, cutest place I have ever stayed! Leigh and Robert are so nice - and their dog Rider is a sweetheart! The studio they rent is located in their backyard and is really secure. I honestly cannot believe they transformed this adorable and stylish studio out of an old barn! I strongly recommend looking in the left desk drawer to check out the book Leigh made showing the renovation process. Leigh and Robert think of all the smallest things, nice towels, specific instructions on how to use the space to its best value, a heated mattress (I didn't even know they made those!), etc. I only stayed for one night, but felt welcomed and comfortable. Most importantly, during this time of COVID-19, I felt CLEAN & SAFE!!
This was our second time staying here! Just as great as it was the first time, would recommend again.

Leigh was a great host! The directions for checkin for the space were clear and easy to follow. Leigh welcomed me to the space, was really kind, and provided great tips for things to check out in the area. The space itself was clean and very well decorted, with added notes to make the space welcoming and comfortable. Thanks!

Leigh was an absolutely lovely host! And her space is so beautifully designed. They have thought of everything and even provide extra travel amenities such as deodorant and toothpaste, which we had forgotten and very much appreciated :) The space was spotless and had a small sink with coffee and tea provided an eating area. We will definitely be back!
Great place, very nice modern and clean

Leigh’s guest house was so nice and comfortable to stay in. Leigh is very friendly and it was great talking with her. The space was very lovely, the backyard is beautiful. It is always great to find a place you can enjoy with your furry baby. Leigh has a magnificent dog of her own that my mom and I were very happy to give some love to as well. The bed was very comfortable. There was a tv with Netflix provided, and so many welcoming touches like dog treats and beers. If I am ever in town again, I would definitely pick Leigh’s place to stay!
This is a comfortable and well-designed space that is meticulously maintained. It felt very peaceful and restful.

This was a lovely place for me and my pup to stay while in town visiting family. Very dog friendly, appreciated all the thoughtful touches and care given to making it a comfortable space. Will definitely be  making this a regular place to stay when I am in town.
Everything was perfect for a night in Salem. Leigh was helpful and communicative. The place was lovely. Highly recommend!

10/10 would come back here. The place was nice & beautiful. Leigh & Her husband both were so nice. They helped me checked in, gave me some great food suggestions around. Overall I had great experience staying at their place.
We enjoyed our stay with Leigh. We will definitely stay again!
This place was just what we needed for our 1 night in Salem. The extra touches for the dog were great!
this is an amazing getaway place for 2 and your dog loved how cozy and clean this place is

A cute detached guest house in a nice, quiet neighborhood near downtown Salem.

The bedding was amazing and the room had a microwave, fridge and a table for 2. Fridge had some sparkling water and some IPAs. Keurig was ready for morning coffee.

Space was easy to access from gate. Leigh was super friendly and was fun to talk to.
The perfect place to spend a night in Salem.

Leigh's place is so wonderful--really well-designed space, lots of sweet, thoughtful touches (treats for our dog! Beers in the frig! Extras like toothbrushes in case you forgot yours!), and super helpful, timely communication. We like the location on a cute, quiet street not far from downtown, the backyard is peaceful and calm, and it was just so smooth and easy. Highly recommend.
Great little AirBNB, quite neighborhood, clean and very comfortable. I’ve never slept so well on a trip before. Definitely would stay again!!

What a charming studio! Located in a charming, quiet neighborhood in Salem. My dog very much enjoyed running around the fenced-in yard. The studio has a very comfortable bed which made sleeping in easy. Leigh also had some sodas and beer ready in the mini-fridge, plus some delicious treats for the pup. We were very comfy and enjoyed our stay.
Really nice place!
Leigh’s place was great. Very clean with thoughtful touches. Great location close to Capitol and downtown.
Super sweet, clean & comfortable space!
Clean, cozy, lots of lovely personal touches. A great yard if you are traveling with dogs. Perfect for what I needed!
Very clean and well organized place. Nice for a short stay. Leigh communicated very clearly and quickly. Easy check-in and good location for close access to downtown shops and restaurants.

We loved the location, it felt very safe and was quiet & in a cute neighborhood. The room was very comfortable and spacious for us. The heated mattress pad and beverages in the fridge were such a nice touch! We hope to stay here again in the future when I come to visit my family.

The Boat House was our favorite stay along our entire trip down highway 101. It was so intricately planned and had everything we needed. The shower is absolutely amazing and all the furniture and amenities made us feel right at home. Leigh was such a gracious host and we really enjoyed chatting with her when we arrived. I would highly recommend this space!

Leigh is truly such a delight. I loved my sweet stay. I loved all the extra sweet touches she gifted me with drinks , dog snacks and a little soap.
My dog and hers lovvved to play which was such a bonus!
Clean and comfortable home with very friendly and helpful hosts. The communication was excellent as well.

A truly wonderful experience and the best place to stay! I am so glad that I ended up stopping here on my road trip- I got to know Leigh, Robert, and their adorably sweet pup Ryder, and they were all so patient with my cattle dog pup and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable! 10/10 would recommend ;)

Leigh's airbnb was the perfect stopping point for my husband and pup in Oregon. It's a tucked away safe space that has everything you could need! She was extremely friendly and flexible with a later than planned check-in. Thank you Leigh!!

Leigh was so wonderful when she helped us check in. She was great to talk with! I wish we had more time to chat. :) The place is actually much cuter and larger in person. It’s spotless. I was kind of shocked on how clean it was- it was very refreshing. My partner and I were so happy we stayed here instead of a hotel.
The place was very nice and clean, only thing is the bathroom isn’t private at all, it’s a barn door that doesn’t fully shut, it’s halfway open. overall was a nice place to stay.
Leigh has an amazing space to wind down and rest. Such a great experience!

Great value, location and amenities. Leigh had lots of thoughtful touches through out the place like extra towels, toothbrushes, toothpaste, etc. Checking in was super easy. Leigh was really nice and provided great suggestions for food! I would definitely recommend this Airbnb.

the host was very friendly and attentive, and the rooms and property we're very charming.  plus, the room was complete with the amenities of a quality hotel room(coffee, toiletries, even a couple beers in the fridge!).  we would stay here again.
Could recommend this property enough!
The place is very lovely and sparkling clean. Love the stay!

Great place to stay. Super clean, comfortable bed. I arrived pretty late, but gate/door code and self-check-in were a breeze and exactly as described. Was able to park right up front on the street and had a great friendly conversation with the owners the next morning. Would definitely recommend it!
Super clean. Nice and much more open and felt great. Great host and very friendly and accommodating.
This is an amazing place. Private and has everything you could need. The owners are wonderful (as is their dog). Hands down the best place I’ve stayed with my dog.

Pretty much the definition of what an AirBnB can and should be. Nice neighborhood and a cute little cottage perfectly appointed and strategically located. The little library out front was a surprise bonus!
Great hosts and really comfy place just as advertised!

We stayed here as we were brewery tasting along Oregon and hiked Sliver Fall State Park. Leigh has done an amazing job with her Airbnb. She has an amazing eye for detail. From the bathroom to the small kitchenette. As well as our sleep, which was amazing due to the lovely purple mattress. Being we were in town on a what was record high in temperature, we were comfortable with the AC unit she had.

We would highly recommend this place!!!
nice guest house, bathroom is not very private, but it did have Netflix which is a bonus.
Great cozy spot for a stay in Salem. Private, quiet, convenient and clean. Will be our go-to place when we're in the area.
Great quiet neighborhood, close to downtown and owners have thought of everything!  Very stylish and comfortable place!
Nice Little Backhouse, perfect for travelers with a dog! Close to town
I highly recommend this place! Perfect for a business trip or a couple. I give this a 5 out of 5 stars without hesitation.

Nice hosts! Accurately described. Place was very cute and comfy. I’d definitely stay again. Neighborhood is peaceful and nice fenced in yard. Was great for my dog. Their fur baby is a sweet heart.

A side note....I left my dogs food dish out and apparently it was a nice incentive for ants. But Robert helped me resolve the issue immediately and tossed the food and issue was resolved. It might be just a summer thing but keep your dogs food sealed if your traveling with a pet.

Nice people and place!
Leigh's place was awesome! Cute decor. The complimentary beers were much appreciated. Leigh was super helpful in giving us tips for our road trip. Highly recommended!

Charming studio. Was extremely clean and photos are very accurate. Owner went out of her way to make us feel welcome. Left beers in the fridge along with sparkling water. Would definitely stay here again.

My husband and I stayed one night while cycling the Willamette Valley Scenic Bikeway. We LOVED Leigh’s place. It was pristine clean and comfortable with SUCH attention to detail. The mattress was so comfortable and the area is so quiet. Would absolutely stay again.
Perfect size for two people. It’s very central to the area and the host is very kind. She also gave us good recommendations on places to go.

Great location.
Very comfortable and clean and quiet
Clean, cozy and cute!
Great place

Our stay in Salem, Oregon was perfect. Our hosts were very gracious. Their recommendations for what to do in the area were exactly what we were looking for. We felt very safe and comfortable in their guest house. Too bad the time went so quickly. Hopefully we can return someday soon.

We love this place. We had everything we needed, including specialty items like hand crafted soaps, an extremely comfortable “purple” mattress, the rain shower is fantastic, and the WiFi signal is incredibly fast … the overhead fan and air conditioner was more than enough to handle the severe heat wave we faced in August.

The restoration of this space was first class. We hope to return here every time we visit the Salem area.

Leigh’s place was perfect for our weekend getaway! Very close to downtown, in a quaint neighborhood. The space was very comfortable for the two of us and it was a pleasure meeting Leigh, Robert and their dog Ryder. We would definitely stay again.
Our hosts were friendly and helpful. A nice clean place to stay in a good Salem neighborhood. We would stay again.
The place is amazing, and Leigh is fantastic!

Beautiful spot for our anniversary trip to see a concert at the state fair. The fair was walking distance and there is good food and coffee close as well.
Leigh and Robert were great. This was by far the best greeting we've gotten in any Airbnb stay. (And they provided good coffee equipment on request!)
You won't be disappointed choosing this stay.
Super clean little place in NE Salem. Very nice host, cute dog, and a nice backyard to chill out after hiking or visiting.
Loved the fabulous accommodations, convenient location, and friendly resident pup!

The guest house was a great place with everything you need. They gave great homie touches. Close to the town. Leigh and her husband were wonderful hosts, along with their pup. They have us great recommendations. They made our stay unforgettable, We ended up extending our stay with them.
Well equipped and comforable private guest house, very quiet.

Clean, easy to check in, welcoming, peaceful, and dog friendly, what more could you ask for? This was a perfect little spot to do a little work in the bungalow and explore the city of Salem. Leigh was very comminicative and made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. Would definitely stay here again.
A great stay!
Cute spot in a great location
Great place to stay especially if you’re looking for something close to the wineries.  Adorable detached guest house.  Super convenient to many areas in Oregon.
The guesthouse is awesome. Location is great for getting around the area and the house is really cute and clean. Leigh communicated very well and extremely helpful.

Leigh’s place was just what we were looking for. We stayed one night here on a road trip, and it had everything we needed. The bed was AWESOME, as well as the pillows. My husband normally sleeps pretty poorly away from home, and he was lights out all night.

He’s also 6’ 6”, so we appreciated the very tall and high quality shower head. Finishings throughout were great, and the neighborhood was quiet. Our doggo was also very comfortable, loved the enclosed yard for easy potty breaks. Would stay again.
This is a wonderfully run, clean, and cozy place to stay. The location was perfect as were the hosts!
Amazing host and a fantastic space!
Clean and nice place to stay

I cannot recommend this place enough! The location was amazing, there was lots of good food nearby, the yard was spacious and best of all super dog friendly! Our fur babies felt comfortable and slept through the night as if we were home! The guest house is super modern and cozy. Very dog friendly which was nice. My husband and I could not stop talking about how pretty the whole space was! After a long day of travel this place was perfect to just relax!
Space was awesome and very cozy! Super close to town!

Excellent location! Very clean, organized, and well designed. Has all the amenities. Well thought-out, simple layout. Nice neighborhood. Comfortable bed. Affordable. Convenient check-in/out. Would totally stay in this location again!
Leigh was kind and very understanding of my last minute cancelation.
This place was a delightful stay in the valley! Everything is as written on the Airbnb listing. Do not hesitate to book while in Salem!
It's perfect for a couple or solo traveler. Very comfortable and cute but minimalistic and affordable too. Short drive to Silver Falls trails. (10 waterfalls in 3 hours. Yes please.)

This place is both comfortable and inviting, a perfect combination of rustic (with history!) and modern convenience. I loved the aesthetic, the spacious feel, and the welcoming hosts, both human and canine.
Such a great place to stay! very comfortable and home-y! 10/10 hospitality. I would come and stay here again, easily:)
Great place.  Stayed for only one night, but would be really comfortable for a long weekend!  Easy check-in, great communication.

Our stay at Leigh’s was wonderful! The space was very clean and had thoughtful touches that added to our stay there. They are very dog friendly, and our dog had a blast running around with their dog Rider in the fenced in yard. It was a cozy and comfortable space for us to call home for the week.
There isn’t a thing she hasn’t thought about to help make your stay as comfortable as possible ! Would definitely stay again :))
I can highly recommend this Airbnb. Spacious, very clean, very comfortable, quiet. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
The place looks even better in person. Nicely decorated, clean, spacious and comfortable to stay in. Only thing to note is that the shower is pretty small, but I was ok with it.

This place was perfect! Easy to find, on a beautiful street in what I gathered to be a very nice neighborhood. Checking in was easy peasy, and Leigh was very accommodating to my not knowing exactly when I might show up. My pup enjoyed the big yard to stretch his legs and take care of business. The guest house itself is absolutely adorable, thoughtfully decorated to feel comfortable and homey. It's fairly large, and stocked with everything I could have possibly wanted. Would absolutely stay here again!
Absolutely wonderful! Leigh is very kind and hospitable.

Thanks Leigh,
We enjoyed our stay!
Perfect little hideaway. Hosts thought of everything!!

The three of us (one of us is a dachshund) enjoyed our stay.  The cottage is definitely dog friendly with dog treats and a bowl for dog food or water.  The TV had all of the channels and a few of the premium services.  Leigh recommended Christo's for dinner.  A great suggestion.
The guest house was a fantastic stay. It was easy to access, spacious, and clean, and my dogs loved the yard. We had everything we needed and there were some nice touches like extra dog treats.

This is a great place, especially for people with dogs because of the yard. The house is impeccably clean and all of the furnishings are very nice, including a very comfortable bed. I particularly enjoyed the ductless heater, which gave me complete control over the temperature inside. Leigh is a wonderful host, providing great directions both before arrival and onsite in written material. She checked in to make sure I had everything I needed, yet she was not intrusive. The only drawback for me was that I didn't want to eat meals out and the kitchen area is very limited. But for most travelers, I think this is a wonderful Salem option at a great price.

I found the urban ‘boathouse’ to be one of comfort, warmth, and relaxation. I feel Leigh and Robert designed the boathouse with the traveler in mind. There is room to move around, light comes in through the many windows, and it feels like a home. The bed was so comfortable, the bathroom spacious, and the large bath towels were soft and absorbent! Leigh and Robert are caring hosts who made me feel at home. And their dog Ryder is the coolest!! I highly recommend the urban ‘boathouse’. When you stay, make sure you check out the desk drawers. There is an interesting book of the history of Leigh and Robert’s house and how the boathouse came to be.
Perfect spot! Comfortable, very clean, and such welcoming hosts. Highly recommend!

Leigh was extremely responsive, the guest house was super tidy and very homey. Close to taphouses, foody spots, and grocery stores. All in all it was a great experience, and my partner and I would highly recommend Leigh's guest house if you're looking for a place to stay while you're in Salem 😁
Super cozy place. I’d stay again!
Great place, great host, very flexible and enjoyable stay. Thank you!
We spent the night at Leigh’s place and loved it!  It was just as described and very comfortable and Leigh was very responsive to all of my questions. We would definitely stay here again!

Lovely, quiet, adorable space in Salem.  It is close to good food, easy to get to and very thoughtfully put together.  We had everything we needed and our blue heeler was stoked to have a yard to romp in!
Absolutely loved our stay here. Spacious, clean, great location and AMAZING bed!
Very cute little place
Great place for a night in Salem!  Cool space that was perfect for two people. Would stay again.
GREAT location and cozy stay. We loved our overnight stay and appreciate all the nice touches to make our visit to Salem special. Our puppy loved it here too. Thank you Leigh.

This is a very cute and comfortable place to stay. Host was available and communicative.

Parking and checking in were simple.

Plenty of clean blankets and plush towels. Everything was easy to find.

We really enjoyed the “fireplace” space heater while we watched movies. Bring slippers if you’re visiting in the colder months as the floor was on the cold side but overall great experience.

Would definitely stay here again.

Quiet clean and well appointed. So many thoughtful details
Husband loved the heated bed. My side stayed cold. My preference
Lovely neighborhood to walk the dog
Secure back yard
We dined at Basil and Board. Pizzas were excellent. Menu is very tempting. We hope to return
as advertised, nicely decorated and cosy. we had a nice two nights here. be prepared to eat out/order in as there’s only a microwave and mini-fridge.
Great guest house, very clean and comfortable. Check in was easy and communication quick with the host.
Very relaxing and dog friendly. Amall house in the back of her house. Great for 2 people.
Wonderful place. If you get a chance to book, do it!
Stylish, clean, quiet stay in a great location. We will definitely be back!
Lovely quiet space. Very private and cozy.

So clean! We loved our stay. Leigh’s place felt like it was  straight out of Pinterest. Everything was comfortable and so clean. All the detail made this place feel special. We would definitely stay here again. If you like a clean comfortable and stylish place, this is the place for you.

This was a perfect place to stay in Salem! The place was comfortable, beautifully decorated, and well stocked! We enjoyed our stay, and would definitely stay here again. Leigh keeps the place stocked with plenty of extra towels, shampoo, conditioner, bar soap, feminine sanitary products, extra tooth paste, shaving cream, etc which was very much appreciated. I will say that the hot water in the shower doesn’t last very long, so keep showers short (Leigh mentions this in a note within the unit, so fair warning). Overall, we had a great experience here. Also for In-N-Out burger fans, the In-N-Out is only 10-12 minutes from Leigh’s place! We ate there way too much during our stay in Salem lol.
A great place for my first Airbnb experience.  Leigh was very helpful in sharing her experience as a host, and the place was both clean and comfortable.
This space is cozy and quiet with a calm and peaceful feel. Lovely decor. Plus an adorable dog if you’re into dogs!

Cute neighborhood and super duper cute little place! My stay was entirely too short so I’m hoping my dogs & I will be able to return.
So cozy & wonderfully stalked!
Good times!!
Leigh was an amazing host! Very communicative and accommodating. Definitely would stay here again.
Leigh was great. They were responsive with any questions we had. Our stay was lovely and cozy. Perfect location for a trip to Silver Falls State Park.
