The room was big.  The bed is super comfy.  The tentants were very nice.  The living room was quiet and comfy.  The neighborhood is quiet and very little traffic.  I was able to walk to Johnny's to get dinner.  The porch swing is a great touch.
The room was great - love the older house feel and all amenities mentioned in the listing were provided. Would definitely stay again the next time I'm in Salem!

My experience at Nick place was great. As a seasoned airbnb user with over 20 stays I think Nick is a great host that delivers all the right amenities for a smooth and comfortable stay. Thanks for making it easy.

Great location, beautiful home, COMFY bed! Nick was very accommodating of my 9PM reservation, arrival by 10PM. The home was clean, and exactly as it looks in the photo. I had a hard time not staring out the window at the beautiful trees as I tried to work on my computer. I will return if I am in the area.
The room was exactly as described in a very quiet neighborhood. Nice place, I would stay here again.

Nick was very communicative, professional and friendly. He provided all the information needed and was quick to answer my emails.

The place is about one mile from the fairgrounds and about one mile to downtown. It's two blocks from the #10 bus.

Lovely house in good,  convenient neighborhood. Although Nick was not at the house, he replied quickly to questions by text.  Really nice to be able to do a load of laundry there - thanks, Nick!  Great location for easy bike access to downtown Salem. There is a train that goes through multiple times a night nearby, though, so bring good earplugs.
Great location and nice place to stay.
Nice Room in quite neighborhood. There where other guests lodging there but I did not even see them during my stay. Will come back if traveling to Salem again .

The home is clean, comfortable and easy to use.  The shared kitchen and sitting room are very nice.  I arrived after 11 PM, stayed for 5 nights.  However everyday I left by 7 AM and returned about midnight so I did not meet my host.  However I texted and e-mailed and they were a responsive host.
Great place for a great value. Close to downtown and east side with shopping mall and restaurants.
Great location. Comfy bed. Clean room.

This place is super conveniently located to the downtown. I was able to walk and bus everywhere I needed. There is food and other resources nearby. The bed was fabulously comfortable and I slept well each night.
Super easy and convenient.
It was perfect.  Easy to find . Close to what I needed and very nice .
Really nice large rooms, great kitchen, good parking, very comfortable bed.
Second stay here. Very clean and cozy. Great communication. Safe area. Will stay again!

Really clean, updated home close to downtown Salem. Definitely possible to walk to anywhere in downtown (it's about a mile out). Hosts were great, very polite, and the home is extremely quiet. I was here for a month and had a wonderful stay.
BEAUTIFUL home! Charger cables, in-room fridge, desk, comfortable bed and the most amazing bathroom! Very comfortable, quiet, convenient, and the hosts were very communicative! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
Very nice clean and quiet location in a nice residential neighborhood. High quality furnishings and improvements in an early 20th century home. Well done.
Quiet place to work.
This is a very nice home with character. Have stayed here twice. Highly recommend it.
Nice and quiet, clean, convenient to city center but also in a nice older historic neighborhood
Was in Salem to visit Willamette University. This place was quite close. I drove to campus, but I imagine someone could walk to campus if you had to get by without a car.

Nick and Julie made my stay as easy as possible. While I did not see them, they were very prompt in responding to my questions that came up the first night I was there. The description of the room was very accurate with great instructions on how to access Keys. Having the kitchen space was very nice. There were plenty of pots and pans with clear notes on what was in each cabinet and drawer. Very close drive to downtown Salem. If I had wanted to I would have been able to walk there in about 30 minutes. Other guests were personable, but they kept mostly to themselves.
Nick's place was exactly as described, clean, comfortable and a great place to stay if you are in Salem, Or.
This was a great experience. I was traveling on business for a month and this house was perfect. Comfortable, clean and located in a great area.
Good
Beautiful, classic home in a quiet neighborhood.
Beautiful home in lovely Salem neighborhood. Especially appreciated access to washer/dryer.
Clean tidy spacious house in a quiet street.

I was expecting "a room" but what we got was a spacious room in a beautiful house that was very quiet. Check in was easy, and we saw so little of the permanent residents we felt we were by ourselves. We were quite jet lagged and they were very tolerant of our dozing on the couches in the living room.
Very clean, comfortable room, nice kitchen. All was just as described very happy with this stay.
Really nice clean room provided everything needed for a nice nights stay. Comfortable bed very clean place I enjoyed my stay here & would recommend it to others.
Beautiful home in a quiet neighborhood.  I needed to check in late because of work and Nick was very accommodating. Will definitely stay again!

Salem means peace and that's what you will find here. Nested in a canopy of older mature valley trees, Nick's house provides the calm, quiet and sense of nature on this street of trees. Nick's house has plenty of natural wood and modern historical charm and creates a further sense of rest. A great place to naturally unwind after a day of go, go ,go. Great Kitchen and rooms with a view of trees. Clean and well stocked with the basics so it feels like home. Thank You Nick.
Nicks home is gorgeous! It's clean, tidy and cozy! We would stay again! Thank you Nick :)
Nick's place is exactly as represented. Quiet & clean. Every night is a good night's sleep. Would happily stay there again.
Nick was a really great host and resolved any issues we had promptly. The house was clean the bathrooms are nice.
Wonderful house, the host was communicative and helpful at all times. The bathroom although shared is not an issue at all, the housemates were friendly and quiet.
I travel to Salem often for work. This was my third stay at this location and I was very happy. My room was clean, quiet and comfortable as always.

Nick's place was great.  The house is really beautiful. The room was well situated with a  very comfortable bed, and a desk. The shared bathroom was available whenever we needed it.  Coffee on the porch  swing was a real treat.
Great place if you're looking for privacy but don't want to pay for an entire home. Clean and comfy.
Beautiful home, older quiet neighborhood, walking distance to great food and family friendly parks. Patty's off center Cafe has amazing food and service. I would stay again with my baby.

They don’t live there. The house is furnished, but I’ve felt more warmth in houses “staged” by realtors. Four guest rooms, one bathroom. Because the hosts don’t live in the house, there is no-one to tell the bathroom sinks are draining slowly, or to ask for a second towel (we paid for 2 people). The whole experience was very impersonal. There’s wifi, but no TV. Due to the weather, the room was very warm. Again, no-one to ask about a fan. We sighted some other guests, but they passed like ships in the night.

Near as we can figure, the location is not walking distance of anything useful, like restaurants, or stores, so you need a car.

We have enjoyed the company of several hosts, but for the most part our Airbnb experience is like this: someone turning an unsuitable home into a commercial rooming house. And the “breakfast” of the Airbnb name? Forget it, please refer to the “they don’t live here” comment above.

The home is comfortable enough for a night's stay.  Be sure to have a flashlight if you arrive after dark so that you will be able to see to pen the lock box and to see key holes on door and to see and verify the house number.  There were no exterior lights on when we arrived.
A nice, quiet place close to popular activities.

Due to an emergency situation, I had to drive over night and needed a clean, safe, and convenient place to sleep one night to rest for another long drive.

I found Nick's place and I booked less than 24 hours to check in time. Nick responded and confirmed right away. Location was convenient, room was clean, check-in was easy.

Nick, Thank you for being a great host!

This Airbnb was a perfect fit for our needs. The location was close to downtown Salem, yet situated in a quiet neighborhood. Hosts answered all of our needs promptly. We really enjoyed their awesome home.
A magical view and restful stay! Thank you!

Although Nick is not on site, he is very responsive to any inquiries you might have.  It is very quiet, clean, and the bed was very comfortable.  As others have noted, the interior is a bit stark - not very cozy in regard to home furnishings.  Has great potential though.  Great if you are there primarily for a place to sleep.  Nice kitchen.

Nick’s place was a fair value. This room is private with a lock. Comfy bed. It is very close to the road thus this is not a good choice if looking for a quiet place to stay. Host was not on site and I had mild issues with cleanliness of the shared bathroom. Friendly guests in other rooms. It was good for a quick stop along a road trip. If I go back to Salem to stay for longer I will choose another location.
Great place for new people. Close to everything.
Nick had very good communication and responded to any questions we had and was even 0kay with us checking in late. The long term residents are also very nice
Nick's place was amazing! It was in a great location outside of downtown Salem. Communication was awesome throughout the experience, and good advice for food was also given. Definitely recommend!

Nick really helped me out with my super late inquiry after my original host had administrative issues precluding my stay. Nick had the room prepped and ready in short order. The historical house is interesting. Upstairs two other long term tenants share the one bath with airbnb guests. It works and the bathroom is good sized. The room is very useable with a desk. There are several pillows to use. The sheets seem new. I like the no shoes in house policy, it keeps the floors clean. The kitchen is available for the guests.
The street is mostly quiet at night.
I was well rested for the next day's events.

Very quiet residential area, near parks, hospital, numerous & diverse eating establisments and shopping. There are a couple longer term type residents, but I rarely saw them and when I did, they were friendly & polite. The room was nicely sized and the bed was COMFORTABLE! Good communication / information from the hosts. Overall this was a very good value and I  would stay again.
Good location and nice host.

Nick's location was convenient for our plans. There are 4 bedrooms upstairs in an old craftsman home with one bathroom we all shared. We were very lucky as everyone was very considerate. There was no problem sharing the bathrm. Everyone kept it clean for the next person. There is a beautiful kitchen that seemed stocked with pots and pans and dishes although we did not use it. There is also laundry facilities.  Wifi was difficult to sign into and no one to ask. It wasn't a big deal for us though, so much so we didn't even try to get in touch with Nick to see if he could help.  If you decide to stay here think big beautiful craftsman home with a  group house living feel. Things were organized and there were extra blankets.  Very comfortable but a bit sterile. We liked it because we had specific plans and knew what we were dong in Salem. We could come and go freely without interacting with anyone. That might sound a bit rough but we were scheduled out and on overload for the weekend. It worked perfect for us. Also the late check out time was helpful. Thanks Nick for letting us check in early.
Nice place to stay.
If you're staying in Salem, this house has all the amenities you might need located in a nice neighborhood. Easy check-in and check-out, and It seemed like 4/4 rooms of the home were Airbnbs.

The house was amazingly beautiful. Definitely a piece of architectural beauty. It was an easy check-in and I was able to arrive and quickly get to my room to get settled. It was very close to where I needed to be and to downtown Salem. I would definitely stay again.

The house is a bit creaky, but that's just part of the appeal of an older place. The neighbor's dog might be annoying at night sometimes, but otherwise this was a great place to stay! One thing for the taller guests. I'm about 5'8 and walking down the stairs from my room I could bang my head on the weirdly low part of the ceiling if I didn't turn my head to the side. If you are any taller than me, you will have to duck every time you walk down the stairs so be careful! You won't have any other problems staying here.

Only reserved for a hot tub which was on the list of amenities but the hot tub was a bathtub with jets that wasn’t clean and was shared with a shower the roommates were using right before me. Just not as expected.
Very quite home, a person lives their full time, said hi a few times but wasn't a social or homely place.
Very nice and calm place to stay
This is a very nice, quiet place. I highly recommend it. Great location.
Nice place to stay, bed is comfortable  and in a nice neighborhood
Highly recommended! You won’t be disappointed.
Thank you!
Great place to stay! Nice house close to downtown, very quiet
this is a great place
The house is very nice. The furnishings are a little threadbare. The shared bathroom can sometimes be a problem. Good location to downtown.
Very straightforward experience which is what I’m after with Airbnb. All was as Nick said in the advertisement.

This is a nice old house, with a good location to the downtown area.  The bathroom is shared among 3 rooms, which can sometimes be a problem. The furnishings in the rooms could be a bit more comfy and inviting.
Nice house in a quiet neighborhood. Pretty close to the downtown area and the Willamette River trail.

This room was exactly as described. The space was clean and the sheets and bed were amazing! I was super grateful for the air conditioner because Salem was so hot while I was there. I didn’t get to enjoy the space as much as I could have. The hosts were quick to respond and I was able to stay there when another situation fell through unexpectedly. Very Thankful For the quiet peaceful space.

Convenient and clean.  Shared bathroom with seems up to 3 other rooms so timing can be tricky but also half bath downstairs.  Easy to get in and house is very nice.  Bed was comfy and set up in Room #1 to have a child or 3rd person with futon on floor which worked well for us.
Another great stay at Julia and Nick’s place. They’ve re-decorated the bedroom and made it even nicer. Julia was very helpful with modifying my reservation when I needed to change it.
Very nice kitchen to cook in. It was fully stocked with pots, pans, utensils and spices.

The house is close to downtown in an older neighborhood with lots of charm.
The inside has been updated nicely.

Just know there is no host at the house and you will be sharing a bathroom with tenants plus other guests.

It worked for me as I was traveling on business.
You can prefer it without any hesitation
Great location and shared living space! Good deal and comfy room.

Great space for the money. Great value.
The hosts do not stay in the place but are very responsive.

I recommend.

Expect a home!
Full access to the kitchen and utensils, laundry room if needed, and the bathroom is a great size as well, with the bedroom being exactly as described.
great place with a comfortable bed,  and a great location for my visit.
Great space for visitors to Salem!
Clean convenient place close to Capitol. $7 Lyft to capitol.
Quiet house in a quiet and safe neighborhood. The room was clean with a very comfortable bed.  Nice (shared) bathroom and very nice kitchen stocked with good coffee.  I'll be back!
A classic home with comfortable amenities and a simple check in process.
This is a consistently great place to stay in Salem.
As stated it is a shared home and bathroom!
Another great stay at Nick’s house
Great Salem location.

This was my first Airbnb stay ever, and the experience was awesome! Nick provides a top notch place to stay that's clean, friendly, great location, and all the necessary amenities. It's an excellent place overall and a great value with everything you get. I will be happy to stay there again if the opportunity arises.
Nick’s place was prefect! Great location, clean and quiet, and quick response times from the host. I would definitely recommend staying.
Very easy check-in. Nice bedroom. Cute house.
We booked a room with two beds, it turned out there is only one bed, Nick gave us another room. No WIFI when I was there, Nick promised it will be ready soon.
Nice people, clean room. Is a shared space with potentially many other Airbnb guests

Great location for going to concerts at LB Day Amphitheatre or the Oregon State Fair. Bedroom was clean and had a comfortable bed. Quiet neighborhood with parking on the street. Be sure to get instructions on how to get your keys for self check-in in advance.

I was disappointed with this property. The reviews portrayed a clean and comfortable location, but the bathroom cleanliness did not meet my expectations. The home is a bunkhouse, and being it is historic, it is also very noisy and sound travels throughout. I was awakened by other occupants returning at 2am even though they were respectful in their noise levels... The noise just carries. With the Owners not being onsite and it being late when we arrived, I chose not to ask for resolution of these issues during my stay.
The room was stuffy yet I was unable to keep a window open due to noisy street neighbors.
This property was not a good fit for me and I would not recommend.
Nice location.
Beautiful house in a great neighborhood. Everything at the house was as expected and I would stay there again.
Quiet. Wifi good. 4 bedrooms sharing one bathroom. Lock on bedroom door very difficult to work. Only a small sliding latch for locking door from inside.
Easy check-in, spacious kitchen, mutliple bathrooms. My only quibble is that the walls/floors do not insulate noise very well.
Easy check-in, spacious kitchen, mutliple bathrooms. My only quibble is that the walls/floors do not insulate noise very well.
I was at this location for an extended stay,  it was very convenient to downtown. The house is very well kept.
Comfortable home and bedroom. Large updated bathroom. Quiet neighborhood and easy to get to.
Nice and convienent location for activities in downtown area.
This is a great place for me to stay when I’m in Salem for work.

Nick’s home is clean and orderly. Full kitchen is well equipped and spacious. Bathroom is shared with other guests so allow time if you’re not first in line, but it all works fine as long as you’re not in a rush.
Beautiful place with all amenities. The hosts are very helpful and respond immediately. Worth staying!
Beautiful reno of interior. Great location in Salem.
Good location to access downtown Salem.  Not as clean and fresh as it could have been.  Each bedroom upstairs locks with a skeleton key.  I'm not sure how safe and secure that is.
Nice location in a beautiful historic home
Great spot, clean, will rent again!
Great experience. Host responded quickly and made the experience comfortable.
clean, spacious and organized!
Very clean, very comfortable.
Good location and value, very clean and comfortable and easy to check in. There may be other guests so don't expect complete privacy.
Great place. Great communication.
Great place for being close to town and in a quiet neighborhood.

Five different rooms here and best in my mind is the larger #3 upstairs.  #4 is nice as well  as #5 downstairs with its own bathroom. Other two are pretty small but cute!  Its like a rooming house and owners do not live on site.   Shared bathroom can get busy upstairs in the mornings.
Will love the house and area
Great stay!!! Would return

This is a great place to stay and I would definitely return.
Beautiful home that is well maintained, super clean and in a good neighborhood.
Super easy check in and the host are quick to respond to any questions you may have.
Great place to stay, very peaceful place and comfortable room!
This home was perfectly located and comfortable.

Beautiful home in a great location. Everything around the house is well organized, labeled appropriately, and given detailed instructions. I appreciated that the kitchen and laundry were available to use. The room was cozy and the bathroom was spacious and clean. A great, safe spot to stay.
My first experience staying in a private room in a big empty house. Having a room available when I needed one was fortunate and appreciated. :-)
Great host and wonderful space.
These hosts are good people.  We had exactly what we needed, a clean room and bathroom and a comfortable bed.,They were very kind to us as well. Thank you so much for a nice stay.

I have had a great experience at Nick's as everything was as expected.  In addition, I have had the opportunity to meet some other interesting athletes competing in the same race, which made the experience even more enjoyable.

Room had a couple spiderwebs/spiders. If you want coffee bring your own K-Cups. Picture shows they had a lot but when I stayed there was only one. Lots of tea options however. No drinks allowed in the room. The mattress seemed like a really firm memory foam. Decent neighborhood, close to pretty much everything. They also provide nearby food options.
Christy was very welcoming and accommodating for my short stay!

I stayed for 6 nights and 7 days. Christy took to opening up her home with the greatest of ease and a resounding effortlessness that was received on my end with deep appreciation. From the inexpensive room to the offering of her car and taking me up to the local market for food and sitting with light talk over cups of coffee was really exactly what I needed, I could not of asked for anything as nice.
This was not a vacation trip, I took a Tower Crane Certification class with 2 huge exams and I would like it noted that the stressless airb&b environment played a role in my passing of class. Thanks you Christy
Welcoming, and quiet neighborhood

My short stay at Christy's home was super awesome. She took me to the local bars/restaurants with her cool car and had a great Friday night. her comfy room was so clean. quiet and welcoming neighbors and cat.
Christy is very lay back and welcoming.

Where do I get started on Christy? She's unique, one of a kind. I felt like I was staying with a friend though this was the first time we met. She showed me Salem, took me to a good restaurant and we ended up having drinks in a bar. The next day we went out again, to the saturday market. It was just great hanging out with her. One of the coolest, and yet loveliest, persons I've ever met.

Needed a place near Willamette to rest my body for a night while I did my dad duties to move my freshman out of the dorm.  Wanted someplace safe to park my car (loaded with stuff).  Wanted someplace quiet at nite.  Wanted someplace inexpensive.  Didn't care about breakfast, fancy linen, memory foam mattress, etc...  Christy's place checked all the boxes.  Her home is a stones' throw from campus, on a quiet tree-lined residential street, which, after dark, becomes silent night.  I arrived at the appointed hour and Christy was there to greet me, having just finished giving a piano lesson to a student.  She quickly showed me around (she has a remodel so there were places that one shouldn't go).   Gave me a key, and I never saw her again.  Spent the night watching game 5 of the Warriors-Traiblazers at a nearby pub Christy recommended, met some Trailblazer fans (sorry your young team lost), and returned around 11p to a house fast asleep.  Very soon so was I.  Perfect fit for my needs.  Thanks Christy--I left the key on your dining table as we agreed, and then tip-toed out :-)

Christy was very welcoming. The room was small, but had drawer space, and the fold-out bed was extremely comfortable. The house is older, and has a unique and relaxed feel. Very short drive, or moderate walk downtown. There are outdoor cats (my cat allergies were not triggered, the room is cat-free) that are real sweethearts if you care to pet them- Coho was my favorite!
Christy was really helpful in accommodating me. Needed a place in Salem while apartment hunting and the location was perfect, central to the city and in a quiet neighborhood.
Wonderful stay with Christy! She had a pool set up in the back yard, and pie for dessert. The house is very comfortable, and Christy is a great host.
Christy was an excellent host. She made me feel very welcome. Her house and neighborhood were quite charming.  Also she gave me some leads for finding future housing in the area.
Rollaway on the sunporch of a craftsman in central Salem. Christy took time to get to know me and answer my questions.
Very nice lady, very quiet place, very convenient to the airport,very friendly,very comfortable to stay. Highly recommend. I will live here again if there is a chance in future. Thanks Chris.

Staying with Christy is more like crashing with a friend than checking into a hotel.  The room is humble but clean and comfortable, with all the listed amenities.  Christy herself is responsive and friendly, and even gave me a ride into town.  I only stayed for one night but would have been happy to stay for longer.
A gracious lady. Fun interaction with host(s) and guests, way beyond what presents as "conversation" now-a-days.
Awesome house in Salem. Christy was extremely accommodating and helpful. She was able to tell me a bunch of things to do in Salem and the surrounding areas. Highly recommended.
Christy and her place.  Down home.  Down to earth.  Accessible.  It was perfect for me.  Enjoy!

From the moment one meets Christy you feel like you've known each other for decades! She's very warm and compassionate and genuinely loves people ! While my visit was short lived due to a family emergency, I'm glad I met Christy as I now have a good friend in Salem. I'd strongly recommend staying here as you will always feel you are among friends and at home....

Christy is one of the most warmhearted persons I've ever met. She even prepared a cooler room for me, so that the night there was really enjoyable. She definitely tries to make one's stay as great as possible.
Amazing stay. Very nice, accommodating.
It was a great experience! Christy was helpful and offered great ideas for enjoying Salem. It was exactly what I signed up for.
Christina was communicative and flexible with regards to scheduling!
Christina was a real nice person, very helpful and communicative.
Super friendly and very accommodating. Clean home and a surprisingly very comfy cot. Thanks again!!

Christina was wonderful! Communication was fast and responsive, and she was an extremely down-to-earth and welcoming host. The room was nice and cozy, and the bed was particularly comfortable. The sheets were so soft, I dozed off in a minute.I couldn't imagine a better first experience for air b&b.

Christina was really nice and welcoming. I enjoyed the stay, it was a really cozy place with a great kitchen, bathroom etc. Nice decor, quiet area, cool travel books and stuff like that. We had a great chat about our recent travel tales which was fun!
Super close to where I currently work, so I hope to stay again.
Christina was warm and welcoming.  A great place to stay while exploring Salem.  Blocks to downtown and the Oregon Capitol building.  Room was cozy and a great value!

Christina made me feel right at home. It was a treat to be staying in the neighborhood where I grew up, as a guest in her home. She was a kind and considerate host, and I very much enjoyed my conversations with her. I look forward to staying there next time I go to Salem.

great location, interesting house, great host!
have stayed 3 times.
it was great every time!

If you want to stay with a "friend" this is the place to stay. Christina was friendly,  inviting, intelligent and all around a great person.  If you want to experience Oregon like a local this is your place. Thank you Christina. This is how Air BNB should work.

Christina is a very nice host. Her house is within walking distance to the State Capitol and Wilamette University. It was the coldest day of this winter season during my stay, but the room had a heater to keep it warm enough. Overall it was a quite pleasant stay. I'll definitely come back the next time I'm in Salem.

Christy is a fantastic host. She truly goes above and beyond to make sure her guests are taken care of. For example, she offered to drop me off at the transit center for no charge when I left. I would highly recommend staying with her!
Christina is very nice. Close to Salem Cinema and the Capital.
Christina was as great host! The rollaway bed is AAA+ house was super quiet and warm on a cold snowy ❄️ night in Salem. Check in was a breeze I would recommend this spot to anyone!
Thoroughly enjoyed! Christina is very gracious!!!
Great value and super convenient location if the capital mall area is your destination.

This place is a great value!
I needed a warm bed in this neighborhood and my needs were met.
Christina was awesome! Very accommodating, as well as personal. Room was small and cozy, exactly what I wanted. 10/10. Would definitely come again.
very accommodating, tiny room, just what I needed solo traveling
No issues, good communication from host, great value. Definitely recommended.
This is my second time staying at Christina's home. I'll come back again and again! Best Airbnb in Salem!
Christina is a warm, welcoming person with a cozy, inviting house. Safe neighborhood with great parking. Would definitely stay again :) Thanks Christina!

Super friendly household ~ host, roommates, and other guests were welcoming and easy going ~ cute neighborhood with easy, street parking and close to downtown! I would absolutely recommend this house for anyone looking for a stress free stay!

Christy was great with everything, she happened to be in Portland when I landed on a Sunday and offered me to give me a ride to her place, which was very helpful. It is a comfy home and she made my stay very easy thanks to her warm personality and helpful tips. I would recommand choosing her place if you're going to Salem without hesitation.

Third time here! The place was as nice as always. Christina, Chad and I celebrated Chinese New Year together, and had some great conversation about travelling, history and politics. I will come back next month!

house was COZY and welcoming. I slept really well and was able to walk to the BEST breakfast out I have ever had at Word of Mouth
Thanks Christina!

I loved my stay at Christina's place!  The room was cozy with great light in the afternoon, and it was a perfect little get away. I enjoyed the neighborhood, and especially walking to the great cafe Word of Mouth--only 8 minutes away!  Christina's house is very creative and homey.

I booked this room with Christina because it was located very close to the Person Vue testing center, where I took my exam. Christina was warm and welcoming. She was very accommodating and understanding of my need for a quiet place to rest before my exam. The room that I booked was not available but Christina had another bedroom ready for me. Her home felt cozy, comfortable and relaxed. For the price, it was well worth it.
Christina was accommodating and very friendly despite my short notice.  The room was comfortable, and her house had the feeling- sign of home/a very welcoming place to stay.
The host canceled this reservation 47 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Christina's place was great! Tucked away in Salem, yet within walking distance from the university and capitol building. Definitely had a relaxed vibe the whole time during my stay and I would recommend Christina and her place to anyone passing through the Northwest!

Christina was so nice! I had a great stay. I was barely there, but it is the perfect room for a solo traveler who just needs a place to rest their head. The house is lovely, the neighborhood quaint, and it is conveniently located to all of the best parts of Salem.
Great bargain, good company, comfortable bed,
Great check in instructions. Room simple and neat, fit what I needed. Close in location to where I was going the next morning.
A great place to stay in and an even better host!
Christina was very nice, met me outside when I was coming in and was very accommodating of my early morning schedule.
Kind hosts, great value.
A charming and clean place. Christina is welcoming and professional. Loved the experience.
Quiet, nice place with friendly people for the price.
Great host! Accommodated me when I booked only a few hours before arriving
Christina est une hôte tout à fait remarquable. Tout est facile avec elle. Sa petite maison est bien accueillante et je me suis senti "chez moi" dès mon arrivée.
Christine is a very caring host, the bed was comfortable and the blankets were very soft and yummy!
Fifth time staying in this house! Just like every time, I'm amazed by Christina and her husband's great personality and hospitality.
Christina was a wonderful, welcoming host and very helpful. It was a great pleasure meeting her.
I liked the little room, especially the couch which made it easy to sit and work on my computer. Christina is a warm and personable host and was very gracious.
This place is really top notch. It is so close to EVERYTHING and the hosts are Friendly and Entertaining!! Nice room with couch and very comfy bed and built in computer desk!
Everything was as described, instructions clear and I had a comfortable stay. Thanks!
Within a mile or so of downtown/train station in quiet neighborhood with lots of trees.   Not a big or new house, and can get a little busy if people are around.   But on the whole pleasant stay.
I had a quiet and relaxing time. The host was very nice, helpful and accommodating. I loved all the green and flowering trees. Looking forward to returning.
Nice, compact room. I liked their cats and chickens

Very cute home.  There's a covered porch area with seating and books.  Very friendly vibe in the home.  Shared with other airBNB guests and hosts.  If you're in the room with the cot, it's right next to the kitchen and laundry room, so expect some noise early in the morning as people get along with their morning kitchen routine/cleaning.  Otherwise the home is quiet and peaceful.  This room has windows and a door that opens to the backyard, very peaceful.  Cot is comfortable enough for a couple nights, but nothing beats a bed!  Perfect place to stay when visiting WU.  Marked this place as a favorite and hope to visit again soon.
Clean place to stay and was great for what I needed it for (quick night trip). Convienent location and she provided great directions on how to check in and exit.
Cute little home. Great for a central spot in Salem
Very friendly and accommodating!
Thanks again! Loved my week and a hal stay at this cozy place. Very comfortable, with very friendly hosts!
I only briefly got to stay, but what a lovely house! Everything was as described and the neighborhood was conveniently located. I wish I had been able to stay a bit longer!
Christina has a beautiful home and is very kind! My room was the perfect size and was very relaxing! I would highly recommend staying in this room if you're traveling solo!
Great value for a cozy room! Would definitely stay here again. Check in was smooth and Christina was a wonderful host!
This is a room good for a solo traveler. It's a very good value and the experience is worth it. I think it's charming. :)
Cute house, relaxed and friendly host!

I can't count how many times I've stayed at Christina's house. Everything was as nice as before. One added feature this summer is the beautiful pool in the back yard. I will come back and I wish all the best to the newly married couple!
enjoyed my stay, was perfect for my needs.  Liked having an exterior door in the room, nice. Bed was great.
Christina's home is quiet, clean, and amazingly located. Her home is beautiful and I felt right as home!
Warm and welcoming home! Great stay here
Really lovely place, clean, convenient, great value. The hosts were friendly and available. We would recommend this place highly!
Very easy to work with, was able to book a room last min. Beautiful backyard, walking distance to downtown. Would stay again.
The Home was perfect..Christina was a top host...

Christina's house was a super convenient place to stay while visiting my son at Willamette University. The room has a very small, extra soft cot, but I was pleasantly surprised and got a good nights sleep. House is older with lots of character. Loved the squeaky old wood floors! Hosts were friendly and the communication excellent. Perfect place to sleep and well worth the very reasonable rate!
I enjoyed the place. Great value, location, and hosts. Thanks!

Christina was very easy to reach. And extremely accommodating. I knew I was in the right place when I found a little space heater in my room! Very kind. Super low-key.. easy-going, no-stress environment. Cute neighborhood.

I always try to stay here when I'm visiting my daughter at Willamette.  Price, location, and friendliness of hosts really can't be beat!  I can walk to campus, the train station, and to the undisputed best breakfast in town.
I recommend this location yo everyone. Very comfortable and nice. I felt like I was at home away from home. A++++++
Always a great place to stay!
Great house, good people
Enjoyed my stay

Very gracious host and felt very welcome. Loved talking to her, her husband and other guests. You share a bath/shower with others and that was no problem. Loved having access to the kitchen and felt right at home. When business plans became a bit challenging Christina gave me a late checkout which really took the pressure off me.

Would absolutely return!

If there was anyway I can give this place 6 stars, I would! Both Christina and Arnold has been such an amazing host for me.  The place was clean, internet worked fast, and the bedroom was simply homey.  I slept well through the night with no problem.  Definitely recommend this home to a friend who is looking for a spot in Salem.
Quiet, great communication, easy check in, and great price!
Christina's place was very comfortable, we both felt right at home and the price was great.

Hosts were very nice.
The room was okay. Not what I expected. And theres only 1 bathroom in the house so you have to cross through the kitchen and living room to get to it.
If you're trying to sleep in, you will hear people in the kitchen since its right next to it. And theres no lock on the door, so if you're looking for privacy this is definitely not the place for you.

I didn't actually get to stay here because I booked in the wrong city. Embarrassing mistake I won't repeat. nonetheless, our host was very gracious and understanding. I would definitely recommend staying here simply given the nature of the positive interaction.
Very funky, and awesome decorations! Everything was easy to find and Christina accommodated my partner and I at a moment's notice! Lovely!
The house was cute in a quite neighborhood. We had great response and communication with Christina and it felt like home away from home.

This is such a cute + cozy place for the price! Met up w my partner in Salem for a break from family festivities over holiday break and found her house easily. Key was easily accessible. Christina had coffee ready in the morning and was very kind. Will definitely stop here again if I’m in Salem.

this home is so wonderful, kind of funky which I love, central to everything I needed in Salem.  I actually had the whole house.  The rates are very reasonable.  I will recommend this airb&b to friends and of course I will be happy to stay there again if I am back in the Salem area.  Well Done!
Comfortable, cozy, clean, and just as advertised.

Christina's place was even more comfortable than I was expecting. I just needed a simple overnight stay, and this was the perfect fit to stay central to Salem. It was easy to communicate and navigate and all my needs and expectations were met. It was even more warm and comfortable than expecting since it is an old house and the weather was freezing- but it warmed up in no time. I would stay again!
Great cozy place and I would love to come back here!
My second stay here, overnighting for work in Salem. Christina is a great host and I will be staying with her again!
Awesome place, great price and really nice hosts who are willing to go the extra mile! Would definitely stay here again when I’m in the area!
I stayed for one night and Christina and her husband were wonderful hosts. I was in town for a quick day trip and staying with Christina made it even better!
Great space! Cozy and perfect as a home-base for exploring the town. Christina was kind and hospitable!

Christy & Arnaud were great hosts! The place is quaint, clean, & super convenient. It’s rigjt by the capitol and a lot do great spots if you’ve never been to Salem. They’re super accommodating and gave awesome tips about what to do if you’re traveling in the area. I’d definitely stop by again.
Great, affordable room.

Christina and her husband are amazing. I love their house, full of books and nice decorations. It is cozy, warm, quite and just perfect for my few days trip to Salem. Everything is clean and feeling homee... I would highly recommend.
My husband and I had a wonderful stay. Peaceful and joyful home! This is a great choice!
Christina was so kind and adaptable. The home was clean, easy to come in and out of, and comfortable. I enjoyed my stay.
This is my second time staying with Christy and Arnaud, and they did not disappoint again! Great house, comfortable rooms, and perfect distance to the State Capitol. I'll certainly be back!

Christy and Arnaud were wonderful hosts. Great communication from both of them, despite some unexpected challenges (unrelated to my experience). I had a very restful night and hoped that I could’ve stayed longer.
I've stayed at Christina's place for the second time, she and husband always live up to your expectations. More so, they even offered help with transportation. I'd say hats off to their hospitality!

OVERALL: 4.5/5 stars Pros: welcoming & inviting guests, crafty & culturally rich house, clean room/bathroom. Cons: Not so much a negative but more note -
the sofabed was a little firm, could have been a tad comfier.

It's definitely got old house charm (creaky floors, Victorian style latches, etc.) but is comfy & filled with character. If you're in Salem & are looking for something slightly different than your average home, look here.
Christina and husband were great hosts. They offered me a ride when they find out I didn't have a car and gave me tips how to get around Salem.
Great value and cute room for a stopover in Salem!

My daughter stayed at Christine’s place to visit the local college. She couldn’t stop talking about how cute the place was. A heater and a fan to make sure ever person who stays will be comfortable. Make sure if you aren’t used to NE/SE directions that you know which one you are going to. She got dropped off at the wrong address before realizing it and had to call another Uber in the rain at 11:30pm. Address was clearly stated on the site, it was our fault. Other than that, great experience. Owners were out of town so my daughter had the place to herself. Too bad she was only there long enough to sleep. Sounded like a cozy home.
We would recommend this place for sure! Five stars. Christine was very tentative to helping with arrangements and even left a neighbors number Incase we needed it. I’m grateful her home was open for my daughter to stay.
Lovely room in clean and quiet area.
Bed was very comfortable and I slept very well (I usually don't sleep well my first night in  a place).  Very cute house with lots of charm and character!
Delightful home and very welcoming hosts!

Very cute old house. Christina came up and said hi and then let us be. Room was great for what we needed. We went to bed and got back on the road the next morning. The bed was a little creaky, as was the house, but it did the trick at a great price.

Great little space for quick stops in Salem. Perfect for 1 as room is small but charming all around. Owners are polite and helpful. Little extra amenities are a nice touch - adapter, tissues, xtra space heater, plenty of blankets. Lovely back yard for a bit of calm. No surprises which is often underrated.

I loved staying with these hosts, and the house is in a great location especially in regard to the university, but also the rest of Salem. The hosts are very nice and accommodating and I would certainly stay wish them again! Highly recommend.
Christina is very friendly and easy to communicate with.  She replies quickly to questions and is incredibly helpful.  The house was quiet and peaceful.
Very friendly!!!
The stay was beautiful ! The hosts are nice and the house very good located. Would love to stay another time at their Airbnb! Hope to see u guys again ASAP

Christina and Arnaud are very sweet and considerate people with a very beautiful and cozy home! They’re prices offer a great value for what you get, Salem and the surrounding neighborhood is very quaint and clean with lots of little shops and restaurants. A well needed vacation and a wonderful experience with them. Thanks!!!
She is so amazing, friendly, kind...clean room, beautiful house...

I stayed at Christy’s place the night before a job interview. The room was cute and comfortable and I got a great night’s sleep. Overall the experience was a convenient, stress-free interlude in an otherwise quite stressful 24 hours.
Great central location, easy to find and great backyard! Christina was easy to get a hold of and really upfront and honest host.
Great stay really close to Willamette! Very nice hosts!
Lovely room to spend the night. Christina and her husband were very welcoming and fast to respond my questions. Highly recommend!

Christina and Arnauld are lovely hosts.  I was in town for a conference, felt welcomed and got the rest I needed for my daytime engagement.  My room on the first floor was connected and yet it was totally quiet at night.  Nice people all around.  Very comfortable
Christy and her Husband were very friendly.  Room was nice. Way better value than a hotel. I am very happy I was able to stay there. If I ever had to stay in Salem again, I would look here first.
Great space with accommodating hosts!
100% would stay there again!
Christina’s place is great. Highly recommend to future Airbnb guests :)
This place is simply wonderful. If we are ever back in Salem we will stay here. Christine is super friendly and accommodating. Amazing location as well.
Lovely hosts who made me feel welcomed.
This was just what I needed. An inexpensive bed to sleep on. Good conversation in the evening around the fire pit, too.

I was in Salem for one night to load up my daughter's dorm room for the summer.  The room in Christina's place was just right for my needs. Clean and comfortable.  Christina and her husband were very nice and helpful.  The location was great, close to Willamette.
Nice spot in a good location. Had a great night of rest on a comfortable bed and loved being able to access the room from the back door. Thank you for hosting us!
Christina was a wonderful hostess. She has a great house that was quiet and peaceful while I was there.
Private n cozy room for a reasonable price.

One night. Okay futon type bed. Hosts were VERY loud as they socialized around the fire pit out back with about 3-4 couples. Didnt know they would having a small party until the day of my reservation, but they were done by 10pm. Even still I had to be up at 5 in the morning...but everything else was okay. Also, Christine was asked if there was someone staying at her house, by one of the party people, and her answer was less than enthusiastic.
Such a beautiful home. My friend and I really enjoyed our stay. Would definitely book again.
Christina has literally thought of everything that will make your stay comfortable and fun. Great host!
I've stayed at several AirBnBs in several cities and this one was by far my favorite. The room was quiet and I was surrounded by good books and other interesting artifacts.
Cute and cozy. Just what I needed.
Such a lovely, unique house. We walked to the capitol, Willamette U, and the Mission Mill Museum. The location is just blocks from Amtrak/Greyhound.
Comfortable room in a great location! great, communicative hosts!
Cute older house to stay at while in Salem. Pretty close and convenient to downtown.
Classic Craftman home walking distance from great eats with a lovely church across the street
Great place the best value and cool neat area in Salem!
I had a magical stay at Christina's place. Everything was cozy, cute, and perfect. I'd book again.

I stayed here for only one night while traveling with my dog.  The room is small but very cute.  Direct access to the gorgeous backyard was a big plus.  I wish there was a lock on the bedroom door though.  Otherwise my stay was comfortable and I would certainly return.
Such a cozy home! Great communication with the hosts that made the whole process so easy!!
This house is charming! The room was cute and comfortable. Communicating with Christina was easy and she was very helpful. I would definitely stay at Christina's home again!
Cozy place with very cute backyard. We really enjoyed our stay here.
Amazing
Very clean, very accomadating. Great price!!
Very nice place! I like it!
Charming, comfortable, and great location - nice hosts - highly recommend!
Super easy checkin - all the amenities, would definitely return :)

A buddy and I were looking for a place to stay after riding our bikes to Salem to attend a concert. Boy, did we pick the right place. From the moment we arrived, it was an adventure. The home was so neatly decorated, catering to the needs of the traveler. The hospitality of the host's were above and beyond our expectations. They were very helpful in our decision making on things to do while in the Salem area. The time we spent here was the highlight of our weekend. It was such a pleasure getting to know Christina and Arnaud ,they are very nice people.  I would highly recommend staying here....

Friendly hosts, 1925 craftsman’s home, my rented space was a private one with access to the backyard. Dog friendly home, WiFi , French press for coffee, cream and sugar. Gas stove for cooking if you need to. I didn’t need much but hot water and toast a knife, plate and a cup.
Washer and dryer was new lovely to be able to was work clothes very thankful for that & iron and board were available too. Guests may be a few in house ask if you need to know. One shared bathroom in a claw foot tub.
Clean as you go theme is helpful as you would in any hosts home. Lots of books to read and I bet it could be very relaxing in the yard with fire place area and large backyard. I was there for a working trip long hours away from the space.
Way cool host family. Fun back yard hang out. Close to downtown. Enjoy!
Wonderful house and outstanding hosts! Amazing value.

Christy and Arnaud host lots of people and now I know why... They have an adorable home in a tree-lined neighborhood, chickens that provide the freshest scrambled eggs in town, and a comfortable environment for conversation and sleeping.
Great location. Great people
Very cute up and coming neighborhood. Friendly host.
Clean comfortable private room in a house with character in a central location and hospitable and  host.
Christina is a great host. I would definitely book the room again if I were to be traveling in Salem.
A very clean house and offers towels and extra blankets .

Stayed here for one night as a base for exploring Willamette Valley - comfortable nights sleep, nice bathroom, easy check in process and good communication from the host. I would stay again if I was in the area
Great location. Very responsive host. I definitely would stay there again the next time I pass through Salem.

We had a good short stay in Salem. The room was small, but nice. The house is located in a quiet street. Some restaurants and a pool billiard place are within 15-20 minute walking distance, but a car is much more convenient in order to get to Downtown. Christina was quick with communication and we appreciated very much she let us use washer, dryer and iron. They are very open minded and nice people, and gabe us a lot of tips for traveling Oregon and the West Coast. Thanks again for everything! (And sorry for the guests who came after us who couldn’t find the key because I put it in the wrong place. My fault!! )
Christina has such a cute house in a nice neighborhood. She was quick to respond and had everything we needed for our short stay.
To any State Or County employees this is a great location for your training.  Just a 15 min drive to the Training Center and along the way you have plenty of choices for coffee and Bagels. :)
I loved staying here. I slept the whole time lol. It was a low key place nice and quiet. And they were super nice! Would definitely stay again!!
This place was great. Cute house, friendly owners.
Great place to stay. Bed was comfortable.

Such a lovely place! Loved that it made me feel at home 💕 perfect place to stay in before/after a half marathon. very relaxing and quiet as well! would have love to personally meet Christina in person, but the communication was on point and had no issues with check in or anything.

Christina and Arnaud welcome you into their home with warmth and a concern for your comfort.   I walked to restaurants and around Salem, feeling quite safe.  I can recommend this place and I hope to return in the future.
Great place, great hosts and great value.
A lovely and affordable spot walking distance to Willamette U. Christina and Arnaud were friendly and hospitable. For great Neapolitan pizza and jazz,  I recommend nearby Christo’s.
Christina's place was so charming- great neighborhood, older house added some great character. Everything is clean and tidy, quiet, great backyard. Christina was so nice, an amazing hostess!
A beautiful old home! Christina and Arnaud were great and hospitable. The bed was comfortable and it was an easy check in process.
Such a sweet space. The room has a lot of character and the whole house is warm, beautiful, and homey. Will definitely stay again when I am next in Salem.
Outstanding place with outstanding people! The location is perfectly right in the middle of pretty much whatever you wanna do. This will be a regular stop on my future trips to Salem.
Awesome experience comfortable and lots to do board games and books to read. Also chickens so was fun for my three year old to chase them around.
Christina and her place are great. Hospitable. Convenient. Comfortable. I would recommend it to anyone.
Very helpful and understanding!

2nd time renting a room with airbnb and this one was really Nice! We didnt get the chance to meet the hosts when we got there but the Information on place was clear, we felt like home .
Super cozy house and room
Good value and great location near downtown Salem.  Quiet neighborhood.  Christina and Arnaud are friendly and warm, but give you plenty of space if that is what you want.  I would stay there again.
Very peaceful place. Would definitely stay again.

My third visit to Christy and Arnaud's.  With each successive visit, I noticed their improvements to this craftsman home, evidence of their effort to provide a welcoming and comfortable respite for guests.  Over the past four years, I found it to be the best bargain in Salem for comfort, convenience and cost (always an important factor).  Whether visiting Willamette U or arriving by Amtrak, both are 10-15 minute walks.  Plenty of on-street parking.  And the best breakfast in Salem is nearby.
Great hospitality. Room good and comfortable !
A beautiful house with a charming atmosphere and wonderful hosts
Great location and amazing little house. They give local food tips and make everything simple!
This is a beautiful home to stay in! Easy, a short walk (through Willamette University and the Capital grounds) to get to downtown for good food and shopping. Perfect!
Splendid host! House has a calming and welcoming feel which is very relaxing. Room was cozy with easy access to the kitchen.
Christinas house is an old very beautiful house. I had enough space for everything and got some good advices. All together it was a perfect short stay. Thank you
Christina and Aurnaud our very welcoming and make it feel like your staying with old friends. I would recomend their place to everyone. I know I'll be back whenever I'm near by.
Nice little spot for a quiet night. I was in Salem taking a board exam and appreciated the privacy.
Christina is a great host and her home is beautiful as well as being in a very convenient location.
Terrific generous hosts and a great space.
Christina and Artaud were thoughtful and hospitable.
Quite accommodating and kind in a beautiful home. Great to have a place to crash before an early morning at work the next day. Recommended!
Very cute home. We were able to walk to food.  Very personable and a pleasant experience!
This really is a cozy home , very warm and welcoming. The hosts are available and responsive but not intrusive . I plan to be back.

I had high expectations and Christina exceeded them! I appreciated the suggestion she made for dinner, Taproot, it was perfect!
The bed was comfortable and the plethora of pillows was cozy and welcomed! I wish I'd have had time to soak in the clawfoot bathtub.

Christina's place is lovely. Cozy, comfortable, and welcoming. She is incredibly accommodating, and willing to work with specific requests.  I love the house, and the location is great for spending a day in Salem, or if work brings you to Salem. I feel very fortunate to have stumbled on this great place and look forward to staying again.
It's a warm and inviting experience- so comfortable.
Nice couple, cute dog and cozy place.
Great location! Loved our stay!
The warm, comfortable and relaxed environment made me feel right at home - like visiting my little brother!

Christy and Arnaud have a lovely house with artistic touches. The room I rented was pleasant and ready when I arrived. This is a clean and peaceful environment for relaxing and resting and the hosts were friendly and helpful.
The house was wonderful. My hosts were beautiful people with lots of character and charm. I would love to come back again and share travelling stories.
Not a fault to report. Great value for the money
The hospitality and value cannot be overstated. I also made a new best friend with the very well behaved puppy named Otter.
The hosts were very kind and welcoming. I felt at home in their home. Everything was easy and they had all the amenities one could expect and then some. It was a great experience.
It was another great stay with Christy and Arnaud. I highly recommend choosing their home. Wonderful hospitality and great location.
Really nice stay! Would recommend!!

Would recommend a stay with Christy and Arnaud.   Loved the 10 ways to save the earth magnet they had on their fridge.  Both Arnaud and Christy are lovely people and did their best to ensure my brother and I had a great stay.  They also provided a space heater to help keep us warm at night.  Thank you for a lovely stay!

I had a very short, but lovely, stay with Christy and Arnaud. They have a really cute old house in a beautiful neighborhood near the train/bus station and downtown. I really enjoyed sharing breakfast and conversation with Arnaud in the morning before I left. If I'm back in Salem or have friends going to Salem, I know where I'll recommend them to stay!
Great spot, convenient too! Thanks!
Close to the Capitol. Quiet space.
very homey, loved the house and you cant beat the price
Comfortable and clean space that was close to everything in Salem. Thanks again!
Christy was extremely responsive and communicated wonderfully! Check in was very easy and convenient and the room was very clean.
Christy and Arnaud were very accommodating and kind. And though I didn’t get to meet them face to face their communication was superb and the stay was perfect.
From the moment you walk in the door, Christy creates a warm and welcoming atmosphere (and having a cute dog greet you is a plus). This is an amazing place if you ever need a place to stay.
Great place to stay and if I am in Salem again will absolutely stay here again. Christy and Arnaud are very communicative and welcoming. They are stellar hosts and I highly recommend them.

Great hosts, great location, bohemian like aesthetic, great bathroom, kitchen
accommodations. Great price.
Great value. Comfy bed.  Super nice folks. I will definitely stay again when I am in town!

This is a great place for those free spirits who are looking for an interesting place (home from 1925).  It was clean and in a good area.  The host were lovely though I was there only one night and exhausted from all of my traveling so I didn’t see much of them.  They were respectful when I was sleeping to be quiet even though it was early.  If you love the feel of a well-loved sweetly decorated old home you will love this place.
Clean, comfy, and super cute! It's a lovely craftsman house and Christy was very helpful and laid back. Would definitely recommend!

BEAUTIFUL house with lots of nice idiosyncrasies and interesting plants. EXCELLENT hosts, with a very relaxing backyard, an adorable dog, and lots of interesting local tips and information about Oregon. Christy went out of our way to help us  and has made our move to Salem so much easier.  I highly recommend staying here.

Christy & Arnaud's space is super cute, clean, and welcoming! I recommend their place as a simple and reliable place to spend the night. Great kitchen, sweet to see the chickens in the backyard out the window!
I had a very good stay. I was in town for work so it helped not having to drive back to work 2 hours everyday. Great little nook. I enjoyed the company

Such a fun and relaxed stay! It was an excellent escape from several days of camping along the road. The space is a very comfortable set up, very clean and Christy and Arnaud are excellent hosts. Absolutely worth the price.
Everything about the place and the hosts were wonderful!
Wonderful, quiet home with a true Spirit of welcome. A great experience and value!
Great place!

This was the perfect place for my short, last-minute break. Super cute house, very cosy and comfortable in a beautiful and quiet neighborhood. Christy & Arnaud were great hosts; welcoming & friendly, and very willing to accommodate additional requests. Easy check-in, and great communication. Highly recommend a stay here.
Great stay

This is our second time staying with Christy and Arnond, they are wonderful hosts. Very friendly and welcoming but are also respectful and conscious of personal space. Their dog Otter is very sweet and friendly. Room and bathroom are always clean and the amenities are thoughtfully prepared for our stay

Christy and Arnaud were incredibly friendly, welcoming, and helpful hosts. I particularly enjoyed talking to Christy and getting her travel suggestions for my road trip. Would love to stay here again!
A super stylish craftsman’s house with lovely hosts + a super cute dog.
Christy and Arnaud’s place was so cute and clean! The house is also very close to everything so it was just  convenient for us to get food and other stuff! 10/10 would recommend!

Christy and Arnaud’s place is the place to go. In a quiet, peaceful neighbor. The rooms are kept up and having access to the kitchen was appreciated. They are good people with an amazing new pup, Otter. Otter alone is more than enough reason to visit this place. I am biased. I do really love playful dogs. Stay here! You won’t regret it.
Such a lovely home and even lovelier people.
x
Christy and Arnaud's place was a great value and super convenient.  I wish I had more time to explore the area. They clearly enjoy hosting, and have created a unique space in their lovely home.
Christy gave great advice on local places to eat and the room was very cute and clean!
Nice place in town
Great small space!
We stayed in a cute room at the back of the house. Christy and Arnaud were great hosts and it was a pleasure to stay with them. The space we stayed in was clean and we had a good time there.
Easy transition and welcoming cosy stay! Not to far from public restaurants and highly recommended.
Christy & Arnaud have a cool craftsman home that is very welcoming! My bf, dog, and I had a nice time there. They gave us travel tips as well as love for our doggie! Would book again.

This was my second stay, and it was great again! I was in and out quickly and really early in the morning, but they were so accommodating and welcoming to me and my dogs- would definitely recommend and would stay there again!
Beautiful house, lots of space, nice looking backyards and many things to motivate you towards positivity
The place is great and the house is charming and old. Because of that, the house creaks and can be loud, but the atmosphere is nice.

The house was near to Amtrak station, grocery store, park. It is enough cozy place if you find someplace to sleep. Hosts are kind, and I had a big chance to go to little show with hosts. Charge was reasonable. There is no reason to hesitate. Hurri up!
These guys are so friendly and helpful.   I love the Labradoodle.  This is an awesome place to stay
The room was very clean and comfortable and the perfect place to lay our head on our road trip through Oregon.  Excellent value and the resident puppy is adorable.
This home is a beautiful bungalow in central Salem.  It is clean as a whistle and furnished to match its style.  For the price, this is a really bargain.
Great place to crash, close to the bars downtown
Nice place to lay your head.  Home is secure. No problems or complaints!
The room has great light and a comfy bed. It was quiet and I was able to work at the dining room table in the evening. Otter the dog is goofy and adorable!

I had to study for a state test and my stay here was just what I needed. I made pressed coffee in their very clean and accomidating kitchen. Felt relaxed and at home and loved looking at all the cute  sayings and antiques they have around their amazing home. Slept very well and honestly didn't want to leave. This stay was good for my soul.. And I passed my test !!
Wonderful time, and a sweet pup! Thank you!
A nice quiet house with a fun dog and lotsa chickens. Fresh eggs were available to fry up in the morning!
Sparkling clean space. Comfy bed. Came late at night and left early morning with no issues. Perfectly happy!

We were the only guests that night so we had the whole place to ourselves. The house was lovely! It was very clean and the WiFi was fast. Christy and Arnaud were very nice when we communicated with them, although we did not see them during our stay (which brings me to the easy autonomous check-in process; a huge plus!). I would definitely stay here again.

My stay was great! Christy and Arnaud were super friendly and helpful. The information/directions to get to and into the home was very detailed and easy to follow. Christy responded to very quickly to all questions and Arnaud was attentive to making sure we arrived and had everything we needed upon arrival.
The room was adorable, comfortable, and clean with a back door that had access to the yard.
I even left something behind and got a message right away to let me know.
Thank you Christy and Arnaud!

As long as you remember that there's only one bathroom that you may be sharing with another guest, you're basically good to go. It's worth noting, however, I really only used their place to the extent of taking a shower and a 3 hour nap before I had to leave for the airport.
Just as advertised, clean home. Cute house with lots of character. Friendly people and dog!
Great hosts. Nice old house with easy to understand instructions about staying there. Easy check in and they answered my inquiries promptly. Great value as well.
Awesome space and very affordable!
You will feel welcomed and comfortable!  A home away from home!
Gorgeous clean and cozy home. They even left the light on for me. I wish I had stayed another night just to flip through some of the hundreds of books they have.
Great location, quiet neighbors, nice hosts. Just like staying in a friend's house rather than a hotel.
I only stayed one night, but it was nice. It’s a beautiful older home, in a good location.
Christy and Arnaud's place was just what I needed. A great price, close to where I needed to be and quiet. Thanks for opening up your home to me.

This cozy room and lovely hot shower were exactly what I needed after a long drive. They made it so easy for me to come in and feel like I could make myself at home. I enjoyed a cup of tea in the morning sunshine at the backyard picnic tables. Perfect way to start my day! So grateful!

So this is not a hotel, but Christy and Arnaud have filled the house with nice special conveniences.  Night lights in all the rooms for the late night dash to the shared bathroom, a little flashlight so you can find the light switch at 5:00 in the morning so you can make coffee.  An incredibly comfortable bed and pillows. They made clear that if I wanted privacy that was perfect but Arnaud and I spent 45 minutes hanging out and talking about travels and the Airbnb business.   Hospitality and consideration was great.  I was moving some stuff from Idaho to California and they gave me the driveway to park in so it would be safer than on-street parking.  Thanks, guys.  I'm not usually in Salem alone but if so, I'll come and visit you again.
Only was here to sleep off my jet lag, but it was a cool spot. Wish I could have stayed longer!
Homey touches, good conversation
They are awesome
Very cozy and lovely space. I had a really peaceful and relaxing stay with access to a beautiful back yard.
This was my second time staying here and it's a good value overall. Check-in was straightforward and the room is basic but comfortable for my short stay.
This is an adorable, older bungalow with a ton of character. Check in was easy and clear. I stayed in the room in the back of the house and it was very quiet.
Beautiful older house. Christy was prompt and sweet.

Their home is so nice and instantly feels like home. I stopped for a work trip and was able to cook in their nice kitchen, use their very nice shower, and feel cozy before I was on my way. I would definitely recommend this stay!
Thanks so much for your warm hospitality and making things so easy. Very charming Craftsman home. Enjoy my wonderful stay!!
great location. very quiet

Wonderful stay at Christy and Arnaud's charming home!
They are super hosts and I'm very grateful for their genuine hospitality, and sharing of their lovely home ....and Otter, the super mellow companion!

Christy and Arnaud offer a wonderful space for guests to feel completely at home. A beautiful kitchen for cooking, clearly marked doors to the house's rooms and amenities, and their own personal warmth make this house a must for any person or couple in need of comfortable relaxation. It is close to downtown, but in a quiet neighborhood. The gracious hosts shared information and gave great advice about local attractions. Honestly, it felt more like staying with old friends than with an Air bnb!
Was an enjoyable stay.  Good gig if your looking for something pet friendly.

This was my second time staying at Christy and Arnaud’s place and it was just as great as the first time. I enjoy how cozy it is and conveniently located to everything while still being a quiet neighborhood. Their communication is great and it is neat to see how lovingly they have been restoring their historic home. Just as I felt last time, I happily recommend others to stay here as well. I’m sure you’ll love it too.
Amazing house, quaint detailing with every little thing.  Good room for great value would highly recommend

What a lovely, warm and welcoming home. Christy and Arnaud's home more than lives up to the hype of everyone's positive reviews here. I will be happy to stay here again. Down to earth and kind people, plus a sweet and soft dog! What more could I ask for in an AirBNB?
Wonderful place to stay. Pleasant, clean, wonderful fragrances from the kitchen. Definitely recommend
Very accommodating and kind hosts.

My second stay was just as lovely as the first. I had mistakenly booked one night fewer than I needed, and Christy and Arnaud graciously worked with me to correct my mistake. They really make their guests feel welcome.
Christy and Arnaud were great hosts! The place was very cozy and comfortable. They were great at communication and helping us check in / check out. Would definitely stay again.
Wonderful, thoughtful host. Highly recommend staying with Christy and Arnaud.
Christy and Arnaud are great hosts and their Craftsman is beautiful! It has a great location just a few minutes from downtown Salem. Would stay again!
great place, shared bathroom wasn't an issue at all

Wonderful stay! The room was a great place to drop for the night. House was quiet, even when my pup was being obnoxious (he was okay after I introduced him to the host and dogs). I am a private person and they let me be the entire evening. Excellent value in a convenient location with wonderful hosts. If I find myself in the area again, I wouldn't hesitate to stay again!

Great space, great communication, and courteous- I had an exam the next morning and they had guests over for dinner but were thoughtful to keep the volume down so I could get to sleep early. Slept well, and really felt this space was worth the value. Very nice and hospitable people!
Perfect place to stay when visiting Salem. Great hospitality and great people! Can't wait for my next stay.
Expect everything to be as advertised. Quiet and calm household and chickens in the backyard. What's not to love?
I recommended to stay at this place. It is quiet and comfortable
Close to downtown Salem and all that the city has to offer.

You will not find another AirB&B with more gorgeous detail & character! As hosts they pull the home & travel experience together beautifully. I was astonished at all the hand crafted unique touches they had implemented to keep their guests comfortable & entertained. Beautifully done!
Great place I enjoyed my stay
A wonderful place to stay! Highly recommended!

I contacted Christy and Arnaud hoping to rent their space for multiple weeks.  They went out of their way to accommodate me as best they could and found me a more longterm rental with some of their friends.  Good people!!

I highly recommend this place! Whether you want to stay long term or short term, you will have a good time here. What I like most about Arnaud/Christy’s place is privacy, and I had plenty of that.  You can also have a good time talking with other guests in the house if you like conversations.   One recommendation I have is to put a lock on the door to the east-side bedroom.  Again, thanks for a wonderful stay!
Great value, was perfect for a hiking trip around the area
Christy and Arnaud's place was a great, comfortable stay! They were quick to respond and their instructions for checking in, staying, and checking out was clear.
Cool location, close to everything.
Perfect spot in close walking distance to everything and the most lovely space ! Really enjoyed our time here and would recommend to anyone

Christy and Arnaud have a charming home, and they are wonderful conversationalists! At least one of them is generally available if you have questions, and they gave us a lot of good tips about the area. They allowed us to stay for a few weeks with our dog, and when he met their dog they played like old friends. They share their house with multiple AirBnB guests, so if you would prefer to have a space to yourself you might not enjoy your stay.

Christy and Arnaud, When I got your place, I found home that called my memories about my childhood, beautiful energy inside the house. I believe you both putting a lot of love into it, so the spirit spread around your home! I thank you for your hospitality. The best of staying with you is finding friends! I heard Thursday is your birthday, so happy birthday Christy! I wish you all the best and happy for the rest of your life!

Many thanks,
Naura
Great place to stay. Centrally located and close to downtown Salem. The accommodations were very nice and the bed was comfortable.
Nice and comfortable.
Had a wonderful stay here. Highly recommend!
Great people!
Cute little place. Feels cozy and homey. Room was lovely with lots of natural light and door to the backyard. Communication and check in was easy. I would stay here again.
Awesome AirBnB in a great location. Close to shops and downtown salem. I would highly recommend staying at this home if you want to have a great experience. Very clean and cozy.

Had an amazing stay with christy and Armand. They let us hangout with their dog for a bit. Also we’re really nice to sit and chat with. Had some great tips for what to see around town. Extremely clean and well maintained room. Would stay here again.
Such a lovely place and Christy and Arnaud are such wonderful people, would definitely stay there again if I was given the chance to go back to Salem

My car broke down a couple miles away, so when I reached out to check how far the house was. Christy replied quickly and even asked if I needed a ride. The room was just what I needed to unwind from several days of stress. Really enjoyed spending time in the backyard.
Good place to stay in
Christy and Arnaud are wonderful hosts. Their home is clean, comfortable and relaxing. I would definitely stay there again. I highly recommend their place.
Ok

Christy and Arnaud's Hygge Room beyond exceeded expectations! Not only was the room and home comfortable and charmingly gorgeous, their hosting skills were totally on point. We felt like we had the entire place to ourselves yet they were present and helpful whenever needed. Our only regret is that next time we are in Salem, they are sure to be booked with guests having an incredible time at a price that cannot be beat. :)
Very clean! Loved my stay!
Awesome room.
Stunning house, sweet pups, well-traveled nature lovers—hard to find a better spot to stop whilst in Oregon. Thanks for having me Christy and Arnaud!
Great hosts!
Great spot if you need a place for the night, very friendly hosts and I felt very comfortable immediately in their home. Cozy bed, quiet and peaceful.
I really enjoyed getting to stay here! Super cozy and the hosts were really nice ☺️
Great place and nice hosts.

This place was just what I needed for an overnight stay in the city. They are experienced  hosts and explain everything very clearly, check in was so easy, there were notes in the bedroom and bathroom That were very helpful to guide you with the amenities.
