The room even had a space heater and a fan for your comfort level!
This is the perfect overnight for traveling. Close to I-5, spacious and quiet. Our host was very helpful with details. We would stay again if we were passing through.
This rental is in a very quiet and domesticated neighborhood. I slept in the wrong bedroom by mistake, and it’s my fault for not being more discriminate when reading their description.
A great overnight stop just off I 5
Thank you for your gracious hospitality! We will be back!

Quiet, clean, and friendly. Great overnight stay for a good price. Very hospitable, offers suggestions on where to go/eat if you're curious. Would stay again if we head back in this direction! Thank you Christy and Arnaud!

Christy and Arnaud are wonderful people and they know how to take care of travelers with both their home and their hearts (the doggies are totally swell sweethearts as well). And as a resident of the Willamette Valley, I can tell you that if you need a nice and convenient central Salem place to stay for one night or several--you have found it.
Great value. Nice and clean place that had a super easy check-in process. No complaints. Bed was very comfortable!!
Such a charming little place really enjoyed the peaceful atmosphere

This space was one of the best I have seen. Christy and Arnaud are first rate hosts. Both a friendly and have a wealth of local knowledge. The location is just minutes from the downtown area and also only a few minutes from the fairgrounds where I was set up as a vendor during the Salem Community Market. The price could not be beat. I whole heartedly recommend you book this location for your next visit to the Salem area.
I have stayed here several times and they are always great.

Christy and Arnoud provide a beautiful space with awesome plants throughout the house. They are conveniently located close to the hospital and are very accommodating to traveling professionals. 5 stars all around!
Always a great place to stay!
Pretty good for the low price!
Christy was great! Communicated well with precise checkin and checkout instructions. It was a clean place. We just stayed for the night.

Christy and Arnaud are really friendly people. They do care for the guests a lot. Arnaud shared his ice scraper with me which was a lot helpful for me to get on road safely after snow storm. I would highly recommend this place in Salem, OR.

Christy and Arnaud were great hosts. We enjoyed our stay in their beautiful and interesting historic home. The neighborhood was nice and rather central to the area (we could’ve walked to the Capital).
Look no further. This is the BEST deal! Loved my stay here and enjoyed my interactions with Christy and Arnaud.

Great stay and communication. Able to accommodate my late check-in due to airline issues. Didn't have much physical contact with hosts because of my schedule but they kept in touch with me online. Older house but very comfortable stay. Highly recommended.
The place was clean, spacious and accurate as per the description. Location was easy to find and check in was smooth. I'd definitely recommend this spot!
Great place to stay! Super awesome hosts. Will not regret staying here!
Everything was perfect. Very clean and easy to check in, very good place to stay

Clean, affordable place to stay in Salem.  Christy and Arnaud are friendly and welcoming, and their place is super cute and spotless.  Will definitely look to stay here again when I come to Salem for work.
Very nice people, great place to stay.
10/10 experience- everything was perfect and I wished I could have stayed longer!
Happy, Peaceful, and loving home away from home
Super cute house, very friendly host, and I had an excellent stay! 10/10 woukd recommend!
I just needed a place to crash for 12 hours, and this was the perfect spot! Quiet and relaxing. And I'm not a dog person, but I liked their dogs.
Great place to stay. Very cozy and welcoming. I highly recommend for price, cleanliness, and excellent host.  Thank you for a lovely stay.
Lovely place to stay! Christy and Arnaud were very responsive and the place itself was just as listed - very cute and charming! 🙂
The space was just as advertised. Perfect spot to crash for the night. Would book again.
Very good place for stay. Host are very nice and helpful
Clean, quiet, great communication with owners
Excellent value
Amazing! Very warming and welcoming energy. Beautiful home. The hosts are great with communication. Beds are super comfy! You'll love your stay!
This is a very friendly and relaxed place at an excellent price

Christy’s place was great! We were just here for a short trip and ended up having the place completely to ourselves. Even though we didn’t get to meet Christy, the communication was fabulous and the location was perfect! If my kiddo ends up choosing Willamette University I look forward to many more stays at Christy’s lovely house. 😁
Lovely hosts combine with a very inexpensive place to lay your head.  I had full run of the house with a personal bedroom (and a shared bathroom that is a 5 step walk from my bed).
The Travel-inspired room has a big, comfortable bed, a closet, and table/chair.  The house is very charming.  It is walking distance from Willamette University.
Quiet bedroom in quiet home in quiet neighborhood. Communication was perfect, quick and thorough. Thank you!

A very comfortable and homely stay in a quiet neighbourhood. The hosts are really kind and welcoming and clearly experienced hosting an Airbnb. Thank you, would definitely stay again if stopping in Salem.
Thanks so much for your kindness, beautiful place!! I would love to come back!!
Economical, comfy bed, nice people
They both were wonderful. In all aspects of the experience. Made you feel welcomed the moment you walk in the door. Good wholesome people and great conversations. Highly recommend and will return.
A really nice and homely stay, my second stay here in two weeks.
Great house, great location, great hosts. Had a very pleasant time here.
Great stay. Super hosts; very accommodating and interested in guest satisfaction. Highly recommend.
Cozy room, nice amenities, great location. I’d be happy to stay again.

Really enjoyed my stay here! I was just passing through the area while on a road trip and needed a place to spend the night. Beautiful house full of character and very clean. I stayed in the Travel room and had the best night sleep! very comfortable bed.

I very nice room! The bed is a queen size and he’s super comfortable! Located near a lot of good places to grab a bite to eat or drink. Had to stay for work it would definitely recommend staying to anyone that is interested for a quick rest.
价格决定品质，因为我们有带一只狗，所以选择余地不大。房东很好，地理位置也不错，但是房子有点旧，有一股味道时间久一点也能接受，但是但是我整晚都没有睡着，应该是床上有什么东西！全身痒，我也没敢洗澡，我是一个敏感体质，但不是过敏体质，不知道中文翻译成英文，大家能看得懂不。不过还是希望大家支持下生意。
Arnaud is knowledgeable about Oregon and shared some historic info. Nice old house in great condition.  The bed was super comfortable too.

A great place! We only crashed the night but it seemed like a really cool welcoming space. Plus! I left my carhart socks there and christy found them and shipped them to me-talk about going above and beyond!

Great spot if you're riding the Amtrak, easy walking distance to the station and everything else you need. Nice quiet room, easy check in, and good host communication. We are allergic to dogs but did not have any issues during our two nights here.

Absolutely loved staying here. Amazing home, amazing price, amazing location.
10/10 from us :)
The location was just a few blocks from Amtrak
Exactly as described. I was traveling for work and needed a crash pad and this fit the bill. Very nice and cute dogs. Comfy bed!
Great stay!
Comfortable stay in a quiet neighborhood with lovely decorations and two friendly dogs
beautiful room in a beatiful house and very nice hosts with cute dogs 😀
Great host. Everything was as stated. This was our first time using AIrbnb.    We would not hesitate to schedule there again.
A very welcoming home in a central location. Definitely worth a return trip.
Greta place for working professionals and travelers alike, excellent location!!!!

We loved our stay at Christy's place! Christy and Arnaud are very welcoming people who also have two lovely dogs. The room was very comfortable (I slept like a rock, what a great bed) and the bathroom is very clean! I also enjoyed the aesthetic of the house, it felt very cozy. And it was fun to be able to talk a bit Flemish with Arnaud 😁. Thanks for everything!

This place was exactly what I needed. Easily accessible with clear instructions for check in and check out. It was a quick one night stay with a late evening check in and early morning check out. No issues. Will definitely look at staying again on my next trip to Salem.

Exceptionally good value in this property. Very nicely decorated and clean - we felt right at home. The location was also good and the neighbourhood felt very safe and was pretty. For us bars and restaurants were within walking-distance (maybe 2km?).
Better than any hotel I’ve stayed at. Christy and Arnaud were welcoming, the dogs were amazing, and overall it was just a great stay! 10/10 will stay again next time we’re in town
Beautiful house. Great hosts!
Friendly hostel vibes, very comfortable bed, accommodating hosts, easy to access. Great location, highly recommended.
It was a wonderful place to stay, easy check in,  very homey, and very affordable. Our hosts were delightful people and the dogs were adorable.
Very comfortable room and friendly hosts, and two adorable dogs. You will enjoy your stay and feel relaxed ready to go again......where ever it is that you are going.

I had a wonderful stay here. It’s a very nice home full of character and the the hosts are super friendly. I was in Salem for my nephew’s college orientation so the location was excellent. I will definitely be staying here again on my next visit, if they’re not already booked. I suggest you do the same!
Great AirBnB - thank you!

Christy and Arnaud were awesome hosts. They were welcoming and respectful, as were their 2 very friendly dogs! The room, bathroom and entire place was very clean, I had use of the refrigerator and kitchen if I wanted, and the bed was very comfortable. They have a nice yard with an above ground large pool, open in the summer, which was an added bonus. I swam laps every day, and truly felt like I was on vacation even though I was there to drop my son off for college. I would definitely stay here again!

I loved staying here! Such a quaint and cute place, very stylish! and everything is thought out: kitchen instructions, wi-fi, desk space, check-in, leisure, etc. It is all taken care of at Christy's! Hope to come back!
Great place to stay - very clean and very welcoming hosts!

This is a warm, family feeling respite. A quiet base in which to recharge, sleep, feel safe.

My bed was cozy, the sitting area by the pool welcoming. The host first class.
Christy and Arnaud’s place is beautiful, comfortable, and centrally located. Thanks for having us! We will be back when we’re in town!

We arrived in Salem a bit frazzled from a long day of driving with our 7 month old baby, and Christy’s place was exactly what we were hoping for and needed! The house itself is beautifully decorated, there are lots of options for shared spaces (no one else had booked the second room so we ended up having the whole place to ourselves), the bed was extremely comfy and we had access to a full kitchen and laundry facilities. We walked through town to the riverside the evening we arrived which took us about 25 minutes, and on the way were loads of great places to eat and beautiful buildings. The only thing I didn’t realise is that the dining area is where Christy and her husband also eat-if I had I definitely wouldn’t have left lots of baby stuff all over the place for Christy to enjoy with her breakfast…just a heads up for future guests!! Sorry guys! Christy also messaged straight away to let me know we’d left a plug behind. Would definitely recommend and would stay again if we ended up in Salem. Thanks for a great stay!
Christy is very nice to communicate with. She was willing to come pick me up at the bus station since my flight was a late flight.
A pleasant, historic neighborhood. Clean and comfy. Hosts are laid back, reasonable people. Nice dogs. Would stay again.
so nice, I stayed there twice ;)  wonderful home, soothing room, kind hosts. playful dogs. great value for money!
Check-in und checkout haben gut funktioniert. Wir sind freundlich von Christy empfangen worden. Parken vor dem Haus war kein Problem, wir würden noch einmal bei Christy buchen.
Amazing little stay also the dogs are so cute

This was a great place for us to lay our heads the middle of a 3 day road trip. The room was comfortable as was the mattress. The bathroom really is 2 maybe 3 steps away. We enjoyed a warm greeting with one of the doggies and our host. Location was great. We went to a local brewery that had great food and drink. Street parking was safe and easy.
Second time staying with Christy and Arnaud, great stay!
Christy and her husband are very nice and communicative. Their home is warm and the pups are incredibly social and lovely. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Hosts were easy to contact and respond quickly.  The place is nice and quiet. My room was clean and spacious.
Very cute and comfortable house.  I felt very welcome in their home.  Beautiful backyard and nice reading nook on the covered front porch.  This is a perfect place to relax or unwind.
Great clean place, and the host is really friendly! Would definitely stay again!
Very cute and cozy room, comfy bed, and easy to access! Would stay again. Thanks Christy!
Superb hosts. Luxurious, comfortable, plush furnishings with a quiet elegance. I am impressed with my entire experience here. Thank you very much. God Bless
As advertised. Bed is amazingly comfortable.
Exceptionally clean, the bed was very very comfortable, and the hosts were kind and responsive. I would 100% stay here again!
I have stayed with Christy and Arnaud multiple times now - they're always great hosts and have a wonderful home.
Was nice.
Always great to stay here!

This spot was perfect for a quick overnight on my way north. Easy check-in instructions, comfortable bed, and the desk was a great setup to get a bit of work done. Also, very close drive to downtown for a bit to eat. I will certainly stay again when I am traveling between Californa and Washington.
Great place to stay, and very convenient location.
Great setting for studying an travel

My stay was excellent.  I booked at the last minute after another accommodation fell through.  The location is very convenient to the university and downtown.  The directions and checkin instructions were clear and correct.   I was the only guest (there are two separate bedrooms and a shared bathroom).  Christy's place is a fabulous value.  My only regret is that I didn't get to meet the dogs!

Christy's home was probably the coziest of our trip, the two nights we spent there allowed us to rest correctly but also spend quality time. Everything is well organized and labels are strategically placed to explain how to get there :))
Great, convenient, quiet, cute
was very straight forward, and the directions were easy to follow
Thank you!
The gang at this airbnb are friendly and approachable. It was all good. The dogs are sweet too
10 stars if I could give them one.
I have stayed at Christy's place in different rooms. Always clean, comfortable, and convenient. Highly recommended.
What a great deal! Comfortable clean with very accomodating hosts. Will stay here again!
As advertised. Delightful place
Great stay!
I've stayed with Christy and Arnaud multiple times. They are excellent hosts and have a wonderful home. Very easy check-in and check-out process.
Great please, very welcoming as well.

I enjoyed staying at Christy's place. The hospitality was great, the house very cozy. The bedroom was very comfortable, and the dogs were sweet and friendly. I would definitely stay there again if I need to be overnight in Salem.

I loved my experience at Christy’s. It’s an older, charming house with fun rustic details. Lots of beautiful plants around the house. I felt very comfortable sharing the space with others, and was surprised how nice and quiet the house is. I’ll definitely be back!
I'm a repeat guest. Highly recommended!

Quick stop as we were driving through, very happy to stay here for the night. Clean, comfortable and huge king bed. We hoped to arrive earlier but didn’t until 9:30pm, were mindful to arrive before 10pm as the description says. Easy parking, nice neighborhood, let ourselves in
Bathroom is older and has claw foot tub with wraparound shower curtain, but we did not need to shower. We let the dogs into our room in the morning and they’re very sweet. Let ourselves out and didn’t see the hosts
Comfortable, both accommodations and atmosphere, nice folks with nice dogs.
Quiet home

This Airbnb was set up so perfectly for anticipating travelers every need. I only stayed one night and never met my hosts but they were extremely quick with responding to questions. Everything was perfect. And the bed was super comfortable- that’s actually so rare in an Airbnb! Thanks!
我是第一次在airbnb订住处，比我想象中的样子要好太多了，因为我最开始先到机场然后不确定什么时候能到住处。房东也很热心的跟我沟通，入住也真的很方便，当我看到我房间的时候我真的很震惊。不光是有一个干净整洁的屋子，并且还给准备了浴巾以及毛巾。房东很热情，早上起床的时候还问我要不要一起吃早饭。入住感觉就真的感觉和自己家一样，如果有机会再来玩，我绝对会选择再次入住！
I typically just keep to myself when i go anywhere, but it was a lovely stay. I saw the host a couple of times. It was positive. Both times. Also, they had 2 dogs, that were just a joy to be around.
Super nice folks and excellent accommodations.  Thanks a bunch for having me again.

Sharon is a gracious host with an impeccable home.  The room was comfortable, clean, and nicely appointed.  I can't forget to mention that the coffee in the morning was delicious!  I hope to be back soon.

Sharon was the perfect host. She made me feel welcome at all times and had thought of even the little things you often need when staying away from home. The room was lovely and furnished well. I couldn't have asked for somewhere better to stay. Otis the dog was so friendly too!
Sharon was lovely! Very friendly and was able to accommodate me on my later than planned arrival. I really liked her home and slept like a rock. Thanks Sharon!

I was there for 2 weeks of business.  Everything was exactly like the picture. Nice room quiet, and comfortable bed and rocker.  Sharon was a very good host.  Everything you needed was there and any questions asked were quickly answered.  She had told me her nephew was having a birthday there with family.  Asked if I wanted to join.  I did for a while, met and meet everyone.  Very nice family.  I excused myself as I was tired and need to get some rest for the next day's work.  Very quiet even during the birthday.  Impressed!  Thanks for a great stay.
Very pleasant stay in a lovely room. Sharon was welcoming but gave me space, and I would happily stay here again.

Sharon's home was comfortable, clean, and was a wonderful place to stay. Sharon is a great host--available for guests when you need her, but also gives you your own space. I would recommend staying here!
Sharon was a wonderful host who really made me feel like I was in a home away from home. The house was wonderful, clean, and provided everything I needed for a great stay.

Sharon is an excellent host! She emailed and texted ahead of time and asked questions that helped to make our stay more personal. Her home is inviting, just as she is. I highly recommend staying with Sharon if your travel take you to Salem. Happy trails!

Diana
lovely little house...Sharon was gracious and her adorable dog, Otis kept me wonderful company when when spending time in her house!
Sharon's place is actually better than I could have imagined....very clean and welcoming, just what I needed as I ushered my child off to college in Salem.

Sharon was a wonderful host. We didn't see each other much, but she was always friendly and made sure I was comfortable. It was very convenient to have a microwave and coffee maker in my room. Her dog Otis is so sweet. I would recommend Sharon to anyone spending time in Salem.

The room and house are clean, well lit, and nicely decorated with plants and the space is overall cozy and cheerful. I was is Salem for a training and didn't spend much time at the house during my stay. The neighborhood is quiet, safe and close to shopping and also close to where I needed to be for training.

I really enjoyed my week long stay with Sharon! The room listing was everything I needed for the week and Sharon was very sweet! She gave me suggestions for where to visit around the area and made me feel welcome in her home! Would definitely stay again!

Had a lovely stay in this cute room, equipped with fridge, microwave, coffeemaker...nice comfortable chair.  The house has a garden in back and is in a quiet culdesac. Sharon even let me use her kitchen since I can't eat out.  Thanks, Sharon.
Sharon's place was cozy and she was easy to coordinate with. I would definitely come back and recommend to friends!
The room is cozy and clean with a nice walk-in closet.
The place was great, clean, and had more amenities than I expected. I appreciated the coffee, breakfast bars and oatmeal, microwave and refrigerator.
Great place Sharon is super nice and makes you feel right at home. Easy to navigate around town, close, but not too close to main roads.
Great location.
Immaculate and caring host.  Quiet and clean.  Close to shopping, restaurants and downtown Salem.  TV, fridge, microwave and Keurig and access to WD made stay enjoyable and a lot better than a hotel.

What a great place to stay for the 2017 total solar eclipse (or anything else that might bring someone to Salem)! Sharon's backyard is private and even were it not for the eclipse, it would've been a great place to just hang out and relax. The home's location is very convenient to all sorts of restaurants and shopping.

Inside, the bed and comforter were amazingly comfortable. The bedroom is very private and the small refrigerator in the large walk-in closet was very useful. The desk in the bedroom provided a nice work surface and the power strip was conveniently located on the desktop (no bending down below the desk to plug anything in). The wi-fi worked flawlessly. The bathroom was very clean and functional, which to me, is one of the most important factors in any rental. It is not an en suite bathroom so guests to Sharon's home will also use it but it sure seemed that her guests were very considerate and I could leave my toiletries out. A Keurig coffee maker with a wide variety of coffee pods was a very welcoming touch.

Of course, Otis made the stay even better!

Perfect situation for me as a healthcare traveler.  Sharon was open, friendly, and willing to visit without making me fell obligated to do so.  Lovely clean home with lots of thoughtful touches in the closet and bathroom for guests.
Clean and convenient to downtown

I stayed at Sharon's place for a month. It was was nicer than I expected and also very comfortable.  She literally had everything you would ever need either in the bedroom or bathroom.  The mini fridge in the closet actually fits more than it seems but beware, the freezer temperature doesn't seem to be even. Not all my stuff was frozen.  But if you don't need it and you're there for a short stay, the place is fantastic.  It was also cheaper than a lot of other places in Salem.
Booking with Sharon was hassle-free, and she was very responsive with communication. I would definitely book again with her.

Had a great stay with sharon, she was super accommodating with anything I needed. The walk in closet has more than enough room for my things, which was clutch as a travel nurse. And her dog is so cute!
Accurate description, very comfortable, quiet, and clean. Host was easy to communicate with.
If you are needing a place to stay, I highly recommend staying at Sharon’s.  She is such a kind person and takes great care in making sure your stay is comfortable.

My son Jerome make an internship  in Salem for 2 months  and stay on Sharon  home. He had a nice room well equiped,  with a  bathroom  and a free access to the kitchen ; Sharon even  provide him a bike to go to work . It was very usefull  and Jerome was really happy to stay there 2 months in such good condition.  Thanks Sharon

Sharon’s place is in an ideal location. Five minutes drive to great stores & plenty of restaurants, coffee shops. Another 5-10 minutes takes you to downtown Salem. Her street is nice & quiet with ample parking. She has a nice garden to sit in & catch some rays.
The bed is very comfortable & the shower is great. Good work space & a walk-in closet which serves as a tiny kitchen/dressing room. There is a microwave , refrigerator & a large cabinet yet still plenty of room to hang your clothes along with a good sized shelf for toiletries, etc.
Her cute dog Otis is a mighty little watch dog but sweet as can be. He just minds his own business.
I recommend Sharon’s place, she is a fine host.

Sharon is an awesome host. I'd give her 6 stars if I could! Her home is stylish and upscale and she was quick to respond if I ever had a question. I felt like I was staying in a Paris boutique hotel. I really appreciated the many thoughtful extras like fluffy towels, comfortable bed and pillows, keurig coffee setup and walk in closet with mini fridge. The location is super convenient and just a short walk or drive to grocery stores and many restaurants. I will definitely stay here again.

Sharon’s home is in a nice and quiet residential neighborhood. The house is warmly decorated and very clean. The guest room is quiet and comfortable with a small fridge, microwave, cups, plates, bowls, cutlery, and a Keurig coffee machine (with a great assortment of coffees).
Sharon communicated quickly with me and was very accommodating. Sharon is a friendly and unintrusive host. I would stay here again.

Sharon has been an absolutely amazing host! Communication and check-in were prompt and easy. The home was extremely nice, clean, and the location is perfect. My room was completely cozy with all the best amenities— smart tv, coffee maker, mini fridge, large closet, and the list goes on. This has been a great experience during my extended business trip and truly has been home away from home!
Sharon was a super curtious hostess and her place ie very much a home away from home, very quiet and peaceful, great amenities, and fantastic location- close to everything. I'd stay again!
Great location and hospitality. This is my second stay and just as great an experience as the first time!
Thanks
Great location. Gorgeous house. Clean interiors. Special touches. Cute dog. Wonderful host. Closet space. Great amenities. Overall a nice experience
Very good place to stay in Salem downtown.
Sweet dog!!! Good coffee and shower. Nice walk-in closet with fridge. Easy entry. Lovely yard. Light sleepers might struggle if others are visiting, too.

Sharon is a great host.  The room and the house are squeaky clean and her dog is fun to play with.  The location is great as well.  I definitely recommend her to anyone who is looking for a good centrally located place to stay in Salem.
Second time staying here. Just as great as first time. Highly recommend

Immaculate small room with a very comfortable double bed, nightstand, armchair, small desk, coffee service, microwave, small fridge, fast internet, and TV (I didn't use it; don't know what it was connected to). Sharon provided dishes and utensils, and several useful desk items. The stylish hall bathroom provided a nice shower with a low tub.
Sharon is a great host who made me feel warm and welcome. Her sweet home is very cosy and clean.  I spent a wonderful time there. I recommend this place for everyone.

Sharon is an excellent host, and the property is conveniently located close to the main streets in town while at the same time situated in a quiet neighborhood. The room and bed was very comfortable and included many extras, like a coffee maker with a great selection of coffees, a microwave, refrigerator, and dishes and utensils. Everything was squeaky clean, too! Highly recommend.
Cozy and quiet and very clean space. Close to downtown and campus.

I was taking some classes at Willamette University and was so grateful that Sharon’s place is open. She was willing to loan me a bike and I was able to coast the 1.7 miles into class with no hills and no worries. Saved me paying for parking and just the stress of commuting in general. Internet was great and aally needs were met. She was super flexible and And will totally try to stay there for future classes.
Nice and clean place

I’d give 10 stars if they let me! I travel A LOT, and Sharon’s place is one of my top favs now! Such a welcoming hostess and Ottis is fluffy awesome

A gorgeous home, sparklingly clean, and lovely decor greets you. All of the thoughtful touches in the room made me feel like I was staying in my own hotel room, just better! Super convenient location to top it off. I will happily book this stay again for my next OR trip
Can't go wrong with this airbnb! Quiet, easy going, and convenient. I would definitely stay again.
Amazing host! Very clean home. All the amenities you can imagine. Would recommend to anyone.
Sharon has a nice comfortable home and communications with her was very good. I love the selections of coffee she had available. I recommend staying at Sharon’s, she is a great host!
Very clean, quiet & comfortable.  Best bang for the buck I've found.
A plus
Comfortable room with everything you could possibly need! Sharon was great!
This house is very clean and Sharon is an excellent host
Easy Check. Very clean and comfy. I appreciated the coffee bar!
Sharon's home is very cute and well kept. I would stay there again!
Sharon’s place is safer and cleaner than the extended stays that I looked at.
It was a great stay. I would stay there again.
Great host! Very clean and accommodating stay, just as described. Would recommend to others and stay again.

Sharon has a lovely home in a safe area that is nearby many shops and parks. I stayed with Sharon for an extended period of time (2 months) and she was always hospitable and helpful. (Ottis her dog greeted me often and it always made my day). If you are looking for a place that is clean, safe, and for an amazing value I recommend Sharon's place for just that.

I stayed here for a month and had a great experience. The room is cozy and comfortable, and having access to the microwave, mini fridge, and coffee bar was great. As someone without a car, I was still able to get around Salem because bus stops are a close walk away, around 10-12 mins depending on the line. Shops on Commercial St are also close by. Keep in mind that it is a small house, and there's no private entrance, so you will be living in pretty close quarters with the host - it's like having a roommate. But this was never an issue since Sharon was always very friendly, accommodating, and helpful. She was kind enough to let me extend my stay for an extra night on short notice. Ottis is also very cute. Especially for such a good price, this is a great stay in a convenient location, and I'd definitely recommend it for both short & long trips!
This place is located in a safe neighborhood. Great value, clean, and host was friendly.
Sharon was very helpful getting me acclimated to the area. Nice, quiet, and peaceful home and neighborhood.

Omg when I say this place was amazing it is an understatement. Everything you need she has. A very welcoming environment. The dog Ottis is the cutest and will become your bestie! The house is sooooo quiet and cleannnnnn!!!! If you are thinking about booking do it immediately because it will be gone and the room is much bigger in person!
Sharon has a beautiful home, and she is so welcoming!! I love this place
Sharon was a great host!!

The most amazing experience! So clean and comfortable. Sharon was the best host you can ask for. Gave me amazing suggestions for things around town and made the transition from moving to California to Oregon that much easier. I stayed for 2 months and I would highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone who needed to stay in Salem Oregon.

Great stay in south Salem; I was here for a month while on a work contract at the hospital. It took me less than 10 minutes each day to get to work. Sharon’s home is clean and cozy, with many live plants giving it a peaceful vibe. The room itself has a mini fridge, Keurig, microwave and dishes. Everything that you need. Lots of streaming channel options. You have the hall bath to yourself. Otis is a great watchdog but sweet, and will spend time with you if you want him to. There is street parking either in front of the home or across the street within the cul de sac. It’s a quiet area. I enjoyed my stay here and would recommend.
Great location.  Everything went smoothly.  Room and everything was great.
Had an excellent stay, host was helfpul and more then welcoming during my time there. Good spot for short or long term trips!
Sharon makes you feel at home best stay I ever had great room very clean great location hope to stay their again thanks Sharon !
beautiful home. I felt welcomed and not out of place.
Sharon’s place was awesome comfortable and quiet felt right at home
Had everything you might need.
Second stay with Sharon it was great quiet and felt right at home.
Very good host. Communicates well, respects your space

I came in late, and it was easy to check in and find my room. The house and room were clean and comfortable. It's a quiet neighborhood, about a 20 minute walk downtown if that's your thing. I would absolutely stay with Nick again!
Easy to communicate with and very accommodating. Well worth the price of rental.

This place was extremely clean and comfortable, and convenient to the downtown area and the highway. Cute, quiet neighborhood. The owner was available to me by phone. The wi-fi did not work, which was a bummer, though the owner offered to drive down from Portland to try to fix it (which I said wasn't necessary). I used the kitchen freely and left it as I found it. There were four rooms being occupied upstairs, and the walls between rooms were very quite thin. This wasn't a problem for me, because I sleep well regardless, but I could hear the voices of others quite clearly, and this might bother other people. A great price for a simple, no-frills, comfortable, safe stay.

This place was great! It was easy to get the keys to the house and the room I stayed in had a lock on the door for extra security. The neighborhood was mature, felt really safe and parking was readily available. The bed was super comfy and made for a good nights rest. The other areas of the home were updated and welcoming. Everything was so peaceful that I found myself sleeping in, which I never do. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Nick is super awesome and flexible! We got the room about 4 hours before we were checking in. He also gave us some suggestions of places to visit nearby. The room is clean and tidy, the shared bathroom is nice and has everything I needed.
Nick is a wonderful person, Was very co operative when i mentioned about some concerns and he took care of those issues pretty fast.  Very good home with all the amenities.

We did enjoy our short stay here. It was our first experience with airbnb. It will be fun to pass on info to our kids, and keep in mind when we have guests who need lodging in the Salem area. Thanks, Nick, for making us feeling welcome. It was good to talk with you by phone. :)

PS We came late both nights and left early, so no time to enjoy downstairs which looked pleasant and comfy. :) The beds were comfortable.

Living at Nick's is similar to how I would live at home:  clean, comfortable, and convenient.  He is easy to communicate with and respond in a timely manner.  The neighborhood is friendly which is minutes away from the Landcaster Mall and downtown Salem!  Sure I would recommend staying at Nick's when visiting Salem.
Nick's house was enjoyable to stay at that I decided to extend my stay.  Easy to communicate with!

The house is located in a residential neighborhood of northeast Salem, only a few miles from the State Capitol.  The room I rented was clean and airy, and the bed was comfortable, but overall it was pretty sparsely furnished.  The photo in the listing doesn't look like the room I stayed in.  Also, I didn't see any evidence of air conditioning, as stated in the listing. The bathroom across the hall was very large and nicely updated.  There is a shared living room and dining room, which no one seems to use, and a nice, fully-equipped kitchen.  There are 3 separate Airbnb rooms in the house, but I wasn't sure if they were occupied during my stay.  Nick doesn't live in the house, so we didn't meet in person, but he was very responsive by email and answered all my questions quickly.  Overall, this room provides basic accommodations in a good location at a good price.

I never had the opportunity to meet Nick. We talked by phone on my arrival and he basically walked the house over the phone. Enjoyed my short stay. The breakfast recommendation Nick left on the desk was definitely a winner
Excellent place, great value. Enjoyed it and would certainly stay here again.

This was my first experience with AirBnB. My sister and I stayed at Nick's place for 2 nights. Nick's response was fast despite our last minute booking! Instructions were very clear and we really liked the "treating it as a hotel" vibe. All the essentials were provided which was really nice! I also liked the space and freedom of the house (even though we weren't there during the day to enjoy it). We were able to arrive late and also cook our own eggs in the morning! :) Very comfy bed and I especially liked that I had a work space to do some homework, studying, and get work done. The only thing I was a little self conscious about was the cracking noise on the wood floor when I would walk around my room late at night and to the bathroom. We hope we weren't too loud for our neighbors. Would definitely recommend Nick's place for anyone looking for a nice, clean, private, and quiet place! :-)
Stayed at Nick's beautiful home. Everything was as described in this quiet neighbourhood and he was very clear with instructions on where everything is as well. I will stay here again soon. Thanks

Great spot to crash for a few days. Quiet neighborhood, good location, spacious and comfortable room. There were a few other people staying there at the same time, which occasionally got a little hectic, but we enjoyed our time here overall.

This is an AirBnB income property and the home owner does not live here.  It is a very nice home but I prefer staying at people's homes with them...."home away from home" feel like a important to me.  I am not familiar with how to distinguish whether or not a house is an income property or the actual owners live there....I'll investigate this more on my end.

I will not recommend this place. The listing did not clearly state that there are multiple rooms (4?) being rented out. When we were there, all the rooms were occupied (not all through AirBnb, according to the labels on the doors). We could hear the floors creak, the doors open and close, people talking, and TV.
This places allows instant booking but when we arrived, the room wasn't clean from the previous renter. Nick told me where to find the sheets and towels, but the linen closet was empty. He told me to look in the dryer. The dryer was packed with sheets and towels, still wet, and already smelly from having sat there for a while. I emptied the dryer then dried 1 sheet so we could sleep. If we hadn't been so tired, we would have moved to a hotel.

Nice clean room - in a nice clean house. Close to Willamette University. We had a fun time visiting our daughter on Family Weekend at the university.

If you want to have a clean convenient room in a nice well kept house you can't go wrong.

Great guidance on how to find and get in to the place.  Being on business travel I especially appreciated knowing a late arrival was not a concern right away.  A great central location.  Take him up on the restaurant he suggests for breakfast - they were great.  (though now I've forgotten their name).  I will certainly be back.

I was in town for a conference, and so I was at the house very little. I just needed a clean, comfortable place to sleep, wash up, and eat a meal. This host provided all of those things. Very comfortable bed!

The house is shared with two other airbnb rooms so it runs a little bit like a hotel. I really appreciated that I had my own room key and the bathroom had a a privacy lock. Everything was clean and well-kept and I had everything I needed. This was the perfect no-nonsense place for business travelers such as myself. I hope to stay here again soon.
Large room with great workspace and plenty of power outlets.

This was my second time staying at Nick's Airbnb and it was just as great as the first time! The house was clean and the amenities were perfect for a business traveler like myself. I love how he has washer and dryers for his guests to use; a major perk for travelers who travel often. I've already stayed twice and would noy hestitate to stay at Nick's airbnb in the future!
Nice house to stay, lots of conveniences available and makes it very easy to carry on as you would in your own home.
It worked out well.
It's quaint and delightful!  "Experience a bit of older Salem in an updated, uniquely classy, fashion."
The place is more beautiful than the pictures. Very spacious and warm. Host was very nice and made sure i had what i needed.
Very convenient for business travel. The bed is really comfortable.

Nick's place was quaint and clean. It was great for me. I was there for business and was looking for a nice place to sleep and work a bit. Check in and check out were super smooth. I stayed for 3 days. I heard another person once or twice but I didn't annually see anyone.

Consistency - that is what you get with Nick's house. This is my third stay at Nick's and it is consistently great for the value. For the value, it's hard not to stay here. I will definitely return and will recommend others too!
Very clean, comfortable room and house is convenient location to central Salem.  Hosts kept me well informed about check-in and access to home.
Beautiful house, very clean, nice and quiet neighborhood. Walking distance to a nice park, 5-10 minute drive to downtown Salem and I-5. Great place.
Great place to stay! Very nice home with lots of room.
This house is a neat classic. Very clean and quiet. The bedroom we stayed in was very roomy and clean. Shared bathroom but we didn't see the other guest. Will book again!
Very nicely updated older home close to downtown

This is a good value and the house is in a very nice neighborhood. At the same time, it was like staying in a do-it-yourself boarding house, since the hosts don't live there. If you are hoping to meet your hosts or be in a place that feels like a home, this one isn't for you. If you are a do-it-yourself type, Nick's place has large rooms with comfortable beds (at least, mine was), large clean kitchen and clean bathroom.
Great Value.  Very quiet.
Very clean and nice!

House very clean and quiet. Booking process streamlined and easy. Nick made it easy for us to book at the last moment!
Comfortable room
We enjoyed staying at this house. It is in a very nice quiet neighborhood! The location is great when one has business at the capitol. We would like to stay there again another time.
Nick's place is very comfortable and clean. Nice neighborhood. I recommend staying there.
Easy and comfortable
Nice quiet stay.
Have stayed at Nick's place several times and would recommend it to anyone.

This is a great place to stay for anyone whether you're visiting Willamette University, taking a family vacation, or you're just looking to relax. The home was very quiet, quaint, and clean. The owners were very polite and professional. I would recommend this place highly to anybody and would definitely stay here again.
The place is clean but there are several year-round renters, and none of them were asked to represent the host, whom I never met. So hospitality was lacking - no instructions even for making coffee.

Super quiet, lovely neighborhood, spotlessly clean.  I didn't meet anyone in person, but it was exactly what I needed for a conference.  I took Amtrak from Portland to Salem and there were plenty of local buses near the house to get around while I was there.

Overall, after the initial issues with the check-in information and wifi, we had a nice stay at this location. It was very clean and comfortable and mostly quiet. The hosts were fairly easy to contact and were responsive to problems. I would encourage others to stay here, but would highly recommend contacting the hosts ahead of time just to double check that all information provided is correct and up-to-date.

The house is very nice and clean and is the perfect location. Check in / Out was very simple and the host was reachable and communicated quickly with me. Wish my stay was longer - definitely would suggest this home if you are staying in the area or just want a jump off point for Oregon travels.
Loved it!!!

Peaceful home in a beautiful and historic tree lined neighborhood of Salem. Great rooms with well equipped and up-to-date accommodations. This is a wonderful house with very clean and nice sized rooms when looking for a quiet stay. Great location with easy access to Salem and the surrounding areas. Plenty of on street parking and easily accessible. This location is highly recommended and includes all the friendly conveniences required for a very comfortable stay.
Convenient location for a quick trip to Salem!

This was my second stay in this lovely historic home. Very convenient check-in process. It's a big house with multiple rooms for rent and I could hear one of my neighbors watching a movie kind of late, but nothing some ear plugs couldn't fix.

I had a quick stay in Nick's place but it was more than adequate. The bed was very comfy for my tastes. It had a big desk that I could do some last minute work on. It also had a printer (I didn't look to see if it had paper) that was available. The WIFI internet worked great. Being that it is an old remodeled house, it looks to have the original wood floors which definitely are noisy when any of the house guests walk around, but it was quiet otherwise. I would stay here again. Thanks Nick and Julia.
Great place! Clean, quite, and comfy

Staying at this peaceful, spacious & perfectly located historic home in Salem was very enjoyable.
Nick & Julia promptly handled all communication with great kindness, and check-in was easy.
The house has everything you need, beautiful living & dining rooms, a fully equipped kitchen, huge bathroom, very comfortable beds, and even a wonderful porch swing. There's the added pleasure of occasional other friendly guests to chat with, as well. I highly recommend a stay here.

As other reviews noted there several rented rooms. The bathroom is shared with all renters. Everyone stayed in there room with the door shut and we didn't know who else was there. The house was large and in a quiet neighborhood walking distance to some downtown places. We only had 1 towel for 2 of us for 2 days. For the extra person fee and cleaning fee I expected plenty of towels and a spic and span home.
There were some cleanliness issues (dirty dishes in cabinets- old food in bedroom mini-fridge).  Host sometimes difficult to get in touch with.  But nice house in convenient area.
Comfortable bed. Good temperature when room AC run.
Nice place

This was a terrible experience.  We texted early in the day with our ETA, but got no response.  After we arrived, there was no host, no direction or instructions, and a lock box on the front door with no code.  We spent 45 minutes on the porch in the hot sun, exhausted from a 10-hour drive and no way to get in.  Finally, after many tries, we found a code in the AirBnB pages, but it did not work.  We called and texted the hosts numerous times with no reply.  Finally, we called AirBnB, who kindly put us up in a hotel, but it was some time before even that was sorted out.  (A shout-out to Jonathan at AirBnB for excellent service and follow-up, though.  Thanks!)  Only after we were in the hotel did we get a response from the hosts, which was far too little, too late.  This was my first ever bad experience on AirBnB.  I would not risk booking with these hosts again.

Tolle Unterkunft, großes Zimmer, nah am Stadtzentrum und ruhig gelegen.
Habe hier eine tolle Zeit gehabt.
Overall a great experience! Spacious, nice house, with a big kitchen. Close to the fairgrounds, where I was working. Quiet neighborhood. I enjoyed my time there and would recommend this place.
The room was very clean. I didn't see one single person while staying here! So it was really quiet. Bathroom was clean. Had everything I needed. Definately reccomend!

My husband and I appreciated the value and location of Nick and Julia's home -- close to campus and walkable to downtown. The living space was clean and comfortable (once we got past the initial snafu of an incorrect lockbox code and could get into our room). We would definitely consider returning here.
Beautiful quiet house. Very clean. Nick answered questions quickly. I would stay there again.
Easy check in. Nice big, well furnished, common area inside and large fenced area. Quiet house while I was there - felt like I had the place to myself.
Nice house with welcoming host. Thanks for a great stay!
First Airbnb exp and it won’t be the last. The house had everything I️ needed,bed was comfy and WiFi was fast. Great experience thank you.
Julia & Nick were available, helpful, generous and kind! The house is spacious and nice and clean! Great value. Really glad I found them so last minute on New Year’s Eve!

The house has been recently remodeled and is kept clean. The common living areas are very spacious but rarely used. The two people who live here full time stay in their rooms, more like a hotel or boarding house. In fact, I didn't meet anyone until I was leaving (the system is set up so that you can get and return your own keys and are not reliant on an in-person host). It's only 1.5 miles from Salem Hospital so the location was ideal for me, and it's bike-able.
Quick, enjoyable stay. Highly recommended!
The best thing about this place is the huge downstairs living room and kitchen. This space is shared but it is expansive.

Great stay for a quick work trip to Salem! The room was big and clean and quiet! The surrounding neighborhood is safe and I felt secured.  Nick and Julia were more than accommodating as my work schedule changed multiple times and so I had to alter my reservation multiple times. The other residents were very friendly and helpful. I will definitely be staying again on my next trip to Salem!

Beautiful old house! Very easy to check in and the permanent residents were helpful when we saw them. Had a few minor glitches that Julia cleared up quickly. The single bathroom got pretty busy at times but not a surprise. Much like a boarding house/hostel set up which I think is perfect for young travellers or passing through. I missed meeting up with a host and learning about the area, but that is just my preference.
The regular or permanent residents who are not hosting can be an issue. The property is fine if you can share space.

This experience was upsetting. This listing is a bit misleading. It is NOT a private room with a private bathroom as I was made to believe, but more along the lines of dorm living sharing a bathroom with 4 other rooms. This wouldn’t have been too bad had the toilet not look like it hadn’t been cleaned in weeks! Covered in pubic hair and urine. This wasn’t the only thing unclean. Dust and cobwebs covered the halls, bathroom, and our room. When we arrived, we could not get in with the codes on AirBNB. The hosts did not send us check in information and the codes they have on AirBNB do not match. This, of course, is after I was in communication with the host all day about a check in time. It was more important that I come after 5 than receive the code and key to my room. When we got into the room, one of the two beds was not made and there were NO extra pillows for the second bed, even in the spare closet they told us we’d find them.

In summary: misleading listing description, Incomplete communication, and unclean and unmade room.

We will not be returning.
Solid value.
Nice, clean and simple. Recommended for anyone who needs an easy stay in Salem.
It's a nice old house and a comfortable place to stay.  There is only one bathroom for 4 rooms, but it worked out.
Very well located tidy, and well thought out home. The kitchen and dining area combo is delightful. We really appreciated having our meals there and visiting with a few friends, cozy!
The place was nice and comfortable. Two thumbs up!
Wonderful. Quiet. Peaceful, as advertised.  Good price. Easy and simple. Just great.
Great place that has self check in, which I really like. I've stayed there before and had a great experience.
Convenient, quiet, spacious place with lots of extras. Bed is super comfy.

The place was reasonably clean for my tastes. Check was simple, nice quiet neighborhood. There were parts of the bedroom that were a bit dusty. I am not a clean freak so the dust did not bother me except when I had to climb under the desk to plug in the AC unit. To get the AC unit to plug in just right was quite the ordeal. Once I finally figured it out I slept well.

Older house in a great location in Salem, OR. Don't be fooled by the outside of the house, inside the house is nice. Not too far from anything I went to, walkable to some things, and easy to get to/from house. The self check-in/check-out was handy since I arrived really late and had to leave really early. Julia was very quick to respond to my inquiries, so even though she wasn't there if you need anything, just let her know. For a solo traveler, it's like a hostel house so I just used it as a room for sleeping/showering when I wasn't out and about. The house has large rooms and large common areas, so there's great potential for good times if you can book as a group.

My grandma and I booked this place last minute and we were very excited about someone actually being able to host us on the same day. As soon as I requested the booking, it was accepted and paid in full. I sent them a friendly message for the last minute-ness about it and went on our way. At check in time we arrived to the house and rang to doorbell and stood outside for 5 minutes waiting for someone to answer. I then read that I was supposed to get a message about a key box and how to open it, which I did not. I though, “no big deal I’ll just have to call them and ask for it over the phone”. I called both of the numbers provided on their page and not only did they not answer a single call, each call went straight to voicemail. I was kind of annoyed as this point but I was giving them the benefit of the doubt and gave them time to call or message back. After two hours I still had not heard anything back from them and was getting really anxious about if I was going to have a place to stay that night. I tried calling again, straight to voicemail. At this point and I’m beyond livid and call Airbnb themselves and demanded a full refund. They told me they had to give the hosts 45 minutes to respond to Airbnb before they could refund me. Shockingly enough, they didn’t respond!! I was able to get a full refund because of Airbnb’s great customer service. Don’t ever stay here. The hosts are unreliable, unprofessional and clearly don’t give a damn about having a reputable business. I bet they won’t even respond to this review
Centrally locates in Salem. Very responsive hosts!
Great place for a short stay. Very close to downtown Salem and a very well kept house. Host was accommodating and gave good food suggestions. Would stay here again!

This is a lovely renovated house. The hosts were clear communicators. The place was immaculately clean and the items for guest use were clearly marked: utensils, cookware, Kuerig and coffee pods, dishes and flatware, extra towels in the bathroom. There is a comfortable living room, dining room, laundry and kitchen with nice appliances for guest use The house is in a quiet residential neighborhood. The hosts say this in the description but really pay attention to the part about shared bathrooms. There is one half bath and one full bath for 5 rooms.  I would stay here again.
Nice house could use another bathroom
100% super great, bed was very comfortable, great location, nice quiet neighborhood with pretty trees, definitely would love to stay again!

Overall a good stay; however, if sharing a bath room is a problem, this isn’t the place for you. I just needed a place to rest my head, so perfect for me. The overall all feel is that of a rooming house, but very clean. Big shared space and good kitchen from the looks. Great location in an a tree lined neighborhood. Let your requirements guide you in choosing this place.
The place is good the hosts are very helpful
Great location, wonderful amenities, beautiful home. An awesome place to stay for a weekend or a month!
Beautiful and Charming home. The other guests were very friendly. Nice to have a washer and dryer. Very quiet and peaceful.
The best was their helfpul tenant.
Very pleasant Victorian home.
Perfect place to stay for a good visit in Salem
Very peaceful neighborhood and clean home. Beds were comfy check-in/check-out were very easy.
This was a lovely place to stay, but I was on a quick visit and didn't get to enjoy it much. Comfortable bed and a shared bathroom upstairs.
Great spot! I went down to Salem for a concert and needed a place to stay for the night. Planned on this spot about a month in advance and it is as good as advertised. Great for my purposes!

I would give this experience a negative star if possible.

I think this was perhaps my tenth AirBnB?!

My second in Oregon, and my only attempt in Salem.

It was the worst AirBnB yet!

I have had issues with some hosts in the past who falsely represented their space, and this is the first time a host has refused to refund me.

Lessons learned:

1) never book a last minute stay on a Friday night after you have been on the road 12 hours a day for days. You are bound to make mistakes.

2) Be sure and select the drop down menu to include your traveling companion, even if in your initial email you mention said companion because host might be unscrupulous and use your mistake to justify keeping your money even if you do not stay in the room.

3) If host is using an inferior lock box, walk away!

4) If host hides behind email, and does not reach out to you directly when you are having issues getting in, walk away!

5) No matter how exhausted you are, and even though you have to make the bed, take the time to search the closets in the hall to find the linens you need, because even though It smells of cigarette smoke and your companion is allergic, your host expects you to stay, or will keep your money.

Know that professionally cleaned here does not include making the bed, and that even though the room was not ready to let, said host made it available anyway because... well they need the money.

I suspect Julia and Nick are having difficulty in general as in the fews days since I tried to stay here they have rebranded their AirBnB account, from Julia to Nick and changed the photo to exploit a young child (Never a good idea), though rebranding is probably a good thing as it was not doing anything positive for the AirBnB brand as it was.

I’m still hopeful that AirBnB will see fit to reimburse me for this mistake, and that Julia and Nick will find the resources elsewhere to fix the gaping hole in the porch beneath the lockbox.

Did I mention the hole?

I fell in it, figuratively speaking which is why I am writing this.

I have photos if anyone is interested.

To close on a positive note... The Grand Hotel on Liberty in Salem is worth every penny.

Head north my freinds Portland is spectacular!
Well managed , modern kitchen and quality materials; convenient location for business in Salem.
A really reliable place to stay for work trips to Salem. Good location, nice house and rooms, and good hosts.
Nice

I had a great time at Nick and Julias' place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located in Salem. Would absolutely recommend to stay there!
This is a great house in a great location. I stay here regularly when I am traveling to Salem for work.

This house was conveniently located and the cost of the room was not egregrious.  It feels like a strange accommodation with one longer term tenant, but otherwise empty.  Because it is lived in, not all spaces felt particularly cleaned or maintained (there were dishes in the sink all week).  A lot things felt forgotten like the empty container of instant  coffee offered on the counter, the moldy coffee in the coffee pot or the pilled sheets on the bed on which previous occupants hairs lingered.   However,  I was appreciative to have access to a kitchen and the ability to come and go as I pleased.  The internet was not available when I arrived and since this issue arose the day before, I would have appreciated having been communicated that this was the case and offered a resolution.  The internet was not restored until day 3, which was rather inconvenient for me.  It is what it is and if you need an easy place to stay this should do, but I have opted for a different location for future needs.
Excellent location and easy access.
What I expected

A great location, great rooms and everything you need is there.  Only pet peeve of þinn were the train horns during night time, but I am a light sleeper.  The hosts are extremely helpful and quick to answer any questions you may have.
Fantastic trip all around! The master bedroom is lovely and very spacious, common areas were as well. Absolutely loved the front porch swing! Well worth the money
Great room , spacious and clean. Nick and Julia  were great adjusting for my changing schedule. Thank so much!
Great house and neighborhood .
Great :)
Great stay
Great location, lots if space. Good hospitality, good communication with host.
Great location, good value.
Great!! Quick responses and great space!
The room was very comfortable and quiet. I had a great respite and would certainly return.
A very pleasant stay.
Responsive hosts, lovely older house, very clean. Only complaint is that mattress in the room is old and seems to need replacement.
Beautiful old home with character and modern touches :)
Very nice experience at Nick's.  Thanks

Staying here means potentially lots of people in a decent sized house who may or may not be observing Covid protocol whatsoever.  If you are not concerned about your health at all...its a pretty nice house with lots of potential-
Clean, convenient, quiet, no hassle.   Highly recommend!
Great location, easy to contact hosts.
Great communication
Nice place to stay
The house is very comfortable with good accommodations. If you don't mind sharing a bathroom, this is a great place to stay. The rooms are very private and safe.

This place is a youth hostel that charges hotel rates - where the bathroom is shared by multiple folks going in and out at all hours of the night. I woke up once and asked a gentleman in another room to keep the loud music down (which he did). This was well after 10PM. The second time one young lady hammered the bathroom door saying "I know you're in there, you're drunk that's why you wont come out" - to her roommate in the bathroom. Then they were talking loudly in their room for a while. Most of all there are multiple maskless people going in and out of the house at all hours of the night during COVID. The description makes it seem like there is a host on site. For the cost I paid for this, I could have just booked a hotel room in Newberg for the same price.
Peaceful, quiet, convenient and clean. Grocery store and other shopping stores all in convenient driving distance.
My first time using an AirBnB, worked out great for me, close to where I needed to be.  Clean, nice old house.
Nice house. Well equipped kitchen. Attentive hosts.

Julia's place worked great for my 2-night stay for Ironman 70.3 Salem. Spacious and well-equipped room and house. Neighborhood was quiet and safe with plenty of parking and very close to downtown Salem. Highly recommend.
Clean, quiet and comfortable. This place is in a nice neighborhood that’s convenient for anything in the Salem area.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Delia and Bob were fantastic! They were very welcoming and inviting into their home. The neighborhood was very close to downtown, but also safe. The home is beautiful, and the guest area is private and very clean! I am so glad to have met them. If I ever venture back to Salem, I will be sure to stay here again!

We have an extremely comfortable space to stay in Bob & Delia were great hosts (very friendly) made us feel at home and provided us with everything we needed, a comfortable room, a bathroom, a small living space, all in all it we had a good time!

Bob and Delia are the sweetest! We were traveling through Oregon to get to Seattle and needed to stay overnight in Salem and stumbled upon their Airbnb. They have the cutest home and the pics on here do not do it any justice whatsoever. If you happen to be in the area or need a so place to stay as you're traveling through, you must book here! Guarantee that you will have a very restful stay! Bob and Delia are very very nice folks and their place is beautiful and clean! Definitely recommend them in a heartbeat! Oh, and love their dogs! ❤️

I was visiting Salem, OR for work and stayed five days with Bob and Delia. They were so kind and hospitable! Their house was super cute, neat and very accommodating, perfect for working "from home" while I was away from home. It was such a pleasure getting to meet their daughter, Vanessa as well! Not to mention, they had the cutest three little Shitzus! I would have loved to visit with them and get to know them a bit more, had I had more time. I'd definitely stay with them again when I come back!

My wife and I stayed 4 nights at Bob & Delia's place and used it as a hub to visit different sights inland, the Columbia Gorge, Portland, and on the coast - very central!  The home is beautiful in a quiet, safe neighbourhood - felt like home away from home.  The family is lovely and go out of their way to meet your needs.  I would definitely stay here again if the opportunity arises!

The host made us feel so welcome  it was more than we expected and felt so comfortable. It was clean spacious private and very comfortable. The neighborhood was very safe and easy to get to. We would go back next time we are in the area

Bob and Delia are just wonderful! Friendly, attentive, flexible and engaging! They truly made our stay fun and pleasant. I couldn't have asked for a better host or place to stay. The room was warm, inviting and very comfortable. Great livingroom area and bathroom as well. I enjoyed their conversation and we talked as if we've met each other before! Thanks again for a great stay and letting us drink all of your coffee!! I can't wait to come back :) Next time, I am making time for us to get out that karaoke machine!

Delia and Bob were terrific hosts. Communication, both before and during my stay was easy and pleasant. Their basement is as pictured;
private, spacious, clean - with a comfortable bed in a separate bedroom and full bath, as well as a nice living area including TV and fixings for coffee, tea , snacks. Their backyard is a lovely space to
relax. The location is a safe, fairly convenient suburban
neighborhood of upscale homes in West Salem. Delia and Bob themselves were the best part of my stay - they were warm, fun, and most welcoming. I enjoyed a great breakfast with them, and homemade chicken soup on my first night there, blackberries from their garden, and their three adorable little dogs. A stay at this lovely
home is highly recommended.

Bob and Delia are a lovely couple. They were very accommodating, the house is very nice, the room was spotless clean and the sheets and towels crisp and clean. The place is next door to wineries in Willamette.

These two were perfect hosts! We contacted them while driving in hopes of finding something close and quick since we were on a 4+ hour drive already and we're ready to call it a night. Not only did they respond within minutes but we were able to use Instant book to confirm our stay and were enroute to their house (or a restaurant near their house for a quick bite) within 15 mins. They greeted us when we parked and showed us right to our space. The family made sure we were comfortable and no had what we needed then left us to settle in. The space is very comfortable and they offer a variety of amenities. Very thoughtful. We left after they did, at least we think so as it was very quiet upstairs when we headed out. The electronic door lock made it easy for us to leave quickly and get on the road again. Comfortable, easy, convenient and great communication. It was the perfect pitstop!

Our stay was very short (we were in town for a wedding), so we only met Delia, but she was extremely kind and generous when we arrived and made sure we had absolutely everything we needed. We were very comfortable, and the place was clean, welcoming, and quiet, with coffee and everything we needed ready for us!

Wow! This was our first time using Airbnb, so my wife and I weren't sure what to expect.  We were very lucky that we found the perfect hosts. Bob & Delia were amazing!  They made us feel very welcomed into their beautiful home.  They made sure we had everything we needed and went over and above what we ever could have expected.  Just a fantastic experience. We look forward to coming back whenever we visit Salem. Thank you Bob & Delia!
Great accommodations and very hospitable! Made us wish that we could stay more than one night. Strongly recommend staying here if you are in or around Salem for however long.

Bob and Delia were fantastic, friendly, and accommodating hosts. They welcomed me into their beautiful home and made sure that I was taken care of. Can wait to stay with them again when I'm in the area.

We loved our stay with Bob and Delia!  They were incredibly welcoming and provided wonderful hospitality.  The guest space is large and very homey, with a very comfortable bed and full living area/bathroom.  We would definitely recommend their place to anybody going to Ashland.

Bob and Delia were incredible! This was my first time using Airbnb (on a friend's suggestion) and both of them made me feel so welcome despite my lack of knowledge. They were very sweet and friendly, my room was very comfy, and the location was perfect, as I had come up to surprise a friend and the house was very close to theirs. I wish I had had more time to spend up there, because I genuinely enjoyed talking to both of them. Hopefully I'll be able to stay again the next time I go to Salem!
Bob & Delia are wonderful.  The space is very cozy & comfy!

This was an all around amazing stay. Very accommodating, kind and clean. My daughter loved their puppies and back yard. I haven't slept that good since I had my twins a year ago....I would love to see them again. ♡
Bob and Delia were present to welcome me and communicated clearly regarding their schedule. They were very hospitable. The listing is as described and is very comfortable.
It was a beautiful house, very nice and clean. Highly recommend!
I had a wonderful time with Bob and Delia. They are wonderful hosts. If you are looking for a place to stay in Salem, I highly recommend staying here.

Bob and Delia's place was simply perfect! Very nice room, comfortable, quiet, and very clean. Location is very convenient if you want to travel around Portland.
As host, Bob and Delia were great! Very nice couple, prepared every detail to make us feel at home.
Highly recommended!
Very nice and quite neighborhood. Pleasant experience, would definitely stay again if in the area!

This is Martha giving the review: Brian and I loved this place! Bob and Delia were great hosts; absolutely delightful people! We were lucky enough to meet their lovely daughter, and she was a delight also. They were all so warm and hospitable. The place is beautiful. We felt like we were in our own private space, and it was very comfortable. They had it set up very nicely, like a mini apartment, with your own bedroom, living room, and coffee/fridge corner. If we should travel that way again, we would definitely want to stay there again.
This location is extremely clean, comfortable and well decorated. The hosts even offered me food. They are very kind and respond to requests quickly. I would highly recommend staying here.

Bob & Delia are excellent hosts. Communication was easy and they really go above and beyond with the little touches (Keurig! and mini fridge, bottled water, and little soaps to name a few) for a very nice and hospitable stay. They had a nice space in the bedroom where I could relax or get some work done on my tablet, and equally in the living room. I had a very restful night's sleep. I would love to stay with them again! Five stars *****!

Bob & Delia and their wonderful daughters were so welcoming and kind during our 10 day stay at their home. The house was quiet in the morning so it allowed us to sleep in a little longer (than we should of). We were very comfortable there and would definitely stay there again.
A great spot!
I stayed overnight while at a conference. It was the perfect, private space to decompress after a full day of information, and comfortable enough as well. The décor and touches were perfect!

Bob and Delia are super generous and went out of their way to help me out and welcome me. I wish I was staying longer because the downstairs room and living room you have to yourself is lovely and clean with everything you would need. Next time I'm in Salem I will definitely stay with them, if they aren't booked up...since with their kind of hospitality you'll be lucky if they have availability!
Thank you for sharing your home with me. Your home is beautiful and the room was perfect - just as described. I enjoyed talking with you and look forward to another visit. Best!
Very comfy and clean. Bob and Delia are very welcoming.

Delia & Bob have a great home to host guests. Very welcoming, clean and quiet. Easy access to downtown Salem shopping, eateries and the like.

Would definitely recommend and would stay again on future trips!
Prompt communication through email from host. Only stayed one night, checked in late, and left early. Bob and Delia were welcoming and respectful of our privacy. Very nice hosts!
Our stay at Bob and Delia's was a great expierence; they were awesome hosts. We will stay again when the need comes up.

A wonderful place to enjoy when in Salem for either business or pleasure. This was a little gem of a find when we needed accommodations at the last minute.  Very lovely hosts and spacious accommodations.

If Bob and Delia has their place available, I highly recommend booking their place.  They are very nice, accommodating, and great host.  I will definitely book with them again if they gave an availability.
Nice place, Sweet people. Comfortable stay.  😊

Delia and Bob were fantastic hosts though my husband and I were pretty much in and out we had a wonderful night away from the kids and it was so nice to jump in a nice warm cozy bed with some peace and quiet. Would highly recommend I wish we could have stayed longer hopefully we will get to visit again😊
Very clean, comfortable and quiet little apartment. All you need for a restful stay. Bob and Delia are very hospitable and nice. Would stay there again with no regrets.

Bob and Delia were awesome hosts.  The were great at communicating with for checking in and very responsive when I had  question. Their home is decorated so tastefully and so welcoming and peaceful.  The bed was very comfortable. I highly recommend Bob and Delia's home and the are wonderful hosts!!! ☺

Big place in a real nice area with everything you need. The area is very clean alot of real nice amenities. I haven't watched TV in a long time there big screen was awesome for that. Really nice people who made sure to let him know if I needed any.
I enjoyed the living room, which allowed us to receive visits. It was a wonderful, pleasant stay at Bob and Delia's house.
Thank you Bob and Delia for sharing your home. We had a great time in the Salem area, and found it very handy to use your home as a central hub to branch out from and see the sights.  Thanks again.

Bob and Delia are incredible hosts.   From their warm welcome, to suggestions on "what to do" and,  finally,  to their amazing accommodations,  it was a wonderful experience.  We will definitely stay there again whenever we find ourselves in Salem.
Very nice home. Wonderful people. Enjoyed our stay. Spacious living room. Nice TV and furnishings.
The neighborhood is very quite and safe. Delia is very helpful for answering my questions. Definately gonna come back in the future!
Loved our stay here, even though it was only one night. The space was bigger than anticipated and it was so clean and nicely decorated! Really gave us privacy and a homey feeling!

10/10 Beautiful home, quiet neighborhood, close to downtown Salem. We loved the area so much we are looking for a home in the area and booked a stay there for next week. The space is extremely clean and it was very nice to have the extra TV room space to spread out and give my boys their space for a night. Delia, Bob and her adult daughter were very accommodating and welcoming. We look forward to our next stay.
Such a great comfortable place! Quiet neighborhood and wonderful hosts! The space was clean, well kept, and felt private. Bob and Delia are delightful! We will be back!
Well maintained, convenient, quiet and clean. Nothing more to ask for.

Very clean and comfortable home. I was really impressed with the great job that was done on the basement. The hosts were able to accommodate us last minute made us feel very welcomed. I highly recommend a stay at Bob and Delia's.

We love Bob's and Delia's place so much this was our second stay. Extremely clean and private. My boys loved spreading out in the TV room and having their own personal space after traveling. Bob and Delia are also extremly welcoming and helpful with suggestions about the area. They also provide a small fridge, microwave and coffee machine. 10/10 stay.

Bob and Delia were wonderful hosts! Their home is immaculate and charming. Bob and Delia were warm, friendly and accommodating. The guest area is private and comfortable with a private bath and living area. The neighborhood is nice and exceptionally quiet. Bob and Delia were quiet and respectful of our privacy. The bed was comfortable and was made with high quality cotton linens. I will stay here again!
