Bob and Delia are genuinely nice people. Very friendly and accommodating. Their home is lovely and our space was great. The bed is super comfy too. If we're ever in Salem again we will stay here ☺
Bob and Delia are both welcoming and personable. Their house was very clean and had extra necessities if needed.
Excellent place to stay.

The stay and home was exactly as advertised.. accomodations were comfortable and clean.. Delia and Bob were very friendly and all the instructions were clear about leaving and entering their home.. would go back when in town.

This was our first stay at an Airbnb and we were impressed! Bob and Delia were both very welcoming, and we felt like we had everything we could have needed for our stay including towels, water, toiletries, and a comfy bed! We definitely recommend their home and look forward to staying here next time we are in Salem!

My wife and I spent 3 nights with Bob and Delia while we were in town for my son's wedding.  They were a great couple.  Outgoing and welcoming to have us in their home.  The accommodations were perfect and could not have been better.

We thought we landed in the lap of luxury when we entered Bob and Delia’s one bedroom suite in the basement of their Salem, Oregon, home.  They warmly welcomed us the first night and checked frequently during our stay to make sure we had everything we needed.  Our bedroom, living room, and bathroom were exquisitely furnished with all the comforts of home.  There’s even a piano!  The small refrigerator and Keurig were very much appreciated.  They even changed our towels after two nights!  We came to Salem to see family and the solar eclipse, and we watched it right outside their home with other neighborhood families.  Bob and Delia made sure we were included, bringing out lawn chairs and bottled water for us.   We met as strangers but left as friends and hope our “celestial” paths cross again.  Thanks again, Bob and Delia, for making our first trip to Oregon one we’ll always treasure!

My girlfriend and I had a great time staying at Bob & Delia's beautiful home. They were responsive and flexible about our check-in time. Bob suggested a lot of good places around West Salem. I'm highly recommended Bob & Delia as your next host.
Such a beautiful and comfortable space!! Bob and Delia were both so very sweet and accommodating, It was so very brief for me to stay and yet I felt so 'at home.'

This place is gorgeous and offers a lot of privacy with your own living room space, bedroom and bathroom. Bob and Delia responded promptly and were extremely helpful with us booking later in the day. Couldn't have found a better place to stay in a really nice and safe community a short drive from central Salem. If we are in Salem in the future we would LOVE to stay here again!
Wonderful home, we had a great stay! Bob and Delia were superb hosts!

This place had everything we needed and more!  Super clean with lots of cool decor.  We had a very short overnight time frame with a late arrival.  Bob was there to greet us and show us the ropes then let us get right to sleep.  The bed was very comfortable, especially the pillows!!  Checkout was just as easy as checkin.  They left toiletries in the bathroom in case we'd forgotten anything and a bottle of water all of which was much appreciated!  And the price and location were an excellent value.
We had a wonderful stay at Bob and Delia's! It's a great, private space, very clean, and the hosts showed excellent hospitality. I recommend them highly, and wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

My first stop in a air B&B and was amazing
Really nice family and very lovely home, beautiful inside and outside so would highly recommend to anyone wanting to stop in Portland so use this family :)
Staying with Bob and Delia was extremely pleasant.  The room came with excellent amenities and I would highly recommend staying with them.
Spacious private place wth private bath, comfy bed in separate bedroom and a large sitting room with gigantic TV. The best surprise was the little refrigerator.
Bob & Delia's place is just as described.  But it was even better than expected because it was so spacious and very quiet.  Great value for their place!!

This was a WONDERFUL place. Super clean. Beautiful room. Great bed, great shower. Very private. Just like great place to  be and a place I would want to come back to. I flew in for a wedding and was not there long, but loved it. They had a ironing board and oron, so I could iron my dress for the wedding. I highly recommend.
What a lovely and nice place, highly recommended for anyone looking for a place in Salem. Thanks B&D
True to description. Nice lower level all to ourselves. Great wifi. Great location and super nice hosts!

Bob & Delias place was great, they accommodated us on short notice and were super easy to communicate with. They made us feel very welcome, and the bed was comfortable! Would definitely stay here again!

Bob and Delia were very quick to respond and accommodated my husband and I in a last minute booking. We had to make a quick trip when our nephew was born and they gladly took us in! They were less than three miles from the hospital. The neighborhood and their home are both beautiful!
This was a great place to stay. Bob & Delia were very hospitable and very helpful with great suggestions for a restaurant and a beautiful area to walk.
Place was clean, 10 min from DT Salem and I felt very comfortable staying there. The space was private and quite spacious. Very nice. I would definitely stay there again

Very easy to find. Beautiful house and the suite was what it says, very private. Didn’t hear anyone get up the next morning so I was able to sleep in. Check out time is the best ! Thank you for the clean comfortable stay !!
Bob and Delia's place was quiet, cozy and clean. A nice place to stay for the night in Salem, and a good value. Recommended!

We loved staying at Bob & Delia’s! Perfect setup for 1-2 travelers with plenty of space. It’s a great setup and very clean. No more than a 5 minute drive into the downtown Salem area. Can’t recommend it enough!
Clean and cozy.  Well lit and comfortable, in the basement.  You’d hardly know it was below the house, except that you can hear what’s happening above.  A lovely couple to interact with. :)
Great place to stay....easy access!
Beautiful home in quiet neighborhood. Close to downtown Salem. Easy access to everything!
Great place in west Salem! For the cost you simply cannot beat staying with Bob and Delia. Having your own bedroom, living room, and bathroom made my stay with my wife and baby perfect.
A very relaxing and comfortable place to stay. I hope everyone enjoys it as much as we did.
Convenient location, great neighborhood, quiet. The living space is very comfortable and private.

The room was very nice and well furnished. This was a very relaxing place to stay for a work trip as it offered a nice, private environment to come back to after a long day at work. The privacy that Bob and Delia offered was very appreciated. I will be checking availability the next time I need to stay in Salem for business.
Great space, as described.  Bob and Delia were very friendly and accommodating.

The hospitality of the hosts is wonderful, clean towels and coffee refills daily. Refrigerator and microwave for bringing your own food in.  Large TV, with many channels to choose from. Semi private, with the open stairwell to the rest of the house, but never felt intrusive. Great space for 1 to 2 people, anymore is a bit tight, yet still comfortable.
Wonderful hosts and beautiful accommodations!
Bob and Delia’s place is great. You get the whole downstairs! Very private and lots of extras. The host are went beyond what you would expect. Ask and they will accommodate you. Highly recommend!
Bob and Delia are perfect hosts. Close to everything cool in Salem too!

Bob and Delia were great with communicating. They were also very friendly! The suite was in the basement, so it was mostly private. The laundry room was next to the private bath and garage door. The amenities were great! Plenty of hot beverage options, a microwave, large flat screen TV, fridge, wine cooler, couches and a comfortable recliner!
Great place, would return.
Delightful home in a very nice area of West Salem, sparkling clean and private with a bedroom, private bath and sitting area.
The home away from home one needs after a long trip
Bob and Delia were great hosts. They very hospitable and their house is immaculately clean. Will definitely book with them in the future.
Nice quiet spot in a nice neighborhood.  Bob was very friendly and I had a nice stay.
This is a great place as good or better than the pictures, clean, relaxing and we'll equipped.  Great TV and couch area, I highly recommend.
Lovely hosts and lovely place! I would definitely recommend Bob and Delia's place if you are ever in Salem :)
Amazing! Beautiful and clean! Great hospitality! This will be my go to place from now on!
Amazing amazing amazing
Delia and Bob provide a lovely place in Salem.  The quarters downstairs are private, spacious and spotlessly clean.  They are warm and friendly hosts.
Amazingly beautiful and private accommodations.  I didn’t realize I was getting a private family room with the room!  It’s incredibly under priced!!
Great spot! Highly recommend.

Bob and Delia's place is fantastic. They were great with communicating and quick to respond. The room was fantastic and you basically have the downstairs all to yourself. Will book again if I ever need to stay in Salem! Thank you again!

I so enjoyed my time at Bob & Delia's place. They made me feel welcome and right at home. They are just a short drive to the Capitol and provided me my best stay I've ever had in Salem.

Thanks guys!

The place was quiet, clean and central for anything you want to do in the Salem area.  Bob and Delia were great hosts.  We enjoyed the coffee and snacks.  The refrigerator and microwave were a great bonus and really helped the space feel like our own.  Thanks, Bob and Delia for sharing your home.
Great place, and a very convenient location if you need to do things downtown.
I stayed with Bob and Delia for one night. I had such a peaceful night of rest. Their home is immaculate, they were very hospitable and the amenities were all one could ask for!
I stay with Bob and Delia regularly and it is always amazing. This is hands down the best place to stay in Salem.
Bob &Delia have a lovely space close to everything you need, but also feels secluded and quiet. The space is very cozy and welcoming and is an excellent value for the price.

I was in Salem visiting Willamette University with my daughter. This place was just 10 minutes away. Bob and Delia are very sweet and welcoming. The bedroom, bathroom and lounge space were very clean and stylish. I had to call Delia to figure out the shower - the trick is to pull on the tub faucet to transfer the water to shower - she was very nice about my inability to figure it out, lol! The bed is super comfortable too, with great fluffy pillows. I didn't use much else as I was really just there to sleep, but there's a big screen tv, mini fridge and microwave, Keurig coffee machine and comfortable seating area. Lovely place and lovely people. If my daughter chooses Willamette, I hope to come back again when I visit.

A beautiful house with a lovely suite! Feels like a home away from home. Delia and Bob are really lovely and so helpful with everything you need. We felt very welcome, and would come and stay again if we were in the area.
Quiet and clean, with lots of space- bedroom and living space with TV to relax and unwind. Keurig with coffee to get your day started! Was a great experience for my first time!

Bob & Delia were very welcoming! Their house is spotless and you have a tv room, bedroom & bathroom to yourself on the lower level. They are super friendly. They live in a nice neighborhood to walk in too!
We loved staying at Bob & Delia’s! We wanted to take our time visiting a winery and exploring Salem and ending our day here was so relaxing and wonderful!
Bob & Delia are great hosts. The accommodations are clean & comfy. Appreciated all the special touches.

This was our 1st Airbnb stay ever and boy did we pick the best place! Bob and Delia are amazing hosts and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable.  We were in town for our daughter’s college graduation and they allowed us to ship leis from Hawaii to their address. Unfortunately the leis didn’t arrive in time but they kept checking at the house for the delivery since we were busy with activities.  The unit is super cute and the bed is very comfortable.  Our stay was amazing........we'll definitely be back! Mahalo nui loa Bob & Delia 👍😄💕🎓

This place is very nice, and the hosts are very friendly. It's a little bit outbof the way from downtown, but it's just a short drive over the bridge. I brought my bike with me, and was able to bike downtown in 30 min or less.

This is a great value! I really felt at home. The bedroom has a desk and is a good sized room and the bed was very comfy. The room with the TV has a couple of couches to chill out on. I enjoyed the stay!

Bob and Delia have a very nice home with a separate living room for guests! Their home is located in a quiet cul-de-sac which makes for a good night’s rest or efficient day working in the living room. Their place is a great value for traveling business professionals.
Very comfortable and great hosts
Quick and easy, close to town. Perfect private area within the house
Very nice couple, great place. Highly recommend.

The place was beautiful and spotless. Nice touches with coffee makers and a mini fridge. He bed was comfortable and they were very quiet, so the fact that it’s an inside access basement didn’t feel awkward at all.

They have some beautiful small inside dogs that were not in the way, never came near the guest space, and weren’t an issue at all. In the morning they did bark, but we were up at 8, so not a problem.

Delia showed us to the space, for us situated, and was ready to offer local dining suggestions. Later we met Bob and he was just as friendly.

Sometimes it’s nice to have an Airbnb that is separate and private, but in this case, being a guest in someone’s home was great because the hosts were so welcoming and friendly.
It was just as advertised on Airbnb and more. Super clean and comfortable. Bob and Delia were so easy to work with and accommodating in every way.

Bob and Delia were very friendly and accommodating. The place was super nice and clean. Bed was comfortable and the private living room was very cozy as if we were at home. Great hospitality! Highly recommended. Thank you guys again!
Loved this place so much! I slept very well. The huge TV with DirecTV is outstanding. I will definitely look this place up next time I'm in Salem!!!

We had an awesome stay! The guest area is very large and comfortable, with lots of nice amenities. The bed provided is amazing. Everything was extremely clean and modern!

Neighborhood is quiet and driveway parking was convenient. I’d love to stay here again!

I never really knew hospitality like this before. Us staying at this air bnb was very last minute but I am so glad that we did it. After driving all day from Seattle we were exhausted. We were already running late arriving to Salem in the first place and I didn’t think that anyone would be awake by the time we got there since it was almost midnight but right as we pulled up Bob walked out and was ready and willing to help us carry things and get us settled. Our place was so quiet and I couldn’t even tell it was attached to the rest of the house. I only wish we had more time there but I cannot explain how much that this place was exactly what we needed. The bed was super comfortable, everything was decorated well and it was super easy and convenient to stay there. I can’t say enough about this place. If you have a chance to stay here you should!
Great place to relax. Room had plenty of space with everything you could want/need in a room.

Delia and Bob are so wonderful and the place is more than you expect.
it's a suite, not just a room. Down stair with bedroom, living room and bathroom all for the guest. We had a wonderful time at their house.
Thank you, Delia and Bob.
Bob and Delia have a great space! It was the perfect location to attend BlackSheep Gathering. The location is beautiful, they really make you feel welcome and have great suggestions of things to do.
Our stay here was great! The room was very clean and comfortable.
Arrived late at their house and everything went smoothly. Bed was very comfortable. Well worth it - would definitely stay again!

Staying at Bob and Delia’s place was such a treat! You have the whole lower floor with a lovely living room with a huge TV, Keurig, fridge and microwave. The bed was comfy and the bathroom well appointed. They are super friendly as well. We would definitely stay there again when we visit Salem.
Two couches, a lounger, tv, fridge, micro, bedroom and bath. All nicely kept and decorated. High recommendations for this home!

Really nice space, awesome to relax in. We aren't TV people but if you are, there is a nice big one. The Wifi is really strong, decorations are nice. The place is super clean and the hosts are eager to help you out. I appreciate their hospitality.

They were wonderful hosts! Very friendly and hospitable. The space is very nice- we shared the main entrance with them and then we had the basement to ourselves. It was nice to have an entire living space with a TV to ourselves. I’d highly recommend staying here.
Nice, clean and comfortable. I only stayed a night, but was very happy. Thank you.
Perfect air Bnb!
This is a great space, it was very nice to have the whole downstairs to ourselves and the hosts were very responsive. We felt welcome and it was very clean. Would definitely stay again!

Convenient and peaceful location.   Accommodation was just as expected and more with a large sitting room in a private corner of the house. Bob and Delia were very helpful and welcoming.  Highly recommended.
Bob and Delia's place is truly a home away from home. Their place is so welcoming and comfortable that we didnt want to leave. God Bless you and your family
Fantastic hosts! Great space!

I have no reservations in recommending Bob & Delia's place.  Quiet and clean and in a great neighborhood.  Central if you want to do the coast and Silver Falls State Park, etc.  We really enjoyed our time here and would stay here again.
Very clean and comfortable. You may need a GPS to find this neighborhood, especially in the dark.
Bob and Delia were great hosts. I felt safe and secure in their wonderful home. I would highly recommend this to anyone staying in Salem.
We only stayed at Bob & Delia's place for one night, but really enjoyed our short time there. Everything was very clean and the bed very comfortable.

We needed a place for 2 nights and came upon Bob&Delia’s place. I haven't stayed in a place where the family lives upstairs but it worked out fine. It felt like home. It was clean and comfortable. When we come to Salem in the future, we’d stay there again, and would recommend it to others.
10/10 recommend!

Such a great place to stay!
Bob & Delia are great hosts! The space is perfect! We only spent time here for sleeping and getting ready in the morning, and it was exactly what we needed! After you enter the shared front door, you immediately walk downstairs to a basement suite with private bedroom, bathroom, and living space area! Our hosts were easily accessible when we had questions! It was so nice to stay at their home because we felt safe with them there, but they also gave us plenty of privacy— it felt like our own home!
We’d definitely stay here again! It was very clean, so comfy, safe, warm (and cool—AC! Haha), stylish, and overall just a wonderful place.

Thank you so much Bob & Delia for opening your home to us!!!
Wonderful spacious accommadation.Bob and Delia are very friendly and respond  fast  when you have a question  or problem.It is in a nice  area of Salem very private
Loved it here! The place was beautiful and they had everything we needed even though we just slept there! It was awesome!
Excellent private and clean suite with a comfortable bed and amazing TV.

I had stayed at two other Airbnb’s in Salem. This Airbnb is my favorite.

The house is beautifully decorated and clean. Bed is very comfortable.

I liked my own living room with large TV and reclining leather oversized chair.
Very clean and welcoming. Everything was exactly as represented online. Very nicely decorated and well maintained. We would definitely stay here again.

This was a great stay! Check-in went smoothly and Delila was available via phone when I needed her. The place was apart from the main house so offered plenty of privacy. I especially loved having a Keurig to brew my coffee in the morning!

Bob and Delia have a very lovely home.  The basement is sparking clean and feels very homey and comfortable. I felt very safe and slept like a baby.  Would definitely recommend to a friend and look forward to my next stay.

I loved the place, comfortable, tastefully decorated and in a quiet residential neighborhood, perfect for a good rest. Delia & Bob were very helpful.

I loved the Keurig coffeemaker, and in the fridge we could store our things for breakfast.
To go out eating or shopping you better have a car, it's a bit too far to walk. We enjoyed our short stay and would stay there again.
It was a great stay! Clean, safe, comfortable and private suite. Bob and Delia was very responsive when we had questions.
Bob was helpful and very nice.  The place is clean, private and very pretty.

Bob and Delia’s place was wonderful. I want to just move in and live there full time. It was like having my own apartment. Very clean and comfy. The Hosts where very friendly and easy to talk to. I will be a regular

Staying with Bob and Delia was perfect. It was just like having your own small apartment. I am a traveling musician and the living room area was a perfect space to write and play. The bed was absolutely amazing, I slept like a rock and didn’t want to wake up! The space was clean (spotless) and the hosts were nice enough to keep us stocked with complimentary waters! Bob and Delia were very friendly, in constant communication, and just make you feel like part of the family. You are surrounded by positive messages in the form of photos and crafts from the second you stand in the driveway, all the way until you fall asleep, which we loved.

Bob and Delia,
Thank you so much! If we come back in the area, we will hopefully be able to book with you again! Best Airbnb experience!

Another great stay with Bob and Delia.  They are incredibly kind and quick to remedy any issues or concerns. Their home is beautiful and comfortable. Highly recommend.

Without a doubt the best AirBnB we've stayed at by far. Sparkling clean, a lot of privacy, own living room complete with TV, Keurig, microwave and much more. Bob was very open and welcoming. We highly recommend anyone to spend a night at Bob and Delia's, and would love to stay there again ourselves some time.

Bob and Delia's place was just as described; clean, comfortable, and wonderfully decorated. They made sure they were available for our questions and were very hospitable. We especially enjoyed watching US football on the huge television after being out of the country for a long time.
Such a great spot. You can tell they take pride in what they offer. Comfortable bed, ginormous t.v. and sitting couches. Cute spot.
Stayed with Bob and Delia for a third time and it was as wonderful this time as it was the first two.  Thank you for a wonderful stay again and again.

Wonderful accommodations and friendly hosts. The space was decorated so nicely, everything was sparkling clean, there were thoughtful touches like the coffee bar & magazines about the area. You have a lot more privacy than a private room being that the whole downstairs is basically guest space. Would definitely recommend to anyone in the area!
Better than advertised, this was a great deal for my own suite-- plenty of space, very clean, a lot of nice little touches.  Perfect for what I needed!
Lovely appointed suite in a very nice home, with everything we needed. The hosts were gracious. We will check for availability on our next trip to salem
You will have a nice bedroom and access to a sitting room with TV and coffee maker. Coffee and accoutrements provided. Bring snacks!

I got this place for my mom to stay at and I'm so glad I did. Bob and Delia were wonderful hosts and helped to make her stay enjoyable and comfortable. Their place is beautiful and they were very accommodating. I highly recommend it!
What an amazing airbnb! Such a great location, cut de sac..nice and quiet!  Incredible hosts, highly recommend staying here.
Bob and Delia are wonderful hosts who truly take pleasure in having airbnb guests.  The space is large and stylish and really was just perfect for our visit to Salem.
Beautiful and comfy space with great detailed directions!

Bob and Delia have a lovely home, and the guest accommodations were just perfect for me! They are in a great neighborhood, just a few minutes from farms, downtown, vineyards, restaurants, etc. They had everything I needed to be comfortable, and I really appreciated the lovely decor throughout the space. It made me feel like I was welcome and this was truly a home-away-from-home. Bob and Delia were excellent hosts, and their communication was excellent. Thanks for a lovely stay!
Bob & Delia: Have a beautiful Air B-n-B with a great location. They are also warm and friendly hosts. The. Ed was really comfy too!
Definitely a 5 star place and Bob & Delia are very kind and welcoming!

My stay at Bob and Delia’s place was perfect. Everything was as listed and I got a tour of the living quarters upon arrival. It was a perfect place to unwind and was not cramped at all. The space was clean and orderly and had just the right amount of privacy.

It’s easy to come and go as you need to and they are prompt about any issues that may arise. I highly recommend and would stay with them again.
Perfect location to get to and from downtown. Gracious hosts, quickly accommodating adjusted dates. Friendly, kind advice.
My second time staying and it was just as good as last time. Everything was clean and in order and it felt just like a home away from home.
A great place to stay. Bob and Delia are friendly, helpful and kind.  Their place is sparkling clean, roomy and restful.  I (we) would gladly stay here again

Wonderful, accomodating couple. You will not be disappointed with your stay with Bob and Delia in their home. There is cable TV in your private living room, a separate private bedroom and separate bath all charmingly furnished. It is a very cozy and comfortable stay. I have stayed here on several trips to the Salem area.
Lovely couple.

Nice private room! Comfortable space and lovely hosts. Beautiful home and a large area for relaxing. Lovely neighborhood and close enough to downtown. Definitely would recommend for anyone staying in Salem.

Bob and Delia’s place was spacious and comfortable. It had everything we needed for an enjoyable stay: a sparkling clean private bathroom, a comfy bed, and a large, hi-ceilinged living room with plenty of seating and a huge TV. We highly recommend Bob & Delia’s rental!
Always a wonderful place to stay or recommend. Among the top stays in the area, including hotels. This Highly recommended Home deserves the praise.
Very clean and comfortable!
Thru was one of the BEST AirBnB’s I’ve been in! Really truly!!!
Bob and Delia are delightful, friendly hosts who know how to make you feel welcome.
Very nice place, especially for the value. House is very clean and the check-in process was straight forward. Recommend if you need a place to stay in Salem.
The house is beautiful, and the hosts are very sweet people. The rental space was like it’s own little apartment, exceeded our expectations.
Very nice people.  The place was as advertised and we'll worth the money.  I recommend staying here.

Dave and Delia were great! The check in was easy and simple and the suite was clean and larger than I expected. The place is very homey so if anyone is traveling and wants a home away from home, this is the place to book!
Great landing pad for our local visit with family.
Bob and Delia's place was clean, comfortable and had everything I needed.  I recommend it to anyone needing a place to stay in Salem.  Excellent hosts.
Beautiful place and great amenities. Extemely clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay here again.
Thank you for your extra communication, which made check in so easy.  Your friendliness and hospitality added to a special weekend.
Very clean! Bob and Delia are very kind hosts and are very thoughtful! Enjoyed my stay very much :)
Very nice and accommodating hosts! Very clean and comfortable suite!

This was a great place. Very convenient location to downtown Salem; safe and secure neighborhood; good value; comfortable space; and friendly hosts. Bob was also very flexible on check in and check out. Only issue (and a minor one at that) was the space wasn't quite as private as expected - no door dividing the upstairs and downstairs. Still a great experience.
Great couple! Huge, private space.
Nice downstairs bedroom and living space that’s all yours. It’s not private but you feel like it is. Beautiful decor and very clean. Great communication
My husband and I were so pleasantly surprised to find this spacious, affordable, stylish, and comfortable suite in a safe neighborhood with friendly and kind hosts!
An absolutely adorable place in West Salem. Wonderful host, very accommodating.  I'd stay again!

Best I’ve been to In Salem so far. They were super nice about everything. I really love how it wasn’t private but it felt private. Lovely hospitality, house and neighborhood. I would choose to stay there in the future.
Great room,  we were  warmly welcomed
The space is one of the nicest Air B&B's we've stayed at. Very modern and fresh, comfy bed and private bathroom. Bob and Delia made us feel right at home.
Bob and Delia have a wonderful home and are great hosts. They are extremely hospitable and made sure that I had a comfortable stay. Thank you!
Very comfortable space, easy access from West Salem to surrounding areas

Very spacious, modern, and well appointed living area with home theater and comfortable wraparound sofa. Large workspace in bedroom area and fast wi-fi.  Large bathroom and full shower. Hosts are extremely friendly and responsive.
Thanks for a great stay!

Second time at Bob and Delia's because they are the best.  Truly don't look any further! The bed is comfy and the livingroom inviting.  They recommended some incredible places to eat and hike. We will be booking again.

Bob and Delia are truly wonderful. Their home is beautiful and welcoming. They made our stay in Salem better with their smiles and excellent food recommendations.  We have stayed in their space twice and are booking again for our next visit. I'll never stay anywhere else in Salem.
I had a great stay. It’s even nicer than the photos. It was a hot day and they already had the a/c going. I had a great chat with Bob. He’s very nice. I can’t recommend this place enough
Very nice house. Very nice people.
Lovely property, sparking clean great room and amenities - good location too. Quiet and peaceful area with lovely walks.
Beautiful, spacious, clean, and private. A great space for couples or small families with excellent amenities!

Bob and Delia have a wonderful home and are amazing hosts. They were very quick to offer their help and made sure that I had a comfortable stay. I recommend a stay with Bob and Delia next time you’re in Salem and I for sure will be booking through them again in the future! Thank you!
EVERYTHING WAS GREAT CONCERNING HOSTS, ACCOMODATIONS, LOCATION, AND COMMUNICATION BEFORE AND DURING OUR STAY.

Staying at Bob & Delia's was super-easy and very relaxing. I barely heard any other noise will I was there. Their home is beautiful and the space is very private, with your own room, bathroom and living area, with a huge tv! It is super-clean and comfortable....I slept like log! I would highly recommend their home to anyone. And bonus points for their three, sweet pups! ☺️

Bob and Delia really know what they're doing, the space is wonderful and welcoming and very big. They have thoughtful touches throughout and we are so grateful to have been able to stay here! I would highly recommend to anyone.
Place was spotless and really cozy.  Comfortable bed and really great hosts
A great and clean house. I enjoyed staying here and would do it again!
Friendly, loving couple who go out of their way to make you feel welcome & willing to help in any way. Great accomodations.
This was my first experience in an Airbnb. Delia was prompt and pleasant  in her communication. Check in and checkout was simple. Accommodations were private, spotless and very comfortable!

Nice, spacious bedroom with a convenient work-space, comfortable bed. A lovely living room with a large TV and sound system. Parking is on their driveway pad and access to the room is thru the main entry to the house. There is a keypad but we were met by Bob and Delia - and their adorable dogs.  Nice, quiet residential location. It is exactly as pictured and described!

I really looked forward to writing this review because Bob and Delia's place was the cleanest, and most uncluttered, place I have ever stayed. It's immaculate and beautiful. It was like staying in a top-rated resort.

Truly, this is a place you want to book when you will be staying in Salem for a week or longer. I only stayed through the night, but it was outstanding for the low cost.

It is located on a quiet cut-de-sac, and you park in a space right next to the garage, so that your vehicle is off the street. There are plenty of directions to run in the morning, if you like to workout.

The guest area is the entire basement. You will have a private bedroom, bathroom, and a living area. It looked like the paint was new. Flawless.

The bathroom is spotless. The shower looked like it was new, and installed the day before.
The towels and wash clothes were high-grade. (In many AirBnB places, you get mismatched towels that were passed down through the host family.)

The living area was large and comfortable. It had a huge TV, and excellent reading material. The couch was gigantic. I was only in there a few minutes of my stay to set up the WiFi (which connected immediately.)

The bedroom featured a queen bed, a clothing rack, cabinets, and a large computer desk. There are plenty of plug-ins to charge devices. The bed was extremely comfortable, and the bedding was top quality. There is a large window over the bed which allows you to be woken by natural light, if you so choose.

I did not use the kitchen area, because I was meeting a lady for breakfast, but it looked functional and well-equipped.

I talked with Delia on the phone just before I entered their place. She was easy to reach, very positive, and explained things easily. I do not know if she and Bob stayed on the property because I did not hear any movement inside the house.

I do not think you will find a better place in Salem, especially for such a reasonable price. Definitely book this property if you are staying for an extended period of time.
Clean and quiet place. Hosts are available if you need anything.
Nice place!
Comfortable space and nice shower! Very nice family.
Bob and Delia were delightful hosts. Very welcoming. We had a wonderful stay.
Nice place, comfortable and easy to get to town. Friendly and accommodating hosts.

Delia and Bob are great Super Hosts and take pride in making their guests feel  as comfortable as possible. The property is  kept very clean and  the accomodations are very comfortable. They are very friendly and love meeting their guests.  I have always enjoyed staying  with them .   Sara

I found the accommodations to be wonderful, comfortable and clean and new and so convenient to a lot of areas in Salem. The hosts are so very personable and friendly and it was just an easy and comfortable process all the way around!! And at night, it was so quiet (a great neighborhood) it made for good sleeping! I just may be back someday!!
This is a great space with great value. Bob and Delia were very friendly and we would recommend them.
Bob was extremely courteous and his house was awesome.  Would 100% recommend.
Great space, nice hosts. Will definitely stay again.

Bob and Delia were phenomenal hosts, the living area, bathroom and bedroom were sparkling clean. They are there to talk if you want, but are totally fine with giving you all the privacy you want. Thank again!
Wonderful people and a wonderful Airbnb, I highly recommend staying here!
Great house and hosts!! Would recommend to anyone traveling in the area

Bob and Delia are very kind and welcoming! I sent a message that we had arrived, and Bob immediately popped out of the house to help us carry our luggage in. We had a great conversation with them for a few minutes, and then they left us to our privacy. The space is very stylish, clean, and private. Wonderful!
Place is perfect for a weekend get away. Clean, easy access and the hosts are very friendly.
Bob and Delia’s place was lovely, clean, and had everything I needed for my stay in Salem. They are very welcoming hosts!

Bob and Delia’s Airbnb is in an amazing location! It’s about an hour to Portland Or the Coast. Salem is a beautiful city with lots of beautiful sites to see and great restaurants. The Airbnb is just how it looks in the pictures, and Bob and Delia were really nice. The combination code entrance was very quick and easy and allowed us to come and go as we pleased without feeling like we were bothering anyone. It was a great stay!

Bob and Delia’s house is nestled in a quiet, pretty neighborhood, and the inside of the house—including the area we stayed in—is so beautifully decorated. We felt instantly at home as soon as we entered and really appreciated the warm welcome we received from them upon our arrival. Everything is clean and well-cared-for, and there is even a little electric heater in the bedroom in case you like being on the warmer side. We liked its central location—easy to get to downtown and other popular attractions around the city. If we find ourselves in Salem next time, we would stay at Bob and Delia’s place again! :)

Bob and Delia were great hosts.  Their accommodations were wonderful.   Very clean,  spacious,quiet and comfortable.   It was our first experience staying at an Airbnb so we didn't know what to expect.  It exceeded our expectations.  I would definitely suggest staying there if you are ever in Salem, Oregon.
Bob and Delia are friendly hosts and we enjoyed their hospitality and great accommodations. If you're looking for a quiet and relaxing place to stay in West Salem, this is it.
Perfect place to stay while exploring the area. Bob and Delia were very friendly hosts and we we extremely comfortable in our room.
This place is perfect- the hosts go out of their way to make sure you're comfortable. The rooms are impeccable and spacious. parking is easy, and the neighborhood is beautiful and feels safe.
Bob and Delia are great hosts!   Made our stay easy and comfortable!
Bob and Delia are kind and caring hosts. They have a peaceful home in a nice, safe neighborhood and a great space for their guests.
Enjoyed my stay at Bob and Delias place! House was very clean and welcoming. It was in a very convenient location. Would definitely stay again.
Very welcoming semi-private suite, shared homes main entrance with owners, Bob was very welcoming and available...we had a nice stay, warm home.
Bob and Delia are a very nice couple and the space is perfect for a few days stay! They made sure we were comfortable with heaters and all! We definitely recommend staying here!
Would definitely recommend staying here! Awesome space
Great place!  Lots of room, clean, comfortable, super friendly, accommodating hosts

Bob and Delia are one of the most friendly hosts we have met. We are very thankful for their hospitality and the warm receiving. Everything was really clean and there is so much space and a quiet extraordinary equipment!!
It's refreshing when you meet people that take pride in providing hospitality.  Bob & Delia highly excel in Airbnb hosting.

In my opinion, this was the best rental I've had with Airbnb. This is Airbnb done right! Bob and Delia have created a space that is beautifully appointed and extremely clean. The rental included a private bathroom, living area, and bedroom--all with good separation from the rest of the residence. The bed was very comfortable, and thanks to the many wonderful, detailed, and stylish touches, I felt that I had everything I needed. When you walk into the house you are struck by the elegance of the interior design decisions throughout. Although I only needed a place to sleep, it was nice being in such a calming and special space. Due to my schedule, I only had a chance to speak with Bob, but found him to be a very gracious host. I hope to stay at this house again at some point. Bob and Delia, thank you for being such wonderful and diligent hosts!
Great stay. Bob was very welcoming upon arrival. 10/10. Would recommend.
Excellent for the price especially. So much space and comfort. It was nice being able to park in the driveway!

This was a good stay for a work week on the road. The house is well suited for a guest visit and they are quick and easy to communicate with. It is a private setup with essentials needed to feel at home too. Bob and Delia are friendly plus attentive hosts. Thank you for the hospitality.
Clean and comfortable place to stay.   You can definitely hear what's going on upstairs and your area isn't completely separated by a door, but overall no real issues.  Don't hesitate to book.
Huge space, clean and comfortable and great amenities. A real bargain.

This is a gem! The hosts are wonderful, friendly, and hilarious! Their home is my dream home and the apt is absolutely beautiful! Their neighborhood is safe and quiet. It was a pleasure staying with them.

Bob & Delia were easy to reach and have a cozy spot that is well located.  I enjoyed my stay!

Super great hosts! Very accommodating, and worth every cent.

Our stay at Bob and Delia's was great. One thing to be aware of is there is no door separating the basement and the main floor, just a small staircase. However, the space is very clean and homey and Bob and Delia were quick to respond to any concerns and overall pleasant hosts. Comfy bed, large TV and mini fridge were appreciated. The community is quiet and feels safe. Great place to stay near Salem without having to be in the city center.

You can’t go wrong with Bob and Delia. We had a great time. They’re very personable, made us welcome the minute we walked in, and were happy we chose them for our stay. We’ll definitely stay with them again when we’re in the Salem area.

Huge couch and giant flat screen TV were welcome after a long day of driving. Bed was very comfortable. No doors on living room so the owners upstairs can probably hear a lot but they were considerably quiet and helpful when we needed them. Bedroom does have a door, I should add. Overall a great stay in a nice, safe location.
Bob and Delia were lovely, and their home was comfortable.  A nice experience.
Very clean and nice place !
Bob & Delia have a beautiful home, and the space where I stayed was very spacious and cozy. Really great neighborhood; nice and quite!

Bob and Delia had everything I needed. The space was spacious and comfortable. Easy to follow instructions. Thank you!
Bob and Delia are so kind and welcoming! Truly a great place to stay!
Stay here and you'll never want to stay anywhere else. It's perfect!

These two are incredible hosts. Cozy downstairs area. Homemade treats and they recommend some great activities near by. Highly recommend! We will stay with them when we return to Salem!

Great location. Great house Great hosts. Incredible value
Bob & Delia are 2 great people. Very respectful and a large joy to talk to. I would stay again. Thank you

Bob and Delia were amazing hosts, so kind, and fun to visit with! The downstairs was serene, TV area had a nice big couch that was so cozy. The bedroom had a nice desk area, and the bed was so comfortable, we had a great night's rest. Nice and clean bathroom, with a hairdryer on the wall, we loved that!  What a great place to stay! My husband and I had such a wonderful stay! Highly recommend, and would definitely stay again!

Bob and Delia’s place exceeded our expectations! The place was beautifully decorated, clean, and comfy. Most importantly, we felt safe the whole time we were there. We would definitely stay with them again! 10/10 recommend!
They are great people and their house is very clean and comfortable. I will stay agiain. Thank you Bob & Delia...
The space provided for guests was cozy, and Bob made sure we were comfortable and knew our way around. We definitely wouldn't mind visiting again!

Highly recommend this place.

Place was v clean n homey.   I didn’t get to use but there is access to the tv rm w giant tv.     Hosts were v accommodating providing that I only booked one day in advance n arrived late.   The bedrm, bath rm n tv are all in lower flr of the house.  Very very clean.  1/2 flight of stairs involved which should not be a bit deal for most. Rooms are part of a house so some sound can be expected as part of life.  location is awesome. Just a few min drive downtown.
Clean, comfortable, and quiet. Exactly as the description states!
Beyond my expectations!

This was a very enjoyable stay, wish we could have stayed longer.  It’s located in an extremely quiet neighborhood and convenient for access to the greater Salem area.  Bob & Delia treated us as family.  It was an excellent stay that we will never forget.
Great place to stay. Very clean and comfortable
Bob and Delia are super welcoming and friendly! The location is great for exploring Salem, and I’d definitely recommend this place to anyone passing through.
This home is beautiful well appointed and welcoming. The hosts are so accommodating and friendly. I would stay there again and again .

Bob & Delia are such amazing people. There home is so welcoming and lovely. We will def be staying with them again. Such great communication with us. Everything you may need they have. Verythoughtful.
We had the entire space to ourselves, the room is downstairs and the entire den area is separte and i liked the honely vibe of the place.
Bob & Delia have a wonderful home and are super hosts. Don’t miss out on a great place to stay.  Great location and easy access to anything you could need or want.

We enjoyed our stay. Nice layout, simple instructions for things like parking and getting into the home. Bob gave us some helpful tips when we arrived. The TV room area is really nice with a huge couch, big tv, a mini fridge, little coffee bar. They definitely set up the space in a smart way.
Super cute and comfortable spot.
Very clean and comfortable stay!
Extremely comfortable living space with friendly hosts. Would definitely stay here again!

This was our first use of Airbnb, and it encourages us to do this more often. This was a roomy, comfortable, private space in the basement (there was a window in the bedroom giving some natural light) of Bob and Delia Bothwell’s home. The quality of the bed linens and bathroom towels was very high, and much appreciated. The living area was very spacious and had a refrigerator, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, and an adequate supply of plates, cups, and silverware. There even were two wine glasses and a corkscrew!
A 65 inch TV was fed by DirecTV, and as we had never had such a system, it took us some time to sort the system out. I got up to watch a 06:00 Euro 2020 soccer game on Sunday morning and was disappointed I could not watch the game. The transmission was on ESPNHD and I do not know whether the problem was the TV could not accept HD, or whether DirecTV had a special soccer package. However, I could watch replays of games, and live transmissions of Copa America soccer - and my wife could watch the French Tennis Final which was on at the same time as the Euro 2020 game and hence there was no fight over which we should watch!
What also was good one had space to the side of the driveway to park a car off the road in a neighborhood where many cars are parked on the road.
The location provides easy access to downtown Salem, and is convenient to several wineries. We were in the area to attend a wedding at Zenith Vineyard, and also took the opportunity to have a tasting at Evesham Wood winery.
Bob and Delia were very accommodating with my changing schedule and were very friendly!
Great hosts!
Everything was as advertised or better. Lovely hosts. Super super place. Reserve this place.
Great spot to stay in Salem!
Comfy living room, nice bedroom.
Very nice place, very clean, quite, and well appointed.
Good location.  Cute space and comfortable bed.

The house was beautiful, and such a nice living room area. After having been camping for days it was so nice to have a hot shower, comfy bed, and some peace and quiet to relax. Didn't get a chance to meet Delia, but Bob was very kind and accommodating.
Really Great People! Super clean and relaxing space.
Bob & Delia’s place was so nice and they were extremely nice! Would definitely stay again!

Everything was great! Very easy to communicate. We came 2 hours earlier and it was not a problem for Bob and Delia.
Both rooms are big and bright. Everything is clean and nice. We really enjoyed our stay here.
great space for a couple or single person.  large living room and nice bedroom and private bath.  everything as shown in pictures and descriptions.  parking on site.  very friendly and helpful hosts

Great spot for an overnight stop on our way across Oregon.
Great stay. Definitely will stay again in the future.
Spacious accommodations in a safe and comfortable neighborhood. Everything as advertised. We will certainly stay here again.
Wonderful spot and exactly as described! Perfect place to stay for my work orientation at the nearby hospital.

Super cozy and clean space. Feels very homey. They provide magazines and little local guides with food and activities which was super handy.
Great place, hosts were helpful and the space was awesome!!!

The neighborhood was quiet and safe very welcoming. As well as conveniently close to downtown. My stay was amazing!!! Everything was clean and easy to find. The hosts answered promptly and attended to our every need. I would definitely stay again  and recommend this stay to anyone!
Bob and Delia were such enjoyable hosts.  Everything was as they described, very nice, clean, and decorated nicely.

Nicest AirBnB we've ever stayed in! It really felt like home and there were wonderful amenities! Private bathroom, mini fridge, microwave, and large TV. The decor was tasteful and the hosts were so kind and accommodating! Very affordable and more than worth it! We were lucky to get to come!

Great space, kind hosts, no check out cleaning! We were only 2 guests for one night but had everything we needed for quick and easy stay. If I was traveling alone I’d do an extended stay here for sure

Wonderful place to crash for the night. Cozy little area with space to relax too! We will be back if we’re in the area again!

Easy to communicate with and easy access to the house.
Love Bob and Delia’s home. The space was exactly as stated. Nice location in West Salem. Very close to wine tasting. Would highly recommend their place. Very convenient to food and other services.
This is a great location to stay.  A quiet neighborhood, yet close to downtown Salem.  I highly recommend it.

Great place - perfect for the two of us. We had the entire downstairs to ourselves and it was very spacious and comfortable. Nice bed, big tv, and a huge couch. Coffee and water available in our own little fridge. Check in/out was super easy and Bob was great with communications. Hope we get to come back so we can stay here again.
Bob and Delia were amazing hosts! The air bnb itself was super clean and in a great location.
great place, great hosts and the price is awesome for what this place offers

Had a great stay here!  The property is in a safe location and the accommodations were clean, private and had the necessary amenities.  We were there visiting family so was nice at the end of the day to be able to relax in a great atmosphere and have a comfortable nights sleep.
You will sleep comfortably in this welcoming little basement suite. Comfy furnishings and sparking clean rooms invite you to settle in a spell, and maybe even, as I did, get some work done.

Bob and Delia's is a perfect little place for a couple visiting Oregon. It's very well maintained and exactly as advertised. They are helpful and give you good suggestions to nearby places and are excellent hosts.
Excellent space. Well appointed. Friendly host. A real winner!

Bob and Delia were so welcoming and friendly! We got the whole downstairs to ourselves. A very well decorated, comfortable, clean, and spacious room and living area. Would definitely recommend Bob and Delia's place if you're in the Salem area. Thank you for a great stay!

Amazing stay! They were super accommodating, and very friendly people. If you’re looking for somewhere to stay in Salem this is definitely the place! You have your own private area with a living space to kick back relax and watch some tv, as well as your own private bathroom and bedroom! Super cozy and home- y feel to it
Large screen TV.  Comfortable queen bed. Immaculate cleanliness. Friendly host. Easy entry. Large downstairs area.

Great place to stay in Salem! Super close to downtown. The place was cozy and clean. The hosts were very courteous about making minimal noise in the morning. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Bob and delia are super friendly hosts! Great at communicating with us to make we were fine. The downstairs area was super clean and spacious. Definitely recommend staying here.

We had a very comfortable stay in Bob & Delia's home. It is very clean and cozy and the hosts are very sweet and accommodating. Great location for visiting wineries too. We would definitely stay again .

So glad I found this gem! I loved the private living room space and everything I needed was available. The space was clean and there were lots of extras, including tea that I'm now obsessed with! I will absolutely stay here again.
Wonderful stay.
This place is clean, comfy, and private. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay!
Wonderful stay! Perfect setup for what I needed! Very accommodating hosts. Would for sure stay again.
nice people  , the place was very clean and tidy. nice big screen. TV.
Wonderful people and stay:)
Beautiful place to stay and relax. All the privacy I needed and very easy check in process. Bob and Delia are the kindest
Exceptional value for what is offered! Very comfortable space with wonderful host.
Very private area in lower level of home which is separated from the rest of the house. Nice having privacy AND knowing someone is home. Would stay again!

Bob and Delia were amazing hosts! We came in on short notice during the holidays and they were very accommodating. The house and the amenities were fantastic. We would definitely recommend to others and hopefully plan to stay here in the future.  On a side note Bob makes an amazing omelette!

Bob and Delia were amazing hosts! We came in on short notice during the holidays and they were very accommodating. The house and the amenities were fantastic. We would definitely recommend to others and hopefully plan to stay here in the future.  On a side note Bob makes an amazing omelette!
This is a great place to stay if you're looking for the right amount of privacy at a great value. Bob & Delia do a great job of making you feel at home.
Very comfortable bed, soft sheets and comfy pillows. We felt very at home here.
Nice place
Very friendly and kind hosts. The room is comfortable and the living area is welcoming and private. I have stayed a couple times now and will definitely be back.
Great location. The hosts were helpful and quick to respond to messages. Overall, I enjoyed my stay.
Me and my kid were so glad to rest in this beautiful house. The hosts were very nice and welcoming. The place we got to stay in was nice and clean. We would definitely love to come back!

A beautiful home with everything so comfortable for anyone on a short stay or long stay.
I only stayed one night, but was truly considering staying longer if available because everything was so perfect. The bed especially was so comfortable! Meeting Delia also made it special. What a delight!
first time staying in an airbnb, and they made it an absolute dream of an experience! 10 out of 10 would recommend for everyone to stay here
Very accommodating host! We stayed one night and it was a great experience.
Nice home. Comfortable. quick and easy check in.  having the entire downstairs with a living room and private bathroom was a huge plus for us.
Delia gave a warm and gracious welcome. The suite is nicely furnished and quite comfortable. The location is an easy access to all things Salem.  I would recommend it
Excellent place.  Exactly as described.
I enjoyed my stay here.   It was very clean, well decorated and comfortable.   The hosts are very kind and respectful.

Bob and Delia were great host! They went beyond my expectations to make my stay comfortable and easy. The living and bedrooms areas were a nice size for one or two people. I would gladly make a reservation again at Bob & Delia’s Airbnb when visiting the Salem area.
Very nice hosts with a great space to share. Clean, cute and comfortable. Completely met expectations and would stay again.
First rate accommodations.  Roomy, clean, wonderful atmosphere.
Bob & Delia are gracious hosts, so welcoming, and the space is clean and comfortable.  We were in Salem for just one night, and this was much better for us than having to stay in a hotel.
A very nice and quiet place. Enjoyed visiting with Bob and Delia.
Beautiful place to stay, friendly hosts.  Private, roomy, clean, well tended. Would definitely recommend this place.

Bob and Delia are so kind and their home is beautiful! very close to both the wineries and downtown, and their place had everything we could need. can't wait to be able to come back for another visit!
Just a great stay in a clean and beautiful home with great people.  Close to everything but,  neat and tidy neiborhood and quietest room we have ever been in....A true gem.
A great place for us to rest and regroup between college visits! Very clean and beautiful neighborhood for taking a walk and easy to find. Delightful getaway spot!
An oasis for us! A wonderfully quiet night in a beautiful home.
Great place, nice hosts - recommended.
Bob & Delias's place is very nice and comfortable.  It is in a great location when visiting Salem. We would definitely stay here again.
Bob and Delia's space is quiet and comfortable. I highly recommend.

Wonderful, courteous hosts that provided us with a quiet and comfortable stay in a peaceful Salem neighborhood. Rooms very clean, bedroom was nice and spacious. The living room, with it’s large comfy couch and tv, was very comfortable and great for winding down. Extremely convenient due to being only 3-5 min from downtown Salem. We would love to come back again.
6🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟/5 stars worth experience 😁Loved the place totally... we would definitely book your place again 😇🙂 This place is full of positive vibes 😇😇

Quality host, and very nice house!
Next time I’m in Salem I’ll book my stay here again!

The owners, Bob and Delia were so nice and thoughtful. They showed us around before we finally got settled in. They supply you with complimentary water & coffee pods for your stay, which I thought was a very nice touch. The bed was comfortable and the area was very clean. The experience overall was amazing. Thank you, Bob and Delia for allowing us to stay in your home!
Such a gorgeous home In a beautiful location!
Clean and beautiful place!

Ah! This is a wonderful place! The hosts greeted me at the door though I had access to the door via a code. I really appreciated that! The area was private, beautiful, quiet and wonderfully scent free. The description says it's a basement but it doesn't feel like that. You will be very happy with this place. Loads of soft. cuddly bedding and a heater if you get cold. Also, very safe and wonderf neighborhood and great, easy parking. Have a wonderf stay!

Delia and Bob were incredibly welcoming and made me feel very comfortable in their beautiful guest suite! I was in town for my friends’ wedding and requested an early check-in to allow time to get ready before the evening ceremony & reception, and Bob and Delia were very accommodating! I appreciated their clear, prompt, kind communication as well as their flexibility. The large bathroom was perfect for getting ready in, with lots of room on the counter for hair and makeup supplies. The living room area provided a great place to relax with a cup of coffee (from the Keurig provided by Delia and Bob) and rest my feet before a night of dancing. I would definitely stay here again and recommend Bob and Delia’s suite to anyone looking for a conveniently located and adorable space! Thank you, Delia and Bob!!
great communication

Bob and Delia are SO nice! It was our first time trying out an Airbnb, and our experience was pleasant, easy, and we will definitely do it again. The atmosphere was very cozy, had a great sense of privacy, and clean. The neighborhood had a peaceful quietness too. If we ever need a place to stay in the Salem area again, booking with them will be at the top of our list. Thanks again!
Clean, courteous, and outstanding communications. What you see in the photos is what you get :) Thank you for letting us into your home as we celebrated a friend’s wedding in Independence.
The house was very quiet and comfortable.  Well appointed.
Clean and comfortable!
Very gracious and welcoming hosts!
Beautiful home in a quiet neighborhood.  Very clean and comfortable.  This was my first Airbnb adventure and it turned out to be a great one.
Beautiful, clean granny unit! Hosts are very easy to communicate with.
Comfortable and cool (temp was 95 in Salem) place to stay.

Bob and Delia’s place was great! Awesome location, super clean, and comfortable. Bob greeted us at the door and helped with our bags. He ensured we knew where everything was, and we were especially thankful to be able to use their washer/dryer. After many stays at places that did not utilize their AC on 90+ degree days, we were relieved to have a comfortable temperature to get some rest. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking to stay in Salem!
Great place to stay! Comfortable and spacious with everything we needed for our night in Salem

Our stay was incredible in Bob and Dalia’s suite.
The suite is beautiful and comfy. We felt that we are home. They are super host and will make sure you have everything you need during your stay.
Thanks Bob and Dalia!
Clean and cozy stay with everything we needed. Spacious living room area that also accommodated two extra guests on the cozy couch!
This is a very convenient and quiet place to stay when visiting Salem. 5 minutes from downtown.
Everything was perfect for our 3 night stay.  Totally private in every way and everything promised was just as advertised!  This is a spectacular place to stay for anyone visiting the Salem area.

Bob and Delia’s space is really clean and quiet with lots of nice amenities like coffee and a great TV.  There’s a bedroom, bathroom, and very large living space; it’s almost the entire lower level of their lovely split level home. If there were a door separating the space from the upper level, it would be a private apartment. Check-in was super easy, and Bob and Delia were quick to respond to any questions.

I was planning my travel to Salem for an art show, and would be staying at Bob and Delia's Airbnb.  The morning of my trip, I tested positive for covid, so I had to cancel both the show and my stay.  Delia was so understanding with my late cancellation, and was very gracious to help me with a partial refund.  If I have the opportunity to travel to Salem, I will surely stay with Bob and Delia
was fine thanks

Bob and Delia are wonderful! They welcomed me into their home with open arms, and made my stay very comfortable. The space is very clean, smells great, and there is a ton of space. I highly recommend anyone who is visiting the Salem area to stay at Bob and Delia’s place. They are kind and even offered me some great advice on a trip I have coming up. Would love to visit and stay there again during my next trip. Thanks!
Great hospitality and a very comfortable home. The hosts are friendly and gracious. This is a great value as well, I highly recommend Bob & Delia’s place!

Bob and Delia's place was perfect for our short getaway to Salem. It was fantastic to have our own space where we could spread out a bit and relax. Bob and Delia' were a joy to interact with and amazing hosts.

Super communicative but once checked in they leave to do your own thing and enjoy your vacation in Salem. The downstairs is cool, which was great for the summer, and it was nice having a living room section to ourselves to watch a movie after a long day of hiking.
Lovely place to stay!
This place is absolutely fabulous! So clean and spacious!  We will definitely stay there anytime we are up there!!  Bob and Delia are great hosts and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Bob and Delia are very communicative hosts. My stay was extremely comfortable. The space was very clean and inviting. This was my second time staying here and definitely would book again.

What a wonderful place!
Very comfortable .

We stayed here for the first night of our roadtrip driving from Vancouver BC to CA. Bob & Delia were quick to respond to our messages and overall very welcoming. The place was clean and comfortable with great amenities, and felt very private even though it's connected to their home. Highly recommend!

Bob & Delia were the perfect Air BnB hosts. Incredibly welcoming and friendly and the space is beautiful and very roomy. A whole living room with comfy couches and a GIANT screen TV for you to enjoy along with mini-fridge and microwave plus Keurig coffee maker. The bedroom is gorgeous with a binder of handy suggestions for dining and enjoying the area. Private bathroom is well equipped with large soft towels.

A great place to stay.

What an amazing place to stay! Very neat and clean, and has everything you really need. Bob and Delia are also the nicest people who made us feel like we are part of the family. Definitely will stay here again in the future!

This was a wonderful place! Very clean and Bob and Delia were kind. The entire downstairs was open for us! The downstairs didn’t have a door to the stairs so we could hear some noises upstairs but overall I would recommend to anyone!
The place was very nice and relaxing. Bob was great and gave us a quick run down upon our arrival.

One of the best AirBNB hosts I’ve experienced. Bob and Delia worked to accommodate our noise sensitivities during our stay and offered us some delicious dessert while hanging out one evening! The house is gorgeous and surrounding neighborhood serene. Their three dogs are also super adorable!

I really enjoyed my stay at Bob and Delia’s, and I would definitely book again! The rooms were spacious, spotless, and had everything I needed. I only stayed one night but had a great nights sleep and a strong coffee before I hit the road. Absolutely recommend!
They were great hosts and their home is beautiful!
Wonderful basement suite

Bob & Delia are exceptionally generous and flexible hosts who seek to ensure the stay is amazing.
Their service is spot-on, as the saying goes.
You won’t be disappointed in your stay with Bob & Delia.

My only regret is not booking a longer stay! And not booking a stay on my return trip through Salem (dates already taken!).

Clean & comfortable. Quiet neighborhood and directions are straightforward. A market, 7-11 and Starbucks is a short drive away. When I arrived, Bob showed me how to get the shower working as it is a bit different than what I expected (and they note in the listing how to activate it and you might overlook that text). I only stayed one night but it was a good night at Bob & Delia’s.
Delia and Bob made us feel comfortable and welcoming. The bed was very comfortable and the living room was sooo spacious. Everything was extremely clean as well.
Charming and cozy space. Would definitely book again.

Bob and Delia are ever so welcoming as hosts and simply delightful people! The accommodation was excellent and I would highly recommend to stay at this Airbnb to anyone! Great and very comfortable place, wonderful house in a quiet and very nice residential area of Salem. Superb hosts!

It was very inviting, cozy and clean. The bedroom was very cute, the extra blankets are very soft. The living room was also very cute and decorated. They welcomed us and showed us around and were very helpful!

This is a beautlful home with charming decor and comfortable furnishings.  The only thing that surprised us is that the guest space has no door or separate entrance to close it off from the hosts' living space upstairs.

"Stellar" grade in all aspect of AIRBNB hospitality. Delia and Bob's place is by far the best AIRBNB that we stayed at in Oregon. This is a newer house and is located in a safe quiet neighborhood, free parking in their driveway, homey and tastefully decorated spacious living quarter in the basement has lots of natural outside light. House is just 1.5 miles from a centralized shopping center with supermarket, banks, post office, library, bars, businesses and multiple places to eat at. Included amenities in the living quarter as advertised are readily available.
Best of all, Delia and Bob treated us with generous and genuine hospitality as if we are visiting relatives. Definitely coming back next time we are in town again. Thank you, Delia and Bob for your Super Hospitality. Definitely coming back next time we are in town again.

We loved staying here! Bob and Delia were very friendly and accommodating. The location was perfect for what we needed and was close to the family we were visiting. We will definitely try to stay here again if we can get this place next time we visit!

Bob and Delia are so wonderful and welcoming! They made me feel at home and their place was very nice, quiet and clean. They are also located close to supermarkets and various restaurants and stores. I’d recommend their place to anyone visiting Salem, Oregon.
Awesome place and awesome people! Very reasonable price.
They are warm, welcoming, considerate hosts. Our stay was comfortable and enjoyable.
Delia was very kind and the space was SET UP (everything you could need or want)! Thanks for being so thorough!
Great hosts!
Bob & Delia’s place was great. Very clean, large TV, very comfortable. Wonderful hosts.
Wonderful place and great hosts.  I will be back.

My husband and I so enjoyed staying at Bob&Delia place during the Valentine’s Day for 4 nights . We love their house . It’s clean , cozy and modern . The basement place where we checked in has private living room , bedroom , bathroom . Feel like back to home . Very comfortable. And just need 5 minutes driving to the Salem central area . We really do appreciate Bob&Delia hospitality. And we would love to choose their place to stay again next time we come to salem .
Nice place, the space was comfortable and accommodating.
It was a very nice quiet stay

Bob and Delilah’s place was beautiful and well appointed.   As hosts they were kind and very flexible. You could not ask for a better place to stay. It is not a speeder entrance from the home but Bob and Delila go out of there way to not make this a hindrance. I would not let that keep you from staying there.
Very kind hosts. Thank you !!

Thank you so much for hosting us. We had a very comfortable stay. Everything was as described and we felt very safe. If we travel back around I would definitely see if this spot is available first. Highly recommended.
Beautiful space and great hosts! We will definitely be booking again next time we travel to Salem!

Probably one of the nicest people I’ve ever met from a Airbnb ! My wife and I were saying we felt like they were our relatives haha ! They definitely made us feel like family ! Wonderful place ! 5 stars all the way !
Had a wonderful stay. Bob even checked and filled a tire for me!

I was happy my wife to she like it
We l was feeling like home
It’s better then hotel
I hope some 1 day l go back to Oregon
I would rent same house again
I recommend it to anybody
I had a really pleasant stay. everything was clean and comfortable. was nice having the while basement to myself.  would definitely recommend
Second time staying here. Comfortable stay and very friendly hosts.
This was a little suburban neighborhood with super nice hosts who have a cute area to relax in. We went one night while our daughter visited Willamette.
Excellent and comfortable place to stay for a stopover while traveling. Thank y’all!

GPS required! Bob was there to greet us.
Clean. Quiet. Comfortable. Coffee.

This was a very nice house in a nice and safe part of Salem.  The room was very comfortable and they actually had two rooms and a private bath separate to the rest of the family so you felt like you had the place to yourself.  The hostess Maria thought of the little things like soap, candles, and spare toothpaste if needed, which does not happen at some Airbnb properties.   The garden was lovely and Maria made me a great omelette with vegetables from the garden and some very good coffee from Hawaii.  It felt more like a quant B&B instead of renting a room in someone's house.  I also got some great restaurant suggestions which were very good too.  I would definitely recommend this place and will definitely go back on my future trips to Salem.  Dog is a bit protective but a real sweetie when she gets to know you.  Great, comfortable place.

-I was pleased to stay at Maria and Ed's bnb for over a week; they are friendly, good to talk to, laid-back, and trustworthy people.
-The home was quiet, comfy and it projects its own personality full of paintings and other decoration.
-The room and bathroom were clean and since these are situated on the opposite wing to where their rooms are, they offer complete privacy.
-The neighbourhood seems to be secure, and there is a small park to go for a walk/run around the corner;
-Since both Maria and Ed work in the morning I enjoyed the home for my own working and having breakfast in the kitchen or reading in the living room.
For all these reasons, I recommend Maria and Ed's bnb.
Best wishes, JM
It was as described, clean, tranquile and welcoming. After a long day on the road I need a glass of wine and they more then happy to share a nip with me!
What a lovely time my daughter and I had at this cozy home.

My stay was perfect-very clean, beautiful and welcoming space. Maria and Ed's home is resplendent with lovely house plants and warm colors. The guest area is very private and quiet, just what I needed. Thank you!! I will definitely recommend this place when I have the opportunity. Even though Maria was traveling when I first arrived, she communicated frequently to make sure I had my needs met. Ed was a gracious host until Maria returned. Lovely people, lovely hosts.

Ich wurde sehr herzlich empfangen. Alles war genau wie beschrieben. Ich freue mich darauf, falls ich mal wieder in Salem bin, bei Maria zu wohnen! Vielen lieben Dank für alles!

I was very warmly received. Everything was exactly as described. I'm looking forward to living with Maria in Salem! Thank you very much for everything!
A very welcoming place to stay.
Maria and Ed are lovely, gracious hosts. The house is very comfortable, and close to the city and various shops.

I stayed with Maria and Ed for 3 weeks and they made me feel welcome and comfortable the entire time.  They were also a big help with information about the area and are just plain nice people. The space is very private and very comfortable with plenty of space. I would stay here again!
Guest area was very quiet, clean and private. Would stay there again. Hosts were very friendly and helpful

This is a great value and excellent place to stay. The home is warm and has a relaxed tasteful Hawaiian vibe. I really enjoyed my conversations with Maria and Ed who are warm well traveled souls.  They felt like old friends and offer guests a relaxing respite on their journey.  The bedroom and bathroom are private and in a separate part of the house. Other parts of the house are shared and available to enjoy.

My stay at Maria's was excellent. Like other's have said, the room is in a separate part of the house that allows for privacy. The room and home were very comfortable and beautiful. Maria was away, but Ed greeted me at the door with a smile and a handshake and made sure I had everything I needed. Top notch, and well worth it!
The home was in a nice area and the the hosts were great. You have your own bathroom, a lot of privacy. Close to Fred Meyer, Starbucks, and several restaurants.
Lovely home in great location.  Very comfortable large bedroom and private bath with everything I needed for a wonderful stay.

Maria is a super sweet host. She was there to greet me and show me the house at her lunch time. She, her husband and daughter are very friendly and she and her husband take a real interest in their guests and are very warm. The space is just as described on the website and I would recommend it to anyone.
Maria's home is a perfect location to be able to enjoy all of Salem. Their home is neat, quiet and full of hospitality. Plus they have a dog that loves to be pet. I would definitely stay here again
Very welcoming, serene setting.

Maria and Ed were wonderful hosts, and made me feel welcome.  The home is extremely quiet, private, and exactly, if not better that as is described in the ad.  Maria was accommodating, and extremely communicative.  I will definitely be back!
Maria takes very good care of you. This place is really really nice with privacy. Highly recommend and will stay here in the future too! Thank you!
Again everything was perfect! This is my second stay and definitely not the last. Love Maria and Ed! Highly highly recommend!

Staying at Maria's house was wonderful! Her and her family are very kind, and they have a beautiful home. The decor and art inside is colorful and bright, I was amazed by it all as soon as I stepped inside. Plus, the  backyard and sunroom are gorgeous. They are full of flowers and succulents, and a great place to sit and do yoga or just relax. The room was also very comfortable and accommodating. My mother and I thoroughly enjoyed our time spent here. I cannot say enough good things about this place. I highly recommend Maria's home!

We had a great stay at Ed and Maria's home. Since Maria was out of town, Ed greeted us kindly, showed us where the coffee/tea was, and even offered us a space in the refrigerator should we need it.
