Though the entrance is shared, airbnb guests have a lot of privacy as the two airbnb rooms and bathroom are in a separate part of the house.
The home itself is beautiful-- warm colors, natural light, and lots of original artwork. The double bed we stayed in was very comfortable. Ed and Maria go above and beyond by providing extra comforts-- robes and slippers (which we didn't use, but looked very cozy), and things like luxurious lotions in the bathroom.
The house is located in a quiet and safe part of town about an 8 minute drive from downtown Salem. I would definitely stay there again.
Great hosts. Comfortable room. Great location to downtown area.

Wonderful first time Airbnb experience. Clean,
comfortable, quiet. Gracious family, attentive to your needs and comfort.
I would stay there again in the future.
Maria and Ed are very attentive and helpful hosts. The House is very beautiful and quite. I recommend it to anyone who visit Salem.

Beautiful home in a lovely quiet area of South Salem. Maria offered us a comfy room in a separate area of her home with our own bath. Lovely family and cute dog. When we return to Salem we will definitely request to stay at her spacious and exquisitely decorated home!

Maria was a wonderful host. She went out of her way to ensure that we were comfortable. She even gave us suggestions of possible locations that we should visit during our stay. For someone, like me, who had reservations about AirBnB stays, my experience with Maria’s house actually changed my opinion! Also, if you like dogs, her dog is SO sweet!

Beautiful home for guests to stay in. VERY quiet neighborhood. The living area for guests is in the opposite end of the home, away from the rest of the family. Our queen-sized bed was very comfortable and we also had a private bathroom. We were offered coffee and tea in the morning and we had our own self in the refrigerator. Maria also had a nice sitting area to sit and relax.
We will stay there, if it is available, next time we visit Salem.

I enjoyed meeting Maria and her family. They we very welcoming. The house is well cared for and there were many extras, such as a robe and slippers and bath amenities. I was very comfortable there!! I would stay again!!

This home rocks! It is very close to downtown and right by many good restaurants. The guest area is spacious and secluded from the rest of the house. It is decorated in a warm, soothing style; I really enjoyed the atmosphere. Maria and her family (including the dog!) are welcoming and friendly. You can tell a lot of care and respect go into the hospitality at this home. I felt extremely comfortable staying here and I highly recommend staying here if you visit Salem.
Very gracious and welcoming hostess. Bed comfortable and a good bedside lamp for reading.

My stay with Maria's was very comfortable, they are a very friendly family. All amanities given to me were nice and comfortable. House is located close to restaurants and grocries so getting good food at anytime wouldn't be an issue!

My trip to Salem was made all the better with my stay at Maria's.  She provided good tips on places to eat and things to see, as well as being very accommodating with a nighttime check-in.  Everything you need for your trip is here: a comfy bed, hot shower, coffee, and even refrigerator space!  I'll be sure to book this place again the next time I am in Salem.
Maria and Ed were quite helpful during our stay and we were quite comfortable.  The next time we are back to Salem we will definitely stay again.
Lovely family (and Ellie, the dog) made our stay feel like we were visiting friends. Nothing fancy...No mint on your pillow, just a comfy bed and a laid-back atmosphere. We will stay again.
Wonderful stay with amazing hosts! Central location, private room and bathroom, and super comfortable bed! Definitely recommend staying here to anyone :)

Ed and Maria's home is very nicely decorated with a beautiful collection of art. The bed and linens were a dream to sleep in and the neighborhood is silent!

Maria is easy to be with and generous in sharing herself and her home, I will definitely stay with them next year during my annual trip to Salem!
Highly recommend this place. Very quite and clean house with private space .  Host Maria and Ed are exceptionally hospitable.  They did their best to make us comfortable and at home.
Maria was out of town the weekend we stayed but her husband Ed went above and beyond to make sure we felt at home

Great place to stay. Loved the big soft bed and how very quiet the area is at night.  The house is easy to find and even though Maria was not there Ed answered all my questions quickly.   Would stay here again!

Maria’s place was truly wonderful! The inside of the home is full of global touches and they include such fabulous extras like lovely robes, extra toothpaste, etc. I rented a room for a visiting friend (with Maria’s approval) and she and Ed were truly wonderful hosts. My friend felt comfortable, enjoyed the separate space but lovely interactions as desired, and truly appreciated a comfortable, quiet place to relax in the evenings and to sleep.

Maria is a wonderful host. Very welcoming and easy to chat with and to get to know. We felt like family. The room and bathroom is very private and comfortable. Lots of nice extras, like fresh coffee and more! It was fun to get to know you, Maria and Ed, and we’ll be back soon, we hope!

Maria is the best hostess ever. She made us feel completely welcome and at home.  It was an extraordinarily special experience and included a trip to the gym for a yoga class one morning. Charming and comfortable home with very generous amenities. We are so grateful and will be back.
very nice, quiet and clean, highly recommended

Maria has a beautifully decorated space with scrumptious linens and amazing art work. She will easily put you at ease with her delightful personality. The space offers privacy, while at the same time allowing you to feel at ease in shared spaces.  I would stay there again!

Was easy to find and everything was very neat and tidy.  Our schedules didn't work out for Maria and I to meet, but her check-in instructions were clear and everything was where she said it would be. I loved having a private mini fridge.  Comfortable and a great price!

We had a wonderful experience staying at Maria's place.  It was peaceful, clean, and comfortable.  The guests' quarters were very private and the hosts friendly.  This was our first experience staying with someone and it was a very positive one.
Great place to stay! Very quiet, centrally located neighborhood. Maria was very flexible with check in time and had great local knowledge. Would definitely stay again!
nice quiet neighborhood with a local park nearby.   I went for lovely walks in the morning and enjoyed my stay.

Maria’s home is a great place to unwind in Salem. Excellent hospitality and friendly owners. The space is quiet and comfortable and clean. Bathroom is nice and private. Great value! Try the excellent bar with food in an old renovated house nearby. Short Uber to everywhere in town. Thank you!
Very kind people, amenable, clean and good value space. Maria was super understanding of all my changes in plans due to my son’s schedule shifting. This is a lovely quiet and clean place to be.

I really enjoyed my stay at Maria and Ed's despite temperatures in the 90's for the first two days of my stay and no air conditioning. Maria is a wonderful hostess and accommodated my special needs to be fragrance free. I plan to return whenever I have training in Salem.

As advertised, this home truly is in a quiet residential area but is also only a few blocks from various eating options. I walked to 2 different restaurants for my evening meals.  The guest room(s) and bath, as well as the mini-refrigerator (very convenient!) area are all in a separate wing of the house: very private.  Maria is a very gracious hostess, and I had my coffee in her lovely garden space. This is a great value for a stay in Salem.

We stay with Maria in her new journey as a business woman, we have a wonderful experience with her and her husband, they were waiting for us and give a suggestion were we can go and expand time, The place is so beautiful and quiet. we wish you a success in you new journey. Thank you Maria.
This home was just as advertised, and the guest quarters are very cozy and private. We hope to stay here again.
A warm and friendly place to stay when you are away from home.
This was my second stay at Maria's. It was even better than my first. The space is great and private and Maria and Ed are great hosts.

Maria was a lovely host. She received us with a warm welcome and even went above and beyond by getting us situated and giving us great tips on the local spots. Will highly recommend to any of my friends!
My second time staying here and it’s always a pleasure- warm, comfortable atmosphere and quiet. Yet easy to get to anything in Salem you want
Maria's has become my Salem home over the last few months when I have had job training. You can expect a warm welcome and thoughtful touches.
Clean friendly place to stay.
Maria was a wonderful, friendly host who provided a cozy space and cheery atmosphere. Highly recommend!
This home is easily accessed; Maria is a gracious host!
Beautiful cozy place with private quarters. Very generous and hospitable
Very warm and clean. Very hospitable and friendly.
great experience.  Maria was a great host

Maria is super welcoming and her home is delightful! It’s a close drive to downtown Salem, which has a lot of quirky shops to explore. Our room was neat and tidy and we really appreciated the privacy. Maria provided lots of snacks and water and coffee - all good things to have on hand while traveling!

You couldn’t ask for a better host. Maria is warm, funny and generous. If she offers you coffee, tea, wine or chocolate please accept- she loves that!  The accommodations are great, almost like a private suite as the bedroom and bathroom are in a separate part of the house with a little ante room. The room is spacious and well appointed. It’s especially nice to be able to control your heat so the temperature can be adjusted just as you like it. There is plenty of space in the house where you can read and relax. As for the dog- she doesn’t bark much; just enough. Happy travels!

What an absolute gem Maria' s home is! Not only is it truly cozy but Maria and Ed make you very much feel at home and honestly care that you have a great experience. I highly recommend Maria home and can't think of any place I'd rather stay when in this area.
I plan to visit this area again and will for sure book here again!!

Maria's home is lovely and she and her family are most welcoming.  The bedroom wing is very private and the rooms are cozy.  We had access to the kitchen for tea, coffee and cooking as needed.  A true favorite!  Hope to stay again when we are in Salem.
Maria is a great host and her place is as described.

Our stay at Maria's Airbnb was awesome. My husband and I have just moved here with our 7 month old daughter. Maria gave immediate response to our request to stay, she doesn't have an exact time for you to check in which is so nice because you don't feel rushed. Her husband made us feel like we were part of her family. We were invited to a party that she was hosting for her Airbnb friends and they made is feel so welcomed. Her accommodations are so lovely and clean. The extra touches of having a robe and slippers to walk around makes you feel your home away from home. Don't hesitate to stay here if you want to feel at home because you will.

Lovely home in a nice neighborhood with a park nearby. The accommodations are very clean and comfortable.
You won’t find a better, friendlier or fun host!
Maria is wonderful host. Really nice big room with  thoughtful design. Super super clean  home with a friendly dog
Excellent hosts, really beautiful place and very comfortable. Would definitely look forward to staying with Maria and Ed again if we have a chance to return to Salem!
It’s always a pleasure to stay with Maria. Everything here is comfortable and Maria is very accommodating. She is more than happy to visit and will converse on most any topic .

Maria is a beautifully warm spirit and engaging host. She's there to listen, share, & make your stay as wonderful as the town around her. House is perfect for down town trips as well as a serene neighborhood getaway. We're already looking forward to when our next meeting with her will be.

Our private rooms in Maria's home were comfortable, relaxing, and very clean. We appreciated coming back to her quiet neighborhood after our adventures around Salem. Maria and Ed are interesting to talk with and hospitable. Elsie is a good watch dog! Great spot to stay.

Very nice accommodations, clean, comfortable beds, private, accommodating host, and a very sweet family. This was my first experience with Airbnb, and I will definitely be staying again. Highly recommend if you are in the area!!
I would absolutely recommend Maria'e place. I flew in late and she stayed up to great me. Was welcoming and the space was amazing.

Staying at Maria’s was a great experience!
They were very welcoming and friendly, very accommodating, and made sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed.
The room was clean and cozy!
I totally recommend booking to stay with them, You won’t be disappointed!
Dayna Bell
I can't say enough about Maria! Truly a wonderful host.  I stayed here with my 4 year old son and she made us feel more than welcome.
Great place.
Very nice place to stay.  Maria was very helpful and hospitable.
Maria was such a sweetheart and the living space is very comfortable/secluded from the rest of the house. We thoroughly enjoyed our visit and would definitely consider staying here again.
房东Maria很热情、周到，房间干净整洁。并对附近的用餐及出行提供了各种有效信息。有机会还会选择住这里。

Our stay at Maria's truly Cozy House was better than we could have asked for. The rooms were immaculately clean and snacks and water were a welcome surprise after a long drive. The bathroom was, indeed, private and well-stocked with necessary supplies.

The public areas of the house were spacious yet intimate which, in retrospect, perfectly mirrors Maria and her husband as hosts - open, friendly, and attentive to their guests needs.
Very clean, and quiet
This was an excellent place to stay.  Very peaceful, clean and wonderful amenities.  Maria is the perfect host and provided great tips that enhanced my stay.

Quiet neighborhood, nice room with a comfortable bed, clean bathroom which is well-stocked,  a small fridge with a bottle of cold filtered water, and easy off street parking.  No air conditioning - but nice fans.  A casual friendly environment.

Ed (Maria’s husband) was very friendly and welcoming. He came outside to greet us and help with our bags. Both bedrooms are clean and comfortable. Maria is so sweet, she had towels and other bathroom  necessities that might get left behind while packing, such as toothpaste and make up remover wipes, already waiting in the bathroom. The house is in a nice location with everything just down the street. Only an hour away from Portland. A straight and easy drive.

This is a super clean, quiet, relaxing home. The guest area provides plenty of privacy and worked well for our family of 3. Easy access to everywhere we needed to go in Salem, including Willamette University. We'd definitely stay here again.
Maria’s is a wonderful host! Very friendly and welcoming. Her home is a short drive to downtown Salem and very cosy.
Maria was a great host for my airbnb stay in Salem.  Highly recommend.
Maria and her family are amazing people.  Friendly and open.  Always had a tip or time to chat.  I HIGHLY recommend their place if you stay in Salem!
Maria, the host, was exceptionally friendly and informative. She provided us with a wonderful experience and we would definitely go back to visit again. A tremendous value and a great experience.
This is a very comfortable place to stay in a quiet neighborhood
Maria and family are wonderful hosts. 5 stars all around. I highly recommend!
Clean affordable and efficient.  Superior to any hotel.

Awesome Airbnb!!  Comfortable, easy to get to, wonderful family that you can have as much or little interaction with that you want.  Private living area for Airbnb guests.  Maria goes above and beyond to make guests feel comfortable.  Will be looking to stay at Maria's again.
Great hosts; private and comfortable space.
Very friendly hosts! It was very clean and our room was awesome!
Maria is very warm and caring. Her place is quiet at night too. Greet sleeping environment. Tasteful home decor too. :)
Very nice hostess.  Comfortable room. Quiet location.

Maria's place is truly charming and her family is very welcoming. She's a shining example of everything a host should be!
The space is fully featured, providing everything we needed and the location is close to all of Salem's best offerings.
Very clean with all the amenities you need. Warm hospitality! I will be back next time I go to Salem.
Very private two bedrooms with private toilet. Super clean. The house is lovely.

Large private space away from the main living area. The room was clean and very comfortable. Private parking in front of the house and not on the street. Maria was a great host and their dog Ellie was sweet. I would definitely consider staying there again.
Excellent hosts and a great experience
Great host, very respectful
Wonderful host.  Two rooms with our own bathroom.  Coffee each morning, enjoyable conversations with our host...super happy with our stay.  We will come back for sure!
Highly recommend to anyone, very nice environment.

Maria is SUCH an amazing host! We arrived or left very late or very early most days and she always greeted us with a smile & it’s nice that the space is set up partitioned from the main section of the house.

Good coffee, cold water, snacks, extra toiletries in the bathroom... and all for about half the cost of a hotel room.

10/10 we would stay with her again.
You will be welcomed by the sweetest pit bull you'll ever met! Maria and her family are lovely and the neighborhood is beautiful and quit.

I spent a month while transitioning homes with Maria and her family. The hospitality was amazing. I couldn't have felt more welcome. The separate and partitioned living space was ideal for me. If I ever have friends come to visit in town this is where I am sending them!

Maria’s spot with such a great find. My friend and I were pleasantly greeted as soon as we arrived, with the space being the perfect size for our short trip. Clean bathrooms and bedrooms with all the basics you would need, along with cute touches of their own decor that fits in to the Salem culture. Maria made us feel very welcome and gave great suggestions on places to visit while there. Definitely would stay again
Very clean and Maria was very friendly and attentive.

We loved staying at Maria’s place! She was very friendly and greeted us right as we came in. Everything was clean and she was super accommodating when we had issues and even had sanitizing supplies for us to use. Our favorite part was the mini green house where she keeps all her plants! Definitely check it out when you’re there. We’ll be sure to stay here again the next time we’re back in town!
nice and neat on quiet street.
Maria's place is an incredible value. It's tucked away on a quiet street. Maria's hospitality and communication is superb. My father-in-law really enjoyed staying here.
Clean space, close to town and a lot of good food spots. Made for a great base to come to for a weekend of hiking.

Maria's place was exceptionally clean, tidy, and comfortable.  It felt like I was visiting my parents' home, without the intrusions.  The bed was comfortable, and the ceiling fan really helped cool me off.  All of this, combined with the great price, make this an excellent place to stay for a few days in Salem.
Like a boutique hotel. A lot of amenities.
This is the best AirBNB experience I have ever had. Great communication, very clean, respectful and beyond accommodating. Thank you for everything!

Maria's place was clean, comfortable, in a safe neighborhood and a fantastic value.  She is a great host that made sure I had everything I needed.  The BNB rooms are separate from the main living area, so you can come and go as you please without interrupting their family.  I will definately stay there again.
Maria is an excellent host. She made us feel welcome and comfortable.
It was an ok place but not great

Private access through garage. Rooms are clean and warm. Bathroom is very nice and clean. Refrigerator, Keurig, and microwave are available for use. Maria is excellent in responding to messages!  That's a big plus!
Maria is a great host. She is very kind and helpful. She let me store my bicycles in her garage, from the rain. The living space is very comfortable, clean, and homey.
Great place to stay for a decent price. 2 bedrooms and a bathroom decently private from the main house

The room was perfect for what I needed. A place to stay and sleep while on business.
Communication was great with host and I had everything I needed for my stay. Great price and convenient enough location for Salem.
Very clean.. very attentive and super comfortable rooms!! I would not only recommend it but I would return if the option ever arises. very down to earth people with very clean and beautiful place!

Because of the pandemic I did not interact with Maria and her family in person. They are being very careful about social distancing protocols, which I appreciate. Even so, Maria was very attentive via texts, and I felt my needs were a priority to them. I appreciated getting fresh flowers several times during my stay!

I walk a lot, and this property is wonderful in that there are many streets in the area filled with huge trees, big hills and glorious vistas. I walked in the neighborhood every day of the five weeks I was here and loved watching spring come on in this beautiful area. Just a mile or two away are all the shops, banks, and other conveniences of town.
A beautiful home and plce to stay. Very friendly and communicative!
Maria was a very sweet hostess.
Maria was quick to respond, very helpful, and kind. This location was much better than anticipated. 10/10
Nice and clean, thank you!
Always the best place to stay in Salem. Like a fancy hotel

Maria's place provided everything we needed for a short stay in SE Salem.  We didn't need a full kitchen, but there was a microwave, small fridge and kurig machine.  Maria's information/instructions for her place were clear and accurate.   And although some CDC guidelines have eased in regards to Covid, I very much appreciated that Maria is still being very cautious with in-person interaction.   Best of show were the bath towels were bath sheet size! Thanks, Maria

Good size two bedroom space with a small entry area. There is a small fridge, a coffee maker amply stocked including paper cups, paper plates and napkins. There is space for one car to be parked on the street in front of the house. No air conditioner. There is a large ceiling fan over one bed. If it's it out, it won't be enough. Overall a good value, and friendly, communicative hosts.

This is like your own 2 bedroom apt!  Beautifully designed and cozy.  Your own private bathroom and mini kitchen area.  Maria thought of everything!  The kitchen amenities, plenty of towels and bedding.  Comfy beds!  The price is very reasonable for all you get.
A perfect place to stay in Salem for my short visit. Great value and a very good host. Maria was always available for any questions that I had.
Very wonderful people. Very quiet. Worth it.
Maria's place was perfect for our short trip. The mini fridge, micro and coffee maker were all we needed this time around. The host family was super friendly and made Salem much more welcoming.
Wonderful Airbnb! Vet spacious private space. Would recommend and stay again!
Very nice 2 bedroom 1 bath space.  Nicely decorated and spacious.  Host was especially accommodating!

This was a perfect place to stay for my short trip to Salem. The rooms are lovely and the bed was comfortable. I appreciated  having a mini-fridge with filtered water, a microwave,  and coffee.  I would happily stay here again.
Great basic accommodations, fridge, microwave, some utensils and coffee provided

Maria(and family) are wonderful hosts! I stayed for an entire month and Maria made sure I had everything I needed to make my stay the best. Maria is very hospitable and her communication through Airbnb email is exceptional. I am thankful that I found this favorably priced, clean, comfortable, well-appointed private suite with such gracious hosts for my extended stay.

The location is also pleasant and convenient. There are excellent places to get food/meals close by as well as easy access to town, OR-22 to the coast and I-5.

I would 100% recommend a stay here.

Comfortable, private space with friendly, helpful hosts! This property is an amazing value for up to 4 persons with 2 bedrooms, private bath and Keurig coffee provided in a quiet neighborhood.
We will be back!
A super friendly host in a lovely quiet neighborhood!  Wonderful local knowledge.

The place was very homey and comfortable. The pillows on the bed were perfect. I work late hours and it was convenient that I did not have to tip toe around because the unit was detached. It was very private.

Maria's space is great.  It has two bedrooms, private bath and an entry hall with a coffee and tea set-up and microwave.  One bedroom also has a small refrigerator.  It's clean, comfortable and stocked with the basics.  If like me, you are eating out in restaurants or with friends and family it's perfect.  You can reheat your leftovers for a snack and have coffee or tea anytime.
Perfect place for our needs. Very nice hosts!
Outstanding Airbnb! Very quiet location, comfortable beds, and all the supplies you need, including a new Toothbrush! Thanks for everything Maria! Until next time...

The rooms were comfortable and warm. Each bedroom had an upholstered chair with a floor lamp nearby for a good reading spot. Access to the space was separate from the main house, through the garage. Communication with Maria was timely. We got plenty of notice about the entry code. Parking was convenient. We appreciated the extra touches of filtered water in the little fridge and the basket of items that are often forgotten-new toothbrushes, toothpaste, and floss.
Great stay on our week trip in salem. Having separate entrance is really nice since I would be in and out quite a bit. The only drawback back was the main bed was a little creaky otherwise no issues
This place was spotless and quiet.  Maria seemed very available.  But it would have been nice to have a TV as well as a way to lock the unit from the outside and the house!
Stay was cozy and warm during a very cold snap!  Easy access and great value.

We were so happy staying at Maria's home. It was comfortable, and we appreciate how welcoming she was. It was so helpful to have the Keurig, coffee, and tea, the refrigerator, and microwave. We appreciated how clean everything was, especially the bathroom. The neighborhood is very quiet and walkable. This is one of the best Airbnbs I've stayed.
Perfect little relaxing suite. Quiet, clean, close to food and coffee, or a quick drive downtown. Would 100% stay again!

Truly one of the best places to stay in Salem, we were a little hesitant because it was only a private room but it is TRULY private! Separate entrance with a bathroom and even a fridge/microwave. Maria was extremely responsive as we had booked hours before check-in after our previous hotel reservations fell through. Willing to share knowledge about Salem and give help wherever needed. 1000% recommend and will most likely book again!
I really enjoyed my stay at Maria’s house. I felt very welcomed! It is a very peaceful place. I love all the beautiful plants in the house. I would definitely come back!
Great place. Will stay here again.
Charming place to stay, and very simple instructions to find the location.
Maria and her B&B provide the best possible B&B experience. It is a delightful place to stay.
Small, but has everything you need for a quick weekend!
Loved staying here!

Comfortable enough but when you leave there is no way to lock up your belongings. Would have been more comfortable if I known someone couldn’t have access when I was in there.  The solarium was beautiful and serine.
2nd time staying at this Airbnb. Great value and  location. Maria is an excellent host. I'll be back soon.

We had little to no interaction with the hosts but the interaction we did have were pleasant. The space did the job, a place to sleep. It's not a truly private space because you cannot lock up your belongings. The rooms are straight off the kitchen, so you can hear everything going on. there was no access to the atrium as the photos might suggest and no window covering on the atrium window. People with anxiety about privacy might find those two things triggering.
This space would greatly be fit from some upgrades, but overall it did what it needed to, provide a place to sleep. It was a good value for the price for sure and we're super grateful for that.

Clean space with easy access to rented area. Free Keurig coffee available with fresh cream in the half size fridge. Lots of amenities available in case you forgot to pack something (tooth brush, razors, etc.) Parking spot available on the street in front of house. Free wifi. This is my second visit to this property. It's located in a nice neighborhood that is very quiet!

Maria was very kind, and got back to me as soon as she could. The space was very cute, however, I didn't realize the space to the solarium/sunroom required us going into the family living space. That meant having a door that remained unlocked between the airbnb space and the living space. I did not realize that would be the case and we did not use that space because we did not feel comfortable going through it. Other than that, the place was a beautiful location, very close to downtown!

Maria is such a lovely host, so friendly and accommodating! Literally everything we needed was there: towels, blankets, shampoo, hairdryer, plates, utensils, cups, fridge, microwave, coffee, etc. Place was very homey, filled with cute plants and the private rooms were truly private. Will definitely be back!
Excellent place to stay when in Salem.  Private, clean, comfortable, and convenient.  Highly recommended.  Good wifi.  No TV.
This is a wonderful little spot. The 2bdrms are secured and have amenities that are usually forgotten.

It’s a charming place to stay.  Quiet, clean and good location.   Nice yards & an atrium filled with beautiful plants.  Good neighborhood too!  This place has two bedrooms, private bath and an entry hall with a coffee & tea set-up and microwave.  There’s a small refrigerator in one of the bedrooms.  Great value.  I would definitely recommend a stay here.
Expect to eat out for every meal and note that the Airbnb is connected to their house. It is a safe neighborhood though.
Maria was super great , the rooms were very clean and she was very flexible ! Thanks again !

This is a great find! There is an amazing sunroom that is great for a morning cup of coffee or an evening glass of wine; Maria is an amazing host and quick to check in with you and see if you need anything!

This place was awesome for me and my sister's recent stay in Salem for Ironman 70.3 Oregon. It was comfortable andclean and way better than sharing a hotel room. Very convenient to downtown.

Host family is very friendly and accommodating.

The accommodations were perfect for our needs. Quiet, peaceful, private and convenient to all the things we needed. The extra touches in the pantry and bathroom were much appreciated. Please work on the garage door lock…inside joke!
Nice place to stay. We only needed beds and a shower so it was perfect
Great place very grateful to have had the chance to stay here!
Beautiful and quiet location. Very comfortable and clean space. It feels like you are being welcomed home. Easy access to I-5, downtown Salem and major shopping centers.
I've stayed in dozens of places, this was definitely the best value, by far.  Perfect space, low cost, top notch quality. Maria was super friendly and hospitable!

Maria and Ed are amazing hosts! We really enjoyed our stay here with how quiet and quaint it is. Rooms were clean and it’s very nice having 2 separate rooms. Centrally located and a good value. Highly recommend!
Great spot to stay. And great hosts.

Such a lovely stay with very considerate hosts. So many thoughtful touches included in our rooms! Very quiet and relaxing, and the AC units were perfect for a very warm summer stay.  We felt right at home. Would recommend highly!

Excellent place to stay. We only needed one room (there are two) so we just used one. There is a mini fridge, a microwave, Maria has a keurig coffee machine with coffee pods and tea and even creamer and water available. There is air conditioning. The shower and bathroom were clean and they included little amenities like toothpaste, shampoo, towels, and a hair dryer (which I forgot). Check in is easy and there is a way to lock the door if your concerned about safety (I was not). It’s quiet and in a nice quiet neighborhood. There was no tv but that was not an issue for us because they provide you with the WiFi. I would stay here again for sure. Good price, nice host, she got to me right away and it was clean and cozy.
Wonderful stay and highly recommend, bed was so comfortable and the place was very clean, look forward to staying here again.

Excellent! Maria was a wonderful host and drove to the store to buy a new iron for me to use after the one she had given had stopped working. Otherwise it was very clean, comfortable and exactly as described.

The place was in a good location and very nice space to stay. You had privacy with entering and leaving and the supply of coffe and bathroom items were great.  The hosts were very nice, accomodating and personable. I would love to stay there again in the future.
Good location, very nice space. Quick to respond. Coffee bar well stocked.

Comfortable two-bedroom quarters with nice hosts, and safe-feeling neighborhood. Car-dependent for going out for food, etc. Would recommend putting up drapes between host’s solarium and guest quarters.

Maria's place is very comfortable. This was our second stay and we noticed a few improvements; the best was a small sofa in the entry, giving us a place to sit and enjoy hot tea while looking through the book selection.
Chris
Cozy place to stay. Provided daily amenities needed which was really sweet. Easy place to get around for a simple work out. Host and hostess has good taste in decorations too!!
Enjoyed my 4-night stay with Maria and her family.  Very cordial and attentive.   I would stay here again.

Thank you Maria for allowing me in your beautiful home! I loved the coffee and tea and no television!
Maria was warm and kind and caring and I appreciate her much. ***hugs***
Great value, as advertised and very private.
Very accommodating. We loved the place and the park nearby!

Maria,
It is always a pleasure to stay at your sweet bnb.
Thank you,
Lowell

Tucked into the residential hills south of Salem proper, this was perfect for my busy days at a conference.  Extremely quiet (I wouldn't have realized I was part of the overall household) and easy to get back and forth to downtown.  My ONLY minor caution might be that if you are taller than 6'2" the shower is going to be a challenge.  I brushed the ceiling in the shower!  But for cozy and quiet it was just what was asked for!

Had a wonderful stay at Maria's place.  Easy self check in, quiet, nicely decorated comfortable 2 bedrooms and space, safe, great travel amenities like mini fridge, micro, coffee/tea, etc. Highly recommended.  Will be booking Maria's place again when in Salem.  Thanks very much!

Maria is an amazing host!!
She accommodated our requests and is super friendly!
Maria was so accommodating and made me super comfortable.  Maria and her husband are amazingly hosts!!
Maria and Ed were friendly and helpful. Beautiful,  comfortable bedrooms and nice sitting room. Incredible value for such homey surroundings. I would definitely stay here again.
Just like the listing:  A quiet two bedroom with a little sitting area in South Salem.  Perfect!

This was our 2nd time staying at Maria's. It's a very comfortable 2 bedroom unit with all the amenities you would need. Maria and her family are welcoming and helpful. We wouldn't stay anywhere else in Salem.

This is an excellent value. It's located in a nice neighborhood and the hosts were extremely welcoming. The bed was comfortable, and while the room itself is large, there's also a living room type area with a tv right outside the bedroom.
I'm looking forward to staying here again the next time I'm in Salem!
Extremely friendly and pleasant experience. Looking forward to staying with the them again on my next trip!
It was really nice to spend one night on your house. You are a lovely couple and everything was perfekt for us. :-)
Stayed here for one night. Felt very welcome. Space was as described. Refrigerator was a nice touch. Neighborhood was beautiful.

Casey and family made us feel extremely welcome.  The space was comfortable, and having access to laundry was particularly nice.  The bed was clean and comfortable. Candles and candies were a nice touch.  Keurig and bananas in kitchen were much appreciated in the morning.
My boyfriend and me stayed for one night. Beautiful family and house, spacious in private area with TV, WiFi, fridge and cute bedroom. Thanks for everything!
Clean quiet and pleasant.

The place was easy to find and easy to park at. It was close to everything needed. I was only there overnight for a quick place to stay mid-traveling, but it was perfect for what I needed, there's no way to find a hotel so nice at such a great rate. The basement area helped make it feel more private. I'd definitely stay again if I needed a place to sleep in the area.

Casey provided a great place for me to stay for my stopover in Salem! Very helpful with recommendations and was great to communicate with leading up to our arrival. The room is private with our own living space as well! Very comfortable, affordable and would definitely stay again!

So so so welcoming! I would advise this stay for any Airbnb traveler. We had the whole downstairs/basement to our selves & it was very clean. The hosts were great as well, very helpful and kind people. Definitely recommend!
Great house, great people. I had my own bed room, living room and bathroom.

Place is very clean and very nice and cool couple you won't regret staying here we're thankful and it was our first time!
Aaron & Diana

Casey made us feel very welcomed and was very flexible with our arrival time which was great as we had a flat tire on our trip up.  The listing was everything it said it would be.  The house is in a nice quiet neighborhood.  I would stay here again if in the area.

Everything was as promised, clean and conveniently placed in Salem. I didn't see a mention of a kitten in the review, but I packed Claritin just in case. I'm glad I did because it is the cutest kitten ever and it wound up cuddling with me. No regrets at all, would definitely recommend the place for budget conscious travelers.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place! Very private and the living room was an added bonus. Great amenities. The little things like leaving chocolates were a nice touch! I was very happy with our stay!
Nice and clean. Friendly hosts. Great value.
Great people. Great space. Definitely would book again. The kids are great fun and very respectful. The whole family is warm and friendly. Loved staying here.
Awesome stay! Family is very friendly and the room was perfect

Our stay at Casey's place was great! We only stayed one night, but Casey and Suzanne made us feel at home right away. The rooms were comfortable and clean and it was a great place for us to relax after a long drive. Our hosts allowed us to bring our cat as well, so it's nice to be able to stay in a pet-friendly place. They provided a good list of restaurants nearby, which was very handy for us as we had never been to Salem before.

Casey and his family  is the go to host for Salem! Their home is an amazing value in a beautiful neighborhood of Salem. The basement apartment was extremely neat and clean, while providing amenities that made it feel homely. I would highly recommend.
Family was inviting and friendly , beautiful home our area was spacious and cozy , was one best airbnbs I've been to ... Thank you for kindness and sharing your home :)

The two rooms with our own TV and mini fridge were like a little private apartment, which was nice after our long, tiring days around town. Bathroom was very clean and well-equipped, but very, very cold- I don't think these houses in the Northwest are insulated as well for unusually cold weather. Our rooms stayed cozy and warm though, with built-in wall heating units and we slept well. Would stay again on our next visit to Salem!

Our stay at Casey and Suzanne's was very short and we had to sneak out quite early in the morning, so didn't have much interaction with our hosts, but they were very welcoming when we arrived. The bed was comfortable and our teenage son enjoyed a good night's sleep on the couch. The bathroom was very clean with a good shower and a space heater for warmth. Our hosts kindly fulfilled a special request and washed our bedding with unscented detergent. This was a great value for our family and very convenient for our visit to Willamette University.
Comfortable stay in a cute community. Nice to have a separate basement room and Casey was great with communication and my late arrival!
Awesome family! I would highly recommend this house for an Airbnb stay. Super laid back atmosphere and the rooms were very clean along with bathroom. 5/5 all around

This was our first airbnb experience because another arrangement fell through and Casey was quick to let us stay last minute and make us feel welcome. Such a cozy private room and loved the deco. Definitely recommended!

The downstairs area is nicely decorated, super cozy, and very clean. We felt instantly home. Also, we LOVED their book collection! You can really tell a lot about a family by the books on their bookshelf and from everything they had on display in the guest bedroom, they are top-notch :) If I'm ever back in the area I'll definitely try to stay with them again!
South Salem is the nicest part of town, and this is a nice, quiet neighborhood, even with the high school right there. The bed was pretty comfy, and again, 2 rooms!
At Casey's place I felt like home. Warm greeted we got everything we needed. Our rooms and bathroom were clean and cost. Overall I highly recommend it.
Awesome place! Will definitely use them again in the future!
Great home with lots of space! Friendly hosts and cats! Great location/ close to Willamette

Clean and comfortable space to stay. Comfortable bed and separate living area. Host was helpful but unobtrusive. Not far from restaurantschool and shops. Individual controlled heat and wi-fi access. Great bargain for a quick overnight stay.
The home is very warm and inviting. The hosts are kind and hospitable. I would go back to stay again for the reading selection in the room alone.
This is a true airbnb experience staying in a local neighborhood with a family-- complete with kids, cats, and piano. Excellent price and everything was completely comfortable.

I very much enjoyed staying at Casey and Suzanne's. The home is well kept, clean and very welcoming as if you are home.

Their hospitality and flexibility was awesome and I couldn't have asked for better.

If I am in Salem, I will be staying here if it is available for sure!
Loved staying here. The house has a warm and inviting atmosphere. Great reading library in the basement. Casey and family were wonderful hosts. This spot is truly what an Airbnb experience should be.
Genuinely nice family - it was a wonderful 1st Airbnb experience. Great location and charming home!

Casey's place is a great value for the gem that it is.  It's quite close to downtown and very comfortable.  We had our own living room connected to the bedroom, s it was private and spacious.  The whole family was lovely and friendly.  I spend so much time chatting with their son, Jackson, that I almost made myself late!  Casey was also a great communicator and was flexible with arrival/check in times so that we could just move through our day as we desired without feeling pressured to get to the house.  It was a nice stay for such a short visit to Salem.

My girlfriend and I stayed the night and very much enjoyed our stay! This place is perfect with its own living space and a bedroom! Also if you are a book lover she has them all. My Girlfriend spent hours going through the books and there is some originals that you don't see everyday. I would definitely recommend Casey's place for anyone going to be in the area of Salem!
Looking forward to staying there again!
Very nice hosts and a good location.

The location is great! Salem itself has a lot to offer, with some really cute restaurants and a beautiful capital building. We loved The Kitchen on Court Street, Venti's, The Governor's Cup, Archive Coffee and Bar and Acme's Cafe- all of which are within 10 minutes of Casey's Place. Portland is an easy hour drive.

Our accommodations were incredibly clean and it was so convenient having the mini fridge and microwave right there in our space.

Casey and his family were all so friendly and welcoming. Communication was prompt and clear.

I would definitely stay here again if I am ever in the area!

This was my second time staying at Casey's. It was just as convenient and pleasant! They are welcomed by hosts but the space also provide a feeling of autonomy and privacy. I'd happily stay again if I'm in town!
We booked day of and Casey was very accommodating. The room was perfect.

this is a perfect place to stop by and rest any day, or even if your looking to stay for a couple days. thia is the perfect quite place you wanna be at. the room that i stayed in was kept very clean and also was the little personal living room. this was the lower section of the house wich was the basement. everything very well organized. the part that i enjoyed the most was when i would lay in bed and hear the piano playing in the top living room. the kids are great at that. it was relaxing and calming. also the cat that comes in and out of the house is very friendly, and loves to get scratched lighlty on her neck:) so if your looking for a place to crash for a night, a week, or more, this is the spot.

This is a wonderful stay for a low cost and just delightful. While it is a basement room, the house is older so you might hear some creaks, and the bathroom is upstairs, it was very comfortable, clean, and the hosts are very kind and welcoming. I would definitely recommend staying here!

Had an absolutely phenomenal stay.  You have an entire bedroom and living room to relax  filled with books or Amazon tv, A mini fridge and, microwave. There was so much more than I expected and that's how I felt about my entire stay. Would definitely stay again if I had the chance and totally recommend it!

My friend and I traveled to Salem for a nosework trial with our dogs and Casey graciously allowed us, and our two dogs, to stay. There are two rooms so my friend took the bedroom and I took the blow up mattress. It was very comfortable!! Their house was easy to find and close to anything we needed (gas, food, groceries, etc). We will definitely return if we're in the area again! I highly recommend them!
Clean, comfortable and homey.  Photos do not do the place justice.  Lovely area to sit in the backyard.  Hosts and friendly, kind and helpful.  Excellent experience!

Casey's home is filled with warmth and hospitality. The moment you walk through the door, you feel absorbed into the family. The bed is comfortable, and the rooms neat and tidy. The home is situated in a quiet neighborhood, and offers a beautiful deck in a private backyard. This is just a wonderful place to stay.
Overnight stay. Cozy home!
Its very cozy room. Nice house, friendly neibourhood, communicative host. It was pleasure to stay

Such a beautiful home and an amazing family. They were so kind. The house location is amazing, the yard is beautiful, the room is clean.
They have an amazing selection of books for down time. Plus they were also fans of The Office and Parks and Recreation, so obviously they have amazing taste.
I wish there was a family and home like this every place I traveled. Couldn't say more positive things about the experience.

Lovely Victorian style house in a pretty area of older historical homes and big trees.  Big downstairs area apartment with a refrigerator, and a separate bedroom.   Comfortable and spacious accomodations.  Casey was a warm and welcoming host. Nice family, with a couple of friendly cats.  We stayed 2 days while house hunting in Salem and surrounding towns.  Several good restaurants in the area.
Was there less than 12 hours but exactly what I needed. Clean and comfortable. Would recommend.
This Airbnb has great value and the hosts are really nice people.  They are very accommodating and nonintrusive.  I will definitely look this place up next time I'm in Salem
They were great hosts and you get a lot of privacy

Salem is perfect for an Oregon getaway--close to Portland and close to all the beautiful Oregon scenery. Casey's home is absolutely lovely and he was very patient with my friend and I who miscalculated how long our road trip from northern California would take and when I needed to be out late to visit a loved one. Thanks for everything!
Stayed for the eclipse. Most reasonable accommodations we could find. The listings' pictures are accurate.

The two rooms were spacious and very clean, with little accents of hospitality like water/beer in the fridge, extra blankets, books. Casey and Suzanne were very hospitable and helpful with a wonderful and friendly family atmosphere. Very beautiful neighborhood with amazing proximity to downtown and lots of walking. The downside, which is not a surprise and is clearly advertised is the shared bathroom which requires careful maneuvering to be sure you can shower/etc in a timely manner. This was a minor inconvenience for all the positive attributes; particularly the privacy of having an entire basement with tons of space at a very reasonable price. I rate 10/10!!
Great basement apartment in a cute house! Casey was super helpful. Enjoyed our stay.

This is a comfortable, clean and spacious stay for a great price. Casey and Suzanne were very flexible with our check-in time and maintained good communication. Very welcoming. Definitely recommend them!

My boyfriend and I ended up booking  Casey's place last minute as we were traveling up the coast and weren't able to find a camping spot on a Saturday night. Unfortunately we didn't get to meet them during our short stay but Casey was very communicative and more than happy to point us to some cool spots in Salem. The house is great and the downstairs room is very cute and cozy. Casey is a great host.
This place was wonderful. Clean, accurately depicted in the photos and very accommodating host! Would definitely recommend and return!
Very nice place to stay. Quiet and serene setting. Highly recommended!
Great place and family to stay with, communication is awesome and the rooms downstairs comfortable...bathroom is two stories up but it is private. Price is fantastic - highly recommend
Amazing stay with Casey! Beautiful home and neighborhood with everything we needed at our fingertips. I highly recommend staying here if you're looking for a an Airbnb. Thanks again Casey!

Casey & Family were great hosts! Their updated basement lvn rm & bdrm was perfect for my stay! Their amenities access to their kitchen & washer/dryer  were a plus after my daily walks & hikes:) Love Salem! Will stay with again if I come back!!
Awesome place

Thank you so much for letting me stay. The town was beautiful and quiet. The room is clean, clean and well-equipped. The host is very hospitable. I enjoyed the good night. Next time I go to Portland I still want to live in your house. Highly recommended.

I stay frequently in Salem. Casey has a great large private space. Very relaxing, great location close the Bush Park. The room has a nice library with reading selections that appeal to all. I look forward to staying again.

Casey’s place is adorable and a great price for a cozy stay. Wonderful hospitality and a sweet family. There are cats which I don’t mind but if you’re allergic it may be an issue.
Quite nice neighborhood and clean home.
I’d definitely stay again!
Very comfortable place and extremely economical.  Casey made sure all needs were met and questions answered.  Highly recommend.
Quiet, spacious, clean, and a great value. This was the perfect place to stay while apartment hunting!
Second stay. Great location. Nice relaxing space.
Wonderful hosts who did not blink at my very last minute reservation.  Very private room, quite and comfortable.
Great value, stayed a second night on my return trip

I chose Casey's place because it was close to my daughters. My stay was only for 1 night so I didn't need a lot. However, I was really pleased with the size of this place. It's more like a Suite and completely private. It's well worth the money. Just a tip the Alarm clock has USB ports for charging your phone. Good find! Also, I can't forget to mention there is nice book selection and magazines too.

So, I do have to mention that for the most part this place is very self contained. However, you'll have to step out of this comfy setting and go upstairs to get to the bathroom. I would stay again and I highly recommend it to others. As a single female traveler I found Caseys to be a safe family environment.
As basement rooms go, very nice with a window. As Casey states separate bathroom is upstairs

Casey and his family showed me great kindness and hospitality upon my arrival. I greatly appreciated them allowing me to stay on such short notice and for being flexible with my check-in time.

They have a very lovely and cozy home. They have added their own unique touch that makes you feel welcome. The main bedroom was very cozy and the second room was nice for chilling and watching TV. I also appreciated the many books that were in the rooms. Would highly recommend!
Very friendly hosts! CLEAN and Private room.
Great place with a bedroom and a sitting space with tv, microwave and little fridge.
Affordable and Quaint

Wonderful home.  Perfect location.   Great, expansive and private two room space for the AirBnB guest.   A wonderful family vibe in the rest of the home.  Comfortable and gracious host.  Excellent value.
Great space, private and cozy.
I had a great experience staying here. The hosts were friendly, and the room was attached to a larger living room area that I got to myself.

The basement bedroom and living room are very private and tucked away. The bathroom is just at the top of the stairs. It is such a pleasant, clean environment in a beautiful, old historic neighborhood. This is the second time I’ve stayed here and my husband has stayed here separately as well while we visit our daughter at Willamette University.
Enjoyable place to stay.
Great place to stay!
Great hospitality
We only stayed for one night, but really enjoyed our time in Casey's home. The space was a bedroom and a small living space with lots of thoughtful touches. We would highly recommend this location!

Casey's place was very comfortable and even though our after midnight arrival was probably later than he would have preferred, he was very nice and accommodating and left the door unlocked for us. It worked well for our quick stay in Salem and I would recommend staying there!
Casey and family were nice and welcoming and I felt right at home with them.

Amazing place in Salem. A cozy space to stay in a wonderful house. Casey and his family are great, we managed to get a late booking even though they were out from the house. The check in process was super easy too.

Easy stay in a family home finished basement -- warm, comfortable space, movies on demand, great price, parking right out front.  Even though guests are sharing a family home, there's a designated guest bathroom (different floor from guest bedroom).  Casey is a clear and timely communicator.  Thanks much!

I was only there for a single night but it was the perfect place to crash. Check-in was handled most efficiently by their cool cat, Carl. Casey was more than accommodating of my uncertain schedule. The two rooms are very quiet, with plenty of privacy. Definitely, a great location <5 minutes from downtown or Willamette. I'll be back.

Casey and Suz were great hosts. The children have impeccable manners. Even the cat was nice. I found the bed comfortable, and my unusual schedule didn't  seem to bother them. They even provided a small desk for me to use for my work.
Perfect stop before heading to Portland. Casey and his family are very kind and we appreciated that he let us arrive so late.

This house was awesome.  You have your own private bedroom and living room with a tv and couch.  It was warm, cozy, clean, and comfortable.  The hosts were very helpful and their family (including their cat) were very welcoming.  My wife and I would stay again in a heartbeat!

Quiet, lovely, affordable place and very friendly hosts. We stayed there for one night and liked everything.
Even restaurants and shops are only a short walk away. The bed was very comfy!

On a tour of PNW colleges with my daughter - this was a perfect spot to have a quick overnight. Casey was very responsive and super flexible. The price was affordable for us, and it was a quick drive to downtown. I have to admit I felt a little awkward going upstairs to use the bathroom, but the family seemed totally fine with it and let us have our space. Great hosts (and yes, AWESOME book selection)!! My daughter started "Ready Player One" while there, so I of course had to buy it for her while at the college bookstore ;)
Very friendly folks, affordable, they invite you in like family friends, great conversation and selection of books, a bedroom and living space as well as a dedicated bathroom

Couldn't ask for kinder people to stay with. We had never stayed at an airbnb without a private entrance before, so that was something we had to get used to, although the host and his family seemed very comfortable with us coming and going at our convenience.
Really cool neighborhood, great value for the location.
Cozy, clean and comfortable just like home! I immediately felt welcome upon arriving for my one night stay and would return again.
The accommodations are modest but roomy. The back deck is gorgeous. I’m not crazy about Salem, but if you have business there, it is central to everywhere. It is a great value.
Most definitely would recommend this home to stay at.
My stay at Casey’s was wonderful. They are amazing hosts. Would go back for sure.

We had a wonderful 5 night stay with Casey and his family. They were very warm, welcoming and hospitable. I would recommend them and would stay there again when in Salem. Great spot for parents visiting students at Willamette University.
Had a lovely stay. Room was cozy and the hosts were lovely! (And accepted a very last minute request!)
Excellent location, close to downtown. A lot of attention to detail with service.
Lovely people, home and location! Casey and her family were welcoming and friendly. It was a great affordable place to stay in Salem. Would definitely stay with at Casey's again.
Nice and clean space! Very friendly hosts!

A great first Airbnb experience for me. Room was just as described. Very comfortable and private two rooms. Great location close to downtown. Super friendly hosts that are happy to chat, or let you keep to yourself. Definitely recommend!
Convenient location and beautiful home. The living room space with the bedroom felt very relaxing and homey.
Quiet room
Very clean rooms in historic Salem area.  Close to Bush’s Park
Super cozy and comfy place to stay. Quiet, residential neighborhood. Super friendly cat. Very personable host. Had a wonderful stay, highly recommend

ホストは、とても良い人で、部屋には電子レンジや、冷蔵庫があって、とても便利でした。
とても清潔で、お洒落な空間。
とても、おすすめです！！
Cozy and affordable place.  Hosts are friendly and attentive.
Great place. Clean, comfy and a great location for us we would definitely stay here again!
It's a nice place. Warm and Friendly.
There is a living room and bedroom in the basement of the house. Very cool setup, offers plenty of privacy. Very cozy and clean

Quaint little stylish family home 10 minuets from downtown Salem. Private bedroom and den in basement studio. Bathroom and entrance upstairs in family living space. Very friendly folks: children were accustomed to having guests around; I had plenty of privacy and quiet, but they were very hospitable and helpful. Great communication via app!
Hosts were amazingly helpful and welcoming.   A great "welcome to Salem!"

Very Nice Neighborhood, close to literally anything you need. The house has so many neat little touches from all the great furniture to the book collection and the quotes from “Parks and Rec.” to the Star Wars Bottle opener.

Super belle maison et super accueil comme des amis invités. Belle confiance des hôtes de nous accueillir dans leur belle maison. Nous avions accès à un petit studio 2 chambres dans le sous-sol super bien aménagé avec
Mini frigo et micro-onde. Nous avons très bien dormi et les chambres étaient fraîches malgré la grande chaleur de 100 degrés dehors! Merci beaucoup beaucoup à nos hôtes de partager leur maison avec des gens de passage. Parfait pour une famille de 3!

This was a great place to stay.  It is in the heart of the historical district and easy to get places.  The host was wonderful and extremely helpful.  They meet my wife and I and made us feel at home.
Place was great, bedroom and living room all to myself
Its a very cute and comfortable house! We do enjoy our stay! Casey, Thank you for everything!
Comfy bed and cozy decorative touches made for an accommodating stay.
Cozy, plenty of space to put our 13 month to bed and be able to hang out with out waking her. The host was definitely our kind of people. Ron Swanson quotes and sitcom lover. 😆💕
very friendly family

I have found my go-to spot to stay in Salem! I stayed here, traveling with my toddler and infant, and it was a fantastic stay. The setup allowed for easy nap and sleep time with that separate room (those with kids know what I mean). The basement included a bedroom and a living room, plenty of privacy, with refrigerator and microwave. Would have been nice to have a sink in the room, but the kitchen was just up the stairs. A list of local restaurants was provided to give recommendations for dining. We enjoyed our stay very much!

Never had the chance to meet Casey or his family, but check in was very easy! He was friendly over message and easy to communicate with. We were really impressed with how clean, spacious, and cute everything was! It was a great place to stay after a long night of driving. We wish we could have stayed longer to play with all the games and read all the books. Their cat Karl was ridiculously cute and friendly. 10/10 would recommend and we would definitely stay here again if we come back to Oregon.

Casey and Suz have a beautiful home in a quiet neighborhood, close to just about anywhere you would need in Salem. The room is a great choice if privacy is your thing. The space is nice and clean, and when we went, the mini fridge was stocked with beverages from water to IPA. They do have a cat, but he is a total sweetheart. And finally, this is a good stay if you love a good read: they’ve got tons of books and they’re right there in your room. I wouldn’t just stay again, I’d move in :)
It was my first time staying at an Airbnb and it was a great first experience! The room was very clean and they even had little snacks for us when we got there. Definitely would recommend!
This place was cute and exactly what we expected. Casey, the host was very response to any questions we had. They were a great host! 10/10 would stay again.
Great place to stay!  Such a nice, accommodating family:)  Adorable neighborhood and beautiful backyard!  I definitely recommend staying here!
Wonderful host and location!
Great place to stay, we would stay there again.
A hip and quaint stay in Salem. Casey and family are very friendly and accommodating, and their space is neat, modern, and welcoming. We enjoyed our stay very much!

I can't complain too much because honestly when looking for a place I valued price over comfortability, but I do almost wish that I had put out a little extra money now. For a $50 stay, it wasn't bad. But if it would've cost any more than that I would've been a little more upset with the quality of the stay. Just a couple of concerns, there is not very much privacy. You do have the whole bottom floor to yourself but you can hear everything thats going on outside the house and in the floors above through the vents. Whenever someone flushes a toilet or starts the shower (the pipes must run by the room) it makes a sound so loud that it would wake us up sometimes. Also the little windows in the room don't have proper curtains or blinds, you can always see into our room and you could watch little feet running by through the window. The cleanliness of the room and bathroom were up to par, and it was a nice touch that they were kind enough to supply the room with some snacks (fig bars) and drinks (la Croix) for the guests which came in handy. It made for a cheap, quick stay but I would not recommend for people planning on staying long amounts of time.

We had a warm welcome and a good stay at Caseys place. You can park your car in front of the house and you've your own bathroom. It's a good place for visiting the city centre of Salem and go into the nature.
Such a sweet family, and it felt very cozy and safe there.  Very spacious basement space, we had everything that we needed!  =)
Great space, nice layout, very clean, friendly host/ess, all around great place, location and  price point. I will be back soon.

Dear Casey,
Thank you for welcoming us into your home. It was a pleasure to stay in your cozy basement and perhaps one day we will come visit again. Bed was comfortable, sleeping courters were clean, and we were even able to watch a quick show before bed in the basement living room. Also, the local guide you provided and small extras (bluetooth speaker in bedroom, great drink selection in mini fridge, and delcious fig bars). Thanks again.

Great location in a quiet neighborhood.  This well maintained home was very inviting.  Our basement lodging had two rooms.  The living room had a inflated air mattress which was very comfortable.  The bedroom had a queen bed and was quite cozy.  The refrigerator had drinks available, the microwave had popcorn available and the TV was there for easy access.  The host was very easy to communicate with and the location was perfect.  We are coming back in a month.  Thank you for an awesome stay.
Very comfortable and clean accommodations.  Lovely family.
great area, kind people
Casey's place was convenient, clean, and very comfortable.  I would highly recommended it. She responded readily to my inquiries and was very flexible in accommodating my late check-in.

Nous n’avons pas eu l’occasion de croiser Casey, ce que nous regrettons, elle nous a permis de rentrer chez elle alors que nous sommes arrivés à 1h du matin. Sa gentillesse a été grandement appréciée. Nous avons eu le plaisir d’être accueillis dans sa belle maison qui est tout à fait conforme aux photos. Encore merci Casey !

The second time staying at Casey’s Cottage was as good as the first. A comfortable bed, a clean bathroom and a convenient location. Close to downtown Salem, Willamette University, and the secret trail to Minto-Brown Park. A great value, too.

Such a cozy place for such an awesome price! Great space and accommodations. Close to everything in Salem. Quiet and quaint area to be staying. Family is very friendly and accommodating. They make you feel like it's your area while you're there!
Nice clean basement rooms. Good location. Thanks!

Quick responses, clean basement living/sleep quarters, wonderful hosts....what more do you want?  Loved it.  Second visit and can't wait for the next.  Used the back deck on a Saturday afternoon for a quick pint....YES!  Living room air mattress was good for our daughter.  Having a separate area for the adults was even better.  Thank you.
Casey was very responsive to my inquiries and flexible in accommodating my needs.
This was a really nice place to crash for the night.  Everything was as expected and the host was very communicative.

Casey welcomed me with a smile at short notice one night when I was travelling through Oregon at the end of a long day. He was hospitable and tolerant of me being exhausted and not too coherent! His place was clean and the airbnb space downstairs feels private and really cosy. I only wish I'd had a bit more time to make use of the rest of the space!
Always a great experience staying at Casey's!
This is a nice comfortable place on a beautiful street. I wish I'd had more time to spend here!
Wonderful hosts, perfect for my needs. May want to point out bathroom is on a different floor than bedroom.
Awesome stay! Great folks, nice spot, good location.
Casey is a great host and the accommodations are perfect.
I would recommend it to anyone. Classic vibe and  super nice family.

It reminded me of staying at a bed and breakfast from when I was a child down in the SF Bay Area. Great Family and Amazing home. A step back to the best part of the Past!! Will definitely be a return guest. It was so COZY and stylish and just perfect for my #mombreak weekend in Salem OR

This is a fantastic place!! The decor is charming with lots of extra touches like a desk, books, a mini fridge and microwave. It is very spacious and private with two rooms; a living area with a great TV and a bedroom. The neighborhood is historic and beautiful and near downtown. And best of all is Casey’s hosting and wonderful welcoming atmosphere. Thanks Casey and Suzanne!!
I have stayed with Casey many times. Room was great as always.
Our stay at Casey’s place was perfect.  Their guest space is private, cozy and clean.   Super nice people and great place to stay.
Great place to stay!
Casey and his family were very welcoming and have a lovely home. Even the cats are nice! We had a great stay and would stay again.
Casey’s place in a really nice living area and bedroom. They have nice touches to the rooms including many books and a tv! Would stay again.
great room and friendly hoasts. clean and comfortable. very accommodating with a shortened stay.  thanks casey
Very good hospitality very friendly and very helpful
Great people and very hospitable

What a wonderful experience with this amazing family. So friendly and accommodating. Will be my go-to place
In Salem!!
Wonderful experience! I felt like I was home!
Casey and his family were very welcoming, and the rooms were spacious and peaceful. Just what I needed after a very full day!
Really nice place to stay.
Nice and Friendly

This is a sweet space located very close to many eateries and a nice, quiet neighborhood. It is a basement space in a beautiful, historic home with active children, so do not come expecting the quietest of spaces. The room does have a sound machine to help with the creaks old homes can make at night, and that was perfect for our stay (thank you for that special touch hosts!). And the children were sweet and had quiet hours, so we didn't experience any issues being in the basement of an active family. The bed was very comfy and the on-demand TV options were awesome after a long, tiring day out and about in the area. This was a fabulous stay at a wonderful price point.

Wonderfully warm and welcoming.  It made my first ever AirBNB experience so awesome!  Clean, comfortable and beautiful.  This family was so sweet and let us do our own thing, they had great knowledge of local area.  House was immaculate!
Casey And Suzanne were very hospitable and answered all my questions.   It’s a lovely spot and a lovely part of town.
Thank you!
Great location and lots of opportunities to interact with Casey and his lovely family.
This is an amazing location and a comfortable space, with lots of opportunities to interact with Casey and his lovely family!
This place is top notch. I wish I could live here. Beautiful and comfortable. Amazing hospitality
Very welcoming place, perfect location, very clean, most friendly people... Just perfect!
In Salem for meetings, Casey's place was centrally located and affordable.
We took a quick trip for OSU graduation and this was the perfect stop. The place was lovely and our hosts were kind and responsive. Would stay again anytime!
Casey and his family were very friendly and hospitable. Their home is in a great location for visiting Salem. The space was very comfortable and clean.
As this was our first experience with an Airbnb, we were not sure what to expect.  What we got was an immaculate, comfortable home with a great family!  We would highly recommend staying here!
Wonderful host
We had a wonderful stay with Casey and Suz. The hosts are very responsive, and the house is clean, well-situated, and has all the amenities. Will definitely stay here again!
Super friendly hospitality! We felt very welcome! Very comfy location, walkable distance to downtown! And a wonderful backjard to relax!
Interesting residence and nice, quiet neighborhood,
Our stay was amazing! We loved our room and the house was filled with great decor.
Place was great. Loved the cat
Great location.  Casey was a great host.
This place is cute, and a great location. Nice neighborhood  and great little touches in the space. Very accommodating and kind hosts. I will definitely stay here again when I’m in town.

My stay at Casey's place has been nothing but amazing. The hospitality she and her family have shown me made me feel welcome and made my visit a lot more comforting. The room provided is also very spacious and has everything you'll need for a short trip to Salem, Oregon. She also provided a list of places and sites to visit within the room for whenever you find yourself wondering what to do next. Overall she has been a really thoughtful host for her guests and ensures you feel welcome for your entire visit. I'll surely book here again for my next visit to Salem 😊😁
We had a nice stay at Casey’s place.  Communication and check in was easy.  We were only their one night but would definitely recommend them for your stay in the Salem area.

Casey's whole family are wonderful hosts. The rooms are comfortable and nicely decorated and include nice extras like games, puzzles, and books. The house is within easy driving distance of Willamette University or about a 1.5 mile walk along pleasant residential streets.
Casey was quick to respond to a last minute reservation. Everything was just as represented with no surprises.

What an amazing place! Great amenities, spacious room, great hosts, sparkling clean, and lovely cats, too! And I've never seen kids this quiet and polite. Perfect spot if you're going anywhere near Salem or Portland! :)
It was above awesome! Must stay here!
Great place to stay. Nice house with privacy down in basement and a very friendly family.

Cute space in a home inhabited by a wonderful family. Cozy & sweet in a beautiful neighborhood. Loved Suzanne & Casey- their darling kids and 2 super sweet cats. Couple was super accommodating (gave this unprepared PNW traveler an umbrella for a long walk!). On the rainy Sunday, just wanted to stay in bed in the basement all day (but had to leave!!) Tip: Don’t wear socks on basement steps!

The downstairs space was perfect and ample for our (myself and sis in law) needs. Air mattress  option was necessary and was very comfortable and set up in completely out of the way spot. Bathroom location upstairs, through the kitchen and down hallway past family bedrooms is not an ideal situation but not a total drawback for us. Quaint neighborhood with awesome doughnut shop very nearby. Loved being able to check in at any hour that was convenient for us and that made staying here one of the best things about it with regard to why we needed a place to stay very near Commercial and/or Kuebler.

We stayed for only 1 night. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was clean with the amenities we needed; the most important parts of any stay.  The neighborhood was nice to walk around with my pup. Excellent hosts!
Great place to stay! One of the best Airbnbs I've ever stayed at. They are also very welcoming.
Amazing location in a residential Salem neighborhood. Casey was proactive about figuring out check-in logistics. Friendly family & quiet, cozy house!
Great location if you are visiting a student at Willamette University! Casey is a great host! Clean and comfy space to relax in Salem. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks Casey!

Great place! Very private room and living area in the basement. Comfortable bed, great sheets. I slept like a baby. I liked it so much, I extended my stay twice and stayed 4 days. Wonderful hosts, very nice, they even fed me one night. I would definitely stay here again.
Such a comfortable stay in a great location.
Great bedroom downstairs! Complete with its own living room. I was over 1 hr  late for check-in, but Casey was very accommodating.
A great place to stay in Salem! Near all the great places in the city. And wonderful hosts to boot, with awesome loving pets :)
Great hosts, very welcoming, quick response, and their place was very cozy.
This place is phenomenal. You get like your own mini house in the basement, for very cheap, and the hosts are super sweet.

I have stayed at Casey and Suzanne’s house many times visiting my daughter at Willamette. It’s an amazing space, very beautifully and warmly decorated. There is lots of room; a two room basement area with a living room and bedroom. Their family is lovely, the area is a wonderful location in the Bush Park
Neighborhood, and it’s always a treat for me to stay with them.
This was the best Airbnb experience I’ve ever had! 10 out of 10 would recommend
Super convenient to Willamette U. Very comfortable bed! Great hosts!

Sparkling clean, great family, gave us privacy but were incredibly friendly! Let our toddler bounce on the trampoline out back and let us wash our toddler's soiled clothes.
