Really nice location - walkable to some shops and restaurants but in a more secluded wooded neighborhoods. Lots of thoughtful  touches (like lens wipes, lint roller, hair dryer, baked goods!). It's a comfortable room, with a nicely set up private bath. Perfect size for 2 people. Elizabeth, the host, is very easy to reach and responsive.

This is a nice, quiet, comfortable place.  Elizabeth is awesome - she's a great, thoughtful, caring person, and that not only is evidenced in your face-to-face interaction with her, but also in all the care she puts into the room, and the special little treats and amenities that you find while staying there.
really nice big house , with several airbnb rooms. lots of space and  good location.
Elizabeth’s home was perfect. Great location, lots of added touches with amenities, food, dishes, bathroom supplies... Nicely decorated. Quick responses. It gave me ideas for my Airbnb too!
Elizabeth is very hospitable! We had a great time!

Great Stay! Little touches in bathroom supplies, small kitchen supplies, and little fridge were very nice to have and made if feel more like home. Elizabeth communicated extremely well and kept me updated on all things pertaining to my stay. Her pumpkin bread in the morning was very delicious, and she had fruit available, which was a pleasant surprise. The location happened to be a couple of doors down from my destination (wasn't planned that way) so that ended up being a great added perk. I would make a suggestion to put instructions on the Keurig. Since it was a small one, I wasn't sure if I needed to add water or wait for it to heat up. The only other thing I could have asked for were windows that opened for some fresh air in the bedroom area, but the small air conditioner was more than enough to keep the air circulating. All in all, this was a great Air B and B and should I ever travel to the Salem area again, this would be my first choice to stay.

Elizabeth really is a Superhost!  The queen room has a comfortable bed, yogurt in the refrigerator, coffee, tea, oatmeal, and grits (grits! Who has grits at an Airbnb but a superhost?) to make, and more helpful amenities in the bathroom than you could ever need.  She goes beyond that, though, baking something for most mornings, and providing fresh fruit.  Truly super!

Great character home and area to walk into town. The nice touches of tv, microwave, coffee maker and the homemade apple bread was awesome. Also the bed was fabulously comfortable and the most important to me as I was driving from Vancouver to Vegas and needed a good sleep for the journey!
Easy access in & out, really nice home & easy going host!

I've stayed at many Air BnB's and this is the very BEST!  The bed was incredibly comfortable, the sheets fresh and good quality.  The decor was very classy, charming and artistic.  The home is beautiful and clean.  Elizabeth made it very easy to find her place, she was an excellent communicator.  I felt safe, welcomed and the amenities were above and beyond.  Snacks, yogurt, many toiletries to choose from, beautiful plates, a robe in the closet, even freshly baked pumpkin bread in the morning.  It will definitely be my first pick if I am ever in the area again.  I also loved having my own private bathroom attached to the bedroom. Thanks for a great experience!
Lovely home, gracious hostess, perfect location for us!

This is a lovely 1920's home. The common rooms are sumptuously decorated as well as the bedroom.  Snacks and toiletries you may have forgotten are bountiful.  Memory foam mattress very soft and comfortable.
What a wonderful stay! Amazing hospitality - great room - and the amenities were on target. Great value

Elizabeth's place was even better than expected. Check-in was easy and communication was great. What really made the stay wonderful was all of the details. So many amenities, all the bases were covered as far as any toiletries or items we may have needed. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
SUCH a fabulous space!! The atmosphere is welcoming and warm, and the house itself is just stunning! I can not recommend this space enough. Truly a beautiful stay. 💕
Wonderful home.  Elizabeth was so thoughtful with nice little touches for her guests.  Just very lovely.
Elizabeth's place was awesome. The room was clean with a comfy bed, the hot tub was nice, and homemade bread was thoughtful and delicious. We had a great stay!
Nice place, comfy bed. Small snacks were provided, that was unexpected and appreciated!

I really enjoyed spending my brief stay at Elizabeth’s home!  She was very helpful with directions and communication. The room was lovely, with everything I could ever think of needing for one night. Really enjoyed the cranberry bread and coffee in the morning. Wonderful shower , comfy bed! Hope to return!
Elizabeth was a sensational host. Would happily recommend to others.

We enjoyed our stay in this beautiful old house.  Elizabeth goes out of her way to make you feel welcome, and shows you where all the amenities are.  If the weather had been better, we would have wandered around the garden.  Our only complaint is the softness of the bed, as we both prefer a firm mattress.
Really cool house.  Cozy upstairs bedroom.  Definitely a great value.  I hope to stay there when I am in town again!
Lovely house and bedroom.  Comfortable bed.  Terrific touches like baked goods and fruit plus coffee maker and microwave with oatmeal.  I definitely felt pampered and plan to stay here again.

Loved Elizabeth’s amazing vintage property, it’s one of the nicest places we’ve visited. The room was comfy and the private bathroom was charming. There were abundant pastries, fruits, and waters right outside the room and coffee and tea in the room. Very helpful when you were hungry and wanted to grab something small. The toiletries are appreciated. I was very impressed that she has shower caps and disposable makeup removers for ladies. Thank you very much!
Beautiful house with comfortable bed and amenities. We would certainly stay there again when in Salem area. Host was welcoming and helpful.
Great accommodations, everything anyone could possibly need. Great communication with the host. Comfortable bed and great location!!

Great room with very comfy bed and en suite bathroom. Elizabeth was gracious and helpful with getting the hot tub ready and providing neighborhood tips. Lots of small touches and nice amenities. Would definitely stay again.
Thoroughly enjoyed my stay! Wonderful location and excellent value. The space was clean, many amenities, and exceeded my expectations.
It's a prefect place to stay.
Wonderful place with nice amenities
I loved staying here and I look forward to coming back! Elizabeth is a wonderful, gracious host, and the home was absolutely beautiful. We had everything we needed and we felt very comfortable.
Elizabeth has an amazing, comfortable house and adds great touches like homemade carrot muffins or banana bread. Highly, highly recommended!!

What a beautiful place.  Elizabeth greeted us at the door. Everything had such love in all rooms.  The bed was so comfy like it was giving you a hug with memory foam mattress and a down comforter. The shower is very tall and my husband loved it.  She had all kinds of extras in room like qtips, makeup remover. There was fruit out in Hall way and then she made homemade Apple muffins. yum. you can use the hot tub if you want. The yard is so awesome to sit and relax on if you want a fire or by the pond. We will absolutely be back.
Great value.  Really a gem.  Would love to stay again.

Elizabeth was the best host I've ever stayed with. She took care of everything that we required and had almost every amenity necessary and more in the room. The house was lovely and the whole experience was excellent.
Fantastic place again! I will certainly come back!

Elizabeth really takes the Bed and Breakfast concept to heart! The house is stately and beautifully furnished, on a gorgeous tree-lined property.  It's like a homey getaway in the midst of a commercial area just off a major through way. Self checkin was a breeze with a digital door code. The rooms are cozy,  with a plush bed and private bath featuring plush towels and a hot shower along with plenty of shampoo, conditioner, and body gel.  But it's the little details that set this Airbnb apart; the room has a mini fridge and a microwave right inside,  with plates and silverware.  There is a Keurig machine with a generous selection including chai and hot chocolate along with bottled water. Instant oatmeal was available in the room,  and right outside,  Elizabeth provides a daily rotation of fresh fruit and home baked breads (she made banana, pumpkin, and pear breads during our 2 night stay! All were delicious). Really an above-and-beyond experience especially considering the reasonable rates. I couldn't recommend it higher.
My stay at Elizabeth’s place was excellent she was so friendly and it has everything you need. Definitely would stay again.
My 3rd time here and as perfect as always!! There is nothing lacking ever!
Very clean, charming residence.  I highly recommend it.
Elizabeth's home is beautiful and very comfortable.  We loved the freshly baked sweet breads every day!  Very nice neighborhood and an easy 10 minute drive to Willamette University.
Perfect in every way as always!

My wife booked this first AirBnB stay for me while on business in Salem. It proved to be a positive experience and pleasant stay. Thought I didn't cross paths with host Elizabeth while there, she has put thought/effort into the hospitality and amenities she offers.
Vista Manor was just beautiful and Elizabeth was an extraordinary hostess.  I highly recommend this booking.
Elizabeth is a fantastic host and her place is beautiful! All the little extra touches make your stay special!

My stay was very pleasant. Everything was as advertised and I had my own room key. Elizabeth went above and beyond with little extras (including any amenity you may have forgotten to pack) and fresh baked goods and fruit. There was a Keurig (with coffee and tea), mini-fridge, microwave, and all the kitchenware you’d need to eat/drink with. I would definitely stay again.

While I didn’t take advantage of it, there was also a hot tub and some animal companions to keep you company if you desired.

Elizabeth is THE Rock Star of Airbnb hosts!  She met me at the door with a pleasant smile and introduction. She gave me a tour of the space made available to me in her beautiful character rich home which was built in 1923. Her place creates a warm feeling with its hardwood floors, leaded glass windows, wood moldings, and period correct furnishings incorporated into the architecture. In my large bedroom, Elizabeth showed me the refrigerator stocked with yogurt and bottled water. In a basket she had popcorn,  oatmeal and other goodies ready to bring to life in the microwave. Also available was fresh fruit and small loafs of homemade spice cake which compliment the coffee I made with the K-cup single cup coffee maker in my room.  I found the memory foam bed to be luxurious and most comfortable with its comforters. Once thoroughly informed of what was available to me, Elizabeth reminded me of the hot tub located outside in a totally private setting under the majestic evergreen trees. Before I went to bed I totally unwound and relaxed, as I enjoyed a soak in the 104 degree water. I trust your stay with Elizabeth will be as memorable as mine! Greg Smith
We had a wonderful stay at this property. The house was as described and check-in was easy. Elizabeth was very fast to respond to my messages and ensured we had a peaceful stay.
What a wonderful home. You can tell its an older styled house and the decor matches perfectly! Elizabeth was supper sweet! We had a small mix up but she handled it like a pro! Deffenitly coming back!
This room with a private bath provided everything we could have hoped, and more.  Elizabeth was responsive and helpful; the space was lovely.  We will definitely visit again.
Cozy place to stay!
This was my second time staying and everything was just as great as the last time. There was nothing I was left wanting for. I would stay again.
comfy sleep in lovely house

Another great stay at the Vista Manor. Everything is as described and has great extra touches for anything you may have forgotten to bring. A great location for local shopping and eating as well. Highly recommended and would stay again.
Elizabeth home and property are beautiful she's exceptionally, accommodating and considerate. we highly recommend staying at this home

Elizabeth’s place is great. I booked one of the rooms for my Mom. She was comfy and cozy and well cared for. Fresh muffins, fruit and bottled water available everyday. Beautiful private grounds and lovely manor house. Elizabeth was easy to get ahold of and quickly responded. I will definitely book with Elizabeth again
What a wonderful and relaxing place to stay Elizabeth had thought of everything. I highly recommend this Airbnb gem. 💎
Elizabeth's house is amazing and I definitely recommend it. The grounds that the house sits on are beautiful and it's in a great location to get around the Salem area. We will definitely be back.
Always a perfect stay!
Another great stay. Good location, nice amenities and clean room

Elizabeth rolls out the red carpet for her guests. Her home is sparkling clean and if you have forgotten anything, she has a basket of amenities to help. She provided fresh baked goodies, breakfast and snack items and our room even had fresh cut flowers waiting for our arrival. We didn't have time to explore her grounds, but the home is lovely and I'm sure the outside is just as welcoming and enjoyable. The home is also very convenient to many eateries and downtown. This is a jewel! I suspect we will stay here again when we visit next.
Very nice

This is the best Airbnb I’ve stayed in.
I’ve been there many times and it will always be my first choice on Salem
Great stay, as always
This is my second stay at Elizabeth’s place. Every comfort is available, and every need attended to. I will definitely stay again if I need a place in Salem.
Beautiful home and perfect room. So many added touches which I loved! Great location and value. I definitely recommend! 😊
Elizabeth’s place was one of the best BNBs I’ve been to! From the easy check-in, quick responses, communication, and THE most comfortable bed I’ve slept in, it was all perfect!

Vista Manor is amazing. Elizabeth had her co host take care of things, so we did not cross paths but she answered all my questions. Her place is above clean and quiet. I am working on my writing so I needed a quiet place. It was perfect. The room is cute and had ALL the amenities and then some. I will be back again.
Great place! Nice extra touches. I may be back!

Elizabeth was a wonderful host and provided a great place for a very good price. As a woman traveling alone, I felt completely safe, and the space was quite comfortable. She had some beverages and light snacks in the room and the fresh flowers made me feel like I was at home. Very convenient location to downtown. I would highly recommend.

Elizabeth is very good and seasoned at Airbnb-ing!  I have stayed with her several times, and each time is better than the one before - she is always tweaking and improving the living arrangements!  Hot tub is a nice bonus!  The only warning I would give you is that Google Maps is funky in her area, so actually look for Vista Avenue and turn there - then Google Maps seems to recalibrate and get you there!

Elizabeth was an amazing host. The room was clean and the bed was great. I got a great night of sleep. The location was easy to find and the house is beautiful. I know where I will stay if I am ever in the area again for work.
Great spot. Very convenient and comfortable.  Plan to stay there in the future.

Elizabeth was a big help with getting to know Salem. Her place was beautiful and she had lots of nice, personal touches. Her family members were also very helpful and polite. The location was central to everything in Salem. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Elizabeth is absolutely the perfect host, and her home is a wonderful place to stay!  I'm usually in the room with the queen bed, sometimes the room with the king, but this stay was different.  I had reserved the queen room, but when I showed up at 1 a.m., Elizabeth came outside to greet me--the people who had stayed there before had used lots and lots (and LOTS!) of cologne, and she wasn't sure that she'd been able to clear the room of the scent.  (I'm terribly vulnerable to migraines triggered by fragrances.)  So we checked out the room together, and after I was leery about staying there all night, she put me in the guesthouse--a much larger place with a VERY COMFORTABLE king bed and kitchen!

Elizabeth's antique home is clean and comfortable. She goes out of her way compared to other Airbnbs I've stayed at to provide baked goods, water, oatmeal, and fruit. There is a thermostat and heating unit in the bathroom which is also in the room so that you have control over the temperature in your space. She provided extra blankets, towels, and a Simple Human dispenser in the shower with shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. She offered access to the hot tub and the room locked from the outside with its own key. The check in was easy. The location is great, only minutes from many parks and perfect for us since we woke the next morning and headed to Albany.
We would definitely stay there again:)

A beautiful home, both stylish and comfortable, with a kind and caring host. I felt warmly welcomed - Elizabeth really attends to detail, with everything from fresh-baked goodies and fresh fruit to a drawerful of supplies in case you forgot something! For animal lovers there's an opportunity to snuggle up to a very sweet doggie; if you don't care for animals, no worries as they are not in airbnb territory unless invited. Truly a home away from home.

Thanks for the stay! It was very lovely and accommodating! Made me and my girlfriend feel right at home. Loved that it was cable tv in the room as well and en-suite bathroom the room. Loved the window view in the bathroom as well. Close to nearby food places and Walmart.
This is the best Airbnb in Salem!

This is a very private and comfortable room in a lovely home. Elizabeth is a warm and gracious host who has added some very thoughtful touches. Add to this the short distance to the capitol district and you have the perfect place to stay in Salem.
Excellent service and a beautiful place to stay, highly recommend

Wow!  The first AirBnB that genuinely felt like a BnB.  Common areas were truly inviting.  Hot Tub! Fresh baked goods! Also close to tons of restaurants both familiar and adventurous.  I went to Venti and had a Thai peanut rice bowl with Korean BBQ tempeh.   Sure why not.
Amazing place to stay. Basically like staying in a hotel with twice the amenities and little touches. Elizabeth is a great host. Highly recommend stayong here!
Perfect place to stay!
We have stayed at Elizabeth’s place many times and have enjoyed each time! She is warm and friendly and her home is so cozy. The beds are wonderful.

I just love this beautiful home, a gorgeous Tudor style home with wood floors, oriental carpets, pretty finishing touches and a lovely shaded yard. And the many ways this host provides for guests - wow! From fresh-baked sweet breads and bottled water to all those little supplies you might suddenly find you need (from toothbrush to sewing kit, etc) - she's got you covered. Easy 2 mile trip into downtown for work. Makes my work travel so comfortable...

We love staying with Elizabeth. Her house is welcoming, quiet, and full of flowers and animals. When we were there were 8 ducklings that just hatched! It was the best to see them walking around. Our daughter loved it. We'll definitely be back.

We came to Salem for a show at the Elsinore. Elizabeth was nothing but helpful and accommodating. The hot tub felt amazing and the property is very centrally located for all our needs. Definitely recommend.

My daughter and I only stayed one night but I wish we could have stayed a week! Elizabeth's house is beautiful and our room was absolutely amazing. I could spend all day in her back yard. If you are an animal lover, this is the place for you. Elizabeth was an amazing host and I would definitely stay here again if I come back to Salem. I highly recommend Elizabeth's place if you need somewhere to stay in Salem.

Best place in Salem!
As always everything was perfect
It was cozy and nice! I liked that there is mini-refrigerator at the room.
What a fun place to stay in Salem. A spread as if on a country farm, while sleeping in a well appointed and comfortable home. I especially enjoyed sitting in the hot tub toward the end of a long day.

This was my first ever Air BnB, but I have a hard time believing that anything could ever top this. Not only was Elizabeth an incredible host that prepared fresh banana bread and fruit for all her guests, but she also provided coffee, easy breakfast options, and a memory foam mattress. I slept better here than I do in my own bed. Also, the backyard is full of plants and a beautiful garden that is incredibly serene. I could not recommend this place enough!

It doesn't get any better than this. Everything was really 5 star. Elisabeth met me when I arrived, showed me my very cozy room and an amazing array of little extras. I was very tired from a long day. I took an inviting shower and snuggled down among the quilts, propped up on several pillows and watched a little TV and fell fast asleep. Everything was perfect.

This is a charming, pristine clean, grand old home— wood floors, comfortable bed, a refrigerator stocked with yogurt and water bottles and a coffee maker in the room; muffins and fruit available for breakfast. Elizabeth has thought of everything a guest could possibly need.  If the weather had been nicer, we would have loved to explore her beautiful garden. This home is a rare and wonderful find... our best yet through AirBnB!  Hope to return!

Such a cute, comfortable hideaway! I couldn't help but think how my kids would have loved coming here when they were small - with the pool right outside the door - and what a great romantic getaway it would make for a few days with my sweetie, exploring wine country. But in this case I was a business traveler; the peace and quiet, access to a full kitchen, and space to do my stretching / yoga were all a perfect antidote to a hard day of work.
Couldn't be nicer.
Elizabeth's place is warm, inviting and so comfy.  Homey environment but plenty of privacy, too.  The perfect Airbnb.
Probably the best accomodation I have ever visited. Equipment included in our stay: HotTube!, Cafee machine with lot of capsules for both cofee and tee, homemade bakery in the morning.

Elizabeth is a gracious host.  We were greeted at the door when we arrived and she would chat with us when we saw her and make sure we had everything we needed. The grounds are lovely with lots of trees and beautiful flowers all around.
Elizabeth is a gracious host who excels at making her guests feel welcomed.  Charming house, warm hospitality and plenty of extra special touches make this a great place to stay!
Elizabeth’s place is beautiful. She thought of everything in the room. I’ve never seen so much attention to detail. She responds quickly to texts and is very welcoming.

This was a perfect one-night stop on our way from Tacoma to Ashland. Elizabeth has thought of everything to make a traveler's stay comfortable, including a wide variety of amenities in case anything has been forgotten.  The microwave and coffee maker in the room were just what we needed.  Lovely neighborhood with parks for walking, plenty of places to choose from for meals just a short walk from the house.

This retreat surprised me! Tucked just beyond a main road, the property is a relaxing escape from the bustle, while still conveniently accessing the grocery store, dispensary, restaurants, and a couple bars. Elizabeth was very welcoming provided anything I could want, and the hot tub was a perfect end to my night. Would highly recommend.
I love this clean, quiet, totally comfortable hideaway. With fresh fruit, eggs from the backyard chickens, and home-baked goodies waiting for me - its unbelievably welcoming.
Allllll the amenities, and such a wonderful host!

Elizabeth is super sweet host. The place is cleaned, and she has everything you need right in the room. She has a little coffee table and fresh baked banana bread and another snack for you during your stay. Super awesome. We enjoyed our stay.

Elizabeth’s home is beautiful and spacious with abundant shared space. The bed is super comfortable and the space is equipped with every amenity you could want. I especially enjoyed the home baked breakfast items and Elizabeth’s thoughtfulness.
Great place to stay! Elizabeth was wonderful and her animals too. The patio/garden was great and there is a pool/hot tub :)

We had a wonderful stay at Elizabeth's place, it was above and beyond our expectations. She is very welcoming and accommodating and everyone was friendly and helpful. We were pleasantly surprised by the array of amenities; she really has thought of everything from sewing kits to glasses repair kits! We also really enjoyed the hot tub and pool :)
We will be back!

We can't imagine a better spot to land in Salem.  Elizabeth's house is elegant, historic and super comfortable.  Not only was our bedroom charming and the bed really comfortable - the gardens, pool and hot tub are icing on the cake.  Enjoy the home baked breakfast goodies, fruit, yogurt, tea and coffee in one of several outdoor garden spots.  My husband loved hitting the pool for a quick dip before breakfast.  Elizabeth was wonderful about offering up walking trail and restaurant suggestions and making sure we had whatever we needed while at the same time we felt as though we had complete privacy.
This was a great AirBnB experience. I would stay here again when passing though the area!

Would definitely recommend staying at Elizabeth's place, wonderful amenities and lovely house.  We only stayed one night which was a shame because we wanted to go in that hot tub so bad :).....Great Host!!!
Great place!
We loved it here!! It's an amazing feeling being in place that's been living longer than we have! We felt safe and comforted, the way a home should feel like.
This beautiful home is in a great location and Elizabeth is an awesome host
Highly recommend this place to anyone! Clean comfortable and conveniently located. Really enjoyed the back yard space, Elizabeth puts extra effort in to make the stay very pleasant

This is my second stay at Elizabeth’s house. I come down to participate in the Salem Art Fair. Elizabeth does a fantastic job making sure your stay is great, from the fresh flowers and banana bread to replenishing water bottles (much appreciated for the hot show)! Everything is very clean and comfortable. The house is located in a perfect location, including being very close to grocery stores and a Starbucks! I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here for a third time.

What a beautiful house, great value! The bed was comfortable and anything you could need was provided. Salem was a great little town that had a little bit of everything.  If you stay and are hungry but not sure for what... look up “The Yard”.

Great location, beautiful home and landscaping!  Elizabeth is a wonderful host, making everything comfortable and welcome.  Especially loved her banana bread pastries!  I will definitely be returning to stay here when we return!

Elizabeth’s place is located in Salem. Decent distance from the wine country and the Downtown area of Salem.  It has a pool and a jacuzzi. Also if you are in animal lover you will love this Airbnb. Since the host has a variety of pet chickens, roosters, ducks  and cats roaming outside of the property.

Even though in our short visit we did not get a chance to meet her, but we can feel her personal care for her guests in all the details. Her place is like an attraction point, so tastefully decorated with a sense of history.
King size worth the $, queen size tight
Great place to stay with comfy bed, and the delicious banana bread is a really nice touch!

Repeat customer and will keep coming back! We travel from Texas to Oregon every year and Elizabeth is the best host we've stayed with. Amazing at every level and a peaceful place to stay. So much fun!

Too many amenities to list !
Gracious, generous hostess
Gorgeous home
Great location, quiet
We look forward to staying again and again
A great place to stay.  Elizabeth gave us wonderful recommendations for dinner.  Don't pass this one up!
Elizabeth is an excellent hostess, provides those extra touches that make the stay special.  Great location south of downtown, easy walk to restaurants, grocery, and bus.
Had a great experience at my first Airbnb stay. Many thoughtful touches such as snacks and toiletries. Loved the charm and uniqueness that is missing with a chain hotel stay.
Great place to stay!
Great location and relaxing beautiful home. Elizabeth is a lovely host, will definitely stay here again if I am in the area.
Thoughtful host, offered to come get me from the Greyhound station when she realized that I was traveling alone. I very much appreciate her doing so. :)

Elizabeth's place has EVERYTHING! Super easy location to find, lots of parking, easy access and flexible check-in was super! Our room was so comfortable and the historical location was gorgeous! (We wished we could have used the hot tub and pool!) Everything from coffee mugs to air conditioning to makeup remover was provided and the room felt very private for my friend and I. My only regret is that I didn't stay here longer! 10/10 recommend Elizabeth's home to anyone traveling to Salem, and I will definitely be booking her place again!
Best Airbnb experience ever! Two words phenomenal hospitality!
Elizabeth's home is gorgeous, welcoming, cozy. She has thought through every detail to make sure folks have what they need to feel right at home. We will be back!
Elizabeth’s house is an architectural beauty! Swimming pool and hot tub are a plus. The rooms are spotless and cozy. Hospitality galore! You won’t be disappointed staying here!
Comfortable room in a beautiful house.

The house is amazing and outstandingly charming. There’s a huge backyard area set for relaxing and since the house is tucked in behind a huge driveway it feels like you’re no longer in the city. The host was very hospitable and overall I had a great stay :-)
Excellent stay!
Great place to stay! Cozy! Great amenities! Elizabeth was a super hostess!
Very sweet host!

I love coming back here... The garden was lovelier than ever, and Elizabeth was eager to make sure I had everything needed. When the temperature dipped suddenly on the 2nd day of my stay, I sent a text asking about heat and got an immediate and caring response - what a lovely host! Also appreciate the thoughtful snacks!!
Great room!
A wonderful discovery with easy access to downtown and close to several very good eateries.  Check in was smooth and we slept great.  A wonderful value for your stay in Salem!
We had a great stay at Elizabeth's place -- the room is lovely and comfy. There were tasty fresh muffins in the morning and we got to meet one of her friendly, cute kitties. The hot tub is great too!

Amazing value for money! Elizabeth really thought of everything you might need for a comfortable stay...there are even homebaked treats, fruit and water available in the hall for guests to enjoy. The bedroom was stocked with a variety of snacks and toiletries too. The bed was incredibly comfortable.  Plenty of electrical outlets for charging phone/laptop. Check in process was very straightforward. Highly recommend staying here!
Great location, super clean & comfortable bed. Elizabeth is very conscientious of all the comforts you may need, beyond expectation. We had a great stay!
I very much loved staying here! I live in Eugene and work long days in Salem. Sometimes, I  just need a place to sleep in Salem. This will be a preferred spot. Thank you, Elizabeth!
Elizabeth and her home are warm and welcoming. She provided fresh baked goods and plenty of snacks!
This beautiful home is such a great place to stay in Salem! Comfy and cozy, beautiful grounds, great hospitality and location. And what a bargain!

Fabulous place.  Elizabeth really made me feel like i was at home.  Only disappointment is that i was just passing through on tight schedule so didn't have time to take advantage of hot tub or meet the pets.

Elizabeth’s place is truly special and I’ll be back anytime I’m needing to stay in Salem. Her home is beautiful, wonderful decor, very clean, organized, and every little detail has been thought of. There was freshly made pumpkin bread waiting for me, a stocked fridge and toiletries and literally anything I needed in my home away from home. I wasn’t expecting this high level of service. Best Airbnb experience yet.
This a charming, immaculate, peaceful home. Elizabeth's hospitality was outstanding.
Elizabeth’s house was so lovely and accommodating. Would definitely return!

I stayed here for work, but it would be perfect for a group of adults that would like their own rooms. There is a hot tub and a beautiful lawn! The house is incredible! This is my dream house with such a warm, wonderful feel!

Elizabeth’s place is quite charming and comfortable, with many helpful amenities.  She kindly accommodated my diet and my lateish arrival time.  We had a nice chat in the morning.  My room had a private bathroom.  Breakfast and coffee were delicious. I’d happily go back if in the area again.

Elizabeth is a wonderful host!   Communication was prompt, the listing is accurate and the location is excellent.   There are many little extra touches to make you feel welcome and at home. Already planning my next trip and hope to stay again at Elizabeth’s home

Beautiful home in a great location.  Elizabeth was incredibly thoughtful with all her extra touches and was a pure delight to meet.  We will definitely try and stay again when we’re in the Salem area for more tournaments.
We really enjoyed our stay at Elizabeth’s home...a home with such character and history..in every room!

This is the second time I've stayed here, and I am not disappointed!  Elizabeth came out and greeted me and chatted for a few moments.  She had made some fresh banana bread and is always so welcoming.  I love staying here.
I stay here at least once a week. Really cozy.
We’ve stayed at Elizabeth’s a few times now and we love it there! The location is perfect for us, the space is great and Elizabeth is friendly and responsive. The house and grounds are amazing too!
Never fails to amaze me how there can be so many little wonderful things about this place!   Last night it was homemade yummy oatmeal carrot cakes.  Everything about this place feels so nice.

Words really don’t  do justice for the awesome experience I had with Elizabeth and her amazing place. Hey everyone out there in Airbnb land, if you’re ever in Salem try to book with her you won’t regret it!
Clean, classic venue, amazing amenities, unparalleled hospitality!

This room in a carefully tended historic home was wonderful. So many personal touches, from snacks to fresh baked goodies to a full set of bathroom amenities. Hot tub was a bonus, as was the warm welcome by the hostess. Loved it so much I booked my second stay immediately.
It's always such a pleasure staying here!  Clean and comfortable.
Beautiful and wonderfully maintained old house with an excellent location in Salem.

EXTREMELY well-maintained large home built in early 1900's.  But equipped similarly to houses built in last 10 years as it relates to amenities and bedroom/ bathroom.   Treats provided as well as freshly baked items in the morning.   Unfortunately we could stay only one night on our way from Bend visit en route to the coast.  Elizabeth is a dedicated RN, but somehow quick to respond to emails.
A beautiful, comfortable, room in the trees, homemade apple bread and fruit, coffeemaker, and yogurt in the room, all that, and an innkeeper meeting me at the door—what a wonderful place to stay!
As always, a beautiful place!
Elizabeth’s bed and breakfast is lovely. I stayed in room 1, with a peacock theme. Her dog was gentle. I appreciated thoughtful touches like homemade apple bread and treats available in the room.
Wonderful place to stay. We will definitely be back sometime.
Outstanding
Very cozy and Elizabeth works to accommodate her guests.
Great place!   Always love the little cakes she makes
It was nice.
Such a cosy homey place, with Elizabeth staying in constant communication. I would definitely come back, i miss that comfortable bed already.

Another delightful stay at this lovely property with Elizabeth. Beautiful Christmas decorations greet you in this beautiful estate. Amenities are top notch. Restaurants abound mere blocks away. Always enjoy the home baked goodies!

Elizabeth was an outstanding host and we loved her adorable tudor style home and her distinctive taste in design, as well as her dedication to decorating for the holidays!  She was prompt with communication, and greeted us personally even though we arrived later in the night. She had also freshly baked some quickbread! All the amenities you would love to have and some you might not have even thought about.
Great, comfortable space. Host goes above and beyond to facilitate your comfort with many special touches.  Best Airbnb I’ve stayed at.
Elizabeth’s place was amazing! We will definitely be returning
Excellent. Would book again. Very accommodating host!
Elizabeth's home is one of the best places I've been fortunate to experience through AirBnB. I would highly recommend Elizabeth as a host and the location as well.
What a great old home!

Elizabeth goes above and beyond and the accommodations are beautiful. She has really thought of just about everything to ensure guest have a wonderful stay, down to the smallest of detail. I look forward to staying again soon.

You will not find better accommodations or Host anywhere else like Vista Manor ! I wish I could keep it a secret to make sure there’s always space for us when we visit !
A very special place and no matter how many people staying it’s always quiet...

I really appreciate how Elizabeth attends to the tiniest details.  Warming up the room with extra heat before a guest arrives, always having cold bottled water and snacks ready and available, and the home-baked breads every morning.  The beds are so comfortable.

Owe my God this was the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. Loved this place I wanna go back to Salam  Oregon just to stay here again. She had Homemade bread and it was so delicious. Place was beautiful. And I had the chance to meet her. She’s so nice and down to earth. Great Host. You well never ever regret staying here.

Great place, hostess and hospitality!  Loved all the treats in the room and moist home-baked goods too!  So delicious!  Thanks for accommodating us last minute too!  Glad we were able to use the kitchen to cook our dinner; thanks!  All the cats, and dog were so friendly and loving too!  Will stay again next time! Thanks again!
Great place! Elizabeth had everything you didn’t think you’d need and more! Elizabeth was nice and welcoming, and made sure to make it feel like home!
I stay here often for work. The other day I had the worst headache and forgot the ibuprofen. I asked Elizabeth and of course she had plenty at the ready for her guests.

This is a beautiful place to stay, very much a home away from home.  Elizabeth is always available, even when she is away. There are many extra touches, I loved having a packet of microwave popcorn to snack on!

Elizabeth's is an historic house. The rooms are nicely furnished and decorated. The bedroom and bath are a little small, but adequate. Any short comings of the facility are more than made up for by the excellent hospitality by Elizabeth. Also she provides food for an in room breakfast each morning, including home made bread, fruit, yogurt, and oatmeal! Hard boil eggs upon request!.Big advantage over other AirBnBs.
Great place ! We love staying here !
Wonderful, interesting home. Elizabeth is a terrific host. Fresh fruit and homemade muffins every day are such a treat. Will definitely stay there again.

Lovely historic home with beautiful landscaping. The room was extremely well outfitted and the bed was exceedingly comfortable. Elizabeth was headed out of town that day, so we did not meet although we spoke on the phone when I had a question,  and she was so very nice.   Check in was super easy and  I’m looking forward to staying again soon.
This is the third time I have stayed here. As always, it was a wonderful experience!

This was my second stay at Elizabeth's and it was just as wonderful the second time around. I was in a different room, but it was still full of amenities, super clean and very comfortable. Highly recommend!

Excelente en todos los sentidos
Un lugar muy acogedor
De verdad te relajas!!
Recomendado total!!!!
Elizabeth’s place is a very comfortable, warm, and inviting place to stay! Great quality and very reasonably priced. I’ve stayed twice and will stay again when I’m back in Salem!

The ad indicates that the home is large and spacious.  It does not indicate that the house and bedrooms are rented to others, and in fact, during our stay it seemed as if all bedrooms and guest quarters were full.  We would not have rented the room if we knew that we would be sharing space with others, outside of the host.  The ad should state the maximum renters that one would encounter should they decide to rent the space.

Elizabeth provides a comfortable and warm place to stay.  She provides so much from all the toiletries you could possibly need to a microwave oven, personal refrigerator, dishes, utensils, etc.  There is coffee and tea in your room and fresh baked quick bread, fruit, water and extra coffee, etc in the hallway.  The refrigerator is stocked with yogurts and water and there is oatmeal and popcorn provided as well.  The rooms are very clean.  I love the sitting area where there is a fireplace and a wine bar with comfortable seating.  I sat there for a while one evening sipping on Irish cream and just enjoying the relaxing atmosphere.  This is all so amazing for the price.  What a great value.  What a great place to stay.
Comfortable and cozy - great value
Elizabeth was a great host, her place was amazing, beautiful house, the amenities where awesome, baked goods were outstanding as well as the fridge being stocked. Thank you
What a fantastic place! Elizabeth is wonderful and has created a magical home to share.

Elizabeth is awesome, helpful and responsive. It's a beautiful, historic home clean and incredibly comforting. Plenty of towels, clean bedding and great touches such as   bottled water, granola bars,Kuerig coffee maker with mugs, flatware and dinnerware. I'm staying another day. Really enjoyable.
I would have a hard time finding another Airbnb with so much value. One of the best hosts ever! Liked it so much added another day.
It is a beautiful area on the property and nearby. Lot's of trees, a nice park with a creek running through it, and Elizabeth was very hospitable.
Quaint place. Nice place for some rest if you are passing through Salem.
Every time we come to Salem we stay with Elizabeth. She has the most welcoming space and she is the best Air B and B host we have ever been hosted by.

Elizabeth was the consummate host. Her home was in the heart of Salem, in a peaceful relaxing setting.  The attention to detail was superb, and she made both myself and my paw child welcome.  The amenities, snacks, and beverages far surpassed a hotel environment. The bed was luxurious and very inviting. The value, location, and overall experience was stellar. I would go out of my way to stay in this lovely home again.
Definitely recommend!
Nice clean place.  Easy access to walking or driving anywhere .  Comfortable beds and has TV, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, snacks!!

Elizabeth’s house is quite exquisite. She left all the needed amenities, and a big binder with helpful local tips! The bed is pretty soft, just for those who might care.
I really did enjoy the stay and am grateful for the hospitality.
Very nice room in a beautiful setting.
Very nice accomodations and service in an interesting setting.

his BnB is a lovely home. A beautiful Tudor house with lovely gardens and a POOL. the upstairs has 4 ensuite guest rooms. There were fresh flowers everywhere.  Coffee machine, fridge, microwave too. It is very clean. Elizabeth provides fresh fruit and snacks. She even offered me a glass of wine from bar in the living room. The bed in my room was a little saggy but otherwise its an amazing value!!!  There are pets on the property so this would not be a good fit for those with allergies or dislike of pets. Thank you Elizabeth.

Such a great space and the host is superb! They have really put effort into thinking of what a guest would like. Snacks, area guides, microwave and micro fridge, private bathroom, etc. The design is great both interior and exterior. Definitely, book here if you’re in town! It’s a great experience!
Elizabeth is a wonderful hostess. Our stay in was perfect.
This is a beautiful house and the room was cozy and clean!
Elizabeth offers such a nice place to stay! She is super hospitable and has amazing snacks to offer during your stay. I would definitely stay again!
Very comfortable room in nice environment.   Numerous amenities and  thoughtful service.

Very comfortable, I loved the eclectic decor and all the thoughtful touches. My first time trying a room instead of a whole house. I would say it was a success and I will definitely rent again when I am in the area.

Absolutely great stay! Highly recommend, great area, great host. She has recommended restaurants, super clean, responds quickly if you have any questions. Definitely recommend staying here if wanting to stay in the Salem area!

Elizabeth is nice and she has a friendly and cute cat. She definitely makes all the efforts to be a good hostess. Her place was not as clean as I expected and I could have used a little more refrigerator space. But for the price, I have nothing to complain about.

Elizabeth is most hospitable and even provides home baked goodies, among other snack options and water bottles!
Looks like her home would be a good place to stay awhile but I was on a quick road trip so basically just stopped for the night. I was able to rest well and be refreshed to continue my journey.

Loved staying at this Tudor styled Inn. We stayed in the peacock room which was so quaint and cozy. Slept like a baby. Elizabeth’s bake goods are outstanding. Perfect snack or with breakfast. I would love to come back to stay someday.
A stellar experience in a beautiful environment, safe, inviting and the best that Oregon has to offer. A five-star Airbnb experience.

Staying at Vista Manor exceeded all of our expectations. Elizabeth was very welcoming. We stayed in the peacock room which was stocked with food and water. Patio and pool access. Backyard was beautiful. Pastries were very tasty. We felt very comfortable. Would recommend without hesitation.

What to expect if you decide to stay in this amazing Tudor style home, surrounded by all types of plants , trees and a garden. A warm greeting, a tour around her lovely home. And also don't forget your swim clothes. Take a dip in the pool or relax in the hot tub. Our room, room #1 was beautifully styled and super comphy to be in. Slept so good we thought we were home in the mountains of Washington State and not in the middle of Salem. I highly recommend that you stay a night or even 2.
I know we plan on coming back.

We really enjoyed our stay at Elizabeth's home. It was sparkling clean and very stylish. We enjoyed our privacy. At the same time, she invited us to use her swimming pool and hot tub. Her place was very well organized, and furnished with many thoughtful amenities. We would definitely stay there again.

This place is warm, safe and inviting. A lovely little neighborhood close to shops and dining opportunities. Staying at Elizabeth's really felt like a value. Clean and cute. Great personal touches. Loved the original plumbing fixtures still serving duty in the bathroom. As a plumber, I enjoyed seeing care taken with older quality items.

Elizabeth’s place is a piece of paradise and I highly recommend it. The area is lovely and very close to restaurants, a grocery etc. The house and room were beautifully furnished and very comfortable, and check-in was simple and quick. The room included many thoughtful touches and amenities and overall I felt at home and welcome. Elizabeth is a stellar host!
We very much loved the historic house and grounds.  A very lovely and relaxing overnight stay.  Elizabeth provides lots of extras and was available for any questions.
lovely little home, and a great host

Elizabeth’s home was beautiful and very well-maintained! The room where I stayed included all the amenities the average traveler would need. The location was also central to many points of interest. Would highly recommend!
It was a pleasure to stay at Vista Manor. Elizabeth goes above and beyond for her guests. Truly a wonderful experience.

Elizabeth’s place was one of the best Airbnb experiences I have had thus far. Such a beautiful place with amenities for days! We loved the thoughtful touches and the pool was an amazing extra on a hot day. Would recommend and will totally be back.
Amazing! First time taking a Airbnb and was just amazed on how everything was handled! Definitely going to come back!!
This was the most impressive Air B and B I've ever stayed in! Stocked with goodies and everything you might need to have a wonderful stay.
Wonderful old house and grounds; beautiful, clean room with amazing snacks and amenities; gracious host.

Elizabeth’s place was truly amazing! Don’t have any doubts about booking a room here. It’s cheap, close to town and her accommodations were fantastic. I booked for my partner’s birthday this weekend and Elizabeth left some fun decorations and a lovely cupcake with a candle and a card! We loved it. We love older houses so this was perfect. Please stay here! It was great.
Above and beyond my expectations. Room was very comfortable, great amenities, great location for my needs. I even had time to enjoy an afternoon at the pool! Thank you Elizabeth!
Beautiful home and piece of land.
Great host and lovely home.
Like staying in a fine hotel full of antiques but with all the amenities.  Sweet pool, quiet yet close to main streets of Salem. Trees around felt cool and comforting. All around a good experience
Awesome place to stay!
This Airbnb is top notch. I have stayed in alot of 5 stars, but this one takes the cake. Excellent host and home.

Nice place with great little extras! Elizabeth had sweetbreads out in the morning, plus other snacks!
Great location with nice garden area and within walking distance of several restaurants.

Elizebeth's place is wonderful to behold, a step back in time and very well maintained.  The hospitality was outstanding.  Quiet and relaxing, in a great neighborhood, I loved my morning walks and enjoying coffee in the garden while observing the many birds that visited it along with a friendly squirrel or two.  The tasty baked goods provided daily were a nice touch.  Highly recommend!
An attractive large house maybe a mansion or former hotel and a host that adds a personal touch to make you feel welcome

Elizabeth was very helpful. She responded to my messages in quick time. She accommodated my requests due to changes in plans during wildfire. She is a great host and would recommend her place to anyone who is visiting Salem.
As usual terrific hospitality and service

Elizabeth’s house was beautiful! She had fresh flowers in a vase in the room. It was a great touch! The bed was also very comfy. She put a few bags of goodies along with some water bottles in our room! Her cat “Sinbad” was very friendly and greeted us right away! Great place to stay I would definitely recommend.
Very clean, cute and quiet. Didn't expect it to be so quiet but it was tucked away in a cute area. The whole place was adorable. Very comfortable!! I'll be back!
Clean and cozy in a unique environment.
A amazing host and a peaceful night
Great place to stay. Elizabeth provided a comfortable homey experience!

Elizabeth's home was very clean and peaceful, yet conveniently located close to lots of restaurants and stores. She was very welcoming and quick to respond to any of our messages. It was a great place to stay and I highly recommend it!
This place is a tucked away gem. Very peaceful and the home is absolutely beautiful

Elizabeth's home is full full of charming details. We stayed in room #1, the peacock-themed room. Although the room was small, it had all the necessary amenities including a smart TV, Keurig coffee maker, and mini fridge. The bed was on the soft side but quite comfortable. There were plenty of blankets and towels, and she provides basics like shampoo, conditioner and body wash. There is also a blow dryer so no need to pack your own. We appreciated the snacks and bottled water provided both in the room and common area. Overall an excellent value. I look forward to staying here  the time I'min Salem.
Thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Elizabeth. She was communicative and kind, and the space was warm and cozy. I slept wonderfully. Thanks, Elizabeth!

Elizabeth is very warm and welcoming. The home is just beautiful and so clean and relaxing. The grounds are a joy and I really appreciated all the thoughtful touches, the many food snacks and amenities available and the quiet. The bed was super comfortable and the lightweight comforter was so cozy! Thank you Elizabeth for one of the most memorable stays ever. Appreciate!
Barbara
This is my second time at Elizabeth’s this year, and I still highly recommend it! I feel very comfortable and very much at home here!
By far one of the best AirB&B’s I’ve stayed in. Elizabeth was super hospitable and kind! She even baked homemade bread in the morning for everyone which was in fact delicious! Sweetest lady ever!!

Elizabeth has always been a great host. Her rooms are always clean and well kept.
For those of you who are looking for a home far away from your house; this home is perfect. The location is great for business people and those who just want to visit Salem.
I look forward to staying in that home again.
Classic Oregon Country home. Well setup and maintained.
fresh flowers in our room, fresh bread in the hall. dog friendly + hot tub= a truly dreamy experience!
Elizabeth has always been a great host. The house is clean; great location and comfortable beds. I am definitely staying there again if the rooms are available the next time I will be visiting Salem.
Wonderful place to stay!

Lovely hospitality in a charming home! Slept better than I have in years. Elizabeth is a fantastic host, with beautiful holiday decor (seriously wonderful) in every room and fresh baked goodies every morning! Amazing amenities and thoughtful touches everywhere. I stayed for 6 nights and was sad to leave!
Second time in the peacock room, cozy and relaxing. The house was so festive and decorated beautifully for Christmas. It was a full house no issues will book again !
Clean, accommodating and all around a delight.
Wonderful, same as my last stay! Elizabeth went out of her way to make sure I could stay for the entire week and a half of my emergency trip, at the last minute. Thank you so much!

Wonderful! Beautiful, restful, well-stocked place with a fabulous host who thinks of every detail plus more. Elizabeth ran circles to make sure I could stay in an emergency and really saved me when I needed a restful place to stay again. My second time therewas as great as my first! Oh yeah, and the 2 sweet kitties who greeted me regularly were a delightful bonus!

Elizabeth made the entire process very easy, I arrived very late in the evening which wasnt a problem and the peacock room was perfectly equipped with its own bathroom. There were also some fruit, snacks, mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker... was a great stay. thank you!

I wasn't sure what to expect with staying at Elizabeth's around the whole covid thing - whether there would be adequate social distancing, how busy common areas would be, etc.  Once I arrived, I was so positively impressed with the setup of the space that I was able to completely relax and enjoy.  And it seems every little detail was thoughtfully anticipated and arranged, from needle and thread to fresh fruit and bottled water.  I wanted to stay an extra day just to feel so pampered!

places like Elizabeth's are my favorite thing about using airbnb :) that's how even if ur visit is like mine was: walk into your room, shower, sleep & leave after waking & a quick breakfast, they're often as delightful as they are unique!

the house itself looked like a living museum or set of a period piece it was simply breathtaking as was the entire experience of taking in the property when i finally saw it by daylight as i left

and not that the room wasn't great... on the contrary, i thought the room would have been a steal simply on it's own merit even if it were simply in a more uniform house in a neat & manicured suburb somewhere

its a self contained space up the foyer stair containing every amenity quality hotels offer: fridge, microwave, attractive basic set of dining flatware & utensils, light food & drinks laid out and comfy seating

private bathroom with a shower & some vanity space (with ample vanity in the bedroom)

the decor throughout is gorgeous i simply wont try & do it justice with a review but suffice 2 say, a tour of the house & grounds alone would nearly be worth what is asked 4 the stay lol

i was coming off of 12 hours driving continuing on in the morning & had picked the space while stopped for a short coffee break simply based on location, price & aesthetic but, as i said, got another one of several surprise destinations i hope 2 revisit one day soon :)
Great value and location.
Thank you

Many public amenities close by.
Very pleasant home and a very friendly hostess.
Had a wonderful stay, Elizabeth has equipped each room with everything you could ever need.  Snacks, fresh fruit and fresh baked goods were much more than I expected.  Will definately stay again.
I stay here every time I go to Salem. It's my home away from home.
Highly recommended
Wonderful experience! Love it here!
Very neat place with some beautiful architecture. The room was nice and there was coffee and banana bread for breakfast.
Staying at Vista Manor is amazing. Cozy, comfortable and every detail perfectly attended to! I would not stay anywhere else in Salem. Love this home!

Elizabeth puts her heart and soul into making Vista Manor friendly, comfortable, and beautiful. This, our second visit, was just as wonderful as our first, last year. We brought our dog, Nora, who also loves the house and grounds. This time, Mother Nature interfered with our fun, dumping an ice storm on Salem, cutting off power and light and knocking down trees. Elizabeth rose to the challenge, providing extra blankets, candles, lanterns, and her usual cheerful attitude. It was an adventure! Vista Manor is a lovely historical home, and to be a guest there is something very special. We hope to visit again before too long.
I just staid for a 1-night stay. Elizabeth responded to all of my questions promptly. Spent some time in the hot tub, was overall a REALLY good experience! Would recommend, this host...
I stayed at Elizabeth’s place while working as a travel nurse in town. It was so nice and comfortable to come home to after a long shift. I felt safe there and wish I could’ve stayed longer!

Elizabeth's rooms are clean, comfortable and ours included microwave and refrigerator and a few extras like snacks and coffee.  It is in a quiet area and we had a wonderful stay for overnight. Couldn't have asked for more.

Elizabeth’s place was such a delight! The location is fantastic. The house is beautiful and her responses are quick and sweet. Before checking out we spent some time looking for their cats and bunnies in the backyard, and even got to pet some! One of the best stays ever.
Elizabeth is an excellent host. She responded very quickly to my inquiry and was friendly and welcoming.
Excellent stay, wish we could’ve been there longer!  Had everything we needed for a good price in a good location.
Best value ever for an Airbnb!

This location is wonderful, with good access to parks, and any groceries or shopping you want to do. The rooms are supplied with their own dishes and snacks. Communication was quick and easy. This is by far the most comfortable we have been at an AirBnB.
Elizabeth was so helpful and the room was so cute and quaint and lovely!
Well tended and comfortable!  Elizabeth's place is a big yes!

This place is a gem! I have stayed at Elizabeth’s Place a few times now and I can’t imagine staying anywhere else in Salem. Beautiful house in an excellent location, with so many amenities! It’s my home away from home while in Salem!
Love it!!!!

We have been staying with Elizabeth for years. Every time we come it’s like coming “home.” She is our favorite Air B n B host. Our last daughter is graduating from college in Salem and we will miss our frequent visits to this Air B n B.
perfect stop while on the road

Elizabeth's place is great.  I had the peacock room - lovely private bath and lots of amenities - snacks and coffee and tea in the room and more goodies and fruit out in the open hallway.  She makes everything you could need for business or vacation trip available - envelopes, scissors, pen and a notebook on your desk as an example. The house is surrounded by trees  and flowers too. Highly recommend.
Outstanding experience. Special attention to fresh baked goods, fruit, coffee etc. made all the difference.  Eager to please and the perfect host. Thank you Elizabeth.
Fabulous as always!  My go-to place while visiting in Salem!  Elizabeth is amazing!
Elizabeth is the nicest host I never meet,
Good place
Elizabeth offers warm, welcoming hospitality - we felt right at home and enjoyed all the thoughtful amenities in the Peacock room. We’re going to have to visit Salem more often!
Great location. Quiet and comfortable.
This is a wonderful, inviting place to stay in a central location, close to everything.
Very beautiful home and surrounding area
An amazing gem in a great location in salem.  We will be back!
Amazing stay! Had everything we needed and a special baked goods in the morning too!
Always a treat to stay!! Love staying for a comfortable, cozy and quiet stay !
10/10 recommend Elizabeth’s peacock room! The property is amazing and everyone is so nice!
This is a uniquely beautiful property in every way with lovely amenities.  Elizabeth takes care of every detail and makes sure everything is comfortable.  It is a great value too.
Elizabeth’s place is great - clean, good location, quiet. I would stay here again.
N/a
Cannot say enough about our wonderful stay, beautiful house, wonderful hostess! Bed was super comfy

Elizabeth’s home and gardens are so lovely. It was clear to us that she has anticipated the various needs a guest might have. It is homey, comfortable, stocked with snacks and amenities. We sat on the back patio surrounded by beautiful plants and felt like we were out of the city when, in fact, we were smack dab in it. Definitely recommend!

What can I say, simply the best Airbnb experience anyone could hope for. Elizabeth was an amazing, kind and generous host. The house is very well located, yet in a quiet setting. I would highly recommend this as a short or long term stay to anyone.
A lovely historic home with beautiful landscaping! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. And dining options were a short walk away.

Elizabeth's place is an amazing historical house with a warm and loving ambiance. The room was cozy and breakfast was delicious! Downtown Salem is a short drive away. We will definitely stay here next time, and so should you!

What a way to end our vacation with a one night stay at Elizabeth’s! We were delighted at everything that was stated and pictured but it was MUCH better than the photos. From the get go- Elizabeth was a  11/10 with communication, attention to detail, comfy bed, cleanliness, hot tub, snacks! And the animals- Mr. Rabbit , hens, duck and cats in a beautiful yard to match the storybook house! Thank you Elizabeth for sharing your home and hospitality! You are one of the best!

Elizabeth’s home is a delightful and unexpected treasure!!

What a surprise to enter a charming piece of history... I cannot say enough great things about this home and what Elizabeth and her daughter Melissa have created here! I will definitely come back!

What a lovely home and an even lovelier family!  It was so nice being able to use different rooms throughout the house and the gardens are beautiful.  It could be a little tricky getting suitcases up the stairs,  but I noticed they have a rental on the first floor, too.  We felt very welcomed and appreciated the amount of detail the hosts take to make their guests feel comfortable.  Elizabeth’s house is beautiful!
Convenient, affordable, and responsive hosts. Hope to stay there again. Thank you!

This is my favorite! I finally got to use the outside space and the pool. Your room has a split unit in it and it keeps it cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Every time I go they have added something new. They are constantly working on the property. I am definitely a repeat customer! Will be back at Christmas time.

Elizabeth’s house is a gem with great personal communication and pleasant accommodations with A/C, amenities like coffee,  fruit and muffins and references for activities such as hiking, restaurants and markets. We highly recommend it and will be back.

I really enjoyed my stay here! Elizabeth has such a marvelous home and offers so many amenities (pool included)! She had everything we could possibly need and then some! The room was very clean and the bed was so comfortable!!! She was a very kind and welcoming host. I would DEFINITELY recommend staying here if you get the chance!

This house is lovely and the host is incredible. They provided amenities that were so thoughtful we didn't realize they were things we could want! We won't hesitate to book with them again if we ever come back to the west coast

Elizabeth was so nice and helpful during my visit.  I knew all the food places close by because of the manual in my room.  This was most definitely my favorite Airbnb so far she even washed and folded a small load of my laundry.  So nice of her.
Elizabeth’s place was perfect for my brief stop in Salem! Comfy bed in a super cool historic home, would definitely stay again!
Beautiful house, wonderful host. Booked one night, but i would definitely stay longer next time!
highly recommend
One of my top choices! A wondrous place with an incredibly hospitable host.

We stayed for two nights in the Peacock Room at the magnificent Vista Manor -- wow, what a stunning old home and property.  It was our first visit to Salem and we could not have found a better host and accommodation.  Elizabeth is very pleasant and warm and welcoming.  From the outset, she was happy to accommodate us.  Our room was very comfortable, beautifully appointed, quiet and pleasantly cool thanks to the air conditioning.  The living room and study are spacious and beautiful too.  We had access to her private backyard and refreshing inground pool.  It turned our visit into a wonderful summer stay.  We only wished that we could have stayed longer!  We highly recommend the Vista Manor...

This is an amazing place!  Very large beautiful home in a residential neighborhood, but just a block or two from Commercial Street and it’s a short convenient drive to downtown.  Plenty of off-street parking, too.  I was lucky enough to stay in the Peacock Room and it was amazing—complete attention to detail, decor, and great amenities.  Air conditioning, too.  Quiet neighborhood—I slept like a rock.  Highly recommend!

Have stayed with Elizabeth several times now. First time in the Peacock room! Small but fully stocked room just like the others. Private bathroom, comfy bed, WiFi works! I love staying at Vista Manor!

Easily the best Airbnb stay I have ever experienced! Elizabeth was a very welcoming host, check-in was very straightforward, and even though other guests stay in the manor in other rooms, I never felt like my privacy was intruded on. If I am ever in the Salem area again, I am definitely staying at Vista Manor!
Classic home with an amazing yard to relax in. Lots of attention from the pets. The chickens like to be pet and the cats and dog love to be loved!

Elizabeth's place worked out so well for our family. Clean, comfortable, the snacks provided morning and evening were great, the grounds were lovely and provided a nice spot to relax. It was just what we needed.

I loved staying at Elizabeth's place! I was only there briefly for one night, but it was a really cute and clean place with a lot of thoughtful touches. the air conditioner above the bed was awesome, the snacks, and the emergency toiletries were really nice touches. the bed was incredibly soft and the theme of the room was fun. everything seemed very, very clean. I was very comfortable. when I ran into an issue with the wifi, Elizabeth quickly responded and helped me out. the home itself is beautiful in a quiet location. I'd recommend this stay!

This is an amazing historical house that is beautifully furnished and taken care of, and the outside grounds are also beautiful.  The room was decorated with period pieces, but also has a highly functional bathroom, with reproduction fixtures.  Even though the room was fairly small, it was well appointed  with amenities, using the space very efficiently.  Next time we will have more than 1 night!
Great place to stay. A/C works great. She was so nice and had some snacks for me. The room was clean and has everything you need for a hood stay.
You would love how authentic this place is

This is one of my favorite Airbnb stays. Everything was so professional with snacks, and the fridge and microwave in the room is  next level stuff!! She had shampoo conditioner and soap in the dispenser in the shower, it was very cool. The house was quiet and available to anyone who has a room, and so is the pool and hot tub. What a lovely experience and what a great peacock room theme!!!

I have stayed at Elizabeth home several times now. One of my best Airbnb in the valley. Okay; it depends on what you are looking for. The home is clean; the host is great in communicating and assisting if you need help. You are close to convenient stores too. The bed is for sure comfortable and the room is private. I plan to stay at Elizabeth home on my next trip to the Valley.
We love this place! My daughter and I have stayed here a couple times now. It’s clean, well stocked, comfortable bed, AC, and thoughtful amenities if needed. We’ll be back!

FANTASTIC! A gorgeous home, beautifully furnished with every amenity I could ask for. We wished we were staying longer just to enjoy such a cozy place. Clean and well cared for with the comfiest bed I've slept on in weeks. STAY HERE.
Great stay in an old style mansion!

There's painted parking spots, which was really nice to see when the parking area is big. Upon unlocking the door, I was greeted and shown to my room. There was an explanation of where water and treats were, etc. and it was just such a nice, warm welcome into the home. I stayed in the Peacock room and it was really cute!
It was the perfect place .. will definitely come for a longer period

One of the best AirBnb's I have stayed at. Elizabeth is a professional host. Everything you could possibly want or need is available. Perfect if you are on the road for a while. I appreciated the guide book.  The hot tub was excellent. This was a true bed and breakfast experience, unlike what other AirBnb's offer.

Look no further, this is one of the best places to stay in Salem! We enjoyed a walk to a nearby park and a restaurant. We brought back takeout for dinner because the outdoor patio was such a nice setting, complete with friendly cats, bunny, and chicken. We slept well in our quiet room and super cushy bed.
Elizabeth is very responsive and flexible. Lots of little extras. We enjoyed our stay and loved the pool.

I’ve stayed at Elizabeth’s place quite a few times now in the last couple of years, and every time it’s been a perfect experience! It’s my home away from home when visiting my daughter who attends Willamette University,  and I would never stay anywhere else!

Great home; clean room and very convenient to those travelers on business trips or vacationing. I have stayed in Elizabeth’s house several times and I plan to stay there again in future when I travel to Salem. The bed is comfortable and the host is great; can’t ask for better.
Great location, and great vibe! Elizabeth was also very communicative!

By far the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in. They should all be as great as this! The house is just drop dead gorgeous and the peacock bedroom is so fun,  cozy, and efficiently stocked with everything you could need. The bed was also extremely comfortable. I unfortunately didn’t actually get to meet Elizabeth but she was very communicative and kind. I will definitely be staying here again if I visit Salem again.

House built in the 30s with all the 30s charm. Very very well-maintained. Pool and hot tub was a great bonus. Don’t think that you can find another Airbnb that could match this one. We had a great time we will definitely come back if we get this way again.  The hosts attention to detail in anticipating any needs was superb..  There were four rooms on the upper floor being rented out. All were occupied when we stayed but we barely heard anyone. Everyone seem to be very courteous. We had room number one and it had its own bathroom, all rooms have themes to them. Room number one was peacocks. Which is really cute the way she had it decorated. She provided homemade zucchini bread and we had items in the room to have breakfast as well as water, snacks and coffee,
Second stay here and great again!

It doesn’t get any better.  Elizabeth’s hospitality and attention to detail is second to none.  A very private and secluded home very close to Salem downtown, she has created a cozy resort vibe in a historical home.
A real gem, quiet, beautiful home and grounds.   Very accommodating host, highly recommended
Five star host and accommodations

This is a beautiful house with artistic touches everywhere, and lots of extras provided like coffee (and cream!) and spare toiletries. The garden is also very visually peaceful including free-ranging hens and two cats. I would happily stay here again. The location is super convenient to Salem businesses.
Perfect private room and bathroom for a night stay. The room was clean and comfortable!
Great place , very friendly host and the bed was super comfortable!
A lovely and comfortable gem. Conveniently located in a quiet neighborhood. Elizabeth is an attentive, yet discreet presence.
Nice place, clean and host communicates well.

Beautiful 1930’s home in a nice location in south Salem. The decor matches the character of the home. I stayed in the Peacock room and it was lovely. Elizabeth was very accommodating and kind. She provides guests with everything you could possibly need. I look forward to saying again soon.

Elizabeth's place is absolutely wonderful! Her themed bedrooms are just lovely with personal touches and decore.
Private bathrooms, microwave, fridge, including water and snacks is a bonus! Very clean and communication was great! I highly Recommend staying at Elizabeth's. The price per night is very reasonable!
Great location, a lot of extra touches, homemade bread, fruit, yogurt. Great recommendations on restaurants. Loved the hot tub. Our stay was perfect!

Elizabeth offers three private, spacious rooms upstairs, each with its own bathroom, plus a stand-alone cottage to those of us needing a beautiful, comfortable, and safe place to land for a spell.  The amenities and extra little details included make for a very pleasant stay.  Elizabeth goes out of her way to see to all these details, and she's a warm and personable host.
Very welcoming

Impressively restored house and grounds, in a more or less central location. I was out most of the time but enjoyed starting the day with the fruit and yogurt Elizabeth provides. The notebook with suggested restaurants & hikes and the history of the house was a nice touch.

Elizabeth was so helpful and responsive. Check-in and out were seamless. It is a gorgeous house that is stocked with everything one might need - water bottles, snacks, fresh fruit, and baked goods in the morning. I will definitely be back next time I am staying in the area!

The peacock room was wonderful. The home is beautiful and close to restaurants and various points of interest.
The room was tastefully decorated, extremely clean and comfortable.
Great stay!!

easy check-in with clear communication.  I felt safe as a solo traveler and appreciated the little snacks and waters in the bedroom.  Location is right by grocery store, gas station, Starbucks, and plenty of other quick dining options.
Comfortable and homey

She provided such beautiful relaxing rooms and environment. I did not even use the pool, hot tub or gardens, but enjoyed the many thoughtful details she included in the room. Matching dishes, extra toiletries if you forgot some, snacks and sweetly had a little zuccini bread for each of her guests.
An excellent home and value.
A very cozy home-like feeling; so many snacks and thoughtful travel items are available, you will feel well-taken care of!

One of my best Airnb homes in the Valley. I couldn’t ask for better. The rooms are clean, the location is great if you are visiting Salem. Awesome communication from the host.
I have stayed at this Airbnb home several times and I plan to stay there in future if the rooms are available.
Great host; beautiful home and perfect location. Stayed in this home several times and I love it. Rooms are clean and well kept, awesome communication from from the host; couldn’t ask for better…

Driving from San Francisco to Portland caused us to get quite tired and we had to make a quick AIRBNB stop. Luckily, Elizabeth’s upstairs room (Peacock Room) was available and it fit us perfectly. Elizabeth has quite the setup in such a lovely area. The room has everything a roving couple needs: tv to catchup, SNACKS, fridge so our fruit and snacks don’t go bad, comfy bed with clean sheets and multiple pillows (I myself can’t sleep without two and so many AIRBNBs only ever come with two!), and a bathroom with endless travel necessities (lots of shampoo, conditioner, soap, toothpaste, and lotions).

Highly recommend!
Great home; great location and awesome host. You can’t ask for better. Definitely staying there on my next trip

I was greeted warmly by Elizabeth and really enjoyed the communication, convenience, comfort and cleanliness of the peacock themed room I stayed in.  I also enjoyed hanging out on the spacious back yard before I checked out.
