Snacks on the dresser and drinks downstairs :) also the most comfortable bed I’ve slept in
This place has vintage charm with all the comfort. Communication was excellent and I felt right at home.
It’s great! Would love to stay again.
Great host
The coziest little AirBnb in a convenient location. Very clean and well stocked, the host, Elizabeth, was the most accommodating. Thank you for everything.

This was a great place to stay in Salem. Elizabeth's attention to detail was amazing - from plenty of towels (and robes!) in the bathroom to snacks both in the room and down the hall, she sees that her guests have access to many things they might need during their stay. It was also a very central location, which we appreciated.
Cute room and kind host. Very clean too.
My Salem favorite!
Wonderful comfort, value and charm.
Value, charm, location and great hosting bring me back to this Airbbnb.

Lovely place to stay, really well positioned to be close to anything you want to do while in Salem. We loved the room we were in, the bed was comfy and the bathroom was clean, everything was as its advertised or better! Elizabeth was really helpful, we texted her to just let her know we had arrived and she was eager and willing to help us with anything we needed.

Wonderful all around- except for one thing. It is close quarters and as it’s an old house, noise really travels. So not the quietest stay. BUT Elizabeth is a pro host! Amazing amenities, great location, cozy decor, good value.
Great place!
Excellent stay once again. Vista Manor cannot be beat for amenities available and the graciousness of the hostess!

my stay with elizabeth was wonderful, she was courteous and a delightful host the entire time.  great communication and very understanding about us arriving late.  the decor is gorgeous and bright and the entire  home clean and wonderfully kept.  highly would recommend staying with her!
Great value,  location,  and hosting!

If you need a place to stay in South Salem, look no further! Vista Manor is a charming old home that has retained the unique aspects of original construction that immediately made me fall in love with the place.
The location is also ideal - very close to shopping and dining options, yet far enough off the main road that you feel you’re in an quiet country manor.
Apart from the charm, I think what impressed me most was the host’s attentive service at all levels to make one’s stay as comfortable as possible. Anything you might need for your stay has been considered. I truly felt at home during my time there, and if I’m in the area again I will definitely stay at Vista Manor.
Always a treat to stay in an historic mansion.  Close to everything and a story to boot.  Elizabeth was turning the sitting area into a Christmas wonderland on this stay.  Such a relaxing stay again.
Great place

The home is lovely and tucked away from the rest of the city, a perfect spot to relax. It feels very safe and welcoming. Elizabeth has thought of everything a guest might need, the rooms have plates, cutlery, snacks, a TV and toiletries. Really enjoyed my stay and would recommend to anyone planning a trip to Salem.
Extremely accommodating and cozy stay. Better than a hotel.
Great place!
Always a great place to stay when visiting grandkids in Salem

The best air bnb in Salem easily with the chillest host. Your simple stay there will probably not be your last I cant imagine living in that house. The house was very nice and well equipped with nice Christmas decor. Merry Christmas! It was a truly blessed visit on my part and I had a great time. 10/10
,My favorite Salem stay!
Absolutely loved our stay at Elizabeth’s Tutor house. We had everything we could need and more.
Great accommodations and friendly host!
Great host

Elizabeth’s place is beautiful! Everything was very clean, and decorated so cute for Christmas. This was also the best stocked Airbnb I’ve EVER stayed at, and Elizabeth has gone above and beyond to make sure you have what you need. The bed was super comfortable, and each room has its own key so you don’t have to worry about leaving your valuables. The surrounding area was quite and safe as well. I would definitely stay here again.
this is truly a home away from home. I stay here a couple days a week for work. after a long day, I look forward to being here where it's quiet and private.
It was a great stay for my wife and I. Everything in the room was very well thought out and everything was provided. Definitely recommend

From pre-visit communication to departure, my stay at Vista was much more than I anticipated. Elizabeth has obviously given a lot of thought to the needs of a guest. She's a very pleasant, attentive, and forthcoming host. The room itself is nicely decorated with bright colors, and the shiny turquoise ceramic tile on the attached bathroom floor is gorgeous. Plenty of snacks, yogurt and coffee in the room, with details on how to find more of everything on the landing. It was a relaxing and quiet mini-vacation, and Elizabeth made it so.
Elizabeth is a very thoughtful host and this BnB has everything you could need! Enjoyed my stay and highly recommend to other travelers.
Elizabeth’s place is the best place to stay in Salem at any price point. She is a fabulous host and her place is always warm, cozy and inviting. Can’t wait to be back soon.

Great location!  Near town, but still very quiet.  Missed the driveway first time around.  Forgot to pay attention to the picture she posted of the entrance!  Beautiful building!  Clean rooms that are all different and have a theme!  We were in the Peacock Room!  It's small, definitely for 1-2 people and not too much luggage.  Lots of hooks for hanging coats, towels, purses, etc. The living room made me think of going to visit my grandma!  Great place to stay and we would return!
Super clean and great host!
Wonderful place, so many nice touches, aesthetics wonderful, snacks and personal touches in room like cut fresh flowers, awesome! Very cute, our peacock room and I love peacocks!

Elizabeth's place is inviting, cosy and clean. Although you are sharing a house it feels very private. There were snacks, fruit, water and hot drinks available. Other thoughtful touches included a guide with places to visit, local restaurants, spare toiletries and more.
Excellent communication from Elizabeth (helpful pics of her driveway marker!) and was quick to respond to any queries.
Always a wonderful stay at Elizabeth’s. She is an exceptional host and consistently goes above and beyond.
Elizabeth is truly a great host… Clean room, comfortable bed, fresh fruit, and delightful little homemade snacks…

It was perfect for two people to spend the night in. It has a private bathroom inside the bedroom. Besides, the bedroom has all the essentials like a microwave, TV, utensils, and some complimentary snacks and water. It feels private even with another traveler in the house.
Beautiful spot! The room was lovely and the host was very responsive and provided very nice treats! Would stay again!
Elisabeth was great at communicating with us for check in and if we had any questions.
Great location! Super cute!
Great place with easy check in

Elizabeth and her daughter were fabulous hosts. Fresh bread and other treats were provided upon arrival. The room was stocked with everything we needed. Their response time was excellent and they were super accommodating to our needs. The bed was a bit too soft for us but other than that we were very comfortable.
What a lovely place it is! The beautiful decor of the room, thoughtful amenities and excellent communication, every aspect of our visit was perfect. We hope to go back to stay there again.
We had an amazing stay here! The house was absolutely gorgeous, the room lovely and had everything we needed with little extras everywhere. I would highly recommend this to anyone!

The garden in itself was beautiful
the on suite bathroom was a plus, and the room had everything, plus.
more for a stay
Fun having a peacock themed room and loved the corresponding colors in the room!
Enjoyed our stay ! It was clean and quiet. We had a restful night staying at Elizabeth’s place!
Great stay, location, well-stocked with everything you need for an enjoyable time. Her home is beautiful! We will be happy to stay again if the need arises.
Charming, historic house. It is nicely furnished. We appreciated the fresh fruit, baked goods, and the ability to adjust our room's temperature individually. We would certainly stay here again!
Always great place, some homemade treats and quiet.
Again, and as always, Elizabeth and her team provided a quiet, peaceful, nurturing landing place.  An excellent Airbnb host
Such a lovely place to stay! Felt very safe, beautiful surroundings, well kept grounds :)

The peacock room was charming and full of wonderful little surprises. Elizabeth is so thoughtful in all the details of the room plus the bed is super comfy. I stayed for a quick overnight while I traveled north and will definitely keep this on my list for future trips.

This is our third time to stay at Visra Manor. Obviously there is a good reason for that. Cleanliness, prices, hospitality, value, decor, and extras make this a BNB we will come back to often. Elizabeth is just lovely as a hostess and her helper Sylvia is the best. It is an older home with all the personality that comes with that. The rooms are beautifully appointed, cozy, clean, and comfy.
Just 30 minutes from the annual tulip festival and all that Oregon's wine country has to offer, you owe it to yourself to stay here. We'll be back next year for some R&R!

My daughter and I enjoyed our stay in Salem at Elizabeth's place. The room was perfect for two people. The bed was very comfortable and everything was sparkling clean. I will definitely stay there again when I visit my daughter at Willamette University.

A unique and fun experience. There are steep stairs going up to the rooms. Not a complaint but just something to be aware of. The room has adjustable heat and was comfy for my grandma who gets cold easily. The bed was comfy for us and the decor is fun and tasteful.

What a wonderful, inviting and very clean place Elizabeth has to offer a traveler! hands down she has the best guest book I have ever seen in over 35 Airbnb's I've stayed in. The bed was perfectly comfortable as well as heating and air cooling options that were whisper-quiet. All the accoutrements to offer including breakfast options as well as coffee and tea, cold water and necessary shower items. I would most certainly return for the above reasons; as well as to go into the backyard and hop in the pool!

We spent a night in Elizabeth's wonderful house. Elizabeth was a super host, our room was beautifully decorated and clean, the bed was perfectly comfortable. I hope we can visit the area again in the future, if so we will only stay here. Highly recommended.

This was my first time using an AirBNB and Elizabeth set a very high bar!  She was very responsive when I had questions about the check-in, etc.  There were lots of extras that I wouldn't expect to find in a hotel room it was like sleeping at home.  I met an older couple who were also guests and they were very nice folks (there were 3 rooms for guests).  I will definitely be looking her up again next time I'm in town!  Thank you for the great stay, Elizabeth!
Amazing

This was our first experience staying at an airbnb . Not know quite what to expect, we were pleased to find this to be ideal in every way. Elizabeth is truly a Super Host and we hope to return to Vista House in the future.

Neal & Audrey Thompson
Ashland, Oregon

Elizabeth was quick to respond. The room was lovely and had anything one would need. I happened to visit when the tulips were spectacular, and I suspect other flowers will adorn the property at other times. Stay here! You'll enjoy it.
Awesome
I stay here weekly and really appreciate the comfort, ease, and privacy.
Very cute and clean room in a beautiful house! Elizabeth provided everything you could need, and even put out little fresh baked goods and fresh fruit. 🥹

very good stay, great value, convenient location, very clean, and lots of convenient extra in the room.  i didn’t read carefully to see it was a multi-unit setup in a beautiful house.  so the only note is there is some mild noise from other guests - not a problem, just a note.
Everything I needed and more for a wonderful weeknight stay. The manor is beautiful and I will likely stay here again!
coffee, private bathroom, snacks.
Elizabeth's house is gorgeous. Don't be fooled by the low price, everything is top notch – beds, AC, towels, snacks, water – and it's in a perfect location.
Absolutely perfect place. The location was great (near to many vineyards and downtown). The host was extremely accommodating and friendly, and the house was simply beautiful. Loved it.

I stayed in the Peacock Room. As with all the rooms, it was delightfully decorated. The attention to detail and to the needs and wants of guests was superb! It was an outstanding value and I hope to have a chance to stay there again. Host Elizabeth does a fantastic job!

Great location close to many restaurants and good places to eat.
Amazing amount of amenities.
Her beautiful house has ample parking and was able to park my car up the drive in front of her house.
Elizabeth is an amazing host and will get you anything that you may need.
My room was very clean, quiet, and I enjoyed the Peacock room with its own bathroom and shower.
There is a reason that Elizabeth is a super host. I would highly recommend, and am looking forward to staying here in the future.
Room was clean, bed comfortable, very well stocked with all you might need for your trip. Lovely house, good location, walking distance to restaurants, stores, bus stop. Enjoyed my stay!

This is a great place to stay! We've stayed there several times and we've never had any issues. The rooms are all lovely and Elizabeth has thought of every detail. The house is amazing and the yards are really nice!  If you're looking for a friendly, clean and convenient place to stay, look no further.
Always a great place to stay! Clean, comfy, and super cozy…Elizabeth is a wonderful host who communicates well with her guests. My very first choice when I stay in Salem!
Very comfortable stay. Felt like being at a classic bed and breakfast. Great amenities and nice touches

Une maison chaleureuse, pleine de charme, de verdure, de fleurs, au calme
Une hôtesse prévenante, aux petits soins, disponible, et qui comble ses invités de délicieux muffins pour le petit déjeuner
Nous avons même pris un apéritif autour d’un verre de délicieux vin de la Willamette valley
Un véritable Airbnb dans l’esprit d’origine
A recommander absolument
Great stay as usual.

I can’t think of a more gracious and attentive host as Elizabeth. The entire process from arrival to departure was flawless.
Thank you Elizabeth, looking forward to my next stay!
We had a great stay in the Peacock room! Elizabeth provided everything a guest could possibly need. She was also very welcoming to our dog, Roscoe.
Wonderful stay in a beautiful house. Elizabeth was very friendly and welcoming
Great experience, will definitely stay again if in Salem! The place was clean, cozy, and a perfect spot to relax.
nice place
This was my second stay at Elizabeth’s place. I simply can’t believe the great value she offers. She truly cares  that her customers’ wants are met. I look forward to my next stay.
great
A beautiful and quiet location.
nice and cool in the summer, but still cozy

What a great house! Beautifully preserved place, the upstairs is split into a few airbnbs each with its own en-suite bath and snacks, and very detailed folder of info about the neighborhood. There was even a framed article on the stairs about the history of the house, fascinating!
Elizabeth's home is lovely and very comfortable. So many interesting and beautiful spots to enjoy. I love the neighborhood as well. Love SE Salem.

Staying at Elizabeth's place was absolutely wonderful. Our experience went above what was included in the Airbnb listing. A supply of snacks (chips, crackers, instant oatmeal, fruit, etc.) and baked goods was constantly stocked and available to us. The downstairs area was spacious with multiple sitting areas and a dining space. We also had access to the backyard which included a pool and spa, more sitting areas, and a garden with chickens.
One of the best places to stay in Salem...top notch service, incredible stay
What a cool place to stay. Bed and Breakfast style very comfortable and cozy. Elizabeth will take care of anything that is needed. Highly recommend.
Our second time to stay overnight again. It just like home to us . Cozy and clean . And Elizabeth is super nice 👍  highly recommend her place to stay .

What a great stay. It was private yet open and welcoming. Very comfortable. Elizabeth is very friendly and kind. She was very concerned that I have pet allergies, but I had no problems at all, the place was very clean! She provides excellent directions and answered all my messages within minutes! Walking distance to food and coffee and more! I hope to return!

We had a fantastic time! It was our first time in Portland and we absolutely enjoyed this hidden gem. You won’t don’t anything else this great for the cost! We highly recommend and hope to go back again.

Staying in this beautiful house, and the Peacock Room, in particular was a treat. It’s comfy, has everything I needed and AC for a warm night. I definitely want to come back when im next in salem. Thank you Elizabeth!

What a sweet place to stay! I needed a quiet place with great energy, conveniently located for food and this place had it all. Thank you for the beautiful thought put into the comfortable stay of your guests!
I only stayed for one night but everything was wonderful! Comfortable room in a beautiful house
Elizabeth was proactive in her communication and made sure our entry into the property would be convenient. We really enjoyed our stay!
Wonderful stay! Close to shopping and food. Host was extremely gracious and quick to communicate and respond to any and all questions. Can’t wait to come back.
Very comfortable and convenient place to stay when working in Salem.
Good decent place.
close to many things in salem
cool and quiet, close to quick bites.

Gracious hostess.  We had the misfortune of arriving the day after "the worst guest [she's] ever had."  The repair and remedies she had to apply to the damages incurred in the adjoining room were disruptive but unavoidable.  Though it did negatively impact our stay, our hostess was very kind and considerate and did the best she could for us under some pretty daunting circumstances.  The driveway is quite narrow and the parking confusing but she was right there to guide us.
A clean and beautiful room, comfortable bed and easy access to it. Lots of info provided and it was a great one night stay.
such a quiet place to come after work.
Great experience staying at Elizabeth's! Very clean, easy to check in, very kind.
Lovely old home.
Great stay as usual.
coffee, snack, and comfort
Lovely historic home with attention to landscaping and wildlife.  Several main areas are open to guests.  Very comfortable and tastefully appointed!
I loved our stay at this house. Will definitely stay there again.

Elizabeth is more than just a super host, I can't say enough about how warm she is and her passion for making every guest stay the best possible.  When I am in Salem this is always my number one choice!
I love staying here. it's comfortable and welcoming.
always welcoming

This was my third stay at Elizabeth's beautiful B and B in Salem. I cannot say enough good things about this home! It is beautiful, so comfortable in all ways, and truly the best value on AirBNB. I am an AirBnB host my self, and I have become a better host because of staying with Elizabeth! She has been a role model for me.

Please come and enjoy Elizabeth's generous hospitality! I highly recommend it.

Elizabeth is so sweet. Her property is beautiful and she has these great parking spots and just pays attention to every detail. If you forget some shampoo or toothpaste or a toothbrush don’t worry she has it. The room was beautiful we stayed in the Peacock room. It was so nice to have our own bathroom right there. She even checked on us since there have been some fires in the area to make sure that we didn’t need anything and that our wedding was not canceled that we were attending. Thank you Elizabeth you are amazing!!

the peacock room and elephant room are perfect for a quiet night.

AWESOME!
This is a great place to get a good nights sleep. Peaceful and very quiet. The host is attentive, on premises and caters to all ones needs. She clearly is a super host. I will definitely stay again.

The room was very comfortable and delivered what was promised. There were plenty of extras in the form of comestibles and snacks and even lite breakfast items. If in Salem again in the future we would stay there in a heartbeat. Elizabeth was a wonderful ambassador and host.

This is a wonderful, elegant vintage home in an excellent location close to town! Elizabeth has thought of everything to provide for an enjoyable stay. We celebrated a milestone birthday and our stay was absolutely perfect! Thanks again!
cozy and comfortable

Peacock room this time. I’ve also stayed in other rooms at this lovely home. Private, quiet, comfortable & good communication!
This is top pick for weekend activities in Salem
We stayed by every time we came to Salem . Always feel Cozy and it just like home .

very responsive to questions, check in was easy - I especially liked that she sent a picture of the driveway so it was easy to spot. The room was quiet and comfortable, the ensuite bathroom and room were well stocked.

Perfect central location in a historic home that has so much charm. Each room is different. The amenities are many and the special touches that Elizabeth has added makes it wonderful. This was my second time there and can’t wait until I can stay again

Charming, cozy and enchanted. Awesome common area with a full dining room, vintage furniture, a fireplace and great decor. Close to town, with great Thai food just a few blocks away. Highly recommended, hoping to stay here again!
cozy and safe, and little touches in case you forget something or need a snack.
wonderful place

Comfortable and very clean room. Elizabeth supplies every amenity found at hotels and a great array of snacks, fresh fruit.....small fridge in room in case you bring your own. Loved the Keurig coffee maker just like at home!
Very comfortable stay.
lovely stay when I work in Salem.
The stay was very pleasant and the goodies were much appreciated. I would definitely stay again.

always great here

We love staying at Elizabeth’s. She is the most accommodating host who goes above and beyond to make your stay an exceptional one.
Elizabeth always welcomes us and makes us feel at home 💝
I appreciate the coffee and little mini moos of half and half in my room.
I love the little touches, coffee and snacks, microwave and mini fridge.
Elizabeth was friendly and welcoming. This was my second time staying at one of her places…both quiet, comfortable, and clean stays. :)
Have stayed here several times.  Elizabeth is great at communication and the rooms are all excellent.  Great value too.

This room is exactly what it promises to be and more! Elizabeth could not be a more kind and helpful hostess; she even added an extra light to the parking to help me in the dark and waited up until I got there! Amazing💜
such a quiet place with amenities to support privacy

Highly recommended! Very clean and comfy. The area is great, there's many places around within walking distance, grocery store, plenty restaurants, etc.

The place is very unique, huge property but still makes you feel at home.

I would definitely stay here again, Elizabeth is a great host!
warm, friendly, cozy
great place to stay, very homey and private

Elizabeth was so helpful! I had a work meeting from the room and she helped me make sure the wifi was accesible and had contractors leave early so there wasn't sound issues. So many little bells and whistles. Was recommended thos place by a friend and will recommend it again myself.

Such a cute place to stay in! Loved the Tudor style home and the charm of this place! Elizabeth also had a lot of extra amenities like personal hygiene essentials to little snacks and water in the room! Definitely recommend staying here!
highly recommended

Elizabeth is very sweet, communicative and has created a unique cozy space to accommodate visitors! I thought the room was welcoming and vibrant. It is a very charming space. I love the detail in this historic old house that is in good condition. Very comfortable stay, I slept great!
quiet, peaceful place to stay
Always quiet cozy and comfortable
quiet and peaceful.
Comfortable stay, felt right at home.

We have stayed with Elizabeth so many times over the last 6 years. She is the most accommodating and welcoming host. Every room is cozy and has everything you need. The house has so much history and the grounds are fun to explore. It is the only place we stay in Salem.
Elizabeth and her daughter were wonderful hosts. Her communication was excellent and we would definitely stay there again.

Fantasy place to stay. Elizabeth was very helpful with anything I needed. My room (#1 Peacock room) was comfortable and cozy. The bed was comfy, the linens extra soft and it’s the little touches that she leaves such as fruit, snacks, water, coffee, toiletries etc that you don’t normally find in an Airbnb. I’d love to stay during the warmer months and enjoy the outside spaces she has on the property. It’s very walkable to several restaurants and a grocery store. I would absolutely stay here again!
This is my second visit with Elizabeth. Its a great place to stay. Reallt welcoming and everything on hand. Elizabeth is a generous host which i appreciate.

I have stayed at Elizabeth's manor home in Salem, Oregon several times and it never ceases to be anything less than top quality. It's homey. elegant and safe. There are many little touches that make it an enjoyable experience. Elizabeth is welcoming, attentive to details and communicative in a friendly way no matter the hour.
Everything is more expensive these days, however, I love the manner house and vibe is good….

The location is centrally located to downtown, making it easy to get anywhere. I was so surprised to find such a large lot in the city. It felt like being in the country. The home is an old craftsman that has retained all of it's charm. Elizabeth was there to greet me and make sure I was settled in. The room was very spacious and the bed comfortable. There is an outdoor swimming pool that I hope to use during summer months when I need to be in Salem. I will return!
Elizabeth was very gracious and helpful, even placing balloons in driveway to assist il me in easily locating the house.

The grounds are lovely although I wasn't able to see them much except from out huge comfortable private room with in suite bath with a claw foot bathtub. Elizabeth is wonderful and also provides a nice hot breakfast. We would definitely stay again.
Man. This place was awesome. Huge Victorian style home, 1 acre of manicured zen, and Elizabeth is an incredible host.

I have stayed at Elizabeth's multiple times while traveling for business. Both of the rooms she has available to rent are beautiful, unique and well-equipped. She has thought of all the details to provide for a very comfortable experience. This has worked great for me for business, but also would be perfect for a romantic get-away. The larger of the rooms she rents even includes a fireplace in the bedroom and a clawfoot tub in the bath.
Elizabeth's home is beautiful and unique. She is a friendly and interesting hostess. Truly a must-see destination.

Best host ever! I did not get into town till around midnight for a spur of the moment business trip. She was very thorough, sent me txt pictures of where to find the key for such a late arrival, sent me all of the wifi information, left the lights on so that everything was easy to find, and the room was fantastic! I had my labradoodles with me and they were very comfortable, room and house was immaculate, all the little necessities you could imagine. Very well organized. A+++
I enjoyed a lovely and relaxing stay. This is truly a beautiful and unique home.
Beautiful spacious room in a park-like setting, in town. Welcoming host and friendly atmosphere.
This place was very cozy. Will stay again.

What a beautiful home! Elizabeth was SO accommodating of our last minute reservation and was very communicative about our check in even though we missed meeting up in person. The room was absolutely lovely and spacious, with a fireplace and a luxurious bed. She even went so far as to stock the mini fridge with breakfast options, and the bathroom was really well stocked as well! She really thought of everything! We definitely plan to stay here again next time we are in Salem. It was so close to everything but still felt secluded and safe. Highly recommended and a great deal!
Beautiful older home, with nice room to rent.
Elizabeth's was incredibly kind and her home is beautiful. She has thought of everything for the people who stay with her.

We enjoyed our stay here while visiting our daughter at Willamette U. We were concerned at first that it may be a little far from campus, but we found it very convenient -- only about a 7-minute drive from our daughter's dorm. In addition, I was pleased to see that we could walk to a few restaurants, a grocery, and even a medical clinic within just a couple of minutes, and Trader Joe's is only a mile down the road.

The room and bathroom were very spacious and comfortable, and the bed was wonderful. In the bathroom, Elizabeth had provided everything we needed as far as amenities, toiletries, and plenty of clean towels and washcloths. The hot water in the shower was a little tricky to adjust for the first few minutes, but it turned out to be fine. We enjoyed the huge closet with plenty of space to hang our clothes. In addition, the room felt very private, with trees right outside the windows. It was a very cozy space on the rainy days and nights, and on our last day, the sun came out and provided a beautiful view.
Nice home in a private setting. The bed was like sleeping on a cloud, loved it!! Room and bathroom were clean, breakfast options were nice. Spacious space, would stay again!

My 3-day stay in Elizabeth's home was wonderful. The room was spacious, the bed super comfy. To my surprise it included a private bath with a vintage clawfoot bathtub, a small fridge, and microwave. Elizabeh was a terrific host, very responsive and attentive  on arrival details, and generous in in offering information about the area. I would definitely stay again.
Beautiful, comfortable house with a great host.  Good location and reasonably priced.

Elizabeth's home is large and lovely. It's located in a quiet Salem neighborhood. The bed in our room can be best described as "cloud-like," and is one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in. Elizabeth's home is located in close proximity to downtown if you're looking to visit the Capitol, and she is a great communicator as well.

Elizabeth has a tastefully decorated English Tudor manor filled with antiques. She is a wonderful hostess with the perfect balance of helpfulness and privacy. We enjoyed the trip a great deal and plan to return.
Elizabeth is a wonderful host. Her home if very nice and comfortable, and she provided some terrific amenities. I look forward to staying here again.

OMG, staying here was wonderful!!  Better than any 5 star hotel I've ever stayed at for a fraction of the cost.  I enjoyed it so much that I'm going to be looking for an excuse to visit Salem again just so I can stay there again.  Can't remember ever sleeping so good.  The bed was luxurious.
Loved the room! Elizabeth was super sweet! Didn't want to leave! We'd stay there again for sure 💟
We loved this place so much we booked an extra night. We drove out to Silver Falls State Park and hike the falls which is something not to miss.
Elizabeth AirB&B is amazing. She puts a lot of effort into making your room and stay extra special.

I've stayed in Airbnb's all over the world and Elizabeth's place has to be one of my all time favorites.  The manor is beautiful, the room fantastic (my room had a fireplace with a morning view of the mountain), a separate private bath with claw tub, and a kitchenette stocked with snacks and breakfast food that was just what I needed when I arrived.  Her place is like a beautiful zen garden nestled in the middle of the city (a very rare find). Elizabeth is very kind, very thoughtful and a great communicator.  She took time out of a very busy day to make sure I knew how to find her place.  When I arrived she and her family made me feel very much at home.

Elizabeth's place is a wonderful stop for a great rest. And she pays great attention to detail, very welcoming, and make sure that you're well taken care of when you arrive. She's very friendly and has a great sense of humor. Her house is a classic for sure, from the 1920s, but kept up beautifully. There are many mature plants and trees around the grounds, and the atmosphere she has created is warm and festive. Highly recommended.

Elizabeth's home is gorgeous!  Our room was huge, with a fireplace and big, beautiful bathroom.  We didn't want to leave after just one night!  Elizabeth provides more than the average airbnb.  We had coffee, water, snacks, fruit, yogurt, and even an in-room fridge and microwave.  She also provided a log so that we could enjoy the fireplace.  An in-room TV was another added bonus.  We will be recommending this site to friends who are going to be in the area, and would stay again in a heartbeat.  We had a top-notch experience.
What a spectacular location, home, and host!
Great spacious house, friendly dog, and accomodating host
Great place, super roomy and clean. Elizabeth took care of me on short notice and her home and hospitality are top notch!!

We loved it!  The room was huge and beautiful - king bed (so comfy), fireplace, big bathroom, great view of the gardens around the house - front, back and side too.  The whole house was really a special place and close to town, but completely quiet.  We'd stay again in a heartbeat if we come back to Salem.
Another great stay at Elizabeth's. The larger room is beautiful, spacious, and extremely comfortable. I love staying here.
A most interesting experience
Elizabeth's place is my favorite place to stay when I travel to Salem for business. Either room has everything I need, and is extremely comfortable. She is a welcoming and communicative host.
Seriously lovely home, most gracious owner/hostess,  perfect location for us - definitely will return

In my decades of very frequent personal and business travel, domestically and internationally, with accommodations in everything from tiny backpacking tents to luxury resorts, Elizabeth's house stands out as one of the best values and most private and comfortable stays that I have experienced!

The house is a recently-restored historical property set back from the street and hidden from view from all directions by its lush grounds that ensure quiet and privacy. My room was enormous. The closet was large enough to serve as a bedroom. The entrance so large, it contained the breakfast and snack items (i.e., refrigerator, coffee maker, hot water heater, fruit, oatmeal, yoghurt, etc.)

I was traveling on business. A well-lit built-in desk facilitated work. Another table was available for meals. The bed was very comfortable. I think it had a memory foam mattress cover.

The grounds are being rescued from decades of neglect, but already attractive and interesting. They include a swimming pool, greenhouse, chickens, and a duck. There are several affectionate cats in the house. I found these animals amusing and delightful. Once the landscaping is completed, this property will be even better than I've described.

I feel it was a near miracle that a vacancy was available when I needed it. My only regret was that I had to leave.

Very quaint and comfortable room in a very large house/estate.  Host Elizabeth was very helpful and informative. Perfect location. Bed was comfortable too.  Cloe the dog . . .nice little greeter.  Shower pressure was weak. We'd stay again!
Very comfortable and cozy. Would definitely stay there again!
Always like staying here. Great host. Great house.
Vista Manor is a wonderful place to stay...clean, comfortable, roomy and beautiful surroundings.  Lots of nice touches!
Elizabeth's place was beautiful and clean. We had a lovely stay and couldn't have asked for a better host for our month in Oregon.
Loved watching the chicken, ducks and turtles!! A truly vintage home in a lovely setting.

Elizabeth has a spacious, comfortable home that is very well supplied with anything a traveler might need. GREAT location for a Willamette Valley drive or sipping tour, or a hike in Silver Falls State Park, both of which are close-by. Communication was excellent and responses prompt. Room was large and very clean. Bananas, apples, coffee maker in room. Bed was extremely comfortable.
The arrangements, stay, and departure were all very easy. Great place!
Great great great

This house is absolutely perfect for anything looking to feel like they got away while still staying close to everything you need in Salem. The home is beautiful and the room comes stocked with everything you need! It is spacious and would be great for a long term stay. The yard is a wonderful sight and all the animals give it the perfect "home" feeling. I look forward to returning!

Elizabeth was very accommodating. She helped me to get situated with a last minute, late night booking. The room was very clean and spacious, and it even came stocked with coffee, yogurt, oatmeal and fresh fruit! Overall a very peaceful stay, and I would highly recommend it.
Charming home and very friendly host! Thanks for an enjoyable stay!
Adorable space tucked away with everything you might need! Bed is cozy, amazing view, and such a delightful stay!
Elizabeth has done wonders in restoring this grand old home.  My stay was most enjoyable.  Its location makes getting to all points in Salem and the surrounding communities quick and easy.

Very nice room and very helpfull
Guest.
Il soggiorno da Elisabeth è stato molto piacevole e rilassante. La camera è veramente grande e
ben arredata. Mio marito ed io abbiamo trascorso due giorni immersi nella natura e nella tranquillità. Molto disponibile la nostra host e molto simpatico il micio Newton che al mattino è venuto a darci il buongiorno .
Luogo consigliatissimo ....

Awesome home and full of character. Wonderful master sweet. Elizabeth is making the most of this property and you will enjoy the lovely  manor feel to this stay. Great value for the price and much comfort. A grand stay.
If I could give this place 10 stars I would, amazing home and wonderful host

Our stay with Elizabeth was wonderful! Thanks so much Elizabeth! Debbie and I had a great time and enjoyed staying at your very comfortable home so much! The eclipse was all we had hoped for and then some! Our stay with you was so nice. Very comfortable and enjoyable.Thank you so much for your wonderful hospitality! :) We hope to see you again...
Lovely space. Large room with private bath. Would stay here again in a minute!

This is a great value and was a very, very nice room! We really appreciated the fruit, yogurt and coffee in the morning too. This room has a private bathroom with a clawfoot tub/shower combo. Lovely property and cute cats outside. This is a historic home so bring earplugs as there are other folks in the house as well. We were awakened and kept awake by a man intermittently shouting between 1 and 2am. This was rough given we were getting up early the next day. The host was very kind and allowed us a late check-out so we got to nap before leaving after our early morning adventure. Would recommend to other travelers.

Great old home very close to Commercial St. The room had everything you could need including a mini refrigerator with fruit, yogurt, oatmeal packets, coffee and tea. Elisabeth was great host. This was our first airbnb experience and I much preferred it to the hotel we usually use. We'll be back next visit to Salem.

Elizabeth's home is incredibly beautiful with a lovely master suite. We felt welcome and well cared for, check in was seamless, the hot tub was wonderful after a day of travel. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone looking for a unique and personal place to stay!

Elizabeth's place was perfect! Easily one of the best Airbnbs I've stayed at. Her home is incredibly charming, and you could really sense the level of care and detail she put in to making the experience comfortable, from the quality of the bedding, to the mini kitchen stocked with water, snacks, and coffee/tea located in the bedroom hallway. The room did get a little stuffy being it was a top floor unit on a weekend of 100 degree weather when we stayed, but that was minor. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Salem!
Elizabeth and her family were extremely nice.
A great place to stay when visiting Salem.  Well located to be close to everything, yet hidden away as a quiet retreat.
Wonderful home, very quant. Very kind and made sure I felt right at home. I have two dogs traveling with me and she was very warm and welcoming on having them in her home.
Elizabeth is a great hostess!

Worth every cent. This home is cozy and Elizabeth works very hard to make the home yours. It is a rather large home - but has a personal feel.  The property is on an acre in the city -  but is blessed with chickens, ducks, turtles, awesome sitting nooks and beautiful landscaping... Although the residence is near all modern amenities, it is so very quiet. No security issues at all. We felt safe, welcomed and treated like family. We travel to Salem often and will stay again.

Lovely 1920’s era home with very personable host (Elizabeth). Some genteel repair work being done while we were there.  Not a walking neighborhood but only a 10-minute drive to downtown. We had a nice, large room with refrigerator, microwave, TV, king-size bed with generous comforters and numerous pillows. Private bathroom with some remodeling being completed.

Elizabeth's has been the BEST AirBnb experience ever!! The house is beautiful with lush garden all around, really pretty! And it's located in such a nice neighborhood. I spent a week here without a car and was able to walk to everything- nice restaurants, groceries, shopping. While at the same time, it's secluded well enough up a small hill, so plenty of privacy and no noise from roads.  The room itself is large, with beautiful view, large closet space, comfy bed, nice private bathroom, comes with a mini fridges, coffee maker, kettle, and so many more. Elizabeth is a wonderful human being, she takes such special care of her guests. She made me feel welcome form the get go, and even offered to pick me up from train station and helped me get acquainted with the place. I wont stay anywhere else when in Salem!
We loved Elizabeth's place. It was huge and so unique! We could have stayed in that big comfy bed all day. Can't wait to come back in two weeks and try out the hot tub.

Elizabeth is a gracious host and her place is outstanding in every way. The large room is beautiful and includes every amenity--2 comfortable chairs by the fireplace, private bath, desk, table and chairs, refrigerator, microwave, coffee pot, coffee, tea, snacks, comfy bed. You will love Elizabeth's place!

It is a lovely home and the room was large, with a lovely private full bath and a mini "kitchen." Elizabeth was a fabulous host and went out of her way to serve us. The location was very convenient for our trip to  Willamette Univ.  We would highly recommend a stay there
A beautiful room in a beautiful house.  Quiet, comfortable.  A spacious suite.  Walking distance to several restaurants and a great little park.  A perfect AirBnB experience.  Thanks Elizabeth!
Elizabeth is a thoughtful and attentive host; the home is quaint, quiet, with a manor house feeling--yet in a very convenient location.  Great stay--thanks so much!
Elizabeth provided a spacious and charming suite for our mother-daughter getaway!
Elizabeth’s place is absolutely charming. She is a great host, with a wonderful place, very peaceful, extremely well stocked, and a great value! Highly recommended!

We loved staying at Elizabeth's place. She greeted us when we arrived and showed us around her beautiful home. We loved the wonderful large bedroom and king size bed. This room has a private large bathroom too. There is a fireplace and sitting area, along with an area for a small refrigerator, coffee pot, and microwave. Elizabeth had fruit and other snacks waiting for us in the room. I loved that there was cold water and yogurt in the refrigerator. Elizabeth checked in with us every day to make sure we had everything we needed.

I stayed in the largest room this time.  A spectacular suite with kitchen and dining area; charming bathroom with enormous pedestal sink, claw foot tub and stained glass window; sunrise view over westward hills; fireplace with side chairs; very comfortable King bed.   Just a quick overnight at work, but this felt like a get-away.
Elizabeth's home is very welcoming and lovely!  The room was beautiful and very comfortable.  She is a wonderful hostess and we look forward to returning.

Elizabeth's place is amazingly comfortable and full of amenities. We come to Salem often and will always stay here if it is available. The only problem is we have a really hard time getting out of that incredible king size bed. It is too cozy!!! We also love that our little dog is welcome.
Great stay! Couldn't ask for a better Airbnb experience.

Vista Manor and Elizabeth are a treasure to be sure! This was our second getaway at this Airbnb. We will keep coming back. Elizabeth is so warm and welcoming and her house is beautiful and yet comfortable. We couldn’t ask for more. From the sweet touches (flowers) to the thoughtful amenities, she’s thought of it all. You won’t be sorry.
Such a beautiful house, large and comfortable bedroom/bathoom, and pleasant host.

What a dream stay! My first airbnb experience and it was fabulous! I thought the photos were too good to be true (especially for the price), but it was everything and more! The location is wonderful...right off a main street where there were restaurants, grocery store, etc, and Elizabeth had some great tips on local places. I was in room 4 and it was so spacious and had everything you'd ever need with large, comfy bed, small fridge, microwave, food, all amenities! The clawfoot tub was marvelous to soak in and the fireplace with a starter log was perfect!  There is even a pool and hot tub during the summer! Less expensive than any local hotel, and soooo much better!  I would highly recommend this!
Another great stay.
This was the latest of several times staying at Elizabeth’s place.  It’s a great location for us and we see upgrades she is making with each new stay.  A great value in Salem.
Conveniently located and a delightful room. The added amenities such as toiletries, fruit, coffee, water, cereal, etc., were greatly appreciated. The holiday decorations were also delightful.

Thank you so much for the stay. It gave us a great break off the road, and let us recharge and prepare for our holiday trip.

The bed was incredible. Wish we had more time there to make use of the fireplace & the bathtub. The closet was about as big as our first apartment, and had better views than it. Everything we've ever dared dream to have in a master suite.

And the local donut shop we found down the street was tasty. Ideal way to start back on the road.

Once again, thank you!
Great Stay and location. Elizabeth is great host too. Amenities were more than expected or desired in an AirBnb stay.
Gorgeous place. Great location. Great host.
Warm, beautiful room in a beautiful older home, lots of character, private space.  Great trees on the lot and home is convenient to downtown Salem.

This place is even better than the listing can convey. It is perfectly located: in a quiet and pretty residential neighborhood, but literally a block and a half from a street with lots of restaurants and things to do. It is perfectly located and beautiful inside and out. I would offer to buy this house, if I moved to Salem.

Elizabeth is an excellent host. She wants to be helpful, though I rarely need any help. She gave me a good restaurant tip last visit. She also has everything you need and more at your fingertips. A little basket of items in case you forgot to pack something. Every detail is thought through. Everything about the stay is perfectly convenient. This is my preferred place to stay when I go to Salem.
Kind, caring and any need fulfilled for our room.  We were a bit cold, coming from southern California.  She immediately gave us a space heater which saved us for the following nights before bed.

The manor is lovely, and we'll stay again on our next visit to the Salem area. The room was elegant, and offered every amenity. The king bed was super cozy, and I slept like a baby. Elizabeth and her dog Chloe are a delight as hostesses.
Staying at Vista Manor is like staying in an English country manor.  The location is wonderful (very easy access to downtown Salem) and the home is lovely.  We enjoyed every minute of our stay.
As always, a great place to stay when I am in Salem. Clean, pretty, quiet, full of nice touches with everything I might need, including breakfast foods and fruit.
I stay with Elizabeth when traveling for work and it is always comfortable and cozy.  She is a great host!!
I hate to check “much better than expected” because I expected it to be wonderful and it was – Elizabeth goes above and beyond every time, and we always feel welcomed.
Very comfy ensuite room with nice amenities.  Quiet and quaint.   Nice place to stay and close to downtown.
What a great place to stay while in Salem.  It has a great location and Elizabeth is a wonderful and accommodating host.
Amazing space with a wonderful host.

The home is in forest and ten minutes from downtown. The home is centrally located for my business trip.

The large room is upstairs. There are four bedrooms upstairs. There maybe other guests during your stay.

Elizabeth provides breakfast items, fruit, oatmeal. I liked that room had microwave, refrigerator, and coffee maker.



The hot water ran out during my shower.

What a magical weekend! Our family rented rooms with Elizabeth to be together for our daughter's graduation from Willamette. Elizabeth worked so hard on our behalf - fresh flowers everywhere; chairs circled about in her glorious back patio so we could gather there with family and enjoy one another; generous fruit bowls and breakfast items in each room; and ample off-street parking. We all loved the elegant living room with antique furniture and wood fire to gather before in the evening. Staying at Vista Manor felt like visiting family and we are forever grateful to Elizabeth for hosting our family gathering.
Amazing place. Very tasteful.
Very comfortable bed, bath tub was wonderful, old world classy feeling, Very relaxing quiet and comfortable.
Elizabeth goes the extra mile with everything you may need/forgot. She had fresh fruit and bottled water in the room. The home is old but very charming and her beds are soooooo comfy!!

This was one of the best Airbnb we’ve ever been! The location is beautiful, surrounded by nature but literally 4 min walk from restaurants and shops. It’s also 10 min drive from a bunch of wineries! The room we stayed in was huge, the bed was very comfy and the private bathroom was big and clean as well. It was like a little apartment. Elizabeth is a fantastic host! She made us delicious empanadas and she gave us a lift to one of the winery and showed us around. Fantastic experience and highly recommended!!
Beautiful home, a gracious host, and amazing amenities to boot. Would book again with Elizabeth in a heartbeat. Can’t recommend enough!

Wonderful BnB with nice breakfast and extra special touches.   Wish we weren’t so tired we missed the hot tub, added from last time we were here.  Lots of food choices nearby as well.   Elizabeth is very helpful with anything you might need-like freezer space !!
Completely tasteful and period-appropriate decoration for her house. The pictures belie the beauty within!
Great accommodations and location. Highly recommended!

Wonderful wonderful Airbnb.. huge spacious room with so many special thoughts. This place is a super host Airbnb but goes beyond it. We did not meet the host but her son was there to greet us and did everything to welcome us. Very nice young adult. Elizabeth also had wine to welcome guests, we never saw that before and best thing ever to have a wine after a long drive. This Airbnb also has a hot tub and a pool and such a beautiful garden area to hang out. We were hoping to extend our stay but sadly it was already booked.
Elizabeth is extremely prompt to respond, within minutes. Communication was excellent

We definitely will return to this Airbnb..one of the best place we have been
Enjoyed our stay and appreciated all the extras.

A terrific value!  Room 4 is spacious and dripping with country charm. The windows and cool Oregon breezes will feed your soul.  Host was out of town but communicated with us continuously as needed.  Comfy bed. Great rest!
Don’t even bother looking elsewhere, you won’t find a better place to stay.

I stayed at Elizabeth's place while I was in town for an event.  I never met the host, but I left early and returned mid-evening, so wasn't there much.  The room was comfortable and it was nice to have the ensuite bathroom.  The pool was not available for use and looked like it had been in disrepair for some time.
This is a charming bit of old England in the middle of Salem OR. It's a great location and a good value.  We will be back.

Elizabeth made sure that we had everything that we needed including setting up another room for us when we had extra family come into Salem.  Room #2 was made available with our reservation of #4 and though a bit smaller it had every amenity that we needed. Elizabeth was a very accommodating and gracious host and if ever we are in Salem again; my wife and I will very gladly book here again. If you need something that is not visible like an ironing board for example; ask Elizabeth and she will make sure to make it available if she can. For being only a block from a busy street, the house and yard were very quiet due to the abundance of trees. We always had shade and the hot tub was very nice late in the evening. What a great stay! Thanks Elizabeth for all you did for us and made possible!

What a charming home...So much nicer than the photos.  Elizabeth is the perfect host and makes me want to stay there longer...Down to earth and comfortable are the words I use to describe this host and her home.

This was the most awesome stay on airbnb I have ever experienced. Elizabeth is such a thoughtful, positive, kind, and generous host! Our stay by far exceeded our expectations!
Thank you for truly providing a home away from home!
We will be back for sure!

Vista Manor is a magical place. Elizabeth provides all of the extra touches. Any items you may have forgotten to pack are available. The bed was comfortable and waking up to the sunrise was magical. There are a number of restaurants within walking distance. If I ever need to stay in Salem again I will choose Vista Manor!

What an AMAZING place!!! We have stayed at many Airbnb’s in our travels and this place was easily one of my FAVORITES! Sorry for the caps I just loved her place so much! So many thoughtful touches, gorgeous property, she was a wonderful host and stayed up when we arrived later than expected! She was a dream and we had the best stay and had such a hard time leaving! We will come back again to stay at Elizabeth’s place if we are ever in the area again!

5 out of 5 stars! If I could give more I would! :)
A beautiful, spacious room with so many lovely touches! Elizabeth was a perfect hostess making sure our stay was the best possible. Would definitely stay here again!
Had a great time here! Elizabeth is incredibly hospitable and will go the extra mile to make sure your stay is comfortable
Elizabeth’s thoughtfulness for the requirements of incoming guests is exemplary! The property is beautiful and well maintained. We loved our stay here!
Hostess thought of everything and was very helpful, lovely house and room :)
Large beautiful house in a quiet neighborhood. Couldn't ask for a nicer place!

A place not to be missed if you're in Salem OR. It's beautiful, secluded, welcoming, and has both a pool (for the heat) and hot tub (for the cold). The house is gorgeous, with many spaces to relax and have space to yourself both indoors & out. Wonderful owner and host, Elizabeth. You couldn't ask for more! Enjoy!

This was our first air bnb experience and I’m afraid Elizabeth has spoiled us! Her thoughtfulness and kindness has surpassed every expectation. The room was spotless, bed SO comfortable, and room filled with so many amenities! She is so considerate and has anticipated any neeed a travellor might have. Room is spacious, with table and chairs. Bathroom is large and filled with extra towels as well as more items a traveler might need. Her home is large, comfy and accessible. My favorite area is her beautiful yard with lush vegetation and comfy lounging chairs. She kept the jacuzzi hot for us and the pool clean with fresh towels. She keeps ducks and chickens and made us a fresh egg breakfast a few times. She also baked fresh muffins on occasion and provided daily water and fresh fruit. I wish I could give 10 stars! She truly is a super Hostess and a wonderful lady.

Look no further for an amazing place to stay in Salem!!! The BEAT hospitality we'veexperienced, comfy bed, great space, and perfectlocation in Salem. Found a new home for when we come to visit. Oh... and the shower was to DIE for ;-)

Elizabeths places is a jewl! The place was one of the best 3 I ever stayed on Airbnb, and she was a great, thoughtful and helpful host. I wouldnt hesitate to recommend her or stay with her again.  Thank you Elizabeth!
Elizabeth has A+++ communication and was very accommodating! Her place was wonderful with a great pool area. Thank you for helping make my trip easy and enjoyable.

Vista Manor is a wonderful airbnb: mansion sized on a couple of acres, beautifully landscaped with garden patio, a pool and hot tub, guest house, eclectic collection of vehicles, a beautiful Lacy Wyandotte chicken, ducks, a large and nicely marked Rex rabbit, a Siamese cat, a dog, huge rooms (ours had a fireplace, built-in desk and breakfast nook,) but what makes this property a standout is something intangible: a generosity of spirit. In the hall there are muffins and fruit, a dozen bottles of water, the top drawer of the cabinet held a large collection of toiletries, tissues, soaps and the basket in my bathroom held almost as many items including new tooth brushes, a family-sized toothpaste, floss, a sewing kit, eyeglass repair kit and on the shelf above the sink 2 sturdy water glasses. The bathroom also had a claw foot tub-shower with old-fashioned copper hardware! The windows have no motel/hotel curtains or drapes. To me, this suggests Elizabeth possesses a generosity of spirit and a trusting soul; qualities too often absent generally in our fast-paced and sometimes cynical society.

A true 5-star experience like you would find in an actual 5-star hotel. Communication is detailed and host was easy to reach. She went a lot of extra miles to ensure I was able to find her place and that I am properly checked in. The welcome was very warm.
The room is vastly spacious with an equally massive list of what she provides. I'm talking everything from snacks to microwave to sew kits. There is truly an impressive number of things Elizabeth provides you.
In short, if you choose to book, you will get a room as big as a living room, hospitality as warm as home, and a list of ammenities that rivals a 5-star hotel.

Great suite with private bath, in room microwave, coffee maker, refrigerator and snacks.

Although I did not have time to enjoy the garden and pool it looked to be great place to relax
Loved staying in this Airbnb!  Beautiful, comfortable, and easy to get in and out.  Lots of special details!!  Coffee, tea, fresh fruit, and homemade bread!!!  Loved it!!
We loved our stay!  We come to Salem about once a year and will definitely try to stay there again!
Clean and fun

Loved staying at Elizabeth's place.  She is incredibly friendly and hospitable. The room is clean and spacious with plenty of room for the 2 of us and our dog. Loved the homemade treats, fruit bowl, and assorted breakfast fare  as well as having the mini-fridge, microwave, and Keurig in the room.  We loved strolling around the huge property and the neighborhood. The location is very convenient to downtown.
Elizabeth's was quiet, comfortable and close to everything.  The king size bed was like sleeping in butter.

My wife and I have stayed at five Airbnb's in the Salem area and Elizabeth's place is by far the best.  Beginning with the lovely home and Elizabeth's warm and fun personality, then continuing with the large guest room with a very comfortable and spacious bed plus a walk-in closet with a view and the private bath, as well as the homemade pumpkin bread and nice extras (fresh fruit, snack bars, oatmeal, popcorn, etc.  The entire experience was wonderful.  And for smokers (I enjoy a nice cigar each evening), Elizabeth graciously allowed me use of the patio and garden area for this pleasure.  The cats were an added bonus, as well as the very calm golden retriever, Chloe.  We highly recommend this extra-special place for visitors to Salem!
Always a great stay - our base for being with the grandkids - Elizabeth makes it so easy with her thoughtful touches.

I always love coming back to Elizabeth’s.  Staying in the lovely room with the king bed is a real treat – there’s almost room to hold a dance inside and the bathroom is large enough for four people to be getting ready at the same time!  Pumpkin bread in the morning and I feel well taken care of!

Wonderful place to stay. Beautiful home with clean room and bathroom. Elizabeth is very helpful if you have questions. All the extras (muffins, bottled water, etc) were nice extras. Would definitely stay again.

Elizabeth's home is lovely, with very comfortable beds that invite you to linger, drinking the excellent coffee, eating the wonderful homemade pumpkin bread, much longer than the day's agenda really allows!  She is a wonderful hostess, checking in about timing, special needs--I am always happy to stay with Elizabeth.
Wonderful stay- with great breakfast and super comfy bed!

Elizabeth's place was the first time I stayed inside an AirBnB residence, so I wasn't sure what to expect as far as privacy, etc.  Her place went beyond my expectations- it was an absolutely lovely and comfortable space, and she provided every amenity you could possibly need and more.  Everything from location, communication, parking, access to restaurants and shopping was top notch.  I hope to stay here again when I am in the area again.

Elizabeth’s Place home away for home for us. Our daughters go to college in Salem so we book Elizabeth’s Place whenever it is available. The bed is so comfortable that I had the hardest time getting out of it to leave today!!

Great house, very nicely and cohesively decorated as well as preserved. Great room! It was a large room with plenty of space for our things and was an incredibly comfy long bed!
Quiet neighborhood, and great communication from host.
Would stay again!
We just stayed for a night and wished it were longer. The house is charming and spacious. Elizabeth is a thoughtful, gracious host.

Elizabeth's place was great!  The room was beautiful and spacious and quiet.  The banana walnut bread was lovely in the morning and Elizabeth was so warm and nice to connect with.  We had a great stay. I highly recommend her beautiful home.
Elizabeth was awesome!! So kind, provided a lovely, comfortable, perfectly appointed space, along with superlative communication... and she even threw my laundry in the dryer for me too! :-)
Elizabeth’s place is a lovely home that was conveniently located!
expect a wonderful experience and great hospitality. A very unique and interesting house and property

This place is lovely, clean, and relatively spacious. It has an extremely comfortable bed with multiple pillows. The windows are nice, the bathtub is great, and the tea/coffee and breakfast options are good and convenient. Also, Elizabeth is quite pleasant and helpful and the various animals that can be sighted sometimes are cute :) Especially the huge gray and white bunny :)

Elizabeth's home is the nicest place we have ever stayed in all our travels.  The home is very large and beautifully decorated. The bedroom we stayed in was spacious with a sitting area in front of the fireplace, beautiful woodwork and windows with a view out to the grounds.  (The property used to be a nursery, so there are many species of trees and plants in the landscape.)   The bed was so comfortable that we checked out what kind of mattress so we could get one for our home.  The large private bathroom had a claw-foot tub and shower, and there is a huge walk-in closet. There were fresh baked muffins and fruit every day.  Our host was just the right blend of professional and friendly.  We felt right at home from the beginning. There were so many special touches throughout our stay.  I will be staying there from now on when we visit Salem!
We stayed in a comfortable suite with a very comfortable king bed. There were many thoughtful extras such as bottled water and homemade bread.

I stayed here for several weeks when I first moved to Salem and it was a nice welcome to the area. Elizabeth is a great host who goes out of her way to make sure that guests are comfortable and have everything they might need on hand. Rooms for this Airbnb are in a beautiful old house located within walking distance to several restaurants and a grocery store. The room was very clean and was stocked with plenty of towels, as well as pretty much every amenity you may have forgotten or would need. The bed was very comfortable and the room was quiet, so sleeping peacefully was no problem. Because my stay was in the winter, I could not really enjoy the back garden, but it seemed like it would be a great place to lounge around and relax in when it was not so cold and rainy.

If you are needing a beautiful and comfortable place to relax, this is it!  We stayed in the upstairs suite for 2 nights as we attended a professional conference in Dallas, OR, 20 min away.  Suite included large bathroom with claw foot bath and shower. The king bed was sooooooo comfortable.  2 armchairs, a small table and chairs, dresser, desk, fireplace, and large walk in closet.  There was fresh fruit, baked goods daily, yogurt, oatmeal,  teas and coffee available for a quick breakfast.  Wine downstairs.  And a very nice hot tub that was wonderful at night.  Beautiful grounds.  Surrounded by trees.  Walkable to restaurants.  Outstanding hospitality and care given by Elizabeth.  Would highly recommend.  P.S.  There is a smaller queen size bedroom with a private bath on the same floor, also available on her site.  FYI: You must be able to climb a flight of stairs.
Beautiful room with everything anyone could possibly need!
Fabulous home, hospitality, and service! We look forward to our next trip just to stay here! Elizabeth is amazing and very thoughtful!

Elizabeth is a phenomenal host, and the room was amazing! From a coffee maker, to a robe for the hot tub, to a sewing kit, no detail or potential need was overlooked. The location is great--groceries, restaurants, and cafes are all in walking distance. The property is gorgeous, and the outside kitties were very sweet and friendly. She was able to accommodate a later check-in for me, which I really appreciated.

This home is beautiful! It is placed just off the beaten path where the traffic is quite but you are still just minutes from all the action. The roundabout drive way made parking simple and could easily accommodate a truck and trailer. Elizabeth graciously greeted us apon our arrival. The keypad entry was a great addition especially because I may have forgotten  my keys in the room once. Inside the house is very clean and well decorated. There is lots of space for guests to sit and enjoy the space. There is even an office on the first floor for you late night workers who wish to not disturb your partner. We stayed in the master bedroom which is just up the staircase. The stairs are wide making baggage hauling easy. As you reach the top of the  stairs there is a table filled with fruit and fresh baked goods around the clock. My Six Year Old Son definitely had more than his share and I may have as well. The master room is just to the right and it is huge! It has a dead bolt so you can secure your room. As you walk in you have your own fully stocked kitchenette, two chair seating by the fireplace which can be used. Loved that. A super soft king size bed, large tv and a table and chairs placed by two gorgeous window over looking the back yard. The bathroom like the rest of the room was well lit and very clean. Elizabeth really went the extra mile to try and provide everything you may have forgot in your travel. But for me the best part was the closet it was huge and my son was so excited about it that he made it his room complete with a mattress covered cot provided by the host. Over all we were very comfortable here so much so that my son tried refusing to leave. Elizabeth was an amazing host and has successfully in my option created a great BnB. Thank you for opening your home for us to enjoy. We will be back!

The room at Elizabeth’s house was delightful! We had everything we needed along with many thoughtful touches including homemade banana bread. The room overlooked the garden and had a view of the city lights. The bed was very comfortable. The room itself was large and roomy. We could also have made a fire in the fireplace if we wished. Elizabeth was easy to communicate with and was also very helpful. You’ll love staying at her place in Salem!
Great spot, great host, I would definitely recommend!
Elizabeth is an amazing host! She thinks of everything and my room was beautiful, clean, comfortable. My stay was luxurious and rejuvenating! I highly recommend this spot!
Such a fabulous house and such a nice lady! We loved it!

A beautiful, warm and welcoming home with a wonderful host. Full of thoughtful touches that made me SO comfortable, from quilts to small fridge, microwave, dishes, tasty treats... I almost hate to say how lovely it is, because I want to keep it as my little secret get away!
Elizabeth is an outstanding host.  Communication was excellent, and how many places have fruit and fresh banana bread outside your room?  Her house is magnificent, and full of historic charm.
Elizabeth’s home is sparkling clean with more than enough space to accommodate you and your party. She was very hospitable and made everything very easy. Will definitely book again!!

This beautiful Tudor home is an oasis right next to city amenities. There are plenty of restaurants nearby and a really nice grocery. The interior of the home has many original fixtures and the decor is fancilly tasteful, without being at all pretentious. Very comfortable!
The kingsize bed was like sleeping on a giant cloud. And I took a couple of nice long baths in the clawfoot tub. This room was my kind of lodgings.
Elizabeth the host is so friendly and great to talk with. And her menagerie of cute critters were fun to watch and hang out with. (Look for a very handsome rabbit!)
When I find myself in Salem again, I do hope their might be a vacancy at this lovely estate. Fingers crossed!

Both my wife and I enjoyed a very pleasant and relaxing stay at Elizabeth's home. Even though you are in the city of Salem you almost  feel like you are out in the country! We were quite surprised and happy to find that our roomy second floor bedroom & bath had many amenities and personal touches that we didn't expect! We found Elizabeth's hospitality to be  exquisitely delightful! (:
Beautiful old home with a lovely yard being restored to its former glory. Quiet, peaceful, welcoming... a true home away from home.
Beautiful homey place to rest and unwind. Restaurants near by. Quiet and cozy . Highly recommend.
Great value for the money, beautiful space. Only ding on the experience was a probably uncommon party at the house that was loud and boxed our car in
This was a spacious accommodation in a unique, lovely home.  We hope it is available the next time we visit Salem.  The coffee, fruit and muffins were a treat.
房东热情善良，好客大方，服务周到，细致，体贴。环境清静优雅，地理位置优越。是我此次旅行中性价比最优的民俗旅店。向我所有的亲友们大力推荐！
A nice home away from home.  Elizabeth and her son are most accommodating.  Thank  you.

Treat yourself to a stay in this beautiful, nostalgic suite. The bed was comfy, amenities are amazing, and you'll get to understand what is so special about claw foot tubs!
We are hosts ourselves who strive for perfection for guests. Elizabeth is just as amazing as her room! Her place would rival 5 star hotels. Look no further and book this amazing Air Bnb!

Beautiful classic home with lovey gardens and very Elizabeth was a great host and our room was spectacular.  So loved the claw foot tub and working space in room.   Was extremely clean with fresh flowers and extra amenities.  We will always come back here every time we come to visit relatives in Salem!!!  LOVED IT!!
Our visit went beyond our expectations and needs. The room was splendid and very comfortable with many unexpected touches. We will try and stay with Elizabeth again if we are back in Salem.

Above and beyond in a wonderful upstairs, king bed room with tons of space and storage.  A clubfoot tub to relax in or shower in luxury.  Extras galore, Keurig coffee pot with coffee pods, tea pods, tea bags, bathroom amenities are abundant in case you forgot anything.  Elizabeth is available and helpful.  Wonderful stay.

If you're ever in Salem stay at Vista Manor. You won't be disappointed. Elizabeth is an exceptional host and her home is absolutely beautiful. If we're ever in the area again, we'll definitely stay there...
A slice of heaven in a secret hamlet in south Salem!

Elizabeth is an amazing hostess and we never even got to meet in person; she routinely checked to make sure we did not need anything and the room offered all the travel amenities one could possibly need. The bed was amazing and the room charming. We could not recommend this airb&b more!! If we ever come back to Salem, we will check Elizabeth's lodging first.
Great, spacious room with good light and a dreamy claw foot tub. Elizabeth is a friendly and warm host who has a marvelous property that was perfect for my needs. 10/10 would stay here again!

Super nice and convenient place to stay. It was quiet and calm and clean the self check in isn’t exactly self check in. She’ll meet with you first and give you a tour and then from there on out it’s as you please which is nice and convenient. Overall great stay.
Elizabeth is a super host! She made sure we are comfortable during our stay!

Such a lovely place so close to lots to do in Salem area. We chose Elizabeth's establishment based on the photos or her historic home and what amenities she offered. The photos and description did not disappoint!
A lovely tudor style home built in the 1920's on over an acre of well landscaped grounds. The interior is tastefully decorated: we chose the king suite and it was spacious, airy with all of the toiletries you would need or want in the ensuite bath with a gorgeous claw foot tub! In addition there was a beautiful wood burning fireplace in the bedroom.
Elizabeth had fresh flowers on the breakfast table waiting for us when we arrived. We even had a small kitchenette stocked with fresh muffins, fruit, cereal and yogurt. In addition, there was a keurig maker with assorted coffee and teas with cream and sugar.
China and silverware along with wine glasses and corkscrew were also provided.
She does have pets on premise to which I was a little nervous about as I am allergic. Not to worry! She keeps a spotless home and doesn't allow her furry kids in the guest rooms.
I didn't sneeze once!
She was delightful to chat and message with. I had questions about proximity to Waterfront Park where we were attending a concert to which she replied quickly with directions and also suggested a few tasty dinner and breakfast restaurants to enjoy during our stay.
I forgot to mention she also has an inground pool and hot tub that we just didn't have time to enjoy, next time we will stay longer!
Elizabeth was a gracious host with a lovely home. It is very reasonably priced for such a wonderful place with so much to offer.
Easy location to find, close to restaurants and gas stations (but you don't feel like you're in a city!). Very lovely location.

Vista Manor is amazing. Elizabeth is so sweet. The room is amazing. This is my second time staying here and we were in the blue room with the king bed and claw bathtub. There were blueberry muffins handmade by Elizabeth! The amenities are amazing and far above and beyond any hotel. The puppy I got to pet was so sweet! The backyard is beautiful. Honestly, the house is so beautiful that my husband and I enjoyed an evening in just hanging out in our room and relaxing. I will attempt to book one of her rooms each time I stay in Salem.

This is a gem airbnb! A beautiful old Manor that one would not expect behind beautiful trees and gardens not visible from the street. Elizabeth treats her guests like family members. The rooms are very clean, there are fresh flowers in the room, she offers a welcome beverage and coffee, tea, fruit and fresh baked muffins in the morning. The Manor is also the home of dogs, cats, rabbits, and chickens in the beautiful backyard. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

A spotlessly clean and beautifully (period appropriate) decorated experience in the Tutor house where you can read all about the history on the wall in the hallway (nicely researched!).
We arrived about ~ 1 hr later than expected, but she had fresh blueberry muffins, fresh fruit, and cold water there waiting for us. The king sized bed room was very spacious with a fireplace, fresh flowers on both the work desk area as well as the dining table across the room, and helpful pamphlets of attractions in the area. The space in the room was easily double the size I was expecting with a fireplace and huge walking area as well as a large bathroom and area when you first walk in (where you find the fridge and tea/coffee and cereals). Downstairs was a gorgeous living and dining area and library/study that overlooked the backyard garden where little tables to sit out and chat were placed. My only regret is not getting there in time to check out the pool or hot tub!
