I think this is the best B&B I've stayed in so far (and I've used B&B in Alaska, Scotland, USA, Australia, and Canada over the years, so quite a few places). Guaranteed if you stay here you will not regret your stay!

Elizabeth’s house is beautifully appointed and very clean. She is l wonderful host. I loved the grounds that had lovely flowers, baby ducks and chickens! The handpicked fresh  flowers that were placed our big beautiful room was a thoughtful gesture. I would stay with her again in a heartbeat.
The room was reasonably priced, comfortable, and in a great location. Also loved the hot tub and pool.
Great place to stay and a great host to work with.
Great room, wonderful host - perfect for what we were looking for. Thanks so much!
Lovely home, the suite was perfect for the 2 of us and very convenient.  The hostess made us feel right at home.  We loved the landscaping & Vista views.  Absolutely would stay here again!
This was my introduction to Airbnb and thanks to Elizabeth and the great accomodations at Vista Manor I'm hooked. Very clean and great amenities.

Loved Elizabeth’s place! A character estate with characters (ie: chickens, ducks, dogs and cats - of course not in the Airbnb areas). Suite was very large and comfy.  Elizabeth probably provided as many extra things should you need them (ie: toothpaste, bandaids, sewing kit, etc) as any place we have been.  So thoughtful.  Bed was great and the little mini fridge, microwave and Keurig was great.  Would stay again.
Great communication, very comfortable, and lots of little perks.  Felt like home.  I wish I could’ve stayed longer!

My husband and I stayed here for a few days for an anniversary get away.  Elizabeth's home was easy to find and located near several restaurants and stores. Her home was clean and comfortable and we had all the amenities we needed. There was water and breakfast snacks available, including fresh blueberry muffins. We utilized the back patio as well to get outside and enjoythe fresh air. Elizabeth has several friendly cats and dogs that allowed us to pet them -- as an animal lover this was a definite plus for me!  We would certainly stay here again.
Wonderful stay! Big comfortable room and quite night. Delicious breakfast. Easy access to anywhere, good location. Definitely will come back. Thank you Elizabeth!
Great hospitality in a quaint house. Relaxing.

We have stayed at Elizabeth’s many times as both of our daughters at here for college. It feels like coming home every time we stay. She has always welcome us and our dogs. The beds are all super cozy. Can’t wait to be back in two weeks.
Elizabeth is a great host. Accommodations were perfect for us. Just a short walk from local restaurants and Starbucks! When in Salem again we plan to stay here again!
A beautiful home in a lovely area with a very accommodating and friendly host. 11/10
A perfect location for us when coming in to town for a show at the amazing Elsinore theater. What a neat property! Very nice and stylish decor. Thoughtful amenities. Great value for a one night stay.
Beautiful home, inviting room, every amenity one could want, and a warm and thoughtful host. Definitely recommend this place and will be going back myself. Thanks, Elizabeth.
This was a lovely room with lots of space.   The bathroom was large with plenty of towels.  Coffee, tea and snacks provided.  A very comfortable place to spend a night!

Love the home and in a nice neighborhood. Lots of places to lounge and relax. Beautiful antique decor for all to enjoy, very clean. Elizabeth was there to talk to and show me around, very nice lady and helpful. The bed and pillows, very comfortable. She didn't serve breakfast, but she had bread loafs and fruit in the hall and everything in your room you could want. There was a small frig with yogurt and water. She had oatmeal packs and snacks in a basket. Very nice and I plan to come back!

Elizabeth`s place ands Elizabeth herself is the reason why I travel with AirBnB. Her 100 year old mansion is superbly maintained, modernized and all clean. I can hardly imagine staying in a nicer place in Salem at all. The room is cosy with a great large bed and a nice view to trees and garden from the bed when you weak up. The living room you are welcomed to use is amazing and huge with plenty of history in. If you ask Elizabeth she is willing to tell you the story of that house and about Mexico and Salem as well. She is a nice and intelligent person with a great sense of humor and it is nice talking to her. The tips where to go out for a little dinner fitted perfectly. All in walkable distance. If you're looking for a romantic place to feel home you all right in Elizabeth`s place. She sure is a super host!
Charming/Affordable and in a great location.  Elizabeth is a great host, I would definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in Salem area!

Beautiful historic home, wonderfully appointed. Very comfortable room and bed.   Elizabeth makes sure you have what you need; she is a wonderful host.  I wish I could have had more time to visit with her.
This is a great place. I loved staying there and really appreciated all the little touches. I really enjoyed Elizabeth's home.

This is a wonderful place to stay.  There are so many thoughtful touches.  I was amazed I could bring my well-behaved pooch and there wasn't an extra charge.  The room was clean, and well appointed.  It was awesome there was fresh fruit, snacks, and bottled water available.  Elizabeth is so responsive.  And it was great - I forgot my phone charger and she had one for me to borrow.  Will stay again!

I have stayed in all three rooms. Each is cozy and comfortable. I stay at Vista Manor about twice per week for work. I look forward to coming here after a hard day of work. Second to my home. Thanks, Elizabeth!

This is the place to go!  As a traveling professional, I work long hours.   I arrived tired and cranky.  I saw that there were thoughtful snacks laid out, and I helped myself to some popcorn, and chocolate cookies.  Watching a movie and relaxing in the most comfortable bed was great!  Waking up and having a hot shower with all the shampoo and everything I could need was so nice.  I do feel pampered.  I love how there is also always home made treats.  Although I didn't try them this time, I look forward to next time!  This place is great.

This place continues to be my home away from home.  Also feel so special when Elizabeth comes and says hello when we arrive.  She has the little touches of snacks, home-baked goods - bottled water, and oh-so-comfortable beds.   I like this place so much that my co-workers and employees are staying here when they come into Salem.    Love it here.
Wonderful place to stay!

Wow. Elizabeth knows hospitality and great Airbnb service. The amenities are amazing. Fresh baked goodies, snacks, fresh fruit, bottled water, coffee, tea, bathroom amenities of every sort including aspirin. She offers wine in the main parlor. Very nice and friendly host in a wonderful estate. Hot tub (all season) and swimming pool with comfy bathrobes supplied. My room had a working fireplace. Special place!

Elizabeth is always so warm and friendly.  She brought an extra comforter since the weather was cold.  Everything is decorated so nice and wintery!   I liked the cranberry bread she baked this time, and a little chocolate left in my room.    This place is a great place to stay.

Elizabeth's home was beautiful.  She was an excellent host.   She made me feel very welcomed and provided many unexpected extras that made my visit all the more better.  I recommend her without hesitation.
Elizabeth is a thoughtful host and she has a beautiful, welcoming home in a great location.
The bed is so comfortable.   Everything is decorated so nice for the holidays.  It was quiet and warm.
Always amazing and wonderful here!
Appreciate the comfortable bed!   It's so nice a quiet.  Great place to get a good night's sleep.

I was almost tempted to write a bad review so no one else discovers this gem.  It was everything and more that have come to expect from AirBnB.  Elizabeth's home is hands down the best we have stayed at and we have stayed at many both in this country and in Europe.
Excellent place to stay in Salem. Privacy and quiet abound

G
Quiet, helpful host, and comfortable.

I enjoy staying here.    Elizabeth makes sure everyone feels welcome.  Also even though I’m a frequent guest, there are different treats and different colored bedspreads so it’s a touch of familiar and new at the same time.
We had a great stay here! Elizabeth was a very welcoming host and provided a charming place for us to stay.

If you want to stay where you feel most comfortable upon check in and meeting your Host, then this is the place. She hasn't thought about everything a traveler would need when away from home. I mean everything-- it is obvious she is well traveled and you can feel this immediately upon check in. I will always check her availability when staying in Salem --  an amazing Host
Home is a perfect place away from HOME.
Second week here and it keep getting better

Elizabeth cares about each of her guests and personally  greeted me soon after my arrival. She thought of everything  someone might need. The offering of snacks, baked goods, fruit and coffee was fabulous. The most was very comfortable. Elizabeth provided a space heater which made the room cozy as the space was a little chilly. Very in tune with her guests! Would definitely stay again.

We both loved our stay and the room we had. The bed was soft and comfortable. The house is beautiful and clean and old at the same time. Elizabeth does a great job to make sure you have everything you could want and need. She has snacks in the room and muffins and fruit in the hall. This is the second time staying here and we will be back.
Such a lovely home.  I enjoyed my stay tremendously, and am already planning to return.
We had a lovely stay. Elizabeth's place is truly top notch.
The Manor is a must experience when in Salem. The house is amazing and so is Elizabeth.
I am working in Salem for the next 6 months and this is the only place I want to stay.
Perfect host

Another wonderful stay at Elizabeth’s! The only problem is the bed is too comfortable and I never want to get up. We stay here every time we come to see our daughters at college in Salem. It’s our home away from home.
House filled with character and charm, in a tranquil setting. Great find.
All you will need
Very accommodating

My daughter, 6-month-old grandson, and I stayed here and the hospitality that Elizabeth provided was outstanding. She truly has a wonderful home and opening it up to the community is very much appreciated.
The details is in the home and HOST. Lovely touches
The details is in the home and HOST. Lovely touches

Elizabeth has been an exceptional Host, especially during this time. She has taken additional measures to make sure her guest are safe and protected in her home. I appreciate her and the measures she is taking to makes sure me and my family are healthy.
Elizabeth showed care for me and my family during our final week at her home. Her home was a home away from home and I would recommend her place for anyone who is looking to stay in Salem
Elizabeth has made my time.away from home feel like I have found a new home... She is considerate and aware of what a customer will need. I will miss my home.away from home

Very kind, responsive hostess. A lovely home, with relaxing grounds. We were on the road from Ohio when Oregon instituted the 'stay at home' protocol for the coronavirus outbreak. Elizabeth provided a very supportive information, and a warm welcome, while putting the social distancing actions into practice. We are very pleased to have stayed with Elizabeth for our first few days moving back to Oregon.
The place was amazing and so was the hospitality. Elizabeth really went above and beyond all expectations.

Beautiful home, beautiful room.
Huge rabbit in the background! Very comfortable king bed, seriously comfortable. The room was clean and well-decorated, BnB-feel which was great for relaxing. Guests were asked in binder found in room to go through the dining room to get to outdoor hot tub. However, door leading to dining room was locked.
Suggestions: Willamette Valley Vineyards is amazing. Also, beautiful parks, more touristy Riverfront Park or likes hikes and more secluded beautiful scenery then definitely Minto-Brown Island park.
Wonderful Place! Great value for such a spectacular, warm and quiet setting!

Elizabeth is such a generous host, her place is filled with welcome amenities! Lovely space, quite but near downtown Salem. We will definitely stay here again, we almost add the second night but our itinerary in Oregon is so busy that we couldn’t. We really enjoyed our stay here.

Elizabeth's Tudor is a wonderful place to stay in Salem. The home, grounds, and friendly felines are both as comfortable as home, yet with a feeling of being in a special place. We thoroughly enjoyed the spacious en suite, the comfortable living room, and the delightful hot tub. It was nice to soak after hiking at Silver Falls State Park. Having some school work to finish up on-line, I even spent time in the windowed office area. Elizabeth was easy to communicate with and left us a personalized anniversary gift along with fresh flowers. We had delicious meals from Straight From New York pizza and Ritters, per her suggestions. I definitely recommend and will visit again.
Elizabeth has an extremely comfortable home, with lots of privacy and a thousand thoughtful touches.
Elizabeth’s home is the cleanest, has everything you’ll ever want/need! A must stay

Elizabeth’s home is the most detailed, thought out, cleanest place you’ll ever stay at! My room was more than anything I ever imagined- not only was it super clean before we entered her home she had masks and hand sanitizer prepared! Everything is surrounded in green nature, she even has a few cats and a bunny (they’re so sweet) Wish I can rate a trillion stars ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ if you’re looking for a place with maximum comfort/privacy/ restaurants all around you ...stay at this home! You won’t regret it : ) the sweet bread she leaves out for you in the morning goes so well with the coffee she also provides! A true angel
The property is lovely, Elizabeth has thought of everything, and it is a totally stress-free experience staying at Vista Manor.

Elizabeth’s place is elegant and beautiful. The house is a 1924 Tudor style house. We were greeted at the front door by Elizabeth, the front entrance had pretty flowers, and Chloe the pretty and sweet dog. We were led upstairs on a lovey old finished staircase, to our room which was a suite. We had access to lovely baked goods and fruit, coffee, tea, and other snacks. The bedroom was large with a king sized bed, the mattress was soft, we had a very comfy sleep. Adjoining the room was a large bathroom and also a  very large sitting room/closet with an extra bed. The floors were finished hardwood, the bathroom had an old leaded glass window that swung open with what looked to be original hardware. Everything was charming. The room had an air conditioning unit which we didn’t need to use. The hot tub and pool were invigorating. We had let Elizabeth know that this was an anniversary road trip and she left a thoughtful card and wine for us. We definitely want to stay here again!
Stay here, it is perfect.
This is a charming home and a wonderful host. We will definitely come back again.
Cool historic house, comfortable accommodations, great host, has everything for an amazing stay in Salem!

If you want fabulous service in a beautiful setting but don’t know where to go, this house in Salem is THE place to go. First, the house is gorgeous and well renovated. The pool is clean and perfect for children and grown-ups alike. The backyard and the back patio Offer beauty and peace. And Elizabeth is setting the bar very high when it comes to hosting. Freshly home baked deliciousness of many kinds, fruits galore, various snacks and more water and hot beverages you can drink. The master room is a dream, with everything in it, down to details such as first aid and sewing kits. If you forgot something, Elizabeth will most likely have it for you. And the bed is soooo comfy, you will sleep like a baby. And I even got to make an omelette with the fresh eggs from the hens on property. Elizabeth is such a gracious, mindful and caring host. My best overall experience with Airbnb for sure!

My wife and daughter and I had a very restful stay at Elizabeth's place. We were on a road trip, and so the king sized bed was clutch, and very comfy. The master bedroom had a small bedroom attached that was perfect for our two year olds pack and play, so the adults could have a separate room with privacy after she went to bed. The pool and jacuzzi were clean, and very cool and hot, respectively. We enjoyed walking in the backyard, searching for kitties, bunnies and chickens. It was a perfect spot for two nights for the three of us.
Such a beautiful house and the outside is just as amazing as the inside! Would recommend to anyone I know! Fast responses to messages and any amenities you could think of!

Will not stay anywhere else in Salem! Elizabeth is the BEST and we just love staying at her place. Treats in every room, homemade pastries in the morning and AC in the room ;-) As long as she is a host, we will stay in one of her rooms!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Vista Manor. For comfort and kindness, it would be hard to beat. We are in our 70s and transitioning from a house just sold to the new house, which isn’t ready. We and our sweet old dog would have stayed another couple of days at Vista Manor but, in spite of the innkeeper spending literally hours on the phone with Airbnb personnel, the corporate people refused to remove a block on an empty room. We were thus denied the use of the room, and we were forced to move on, with great difficulty, before it was convenient. A great deal of stress and anguish resulted from Airbnb’s seeming lack of consideration and total disregard for the comfort and wellbeing of the customers, us, in fact. It was enough to turn us off Airbnb for good. Frustrating and in the end harmful to our family.
Elizabeth was the best, amazing stay with very thoughtful touches. Can’t wait to return in the future.
This was our third stay at Elizabeth's place.  Always comfortable, and delightful!  Very clean and easy to come and go.  You won't be disappointed!
Great place to stay. The owner is amazing!

This was probably the most well thought out place I've stayed at. Elizabeth thought of everything you could possibly need and has it readily available. The room was perfect and the entire home was beautiful. Was nice to walk around the back yard and watch the chickens and rabbit.

Elizabeth goes above and beyond to make her guests feel special! She had everything you can think of—snacks, water, coffee & breakfast! Very thoughtful and sweet lady. Her place was very spacious, unique and comfortable! Highly recommend.
Great host, very quick to respond to questions.  This was our second time staying and we can't wait to plan our next trip here!
Clean room, responsive service in a unique setting.

If you are traveling to Salem, OR, this is where you want to stay! Elizabeth is a gracious hostess; and her home and the grounds are clean, comfortable and beautiful. Quiet and serene - a place to relax.
Place was fantastic.  I will definitely be looking to stay again when I come back to Salem
Very beautiful home where the hosts make you feel so important. The location is in a perfect spot!
Incredible experience all around. Beautiful home and grounds. Elizabeth is so friendly and helpful.

This place is beautiful and quaint with so much fun character! The room was spacious and the hosts were very inviting—literally the only thing that wasn’t top notch was the shower experience. The shower curtain is inside of a claw footed tub, so it is very small and the shower curtain closes in around your body.

Elizabeth is really though and added touches to the stay that we didn’t even think of but we really appreciated. She made me and my wife feel so loved and so welcomed. Very clean and taken care of place.
Excellent airbnb.  Well done.

This is a lovely, quaint older home with great character and charm.  Many special touches. Close to vineyards and many restaurants. Awesome decorations for  Halloween on the property.  We didn't utilize the pool/hot tub (out of season) but looks like it would be so nice!  This place being old has the creaks and noises of older homes, that is to be expected, but not a deterrent for us. Very comfortable king bed, nice hot shower, yummy apple cookies!
This home is just beautiful and filled with amenities! A quiet neighborhood yet close to shops and downtown. Just perfect while visiting my daughter at Willamette.

Stayed the night in the master suite. It was absolutely fantastic. Very cool and large room, beautiful garden, and orchids all throughout the common area. Located in a really nice spot of Salem. Uber had trouble finding it because you can't see the house from the road. It's covered up by the greenery.
It was absolutely perfect. Would highly recommend.
Elizabeth’s place makes you feel like a welcomed guest. She has thought of everything you might need. The space is beautiful, quiet and charming. The location is perfect.
Very communicative host, lots of little touches in amenities. Gorgeous historic house with a massive room.
Wonderful, clean place. Spacious and comfortable.
Very nice staying here! Nice touches all the way around!

Super host is an understatement when it comes to Elizabeth. While here for an extended stay, I have wanted for nothing. She has anticipated everything one could need, from toiletries to snacks to wine keys, all in a welcoming and peaceful environment. Super convenient to grocery store and food venues while tucked away with a beautiful garden. Won’t stay anywhere else now when visiting!

Wonderful place to stay with a host that ensured all our needs were met without delay. Elizabeth really made our time in Oregon a memorable one by providing a warm atmosphere and recommending many local places for us to visit. If we visit Oregon, or the Portland area, again we'll definitely see if this place is open for us to stay!

I stayed in two different rooms over my 3 week stay. The Manor Room is large and spacious. I was able to quarantine safely after travel during COVID, telework comfortably and even do my workouts with plenty of space!  Popped over to room #2 for a few days due to a previous reservation and loved the Elephant room too. Even though it was smaller it had everything I needed. Nicely updated bathroom as well! Would stay in either room again happily.

Cannot say enough good things about my stay here! I had shifting plans and had to bounce between rooms of Elizabeth’s but she was so very accommodating. The Elephant Room and the Bird room (the big room) were both lovely and well appointed. And the pumpkin bread she made was GREAT!
This is our second time staying here and we absolutely love it! Best host ever! Super clean!

This spacious suite has a very comfortable king size bed and all the amenities you can possibly need.  I cannot recommend this place enough.  You will not be disappointed and will love the fresh baked goods!
Great room with TV and computer hookup. Warm and well decorated.
We love it here and have stayed many times now. Elizabeth is a wonderful host and goes above and beyond to anticipate and meet her guests needs.
Elizebeth has a charming, well maintained, vintage home to spend some time in. It’s a great Salem location, so close by to many cafes restaurants. I’d come back here!
Elizabeth went above and beyond with accommodating my very late arrival and the room was spotless and welcoming! Such a great host!
Amazing! Thank you Elizabeth!
Lovely, quiet home with quaint feel. Lovely accommodations with some great common areas. Our host was responsive to our questions and answered us right away.

Elizabeth has the best place for a quiet writer to get some work done. This was my third stay at the Vista Manor and the experience never disappoints. Her prices are more than fair, the space is gorgeous and extremely clean, and it is beautifully decorated. Elizabeth is great at communicating. There was a city-wide power outage and Elizabeth made sure I knew about it and she called the city immediately to find out what was going on. I appreciate this so much. The amenities she provides are the nicest and I really appreciate the little touches. I would highly recommend staying at Vista Manor!!!

This place is such a treasure.
Elizabeth is an incredible host.
King size bed, claw foot bath tub, fireplace in my room, pool and hot tub. Whats not to love?
I will definitely be back.
This is a comfortable, roomy place to stay.  We are repeat customers at Elizabeth's beautiful home and plan to return many times in the future.

Elizabeth keeps a truly excellent B&B in the old school tradition. Beautiful location, Excellent hostess. Interesting home with the traveler in mind. We stayed in an unusual weather disaster and  she made a special effort to take care of our needs despite personal adversities.

The house was very nice and central to town. We didn't see photos of the hot tub beforehand but it is a nice modern tub, though would get crowded with more than 2 people. The shower/tub in the room is a clawfoot tub and requires a large step to get in and out so that could be an issue for those with mobility problems. The host was very responsive to messages and accommodating. We were very happy with the space overall.
Elizabeth’s home is beautiful! Our stay was amazing and we had a great time!
Clean and beautiful ❤️ home away from home, so lovely!!
Wonderful place! The amenities are plenty with warm & friendly touches. Elizabeth is a delight. We will be back!

STAY HERE! So amazing! The house is great. Hot tub and pool along with animals. How can you go wrong. Check in was super easy as well as check out.  House was amazing and the room we  stayed in had an amazing bed/mattress ( we had the private with our own bathroom). Cant wait to return with my fur baby. Definitely recommend 100%
A cozy, quiet place to relax from the daily hustle. Elizabeth goes the extra mile to make you feel welcomed.
A clean, welcoming space- centrally located easy to find and just superb!!

One of the nicest places we've stayed! This place has charm, coziness, warmth, cleanliness and all the amenities you need. We were very surprised by how quaint this lovely place was and how attentive our host was to our questions. I just wished we could have stayed longer. We will be back!
My stay here was outstanding!  I loved the hot tube. I look forward to staying again.

Vista Manor is a beautiful house with great accommodations whether you are traveling alone or with a few other. Elizabeth is one of the most friendly and accommodating hosts. Would definitely stay again when I am in the Salem area.

Seriously an amazing place! Would recommend to anyone traveling through this area. We found it last minute and am so thankful we did! We will definitely be staying here again! The amazing hospitality made us feel like we were back in the Midwest.
Clean, quaint, quiet and private. The stay gave me everything I'd hoped for and more. Also the location is great.
Elizabeth is a great host.   Her place is centrally located in south Salem....and is convenient to all places of interest to me.  We’ve stayed with her before....and we’ll stay with her again.

Outstanding experience! My daughter stayed in room 4 with my 9 year old daughter. The king bed and spacious room were fantastic! The fireplace is such a cozy touch, but we didn’t use it. My daughter loved ALL the available snacks! (Fruit, fresh banana bread, packages of oatmeal, chips, cup-o-noodles, Oreos, Biscoff cookies, peanuts, yogurt, tea, coffee and bottled water), and she even brought up her blender so I could make my smoothie! There were plates and mugs, paper towels, silverware, mini fridge!

There were plenty of toiletries in case something was forgotten in the packing at home. We enjoyed the hot tub the following morning and didn’t even hear ANY of the other guests our entire visit!

This stay was great! This was the most well supplied stay I have ever used. Anything that you could have forgotten was available. There were snacks and drinks waiting for us in the room. Any toiletry you could think of was waiting for you in the bathroom. Extra blankets, towels, a robe for the hot tub - it was all there! Elizabeth even offered us firewood for the fireplace in our room in case we got chilly and wanted to make things more interesting. Just perfect!
Wonderful space, has everything you need. Great location next to lots of shops & restaurants.
Hands down - best place to stay in Salem.  Quaint, charming, quiet, so relaxing.

Finding the place and checking in was super easy with the specific instructions that Elizabeth provided. Really great communication from the host to make sure we were taken care of. The place was super cute and exactly as described with so many sweet personal touches throughout the room. Definitely recommend and will try to stay again in the future!

Very Lovely place to stay! Super Kind & friendly Host & family! Home away from home many quaint rooms to stay in. Pet friendly, great location, great outdoor spaces to relax in! Will definetly be staying here again when we come to see our son again!
Perfect location.  Great place great host . Pick this one !
This is the best Airbnb we have found in Salem which is why we will stay here many more times in the future!  Great amenities and a very comfortable king size bed.

Really cool property and nice hostess. It’s a giant old house carved into suites. Remind me the bed and breakfasts of ole, but not as stuffy. I came as a staycation to soak in the hot tub, and it did not disappoint. The pool and patio is cute with nice landscaping and some lounge chairs. If you know how hard it is to find Airbnbs with hot tubs, you’ll think this is a bargain. I’m all about the hot tubs when it comes to Airbnbs, personally. That’s what makes it vacation!
lovely, comfortable, clean and quiet!
A restful stay in a very spacious and beautiful room! The extra touches made me feel like I was at a bed and breakfast!
We make a point of trying to stay at Villa Manor. This is the best Airbnb we have found in Salem.  Shoot this is the best Airbnb we have found anywhere. This place is beautify and serene
I loved this place. Quiet, private and had everything I needed. Elizabeth was reachable and had the place stocked well for my visit!

Elizabeth’s house was lovely.  Everything was clean and well stocked. The house was quiet and peaceful with nice outdoor spaces in the back yard and near the pool. There are several restaurants in walking distance.

Elizabeth was so hospitable to us while we were in Salem. The home and grounds were beautiful and we got to enjoy a lovely hot tub sunset :) She even had her daughter bring up some ice when my knee was aching from a long hike.

I would only recommend that you don’t stay here if you have a cat allergy. There were several cats on the grounds, and my allergies were pretty bad during our stay. We did end up purchasing a Neti pot at the most wonderful natural grocer right around the corner!

Elizabeth was so welcoming and kind! We loved our spacious room and all of the extras to make us feel at home! The bed was especially soft and so comfortable! We had a great nights sleep! We will definitely return next time we come to Salem!
Once again, a most wonderful stay! The gardens were in fine form and the house was beautiful. I look forward to my next visit at Elizabeth's, and having another conversation on the patio with her.
Elizabeth is a most helpful and hospitable host! Our suite was beautifu, and we had everything we needed, including pastries and fruit for breakfast.

This is a very nice suite!  There are lots of extras that I didn’t expect but very much appreciated!  Cold water and many varieties of yogurt in the fridge, fruit, pastries and even a variety of toiletries in case you forgot to pack something.  The room was very spacious and the king-sized bed was soft and comfy!  I will definitely be back.
This was a perfect place to stay on my road trip with my dog. The room is spacious, parking is plentiful and location is very convenient!
We loved our overnight in this lovely English Tudor home. There were too many extras to list and the furnishings made us feel like we were in an upscale English inn.
Beautiful place to stay when in Salem! Perfect communication and extremely helpful host!! Will highly recommend anyone to stay here!
Lovely room with lots of little extras.  I have stayed at the Grand hotel a number of times and Elizabeth's breakfast items are MUCH better and more creative, too!

A lovely, cozy, relaxing, private place to stay mere minutes from anything you might want while staying in Salem. The host has obviously given a lot of thought to the various needs and comforts of her guests. The place is at least as nice as advertised and communications with the host are excellent. This room was an especially good value especially compared to the hotel options nearby. Highly recommended.

Comfortable, clean lodging in a historic home.
I enjoyed chatting with Elizabeth's daughter, Melissa, who was a friendly and responsive host.
Hope to stay there again when visiting Salem.
Great stay, so comfortable and host is very accommodating.  It was lovely to take a dip in the pool and use the hot tub too!
Great space; clean, spacious, quite & easily accessible to shops and parks. Elizabeth was very responsive and we loved all the little touches added to the room.
Staying at Elizabeth’s BnB was lovely! Check in was easy, the house and grounds are beautiful, and Elizabeth is very accommodating. I highly recommend booking this stay!

This place was amazing!  The home has an old style charm with a lovely backyard.  Our room had everything we could need and Elizabeth was very welcoming and accommodating. I would certainly recommend this place for anybody having an event in the area such as a wedding or weekend getaway as this location is perfect for gathering with friends and family. We will certainly stay here again when we are in the area.
Clean, spacious and well stocked with snacks/breakfast. We enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended!
Nice quiet stay- fully loaded with necessities and snacks! Elizabeth was so generous and checked on us during our stay!

My husband and I had an absolutely wonderful time staying at Vista Manor. I cannot think of anything Elizabeth could have done to make our stay better. The house and grounds are lovely. Elizabeth is very responsive if you have questions plus she is just a great person. I wholeheartedly recommend staying here.

Elizabeth's wonderful manor house is a joy. We have stayed there twice before while work was being done on our nearby house. This time, we booked a room for out-of-town guests, as our home is again not quite ready for visitors. They absolutely loved the room, the whole beautifully appointed house, and the wonderful grounds. They were treated so kindly, they said they would love to stay there again.

Elizabeth's place was charming and welcoming. She opened her space to all guests and made sure I was well cared for. As a solo traveler, this was the perfect environment. Loved the pool and patio and adorable, personalized rooms.
Go, so worth the location, price and host is amazing!~

I loved staying at Elizabeth's home. The historical house is beautiful, and my room was spacious, private, and full of personal touches as well as supplies a traveler might have forgotten. I appreciated a friendly face and brief orientation when I arrived, the menagerie of outdoor pets, and the many thoughtful details (homemade bath bombs! homemade hazelnut bread! fresh fruit! I will be coming back when I return to Salem.

Repeat visitor to Vista Manor's BIG room. The set up is phenomenal, as is Elizabeth. You can't go wrong staying here. Tried the hot tub by the pool this time and it was wonderful after a long day out and about.
You MUST stay here! Elizabeth’s Airbnb is such an amazing gem and we were blown away by the beauty and hospitality. This is one of the best places we have ever found on Airbnb.
Love staying here! Such a treasure!

What a fantastic place! Charming vintage manor, clean & comfy. It’s a garden oasis, yet so conveniently located. Elizabeth is the best hostess: readily accessible, great instructions, thoughtful amenities (including home baked breads) …
We will definitely be back!! We give it 10 stars!

Just wonderful rooms in this older home. Very clean.... So many thoughtful amenities at a price that you don't see anymore these days. Elizabeth is being kind and helpful and obviously works very hard as a nurse and a host. We will be back soon... This of our second stay. A++++
Wonderful place. Reminds one of a Bed and Breakfast from days gone by!  Clean, sweet, comfy!  Hope to stay again sometime.
We've stayed with Elizabeth for 5 years in a row... same time every year in August. She's the BEST and we LOVE staying at her home. That's all I need to say about that 👍🥰🏌⛳🇺🇲✈🌲⚜🐆🖤💛🖤💛

We wish we could give Elizabeth’s place 10 stars. Great location, amazing hospitality, we felt like we were in a chalet in Switzerland. Fresh bread and fruit, coffee and tea in the room, it all felt like a wonderful home away from home. Wish we could have stayed for longer!

Great home, great accommodations, every traveler's detail is available (when was the last time a hotel provided an assortment of band-aids?)
The house is grand, the gounds beautiful, the location is great but quiet. Highly recommended!!

The Hughes House, as it is historically called, is extremely charming and cozy. Elisabeth has covered every detail and the space is sparkling clean. The best accommodations I’ve ever had at an Air BnB. I would 100% stay again. Also a great price!! Thanks Elizabeth
What a great experience. This is what AirBNB intended when it began. Beautiful home with a story to tell and inviting host.
Just a wonderful spot. Clean, comfortable, and with many amenities. (plus chickens!)
Whenever I am in Salem this is where I stay because I just love it.

This is a wonderful place to stay…physically charming and attractive, comfortable bed, bath, etc. in a beautiful, well maintained grand older home. Additionally, Elizabeth has thought of everything you might need to facilitate your stay. We ate our take-out dinner at the charming table for two, looking out over the garden area in the back of the house. Cups, plates, serving ware, microwave, fridge, coffee maker, extra towels, blankets…on and on… everything was provided. We will definitely plan to return and spend 2+ days there.

This place is beyond gorgeous, cue the Snow White enchanted cottage feels. The room we rented was cozy, bright, and decorated meticulously. The creature comforts were beyond thoughtful. The host was always helpful and quick to respond. I’d stay here again in a heartbeat. This home is a gem.
Go there, just go.  It's fantastic.
Great place to stay. Very easy communication and convenient location. Very easy to check in. Loved all the goodies that Elizabeth provided. Definitely goes above and beyond!
Stayed in the Master Suite, great place! Very clean. Private, but also very homely feeling. Elizabeth communities promptly and excellent host. Would highly recommend.
Terrific, no reason to stay anywhere else in Salem

A bit of bliss in an otherwise busy world.  I felt safe and secure exploring the surrounding area..  It has the benefits associated with a downtown (close to grocery and restaurants )  combined with  the quietness of an established neighborhood. The home itself is peaceful with a slice of history   and the hosts have thought of everything.  It reminded me of the hostels of Europe-low key and inviting.
This is a wonderful place to stay.  Elegant yet feels like home.  Elizabeth is a super host.  The hot tub and swimming pool are an added bonus.  We definately will return.

We expected a good visit but this was so much more.  If you want a cozy, warm, intimate experience you will not be disappointed.  Everything that we needed was right at our fingertips.  We were supplied with fruit, pumpkin bread, snacks, yogurt, water and so much more.  Not what your normal AirBnB would have.  The staff was more than accommodating and what we didn't have, they supplied.  But, beyond that, this establishment has a feel you can't imagine.  Mixing old with new and, aside from the inviting guest rooms, the parlor and dining room are enchanting.  It was like stepping back in time and yet all the amenities of our modern world.  The grounds are amazing and tranquil. Although it was just the two of us we could envision an entire family gathering here.  Don't pass up the chance for an awesome stay.   The Wrights

Such a great experience! Elizabeth is great. So sweet and helpful. This Airbnb has everything you need. We had our dog with us and he also loved it! Bonus: fresh made bread and/or coffee cake in the mornings!
Absolutely worth it. Great value for all of the amenities you get. Was a nice get away while being close to Salem.
Great stay, killer value. Clean, big, and considerate
Beautiful room beautiful grounds.
Excellent in home stay. Elizabeth has covered all the bases - thoughtful details everywhere. Quiet and very comfortable.

Elizabeth was wonderfully helpful and checked in on us regularly. The accommodations were comfortable and more than large enough, and the location was nice and close to breakfast, coffee, and everything we needed to get to.
Really great for either a one-night stay or multiple nights, and we daydreamed about bringing other couples out and booking all the rooms at once 😀
Great place. Beautiful home, very relaxing. Clean, quiet and comfortable. Would definitely recommend.
The stay was cozy and the host communication very well to us. We enjoyed the comfy bed and the decor.
If we could give it 6 stars we would. Lovely, spacious, gracious and filled with unexpected touches of generosity.

Elizabeth has created a wonderful space to shelter in, regroup, and feel at home during your travels. So many little touches that you don't find in a lot of Airbnb's.

Did you forget toiletries? She has you covered. Need tape, or sticky pads? She even has those. Plus, coffee, creamer, a selection of little snacks, and even homemade banana bread out in the hall this trip for her guess.

The bied is soft and inviting. The grounds are a little sanctuary in the heart of a busy commercial area. Everything was clean and welcoming. I will return.

Take the time to chat with her if you are fortunate enough to find her home. What an interesting and well traveled woman. You won't regret it.

Great place
Great host

Wow! I was so impressed by Vista Manor. It’s really lovely!
I stayed in the master suite. It’s very roomy, well appointed, very clean, & beautifully decorated. The bed was comfy & cozy.
Elizabeth provides a variety of snacks, fruit, plates, mugs, cutlery, coffee, etc. She even baked some yummy banana bread.
I highly recommend Vista Manor & hope to return.
The accommodations were lovely, a visual feast and very comfortable.  Many thoughtful touches.
Such a beautiful setting and unique house! Our room was very spacious and the bed was very comfortable. Elizabeth was a fabulous host!

Elizabeth's place is very well located close to markets (an organic market is nearby) and restaurants (not far away) We stayed there after a visit to Silver Falls State Park and the Trail of Ten Falls. It is very close to big street, yet you only sense the restful calm of her sizeable property. Her communication and check in instructions were so clear and the room was just as shown in the photos. Fluffy fresh new towels and shower curtain, very clean and comfy spacious room with every detail considered. We did not use the little side bedroom except to store our bags. Note that there is no central heat but a fine unit in the room and probably a space heater in the little room. Lovely pear bread and fruit and yoghurt were provided with plates and paper towels and a gallon of water. A short but very good stay, we enjoyed the privacy as the suite is on the opposite side of the hall from her other rooms and over the living room.

My stay at Elizabeth's was short but lovely. From the moment I drove up the driveway I was charmed by the house and decor. The house is only a ten minute drive from a cute little downtown area with restaurants and bars. I stayed in the master suite, which was spacious and cozy all at the same time. The bed was one of the most comfortable I have ever slept in. And on my way out a delightfully friendly kitty stopped me for some attention. Couldn't have had a better stay, and I definitely hope to return!
Private and quiet.

My wife and I both agree that Elizabeth's place was one of the best airbnb experiences we have had! The house is beautiful as are the surrounding grounds and our suite upstairs was very wonderfully appointed, private and comfortable. The extra touches of homemade bread and fruit each morning was much appreciated and we had everything we needed!
We highly recommend Elizabeth's beautiful home!

We enjoyed our stay, the room was beautiful. Loved the decor and the bathtub. The room is huge, and has lots of amenities. It was also very quiet at night. Lots of cute animals on property too! Now possible drawbacks: The bed is super soft, kind of sinking feeling, so if you like firm you may have trouble sleeping. Also, I am not sure there is actually a washer and dryer here. When messaged the host asking about it she never answered me. When I booked it was listed as an amenity, but I couldn't find it anywhere. Besides that, it is a really great place and we would love to try out another room in the future.
Charming beautiful space. Highly recommend very thoughtful touches
Excellent stay as always with Elizabeth! I’m a happy repeat customer 🙂 You cannot go wrong staying here.

It was such a pleasure staying in Elizabeth’s home for the second time she has everything you can imagine, she even leaves fresh baked bread and fruit for you! She has the cutest and kindest pets. My stay in Salem was wonderful. Wish I can leave more stars!

Elizabeth's home is lovely! The historic home is beautifully furnished and very comfortable. Elizabeth was an attentive host and checked to be sure I had everything I needed. I would definitely recommend it!

This is a lovely spot!  Elizabeth has thought of everything a traveler might want. The room is so cute, the price is very fair, and she has lots of extras such as fresh fruit and baked goods that really make it wonderful.  Thank you!
Amazing host, beautiful house, rooms and service! You won't regret staying here !

My wife and I absolutely loved, loved loved staying at Vista Manor with Elizabeth! So many positive things to be said I don't even know where to start.

Elizabeth's home is a gorgeous Tudor home built in 1933 with an elegant dining room and living room area replete with hardwood floors, beautiful furniture, amazing French doors, chandeliers, an awesome fireplace, surrounded by a beautiful wooded lot with tall trees and foliage. What a peaceful, tranquil spot just a couple blocks from shopping and restaurants. Driving onto the property was like driving into a different world.

Our room was even better! We had the largest of four rooms available. It was very spacious, high ceilings, tastefully decorated and furnished, a brick fireplace, a large Persian rug, hardwood floors, comfortable chairs, a desk, a dining table, easy to use heater/AC operated by remote control, a very comfortable king size bed, ceiling fan, lots of windows everywhere looking out to the rear patio and wooded lot as well as a view of Salem from atop the hill.

The bathroom is equally spacious with a stained glass window, an antique claw foot tub and brass plumbing with porcelain knobs, plenty of extra toiletries, lots of clean towels, and immaculately clean.

The small second bedroom was equally well appointed with a single bed, a clothes butler, iron and ironing board, and a closet full of extra towels, fans, bathrobes, and other useful creature comfort items. Elizabeth has thought of every detail including fruit and fresh pumpkin spice bread in the hallway, and in the entry of the room a fridge, dishes and utensils microwave, snacks, and water chilled in the fridge. The level of hospitality is unmatched in my numerous experiences with Airbnb's in the US and abroad. Truly exceptional.

This was our wedding weekend and Elizabeth was incredibly responsive and helpful in every way leading up to our arrival, coordinating with me in the delivery of floral arrangements for the room and the wedding. She even left a thoughtful card and a bottle of French sparkling champagne for us in the room. It was just above and beyond in every respect.

Elizabeth and her sister Lauren were so gracious, friendly, and kind to us, making our special weekend that much more enjoyable and memorable. My wife commented that this is our new home away from home when we visit the area...which will be often.

Thank you Elizabeth and Lauren, your home is a slice of heaven. Thank you for sharing it with us. You are the best! Lisa and I look forward to seeing you again soon.

This was my 2nd stay and really enjoyed it yet again!  I accidentally left a charging cable in the room and the cleaning lady grabbed it and brought it to me.  I highly recommend staying in this beautiful home.
What an adorable room, all decked out for the Christmas holiday!! So comfortable and inviting.
The home and room are amazing! Everything is provided for a very comfortable and enjoyable stay. The holiday decor was an added surprise that made it extra special.

This place was beautiful. We stayed in a room that had a private bathroom and a mini fridge with a coffee bar. The house was quiet and peaceful. It exceeded my expectations. I would definitely stay here again!
Happy to have enjoyed another stay. Elizabeth’s place feels like a home.

We stayed in the king en suite.  It was very comfortable, cozy, clean, beautifully decorated & well stocked.  It was perfect for me & my daughter on our quick trip for a volleyball tournament.  Elizabeth was an excellent communicator who greeted us upon our arrival and made us feel right at home.  Nice, off-street parking too.
Wonderful choice for a getaway. Exactly as advertised and wonderful personal touches
Always great stay. Elizabeth defines Superhost!

We live in Salem, and I booked this stay for a visiting friend, and from the feedback we got, we will book Vista Manor for visiting friends and family again. These are our friend's comments:
I am very happy with my stay at Vista Manor. The lodgings (Room 4) were very comfortable, along with all of the accommodations. I would recommend the Manor to anyone who is looking to stay in Salem. My appreciation to Elizabeth for her care in overseeing my stay.
Wonderfull stately home on spectacular grounds close to everything.

Elizabeth's place goes way beyond expectations. It was totally charming and incredibly welcoming. We were there between Christmas and New Year's, and I thought I was staying at Santa's guest house. The suite was fantastic and complete with everything a traveler could possibly need. Everything had a thoughtful touch, and the place was cozy yet spacious, traditional yet fresh, personable yet private. I hope to return in the summer.

What a delightful home in a convenient location! All the amenities to make your stay relaxing and pleasant are provided. From our window we saw wild turkeys, squirrels, birds, and a rabbit on the property.
Wonderful place to stay in Salem.
Always a peaceful visit

We had a very good stay. Our hostess, Elizabeth was kind, friendly and responded right away to our needs. We stayed in the largest room, the King Suite. There was plenty of room to sprawl out and be comfortable. We appreciated all the extras such as yogurt, snacks and coffee maker. Elizabeth also provides bathroom extras in case you have forgotten something like makeup wipes, sewing kit and toothbrush. I got a long glimpse/view outside of the window at the large bunny having breakfast. The property was nice. This was our first Airbnb and we will use this location and others in lieu of hotels when traveling.
Very comfortable!
This was our second time being hosted by Elizabeth. Everything was perfect, we love all the decor and personal touches. Very thoughtful and kind host. We love to visit this place.

Elizabeth is the definition of super host! She provided all the basics & more & even provided fresh fruit! She was truly amazing to stay with & made everything super easy. The room was bigger & cleaner than I even imagined!

Elizabeth has a charming place. Our room was spacious, with a bird theme. It had beautiful hardwood floors, large windows, and even a fireplace (which we didn't use). There was also a very large shared sitting room available. Elizabeth was very attentive, cooking homemade goodies and fulfilling minor needs. She was extremely responsive to communications. It would be a delight to stay there again.
Elizabeth is always an amazing host!
Very nice place to stay. Lots of great extras. Thank you Elizabeth.

Toni and Ed were just thrilled with their first Air B&B experience. They said that everything was excellent and Elizabeth provided so many little extras that it was much better than a nice hotel stay. They also found Elizabeth very friendly and accommodating. (This was booked for them to try, as they weren't certain they would like it better than a hotel. It also saved a little $ compared to the hotel they had been staying at.
Very cute! Perfect small space for two to relax & recharge!

Gorgeous home, welcoming host, and great location!
Second time we have stayed- perfect
What a lovely place to stay! It was very peaceful and comfortable, with easy check-in, great communication, and a well-appointed room. I woild gladly stay again.
Elizabeth is a wonderful hostess who has thought of everything.  The room is extremely comfortable and stylish. My only regret is that we didn’t have more time to spend there.

Everything was perfect, and far exceeded my expectations! Beautiful, charming home, comfy bed, big claw foot tub, and all the little touches to make for an extra special stay. I loved having a morning coffee in the garden while my dog happily sniffed around. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
breakfast is light continental style
We love staying at Elizabeth’s home. She truly thinks of everything to ensure your stay is the most comfortable and relaxing.
As always , we love Elizabeth’s.. everything is always perfect.

Best Airbnb I have ever stayed in. The value is incredible. Immaculately clean. Has everything you need and more, from a coffee tea bar, to a sewing kit, to fireplace supplies, to shower caps, I didn’t need to bring anything with me! Great location. Sweet touches like homemade cakes and breads available for you to take. Host is polite and communicative. I can’t recommend this place enough!
Frequent stays at this lovey airbnb! Great location, comfortable & welcoming
Elizabeth goes above and beyond to assist guests.  Miraculously, she even found my missing earring in her vacuum bag!
The Vista House Manner is one of the best deals in Salem. Wonderful decorations. Comfortable bed. Beautiful grounds. Lots of amenities.
I had a great stay. I was in Salem for work and it was lovely to return home too this beautiful cottage each evening. The inn and ground are beautiful.
Our stays at Elizabeth's place are ALWAYS amazing. Her home is so warm and inviting and every bed is so comfortable. It feels like coming home but you don't have to deal with the relatives ;)

What a great room to stay in Salem. Elizabeth was very prompt and attentive as well as very laid back and thoughtful as a host. Anyone wanting to stay that wants a nice big bed, a private bathroom, and a private space for their kid (optional), this is a dream scenario. I enjoyed staying here, even if only for one night. Will be back sometime in the future! An excellent host!

Elizabeth is a great host and you cannot find a better place to stay in Salem. This property is very cute and in a great location. Also, Elizabeth pays attention to the little details; we loved the fresh flowers and small necessities we found in our room. If I’m ever back in Salem, I will make sure to stay here again!
Perfection! Our favorite place to stay!
Beautiful, spacious rooms!
Loved staying here… a beautiful place, very clean and with lovely touches. Will definitely stay here again when am back in the area.
This property is charming. We loved our rooms and the surrounding grounds. Elizabeth is an excellent communicator and allowed us to check-in early.
A very spacious and comfortable room and bath. The host has thought of, and provided, all one needs. And there is a great park nearby for you and your dog.

The room was very spacious and had everything we needed. Originally, we planned to bring our dog but ended up deciding against it. The room, however, would've been perfect to fit the three of us. It was nice having our own mini-fridge, microwave, bathroom, and coffeemaker. Also, my girlfriend liked the fruit that was kindly put out as a nighttime snack and even tried the delicious muffins one morning. Overall, it was a great stay!
Elizabeth has created a wonderful, beautiful, restful spot. This was my second stay at Vista Manor. I'm sure I'll return. I highly recommend you stay here.

Lovely historic home close to downtown Salem. Our room/suite definitely exceeded our expectations. Generous supplies. Would stay again. As a bonus, there was a lovely planting of tulips blooming out front.
Elizabeth is an amazing host. place is beyond beautiful with great hospitality

Elizabeth goes to extraordinary lengths to make sure guests feel welcome, safe, and extremely well cared for. Her rooms are sparkling clean, the atmosphere is luxurious but not pretentious. The grounds are gorgeous - a private park! You have everything you need to be "at home" in her bnb, and if you need something else (to wash out your French press, for example) just ask. Help is immediate and generously given. Absolutely wonderful place to rest.

It is always a joy to stay here.  The yard is lovely and the room is always sparkling clean and decorated so cutely!  Elizabeth has the room well stocked with snacks and toiletries in case you have forgotten anything, which is wonderful.  Thank you!

Such a wonderful stay! Elizabeth provided all we could possibly need and more. The room was clean, spacious, and charming. The house is gorgeous and only a short drive or walk to the downtown area. Elizabeth also provided great suggestions. Stay here if you can!

Great stay
Master Suite is great
Beautifully decorated and very quiet
always a quiet and restful experience.
Nice place-would stay again

We spent 3 days at Elizabeth’s. It was exceptional value, very quiet and peaceful , we totally enjoyed our stay. Beautiful home, our room was large and very comfortable, beautiful gardens, it was close to all amenities we highly recommend it.
Stay at Elizabeth’s… her place is absolutely the epitome of Air B&B life;))…

Beautiful Tudor-style home full of artistic touches and surrounded by lovely gardens. The beds were comfortable, bathroom appointed with various toiletry items, and the shower  heavenly. We did not meet the host in person, but the vibe was very hospitable, every detail thought of.  It was so nice to find fruit and muffins available in the hall, Keurig coffee in the room, yogurt and bottled water in the fridge. And I loved the bird theme in the room we stayed in.
Always a great stay.
Clean and cool place that is as well stocked as any airbnb I have ever been in with a solid location.
great place tostay

Stayed only 1 night for a tournament. . This was the perfect location and super easy check in and very comfortable room!! I will stay here next time I’m in Salem!!
Thanks Elizabeth

Another wonderful stay in Elizabeth’s beautiful historic home.  This suite  is lovely and spacious, the bed is very comfortable, and all the delicious snacks are so nice.  Looking forward to my next visit!

I was only in Salem for a day and a night, but I wish could have stayed longer at Elizabeth's. Everything was great; very comfortable and a short drive from downtown and the Willamette campus. A peaceful garden property in the middle of the city.
Beautiful home, very large beautiful room. Restaurant and winery recommendations also excellent.
Great, comfortable space. Would definitely recommend.
Elizabeth is a Salem treasure and I've stayed at her amazing home several times. It is clean, comfortable and convenient to everything. Highly recommend.
Thanks you so much for your space and shared stories. God bless you
great space.

I loved this little bnb! I was passing through Salem and needed a place for the night, and now I want to go back to Salem just to stay there.

Very cozy, the bed was so soft, and the sound of rain while I overlooked the garden and drank my coffee was a sublime way to start the day.

Elizabeth was great. I would definitely recommend this cozy spot
Comfortable and easy place to stay. We’ll be back again!
Lovely spot!

My expectations were exceeded , the pictures did not adequately capture how beautiful the house and garden are. My room was spacious and Elizabeth thoughtfully stocked it with extra toiletries, water and snacks. Definitely will stay here again next time I’m in Salem

Elizabeth's Vista House was the most pleasant and relaxing b&b I have stayed in. The bed was luxuriously comfortable even for someone like me who prefers a firm bed. The room a/c allowed me to create the perfect temperature for restful sleep in this quiet house. The furnishings were clean, comfortable, and tasteful, and there was plenty of hot water for a good shower or a soaking in the clawfoot tub. Elizabeth took care to provide a variety of snacks and home-baked goods, even letting me know when warm bread had just been put on the serving tray outside my room. The view of the gardens from my window made me wish I had more time to relax and enjoy them, something I hope to do on my next trip to Salem. Elizabeth's Vista House deserves more than five stars!

I strongly recommend this property to travelers who want to visit Salem. The location is perfect, close to Salem downtown and wineries. The house itself is too beautiful, above my expectation. Elizabeth’s interior design is super cool, we have found the cultures from all over the world in this Tudor house with French doors and windows. We’d appreciate every detail the host has provided. Very good memory to bring home.
The home was everything promised,  great room, plenty of room, great accommodations for out puppy, and great grounds to just relax in. And close to just about anything we wanted to do.

The room is very lovely and comfortable. The location is perfect, close to Salem downtown. Elizabeth was also very kind.
I'd stay here again and would definitely recommend it.

Such a lovely space. The bed was very comfortable! There were snacks available and homemade banana bread. You can tell Elizabeth cares for the small details and we appreciated that. Would definitely stay again.
Great stay

We loved our stay in Salem! Elizabeth (and crew!) were kind and very welcoming. The home is located near downtown, restaurants, and a beautiful park! We had wonderful little surprises all throughout our stay (fresh flowers, muffins, water, coffee...etc.) We are so grateful for this gem of a place to stay while we were in town. We would definitely stay here again! Thank you, Elizabeth! :)
This was a perfect space for my solo stopover in Salem. Comfortable, immaculate, many thoughtful amenities, great tips for local food & drink. Elizabeth is a great host.

We have stayed in dozens of Air BnBs all over the world and this is in our top three favorites.
Perfect location , beautiful grounds,gorgeous furnishings, gracious hostess,large comfortable suite with lots of extra thoughtful amenities . In other words absolutely PERFECT !
We are looking forward to a return visit.

We booked this place last minute and it was perfect on our road trip. The room was very large and the bed very comfy. The extra snacks, home baked goods, water etc were so homely and lovely. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Very comfortable and convenient.
Wonderful stay! Exactly if not better than described. Good location, comfortable room and bed. Would definitely stay again!

What a treat to stay at Elizabeth's grand Tudor home! Everything was squeaky clean, from the floors to the bathroom, carpet, dishes, dinnerware. I really enjoyed the bird motif, it was consistent without being redundant ...Elizabeth's art pieces drew me in and captured my curiosity!
So much to like...my room was just huge, nice and cool, large tv, snacks, lots of coffee and coffee mate, oatmeal, freshly baked breakfast treats! There is bottled water and even a very large bottle to fill the kuerig with.
There are so many nice towels, a claw foot tub, beautiful original wood floors, the king bed was divine, if only I had more time to lounge in it. Sleep was wonderful.
Outside, there are two delightful kitties. There are several restaurants: Thai, sushi, 5 guys, and an extremely proper NY pizza, all just a stroll down the block!
All in all, Elizabeth's stay far exceeded my expectations and I would love to go back! Thank you for a lovely stay!!

Lovely old house with interesting spaces and many amenities.  Space inside and out to relax and read.  The rooms have plenty of storage and a nice array of complimentary snacks and beverages. It is close to many things and is easy to find. Elizabeth is a great hostess and the communication with her was excellent.

Great house in a convenient part of town. Huge comfortable bed and ample space. Snacks provided in the hall and in the room. Really good value for anyone looking to visit Salem or just stopping through!

We enjoyed our stay at Elizabeth’s house. It was a beautiful setting and we especially loved the views of the garden (and chickens) from our room. Our room was very spacious and comfortable. And it was a great location too.
quiet and comfortable
Great

The stay at Elizabeth’s en suite was very comfortable. The bed was king-size, the room was exceptionally clean, and it was well stocked with many delicious snacks for us to enjoy. We felt very welcomed and would definitely recommend this place. We will come back again!

We enjoyed staying in this suite. The bed was very comfortable and everything was clean. There were also a variety of snack and breakfast options like oatmeal, popcorn, and coffee in the room. There was also homemade banana bread and muffins. This was a great place to stay and was a nice location.

I stayed in same room in 2018.

Elizabeth responded to my inquiries quickly. I arrived at 7:30 pm. House and room was unlocked and room AC was on.
Salem was hot and humid.

I loved room decor.

I think room decor was updated since my previous stay.
Place was amazing! It had everything we needed and more. Comfortable & charming!

My son and I had a lovely stay at Elizabeth’s. There was a small “bonus” room that was perfect for him and the space was so beautiful & comfortable. Lots of thoughtful details — plentiful coffee, water, baked goods & snacks; very easy check-in and communication. We feel so lucky to have found this gem — and hope to be back!
Great location, beautiful grounds, awesome host and a lovely little town. Who could ask for anything more. Would definitely stay again next time we’re in Salem!

We really like staying at Elizabeth's house in Salem.  The rooms are big, comfortable and very well stocked.  She has every detail covered.  Our son is attending Corban University and this is a good location for visits with our son!
I had an amazing stay. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for somewhere to stay in the area!!

Staying at Elizabeth's place was a high point of my vacation in Salem!  I had the master suite with King bed and ensuite bathroom at Vista Manor. Bright space with windows all around with lovely views of the gardens. Large, beautiful space. Included an extra room with twin bed and good closet space. She thought of everything. Close in location.  It was wonderful after a day out to come home to this place. I would definitely recommend that others pick this airbnb.
I enjoy staying here. it's private and comfortable
Always enjoy staying at Vista Manor. It’s like staying with someone’s family—and amazing home.
What a beautiful and comfortable place to stay with so many sweet animals and a lovely garden area! Really good location for visiting Salem or even Portland. Thank you.

This might be my favorite airbnb spot so far. The house is absolutely lovely, the room was half the size of our house! The landscaping outside is worth mentioning because they clearly put a lot of effort into it. The location is ideal for anything you would need. My son loved watching the ducks and chickens run around the backyard. Every single detail was thought of for our stay in the sense of supplies. The care package in the bathroom with extra toothbrush, wipes, etc was greatly appreciated. Our host was so welcoming, accommodating, and friendly. 10/10 would recommend. Honestly I would come back here just for some R&R...

Lovely well-tended place,  with an abundance of space for airbnb guests and visitors.  Very separate from host's living space.  Very comfortable bed,  spacious room (I was in the Bird room) with fun and pretty decor fitting the house style.  Large well-equipped bath with a lovely stained glass window and claw foot tub/ shower.  Elizabeth provides plenty of supplies from cotton wipes to bandaids to sewing kit! Small fridge,  coffee maker,  supplies- she's very generous.  Everything was clearly communicated and responses were timely.  Elizabeth is a lovely host with a lovely home. Location in South Salem was perfect for my needs,  ample parking, lovely setting off of the street in a hill. Quiet and friendly with lovely outdoor space,  geese, chickens- but only if you want to see them!  Highly recommended.
My stay with Elizabeth was perfect. Room was clean and spacious and location was perfect for visiting family nearby.
As always, a peaceful homey stay.  I’m a frequent flyer and Elizabeth and her support team are excellent.
As usual, Elizabeth did not disappoint. We’ve stayed there several times and it’s perfect in every way.

Elizabeth is the true definition of SUPER HOST.
Loved my stay and would definitely recommend to someone else.
Comfortable bed and spacious accommodations. Cool house!

Always a delight to stay at Elizabeth’s in any season, but Fall and summer seam like our favorites.  It’s either cozy fires or floating in the pool. Elizabeth is an excellent host, always attentive, and the house is amazing. Elizabeth, if you ever choose to sell, I can see being an Airbnb host in my future.  Taking over this dream property would be an honor!
House was very well set up. Very clean and comfortable. We will look up availability on our next trip.
Lovely place to stay, lovely hosts.
My home away from home for the last few years when in Salem to visit my elderly mother.  Beautiful home and grounds, attentive and gracious host

This property is phenomenally beautiful and centrally located and Elizabeth is also phenomenal!

She’s thought of everything and her attention to detail is amazeballs and she goes above and beyond to make sure your stay is to your liking!

It’s quiet and gorgeous and has everything you could want or need and more and the price is reasonable as well!!

This is my second visit at Vista Manor and I’m sure I’ll be back again!!

Thank you again Elizabeth 🥳💚

another phenomenal stay at Vista Manor!!

was warm and toasty and quiet and beautiful and I can't express enough how grateful I am for Elizabeth making our stays welcoming, not wanting for anything. ***hugs***
ps I'd have stayed longer if the rooms weren't all booked!
Terrific attention to hospitality! Comfortable, convenient, clean.
Always love staying at Elizabeth’s house. She is the perfect host and her place is immaculate.
Elizabeth's home is an oasis. Quiet, comfortable, and a few really cute chickens.

Elizabeth was an amazing host!  She allowed my privacy the first couple of nights, then because of the extreme weather conditions was very communicative and accommodating. She went well above and beyond! Had a very charming experience!! Would love to return.

While traveling, what better place to be in during an ice storm!  Elizabeth built a fire for us in the great room, which was so cozy and decorated very lovely, complete with a tree and collections of ornaments and santas,  all colorful and cheerful for Christmas.  Because we and the other client weren't able to go out for food on our second night there, Elizabeth and her family invited us all to a lovely, yummy dinner in the family dining room.  We had comfortable dinner conversations and were treated to a beautifully set table with bright candelabras as well.  We have shared the information with friends and do plan to stay with Elizabeth again one day.  Happy New Year!!!

It was a comfortable place to stay close to where our kids live in Salem..
We're heading back in a couple of weeks and looking forward to staying in the even bigger Suite!
We look forward to a stay with Elizabeth. Certainly as advertised and better.

We really enjoyed our stay. The house we beautifully decorated for Christmas. The amenities--it seemed like everything was thought of. I'm a person who has a lot of scar tissue thus requiring a very soft bed. The bed was a little hard for me, But I found a foam mattress in the closet which I put on top of it and there were plenty of extra sheets, so those solved that issue for me. We really appreciated all the thought that went into this AirBnB!

Very responsive host, just as advertised!

Attention to detail.

Thank you for your hospitality!
A beautiful setting.  Excellent communication.  Special, extra touches (fresh banana bread, fruit/chocolate bread).
Thanks Elizabeth - the stay was just right for our week-end and close to our kids.  So nice to come back to at night and very quiet....We'll keep you in mind for another time.   Gerri
My daughter loved the place so much .. Loved all the small touches fresh muffins… she was very comfortable. We will definitely be going back for sure! Super lovely host ! Thanks so much
Awesome stay! The place was very clean with nice homey touches. I would definitely stay here again.

Elizabeth is a great house and her home is even more lovely! It’s like staying at a bed and breakfast. Everything you could need, or want, was in the room or readily available. My husband and I stayed in the King suite with our dog and LOVED all the bird decor. Seems like each room has its own little decor theme - next time, I may be opting for the elephants. Even our dog was calm throughout the night, which is rare in “hotels.”

Also, there are chickens and they are so fun to watch! Big chicken fan and I enjoyed their presence, as well as the ducks, on property.

Will definitely stay again the next time I’m in Salem!
We have stayed with Elizabeth many times before and we enjoyed our stay this time as we always do!
I had to stay an extra night due to bed weather. Elizabeth was quick to get me booked to stay and was very helpful with making the accommodations. It was a pleasant stay as always!

I have stayed here several times now and will do so again. Elizabeth is a wonderful host who cares about the well being of her guests. She goes above and beyond to create a welcoming, comfortable, homelike shelter for we travelers.
Nice, comfortable room. Appreciate the snacks and bottled water. Great location.

This is the second time I have stayed with Elizabeth. Both times have been fantastic. What impresses me most is her attention to detail. Each room has a theme, and they are all decorated beautifully. I have been made to feel very welcome, and couldn’t ask for any better place to stay.

Absolutely loved the place!  The room is tasteful decorated and extremely comfortable.  Elizabeth goes to extremes to make your stay more enjoyable.  With fresh fruit, snacks and water readily available, there was nothing that was lacking. We highly recommend it and will definitely book it upon our return.
The host canceled this reservation 45 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is such a great place to stay! I’m a travel nurse and my partner and I stayed at Victoria’s place for 9 months. We ended up extending my contract twice because we loved it so much! It’s spacious and cozy, we felt right at home immediately. Victoria is SO sweet, she was super quick to respond anytime we had a question or issue. Her husband Don lives intermittently in the apartment next door so he was around to fix anything broken and planting flowers in the flower bed. The neighborhood is ADORABLE, and it’s a super short walk to the beautiful Bush Park (and the hospital, so it was perfect for me). I could not recommend this place more!
Christine is a wonderful Host, she is fun and clear and warm. I loved her library and the art, a musician and artist as well. Simply a lot of goodness rolled into one delightful person!
Great location, smooth check in process, no complaints.
Great room! Christina was wonderful!

Warm, welcoming house with a great host! Room has comfy bed (on the hard side but comfy), great chair, space heater, not a ton of extras but a very homey room with everything I need. Good shared bathroom, kitchen, and common areas.

Christina was very accommodating! She was flexible about checking in late, as we were driving home to Seattle from SF on a road trip. She even upgraded us to the basement unit, which had its own private entry and we had the entire place to ourselves! The check out was late too, so we were able to sleep in and really enjoy the place. I definitely recommend booking with her!

Had a beautiful time with these dear people! The bed was very comfortable, and place was quiet -- we had a great rest! They made us feel very much at home and welcomed! Enjoyed the little talk-time in the morning, and they made us feel comfortable to make our coffee and sandwiches for the trip. Highly recommend them and their comfy cozy space!
Christina and her partner are very lovely people. They were thoughtful and accomadating to my last minute booking.

Christie's place was awesome. We enjoyed our stay immensely because Christie and her fiance Arnaud were very warm and friendly. The house is close to the capitol and we were able to walk there for our business which was very convenient. We hope to come stay again in the future.
Wonderful Stay!!!
The cat is a nibbler, it's cute as heck.

This place was just as described, cute, conveniently located near the capital in Salem. We unfortunately arrived late and left early, but when we did see Christina and her partner they were both charming and accommodating. Great place to stay for a night or two!
Comfortable, clean, unassuming, nonintrusive.  Christina went on with her life and made it easy for me to fit in.
