Linda’s home was beautiful, clean, and cozy. Linda met us the first day to help us check in and talk through WiFi, house rules, etc. We had a wonderful stay and would happily stay here again!
Excellent!

Adorable, welcoming home in delightful neighborhood. Very comfortable and convenient. Linda is a terrific communicator and extremely responsive host. We even enjoyed a fragrant fully decorated Christmas tree during our stay.
This place is beautiful and comfortable.  I would definitely stay here again.  It was perfect!

This was a very cute small house on a  quiet street within walking distance from downtown Salem.  The space was very comfortable and perfect for the two of us but would be big enough for a family or two couples.   We were only there for a night so we didn't get to explore too much but we did get a great walk in at Minto-Brown Park which is nearby on the Willamette River.  The home was very clean and had everything we needed to feel at home - even a Christmas tree!
Lovely house in a quiet, yet central location. If you're ever attending anything downtown, this is a great option.
Beautiful home, lovely art, very clean, comfortable, and cozy. Nicer than we expected --  we wished our itinerary allowed us to stay longer.  :-)
This is a gem, will definitely be back when I visit my Mother!
Beautiful little place with such a convenient location to downtown salem! We had such a relaxing stay in Linda’s place.
Very nice and clean.
A lovely, homey place to stay.  Close to downtown, but in a quiet neighborhood.

If you are looking for a clean, quiet place to rest, then look no further!  This is your place!  Linda is a great host. She responds to any questions very quickly. She gives great suggestions on dining options.  She gives complete privacy!!  Also, she doesn’t go “ overboard on cleaning fees. She is a very fair host.  I would choose to stay here again if i was in the area.

Linda is a wonderful host. We were happy we were able to meet her. She has a very cozy comfortable home. We were very at home in the cottage. Beautiful kitchen, nice artwork and very comfortable bed.
We would highly recommend staying at Linda’s. Super location in a quiet neighborhood.
We will be back when working in Salem. Jamie & Raytcho

Nice home, a short walking distance to Bush Park.  Nicely located in older part of town in a neighborhood with some well maintained, classic properties.  For those who don’t want to drive around, a not-too-bad-walk to the shopping district.  For those who do, this house is strategically located for exploring the areas around Salem.
Sweet, simple house with lots of natural light and fully functional kitchen and nice, deep tub.

Linda's place was lovely and bigger than we expected. We were a group of 4 and felt like we had plenty of space. Beautiful artwork adorns the wall and there is a lovely old tree in the backyard that I imagine must be wonderful to sit under in the summer :) Thanks Linda! We'll be back!

Again, Linda went above and beyond to ensure that our needs were met even though there were last minute changes in our itinerary. She is a terrific host and her home is so comfortable and inviting with special seasonal touches. The added comforters on the beds are gorgeous!
Would definitely recommend this home! Beautiful, cozy and the perfect getaway from the mundane. Linda is very sweet and loving
Very nice!
Had to come back to Salem for a business meeting and chose here vs other places in Salem that we’ve stayed.... very homey place!
Lovely spacious home, not too far from downtown. Excellent communication.
Linda is a gracious host and her cottage was a perfect home away from home for a weeklong stay.  Great neighborhood.

This is an adorable home in a beautiful, older, well kept neighborhood - perfect for walks and exploring, and close to great coffee shops and shopping.  The house itself is so wonderful!  Warm, cozy, lovely open floor plan, great full kitchen, cute seating areas, lots of windows and natural light, I could go on and on.  This was my first Air BNB experience and this home and host, Linda, far exceeded my expectations.  We'll definitely stay here again!
An adorable house in an adorable neighborhood within reasonable walking distance of downtown Salem and Bush Park.

Cute, cozy cottage on a quiet residential street. We had been on the road for college visits and Linda's home was such a great break from hotel rooms. It's very comfortable and clean, and we got to Willamette University in about ten minutes. Thank you, Linda!
Had a very nice time in Linda's home. House was very comfortable.  I was a bit concerned about the age if the cottage, but had no reason to be. Everything was updated and cozy.

Great to have a whole house, and a lovely house it is.  Cozy with lots of original art and a nice, deep tub for soaking.  We stayed in the winter but there is a sweet back deck that would be great in the warmer weather.  Linda is super-friendly and attentive.  Would stay again!

We had a wonderful time at Linda’s place. The house is spacious, comfortable, sparkling clean and in a great location. Check-in and check-out were very easy and Linda is a great host. We’ll definitely plan to stay with Linda again the next time we are in Salem.
Very cozy, prime location, beautiful & unique home all around.
The house is centrally located in a quiet part of Salem.  It is quite comfortable and sparkling clean.   I would not hesitate to return to it the next time that I visit Salem.
Great location and value!!!
Beautiful home in a great location. Clean, comfortable and with lots of charm. Linda was very sweet and was quick to respond. We definitely recommend Linda’s place!

Linda's home is charming and filled with art.  It was warm and inviting during a cold spell and we were very comfortable there.  Linda checked in with us to make sure all was well and went out of her way to accommodate an unusual request that we made.  I hope to be back again soon!

Linda has touches that go above and beyond Airbnb I've stayed at in the past. Great price for an extremely nice place. I have another trip upcoming in Salem and I'll be booking again if it's available.
Meets our needs perfectly. Linda is amazingly hospitable.
Beautiful home, super clean, and very cozy.  Cant wait to stay again!

Linda's house was perfect! I  was in Salem for a quick overnight visit while my daughter visited Willamette. After a full day of walking it was so nice to come "home" to Linda's clean, comfortable place. I enjoyed a nice hot bath in the sparkling clean bathroom and a wonderful night's sleep on the super comfy bed. I appreciate the nice touches like plenty of towels and high quality linens on the bed. The coffee supplies for the morning were also greatly appreciated. The neighborhood was quiet and I actually skipped one of my scheduled morning activities so I could stay in the cozy bed a bit longer. I was not bothered by any traffic noise, including trains. I will definitely be back.
A wonderful and well located find.

Linda was such a wonderful host! She is so sweet and accommodating, and her house is gorgeous (I would say her pictures don’t do it justice). We only stayed one night but it was delightfully cozy and nice—wish we could have stayed longer!
Logement parfait pour une famille et au calme, fonctionnel. Bien écouter les conseils de linda sur les commerces de proximité ou choses à découvrir.
This was a perfect little house for a family!!!
Darling little cottage perfectly accommodated for our stay. Very clean and comfortable, wonderful communication from host. Lovely neighborhood too, we plan to stay again!
Linda's place is great - super clean and close to town.

The cottage was charming inside and out. Easy communication and instructions. Linda thought of all the little things to make her guests feel at home. Could walk to the river and downtown.  Grocery stores a short drive away. Would definitely stay again.

We enjoyed our stay very much,very clean and everything we needed. Linda responded very quickly to any of our questions even when she was on a camping trip. We highly recommend  her cute place,we will definitely stay again.
Linda’s space was incredibly charming, clean and comfortable. We had the best time making a home cooked meal and enjoying coffee out on the front porch :)

We spent a week at this lovey home while attending our Granddaughters’ wedding in Salam.
Spotless & roomy with all conveniences needed, comfy bedding, robes and all the necessary kitchen appliances – including a well-stocked Nespresso coffee maker.
The home owner is next door, but totally left to ourselves. She gave great advice on where to eat and visit.
Lovely quit neighborhood. Would plan on staying here when visiting in the future.

Linda’s home was wonderful. We only stayed one night, passing through Salem in a road trip, but we were wishing we could stay longer. Beautiful decorations, comfortable furniture, all sorts of amenities. We highly recommend this stay!

You will not want to leave this little cottage, rain or shine!  When we pulled up and saw the apartment buildings nearby, we thought, "uh oh" noisy.  Not at all!  The area is quiet and pleasant.  Walk the neighborhood if you have a chance.  The gardens are beautiful and the  houses charming.  Sit on the porch in the rocking chairs and wave to neighbors or talk to the mailman walking by or just read a book.  Then there is the deck in the back with beautifully planted flower pots and lights at night.  Another charming reading space is in the kitchen nook with skylights.  You cannot go wrong with Linda's place. My husband walked to the convention center for a conference and Bush Park is walking distance.

A charming home in a beautiful neighborhood on a tree lined street with a gorgeous garden and outdoor living space. We stayed here as a young family of four and the breakfast nook made for a wonderful place to start our day before the kids woke up. (The blackout shades in the bedrooms helped maximize the sleep in time for our two little boys)
Everything from the complimentary coffee and creamer to the comfortable furnishings made this a home away from home. Linda went out if hey way to make sure we had everything we needed and more, even making extra unrequested accommodations for our infant.
Be aware that the double beds in the rooms are best for slender or extremely cuddly couples. Fortunately we're at least one of those attributes
We hope to come again soon and repeat our experience.

This is the perfect place for either an overnight stay while traveling through Salem, or a longer visit to the area. Communication with Linda was super easy, she met us make checking in easy and pleasant.

The home is incredibly nice and comfortable, with every amenity, comfortable beds, tons of towels, nestled in a quiet neighborhood.

I can’t recommend this home highly enough!

Lovely cottage!  In addition to being in a great location Linda’s cottage is beautifully decorated and she provided several extras. She prepared the house by turning on the air conditioning so the house was cool when we arrived. There were fresh flowers and lovely artwork on display. Additional extras included nespresso pods, milk steamer, and half and half. We will definitely be returning!

Linda’s place was a perfect spot located in a quaint neighborhood full of beautiful homes and landscaping. I immediately felt at home here. Linda greeted us when we arrived and showed us around.  Comfy beds, great shower. Wouldn’t change a thing! Thanks so much!
You may expect helpful communications, clean cottage, great location, sweet host!
Beautiful home.  Responsive hostess despite our later arrival.  Comfortable and very best and clean.  I loved her decorative tastes.

We loved our stay here. We felt right at home. The house is in a great neighborhood. My mom took walks almost every morning. She is in her 70's and I didn't worry about her safety or getting lost. The porch was so nice to sit and have my morning coffe. Beds were comfortable and everything was clean. If we needed anything Linda was right there to help. We would definitely stay again if we come this way in the future.
Adorable house, lovely deck for sipping wine and relaxing.  Linda was the best!
Wonderful, clean and comfortable home! A sweet place to stay in Salem, OR.

Linda’s place was such a great home to stay in Salem. The location is so close to downtown that you could walk. The house was incredibly clean and felt comfortable immediately upon entering. The space is laid out great as a vacation home with a wonderful kitchen and back area. Linda was very thoughtful and bought some milk so that we could use here milk frothed and Nespresso machine to make some morning lattes. I would recommend staying here!
Linda's house was a joy to stay at!
This place was exactly what we expected. It was beautiful, clean, and comfortable. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great place to stay!
Super clean, super friendly host. The place is beautiful and stylish. Enjoyed the stay. Would recommend the place specially if you are traveling with kids

My family and I had a great time at this adorable Airbnb. It is located in a beautiful walking neighborhood and close to restaurants. It was very clean and had comfortable beds, pillows, and sheets. Linda was a great host and provided us with a Nespresso and milk frother.  My family and I plan on staying here again when we visit next year!
Linda was very accommodating!  House was super clean, all the amenities, quaint cute cottage

We really enjoyed our stay in this comfortable home.  The location is a short walk to Bush’s Pasture Park and close to downtown.  We loved the quiet neighborhood , the conveniently stocked kitchen and the tasteful decorating both inside and out.  Everything about Linda’s home said welcome.  I certainly would not hesitate to come again.

Linda's place is wonderful, easy to access, and comfortable - we felt right at home in Salem. She was a kind and gracious host. We would definitely stay again if in town and recommend her place to friends and family.
Incredible home.  Big, lovely and super charming.  Wish we could have stayed longer.

The location was perfect and very close to Bush Pasture Park. The house was very clean and comfortable in a woodsy setting and very private. We will be back for sure!
Highly recommend!!!
Nice place
A wonderful cottage/house in a lovely neighborhood. Linda was a very nice host and we enjoyed the entire experience in her home.
Super cute house and neighborhood.

Great place and just like the pictures, the house was very clean when we arrived. Unfortunately toilet seat hinge broke which is a wear and tear item while we were there for one night and she wanted us to pay for it

This is a very nice 2-bedroom house in a great location - a 5-minute drive to downtown and just blocks away from Bush park. The house is very clean and many amenities (especially in the bathroom and kitchen) are included. Linda was a gracious host and responded to our inquiries quickly. She met us at the house and showed us around. We would stay here again!
Very comfortable and cozy place that will make you remember every detail of it. Very good location as well
fantastic stay!!!
This home is so cute, I actually wish we had stayed longer in such a lovely space. The bed was comfortable and everything was neat and tidy.

Linda’s place is adorable. Clean, comfortable, perfect for my family of four. Linda allowed me to use her personal washer/dryer, which was incredibly kind of her and helpful.
I give Linda and her AirBnB five stars.

We had a great experience. The home is well latest out, spacious, and super clean. Nice neighborhood and beautiful landscaping. Communication from Linda was clear and she made it it really easy to enjoy the short time we had in Salem. I would recommend this home to anyone.
Linda’s place is perfect. Her house is cute and comfortable. The location is great too, so close to downtown and easy walk to Bush park.
Linda is a gracious host. Her house was Sparkling clean, comfortable, and well stocked. The neighborhood is super quiet. I would love to visit again.
We really enjoyed our stay in this adorable home. Linda was very kind and helpful about places to go for dinner. We had a lovely time, and enjoyed all the artwork in the home.
Comfortable clean space. Had everything we needed. Nice interior design.
Linda's place is beautifully decorated and feels like a home.  Very clean, comfortable with A/C and a fully stocked kitchen for preparing meals.  Bonus points for the coffee.  Highly recommended.
Wonderful, charming, spacious we loved our stay at Linda's home.  Comfortable living room, full kitchen and fantastic patio out back. In a quiet neighborhood close to downtown.

Linda was so sweet! She was easy to get ahold of and we had everything we could need and more! You shouldn't past these place up, pictures don't due it justice and there was so much room! It was such a nice vacation then being able to come home to Linda's place was so nice! Her decor is so cute! Plus we had such a relaxing time! She has all the hookups, and her tub is awesome! If we are ever back in the area we will be booking with her again!

Excellent location, seamless check-in and check-out.  I prefer my stays to be private family time, and felt Linda completely respected that.  The cottage is gorgeously decorated and has a fantastic layout.  I would totally buy this house for my retirement.
Clean, comfortable and nicely decorated.  Very quiet neighborhood and great hospitality from our host.
Lovely, cozy home with a beautiful backyard with patio seating. Great location in south Salem.
Very clean and well laid out, good location in a quiet neighborhood about 20 minutes from downtown.  Would definitely return.
Loved our stay at Linda's house! Would highly recommend staying there if you're in the Salem area!
Such a Perfect house to stay at!
Very quaint home in a great location.  The house is very clean and comfortable.

My co-worker and I stayed at Linda's place while in town for work.  It was perfect for the 2 of us and it was only about a 10 min drive to the Capitol area.  The house was cozy and clean and the beds were extremely comfortable.  I really enjoyed checking out all of the wonderful artwork in the space.  The kitchen was well equipped and we appreciated the fact that Linda provided coffee, cream and OJ for the morning.  My co-worker went for a run in the early morning and felt very safe in the neighborhood.  Linda was very communicative and check in was a breeze.  I'd definitely stay here again.

I highly recommend
Linda's place. It is very clean and very relaxing. It is located on a very quiet residential street but also very close to restaurants. We hope to stay here again someday
Linda's home was very clean and peaceful! We slept very well.
Great cottage experience close to downtown Salem.

We had a group of 4 visiting for a wedding and couldn’t have been happier with our stay. The house was clean, comfortable, and well decorated. Linda was an amazing hostess and it was easy to get in touch with her for any questions. We only wish we could have spent more time in the house!

What a beautiful, cozy, and clean home.  The neighborhood is lovely too.  We enjoyed our stay so much and wish we could have stayed longer.  Linda is an amazing host.  If I ever need to stay in Salem again, I hope this home is available.
Linda’s cottage was just as described and she could not have been more helpful for a weekend of hiking, wineries and delicious food.
Very nice host. Had a great time!
The house is absolutely perfect for a relaxing get away.  Linda is a wonderful host.  This will always be my first choice for a place to stay in Salem.
Great location, roomy house, cozy bedrooms

Linda's house is in a lovely, walkable neighborhood with quick access by car to downtown Salem restaurants and brew pubs.  A natural foods grocery is minutes away to the south.  We had a good nights sleep and quiet  mornings.  Linda was available to welcome us in and tell us where we could find an organic/natural foods market.  The interior is as pictured and very cozy.  We had some cool nights but with zonal thermostats in each bedroom and the living area, we were never cold.  A great stay and convenient for exploring Silver Falls State Park--a must do hike!

This is my second stay at Linda's place and I expect I'll be staying here again the next time I'm in Salem. Her house is very clean, comfortable, and just lovely with artwork and other nice touches. The bedrooms are on the small side but beds are super comfortable with good quality linens. Linda is also very responsive if you need to contact her during your stay. Overall a great stay!

A very comfortable, relaxing house with all of the amenities that we needed.  It is in a charming neighborhood that was very convenient to downtown Salem, local parks, museums, the Capital and the University.  Linda was most hospitable and helpful with info about the house and the City as well as the small towns and countryside surrounding Salem.  We would definitely stay there again.   Alan and Sharon
This small cozy house is a wow! Great location being close to town and Willamette University. Neat as a pin and sparkling clean. Would return in a heartbeat.
Linda is a gracious host.  You will feel welcome.
Linda is a wonderful host - very responsive and her place was very clean and well stocked. The neighborhood is very charming and quiet.

Very cozy and everything was updated and really clean. If we had stayed longer we could have used the kitchen appliances, which were really nice. There was Netflix available, the beds were cozy, and we played apples to apples at the table! A+ .. would come back.

This house is so comfy and clean! Linda the host is beyond nice. She had everything we could have needed available. And she even babysat for us when a crazy turn of events left us with no sitter. I don't think it's possible to like a hostess more than we like Linda.
Bed was comfortable and the ductless heating worked perfectly.
Home is in a beautiful historic neighborhood with shopping and restaurants within walking distance.

I would not want to stay anywhere in Salem but at Linda's Airbnb! This property is not only beautiful but it is close to everything Salem has to offer! She is an amazing hostess, and even had a portacrib and high chair for my granddaughter! I really cannot say enough positive things about our stay there. I look forward to my next visit!

The location of Linda’s place was perfect for our trip.  We took our 7 year old with us and it was a wonderful neighborhood to take a walk in and she loved watching the squirrels and enjoyed all the crunchy leaves.
Very clean with awesome beds! I slept like a baby. The house is in a great location and was sparkling clean. Would definitely stay there again!

Clean.
Quiet.
Comfortable.
Well-appointed.
Linda's place is so spacious, comfortable, clean, and quiet. The cottage was very updated. We absolutely loved our stay.

Linda's house was so comfortable, clean and quiet. Plenty of space for three adults, close to a few walkable spots to grab a bite and a very quick drive to downtown Salem eateries and shops.

Linda always responded quickly and provided plenty of information for our stay. If we find ourselves in Salem in the future we'll know where to stay!

This is my second time staying here.  It's in a great location with restaurants within walking distance.  The house is very clean and comfortable.  I love the artwork in the space.  The beds are very comfortable and coffee and cream have been supplied both times during my stays.  I highly recommend Linda's place and I will definitely stay here again.

We really enjoyed our stay! The home was darling. Linda was incredibly responsive and accommodating. She has a pack n play and there is a tub—both things that are so helpful with little ones. We would absolutely stay again.
Excellent place to stay.  Very spacious and clean cottage.  In a very nice, quiet neighborhood.  The bed is amazingly comfortable.  Thanks Linda for opening your home to us!
The place was nice and clean and beds were comfortable.  We will stay again.
This place was perfect and Linda was super helpful and available if we needed anything. It was close to everything and super comfortable!
A wonderful cottage, an incredible deal, and an excellent host.
Very clean space, welcoming touches, great and fast communication by host.
Perfectly quaint cottage. Clean, comfortable and charming.

Linda is a wonderful and responsive host. Her place has everything you can need more and is such a sweet and comfortable environment. The beds were comfy and all essential amenities were already there. You will not regret reserving this cute and cozy home!

Linda's Airbnb is a great location and homie. The space was clean and had nice touches here and there. Linda was a great hostess and was quick to respond to requests. This is a perfect Airbnb location in Salem, OR, and at a decent price. Enjoy!
Super cute house and very clean!
Great spot in Salem. Cute and cozy home. Perfect!
Lovely place - very clean, great amenities, and prime location. Would stay here again next time!
Amazing location, close to I-5, large private space, clean and equipped with amenities. I highly recommend for visitors to Salem or that route to try out stay with Linda.
Great value.

Linda’s place was perfect for our quick stay in Salem. It’s very cute, clean, and has everything you might need for a stay. It’s located close to many amenities and a good walk from downtown. The neighborhood is very pretty! Thanks, Linda!
Linda’s home is beautiful and  she is so incredibly welcoming and knowledgeable about the area
Thank you to Linda for a comfortable, convenient and stylish place to stay. Highly recommended!
Linda’s place was lovely. I was traveling for work and it made it much more homey than if I’d gone with a hotel. The house is great, no complaints at all
It was a great place, very comfortable. Appreciated the coffee touches and small details. Great value
Great place! Very clean. Central location. Very homie
Linda's place is just as it seems in the pictures.  Cute, well appointed,  clean and with a wonderful location 2 blocks from Bush park.
This was a really nice clean space. The fresh flowers were a nice touch too
Amazing place to stay and very clean and  Linda does a great job of making the place feel like home. Would definitely recommend staying there

Modern, but quaint...stylish, but not cluttered...small space, but seems large. What an amazing place so close to such amazing wines. Immediately after getting there we all wanted to stay longer. Linda is attentive, check in/out is easy, and the location is prime. Dare I say she should charge more for staying there O.o Thank you for sharing your space and your 2 for one wine tasting coupons with us!

Linda's cottage is an adorable assortment of charming art belying a well-appointed and highly functional little space that should serve even the most demanding traveler expecting the comforts of home. Everything was so comfortable, easy-to-use, and adorable, and I truly hope I have the opportunity to come back sometime! Linda was such a welcoming and communicative host, and I think this cottage is an absolute gem for anyone needing a quiet place to live in Salem for a couple days or weeks!

Wow! Linda’s home is incredible. It is so clean, so cute, so relaxing, so comfortable. I wanted to move in and never leave. Linda is super sweet and a very helpful and accommodating host. Can’t wait to stay again!
Great location, very charming 2 bedroom with queen & full size beds & full kitchen.  Lovely spot in Salem. Will definitely stay here again.

This home is outstanding. We’ve stayed in several Airbnb’s in Salem and Linda’s home really stands out. It’s been recently updated and is immaculately clean. She’s prompt with all communications. Highly recommend this home. .
Fantastic host.  I have already highly recommended Linda’s place to friends and family visiting the Salem area.
Excellent 2 bedroom with all the necessities, done in a tasteful, welcoming decor. Totally stay here.
Lovely bungalow home in a quiet neighborhood. Close to restaurants and shops. Would highly recommend.

Great location close enough to the main thoroughfare but far enough to not hear or be bothered by the noise and traffic. Located in a quite tranquil neighborhood. The house was very clean and very comfortable with a stylish retro feel. Linda was a great host and made sure we had everything we needed. I would definitely stay here again and or recommend it to friends or family.
Linda is a very friendly and helpful host  The cottage is lovely and in a very nice neighborhood.
Great location, very clean and comfortable!  We enjoyed our stay and we would definitely stay here again.  Linda was very responsive and helpful.
Great location, easy drive to everything, very clean, beautiful space.
Super cute house, wonderful touches such as coffee and butter. The place was so clean it squeaked!  A very thoughtful and considerate hostess. Do stay if you are visiting Salem

Linda’s home is absolutely beautiful and charming, clean, inviting, and the perfect place to stay while you are in Salem. The neighborhood is quiet, and Linda’s touches and thoughtfulness make your stay perfect. We are so happy we stayed and will definitely be back again. Thank you for your awesome hospitality!
Clean, spacious and quaint. Exactly as described. Would absolutely stay in this beautiful cottage again.
Such a dreamy and comfortable stay!!! Thank you Linda!!!!
Great space, clean, spacious

This house is a delightful little gem in a quiet residential neighborhood. It’s sparkling clean, comfortable, and stylish. Lovely Bush Pasture Park is a few blocks away. Both downtown and Willamette are within walking distance. I am planning to come back here again.

This places feels just like home.  Linda is amazing and quick to respond.  Even came and introduced herself to me.  The back yard is nice and relaxing as well.  It’s a perfect place to get away and feel like at home at the same time.  I would definitely recommend this place and would come back in a heart beat!!!!!
Best place to stay in Salem.  I will definitely be booking again when I come back to Salem.
Really nice spot, great location
Great amenities, fabulous decor and so comfortable. Will be back!

Linda's place is wonderful!  The house is clean and has super cool art throughout.  The neighborhood was SUPER quiet at night and felt very safe.  The back deck was great for take out dinner and drinks both nights that we were there.  We would definitely stay here again!
It was a wonderful stay again!!!! It’s always beautiful and amazing.  I can’t wait to come back and stay again!!!!!
You will definitelylive Linda's place. I highly recommend staying there.

We enjoyed Linda's home. The owner takes pride in her home and the landscaping. She does live in a small cabin in back yard so if one has a problem she's right there. I was concerned with both  (hers and ours) privacy playing in the back yard with our grandchild.
Nice location

Linda is amazing, she is just as amazing as her place. She offered great hospitality, provided us with a quick brief tour of her lovely home. The house was polished clean with great amenities for those who are traveling. The wi-fi was super fast and the finishing touches to the home were outstanding, as a traveler you feel right at home. Access to the laundry/washer unit was fairly easy, it was just a small walk down to the basement linked to the home. I would definitely come back to stay 100%

Linda’s home was just as described.  Very clean and tidy.  Super quiet neighborhood great for an evening stroll.  All the amenities you could need and additional conveniences. We would definitely stay there again when we pass through.
Great little place, I would recommend it to anyone.
Very quick response. Helped me and my coworkers not have to drive all night back to Washington. Beautiful place and super close to lots of things.
This is such a great listing! Super cute and safe neighborhood, incredibly clean home, Linda was so easy to work with and so helpful!
House was so cute and cozy! So perfect for a relaxing getaway.
Linda is amazing and her place is sparkling clean.  She made our stay relaxing and enjoyable.
Perfect location on a quick trip to Salem For the Trail of Ten Falls hike. Easy entry, very clean home. Love the espresso!
10/10 recommend! Great price for a great place in a great location!
Clean and cute- we enjoyed our stay!
A fabulous home!  Very clean, well stocked, comfortable beds, awesome patio and front porch, great location, very quiet, and wonderful communication and hospitality!

This home has surpassed my expectations, warm, comfortable, within distance to really just about everything. Her aesthetic is vibrant and inviting, with playful art and great feng shui. She provides ample space to stretch out and relax, with an AMAZING kitchen that I literally had to tell everyone I know about. That fridge! The cute cups! Every little detail was incredibly well thought out with love and care.

I came here with my coworker and her daughter to study for a big test the next morning, our car was parked in front of the home. Sadly while we were sleeping we had a small break in to our vehicle, first time ever happening to this Airbnb. Linda was quickly notified, she answered and came immediately to assist with professional integrity. She made us feel evry welcome and secure albeit the circumstance, because she was so graceful and kind to us I would not hesitate to stay again. She truly is an amazing host, as I have worked as a hotel manager before- she has more poise than I ever would during our situation. Kudos, Linda. See you soon!


Angelena

Linda's cottage was great! So cozy, quiet and relaxing. Really appreciated the outdoor backyard patio where we had dinner and the front porch rocking chairs, which were so relaxing. Great amenities in the kitchen and bathroom, including bathrobes. Would definitely stay here again and for an even longer stay.
Beautiful & cozy home inside & out. Thanks for all the touches that made us feel right at home. We sure enjoyed the gardens & outdoor spaces. Thanks Linda!

Linda has made it a very comfortable place where we could get some rest from our travels.  The neighborhood was beautiful. We loved playing cribbage on the back deck under the oak tree.  This is probably one of the cleanest Airbnb we've stayed.  Loved all the special touches Linda has at her home.
Had a great trip, Linda's home was perfect for what we needed. Thank you!
Amazing house! Linda was so friendly!

Linda's place was very nice. We appreciated how roomy and clean it was. The beds were comfortable and the AC kept it as cool as we liked. It was a five minute bike ride to downtown.

We will definitely stay there next time we are in Salem
Great place!  Clean and comfy, just what we needed!
Linda's cottage is truly a gem! A very nice and stylish place to stay at! You will have all the amenities you'll need. Linda's a great host!

You will love the house once you see it. Amazing art work from outside and inside. Unique decoration and sparking clean. Once you see the house you will understand that someone is really taking care of it with love. Each corner of the house will tell you a nice story and you will enjoy wonderful paintings and art works specially chosen for the decoration.
Backyard is also very nice. We enjoyed the morning coffee and evening that gives you a peace of mind there.
What a great little place! Beautifully decorated and clean. Adorable neighborhood and close to all we needed. Would definitely stay here again!
What a beautiful and charming cottage. Excellent location.  Very comfortable.  Glad we stayed here!

The pictures undersell Linda’s house. The main living area is spacious, the whole place is spotlessly clean, and the front porch is a great place to wind down after a long drive. The kitchen is nicely appointed, there are enough tools to do some real cooking if you are so inclined.
Best Pl., I’ve ever been in a long time really quiet neighborhood. The park is right down the street. No complaints whatsoever

Such a special home in a wonderful neighborhood.  Linda is a fantastic host.  I highly recommend Linda's home for anyone planning to visit Salem.  We really enjoyed talking summer evening walks in this lovely neighborhood.  Thank you Linda.
Beautiful house in a quiet and safe neighborhood. It was super clean with all the  amenities of home. Close to Willamette University and downtown Salem. Would definitely stay here again.
Great location. Stylish and clean space. Wonderful host.
Linda's place is very cute and in a great location. We enjoyed exploring the area around it. It has super cute little artistic touches throughout.

Linda prepared a wonderful welcome in a spotlessly clean home. I was traveling with my mom and that was important. The beds were comfortable and provided a great night’s rest on our long drive. We could cook easily, eat outside on her deck and enjoyed walking in her neighborhood. I would definitely come again. Thank you for the warm hospitality.

Linda’s place was the perfect place to stay for our small family during our vacation in the area. Much more was provided than other places we have stayed, which made things easy and comfortable. Couldn’t have asked for a better fit. The cleanliness was outstanding too! Thanks again!!!
Great place!
Cute spot in the perfect location for sight seeing or that overnight business trip. We will definitely come back!
My wife and I had a lovely stay. Linda was welcoming and made everything nice and easy. The house was very clean and had everything we needed. I would be happy to stay again.
Linda's place is located in a quiet neighborhood. It is very clean and cozy. Linda is very responsive and very kind! I can't say enough great things about her and he place.

What a gem!! Linda's place is very clean and the location is perfect for walking in the park or going downtown.  Linda is so kind and helpful.  We will always try to stay here when we visit Salem. You can't go wrong if you book Linda's place.

Linda met us at the door which we really appreciated. The house is decorated beautifully and so comfortable. It is a charming neighborhood of older craftsman’s. Restaurants and groceries are a short drive. We loved going for walks in the beautiful river park.
Well provisioned hosted and located property
Very nice home, we enjoyed it.  We loved the neighborhood.
Fantastic deal, gorgeous house, everything you need for a comfortable stay. Would definitely stay there again.
Linda’s place is like home away from home! Beds and pillows were very comfortable. We were able to enjoy our coffee on the back deck and enjoy the beautiful birds and peaceful place!
Charming Salem location, stylish decor, comfortable beds and she provides lots of coffee options and whole milk for the nespresso  machine. Thank you so much Linda!

Linda’s home was just perfect!   I was arriving late and leave early, and her check-in/check-out procedures made that very simple and easy.  The home was very clean and comfortable with a warm feel.  I will definitely stay again in return visits to Salem.

La casa estaba super limpia y muy comoda.
Regresare a rentar otra vez en casa de Linda.

Such a cute little home! Linda was very friendly and communicated really well with us. We had a minor problem with the fridge and she was there within 5 mins to fix it, that was something we really appreciated. Overall it was a great experience!
Very Clean home and very simple check in check out instructions. She added personalized touches to the home that made it feel homier. Really enjoyed our stay.
I had a very comfortable stay at this cute, welcoming house!
Linda's place is truly our favorite Air B and B spot in the United States. She has taken so much care to create at wonderfully comfortable space.
Best Salem Air unit I have stayed in.  If your looking at this and it's actually avail... RENT IT!
Great communication. So stylish!

The cottage is in a perfect spot for visiting a Willamette University student, or for exploring the Salem area. It is very cute, stylishly and fully appointed with all you need for a long weekend, and was spotlessly clean. We enjoyed our stay very much.
Linda’s place is an excellent value and wonderful, charming house in a charming neighborhood. A ‘must stay’ in Salem!
You can expect superior cleanliness and attentive hospitality from Linda!
So great, great, great. Very easy place to stay. Comfortable. Convenient. Thanks!!!
Linda's Airbnb is homie and cozy. The place has everything you need and is great for value. Enjoy your stay!
Linda's place is a great place to stay in Salem.  Its spacious and decorated so tastefully.  The neighborhood is quiet - so it's a great place to get a good night's rest.
Absolutely lovely!!
Charming little house, very much enjoyed my stay. Will definitely try to use again when I am in the area.
Such a cozy, cute space for a get away. Love that you can easily walk to the park.
Linda is a wonderful host.
The place was very clean, very accommodating, quick response and it was very affordable, made our trip!

We had a great time at Linda's place! I wish we could have spent more time there. The home is in a cute & quiet tree-lined neighborhood, everything was clean and comfortable. I really adored the kitchen space. Would definitely book again.

I'm going to preface this review by saying I'm sure Linda has written me a poor review for the night spent here and I'd like to touch on this.

It was my three friends and me, for the night. We are teenagers, yes, however, we are respectful teenagers.

Around 11 pm, we were playing water pong (no beer, just water), when Linda, the host, knocks on the door of the house without a mask on. I grab a mask and step outside to talk to her.
"CAN YOU READ? ARE YOU LITERATE!?" She spits.
I'm astounded she's speaking to me like this. I try to talk her down and explain how this absolutely isn't a party (everyone was mentioned in the Airbnb guest list) and how we aren't making a mess - to no avail. She keeps telling me to "shut up, you immature child." First of all, the whole time, I was being as respectful as one can be and picked up on the irony in that statement. Second of all, there was nothing we had done to deserve such a reaction - I have a video taken about an hour before checkout in which the house looks better than when we got there. We really don't know what set her off. But what we do know is that she made us feel very unwelcome and very uncomfortable that night.

I can say it's in a beautiful location, about a 5-minute walk to the park and we enjoyed our morning in Salem and the wonderful breakfast from the Sassy Onion.
Enjoyed our stay. Such a cute little bungalow. Loved her decor and art work!
Great house. Great host.  Would stay again.
Highly recommended! Great place we fantastic amenities.  Linda is a wonderful host.
Cutest place and decor! Great location too :)
This place truly felt like home. It was well equipped and cozy and kids had a great time. Wish we could stay longer.

My two relatives and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay in this charming cottage. We were enchanted by the stylish, artistic touches as soon as we walked in, admiring the paintings and decorations in unexpected places, such as the bathroom and the kitchen nook, which features a beautiful stained glass panel in the window. Highlights included watching a Netflix movie while curled up in front of the cozy fireplace in the evening and sitting in a rocking chair on the front porch in the morning, soaking up the sun while reading a good book. Thoughtful touches include robes for all guests, a hairdryer, and a bedside reading lamp. I look forward to staying in Linda's beautiful home again, and I hope to stay for more than one night next time.

Beautiful little house in a lovely, quiet neighborhood. Very comfortable beds. Has a nice kitchen with everything you need. We really enjoyed the walk through Bush's Pasture Park. Highly recommend staying at Linda's cottage!

Our second time staying at this beautiful home. Can’t wait to go back. Linda’s home exemplifies home away from home. The caring touches she has made makes you not want to leave. It’s a beautiful true craftsman bungalow that is light and airy and in a nice neighborhood. The decor is comfortable and well thought out. We love the front porch, fireplace, all the windows and comfortable mattress’s. Linda always responds quickly and is a wonderful host.
Thanks for another perfect weekend in Salem.

Linda’s place is situated in a very quiet and lovely neighborhood. The Airbnb is stocked with things in the kitchen that you can use to cook with if needed. The location is the Airbnb is perfect as well (close to downtown). Linda responds quickly and is very nice. I would definitely recommend this Airbnb and I would come back and stay in the future.
super clean, friendly and was able to accommodate. beautiful porch out back and a nice neighborhood. just a lovely stay. 10/10 would stay again
Linda’s home is absolutely delightful! Beautiful, great location, well stocked, fantastic deck! We really enjoyed our stay and plan to be back.
Linda was a great host and our accommodations couldn’t be more what we were looking for. Definitely would recommend for anyone searching for a charming house in the Salem suburbs. Loved it!
So clean, lots of great bonus features, nice to have the parking right out front. We loved the fire pit and Linda was so kind and accommodating.

I had a short one night stay at Linda‘s cottage in Salem. The house is super cute and comfortable as well as conveniently located in town. The front porch and the rear deck we’re very cute and comfortable with seating and lots of beautiful flowers. Linda provides many extra touches such as toiletries, spices, coffee etc. Check in was very easy and Linda was great with communication. I definitely stay here again when in the Salem area.

Nicely decorated with lots of personal touches (artwork, a couple of games people could use, bathrobes, well-written explanation of how things work....). Very clean. Patio out back to enjoy nice weather.
Linda is a wonderful host. This beautiful, clean home is in walking distance to Salem restaurants and is a great value! Highly recommend.

This is a special and beautiful home with comfortable beds, well designed kitchen and lovely living room. There are some features that really stand out, the rocking chairs on the porch, the delicious espresso machine, the close-up mirror for applying make-up and the luxuriously roomy tub.  Linda was a kind and gracious host.  She was helpful. She has poured a lot of love and time into this property. This is apparent from the moment you arrive and view the plethora of flowers and plants growing outside.
Wonderful little bungalow in Salem; we enjoyed a brief but comfortable stay along our drive up the Pacific Northwest. Definitely recommend it to other travelers!
The place was amazing!! Special touches, comfortable beds and top notch quality from coffee maker to TV. Will definitely stay here again

This quaint little home was everything we needed for a quiet and restful evening after traveling. It was cleaner than any place I have seen. I would literally give this place 10 stars if I could. Individual AC units in each room kept it perfectly cool for us. One bed is softer than the other so if you prefer either just feel them out first. The couch itself was so comfy with the fireplace I almost fell asleep there. super friendly host with excellent communication. I always felt like I could reach Linda. The location is ideal - quiet residence with easy access to a few eateries. The patio out back was nice also for relaxing with my family after a long day of travel. My only regret is that we didn't have more time here! 10 of 10 would stay again
We had a great stay!  Linda is a wonderful host.  The house is so cute.  We had a great time in Salem!
Really lovely cottage. We stayed there for one night and we had absolutely everything we needed. Would absolutely stay there again if Im visiting the area.

This cottage is wonderful. Beautifully remodeled with high end products. Furniture and decorations are add a peacefulness to the overall  cottage.  Location is perfect. It's located in the historic district of Salem. Beautiful landscaping adds to the cottage quaint feeling.
House was super clean and cozy. Nicely decorated with just the right amount of amenities.

Outstanding host with great communication for us, including when we left behind some keys.  The house is very well appointed and comfortable; my family of four all enjoyed our stay.  Everything was just as we expected from the listing descriptions and photos.  highly recommended.
Great place to stay! It was super clean and had all the amenities. Quiet neighborhood too. Linda was an amazing host!
Amazing host, great communication and fabulous home!

Linda is an excellent host with a lovely home. It's a perfect place to stay in Salem. Walkable neighborhood, located close to downtown and many other amenities. Would recommend staying with Linda any time you're on Salem.

This house is adorable and spacious, comfortable and well appointed. Our overnight was super pleasant and the coffee shop on the corner was tasty and close enough to wall and bring it back to enjoy on the porch. Loved our stay, would easily come again!

This is a darling cottage in a quiet neighborhood. It is nicely decorated, has a large kitchen, comfortable beds and AC. We enjoyed the rocking chairs on the front porch. Linda is a welcoming host and very responsive to any questions. We would stay again!
The house is wonderful in a great centralized location. Kitchen and home have all you need to have a comfy stay. Linda is very nice,helpful and informative  wonderful host.
The cutest place to stay while in Salem. Very comfortable
The cottage was clean and comfy. It was a quiet neighborhood and we had a great time.
Super cute place!

Charming, well-appointed, easy to access. Convenient location as a stopping place to explore Salem, Portland, Mt Hood, and the coast.
Everything we needed!
Fabulous charming place to stay with all the extra touches, Super clean and well decorated  with a central location to do day trips in all directions. Linda was an excellent host, one of the best!
Cute place with lots of space and a nice back patio!
The place was just as advertised.  Very charming, great location, cute neighborhood, and a great host.
It was a beautiful place to stay!  Linda was great host.
We loved our stay here and would definitely come back again!
Great, cozy place for us to call home base during our stay in Salem! We were well taken care of -- clean, plenty of amenities, and some small touches Linda thoughtfully considered.
It was such a beautiful little place! Quite and relaxing! It had everything we needed!
Linda was a great host…easy to communicate with and her house was perfect for our stay. The location is great and we had everything we needed.

So comfortable with such beautiful art and a relaxing happy atmosphere. Perfect location and close to everything you could want or need. The host is lovely, so sweet and kind. This was my first stay here, but it won’t be my last. So pleased with our stay ❤️

Our FAVORITE place to stay in Salem! We enjoyed running in the nearby park, sitting on the front porch in the evenings, and the proximity to restaurants and businesses. The house is updated but has a vintage charm. The location is in a neighborhood filled with other beautiful older houses making it interesting to walk or drive around the streets. We loved talking with Linda. She is a great host and ensures we are happy and comfortable. The house has everything needed for a home-away-from-home-stay.

Elaine & Mike

The cottage in Salem was just like an old Sears home. So quaint with all the perfect amenities like the coffee maker, dishwasher and air conditioning in each bedroom. Plus to our delight there was an outdoor cat that our kids loved to cuddle each morning on the front porch as we sipped our coffee. It is worth mentioning that the host was on site during our stay - so as I did yoga in the morning in the living room she was gardening in the front and as we pulled up, she was always there to greet us. A lovely home but less privacy than we expected.
Linda is a great host and her home is exactly as the listing describes. It is very well kept, clean, and has great decor. Would recommend to others.

Adorable cottage within blocks of a lovely park and garden.
Great communication prior and during stay. Home had interesting art and comfortable furnishings.
Nespresso coffee maker and pods for the early morning coffee fix, front porch with rocking chairs made a nice spot to enjoy the early morning.
Since we visited during a heat spike it was delightful to find each bedroom had its own AC unit.
Fresh flowers made it feel even more welcoming. Our passing interactions with our host Linda were friendly.
Try White’s for tasty breakfast, only a few blocks through the neighborhood and reasonably priced.
All in all I’d recommend this spot as it had all we needed and was exactly as described!

Lovely spot. comfortable beds.  Perfect for a couple.  Be aware the fridge is small. Storing large amounts of chilled items is not possible. Air conditioning in all the rooms was wonderful and is not always standard In The PNW.  During the excessive heat it was a joy.  Linda’s a great host and super helpful. Thanks for a lovely stay. I would stay again.
My stay at Linda's place was great, the neighborhood is amazing and the house was exactly what I expected. I would definitely stay here again!
This was a very comfortable, nice place to stay. The location was quiet and easy to reach. Each space was well thought out with furnishings that met our needs. We recommend staying here.
Super cute home. Very cozy and peaceful. Great neighborhood, safe and quiet.
Cozy, very clean and beautiful home. Great neighborhood. Quiet and peaceful. And Linda got her "Superhost" name for a reason! We'll be back.
Linda's home is lovely and comfortable, we only spent the night there as a stopover to our final destination but it was much more relaxing than a hotel!
The house was perfect for us. It was very clean, well stocked, and in a great location. Convenient to everything in Salem. We will definitely stay there again!

Linda was an excellent host! The home was very clean and tidy with everything we needed for an enjoyable stay. I appreciated that there was A/C in the bedrooms and main living/kitchen area. The place was well decorated and in a quiet, peaceful neighborhood. Linda, herself, was so kind and friendly, making sure we had everything we needed throughout our stay. I highly recommend her home to stay at, and would definitely stay here again.

This is the place to be in Salem! Cute, quaint, quiet, and cozy!
Linda keeps everything exceptionally clean and she’s very accommodating. We wanted to be able to check in a little bit earlier if at all possible and she was able to make it happen and communicated with me throughout that process.
Nice spot!

We had another perfect stay at Linda’s bungalow. We love staying here! Linda is so nice, such a great communicator and has really thought of everything. The location is ideal for anything you might be coming to Salem to do. I can’t recommend it enough.

We recently booked Linda’s place for three weeks. We are from Salem originally and we know the area. Linda’s place is a gem! It is a great location to everything you want to see in Salem.  We have a one year old daughter and Linda was very accommodating.  She went above and beyond for us. Thank you Linda!

Very enjoyable stay at a cozy cottage .I was impressed that (Linda ) had everything you needed! I love how she communicated with us . She a friendly lady! Looking forward to staying there again in the near future. Next time the stay will be longer

Lovely home in a quaint, quiet neighborhood.  Walking distance to the beautiful Bush Park and Willamette University. Super comfortable beds and an immaculately kept cottage.  Hope to stay again.

Linda’s place is perfect as home
base! She is kind and prompt and has awesome recommendations and her listing is extremely accurate!!

I would highly recommend you book this stay ASAP! We for sure will be back!

This place is amazing. She thought of everything - even decorated for Halloween. Loved the neighborhood kitties. Fireplace, two subscription channels, beautiful outdoor area, plenty of space to relax.
The house is cute and cozy. We had everything we needed during our stay. We were able to walk to restaurants and shopping. I would stay here again.
Very sweet, comfortable and clean. Linda was a great host. Easy to find and get around town. Awesome bath tub!

This house is very comfortable and peaceful. It is a great combination of vintage and modern (new windows keep noise and cold out; gas fireplace and frame TV are awesome; the art and craftsmanship are interesting and plentiful). Linda has been very helpful and personable. It's been a delight to stay here!
I am so glad I tacked on an extra night in this sweet space. See my earlier review for more!
Comfortable, clean, and obviously lots of care put into this home.
Linda’s place is marvelous! Warm, comfortable, inviting. Feels like being on vacation but with all the comforts of home. Linda is a wonderful host!
Everything was wonderful. So clean and cozy! Linda is the best!

My coworker & I have stayed at this place twice now when we travel for work because we loved it so much the first time. The neighborhood is quiet even though it's really central and the house is beautiful. It has a great kitchen, living area, and comfy beds. We look forward to coming back next year!
We had a great stay at Linda’s place. The unit was well stocked, comfortable, and communication was clear and easy. Definitely recommend for anyone looking to visit the Salem area!
Clean, great location, and Linda has great communication!
Super clean, tidy, warm, nicely decorated, comfortable beds, a full kitchen and a wonderful and attentive host. What more could you ask for?
Linda is an amazing host. She's communicative and very welcoming. Her place is kept very clean and she even helped us get a few belongings that we accidentally left behind.
This listing was perfect for our stay in Salem and was very charming. Everything was very clean and it's in a great location with a quiet neighborhood that's close to many restaurants and stores.
we had a lovely time at the coziest cottage in Salem!
Adorable place! Perfect to stay I’ll be back.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The house is in a great location and is charmingly decorated. Linda was very welcoming. We would definitely stay again.

We were in Salem for a quick overnight, and hope to snag this place when we’re back for a longer trip.  Very clean, well decorated, and comfortable.  I’m not sure if Linda was on the property while we were there, we felt like we had our privacy.  Oh, and the neighborhood is quiet and safe.  In all it was a smooth experience.  Thank you Linda!

JUST LOVELY.   My friend and I needed just a quick overnight to relax.  Linda's place is just lovely.  Clean, pretty, well decorated, fun artwork, and everything we needed was there.  She left good clear instructions.  Linda responded right away to my request, and I got to meet her the next day when we left.  Very kind.   I was a little worried about the neighborhood because I don't know the area.  It was just fine.  Older houses, well kept, and we felt very safe.  I would highly recommend.  Hope to go there again someday.

This place is the CUTEST. Super clean, easy check-in, good location, and all the amenities you’d need. Lots of special details show you how well-cared for and loved this house is.  We’d definitely stay there again!

Linda was such a great host! She communicated fast and made sure we were all set before we arrived. Her house is charming and warm. She even decorated for the holidays which felt like a nice homey touch. I would absolutely recommend staying here and hope to stay here again in the future!

This is the second time my brother and sister-in-law have stayed at Linda's when our house is overcrowded with guests.  It is so quiet, clean, and peaceful that my sister-in-law considers it a writing retreat, but it is also a great space for family relaxation.  Linda is incredibly helpful and accommodating, and quickly responds to any questions.

Linda’s home was such a beautiful, peaceful, and comfortable space for my family to land for a few days. The kitchen is well-stocked for cooking, the beds are comfortable, and the living space is so cozy with the fireplace. Linda went above and beyond to make our stay smooth with two young kids. I would absolutely stay here again and recommend Linda’s home to others visiting Salem.
Very nice and cozy place.
thre place was nice, clean, easy to find, and easy to access. it was just what I was looking for

This is a wonderful place in a nice quiet neighborhood. It is very clean, comfortable, uncluttered, colorful and artfully decorated. Linda is a welcoming unobtrusive host. We’re looking forward to staying there again  and again.
Great place to stay in Salem
Comfortable, quiet, spacious and clean.

Linda’s house was cozy. My husband and I stay for almost a week and Linda was super responsive to any questions we had. The location is perfect as the street the house is on was quiet but close enough to stores and restaurants. I will definitely stay again in the future.

The house was so cute. It was walking distance to everything restaurants, parks and attractions all less than a mile away. Our flight arrived early which never happens and Linda let us check in early. Really enjoyed everything including the hotel robes.

This was our first Airbnb experience and I'm not sure how we could top it!

We live in Salem and needed a place stay while our home underwent repairs due to water damage. It has been very stressful and chaotic in our home and Linda's beautiful house was just what we needed, especially for our little baby.

As other reviewers have noted, the house was spotless. It had everything we could need for a multi-day stay. And it was just such a pleasant place to relax; lovely décor, beautiful neighborhood (one of my favorite in Salem), and a cozy gas fireplace.

In addition to the wonderful accommodations, Linda was incredibly responsive and kind. We are so grateful to have been her guests.

We enjoyed this charming and cozy home so much!  The place was comfortable and well- appointed; we found what we needed to cook breakfast and make coffee.  Everything was clean and fresh, including beds, bathroom, floors. We appreciated the seasonal decor, local magazines, and plenty of pillows!
I had another amazing stay at Linda’s place! Everything was perfect like always. I loved sitting in the chair reading with the fire going and the location cannot be beat!
Loved staying at this adorable home. It’s so homey and in a nice, quiet neighborhood.  Linda was really welcoming and friendly during our stay. Highly recommend!
A must stay! Close to downtown, very cozy and easy to find. Highly recommend.
Perfect for a small group or family. Highly recommend!

A very thoughtfully artistic decor from the front deck through the back deck, and everywhere in between.

There's a light charm to the home, as you can tell effort and care have been put into making it a pleasant experience.

Communication was excellent. We were allowed to use the basement washer and dryer, which was appreciated.

The lack of an outrageous cleaning fee was also a draw for our choosing this home. A very easy recommendation.
This was a perfectly charming spot for our quick trip to Salem. The house was spotless and had everything we needed and more. We look forward to our next trip!
Charming house in a nice neighborhood. Linda thought of everything you could possibly need.
Wonderful big space. Near everything! Everything we needed for a fun weekend!

clean, beautifully set up and decorated. the beds were very comfortable.
the house location is charming. the kitchen has everything you need for dinner prep. a delight to stay in.

Nice house in a great neighborhood. The house was clean and comfortable. There are several restaurants and businesses within walking distance. The host was easy to communicate with and we especially enjoyed the back deck, yard and fire pit.

Great airbnb find near downtown Salem in a nice, quiet neighborhood.  Linda's place was very clean, had everything we needed for a quick weekend away from home.  A lovely place.  We'll definitely be back.

I booked this place 3 months in advance just to make sure it was available because I always love staying here. Even though it's a small house it feels spacious with the open layout. Each room has its own climate control and the gas fireplace  is heaven on a cold night. Linda the host is terrific and very responsive.

Linda’s place is seriously incredible. It’s the cutest little cottage with everything you need and more. She even provided shelf stable whole milk for your morning coffee- which I didn’t even know existed and has changed my life! The place is immaculate with comfy beds. There is unique art everywhere and the place is just perfectly decorated. I was sad to leave. Linda is the best you must stay here.

This place is Great! Clean and beautifully decorated. Very welcoming. Close to everything. Beautiful neighborhood to go for walks. Wonderful host reached out to ensure we had what we needed for our stay. Would definitely recommend!
Thank you Linda!
This is the 2nd time we've stayed with Linda and 265. It is a great house with all that you need, easy to find, wonderful host, simple parking and well located. Highly recommended !
Linda's house was perfect for us.  The amenities were great, and Linda was very accommodating.  We wouldn't hesitate to stay here the next time we are in Salem.

Cute and clean place. Super
Close to stores, restaurants, and a beautiful park. We were very comfortable and enjoyed relaxing by the fireplace.

We stayed at Linda's on a quick trip through Salem. Not only was Linda helpful and gracious in her communication leading up to our trip, but she greeted us warmly when we arrived. The place was very charming and comfortable. It had everything we could possibly need from towels and shampoo to a well-stocked kitchen. The beds were comfortable and the common areas were a great place to relax. If we are ever in Salem again, this would be our top pick as a place to stay!

This house has all the comforts of home, as well as a bunch of delightful features that make you feel like you're on vacay! Perfect, in my opinion. Beautiful artwork, comfy stylish furniture, sun room, great little kitchen, cozy living room with gas fireplace, great bed, light-filled spaces, darling front porch. And the neighborhood/location is top-notch - great places to walk, parks and close to town. Linda was lovely - checkin and communication was a breeze. I'll be back!
A very charming, spacious, and clean cottage!  Loved the location and the fireplace, too. It felt comfortable and relaxing.
Great location in Salem.   Located near Downtown, Bush Park and the Capital.

Such a homey place to stay in! The location is perfect, in a very quiet calm neighborhood but close to all the restaurants and shopping centers. It was very clean and comfortable. Has a nespresso which was awesome 😉 Highly recommended staying here!

Linda’s cottage is wonderful and the neighborhood is quiet and charming! A large beautiful Siamese cat came to the back door’s window every morning to peak in on us. Well stocked kitchen.  Bathrobes were a cozy touch!

Great location just a couple blocks off the main drag in a nice old neighborhood.  Comfy beds! We didn't do any cooking but the kitchen is fully equipped.  Lights from the next door apartments were a tad annoying.
the home is adorable, and lots of really great art, a quiet neighborhood and location is great

This is a great little house!  It has been remodeled and modernized!  My favorite things about the unit are: the heating and cooling units, the remodeled kitchen, the remote control modern fireplace, the quiet location, the deep large tub in the bathroom, the beautiful breakfast area with skylights and a nice view, and the back deck and patio.
Linda is such a great host, everything you need is there and if not she is just a message away. The location is great near all stores and lots of restaurants. We enjoyed ourselves!!
This place is absolutely fantastic! My favourite Airbnb so far! Kitchen with everything you need, TV+Fireplace to relax in the evenings and much more.. Highly recommended!
Excellent location. Linda even had fresh flowers out when we arrived.
Fabulous and charming.  Only challenge was the lack of a full size refrigerator and easily accessible laundry facilities.
Very cute place really enjoyed it
Super cute & clean house in a great neighborhood - would definitely stay here again.
Great place. Cute, quiet. Nice neighborhood. Hostess is kind and helpful.

A lovely place to stay, and the best part is the absolute gem of a host! Linda literally saved our wedding! We came to Salem for a quiet elopement and our witnesses fell through at the last minute. We were panicked and desperate, strangers to the Salem area, but Linda came through for us in a big way! She and her friend rescued our special day with grace and humor and even took pictures and video for us! Our four year old daughter simply adored Linda and she was so genuinely warm and joyful with her. Her kindness really made the entire trip for us, she embodies the spirit of hospitality to a degree I've never witnessed from anyone else before. It truly felt like visiting family!

The home is crisp and clean, tastefully decorated, well-equipped, and conveniently located. The outdoor grill is a great touch and the beds were unbelievably comfortable. We wanted for nothing during our stay and brought home wonderful memories of our time there that we'll cherish forever.
Just another review affirming how lovely a stay this is :) clear instructions on where stuff is and how to use it, bright airy decor, great furniture and comfy beds. Thanks Linda!
Great location and great value. Perfect for our little family. Thanks Linda!
It’s a beautiful home! Would definitely stay here again!
Super cute, super clean, and in a great location! Check in/out was easy and the host communicated great!
A beautiful home filled with local art and natural light. Extremely clean, well-appointed, comfortable, and filled with everything you’d need to feel at home. Wish we could have stayed longer!

Very charming, family friendly house! We stayed here with our 2.5 year old son. The neighborhood  was nice and felt safe. There is a playground nearby and plenty of room to play and roam around inside the house. We will definitely stay again when we are in the area.
Very nice place host was very respectful and helpful. Overall good time

Linda’s place was great! We were in town for a wedding and didn’t have too much time to enjoy this lovely house and backyard, so I’d love to stay again just for the house alone. It had everything we need and even came with robes. Linda was so fast to respond and very accommodating. I highly recommend staying here whenever in the Salem area.
Linda’s place is beautiful! Has everything we need. Comfortable and relax! We definitely will come back !
Linda’s place is an absolute gem. It was super clean and very cozy. Linda was very helpful and accommodating. A great location as well. Five stars!

Loved this unique, comfortable home. We had everything we needed and more. We walked to Fork Forty (kind of a modern food court—very eclectic and fun) which was just a little over a mile away. We would definitely stay here again.

Linda’s place was lovely and exactly as described.  Very clean, nicely decorated. It is in a nice neighborhood. We were only passing through so we didn’t get a chance to enjoy the place as much as we would have liked but would definitely stay there again.
Linda’s house is a perfect spot for a small group of people. I would absolutely stay again.
The house is an artsy craftsman style home in a nice neighborhood. Centrally located and close to downtown. Clean and very comfortable. I will definitely stay again.
Very cute tiny house very nice lady and easy to find.
The house was clean and cute. It’s located in an adorable neighborhood. Linda was very responsive and kind. We would stay here again!
Linda's place is awesome! Super clean, with everything you'll need and even more, and last but not least located in charming and very quiet neighborhood. I recommmend, big time!
We loved Linda’s cottage! Lots of amble room in a quiet neighborhood. We had questions about laundry and she got back to us right away! Would definitely stay here again!
wonderful place! cute and cozy! Has a great host

We loved Linda’s place! It’s cute and charming and has so much character. She greeted us when we got there and was so kind. It was in the perfect location for where we wanted to explore and we loved all the art displayed around the house.
Absolutely adorable house, plenty of space, quiet, lovely neighborhood, spotless clean! Would definitely stay again!
Beautiful, comfortable, artistically decorated and well-appointed rental home. Linda thought of everything. This is a great place and I hope we get to return for a longer stay.

Linda’s home was fantastic! Everything was very thoughtful and comfortable. The neighborhood was quiet and everything was easily accessible. Linda was such a gracious hosts who really cares about her guests. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Amazing stay! Me and my family wish we could’ve stayed longer! Linda was a great host and the home was simply amazing! Definitely plan on stopping next time we are in Salem!

GREAT find! Everything you need, great back patio, and very convenient for anything Salem. We were in town for the IronMan and this was the PERFECT spot for us. Linda was so kind, the house was clean, and we had a great time.
Such a cute and cozy little place, well appointed and in a nice area of Salem! Linda, even let us store our bikes in the basement, which was very kind of her! Would def stay again!
Linda was there to greet us and to send us off (just lucky with timing and running into her).  She was gracious and happy for our visit to Salem.  Great place to stay!
A very comfortable home!  It had everything we needed. We especially enjoyed talking with Linda about the plantings in the yard.  We would definitely stay here again!
Linda is wonderful to work with! The space is great and exactly what we needed after days of being on the road and hiking. I highly recommend Linda and hope we can stay again!
Wonderful, clean, comfortable house. Linda was a great host and we’re glad we found this gem!

Linda's house was very comfortable and had a homey feeling to it.  Linda answered my questions almost immediately and very informative about the area and had great recommendations. I would gladly stay here again!!!

Linda’s place is not only cozy, artsy, full of small, colorful details but also convenient and well located.
Plenty of space to relax, the deck was amazing and I had a good time relaxing among the flowers and hummingbirds!
Linda was very kind to give us access to the laundry room too ;)

We really enjoyed this place.  House and yard in excellent and clean condition.  Nice kitchen.  Comfortable bed.  Perfect location - close to downtown but in a quiet well kept neighborhood.   Host Linda is very responsive.  Would stay there again.
The house is just as advertised. Linda was great to work with and the house was clean, comfortable, and in a nice neighborhood. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others!
Lovely home. Spotlessly clean. Artfully decorated. So very comfortable. Outdoor areas gave us good birding. Can't wait to return.

We stayed one night here on a road trip and it was perfect. The house was very clean and obviously cared for, great space with AC in the bedrooms.

The bedrooms are a bit small so I’d you’re traveling with a group or as a family, it may be tight quarters for more than one night. Otherwise, this place was ideal and Linda was very helpful.

Very clean unit in a quiet neighborhood. Very close to downtown amenities. The deck area looked lovely and we were sorry not to enjoy it during the July heatwave we managed to meet. The cottage is well decorated and had all the comforts once could want. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and hope to be back!

Comfortable and clean home with well appointed kitchen, dining area, easy parking and relaxing front porch in quiet neighborhood. Our family really enjoyed the artistic and special design touches, updated bathroom, and comfortable furniture and beds. Communication with Linda and check in were great. We would certainly stay here again.

We had a really great time at Linda's place. It was really clean and charming. Comfy beds with extra pillows and blankets if needed. Air conditioner worked awesome. Great walkable neighborhood with Bush Park very close. Linda was very nice and accommodating. Really easy to get in and relax right away. Would definitely recommend her place for anyone looking for a nice getaway.
Lovely , clean and cozy place to stay.
We were so happy!  Sweet and safe neighborhood.   Linda was friendly.  Everything was there that we needed and comfortable.

Beautifully and creatively furnished and decorated in old town Salem. Clean,  comfortable and charming home restored with updated appliances and a/c in the bedrooms and living areas. Everything was thought of… down to the qtips and ironing board! Quiet peaceful neighborhood… enjoyed meeting Linda! You can’t go wrong here!!
Comfortable, spacious and quiet cottage in a charming neighborhood.
Beautiful home!! Artfully decorated, very classy! Incredibly clean, extremely comfortable beds. We stayed just one night and would absolutely stay again. Thanks again, Linda!

Lovely house, great interior design with lots of loving care, everything even better than advertised! It was a pleasure to stay at Linda’s house. I highly recommend this AirBnB for anyone traveling to the Salem area.

This property was absolutely adorable, very comfortable, close to everything we needed in Salem and a wonderful value. Linda’s attention to detail to provide everything you need for your stay and comfort was above and beyond. We really loved being here thank you so much.

This delightfully decorated 1920s cottage has all of the comforts one enjoys in 2022.  The hostess as thought of everything to see you are totally comfortable. The cottage is well maintained and quiet and the location is perfect when one visits Salem. We are definitely coming back!
Friendly host, clean and cute place, great location
We loved our stay! Linda was a gracious and considerate host. Home was as advertised, with all the amenities needed for our stay.

My husband and I were in town for one night in the midst of a west coast tour. Linda’s home was a great stopping point. We were a stones throw from Salem’s center, but the street was near silent. Another plus - Linda’s home was only 15-20 minutes from several amazing vineyards and tasting rooms. Should we find ourselves in Salem again, we will definitely choose this lovely, inviting home.
