Sara was very friendly and accommodating. The environment was quite and relaxing. And I appreciated her letting me do a late check out!
Good value - communicative host
they were very nice and communicative!
Sara is kind, friendly, made the checkin and all details easy. Went over the top in hospitality!!!!
We really enjoyed meeting Sara-Adam. They're super friendly and put us at ease for our first ever AirBNB experience.
This was my second time staying. Sara is very accommodating and kind. Already booking again!
Very nice and clean place
Nice clean room, hosts took care of a fire alarm battery needing replacing without being asked.
Safe, clean, comfortable room. Very friendly and helpful hosts.
Convenient & clean room in West Salem.  Recommended!
Clean and quiet. Host’s info for the stay was clear and understandable. Appreciate your flexibility and communication.

The place was quiet and clean, and the host was very helpful and friendly. It was pretty easy to find, being located just off a main highway. The bed was comfortable, and there was an outlet right next to the bed which was very convenient. Overall great place, I would definitely stay there again if in the area.

Excellent place for a quick stop.
Feels like a home. Very convenient, quiet and comfortable. Sara-Adam are great hosts.
Appreciate Sara and Adam’s place. Clear description and expectations. Great communication. I’d be happy to stay again.
You couldn’t ask for two nicer people to be your hosts. They are very welcoming. The room is very clean the whole house was very clean and organized. We definitely will see them again.
It was very nice to stay with them, they are very helpful. I am glad i meet them!
Nice and independence
Super easy to get in and a very convenient/smooth stay! We loved the apple spice candle that reminded me of my piano teacher’s home during Christmas. Thanks, Sara and Adam!
Sara and Adam try hard to make it a good and comfortable stay
Amazing stay! It was very clean and tidy and really cozy. Communication was speedy, check in and check out was super smooth. It was perfect! Would 10000% book again :)

Great stay, worked great for our needs. It was clean and quite, good price. Appreciated a quick and dimple check-in. Was somewhat close to a main road, which is great for proximity but can add road noise if you'd like to keep the window open for fresh air.
They were awesome to deal with!
Sara-Adam’s place was comfortable, very clean and perfect for our stay.

A nice space , especially for Star Wars fans (living room displays very well done!), but very comfortable and accommodating for anyone.  Definitely recommended, and I’ll hope to stay again to talk Star Wars with them.

Sara was a lovely and most considerate host. She was communicative prior to my arrival, even though booking last minute, was there to greet me, and barely saw her after that. Space was clean, simple, and very nice. Thanks for a great stay!
great place!

I only met Sara very briefly (she was nice!), as I was in and out of the place in 12 hours. I was mostly just looking for a good night's sleep but woke up at 6am due to traffic noise from the busy road outside the window (for good and bad, it's very close) and couldn't get back to sleep.
My stay was very comfortable, great hosts and near a very cute downtown area with lots of options!

Excellent place, only a few minutes from the Oregon state capitol building. Easy check-in and super CLEAN & quiet room. We had the room & bathroom to ourselves that night. It's an awesome apartment on the 3rd floor, but it only felt like going up to the 2nd floor only. Definitely would stay again! & again

P.S.- The Star Wars photos/frames, toys, and decor in the place were super cool and mind-blowing. The Force is strong with Adam & Sarah!

This place is as advertised and we didn't have any issues apart from the heat. the room was insanely hot and we couldn't leave the window open as it backs onto a busy road that is noisy at all hours. didn't get a chance to meet the hosts but would have brought it up to them if I had/ we were staying another day

I stayed here for two nights on my way to the Oregon coast. Sara is a wonderful host and is always there if you need any help. You get your own bathroom and can use the kitchen, living room etc. The apartment is close to the highway so it can be a bit loud but I didn’t hear much with the windows closed. There are also some restaurants, coffee shops and a supermarket close by. Would recommend this place for everyone who’s visiting Salem (and has a car otherwise it’s probably a bit hard to get around here).
Highly recommend! Sara was wonderful. Very communicative, kind and thoughtful. Room was comfortable and quiet! Will stay again
Great place! Big star wars fans!
Great place, if you like Star Wars. this place is for you.
A great bedroom and bathroom. The kitchen is well equipped and its nice to use the livingroom with the TV as well. Would stay here again!

They were very kind and let me check out late due to my departure train being in the afternoon. The apartment is very clean and they even had a fully stocked first aid kit in the room. Would definitely stay with them again.
Everything was perfect.
I really enjoy being at Sara-Adam house. I had a very nice stay there. I slept well and comfortable and could use her kitchen and refrigerator. It was a pleasant stay.
good place! didn'tmind the highway noise!

Was so grateful for Sara and Adam they got me out of a last minute bind because I got to Salem a day early and booked last minute they responded so fast and was so welcoming to us, I would love to stay here again. Thank you guys so much

Sara was an excellent host, making sure check-in was near effortless! Sharable items are marked, and the place was quite clean! she is a sweetheart, come stay here.
Only issue is exposed electrical and bathroom fan sounds like it's going to blow. but everything went without a hitch :)
Great host, very nice and easy going. Adam was resourceful and understanding. This is my go to place every time I am in Salem. Highly recommend 10/10. Thank you so much !!!

Great place in Salem!! Conveniently located, comfortable bed and space. Kitchen was well stocked to prepare meals. Monica was super responsive to any questions and went above and beyond to be a great host!
Monica was a great host and the house is fantastic.
The place was clean and comfortable. Would definitely recommend.
Lovely home in a quiet area convenient to shopping and restaurants.  Really enjoyed the back deck

Monica was an attentive host and was readily available when I had questions. The home is very comfortable and conveniently located to the amenities Salem has to offer. The bed is quite comfortable and is across the street from a park. For a homey stay, I'd recommend.
Lovely place, quiet and calm, but close to everything you need.

This place was fantastic! Monica is a great host and is excellent at communicating with guests. I was thrilled to see all the houseplants, this house is very peaceful. I love the kitchen. I would definitely stay here again.
Great location, very nice and quiet neighborhood.
Monica's place was comfortable and homey, I'd stay again.
Very nice place and great location!

The highlight of my stay was Monica's great responsiveness to my messages and requests. I felt complete confidence that any question or concern I had would be addressed seriously and quickly (thank you, Monica).  Of possible importance to some guests is that there are very strong fragrances/perfumes in the air and linens. I am not 'allergic' or chemically sensitive like some, but I can imagine that this might be problematic to those who are. Another highlight for me: The house  was located near a very pleasant park that was enjoyable to walk through.
Great place!

Sandy and Ben are the most gracious and helpful hosts I have ever met! They opened up their home and treated us like family. The location is in a very safe and friendly neighborhood with shops/a mall nearby. Sandy and Ben gave us lots of recommendations for sightseeing on the coast and hiking in the woods. I would highly recommend their place!
If you get a chance to stay here you won't be disappointed. Diane and Tom are great hosts and I hope I can stay with them again in the future if I find myself in Salem.

This lovely home has a quiet setting with a yummy berry garden, flower garden in front and fruit trees in the back, beautifully framed with white oak trees.   The sunsets and soft breeze experienced from the hillside patio out the front sliding glass doors (with a fire pit!) were just the ticket for perfect relaxation before sleep.  The accommodations include a spacious and beautifully furnished living area, a roomy bedroom with a very comfortable Queen bed, soft bath towels and linens, and a clean bath.  The location is just minutes away from town - so it is convenient, too.  This stay was our first experience with AirBnB, and we were delighted.  You couldn't ask for more considerate and respectful hosts than Diane and Tom, either!  We will be coming back.
Beautiful space with a rural feel yet so close to town. Tom and Diane were great hosts, and were available to share information about local restaurants and Salem overall.
Diane's place is secluded, but plenty close to many great attractions in the Willamette Valley. The space is roomy and comfortable, and the berries were a treat!

We loved every part of our stay. Tom and Diane are beautiful people that go above and beyond to make your stay relaxing and comfortable. The location is amazing and quiet yet very convenient to the Salem area. We can't wait to return for another visit.

Diane's place was great! Communication online and in person was great, and the space was very cozy and private. The bed was comfortable and the living room area was very spacious. We loved the cute little garden and small Kitchenette with plenty of amenities to whip up some breakfast before getting back on the road. We would definitely recommend this place to friends and family!
Great communication, booking and very large comfortable place. Loved the fresh strawberries, raspberries and blackberries. What a treat to stay here.

Diane and Tom were wonderful hosts! Diane is so hospitable and even picked us berries from her garden as a lovely welcome. Tom was very helpful and stacked the fire wood in the fire pit so it was all ready to go when we used it at night. We had picked this location because it's close to Silver Falls and we couldn't have made a better decision. A lovely stay all around!

Diane and Tom are awesome hosts!  The cottage has a lovely view of the garden and we were treated to fresh berries that Tom lovingly grew and harvested.  They made us feel so welcome and we can't believe our good fortune to have chosen their home for this trip.
Diane and Tom were so nice! They even shared some of their homegrown berries with us. The downstairs apartment is wonderful! Comfortable and quiet. Was the perfect spot for us after the eclipse.
What a gem! Hosts are a amazing people-- our stay was so comfortable!
very private with separate access

We had a wonderful stay for the one night we were here. There were even fresh strawberries and raspberries picked from the garden already in fridge ready for us to eat. I would certainly recommend this place to others.

Diane and Tom were great host. We had a last minute booking to escape the smoke in bend and they were very accommodating. They even helped us out with the baby while we unpacked. There place is very comfortable. Stayed nice and cool down there too. The welcome berries and snack were great. If we are ever in need of a place in Salem, we would definitely stay here again.

Super comfortable and spacious place with all the little touches to make you feel right at home, including fresh berries right out of the garden.  Great communication and easy to check in and out.  Highly recommend staying at Diane's if you want a relaxing night!

This is a relaxing, spacious and very quiet AirBnb. We were fortunate enough to enjoy some fresh strawberries and raspberries from the host's garden, and there was a fire pit ready to use just outside our accommodations. This AirBnb is next to a corrections facility, but it made no difference to us. You can't see it and otherwise the surrounding area is just rolling hills, trees and quiet neighborhoods. I would highly recommend this AirBnb to anyone in the area.

Tom and Diane made is feel right at home! We had our own driveway and private patio and entrance, plus a great view of the beautiful garden. A great amount of space and privacy plus some very thoughtful provisions for breakfast including delicious homegrown berries. We can't wait to stay again!
The apartment was private, and quiet. They were a very pleasant couple, and surprisingly had fresh berries, and other breakfast items for us to enjoy.

Diane and Tom are so warm and welcoming. Great place to stay with a comfortable fresh feeling. Beautiful home and garden. Best twin air mattress EVER! Id take it over my own bed. Wonderful snacks and care conveniently setup for us. We would stay again if in the area.
Lovely place to stay for a quick trip down to visit my son at college...enjoyed waking up the quiet, peaceful spot with deer in the yard!

Diane was extremely friendly! The room has everything needed, including bath towels and toiletries. A few breakfast options were provided as well, which were amazing. The place itself is immaculate and has a beautiful back porch area with optional fireplace, which we would have used had it not been cold out. While we were there just one night, I would be very happy staying here for a longer time.

The house itself is just a few minutes away from a large selection of restaurants and any shopping needs (Safeway, Rite Aid, etc).

The view of the oak forest and wildlife out back, the valley and sunsets toward the front gives this private retreat an extra charm for AirBnB travelers. Located with easy and quick access to downtown or the foothills.

The expanse of the interior space allows for multiple activities (e.g. exercise; family board games and TV watching) Amenities are plentiful and thoughtful.

Everything was just perfect.  It was quite and the views were awsome and your hospitality was so nice. You made us feel very comfortable. We would like to come back when we come to see my grandaughter. I'll call it the perfect spot. Thank you so much for all you do to make this an amazing place.
A Hidden Gem. Close to where I needed to be and wonderful accommodations. Plenty of space, homey, cozy and clean.

Diane and Tom's place is great.  Large private space with a pretty view of their garden.  They are  less than 6 miles from the downtown Salem and it is an easy drive to town.   The bed was comfortable, the water hot and it was very quiet.  We liked being close to town but out in the country.  It was really nice to have a small kitchen area that had food for breakfast (yogurt, milk, just, cereal and scones).   If you wanted more, WinCo is not far away.
Best AirBNB experience yet, period!
Everything was spot on from what Diane described. A very nice space to spend a night and an incredibly hospitable host.
We had a wonderful stay. Diane was a lovely host. The setting and location was exactly what we were looking for. We  look forward to staying here again!
Diane and Tom are the most affable hosts imaginable!  They made me feel at home while respecting my privacy.  The unit is spacious and well lighted in a lovely country setting.

Diane and Tom and wonderful hosts. They were very warm, inviting, and friendly. They accommodated our requests willingly and communciated very well. Their home is beautiful and situated on a very quiet street with beautiful views and a gorgeous back yard. We highly recommend staying here.

We loved our stay at Diane and Tom’s. There were so many great touch and the location was perfect for us. The accommodations were amazing, from the snacks to the beautiful scenery. Thank and can’t wait to stay again.
Was absolutely brilliant!

This is why Airbnb was invented. The place is clearly more than a business - it is also a lovely way of rural life that the owners want to share. And the apartment is quite a bit larger than we expected, and has a better view.

Diane's place was a delight. Roomy, very clean, and well-appointed. It was great having the yogurt and cereal, other snacks and beverages in the refrigerator. Diane's communications and hospitality were outstanding, and it was a pleasure taking with Tom. I look forward to visiting again!
Beautiful place!  Nice gardens.  The snacks and coffee were really nice touches.  Hope to go back and have more time to enjoy.
Awesome, clean, and scenic property!

You will be warmly welcomed by Diane to her beautiful home. The space is very spacious, clean and comfortable. It is obvious that she wants you to have a comfortable stay.
Communication was easy, and her suggestion for dinner just right for us.
We felt very cared for and refreshed for continuing our journey home. It would be great to be there to enjoy Tom's berries!
Thank you, Diane.

The was my second visit, and it was wonderful to return. I felt like I was going to visit friends. Diane and Tom's Airbnb is spacious, very clean, and nicely appointed. It's great to have the fridge, stocked with snacks, beverages, yogurt, etc. Other food, suck as cereal, crackers, and a couple baked goods were set out. Especially, Diane and Tom's hospitality is heartwarming. They are warm, kind, interesting and interested.

Diane and Tom are wonderful hosts. Their basement apartment is very spacious, quiet and super comfortable. Very easy commute to the downtown area, and Diane goes out of her way to make sure guests are comfortable and taken care of.
By far, the best experience we’ve had using Airbnb!  They were wonderful, place was immaculate, and all the extras were so appreciated! If you get a chance, stay with them!
Perfect place. Perfect Hosts. You won't be disappointed.

I was pleasantly surprised to find a 1 bedroom, 1 bath with a huge living space. Diane's home was sparkling clean and she thought of everything a guest might need for their trip. I enjoyed sitting outside on the patio and taking in the beautiful surrounding. I will be choosing to stay at Diane's if I find myself needing to comeback to Salem Oregon.

Diane and Tom are such a lovely couple! We had a wonderful time staying at their immaculate and peaceful place. I only wish we had time to sit by the fire and spend more time together. We were there for a Willamette University graduation, did a little wine tasting in Carlton and it was a quick drive to downtown restaurants and shopping. The ambience of their space was both very relaxing and we felt right at home. We especially liked their radio, we didn't even turn the TV on once! The welcome when we arrived, the extra touches like cheese plate, La Croix water, breakfast goodies, daily ice water, and having a fan available were all very appreciated. Their place is top of my list next time we are in Salem. ❤️
Spacious accommodations, gracious hosts! Nothing walkable if that's important to you. But if you're looking for a quiet respite, removed from the city, this is the place!

Diane and Tom were great hosts. They provided a warm welcome when we arrived, gave us the "lay of the land," and then let us enjoy our time in Oregon.  We really appreciated the fresh, cold water (I like to have water on hand at all times), milk, juice, breakfast items and the snacks that they provided.  They had everything we needed and more. Their land is lovely, and we really enjoyed our stay. The only thing that surprised us was how close their home was to a correctional facility. It wasn't a big deal, just a little unexpected. We would stay there again.

Diane and Tom were very warm and welcoming upon arrival. There were snacks and coffee provided and small touches that made you feel at home. The space was very clean and carpets were exquisitely spotless! We enjoyed our stay very much.

Diane does a great job hosting! The place was clean and welcoming, with plenty of space and everything we needed, including snacks and breakfast foods. The highlight was definitely getting a chance to pick strawberries from their garden too. Diane did a great job of being available but no where near intrusive, which we really appreciated. I only wish we could have stayed longer!

Diane was such a great host! My girlfriend and I were welcomed by Diane when we got there. She showed us the big downstairs area which we had all to ourselves along with snacks and water that she provided from her own well! The house was clean and welcoming. We got to watch a beautiful sunset by the fire pit that they have outside of their garden. Had a great experience and would stay here again!
We enjoyed our stay at Diane’s place. Beautiful scenery, relaxing and peaceful. You won’t be disappointed!

It was an absolute pleasure meeting Diane! We had a wonderful stay. Her communication was excellent and the accommodations were even bigger and better than the photos suggest. Diane is an absolute gem and her place is the perfect, quiet getaway.

Thank you for everything, Diane!

This rental has a large living room and a good sized bedroom. Everything was very clean and comfortable. I slept awesome both nights.

This has been the most peaceful place I have ever stayed. I loved listening to the birds chirping in the morning and being able to enjoy nature while sitting outside. It was the perfect place for a weekend getaway.

Diane is extremely kind and welcoming and was there for anything I needed. If I am ever back in this area, I will definitely stay here again!!

Diane was very friendly and there were several extra amenities that were very helpful, such as tea, extra glasses, and a breakfast pastry. Their garden/backyard is a beautiful and peaceful place for relaxing!
Very nice hosts, lovely spot, great value and impeccably clean. It is a pleasure to stay with there.
Unit was spacious, clean and quiet. Bed was very comfortable and hosts very welcoming.

It was beyond any bnb I have stayed at. Why would anyone stay in a hotel when you can have everything and more staying someplace  like this. For those that have never stayed in a bnb because they think they will be intruding,  They need to stay here.. Complete privacy, incredible hospitality and accommodations that far exceeded my high expectations.  I will be back and I will  tell anyone that will listen what an amazing place this is. Thank you Diane.
Diane’s place was great! They made us feel at home and even let us eat the berries out of their garden. The location was great, just a short drive to anywhere we wanted to go.

Diane’s place was absolutely perfect! She was the friendliest host I have ever encountered. She even had the next day’s breakfast prepared for us and in the fridge when we arrived. She gave great local tips as well. We would absolutely return to Diane’s place and recommend it to anyone!

This place was wonderful and although we got in late and had to leave early they were extremely hospitable and had no problem with our schedule. Lovely home, highly recommend you check it out if coming to Salem!

Cute and cozy little place and has all the little touches you could need. Was so thankful to have a bowl of special K and homemade scone, when I woke up from attending a wedding the night before! If we ever find ourselves back in Salem or around there will try and stay here again!

Diane has done everything you can think of to make her place inviting.  Rarely have we stayed at an Airbnb with snacks and enough to make a satisfying breakfast.  Each room is nicely appointed and there is a great outdoor area.  We highly recommend and hope to stay there again.
Lovely space, quiet location, great communication, easy to find and good instructions for how to let myself in because of a late eve arrival.

Such a wonderful, luxurious space!  Tons of room for the two of us to rest & relax.  Diane was a wonderful, accommodating host, providing a great welcome and lovely snacks.  She went above and beyond to serve us.  Fantastic value for the price!
Diane is an outstanding hostess.  She communicated quickly with us.  Home was very clean and welcoming.  Able to relax as if we were in our own home.
What a wonderful retreat! It was quiet, very spacious, and supremely wonderful. The hosts were kind and had some great tips for food and everything was great.

Thanks Diane for providing me a place to stay between my road trip. Your house is such a lovely place to stay. I appreciate the thoughtful touches you have done even only for the one night I spent there. I would love to come back if the opportunity comes by in the future!

Staying at Diane and Toms was like coming home.  They're a delightful couple.  The property was beautiful and the accommodations were clean and very comfortable.  They provided everything we needed and the thoughtful extra touches like freshly picked berries and figs from their property made it that much more special.  We will definitely be back.

Diane was an excellent host, was very communicative and clearly has thought through the needs of her guests. She had a lot of "extras" and we enjoyed picking fresh strawberries, blackberries and raspberries from the garden. Yum! We had an engaging conversation and recommend her and her home to Airbnb guests! Thanks Diane.

Diane was very accommodating, fun to talk to and has made the unit feel like a home away from home. The bed and pillows were comfortable, bedroom and bathroom linens smelled fresh and the kitchenette was stocked and the breakfast fixings she provided made the mornings nice and relaxed with being able to grab a bite to eat before we headed out. If we are in Salem again we will definitely be checking to see if she has vacancy!
Great place to stay. I can't imagine a better host. You will definitely be happy with your choice.
Diane is a great host! Checking in was a breeze and the space is incredible. Diane is sweet and thoughtful. Absolutely enjoyed staying here!
Diane went above and beyond to make our stay welcoming and comfortable.
Diane is one of the nicest AirBnB hosts I've encountered! Her place is more than worth what is charged and her care and attention to detail make it even more of a bargain!
Great place to stay in Salem. Very comfortable, and very welcoming.
Practically perfect in every way. Tom brought me fresh berries & gave a garden tour. Hosts were accessible and friendly and never intrusive. Space was comfortable and bed was great!

Diane has thought of everything you might need & provides light snacks/breakfast items.  It’s like staying with family but without intrusions.  She is very kind & attentive.  The home is comfortable and spacious.  I feel that she went above & beyond for us and would definitely stay again and recommend to friends.
A great place to stay with great amenities and great hosts.

You will be cheerfully greeted by Diane when you arrive at this Air B&B. Her and her husband were very thoughtful and amazing hosts and guests should feel comfortable striking up conversation with them and sharing their company.

Diane is extremely detail oriented and leaves no personal touch unattended when preparing this one-bedroom, one-bath, personal entry space. I booked this place based on 1) location to my work training class and 2) price - which were both great. I traveled with my 6-month old and my mom (aka babysitter!) and stayed at Diane’s place for a week, so a comfortable, safe place that was more like “home” than a hotel room was what I wanted and completely got!

Very thoughtful details included: a nice tower fan in the bedroom, night lights all over, extra towels that felt thick and luxurious, bathroom essentials (shampoo, conditioner, soap, hairdryer, etc), wonderful snacks, WiFi, cable TV, more than ample space, private entry...the list goes on.

You can’t go wrong with this place and you’ll enjoy a wonderful and comfortable private space.

We were quite comfortable and enjoyed the quiet stay away from town and road noise.  Spent several days in Salem  visiting grandkids etc and taking in a play at the historic Elsinore Theater and it was relaxing to come back up the hill to Diane's rental for  a good nights sleep.    Clean and spacious and more than lived up to expectations.

Scenic, spacious, clean and very comfortable. Peaceful environment, very comfortable bed and easy access to grocery stores, restaurants and historic downtown. Diane and Tom are the most gracious and pleasant hosts. It was a pleasure meeting them.
Quiet, spacious, great pillow top bed, very private. Nice territorial view. And  hosts that most of us in the NW would like to have for next door neighbors.

Don’t look any farther, this place is great ! Diane is lovely and was responsive to any questions and gave great dining recommendations.  The place is private, immaculately clean, spacious and convenient to Silver Falls State Park and downtown Salem , the capital and restaurants.
Fabulous spot.  Hosts were very welcoming and added so many extra touches.  We stayed 3 nights and wished we’d stayed longer.   We highly recommend.
This BnB is very lovely and very very clean. It was comfortable and very convenient to Corban University where our son was visiting.  The bed was comfortable & we slept very well.

This is an amazing place. It is an entire downstairs with a large family room with separate bedroom. Diane set up an air mattress for my adult daughter and she was very comfortable. We loved the evening camp fire. Drinks and breakfast were plentiful and the views stunning. 5 stars!
I liked the easy access from parking to the private entrance. I found the space spacious, very clean, quiet and centrally located.
Nice and quiet location. Everything was very comfortable and the fan with a "white noise" option is a nice touch. Dianne had all the necessities!
Amazing on every. Single. Count. All possible items, 5 stars: beautiful! AND delicious water and generous, thoughtful stocking of kitchenette. Thank you, Diane and Tom!

Diane and Tom are warm and welcoming hosts who make sure you get settled in well and offer tips for things to do. They really love what they do and it is evident in how they welcome you into their place!
Large and very clean space. Check-in was easy. No complaints!

Thank you, Diane!
Such a warm and inviting host. We hated to leave :)
Comfortable home, beautiful tree views.
A special place to visit.

Tom and Diane’s place was perfect! It’s super clean, in a great location and we felt at home. There were snacks in the fridge and breakfast available. They were very accommodating and we can’t wait to stay again.

My sister & I shared some special sister time in Diane’s home, where she made us feel welcome & cared for by all she did for us, to make our stay in  her home a delightful experience. I can’t say enough good things about Diane as a thoughtful person, and how she went above & beyond, to make sure we felt comfortable & by letting us know she was available if we needed anything more. The apartment is very spacious & light with all details attended to for the comfort of her visitors. The main bed was comfy, as was the extra air mattress she set up with added padding, and plenty of room to accommodate an additional separate sleeping space. All other amenities were wonderful & inviting to us as guests, who look forward to seeing Diane again on a return trip to her home, when we have more time to explore the area together in the future.
Great stay.

The breakfast, snack, and drink options set up downstairs for us were a great after a long day of driving. Diane was very welcoming and kind. We are hoping to come back in the summer to enjoy the beautiful fire pit and the view of the valley
As always Diane's place is great. It has become our home away from home.

Staying with Diane and Tom is always a great experience.  The home is always clean and the extra touches are what make Diane a super host.  This was our second visit and we will definitely be back again soon.
Diane’s home is amazing, we really enjoyed our stay. Definitely the best host we have had in an Airbnb. We highly recommend your stay. The snacks and water provided made our stay very relaxing.
Super comfy, and stylish getaway. Their hospitality and kindness made us feel very welcomed and right at home. Great views and good vibes
This is a beautiful location on a hillside overlooking Salem and the lodging is spacious and has all the necessary amenities and many additional thoughtful touches to make your stay more comfortable.
This is a great find. Diane and Tom are so inviting, the rental is spotless, and there’s so much more space than I expected.
Very kind and friendly host. The place was quite, clean and comfortable. Would love to stay there again next time.
What a great place to stay. The home was very clean and comfortable.  We enjoyed spending time with our family around the fire pit.

We had an amazing time at Diane’s. She really has thought of everything that you could possibly need. Coffee, milk, tons of snacks and more. The first evening I arrived, Diane and her husband made sure that I had everything I needed for a fire and a perfect day outside. Their backyard is beautiful! We really felt at home. We will definitely be back!!
Perfect little place! It was a really nice touch with the cereal and yogurt, nice quite relaxing place :)

The rooms were clean, spacious & comfortable, with everything we needed!  Plenty of space for visiting with friends or family inside & out on the patio!  I enjoyed the peaceful, country setting of the home--away from traffic and noise.  They have a lovely garden, singing birds & beautiful view!  Diane & her husband were friendly and personal and willing to go the extra mile for our comfort.  It was a great "first experience" with Airbnb!
We highly recommend Diane’s Airbnb.  It was clean, comfortable, and spacious.  The location was great with a pretty wooded view.  We wish we could have stayed longer!

It's a beautiful space in a daylight basement. If you arrive at night you'll wonder if the wood chipped path is a driveway. It is. :) Once you enter you immediately feel at home. The couch and bed are to die for comfy. The carpeting is especially wonderful to walk on in your socks. So soft and plushy.  Sadly, when we arrived the garden wasn't in full bloom or we would have had quite a lovely time exploring their huge garden and lovely yard. Highly recommended!

What a lovely place away from the city! We stayed here for one night in May, 2019, and appreciated the hospitality, cleanliness, and large space to relax in after a full day of travel. Diane was very welcoming and provided a lot of little extras, including snacks and a light breakfast. We highly recommend staying at the Country Garden!

Perfect place with a touch of tranquility. Thank you so much for a lovely place to stay, again. I thoroughly enjoyed my 2nd stay and will certainly be back. You both are such gracious hosts. The extra touches make your place a unique gem.
Diane and Tom are great hosts. Their location is prime with easy access to Salem, Highway 22, and I 5.  We highly recommend them for your stay!
What a treat. Welcoming and very accommodating. Quiet and cozy. We would definitely stay here again
Diane's home is wonderful in every respect. Peaceful and quiet location with great views, comfortable bed, incredibly clean bathroom, and great hosts. Highly recommend to anyone checking out Salem.

Diane and Tom’s place is the perfect quiet get away!   My boyfriend and I didn’t know what to expect for our first AirBnB experience!  Diane and Tom were great.  Their place with the private entrance was great!  A nice quiet home away from home retreat.  I loved waking up in the morning sitting at the table by the window and just looking at the birds, chipmunks and looking at the garden!   Great view!  My boyfriend especially loved taking pictures of the birds!  Great place to stay!  I highly recommend Diane and Tom’s place.
What a quiet and peaceful setting. The property is amazing and everything was exactly as described and pictured. If you’re looking for this type of experience, look no further then Diane’s place!

Absolutely fantastic location! Easy access to multiple focal points. Wonderfully mind hosts, who truly want to make sure you have an enjoyable, and comfortable stay. Very private, and very clean. It was extremely ideal for my trip, and I will very likely be booking again in September!!
Very nice location and super serene.

Nice, clean and open space. Beautiful views of lush garden. Nice outdoor area. Lock box entry was very easy to navigate. Welcome packet answered all of our questions. Diane and Tom are wonderful hosts. We had everything we needed provided for us and a few thoughtful extras. I will definitely stay here again and I would recommend to all.
Very wonderful space, quiet and peaceful.  The outdoor surroundings are so calming and picturesque!  Will be staying here again if I am ever in Salem.  Special touches and a very clean space.

Diane’s place exceeded my expectations. There were many thoughtful touches throughout the place. The hospitality was perfect. The location was great and the home was really clean and the instructions were transparent from the start. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting the area!

Diane is a lovely lady and so is her home. The place is as described, actually, larger and very comfortable. Loved the garden and all the beautiful trees. Wish we had had more time to enjoy it, but we packed too much in our schedule! I highly recommend Diane’s place. Thanks for the yummy scone and for letting me have some berries and cherries. Loved them :)
To whomever decides to stay with Diane, this is a very clean space with some very personal touches that make it feel like a home away from home. Diane is rated as a Super Host for a reason.
A quiet, peaceful place to stay. Diane and Tom are very hospitable and respectful. Definitely will stay here again if I get the chance.

We loved our short one night stay! The location was so close to Corban University where we picked up my son from Worldview Leadership Academy. Diane’s personal touches from snacks to setting up an air mattress for my son were very thoughtful. And her drinking water is amazing! We hope to return next year.
Beautiful and serene yet very close to town. Gracious hospitality and comfortable space. We would love to come back for a longer visit!

A wonderful stay: starting with a warm welcome by Tom & Diane. Convenient location to explore Silver Falls SP and Salem.
The space was clean, quit, spacious & comfortable with all the finishing touches. Was a pleasure staying here. Recommended!

I had a absolutely wonderful stay! The living space was larger than I expected; the kitchenette was filled with goodies that were just what I needed; the bed was comfy and of course, everything was sparkling clean! I went down to Salem to take a test at Corban, and Diane and Tom’s property was just right next to the campus, so the location could not have been better! If you are looking for a cozy, relaxing and quiet place place to stay in south Salem, this place is perfect for you!
Very pleasant stay. Thanks!
Diane and he husband were friendly and generous. Their place is comfortable, large, peaceful, and pleasant. They even put out food for you for breakfast!

Diane's home is lovely and the way she set up the basement for guests is perfect. She has thought of a ton of little touches to make your stay enjoyable and similar to a BNB- go figure! Her and her husband are very sweet and made check in very simple. Their garden is stunning and was a pleasant view when we first woke up in the morning. They have coffee, snacks, fresh water and the space is great for relaxing. We have no complaints! Thanks for the stay, Diane!

Diane’s place is in a quiet rural neighborhood and is the entire basement level of her house. Lots of room to spread out and relax! Comfortable bed and linens and also a nice patio space to enjoy. Morning beverages and a simple breakfast are also provided, making this a great value!

Being able to have the entire first level with private access was very neat. Diane's place was super clean and all the little amenities like a morning pastry, and yogurt were welcomed.

We enjoyed having a glass of wine out in the patio stargazing. This listing should be on the top of your list. It provides easy access to Silver Falls State and that was a bonus.. I just wish we could have stayed an extra day...

Diane was very nice and so welcoming. Her place is clean, comfortable, and 15 min to downtown Salem. We really appreciated the breakfast foods she provided for us, the crystal clear well water, and her hospitality.
Our stay was great. The space was very clean and the location is pretty and peaceful. Diane and her husband were very helpful and friendly.

This is a mandatory stay if your thinking of a place anywhere near the area, even extended drive worthy!!

The host... AMAZING! She really made us feel like we were family coming for a visit! SUPER NICE!

Soooo many thoughtful touches!

Thanks for making a part of my younger cousins trip beyond rememberable!

This is the friendliest Airbnb we've yet experienced! Diane and Tom were both amazingly friendly and helpful. The space is also larger than any Airbnb we've been in. They have a great garden too. We felt well-provider for: among plenty of other things, we were given in-season fruit, a delicious scone, and high-quality well water. The place is located at the edge of town in a beautiful, extremely quiet country environment. The final morning, we were pleasantly surprised to find that a protective kitty was lounging on our doormat at the glass door. It disappeared before we could greet it.
It feels as if you are staying with family. Diane has goodies in the refrigerator and provides breakfast. She has a wonderful garden outside and a great view. You have complete privacy.
The stay was marvelous.

This place is spectacular! The perfect cottage feel that feels like home :) You can go outside to admire the nature, beautiful surroundings of luscious trees and deer sights and skip through the berry field and pick berries :P The cottage itself is equipped with everything you need. The place is sparkling clean! The sweet amenities in the bathroom, kitchen area and bedroom are very very much needed!

This will be my home away from home spot for sure, diane is so sweet and welcoming everyone should experience this lovely home of hers :)

We absolutely loved our stay! The location was awesome - country feel yet close town. The property is gorgeous. Diane's thoughtfulness was great, the fridge had a few breakfast items including hard boiled eggs and yogurt. She left us a yummy scone each day and offered delicious water from their well. We had a lovely time. Thank you!!!!

Diane and Tom were excellent  hosts! Their place is super cute and the location is great. We were here for a concert for only one night and I wish we had longer to stay!  Diane provided some nice treats, including a delicious scone for breakfast. My friend saw a little fawn in their yard early in the morning while enjoying her breakfast and they both provided great tips on things in the area. Definitely recommend and hope to stay again at some point!

Lovely home in a great location and an amazing yard space. Diane and Tom thought of everything and have created a wonderful space to get away and they are so friendly. Would definitely stay there again!

Loved the warm welcome from Tom and Dianne with fresh fruits just picked from the garden. The apartment was quite spacious and cozy with very a nice breakfast and snacks to choose from. We were so close to Salem but it felt like a country retreat. I very much enjoyed the sunset in the outside patio. Definitely recommend a stay here.

Diane's place is very spacious,  clean and comfortable.  While being part of their home (lower floor)  it is very private and light filled.  It has a beautiful outlook to the garden and fields. Diane provided lovely breakfast & snack supplies. We highly recommend this Airbnb.
Great value, very spacious and private. Would definitely stay again.
Diane was a gracious host and her space was very clean and comfortable.

Tom and Diane are a lovely couple. Diane went out of her way to make me feel at home, including a home made muffin with raspberries out of her garden and crystal clear well water. I couldn't have been better taken care of. Loved it.
Very comfortable place to stay complete with snacks after a long day.  If you’re lucky they’ll still have raspberries that Tom will pick each morning.

Perfect little spot for exploring wineries, driving to the coast, and hiking around Mirror Lake.  The house itself sits in a very peaceful location.  Excellent view of the sunset over the garden or any number of birds in the morning.  Diane's thoughtful touches included snacks, drinks, and even a bouquet from her garden on the table.

This is a peaceful and beautiful location, but so convenient too. We loved our stay and enjoyed Diane & Tom’s hospitality, including fresh raspberries! The birdsongs were so beautiful, and little chipmunks and critters outside were charming. We got a bonus in two gorgeous sunsets. We stayed in writing all day and enjoyed the setting both inside & out. All the amenities etc. were great - we had no issues of any kind. Highly recommend!
Diane is a very kind and thoughtful host!  If you miss your sweet grandma, Diane’s place is the perfect place to spend the night.  Delicious well water!
Diane’s lovely & private place was wonderful & hosts most gracious & helpful. Everything that I needed was there. I will certainly go again & it is convenient to Corban Univ. All around great stay.
What a great experience. We booked this location for our Daughter's birthday because of the close proximity to Corbin and it exceeded our expectations. I will gladly book here again.
I can't imagine a better place to stay when we visit. We return every time we are staying in the area.

Tom and Diane were both wonderful!

The house is conveniently located close to the city, but the tranquility and peacefulness is countryside living at its best. There is also a nice view of some city lights in the evening and if the weathers just right a beautiful sunset too!

Their home was the perfect retreat and respite I needed while spending time with my father during his recovery at Salem hospital.

Tom sent me some supportive text messages to help keep my spirits up, and Diane kept the little refrigerator well stocked and I was able to enjoy a little breakfast each morning. I really did feel spoiled and didn’t even have to do the dishes!

I couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Tom also gave me a departing gift of some rhubarb from his garden.

Thank you both for everything!
Susie

Diane and Tom's place is a wonderful getaway just outside of Salem. The space was much larger than I expected and had everything need (and more) for the short time I was in town. Both Diane and Tom were incredibly welcoming and I enjoyed my interactions with them. I'll definitely look to stay here again next time I'm in town.
Diane & Tom were such gracious hosts! I look forward to staying with them again
Quiet, clean, inviting, homey place with excellent hosts!
Very spacious and clean.  We loved the close proximity to Corban University.

Diane’s place is comfy cozy complete floor.  There you can find a large living room, TV, couches and chairs as well as table for two.  There is water, mini fridge with snacks and flavored seltzer water. Breakfast was included.  We enjoyed our time and privacy.  The best thing about it was the quietness and deer we saw. My husband and I used this as a two get away. I’d highly recommend it.
Fantastic location for anyone coming to visit Corban University.  It is within walking distance to the campus sports field.   Great hospitality and quick communication.  We will visit again!
Great value, lovely place and awesome hosts!

Great place for a quiet getaway, or place to stay. We just did a quick over night here from a long drive from CA heading to WA. We were exhausted and Diane made it super easy for us to get in. We arrived pretty late and were able to self check-in and settle in for the night. Diane also had a mini continental breakfast set up for us, which was such a nice touch since we were getting back on the road for another long drive the next morning! The location is great not to far from Portland if you want to head to the outlets or downtown. The space itself was huge and nice, and we slept soundly. Would definitely stay here again if were travelling through Oregon!

Diane was an incredibly courteous host and her place is fantastic. There’s plenty of space, a comfortable bed, a nice shower and it’s only a 15-min drive from downtown Salem. I would absolutely stay again.
The place was a little hard to find at first (probably because it was nighttime) but I loved staying here and the hosts were very friendly!
Diane's place is perfect. I've stayed here many times and have never been disappointed.
Had another great stay at Diane and Tom’s place. Would highly recommend.

Diane is wonderful and made us feel right and home and very welcome. The bed is very comfortable, shower pressure is awesome, and the mini kitchenette was great! We enjoyed all the travel tips and the morning tidbits to eat. Felt very warm, cozy and safe! Will definitely stay again If we are in the area.
I'm never disappointed. This place is perfect. I stay often and am always impressed.

Diane's home was so lovely. She greeted me warmly to her home and her husband was so sweet and came out to say good-bye as I was checking out. The listing is very spacious and full of wonderful amenities. I will definitely remember this very special visit and I very much hope I get an opportunity to come back.
My stay couldn't be better. Tom and Diane always exceed my expectations. I have stayed at their place several times and am always impressed. I never stay anywhere else when I'm in the area.

Diane & Toms was peaceful and clean. Diane met us and gave us a tour of her place and where everything was. We made a suggestion about lighting the driveway entrance better. The next night they had placed reflectors with address at the driveway entrance and down the driveway. Comfortable place and exactly what we expected.

Diane's place is a garden sanctuary in a peaceful wooded area with wonderful views across the valley to Salem.  The house is immaculately clean and very comfortable.  Diane is a delightful host!  We highly recommend her place!
Such a comfortable and peaceful atmosphere! Always a very enjoyable stay.

Diane is truly a super host.  The space is always immaculate and always welcoming after a long day of travel.  Very private location with beautiful wilderness all around.  We couldn't have asked for a better stay.

Diane’s downstairs guest space is very comfortable and has a great view of the smaller mountains in the area. They were quick to accommodate to our needs and even provided wood and kindling for the outside fire pit.

I really enjoyed my stay here. Both Diane and Tom were really helpful. Especially Tom helping me find where to walk and get my daily step count. The living room there is setup so nice with a big couch, I wish I could have arranged to bring family there for part of my visit.

This AirBnB is in a beautiful, out of the way location.  Really enjoyed the sunset from the porch area.  If you're looking to get away from it all and yet be close to Portland and the Woodburn outlet stores, this is the place.

Beautiful natures and ranches surround the place. It perfectly suits my purpose of staying in Salem, OR. It’s clean and spacious for two, and the hosts, Diane and Tom, are adorable and easy to talk and will accommodate your needs. Looking forward to visit next time.
Diane was very sweet and accommodating. The space was very big and sparkling clean. Thw outdoor areas is beautiful. We will definitely try to stay again if we are in the area!

Lovely place in the quiet Salem countryside. Still very close to everything. Very easy freeway access. Serene space with great views. Hosts were wonderful. Couldn’t ask for a better spot to stay while visiting family and friends!
Beautiful view of nature, quiet, clean and cozy! If you like it to be quiet and away from a big city this is perfect and to get to shops/town its only a short drive. Enjoy!
Diane and Tom were fantastic hosts. The place is surprisingly spacious and the environment is relaxing. Definitely would stay here again.
An enjoyable quiet setting overlooking Salem and the Willamette Valley.The hosts were friendly and hospitable.
Diane is a wonderful host and her house is lovely. If you're a frequent airbnb'r in the Salem area, you're missing out if you haven't stayed here.

Diane was the first host that ever gave me a full in-person greeting and walk through! A cozy retreat with all the touches of home. There’s a make shift kitchen and she’s always available for things like ice and clearing dirty dishes while you’re out. Thanks for a quiet, cozy retreat. We will definitely be back when the weather is better so we can enjoy the view and fire pit!

Diane and Tom are wonderful hospitable hosts. Diane greeted us with a tour of the place. The location and the view is amazing! It was easily accessible, and simple to check in. We really appreciated that Diane refilled our water, cleared the dishes and trash, and cleaned the coffee maker. It was everything we expected and more. Very comfortable and clean! We will definitely be checking Diane and Tom’s place for availability if we are ever in the area again!

We had an amazing time staying with Diane and Tom. They were such kind people and we really enjoyed getting to know them during our stay. The accommodations were clean and relaxing; it was a perfect place to stay while we got some work done in Oregon. If we ever come back to the area, definitely will be staying with them again.

This country cottage was perfect for our stay in Oregon. The garden and views were so wonderful to wake up to and the sunsets were gorgeous. The living room area is huge, and everything was so nice and clean. The owners, Diane and Tom, were so hospitable and lovely to talk to. I would recommend this place to anybody staying in the area!
This home was a super convenient location for us, Diane and her husband were so kind, and friendly. They really make you feel at home!
Diane’s place is easy to find. House was clean and the bed was comfortable. Nice quiet location with a beautiful view.

Such a home away from home in a quiet restful area overlooking the valley. Diane is a great hostess and the accommodations we in a spacious suite. We left sad to leave, totally refreshed. Would love to come back.

I would highly recommend this airbnb.  Diane and Tom have thought of everything you might need.  The space is huge and the unit is very close to lots of shopping and downtown Salem.  We felt very welcomed and relaxed during our visit.

Diane went above and beyond with making us feel comfortable and welcomed. There was a little mini kitchen area with cereal coffee and a fridge with snacks and milk and some drinks. We had more space than i expected and lots of privacy. Tom and Diane even helped us set up the firepit outside so we could make smores. Highly recommend staying here.
The place is beautiful. Tom and Diane were very friendly and helpful. It is a great place to stay.

Diane and Tom are absolutely charming hosts. Their place is beautiful and cozy with gorgeous sunsets and baby deer that walk through the back yard. A peaceful place to stay outside the bustle of downtown Salem but still close to good places to eat and the spectacular Silver Falls State Park.  We hope to return in the near future.
Tom and Diane provide a perfect and peaceful place to stay.  We definitely recommend and plan to return on future trips.
My stay here was great! Diane was very communicative and helpful, and the place itself was comfortable and well-stocked with amenities and even snacks! The view from the front door is awesome!

Such a lovely, country environment for my husband and me to have a much needed break. Everything was fantastic! Tom and Diane are delightful and their property is beautiful. So easy to get to from the freeway. Very clean, roomy, and quiet. The bed is one of the most comfortable I’ve ever slept in. Thanks again, Diane and Tom, for a memorable stay in Salem. We’ll be back!

the whole place is really great!!!   I enjoy my time there a lot ! Diane came greet me during check in. and Tom came talk to me almost everyday cause they felt bad that I was there all alone(on a road trip alone)  the living room has more than enough space that i can put my stuff everywhere haha. the bedroom and bathroom are clean. kitchen is good, even there isn't a stove but they have a lot supply and snack for you (juice, milk, eggs, cheese, cracker, cereal, you name it) Diane came take the trash, dirty dish and feel the water while you are gone.  it was a hot week with average 100 degree during my staying, they have the AC on all the time, the basement is nice and chill, feel like two different world than outside burning air.  I cut my finger with glasses accidently, Diane and Tom help me to clean the mess and patch my finger for me. couldn't ask for better host!!  stay with them, you won't regret it !

Diane's place was perfect for us.Thete was so much space to relax and we loved how clean and tidy it was. The location was perfect allowing for a country experience that was close to everything in the city. We highly recommend and plan to stay again ourselves!

Diane and Tom are great hosts who take into account every detail, big or small, to make our stay at their beautiful home, an amazing experience. I loved it so much that I am staying with them again when I go back to Salem in October.

We had a great experience. Lots of space, comfy furniture and a fantastic location. It was a quiet and peaceful place with many nice accents of a home away from home. Loved our hosts and would recommend them and their lovely home to anyone.
Beautiful and quiet spot in Salem.
Amazing
We had a wonderful stay and would highly recommend staying here if ever in the area.

This spacious basement apartment was a very comfortable and clean place for us to stay in while visiting family in Salem. Too many amenities to list, the hosts have done an incredible job of making their guests feel welcome and taken care of. Since we enjoy visiting our family here, I’m sure we will be staying at the Country Garden Retreat often!

I had such a wonderful stay in this space! I needed an escape to concentrate on finishing a major project, and it was the perfect place to do so. Comfortable, welcoming, clean, and a gorgeous view. Diane and Tom are amazing hosts, too! So kind and great to chat with. I absolutely recommend reserving this space. I hope to visit again.
This airbnb really is walking distance to Corban. A very good  spot to visit students from!

This is the 2nd time my daughter and I stay with Diane and Tom and, again, it felt like home away from home. Their place is great and super comfortable.  They are indeed super hosts. I am planning on staying with them again next time I visit my daughter in March.

You will not be disappointed… Diane and Tom are some of the most kindest and thoughtful people..Everything was described perfectly and still does not describe all the awesomeness of our stay:) stay here u will not be disappointed. Thank you so much

This is a great place to get away from crowds but still be close to the things you want in the Salem area. The location is peaceful and the accommodations are spotless while still being inviting and comfortable. We will definitely stay here again.

One of the best Airbnb experiences I’ve ever had. A perfectly private floor in a beautiful home in a ultra quiet neighborhood.

Every little detail is covered with Diane, and if anything is missing, let her know and she will take care of you.

We slept very well and we highly recommend Diane as a host.

Our stay was great! Diane is very commutative she said hello to us when we arrived she went over everything with us. We had a nice stay it was very quiet which sometimes that’s what you need. They bathroom was fully stocked with towel and the little “kitchen” area has everything you need, she even put out water for us and refilled it when we were gone which was very much appreciated.

This home is delightful in almost too many ways to list. Sparkling clean, very comfortable, lots of space. My favorite parts: the rural setting and great view of Salem; the wonderful color coordination of interior spaces (love the dark accent wall behind the TV, the painted bureau in the bedroom that plays off the color in the picture above, and small decorative pieces in the bathroom); and the very comfortable bed. Diane was very welcoming but not in the least intrusive. I wasn't expecting to find a gem like this at such a low cost, but am very happy I found Diane's wonderful place. I plan to stay here again and again -- if she isn't already booked, as I believe her place is quite popular!
Kind and attentive host ☺️

My second stay was as delightful as the first. This is such a lovely spot, with a great view of the lights of Salem. The rooms are spacious and spotlessly clean. Diane and Tom are wonderful hosts -- helpful but not intrusive. If you need to be in Salem for any reason, this is a great place to stay!

Very attentive hosts who make sure you have everything you need but give you your space to relax. The space is exactly as listed. Very comfortable, clean and cozy with everything you need. It’s also super close to great hiking, site seeing and Salem sites. Will definitely stay again if available. Highly recommended!

This is an absolute gem in the AirBnB world.  Guests have the whole bottom floor of the house - a HUGE living area, large bedroom and large bathroom (shower, not tub). Everything is very clean and feels well cared for.  As the description indicates, there is no real 'kitchen' - in particular, no sink, and you do not do dishes in the bathroom sink (the house is on septic). BUT, Diane does provide a way to have the basic dishes (glasses, plates, bowls, silverware) washed upstairs.  So heating things in the microwave, or having other foods that don't require a full-on kitchen are fine.  In addition to the incredible comfort, cleanliness and spaciousness of this lodging, the outdoor space is amazing - you have your own patio, with seating and fire pit, and a truly gorgeous view - a hilly oak tree savannah landscape.   It's quiet, peaceful and beautiful.  It's about a 10-15 minute drive to 'downtown' Salem, but there are lots of restaurants, shops etc, even closer.   We had a great stay at Diane's (and Tom's), and would definitely stay again.
Wonderful Airbnb property. Nice space, great accommodations and lovely hosts.  And, great value.

We spent a weekend at Diane's place while visiting our daughter who attends Corban. It was a perfect location for that purpose, right by the campus. We have stayed at various hotels in Salem, and this was so much more convenient and comfortable. The rooms were clean and quiet; the view out the windows onto a garden and wooded area, with a bit of a view of the valley, was beautiful and peaceful. The hosts were very kind and welcoming, and we enjoyed chatting with them, but they also left us alone. There were many hospitable touches such as little muffins, yogurt and juice in the fridge, paper cups by the sink, coffee and cereal available, and a water dispenser that Diane kept filled for us. The kitchenette area consists of a small fridge, microwave, coffee pot, toaster, and a few supplies. There is no kitchen sink or counters, nor freezer to speak of (although I've no doubt Diane would have put something in her freezer for us if we'd asked --- she was very accommodating). An extra table somewhere to provide more "counter" space would be helpful. But in general, if you are planning on eating in, keep it simple, with items that don't require a lot of prep or freezer space, and you’ll do great.  All in all, a very nice stay and we will definitely be back!

Diane and Tom were both so wonderful and welcoming. The space they provided was clean, comfortable, and in just a perfect spot. They were both very sweet and accommodating, and not once did I feel out of place or uncomfortable!
I love staying here whenever I come to town, it feels like home. Just the right amount of amenities and super clean. A little retreat that feels more country than the city of Salem.
Great location for visiting Salem.  We had a very comfortable stay at Diane’s place and appreciated her hospitality. Would definitely stay there again.!
Great place to stay, convenient location, nice amenities and all around just a feeling of being home away from home.
We stay here whenever we visit our daughter at college. The location is quiet and beautiful while still being close to town. Clean and comfortable, great hosts!
In a few words: we had a wonderful stay! Definitely choose staying here. It was perfect.
Diane and Tom were friendly and accommodating. The space is very clean and well maintained. The bed and bedding are comfortable.
A beautiful, quiet location but still conveniently close to Salem. Communication is quick and clear. Diane and Tom are wonderful hosts!
Tom& Diane are such great host ! They were both so welcoming and inviting. The location was perfect for us. It was the best Airbnb experience I’ve had so far !
Lovely hosts, great stay :)
Very clean and spacious place. We enjoyed the deer visiting in the evening and the hospitality of the host. Lovely place.

I had a wonderful visit to Salem, Oregon and that is due in large part to Diane’s hospitality and the comfort provided in her home. I appreciated the large living space, comfy bed, and peaceful location. I highly recommend this spot!
Diane's place is perfect. It is clean, roomy and has so many thoughtful touches! We loved having dinner on the patio with rhe beautiful view. We will definitely be staying again!
A beautiful location and great hospitality by Diane and Tom. So relaxing and comfortable! Highly recommend it as a great get away place.

Diane and Tom were the perfect hosts! They were very welcoming and accommodating, with quick communication and great advice on local activities. The space was pristinely clean and so comfortable. I loved sitting in the cozy chair and looking out the windows over the berry garden and fields and trees. This was just the idyllic retreat I needed to soothe my soul. <3
We had a wonderful time staying at Diane and Tom's place - It was cozy and comfortable with a beautiful backyard. We loved their warmth and hospitality. The space had everything you would need :)

Diane’s home is really beautiful and she and her husband Tom are wonderful hosts. My time in Oregon was amazing and having them host me made it even a more pleasurable experience. I recommend their home to anyone who wants to have a gorgeous scenery and a very well kept and wonderful place to live in. A warm and cozy home. This is definitely the place to be🥰
Diane is such a great host! She is very welcoming and takes great care of her property. Hope to stay again.

We had a wonderful stay while visiting family. Immaculate and homey, it was a peaceful respite for us at the end of each day. We will definitely recommend everyone stay with you if they are in the area.
Such a great location. Everything was just perfect.  Hosts were awesome.
You will be happy here.

The unit is a clean and taken care of place. I was a little hesitant when I saw it was in the daylight basement of their home, but as soon as I got there I felt so much better. Diane was very welcoming and had everything set up to make you feel right at home. Not to mention you look out the slider to a beautiful country view!  It was an adorable place to stay!

Diane is a wonderful and kind Host. We enjoyed our 2 day stay so muchWe felt so welcomed that we really wished we were staying a little longer. It was so peaceful and quiet in that part of town we felt totally relaxed and happy. I will definitely recommend Diane's AirBNB to all my friends and we hope to return next year.

Diane was flexible with my late checkout request.  Nice view, but due to the floor level we could hear a lot of floor creaking and water activity from upstairs.  If you don't mind host interaction (like at the door when you arrive to meet and explain the rules, in the living room to get dishes and garbage when you go out to eat, etc.), then it is a nice clean place with a good view and country feel, yet close enough to town to get dinner.

Diane is the most gracious host!  We were treated as guests in her house and felt very welcome. If you're looking for a quiet spot to rest and not be far from downtown, this is it.  Highly recommended!

We stayed here for four days while visiting family in the Salem area.  We loved the location and the accommodations are spacious and very comfortable.  Diane and Tom are wonderful people, attentive hosts, and we enjoyed meeting them.  We will absolutely try to stay here again in the future!

Diane and Tom are the epitome of the Perfect Airbnb hosts!  After a week on the road, their place was a peaceful haven to relax, refresh and reboot!  Diane reached out ahead of our arrival to make sure we knew how to get there, where we could park and how to get inside.  Upon our arrival, Diane greeted us to ensure everything was to our liking, ask us if we wanted wood for the outside fire pit and if there was anything she could do to make our stay more comfortable.  She even left some snacks for us and cool water from their well. After that she disappeared, giving us our privacy.  The place is more spacious than it looks in the pictures and it is SUPER clean!  The bed is comfortable, the water pressure in the shower is strong, and the inside and outside are charming.  I HIGHLY recommend staying at the Country Garden Retreat!
Lovely little garden apartment,  great proximity to Corban University.   Very scenic back yard.
Great accommodation outside Salem. Great hosts in Diane and Tom and in a beautiful setting and well-stocked accommodation.

My son and I had a wonderful time staying at Diane's house.  She is an amazing host who is kind, helpful and excellent with communication.  The house is in a beautiful location, and it is so relaxing and enjoyable staying there.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting a peaceful and comfortable stay in the Salem area.

We only had a 2 night stay but it was super cute & easy to get to. Very spacious. The welcome snacks were most appreciated :D And it was a GREAT value!!! Diane came down daily to empty out the dirty dishes & garbage for us, and refill the most delicious well water... while we were out. You MUST drink the water lol All the basics were there. Mini fridge & microwave... toaster & coffee pot (with coffee!!). Overall, very good stay while visiting Salem!
Beautiful location, home and hosts.

Amazing location if you are looking to have a quiet and peaceful visit but also not far from downtown and only about an hour drive to Portland! plenty of hiking spots and lakes nearby and everything you could reasonably ask for while staying in someone’s home! Will most definitely consider staying again next time I visit Salem!
Diane is a lovely host. Her home is very clean. The living room was very spacious and had a great view. The location has a quiet country feel but only a 10 min drive to get food/coffee.
this is a beautiful place to stay and Diane is a wonderful host
Just a great stay overall. Place was super clean, comfortable. Had all the privacy I needed. Diane and Tom were very accommodating. Very friendly, a special group of people.

This is a great piece of country in the city. The area is spacious and Diane offers an enormous amount of energy to keep her guests happy. A great place to stay when you are in the area either for work or vacation.

My guest was accosted and asked if she was a drug addict two days into the stay if you want to stay at a place where people question everything about you then this is the place for you I hated this day I left after two days. That’s my feeling on this host
My stay at Diane’s was very relaxing.  I found their home very clean and nothing lacking.

Diane'splace is awesome! Diane is a great host and so welcoming! The space is clean, tidy and has so much space! We also loved sitting on the patio, drinking coffee and looking at the view! We highly recommend this place!
Very private entrance, clean room, comfortable bed and loved the snacks available in the room. Every AirBnB should have snacks and a small selection of food to go! Would stay again if I needed to.

Our hosts were incredibly thoughtful and welcoming. Very kind and genuine people. We felt especially safe here, and the location is quite charming and quiet, but with easy access into town if you need to pick anything up or grab food. Check-in was easy and communication timely and helpful. The space was much larger than we had anticipated and very comfortable and "homey." The accommodations were comfortable, and our hosts were even extra thoughtful by turning a lamp on in the space for us before we came home in the evening after it was dark.

Bonus perk: My hair was softer after washing it in the shower there than it has been in years with our over-treated, extra-hard water back at home. I didn't even know my hair was capable of being that soft and shiny. It was a nice vacation for my hair as well as the rest me.
This was the perfect place for us. Absolutely everything was five star. We have been recommending it to friends as well. Super value!!! We will definitely stay here whenever we visit the area.
Great location. Quiet and peaceful but close in.
Tom and Diane are wonderful hosts. The place was clean in a quiet beautiful country setting. They are very responsive and attentive. Nice place to relax.
I stayed here during a family reunion in nearby Turner.  It says it all that it didn’t take long before I was referring to this place as my Zen Den.  Diane and Tom are wonderful hosts.
They have earned all the great reviews: nice accommodations, spacious & clean. A very hospitable couple, offering to help as requested, but otherwise leaving renter’s alone.
We had a lovely stay.  Diane’s unit is very spacious and sparkling clean!  It had everything we needed for a relaxing weekend.  Thank you!!
Quiet, country setting. We observed a deer roaming by while drinking our morning coffee.

I can't remember how many times I have stayed at this point, but each visit is great. I am thankful that you continue to host. The place is convenient, close to everything, and still so quiet. Thank you again for having me!

We are return customers! We first chose Diane's place because of the proximity to Corban University, where we have a student. We found it to be clean, quiet, and comfortable. The hosts are very friendly and responsive to questions. It is ideal for a couple; a third person can stay on an airbed they have. There is not an actual kitchen, but it has a microwave, coffee pot, toaster, and small fridge. Not really set up for lots of meal prep, but we were able to toast bagels, reheat food, etc. Being right next to the college makes it so easy for us to stay there, and I'm sure we will be back!

My only regret is that I wish I had more time to truly enjoy Diane’s home. It was very spacious and comfortable and she adds little details that make you feel at home. I would definitely stay here again.

We have stayed at Diane's place several times visiting our daughter. We keep coming back because it works so well for us. It is clean and comfortable, on a quiet street right by Corban University and only a few minutes from stores and restaurants. We appreciate the little homey touches like juice and yogurt in the fridge, and the hosts are always very welcoming.
Tom and Diane were awesome! They had everything we needed and were very hospitable and friendly. This location was perfect for us to attend our daughters beach volleyball games at Corban University.

Diane and her husband couldn't have been more hospitable and friendly,  especially with the snow storm we had. They were flexible with my departure and even helped get me on the road. I felt very cared for.
I loved this location.  beautiful sights and countryside  but close to town . i would highly recommend

What a lovely place!  From Tom and Diane's warm welcome to the thoughtful touches, we enjoyed every part of our stay.  It was comfy, well appointed, and filled with anything we might need.  But truly, it was the hospitality of Tom and Diane that made it feel like coming home.  We're looking forward to staying again. 😊

Thoughtful, considerate host with a wonderful place to stay.  Super clean, comfortable and beautifully decorated.  I enjoyed having a separate entrance, a private bathroom and the opportunity to do a load of laundry.  Coffee pot, microwave, mini fridge and breakfast goodies for the first morning were added bonuses.  You will not be disappointed if you stay here!

This was my second stay at Cindy's Nook.  It is a comfortable, clean, safe and convenient place to stay.  I love the private bathroom, separate entrance and the thoughtful amenities -- coffee pot, microwave, mini fridge and use of washer & dryer.  Oh, did I mentioned that there is also a sauna that can be used???  Lovely backyard with shared grill.  Convenient to so many things -- located near Commercial Street in southern portion of Salem.  Host is friendly, helpful, polite and extra thoughtful.

My wife and I had a great stay at Cindy's place!  The location is great.  Close to downtown, but also close to family we visit.  The place itself is wonderfully decorated and inviting.  We were able to relax in the evening in the "living room" area, then settle into a pleasant sleep after. If you visit Salem, I would highly recommend a stay with Cindy!
Cindy's nook was clean, comfortable, convenient, quiet - a great place to stay for several days on business.  The sauna is a wonderful bonus.
Yes so worth it. Will do it again
I think the best review of Cindy's Nook is that I would stay there again.  It's private, quiet, clean, and just what I was looking for.  I recommend it without reservation.
Cindy's "nook" is a great place to stay in Salem. It had everything we needed for a comfortable lay over in Salem. We HIGHLY recommend.

My husband and I stayed for 2 nights while in Salem house hunting in the area. Cindy's place was a very welcome respite from moving and staying with family. We loved the central location for getting around town. The room beautifully decorated, the bed was very comfortable and the shower had great water pressure. Cindy really goes the extra step to make the space very relaxing and to make sure her guests are well taken care of. Thanks so much!
Cindy's nook is a gem. It is spacious, quiet, clean, and comfortable. I loved it so much that this is the first time in my history that I booked a future stay at the same place before leaving!

Cindy is a thoughtful host, and her nook is quiet and cozy. Cindy does a wonderful job making sure you have everything you need and is always quick to respond. I had a very pleasant and relaxing weekend.
