The kitchen was stocked above and beyond for our visit. We had a wonderful vacation and will keep this accommodation high on or list for future visits.
Everything in every way was perfect.  There was nothing to wish for, or need as it was all there and then some.  Spotless, very homey, and just extremely comfortable.  First class...5 star!

My stay with Chuck and Lorie was such a beautiful experience, the setting and home were perfect, their thoughtfulness and kindness showed in every part of my stay .
When I needed anything at all they were readily available.
The convenience of a grocery store and the beauty of Oregon was minutes away,
I couldn’t have chose a better place .
The amenities they offer covered everything, they literally thought of everything.
In the future when I return to Oregon, I will definitely try to stay with Chuck and Lorie again.
They are amazing beautiful hosts .
I felt very welcomed and safe .
Thank you Chuck and Lorie for my first experience with Airbnb I will definitely continue to use your services .
five stars for sure! loved every moment

This place is immaculate! And the location is private and beautiful. This is a daylight walk out basement which means that host, and guest, noises do travel through the ceiling and the vents. It is background noise and we only mention this in the review in case it might be bothersome to someone considering this lovely Airbnb. The hosts went above and beyond with thoughtful supplies and everything was in excellent condition. The detailed written instructions were very helpful.

Chuck and Lori were great! Very friendly and welcoming, and they left snacks wine and coffee for us! The guest suite has its own separate entrance with a smart lock (SO nice not having to keep track of keys!) and feels very private. We also rarely could hear anything going on upstairs (and normally in a basement suite you hear everything going on above!). We would definitely stay here again.
Sunnyslope Retreat was the perfect place to spend our time in Salem! Chuck and Lorie have thought of everything to make your stay amazing!
Our family had a great time staying at Chuck and Lorie's place. Good location (as it is really close to our family in Salem) with everything we needed for a short trip!

Perfect Airbnb place. I have stayed here at least a few times already and always look for it when I need to be in Salem for work travel. It’s so warm and inviting and very clean.  There’s so much TLC in this place and the fireplace is the frosting on the cake for those cold winter wet nights in Salem.
Warm and welcoming, fantastic hosts. Highly recommended.
What a great AirBNB!  Gracious hosts and the space is large, well thought out and very clean.  I will absolutely stay here again next time in Salem!!!

This is a slam dunk place to stay!    Chuck and Lorie are thoughtful.    They have thought of everything that you could ever think of that you need!    They were responsive and courteous.  This place is large, comfortable, super clean, uncluttered, awesome location……..need I go on!    Great value!   It was definitely one of our best Airbnb stays!    Highly recommend!

We were very comfortable and couldn't be happier about the location-walking distance to grocery stores and restaurants. The hosts were extremely sweet and attentive. The welcome bottle of wine and basket of healthy snacks were a nice touch and much appreciated because we were so busy running around town all day. And, it was sooo nice to return a super quiet and clean neighborhood. The sleep number bed had us so spoiled. Now we need one for our home. Will definitely ask to come back. Thank you C & L!!!

Chuck & Lorie welcome their guests to one of the cleanest and best decorated air b&b's in the Salem area.  This property is quiet, clean and handy to downtown and groceries.  Comfortable bed, awesome fireplace and handy adequate parking.
This was an extra comfortable retreat. Chuck and Lorie are super nice and very accommodating! They definitely focus on the "little things" to make the experience better!
This is a wonderful place! Great, quiet location with kind and communicative hosts. Would definitely stay here again!

Chuck & Lorie are wonderful hosts!  I can't emphasize that enough.  Really nice people who really care about their guests having a comfortable, happy stay.  Their apartment is perfect for one person or a couple for either a short visit or medium length visit.  I was moving here for work and so needed a place where I could comfortably work and live while I moved into my new place.  Sunnyslope retreat was perfect.  It is very conveniently located to shopping, restaurants, and less than 10 minutes to downtown even during rush hour.  Everything worked perfectly including excellent wifi service and lots of outlets to charge phones and computers and a great work space with an excellent desk space and work chair. Their were  also nice touches like fruit and snacks and some refreshments in the fridge as well as nice bottle of pinot.  All in all I highly recommend Chuck & Lorie's Sunnyslope retreat to anyone in need of a comfortable place to stay in the Salem area at a very reasonable rate.

We really enjoyed our stay at the Sunnyslope retreat. It’s quiet and comfortable. Chuck and Lorie are great hosts and from what we can tell beautiful humans.
The apartment is well furnished and decorated. Every detail feels thoughtful.
From the sleep number bed to the toiletries and snacks.
The apartment is clean, smells good and feels safe.
We had such a nice stay and even got to see a deer come through the backyard.
We will stay here again given the chance and recommend Sunnyslope to all our friends and family who come to visit Oregon.

A nice, comfortable space located on the bottom floor of the hosts house. There is a short walk down a side driveway and around back to get into the entrance. The property is located in a clean and quiet neighborhood, and the space looks out on a peaceful backyard.

We had a decent stay with only minor issues. Multiple times upon entering the space we had to air it out due to a rather unpleasant smell. Using the fireplace was a little unnerving as it pops on rather strongly as you have to light it by hand and it did take some time to heat the space up. We did appreciate the multiple ceiling fans to help with air circulation. The kitchenette space and fridge were smaller than we had expected so we could only prepare small meals and snacks and ended up having to eat out more than we had planned. The water in the bathroom does take a bit of time to heat up for a shower and in the sink. And the bed has a number mattress which took quite a bit of time to adjust because the remotes were hard to operate. Space was clean and nicely furnished, and we enjoyed an evening of playing board games that were available for use.

A lovely accommodation along with great hosts  made this an enjoyable stay. Quiet neighborhood, plenary of nearby restaurants and easy parking added to my stay. Chuck and Lori provided great a welcoming and I highly recommend this B&B.

Chuck & Lorie literally thought of every detail to make this sweet space even more perfect.
Chuck gave us a warm welcome tour. The bottle of wine and basket of snacks was such a nice touch and made for a great relaxing evening.

The space is so clean, so well thought out, and absolutely 5 stars.
The bed was very comfortable, we slept freakin good... And each morning we opened the blinds hoping we would see a little deer in the beautiful backyard. ♥️
If this is available, BOOK IT.
It’s a gem, and they are amazing hosts.
We truly appreciated them opening their home to us. What an AMAZING Airbnb!
perfect spot for what I was in Salem to accomplish. quiet, convenient to market etc, cozy. and the area in general, Salem, Independence, that area... would definitely stay here again.
You will be 100% happy staying in this lovely couple’s Airbnb.  There is so much attention to detail.

We really enjoyed our stay at Sunnyslope Retreat.  Chuck & Lorie are wonderful hosts.  The house was clean and comfortable and in a perfect location to visit family and friends in Salem.  It provided us with a nice respite in between visits.

The place is quiet but still close to parks and groceries. They have everything you need to be comfortable and relaxed for the stay. The layout is cute and the hosts were responsive to communication. Can’t ask for a better place to stay when in town.

Lite breakfast, yogurt, fruit, oatmeal, coffee and tea we're available as well as some treats. Extremely clean and comfortable with a convenient location. Private and lush backyard view and access.  Hosts we're very friendly and helpful!

We really enjoyed our stay. You have thought of every detail and anticipated every need. The location was a little tricky just because we wanted to explore the Willamette Bikeway but great neighborhood and wonderful stay overall. Would highly recommend. Thanks again.
clean and nice to stay at in a good neighborhood

Check and Lorie were amazing hosts that when above and beyond. They offered snacks and breakfast in our apartment, a bottle of nice wine and plus many other amenities.

They suggested great places to go see and then we decided to head to the beach and Chuck and Lorie lent us chairs and coolers to make our time there that much more special.

I would highly recommend this location to anyone. The apartment is well equipped with everything you need and is beautiful inside and out. The grounds are all very lush and green there.

You couldn’t ask for any better hosts!
Enjoyed out stay.
A beautiful peaceful retreat. The home is cozy and relaxing. Chocolates by the night stands and treats at the kitchen table. So many thoughtful touches.
A very clean and comfortable place to stay. Chuck and Lorie went the extra mile with several little touches to make us feel welcome.
Great place highly recommended  if you're in the area.

We had a wonderful stay at Sunnyslope Retreat. The attention to detail, breakfast bar, snacks and even a personalized greeting sign really made us feel welcome and right at home. Thank you Chuck and Lorie for making our stay in Salem special!

This was a great place to stay! Chuck and Lorie are such nice people and the space was exactly as described. It actually seemed even bigger than I imagined. The kitchenette was well stocked and the bed super comfy. It was a lovely stay and I absolutely plan on staying again in the future.

Fabulous and comfortable place to stay.  In spite of the fact that they is no stove or oven, we made do with toasters and crockpots and the microwave.  Bed was super comfortable and there is lots of space and a beautiful garden view.  Very close to everything too!

This was our first airbnb experience and it was wonderful. Our hosts were so welcoming and helpful. All of the written instructions were amazing. The Sunnyslope retreat was cute, cozy, and immaculate. We would stay there again in a heartbeat

The perfect little place we temporarily called “home.” My husband and I just moved to Oregon and are not able to get our own place yet due to our circumstances, but Chuck and Lorie’s place is a cute little abode that was really fit for us. The tiny little details made this stay a little more special. Our favorite thing to use was the fireplace, it warmed up the place nicely. Their hospitality, kindness, and understanding does not go unnoticed. We highly recommend this place and will definitely rent it again in the future if there are available openings!

Be prepared for a terrific stay at Sunnyslope Retreat.  We felt welcomed and valued by Chuck and Lorie.  They  stayed in touch in a way making it easy to enjoy our visit to Oregon.  Their attention to detail in the living space provided was terrific.  They thought of EVERYTHING a person might need while away from home.  Their quiet neighborhood was delightful, too.  We hope to visit them again on our next trip to Oregon.

We loved the charm and coziness of Chuck & Lorie’s place!! It has everything we needed and the bed is so comfy!!!! They even had a chocolate on each nightstand, snacks in the fridge, sparkling beverage and a fireplace. Loved it!!

Wonderfully quiet and relaxing retreat. Chuck and Lorie were so friendly and welcoming. Everything was spotlessly clean and so comfortable. We look forward to staying at Sunnyslope Retreat again in the future!

We were a little concerned about noise when we realized we were in the basement of the owner's house but it was mostly very quiet. They were very attentive with very clear instructions. "Apartment" was attractively decorated & loaded with so many unexpected and thoughtful extras (snacks, breakfast items, chocolate, cheese & wine) for our enjoyment and comfort. Felt very homey,  cozy and warm. We wish we had more time to actually be in it to enjoy all the comforts. Lorrie & Chuck were very compassionate and kind.
We had a great time in Salem while I was taking the bar exam. Chuck & Lorie provided us with a clean, friendly space. We would definitely stay again!

Cozy. Comfortable. Clean.
Couldn’t be happier with our stay at Chuck and Lorie’s Sunny Slope Retreat. We will defiantly stay here in the future if it’s available.
Great location. Wonderful, thoughtful hosts.

We were so fortunate to have booked Megan's home to be in Salem for the great eclipse! She lives in a quiet community and has a very lovely home. Her past experience as the owner of a bed and breakfast is evident in her extraordinary attention to detail, ensuring that her guests are settled in and comfortable. She made sure we had breakfast supplies and snacks, which was so kind of her to do. We were able to watch the eclipse in the meadow like field about 100 yards from her home, and even picked fresh blackberries from the brambles there. Another treat was to sit on her enclosed front patio, enjoying a glass of wine and all the stars above. If you are looking for a peaceful retreat while you explore the Salem area, this is the place to stay.

Nancy was very inviting, accommodating, and helpful!  Location is in a very friendly neighborhood, and her immediate neighbors are super nice people.  Huge public park backs up to the property, which is quite inviting.  Also, there are huge trees on and around her property which provide natural shade and air conditioning.  Having been a local for 20+ years, she knows the area very well, and can offer tips and guidance for what to do and see in the greater Salem area.
I had a great time and my stay was excellent. Thank you so much!

This place exceeded my expectations.. cozy, clean, and conveniently close to downtown Salem! Susan was a sweet and welcoming host, and her dog Ari is absolutely adorable. I will definitely be staying at this place again in the future!

Wow! Exceeds expectations! Feels like a five star retreat!! Photos do not do it justice. The room is very spacious, as is the bathroom, and lots of closet room. Recently remodeled: everything new. And the entire front half of the house is included in the booking: family room, living room. Private entrance through the front door, bedroom directly to the right. Only the kitchen/laundry room is "Shared" space. It's in a quiet neighborhood, minutes from downtown/fairgrounds.
Susan and her pet dog Ari were were great hosts! Occasionally meeting mornings in the kitchen where she would have a freshly brewed pot of coffee and a wealth of tips for the area. And her fresh out of the oven blueberry muffins were the best!!
Next time I'm in town, I hope I can stay here again!!

Susan's place was so nice, I extended the initial stay a few days.
Her location is great: a couple blocks from the fair grounds. Minutes from downtown and the Capitol. Couldn't ask for more!
On top of everything, her laundry room was open so I could do a load while running errands, come back and do another. This was great as I prepared for the net leg of my travels.
Wonderful host, accurate description, clean, plenty of space, and comfortable!
Susan is an excellent host. Her place is nice and clean. I had a lovely time sitting a chatting with her.

Susan's place was absolutely lovely, and she was a fantastic host! The room, bathroom and sitting room were very spacious, wonderfully decorated and very clean. The bed was extremely comfortable and the house is in a quiet neighborhood. Susan went out of her way to make sure I was comfortable -- she let me check in early, greeted me with homemade muffins, and had coffee and breakfast foods available in the fridge. She even helped me get some packages to the post office when I was in a pinch! All in all, a fantastic stay I would highly recommend.
Susan's house is a wonderful place to stay.  It's clean, has a comfortable bed, large bathroom, close to Willamette University, and a kind hostess!  I highly recommend this place!

Nice location a few miles from downtown and from Willamette University and the state government offices.  Susan was very friendly.  Bath and bed are private and sitting area is nearly private.  Susan is very nice about sharing her kitchen and fridge. Comfortable bed.   We'd stay again!

Susan's place far exceeded my expectations. I was welcomed at a later hour than planned with a warm, roaring fire and Susan's wonderful hospitality. The bed was comfortable and private, and the bathroom was much larger than expected, with anything you might need. I felt at home in the kitchen, where she had coffee and some amazing lemon blueberry muffins (YUM!).

The neighborhood was adorable - really well kept homes, and completely safe. She is located five minutes from the freeway and from downtown. It was really easy to get around.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and wish it could have been longer. Thank you for being an exceptional hostess!

Staying with Susan was great, I was scared at first as it was out first time using AirBNB. However, the comforting environment and close proximity to all that Salem has to offer simply could not be passed up.
Simple accommodations, but if you are looking for a nice place to stay in Salem Susan's place keys the bill. Only thing missing is a tv.
Everything I wanted in my Airbnb. Susan is a perfect hostess. Her home was clean, stylish, and very comfortable.

Susan's place is such a great cozy space. All the privacy you need while still having the opportunity to meet and chat if you want. The bathroom is spacious and the bed is super comfy and warm! Susan was a generous and wonderful host and her doggy was such a gentleman. =]

Susan was so welcoming and provided the perfect space for a relaxing weekend. Her home is very zen. The private bedroom and Susan’s private space are well sound insulated from one another—we were each sure the other party might have heard the other laughing until pretty late but it was not a problem. When we initially arrive Susan shared some fresh beef stew she had just made and every morning there was coffee in the pot. The bed was also super comfortable (has a heated blanket!) with a generous private bathroom. The WiFi is fast and the location is a short drive from Willamette University and down town.
Great space and thoughtful host.

Susan was a very kind host and made sure we had everything we needed for the stay. She was a good conversationalist and very easy to get along with.
Her home is fairly large and we had access to a living room with a fireplace, a bedroom, personal bathroom, and kitchen/dining room.
Susan stayed in the house we occupied, albeit in a different section (demarcated by doors that had “Private” signs on them). Because Susan was so gracious it was not unwelcome; however, if you’re looking for a place where you can have the entire house and its facilities to yourself, this may not be the place for you. Overall, a lovely stay.

Susan's home is lovely, quiet and comfortable. The bedroom and bathroom are very private and cozy. She is a personable and accommodating person who will join you in conversation or leave you alone, whichever you prefer. Next time I am in Salem I hope I can stay with her.

Very pleasant stay at Susan's place. Her house is super clean, and is tastefully decorated. Though the kitchen is shared, Susan makes the kitchen available to guests almost as if it were their own. I appreciated the short and easy commute to my workplace on State Street, too.

I couldn't have asked for a better experience: convenient location,  quiet neighborhood, comfy bed, nicely-equipped kitchen,  simple yet tasteful decor,  and a gracious hostess. If I ever have occasion to need a room in Salem again, this is where I want to be.
Perfect, centrally located home....clean and comfy.

Susan's place is an oasis in the city. Great value -- practically a whole place to yourself (private bedroom, bathroom, living room, dining room, and entrance). Very clean and comfortable. Susan was a wonderful host, good for a conversation, but she was also very respectful of my privacy.
Clean well decorated space. Close to downtown Salem.

Susan is a friendly and generous host, and her little dog is also friendly and exuberant. A great deal of effort clearly went into making the space aesthetically pleasing. It was very clean and nice linens. A nice relaxing living room and dining area. The kitchen is shared, but Susan is very accommodating and makes you feel at ease like you are staying at a relative's home.
I had a great stay here! Close to downtown and restaurants. She was also very accommodating. I recommend staying here!

Susan is such an awesome host! She is so thoughtful and very friendly. The space was clean with beautiful decorations. The bed was so comfortable and had a heated blanket. And the bathroom was so spacious! I would definitely recommend staying here!
What another delightful stay at this sweet and inviting home.  The kindness the host showed my grandgirls was appreciated...they especially liked the fairy wings and wand! Thank you!!

Susan's place is nestled in a well established neighborhood with mature trees and immaculately kept and maintained homes just minutes from downtown.  On her property were large Tulip Magnolia trees in full bloom making for a fresh spring feel.  We enjoyed staying there and Susan is a wealth of information as far as things to do locally.  We would definitely stay here again on our next trip to Salem.
Susan is amazing! Do not miss this place if you can book it, you'll have an amazing stay and leave with a new friend.
Both Susan and her place were lovely! She made sure we had everything we needed, and made us feel at home. Would definitely stay at her place again.

Great stay. Very clean, stylish, and comfortable place to stay. Very reasonably priced. Susan was a great host. We shared the kitchen, but the beautiful living and dining area was my space. Large bedroom and bathroom. Very comfortable bed. Susan had thoughtful touches like fresh flowers, great coffee, and breakfast items in the fridge. Great neighborhood to walk in. Would highly recommend and plan to stay again.
A very good value. Susan is sweet and does her best to be accomodating.

This is a charming, well-kept, quiet, beautiful place. It is only matched by Susan's care and hospitably. She is ready to chat and just as conscientious to your need for quite.

A gem in Salem.

Susan's place is a great one to stay! It is right in the middle of the town in a residential area. The place was very beautiful and well maintained. We get a private room, living room and the kitchen is shared. The bedroom had heated blankets which was a plus :).

Susan was a caring and an amazing host, she answered our questions pretty quickly and also ensured there was no problem with us arriving later than the check in time. Our check in was very smooth and she gave a quick tour of the house and left the place to ourselves. Susan also had breakfast items for us like yogurt, cereals, fruits, juice etc.

We would recommend this place to anyone who want a good place to stay in Salem. We will definitely stay here the next time we visit Salem!

Susan's home is a perfect blend of hospitality and privacy. It is comfortable, clean, and quiet (except for occasional early morning train horns). Good, central location in a residential neighborhood. Walking distance to a park; short drive to downtown. My third time here, and it's always great. REALLY comfy pillows on the bed!
Susan was super sweet and made us feel so at home. The room was really cute and comfortable. Great location, quite neighborhood but close to the freeway and town.

Susan’s home was impeccable, and truly elevated my expectations for what an Airbnb should look like. She had snacks, water, and food available, even without advertising. Susan was a delight to chat with in the few moments we crossed paths, and she made my visit to Salem such a delight. Highly recommend her place and a stay with her.

I’ve stayed at quite a few Air BnBs and Susan as a host blows everyone out of the water. She is extremely warm, pleasant and friendly. Rooms were extremely clean and smelled amazing. I hope anyone who comes to Salem picks Susan’s humble abode to stay at.
She really went above and beyond to make this a welcome place!

Susan is extremely kind and accommodating. I had to drive to Salem to take a 4-hour test at the major testing center there.  Susan's home is only about 6 minutes away.   She was extremely thoughtful and helpful, and her home is very friendly and quiet. I was able to study and collect my thoughts the day before the exam in a stress-free environment, and I think it made a big difference. Her home was fantastic, and it was really convenient being able to use the kitchen as well. I would absolutely stay here again. Definitely recommend!
We loved our stay with Susan!

We enjoyed our stay at Susan's while we were visiting family in Stayton. Communication was so easy, and we felt at home instantly. Susan was so friendly and welcoming, and it was nice running into her in the kitchen in the morning. The small touches like flowers and snacks in the fridge were so nice, and the bed was incredibly comfortable. We wouldn't hesitate to stay with Susan again if we're in the area!

Susan’s space was amazing it was the perfect place to unwind after a long day non stop day. It was extremely clean and well kept. The small details all around the space really added to the experience.

Susan had different small amenities available. She had snacks available in case one may need them. She had some basic toiletries available in case I had forgotten something. I had never seen this level of attention from any other Airbnb I had stayed in before!

Overall the place is amazing and you will not regret making this place your stop when in Salem.
Susan is definitely a Superhost! Her place is clean, comfortable, and conveniently located. She is very accommodating and friendly. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay there again!

I L-O-V-E Susan's guest space.  The decor, color and style, suited me perfectly, bringing calm and serenity.  I was pleasantly surprised to have not only private bathroom but also private sitting room.  Loved the quiet and privacy.  Susan was available just behind a door in her private quarters for any questions or for a chat.
The previous reviews are all very accurate! What a lovely and comfortable home, gracious host, and great location.

Susan's place is so peaceful and full of positive energy!  She is a total delight.  She went out of her way to find me a few things that I thought I might need and each day there was soothing music playing.  I would absolutely recommend staying here and will so again if the opportunity arises.
Susan was so gracious and welcoming ! We will definitely try to stay with her again in the future. We appreciated the amount of private space we were given and found everything clean and cozy !

Susan is the best. The house is pretty nice too, but seriously. Do stay here, and make sure you have a coffee in the morning and chat with Susan a bit. Ask her about her travels and her work. You won't regret it.

And of course as a result of Susan's kindness, her place is well stocked, clean, and wonderful. She'll make sure you've eaten enough. Necessities are provided and then some. The house has a good vibe and is very well kept. I have trouble sleeping usually, and I slept like a baby here.

We were in town for a wedding and found Susan's place. It looked lovely and we had very high expectations for our trip. Even with our expectations Susan went above and beyond and made our trip so easy and delightful! We were driving up from Northern California and due to a fire we were rerouted adding many hours to our trip. This caused us to be arriving close to midnight. Luckily, Susan was so amazing and accommodating and welcomed us warmly in the late hours of the night. To top it all off we had brought our ESA dog with us and were going to leave her with friends or with a sitter for the day we were there but I reached out to Susan and she graciously allowed us to keep our fur baby with us in our room. What could have easily turned into quite a hassle was not a problem at all thanks to Susan's incredible hospitality. If you're in town for any reason I definitely recommend staying with Susan. Not only will she be one of the best hosts, but the space is lovely and she even provided waters and snacks for us in the kitchen. What a great stay we had. Thanks Susan!
Susan was great, the place was quiet and very clean. I loved the decor and am stealing her interior design ideas for the bathroom. 10/10

What a lovely experience we had at this Salem Airbnb! This property was immaculately clean and delightfully, yet simply, decorated and furnished. Extra pillows, blankets, towels, and bathroom amenities were already provided, as were breakfast supplies in the refrigerator and kitchen. The host is gracious and welcoming, yet respects the privacy wishes of her guests. We would stay at this property and recommend it to friends and family in a heartbeat!
We stayed with Susan while visiting some friends.  Her home is very lovely, she was a great host.  Comfortable home and nice place to rest for the nights we were in town.

I can't say enough about Susan and her hospitality. Staying with her felt like staying with family, and I would recommend her to anyone. Susan was more accommodating than even our loftiest expectations and the place itself was immaculate and well stocked with everything a traveler could possibly want. Even her dog, Ari, was a total sweetheart! Would stay again.

Susan was a very thorough and attentive host, going so far as to offer me train station pick up. The home was very clean and orderly, the room for guests was clearly made into a private space. There is a full bath in the guest room, and guests can have free reign of the rest of the house. The space made me a little worried that my late night going and coming might disturb Susan. I would not recommend this space for folks looking to have a bit more of a carousing adventure in Salem.
Susan was a super host, her place was quiet & very conveniently located only 1.5 miles from Willamette Univ. where I was visiting my son!
Susan’s place is in the heart of Salem. The bed was cozy, I especially enjoyed the heated blanket. It was nice that Susan gave me a lot of privacy, but left the coffee on for me in the morning.
My 2-night stay was great. Susan is a gracious host and offered some wonderful suggestions for places to eat.

The thing that struck me the most was how everything in the house was part of the overall atmosphere of calmness and serenity. While I was on a trip mostly for business and had little time at the house, I still enjoyed the soothing colors and Asian-influenced decor. The furniture is also simple, but elegant, as well as comfortable. Susan herself was a delightful hostess, whether we were talking about the weather or sharing our stories with each other. I would highly recommend Susan's home for anyone seeking a home to relax in.
Very clean, quiet, comfy and convenient place to stay.  Easy parking.  Susan is a lovely host. As an older person traveling solo I felt very safe at Susan’s.  So glad I booked it!

Susan's description of her space and amenities is accurate. Found the space inviting, homey and very comfortable (loved reading by the fireplace).

It's in a quiet neighborhood, that along with a very comfy bed offered a great night's sleep (which is very important to my husband and I).

Susan was a very thoughtful and personable host, checking in periodically to ensure all was going well with our stay, which was much appreciated.

I was a little anxious about the shared kitchen space (hadn't done this before) and it turned out just fine. Susan gave us fridge space, explained the basics of the kitchen, left us healthy snacks and provided coffee in the morning (all we had to do was push a button).

I had a workshop in downtown Salem and this was a great location for ease of access, only a couple of miles away (easily walked in decent weather).

I would recommend Susan's space and would stay there again in a heartbeat.

Susan was a wonderful host! I arrived pretty late in the evening and she was there waiting to show me all the little tips and tricks to make my stay extra enjoyable. I loved that there was a fireplace and electric blanket, as it was very cold outside when I arrived and I had been in the car much of the day. The bed and pillows were very comfortable and her place was sparkling clean with nice little extra touches for her guests. The neighborhood was quiet and safe with plenty of street parking. I would definitely recommend her place and would stay here again.

Susan was very welcoming and greeted us when we arrived in Salem. The house is in a cute neighborhood, and it was located very close to where we needed to be all weekend for a wedding.

The house was cozy, and we appreciated the coffee and snacks available! I also certainly loved the added touch of an electric blanket on the bed.

Overall, we had a good stay and would recommend Susan and her space. Thank you again.
Quiet neighborhood, close to downtown.Susan's home is nicely decorated with classy touches (like fresh flowers) and beautiful art throughout.
Susan was wonderful!
Clean quiet comfy! Susan is very thoughtful host!
This is my second time booking with Susan and like the first time everything was wonderful.

Susan's is very well-kept and in a great location. She offered assistance in several areas and made me feel right at home. It's very clean and quiet, and she's very kind. I would definitely stay there again!

This was my first experience at an Airbnb and Susan did outstanding! I will definitely be coming here whenever I head to Salem. She was very kind well informed of events in the area. And I cannot say enough about her kindness and helpfulness if I could rate her higher I would 10/10!

With a cozy fireplace, comfy bed, and well-equipped kitchen, this was a great choice for me. I enjoyed the quiet, safe neighborhood and if you enjoy getting to know your host, Susan is smart, thoughtful, and gracious. Highly recommended.

Susan was by far the best host I’ve ever had with Airbnb. She’s so welcoming and friendly. The house is clean and quiet and in an excellent neighborhood. I will definitely go back and recommend staying there!
a pleasant , peaceful stay
We had an excellent stay. The house was exactly as described. There are many nice touches that other hosts might overlook. We would gladly stay here again!

Susan’s house was better than expected. Clean, quiet and beautifully decorated. She is a gracious hostess that will give you your privacy. It’s nice to have your own kitchen and dining area after a long day of exploring Salem. You can’t go wrong with staying here!

The house was exactly as described.  Thoughtfully decorated, impeccably clean.  Conveniently located to just about everything.  Quiet neighborhood, easy parking.  Without reservation I would recommend staying here.
You can expect full use of her home in a quiet setting with all the privacy you may desire, a clean fully equipped kitchen, etc.

We had a wonderful stay in Salem! We felt like the home was very cozy, clean and quiet. You’ll appreciate the tapestry and cultured decorations, hand crafted wooden furniture and the dual blanket warmer in the bed. The home feels newly renovated and the bedroom has a private vibe to it with nice, natural lighting. The quarters included the main living room section of the house, kitchen and bedroom/bathroom which are all spacious. Susan had just the right amount of interaction with a host as we like. We met her upon check in and were provided two keys and a brief set of instructions for around the home. The home is located just a few minutes drive from just about anywhere and Susan even offered to take us a few minutes down the road to a friends wedding we were attending. Super host move :)
Nice comfortable home in a very nice, quiet neighborhood

Susan is an amazing host! This was the first time my husband and I have stayed at an Airbnb and we were not disappointed. The extra touches along with her kind and welcoming spirit made our stay amazing! We would definitely recommend staying here.
Very clean, nice neighborhood, friendly host, and big comfortable bed.

Susan,
Was by far the best host that we have had so far and one of the nicest people you will ever meet. I will checking to see if her place is available any time we go in the area.
Susan was an outstanding host! She ended up hosting my dad while he visited us for a week! Such a beautiful home filled with so much peace! My dad definitely looks forward to staying there again!
We loved our stay at Susan’s place.  Everything we expected and more.  The bed was super comfortable.  The whole place was very clean and comfortable.  Would thoroughly recommend Susan’s place.
A wonderful appartment and a lovely host named Susan
Susan is an amazing generous spirit and I really loved staying in her home! The neighborhood is nice to walk around as well
Beautiful mix of contemporary & classic Japanese décor.  The bed is very comfortable.  Very spacious & clean.  Susan is a charming hostess.  We will definitely return next time in Salem.
Great place and sparkling clean. Good location and will definitely recommend and stay again.

Once again Outstanding!
My husband and I stayed for over a week while visiting our new grandson. I can honestly say that Susan's reviews live up to the expectation. We look forward to seeing her in the future.
Great home! Exceptionally clean and maintained. Great central location and we loved staying with Susan.
Solid place to stay

My spouse and I were in town for a wedding and we enjoyed our stay in Susan’s home. In the evenings we enjoyed reading near the gas fireplace, the bed was comfortable, and the shower was nice. Susan supplied us with a variety of breakfast items to choose from and she was friendly. We also had fun giving some pets to Susan’s little dog Ari. This was a cozy place to stay.
Everything is top notch. Very clean, close to everything. Salem is a wonderful city.

Susan’s place was perfect in so many ways. As new transplants to Salem Susan was extremely accommodating and really made us feel welcome in her home. From recommendations for restaurant’s to furniture stores Susan was not only a great host but a great guide as well. I can’t recommend staying here enough.

Quiet and cozy with lots of thoughtful touches. Susan struck just the right balance of checking in and giving space. She had lots of kitchen things I didn’t take full advantage of, but I enjoyed the granola bars :-) Also, I run cold and really appreciated the electric blanket, extra blanket, and space heater.
Susan is a wonderful host! Very cozy and clean space. Would definitely recommend!

A well appointed and commodious guest suite.  Spacious in all rooms.  Combination LR/DR with comfortable furniture, attractive DR set, and gas fireplace.  Shared kitchen is bright and sunny and equipped with anything you would need.  Spotlessly clean bathroom.  A very comfortable space, with a graciously welcoming hostess, and a short drive to downtown and the state capital complex.  Ample street parking.  We highly recommend it.
Clean, simple, and inexpensive. Exactly what I was looking for.
Susan was a very gracious and accommodating host.  The place was very comfortable and made me wish I hadn’t been working so much so I could’ve spent more time there enjoying it!
Convenient location and an inviting living room with gas fireplace to sit and read.
Susan was a wonderful host, and has a lovely home. She made me and my partner feel very welcomed and offered a comfortable atmosphere.
Lovely, inviting space and very gracious host. Highly recommend!
Susan was a very gracious host. Very nice and clean home in a good location.
A nice quiet home with a comfortable atmosphere.
Very clean and quiet place. Everything you need to have an enjoyable stay.
Immaculate, spacious, comfortable, incredibly kind host.
Susan had great communication, sadly we didn’t realize the house was shared!
Wonderful stay with Susan, cannot recommend it more! Lovely room and super sweet host! Enjoyed my stay
Soothing, clean and quiet location.  Sweet neighborhood and kind home owner.

Susan is such a lovely, generous host. The space was very tranquil and spotless in a safe and friendly neighborhood.m with easy parking. The cost was fantastic and made a week long stay affordable. As has been mentioned, the kitchen is shared and Susan lives in the adorable house too, in rooms in the back of the space.  I throughly enjoyed the suite with the large bath and bedroom, but some may not consider it ‘your own space’. Given the price point, I don’t have any complaints as I would have happily paid for the space to be in a shared home. Thank you Susan!

Our stay here was fantastic. This was the first time we've stayed at a home with a shared space. Susan was awesome, she did a short tour with us upon our arrival. Areas in the kitchen were set aside for us to store our food. This was great. Lights in common spaces were automated so we didn't have to worry about being in the dark. We felt very much at home. Susan provided so many things more than I've seen in other AirBnB's. It was the small touches that made the big difference. Her home is very clean, neatly organized, comfortable and centrally located with shopping and dining in close proximity. I would absolutely recommend staying here. It was the perfect home away from home for our week in Oregon.

Susan's place is a comfortable calm bungalow in a lovely quiet neighborhood on the flats of Salem, great for biking or walking to downtown coffeeshops & parks, & not far from shopping, I-5 destinations, etc. Susan is a great host, giving interaction or space as desired. We brought bikes, which she made space for inside.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there & would happily choose it again for a visit to Salem!

My mom and I loved staying in this beautiful home.  It was very clean, conveniently located, and affordable. Susan was a gracious host and made us feel very comfortable and at home. She thought of everything from fresh fruit and snacks to leaving a light on for us when we were out past dark.  Although she does occupy the back of the house, we rarely saw her except when she checked in on us to make sure we had all we needed.

The place is great, the bed was very comfortable and the shower had great pressure and was hot! It worked well for me as it was just blocks away from my granddaughters.

Just know that there is no TV 📺 or a radio 📻
Susan is a great host- very accommodating and thoughtful! She thought of everything a guest could need. Nice comfortable bed too.

She was a great host, we arrived at her house late in the evening and she stayed up to greet us when we arrived. She had snacks for us and the space was nice and comfortable, and even had space in the fridge for us to store our food.

Susan is a great host and a lovely person! We enjoyed our stay tremendously.
Her space is very calming and relaxing and has real character. Highly recommended!
Ditto to all the good reviews that preceded this review.  Susan made us feel right at home for our short visit.  It was helpful to have her close by if we needed anything.

Susan is a wonderful hostess and the sweetest person ever, could not have asked for a better stay. Her place is clean, comfortable, inviting, very conveniently located, and she does whatever she can for a great stay.
Wonderful accommodations and excellent host.

It was perfect! Susan was great!
Prefect location for my daughter and I.
Susan is a very kind host.
Host was very nice and accommodating. Location was very central and easy to get around. Easy parking. Would definitely stay here again.
Great stay - very clean!  Susan was very hospitable!

Our stay was wonderful.
Susan met us upon check in and ensured we had everything we needed during our stay! We’d absolutely stay with Susan again :)

Judy and Ray were awesome - Lots of aloha!  They were so attentive to the DETAILS and they really made me feel at home. The cottage was very private and in a quiet neighborhood.  Just 10 minutes away from downtown Salem.  Parking was easy - right outside the cottage.  Judy had all the amenities of a hotel and more.  I would highly recommend Myrtle Cottage.

Great quiet private cottage in a very nice quiet neighborhood.  Fruit and cheese and croissants waiting for us. I loved soaking in the antique claw foot tub. We were able to relax and Judy gave us great restaurant recommendations. Well decorated and comfortable with WiFi and a great tv

Judy and Ray were very gracious and accommodating hosts! Myrtle Cottage is a perfect place to stay for any traveler. Judy is a great resource for fun things to do in the area. They were also very nice, understanding, and helpful when some issues with the AirBnB site came up. I would highly recommend this place for short term stays 😊
All you might want in a small space! We enjoyed our visit very much.
Great accommodations! Very private and beautifully decorated.

This place was perfect for us! We like peace and quiet, yet still like to be close enough to the hustle and bustle of downtown. Great stay, Judy was ultra fast at responding to messages I sent. We didn’t see them at all during our visit, which we actually prefer, to be honest. Awesome amenities and thoughtful hosts! Two thumbs up!

Judy and Ray's cottage is set up beautifully with care and lots of amenities.  I liked the comfortable chairs for reading, well-stocked mini-kitchen, and handsome space throughout.  Judy was very responsive on our only hiccup,  when I goofed and turned off the wi-fi access.
Judy was a fabulous host. All the small details did not go unnoticed! A very clean and quite cottage that made it very easy to relax in. It made our stay so pleasant! Thank you!

Great place, close and easy access.  Lots of closet room and plenty of hangers, comfy bed, sitting chairs for reading or working on the computer.  Good and helpful information about the area including tips for restaurants and winery's in the area.

We had an amazing stay! The cottage was super cute. Judy and Ray provided amazing welcome treats and toiletries. One of the nights got a bit too warm in the cottage but overall we had an amazing stay!!
Great little place. Plenty of amenities. Great stay!!
Beautiful unit close to amenities. Hosts very nice. Private and quiet.

Myrtle cottage is wonderful.  Peaceful and quiet. Clean and cozy. Perfect for one or two people. Judy is a lovely host and added nice personal touches to the guest house. The cottage is centrally located and easily navigated. The neighborhood is nice and was a great place to take a morning walk before starting your day. Judy thought of everything. I highly recommend staying at Mrytle Cottage.

Unfortunately we did not have a good experience here. We planned to stay for three months, but because of issues with the place that stay had to be cut short. It was much smaller than expected. There was no way to cook at all, which we were led to believe there would be. We even specifically asked the host about that before booking. We had to clean webs off the walls because there were a lot of spiders. We had to kill 4-5 a day. The bed was very loud and squeaks with any movement at all. The shower was nice but it dripped for hours after it was used. If you opened the bathroom door before all the steam cleared out it set the fire alarm off.

Overall the biggest disappointment was our loss of money after the host didn’t honor our agreement. We had several conversations with the host before paying to come to a fair agreement, as the place didn’t have an honest description of the property. The host was very nice and even understanding, up until it came time to actually make the changes. Suddenly she starting avoiding us for some reason, which was very frustrating. Unfortunately we were very let down and lost a lot of money because of this. It ended up being ridiculously expensive for what it was, and we would not stay here again.
This guest house is perfect! Very clean and private with all the amenities you need.  Very peaceful and quiet area.  I highly recommend and wished that I could’ve stayed longer than a week!

A charming guest house on the owner's property but with plenty of privacy. The host was very responsive, the accommodations were lovely, the neighborhood quiet, and it was a quick drive to downtown Salem.

We really enjoyed our stay.  It was quiet, clean, private, easy to get to and fairly close to stores and restaurants.  Parking was a breeze.  Anything you might need was anticipated and provided for.  We're hoping Judy & Ray's place is available the next time we're in Salem.

We loved our stay at Myrtle Cottage. Everything was super clean, cozy, and we appreciated all the little touches of comfort such as the rolled towels, coffee, and snacks!  We would definitely stay again!
This cottage is perfect and cozy! There are many personal touches that Judy and Ray have provided. Highly recommended!
An inviting and quiet place to stay when you are away from home.
This is a great place to stay in Salem.   It was clean and comfortable and the host was very easy to work with.  I will be recommending it to my friends band family who come to visit.
the myrtle cottage was awesome for my work week away from home, very nice quiet place. enjoyed every minute of it.

Positive experience - adorable little place with several special touches. Everything was clean and well decorated. Communication was smooth. We appreciated the local tips and basket. Would recommend to others!
wonderful place to stay, everything was perfect for my week of work.  highly recommend the myrtle cottage

Judy and Ray have a nice, clean and cozy guest house nestled in the trees.  The location is on a quiet side street, but is only a short drive to eateries, a tap house and a grocery store. The comfortable bed and linens made for a good night sleep.
Clean and comfortable guest cottage
A very nice place to stay. Very private and comfortable.

Myrtle Cottage is a lovely retreat.  The location is great for exploring Salem, it's very quiet and a great value.  Judy and Ray are wonderful hosts, great at communication and sharing suggestions for sightseeing and restaurants!
wonderful cottage, love staying my work week here, so quiet and private, Judy and Ray are wonderful hosts
quiet, porch area, comfortable, easy access to roads, comfortable
A charming and comfortable place in beautiful surroundings. Judy and Ray really made us feel at home.
always a pleasure to stay at myrtle cottage,  so peaceful and the flowers are beautiful right now.

This is a great place! A quick and easy drive from downtown Salem,  and close to a coffee shop and grocery store. The room was super comfortable and homey with lots of nice touches, like bath salts if you wanted to have a soak in the clawfoot tub, and a generous selection of snacks. I would definitely stay here again.
The guest cottage was wonderful!  Super clean, lovely basket of goodies and coffee when I arrived.  Location is super convenient.  Highly recommend!
Lovely atmosphere,  quiet little cottage with cozy touches throughout. Totally private. Owners are there if needed but do their own thing. The grounds are beautiful! The bed, very comfortable.

Judy and Ray's place is the cutest little cottage. Although is a back house, it's definitely privately tucked away with a cute little porch and seating area. We came to Salem for a wedding and this spot was in the perfect location and an easy Uber to downtown and the winery where the wedding was at. Judy is so warm and welcoming and truly made sure we felt comfortable and had everything we needed. Highly recommend staying here if you find yourself in beautiful Salem!

This place was great!  Very private and relaxing!  There was a lot of attention to detail with notes of where the best eating places, etc.  The room was clean, comfortable, and refreshing to come home to.  I will definitely be back.  Thank you so much!
Quiet, great location and price.
This is a great place to stay!

Judy and Ray’s place was the quintessential AirBnb!  It was beautiful, tastefully elegant, bsparkling clean,  perfectly-appointed with many extra amenities, convenient to  town and very private.  Judy and Ray were very communicative and offered many helpful suggestions for enjoying the area. We loved our stay and hope to stay there on future visits to Salem!

I would recommend this place to anyone,  clean and private space that has everything you need for a comfortable stay.  Judy and Ray were very helpful and kindly communicated how to check in to their tucked away lot, enjoy!

Lovely cottage, stocked with all the amenities you could need. They don’t have air conditioning but an open window and fan is just perfect to stay cool and comfortable. For people who can appreciate a nice bath tub, you don’t wanna pass up this place.
This is an adorable cottage in a quiet neighborhood. Well-equipped and well-stocked. I would definitely stay there again. Book well in advance, because everyone else wants to stay there, too. :)

Had a lovely stay at Judy and Ray's cottage. It was the perfect location..only about 8 minutes from downtown Salem. The cottage had everything I needed plus some lovely extras.. water bottles, snacks, and even bath bombs for the tub! I'd definitely stay with them again next time I'm in town.
Nice place.
Private, quiet and beautifully appointed.  I can't imagine what could be added to make it better!
Quiet and peaceful. Great access to all areas of Salem and the country side.
wonderfully quiet and cozy cottage, stocked with anything you need or forgot for your stay.  Ray and Judy are wonderful hosts and I always look forward and enjoy my stay at myrtle cottage :)
Quiet spot very comfortable
Amazing cottage, quiet, private, comfortable and the host is amazing.

This is a very cozy cottage, nicely decorated and filled with nice touches, like shampoo and body wash in the bathroom, treats in the kitchenette, and water in the fridge. It's located in a very nice area. Judy provided us with a list of places to eat and to visit and, since we're thinking of moving to the area, the best places to live. We would definitely return. My only caveat would be that it's a fairly large step to get into the tub/shower, which might be of concern to some (it wasn't to us). Highly recommended!
Very clean, well-designed private space.  Judy was extremely responsive and very helpful.

Great little place quiet area except occasional barking dog right next door whose fence was right up to the bedroom window. No real thermostat so the temps can vary quite a bit. Bathroom is very small with limited counter space. Shower is excellent with good pressure but very small and the shower curtain surrounds you and hugs you almost. If grossed out by that you won’t like the shower. It’s quite a climb to get into the tub for the shower and be careful to not touch the metal piping by the hot water as it can be very hot. WiFi is a TMobile Hotspot which was quite slow. Our Verizon phones were faster though the signal weak. Aside from this the place was great value and great attentive host.
Great stay if it’s a quick one!
Great hosts and convenient location
Very nice place and very nice host
Great spot for traveling professionals. Judy is very hospitable and easy to contact
Great stay in the cottage. Would definitely recommend it.

Myrtle Cottage is a clean and cozy guest house nestled in the trees. The location is on a quiet street, only a short drive to our daughter’s house and was perfect for our stay while social distancing, visiting our daughter and looking at areas for our forever home. Judy was extremely responsive; we couldn’t have asked for a better host, location and accommodations.
A tucked away gem. Peaceful and safe and everything you need. Great hosts! Highly recommend!

Smallish but very nicely appointed.  Perfect for a couple.  Centrally located.  Private parking directly in front of cottage.  Lovely setting - trees, flowers, etc.  Very well-maintained.  Hosts very hospitable but not intrusive.  Would definitely stay again.
Beautiful guest house with all the perfect amenities.
very private, nice place to stay
Cozy and secluded place with easy access to the highway.
Was a very comfortable place to stay. Enjoyed the peace and quiet. Judy and Ray were more than accommodating for the last minute booking!

Extremely homey and comfortable. Staying here was so much more than staying in a hotel. Easy to communicate, and responded to our one issue (WiFi outage) in minimal time! You will enjoy your stay here if you choose to!
Myrtle Cottage was a great place to stay for a week! Very comfortable and cozy, quiet, and clean. Judy and Ray were responsive hosts, very nice and easy to communicate with.
Very clean, comfortable and private. It was well stocked so we never needed to ask for anything. It is located on a flag lot so look for the private driveway lined with large rocks.

Judy is a great host. Our first contact after the reserving on the website was a text message welcoming us. I was busy and forgot about it. She did not and she called me. She wanted to make sure everything was to our satisfaction. It absolutely was. We will reserve her little space again in the future. Thanks again for opening your home to us.
A lovely place. The host was very quick to reply to my text. I recommend this place :)
Was a beautiful location! Wonderful communication.
Myrtle Cottage is cozy, clean and restful.  It's a perfect place to launch for all the activities Salem has to offer, and a comfortable spot to return at the end of the day!
Great place to stay that’s a 9 min drive to downtown Salem and less than an hour from Portland! Very easy check in and has everything you need:)
This is a lovely cottage, tucked up in a wooded lot. You feel like you are out in the woods! Very peaceful and quiet!

Quiet little cottage nestled in the hills of West Salem.  It's a separate building near their house with convenient parking.  The interior is comfortable, clean with simple touches to enhance our few days away from home. A great location with plenty of food options even during Covid.  Judy & Ray were good communicators and made our stay as pleasant as possible.  Would stay here again.
Great location and parking.  Very quiet and private.  Bed is quite comfortable.
Great stay and host. No complaints. Will stay again for sure if the opportunity arises with work.
This was the BEST Airbnb that I’ve ever stayed at.  Judy was a fount of information.  The surroundings were gorgeous..  I wanted to stay here forever.
Judy was a great host. She was quick to respond to our questions and check-in was so easy. The cottage was sparkling clean and comfortable—a great place for our needs.

If you need a place to crash in Salem, I would highly recommend Judy's cabin.  It's located in a suburban neighborhood in West Salem, about a 5 minute drive from downtown.  It's cozy, cute and well-appointed for the price.
Beautiful space in a beautiful area!
Great little guest house! A little tricky to find but Ms Judy was amazing, super kind and communicative.
Quiet, clean, comfortable, and thoughtfully furnished. Highly recommend.
Very charming and comfy. it was very private and quiet. will stay there again on our next trip.
A really nice place. Quiet. Clean. Judy very nice and helpful.  A nice place to stay.

Myrtle Cottage was an excellent place to relax and recharge my "me" battery.  Judy is a great host, communicates well, is prompt with replies, and also gives information on local places to visit.  I was kept aware of anything going on around the property at all times, and overall it was a wonderful stay and so much better than a hotel even.
Nice, neat, and well cared for. This little cottage is quiet and comfy.

This is a lovely place to stay, in a safe and quiet residential part of west Salem! Very clean and well kept, and has a cool claw foot tub too! Would recommend to anyone, and will likely be using again. :) Judy was great at communicating and responding to questions quickly!
Great location near downtown Salem in a quiet neighborhood. The guest house was as advertised.

Myrtle Cottage was the perfect fit for us as we were attending a wedding nearby. Judy communicated very well, and had many little touches that made us feel at home right away. It was the perfect place to rest and relax, and make our home base as we explored the area. We would definitely stay again!
Cute place. Easy checking. New A/C unit worked great in 100+ degree temperatures.
STAY HERE!  You won’t regret it.  I stayed here once before and loved it.  This trip was just as good.

Great rental.
Well furnished and really nice amenities.
Quality bedding and towels.
Relaxing setting.
Easy access to both Salem and the wine tasting.
Would definitely stay again.
Cute little place to explore Salem from for a weekend!
Everything was great!  The cottage offers plenty of privacy and Judy is friendly and available to handle any issues (there were none during my stay).
Amazing place and host! Will surely be returning back!

Was not a fan. First time using Air B and B and probably wont try again. Thought I was going to save some money, that wasnt the case. Thought it was going to be cleaner than a 3 star hotel, that wasnt the case either. Miscommunication between me and the host when I asked her if i was paying for nights or days and she was incorrect but didnt tell me until I couldnt get a full refund. Ended up staying one of the nights in a family members camper. Sheets had sex stains on them. There was Ant traps around the house. No air conditioning and after I called to ask if she could give me new sheets she said the sheets were fine and that I was mistaken. Black hair in the bathtub. Just was not happy with my stay and would recommend to anyone else.

We stayed at Myrtle Cottage which allowed us to go back and forth quickly and easily to Capital Manor to visit family members there.
Myrtle Cottage was clean, private, and well appointed. Communication with hostess Judy was seamless. Thank you for helping us to safely visit our family member while maintaining Covid safety.
Great place to stay when visiting Salem or it’s wineries.
Wonderful place and a great host! Clean, private, and very relaxing. I would recommend this place to all.
The little kitchenette area has been remodeled and looks great and functions well in this studio apartment.

I had the opportunity to occupy Myrtle Cottage for five months after moving to the Northwest and searching for a house to buy. My stay was everything I could have hoped for.
The cottage is comfortable, tranquil, and located in a lovely neighborhood. It's within a few miles of all the amenities one might ask for, including the best used-book store in town.
Judy Armstrong is an excellent host. She is accommodating, kind and determined to make one's stay the best. emw
Thank you!
Judy’s cottage was very welcoming and warm! The cutest set up with a kitchenette and the comfiest blankets! The claw foot was the best addition. Would definitely come back and recommend.
Best Air BnB experience I've had. Judy thought of all my needs for me and provided an excellent stay
The place was great and close to shopping and restaurants.
Nice, cozy, private spot.

Judy was extremely responsive.  We made the reservation 8 months in advance and she always responded within 10 minutes.  If I called, she called back.  If I emailed, she emailed back.  She was very respective of our ways of communicating to her.  Her cottage is in a very nice and quite neighborhood that we could completely relax in.  Thank you Judy for being such a gracious host.
Great location, clean, comfortable, safe and quiet. I enjoyed the front porch … sitting after work, very relaxing!

We loved our stay at Judy's guest house and wished we could have stayed longer! The guest house is very private and elegant. Judy was very gracious about changes we needed to make in our visit and she went out of her way to help me get clothing back that I left when we checked out. We would definitely stay here again on our next visit to Salem!
Thank you for having us, it was nice stay. :)

The Myrtle Cottage was wonderful. Easy and seamless check-in, easy to find, and a beautiful little cottage to boot. Centrally located in West Salem, it was easy for us to visit our relatives 20 minutes away in Monmouth, and then turn around the next day and drive to the coast at Newport in an hour. The hosts are attentive and responsive and I highly recommend staying here!
I found Judy to be attentive and accommodating to my needs. My stay was quiet and beautiful.
Everything was amazing. I loved the privacy and cleanliness. The host was amazing couldn’t ask for a better stay.

This was our second time staying at Myrtle Cottage. The cottage is small but perfect for our needs—a comfy bed and an area to keep and prepare breakfast. I particularly enjoyed the covered porch for drinking my morning coffee and relaxing at the end of the day. Good location—close to Salem and Riverfront Park. Thanks, Judy!
Great little guest house. No contact check in. Enjoyed our stay!

Myrtle Cottage is a lovely little cottage set back from traffic and neighborhood noise. I really enjoyed my stay there. Judy is a wonderful host and very attentive to your needs. This is the best AirBnB I've stayed in.

Very nice little place in a quiet part of West Salem. Judy was quick to communicate and help when we had questions. Everything was clean and attractive.

A few things to know, however. The cottage is quite small, and doesn't offer much space to stretch out. The description says that it has "dedicated work space," but we couldn't figure out where that might have been. The bathroom has no counter space, and the raised clawfoot tub is a bit of a challenge when getting in and out. We discovered a step stool in the closet on the last day, which probably would have helped with the tub. As long as those minor issues aren't a problem, you should be very happy staying here.
Excellent stay.  Cozy, comfortable, and welcoming.
Judy's place is on par with Salem's swankiest hotels, only cozier.

Judy's Cottage is our lodging of
choice when visiting Salem, clean, comfortable, safe, good parking.
Beautiful sitting and cottage was clean and  very well supplied.   thank you Judy!
Judy is a wonderful and gracious host. This my 2nd time at Myrtle Cottage.  Judy is very responsive to any needs and respects your privacy. I have no doubt that I will be back again.

Elizabeth and her home are absolutely wonderful. The space was ideal for us and our Australian Shepherd while in Salem. Not only did Elizabeth work to make sure we had everything we needed she stocked the room with fruit and water. Definitely book this historic  home for your stay, you wont regret it.

Elizabeth is really kind and helpful. My stay at her place was very comfortable. She took every possible effort to make us comfortable. We stayed at her place on eclipse weekend, when everything was booked in advance. She changed our room to accommodate 3 of us comfortably at the last moment, and we appreciated that a lot. Our original bedroom was smaller to accommodate 3 people, but she made arrangements to accommodate us at such a short notice.
I would definitely like to stay at her place once again. I would recommend her place to Everyone who's willing to spend some time in Salem.
Such a beautiful home and perfect coziness. It made my months of schooling so much more enjoyable knowing I had a home away from home. Highly recommend this home!!
A jewel.
Decent, comfortable room, close to South Salem shops.                    Elizabeth is very prompt at responding to your requests.   Very good value.

Elizabeth was a very gracious host. She made sure to meet us in person when we arrived and gave us a tour of our rooms and the premises. She also went out of the way to make sure some undecided family would have a place to stay. Elizabeth made room #2 available to us for booking in addition to room #4 that we had already booked. Even though it was a smaller room, #2 had every thing we needed, every thing that was listed, and even some extras(sewing kit, spare toothbrush, eyeglass repair kit). If you need anything but don't see it(iron and board), just ask and odds are that Elizabeth can make it available. The property is beautiful and shaded and the pool was a welcome relief from the heat. If ever we are in Salem again we will look to book with Elizabeth first. Thank you again Elizabeth!
We had a great experience. Elizabeth is a wonderful host.

A very respectful  and peace full place to enjoy your vacation  spot with a pool and all the amenities  you could ever need plus  Elizabeth  is the most gracious  and hard working woman I've  ever meet she will bend over backwards know wards to heldpay you out
Old House. Great place. Excellent host. Great amenities.
Great spot. Don't feel like you're in the middle of Salem. Cozy. I'll be back.

Elizabeth’s historical house was beautiful and Elizabeth was an amazing, upstanding host. She takes the time to really make your feel welcomed. The amenities she has are more than what a hotel has to offer at a fraction of the price. It was relaxing and easy going. I truly appreciated my stay there.

Our stay at Elizabeth's was a really great experience for us. The house is historic and has interesting touches. Everything was comfortable, clean, and thoughtfully arranged. We really enjoyed feeding the ducks and chickens, too! We hope to come back.
Beautiful old tudor home, lots of outdoor space.  Nice touches in the rooms.  Will definitely stay again when I am in the area.
Abundance of hospitality and amenities. Very convenient location. Such interesting conversation with Elizabeth.
This is a really nice room. I enjoy my stay at Vista Manor.
Beautiful home with comfortable bed and great host. Highly recommend for a stress free stay.
Great stay and wonderful experience! Felt very safe and well taken care of. Hope to stay here again next time I’m in the area!
Elizabeth keeps a beautiful and relaxed home, within easy driving distance of downtown. We enjoyed the quiet neighborhood.

Elizabeth is a wonderful host!! My room had everything I could ever need! Complete with fruit, snacks, yogurt and more! Wonderful bed and great shower! There are other rooms on the same floor but if I hadn’t seen the other guests I would never know they were there!0” It was so quiet!  I will never stay in a Salem hotel again!

Very comfortable beds, peaceful and beautiful decorated home.  Fresh fruit, fresh sweet breads everyday.  Bottled water provided.  Elizabeth is very nice and is thoughtful for having everything you need in your room.

We had a very pleasant stay at Elizabeth’s house. The amenities are amazing (she literally has everything and anything you need) and the house is gorgeous! We would love to stay again next time we’re in Oregon.

The level of communication and care expressed by Elizabeth was exceptional. As much as my wife and I enjoyed the comfort of an inviting and welcoming home, we were equally impressed with how Elizabeth made sure we had an enjoyable visit. There were wonderful touches that made our overall visit to Salem one to remember!
Elizabeth's home is a great place to stay in Salem, and Elizabeth is a fantastic host. Nothing like fresh banana bread waiting in the morning.
The elephant room is so cute.  First time I stayed in this room.  Nice plush rugs and hot shower.  Awesome.  And the carrot cake was yummy!
Very comfortable and convenient location.
Stayed with Elizabeth all too briefly. A wonderful oasis on my long California to Canada drive. The room with bathroom was outstanding. And she welcomed my dog too.
Elizabeth's home is beautiful and historic. Can't beat it for a cosy night in a beautiful neighborhood. Also can't beat the hot tub on a cold night!
Wonderful older, well kept home.  Lots of space.  Everything you need is provided.  Quick response by owner.
Elizabeth is a fantastic host and this home is so cool! If you like cozy rooms, fresh baked loaves, and the feel of a 18th century inn then you have to stay here 🙌

Elizabeth's place was very stylish and lifted up our holiday spirits during our CA to WA move before the holidays. We had everything we could imagine to ask for in our room. Lisa met us in person, made sure the hot tub was ready since I was specifically asking if it's still open in December. My husband and I had a very relaxing and luxurious experience our second moving night. For breakfast we had a lot to choose from: yogurt, muffins, coffee & tea, fruits, and oatmeal. So we were able to save some time in the morning and drive long time before stopping for lunch. We also came by a big van, and Elizabeth marked a parking spot for us, and we had no problems fitting in. All our stay we were very warm and safe. When it was time to get back on the road, I met a very friendly black kitty outside that kept purring and asking for pets 🙂 If I am ever in Salem, I would love to stay at Elizabeth's place for a longer time--it was amazing.

Luxurious bedding. Elizabeth is super friendly and easy going. Pet friendly. The hot tub made for a relaxing evening and morning. We stayed here while visiting family in the neighborhood. This was the perfect affordable spot, with an amazing king bed! Thank you!!

Everything here was PERFECT. Elizabeth is the best host/hostess I have ever had the pleasure of staying with. The home itself is historical and fascinating. The entire day felt like Christmas itself with all of the decorations. I cannot wait to stay in the other rooms and if you get a chance to have her host you, do NOT miss it. She does not disappoint! Just look at her other reviews. I had the best night sleep as well. I could go on and on, but you get the point ;) Looking forward to staying again!

Our second time staying at Elizabeth’s was just as lovely and inviting as our first time there! The communal spaces felt private and welcoming, and we were always excited to see what the baked good of the day is. We really enjoyed the hot tub both in the evenings and the mornings. The bedding was luxurious and so comfortable. We were able to leave our dogs in the room with no issues, and there was plenty of space to walk the dogs both on the property and in the neighborhood. There is also an amazing dog park just a few minutes drive away- Minto Brown. Elizabeth is super easy going and loving towards our four legged family members. 5 stars, absolutely recommend!

Very accommodating stay! My only critique is the occasional smell of cat litter. There is a dog, 4 cats, 2 tortoises and an array of poultry but they are kept in separate rooms, however I still was able to smell the animals.
Definitely a nice place to stay, very private and quiet. Super clean and warm. Had all the amenities and if you forgot something, Elizabeth had plenty of toiletries.

We love Elizabeth’s so much- third time staying here and it’s perfect! So much charm, freshly baked goods everyday, perfect little hot tub, and she always says hello to our dogs too! Thank you Elizabeth!
What a wonderful experience. Beautiful home and space. Will definitely return.
Nice quiet place.  Secluded, but super close to downtown and lots of businesses.
PERFECTION
I always stay here when traveling to Salem for work. I plan on securing a weekend of R & R for myself and family once my work assignment is complete.
Always gracious and accommodating.
Very cozy
An ideal place to stay at a reasonable price.  Fantastic value for your money.  A good place at any price.
Comfy bed. Very cozy and quiet with everything you might need: a swimsuit for the hot tub, in-room snacks, wifi and even cable t.v.
It's a beautiful old house with comfortable, clean rooms. I super appreciate being able to bring my dog!

You can expect a beautiful Tudor style home tastefully decorated and easy to find.  I stayed in room 2 which was small but very nicely decorated.  The king size bed is super comfortable!  There's a small fridge, micro, coffee maker, plates, glasses...etc....everything has been thought about.  Although I only stayed one night and didn't get a chance to enjoy the grounds it's very beautifully decorated and inviting!  I will stay again!!
Comfortable and hassle free. What more could you ask?
Big room with adorable details and a comfy bed I wanted to take home with me! Very lovely breakfast food and snacks.
Such an amazing place. Looking forward to future stays!

Immaculate. Sparkling clean. Attentive responses. Im a traveling rn who works overnights. She was so accomodating to my bizarre schedule and place was so quiete and tranquil you could've heard a pin drop while i slept through the day. Only wish it were closer to the facility im working at because id be a customer for the duration of my assignment.
I had a great quick stay at Elizabeth's beautiful Tudor style home. I especially loved the decor and thoughtful amenities. Highly recommended!
Another great stay in south Salem, close to everything you need. 10/10

Roadtrip in Oregon and stayed at Elizabeth’s house for one night. Communication was great from booking through check-in. Lovely neighborhood and welcoming home. Tons of foods and other necessities provided, feeling like a home away from home. The bed was super comfy and the en-suite bathroom was really convenient. Breakfast was yummy! Highly recommended!
My stay is always pleasant and Elizabeth's touches makes her home.feel welcomed.
Charming home in convenient location. Elizabeth is a thoughtful and welcoming host. Will be back again, I'm sure.
The details is in the home and HOST. Lovely touches
An historic place with a knowledgeable and friendly hostess.

One of the best bnbs I’ve stayed at. Elizabeth was quick in her responses. Very hospitable and kind and friendly. Room was stocked with everything we needed, including a mini breakfast. Bed was so comfy, it was hard to get up in the morning. Such a good vibe in the house. Clean. Great location. Really enjoyed our stay. Will book w Elizabeth again if ever back in the area.
The details is in the home and HOST. Lovely touches

Great stay! Quiet, quaint, and very clean.
Had everything I needed in the room and the location was amazing being so near to Willamette University.
Beautiful old house, with charming rooms, comfortable beds, and friendly host
She was very kind and pet friendly. She let us stay a little past check out since we got there late and had snacks available
Safe place for any traveler.
