I would recommend this place to anybody, it’s charming and quiet, and the chickens and bunnies are fun.

What an amazing place! We came to visit Salem and were wowed by the house, as well as the hospitality of Elizabeth. Really outstanding. We will definitely be back the next time that we visit! 10/10 would absolutely recommend.
100% recommendable. Everything worked perfect, very nice and clean house; and Elizabeth was an excellent host.

She had great service with very quick and helpful responses. Baked fresh bread and had it ready for our departure. Had a friendly cat that made us feel at home and welcome overall great stay that made us feel at home. Would recommend and definitely return again in the future!

This is truly the best place to stay if you're visiting Salem.

I came here a little spontaneously but the host, Elizabeth, still went out of her way to accommodate. She set me up in the upstairs room, the bed perfectly made, everything very clean -- and yet not in the cold and sterile way most hotels and AirBnbs prepare their rooms. Instead the room displayed so much warmth and character: antique furniture, travel posters and maps hanging across the walls; all the striking beauty that surrounds, like a landscape of Oregon mountains outside the windows. Plus, I had my own bathroom, thoughtfully fully-stocked with emergency toothpaste, toothbrushes, emergency sanitary pads and so much more. I was impressed by all of this -- so imagine then how I felt when she moved me to the master bedroom.

Beyond the accommodations, which I will reiterate: acutely prepared for the traveler (coffee-maker, snacks, spare water bottles, etc.) -- I think my time here will be defined as exceptionally inviting as far as AirBnbs, or individuals, go. It is clear that Elizabeth -- hard-working, industrious and ever-considerate throughout my stay -- is a rightful super-host. Because staying here can only be compared to visiting dear friends you haven't seen since forever. Or like an escape to some scenic inn, safe and far-removed from the rowdy world that lies beyond. Or simply like visiting family. I'm so fortunate to have stumbled upon this place.
This is by far the best place I've stayed with Air BnB! This is the only place I will stay from now on when traveling to Salem. You are not going to find a better home or a better host!
Welcoming host and cozy room. Elizabeth baked fresh banana bread for us!
So nice and easy to stay, she baked apple bread to share with the guests and was very accommodating.
Great private room. More than I expected.
Elizabeth is accommodating, flexible and kind.
Awesome
Excellent

We couldn’t be happier with our stay at Elizabeth’s home! We were traveling with our puppy and booked last minute after 8pm. We received a welcome message almost immediately, and continued communication until we arrived at 10pm. The house was easy to find (about 4 miles off the 5 Freeway into Salem), ample parking with good lighting, and her home is absolutely beautiful. Letting ourselves in went flawlessly with her precise directions. The room was great; nicely decorated, well stocked, super clean and comfortable! We slept very well. We would definitely recommend staying at Elizabeth’s home!
An amazing manor! Great bathroom and lots of supplies if you forgot something, tv and a pool/hot tub!

Awesome place to call home; away from home. Clean and well kept rooms. This is my second time to stay there.
The host is very respectful and goes above and beyond to make sure you are comfortable.
I will definitely stay there again if I happen to be in Salem.
Beautiful home, large rooms with refrigerator, coffee maker, microwave.  Lots of fresh fruit and snacks provided.  Coffee, hot tea available in your private room.  Nice decor.  Very clean.

Elizabeth was a delight! Having booked my reservation at 9:30pm for the same evening, I feared not getting a response. She was prompt, kind, and very hospitable. Met me at the door, got me into my room, and made sure I had everything I needed for the stay.

Elizabeth is a wonderful host and went above and beyond. The room was fully stocked with everything you could possibly think of. My room was filled with elephants which reminded me of my trip to Thailand.
Special memories during a stressful day. Thank you Elizabeth for the home made bread. It was delicious.
Home is a classic beauty in a quiet residential area. Elizabeth is  conscientious about things being just right for her guests.
Great place as always
Elizabeth's place had everything we needed for our weekend visit! She was attentive and extremely hospitable.
This was one of the best Airbnb experiences I’ve had.
We had a great time at the manor, very pet friendly and Elizabeth is a great host!
Lovely house and property, the room was spacious and very clean. I only got to stay there for a quick night on a road trip but it was a great choice
Beautiful , classic old home, fun decor. Elizabeth really cares about her guests' happiness and satisfaction.

Elizabeth’s place was absolutely amazing. We’ve traveled quite a bit and she was one of the best hosts we’ve had. She had great communication and her place was very clean and equipped. She even had homemade apple bread and fresh fruit for us! We would happily stay here again.

A great place for the value The host is unusually generous providing all of the amenities you will need for a short stay including unlimited snacks, bottled water and coffee not to mention a nearby drawer where you can borrow phone chargers, bathrobes even swim suits if you want to use the spa. It was a very pleasing stay for us.
One very nice stay.   Highly recommend to everyone wishing to stay in Salem. Win~win!!!  Great host.
Great space, location & hospitality!
A joy to stay at Vista Manor.   Older home nicely appointed.  Fruit, coffee banana bread, and much much more.  We'll stay with Elizabeth again IF she has a vacancy

I love staying at this property. It really feels like a home away from home. While there are other guests staying at the property at the same time, it feels like a good balance of quiet and feeling that other people are present somewhere not so very far away.

The grounds are soothing and well-cared for and there are always goodies to munch on, but not too many goodies, just enough, and then there's always fruit and coffee :)
I was comfortable the entire stay, would definitely book again any chance I get

Look no further than Elizabeth's place for a wonderful, spacious, clean, and efficient space. she has all your needs and more you could expect from an Airbnb stay.
She has amazing amenities you won't find at other airbnb!. go ahead and book!
Elizabeth was a fine host. The home was clean. It was quiet too. Check in process was smooth.
A real professional.... the room was well equipped with everything a traveler might need
Quiet and relaxing with a gteat hostrss who makes sure rooms ate stocked with snacks, fruit and  homemade bread.
Great in a small town north west
A cozy place with a good  atmosphere and the great amenities.
A Comfortable quiet room with nice amenities in a nice neighborhood.

Very nice house, tastefully decorated and well setup rooms. Great communication from Elizabeth and family. Was a little worried visiting a location with a shared space in covid times, but the way things are set up works well despite it. Would definitely return.
exellent service
This Manor is beautiful, and comes with all the amenities and extra towels, clean place, hot tub was nice, great stay!

This was such a lovely stay. The elephant room was so cute and it had its own bathroom. I think the real thing is better than the pictures, I was surprised when we arrived because the room was much better than I expected. I didn’t meet personally, but she quickly responded to my messages and was very kind. The house was unbelievably cute I loved it. Plus it has a pool and jacuzzi, is close to downtown, and Elizabeth provides all the toiletries a girl could need. Also there was freshly baked sweets for us when we arrived! A fantastic stay.
We had a wonderful and comfortable stay. I definitely plan on staying again.

Elizabeth's place is like a special secret I'd like to keep to myself so it won't be booked next time I'm in Salem.   Her place is where I'll always choose first when I need to stay the night.  Everything is great!

Elizabeth’s home is beautiful and has the feel of an intimate bed and breakfast. My room was so cozy and had everything I could possibly need and more. I only stayed for one night as it was a stop over during a long drive and I wish I could have stayed longer! Elizabeth was so pleasant and communicative. Would recommend!
Clean, friendly, and amazing hospitality! Elizabeth has toiletry items, snacks, water, coffee, fruit, and even home-made bread. WOW, way more than i expected! Great, quiet place to stay.
The home and hospitality are lovely. This was a very comfy stay and I’d certainly enjoy a return visit.
Comfortable with many extra thoughtful touches!   My go-to place while spending time in Salem!
Nicely decorated, lots of amenities, and a very kind and responsive host!

There is, hands down, no better place to stay in the Salem/Portland for this price in my experience. Elizabeth greeted us when we arrived and gave us a tour of the beautiful gardens surrounded the house and the stunningly decorated house. There is everything you could possibly need at the house, from a hot tub and pool, to extra toiletries, snacks and fresh baked goods right outside your door.
Very well done. Lots of special holiday “touches”. Very clean. Excellent communication from the host.
beautiful house located strategically by State St.  Wonderfully decorated room with a comfortable area to sit and relax in the common areas.
Elizabeth's place is like that special secret spot I like to hike to and not share with others so I'll always have it to myself whenever I return!  (Big smiley face!!)

A great place to stay! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a quality place to stay in Salem. Elizabeth is quick to respond to any queries and the rooms are sparkling clean. Would comeback anytime to this place.

This a great place to stay! Everything is set up nicely and instructions are easy to follow. The location of the Airbnb is perfect there’s a lot of restaurants and stores nearby. She also has a binder that I found very informational from what to eat and what to do in the area.

Elizabeth’s place is not only GORGEOUS but her hospitality is top notch.
She included so many extra little goodies that made for the perfect stay. Including fresh baked goods, fruit, coffee, shampoo, makeup wipes...you name it. The backyard is quaint and the location is near anything you’d need!
Elizabeth has a beautiful place. Very clean. Would stay again . She was very helpful and responsive.

One of our best Airbnb stays. Very clean place with all amenities you can ask for. Super comfy bed. We also like the decoration of the room very much. You will feel a sense of artistry in everywhere. Elizabeth was super helpful and very kind to us. Would recommend anyone.

It’s always wonderful to stay at Elizabeth’s! This was my first time in the elephant room, which was very very comfortable! The bed was incredible – firm enough, but soft, too.  There were snacks, coffee, tea, and yogurt in the room, and banana bread in the morning with fruit outside on the landing.
Truly the best Airbnb stay we’ve ever had! Space was clean and so beautifully decorated. Elizabeth was incredibly kind and welcoming and made our stay in Salem outstanding!
This is a hidden gem.. beautiful, charming character and with every convenience.   The bed was super comfortable and shower great.. I highly recommend.
What can I say.... Elizabeth’s place is my home away from home! Would never stay anywhere else!
Very well-provisioned. Very thoughtful host. Would not hesitate to stay here again while in Salem. A very good value.
Very nice and affordable place to stay in Salem. The in room coffee maker was much appreciated and baked goods on the landing were a sweet touch

The elephant room was just as described, super clean, had all I needed for a stopover in the area. I would recommend it especially for 1 guest - for two if you’re happy in intimate spaces together :) Elizabeth was timely responding, check-in was very easy, the location is close to downtown Salem.  Even though a room in a (gorgeous) house, I felt private and secure.
Nice cozy home in great neighborhood.  Close to get anywhere in Salem or go to the Ocean.  Comfortable beds and nice bathrooms.

This is a fantastic place to stay.  I can't say enough about the level of thought Elizabeth has put into her place.  Each room has a theme (I stayed in the Elephant room) and she's thought of all the things you might need with baskets of personal supplies from toothpaste, to q-tips and everything in between.  In addition to coffee with all the fixings, there is a full supply of snacks included in your room and little touches I've never seen elsewhere such as water bottles with "Congratulations to [my Willamette grad's name]".  Every day there is fruit and baked goods laid out and Elizabeth checks in regularly.  I've stayed at Elizabeth's place twice and I wish I could stay here every time I visit.  All that AND the best price I've found in Salem.   Highly recommended!!!

The listing is outdated and inaccurate. It states that there's space in the kitchen for guests to prepare and cook their meals, however, upon trying to cook, I realized the entire stove was broken... I messaged her in regards to that and she told me that the kitchen is actually completely off-limits due to covid so inaccurate description. also the bathroom had really bad Plumbing issues to the point where water was flooding on the floor. there was no plunger in that bathroom also there was someone's hair on the floor which shows it was not completely sterilized. the room wasn't Superbad the sheets and towels were clean however, the entire place was really dusty and you can tell it was not sanitized. also there's cats there and I have bad allergies so kind of sucked but she definitely be added to the description. overall the place is not as described and some amenities are not available. The living room was a mess.

Elizabeth has thought of everything   It is the best experience from the moment you book the room to check out. Thereare so many wonderful touches from the extra toothbrushes if you forgot yours to the-home baked goodies left each morning. I can’t-say enough wonderful-things about Elizabeth’s home and her hospitality. This is a definite 10 in my book.
A great place to stay! Has everything you need. Kind hosts, who even did my laundry before I continued my travels! I’d recommend staying here.

Very clean, safe area, thoughtful amenities. 5 stars all around!

I’ve stayed in many Airbnbs since 2016, and Elizabeth’s place tops the list with the most thoughtful amenities and touches. Would highly recommend this stay.

Elizabeth’s home was absolutely wonderful. The location is perfect and she provides a great guestbook with lots of fun and exciting things to see and do around town. She was very warm and welcoming when I arrived. My room had so many snacks and little amenities to include a mini fridge and microwave. The bed was comfortable and the neighborhood quiet. The only regret I have is that I couldn’t spend more time! Highly recommend staying at Elizabeth’s.
Lovely, cozy, cute decor. I was very comfortable and more than everything I needed was provided. Lots of super thoughtful touches. Would recommend and stay again!
Beautiful house and surroundings.
Excellent! The animals and house are a joy!

We had a wonderful stay here. The room, while slightly small, had everything one would hope for - en-suite bathroom, microwave, fridge, and TV in room, good WiFi, plenty of clean towels and little travel size items in case you forgot anything. The house and grounds were charming and lovely. We also appreciated being able to use the hot tub after a long day of driving! My only complaint would be that the bed was a tad soft for my liking - I prefer firmer support, but the mattress could be perfect for someone else. Overall, a great place to stay!
Great location and value for money
Very accurately portrayed room with so many little extras. Fresh muffins for breakfast and little snacks too. Great place to stay in Salem!
very clean, private and a wonderful experience with an Awesome Ambiance!!

Our stay was a much needed, relaxing and stress free getaway.  I can't think of one thing they forgot in their abundant supplies to ensure the happiness of their clients.  All in all, a simply wonderful visit.  Quiet and peaceful, a perfect little place to unwind and enjoy their beautiful grounds and landscaping, and comfortable rooms to exploring this historical home.  Definitely a place I would gladly recommend.
Cute little place with all necessity provided

A very comfortable home to stay in. The room was clean and very well kept. Also super cute to stay in! There was tea and snacks ready for us. Elizabeth was a wonderful host! We would definitely stay there again

Clean, tidy, easy, with all the amenities we hoped for. This was the perfect place to stay for us while visiting family for the weekend.

Thank you for making our trip so seamless! We appreciated the easy check-in, thoughtful details, and cleanliness :)
Very clean, very well accommodated and would stay again.
Always a great stay!

What a beautiful house  with lovinglyy decorated rooms!  Elizabeth offers  fruit and homebaked muffins and breads daily, stocks the mini-fridge with yogurts and water bottles, and the  room with snacks to enjoy all day.  She offers a cooked breakfast but I never felt the need to ask.  We will definitely come back when we make another Oregon trip.
This is a lovely home, and has all the amenities you could ask for! We only wish we would have planned a longer stay.
Great place! So many amenities! Would definitely stay again.

This is a welcoming room in a quiet and beautiful historic home.  There are a lot of personal touches and the host is quite nice.  It was rare to find such a dog-friendly and affordable place.  It's worth the short drive from the freeway if you are heading up or down I5.
One of the best Airbnb’s I’ve stayed at. The Elephant room had lots of personality and was stocked with any kind of supplies imaginable, and  even things I didn’t know I needed.
Elizabeth is the hostess with the mostest! only wish we could have stayed longer!

Elizabeth the Host together with her daughter Melissa could not have been more helpful. Vista Manor is in a great location, the house is clean and you are made to feel very much at home. Fruit bowls for guests, freshly baked bread and outdoor dining were just a few of things that made this such a wonderful stay. Nothing is too much trouble. Would definitely stay here again
Sharon and Chris
Bermuda

This home is so beautiful. Host was great. Host made sure we had everything we needed. Communication was excellent between host and I. Had no issues at all.
Would definitely stay again. The location is great, quiet but close to everywhere.

This is such a wonderful room in a beautiful house! It is cozy and very well stocked with amenities and snacks. Elizabeth was very friendly and prompt with all her responses. If I’m in Salem again, I will definitely stay here!

Elizabeth is a wonderful host and her home is beautiful. A very warm and welcoming atmosphere. The room we stayed in was very clean and had everything we could ask plus snack foods to eat so we didn’t want for anything. It was very easy to find her home using GPS. Great location
Beautiful historic home. Charming and lush rooms with lots of extra touches. Lovely gardens. Close to everything. I would definitely come back!
Elizabeth is great host. Place is gorgeous. Me & my wife had great time here.

I’m not sure how an AirBnB could be better. Elizabeth provided a wealth of amenities - more then I have ever seen anywhere - on top of having an amazing and beautiful house and land space. Elizabeth herself was a very gracious and giving host. Highly highly recommend this space!
Everything was great

I didn’t get to meet Elizabeth but she was very communicative upon our arrival and made sure we had no issues during check-in. The room had everything we needed and more actually. It was nice and cozy. Location was great too and ample parking. Highly recommend! And would come back again if I’m passing the town again.
The Elephant Room is just perfect. Clean, darling, thoughtful touches throughout. Excellent location. Personable feel, but not invasive. Superb value. Don’t overlook this one!! Highly recommend!

Elizabeth has a beautiful gem in the heart of Salem! I traveled with my mom, and my mom loved the little details in the room including the elephant themes and all the nice little attention to detail like the book of local restaurants which came in handy for finding breakfast the next day. I kinda wish I stayed longer, however Elizabeth is definitely great with her AirBnB! Thank you Elizabeth!
This Airbnb was perfect and Elizabeth was an awesome host!
Wonderful stay. Wonderful host. There was every amenity you could ask for and more. We will be coming back if we're ever in the area. Super charming and at a great price.
Elizabeth is a great hostess. She anticipates every need of her guests. This is a great place to stay.
This space was more than expected. Super cute and comfortable. Highly recommended!

Adorable place to stay
The house alone is gorgeous and the Victorian furniture is beautiful and well kept.
The room itself is cozy, neat, and has lots of cute decorations :)
The hostess was super nice and check in was a breeze despite me coming so late at night.
100% should stay here!
Great place to stay.
Beautiful property, convenient to many food locations
Great location, the house seems secluded with the trees and garden but it is walking distance to many places, and easily accessible by car/Lyft.
An absolutely perfect spot - an extremely comfortable and beautiful home. Elizabeth is so welcoming and everything you could need is available. And, the location is ideal.

Elizabeth.thank you for everything. the property was beautiful and the elephant room.i ended up.in was perfect, great energy nothing but good vibes and most importantly i felt safe.
no other place I would stay is Salem.
Quiet location

My husband and I have stayed here twice and had a great experience both times. It is exactly as advertised and so conveniently located just off Commercial, yet at the same time it's so quiet and peaceful that it feels like you're in a country house. Self check in was easy, and everything was clean and cute. We appreciate all the extras, like yogurt, bottled water, and yummy snacks in the room. Elizabeth is very kind, and she responds to emails right away. The first time we stayed we had a chance to meet her, and she introduced us to some adorable ducks in the backyard. :) The second time she was out of town, but available by text and email with quick responses. I definitely recommend this one - in fact, we are staying here again next month!
the best ever in 5 years of traveling.
Comfortable.  Clean.  Relaxing.
Wonderful accommodations. Very accurate descriptions. The hot tub is in pristine condition!!  Bread and muffins are excellent and a special treat.
We loved this place! So convenient and easy. Elizabeth was very accommodating and her banana bread was delicious!!
Just a nice room! So comfortable, loved the elephant decorations, snacks and goodies were available. Enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend!
Thanks Elizabeth for everything !!

Elizabeth's place is great!  The cost/comfort ratio is hard to beat!  And Elizabeth is a warm and wonderfully caring host!   Whenever I come to Salem, I keep my fingers crossed that she will have a room available for me!
This is a wonderful quiet stay. Clean and compact. Everything that you need and close to roadways. The elephant decor in the room a nice touch. Would definitely recommend.

We had a wonderful overnight stay with Elizabeth, the location was so convenient with all the shopping and restaurants nearby and the house was beautiful. The Elephant Room is very cutely decorated and the additional snacks and coffee were so appreciated, there’s also a hot tub in the backyard that I wish I had the time to try out. It was very quiet & clean and we had a restful sleep, we wish we could have stayed more than one night!

The room is located in a large and interesting house in Salem. We had the elephant room #2. Elizabeth was easy to reach and communicate with. Check-in was very easy, and we especially liked the fruit and bread laid out for us. The room is a bit small, but if you just need a night to crash, it's perfectly suitable.
What a great place to stay. Everything was so clean and the house is beautiful. Elizabeth was extremely helpful and welcoming. I would definitely stay her again!
This is a beautiful wonderful stay;) everything is as advertised and we love our stays here, Thank u Elizabeth
We love this lovely Airbnb and have been recommending it to others! A great place to stay! ☺️
Cute house, loved that there’s an attached bathroom for added privacy! Fully stocked room with drinks and snacks too!
Wonderful stay.
This home was incredibly decorated, quiet, and just what we needed after a long day of travel! Would highly recommend, and wish we could have enjoyed the space for more time

This is hands-down one of the most beautiful places I’ve ever stayed. The rooms are all so lovely, spotlessly clean and there are numerous special amenities including fresh baked goods.  I feel like a movie star every time I stay here!
Nice host, clean place, cute bedroom.
We really loved our stay here. Definitely would stay again!
Enjoy the snacks, the towels are thick and plentiful, bed is comfortable and personal touches are flawless.
Very comfortable and homey.
Exactly as described! Great location and plenty of amenities. Would stay here again!
Fantastic stay . Appreciated the at home feeling of your beautiful place.

We were just passing through for the night, communication was excellent and check-in very easy. We got in late and Elizabeth had everything ready for us. It was easy to find, tucked right off a main road and felt very safe. Way better than a motel stay, excellent quality.
It was very cozy place to stay. Beautiful historical house. We checked in late and out early morning but wish we could spend more time at the house.
The House is very nice and clean. the rooms are a good size and the location of this place is perfect! The driveway also has plenty of parking space. I would recommend this place to anyone!

Great stay. Elizabeth was excellent in her communications and we didn't have a bit of trouble coming in late. The room was extremely comfortable and the hot tub was relaxing. We will definitely be back.

This place was more magical than we imagined. We stayed on Halloween night and the decorations inside and out made it atmospheric. It was easy to find, right off the main road (but couldn’t hear any traffic) and full of charm. We only stayed for one night but wished we had for more. We brought our dog and he made himself right at home. There was even a large park about 2 blocks away for us to walk him. We’d highly recommend this place!
Nice property!

It's always wonderful to stay at Elizabeth's--the rooms are cozy and very well-appointed; the beds are soooo comfortable (I'm always at a risk of oversleeping my appointments!); the treats and fruit are yummy; and I always feel well taken care of.  It's my Salem pied-à-terre!

Elizabeth and her daughter make a strong effort to make your stay a nice one. They were helpful and generous with their hospitality. The room was well equipped with a fun elephant theme. Good bed, good rest.
Everything was easy and convenient. Thanks Emily!

Elizabeth's place was awesome! the house and garden is beautiful, everything was clean, well cared for, and although I did not meet the host communication was great. maybe the most professional airbnb experience I have had. walking distance to food, groceries, etc. I loved it!
Great room in a easily accessible area. Safe and clean in a great neighborhood.

Everything so well organized for a seem less check in. Great to have tea and some snacks available for evening and next morning. Quiet lovely home inside and out.
A quality stay for an affordable price with amenities of hot tub.
The room was very clean and worth the price!
Great place to stay, tons of amenities that made this great for a work trip. Will be coming back!

I’ve now officially stayed in all 4 rooms in the main house. The butterfly room is lovely and well appointed. It seems like it lacks a mirror but it is in the wardrobe door. The bathroom is downstairs so that is the only small inconvenience but the bathroom is large and all yours. Lots of windows so it’s a nice bright space.

What a fabulous and affordable find!!! The house is beautiful, easy to check in and find, and the room we had was so cozy! Elizabeth thought of everything-mini fridge, coffee maker, dish ware, microwave, just about any toiletries you could think of, and snacks! It’s a beautiful home, and our room was just lovely. The bed was incredibly comfortable. The house was very quiet. Elizabeth made herself incredibly available. Best air bnb I’ve ever stayed. Definitely would go back, and definitely recommend!

This place is even more charming and inviting than the listing shows. The host goes out of her way with extra touches of hospitality such as fresh baked banana bread and every kind of toiletry you could need. I’m already looking forward to a return trip to Salem to stay at this location.

Elizabeth was incredibly gracious.   The accommodation was superior in every regard.   We loved the bed, the little extras (e.g. banana bread, cookies and in-room goodies, the toothpaste [in case you forgot], etc.), and the home itself (built in 1933) is so much fun that it was a pleasure to stay there.   If you visit Salem, OR you most definitely want to stay here.

This is my third time staying at Vista Manor and as always it was such a pleasure! Elizabeth goes above and beyond for her guests! And yetI have privacy! I look forward to the little extras that you don’t get in many other places. Things like snacks and yogurt and water and fruit and homemade banana bread! I will always stay at Vista Manor when in Salem!
Great stay!
Great host, great value, soft bed
Elizabeth is always accommodating and gracious.
Had a great stay. Very nice house with a lot of nice touches in the room. I was only there briefly but it seemed like a nice, comfortable place.
As always, this is a great place to stay.  Very clean, with lots of attention to what travelers might want, and the snacks are a really nice touch!  Thank you!
This is my 3rd stay In this beautiful home! When traveling in Oregon I will always try to come back to stay here. As usual the home was beautifully decorated & impeccably clean.
This wasn’t our first stay at Elizabeth’s lovely home and certainly won’t be our last. She always goes above and beyond to make your stay the best experience it could possibly be.

I love staying at Elizabeth's, it's a lovely  big home! the bedrooms are decorated very nice beds are comfortable, microwave, little fridge, one cup coffee maker, with all the condiments. The price for staying is very reasonable!!
Beautiful home, great location. Elizabeth has thought of everything to make this a wonderful stay. I have stayed in both the Elephant  and Peacock  rooms. Very comfortable. Thank you Elizabeth!
Very comfortable stay, we loved our visit!
Elizabeth is a wonderful host. Easy check in, adorable home. She provides everything you need and then some.

Very convenient location as it has many options nearby and also to travel out too. Host is very nice, communicates well. Detailed in the extras she provided and if you are new to the area really recommend reading the binder for food, entertainment, and other recommendations.

Only minor complain we had is that the bed in the elephant room was a bit noisy. But Elizabeth said is going to have someone take a look at it to fix the issue.

Would definitely recommend this place :)
Easy check in, great amenities, perfect location.

This is a great room (we like the elephants!). The living room is also spacious and nice. Elizabeth provides everything you can (and cannot) think of including coffee, yogurt, and cleaning stuff. The house is beautiful located in a quiet neighborhood.
Great stay again
Great place in Salem and would definitely recommend staying here to anyone.
Was really taken back with all the amenities offered.  Elizabeth made sure I had everything I needed and is a great host.  Just a few miles from the Salem airport.  Definitely worth checking out.
Great place to stay! Easy to locate and near food and attractions, the elephant room was cute and welcome! we felt clean and safe! Definitely coming back! elizabeth made us feel at home

Such a charming property. Elizabeth has so many touches that are above and beyond. Snacks and coffee, clean room, easy to get in and out - it was very nice. I felt very safe as a solo female traveler. I also greatly appreciate the little welcome basket for my pup. So much thoughtfulness.

The only minor thing for me is that I didn’t realize there would be other guests. This is more like a bed and breakfast, imo. I could hear their conversations through the walls. When they got up early, it woke me between their talking and walking through the hallway and down the stairs. Light sleepers might want to bring earplugs.
Perfect everything!
Great central location with accurate info & lovely home!
Awesome stay always:)
Great stay.  Would stay again,  friendly, easily accessible and fun to say hello to other guests.
Great place! Cute cottage vibes.
Gorgeous views, welcoming and whimsical environment
Exceed expectations! Beautiful home, clean, comfortable, and convenient.

Charming and comfy! The Elephant room suited our needs perfectly— this hostess has the gift of hospitality like no other. We will be coming back in future trips to Salem and checking availability here first.
We enjoyed our stay at Elizabeth’s place! Timely communication, clean and charming room, home made treats! Good central location.
Always convenient and clean.
So many unexpected details! Accommodated one of my requests with no hesitation. Bed is very comfortable. Will definitely try to stay again when I’m back in town.
Very clean, cozy and comfy
Great room, location, all the necessities
Good especially if you know how to deal with AirBnB

Our stay in the elephant room was wonderful! Everything was clean, the room was cozy, and there was everything and anything we could possibly need. We can tell Elizabeth really cares for her guests as she provides fresh banana bread, lots of snacks, and all of the toiletries. Her attention to detail and hospitality is unmatched as an Airbnb host! We’ll definitely stay again next time we’re in town.
This room was nicely organized and clean. I had a good nights rest when I stayed there. Easy check-in and the owner communicates well.
Clean,quiet, and awesome historic home! Easy check in and check out. Would stay again!
Beautiful property, peaceful, and all the amenities you could need
Another stay at this lovely home in Salem! Close to downtown, convenient, and welcoming
Beautiful and lovely place.

It was such a treat to stay in this beautiful heritage home.  Elizabeth’s attention to detail had us wanting for nothing and made us feel special.  If you are ever in Salem, then be sure to spend a night or two at Elizabeth’s.   Thanks for sharing,  Judith and Martin

The house and location are excellent. The room itself was likewise pretty wonderful and there were a surprising amount of amenities and "nice to haves" in the room. I had a small issue with communication but I consider it forgivable considering the value of the place.
This was just what we needed, a place to get ready for a friend’s wedding and then spend the night afterwards. It was cute, clean, comfortable and the details provided by the host were helpful.
A wonderful home with a great body. Very clean and comfy rooms and beds. This was our third time here for good reason! A++++ all the way! Thank you Elizabeth...
Charming themed room and amazing amenities stocked to the rim! Will gladly stay at this BnB in the future. :)

Booked this very last minute but was much worth it, will definitely add it to my list for when I come back to the area. The manor as a whole was beautiful and easy to find as well as close to many great spots in Salem.
Definitely worth the value of the room and the host was very nice and communicated adequately.

Feeling very lucky to have experienced Elizabeth’s lovely home & spectacular garden! Everything we could have needed had been thought of and communication was excellent.
Thanks so much for such an enjoyable stay!
Loved staying here! It is very charming and perfect for a weekend getaway!
I always stay at Elizabeth's when I come into town for business. She's a very hospitable host and makes everything very easy. Would highly recommend!
wonderful place to stay
Nice place to stay in Salem—gorgeous yard in full spring blooms
love the comfort and amenities, coffee and cream, right next to bed. 😁
You willlll not be disappointed:))) this is a wonderful place and Elizabeth is wonderful;)

My fiancé and I were visiting the area to look for apartments in south salem. The location was extremely convenient and our room was beautiful! Elizabeth always had fresh baked goods (the muffins were to die for)  and bottles of water for her guests, which was a very nice touch. Will definitely be recommending this spot!
this is a great place to stay in south Salem. I appreciate how private the room and accommodations are.
Always great
This is  a great place to stay! It's very conveniently located. The room is comfortable and well-appointed. Elizabeth makes a perfect host!
I stay in the elephant room and it is so quaint and private.
Honestly the best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed at! Elizabeth goes above and beyond to make sure you have anything you could possibly need on your travels. Would love to stay again!
so quiet and comfortable.
excellent place to stay
I really appreciate staying here. I am here at least once a week for work.
Such an amazing stay. Elizabeth was a great host, and I was surprised well decorated the manor was. I will definitely stay here again next time I pass through the area

We had a great stay at Elizabeth's home in Salem, Oregon. The house is set up to meet any of your needs. She has thought of everything. We loved the homemade bakery in the morning along with fresh fruit. We enjoyed the good coffee and creamer provided. The Elephant room had lovely unique decor and the space was calm and relaxing.
We were close enough to walk to a few stories, which we always appreciate. The check-in system was easy.
We will stay here again when we come to Salem.
Oh, and very very quiet, we slept with the window open and didn't hear a thing. Also, sometimes shared spaces in a home can be nice, it felt like we were the only ones there. This time of year it was too cool and rainy to enjoy the outdoor area by the pool, but it appears to be a well set up space when the sunshine shines.

Elizabeth’s home is so wonderful! My sister, dog, and I stayed for the night while we were passing through town and I wish we could have stayed longer! Elizabeth is a wonderful host with great communication. Her house is in a great location, clean, and she provided a lot of suggestions and information about the town and what’s available near by.
Clean room and great house! Would stay again
excellent place, quiet, and all self contained in a cozy room

Nice house, parking right out front, coffee, tea and plenty of snacks laid out and available which was nice. Great suggestions in the book on the desk for where to eat and explore, very helpful. King bed was very comfy. Walls are pretty thin, old house, but charming
Thanks!

Pictures do not do the place justice. You can tell this is a location with experience hosting at traditional b&b levels. Great comfort and accommodations. Doggies loved it! Very comfortable main space that was inviting for reading.

This is a great place to stay if you are going to salem. It’s tucked away in an adorable little area, and the host even offers snacks and many other amenities when you enter your room. The themed rooms are adorable and it’s just a great airbnb.
perfectly quiet and cozy
nice stay
A lovely quiet neighborhood.
Such a lovely home! So welcoming and warm :)
The room is very comfortable, and it's in a convenient location to shops/restaurants. Elizabeth was also very kind. I'd stay here again and would definitely recommend it.
wonderful stay
Awesome

We stayed in the Elephant Room. Loved the decor-felt very comfortable there. Nice to have a bathroom, mini fridge, and microwave in the room. Wonderful home and grounds. Felt secluded but near our events and everything else we needed. Looked in the other rooms and they looked nice, too. We would stay here again if ever coming back to Salem, Oregon!

Always woke up to fresh baked goods and bottles of water and fresh fruit. Very nice very nice! It was a very quiet room I may have been the loudest person (sorry) there because I would come home at 10:30 after being with my grand baby. I apologize if I left the TV on and disturbed anyone I try to keep the volume to  a 2,3 or 4. Everyone I met at the house was very cordial and accommodating. I hope to come back soon and I will bring an elephant with me  to add to the collection the next time. I will be back. Thank you for sharing your lovely home.
Wonderful
Great place and location
Lovely room. Enjoyed the tub!

One of my best AirBnb experiences ever. Elizabeth is a very thoughtful, generous,  and accommodating host . The room was so comfortable and quiet, the house is beautiful and interesting, and the garden is a peaceful place to relax. I highly recommend, and I will be back.
The elephant room was exactly as described. It was clean, quiet, and in a perfect location in Salem. We stayed one night on our road trip home and it felt like we were staying with a family friend.

This was our third stay with Elizabeth and as always the attention to detail is above and beyond. Being able to bring our two dogs with us and to stay in such a comfortable place is very much appreciated! 🥰
Cozy in the winter and nice and cool in the summer. This is always a great place to stay.

This is a charming and welcoming space. We enjoyed the elephant motif and the spacious bed. So nice! We also made use of the fresh fruit & thought that that was a lovely touch. The room was delightful, and the bed was huge.
Great stay as usual. Nice and cool even with the 100 degree day. Thanks for turning the a/c on early, Elizabeth.
The room was very nice! Great air conditioning!

The room is small but clean and comfortable, and we liked the elephant motif. Even though Elizabeth was out of the country, she communicated with us very well through texts. We appreciated the convenient location and the thoughtful amenities.

A very beautiful and comfortable place.
We loved that it was walking distance from good dinner and breakfast places.
Elizabeth's place was great and helped me get into a calm environment to pass my exam! would definitely recommend if you're staying in Salem!
Absolutely recommended. Elizabeth is super nice to us, and we had a great time in the house and garden. Room is clean and comfortable. The cats chicken and ducks are very friendly as well.
Elizabeth was a lovely host, the rooms were nicely decorated and clean. the house was at a really convenient location, also the pool looked nice.
Very comfortable room. Had everything I needed.

This is my second stay at Elizabeth's beautiful home.  She provides everything you need and much more!  It is so handy to have coffee and tea making available in the room as well as the microwave and fridge.  The little touches like fresh fruit,  muffins, silverware and plates make  all the difference.  The beds are very comfortable, the towels are soft and she even provides  fluffy bathrobes!  Better than a four star hotel in my opinion.  I look forward to staying again in the future.

The Elephant Room at Elizabeth’s AirBnB far exceeded our expectations. This is the first time I have stayed in a room in a home and it was everything and more that was described. The room was cozy, the bed very comfortable, the AC perfect and the vibe very welcoming. The Elephant Room is one of 4 on the 2nd floor that are AirBnB rentals. Despite all rooms being occupied the night we were there, it was quiet and safe. We also enjoyed access to a large living room, ample dining room and relaxing patio (complete with friendly kitty). Our every need was considered and filled. The location is also fabulous as it is a short walk to a number of good restaurants. We left wishing we had one more night there, we enjoyed it so much! We will definitely return if we ever are needing a place to stay in the Salem area.
Wonderful room and house, the room contains all I need. Thanks Elizabeth for the great hospitality.
Elizabeth is great with communication. Appreciate that very much.

Elizabeth is a true gem and staying here was a wonderful experience. Her baked goods are fantastic and it was perfect for our 2 week stay! She took care of absolutely anything and everything that we needed!

Elizabeth was very communicative and the house was adorable! The room was very cute with all the elephants. The bed was very comfy and she has thought of everything! I even sent the listing to my mom for when she drives up from CA to visit as a good option for stopping half way.
This lovely house with tastefully decorated private guest room and bath was a perfect place to spend the night in Salem. The Elephant Room was a gem. Highly recommend.
Snacks! Awesome home. I enjoyed my stay a lot! I will be coming back.

If you love theme related adorable rooms with everthing you need, stay here. The bed was big and comfortable and the bathroom was very comfortable as well with a single sink. Loved the view of the pool from our room. There were fresh baked goods left in the hallway for all the guests to enjoy as well as fruit and other snacks. I'd never been in such a thought out Airbnb before.  Just loved it.
Pleasant relaxing stay at Elizabeth’s beautiful manor!
Another great stay.  Elizabeth goes beyond.
Great stay. Very comfortable.

Elizabeth is a great host, and clearly cares about providing the best experience for her guests. Her 1930s Tudor home is unique and interesting -- not to mention cozy and comfortable. And, her rates are unbeatable. If we need overnight lodging again in Salem, Vista Manor will be our first choice.
Really lovely place to stay

Quiet room, perfect temperature for sleeping, convenient shower. Personally refrigerator in the Master's bedroom is a nice bonus. One of the best airbnb I have stayed in for a very fair price. Will be checking for availability if I ever stay in Salem again.
great place for rest

A very welcoming place and Elizabeth was easy to contact.  Very comfortable and the bed was wonderful.  She puts out lots of goodies if your looking for a snack.  We would come back if we need a place to stay in Salem.  Dennis & Judy
As nice as always.  Loved the king-sized bed in the Elephant Room. You make it feel like our home away from home.

low quality in a fancy environment. cleanliness and value get low marks: found several hairs in the bathroom upon entering. so much money for a creaky old room with waaaay too many elephant knick-knacks. other guests were a pain, while posting did say “several” rooms are rented, they fail to include that all of those rooms - at least 4 - are on the same floor, and you will likely share 1-2 walls with them. the noise was insufferable: guests cooking meat in their rooms at 11pm, toilet seats falling at 6am, plastic trays/trash cans falling at 4am, trash collection/garbage trucks early in the AM, and next to two busy streets, not to mention you can hear everything, since it’s a creaky old house and you share the same floor/walls as everyone else. Bed was comfy enough, but the pillows were low quality- are they original to the house?!? internet couldn’t handle a podcast, so don’t count on that either.
i don’t think any consideration is paid to the guest experience. hosts do not put themselves in the guests shoes (apparently the parking rules only apply to guests, hosts can park anywhere and block your travel). i found this place to be all about ‘the house’ - which, sure is old and has a history - but the rooms are not worth the cost, not by a long shot!
This is my second stay with Elizabeth. She makes everything so easy and welcoming. The rooms are fun and cozy and I sleep so well here! Highly recommend Vista Manor!
Thank You Elizabeth for another great stay!
Great stay - comfortable room and bed. Great location and quiet.
It was a great experience! Great communication! We had some issues with spiders/bugs and Elizabeth got it taken care of immediately. Such a charming house!

Great location, you will not regret staying here for a few nights. Lots of extras, such as muffins, chips, coffee, tea, snacks, personal needs, just about anything you might have forgotten.  Very unique...
Lovelt and pleasant stay.

Lovely host. Home is warm and beautiful.
Christmas decorations were so wonderful. She offered so many extras. From the tasty pastries to the oatmeal and yogurt for breakfast available in your room. Very quiet and comfortable bed. Will definitely be back!

Had a wonderful visit. Elizabeth was very respectful of privacy while at makings he same time being easy to reach. There was an ice storm during my stay and she went well above and beyond making my stay a memorable one!
Highly recommend. Thank you Elizabeth for everything!
always comfortable and quiet when I am there.
lovely
Always a great stay with Elizabeth just 1 night enroute to California
easy check in, and very private

I loved Elizabeth's home! This was my first time staying at an Airbnb that is a room in someone's house. She made me feel right at home and it was so comfortable there. Would definitely stay there again and highly recommend Elizabeth and any of her listings!

We stayed in room 2  aka The Elephant room.  Very cosy all the amenities you could want.   Will stay again.   Only note is to understand this is a heritage house with old doors and thin walls.  We could hear the young girls across the hall having a good giggle but not past 10pm.

Felt like being home. The house is beautiful, and the anything we could have needed was provided. We were so comfy, we forgot to leave!

Thank you for hosting us 😊

I loved the themed room and thoughtfulness of the decor. The host was generous with snacks. Despite sharing the floor with other guests, house rules meant i felt private and undisturbed. Altogether delightful
Exactly as listed, very responsive host, and the snacks and breakfast options were such a kind touch!
Beautiful home and great amenities!  Very responsive host.  Couldn't have been better!
I have stayed here at least four times, and as always, get nothing but the best!

Elizabeths home is lovely! Beautiful touches everywhere, very comfortable,  safe,  SUPER convenient location and lots of extras- Elizabeth is growths and responsive,  provides snacks,  drinks,  breakfast- lovely outdoor spaces, and a wonderful walkable park nearby. Excellent value!

We thank Elizabeth for such a comfortable room with bathroom
We have stayed multiple times. Very nice place to stay with our dog on route to the desert

Elizabeth was a fantastic host who truly cares about every detail. Her home is lovely, and our room was comfortable and quiet. The location was perfect for many activities in Salem. We look to forward to returning!

We continue to come back to this Airbnb !
The atmosphere is always welcoming here.
Comfortable and clean—a place you can get away from it all and relax.
a pleasure to deal with, would again gladly
2nd stay, very nice!
cozy
In evwry way, Elizabeth has set up the space to feel homelike and welcoming.  I appreciate her attention to every detail as my host.

I’ve stayed in Elizabeth’s place numerous times over the years, it’s my home away from home!  I travel to Salem often from the East Coast to visit family in Salem, and couldn’t imagine staying anywhere else.  Outstanding in all regards!

We highly recommend this house and Ligali was an amazing host! He and his family were so helpful, giving local tips and also affording us total privacy. They are really friendly and genuinely kind people. The house was stocked with supplies, everything we needed, including nice appliances- gas stove, a mixer, Keurig, down to the details of tupperware and laundry soap. The deck in the backyard is a peaceful place to sit and relax- with some of those big trees that makes Oregon so nice. The air conditioning was excellent when it was hot. The house is roomy, beds are comfortable, internet fast, and tv nice. The location is nice and it is close to all kinds of stores, the only downside being a little traffic noise. We loved visiting Silver Falls, Lincoln City, Newport, Portland, and Eugene conveniently from Salem. This house was a perfect fit and we felt welcome and at home here. We really appreciated the hospitality and enjoyed our stay.

Ligali’s home was exceptionally clean, conveniently located in South Salem (close to my new favorite ice cream shop) and a more comfortable alternative to a local hotel. The home has been remodeled with modern features and has a large backyard and deck. Ligali was very accommodating and was quick to reply via text. I recommend this home for your family.

This is a lovely designed, renovated ranch style home that provides nice sized bedrooms and spacious bathrooms. The laundry area was handy and the kitchen was equipped with top of the line appliances. We missed having some basic condiments, but there was a nice spice rack. Pots and pans are provided, though they are difficult to access in an out of a corner lazy-susan. If you want wine, bring a corkscrew as we weren't able to find one. Keurig coffee pods and creamer was provided and of course appreciated. The mattress, pillows and bedding were delightful...super comfortable and cozy. The street is not super busy but cars did speed along and with the house sitting fairly close to the street, we needed to keep close eye on the two-year old. There was some road noise from the bedrooms but it settled down fairly early each evening.
Pictures are accurate. Very comfortable and reasonably priced. Ligali was very prompt with any questions.
Clean comfy house near shops and restaurants.

Nice, clean with many upgrades. There is a beautiful full kitchen, pods coffee maker, toaster and pretty much anything you might need as well as a washer & dryer - perfect for a few days or longer stay. Location was easy drive to downtown Salem.
Hosts had coffee, instant oatmeal, granola bars out for our use.
It was perfect for our needs.

Excellent hosts. Very thoughtful and easy to communicate with.

The house was perfect for our family of 6. We stayed over the Thanksgiving holiday. Kitchen was well stocked and had many great appliances pots & pans and utensils. If you plan to do a lot of cooking as we did, you will need some extra items like cookie sheets, pie plates or baking dishes.

Beds and furniture were all very comfortable. House was very clean. Nice Roku TV with lots of streaming channels.

Convenient location close to many stores and restaurants.

Great place to celebrate the holiday and felt like a home away from home.
Clean, communicative, convenient. Is there anything else you need?
Wonderful place- highly recommended! Clean and organized with many nice touches!
Very clean and generously stocked.  A great place to stay!

Ligali's place is EXCELLENT. This is for sure one of my best AirBnB experiences. His place is well-stocked with everything a person could want (coffee, oatmeal, granola bars, ice packs), but still it was clutter-free, spacious, and inviting. We walked up the street late our last night there for some great Thai food. Thank you so much! I hope to stay with you again! :) :)
We really enjoyed our stay! The house is perfect and everything we hoped it would be and more!!
Ligali’s home was very welcoming, charming and clean. If I am ever in Salem again I would love to stay there.

This was the perfect place for my family's stay in Salem. We had everything we needed.  It is located close to everything you need. Would definitely stay here again!  Perfect hosts who responded quickly to our questions!

Pictures and descriptions accurately reflect Ligali's warm home in Salem. Everything is set up for guests to have a comfortable stay. Ligali responds quickly to inquiries and is quite accommodating to our special requests. Highly recommended.

Our family totally loved staying at Ligali's property. It had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. We especially loved the fully equipped kitchen. All the other spaces in the home were also perfect. Ligali was responsive and accommodating. We would love to stay here again on our future trips to Salem and we would highly recommend Ligali's home.

This is THE place for anyone looking for a comfortable, "like home" place to stay! Many ammenities included like soap and shampoo, towels, bedding, and even coffee! Spent a week with the family here and could not have asked for anything more! Great house to stay at if visiting Salem!
Perfect place to stay! Very clean. Responsive host. Highly recommended and worth the price.

It was a very homey place with new renovations but a nice touch of the original house.
It was great for the price when you have a family of six because it came out a lot cheaper then hotel rooms for us & our older married children.
Communication was good but it is a busy street so night time was a little noisey on the weekend but tolerable.
There are a lot of food items there which was nice to have available.
For us the unfortunate part was the previous guest smoked in the house! That was not Ligali's fault and he did let us know before we checked in. It was airing out when we arrived which helped a lot but every time we closed up and left, it still smelled a little smokey when we got back so we had to air out every time. If airbnb guests want to smoke than they should look for those units available instead of ruining it for the next guest. We enjoyed our stay a lot!
This was a spacious home for 6 guests. We enjoyed our stay immensely. It was in a good location for getting to central Salem. The house was appointed with nice things like a Keurig.

Our family really enjoyed staying in such an inviting and comfortable home. We found everything we needed and were very happy to have a safe, clean, and convenient place to stay. Lovely space and outstanding hospitality, we would definitely recommend a stay here at the Ligali’s place.
Ligali's home was clean, comfortable, and perfect for our family of 6.  We will stay again when our next grandchild graduates in 2 years.  Thanks so much
We loved the house!  Very updated home with comfortable beds and the pillows were amazing.  The space was very clean.  We really appreciated the stocked kitchen and the bottled water!
The hospitality given by Ligali was outstanding! Very helpful, making our stay so much easier. Great location, easy to get everywhere!
Legali's home is conveniently located to grocery stores and restaurants. Responses were quick.

Ligali was good about checking in with us during our stay to make sure all was right. The house was very nicely maintained and in a good location. If the occasion arose we would certainly stay there again.

My family definitely enjoyed their stay here. The home is very nice and you can tell it’s been upgraded. Love the size of the kitchen. The bedrooms are a great size and the furniture is very nice as well. The location was great as we were in Salem. Very easy to get to local spots that were recommended. Communication with Ligali was great. Definitely recommend this home. you can tell that Ligali is very focused on making sure that your stay is nothing short of excellent.
This place has everything you will need and more.  Kitchen is fully equipped.  Great location.  Quietband safe neighborhood.

Awesome house - perfect for a small group of friends or family. Super clean, fully stocked with anything you may need (even food in the pantry), and the beds were comfortable too! Would definitely stay here again without a doubt! Ligali was super nice and responsive too, which is an A+ for me!! :)
This place is great and the host was super responsive. Would definitely stay here again!
This home was nice and clean and a great place for our family to stay. It was near places to eat and shop, and Ligali was a friendly and responsive host. I would definitely stay here again!
Clean, everything works, all beds had pillows and blankets/comforters. Great snacks and amenities. I would stay here again

This place was the perfect size and location for our family (max occupancy). Very Clean, spacious and pretty much everything you need is provided. There’s even a BBQ grill out on the deck <3. Ligali responds quickly and is very friendly. We hope to stay here again for our future Oregon trips.
It was clean and cozy! Definitely loved the kitchen.

This house feels like home. It offers so many amenities that make your stay relaxing and stress free. The host is super nice and responds very quickly when contacted. Check in is a breeze and this is a kid friendly place with a fenced in yard, a deck and nice bbq grill all in a nice area.
The house is super clean and Ligali is very accommodating and quick to respond to questions. Great location near many great restaurants and shopping.

I would highly recommend Ligali's AirBnB. The house was clean and very well maintained. Location was quiet. The outdoor area looked very nice. Unfortunately it was a little too cold for us to enjoy it.
Ligali's home was exactly what I needed, a good clean home with everything I needed for a few days away from life's troubles. Close to food, but also secluded enough to feel like a quiet home. A+++

We stayed with my senior dad and our twin one year olds. It's a multigenerational-friendly home. The only steps were at the front door, and it was just a couple. Sensored nightlights in the hall and rooms and few loose items for toddlers to terrorize.

Ligali's place was super clean, spotless and pretty comfortable and uncluttered. Easily accessed without having to communicate with the owner. The home was warned up already when we arrived. It felt thoughtful and like it was arranged for guests instead of feeling like you were staying in someone else's personal home. Quiet at night and squirrels to watch in the backyard.
Two bathrooms and the full kitchen was nice. Once we opened all the curtains and let the daylight in, it felt bigger and even more welcoming.
Really great place to stay: convenient, clean, & quiet! I have stayed in this location multiple times now and will certainly stay again. Very responsive and easy to deal with hosts.
Great hosts, place was just what we needed!

Our family had a wonderful holiday week at Ligali’s place.  It was every bit as nice in real life as in photos on the internet.  The living areas were spacious and we enjoyed meals around the big dining table and played games and watched TV/movies in the living room.  The kitchen is gorgeously redone and extremely well equipped which was a treat for me so I could cook family holiday meals.  The location is quite nice in South Salem - close to downtown,  groceries, the post office, the bank - everything.  Ligali was very helpful with arrangements and always answered my questions quickly.  The beds were very comfortable with lovely linens.  Having two bathrooms was a big plus for a family gathering.  We hope to stay here again when we visit Salem.
Everything was perfect. Very clean home with plenty of amenities. Very close to local businesses i.e. grocery stores, gas stations. I am definitely looking forward to staying here in the future.
Ligalis place was perfectly clean. It was close to restaurants and other things. It’s been remodeled and is super nice. We felt safe with the area and the Ring alarm at the house.
Great place to stay. I stay at this location with some frequency and always recommend it.
Great house. Clean and simple check in. Near a number of restaurants and stores, but still in a nice quiet neighborhood.
Ligali is a great host. The space was tidy, comfortable, and has superb amenities. Highly recommended!
Always a great place to stay. Host is always responsive and easy to work with when needed. This is my favorite Salem spot!
We really enjoyed our stay. The house was amazing and really felt like a home away from home. I will definitely recommend this place.
Ligalis place was beautiful and comfortably housed 5 people. She had the essentials for cooking already, a great backyard area for eating. Thanks for a wonderful stay!

This house was great for us!  Convenient location, quiet neighborhood.  Since a couple of us had bad knees, it was particularly comfortable, since it was all on one floor and the entrance only had a couple of shallow steps.  The kitchen was a delight to use - modern appliances.  The walk-in shower in the utility room was an added bonus!  The main bathroom had plenty of storage for our personal supplies.  The living room was comfortable for us to sit around and talk.  The host was particularly responsive when we had a problem with a kitchen shelf being loose.  I felt it was a comfortable place for a few days.  Since the weather was perfect, we enjoyed sitting on the back deck.  The back yard was private, which was nice.
I very clean beautifully furnished home with air conditioning very comfortable beds and very nice amenities.  I highly recommend staying at Ligali's house!
Wonderful gem with the feeling of being at home. Great communication with host and perfect for our family.
Really clean... exactly as expected. Very nice updates to the home and peaceful back yard. The hosts were super quick to respond to any requests. Had a great stay!
LOVED this place. Extremely clean and comfortable. Host is very attentive and kind. Loved the backyard as well. Will definitely stay again!

Outstanding property!  We used this space for parts of my extended family in town for a high school graduation.  The property was spotless and well-appointed.  The rooms were perfect for three couples and the bathrooms are modern and clean.  We highly recommend it.
Great location, clean place, and all the amenities one could ask for. Would stay here again without hesitation.

We hand an amazing stay here. We were in town for our niece’s 4th Birthday Party. It was just what we needed. Great location close to lots of amenities - restaurants, grocery stores, cafes. The  house was sparkling clean with lots of great touches. Ligali was very friendly and communication was prompt. We’ll definitely come back here again.
A nice place that is close to amenities, and the Enchanted Forest!
Nice place to stay
Nice, clean home. Great backyard for the kids!  Perfect for our needs!

Lovely, comfortable home with ample space to accommodate our family of 6. Nicely remodeled with new kitchen appliances. Thoughtful kitchen touches include an electric tea kettle, large toaster, Keurig, coffee pods, tea, hot cocoa, granola bars, fruit chews, full spice rack. There were ice packs in the freezer which we used to pack our picnic. Nest thermostat provided air conditioned comfort and Ring doorbell provided security. Thick, soft towels were provided and the linens were soft, not scratchy. We would definitely stay again when in the Salem area! Thank you for a wonderful stay, Ligali!
Loved staying here!

My sister, niece and I did a girls trip to the Salem area. We stayed at Ligali’s place for two nights. It was extremely comfortable for the three of us. The house was clean,  quiet;  the beds were comfortable and the kitchen was well stocked with coffee and snacks. Ligali let me know when the cleaners were done so that we could check in before 5 which we appreciated. Several great restaurants are very close by. The Neighborhood was quiet so we all slept well. I would recommend this house and would stay here again.
Very clean updated home. Owner was accommodating on check in time. Very nice to work with. Location was close to everything.
It's a gorgeous and  perfect place to stay.

Ligali's place was great. The house is a great size for 6 and was perfect for our family holiday! Situated in a peaceful area, it's close to shops, restaurants, supermarkets etc. Great size backgarden which we loved for chilling out, plenty of room for the kids to run around and play. Handy with decking area and BBQ. Place was spotless, so clean and the amenities were great!
Ligali was really helpful and made sure to message to see if there was anything we needed and was very quick to respond if we semt a message.
Would definitely recommend.
Thanks for a great stay and we will be back! :)
Newly renovated, well-decorated, close to everything, great amenities, and kid-friendly. Had a pack 'n play and bassinet and toy box with some toys. Everything new and very clean. Nice laundry room.
Very clean and spacious. Great location. We would choose to stay again!
We had another great stay at Ligali's place! Highly recommend if you're looking for a comfortable place in Salem!

This home is one of the best places I have ever stayed.  It is exceptionally clean and modern.  The bathrooms have been updated, the kitchen is stocked for any cooking you would want to do.  The beds are nice and the location is great.  I suggest you look no further if you are going to Salem.  Cheryl
Thank you for a great stay!
Great location to stores. Clean and neat. Bright and sunny space.  Very comfortable

This house is spacious and has a lovely kitchen.  It is nice to have the two bathrooms.  We enjoyed having a nice yard in the back.  It is close to so many stores and restaurants.  The street may seem a little busy, but the house was quiet.  A nice place to stay in Salem.
Beautiful place, will definitely be back soon. Thanks Ligali for hosting me
The place is comfortable to stay at and very clean! Would like to stay again if visiting the same place.
Great hostess, clean, great location! Better the second time around!
I stay in Salem often. This place is among the best. Highly recommended!
Great place and location
Great accommodations for our family visit to Salem. You need for nothing during your stay and the home is very cozy (and clean!). We enjoyed our stay!

This accommodation is so central and so convenient. It is sparkling clean with lovely little touches and a great coffee machine. We were originally booked for 5 nights, but ended up staying 7 just because it was so comfortable. Thanks for your hospitality, Ligali. Highly recommended.

We stayed at Ligali's place for 4 days while visiting family in the area. The layout of the house was perfect for us. The kitchen was large and well equipped, the beds were comfortable and we had everything we needed. Very clean. You do need a car to get around, but the neighborhood was quiet and pleasant.
Ligali’s house was very clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay very much.
Great communication and cute cozy home.
Nicely renovated at a perfect location!
You can expect a very nice nice clean place to stay and relax and enjoy the place

I would highly recommend this house!  It was impeccably clean and was great for a family stay.  Had a very nice kitchen with lots of new appliances and some handy basics in the pantry.  Everything was very comfortable and stylish.
Great house, very close to many shops and restaurants. Everything you need is at the house, and very quick response from hosts.
LOVELY home and great host.  Could use a bit more parking. VERY clean and close to everything. We will be back

We had a pleasant stay in Salem at Ligali's house. Loved the keypad / keyless entry to the house. Close to lots of DoorDash options, quiet neighborhood, nice backyard to sit out on. The water pressure was good and the beds are firm. Thanks!

Nice neat and clean home. Plenty of comfortable beds.
Everything you want or needed is thoughtfully provided.
Very nice home to stay in.
Quiet and peaceful.
Great place in a good spot in South Salem.  Close to everything really.  Comfortable home and lots of thoughtful amenities in place.  Thank you
Niece place that was an easy check in and had everything we needed while staying there. It’s nicely updated and clean. Good location. Close to restaurants.
Super great place to stay. Very cozy, great location and very clean. Maintained very well but mattresses are very very firm.

I wasn't happy with this place. When we walked in the house, had an awful smell. We had to drive to the store to buy Febreeze to spray the whole house. I wasn't able to cook, the pans were dirty and smelled bad. The knifes were oxided or dirty. The shower curtain had pink slime. One of the bed covers had a stain.
One of the bathrooms did not have shampoo and conditioner and I had to go out and buy some, which it was another expense.
The TV, wasn’t working properly and the internet kept turning off and on.

Overall, staying at this place caused an extra expense for my family to eat out instead of cooking as I planned to and wasn’t able to due to dirty and smelly pans.
This place is really nice!
Ligali’s place was sparkling clean! Host’s communication was through and prompt. I definitely recommend this home and would stay here again.
Affordable comfort! This home is in a nice neighbor and has all the necessities. Very clean and the host was so quick to accommodate our stay! I would definitely stay in this home again!

Let me just say the pictures DO NOT do this place justice! Ligali's home was so beautiful, peaceful, clean,cozy and had everything needed! I wish we could have stayed longer! Truly a hidden gem and will be staying again if they will have me! Couldn't have asked for a better home away from home.
Ligali was absolutely wonderful and always responded to my messages quickly. The house was very clean and had everything we needed and more! Great place to stay for large groups and families.

This home was immaculate and very family friendly.  We loved being able to visit Silver Falls State Park from here.  We were a little surprised to see that they request shoe not be worn in the house.  This was hard on our feet after hiking most of the day.  You may want to bring a pair of slippers if you're not used to being on hardwood floors all the time.  We loved having a full kitchen and plenty of space for our entire family.
Great Place!
Nicely updated house with everything we needed, close to great food and coffee options and a wonderful value.
A very family friendly, clean ,  nice airbnb we stayed at this week. The place is just as the pictures describe. The hostess showed us nothing but hospitality & was nice .
Great place to stay at, nice neighborhood and very clean house. We enjoyed our stay!

We came to Salem to drop off our daughter at college.  The house was conveniently located and central to everything we needed.   Even though the house is on an arterial road, it was quiet and comfortable and met our needs.  We had zero issues and communication was great with Ligali!   Would recommend!

Lovely little home that was super clean and quite well stocked with linens, kitchen supplies, bathroom amenities, etc. Gracious hosts were quick to respond (I had a few questions and Ligali responded quickly and was so nice). The house is on an arterial road but noise was not an issue, and the location made it really easy to get out to all of the places that we needed to be. There are tons of close options for food and beverages. Air conditioning was great, very large backyard, and an enjoyable stay. I would recommend this home and would absolutely stay here again!
The house was clean and had everything we needed for our stay.
It’s a really lovely house! Has everything my family and I need! Would definitely come again next time!!
Great spacious rental for a larger group, convenient location that's less than a $10 Uber ride from downtown Salem with well stocked amenities!
We had a nice stay in Salem! Easy to get around and not too far from the downtown area. Comfortable stay with all the kitchen amenities for cooking in. Lovely back porch.
Great check-in process and clear instructions.
The house is very comfortable and in a good location. Everything is nice and clean, and felt like home. It was exactly what we needed.
This was a cute and clean home too stay in. I loved the backyard and the coziness inside!
We really enjoyed our stay here. The Airbnb was very clean, well appointed and well situated. Would definitely stay here again.

Nice home with more than was listed. Well outfitted kitchen and large bathrooms with plenty of towels. A bit of a loud street but expected in Salem.  The small needs we had were quickly attended to. Would recommend.

This home was sooo perfect for my family.  My son plays Basketball for Willamette University and the location was perfect.  The home was so accommodating with all the amenities we needed.  So close to everything.  we would love the opportunity to book again in the future..  Thank you, Thank you Thank you😁😁😁

This home was absolutely perfect. The self checking in was so easy. Every kitchen item we could need to serve our own meals were provided as well as 3 different coffee makers. That was a new one for us. The home was spotless and had upgrades we weren’t expecting. Ligali was the perfect host and we hope to be using this home on our future visits to Salem.
The layout of the house was perfect for our purposes. The kitchen was open and the 2 full baths were awesome.
Very pleasant place and nice for a medium sized family

This was by far the best Airbnb experience we had had so far. The house is lovely. The beds are very comfortable. Lots of hot water and excellent water pressure.

The stove was also wonderful. And I loved how well stocked the kitchen is with all the cooking and pantry things. Pots, pans, etc. It made cooking here a great experience.
The perfect space for our annual work at Salem Health. Well equipped, spacious and great location.
Nice place, good stay, very responsive host. One problem that arose (not the host's fault) was tended to and resolved promptly. Thanks, Ligali.

Everything about this home is really great. Owner are really great. And everything about this beautiful warm cozy home is everything you will expect. Looking forward for next stay in Salem at this beautiful home .

Loved the house and responsive owners! Great location and super clean and well kept. Kitchen was functional and stocked except for salt/pepper. Large frig was a plus for us since we stayed for a week. The only detractor was the traffic noise coming from the road that was pretty constant. This was a busy road near an elementary school. If you're not bothered by road noise, we'd highly recommend Ligali's place. This was the reason it didn't get 5 stars for location.
Great place. Had Exactly what we needed.
Very nice home! Amazing price! Very clean! Will definitely book again!
