The house is as described. Very nice, quite neighborhood. If you forget anything for your trip, stores are very close by with anything to meet your needs!
Excellent kitchen and comfortable living spaces! Close to stores and restaurants.

This was my second stay at Ligali’s home and it couldn’t have been more pleasant. The home was close to our family and all the locations we had to be. The communication was great and the self check-in was very simple. The home was very well decorated and stocked with essentials. I know I’ll be back here in a few months when I visit family again.

We stayed for a weekend. The host's communication was wonderful. I had a few issues and they responded right away and fixed it. I lost a ring and the host took the time to go look for it. That meant a lot. It is on a busy road as others have stated but I couldn't hear any noise when I was sleeping. It was comfortable for a weekend stay.
We had a great few days here. Perfect location for visiting Willamette & Linfield. Will be visiting again when my daughter is a full-time student.
Great accommodations! Was perfect for our trip! Would definitely use this one again!
Lots of room! very well maintained and the location is close to everything you need. I highly recommend this place and would be back again! 10/10
Very comfortable stay nice place great location very pleased with my stay here
The place is exactly what you see on the pics no catfish. Lol everything is nearby, easy and smooth check in. Would totally recommend this place to anyone that is visiting Salem.

We stayed here for 4 days and we loved it. This is close to many restaurants and only 10 minutes from downtown Salem. There were many amenities in the kitchen that made it easy for us to cook and have coffee. Having two bathrooms and washer/dryer was very helpful as well. =D
Wonderful place to stay in the Salem area.
Great stay, kitchen fully stocked with appliances. Safe area, easy communications with host.
Cute house with all the basics.  Good Location, 5 mins Riverfront and center of Salem
Great house in Salem! Perfect for our few day stay.
Great location, was easy to get around town
Cute home with plenty of space for 6 people. Modern appliances and beautiful backyard!

The house was clean and the beds where comfortable.  The AC was fantastic. The house is in a great location that was close to everything (a Starbucks just down the road!).  The neighborhood was quiet and we felt safe.
We had a great time and was perfect for our group.  Thanks for the accommodations.
Another good stay in the Salem area.
This was a nice place to stay and a great kitchen for  making our own meals.
clean and comfortable.  would stay again

This is a great space.  Very quiet. Comfortable and well maintained.  We loved the blackout curtains and large spaces throughout the house and the back area.  Very clean. Easy to find and host was easy to talk to.  Great check in!
We had a great stay! House was as clean and comfortable. The kitchen was well appointed and a nice size. Great location.
Location was great for us. Close to coffee and food as well as the people we were visiting
Easy access to stores freeway and restaurants ac was wonderful
Great place! Highly recommend for anyone wanting to stay in the area.
Beautiful, conveniently located home

Ligali's home was comfortable and spacious. A perfect spot, 10 minutes driving to anything you'd like. We stayed here while getting our kid settled in at the University. We will definitely stay again and highly recommend it
Kitchen had everything we needed for preparing meals, including a great spice rack! Even coffee and tea left for us! Thanks so much!
Comfortable stay. Prompt communication from host. Lovely kitchen.
Ligali’s place was perfect - thanks for a great stay and prompt communication!
Perfect stay for our family! It had everything we needed and was great with kids. Nice neighborhood. Clean and  tidy.
Great stay in Salem. We needed a convenient location between Eugene and Portland and this stay was perfect. Everything was as pictured. Would stay here again if in the area!
Thanks for a great stay in Salem.

Quiet neighborhood and responsive host.
Convenient self check-in. We liked having two full bathrooms and use of the washer and dryer.
Was a nice place to stay!

The beds are old and a bit stiff, the place could also use a fresh coat of paint, and a bit earlier response to my early check in request would have been appreciated. Overall, though, the place was perfect for what we needed it for and we enjoyed the backyard

Our stay here was great! Check in was a breeze. Very spacious for our group.
Also very convenient to all local amenities.
Enjoyed our time at your place.
Thank you for your hospitality! We had a good stay!
This house was clean and uncluttered, yet felt like home.  Clear instructions for check in and check out. Location was just a short drive to many places.
Very clean welcoming home! Highly recommend!
Great location and clean and tidy. Beautiful kitchen. It was the perfect house for our visit to Salem.

Very nice and comfortable home. Host was awesome to work with. Allowed us to check in a little early and provided a Christmas Tree for us.

The home is on a fairly busy street but there is plenty of parking. Beds are comfortable and mattresses are on the firm side. The kitchen is nice with new, well working appliances. Cooking appliances are minimal such as no crock pot, casserole dishes, or strainer.

Overall a 5 star rating as the home was warm and comfort and a great space for family over Christmas.

We stayed here for a week for New Year’s and it was awesome and comfortable. I like to cook and the kitchen is complete with all of the standard kitchen tools that you might need. They even have spices and cooking oil in stock. We just used some and replaced them. We also enjoyed Keurig coffee. The home is secure with Ring lock. My daughter loved the spacious backyard once it stopped raining. Our check-in was seamless. The guests instructions and house rules were very clear. Ligali is very responsive to queries. There’s a washer and dryer for your dirty clothes. There are cleaning supplies to tidy up the place and extra toilet paper and paper towels. It was such a homey stay. Quiet neighborhood and restaurants and coffee shops are close by. Very good deal and excellent stay overall. Definitely recommend! We will book again in our next visit to Salem. Thank you, Ligali. God bless you and your family.
This was a great stay for us and our very active baby. The home is clean and uncluttered which made it safer for our little one who likes to get into everything. We already have a date to come back.
The home Was easy to find and in a quiet neighborhood. There were plenty amenities throughout the home in case you forgot something. Really enjoyed our stay.
Great place to stay for a family.  Very clean and I really appreciate the well stocked kitchen with all of the appliances and cookware you could need.

Home was clean, quiet and comfortable.  Upstairs bedroom was very cozy.  Kristen was very hospitable throughout the stay.  She communicated with me before the stay and made me feel VERY welcome.  The flexible check in time worked very well with my schedule.  I highly recommend Kristen to future prospects.
"Magical!"

What a delight my stay turned out being! It was my first time booking just a room with the owner home, versus booking the entire house. Kristen was warm and welcoming. She made staying there as a single woman feel comfortable and inviting. With the lovely accommodations and the fresh latter each morning, I’ll most definitely be coming back on my next visit to Salem!

This was exactly the place I needed while in town for work! Kristen was so wonderful to meet and have as a host. The room and house were so cozy and felt at home. I slept like a baby!! Kristen was an absolute doll, so friendly too. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay and will be recommending to others!!
This was great for my week in town for work. Conveniently located and Kristen was a really kind, communicative, and generous host! Nifty house too!

The place was super convenient for 70.3 Oregon.  Close to the riverfront and the convention center where Ironman village was. Kristen is super nice. A great host! She has more than 1 room so she can accommodate a group if you book early.
I enjoyed my stay at Kristen’s place, she goes above and beyond to make sure your stay goes well.
Great location and spacious house that can accommodate large groups  nicely laid out

We loved Sheli’s place! It is gorgeous with a stunning view and a fully-stocked, beautiful kitchen. It had everything our very large family desired! Perfect location at the end of a quiet and safe cul de sac. Thank you for having us!
A beautiful home! Very clean, well kept and comfortable. A perfect fit for our large family to stay during our son’s wedding.   Highly recommend

The location of this property is great!  Its a very quite cul-de-sac with lots of nature around.  Only a 5 minute drive to a main street that has tons of restaurants, grocery stores and more.  The house is very comfortable and allows for good gathering spaces and also quite spaces to retreat to.  Highly recommend this home!

Sheli’s house was the ideal place for our extended family of 9. Plenty of space for all of us, and nice touches for our youngest family members (age 5 and 8).

We enjoyed having a lush yard to sit on the patio and relax after attending wedding festivities in Salem.

The kitchen is a lovely place to gather for family meals.

Location is very nice, not too far from town, but on a quiet cul de sac. The yard is gorgeous and well cared for.

We had excellent and timely correspondence with the host. The whole experience was wonderful.

This is a beautiful home located in a quiet area of Salem, OR. We really enjoyed this home, especially a play room and patio to hang out and socialize. Thanks Sheli for hosting.
Hien

Sheli's place is amazing. It feels like a model home with everything you would ever need to be comfortable. It was perfect for our large family group, plenty of open space to gather, yet still able to find a quiet corner if needed.
Sheli is quick to respond and so accommodating. We traveled with a toddler and Sheli offered everything needed, a highchair, play-n-pack, toys, even chubby books!
I would rebook in a heartbeat without a second thought. The only disappointment? It was over way to fast!!
Amazing house! Quick response and very accommodating of a large group!

Sheli’s place was perfect for our group and she was a gracious host.  Sheli was communicative leading up/during the entire visit and the house was clean and as described.  Would recommend to everyone!

Sheli's home is large, super comfortable, and sparkling clean. It was just perfect for our group of 10, and we enjoyed the welcoming little notes and personal touches that made it feel very special. It was also great to have a large kitchen and dining area for having breakfast together as a group in the mornings.
Beautiful home, Sheli has made everything perfect to make her guests feel welcome and comfortable in her home.
The host was very responsive and the house is beautiful and accommodated all of our guests perfectly.
Excelent house

Immaculate home!  Sheli's place was very clean, well decorated, and had everything we needed for our stay.  Home is well laid out with little details to make a stay away from home comfortable and enjoyable.   Home is in a nice, quiet, safe neighborhood.   Sheli was very quick to respond to all communications and help in any way she could.   We will definitely stay there again if we are in the neighborhood in the future.
This was a great home with many nice touches and amenities!  Our family had a wonderful time here together! Sheli was a very responsive and gracious host!

The home is beautiful in a quite neighborhood with a lovely view outside on the back deck. I spent every morning on the deck drinking my morning coffee and enjoying the morning breeze. I highly recommend this property.
House lived up to expectations. Great location. Very clean and good value. We had three families for the weekend and there was plenty of room for all.
The house was amazing and clean. Tons of room for the whole family, quiet spaces if anyone needed to get away for a break. Highly recommend.
A very quiet, spacious comfortable place.  3 couples with plenty of room and fun at the pool table.  Nice amenities and happy to see coffee stocked in the kitchen.

My family and I used this home as a homebase for the weekend of my wedding. It was perfect for our needs. Quiet, and close to everything in south salem. We couldn't have found a better spot or a more hospitable host. Would definitely recommend to others.

We had a wonderful time at Sheli’s place! It was the perfect amount of space for our large family and had everything we needed. The soft new carpet was so comfortable. Sheli was very accommodating and communicative.

Had a great stay at this home. We were in the area for a basketball tournament and the stay was made so easy here. The kids loved the entertainment room but especially the ping pong table! If we ever come back to Salem for a tournament this is gonna be my first choice to stay.

Great 2 story home.  Very clean and spacious.  Our softball team stayed here for a tournament,  and with 10 people there was room to spare.  Highly recommend this rental.  We will try to book it again next time we play in Salem.

Shell’s home was PERFECT! We stayed here for our wedding weekend and it was everything we expected and more! The communication was fast & easy and Sheli was so accommodating! I would recommend her to anyone!

We had a wonderful Labor Day weekend at Sheli's place. House was extremely spacious and comfortable, and Sheli left nice touches to make us feel very welcomed. Check in and check out process was extremely easy and Sheli was great with communication.

A wonderful home with everything you could want for a perfect stay in Oregon. We were able to maximize our family time by staying together. The kitchen has all the comforts of home with the breville coffee and a vitamix. The kids loved the gameroom. The layout of the home is nice many together spaces yet you could still enjoy a nap in the bedrooms undisturbed. Shelli even set out baby monitors, highchair and a play pen to make our time together with the babes safe and relaxing. Thank you again for your hospitality.
Sincerely,
Rebekah Doyle

Sheli’s home is located in a well maintained, quiet neighborhood with yummy wild blackberries growing across the street. We used this as a home base for out of town family attending our daughters wedding in July.  The home is set up with everything you’ll need plus more with personal touches throughout that make you feel at home. The few days after wedding we spent relaxing out on deck enjoying the views of very well maintained garden on comfortable “like new” outdoor furniture feeling like we’re at a 5-star resort. We would highly recommend!

This place was absolutely amazing. All our family fit comfortably and it was so cozy. The kitchen had everything we needed to make the large breakfasts we needed. The neighborhood was definitely quite and being at the end of the cul-de-sac reduced any street noise. I just can’t say enough good things about this place. Anyone with a large family or just needs space should definitely stay here.
Excellent all around, location was great, house was beautiful and host is a great communicator. Highly recommend!!

Beautiful house! We loved being able to eat outside on the patio! The kids loved all the toys they discovered at the house and we definitely appreciated the pack and play that Sheli left out for us. I would suggest for anyone bringing littles to bring a baby gate for the top of the stairs. The only complaint that I have is that there were no bath washcloths in the house but other than that it was a great stay.

A very clean and comfortable home with all the amenities we needed. The host was gracious and helpful, and the house was a perfect fit for family and friends to gather. There are nice parks and easy walking streets/trails nearby, and it’s a beautiful neighborhood. Highly recommended!
Overall a lovely place to stay.

We had a group of 8 family and friends staying at the house, and the house accommodated all of us very nicely.  Beautiful clean, comfortable house with a great deck for gathering.  Many thoughtful amenities provided by host. Ping pong table in the game room was a huge hit. Communication was great. Definitely highly recommend.
This house is beautiful and tranquil. Comfy beds and all the living spaces were wonderful. Definitely enjoyed our stay.
Absolutely amazing! We could not have been happier. Exceedingly beautiful, clean,  well appointed, delightful home.

Poor communication skills. Last minute checkout due to miss understanding. Take before and after videos and picture because the house is still full of owner belongings in the cabinet in case anything goes missing.  Don’t feel like an Airbnb. Ruin my family reunion due to a misunderstanding and a last minute checkout. Don’t even wanna give us time to pack up. Everything was a last minute.

Great house and location.  Everyone love the patio. The espresso machine was a huge hit!    Sheli was a wonderful host and communicated well.   My friends and I were there for a race.   We would definitely go back
We were in Salem area for a family wedding. House was perfect, we could have bedded 4 more people. The yard is spectacular.

This was our second stay at this beautiful home. While a little on the pricier side it fit our needs wonderfully. There are fantastic amenities such as the fire pit table outside and a breville expresso maker in the kitchen. We also made use of the kids toys for our toddlers and the many rooms for our extended families to sleep in.

The home is very beautiful & spacious. We had a group of people where some could be in the game room, others on the deck, the kitchen/living room area or just relax in their bedroom.

The home, location and neighborhood worked out perfectly.
Nice host, and nice location for eclipse viewing
Charming, clean, well-located   near downtown Salem. Kind and comgenial management.

Kristen the host was outstanding, gracious, friendly, helpful and very accommodating. The location was fantastic. The accommodations were beautifully decorated. The rooms were charming and extremely comfortable. I highly recommend it. My experience was great!
Kristen’s home is lovely and she’s a wonderful host

Stayed with Elizabeth during the eclipse, and she was an absolutely fabulous host.  Before checkin, she was extremely communicative.  After checkin (even though it wasn't advertised), she prepared a lovely dinner and breakfast for us.  My room was large and clean and comfortable, with a king size bed, desk, wifi, and towels.  The shared bathroom was also large and clean and came with shampoo, conditioner and body wash.  Didn't get to use it, but there was also a nice looking pool!

This house is a wonderful place to stay. Close to everything, the host was amazing the rooms were beautiful, clean and lots of thoughtful touches. A wonderful place to take kids as there is a beautiful backyard to explore.

Elizabeth is a great host and her place is truly a home. She offers many amenities and little touches I have not experienced with other bookings, including an invite to a home cooked breakfast, personal toiletries, beverages and snacks!
Very cozy and beautiful place! Amazing prices as well. I highly recommend staying here if you’re needing a place in Salem, OR. Went above and beyond my expectations.
Best Air Bnb to stay in Salem by far. Definitely recommend staying here!

Just a wonderfully maintained and beautiful BNB. Great communication and amenities. Just perfect....

Very clean, cozy, access to restaurants and shopping. A great place to stay. We will go back for sure!
This was a great experience! Host was flexible and easy to work with!

Elizabeth’s place has it all and for a great price!! She was super fast at responding and very friendly! King bed was soft and comfy! Hot tub and pool look amazing so we definitely plan on coming back in the summer time!

Elizabeth has a beautiful home in a tranquil setting but within easy walking distance of several eating establishments.   Everything was clean, communication and check-in were rapid and efficient.  I would strongly recommend staying with Elizabeth.
Great
Great place and host!! Beautiful property and house. Loved the hot tub!
Beautiful place
So great, bed was so comfortable and access was so easy. Everything was perfect and as described. Even with covid, felt so at ease and homely. Would definitely stay again!

The hosts were very pleasant and even did a complimentary load of laundry for me.
The room was quite cozy and had all the amenities I could think of from toiletries, water, wine and snacks, mini fridge, microwave, plates, mugs, silverware and fast WiFi. I definitely stay here again!
Elizabeth’s place is the home away from home. Very nice house in an area that’s so close to a lot of stores. Highly recommended.
Elizabeth has amazing everything. I felt valued and for the price I got an absolutely amazing experience. Anytime we are in Salem, we will try to stay again!
Wonderful location, accommodation, and value; beautiful house and grounds. Snacks, great amenities, and a wonderful host.

Dear travelers,
If you are passing through Salem, Oregon, make plans to stay in this timeless place. As you drive up the well marked driveway a safe and warm energy embrace your arrival. Plan to arrive an hour before sunset, this way you will see the details of the house in the shadow casted by the sun. Leave your work and worries outside, because the second you step inside the panoramic view will take your breath away. The beauty is in the details, each inch of the house has a personal touch. This magical place is suited for business travelers and couples longing to reconnect their youthful love.
Yours truly, Traveling Salesman

Look no further. Elizabeth's place was far beyond my expectations. She was quick to respond to my questions and before meeting her I felt welcomed which was important for my long term stay as a guest who has never been to Oregon before. She is incredibly organized and clean and offers the little things like food and forgotten toiletries that are essential for traveling. She has welcomed me to family get togethers and dinners and I feel like part of the family. Her home offers more than just a room, but a great experience:) Highly recommend!

Beautiful place! I was charmed by the exterior and interior. Additionally, the host really goes all the way in stocking the bathroom and bedroom with necessary supplies. For a traveler on the road, this was much appreciated!
The best!
Clean and comfy! There isn’t a single thing i wasn’t impressed by! Complimentary snacks, huge drive way with plenty of parking, beautiful home, and a so so clean! Cannot recommend this place enough!
Very very clean, and the amenities provided by Elizabeth are more than what’s usually offered at hotels lol, thank you Elizabeth!
What a beautiful place! Elizabeth was a great host. Would definitely recommend it!
Loved our stay! Host was very quick to respond when communicating prior to our stay, greeted us on arrival and was a very welcoming host. I would stay again and recommend to anyone!
This is one of favorite Airbnb stays..... the house has a welcoming feel, the rooms are beautiful and clean, and Elizabeth goes the extra mile for your comfort.
Elizabeth’s house is beautiful and cozy. She was incredibly welcoming and the room was great. I’d love to come back next time I’m in the area.
Beyond pleasant, great amenities and blissfully comfortable atmosphere
Nice place. Quiet. Quick response to any questions. Would stay again
Great place
Peacock room one of my favorites! Thank you Elizabeth for being so accommodating and helpful as always. Vista Manor is the best!
I’ve stayed at Elizabeth’s twice now and I absolutely love staying there. The rooms are gorgeous and comfortable, the grounds are stunning. I can’t recommend it enough.

We stayed in the cozy butterfly room. A lovely view from the many windows. This room reminded us very much of staying in Scottish BnB homes! The host is warm & welcoming and provides many extra touches like snacks and waters.  Would definitely recommend. Women traveling alone will feel very safe here.
nice, clean, beautiful house. caring and kind hostess. lovely experience. 5 stars
Room was clean, and the location was perfect! Had a great stay!
Lovely, lovely home - Elizabeth has thought of just about everything a traveler could want or need. This place is a true treasure.
Our room was very nice and cute. The house was really pretty too. They put up the Christmas decorations. The host is very helpful and kind. Definitely recommend.
Beautiful home, kind and communicative host. Would absolutely stay here again.
Lovely place to stay. It’s beautiful and the host is warm and inviting. Was conveniently located near a bus stop which made it easy to get downtown. Great place to stay if you find yourself in Salem.

Elizabeth hosts a wonderful residence. I have no complaints. Everything was just as described and I had everything I would have needed. Elizabeth was always on top of communication and a delight to talk to. I will always look to see if her listing is available first in all my future Salem travels!

This place was great, the room was very cozy with helpful instructions. The mattress was very soft, but if you are a light sleeper the bed is creaky, so be aware of that. There were several personal touches like breakfast fruit and sweet breads. The bathroom is shared as mentioned in the description, with many extra toiletries for use. The house is charming and was decorated for Christmas while we were there! Elizabeth was very responsive and a helpful host. Great location in south Salem as well!
AN immaculate, beautiful house.
Always a great stay! Comfy bed and pillows with quality linens, fresh towels, Keurig in room with mini fridge and microwave. Very accommodating and responsive.
Great experience. It was a very cozy room with an incredibly easy check-in/out. In a nice location in town, this place is an fantastic value.
Always an excellent stay. Feels like home away from home.

We had such a wonderful stay at Elizabeth’s! Everything was clean and VERY well stocked, Elizabeth was a friendly host. The location was convenient to the downtown areas. We didn’t have a car and enjoyed the ~hour walk through lovely neighborhoods and parks to get to restaurants and things to do. Would definitely stay again!

I was lucky enough to stay in Room 3, king with a nice bank of windows.  Elizabeth is a marvelous host, and although the shared bathroom is downstairs, it's very well appointed.  Be sure to enjoy the fresh fruit, pastries and coffee that's available and of course make sure to check out "The Book" a very detailed guide to the local neighborhood, the city and all of the necessary details for your stay.

The bathroom situation was a no go for me !! It was downstairs so 3 times in middle of  night get dressed go down creeky stairs !  Im a light sleeper so i could hear the other 3 rooms come and go !!  Also didnt like when i go down stairs to go bathroom or shower i had to leave my room unlocked… keys, money, laptop etc !!! Its a NO GO. For me !!
Great place to stay! I stayed in the Butterfly Room, king bed, sitting area, very comfortable! Very nice and safe area.  Hostess so easy to work with.  Great rate! I will definitely stay here again.
Elizabeth was amazing and she made our stay the best in the places we stayed during our tour in the Oregon state.
Beautiful room with delicious homemade breakfast!
It was one of the best stay we ever had! So cosy, so uncomplicated! I would give it a 6 star rating if I could. Would love, love, love to come back one day!

This is an absolutely darling little boarding house! The room was large and comfortable, and well stocked with all kinds of thoughtful little extras. The bathroom being downstairs really isn't a big deal unless you're faced with mobility issues. The rooms are by no means soundproof, but the other guests were quiet and respectful for the most part when I was there. Elizabeth was a responsive host and a pleasure to book with, answered all of my questions and I have no doubt she would be attentive to any needs that may come up. While this is a pet friendly BnB, the yard is home to chickens ducks and a rabbit so probably not the best place to relieve a dog. Elizabeth did point us to a nearby park, though, that was a nice place to walk them. Would absolutely book this room again!
The home made pastry snacks are very yummy, different each time.
Clean, cute and easy check-in!
Great, quiet place with fresh homemade treats.

The Vista Manor is a beautiful, warm and friendly vintage designed AirBnB nicely located in Salem Oregon. Elizabeth is kind, caring thoughtful and her Manor is very accommodating. She and her staff are very helpful.
I stayed there for almost month and would so again if ever needed.
Perfect value, comfy

my goodness! the reviews pretty much nail this one on the head. not quite sound proof but that is never a problem for me but may be for others. The home is so clean, beautiful and packed with anything you would need. only thing I didn't see coming is not having access to the kitchen but if you don't bring a bunch of foods to cook on an oven top and bring things like frozen pizzas, packaged oatmeal, or box/microwavable hot cereals, etc you'll find she has everything you need to prepare it. and you can pair it with any baked goods she makes and keep well stocked. in fact everything is well stocked. location is amazing and close to everything you need. love the bath downstairs! big tub for bath lovers. and a heater inside to keepthe space warm for you when you get out. the house is so big and beautiful and she's a great host. very polite and quick to respond to any concerns or questions. would recommend 10/10
Beautiful historic home.  Very clean and comfortable.  Close to stores and restaurants.  Elizabeth is a great host that makes sure you have a good experience in her home.
Thank for being such a great host.
I travel to Salem quite a bit and always look for a place to stay here. Great host and great location!
I loved my stay in the butterfly room! The home was lovely and the room was easy to find.  There were even fresh flowers on the desk to greet me.
We loved our stay at Elizabeth’s ! The room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable! Amenities were very nice. Elizabeth is a great host.
Great location close to everything.  Place is clean and quiet.  Check in is easy and plenty of parking spaces onsite.
Everything was great. Wonderful place to spend the night on your journey.

Stayed here for 2 weeks while our place was being worked on. We both enjoyed our stay. The house has a B and B vibe and feel and we felt really comfy. Our host, Elizabeth, is a lovely woman and an outstanding host. She's very attentive to her guests and so easy to communicate with. Should we ever need a nice, clean place to stay at while here in Salem, this will be the first place we check.

This is a great place to stay! Everything was so clean, Elizabeth was super friendly, and the house and grounds were pretty. :) We loved having the mini fridge and microwave! Only thing is sound - you can definitely hear the people (and their phones) in the room next to you. Didn't bother us though, everyone was respectful!
Great communication and service as usual! Will try to stay here again next time I’m in the area!
what a cool place.

Elizabeth provides a wonderful experience in her lovely home. We stayed in the Butterfly room and it was full of charm. As soon as we stepped into the home it felt like we stepped back in time. The bathroom was clean, the room was clean and if felt welcoming as soon as we drove up the driveway.

The room also came with a continental breakfast and coffee. The coffee was good especially with the loaf cake and fruit. The bathroom had thick fluffy towels which made the ABnB feel like home. The bed is comfortable and with the butterfly artwork throughout the room it gave us the ability to lie back and relax.

We will definitely go back to experience the area of Salem in the Summer and stay at Vista Manor.

Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a calm, relaxing, cozy, and nice place to stay! Rooms are all super clean and cute, hosts are super responsive and helpfulness, and I’d definitely stay there again!
Beautiful old house and garden. Plenty of useful items in case you have run out or forgotten. Great information about local places.
Perfect spot for this Grandma's visit. A comfortable home in a safe neighborhood, it felt like visiting family.
Fantastic amenities

This is a good location if you have a student you are visiting at Corban University especially if he or she plays soccer : )  It is very close to the train station and the Williamette University athletic fields.
Everything was lovely. Didn’t know there was a hot tub but I don’t think it was up and running
Great spot. Host was very sweet and they had amazing homemade bread greeting you in the public area. Room was themed and cute. Very nice property.
Very clean, cozy and conveniently located. Beautiful home with all of the amenities you need for a comfortable night. The king size bed sleeps amazing. The host provided fresh fruit and water too.
Exactly as expected. Clean space, easy check-in, and great value. I appreciated having a key for my door for some extra security too, and helpful amenities made the stay even better.

Beautiful historical home in beautiful neighborhood. All the comforts of home. Walking distance from restaurants. built in pool and hot tub in the a beautiful backyard but could not enjoy since I was there in the off season. All the comforts of home. If you have cat or dog allergies this may not  be the home for you although I never saw the cats or dog but I could smell them.
The house is super cozy and comfortable. Close to the central as well . Would love to book again next time .

What a perfect place to be!
I stayed in the butterfly room during my stay passing through Salem to Portland. Even though my stay was short, it was perfect! Such a comfortable bed and room. Really made me feel at peace during my stay. If only I could stay here during the summer! I got a sneak peek of the backyard and was tempted to dip into the pool! (:
If you are passing through Salem, I HIGHLY recommend staying here. Elizabeth was quite the accommodating host and the place itself felt so magical. I’m hoping to book a stay here again soon!
We loved our stay. It was close to everything yet set back on a nice acre lot of peace and privacy.  The host was wonderful.  We would definitely come again if we can find a vacancy.

Elizabeth’s house was beautiful and adorably decorated for Easter. My only disappointment was that the private bathroom was not on the same floor as my room (butterfly room). Everything else was perfection.

Elizabeth really makes sure you have what you need. She was a very clear and prompt communicator as well. Loved the room themes and nostalgia of a 1930’s home. Glad I had the opportunity to stay here!

This is a great place to stay and it’s super clean , all the amenities are wonderful and the yard is beautiful.
I stayed in room three and the bed was extremely comfortable and soft.
beautiful and wonderful stay!
Host was great and attentive, I enjoyed my stay
Awesome stay. Beautiful house and a super nice host.
Great place to stay. Clean and beautiful.
Great location and very nice place. Beautiful flowers. Host provided for a hassle free experience.

Would highly recommend this place! It’s a beautiful big home with fresh tulips everywhere. Very close to downtown. Very accommodating and gives thorough instructions. Will stay here again whenever I visit Salem.

Elizabeth’s house is beautiful and wonderfully decorated. She really goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable. She had quick response to all my last minute questions! Would definitely stay here again!
If you’re heading to Salem you definitely want to stay here! It is always a special treat! Beautiful home especially this time of year hundreds of tulips!
Professional, clean, thoughtful host.

This is the most luxurious AirBnB we have ever stayed in. We could not believe all the treats and goodies that were offered by the host without any extra charge. If we will ever be in this area again, we will book this place and only this place again! The front yard was covered in several hundred tulips. WE LOVED IT!!! Thank you so much!
Beautiful room with lots of natural light. Elizabeth has stocked up on anything you may need or have forgotten. Would 100% stay again.
Great place! Super clean!

This was such a great place to stay. Elizabeth provides everything you need before you realize you need it. She also adds lots of smaller, thoughtful amenities to really bring it to the next level. The space is clean and beautiful, and Elizabeth is a quick, clear communicator. Would definitely stay again!

Elizabeth has created a magical retreat for her guests… no matter if you are staying for a day or a month!! It couldn’t be better.

She is easy to communicate with and she makes every part of your stay special!!

This is by far the best value on Airbnb!

I highly recommend Elizabeth’s home to all guests!
Beautiful place. Loved all the tulips in spring. Easy check in and good communication.

This house is adorable! Great location, nicely decorated, and the bed was so comfy. The bathroom being downstairs wasn't a problem but we did get a bit self conscious we would wake up other guests if we had to use the restroom at night. Very clean, and the host is very thoughtful! Will be staying here again
Very historic Tudor.   loved the house.
Great stay! Antique house!
Excellent place to stay in Salem, wonderful host and a wonderful stay :)
Great

If you're looking for comfort and serenity, this is your place! Elizabeth offers beautiful "themed" rooms, and her thoughtful "extras" and attention to detail are beyond expectation. You can even roam around among the flowers and greenery . . . just so special in every way!
A & MB
Our stay was comfortable

This is a quaint, old BnB which has its charm. Elizabeth equips you with many thoughtful touches in terms of snacks and amenities. We were grateful for our “white noise” machine because with 4 rooms close together, old doors and uncarpeted stairs, there is a certain amount of noise from other rooms. Charming place and area… great value!
Very nice room, comfortable bed, everything was very clean and well organized. Host was friendly and communicative. Highly recommended.

This is my second time staying at Elizabeth's lovely home. Elizabeth is so attentive and communicative and always makes me feel so comfortable. Her home is so special with so many sweet details, from the decor to the water and fruits left out for guests. Highly recommend!

I saw two of Elizabeth's rooms. The first was after she accepted my reservation and placed me into this beautiful en-suite and grand room with a beautiful king bed,  lovely bathroom, in room m/w, fridge/coffee maker/fruit/snacks etc and a large closet with an additional bed. I had laid out my belongings, prepared the bed for sleep, made the bath ready for a long needed soak after driving from Connecticut over the course of 4 days (almost 3600 miles!), and was just getting ready to disrobe in the bathroom when Elizabeth knocked on the door, came in and told me I had to move to the other room because someone else had just reserved it in the last 5 minutes and were on their way! Of course, as a super host myself, I knew she had to accept the reservation, send the party her address and that the folks could not have just shown up without her express permission, so her excuse was not an honest one.  She then came in and started gathering my stuff to move me into the second room. The 2nd room was 1/3 the size and the bath was on the first floor (room was on the second floor). The coffee maker was ancient and leaked all over when I tried to use it the next day.  The room was nice, the bed was comfortable and I was too completely exhauseted to argue. She kept saying "I tried to do a nice thing", but the truth is that she wanted to get more money and had no qualms booting me and my things out of the first room into the second and lying about it. Having explained that, the big room is lovely and worth every penny. The butterfly (second room) is tiny (but had a big TV/fan/lovely windows) and there is little room to move around, but the bed is very comfortable. It is a bit of hassle to go down the stairs in the middle of the night if you have to use the ladies room and might not work well if you do not want to run up the stairs after a bath/shower in a robe, have kids or any problems going up and downstairs.  Could have been the best stay ever, ended up being OK.
Great location right on Mill Creek.  Historic and very cute home.  Close to town and walkable to downtown if you don’t mind about a 1 mile walk.  We very much enjoyed our stay here.

Really beautiful, recently updated historic home. House is extremely clean and well appointed throughout. Back patio has a BBQ (which we did not use). Would be a great place to hang out, eat, BBQ right on the river. Didn't spend much time in the house (at a training all week), but seemed very cozy.
The host canceled this reservation 104 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 91 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We loved this beautiful gem of a house!
Fresh fruits and ingredients to make waffles were thoughtfully provided by the host.

Beautiful house! Very clean! Our only feedback to improve would be that the house decor is not very kid friendly with lots of extra decorations everywhere, glass furniture and no option for a high chair. It felt a bit tight navigating around everything with a child. We could not get the tv to work even by following the host directions.
But the location is great with a clean, small park 800 ft away that has a good playground.

This is such a beautiful home. We loved our time here. The creek is beautiful, but definitely watch pets and little ones like the listing says. The home is so lovely with gorgeous views and great ambiance. It had everything we needed and more. Would definitely stay here again.

What a wonderful find in beautiful Salem.  Beautiful home. It has everything you could possibly want. The location is fabulous right on the creek. Super quiet and beautiful old neighborhood. Perfect for our visit to Willamette for Family Weekend. Thank you again.
Good to have there, nice accommodation. So calm and peaceful environment

Private room, clean, quiet, relaxing and comfortable. Quick to get downtown and easy 10 minute walk to beautiful Bush park for some exercise. Host is quick to help and responsive to requests and suggestions.
Very nice place and nice people.
Perfect
Its a nice place cosy and comfortable. The hosts are amazing definately recomend staying here
Fantastic space, extremely comfortable bed, clean and welcoming.  Also very flexible and quick in responding.  Would recommend to all!
Evelyn was very welcoming and friendly! Nice room with a desk, Keurig, oatmeal, and plenty of linens. I stayed for 3 months due to having a rotation nearby for college, and this was perfect!
Everything was great. Room and bathroom were clean with lots of amenities and Evelyn was an attentive host!

Evelyn was just great. She was very accommodating on check in and check out. She would always respond in a timely manner. You have a private room in the basement. Evelyn’s sister also lives in the basement but has her half blocked off and keeps to herself so don’t let that worry you. Evelyn also has some oatmeal packets, Keurig cups for coffee, and tea packets. She has all of the basic ammentities (towels, sheets, soap, shampoo, etc) and even has a small fan and mini space heater. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable place close to town. Thanks again Evelyn!
My first experience of Salem was wonderful and very hospitable thanks to Evelyn. I needed a place to stay while my apartment was getting ready and her home was incredibly comfortable.
Great place to stay for the money. Very friendly host. Very quiet which was great and it was very clean. Great trip.
Nice private room in good central location near downtown Salem. Good host, good  amenities in-room  and comfortable bed. A+

I stayed with Evelyn for 2 weeks. She has a lovely home with a beautiful back yard and porch. The room is clean, bed is super comfortable, loved the rocker/ottoman and the amenities like a Kuerig coffee maker, private frig and microwave. Desk and tv in room with Netflix also make for a very pleasant stay. Evelyn is a quiet and very nice lady.

This was a quiet and comfortable room to stay in with nice amenities such as a microwave and keurig. The shared bathroom was never an issue and when I needed to use the kitchen it was available. Evelyn was very nice upon meeting and throughout my stay.

Evelyn was an accommodating host who stayed up late into the night to receive me after I flew into Portland. Her home is located in a quiet part of town, but it’s also just a few minutes away from downtown, good food and the state Capitol. The bed was comfortable and the room was well kept. If I find myself in Salem again I’ll be staying here again.

You can expect a quiet, clean space with a gorgeous backyard. The location was absolutely amazing, on a quiet street with an entire walking track located across the street. It was everything I needed.
Amazing house,beautiful garden and Evelyn is really sweet!Thanks again!

This was a stellar place to stay. Evelyn was deeply hospitable and provided a phenomenal place to stay for two months. The room and common area were clean, spacious, and well-supplied. Its proximity to multiple bus routes makes the location ideal for anyone wanting to explore the area, and there's a lot right nearby the house. Evelyn always respected guests' privacy and was always there to provide any information and good conversation. I will greatly miss being there and will be sure to return whenever I revisit the area!

Evelyn and her cohost were so sweet. Only saw each of them once or twice during the 5 nights I stayed but they were very prompt to respond to messages if I needed anything. Very comfortable bed with plenty of blankets and pillows. The bathroom is shared but there was only one time it was occupied when I needed it :). I only saw the lady staying in the other room one time while making coffee in the Keurig, and the rooms don’t have shared walls. Excellent value and just what I was looking for. Would definitely stay again if I was in the area.

Evelyn was so nice and accommodating. The downstairs area is very large and includes a kitchen area, dining area, washer and dryer, and bathroom. My room was great - probably the most comfortable bed that I've ever slept on. I was here for almost two weeks and really enjoyed my stay. Thank you Evelyn!
Amazing stay! Very clean space, quiet neighborhood, and very nice hosts! Highly recommend.

I was very fortunate to stumble upon this gem. While we are each unique  in our desires I would happily prefer staying at Evelyn's over the Plaza Hotel or the Breakers in Palm Beach. Why you may ask? Each turn of a towel, folded sheet or fluffed pillow is done with the type of care that only comes with proprietorship. While a rating of AAAAA may ensure it's all booked up and I'll never get to stay again it certainly deserves it. What a treat!

The stay was spacious, quiet, and provided great amenities. Perfect place to relax and its location is close to good food. Evelyn was a wonderful host. She gave a clear introduction to the stay and was quick to respond to any questions.
Great host. Private room to myself. Will return if I'm ever in the area again.
Very pleasant place to stay. Would definitely return.

I highly recommend Don & Karen's home in south east Salem! They have gone more than the extra mile in making sure that their guests are comfortable!

I spent 3 weeks in their home. My room was very attractive and perfectly appointed with a comfortable bed and pillows, ample closet space, a chest of drawers and a desk which was perfect for my laptop. It also had a comfortable armchairs and plenty of pillows if I wanted to read in bed! The bathroom was spacious and comfortable with a great shower/tub combo, immediate hot water and plenty of space for my personal items. The kitchen had everything I needed to cook my own meals. There is a Safeway and a Walmart 1/2 miles away.

Since I didn't have a car, the extra bonus for me was the bus stop for bus line #6 which was 2/10ths of a mile away. I frequently used it to go to my daughter's house. Of alI the comforts in their home, I wasn't expecting to be so conveniently located to precisely the bus routes I needed to visit my daughter and to go downtown! Bus line #21 gets you downtown in 20 minutes traveling all along Commercial St which is the main thoroughfare in southeast Salem. That stop is 1/2 a mile away.

Karen and Don are very thoughtful and ensured I had space in the pantry and a small fridge to store my food items. But best of all was their friendly and warm, easy-going hospitality! I highly recommend staying in their home in southeast Salem!

Don and Karen are one of the most amazing people I’ve ever met. This was my first AirBnB experience and they showed me first class hospitality. They went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable and further helped me out with my accommodation needs.
Wonderful hosts with a beautiful home that is about 5mins drive to almost everything you’ll need to be comfortable! I’m very happy with my experience. God bless!
Don and Karen are really nice hosts, great place to stay!
These guys were really great. Super helpful and friendly. But made sure to give you plenty of space. Very comfortable and clean room and bathroom. Would for sure recommend!
Very lovely home and wonderful hospitality.

Don and Karen were the best hosts I could've asked for during my 6 week stay. They were so accommodating with all my requests and made sure all of my questions were answered. The rooms have all you need, the bathroom is spacious, and the house is sparkling clean at all times. The house was always calm and relaxing, easy to come home to after a long day. Their dog is also such a sweetheart on top of it all. They basically became like family at the end of it all! Would definitely recommend anyone coming through Salem to stay here!
They’re really great people. They’re friendly, but they also give you space. They have the sweetest dog I have ever met!! They provide so many things, and they really go above and beyond!

Don and Karen’s home was the perfect place for me to stay while travelling for work. The room was cozy and comfortable, the bathroom was always clean, I had my own fridge, and their dog is the absolute sweetest. They even invited me along to their holiday get togethers when I wasn’t able to travel home to see family.

I stayed with Don and Karen for 2 months for a physical therapy school clinical rotation. It was a great stay! They were very friendly, hospitable, and welcoming. Their house is in a great location for commuting around the area- close to hikes, parks, local businesses, you name it. They would offer me tips and recommendations for things around the area which was very helpful. I was able to have my own space and be able to visit/interact as well. The house is always very clean and the room is a cool space with a desk for if you need to do work. I would join in on family Catan nights which was always fun. Highly recommend!
Don and Karen are amazing hosts! I would suggest this to any graduate student or travel nurse looking to stay in the area. The house and room are very welcoming and their dog is the best!
Don and Karen are great hosts. I would recommend this stay to any other students looking for a place for a rotation!

I am so thankful to have found this listing! It is what made my trip up to Oregon possible. The perfect spot for any student on clinical/travel nurse. The space is clean and I am so happy to have found a space where I feel safe. They’ve been so accommodating - even so far as making sure there’s enough room in the pantry and room for groceries.  10/10

I feel so lucky to have stumbled upon Don and Karen’s Airbnb for my long term stay while I finish up some schooling. It’s been a home away from home and I wouldn’t have wanted to stay anywhere else! So many good conversations and laughs! Their dog, Zona, is the sweetest pup and is the cherry on top of a wonderful stay.

There’s been so many things that they’ve gone above on, but just to name a few: Don drove to help me fix a flat tire on a Saturday morning and then stayed with me when some men asked if I could jump their car; Karen drove me to Portland for a medical procedure and then stayed to drive me back to Salem; and Karen also got up at 3am to drive me to Portland for a 6am flight. They’re absolutely incredible and some of the best people you’ll meet!
Awesome family and zona is a peach once she gets use to you .

First and foremost, Emily and Ian are the nicest couple. They greeted us into their home and made us feel right at home. Not to be overlooked is their wonderfully decorated home with historical, cultural, and fun art pieces throughout; I found myself lost in the some pieces as I admired the artifacts. The accommodation exceeded our expectations in every way. We were only passing by for one night on our way home, but we would have loved to stay longer. Hopefully next time. Thanks for welcoming us into your lovely home and for a wonderful stay.
Emily and Ian were very hospitable hosts, very easy and quick communication and I felt very welcome. The bedroom is very comfortable and the cats are friendly.

We were very happy with our stay! The hosts were friendly and answered our emails quickly.   We slept soundly in the comfortable queen bed.  The bedroom/private bath were clean and stocked with toiletries for those who might forget them.  A large widescreen TV with streaming services was available as was the kitchen.  The location is convenient -- a quiet residential area just a couple minutes from all the stores.
Extremely welcoming hosts + clean spacious room and private restroom + thoughtful touches like extra toiletries for guests = perfect Airbnb.

We had quite an enjoyable time with our hosts!
Emily was so gracious, the bed was very comfortable and their private bar upstairs was an adventure going back in history! We even got a special tour of the finest brewery in town called Santiam Brewing from her husband and owner Ian. We would certainly stay again!
Emily is a thoughtful and cheerful host.  I had everything I needed and plan to stay here again if the room is available.

Friendly host; we had several changes through the trip and everything worked out perfectly. They have lovely cats that like attention, and two parrots. Super cool! Although I'm allergic too cats I didn't have a problem sleeping in the guest room, and didn't need any medication. Room was super clean. As a guest here Ian, and Emily made me feel comfy. Definitely recommend them for any travel goers who are visiting for a week/weekend.
Couple of local legends, great place to stay!
This places it's a must to stay at! Emily and her husband are so great. Not only do they provide a great place to stay, they made breakfast for us the next morning. Truly great people!
Emily and Ian's place was perfect, clean, close to downtown, and a beautiful space.

Ian and Emily are very special! They're welcoming and generous. I had a absolut blast staying at their home. If you're a history geek like me slip the subject into a conversation with Ian, something special might happen. Ill be going back at this place
Good location, comfortable bed, clean place with tons of character. Emily was quick to respond and was there to tour the place when I arrived. Can't beat it for the price - definitely recommend!
Favorite place to stay in Salem!

Nice people. Room was clean and decent size . Big queen size bed ,very comfortable. They were there if we needed something or had questions . We were never Disturbed or bothered when we were in our room . There is no TV available to watch when in bed . But they do have WiFi and watched movies on laptop .. great place to stay when in area
Great place, great host and look forward to seeing them again soon.
One of favorite place to stay in Salem!
Emily and her partner were great. Two lovely kitties. Place was clean and cozy!
I come to oregon every month, and by far my favorite place to stay.

Emily was a wonderful hostess, her place is in a quite area and you can rest up from traveling (we were driving down on the I-5) while playing with her cat. We enjoyed staying there, the place is clean and neat and everything was just as described.

Thank you Emily and Ian for an easy place to stay while we were in town for a business seminar. We didn't need much but this was perfect! Everything was very clean and the neighborhood felt very safe when we went for a run. Emily and Ian were very kind hosts.
Excellent stay, beautiful and comfortable home. Emily was very sweet and accommodating with me having to get in very late. Definitely would stay again!
Cute cat!
Fantastic respite from the day to day travel of the road. Wonderful couple. Great conversations and hospitality. Beds comfortable, sheets are super soft. Would definitely stay again.
Emily’s space is a great value and she’s a super laid back host. I would stay with her any time!
Emily’s was a great place to stay, even though I was sick most of the time. lol thanks for everything!

I highly recommend this airbnb to everyone who needs a room in Salem Oregon. Emily, the host, is the best!!! The room was great! The location worked perfectly for me too! I completely enjoyed my stay in her wonderful home.

This airbnb is an exceptional value!

My experience at Emily and Ian’s was hands down top notch! It was a perfect location for a late late night stay over. They wen’t so far and beyond by waiting up for me till 1am. Talk about feeling mug welcomed. I will definetly be back in the future and highly recommend this place for anyone traveling though Oregon!!
Emily's place is in a great location. She responded quickly and check in was very easy. The location of the house and value are great. However the room was very hot and smelled strongly of cat urine.
整洁舒适 床非常棒  还有可爱的鹦鹉和猫  Emily是非常礼貌 尊重 善良的夫人 她等我到很晚 我非常感谢 我会想念你的
Good place for a quick stay.
Great place to stay if making any trek up or down the I-5.

We had a great stay with Emily! We arrived late and she was kind enough to stay up late to welcome us. She showed us around her beautiful home and was thoughtful enough to leave us some scones and other goodies. We would recommend staying here!

It was a pleasantly experience. Unfortunately we were busy with the obligations we were in town for, but when we arrived we got a wonderful tour of the pets and when we left a much needed delicious brunch.

Emily is a great hostess. She is generous and good company. There are various birds in the house that are so much fun, they sing opera in the morning and will chit chat with you in the afternoons. I highly recommend staying with her, especially if you’re new to town!

Lots of nice little touches like toothpaste, folded towels, snacks, folded toilet paper end, and blueberry pancakes in the morning made it feel friendly. The kitty was very cuddly and adorable as well. Thanks again!
Very sweet couple. Beautiful gardens. Offered breakfast daily and close to most things in Salem. They do have birds that wake early so keep that in mind if your wanting A place to sleep in.
The place is clean and comfortable and there's a nice big window in the bedroom. Emily and Ian are really lovely people and I enjoyed getting to know them a bit!

Emily and Ian are kind and welcoming to guests and extremely accommodating.  Their home is very close to the main arteries running through south Salem but also in a quiet neighborhood.  The back porch is a very relaxing place to spend some time and inside, the kitty will make you feel welcome as well.  Highly recommended!
Great hosts!  Wonderful place to stay and great location.
Both Emily and Ian were great hosts that communicate well and are always willing to help guests feel at home. Super friendly couple and nice house in a calm neighborhood . Thank you for everything!
Emily and her husband were such nice hosts, the room and bath were very comfortable, and the location was easy to get to downtown Salem from. I would definitely stay here again if in Salem.

What a amazing experience! The house was so amazing and beautiful! I love being there and getting to know you. Thank you for your kindness and having us. I could not ask for a better experience. Thank you for making us feel at home.
Fabulous hosts. Felt right at home. Responsive to my communications. Outstanding hospitality! Book this room now!
Place was perfect for our trip, Emily was one of the most accommodating host we have ever had. Thank you
Lovely experience! Emily and Ian are wonderful hosts that make you feel welcomed and part of the family. The garden space is peaceful, perfect for unwinding after the day.

Emily and Ian were amazing hosts.  I had to cancel one of my days and they were super accommodating and beyond understanding.  They even invited me out to their beautiful patio and offered me to have a beer with them.  And the beer was brewed by Ian at his brewery! Emily even made me coffee in the morning before I left and gave me an adorable soap she had made.  I will definitely stay with them again when I am in town.  They were two of the kindest people I have ever met.

Emily was great at emailing before.  She was friendly and did very nice touches like water, fruit, chocolate and a new toothbrush.  Very thoughful.  But the house, room and bathroom all smelled like a cat litter box.  It was very unpleasant.  I almost left in the middle of the night.
Your stay here will be warm and comfortable. The room has nice touches and they provide a nice level of hospitality.
Great place to stay when traveling in Oregon with a great caring Host.
Emily and Ian are gracious hosts. The house is clean and comfortable. It is ideal for animal lovers as they have koi, parrots and a friendly cat.

Emily is such a wonderful host! We checked in late and she was very accommodating, and made us coffee and breakfast. Her house is beautiful and she gave us many great recommendations for nearby places! Would love to stay with her and Ian again!
Emily was a gracious host. My four year old loved meeting her parrots and parakeets and kitty and feeding the coy in the beautiful coy pond.
Emily and Ian were great! Comfy bed and nice room.  Would definitely stay there again!
She’s the best.
I stayed here with my dad on a roadtrip/cross country move, and Emily was a gracious host. She introduced us to Ian's brewery and had thought out the details to make our stay nice and welcome.
Very friendly family, It was a pleasure to stay at their home. Thank you very much for interesting holidays.
Well, for sure don't ask any questions. Thank you

We had a wonderful stay with Emily and Ian.  They were very accommodating and were able to set up a small table for my mom to work on in our room.  Emily is a very welcoming host and we appreciate the work she and Ian have put into making their home attractive.  I highly recommend staying with Emily and Ian if you’re in Salem.

Beautiful parrots and handsome Koi almost jumping out of their pond to eat. Their was a feeling of being in a tropical paradise. Although we were only there for one night. It would have been nice to relax on their padio. Plus we were surprised by a lovely breakfast.
Get place to stay, with my own bathroom too, not on-suite but close by. Love the artistic touch’s, fun color,  and sweet pets. I’ll be back here!
Very comfortable space, wonderful hosts. Many special touches and very friendly cat. Bed was great too! I hope to return.
Nice room, good stay I can only recommend.

Peaceful back porch perfect for studying and relaxation. It was just what I needed for the day before my big test. Emily was very respectful and even offered coffee and breakfast in the morning! Love the homemade soap and very friendly cat!

The room in Emily’s Home is quaint. The bathroom was very clean and had extra touches like a travel toothbrush set just in case I forgot mine. She even had fresh flowers in my room. Would definitely stay here again.

Emily & Ian are wonderful hosts & we thoroughly enjoyed our stay for 2 nights at their lovely home. Their home has lots of class & if you enjoy history, these folks are for you!  Emily is by far the hostess with the mostest,  &  went the extra mile in many ways. Our only regret is that we could not stay & enjoy their gardens longer.
Emily's place was lovely! The bedroom and bathroom were clean & comfortable. The garden surrounding the house was beautiful!
Courtesy, cleanliness, creativity, colorful, great art, water features, back patio that invites staying a while.  I was a late night arrival.  Emily and Ian were understanding.

Emily’s accommodations were perfect for our one-night in Salem while my daughter took her ACT test. It was nice to be able to relax on the back deck, watch the koi, listen to the tropical birds, and just enjoy the serene environment she has created in her home.
Very clean bathroom!

Emilee and Ian are very kind and gracious hosts. My daughter and I really enjoyed our stay. We especially loved Firkin the kitty that talks to you when you say hi to him.  This is a very  peaceful atmosphere and a comfortable bed.   Would definitely stay here again the next time I'm in Salem. Thank you so much Emilee and AN.
very comfy bed. clean and friendly.
excellent place to stay--It was awesome
Lots of Friendly critters and A lovely place to stay definitely my new favorite!
Great host, very accommodating of anything we needed! Would definitely stay again

Very nice couple. Room and bathroom is very clean. I slept very well there.  Didn’t wake up once. I’m sensitive sometimes to animals and pollen but not here.  Super friendly cat, like their owners.  Very smart engaging conversation over coffee.  I was on business and would have like to stayed longer.
I would recommend her place to any one

A cozy room, a private bathroom, a charming couple, and a willingness to help make your Salem experience a winning one - high praise, but well-earned.  Emily and Ian made us feel at home from the moment we stepped in the door, as did their charming cat, Firkin.  You get way more than you pay for if you stay here, and we hope to return on a future visit.

Comfortable bed in a dark room made for a good night's rest. The bathroom is very brightly painted and decorated, with a good shower, which made for a good start to my day! Emily and I shared a beer and a comedy show the night before.
Emily is a sweet and welcoming person. The room and bathroom were very clean & organized. Plus, she was so helpful with all my questions & requests. I would definitely stay here again!

I've had a week to think about this review, and I'm still shaken by how I was treated. After checking in and being asked to store my suitcases in the kitchen (because they were too heavy for her new floors), I laid down on the bed to relax. Almost immediately I noticed several ants on the bed. After investigating, I found more ants on the floor, baseboards, walls, and getting into my bag of cookies. When I pointed them out trying to come to a resolution between us, Emily became enraged and said that I should call AirB&B to make other arrangements. As it was my first AirB&B stay, I didn't realize I could do that. She repeatedly yelled about my finding "one teeny tiny ant" (there were many ants) and sprayed bug spray around the room while I was in it. And she mentioned that other people had complained about ants and how she doesn't run a professional hotel with an exterminator. Then she told me to take my things and leave. I have never witnessed such behavior in my life, and I was horrified that I was in a strange city with no place to stay. Luckily AirB&B found a lovely place for me to stay less than a mile away and refunded all fees associated with my stay. I really think Emily needs to do more to get rid of the ants, but more importantly, she needs to learn how to keep her cool when things don't go right. I do not recommend her place.

Emily and Ian were such kind, warm hosts -- staying here was lovely. Lots of quirky little touches that really brought personality to the home. Everything was clean and neat, I would recommend staying here anytime!
Wonderful hosts, very clean, and great location. I had a nice stay.
Interesting decorations!
clean and fairly quiet! comfortable and affordable

Our stay at Emily’s was perfect for what we needed!  The bathroom and bedroom were really clean and use of the kitchen was really helpful for us.  Emily was very nice and welcoming willing to help in anyway she could.  We really liked their friendly cat :-)  The birds were really cool to see and the backyard was so nice!   Looks like they put a lot of work and care into the house!
Expect a quiet and very clean place. Come and go as you please also.

房东一家人特别好。
房子特别有艺术感，住着也特别舒服。
非常干净整洁，房东特别热情，我们聊了好多关于旅游计划等等。
我学习到了好多有用的知识。
房东提供了旅游的好多意见
总之一切都非常棒！
强烈推荐给大家。
Comfortable & convenient accommodations, friendly & relaxed hosts ... highly recommended!

We had a short and sweet stop at Emily’s house on our way back from a wedding. It was lovely. Emily was very accommodating and the room was perfect for some quick shut eye before hitting the road again. Loved the vintage decor!

Emily and Ian are great hosts with a fabulous Airbnb setup. The pictures do not do this room justice - it is extremely spacious (as is the bathroom)! I was only in Salem for the one night so I did not use the kitchen, which was available.

The bedroom and bathroom are all located on the main/first floor; however, there are stairs between the driveway and the front door (which I didn’t mind at all! but may be important to consider depending on a person’s ambulatory needs).

If I’m ever back in Salem, I would definitely see if this location is available again. Highly recommend!

Emily, Ian, and Firkin the cat were fantastic hosts! We were so glad to stay there overnight on our long road trip down the 5. The room is super spacious, Firkin the cat and all the animals were a wonderful distraction from the long day, and it was so nice to finish the day in a clean, orderly, and inviting home. I'm sure we would have enjoyed staying longer if we could have. I recommend it for anyone looking for a clean, cozy stay while either exploring the area (just a 10 minutes drive from downtown Salem), or simply stopping by for the night. Thank you for the great stay!
Clean, easy access, good hospitality.

Emily and Ian were outstandingly gracious hosts, showing us around her beautiful and fascinating home and some fantastic local insight. The room and bathroom were spotless, and we slept great. Be sure to stop by Santiam Brewing if you're staying with them to try some of their amazing variety of beers. And if you are a bird lover, you're in for a special treat!

I st time staying;) Definitely will recommend Emily's place! We were lucky to find this place at short timing & a great rate. The family were very friendly & the place was decorated very beautiful with amenities;) the garden & fish pond out back was beautiful too;) What a pleasant day!
Emily’s place was clean and cozy. We stayed for one night but it felt like home. We will definitely stay again if we are in the area. They have cute cat :)
Great value and comfy room. B sure to remember the host has birds because they start chirping around 10am until 10pm, but otherwise are quiet-  Was a great place to stay overnight!
Clean room and bathroom in a nice neighborhood!
Emily and Ian were terrific hosts...their space was welcoming and eclectic. Would choose their home again if going through Salem.
If you want a great room at an affordable price, stay at Emily’s place!  Very clean and comfortable and awesome communication.

My stay at Emily's was great. She was very friendly and available if I needed anything. I was in town for work and it was in a great location for my commute as well as to stores and restaurants. The bed was comfortable and I plan to stay here again if I am back in the area.
Come as a stranger and leaves as a friend. This is the most desirable and authentic experience a traveler could hope for. Emily is a rare diamond among a sea of zirconium. 5 starts.
The room was wonderful!
Clean and friendly host, would recommend to all. Thanks Emily
Fantastic host! Emily provided an outstanding room and hospitality. 10/10 would stay again.
Emily's home was quirky and fun.  My husband and I loved seeing all the birds, and their kitty is cute and friendly.  Thank you!

Lovely home, peaceful, clean and quiet room, comfy bed, beautiful garden out the window, great coffee in the morning.  Be aware, no TV in the room, but if you're like me and not into television, that was not an issue!  I'd definitely stay again.

Stayed here for a night, great place at an affordable value! Spacious bedroom, clean bathroom, located in a safe area. Emily and Ian were great hosts, also has a very friendly cat. Would definitely recommend for anyone in Salem area!

Ian and Emily were such great host. I felt very comfortable in there home. Ian was so kind to include me for dinner the first night I was there. I had lovely conversations with Emily. I couldn’t have asked for a better spot. I loved all the birds and of course there cat Furkin. I would definitely stay here again if I’m ever in Salem.
Had to cancel reservations but went smooth.
Wonderful space, kind hosts, adorable feline greeting committee! Couldn’t have asked for more!
Nice, cozy, and stylish place. The hosts are very communicative.
Comfort, cleanliness, courtesy, beautiful creative use of color, a sense of world travel.
Great place for the value and got some good sleep in. Very responsive and friendly hosts.
Good place for short stay.
Delightful and generous hosts
Cozy!
Ian and Emily are extra accommodating and access is easy!
Nice hosts in a unique setting.  Hope you like birds, but they are not bothersome at night, at all, and I enjoyed them.
Overall wonderful little room. Would recommend it for anyone need a place to stay in Salem for the night
Nice place and Emily and Ian were very nice and kind, would definitely recommend and stay there again if I go back there :)
I used Emily's place as a pit stop on my way north. I had a pleasant stay - they have a very nice cat!

We were welcomed in and invited to watch tv with Emily. We were given plenty of privacy and space. While the birds made sure we didn’t sleep in too late, they were charming and never an issue. Great location, friendliness, and a relaxing place after our long excursions.
Ian and Emily are very nice hosts.  I enjoyed my stay at their house.  Very comfortable bed and stylish room.  I very much recommend staying here.  Close to shopping, but in a quite cul de sac.

Emily's was a great host for us. This is our first experience in an Airbnb and she was very lenient with us knowing that (we ended up staying till after 11am cause I didn't understand that there was a check out time). Her house is very unique and comforting and her parrots singing was entertaining. Thank you to Emily and Ian for a great first experience and for being understanding!

Emily’s place was so lovely - I loved the bird themed decor, and her cat was the sweetest. I came in late and left early in the morning so I didn’t get to spend too much time, but I’d love to in the future.

The host, Emily, couldn't have been nicer, but it didn't make up for the uncomfortable weirdness. When I expressed unease at sleeping just feet from the bloody war print and actual weapons that were attached to the wall (an antique rifle and very sharp-looking spears and knives), Emily moved me to the "overflow" room for kids. Neither room had a chair or anyplace to put clothes/suitcase except the scant floorspace, and no hanger for a wet jacket. I asked if it would be alright if I read a book in the vacant family room. She responded that "Most guests stay in their rooms." Not so nice, message received! The next morning at 7:45, there was lots of stomping just outside my door (despite the retired couple leaving their shoes by the front door), and one of their 10 cockatoos shrieked loudly for a good while. Again: message received. They needn't have gone to all that trouble; i was already awake and ready to go. Emily had  left a cup and teabag but no provision for coffee.  I took a last look at the still-standing Christmas tree and said goodbye forever to Air B&B.

Cute room and bathroom that were very clean. Easy check-in and perfect place to stop on my road trip! Emily and Ian were quick to respond. Bed was comfy and I enjoyed all the cat and parrot themes around the place. Mahalo nui loa!

Great stay! Clean. quiet, responsive communication. I didn't have time to ask Ian and Emily about some of the interesting artifacts in their home or their experiences in craft beer brewing. Next time...
This was a nice little place. We really enjoyed our stay.
The place was clean had everything ready when I arrived. I would stay again if in the area. Very nice people and really neat knife, sword and gun on the wall real neat history behind them.
Emily was a considerate host. The property was centrally located too.

My name is Radha and I am one of three people who were hosted at Emily's home.
These comments only reflect my personal experience, not my friend Zoe who booked the reservation.

Our hosts were very gracious to let us stay even though we booked the wrong date.
They weren't planning on hosting at all that weekend because it was their anniversary
but they let us stay anyway. Very nice. Thank you!

I wished I would have read a lot more reviews before we booked it because they
have about 8 tropical birds. I'm aromatically very sensitive unfortunately, and I would
have chosen differently had I known. It seems like the hosts would put that more prominently in their profile, since it is such a huge presence in the home. If you don't like birds in cages and the aromas that go with that, I don't recommend it.

Also, their profile says you can use the kitchen to prepare food. All I needed was to
to boil water for my morning cuppa and I mentioned that to Emily during the
tour on arrival. She said that was fine. But at 7am when I was in the kitchen, Emily came out and it felt like I shouldn't be in there. She asked me what I was doing in a sort of uncomfortable way. Glad I had no need to make food. I left the kitchen as quickly as I could. I used my flashlight, since it was still dark out and the birds were asleep, but that woke them and one of them squawked loudly.

We rented both rooms as there were three of us and the room my friend stayed in
