had a lot of ants. He didn't mention that until after we checked out, so we didn't say
anything to the hosts.

I did read the other reviews, after the fact, and I was taken aback at Emily's unprofessional responses to her guests, and lack of apology, when given critical feedback.

The bed was comfortable and the price was great! And the window opens.
Excellent place to stay at. Emily is very nice and made sure I was comfortable. I stayed at her place for 3 nights and booked another 3 nights in the upcoming month.

My stay at Emily's place for four nights was lovely. The room is indeed private and tastefully appointment with antique photos and artwork, and artifacts arranged on a wall. The bed is at least a queen and quite comfortable, and there are two end tables with lamps and the overhead light fixture has a Tiffany-esque shade that is lovely. The bathroom is immediately across the hall and fully stocked with soft white towels, and everything is clean. I'd definitely come back and it's a great value. Emily is a great host, but not a talkative one, and I happen to like that.
Lovely space nestled in south Salem. Wonderful hosts and a quiet space. Highly recommend.
Very cozy place to stay. The hospitality was nice! Communication was prompt.

Emily's place is wonderful! Clean, organized, comfortable!
I recommend!
Easy place to stay in. Emily and Ian are both very friendly and accommodating.
Very nice place in a good neighborhood. The hosts were very kind and had good communication. If I ever need to stay in Salem again, I won't hesitate to rebook this Airbnb
Pleasant people and place to stay at. Awesome as always. I will definitely stay again when I am in town
Good communication, comfy accommodations, really friendly people.  Emily and Ian we're great hosts!
My stay here was fantastic.  I highly recommend!  I felt right at home.
Clean space, incredibly friendly, exactly as described
Wonderful place to stay in Salem, Emily and Ian were such kind hosts! It was perfect.
Great place, fabulous hosts, easy to find!
Clean, simple, and too the point. Nothing fancy but convenient for the purpose of my stay.

If you don't might a truly 'shared' space and birds and a cat, then you might enjoy this. Owners like to talk and were friendly enough.

For me this was an uncomfortable space, as I like more privacy and a separate entrance. Very noisy form their TV and talking on the phone, birds very loud, walking through their front door into their small living room felt like we were intruding. Bathroom is shared. Bird cages in kitchen. Bed in green room very bouncy and you roll to the middle, so not so good for 2 people. Cat came in our rooms, and there was cat hair on both beds and chairs. Green room's decorated with weapons and a painting of a battle...a bit uncomfortable.
Hidden treasures. Living history.  Lovely parrots
Exactly as described, good location, clean & comfy. No complaints!
Very clean and safe place, I would highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a calm quiet and cozy place.

Emily and Ian were such wonderful and gracious hosts! They gave me great recommendations for things to do around the area, and I had a great time chatting with them at their awesome brewery. The room was very peaceful and comfortable, and the cheery bathroom right across the hall was clean with plush towels and extra toiletries. Great value, great people! Thank you, Emily and Ian!

An excellent experience. Hosts were friendly, engaging, and fun. Offered a lovely breakfast on my first day, and shared lovely conversation about books, archery, and history. The cat is adorable and incredibly friendly, and I enjoyed learning about the birds! Absolutely book this space if you are looking for friendly and eccentric conversation!!!

Fantastic location and neighborhood. Nice sized rooms with a great clean bathroom. The hosts are very warm and welcoming and have great suggestions about what to see and where to go while in the area.  Beautiful serene yard and a fun loft area/ bar upstairs.
Warm and welcoming atmosphere!

Emily’s place was comfortable and clean complete with an  amazingly friendly cat! Do be aware that Emily keeps many birds who greet the morning sun with loud enthusiasm. As we had been on the road for two full days, I was awake earlier than I would have wanted. Otherwise, Emily and Ian were kind hosts and made us feel welcome.
Very laid back and accommodating couple.  Dare I say eccentric style but it all worked to a great effect.
Amazing!
Loved the place!  So unique with the birds and fish!  And Emily was very hospitable.

A good night’s rest was had! Bed was cozy, and coffee was available in the morning. Emily was a lovely hostess and even treated us to complimentary flight cards when we mentioned we’d be swinging by the brew pub that they own.
Very nice place!  Very nice hosts and a great room!  Thanks!
Welcoming and comfortable experience.
Great place to stay!

we had a nice, comfortable, quick stay in this unique home. Emily and Ian were kind and welcoming, and provided the amenities we needed. strongly recommend staying here for bird/animal lovers. Also be sure to check out the beautiful garden.
Great place to stay, would 10/10 recommend and stay again!
Very Clean, pleasant host who is very accommodating. Will def stay again
We enjoyed a very comfortable stay at Emily's house. The place was very clean and tidy, and our hosts very friendly!

Little gem few miles from Salem downtown! Emily and Ian are wonderful hosts and welcomed us warmly on arrival. Bedrooms and common areas were neat and cozy. Enjoyed waking up to bird chirps! Highly recommend and would definitely return if we're in the area!
Emily was a great host and allowed me to have a late check out, which helped me tremendously. It felt calming to hear her birds, I felt like I was in a jungle. Overall great stay!

We really enjoyed staying with Emily and Ian. Given we'd made a cross country drive, Emily was very gracious in being flexible with check in. We loved the beautiful space, the gardens and koi pond, and the beauty all around, and for a great price, too. Everything was very clean and Ian and Emily and friendly and welcoming. I highly recommend them!
Nice room in a lovely home. Just what we were looking for for a quick overnight in Salem.

Amazing and lovely place to stay. I wanted to stay longer to enjoy the gorgeous garden outside the window. Ian graciously drive me to catch the airport shuttle which is conveniently closeby. I will definitely seek them out if I need to stay in Salem again!

Very uncomfortable mattress. They have a parrot 🦜 that woke us up at 6 in the morning, I love animals but the bird started to sing and talk non stop until we checked out, we actually checked out earlier than expected because of that.
Very good communication! No matter what time of day, they always got back to me quickly and on top of that kept me advised

Ian and Emily’s place is a gem, we enjoyed our brief stay there very much and hope to return in the future. They were so welcoming and accommodating. Their house has so much fascinating decor, including a picturesque garden in the back surrounded by plants and a koi pond.    It was magical, thanks again Ian and Emily for the hospitality! :)
We had a great sleep and a pleasant morning chatting with Emily and her husband.

Emily is a kind host. She let us know about her husband having guests over prior to arriving. She also gave us a tour of her home. Her parrots are awesome and the kindest cat we have ever met. Our bedroom was beautifully decorated with everything described. There was also a menu on our bedside table of their owned restaurant. Emily was quick on her toes when we asked questions. Lovely owners, cute pets, and very decorative room. Also allowed us in the kitchen, dining room area where the parrots reside. A bit dirty, but understandable since there were guests (friends) at that moment. All in all, we enjoyed our stay. :)
Nice house in a really nice area.
Great, compassionate hosts who are willing to converse or let you have your space depending on what you like! We had an excellent stay.
Great place to stay. Very nice host and room.
This was a nice place to stop and rest during my travels. Emily and Ian warm and friendly and very accommodating. The patio was a perfect place to enjoy a meal and unwind from the day.
This is a great value! Close to stores and grocery.
Super cute house with really awesome hosts!

Charming little house and garden with lovely hosts. Beautiful antique rugs, tiffany type lampshades, comfortable bed, friendly adorable fluffy cat. Koi pond and waterfall in backyard.  Great local tips from the hosts. Convenient location to everything, downtown, river park, Trader Joe's.  Hope we get to return and stay here again.
Lovely private room in a quiet neighborhood of Salem. Enjoyed our stay!
Emily's private room was perfect for my fiancé and I on our trip around Oregon!

A British-Colonial theme with old war regalia on wall. Menu to restaurant brewery couple owns in room.  Sweet cat greeted us for 5-10 minutes in room. Did meow in the middle of the night-maybe wanted to come into room? Lively parrots in the morning.  It was a nice quaint stay.
Excelente
Very accommodating.  We had been stuck in traffic on the I5, so, se did not arrive until almost 1:00 am, but we were given the door code and  greeted buy purring!!!!

Rooms in a private home, Shared bath, it seemed to be a strain to keep up the place.
Friendly hosts, lots of harmless animals. Be sure to get a code to re-enter.

Very friendly and accommodating hosts. They allowed me to change a small specification in my reservation last minute and were very understanding. Their animals make you feel like you are at home. I highly enjoyed my stay here.

we enjoyed our stay at the house. the hosts were so hospitable and helpful. the house is inviting and comforting. beautiful decor, and such unique lamps. the back deck is a secluded paradise that is decorated to an immaculate degree

Emily’s home was breathtaking for us. The walls are painted vibrant colors and all the decorations were absolutely beautiful. The back yard is nothing short of a garden you might pay to walk in and relax.

Emily and her husband were entirely relaxed and hospitable and made us feel comfortable using one of their rooms as well as the common space right away.

The location is very close to the I-5 so if you are looking for a place to rest this is the ideal spot. It’s only a shame we didn’t spend more time there.
Emily’s place is clean bright cozy and charming. Easy stop off I-5 for a peaceful rest.

For $39 a night this place is fine.  I had never stayed in an airbnb before but thought staying in someone's house would be a great way to meet new people. Emily is not the friendliness and I hid out in my room the only night I stayed.  Ended up booking a hotel room for the 2nd night.  I broke the house rule about wearing shoes inside and was headed to my room with supper but was stopped and relegated to the back deck which  no food in the room is also a rule. I take full responsibility that I didn't read the rules close enough.  Emily messaged me from inside while I sat outside letting me know the shoe rule. When I told her i wasn't staying the 2nd night she made sure to let me know that she thought it was awkward that she had to explain the rules.  There are birds in the kitchen so the floor was a mess but I didn't notice the noise much as some had mentioned.  I never did meet the cat.  If you're looking for someplace to sleep and nothing else this place is perfect.  Bathroom is across the hall from the bedroom so it's not possible to completely hide but I tried.
Emily was very hospitable and communicative! We had a great stay and I recommend this place to future guests!

Emily was perfectly nice to us, but we just were uncomfortable with the decor of our rooms, and the general vibes of this place.  The parrots and koi were cool.  Our rooms had very strong primary colors in high-gloss paint, and warlike wall decor; not conducive to good sleep!  We felt uncomfortable and left as soon as possible.  However, different strokes for different folks!  You might like it.

Although I only stayed one night and was not in actually in the house very much, my stay was quite pleasant. My bed was very comfortable, and my bedroom and bath were spotless and charmingly appointed. Emily and Ian were gracious hosts, and we had a fun, all-too-brief chat before I left. This was my first time here, and I definitely plan to stay here the next time I come to Salem.
We are grateful to Ian and Emily for a comfortable and cozy stay. They have a lovely home that is full of character. If Ian is around ask him to show you the coolest bar in Salem :D
Amazing value. Comfortable,  unique home in nice neighborhood.

We had a nice little stay at Emily's. She is very sweet and kind. And we were lucky enough to be there on a Thursday night to attend choir practice on the back patio - priceless. Great cat, birds are cool. Great value and location
Emily is a generous, kind and gracious host. My daughter and I had a wonderful visit, thank you, Emily! We would gladly stay again.

Emily and Ian have a very comfortable home- Our room & bathroom were really clean and nicely decorated. We enjoyed visiting with them a little bit when we arrived in the evening. Their house is in a nice residential area that’s not too far from the 5 freeway. Great stay overall!

The neighborhood seems very safe and quiet. The home is not too far from I-5 and close to stores. The hosts are lovely and very interesting and friendly. Their garden is gorgeous and their birds are wonderful company. I would definately stay with them again.
Emily and Ian we're very kind and helpful. We would stay there again.

Great hosts. Great decorations. Friendly cat. I was worried when the reviews said there were some birds there and while they can be a little talkative during the day they won't wake you up at night and they're separated pretty far from the rooms. The backyard is beautiful as well.
Very clean comfortable room and good location
Our stay was delightful!  Comfy and relaxing rooms! Emily and  Ian where great host, we would recommend anyone to stay there.
I appreciated the quiet, and mostly, private space.

Emily, Ian and Furkin are the greatest hosts! Furkin is such a celebrity of a cat. Choose this Airbnb to meet the one and only Furkin and stay for the awesome, sweetest hospitality provided by Emily and Ian. Fun decorated space on top of it all too.
Very nice friendly couple. Enjoyed a good nights sleep. Bed was comfortable and private.
Amazing home, host, garden and pets. I’m looking forward to staying there again soon
Great stay, awesome hospitality and a wonderful breakfast
Great place five stars all the way around super friendly and kind.  I would recommend this place
Very clean and comfortable.

Emily and Ian were so kind and friendly. They showed us their animals because we were curious. Emily made us a wonderful breakfast in the morning of bacon, sausage, eggs, and toast. We had great conversation with them. This was a great place to stay! I am also usually allergic to cats, but I wasn’t bothered one bit by their cat.

Emily and Ian were exceptionally hospitable. Emily served us dinner in the evening when we arrived at their dinner time and then a full breakfast, joining us at the table with her own breakfast. wonderful conversation.
Bed was comfortable, room and bathroom clean.  Communication was great.  If you like beer and good food, go try the Santiam Brewery which they own!  The Shepherd's Pie was super tasty.
Great place! Very friendly

Oh my goodness this was a fun and unique stay -- I never expected anything like this in Salem! It felt just as much an Airbnb Experience as lodging. Emily and Ian, the cat, and the parrots were all so very welcoming. Based on past reviews, I wore earplugs to bed -- but they were not needed at all. No bird noise until well after breakfast, which was also tasty and filling and not something I usually expect with Airbnb listings these days! The bathroom was spotless, and I enjoyed the colorful and unique decor throughout the house. I wound up staying in the blue/purple room (the other listing) and found the bed to be the right amount of comfort (not too hard, and not one of those too-soft memory foam deals). Definitely recommend this if you're looking for a place with character -- both the home and its occupants!
Emily’s place was clean, decorated wonderfully, and a nice breakfast was included. She and Ian were fun to talk with. I highly recommend them as hosts!
Two bedrooms with shared bath in a clean, friendly environment.  Great location, close to dining opportunities.  Would definitely stay here again!
Wonderful hospitality,  magnificent shower, magical gardens....great stay with wonderful host.

The company and conversation was a treat. We connected with Emily over our love for animals, nature and planet protection. And we had the opportunity to see the 'special room'....being British, it was a thumbs up and cheers!

Emily and Ian are the most thoughtful and generous hosts you will find in Salem. Breakfast was substantial, and very good. Emily introduced us to her gorgeous Sun Conures. Firkin, the extravagantly friendly Tuxedo Cat, introduced himself. The rooms are decorated with warmth and taste. The house is comfortably, not antiseptically, clean. Parking is easy on the cul-de-sac. You will be within minutes of anything you want to do in Salem or Keizer. I recommend without reservation that you make a reservation here.
Emily's place is a very nice house, it's very clean and very comfortable.
I saw and chatted with Emily a couple times in the morning and she was always very kind and helpful. She was always very eager to make me a breakfast in the morning!

Emily and Ian welcomed us into not just their home, but also their brewery & restaurant/bar!   We felt part of the family & came away with a full belly after a very comfortable stay... & we’ll return for choir practice!
Great space and excellent hosts!  I would love to stay here again!

We had an amazing stay at Emily and Ian’s place! Great conversation, breakfast was outstanding (very yummy jam!), and her kitty, birds, and koi fish were a really great addition! Definitely recommend :)
I felt very welcomed by Ian and Emily from the time I booked the space.  Lovely accommodations.  I felt very safe, comfy and slept well.
Wonderful

Emily and Ian are kind and generous people. Emily offered me homemade bean soup among other goodies when I asked about a nearby restaurant. I left very early in the mornings for meetings and she offered me steaming to go coffee and more treats on my way out the door. Had my own private room and bathroom away from their private upstairs area. Enjoyed meeting her parrots who are serene and shy. Excellent value. Great Airbnb hosts.
Great location for I5 travelers.
Emily’s house is simply unique and beautiful. It feels more like a fancy hotel than an Airbnb. Love it! Her cat is so friendly. Would definitely stay again!
I recommend anyone stay there. Beautiful home and room.
Great place to stay. Very nice host

Emily&Ian were great hosts. It was very clean and beautifully decorated. It was nice we had our own separate lounge area to watch TV when at their home...it was so nice we booked 2 more nights with them.
This couple was very very  nice and their home was very clean, lovely, and quiet.
Great place, great host. Clean quiet accommodations, would recommend.
Friendly hosts and a nice cozy home.
Clean, quiet and comfortable. Easy check in.
Emily's is a beautiful house.  She welcomed me on my arrival and gave me a quick tour. The room was very comfortable.  I enjoyed my stay and would gladly stay again.
Colorful vibrant home with great hosts, very easy to communicate with and quick in response.
Very nice and comfy please Emily was great toast I love to go back again thank you Emily
Lovely place in SE Salem. Great communication and hospitable hosts. Definitely recommend!
A very nice decorated room at a very convenient location.

Tasteful clean bedrooms; comfortable and creatively decorated living room space with ample seating and a large screen TV.  Wifi log-ins are posted in the bedrooms.  The home is on a quiet cul-de-sac about 5 minutes from the freeway in the south part of town.  Winco, Trader Joe's, and several gas stations are just a couple minutes away.  If you're around during the daytime, you'll probably get to meet Roger and Amigo or see the koi in the backyard pond.  Emily and Ian are both quite friendly.  We enjoyed getting to know them a little bit, and yet we still had ample time and space to ourselves.

I was afraid there would be noise from the parrots and brought earplugs, but really it wasn't a problem. The cat is sweet and doesn't appear that much either. All in all, a quiet and very comfortable space.

Ian and Emily are friendly and gracious hosts.  I was hesitant to stay in an AirBnB that was within the owners' living space, but they made it comfortable and easy.  The very reasonable rules and expectations were clear from the beginning.  The decor was interesting and homey.  I like animals, so it was fun to have the friendly cat around. The parrots were fun to watch and learn about, and they impact the peace and calm of the sleeping quarters at all.
Everything was perfect! Their home is spotless and they are great communicators!
Great couple, very sweet. Cute room with my own bathroom across the hall. My 2nd time here. I feel so welcome and comfortable here.
Very beautiful room and colorful bathroom! Got to have a nice chat with Emily when I got there, and I loved making friends with their cat!

Emily and Ian are very nice and friendly hosts. The room is nicely appointed and very comfortable. Everything is very clean and the snacks are a very nice touch. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again!
So happy to stay here again. truly looking forward to another stay in the future. great location, quiet and comfortable.
Wonderful spacious room in a quiet neighborhood.

Expect gracious hospitality in an art-filled home. Emily made me a tasty, tender omelet both mornings I stayed there. I appreciated being able to use the washer and dryer. I enjoyed a quiet place to read in the evening and pleasant visiting in the morning.
A conveniently located comfortable room, with friendly hosts!
The home was beautifully decorated. I enjoyed the friendly conversations with with Ian and Emily. I even talked with their parrots quite a bit.
Fun decor, peaceful, welcoming. Sleep soundly.
Cozy home to stay the night in. I would book again

My time here was absolutely wonderful. I loved the cat and how friendly he was. I loved the beautiful home and yards where I could lounge in. It was just what I needed to be able to breathe and relax. I felt at home and felt like I met new friends with the hosts(:

I had a great night’s rest at Emily’s house! Her home is lovely and the room was perfect for a one night stay on my road trip! Neighborhood was quiet and I felt very well taken care of. And the location is so convenient! I would definitely stay here again!

Our stay at Emily's home turned out to be quite perfect. The location was a quiet neighborhood, yet close to 1-5. We needed to catch a good night's sleep as a break in our travels and everything turned out just right. Thanks to Emily for being well organized and presenting a comfortable, quiet, clean place for our rest.
A warm, welcoming, lovely place to stay. So pleased to have discovered Emily & Ian’s home.

Home, including guest room, is lovely, cozy, very inviting. Backyard, which includes a koi pond, is a lovely relaxing space too. Emily and Ian are great communicators and hosts, as are their birds and heartthrob cat, Ferkin! Super comfy room and bed—I slept wonderfully!
Terrific place for a comfortable pitstop! Charming room, nice hosts, awesome kitty!
Great stay, very nice host and place.
very clean welcoming place would recomend
The room was excellent and I enjoyed my stay. Very clean and comfortable.
Clean. Affordable and quiet.  Would definitely stay here again!
The Salem location was great for a break during our road trip.
A great place to stay in Salem!

This is my second time staying with Emily and Ian! Their house is lovely and it’s clean and in a nice quiet neighborhood! The bed is really comfortable and I get a great night’s rest! Emily is the sweetest woman and I love their cat!
clean and quiet room. Great hosts.
Great!
Thank you for a great stay, I slept well! You were accommodating and respected my privacy. I enjoyed the space and your lovely home.
N/a

This was a wonderful experience. As a single woman checking into an AirB&B, I felt safe in this house. The hosts were very sweet and respected my privacy. They were easy to communicate with and happy to give me what I needed. I will definitely stay there again next year.

Comfortable bed. Cute decoration with home feel. Bathroom clean and hosts were really conscientious on giving me privacy to let me use the space. Quiet neighborhood and still easy access to fast groceries or pick me ups if needed. Easy to communicate with. Bonus cat to guard you and birds to squawk in on a conversation.
Perfect!

Beautiful clean space!

Comfy bed
Kitchen access
Great 5G wifi
Bathroom clean and well stocked
There’s a cat that roams the space outside of bedroom and sneaks into bedroom if you leave door open.

Would stay again if ever in the area

The perfect overnight stay after a long drive. We enjoyed the patio and coy pond. Comfortable bed, slept well. Many restaurants and stores nearby. Emily and Ian were very accessible and gave us our privacy. Very nice people.

We are crossing the States during our honeymoon and loved staying one night at Emily’s !
The place was quiet, comfortable and very nicely decorated !
We absolutely recommend it !
The home had what we needed for an overnight stay. Street parking was available. The room was clean and comfortable.

I would highly recommend this place for single women or those that want the comfort of others around, you would feel more comfortable here then a hotel. Neat decorations as well. It is apparent Emily has gone to a lot of work to tastefully and thoughtfully decorate the space. Ian responds quickly to any message needs.
Great value and location.

Clean, comfortable space just as described. Firkin the cat was nice and hung out in the room with me for part of the day (although you can shut the door to keep the cat out if wanted). I loved the quirky/cute bathroom decor with cat towels and parrots. Emily and Ian gave us our privacy but were easy to contact via the app. We didn’t have a chance to chat with them while we were there. The location is in a safe, nice neighborhood. I felt comfortable keeping my car full of luggage outside.
Amazing host. Would definitely stay at this location again.
Quiet culdesac. Clean home. Good stay.
Muy buena excelente me encanto
The room at Emily’s was just as advertised. Delightful bathroom with cat and parrot theme. As a woman traveling alone, felt very safe in this home and neighborhood.
Beautiful home, very comfortable bed. Great value.

I had a lovely time here.  Asthetics like the sumptuous colors and Tiffany-style glass really made this place special.  I was greeted by friendliest kitty you ever did meet, and we felt right at home.
Pretty much exactly as described. Good place for a night or two.

This is a good option on the south side of Salem. You will receive a code to get in/out of the house as you need and a private bath separated by a hall. I did not see the hosts during my stay. I am thinking they were asleep when I arrived and were out when I left. I did meet their cat though, who was quite friendly. Everything else was clean and comfortable. This is a good pick for a private room stay in the Salem area.

Lovely house in a quiet location. Partner and I were in the area to visit friends and this was perfect for us for a couple of nights.

Ian and Emily were both very helpful. Firkin is very cute.

Ian and Emily were wonderful hosts. Their place was so charming, and I loved the bathroom decorations. Their cat was very friendly, and their birds were quiet at night. The location is in a quiet neighborhood, and it felt very safe to park the car on the street. Would definitely like to stay here again when I'm in the area.
great place to stay!
very nice people, and house is very beautiful nice and close to the interstate and would definitely stay again if in Salem

Wonderful stay with real rainforest theme from the parrots and bath decor was delightful!
The bed was perfectly comfortable and even enjoyed a bath. Such a peaceful home ; the birds sing in the morning 😂
Always a pleasure to stay at Emily's. Such a very lovely home with quiet comforts.This will be my go to place in beautiful Salem!

Emily and Ian are very unobtrusive. One would hardly notice that we shared a space. They invited us into their very nice, upper-crust (as my dad would say) British styled home. It turns out that Ian is an ex-pat. I love pets and theirs are no exception.

My partner and I had an excellent stay at Emily and Ian’s place.

The hosts were very kind and welcoming. This space is unique, you will have a great time looking around. Their kitty was extremely friendly as well!

We felt right at home in their space, and they were able to accommodate our last minute booking.

Safe neighborhood, close to essentials (Walmart, restaurants, highway).

We loved this spot and it was priced very reasonably. I absolutely would come back if I find myself in Salem again!

I didn't spend allot of time at the house.. My first night I was very cold. There just wasn't enough blankets on the bed. I got up and made coffee but I wasn't sure if I had permission to this but at that point I was looking to warm up.. Ian greeted me and apologized for the lack of bedding. Emily was a blessing.. she made me feel comfortable.. we had a cup of coffee together and she shared with me her house.. she took to a special room and I could understand why it was so special to her/them. I would be happy to stay at their place again at the lower cost..

we absolutely loved our stay, their house and decor was amazing!! emily was incredibly attentive and fast with responses and their kitty was the sweetest little guy, very lovey and loved to lick so if you love cats (and birds), this is definitely the place to go!!! the birdies were loud just in the morning but also not too loud that they couldnt be fairly blocked out by some earplugs or headphones if you need to sleep later than when they start yellin :) the space was beautiful overall and we felt very welcomed!
Exactly as described, nice neighborhood, pleasant and very comfortable bed and good sleep. Would definitely stay here again.
We had a very comfortable stay and everything was clean. Emily and Ian were friendly and gave us many tips for our stay.
Peaceful and serene, quiet environment, well kept and clean. Extremely interesting, eclectic decor. And Ian and Emily are wonderful, friendly, and helpful hosts. Would definitely go again 🤪
Emily and Ian were perfect hosts who always went out of their way to make our stay comfortable and home-like. We look forward to staying again in the future.

What a wonderful place to stay! Highly recommend if you’re looking for an interesting spot to stay in Salem. Emily and Ian were incredibly kind and I loved all the color and art in their home. The birds were a treat as well and quiet at night as was described.
Great hosts and a lovely peaceful home. Awesome experience.
Great stay!  Friendly people and animals.   Easy to get in and out, comfortable bed, and clean bathroom.
Great space and very welcoming hosts! Thank you!

I needed a place to stay last minute and they were there to rescue me! I had an amazing time. Most beautiful home and peaceful atmosphere. I cannot wait to visit them once again and hang out with furry Firkin again :) thank you!
Emily is Avery sweet lady. There are these amazing birds she keeps in the non-rental part of the house. I found their calls and whistles very pleasant, even comforting.
Communication is quick and easy, very helpful with local tips, and very hospitable. This is a home away from home!
This worked out great!  Jason was a very precise and responsive host.  Thanks!
Large home with ample living space. Convenient location with parking. Rapid response from owner on all communication. Checking in and out was a beeze.
I had a great experience at Jason’s place. The house was very clean and well stocked with everything needed, all at a lower price than the area hotels. I definitely recommend this location to anyone.

Nicely maintained space with a roomy living room, a well-appointed kitchen and 2 great bedrooms in a great location. Felt like a home away from home. Highlight was the toy room for my 2yr old. He had a blast with a variety of toys, made it super easy to engage an active toddler! :) The house is kid friendly. They had a booster chair which we could use at dining and the backyard play area was also great. We enjoyed the Keurig coffee and the breakfast items were all well stocked.  The only thing was that we needed a little more room in the closets for our clothes. It was quick & easy communicating with Jason and the instructions were clear. Overall it was a very comfy stay and we will surely consider coming back! :) Thanks.
Jason is very responsive and accommodating.  The location is great!

Our grade school kids enjoyed the playroom. Their parents, us, enjoyed sleeping in our Saturday morning thanks to that playroom.
Thank you.
Beautiful home and great host! We were very comfortable. The place was clean and perfect for our little ones! I was especially thrilled about the bidets!

Jason’s place was a very comfortable place to stay. We were on our way north and needed somewhere to stay the night. This was so much better than staying a local motel/hotel.  His house was very clean and we really appreciated that there was no shoe wearing in the house. The floors were immaculate. The house was well stocked with all the kitchen amenities we needed and the beds were really great. Got a good sleep for traveling the next day. An added bonus was having chopsticks to use for our meals. Definitely recommended for anyone staying in the area for a longer period or just passing through.

Jason's house was perfect for our trip to Portland from So. CA. The accommodations were perfect for our family. We relaxed and watched a movie. The laundry room was an added plus. The full kitchen allowed us to prepare are meals. Breakfast was a delight. We went on a day trip the next day to the Benedictine Abbey in Mt. Angel 30 minutes away and Jason was amazing for letting us check out late. I would recommend Jason's home to anyone visiting the Salem, OR area!
It is a nice and super clean house , you will love it , Jason is a great hoss you will receice his reponding quick.

For my family's stay in OR this house was perfect! The beds were very comfortable, providing restful sleep after long days of hiking. We were able to cook meals, making this a cheaper, more comfortable option than the local hotels.  Jason was always very responsive and accommodating! He has done some nice updating to the house; the layout is great. Having access to the laundry was a big plus. Although, the house is on a semi-busy street the fenced backyard makes for a quiet, private outdoor space. Our little one enjoyed the playroom and the outdoor toys! Overall, wonderful experience if we ever are in Salem, OR again we would consider staying at Jason's again.
Jason's place is great. Highly recommend it, especially if you have kids.

Jason's house was the perfect home for our stay in Salem Oregon. The house was super sparkling clean ! Jason even make sure there were lots of bottled waters available for us.I would highly recommend it,especially if you have kids.
Jason’s place was comfortable, clean, spacious and inviting. We slept well and the place was very clean and comfortable.
Had a great stay :) second time booking, would book again.

This was far superior to staying in a hotel.  The house was spotless, the beds were very comfortable, communication was great, the ease of checking in and out was spot on.  It was easy on and off the freeway location was great, restaurant stores less than a half a mile away.  Quiet and safe neighborhood all in all I would absolutely recommend this place and will stay here again.

This is the owners home or maybe vacation home. It seems as though the family stays elsewhere when the house books. It was slightly new for us having all the family’s belongings out, but it ended up making the stay more comfortable. Great kitchen for cooking, big tv with fast, reliable internet, nice showers with double head and bath with jets, new laundry machines, well stocked with basic foods. On the outskirts of Salem, but not a bad location. Great communication from the host Jason! We would definitely recommend!
Great location and well stocked

Jason's place was great. Easy to get to,  lots of space, very clean and peaceful. The beds are super comfy + the area was quiet = great sleep! An adequate kitchen allowed me to cook all our meals during our stay but I noticed a Shari's restaurant just up the road if the need had arose. ;) All in all a pleasant stay and we would most definitely return.
This house was exactly as described. It was clean and hospitable.  We would definitely rent it again and Jason was a stupendous host.

This home couldn't have been more perfect for us. Traveling with a 3 year old can be less than fun, but the house was set up for it. An entire playroom full of toys and movies. A kids bed on the floor in the master bedroom. Everything you could think of was there. The house is beautiful and spacious. It's located near lots of restaurants. It was perfect for a trip to Enchanted Forest. Highly recommend!
Jason's home was exactly what I needed. clean and he left clear instruction, thank you!
Jason was very accommodating to our needs, we had a great stay :)
Great place to stay in Salem! They were so generous with their house!

This copy-paste from the host summarizes our experience perfectly:  "I have to disagree with your assessment of the house. I think our reviews speak to that but you are quite sensitive to certain things that no one has ever mentioned before, so I’ll note those things for future reference. For example, the toys are in the right spot to us and many families who have stayed here - the playroom. No one has ever complained about the vacuum in the dining room (it has to stay on a charger) or flashing lights of the wifi. I suppose the dining room is more of an art and utility space to us so it’s something not noticed by us. Actually I just slid the cabinet over for now to allow extra heating from the vents under the TV but again, I guess others are more sensitive to such aesthetics. Basically the complaints seem a bit harsh from my point of view since we live here, it’s not just a “rental property” but it is what it is. The house has worked out great for all our guests in the past but I’m sorry it didn’t work out for you. Anyway, I’ll issue the refund."

Jason's home was just right for us as we were visiting for a wedding and exploring the local area. The home was clean,  and well organized. We made use of the kitchen, laundry, and TV. We appreciated that Jason stocked his kitchen with many conveniences such as breakfast items. We would definitely like to stay at Jason's home next time are in Salem.
Jason’s home was the perfect home base for our group’s weekend in Salem. Clean, comfortable, and cozy! The continental breakfast and great communication was also very appreciated
Wonderful place to stay with more than you could need!
Comfortable home. Great base to explore the area. Perfect for families with kids. Clear, accurate communications from host.
Thank you for a clean place. It's everything he described. Just a busy road.

Jason's Place was our families first Air B&B and staying there felt as comfortable as being in our own home. The tea, coffee/coffee maker, orange juice and snacks were a wonderful touch! All the items in the kitchen made it easy for us to have several home cooked meals even on Thanksgiving Day.  The location was convenient for us and stores were near if we needed to buy something.  We liked that the home had plenty of room to spread out, two full bathrooms, Wi-Fi, cable TV and lots of seating. Being from Hawaii, we do not worry about cold weather but Jason's Home Instruction Book was helpful to understand not only how to operate the heater but helped give general information about the home. Our family was extremely satisfied with our stay at Jason's Place!

Jason's place was very clean and well organize.  The house was very  spacious for 3.  The check in process was very simple and easy.  I hadn't spent much time in Jason's home so i could only share what  i could.
Nice clean home to relax in. Great for a small family.
Great rental. Super clean with easy consistent communication with the owner.
A great place to stay as a family.
Great location, super clean, and great amenities for a family.

Great place to stay if you have young kids. My family of four stayed here for a week - mom, dad, a 3 year old and a 1.5 year old. There are two ridiculously comfortable queen beds (wish the Master was a king though), a toddler bed, and a pack and play! I do wish the rooms had some sort of dresser to put clothes in as the closets are already in use.

Ample, open space with two large bathrooms. My girls loved the toy room, Netflix, and the backyard. We also liked that we could park in the garage.

Jason was very accommodating and provided a high chair.

Jason’s house was everything we needed for traveling with kids. There were toys, a play house, a swing set, crib, high chair, and so much more that made things easy and fun. The house was clean and well-stocked and the location was within an easy drive of everywhere we wanted to go. I would stay there again and highly recommend this place for families!
We found this home to be very clean and comfortable and the host  accommodated for our needs. We would definitely stay again.
Great home, great communication, and hospitable touches made this an excellent weekend for us.
Jason’s home was super clean and filled with anything one might need to enjoy their stay. His home was welcoming and we enjoyed it so much. It was perfect for our family of six!!
Nice stay ! Will be back
I stayed at Jason's to spend a weekend with out of town friends.  His house was very homey and comfortable.
This house is clean and incredibly convenient, particularly for traveling with young children. The host had all the information we needed available.

Our family of 6 felt right at home. Besides the great deal in price and amenities for families with young kids, we have 4 kids, the location close the the 5 freeway and all the great places to eat was a added bonus. Highly recommend to anyone regardless if you have a family or not.

House was better than expected. Not that we expected anything terrible but photos didn’t do it justice. Nice home, spacious, kid friendly... kids toy room was so entertaining for our children. Coffee maker, pots and pans, washer/dryer all nice amenities! Descent size back yard. Would stay again if in the area! Thanks

Jason's place is great. This was the second time we had stayed and it was great then too. Quiet neighborhood, easy access to the freeway, excellent space with all the amenities of home. We're hoping to stay again. 😊
It was a great location and very quiet place to stay. The house was exceptional and very clean felt like I never left home.. i would definitely stay here again on my next trip to Salem

Jason’s house was beautiful! I was a little nervous as it was my boyfriend’s first time staying at an Airbnb and he was skeptical and I wanted it to be a good experience for him since I’ve never had a bad Airbnb experience. He was so impressed and pleased! It was comfortable, the temperature was perfect, the beds were comfy, the hot water was plentiful and the water pressure was awesome.
The house was immaculate! Jason had “continental” type food for us to eat if we wanted and provided delicious coffee for us. I would 100% stay here again and absolutely recommend this home for you.

Thanks, Jason!
Get location, clean and hosts are very accommodating. Have stayed at this home twice. Plan to stay in the future.

We loved our stay in Salem! We traveled with a 3 yo and particularly enjoyed the play room, which was stocked with plenty of age appropriate toys that he was able to play with. The house was clean and everything we needed was easily found. The house was perfect and very comfortable for our stay.

Jason’s place was great for our needs when we came for work in Salem.
The place is very nice and clean.
Location was perfect. It was only 5 minute drive to my Aunt’s place. It was closer to stores and everything.

A very nice spacious house with high ceilings.  Jason did a great job in communicating as it was our first time using an Airbnb.  And a great location to the places we needed and wanted to go for dinner etc.  We would definitely check to see if this is available again.

This house is a great place for families or groups of 4-6 people. It's clean and has a well stocked kitchen if you need to cook. Additionally, I made a mistake and booked one less night then I intended to. Jason worked with me to let me book an additional night last minute and I am very grateful for that.

Jason's place makes traveling with young children a breeze.  From the hours of fun to be had in the playroom and outside play area to the kid-friendly beds and other offered amenities, our whole family was happy and comfortable.  Communication and check in were great, it was very clean and super well stocked, and it is perfectly located for our needs.  We will definitely be back! Thank you Jason!

Spacious place, comfortable beds, and very clean. Also, thank you for letting us use the garage for our van.
We would definitely consider staying here again.
Pleasant home, clean and comfortable beds.

We had a lovely stay at Jason's house with my mother, husband, and infant! The house was exactly as we expected based on the listing and the reviews, and was exactly what we were looking for. We needed a house with a washer/dryer and close to the people we were visiting (speaking of, the playroom was a hit with their 4yo!) Jason was highly responsive before and during our stay, and we also really appreciated the very clear instructions and guidelines in the binder. Would definitely stay here again!

Our stay went well. There was coffee and tea and the beds were comfortable. There was plenty of towels and the washer and dryer worked well. Nice sized Tv and good yard space. Someone came to mow the yard while we were there which was nice nice we stayed 2 months. Jason was quick to respond to questions when asked. Overall, we were pleased with our stay.

I loved staying at this house. When we go back to Salem we will look at staying there again.
First of all, the location is great! You are only about 5 minutes to I5 and even less to markets and restaurants. We found a new breakfast place that you have to try. It is called Toast and Jam. Breakfast was great (try the coffee cake on the side), dinner was so so.
Jason was a good host. Great communication of what to expect and what they expect from us (not much).
The amenities were great because they offered the use of their washer and dryer which made life so much easier. Not a small w/d but a full size great SamSung w/d. Even better than what I have at home. They also provided the detergent. They also had more than adequate soap at all the sinks and TP and paper towels. I really felt at home and liked that I didn't have to go to the store to get any supplies that I would only use very little of. Seems like someone lives in the house and left it for me to use as I need.
If you have little ones, they have some play things and books that would make it easy for your kids to spend some time enjoying.
Only 4th AirBnB experience, but best so far by far.
Thanks Jason!
Amazing beautiful home. Very clean and comfortable.
Nice place. Convenient location. Great host

This home is outstanding. It is very welcoming and comfortable. It's in a prime location, close to restaurants, shopping, and the freeway, yet in a very nice subdivision. The best part for us though is that it was perfect for my elderly mother and my young grandchildren. To say it was kid friendly is an understatement, it was set up for kids and they loved it. We loved it too, because they were well occupied. There's two dining tables, which was nice for our family to have. The Keurig was a nice touch to our mornings as was the complimentary tea. It was very clean and very easy to keep clean. I will recommend this home for others visiting the area.
Jason was a great host and communicator.  The house is in a great location in South Salem.  I had room to set up "office" space and plenty of room.  I especially appreciated the holiday touches.

This house was perfect for our stay. it was very centrally located in salem and close to a lot of stores and restaurants. my kids loved the play room and it was great at keeping them busy while we were there :) the house was clean and cute, it had quite a few different amenities that were nice, like coffee and some breakfast items that were easy to make as well. We enjoyed our stay here
Jason's house is well located in Salem, near to commercial & kubler (trader joes, natural grocer, etc), nice & clean, looks pretty new throughout, nice laundry, kitchen & living spaces.
Jason was a great, accommodating host. The house was clean and very comfortable. Thanks!
Jason’s place was the perfect space for our family. We highly recommend! It’s super clean and it’s located in great quiet community.
This is a large clean house in a residential area of southern Salem. The photos are accurate. The house has a play room and a swing set out back.
The home was very clean and comfortable!

Jason’s home has an ample master bed and bath suite, play room, backyard sandbox and swing set. The kids enjoyed there stay here. There is plenty to keep them entertained. Very clean and quiet. Highly recommend.

We were traveling with my daughter and her 2 young girls, this was the perfect place. There was a toy room with toys and books, a toddler bed, and a backyard with a swingset. Shopping for groceries was nearby, the home was clean, and communication was quick. Thanks Jason!

Jason was especially considerate. He offered to get down a high chair from the attic for our baby and had a pack and play set up on our arrival. The playroom was especially nice when we needed to avoid the Oregon heat wave. My only suggestion was it was difficult to determine what was complimentary for guests and what was just personal items of the hosts (there was a lot of food/ drink in the fridge and miscellaneous items on the counters) so as a result, we initially felt like we were encroaching on the host’s space. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and appreciated Jason’s kindness and communication.
Nice space. Great location.

Jason and his family have a great little Airbnb for families. Our kids had a great time exploring all of the toys and books. Jason was communicative and friendly. The house was clean and uncluttered. We had a great trip!
This is a great house for a family with small kids.  I have 3 kids 6 and under and it had everything we needed and more, plus it was very clean.

This house is perfect if you have little ones! The toy room is awesome and they have many kids movies to choose from if you have a night in! It just felt like home away from home! Jason was very quick to respond when I had a question which was awesome! We would definitely stay here again on another trip!
Good location, clean, met our every need and great host. Will most definitely stay at this home in the future.

This was the most kid-friendly home we’ve stayed in. My kids (ages 5 and 3) had a blast with all the toys. We loved that there was a little car bed with crib mattress that we could use for a crib for our 3-month old baby instead of the pack-n-play that we brought. We really have no complaints! Very clean and comfortable.

Jason is an outstanding host.  The house is warm and inviting and a great location.  Quick and convenient for groceries, orchards/farms and easy access to the freeway.  We had an amazing stay and enjoyed feeling right at home. Would stay here again and highly recommend.
Lovely home, AC worked well on the 2nd warmest day on record, home was perfect for our 3 day stay.
Wonderful experience. Very clean, felt like home. Nice neighborhood. Great communication between Jason. Highly recommend. BBQ out back.

This house was perfect for me and the family. The location was convenient to stores and food. The house was comfortable and homey. Lots of great amenities. We highly recommend this place if staying in Salem.

This home perfectly met our needs. We were going to get a hotel when a last minute trip sprung up for us, but found this home instead. Traveling with 3 kids, we couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay. The playroom and backyard were perfect for keeping our kids entertained. Beds were comfy, home was clean, and it was extremely close to everything we were doing.

Great place to stay with children. We had a minor issue getting into property on night one and Jason was quick to respond after 1 am in the morning. He was very courtesy with all communications. The house was clean, comfortable, and perfect for children as they had toys, activities, swing set in back. We also had access to cable, netfiix, etc.  I will never stay at a hotel again. Highly recommend this home. Neighborhood was well kept with nearby garden, which kids enjoyed walking too.  Plenty of stores near by.

Wonderful stay at Jason’s home away from home. He had everything we needed and was at a great location. Very accommodating and easy to communicate with. Will definitely look forward to staying there again in the future.
House it's nice and clean, great location and good neighbor hood.
This is a nice, comfortable home close to a lot of conveniences.  It was clean and the host had excellent communication.

My wife and I had a great stay here with our infant son. It’s a great place for little ones, as there is a play room and the living room is a nice open layout. Jason is very communicative and quick to respond.
Awesome….as always!

We really enjoyed our stay. The place is nicely decorated and clean. Jason was kind enough to accommodate a last minute request to spend an extra night. The play room was a feature our daughter really enjoyed. We would definitely stay here again.
Great place -- convenient, clean and just as advertised.  The kid's playroom was great and Jason was a super good host!
Easy access to Salem's south side and I-5. Cozy mattresses, slept great!
Awesome…as always!
Great place for a family
Always a pleasure and great stay!
Nice house. Jason was an excellent host. Always responsive.
Enjoyed our stay it was wonderful
All the comforts of home while traveling and close to freeways and other necessities.  Quiet neighborhood and very comfortable beds too.

Jason's place was absolutely perfect for what we needed. Plenty of amenities, and so close to anything you would want or need. We would not hesitate to stay there next time in Portland. Thank you Jason for a great experience!
Always a great experience, with all the things needed to make for a pleasant experience for myself and the kids! They always enjoy themselves!

Jason’s house was a perfect base for our visit to Salem with our little girl. Communication with host was very good, easy check in/out. It was very comfortable and felt like home. The best part was how child friendly it is. Our little girl had so much fun in the playroom and playing in the garden.
Home was in a perfect location for us. House was clean and had little extras. Had everything you needed. Jason was a great host and responded quickly.
Great place! Jason is a good communicator and his home is very accommodating and totally worth the stay. Has netflix, disney plus etc
Jason responded to my questions quickly. And was willing to help me when my flight had been changed. Easy check in and a nice home.

Wow! This was my first Airbnb experience and it was a great one. Everything was amazing - the play room, washer/dryer, kids bed in the master, play area outside and more. Thank you Jason for making our stay and amazing one!
Very kid-friendly and comfortable! Host is very quick to respond as well. Great stay!
comfortable home within great distance to shopping and highways.
Jason was very helpful and responsive to communications.

Jason's house was perfect for our family stay in Salem.  We have a toddler and an infant, and the house was great.  Our toddler loved her "racecar bed" (toddler bed in the master), and it was a struggle daily to get her out of the playroom or the sandbox in the back yard.  We really appreciated the pack-and-play for our infant to sleep in as well.  The house was well maintained, and because it had air conditioning, we didn't mind visiting when it was pushing 100 degrees all week.  We will definitely be looking to book again on our next trip to Salem.
Jason is an amazing host - very quick responses whenever we had questions. The house is also very beautiful and spacious.
Great home

Great Airbnb with the necessities and very spacious. The location is great with plenty of retail stores nearby. The home was very clean. There was an extra air mattress provided which came in handy. Jason was very accessible and responded quickly to my questions. I would definitely stay here again and I highly recommend it!
This place was super clean and comfortable with a well stocked kitchen. Very kid friendly and close to I-5. We would definitely stay here again.

This home is fantastic. It is fully equipped, so comfortable, easy to access and super clean. All the comforts of home. If you are traveling with a kid or kids, even better. One of the best airbnb's I have stayed in and will definitely return.
Jason was a great host and kept us informed of everything that needed to be handled in the house. Very clean.

Very roomy home. Two beds are a plus … great place if you have small children. We liked the idea of having the extra bed for me in case my husband had a rough time sleeping. The queen bed was very comfy and we both slept well. Love it when there are small fans provided too. Clean and a good location too.  Close to grocery and restaurants.
Loved it. Super homey vibe

Jason's home is one of the most fully outfitted with the comforts of home that you could find, complete from coffee and tea brewing and steeping options, incredibly plush beds with extra blankets, a huge master suite, a full kitchen without any missing needed cooking utensils, and so on.  The home has a driveway for the parking and is in a nice section of town near ease of shopping for everything from Trader Joe's to Walgreens and more.   There is a bit of road noise in the front of the house, but it is not noticed in the bedrooms at night at all, it feels very quiet.  If you have small children you will be thrilled at the playroom!  The picture book library is a children's author writing dream, if you need a writing cabin!  For me the playroom served a good yoga room.    Jason's binder of information is helpful, and the instructions are "just right," not overboard, very appropriate.  We would absolutely return when we are in Salem again and we recommend this place highly.

This Home is perfect for traveling with toddlers. We are hyper sensitive to safety and have felt safer at this home than at any thus far and we’ve stayed in plenty in Salem. The home is clean and well stocked. Owners are professional and understanding.
We will return.
Tuvimos uña estancia maravillosa la verdad muy equipada. Excelente anfitriones.  Los niños estuvieron felices con la recámara de juguetes
Great experience as always! 5 stars!
Clean, well-equipped, and accommodated a very last minute booking
Great stay as always! 5 stars!

The house was clean and comfortable. There seemed to be lots of personal effects in the house. We heard quite a bit of road noise from the master bedroom. Jason was slow to respond to my initial inquiries for information after booking his place. And at checked, I sent him a text per his written instructions which he never responded to.
Good house, good location, super responsive host.  We felt right at home.
great place for families with young children

We stayed for Christmas and the host was so accommodating. The house was way better than pictured. Great home for families. Had a whole play room for them and great outdoor toys and a child's room. The place was clean, very spacious and updated.
beautiful stay at this beautiful home. definitely recommend and will book again in the future for other visits .
Another great stay! Thanks!
Great house, great host, great stay! Highly recommended!!
Great Location. Beautiful large 2 bedroom home with everything we needed. We will stay here the next time we are in Salem.
Great, clean house with lots of amenities. Centrally located in Salem. Has everything you need, spacious, and comfortable place.
such kids and family friendly place!
10/10 is an understatement. They are two of the best people you’ll ever meet. The house was ALWAYS clean and made me feel at home.
Don and Karen are amazing. This is a great place to say. They make you feel at home and are very welcoming.

Don and Karen are a great couple who really enjoy having students/nurses around the house. They made sure I felt comfortable in their home, whether it was the temperature of my room or with plenty of space for food in my own mini-fridge and pantry space! They’re very easy to chat with but there is also no pressure to hang out if you’re busy. You have access to most areas of their house, and are always available to help!

As a female student, I felt very safe in this neighborhood and in their home. It was very clean, and their dog Zona is the sweetest and best girl ever! I would highly recommend anyone to stay here!

Amazing stay, location, and hospitality! If you are on rotations or need a long term stay, this is the place for you. The home is located in a great location with food, coffee, and stores within minutes away. The shared bathrooms are kept clean and tidy. The room decor makes you feel at home and is a great space to come home to after a long day. There is more than enough room for kitchen items in the refrigerator and pantry. A big highlight is the Keurig, in which cups are refilled daily. The hosts are kind and make you feel welcomed and safe. 10/10 recommend!

Couldn’t have asked for a better experience! Don and Karen are extremely welcoming and accommodating. The room was very clean, the bed was comfortable, and they provided a desk for me to set up for long study sessions. The neighborhood was nice and quiet and the bathroom/shared spaces were clean and spacious. Would definitely stay here again if ever back in Salem
If you’re looking for the warmth of a homely place away from home, Don & Karen’s place is the perfect choice. They make you feel at home, welcome and comfortable. Absolutely enjoyed staying here.
I had a wonderful stay here at Don and Karen's home. I felt welcome and comfortable.  I would definitely recommend this airbnb!

Had a lovely stay! Karen and Don are friendly and helpful and Zona is very sweet. They made me feel very welcome/at home. Great house in a quiet area. Had everything I needed and description was accurate. Great for long stays and had my own space but felt I could use common areas as well.

Jean treated us to a delightful stay at the Centennial.  Beds were perfect, rooms were roomy and spotless, the space has extra touches well above and beyond you'd expect in a space.  Jean was delightful to chat with about her bike passions and our light meal was truly delicious.  Highly recommended!
Beautiful, charming, spacious, comfy home to stay in. We would stay there again without hesitation. The house is a gorgeous antique, but with all necessary updates.
Jean is a wonderful host. She greeted us when we arrived, showed us her pleasantly updated and charming old house, and served a nice, light breakfast.

Friendly host with great stories to share, beautiful quilts and loads of other interesting decor to look at. The guest rooms were beautiful and a delicious breakfast to boot! We enjoyed our stay very much😊
很棒的房子
Jean was a great host, and the accommodations just right for our quick stay.

Jean's Century House sets the bar for BnB experience. She excels at special touches that really make guests feel at home. She pays attention to every detail to make sure her guests have a great stay. Her home is clean, comfortable, and there's plenty to explore. We are already looking forward to a return trip.
Great place!   Jean was a wonderful host.  We would stay again when in Salem.

Jean's home is open and welcoming, with quilts and delightful art work.  The rooms were cozy, the beds comfortable,  the common rooms were spacious and welcoming and Air Band B breakfast was excellent.  We thought this was a bargain and were not surprised that Jean has many loyal enthusiastic regular visitors.
Jean made us feel very welcome, and her house was charming.  Parking and check-in were easy, the rooms were very comfortable, and Jean provided delicious smoothies and pastries for breakfast.
Great host. Super location, close to the Capitol and downtown.

Jean is a great source of local information, friendly, and responsive. The upstairs apartment is spacious, sweet, clean and comfortable. We were especially grateful for the space to lock up our bikes. Her place is conveniently located.
Jean is a wonderful host, and lovely person to get to know.   Breakfasts are tasty, the rooms are clean and comfortable.  Her house is beautiful! We will be staying with her again.  Highly recommend.

Jean was a amazing host! The living spaces were clean and orderly. Beds were comfortable.
Jean took great care to make sure we had all our needs taken care of. The personal touches we much appreciated, the homemade cookies to the beautiful breakfast that was served in the morning.
We will stay again if in the area.

Jean's place is a wonderful space for families with kids.  There is plenty of space for everyone and the space is thoughtfully decorated from bedroom to bathroom to even the open space leading to the different rooms.  As her description mentions, there is no TV but plenty of educational toys for the kids and plenty of books for enjoyment of kids thru adults.  Note that the apartment is accessed thru a flight of stairs from the front of the house but parking for the car is thru the gate in the back.  Only negative is the kitchen which is a bit limited in terms of amenities (no stovetop nor water kettle) but we made do with the rice cooker & microwave for simple meal preparation (she does provide muffins and yogurt and juice for breakfast).  Big plus is hot water never ran out with 4 people taking showers one after another with bathroom being well heated.  Backyard spacious and good place to hang out should you choose to.

Jean attended to detail and the needs of her guests, provided healthy, refreshing, delicious foods, and allowed flexibility in the accommodations due to the pandemic. The rooms are attractive and the beds are very comfortable. The Kitchenette is efficiently arranged and is stocked with all that we needed for simple meals.
Jean is a most amazing host. Her home, the location, the small touches and service all made this a most wonderful visit to Salem… and Jean is absolutely delightful. thank you!
Nice clean and quiet place to stay, fresh fruit and pastries are a nice touch.

Jean has a lovely home in Salem.  It’s central and walkable to Willamette University, downtown, Amtrak and the hospital.  Rooms are comfortable and beyond squeeky clean.  Jean has thought of everything you might want or need and then put it in hands reach.  She left delicious home made treats and  light breakfast goods for us replenished them as they got used and checked often to ask if we needed anything.  Our hostess was a friendly resource for information about the area.  Really enjoyable to talk with and also very respectful of our time and privacy.  Century House will be our first choice when visiting Salem.

We attended an event at the Willamette heritage center, so the location was perfect! The space was clean and cozy — we loved the quilts and comfy chairs! Jean was a great communicator and we appreciated the snacks. Thanks!

There aren’t enough stars to rate Jean and the lovely Century House! We rented 2 rooms in this lovely house for an Ironman race. We were late getting in and were going to head straight to dinner to meet friends, but Jean encouraged me to stop by the house first to drop off my racing back so it would be safe. She was waiting with a welcoming smile when we arrived. She quickly showed me around and had me store my bike in the lovely dining/sitting room. I was BLOWN AWAY by this adorable home! She has comfy lovely touches with homemade quilts and beautiful decor. We had a shared kitchen and small dining/sitting room. The fridge was stocked with juice, milk, yogurt homemade granola (beware if nut allergic), muffins, fresh fruit and treats on the counter! She had coffee and tea, as well.

We pretty much had the upstairs to ourselves aside from 1 or 2 nights. We were in and out alot due to pre race race activities. Jean accommodated all of my triathlete craziness by finding a place to hang my wetsuit outside and a safe place to practice transitions. Her garden is an oasis! My daughter enjoyed the hammock and the sweet black cat Carl. Jean would come up and empty our garbage, recycling and compost cans daily. She would open and close windows to make sure the house was nice and cool when we got home. If there were dishes, she would wash them! She even made my daughter’s bed! So sweet. We came back to fresh blueberries from the Farmer’s Market!

My favorite part of our weekend was sitting enjoying coffee with this amazing human, sharing stories of cycling and animal rescues. Jean is a talented quilter and we couldn’t resist buying a pillow and some bicycle potholders! We really love Jean and have made a friend for life! Do not pass up an opportunity to stay at Century House. I promise, you will love it!

This is the best place to visit, especially if you have kids. There was an entire room dedicated as a playroom/reading/lounge room and the kids loved it. Jean was wonderful as well. She was so friendly, communicated so well, and left yummy treats in the kitchen for us.

Marissa and Nicolas are super friendly hosts that give great local tips! Their house is nice an clean, we had everything we needed. There's not a lot of privacy but if that doesn't bother you, this is the perfect place!

Marissa, Elliott and their dog Maggie are very sweet. We started the visit by walking our dogs together as a way to introduce them and keep contentions at a minimum. The bed was very comfortable, and storage for clothing very adequate in the space. The house is so clean and comfortable. The bathroom was the best, very modern, spacious and clean. I was able to find a wine bar down the street, and they are not far at all from a variety of restaurants. It was perfect for walking, very flat, safe neighborhood. The stay was great, Marissa is kind to talk to, and I was able to go to sleep really early, there was no trouble with noise! Thank you Marissa, Elliott, and Maggie for having me and Tawny over :)

Marissa and her partner Elliot were very friendly and hospitable for my brief, but wonderful stay. They have a very lovely house and cute, rustic design that’s very welcoming for a single traveler or a couple. Their dog Maggie is very energetic and curious so beware of all the love she will give you :)!
Excellent spot for attending business at the Salem Convention Center. Super cute dog to boot.

A great location! Lots of things in walking distance and a cute neighborhood. The owners and their pup are so sweet, very kind and welcoming. Comfy bed, heated floors, and nice backyard. Not a lot of personal space since the house is very open, and the bedroom door is a sliding door that just lays across the door frame so it doesn't seal shut, which can cause for noise to transfer from inside and outside the room. A good place if you are just looking for a place to sleep after being out and about all day.
Perfect
The place was great for a quick stay! Marissa was a good communicator and everything was as described.

Marissa was very welcoming and her space is just what I needed. The house is in a very safe and quiet neighborhood. The bed and pillows are very comfortable. Anyone looking for a nice quiet space with high speed internet and a cozy bed, Marrissa’s place could be the one for you!
Perfect - great location, clean, and comfortable! Marissa was helpful yet allowed me to have privacy.

A wonderful and comfortable place to stay in! Marissa's home is beautifully done and clean, and the neighborhood is absolutely lovely. We didn't speak to her much, but the little we did with the young lady was fantastic. We appreciate and are grateful for her hosting and would love and be honored to stay at her place again!
Beautiful house, great location! Perfect for anyone traveling or passing through!! Marissa is amazing! 10/10!

Marissa's place is so beautiful & creative! it was a very peaceful, lovely stay and I really enjoyed myself. The bedroom is beautiful great colors and warmth! The bed was perfect and extremely comfortable and I slept very well. The house was pristine clean!! Excellent communication from Marissa!! the house is located in a really nice downtown part of Salem close to restaurants, & shopping. The neighborhood was peaceful & quiet.
I really enjoyed using for kitchen.
Thank you Marissa for all your phenomenal hospitality. Would stay there again and again

I was so happy to find Marissa’s place for a last minute trip to Salem, and it was better than I expected! Marissa was extremely accommodating and helpful. The location was perfect, just minutes from downtown in a cute neighborhood. Marissa’s home is spotlessly clean and the bedroom is cozy with a comfortable bed and lots of closet space. And the backyard with it’s covered seating area is a great space to relax at the end of the day. Wonderful!
Shared bath seems like it's private, host is very descreet.

We had a nice one night stay and very much appreciate that Marissa made an exception to accommodate us with our 4 year old daughter and two older dogs. Although the space is set up to be coziest for fewer beings, we made it work and appreciate that Marissa gave us a quick respite on our way through town. We also appreciated that Marissa allowed us to park in the driveway since we were traveling with a lot of gear that we wanted to keep safer. Had we had more time we would have enjoyed the beautiful backyard space more and the house itself which is cleanly and charmingly decorated. This is a great spot for a single traveler or couple.

Marissa is a really great host and her home is comfortable and immaculately clean. I was in Salem to do the Ironman race and Marissa was super accommodating to everything I needed to get ready, including putting up with my 4 am wake up on race morning. I would definitely recommend to friends and I’d stay there again if I’m ever back!
A really convenient stay in Salem. Communication with Marissa was fast, we were greeted when we arrived (self check in is also available), the room and house is comfortable and clean.
A great central location with a very welcoming host who is passionate about improving her neighborhood and city.
The host was gone so I had the place to myself.  That was really nice. As stressed it is more of a shared space. Very nice house, had a great stay.

Impeccably clean and furnished with a cute backyard for outside dining and lounging. Also the bed was amazingly comfortable. fMarissa's directions were clear and the location was safe, quiet, and walkable. Highly recommend for a restful stay in the Salem area.

This is a lovely home in a quite neighborhood in Salem.  Absolutely loved everything about the stay up to the end when I was accused of all sorts of things.  Made it sound like I had trashed the place.  I had not.  I did let my dog sleep on the bed.  I had missed the rule that says no dogs on the bed.  Melissa claims it was stated clearly in house rules.  Looking back I was not able to find the house rules in materials sent out ahead of my stay.  I did read house rules provided at the home.  If no dogs on the bed was in there I'm sorry I missed it.  Asked to pay additional cleaning fee which I have no problem with.  Perhaps a pet cleaning fee up front would be easier for everyone.  A 'no dogs on the bed' sign in the bedroom would have been helpful too.  Melissa had a guest host, Ana, during my stay who reported I had smoked in the house and had many other complaints about me.  Attempted to communicate with Melissa about these issues and received no response.  Such a bummer.  It is a great place but communication during my stay was a major issue
Clean and comfortable.

Marissa's room was just as it claimed to be. The room was cozy and beautifully arranged. The bathroom, as it was not private, was quite large, plenty of room to dress in. My host was home only one of the three nights I stayed, but she was kind and the house remained very quiet, you'd never know you had a housemate. Well worth every penny, would 100% recommend this rental.
A lovely space to rest after exploring Salem and the surrounding areas. Marissa was very accommodating, and has some good suggestions for coffee on her guidebook.
easy to work with and communicate!

marissa's is THE BEST shared space airbnb EVER!!
it's a super cool, thoughtfully (re)designed home - quiet, with a very comfortable bed, plenty of space for one's belongings and tons of fun touches in a safe, extremely walkable neighborhood. i will stay here again any chance i get!
Marissa is a great person
Great place to crash if you just need a bed for the night. Easy access on a quiet street with plenty of parking.
Very clean and organized home! I loved the decorations and colors. Would recommend!

Definitely a great place to stay. The room is clean, comfortable and has a lot of quirky decorations that I love. The bathroom was also clean and most importantly the toilet has a bidet and a seat warmer which is soo convenient during the winter. I had a pleasant stay and  I will definitely come back if I am ever in the Salem area. Thank you Marissa
A simple, elegant space with surprisingly subtle amenities.
Very easy to find.  I felt safe in the neighborhood.  It’s a flat walk to the beautiful State Capital grounds.  Marissa’s description of her home was spot on!
Planning to return often
Wonderful host - ty
Absolutely awesome. Thank you for your hospitality!
A perfect place to stay for the night!
A pleasant, but brief stay

Elizabeth truly is a “super” host.
