Having stayed at her lovely estate before (in one of the rooms in her home), I had come to expect all the amenities she provides to her guests — from cable TV and Wi-Fi to a convenient kitchenette set-up with a mini-refrigerator, coffee maker and breakfast pantry. On this occasion, however, I was able to book the cottage (next to the pool) and was so pleased with this new experience that offered a small living room (with an electric fireplace), a full kitchen with gas range/oven, microwave, toaster and full-size refrigerator, a dining table and ample countertop space for food preparation. And, Elizabeth has thought of everything for the cook! I discovered so many cooking tools and equipment, from measuring cups to frying pans, baking dishes and spatulas ... No plastic plates! Nice ceramic dishes, bowls, serving plates and glassware. The well-stocked bathroom with shower (and any toiletries I might have forgotten) is downstairs. Upstairs, I had a comfortable queen-size bed, a large desk, spacious closet and a HUGE television. Both rooms had their own electric heat pump, so it was easy to adjust each room for heating or cooling. As on my other visit, Elizabeth and her son, Cris, were available to assist me when I needed it (mostly for my cable and Wi-Fi questions). I highly recommend the cottage, especially if you are planning to have a longer visit in the Salem area.
We spent our one year anniversary here. She had champagne, a card, and candy for us! Elizabeth was so helpful and kind. The best airbnb I've stayed at! She truly made our time there special!

I was only passing through but so glad I chose Elizabeth’s. She was very helpful and showed me around the home and property. This charming little cottage was a nice spot to unwind and relax after driving. A hot tub is available and a pool although the pool wasn’t ready to open yet. There is everything you need and a few extras, like fresh eggs from her chickens. I hope to stay again and spend more time in the area.
Loved the location and Elizabeth was an amazing help..

We booked this on a whim when we need to spend one night Salem. We could not have been happier. The location is amazing! You turn off a busy road and then into a secret garden. The hot tub was an incredible touch.

We would be back! Thank you!

Nice cabin with a swimming pool and hot tub right outside the door.
Great amenities, friendly host

This cottage was lovely, we stayed for our honeymoon...on arrival we were greeted w tulle and ribbons outside to decorate for our celebration...she had the hot tub running and by the in ground pool there were fresh towels and candles lit....inside she had a complimentary bottle of champagne chilling next to a beautiful bouqet of roses ..also there was a fireplace that was very nice. and a fridge fully stocked for a wonderful breakfast...during our stay it was completely private and quiet we felt very relaxed...i would highly recommend this cottage to other couples
Really a great experience overall! Only thing to complain about was handled by quickly! Would recommend

This is a a very cute cottage like Home.  The hosts were very helpful in answering any questions at any time of the day through the app.  I loved that it was dog friendly.  I really liked that it had very useful amenities both in the kitchen and in the bathroom. It was so much better than staying in a hotel

Really enjoyed my 2-month stay.  Cottage was comfortable, very clean, well furnished with all of the amenities.  Location was perfect for my summer job in downtown Salem.  Elizabeth was very friendly, responsive and accommodating - always wanted to make sure that I had everything that I needed.  Check-in was very smooth - she sent directions and photos of the road sign, cottage entrance, parking spot, etc. which made her place easy to find.  Highly recommend.  I would stay there again.

Staying at Elizabeth’s guest cottage has been the best B&B experience ever!  The cottage is super clean and cozy, it has everything that we needed, everybody loved it!  Elizabeth is a great host, she not only showed the cottage that we booked but also many of the others which brought a great time to our kids.  I made a mistake in booking by missing one room, Elizabeth offered another room to help me get the issue resolved, that’s very generous and very impressive,  I felt that I was super lucky to chose Elizabeth’s house.  I would come back if I go by next time
Incredibly friendly host and very attentive to details in there Home. This was my first AirBnB experience and it was one for the books!
Our family had an amazing time at Elizabeth place. Elizabeth is very generous, kind and thoughtful. This place is big and confortable. Thank you. Gracias
Great amenities, attentive hosting, stylish inside and out.  Great location, park across the street and of course, that great jaccucci.

Elizabeth provides prompt communication, excellent amenities, and calm and peaceful environment, attention to detail and much solitude and privacy.   A beautiful environment for the price!  Highly recommended
Elizabeth is a wonderful host! She truly goes above and for her guests! We had a wonderful stay!
If you expect the best at a bargain price stay with Elizabeth, one of the nicest places we have ever stayed.

If I could give 10 stars, I would! Elizabeth was so accommodating for our group and was quick in communication. We had a group of four and it was just perfect for us! She went out of her way to make us feel comfortable. She seemed like a friend who we could ask if we needed anything or if we had any questions. We arrived very late and in the dark, but her directions were so clear, we had no trouble getting in. The house had everything we needed, was comfortable, and homey. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone coming to visit Salem!

What a great little place! We thoroughly enjoyed the pool, air conditioned rooms, and home-made banana bread Elizabeth provided for us! There was also a fridge full of breakfast items such as fresh duck & chicken eggs from her back yard! A great place to stay for the night or a weekend getaway. Thanks again Elizabeth!
Elizabeth was very friendly and attentive. The place was cute, comfortable and well stocked with thoughtful touches.

We enjoyed our stay. It is hard to pick the highlights of the experience because it seems that all was perfect. Elizabeth maintained great communication prior and during our stay, she welcomed us when we arrived, the place was clean and there were goodies in the fridge and fresh fruit on the table, pool and garden were available to us to enjoy, she shared the best places to visit in the area. AC and WiFi were also available. We would definitely stay again at her place!

Elizabeth’s place is the perfect place to stay while visiting Salem. It’s centrally located and very comfortable. The king size bed upstairs was so comfortable I didn’t want to leave the bed. Elizabeth provided fresh eggs, banana bread, almond milk and water in the fridge. The neighborhood is quiet and provides a peaceful place to rest after a long day. Elizabeth is a fantastic host and if we are in the area again we would definitely choose her place to stay! Thanks again!
Elizabeth’s place is warm and welcoming.  The property is beautiful.  Easy check in with a key pad. The place is full of thoughtful touches .... we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Nice place to stay for a night or a week.  Spacious, private, well stocked, dog friendly.  Beautiful grounds.  Short walk to a nice little park or several restaurants and grocery stores.
Super place and very convenient as a Salem hub!

Elizabeth and her guest cottage made for an amazing stay! The grounds are gorgeous and the cottage is clean and comfortable. Elizabeth is a stellar. She is helpful, considerate, and just all around an amazing host. Bonuses are the many lovely animal friends you can visit on the grounds, the fresh duck and chicken eggs, and the many lovely details that Elizabeth has thought to provide for you. Stay here if you are in Salem!

It was an amazing tiny home, everything you need to cook full meals or just heat something up, a great space and very clean, though it was too cold to swim the pool is very large and looked like a lot of fun.
What a nice cute cottage!

What a great space! Lots of space, full kitchen, clean, and quiet but in the midst of everything Salem, Oregon has to offer. The host provided fresh eggs from her chickens, a new half gallon of milk, yogurt, English muffins, fresh fruit, etc. Lots of seating, a TV on the lower level and in the bedroom, comfy King-size bed, clean bathroom - even a private swimming pool for use if wanted. I would stay here again in a heartbeat. And Elizabeth, the host, was an excellent communicator. Perfect place to stay.

My boyfriend and I had to make a very last minute trip to Oregon, we just needed a place to sleep for the night. The cottage was an amazing value compared to the prices of hotels. The bed anad pillows were extremely comfortable! She had wonderful ameneties and the self check in was extremely easy. We really wish we could've had more time to spend at the cottage. Definitely a great find for us.  Highly recommend!

My daughter and her friend stayed a few nights to take the mcat.
They said: the place was very clean and neat. There were eggs in the fridge from Elizabeth's chickens which was very thoughtful of her. There was a few issues that came up but Elizabeth was able to get it sorted out. Also she was very understanding and sweet to let my friend stay pass checkout time for a couple of hours as I was taking my exam. Thank you for the wonderful time! I highly recommend!

We were pulling into Salem last minute, and I finally heard back from a couple rooms that they weren’t able to take us in, so I scrolled through Airbnb and  gave it one last shot, and in less than  a minute Elizabeth  accepted my request and contacted me. It was unbelievable how she took such good care of us on such short notice. The place was better than we could’ve hoped for, and our host was very kind as she welcomed us in the driveway.

I would have stayed another night Elizabeth suite but it was booked and I know why.

Above and beyond !! Where to start ?The king size bed super comfortable !! Big screen TV with Xfinity cable. Very night two floor suite with complete kitchen.

Lots of thoughtful details, fresh baked goodies, fridge stock with almond milk, water, eggs, snacks, lots extra towels and essential travel items . Covered private parking , Hot tub access was great. My new #1 go to place in Salem.

Highly recommend Elizabeth suite.
Great place to stay!   Easy access to pretty much everything.  Fresh eggs, fabulous!  Nice quiet neighborhood.  We would definitely stay again!
Amazing space with the best host. It was just what we needed. You will enjoy this home :)
Elizabeth is a wonderful host. She provides a great place to stay and many extras touches that are appreciated.  available on site and helpful with information. would suggest to any single or couple.

Elizabeth is an awesome host! There was fresh fruit left on the table, breakfast item, eggs from her chickens, and the guest house was the perfect size for our group of four.

Thanks for everything!
Wow what a lovely place . Elizabeth is a Wonder Woman. She goes above and beyond for her guest.  Super cozy with lots of extras. Highly recommended.
Elizabeths place was beautiful, with lots of little touches that made for an incredibly relaxing evening, we had a very peaceful stay.
Everything was as expected;  Elizabeth was very responsive. I would stay here again!

Elizabeth’s guest cottage is charming and filled with special touches to ensure a very comfortable stay.  Loved the homemade jam and fruit and having the option to cook meals, though our schedule didn’t leave us time for that.  This  will be our go-to choice whenever we come back to the area for visits!!

The space is great, close to a lot of fun things, we only spent half a day actually in Salem but the riverfront Park is great, and we had a wonderful time thrift shopping at Engelberg Antiks-huge selection. A full kitchen, made two big meals there, everything for basic need for dishes, I brought my own lasagna pan but skillets and serving dishes and utensils were provided. Basic breakfast supplies, clean and stylish space. It was quiet and peaceful, the dvd selection is lacking so if you’re banking on a group movie I would bring your own from redbox or something for the downstairs tv but we ended up playing trivial pursuit and had an even better time. Host was wonderful, very attentive and hospitable. Was great for my boyfriend and I with my brother and his girlfriend for dinner and breakfast. Easy entry, had everything we needed there and felt very at home, highly recommend for your stay in Salem or visiting nearby.  Host mentioned google directions are slightly off but Apple maps took me right to it so just a heads up that if you have an iPhone you should have no problems finding it :)

Stay here. I promise, you’ll end up liking it more than your own home. The lodging is stylish and comfortable the setting is absolutely beautiful, and Elizabeth is an amazing hostess. This location is a gem and a jewel for any traveler.
Very cozy and clean little cottage! Perfect for us and our 4 legged friend!
This place is amazing. Everything I could ask of a Airbnb and then some
Great stay.  Clean, and breakfast items were good.  Nice location if in the capitol area of Salem.
Comfy, cozy place with a few extra goodies & great hospitality!

Great little rental! Lots of little touches that made our stay great. The bathroom even had dental floss and a sewing kit. Fridge was loaded with terrific goodies, including organic milk. The beds were really comfortable and even though it is small, 2 adults with 2 teens and two dogs did well in the space. Elizabeth was a terrific host and allowed us to come in early. The price was awesome for all the great amenities she provided.
Wonderful spot near some great places! Elizabeth is quick to respond and very helpful. All the amenities you could need were provided.
This was a great place for my daughter and I to stay when doing a college visit at Willamette.  Thank you for the great communication and cozy place to stay!
Great little jewel in central location.  Lovely hosts; could not be better!
Quiet and serene, yet close to lots of shopping and dining. Ok for two business travelers, and excellent for one! Would love to come back and enjoy the pool!

Perfect cottage feel. And the bed was extremely comfy and the hot tub hot was hot we even cooled off in the pool. Fresh eggs and English muffins in the morning provided. Had a great little visit. Thank you!

Elizabeth is a gracious host amd the accommodations were clean and inviting.
I would stay here again.

The cottage itself is just amazing for both the value and location. Despite our stay being short, we still absolutely loved the location and comfort provided by Elizabeth. Anyone staying here will not be disappointed.
I had an amazing stay here; felt like home away from home (:
This is a charming cottage, and all the little touches have been provided. Elizabeth is a wonderful host, and we enjoyed our stay very much

Some friends and I came to Salem to visit nearby wineries. Elizabeth's place had all we needed- a kitchen to make a meal, coffee, towels for the hot tub, a radio, TV with cable to catch some playoff football, and a convenient location to downtown for dinner and wineries not far away. The hottub was nice and hot. Her property has big trees around which was nice.

It's an older home with some character, but good value for what you pay.
Great place to land for the night!

You are in for a treat here!  You have your own parking space and enter a gate into a courtyard with a pool and a hot tub!  Easy keyless access and a refrigerator with everything you need for a nice breakfast in the morning...even 1/2 and 1/2 for coffee!  The place was cozy with many special touches that helped us feel relaxed and comfy.  The location is convenient to downtown.  If you are a vegetarian, check out Taproot for a great meal!

Our group thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Elizabeth's guest house. The space was adorable and full of all of the amenities that we could think of! We especially appreciated the selection of breakfast items.. as graduate students on the run to classes, being able to grab and go was much appreciated! We can't wait to stay again, especially when the weather warms up, since we didn't get to enjoy the beautiful backyard and pool!
The stay was great. Very hospitable and great place!

Everything you need in the kitchen & bedroom! Very thoughtful baby accessories. Comfortable bedroom. Elizabeth greeted us upon arrival & provided excellent communication throughout our two night stay. Thanks again!
Awesome service

Lovely space.  Private, comfortable, nice kitchen area.  Elizabeth provided eggs, bread, cereal, coffee,  and an extra baked good for breakfast, which made the morning so easy.  Even the fold-out bed in the living room was comfortable.  We didn't take advantage of the hot tub, but it was a great additional amenity.  All in all, a lovely place to stay.

Elizabeth's cottage was clean, comfortable, and convenient for our Salem adventures. She made every effort to make sure we had every amenity available including fresh eggs, granola, and fruit.  We would definitely visit again.

We chose Elizabeth's place because it was a short distance to the local wineries.  We were very pleased with our stay.  Her home was beautiful and comfortable.  She responded quickly to our questions and was very accommodating.  The hot tub was also very nice after a day at the wineries!

Cute little two level airbnb. The electric fireplace is a nice cozy touch in the winter and Elizabeth does an amazing job stocking every amenity possible. She is extremely responsive and helpful, even offered to help me unload the first night! I found this location ideal for my trips downtown and to the capitol for my business stay. Very close to food places (could walk if you want), a drive through coffee kiosk, and a roths grocery. Only about 2 miles away from the Public Library. Wifi and everything worked great. I would stay here again. Very clean and neat. Was very cozy while I was there and it rained every day. Only thing I would say is keep in mind you are walking past a swimming pool and make sure you are aware of this, elizabeth provides a flashlight at the carport.  I had no issues and didn't need the flashlight. I found it fun to be back behind the pool. Only regret was that it was too rainy to try out the hot tub.
Really enjoy the cottage, nice and quiet.
I was very happy staying here at Elizabeth's B&B and would recommend if your in the area to stay there! I know I plan on coming back!
Great location, host and amenities!

This place was a pleasure to stay in! Super comfortable bed and it's within easy walking distance of groceries, restaurants, etc. Elizabeth was communicative and flexible with changes I needed to make. The place was clean and comfortable with wonderful amenities.

This was our second time staying at Elizabeth's wonderful guest suite, and just like before, this place was charming, well-stocked, and made us feel right at home. Cannot wait to stay again next time we are in Salem!
N/A

The home was fresh and clean and wonderfully private. There was fresh fruit and breakfast items available as well as many little needful things.  The hot tub was wonderful! Elizabeth was easily  communicative with any questions :)
There were so many thoughtful touches. If I could I would of stayed there another night.
This was a great place to stay! Easy to get to. Lots of thoughtful amenities. Well stocked clean kitchen. Easy instructions and very comfortable place. Highly recommend.
Perfect space. Great host and wonderful experience. We would definitely stay here again.
Convenient location, comfy king bed, and fresh baked banana bread!

There is no doubt that this space is absolutely worth the money. I personally feel like the photos don’t do it justice. My husband and I stayed here for a local wedding and we were thankful that we were  allowed to bring our Yorkie. The space is updated and has everything anyone could need. Our only issue with our stay were the ants... My husband and I were in a bit of a rush upon our arrival because we didn’t want to be late to the wedding so we dropped our items and our dog off in a rush and did not realize that the whole bottom area of the unit was covered in ants. Yes they were only sugar ants and yes Elizabeth had mentioned she was having a little problem with the ants but gosh there were so many we ended up excluding ourselves to the bedroom after spraying ant spray all downstairs. My husband and I also could not get the AC unit in the bedroom to work. Mind you, we are very tech savvy and even went to the lengths to look up the exact model online and just couldn’t get it to work. Aside from those two issues the place was great.

This bnb has excellent reviews for a reason. Elizabeth truly is a SUPER HOST and a lovely person. She respects your privacy but makes sure you are having the best stay possible. We stayed in the cottage and it was the best bnb experience we’ve ever had. She has thought of every detail. The space is clean, comfortable and well appointed. The kitchen is set up with nice appliances and everything you need.
On arrival she was very welcoming to our family. She even loaned our toddler some toys and gave us a tour of the chickens and ducks when we arrived. I really can’t say enough good things about our experience and the location. It's central to everything in Salem and yet is very peaceful and relaxing.
Lovely and cozy place. Lots of thoughtful touches. Bed pretty soft if you are used to a hard mattress. Otherwise, perfect!

Very cute little cottage!  We used the hot tub a few times and that was nice.  Elizabeth even had items stocked in the refrigerator for breakfast.  She also stocks many other amenities you might need.  Towels, a fully stocked kitchen and even toiletries were all available to us!  It was a relaxing stay and we were close to all the places we wanted to go!  I would recommend it to anyone!  ❤️

It was a very cute and cozy guest house.  Great location too.  Unfortunately, we ran into a minor ant problem.  According to the host, it can happen at this time of the year.  I would appreciate some kind of hints to set my expectations right.

This was our first experience with AirBnB and we couldn't have chosen a better host! Elizabeth was incredibly nice, very responsive and she even left a beautiful arrangement of roses and champagne for our anniversary. Truly happy with our experience!

My husband and I are from the valley but currently live in Bend. We needed a place where we could have the space and privacy we wanted with our new baby and our dog. This was the perfect place for our little family to stay while visiting our friends and family! I would highly recommend this place to anyone but especially traveling families. We will definitely stay here in the future!

This place is great for a single person or a couple. Very clean, lots of small touch amenities and the hot tub was really nice. Elizabeth met us when we pulled up, but if she wasn't there, the check-in directions we're very clear - including the fact that Google Maps doesn't work! Great experience and good deal, especially for a quick get away from the city.

We had such a lovely stay.  The cottage was adorable and comfortable.  Elizabeth was so helpful and quick to respond. The location is so convenient to shopping and groceries,  and she provided many options for breakfast that made everyone in our family happy. It's secluded and relaxing.  I highly recommend, and would definitely stay there again.

Elizabeth’s place was just what we expected. I don’t like having to go downstairs in the middle of the night but other than that her place was perfect. She even provided toys for our grand baby who visited. We’re looking forward to going back in warmer weather so we can take advantage of the pool. Elizabeth was always available to answer our questions or deal with any concerns.

Elizabeth was a fantastic host! She warned us our GPS would get us lost, so she sent step-by-step directions including pictures. She met us in the driveway to welcome us at Vista Manor, then showed us around the property. She even supplied fresh eggs from her chickens for breakfast!

Elizabeth's place is a gem in the city. It's quiet, comfortable, and most important properly equipped. Anything you need Elizabeth will take care of. It was still too cold to use the pool, but the hot tub was amazing and the perfect answer to soak off a 7 hour drive. The house was clean, well stocked, plenty of everything, and Elizabeth is a great host and I would definitely stay here again in the future.

We finished our honeymoon at Elizabeth's place and it was absolutely perfect. Elizabeth was very hospitable and as well as being greeted by a clean and tidy place to stay we were given juice, eggs, bread, fruit and freshly baked banana loaf. We would definitely stay here again and have recommended to friends. Thanks Elizabeth!

We loved staying at this cottage. It was perfect for 2 or 3 people. Elizabeth was gracious and helpful. It was great that we could bring our dog too! We will stay there again next time we are in Salem.

Elizabeth’s guest house was just as advertised—clean, private, and comfortable.  It is situated on a fairly large estate where Elizabeth has a variety of animals and a greenhouse that guests may chose to enjoy if they wish.  I really enjoyed seeing the baby ducklings and meeting the resident cats and dogs.  I was on business so didn’t get to enjoy my surroundings for long, but it was a pleasant place to unwind for a night.  I would happily stay again.
The location was perfect. Nice and private.

This is a cute guest cottage. The 1st floor is a nice living area with a full kitchen and bathroom. Upstairs is the bedroom. The bed is really comfortable, the sheets are super soft and it is very quiet. We had a very relaxing stay. Elizabeth is a great host. She was very welcoming and responsive!
This was a great place to stay Elizabeth went above and beyond with amenities and added convenient touches that made our stay all the more enjoyable. The hot tub was great.
Elizabeth’s place is so special and quaint! The perfect ‘staycation’ for us, visiting from Portland area. Elizabeth was great with communication and has added lots of special touches to the place.

Loved our stay with Elizabeth! What a lovely property. We fell in love with all of the cute animals she has. After a couple days of hiking we throughly enjoyed the use of the hot tub. This is a great area/part of Salem to stay in, close to good restaurants and the downtown part of Salem. We felt very welcomed there. Would happily stay again!

Elizabeth's home is lovely. It is located very close to downtown, which was just perfect for our stay. We were a little bummed not to be able to use the pool, but Elizabeth gave us fresh eggs from her chickens which was such a lovely touch! I would definitely recommend this place.
Very nice and accommodating. We only stayed for one night but everything was great.

Super nice host comes and checks to make sure you have everything you need. Big comfy bed with big fluffy pillows and nice big flat screen in bedroom . kitchen is pretty well stocked had everything we needed .Nice quiet property with peaceful outdoor atmosphere. We came pretty early in season to early for pool was still being cleaned but looks like it would be a great time in the summer . I love that she has recycle bins that are easily labeled for dispensing! thanks for being eco friendly! So many vacation rentals are not and we drive around trying to find recycling bins definitely a plus for us!
The guest house is cute. The stairs get tricky with suitcases and midnight bathroom trips. We were greeted with a smile by Elizabeths daughter and Elizabeth always responded quickly.
Really enjoyed our stay here. Well-kept living space, friendly hostess, and a pretty neighborhood.

Elizabeth's guest house is a great place to stay in Salem. She thoughtfully provided recommendations of things to do nearby, and her place was clean and well suited for our family of four. I would highly recommend anyone to stay here!

Elizabeth was very thoughtful and made our visit even better than expected! We had a lei shipped to her address for a graduation gift, and she even put it at our door for us! Awesome host, and amazing place!

This was a great spot for the night for my dog and I.  We would absolutely stay here again if in the area.  It was easy to find, exactly as pictured, the family was very nice, and the place clean.  Next time we will take advantage of the pool and hot tub!
Very gorgeous space, would def stay here again

Elizabeth was an exceptional host. She was so thoughtful and the sundries in the home were above and beyond. The space is lovely and we enjoyed a cozy dip in the sparkling clean jacuzzi. Elizabeth offered a tip to visit an incredible winery and we had a magical time in Salem thanks to her. The beds were really comfortable and the kitchen was well stocked. The whole experience was warm and inviting. I would highly recommend this place and the host!

We stayed at Elizabeth’s while visiting family in town & absolutely LOVED her space. It’s super family friendly for those traveling with infants/toddlers...
Beautiful property. The outside garden was amazing!! I’d love to live somewhere like Vista Manor! We will be back

If you’re looking for outstanding hospitality, great amenities, and close to restaurants this is the perfect hidden gem. Elizabeth was so sweet and sincere. We had our own private cottage on her property and in the fridge were fresh eggs from her chickens and English muffins and a few yogurts. Was so sweet to have such a thoughtful gift considering we were constantly busy on this trip for our friends wedding. The hot tub and the pool were so nice to come back to. Over all this was an amazing experience and great memories.
Elizabeth was great and the space was clean.  It really had everything you would need. We will be back.
Very friendly host, nice location, a great value. We loved the pool and hot tub and the kids loved the pool and hot tub.
It is conveniently located near many eating establishments. We walked to  a couple of very nice coffee houses. The bed was especially comfortable.

Elizabeth's place was beautiful! She showed us her animals and around the property. The guest house was very clean and cozy. It had everything we needed, along with some extras incase you forgot something. Elizabeth was very pleasant and always responded quickly to any questions we had. Great place to stay!

Elizabeth's place is an oasis inside the busyness of Salem. She was very kind and welcoming not only to me but also my partner, 10 year old niece, and our pup (70lb). The place is spacious yet cozy, and the pool was the icing on top. Lovely special touches like flowers, breakfast items, etc. I look forward to staying here again!
Elizabeth's guest house is amazing.  Old world charm yet perfectly refined with full amenities.   Highly recommended for any couple.
We had a very nice stay!

Really nice private 2 story cottage with beautiful grounds.
Elizabeth was very welcoming and we really appreciated the basic foodstuff and fruit that she makes available to guests. We didn’t have to go out for breakfast, but got to relax in the morning. Great 4 person hot tub right out the door.
This was a perfect resting place for me and my friends during a conference.
Thank you for the very nice stay!

Such a cool spot with nice views and huge trees, hot tub and pool, the wonderful breakfast food, fresh flowers and eggs from the chickens, comfy bedding, their cute pets and being able to bring our pet, and all the other little touches made it just a great stay.
Place was cute , clean and exactly as pictured.
This is a quaint, quiet and warm space. Fresh eggs from the on-site chickens, fresh flower displays, a charming cottage feel and communicative and responsive host.
This is a great, quiet little getaway and only right outside of downtown. It was a perfect base for our family's visit to wine country. Thanks, again!
Thank you for having us! We enjoyed our stay and would recommend the place!
We loved it! Thanks Elizabeth!
Lovely, quiet get-away. Many amenities. Next time I hope to enjoy the pool and hot tub!
This was our second stay and was exactly as we expected.  Would still stay here again!
We just LOVE staying at Elizabeth's place! Close to everything we need, cozy, beautiful, awesome! Worth every penny and she is a spectacular host!!!
Great host, and a cute place. The kitchen is well equipped and I appreciated the small touches like the bowl of fruit and the toiletries basket.

Great place and host! Super clean, added touches with refrigerator stocked with items and coffee. Much more than we expected. We especially loved seeing the chickens and bunny out and about. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Elizabeth has a very cozy place with all the amenities you need. She stocked the fridge with fresh eggs, and other breakfast treats. The beds were comfortable, with lots of extra blankets.
The location is very close to restaurants if you don’t want to cook. There is a sweet park close to walk your dog or take the kids to play. Elizabeth was a great host and gave us great tips for places to eat. We will stay here again!

So many thoughtful things fresh flowers,eggs from her chickens, fresh baked goods, and more.  After flying in from the east, it was nice to be able to get rested without having to leave for breakfast.
Clean, had everything plus some. Elizabeth was very nice and went over all details with us.
Excellent vacation rental! Comfortable, clean & fun! This is by far the best vacation rental I’ve stayed in. Gorgeous property and very close to everything you could need.
Elizabeth's place was the perfect for our short stay in Salem. Would recommend.
Enchanted apt next to main house.  Beautiful property with access to pool and jacuzzi.  Close to store and vineyards! Highly recommend.

Elizabeth is a super host!  She communicates promptly.  The location was very quiet!  Everything was very comfortable in home with some lovely personal touches!  She went out of her way to make sure we were comfortable.  Home was extremely clean!
Elizabeth’s place is cute and cozy, we loved the farm fresh eggs and the hot tub!
Elizabeth was good at communicating. Nice place.

Perfect for a couple rather than 4 adults...but we only stayed one night and my sons managed on the pull-out couch. Coffee and basic kitchen necessities were there which is very nice. Some fruit and eggs were in the fridge.
Farm fresh eggs and fresh fruit was amazing touch

A gem! Thoughtful touches made this centrally located little cottage perfect for our visit and Elizabeth was wonderful. Because we are in the area so often it is so great to find places that are comfortable clean and a great value. Will recommend and come back!
Very cute bungalow, cottage type feel. Elizabeth is INCREDIBLY kind, responsive and helpful. We very much enjoyed the area and location. Highly recommend.
Great, private space with lots of great touches and a place for our dogs to go outside.  Highly recommend.
Wonderful place to stay!!

Cute little pool house that was perfect for our stay. Super close to cute downtown area and restaurants.

Elizabeth was very responsive and helpful with the questions I had. I’d definitely stay here again.
This bed and breakfast is in an excellent location and included a lot of extra touches!
Amazing little guest house! It has everything you’ll need! I’d definitely recommend booking, and It will be my first choice for my next stay in Salem!
Great place close to a lot of great wineries!
Beautiful guest house to yourself, very clean and quiet. Elizabeth is extremely kind and helpful. The hot tub was definitely an added bonus!
Well thought out. Cozy & private.  A carport was an unexpected plus amongst others.

The cutest guest cottage to stay in Salem. Elizabeth is a great host providing us extra towels for the hot tub and fruit and eggs for our breakfast the next morning. We will definitely be back to stay here again!

If you are looking to stay in Salem, Elizabeth provides a great experience! There were so many nice touches that we were blown away by! Highlights were homemade jam (I am assuming) and fresh eggs from her chickens!
This is a small place with a large bed and great amenities. You can easily access the University and downtown by car or walk (if you need the extra steps). We enjoyed being able to keep up our morning runs in a safe, well lit neighborhood.
We will be looking to stay here again!
Such a beautiful homey place. I’d would visit again! Host was very accommodating & friendly! The host was so thoughtful! The hot tub was a great touch!
Beautiful place , extremely cozy and clean ....appreciated the breakfast foods . Location is great as well!
Great cottage.
Elizabeth’s place was very clean and had a lot of thoughtful touches. Will be staying again!

I really enjoyed my stay at Elizabeths guest house! It was cozy, warm, very clean and a perfect place to end every day. I appreciated her immediate communication and checking to see if I needed anything but also the peacefulness of my retreat. I would highly recommend staying there and can’t wait to come back!!
Elizabeth goes above and beyond. Her house is wonderful renovated to it original splendor and is an outstanding host. I can't wait to come back!
The house was amazing. Beautiful inside and out. Great instructions left for the house. It was clean and well put together.
Private cottage and friendly host

Elizabeth’s place was sparking clean and super comfortable.  It was well stocked with everything we needed. The fresh flowers on both levels of the guesthouse was an amazing touch. I will stay here the next time I’m in Salem.
Great place to stay in Salem!! We would definitely book again.

I stayed in the little cottage and it was spacious and had a well stocked kitchen.  Elizabeth even provided eggs, toast, fruit, and yogurt!  She was extremely responsive to any request I had.  i enjoyed my stay here.
Easy comfortable place to stay. Elizabeth is very nice and helpful.

Quiet retreat, great amenities.
Very relaxing with great kitchen space.

A great little place for 2-3 people max.  The king-size bed was so very comfortable; just the right firmness. The sofa bed was a bit soft for our son so he slept on the floor on his Japanese roll bed. Otherwise, completely efficient with everything anyone would need to prepare meals. We were in Salem to help restore an old Airstream and the hot tub and pool were greatly appreciated at the end of the day.  Elizabeth was very gracious and attentive to any requests, but on the other hand,  we felt we had complete privacy.  A great, secure location; close to downtown Salem and local grocer.
One of my favorite spots to date & if we visit Salem overnight again we’ll look to book here. Super cute inside and the hot tub was a great bonus!
Ants everywhere..

This is my second stay at this charming and cozy location — easy to find and handy to the things I need in Salem . Very clean and comfortable. Great decor and very easy check in . Excellent carport . Elizabeth is kind and thoughtful as a hostess! I’ll be back again the next time I need to come to Salem.

If this place is open and your considering it, don’t hesitate- book it!! Cottage is in back of house and very private. Amazing hospitality, quick to response, very easy self check-in instructions, very clean, well-stocked kitchen – even with rice cooker with rice supplied, numerous amenities, large flat screen TV with Infinity Cable, fast Internet, and knowledge of local places to eat.  Location could not be any better, central – within short walk or drive to everything including a park to walk my dog.  Comfortable bed and easy access to pool/relaxing spa.  Elizabeth was a thoughtful and responsive host. Would love to come back again next time in the area.
Sweet, quiet little cottage tucked into the woods (and yet close to everything in Salem) with lovely hot tub just outside. Host was helpful and welcoming.

This is really a charming place to stay.   It is wonderfully located in Salem, in a very nice neighborhood, close to downtown.  But still manages to be quiet and secluded.  But the best part is Elizabeth's attention to your needs and her very sincere desire that you enjoy your stay.  Which we did.
Elizabeth is a warm, responsive, accommodating host.  The place was beautifully and colorfully decorated, with many thoughtful touches.  Slept well, woke, well...and would stay here again.

What a great place to stay! Elizabeth was an amazing host. The cottage was clean and she had stuff for our baby ready to go which was a huge bonus! The location was ideal, close to downtown and lots of shopping around the corner including a lot of good restaurants. Elizabeth checked in with us almost daily to see if there was anything we needed which was so kind. We will be staying again!
We loved our weekend stay at Elizabeth's place. The kitchen was fully stocked with breakfast fixings, which was very convenient. It's quaint and in a great location.
Very warm place, Elizabeth was great at offering all the little things that sometimes we forget 😊 I will definately stay again!
Such a great place! I loved spending NYE here. The guest house is so cute and amazingly clean. It was super easy to find, I will definitely be staying there again!
Fantastic little cottage! We will definitely stay again!
Great little stay in Salem! Really sweet touches with fresh eggs. Everything we needed and I’d absolutely stay again!

Everything about my stay at Elizabeth’s was perfect. Complete privacy in a comfortable and spacious guest house. The fridge was stocked with breakfast food and bottled water. Coffee and condiments were stocked. There is a DELICIOUS hot tub, and I even had a bottle of Oregon Pinot Noir waiting for me as a welcome gift! I wish I could give the space 6 stars!  Definitely one of the top Airbnb’s I’ve stayed at EVER :-)
Another great stay at Elizabeth's lodgings! Will be back again!

What a great place to stay! It's literally right next door to dining, grocery and main roads, but feels secluded. We're a family of 4 (two littles), plus a dog and we were super comfortable. The host was amazing and we look forward to staying again.
Loved the cottage. Lots of little extras, felt very secure. Nice kitchen...all round awesome.
Great place to stay. Communication with host was wonderful. Highly recommend

I love the cottage!   It’s my first time staying there and I was so surprised when I arrived late and saw fresh eggs and English muffins in the fridge.   So grateful as I was starving.      Comfortable bed.   Nice tv.     Great place.  Easy check in.     Love the host.
Wonderful place to stay!
Cozy and clean. Convenient location. Elizabeth greeted us when we arrived to make sure we had everything we needed.
Great spot, right in the thick of Salem.  Comfy beds, very useful kitchen, clear and accurate photos and communication!  Thanks, Elizabeth!

Elizabeth is a WONDERFUL host who is highly responsive and seems to live for creating a great experience for her cherished guests. The hot tub was amazing, the guest cottage was secure and private. I felt safe and like I was on a true vacation. Thank you! I will definitely be returning.
Elizabeth’s place is an older, well maintained place with a lot of charm and a charming host.
Elizabeth’s Cottage was amazing!Beautiful, well stocked, and in a great location. She thought of everything to make our stay perfect. A must stay when in the Salem area.

Elizabeth's cottage was so cute and homey! It has absolutely everything you could need or want. She has thoughtful touches in the bathroom like toothbrushes, face wipes, and almost all the small stuff one might forget to pack. She also leaves a few small breakfast and snack items for you as well as providing a kitchen with pots, pans, plates galore. The king bed is comfy and the sofa bed is great for extra people. We were 5 people in the small space but it felt great! There is plenty of parking for cars too which was great.  Elizabeth was quick to respond to all my questions and concerns. She really cares about her guests' experience. I wish we had stayed longer! 10/10 would recommend!
Another great stay!

Always a great place to stay.  This particular stay had special homemade bread in the refrigerator for me, Elizabeth met me at the parking (carport) and actually carried my suitcase in.  She showed me a few thing in the cottage - and even put a phone charger in there for me (because she knows I tend to forget when I travel) .  Always a pleasure to stay there.

Wow! This is way better than I expected! The hot tub is so perfect! It didn’t make my skin itchy and having the pool all lit up next to it. The bed was SOOOO comfortable along with the sheets, pillows AND blankets !! I was so impressed! It had everything we could have thought of needing and then some! She accommodated to my infants need with a play pin and highchair! I will definitely be staying here again! :)
Cozy, wonderful stay! We played scrabble and used the hot tub.  Our dog was able to roam around the fenced yard.  Great place to unwind, thank you!
Expect to be treated well and relax in a very comfortable setting.

Elizabeth has a very comfortable and thoughtful space. It has all the amenities and touches to make your stay very comfortable. I think if you are taller than 6'3" and 225 pounds the shower and walk upstairs will be a little tight. By far, this studio 2-level is in the upper end of quality and service.
Elizabeth is always so thoughtful.  I appreciate her warming up the place before we arrived - the fresh fruit is great, and it's always like "home".
Fantastic place to stay! Quick responses, nice central location. Cottage was beautiful and had everything you would need to relax and enjoy a Peacful stay! Awesome place and host!
Easy parking and centrally located, and comes with great communication from the host!

I had an event to attend and Elizabeth took the time to let me know how far it was from her home. She was extremely helpful and responsive. She also respected my autonomy and privacy. The Air BnB was conscientiously stocked with all of those little comforts of home: Kleenex, Qtips, scissors, etc. and the kitchen was also mature with all of the apparatuses and utensils one would need. There were many thoughtful considerations: water, fruit, etc.

I absolutely loved the detailed check in instructions with pictures making locating, parking, and gaining access so easy. I had no problem finding the place and there was ample parking in the carport. The majority of the pathway from the carport to the Air BnB location is cement, so rolling suitcases work fine and you don’t have to worry about muddy shoes on a rainy day unloading your car. I also felt extremely safe in the neighborhood.

The only consideration I would pass along would be that if you are a light sleeper, there is a large dumpster for the neighboring apartment complex right beneath the bedroom window. On both days (a Thursday and Friday) the dumpster came crashing down at around 6:15 am. One day it was caused by the garbage truck emptying it, and it sounded like the garbage came again the next day, but it was likely someone putting garbage inside. The second day I was hoping to sleep in a little bit was unable to after that. For someone who is not a light sleeper, this would probably wouldn’t be an issue.
Perfect location beautiful outside and in, hot tub was amazing, fresh eggs and lots of xtra thank you best Airbnb ever

Perfect guest home my children and I absolutely love Elizabeth’s home. She went above and beyond to make my kids feel at home and the place is clean and beautiful. Pool and hot tub are just an amazing extra close to town as well.

Absolutely amazing host!!! Feel so much at home in Elizabeth’s air bnb she has made a hard time for my children and self so much less stressful and welcoming. She goes above and beyond in all aspects of being a host.
Absolutely amazing host and relaxing place my daughter loves staying at this Airbnb and visiting the bunny and chickens daily
Amazing host so understanding beautiful home perfect place to relax especially in summer near a beautiful pool
Absolutely amazing long term stay and will be back to visit my kids love the pool and chickens and Elizabeth became like family to us

Elizabeth goes above and beyond for her guest this was an extended long term stay for myself and children through covid and she was so welcoming and made us feel at home will definitely recommend the cottage it’s perfect and became our home for many months we will truly miss it and be back to visit
Definitely recommend this spot to anyone! Great amenities and hosting. Love the nice touches such as snacks and coffee not to mention fresh farm eggs! Would definitely stay again
We really enjoyed our stay.  Very comfortable.  Felt more roomey than photos depicted.  Elizabeth is very kind and makes you feel at home.  Good privacy.  Excellent location in town. Great value.🙂
Very helpful flexible host. Air conditioning works great . Nice set up for 4. Pool was a nice bonus .

Vista Manor was so much more than we expected with incredibly thoughtful details and a warm, welcoming environment.  We initially chose this stay to celebrate our anniversary because of the hot tub (clean and wonderful) and it's proximity to In-n-Out (only 20 minutes away), but would have been happy just hanging out in the space all day.  It was beautifully furnished, clean, and had everything you could need.  We'll definitely be returning to explore the area more!

King bed upstairs with air conditioning, couch and desk allow for more functional space upstairs.  Pullout twin/full on main living space allowed for our daughter to have some alone time.  Full refrigerator, stove and all the kitchen supplies one would need are readily available.  Unheated swimming pool in the summer makes for a refreshing, almost shocking, afternoon dip.  In our nine years of airbnb, Elizabeth has the best communication of all the "world".  Hope to stay again.  Super lucky to enjoy her manor.
Great place to stay, very cozy ❤️

This was our first time ever vacationing like this and Elizabeth made it a wonderful experience. She was so kind and showed us how to use everything! She had this amazing book with suggestions and places to eat and things to do and we used that to plan a lot of our day. We went to ACME cafe which was 10/10 for breakfast which Elizabeth had recommended and it was within walking distance of the cottage. Such a relaxing and needed vacation. Thank you Elizabeth for making it such a great vacation. We will be coming back :)

Elizabeth’s cottage is perfect. It’s clean with tons of amenities that you might need during your stay. Her pool and hot tub are a great bonus, too. Her whole property is beautiful and tucked back off the main road, which is so nice for a city like Salem. She’s a great host with great hospitality! If you’re rolling through Salem, this is where you need to stay.

We had a nice time in the cottage. It was really nice to have ketchup, salt, olive oil etc in the cupboards and we didn’t use any, but thought it was a thoughtful touch that she had lots of bathroom supplies available and fresh flowers in vases around the cottage. The fresh fruit and eggs were also very kind.

Elizabeth’s communication while we were there was excellent. She was very accommodating and responsive. Our young children really enjoyed feeding the chickens and bunny and petting 2 of the sweet cats.

We felt safe and the house was clean.

The listing did mention that the pool was shared and was not heated. But I didn’t give it much thought since it would be in late August, I figured it would be fine. Unfortunately, it was too chilly for me and the kids to go in, but other guests swam with no complaints, so it’s likely we are just cold water wimps.

We would rent from Elizabeth again without hesitation.

Elizabeth’s place is truly in a beautiful spot.  I was surprised to find the accommodations were more spacious than I expected based on the photos, and our little family was quite comfortable there.  (My husband & I have two kids who were with us — a toddler & an infant.)  We appreciated thoughtful touches like the bowl full of delicious fruit that was waiting for us when we arrived and, though we didn’t get a chance to enjoy them, the farm fresh eggs that were left for us in the fridge.  Elizabeth was so kind as to invite us to join her out at the pool after our arrival, and although we ended up staying indoors to rest, we appreciated her kindness & hospitality.  We enjoyed our stay.
Elizabeth is a great host! Super attentive and kind, and her response time was always almost right away. Her home is absolutely gorgeous and the hot tub and pool were great!
Close to lots of stores and quick trip to Willamette. Nice touches in the fridge for the short trip!
The location is close to many stores and restaurants. The cottage was beautiful and amazing. Elizabeth is a great host and great at communicating.

Elizabeth’s place was super cute and comfortable. It stayed nice and cool with the air conditioners and the pool was a nice bonus. Also a very convenient spot close to Life Source natural foods and Ventis Taphouse.
This is probably one of our best experiences with Airbnb. Our host was super helpful and attentive. She helped us out with our pup and just made our stay very easy and comfortable.

Sweet lodging in a great location! The king bed was very comfortable. Elizabeth provided fruit, coffee, fresh eggs, plus an assortment of other goodies and had a lot of nice touches throughout the apartment. We especially appreciated being able to bring our cat as we are relocating to Oregon from another state.
Excellent stay with excellent host, would recommend to friends and fam.
She was the sweetest! The space was perfect for my partner and me to crash after attending a wedding nearby.
Elizabeth's place was fantastic. We had all the necessities, a kind size bed and a hot tub! Loved it!

Great place to recharge. Was perfect for what we needed it, it has a lot more to offer that we didn’t use given our circumstances but highly recommended for a quick stay in Salem. Host was very responsive and helpful
Adorable and private cottage.  Had everything we needed for a night away.
Cozy cottage; easy check-in; safe neighborhood

Elizabeth was very communicative, she made herself available and was overall a good host. Her cottage was amazing and very comfortable. Me, my dogs and boyfriend stayed for one night and I wish it could have been longer. There were fresh eggs, water, fruit and little touches that made it such a pleasure to be there! Super clean and I would definitely consider staying again! Five stars -period.
Wonderful place to stay, Elizabeth was a great hostess and definitely cared to make sure we got everything we needed for a relaxing stay.
Pretty accurate to listing
Elizabeth’s place was fantastic! The room was clean and quiet, and the space was more than enough.

Very comfortable place!  Tucked away in a quiet street, lovely garden/patio area with the guest house adjacent.  Parking was great (inside the house property, not on the street).  Very clean, comfortable downstairs with all the kitchen amenities, and very comfortable bedroom, tv, etc.  Not a large space, but well designed and very pleasant place.  I would definitely return!
This place is warm and welcoming. So many personal touches.
This was our first Airbnb so we didn’t know what to expect. It was very comfy and decorated very cute. Very nice.
This is a cozy, well decorated restful place to stay, close to many places to eat, Elizabeth is a great host.

Really cozy and cute, clean space. I booked this place to take my Oregon Board Exam. Elizabeth’s home is 5 minutes from the exam location. Made it very convenient and her space was just what I needed for the night before my exam.

The cottage is cozy and comfortable, with all sorts of perks (fresh fruit and other snacks, lots of kitchen extras, blankets galore, access to the hot tub, and comfy beds).  We enjoyed our stay and will be back for sure!
Really kind and responsive host. The place was really clean and had some really thoughtful touches and amenities.

The cottage was amazing! Very quaint, clean, tidy and amazing. Loved the stairs, and the way the cottage felt. My dog loved the stairs as well as the back garden! The hot tub is a great amenity. Elizabeth was amazing, and responded very quickly to questions or any needs.
I love this cottage and will completely return again.
Appreciated the eggs and fruit for breakfast before our adventures inside and outside of Salem. Lovely guest house! Great location. Elizabeth is wonderful!
Never had a host be so quick to respond to questions with a manor of kindness. I would recommend staying here to all. It’s very cozy and easy to make a temporary home in.
It’s a wonderful place.

Elizabeth was so friendly and accommodating. She made sure we had everything we needed and explained how to work the hot tub when we arrived. The place was cozy and the bedroom had a large TV with cable and HBO. Highly recommend!
Prompt communication from host.

Lovely and quaint guest house with everything I needed. I felt cozy and comfortable in a peaceful setting. Wonderfully close to shops and restaurants. I would definitely book this place again for a longer stay.

This cottage was so nice ! Very quietly placed near the pool and hot tub tucked away in the back , house was clean and had awesome amenities . She really puts her own touch to making the stay worth it ! We had everything we could’ve needed and definitely will be coming back. Side note about the area, we had an amazing delivery from the Chinese Hong Kong house , delicious !

Elizabeth is a top notch host.  Her guest cottage has EVERYTHING you need,  plus stuff you didn't realize you needed until you see it. From breakfast for tomorrow morning to a sewing kit in the bathroom to a throw blanket to wrap around your shoulders Elizabeth has thought of everything. The bed is super comfy. The place is as clean as a pin. There is a full kitchen. I could have stayed forever.
Cozy home for our small family to stay one night. Good coffee and baby slept well in the pack-n-play. We didn't make it to the hot tub, but wish we could have.
Great,  private space. Super convenient! Everything you need is right there.

This special little place is absolutely adorable! It is hidden just enough to feel like you are away, but close to everything! It has everything you could need for a short stay, or even a week or longer! We absolutely loved everything about it and hope to be back soon!

I really loved Elizabeth’s Guest house. She was friendly and accommodating. I really enjoyed that about her place. I wish I could stay longer. It seems like a perfect place to work or study while being in Salem! It is really close to everything. I love the co-op grocery store right around the corner. And it was nice be able to walk around. I also liked that my car had a awning. It just felt like a cute Europe get away. It was exactly what I was needing. Thank you!
We had car trouble and didn’t get to stay there but were happy with great communication. Looks lovely!
Such a beautiful spot. Along with some of the best hospitality I’ve had!
A very at-home feel. Really appreciated extras in the kitchen and availability of accessories in the bathroom. Flawless communication with elizabeth. Would definitely return.
Loved the place! The only bummer was we couldn't get the flames to work on the fireplace but otherwise it was 5 star place and experience!!
Perfect spot for our few night stay in Salem. Great location, close to stores and restaurants. Elizabeth is a super attentive host. I’d highly recommend this place.
Wonderful place to stay.
Very beautiful place. Above and beyond touches like flowers and food. Right in the heart of Salem. Fantastic place to stay
Cozy place to get away for awhile. A welcoming and hospitable environment and close to everything you need! Would definitely recommend

Great cozy apartment. It checked all the boxes, cable, full kitchen (w snax & fruit), hot tub (and pool!), good location, and Elizabeth was a great host!  If we have business in Salem again we’ll be back for sure.
Elizabeth was very timely about her responses. She have clear and accurate check in details, and was always available if we needed something. King size bed was great!
We loved the stay. Completely easy, clear communication, and very cozy. Thank you!
Elizabeth's place was very homey and welcoming. I would definitely book again if I return to the area.

If you are looking for a quiet comfortable stay in Salem - this is it. Elizabeth has a wonderful place within close proximity to much of what Salem has to offer.

The hot tub, dvd collection and kitchen served all our needs for our brief stay!

Super cute and comfy place for us to rest and relax for the night.  Great communication, everything you might need is there - even snacks!  We tried the local Thai place - great call, it was delicious!  Thank you for a nice experience.
Super quaint cottage. Very friendly host. They clearly want to make sure you have what you need. We had a great time.

The cottage was perfect for us. It is spotless. The hostess put out fresh flowers, snacks and bottled water. We were there in winter. The pool was closed. But with the pool, BBQ, deck chairs it looks like it would be great in the summer. We loved it!!!!

Elizabeth's Guesthouse exceeded our expectations, with a lot of wonderful touches throughout. Iit was spacious enough for 4 people and our pup. Check-in and out was a breeze and coming and going was also very easy and simple. Thank you for the wonderful stay - we will definitely re-book if back in the area!
Sweet spot! enjoy the stay
We enjoyed our quick overnight getaway here. The host was quick with responses, the hot tub was great & we will be back!
Good stay. Clean. 👍🏼👍🏼

First visit to Salem yet I felt right at home. I should start out by mentioning that my spouse and I appreciated the holiday decor. We won't be traveling back to the Southeast for Christmas, so having little touches like that provided us with warm feelings of family. This spot was in an excellent location, boasts a hot tub, and your fur-family is accepted with open arms. What's not to appreciate? We're already excited about exploring the many vineyards that surround Salem in the warmer months to come. If Elizabeth has the availability I'll def return. Thank you for all the responses to my questions and hosting us as your guests.

We were more then pleasantly surprised upon your arrival at this little guest house. Not only is the space cute and impeccably clean, but Elizabeth goes above and beyond to be an amazing host...I rented the place last minute for a girls night, Elizabeth’s hospitality really made us feel welcome! She was easy to reach and so accommodating and she left a generous amount of snacks and treats for us. The hot tub was nice too! My husband and I are avid Airbnb goers and we usually don’t stay the same place twice (we like to see different places) but I am definitely hoping to return in the future.

Elizabeth provided a wonderful stay. There's a reason this is our second stay with her. The accommodations were splendid and it was everything we needed for our stay. Why are you still reading this review? You should be booking NOW!

Adorable and cozy space, it was decorated super cute for the holiday season. The hot tub was perfect for the cool clear evening.
The kitchen is well stocked with and some great snacks and breakfasty items.
Loved the Cottage and look forward to another stay when it's time for a mini getaway
Amazing place and people!
Great space! Good location for my night away.

Elizabeth’s guest cottage is super cute and well stocked. Everything you need is there! I didn’t use the pool, but it was great to sit in the hot tub for a bit. It is close to restaurants and other shopping if you need anything. It was a nice retreat from my day-to-day life.

We stayed at Elizabeth's in the middle of a long road trip with our pup and it was a perfect place to get some rest. There were lots of thoughtful touches including a well-stocked kitchen. We hope to return for a longer stay and use the jacuzzi.
My second time staying here & will be back again in the summer to try the pool! Elizabeth is accommodating & very fast to respond/correct any issues that arise.
We had a great stay in Elizabeth’s centrally located and clean Airbnb! Nice set of locale sites/things to do she provided as well !
We had a great stay at Elizabeth’s, the bnb was stocked with snacks and some breakfast foods, coffee, and plenty of movies and board games to enjoy. Definitely enjoyed the hot tub on a chilly night!
thank you
The place was perfect. Clean, cozy and the hot. tub was just wjat was needed for the night away.
Stayed overnight while on a road trip. Check-in was easy, and stay was very comfortable! Elizabeth was prompt in her responses. Highly recommend!
Elizabeth had amazing communication and we really appreciated it
Great place and very cozy!
Home away from home

You can expect to have all your creature comforts at your fingertips. Much nicer than any hotel. Private yet right in the heart of Salem.  A comfortable bed, efficiently stocked kitchen, and perfect WiFi meets all your needs. The outside environ is like being in a landscape heaven. The host service feels like family to me thanks for our 7 weeks.

The cottage is very clean, tastefully decorated, and has so many thoughtful touches including breakfast accommodations, snacks, and all the means to cook a full meal. We enjoyed the hot tub after a long day of hiking the Trail of Ten Falls. Elizabeth was so super communicative and helpful!! Overall, our stay was very clean and comfortable and has excellent amenities . We will definitely stay again if we are in the area!
clean, warm and cozy. super easy to find and conveniently located. Elizabeth was super accommodating for us as well!
Elizabeth’s Airbnb provided comfort and tucked away from street noise. The little touches of hospitality items, from breakfast to use of the hot tub made for a relaxing stay.
outstanding 5 stars.

This place is a gem. First, it is easy to locate, just a few feet off a main street in Salem. Near many great places to eat (Try Acme for Breakfast it is incredible.) I needed a charger, and there was an office depot very close.

The host is INCREDIBLE. She takes you through the entire place, explaining all the amenities and how to use heat, stove, & leaves you breakfast in the fridge, snacks and fruit on the counter

There were huge fluffy towels to luxuriate in...a basket of "did you forget" items including things like toothbrushes & other toiletries. The bed was comfy, the fireplace provided nice ambiance.

This location offers peace...though it sits close to everything, it is nestled into a wooded area and is secluded. Your car is parked safety under a carport. And a lovely desk with plug ins for your computer and phone. I'm working on a book and I got several hours of blissful writing done while I was there!

Book this place, you won't be sorry.
The hot tub was lovely! The kitchen was also very nice. Very clean interiors and a convenient location!
The hot tub was perfect for a relaxing time. The space was cozy and inviting. Perfect for a weekend away.

Elizabeth’s house was very welcoming and very clean. Amazing hospitality and she was very easy to get ahold of if i needed it. The place is beautiful! Definitely recommend this home to others. Many amazing snacks were left as well

Elizabeth's home was very comfortable and welcoming.  Nice additional charm of fresh flowers, which were lovely.  In addition she had snacks and breakfast items available. She responded quickly when we had a question, we were very happy with our stay. I would definitely stay here again.
Elizabeth’s place was so sweet and comfortable. The fresh eggs from her chickens were a lovely touch.
Great place.  We really appreciated the extra amenities like snacks and basic toiletries.
We absolutely loved our far-too-short stay at Elizabeth's place. Honestly, one of the most well-appointed and thoughtfully laid out AirBnb's I've stayed in (including those abroad).
Comfortable stay, nice personal touches and a great value for the space. Perfect for a Salem visit. My parents stayed an extra day!
We absolutely loved this home.  Elizabeth made sure we had all we needed and the place was so peaceful. Loved the location being so close to the center of town and will definitely stay again!
Super communication, everything was easy. Great spot! Would stay again.
It's a nice home and very close to market area.

This cottage was a nice little tucked away spot that was still in a convenient location. Parking was super easy, as was checking in. We appreciated the full kitchen and some staple foods/snacks that were available. The host was super quick to answer questions and always had someone on standby even if she was not available. We were there at the unlucky time for the AC to be acting up on a hot night, but the hosts were super quick to respond with some troubleshooting tips (the issue had never happened before) as well as where the fan was stored. Overall it was a convenient place for our weekend stay - we'd stay again!
very nice cottage would highly recommend
Outstanding! Beautiful place. Great communication and out of this world hospitality. This place was perfect! A million and one thoughtful touches.

This is a warm and inviting oasis tucked away just off a major thoroughfare. Welcoming host with wonderful suggestions for food just 1-2 blocks away—several good options. Comfy bed, quiet and many special touches including fresh eggs for breakfast. All together a lovely stay for our quick getaway to the Willamette Valley

This is a totally charming place, very private, with thoughtful amenities including farm-fresh eggs for breakfast and a hot tub.  Just FYI: steep stairs to the bedroom, but if that's not a problem then this is a wonderful spot.
Amazingly Charming airBnB, Elizabeth is Royal.
Wonderful spot, super clean and such a kind host. There were so many little touches that made the stay special and easy. So helpful to have such a responsive and communicative host!

Cute place with all amenities that were listed. Elizebeth was the sweetest with a daily message offering to help with any needs or any questions at any time. When we come back to Salem to visit we defiantly will be staying there! Everything was better than advertised.

What a gem! Loved the extra touches and clear attention to details.
Lovely home away from home feeling.
Great place and nice property for the price and area. Great Host!
Cozy and wonderful little spot! The pool was cold and refreshing, the hot tub was soothing and nice. Loved the breakfast items and snacks provided. Will definitely be back!
Awesome place! Stayed just for a night and it was cute, clean, comfortable and in a safe area. Communication from host was great. Would definitely stay here again!
We loved our stay at Elizabeth's cottage. The cottage was exactly as described and the breakfast options were great! We also enjoyed the hot tub and the proximity to downtown.
Elizabeth was a great host. We enjoyed our stay at her cottage house. It was a really nice experience to stay at her mansion. We would definitely revisit next time if we are bypassing Salem.
A secluded lovely charming cottage. Many extra touches and a comfortable bed. Beautiful landscaped yard and easy to find. Must visit again!

Awesome place to experience Salem! Spacious guest house with full kitchen and 2 floors, next to the pool on a huge property.

Elizabeth gave great recommendations of wineries and restaurants, and was very communicative. Also really appreciated all of the thoughtful touches such as breakfast goods, snacks, fresh eggs and all the kitchen amenities to cook with as well. One of her restaurant recommendations, La Hacienda Real, had the most authentic Mexican food we have had for a long time!! (My partner being a very lucky Mexican food eater highly approved!) And handmade tortillas. DELICIOUS.

It was awesome to be able to use the hot tub, and the property and gardens were super beautiful. On site parking was wonderful.

Unfortunately the pool wasn't clean and ready to swim in, but the hot tub was amazing and it didn't make our experience any less awesome here. Highly recommend!

Elizabeth was a great host who went the extra mile for us in terms of service and quality of stay. Possibly the best place to stay out of our entire trip to Oregon. Thank you again Elizabeth for letting us use your guest house!

Perfect, cozy little cottage for 2-3 people. All you need for a stay with lots of extra touches. Bedroom upstairs. Airy and comfortable. We were able to host a small group pool side for a graduation celebration and Elizabeth provided lots of extras for us to pull it off. Excellent communication and very attentive!! Wish we were closer and could stay again!
#1 Airbnb for location price and host just tops it off with the best of the best in my opinion for a young bachelor like myself.
What a wonderful cottage! Located in a great area, beautiful home, and hostess was wonderful. Definitely will book again

Elizabeth's guest cottage was very nice. It was modern, spacious, comfortable, clean, and full of nice amenities and personal touches. There were fresh flowers, fresh fruit and eggs, snacks, toiletries, games, local info, etc. The kitchen was very well stocked and the property was beautiful. Elizabeth was very welcoming and accommodating, although I never actually met her in person. And Los Baez is right down the street!

Elizabeth is a 5 star hostess. The little guest house is nice and the house and yard beautiful. The main house also has guests and it was quite busy while I was there.

She’s song a great job!!

I love this place, perfect location. Elizabeth provided farm fresh eggs English muffins fruit and yogurt. we didn't have to rush to get breakfast. This also saved us some money that we could spend elsewhere. Wonderful host, checked on us just about every day with a text to make sure we were comfortable. We enjoyed the hot tub it was a little cold for the pool.

Elizabeth’s cottage was a  quiet little oasis. The cottage was very cute, clean, and had many thoughtful little touches. Elizabeth was a great host and very easy to get in touch with. We only wished we could’ve stayed there longer!

Guest comfort and enjoyment are the priorities at Vista Manor! Nestled among trees and flowers, the cottage is five minutes from several store, restaurants, and public transportation. Elizabeth is a wonderful host who spares no effort in facilitating guest satisfaction. Highly recommended, I have already secured a reservation for Fall 2021!

Elizabeth’s guest cottage is the perfect blend of quaint and comfort. It is on an incredibly beautiful property with friendly hosts and an adorable menagerie of animals. I only wish I had more time to stay! (We were on a quick drive-through as part of a cross-country move with pets) I especially loved the upstairs bedroom with a lovely view of the property. Thank you, Elizabeth (and daughter Melissa) for getting us situated! I would love to stay again!
Nice guest home in good and convenient area.
Great place with everything we needed to enjoy Salem
Easy to find, easy check in and super cute place.

Arriving at Elizabeth's Guest Cottage at Vista Manor is like discovering an oasis - Vista Manor is a lovely, lovely property. Elizabeth made everything easy for us. We were delighted to find the Guest Cottage well-supplied with fresh fruit, fresh eggs, and an assortment of snacks, as well as a well-equipped kitchen. We were sorry to be able to stay only one night. I hope to return.

great little duplex big bedroom, fully stocked kitchen and quiet area.
bathroom is small but towels are soft and clean.

We found Elizabeth to be an exemplary host. She filled the refrigerator with waters, yogurts, eggs and English muffins. She also gave us lots of snacks & Kerig coffees. Extra towels & extra pillows were available in our cottage, a big plus for us. The cottage was comfortably air conditioned and there was plenty of hot water. All in all, we give her an A+!

The guest house was immaculate, roomy but still cozy and very comfortable. We didn't end up having time to cook, but there was ample cookware to do so! Elizabeth had snacks, as well as farm fresh eggs in the fridge. Wonderful stay, I am happy our hotel lost our reservation so we were able to stay here instead!

Elizabeth was an incredible host, she was easy to communicate with and happy to accommodate. The space was clean and had everything we could possible need. It’s an older home with quirks but we found them charming. Grateful for a great stay :)

This property is as surprising as it is beautiful. We weren't expecting the beautiful manor house and lush grounds right off of a main street in the middle of town. The location really couldn't have been better, all the necessities are within walking distance and the cottage still manages to feel private and away from the bustle.  Elizabeth was an excellent host and we enjoyed our stay. Would definitely stay again next time we're in the area.

the guest cottage at Vista Manor was a lovely spot to stay on our roadtrip. it was conventley located in town to parks and restaurants. we would definitely stay here again and recommend to others for any type of stay through Salem.
Elizabeth and her daughter were wonderful hosts. Guest house was perfect for our little family. They even allowed the children to feed the chickens. Definitely recommend!
The house was so cute I wished it were my home.  There is a really nice park within walking distance.  We had a nice stay.

Elizabeth is very responsive & in tune to her guests needs.  Cottage is very well equipped & spotless.  Parking is great, groceries, and shopping close by.  Granddaughters had fun in the pool while grandma & Grandpa soaked in the hot tub!  Our stay was great.

Great location! Elizabeth has thought of almost everything to make your stay comfortable. She is attentive and checks in via message to see if you need anything. It’s a peaceful cottage in the middle of the city.

This stay was a great choice for my boyfriend, golden retriever & myself. It was located very close to a nice park for our dog & Elizabeth’s yard was also big to allow for a bit of exercise for the dog. The place itself was nice, roomy & had all the essentials & more - Elizabeth stocked it with snacks, breakfast items were provided for cooking, & extra toiletries. The yard was beautiful & the pool/hot tub was nice to use. The stay was located within walking distance to a few eateries/grocery stores & minutes to the downtown area.
Very pretty house! Elizabeth provided detailed instruction, so I could find the house very easily.
A little hard to find but host gives great directions
