Elizabeth is a great host and so is her home. Her Air B&B has everything you need and then some. This was the most stocked place I have ever stayed in. She even provided breakfast foods; fresh eggs, fruits, English muffins, homemade preserves... If you forgot any toiletries (like me, I forgot my toothbrush) no worries, she's got that. Aspirin, cotton balls... I'm telling you she thought of it all. On top of her insistence of letter her know if you need ANYTHING, how could one have any more needs! she's got it all covered! The cottage is cute and cozy, had every thing you would need to make a meal, is clean, has lots of extra blankets, good working A/C... the yard is peaceful, the pool and spa are a nice to have. Its a good location in Salem.
I hope to return and pay Elizabeth a visit again, kind and thoughtful people like her are a rare find. You will feel at home.

We will be back again and again. And we will send anyone going that way to stay here! What a wonderful place! Super clean, comfy, well decorated, well stocked. Just perfect. and the price is phenomenal! Be aware that the bathroom in the cottage is downstairs, but the stairs were safe and we did not find it a problem at all. We are 70 years old.
This was our second stay and we will go back at least once a year for the tulip festival or just to visit wine country in the Willamette Valley. A++++++ :):)

Outstanding place to stay; the pool and hot tub are a great add-on!  The suite was clean and had everything we needed.  They even had snacks, water, and some food, which was greatly appreciated.  Nice neighborhood and close to the city/downtown and parks.

This was one of the most well stocked and hospital Airbnb’s I have stayed in. There were breakfast items, snacks and lots of bottled water in the fridge. Plenty of coffee options, towels, extra toiletries in case you forgot, etc. The bed was comfortable, and it was so nice to relax by the pool after a long few days on the road. Elizabeth was very attentive, made us feel welcome and made sure we had everything we needed. This was a really great location for a couple, infant and dog.
Thank you for sharing your space.

My wife, dog, and I stayed four nights in the guest cottage while touring Willamette Valley vineyards and the beach.  The cottage is quiet and private but also close to a nice grocery store and restaurants.  Elizabeth provided fresh fruit, a number of snacks, and coffee for breakfast.  Our dog liked walks down the road to the park.  We will definitely stay here again.
This is a great place to stay when in Salem. The guesthouse is very cozy and comfortable. It has everything you would need. The host is very friendly and accommodating. I highly recommend.
Great place.  Elizabeth is an awesome hostess
Loved it. Great place. Lots of space. Pampered with breakfast food and other unexpected amenities. Very quiet. Easy check in and out.

Elizabeth’s Air BnB was great! The pictures she has posted accurately represent what you are booking. We were busy with family while in town so we didn’t really need to reach out to her with questions  but whenever I did reach out she had super prompt responses. Clean, cozy home in a great location, would definitely recommend if you’re needing to stay in Salem, Oregon!! Thanks Elizabeth!

Elizabeth’s home is just like the photos, beautiful!. It’s comfortable, quiet, and has all the amenities you will need for your stay. We felt right at home and were sad to have to leave. The property is gorgeous and we had complete privacy. If we go back to Salem, we will absolutely stay here again!
Good location. Great host. Highly recommend.
Great location in South Salem.  Close to everything.  Have spent a total of over 3 weeks here this summer
Awesome place to stay. Enjoyed the place very much. Elizabeth and her daughter were great hosts and I highly recommend.
Very clean and well equipped. Elizabeth is a great host! She always check on us to make sure that we are okay or if we need anything. Recommended!!!

A great and comfortable place to stay right in the middle of Salem. they offer all the amenities you can think of to make things more comfortable including fresh eggs for breakfast. would stay here again anytime were back in Salem. Even our dog enjoyed his stay :)
Elizabeth was a wonderful and responsive host.  The location was very peaceful and quiet.  All amenities were available.  Comfortable bed.  Would stay here again if the opportunity allows
great host !!!she was really nice.

Very cozy guest cottage with nice appointed touches including yummy homemade jam, fresh fruit and eggs. Great to have designated spaces for parking esp. in a covered carport if you're unloading in the rain. We came late so it was nice to have motion lights turned on. Elizabeth was very accommodating & responsive to our needs even following our late arrival. Thank you for taking care of my surprise gift!The grounds are beautiful, and the critters roaming about kept our dog entertained. We plan to book another stay in the near future!
Perfect place for our short stay in Salem. Had everything we needed and was conveniently located.
Great little spot, close to downtown, cozy, comfy! Nice set up, everything you need, including safe easy parking. Highly recommend!
Another great stay
We had a great stay! Thanks so much!

Lovely spot.  Located near amenities and a great off leash area for your pup is close by. This was a perfect place for us to stay. Host is very communicative and attentive to make sure your stay is a good one.

The Vista Manor was just what was needed for our visit to relatives. It was a convenient location and a comfortable place to relax. While, we didn't cook any meals, the kitchen was fully equipped. We plan to stay again
Great,  great,  great! Loved the location and all the little amenities.
Great place! Thank you
Perfect stay! The space was beautiful and a great place to stay on your trip. Highly recommend
Lovely place and the nicest touch having food in the fridge and snack available for us in the morning for breakfast. Would stay again!
Always our home away from home when visiting family in Salem
This is close to a large variety of options for places to eat. I would definitely rent this place again!
This is the second time we’ve stayed here and will absolutely stay again. It’s clean and in a great location. Perfect little cottage.

This is a great place, centrally located in Salem. It was clean, had all the supplies we needed, and Elizabeth was very communicative and friendly! I was able to do video calls with the Wi-Fi with no issues. There is a Roth's grocery store within walking distance and plenty of restaurants, etc. I will definitely be staying here whenever I come through Salem to visit family. Good spot!
Great, comfy place to stay. Loved the fancy shower head, snacks, and eggs in the fridge for breakfast. Very nice touches!
I’ve stayed here a few times. Great both times. I enjoy the hot tub and the comfortable bed. Will definitely be booking again.

The description of the property matched what we found upon arrival. The check in instructions and photos provided eliminated any confusion. The cottage was comfortable and well equipped. Given this time of year, it was especially helpful to have separate systems for heating upstairs and downstairs. The bed was comfortable and the location extremely quiet so sleeping was excellent.

While we did have a few questions during our stay the response was quick and complete so that’s why we rated the hosts communication and attention to detail as 5 star.

The kitchen was well equipped and we appreciated the extra tray of food available to us if we needed it. The Cottage is in a great location and was in close proximity to all the places we planned to see. No doubt that should we visit Salem again that Elizabeth’s place be a priority to stay at again.
Highly recommended!

Super cute and relaxed! We only stayed one night but we found ourselves wishing for more! Her guest home is cute, private, clean, and extremely well stocked! If we are in the area we will book here again.
The perfect place to stay while in Salem.
This is the second time staying with Elizabeth and we loved the cottage and all the extra touches to make this such an enjoyable and relaxing trip!
The host thought if everything! Cute little place!
Out in the country but close to Gresham! Plenty of room in the guest suite as well as in the common spaces.  A personal, real-home feel and a chance to see the horses and chickens. Loved it!
Had a wonderful stay Elizabeth was very kind and provided a lot in the Airbnb!
This is a comfortable rental with an excellent bed and a well appointed kitchen.
Elizabeth’s place is great! Homey with all the essentials you need to feel your most comfortable. Communication was clear and check-in was easy. I would definitely stay again.
Cozy space with a well stocked kitchen and bathroom. Perfect for a night in Salem with my partner, baby, and dog. Elizabeth was very responsive when we had questions upon arrival.
Elizabeth is quick to respond to messages and very thoroughly provided information. Very accommodating with us bringing our dog. Also very thoughtfully provides amenities should you forget anything.

The whole experience of choosing this property was an excellent process. From the first inquiry communication was quick and thorough.  The property itself is a hidden jewel and Elizabeth’s directions are spot on, her attention to detail was amazing! We were there during Christmas, all the mugs, area rugs,toss pillows ,bedspread, throws and even the tissue boxes were holiday themed. I had recently broken my ankle and was pretty wobbly and using a cane the walkway was kept clear of snow and well lit. Elizabeth provided so many extras , bottled water, yogurt, eggs English muffins, coffees and teas, a big bowl of fruit,various snack items to choose from and more plus a whole basket of toiletries! The property is charming and you’ll never find a better host anywhere - we couldn’t recommend her more highly
The space is great.  Elizabeth kept everything well stocked and ready for us when we arrived.
Elisabeth’s place is very comfy and wonderful communication.  She provides a few extras that really made us feel at home.

This is a very nice place with all the amenities one needs for an extended stay. I was here on work travel for 10 nights. The host is very kind and provides extra touches like breakfast items. She welcomed me with a nice bottle of wine which was great to have after a day of travel getting here. The place is very clean and her touches made this feel like a home away from home.
Perfect place and perfect location!!!!

I travel for work and found Elizabeth’s place was exactly as described. 1st floor is the small living room, a very well stocked kitchen with lots of counter space, dining area with a table large enough to work at, and the bathroom. Upstairs is the large bedroom with king bed & TV with cable. Great parking, 1 block from a main road with shopping & dining, and quiet at night. Elizabeth was very responsive and was an excellent host. I will stay here again.
Elizabeth puts a lot of care and time into making sure her guests have everything they need. Very cozy and clean.

This was my 2nd stay at Elizabeth’s & it was just as good as the 1st. Well-stocked kitchen, comfortable bed, good parking. I’d happily stay here again…and would have done next week except she’s booked!

A great rental property. Cozy, comfortable cottage walking distance to stores and restaurants on Commercial Ave. Exceptionally clean and private. Elizabeth was an excellent communicator. Would definitely look to rent this cottage again!
Great place, great hosts, great location. Cozy, well equipped and quiet. This was I third time stay at Vista Manor and we will be back

The guest house was perfect for our quick trip to Salem.  Decor, amenities, and location was awesome. Elizabeth provided great snacks and a cozy space for our family to stay.  We will be back to explore more of the area.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!  The fully stocked kitchen (complete with fresh eggs and English muffins) was a pleasant surprise and definitely made things easier.   The level of communication was just right and the response to our needs timely.  Highly recommend.

This place is so thoughtful and cozy! Everything you need from bathroom essentials, extra clean linens and plenty of coffee and tea. Elizabeth’s place was super tidy, comfortable and accessible. The little guest cottage was gorgeous and a welcome peaceful nights rest after being on the road all day! Thank you for creating such a thoughtful and comfortable stay !
I made this reservation for my husband & son for a quick visit to Willamette. It was a great spot for them to stay (along with our dog!).  Thank you!
It was such a cute, cozy spot! I loved it!

This was the perfect place for my stay in Salem while completing team training to receive my service dog. Elizabeth was very accommodating, and the location is super close to lots of different stores. A great place to stay if you’ll be spending time in Salem.
Highly recommend!

This was the second half of my stay, and it went very smoothly. Elizabeth had great communication and responded quickly when I had questions. The place was clean, quiet, and served as the perfect home base for all of the activities I needed to attend. I would definitely recommend the Vista Manor to others looking for a place to stay in south Salem.
Lovely place… feels like home :)
Great place to stay! Nice private setting too.
Quiet, comfortable accommodations. Wonderful host
Elizabeth was so easy to deal with, and everything about the location was perfect.
Great unit that is very clean and easy to get to.  We would stay again
Perfect place for my weekend getaway. Elizabeth thought of everything. Whenever I'm in Salem, this would be my first choice.
Great spot. Elizabeth was very responsive and made sure that we knew how to get there. Lots of great food options nearby including massive Whole Foods-like supermarket within 3 minute walk.

I booked a week long stay for a work trip at Elizabeth’s and it was nothing short of fantastic! The cottage is private, quiet and cozy. It was super clean (especially for being dog-friendly) and stayed heated very well!

The entire cottage was well stocked with everything! From dishes and basic cooking needs, to toiletries and extra towels and blankets and pillows. I had everything I needed.

The location is wonderful. I enjoyed being so close to the city center (about 8 minutes) and near by many convenient stores.

Lastly, the entire place is beautiful! Colorful flowers everywhere you look and fun, festive decor all around.

Elizabeth is very responsive and was an amazing host. I will be staying here again!
Peaceful and private and close to everything. Can’t wait to have another getaway to stay here again! One of our faves!
We LOVE this place! The location is fantastic and the property is incredibly lovely. It's good value, with good communication from Elizabeth.  Small problem with tiny ants was quickly addressed.
This is a great stay if you have dogs. There is a huge private yard to walk your dogs. It is clean with a nice kitchenette ready for hime cooking.
A perfect little slice of nostalgia and charm in a modern town - you feel transported to a time of simple pleasures. I almost want to keep this gem a little secret but you really should Book now!
This palce is clean, dog friendly, and a nice kitchenette for home cooking.
Very cozy place to stay. Well stocked and organized if you need to cook. The environment was quiet and wish I could’ve stayed longer although I was just passing through. Highly recommend!
Great communication ! Cute cottage

This was one of the best Airbnb's I've stayed in, and I've been to a lot! Great little touches that you feel like you're at a 5 star hotel! It was about 35 minutes away from Silver Falls Park, which is why I chose this place. My dog loved it ,too!

My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.  Comfortable, cozy, convenient, clean and well apportioned.  Just what we needed for home base for a couple of days.  The size was just right for two.  Beautiful flowers!  Elizabeth was very attentive and helped with our questions.  Loved the fruit basket and snack basket!
We had a very comfortable stay in this charming, private cottage. The host thought of everything, even eggs fresh from the chicken coop! We highly recommend this secluded and comfy hideaway!
Cozy, and a convenient location. Very kind and responsive owner. Comfy bed.
Great location and comfortable retreat in the city. Quick communication, easy check and great spot to stay in Salem.
Great two story cottage, comfy king bed and nice touches of snacks and extra toiletries with an efficient layout.
Beautiful home. Gorgeous garden in lovely area close to everything.

Great hostess.
Very responsive.
Nice and clean.

This little cottage is tucked away inside a beautiful garden nestled in a quiet part of Salem. The cottage stands alone on a property with a larger house and a pool. Elizabeth's communication and detailed instructions to find the house were super helpful as were the lighted pathway past the pool and through the garden as we arrived in the evening and it was fairly dark. The cottage was very clean and has some updates (floor and bathroom) but retains some original charm. Everything was in good working order and the fruit and snack baskets, fresh eggs, English muffins, yogurt, butter, jam, and many condiments were great for sustaining ourselves during our visit. Elizabeth checked in during our stay to make sure we were comfortable which I appreciated and was very responsive when I had a question about the lock. The wi-fi is great and the bed is very comfortable.
Wonderful place.  Everyone you need plus extras.  Thank you.
We enjoyed our stay at the cottage. Cozy and we felt well cared for!

Elizabeth is a thoughtful host. Communication was great! She has thoughtfully provided items you may have forgotten (like make remover wipes, toothbrush, etc). We enjoyed the provided eggs (yummy) for breakfast, as well as the fruit and snacks. Having all that felt like Christmas in June.
The place is clean and well stocked.
Within walking distance to Fred Meyers and Roths and a Starbucks.

Great house! And perfect location. Close to a lot of restaurants and downtown Salem!
And the host is amazing
Wonderful place to stay! Perfect location and check-in/communication with Elizabeth was super easy. Would definitely stay here again!
Great place to stay in Salem! Close to stores and plenty of restaurants as well!
Great stay, clean and quiet. Thank you for letting us have our pets over. Very easy to get a hold of.
Nice stay close to downtown. Great AC and lots of little snacks.
Wonderful stay in beautiful bedroom/office , kitchen/sitting room, bathroom, etc. Easy to get to and beautiful surroundings and decor.

A great place to stay, in Salem. We were there for an Ironman event and this little cottage hit the mark. The kitchen was well supplied, the garden out back was relaxing and peaceful, and it’s very close to everything.
Walking distance to good food, and grocery stores, a few min drive to down town Salem and Riverfront park.
The host is very communicative, and responsive if you need anything. Very well stocked place with great little touches (fresh flowers, little snacks, extra everything in bathroom incase something is forgotten).

It’s like a little quaint hotel run out of a large and beautiful historic feeling home. This cottage is off to the side and very private. We’ll be back for sure.
You want to rent this place. For real. It’s a great, private, clean and comfortably spacious good deal!

Cute little cozy villa in Salem. Clean and exactly as described in the listening. You have your own entrance. If you are looking for privacy-this is it. We were unable to find a location in Eugene for the World Track Event. So, this location in Salem was perfect and only an hour away. We didn’t get to make it to Enchanted Forest with the little one. My plans are to make it back and hoping to stay here again if booking is available. Elizabeth was an excellent host and responded swiftly to needs.
Great stay! Cute and cozy good location very close to restaurants etc Would go again.
Elizabeth is wonderful and the place was stocked with all the essentials. The king bed was such a treat. Thank you!
Thanks for everything. We had a great time!

The space was welcoming and very well maintained.  We arrived during a heatwave and our host made sure the A/C was on to ensure that the home was comfortable when we arrived.  I will definitely book again if I am ever in the area.
Best place i’ve stayed at yet!

Lovely and comfortable stay with a thoughtful and gracious host.  Elizabeth had great communication throughout our stay and was kind and welcoming to our family.  We really enjoyed our visit and are grateful to have been able to utilize her lovely patio and apartment.  We stayed for almost 2 -weeks while remodeling our own house and it was a great experience.  Large comfortable upstairs bed with air conditioning and pet friendly space.  Everything was clean and relaxing.  Good parking also as we needed to have 2 cars with us during our stay.
Nice air bnb that allows pets and is central to everything.
Appreciated the attention to detail given by Elizabeth and the uniqueness of her cottage
We absolutely loved this little place, tucked away in a cozy setting! Quiet, tranquil and peaceful!

Great set up! We really appreciated the detailed check in information provided to us (steps for parking, access to unit, etc. complete with pictures). We enjoyed all the vegetation and flowers on the property. There were some really pretty outdoor spaces. A stocked fruit bowl upon arrival on the counter was a nice touch!

This is a small guest house on the side of a larger house.  The location is on the edge of a residential neighborhood, with apartments on one side.  You are quite close to the main road through Salem, with a grocery store and burger restaurant in walking distance, but most other businesses will require a car.  The hosts are nice, and have provided just about anything you might need in the location.
This is a great place. Beautiful house, very peaceful and awesome location. Elizabeth is a great host!

We enjoyed Salem and Elizabeth's hospitality was fantastic, the extra amenities were generous and the ability to use the entire back yard was great for our dog. Although the space was small and the steep stairs to the bedroom was a challenge for a late night bathroom run, we felt welcomed and had the ability of parking the car in the carport near the guesthouse.
Great location in Salem. Elizabeth was wonderful without being intrusive.

Nice place and very well stocked for anything you could need (extra toiletries, lots of cooking supplies, snacks, towels, etc.) Elizabeth was very responsive and kind. Location is nice and quiet but a short walk/drive to whatever you need. Great that it's pet friendly! Only small thing was there was a bit of a musty smell but overall we had a nice weekend stay here.
Elizabeth was a kind and gentle host with a comfortable side cottage... and a pleasant walk from a difficult testing center!
We have stayed at Elizabeth’s place many times before and enjoyed it every time! It’s a lovely pleasant place with many amenities and great location. We will be back again!
nice stay
Great location, charming and cozy place.  Felt like home so comfortable, quiet .
Séjour très agréable, accueil très chaleureux avec cadeaux de bienvenue (fruits vin aliments..)
Great location and perfect place to get away.
The house was perfect for us. Elizabeth was a great host. Highly recommend!

Elizabeth was a great and friendly host, and provided an amazing space to stay. It was very clean, and well stocked with all the essentials and more. They provided breakfast foods, and even eggs from their own chickens! All in all, it was a great experience, especially for our first AirBnB, and we'd highly recommend it!
Great stay!
Elizabeth's place is clean and cozy.   It is well centered in Salem so you can use it as a central spot to explore the area.    I liked the enclosed area for my dog.  good value.
Great place to stay in Salem! Our host was extremely helpful and responsive and the cottage was easy to find and very private.

We enjoyed a great weekend in Salem, wine tasting right after Thanksgiving. This cottage was close to downtown, super close to many stores, yet felt tucked away from the nearby road. Elizabeth’s place is very clean  and well stocked with everything we needed! And the fresh eggs and fruit in the morning were an extra special touch! The king bed upstairs was really comfortable - we slept well. Elizabeth was such a gracious host, and went out of her way to accommodate our early arrival. We truly enjoyed our stay, and would definitely return again!
Elizabeth is great! We stayed during the holidays and the room was completely decorated for it. Cozy space and she allows pets. Can't recommend enough.  A+
Elizabeth was a great host and the home was perfect. Very well stocked, very clean and so comfortable. Our dog loved the big yard to run and play in.

Lots of great touches like fresh flowers and fruit basket. Elizabeth was very responsive. I would definitely recommend this place. My only dislike was having to go up and down the stairs in the night to use the restroom.
Perfect place for a stopover and appreciated the parking nearby so don’t have to unload quite everything. Dogs were comfy and appreciated the treats and eggs and breakfast things.
We really enjoyed our stay and look forward to coming again.

Nice homey place with a carport for guest parking. The was kitchen extremely well stocked with snacks and breakfast items available for guests. King sized bed upstairs very comfortable.
There is pool near the entrance of the guest unit - something to consider for people with small children.
Cute place. Elizabeth was a great host

The place is great very private, and the amenities were perfect. The only thing may be to improve on is I arrived after dark, and it was a little hard to see the path to the place next to the pool. The only other comment I have is the light above the hood in the stove is burned out other than that it was a great stay.

We stayed at Elizabeth’s place for a night before heading to Bend. Her cottage was cute, comfortable and well stocked. Elizabeth was responsive to all questions we had. Would have loved to stay longer!
Adorable cottage. Well stocked with everything you could want!
Best-equipped kitchen ever in an Airbnb!  Lovely private fenced yard.  Quiet setting in the heart of the city, and dog-friendly!
I have a big pickup and parking wasn’t easy but other than that… it was a great spot
Elizabeth’s place is fantastic - clean, comfortable, and convenient. Elizabeth was extremely responsive and helpful - top notch stay.

Our stay at Vista Manor was just perfect for a place of our own--a refuge after tiring days of family reunion and the joy of little great grandchildren.   Everything was warm and cozy during stormy winter days.   We could not have asked for more friendly and helpful hosts.  We enjoyed every part of our stay and appreciated Elizabeth letting us extend a few more days when our family reunion was extended.
Cozy cottage. Well-stocked kitchen. Appreciated the breakfast items provided.

The place was great just not really what I needed.  Probably better for someone younger. The bed was upstairs and the bath down. I probably should have read the listing more carefully. It was very private and probably quite beautiful in spring and summer. Parking was great. The kitchen was well stocked. Elizabeth was very kind and proactive in her communication.
Elizabeth was extremely friendly and professional, made sure we were doing well and had everything we needed, even made a couple of exceptions for us due to our situation.

Stylishly decorated with new furniture, comfortable and clean. Kyle thoughtfully provided everything in this space—from Keurig machine to bottled water and snacks to hair drier.  There’s a small kitchenette area with hot plate and mini fridge, plates, kitchen knives, glass ware, etc.  The property is awesome as well—in the woods with deer commonly visiting the property.  I very much enjoyed my stay. Thank you, Kyle!
Awesome place to stay, nice and spacious. Great amenities.
10/10 will stay here whenever I’m in Salem

Peaceful and quiet in a forest setting yet so close to downtown. Nice crisp Oregon air. Open space feel. Super cute and decorated with a nice and clean look. Lots of goodies and snacks provided by host. Small kitchenette but had everything you needed. It’s almost private except the laundry room is shared with the guests in the ensuite.

Staying with Kyle was an exceptional experience. My partner and I stayed for ten nights when we were first moving to the area and Kyle was over-the-top kind and welcoming to us and our critters. His apartment is wonderfully put together and includes many thoughtful touches that made us feel cozy and at home. He was easy to communicate with, both before and during our stay,  and offered us great local tips on things to check out. And finally, his location is beyond amazing. We saw baby deer almost every day and woke up each morning to birds singing. It was overall a fantastic experience and we are grateful for having such an excellent host!

We had a wonderful stay at Kyle's place. The amenity that he provided is just amazing. A very comfortable bed, a upscale bathroom and a well stocked refrigerator are just among the few things that he provides. The property is secluded in the woods, yet only minutes away to city center. We had nice conversations, and he is just a great host. We wished we can stay longer! Thank you Kyle!
Kyle’s place is spacious, relaxing, and includes many special touches that were welcome surprises after a long, hot day. Stay here if you are in the area!

This is a very lovely place !
The accomodation is locates five minutes from the city, and yet on the middle of the woods !
We saw deers, chipmunks, squirrel and nice birds.

The host gave us an excellent welcome ! He helped us for etablish our iterares, he answered very quicly for helping us, he was very caring .

But he also knows how to be discreet and we felt comfortable, and I felt especially good in the hammock ! :-)

The housing is very nice and spacious, impeccable, and well equiped.
The best adress in Oregon !

Excellent adresse . L'hôte nous a réservé un excellent accueil : il nous a aidés à établir nos itinéraires, nous a donné des idées de sorties, de petites adresses pour nos courses, il a répondu rapidement à toutes nos petites questions. Mais il a su aussi faire preuve de discrétion et nous laisser vivre notre vie .
Nous nous sommes sentis très à l'aise dans ce magnifique petit logement et nous y avons passé du bon temps ! J'ai aimé passer de longs moments de lecture dans le hamac . J'ai pu observer des écureuils , des chipmunks, de beaux oiseaux et même un chevreuil femelle et son faon .

Le logement est situé à dix minutes à peine de la ville, et pourtant au milieu des bois .

IMMACULATE!  This place is beautiful! Kyle is very nice, although I only saw him the first night. I truly enjoyed our stay and would stay here again. It is secluded and we enjoyed the deer and chipmunks that cane around to say “hi” each day. There isn’t a kitchen sink, but that wasn’t an issue for us. The bathroom sink was more than adaquate for our needs. The bed is extremely comfortable. The sheets feel very clean and soft. Kyle pays attention to many details and  has great decorative style. We loved this place!

Kyle’s place is a true gem! I wish we would have planned for a longer stay. Very comfortable bed and the place had everything you could possibly need. Great location to visit Willamette Valley. One of the best Airbnb experiences we have ever had. Don’t miss this place!
Feels like you are in the woods, yet still close to town. The space was very comfortable for two.  Kyle is a great host!

We will definitely keep this location on our 5 star list of sites.  We were there to help family and  Kyle was always prompt with a response whenever we had a question.  He was very accommodating, I casually mentioned my husband liked dark beer, when we arrived we found a very nice 6 pack in the fridge.  The apt was nice, clean, and quiet, and we will definitely will be back.

Kyle deserves more than 5 stars for his beautiful AirBnb and the amenities he provides.  The property is stunning and living area is beautifully decorated and so comfortable.  I particularly appreciated the great coffee selection!!  Kyle is welcoming, thoughtful and quick to help with anything you need.  I wish I had booked a longer stay.

While staying at this beautiful location you are truly on vacation. Kyle insists on making your stay comfortable and care free. His home was pet friendly to our two well-behaved dogs. Kyle really thought about every detail you would want and many more you didn’t even know you’d want! We felt welcome and right at home from the moment we pulled in to the driveway. Kyle was quick to respond if we needed anything. I would recommend this location to anyone. You’re close enough to town to run to the store or park, but, when you’re “at home” it’s easy to forget that you’re not tucked away peacefully in the woods. There is a lot of “Oregon Charm” in the home and we can’t wait to stay again!

Kyle’s place is immaculate. Every attention to detail has been met. I cannot express how accommodating, kind and flexible Kyle was, in regards to my stay and my needs. This place is an incredible value.
One of our best experiences with Airbnb.  Kyle is a fantastic host.  Everything is thought of to make your stay worthwhile.
Great, quiet spot. Very comfortable, and Kyle is a thoughtful host.

Kyle is a congenial host who clearly knows how to accommodate his guests .  We felt very at home in this space, which is extremely clean, comfortable and updated.  We appreciated the tasteful furnishings and the many extra welcoming touches.  Rentals don't get much better .... we would definitely come back!

This is perfect in every way, especially if you value privacy. It is just minutes from downtown Salem. Everything is new, stylish, comfortable and charming. It is certainly an excellent bargain. Kyle sets the standard for an Air BNB host. You will not be disappointed.

Our stay with Kyle was exceptional. He didn't miss a thing from the cold wine to a great comfy bed. The space was exceptionally clean warm and friendly. So close to so many things it's a great place to stay in Salem.

Kyle was a great host and the place was excellent.  We were well informed of what to expect upon arrival and throughout our stay.  The location is close to many of the places we wanted to go yet out of the way of main traffic.

This was a peaceful, quiet place with exceptional amenities. I loved the decor, comfortable surroundings, wine in the fridge and shampoo in the bathroom, along with a nice TV, movies and even Alexa to turn on the lights or play a favorite song. Kyle was very responsive and an excetional host. We would definitely return!
Kyle has a fabulous, stylish, comfortable luxurious Hideaway that I plan on visiting again!

Very comfortable private first floor home with everything you need.. we recommend staying here. Kyle checked with us to make sure we had everything we needed but we also had lots of privacy.  Such a beautiful area.. it’s like being in the country but still close to everything. Beautiful views from gorgeous big windows!!
This place is AWESOME. Kyle was super helpful and hospitable, and we enjoyed our stay so much. Super cool spot with awesome amenities and nice location.
I had a great stay at Kyle's.  It's a beautiful location, great amenities and a thoughtful host.  I'll be back.

Kyle’s place is amazing and he is such a thoughtful and supportive host. I needed a solution to a unique situation and he was great to work with. Cocoa the cat loved the stay there as well. Definitely my first choice anywhere in Oregon!

I’ve stayed at Kyle’s place several times now and it always feels good to relax and treat the space like home. Kyle puts allot of thought and energy into his guests and goes way beyond to make it a great experience. Thank you Kyle — I love Oregon!

Perfect weekend for a man (my husband) and his dog to get away for the weekend. Quiet spot. Kyle was incredibly responsive and offered to stock the fridge with some beverages of our choosing. Very thoughtful!
Kyle’s place is amazing! Everything I expected and more. This will become my go to when in Salem.

A fantastic place in the woods and yet close to the city.  Kyle is really a special host.  We highly recommend staying at Antlerwood.  Easy parking.  Spacious living room/dining area,  separate bedroom and bathroom...all beautifully appointed.  Kyle went out of his way to make our weekend very special.  It's a "must do" if you are exploring the area.

Impeccably clean, very spacious and extremely comfortable. Loved all the vintage cameras and the electric "wood-burning" stove. Kyle's place is both cozy and charming and a really great retreat for relaxing after a long day visiting with family. Tucked into the trees with deer roaming out front yet just a few minutes from downtown. Even though it's on the bottom floor underneath the main part of the house, it is incredibly quiet and private. We would come back here in a heartbeat next time we're in town!
A very nice place to stay at and I hope to stay there on future visits to my son’s family
Expect a thoughtful, comfortable stay.

Kyles place was awesome!! So clean, decorated up to date and Kyle was so thoughtful with it being my husband and I’s 25th anniversary.  He made sure everything was perfect for us.  Kyle has great recommendations of wineries.  Definitely will stay here again if we’re in the area.

Kyle's place was wonderful to stay at!  We had everything we needed, plus many thoughtful touches that were much appreciated (e.g., preferred beverages provided after Kyle inquired).  We would recommend his place to others and likely stay again!

Kyle has set the bar high for those wishing to be super hosts. He is a genuinely nice man and he has made may thoughtful  touches to his beautiful place and keeps improving it--he added beautiful flower boxes to the guest's outside space while we were there.  It's tucked in the woods so the deer, chipmunks and squirrels were frequent sights, but still close to town. We highly recommend staying at this very special AirBnB.
Excellent property! Great place to unwind and be treated like a super guest
Beautiful inside and out! Plenty of space—a really quiet getaway.

Kyle far exceeds the definition of super host. His thoughtfulness, extreme attention to detail and wonderful location made it hard to leave when the time came.  We will be back.  Five stars all around. Thanks Kyle!

Kyle is the consummate host, and his place is the perfect hideaway for a couple wishing to spend time in South Salem. The mini-apartment is situated in a woodsy area, is quite spacious and comfortable, and it’s nicely decorated. Bonus—it’s pet-friendly, too! It was the perfect place for us; we wanted to eat breakfast in but had no desire to cook lunch and dinner at the apartment. The hot plate provided sufficed just fine for us. The bathroom is spacious and beautifully decorated. Kyle thought of everything, even down to the beer in the fridge and the bottle of Pinot Noir on the table.

One last note: Most. Comfy. Bed. Ever.
Lovely secluded house, still very close to Salem. Plenty of space, special decor selections, pet friendly!
Great place to stay
Such a cute place!
This place is a treasure; super clean, comfortable, beautiful setting. Kyle went above and beyond to welcome our family. Totally recommend.
Thank you! Amazinging trip!

If I could give Kyle’s place an infinite number of stars, I would! The guest suite was super stylish, homey, and had every thing I needed. The entire property is beautiful, and it’s in an amazing neighborhood.

Kyle is an amazing host as well. Super polite and accommodating, and left me with coffee and wine to enjoy during my stay! He is great at communicating with his guests, responds quickly. I even managed to lock myself out one night and he quickly got my text/call and let me in with no frustration, even though I know it was a pain.

I would stay here a hundred times more!
Kyle's place is in a scenic quiet area. Amazing space to stay in, anything and everything that was thought of to make it cozy and relaxing.
A peaceful  and quiet location.  Kyle is an attentive host and most accommodating .  AT&T service not so good, even with Kyle generous sharing fo his WiFi booster
Great place in a great location! Kyle went above and beyond!! I would highly recommend this stay!

We were landing super late in Portland, thus arriving at ~2 am to Salem. Kyle made accommodations, which included even making a bed for my son (@sofa-bed)!
I felt that he was the kindest host I ever experienced at Airbnb...
The property was very well lit and easy to find at night; quiet, but still close to Salem...

Kyle's Antlerwood Hollow provides a calm and peaceful setting for a weekend getaway, a staycation, or in my case a longer-term transitional residence as I moved cross-country to Oregon from Texas. This hidden gem is nestled amongst beautiful trees, hills, and winding roads and offers frequent sightings of deer. The place is sparkling clean, stylishly decorated, pet-friendly with approval, and minutes from restaurants and shops. It's easy to find and equipped with every amenity you could possibly need or want. Kyle has a delightful personality and energy and he ensures the comfort of his guests. He's very responsive and attentive to messages and needs. He even won over my sweet but skeptical pup. I would highly recommend a visit to Antlerwood Hollow. You'd think after 3 weeks there I wouldn't want to go back for a while, but I would certainly stay again for a weekend getaway or staycation.

Kyle's place was perfect for my family to spend a couple of nights. The living area is spacious enough to hang out and play games, with a fold out couch and extra mattresses. There are plenty of amenities: parking, good lighting, Alexa for communication and music, even several options for making coffee. The location is better than expected, five minutes from restaurants in South Salem and near downtown as well. We would definitely stay again.

Kyle’s place was amazing! Best Airbnb and better than any hotel we’ve ever stayed in! Every amenity was perfect and so many personal touches! We visit our family in Salem often, so I hope this place will be available each trip. The scenic trail behind the house is beautiful and was perfect to take our young grandsons on. Can’t say enough good things about Antlerwood! Thank you, Kyle!
Clean and perfectly decorated space! Host was very quick with responding and accommodating!

What an amazing little hidden paradise. Probably the nicest, cleanest, and best neighborhood around. Kyle will go out of his way to make sure you have everything you want. Deer and birds daily, chipmunk and rabbit too, say hello to my Stellar Jays while you’re there, I know they miss me.
Kyle’s place was a wonderful and relaxing place to stay. He had a warm welcome waiting for us. His place is beautiful and was very clean. We enjoyed the beautiful and peaceful settings.

I wish I could give 20 stars! Kyle's place was super clean and comfortable with thoughtful touches all over the place - including a personalized sign welcoming us and our dog by name! The space is well designed and stocked with everything one could possibly need. Kyle was extremely easy to communicate with and helped recommend a great place to go hiking. We are really looking forward to the next opportunity we have to take a trip down to Salem so that we can stay at Kyle's place again!

Well decorated, spacious and good location. Hot water and water pressure was great. Loved the bed, so comfortable and nice bedding!!!

Heater stove in living area and portable heater fan in bedroom.

Washer and dryer worked well and nice to have access to.

Beer in fridge but I don’t drink beer so I didn’t partake but nice touch. There were many coffee choices as well.

Quiet downstairs unit. There are two steps up and over to go from living room to bedroom. Sink in bathroom or utility room, none in the kitchen just as advertised.

First day was warm so Kyle turned on AC so the Airbnb unit could cool down. Unit does not have its own control of temperature/AC.

As mentioned, AT&T service is not the greatest in the unit.
Peace, a little heaven, relax... amazing place... near the city but out...
Kyle is very thoughtful and accommodating and the suite is extremely clean and in a beautiful location.

We typically don't stay in "shared space" airbnb's.  Don't miss this rustic, chic space for that reason! Kyle's place was comfortable and inviting and he was available by a simple text when we asked questions.  The coffee was amazing, with a touch of espresso! Kyle even had a case of water waiting for us when we arrived.   There was plenty of room for my husband and I.  We ate breakfast in and ate dinner at restaurants in town that Kyle suggested.  We were not disappointed.  Don't pass up this gem.
This is a great find. Kyle thought of everything. Very comfortable stay!
This is a wonderful place to stay! Very cozy and comfortable. Much needed getaway. Will stay again!

This suite was perfect for our stay in Salem. The space was comfortable and clean, and the property is absolutely beautiful while still being accessible to a lot in Salem. Kyle was very welcoming and hospitable.
Space was great! Lots of privacy despite being a “shared” space - barely! Loves that dogs are welcomed, great outdoor space, great bathroom supplies and had local beer for us in the fridge.

Kyle has a wonderful place to relax...a great assortment of movies..nice computer table...extremely comfortable bed with soft pillows...a dual head shower with nice soft towels...the place also has multiple sitting areas and hammocks where you can relax and take in nature...will definitely return

This stay was INCREDIBLE! Kyle treated both myself and my dogs like family. I couldn’t ask for more. His AirBNB was beautiful and incredibly cozy. All the amenities you could imagine and MORE! Sweet touches like beer in the fridge and coffee for the morning!

The surrounding woods and wildlife were magical. We saw deer multiple times, rabbits, squirrels, the works.

Kyle went above and beyond for us and I’ll feel forever grateful. When the California fires were raging and I needed a few more days to crash, Kyle was more than willing to help me out.

This stay will wow you beyond belief, no matter what your expectations are. Adult friendly, kid friendly, and dog friendly :) Enjoy yourself!

We can't say enough about Kyle's excellent communication and his attentiveness to our needs during our 2-1/2 month stay. The Airbnb space is very comfortable plus the location is only minutes to downtown and Minto-Brown Island Park, a place that we loved going for walks and bike riding. We especially appreciated being able to bring our cat with us as we were moving from another state to Oregon. We give Kyle an A+ for his friendliness and kindness.  We would highly recommend staying at Antlerwood Hollow - a place that feels like you're on retreat in the woods. Thank you ❤️
Kyle’s place is lovely, comfortable, clean, and all that you would hope for in an air bnb. We will stay here again.
Amazing stay! Kyle helped me build a fire to roast s'mores. BEAUTIFUL home...can't wait for my next visit.
Antlerwood Hollow is full of the little touches that a traveler needs and appreciates.  The property feels rural, but is minutes from some of the best amenities Salem has to offer.

The only thing you need to bring is your toothbrush.  Just about everything is there and even more.  Highly recommend this place. Like I told him if we come back I’ll check to see what dates are available and will plan our trip back to Salem around his free time
The best Airbnb experience I’ve ever had!

Antlerwood Hollow was one of my all-time favorite short-term rentals. As an artist/writer working remotely during the pandemic, I've been feeling so claustrophobic in city apartments, unable to work in coffee shops like I always have. At Antlerwood Hollow, I delighted in all the different places to work -- desk, kitchen table, couch, comfy armchair, reading chair in the bedroom, even Adirondack chairs outside when the weather permitted. The space is much larger than it appears in photos, and the setting is gorgeous. Kyle was an incredibly kind and helpful host, going above and beyond a number of times for me and my little pup. I stayed nearly two weeks, and would have stayed longer! A forest dream-come-true.
This is an awesome space, in a beautiful part of Salem. Kyle was very accommodating.

Very cozy and welcoming space. Kyle gives lots of personal touches that make that space feel like home. Unfortunately we were there during a freak ice storm, but we were well cared for and our needs were all met! Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to get out of the city but still have all the amenities close by!
Lovely place in the woods but very. Lose to downtown Salem and wineries.
Felt like being a guest in someone’s home but with all the amenities you would find in a hotel all in a beautiful setting. We will definitely be back.

Kyle is an amazing host!!   We have stayed at Antler Wood  Hollow twice now and have been very pleased.   His place is amazingly clean and inviting.   It has a very comfortable bed.  It is nice and warm and off of the beaten path, and has an amazing living room with a great movie collection.   We have already booked our 3rd vacation here.   Kyle is a super nice guy and could easily charge double for this beautiful forest paradise
Great location! Such a lovely place to stay!

A beautiful home, amazing amenities, we really didn’t want to leave!! Kyle’s home is in the perfect location. You feel like you’re in the woods but your only minutes from Salem, not to mention only an hour from Portland and the coast!! So glad we stayed here and most certainly would again!!
Nice one bedroom apartment surrounded by hills and trees.
Very clean space & quiet neighborhood. Close to town & hiking. Great TV too!

A great place to stay in the Salem area. Close to the city but a quiet, secluded setting.
Kyle’s a friendly host.
Would definitely recommend!
Kyle is a very gracious host!  Antlerwood Hollow is in a peaceful, retreat-like setting!  Deer walk by, birds are chirping, trees are everywhere! We would definitely come back!
Our second stay and it was great. Quiet, peaceful and a change from Hawaii. Would always be our first choice when visiting family in Salem.

Comfortable, affordable and convenient to Salem and Dallas.  Kyle is a great host who communicates well, making sure you are comfortable.  He responded to all questions before and during our stay in a very timely manner.

This AirBNB is insanity. I literally couldn’t ask for anything more, Kyle has it all. Any question you have or service you need will most likely be fulfilled if you bring it up. Plus the place is just beautiful. Tons of wildlife, especially pretty much tame deer that eat, drink, and wander right in front of your windows. I’m a return visitor, and I will be for years. I have two dogs and he is just fantastic with them. I feel completely at ease and so well taken care of. If I could give him 10 stars I would!

Location, location, location. I am a solo traveling female and wanted to feel safe in my lodgings. Kyle's place is perfect! While it is secluded, I felt safe up the hill in the 1st level apartment space. It is larger than it looks in the pictures. Deer are daily visitors with the feeding bowl within view of the large windows in the living room. Very quiet and peaceful at night. Loved the bathrobe provided! A/C was wonderful on those hot days.

Day trips to Minto-Brown Island Park just minutes away was great for walking the dogs. Cyclist would love that park! I also visited Nelson Park right down the road. A hilly pathway around the park was great exercise and very kid friendly.

This place is incredible! Everything was clean and incredibly comfortable. The view is great too! It’s perfectly place near enough to everything but you still get the quiet peaceful feeling when you are there. Would definitely stay again! Thank you for the great stay Kyle!
Kyle’s place is super cozy, clean, and has more than you’ll ever need! Would 100% recommend staying here!

What a fun and wonderful place to stay! This is our 2nd time here and it just keeps getting better. Kyle is very thoughtful and kind— even the deer and rabbits know this. He has indoor activities—nice TV, books, movies, games. We highly recommend staying here.

What an amazing place! I already have made another reservation to go back. Kyle is an amazing host. Place was really clean, kitchen had everything you need and the bed was soooo comfortable. The outdoor area was just the relaxing place I needed at the end of the day. This is by far the best AirBnb place I have stayed in.
Clean, nice amenities and beds were reasonably comfy.

This was our second time staying at Kyle's place, and we may have loved it even more than the first. So spacious, comfortable, well equipped, and perfectly nestled in the woods but just 5 mins from town. There were a few changes and additions since our last stay that made it even better. I think the only thing missing is a kitchen sink and a full-length mirror, but everything else is downright perfect, and Kyle is an excellent host who always greets you with wine and/or beer. We'll be back!
So cute and comfortable. Loved looking out into the trees every morning with a short drive into town.

Our stay far exceeded our expectations. We are moving here and needed an extended stay until we closed on our house. Beautiful location with hiking trails and deer. Very clean and had everything we needed for our extended stay. We highly recommend Kyle.

A nicely appointed comfortable dwelling in gorgeous surroundings. Extra nice bathroom. The host is very welcoming and extremely laid back! Check in and check out are so simple and he’s really responsive with questions! I rented this for my in laws when they came to town and they were thrilled and want to stay there again.
Such a comfy space with anything you could ask for. Settled back in the trees for a relaxing time. I would have lived there if I could have.

Stayed for a month and loved it!!! A beautiful, peaceful home. We both worked full time and the WiFi was excellent even with video streaming. Kyle was extremely accommodating and responsive.  Would absolutely stay again.

Kyle’s place is excellent. My husband and I stayed here with our 11 month old, while visiting family in the area. It was the perfect little space, with everything we could need available to us. The location is great, close to restaurants, hiking trails, and parks to play for our little one. The property feels very safe, clean and cozy… exactly what we were looking for.

Kyle was great with communication and quick response. He was very accommodating of our schedule and unique arrival/departure needs. We wish we could have stayed longer. 10/10 recommend! We hope to book a trip here again soon.
Place was really clean and relaxing

This was the perfect place for an extended stay. Kyle had everything I needed and was very helpful and accommodating. The place was very clean, comfortable, quiet, and in a great location! I can’t recommend it enough!
A really nice place that was conveniently located. Be careful driving at night as I had several close encounters with deer.
Kyle has a great spot. The reviews I read and information on the listing are accurate! Very clean and comfortable.
Friendly host and peaceful and cozy and place.

Wonderful home away from home set in a lovely country but easily accessible location. Kyle attends to all the amenities you will need. Comfy, clean and quiet. Great park nearby for a great walk. Highly recommend.
Great location, very quiet, incredibly comfortable!

Awesome place to stay....outside of mainstream city life,  in the woods ....designed to be warm and cozy in winter and great place to hike in the summer or just sit outside and enjoy nature....so peaceful and yet 10 minutes away from good restaurants, Costco and  Walmart.   For us the location was perfect.  Easy access to freeway for day tripping to Portland and surrounding cities for visiting family and friends... furnishings were great....comfy bed, good size living area and a huge shower with two shower heads..... nicely done and very comfortable!  We will definitely be returning to enjoy the new outside pergola and new landscaping!
We enjoyed our stay ! We will stay again. They were great in accommodating us and the dog !!

This was our second time using this Airbnb. Kyle goes the extra mile and is friendly and welcoming! The space is unique and in an absolutely picturesque spot.

Thank you for hosting again! We’ll be back :)
Beautiful property.
Great place, tranquil location and yet close enough to the town for easy access to amenities.
The best experience you could ask for!

Kyle’s home was very cozy and relaxing. The place was thoughtful hosted with every amenity available to us including a bottle of chilled wine and cold beers waiting for us. Bonus, our pups had plenty of space to explore!
This place was perfect for our stay!! Even better than expected & Kyle was super responsive & friendly. We would definitely stay again!

This is my second time staying at Kyle's and it is lovely as always. Check-in was a breeze and the place was very clean. Kyle was very accommodating to our last-minute request and we truly appreciated it. Definitely would stay at Kyle's again when we return.
Kyle’s guest suite was awesome, quiet, and everything I was looking for. 10/10, would return again.

Kyle's place was a very clean, comfortable and welcoming place to stay. He was very good at communicating and very helpful. We are very grateful to have spent a few nights here and to have a good place for our kids and our pup to stretch out. We had fun watching deer and squirrels outside at night!

The location set just on the outskirts of the city was wonderful. Scenic and lots of wildlife. We saw deer every day. The lower level which we rented was immaculate and quiet. Close proximity to an amazing park with paved trails that go on and on. I would highly recommend this place to anyone coming to the Salem/Eugene/Portland area.
This was one of the most unique and cozy stays we've had. Highly, highly recommend!
I would give this place 6 stars if I could. it was outstanding. great location, close to downtown, but still on a quiet street with plenty of wildlife. the place is nicer than the pictures suggest!
It’s a beautiful wooded property that is pretty close to all of Salem’s offerings but tucked away in its own peaceful setting. We even saw deer on the property! I highly recommend this listing!

It was an outstanding experience! It’s such a lovely home, in a beautiful setting. We love the marriage of modern convenience and country rusticism. Most importantly, we appreciate how helpful and welcoming Kyle is. This home really helped create an incredible setting for a wonderful weekend getaway.
Wonderful location and setting.  Very peaceful and beautiful.   We enjoyed our stay and would definitely book again when in Salem.

Kyle's home and location are beautiful! Perfect place for a getaway with our pups (thank you for allowing dogs)...close to parks and restaurants. Wonderful host...he was away from the home when we arrived, but checked in with us to see if we needed anything and responded very quickly when we had a couple of questions.
Thank you Kyle for sharing your beautiful home! We hope to be back soon!

This is such an extremely comfortable, clean, homey, convenient, and thoughtfully stocked and fixed up place! We really enjoyed our stay and I only wish it could have been longer so I could relax in the many hammocks and listen to the birds. It’s rare that I wish I had more time to spend just lounging around my Airbnb! This is much more than a place to crash - it’s more like a temporary home.
Think twice about staying here if you like quiet. Between the road noise, the mechanicals noise and sounds from upstairs it wasn’t for us easy to sleep.
Best air bnb I’ve stayed at and I’ve stayed at quite few

It was very clean and spacious. The pictures don’t do it justice. There is a super cute reading nook in the bedroom that I very much enjoyed. There are extra blankets and heaters available.  Kyle was kind enough to let us check-in early so we didn’t have to stay in the rain. Downtown is only a 15 min away. I highly recommend booking this location!
Very clean, cozy and a great value.

My first Airbnb and I know I was absolutely spoiled with Kyle’s place! This place is a gem, it’s a perfect getaway to relax and have a staycation. It would also be a perfect hub for discovering Oregon too! He was so accommodating and sweet to my puppy.  I would love to stay here again. We had a wonderful time! The amenities were above and beyond and the decorations were so cute and cozy. The bed and couch were so comfy as well!

Kyle's place is extremely comfortable.  We were very comfortable and safe.  Kyle provides many ways to manage the temperature in the space.  The kitchen area was easy to use and keep clean.  The bedroom was very private and cozy, with a reading nook, a nice closet area, and a bathroom with a shower with dual heads.  We hope the space is available for our next trip to Salem.

We can't thank Kyle enough for how kind and adaptable he was throughout our booking process and throughout our stay. He welcomed us with a sweet sign at the front door and always responded quickly and thoughtfully to messages. The location was in a beautiful wooded area while just a short drive to Salem proper. The space itself had so many little touches to make it feel like home...from books on the shelf to a full K-cup coffee rack to plenty of dishes and linens. We did most of our cooking and dining out, since we have family in the area, so didn't miss the kitchen sink or oven. When we did have a few things to wash, it was easy to use the laundry room sink and the washtub/drying rack Kyle provides. Our family of four (well, five with our dog!) absolutely LOVED our stay and will look for Kyle's place first the next time we stay in Salem.
Really nice place.  Would definitely stay here again.
We loved our stay and would definitely book again if in the area.
There is everything for a great holiday.  Comfortable bed.  When there was a snow and ice storm, the house was warm enough.  We really enjoyed.  We had a great time.  Really recommend to stay.

we loved this place, and would be happy to stay for longer!
all amenities, and excellent communicationsl
Kyle’s place was the perfect place for us to stay while in Salem. It was quiet and cozy and had everything we needed. The owner is very quick to respond and helpful.
Very nice guest suite in a great area.

We had a month-long stay and the place was perfect! We had everything we needed, the place is very clean and well-stocked, and there are a lot of small touches that made it feel homey. The location feels secluded while still being close to town. Kyle was a great host and made us feel welcome. We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others!

In a busy work week Antlers Hollow was an oasis of peace, space to be outdoors just bathing in the forest and bird sounds even on the wet day. Meditative and grounding. I am so grateful i coukd stay there
Rebecca thoroughly enjoyed her stay at Kyle’s. Thank you for welcoming us into your home!
My stay was kind of last minute, but Kyle was responsive and helpful! The place is super cute, clean and cozy. It had lots of thoughtful touches and amenities. I would definitely come back.
Beautiful location, clean, and very homey feeling. Will definitely look into this place again next time we are in Salem.
Thanks again! Close to town but in the country
The host canceled this reservation 260 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The home is absolutely adorable and the two hosts were very accommodating. I highly recommend!

Stylish and comfortable stay. Perfectly located near downtown Salem. The hosts have spent time thinking about their guests requirements. The place was very clean and comfortable with thoughtful touches throughout. I would stay again.
Beautifully decorated cozy bungalow in a great neighborhood.  Everything was awesome!!

This little bungalow is a beautiful charmer. I rented it for family visiting from out of time and they loved it! Close to downtown and Minto Brown and Bush Parks, there is plenty to do close by.

I cannot recommend this rental highly enough. the host was great and quick to respond every time.
We loved this house! Sarita’s hospitality was wonderful, and this location is perfect.

I loved everything about the decor and felt the owner had so much thought and care into all the extras. It felt like she chose everything as if she were living there herself. She didn’t skimp out on quality from sheets to dimmable lights throughout, remote controlled flickering candles, to well chosen vintage decor in every perfect nook of the house.  I felt inspired everywhere I looked. If I needed something, it was available-  from an extra fan because I love white noise when I sleep, a pen in the kitchen drawer when I needed to write a check, to a square skillet for bacon I needed to fry for breakfast. It truly felt like a home away from home.

We enjoyed our stay the home was very comfortable, clean and well decorated. The air conditioning was great! The location was perfect for easy access to downtown Salem. Would stay again in the future.

This is one of our favorite places we have stayed! It is sparkling clean and the location is excellent. Within a mile of a bunch of great dining and parks. We truly enjoyed our stay in this perfectly charming and well maintained bungalow.

This was a great spot in a quiet and charming neighborhood. Furnishings are stylish and comfortable. Within a quick drive to everything we needed in Salem and the surrounding area.
The host had thought of all the little things and it made this stay outstanding!
Wonderful place.  Can’t wait to visit again
You will love Sarita’s lovely bungalow. It conveniently located, stylish, and she has thought of everything with   amenities that are above and beyond the norm.
Sarita is a top notch designer! Her place is stunning and located in a really fun neighborhood close to downtown!

The cottage is so very stylish and cute. It was welcoming, cozy and comfortable. The neighborhood was very quiet yet close to all amenities. I highly recommend this place. Thank you for a great experience and the last minute booking!!

This is a wonderfully appointed property and conveniently located to so much of what Salem has to offer. Sarita is a great hostess. She is very accommodating and quick to respond when contacted.

Our stay was perfect and we look forward to another soon!

This property is everything it’s advertised to be, plus more! The place was very well put together, with personal touches throughout. There was even a small space heater in the bedroom, just in case. The bed was extremely comfortable as well. I would definitely stay here again!

Beautiful property located close to  everything Salem has to offer! Restaurants, Bars, Food trucks, Breweries, Wineries you name it it’s there. Sarita is by far the best hostess I’ve ever had( & I air bnb a lot) My stay was awesome I look forward to another stay soon.
Just like described, only better! It’s cute and comfortable and quiet.

One of the best rentals we’ve ever stayed in. I’ve never said this before, but the photos really don’t do it justice. It is so thoughtfully decorated, it’s like a place you usually just admire in magazines. All around just a wonderful experience.

Marita's clean well maintained bungalow is in a nice quiet neighborhood and is very conveniently located for access to all that you may want to do in the Salem area. Sarita is a wonderful host. She responds very quickly to any questions you might have. She is even better at anticipating your questions and providing the info ahead of time!
A great stay. Would recommend!

This bungalow is so cute, comfortable, welcoming. The bed was comfy, the towels were so soft, the property was very clean, the neighborhood was gorgeous and idealistic with its picture perfect bungalows lining the street. I stayed alone for a business trip and truly felt like home away from home! Ten stars!
A wonderfully kept property with a great location for activities in and around Salem.
This charming bungalow delivers on every aspect! The space is meticulously curated and unbelievably comfortable; the perfect spot for a couple looking for a quiet area close to town.

I spent several days at Sarita’s house and could not have been happier. The house is so comfortable and beautifully decorated. I can’t think of anything that I was missing for my stay. The location is super peaceful, yet close to everything. Communication was very quick. Overall it was a really great stay and I would definitely recommend it!
Absolutely lovely. Charming home in a peaceful neighborhood, close to everything. Pictures don't do it justice.
Great place! Communication with the host was super easy. Lots of nice little touches to the place.

We had the most comfortable stay! Sarita’s place felt like home as soon as we walked in. It was beautiful, clean, and had everything we needed for a cozy working vacation in Salem, and in a great location too. Close to downtown but the neighborhood was quiet and great for walking and enjoying the gardens. Sarita went out of her way to make us welcome and was available for any help or local area suggestions. Thank you!
Small and cozy bungalow! Perfect for a little getaway and area is peaceful !
This is the cleanest place I have seen in an airbandb. The decor is exquisite, really charming. Sarita thought of everything to make your stay comfortable. Just perfect!

This is super cute, cozy, and visually aesthetic air bnb! Sarita was very communicative with helpful details for checking in and checking out. I’ve been to MANY bnbs but Sarita’s bnb has one of thee most generously stocked pantries with many different seasonings and even honey for the tea! It was a bonus to also have foil, plastic wrap, and ziplocs as well-it made cooking so much easier and convenient. If I’m in Salem again, I would love to stay here-so close to downtown as well!

We couldn't have picked a more perfect landing spot for our visit to Willamette U. We loved walking around the beautiful neighborhood of gorgeous homes and gardens. Sarita's place is incredibly charming and comfortable. We definitely hope to stay here again on future visits!

Sarita’s sweet little house in Salem, was a perfect home base for the exploration of the area. Located in a quiet neighborhood, this home had all the amenities needed for our stay. Beautifully decorated and cozy, the beds were comfy and everything was clean and inviting. I would absolutely stay here again and again!

The Fairmont Bungalow is a very good Airbnb. Everything was described accurately by the host. The kitchen and laundry in the garage were both well stocked and the keyless code entry was so convenient. Although the bedroom and bathroom space is small, it worked for our needs and we enjoyed our time in this bungalow and would certainly rebook for our next visit to Salem.

This place is very clean and comfortable! Tastefully decorated. Kitchen well stocked. Easy parking. Its in a very nice and quiet neighborhood. Hostess was very quick to respond and very helpful. Very close to restaurants, stores and downtown. Would definitely stay here again!!
Comfortable, well stocked, quiet and nicely decorated home! Hostess is quick to respond to questions. Highly recommend!
we loved it in general it was perfect for our purpose

This bungalow is very cozy and comfortable, decorated very nicely.  The bungalow was very clean.   The kitchen is stocked well with everything you need for making your meals.   It's in a quiet neighborhood.  We enjoyed our stay and would stay there  again.  Checking in was very easy and Sarita had a list of things telling us what was expected to be done at check out, that makes things very easy.   Sarita was very good at communicating with us before and during our stay there, and after when we thanked her.

Sarita’s cottage was everything we hoped for and more. Somehow we found it even more charming than in the listing photos! I have already recommended it to a friend and will definitely book again if I make it Salem again in the future
A cute house in a wonderful,safe area. It was easy to check-in and check-out.
Cute place, clean, and had what we needed for a good stay!
We had a great stay! It was cozy, clean and in a cute neighborhood. Lots of thoughtful little touches in the house.
Super cute bungalow in a quiet neighborhood with easy access to downtown.  We enjoyed our stay here!

We really enjoyed our 3 week stay. The neighborhood is safe and very walkable. House has a vintage/historic feel.  Bed and bedding was very comfortable.  Downside - no dishwasher, backyard needs attention,  house has a musty smell.
It was warm, quaint, and had a great location.

My stay at Sarita's place was very pleasant and smooth. I was able to focus on the purpose of the trip without distraction from my accommodation ... just what I needed. Sarita also communicated well when I had questions/requests. I wish I could have stayed longer!
Very cute place in a great neighborhood.
would stay there again next time I work at Salem hospital

Caleb and Keely were very gracious people. The apartment was beautiful, clean and had everything you could need. It was truly a home away from home. This made is so much easier on us during our travels and gave us a nice break to relax and not have to worry about improvising or spending extra money on eating out. Very cozy and well insulated. Great privacy and definitely one of our favorite Airbnb spots. The cleaning fee is super steep but I was able to get Airbnb to cover it so that we could save some gas money til we traveled to our next job and got paid again. Otherwise it's a great deal. The hosts were willing to waive the cleaning for us, knowing we were a little tight on money that week. I would not expect this to happen as a regular thing for customers. I just wanted to include this part of our story to show what Wonderful people they are. I didn't pay attention to the total like I should have before confirming my purchase for the night and even though they have the least restrictive possible cancellation policy, I still would have been out even more money and not be able to afford a place to stay for the night. They would've been effected negatively too, as far as bad marks on Airbnb's end and could have even been out $100 themselves with the way their policies work, had they changed or cancelled anything for us. (Which is ridiculous for them to penalize the hosts like that.) I just thought it was really great of them to offer to pay me back the $20 cleaning fee in cash, in the event that we checked out early. They did not have to do that and I was very thankful for their offer. Luckily, as I stated earlier, I was able to contact Airbnb and explain my situation to them and they covered the cleaning fee to ensure we had a positive experience with them. It isn't often that you'll find people who genuinely care and are willing to help perfect strangers. Again, please don't expect this or try to take advantage of them, just know that you'll have some amazing hosts who are good people while staying there. Definitely recommend!
Totally recommend staying here. Plenty of little extras that made my stay a great one.

This place is far more than you expect. It's clean, modern, comfortable, quiet, and cozy. Literally the nicest place I've ever stayed while working on the road and I've been staying away from home on and off for the past 10 years.

Caleb and Keely have a clean, stylish space that is welcoming and suited with all the amenities.  We were in town for a Celebration of Life and considered the space our home away from home.  It was comfortable and Caleb was responsive and accommodating to our requests.  I recommend staying with them if you are in the Salem area!

Absolutely loved staying in this beautiful and stylish space. Caleb and Keely were quick at responding to messages and very accommodating. It was the perfect size space for my partner and I to enjoy a relaxing evening in front of the fire place on a rainy night. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Best place I've ever stayed.
Impeccably kept apartment/suite!!  Thanks for the hospitality and great communication!

Absolutely beautiful place to stay. Caleb was super cool, and welcoming. Fit four adults perfectly for a weekend. We accidentally locked ourselves out of the place and Caleb was there within a phone call to unlock the place for us. It was nice to have the coffee maker, pots, and pans and a stove to make food in the morning. I wish I could give their place more than 5 stars. Perfect, cozy, and comfortable.

Every once in a while you run in to a real gem - this is THAT place! Great space, great location, great value, and super clean, what else could we ask for!

Thanks guys!

Great private apartment in Salem. Super clean and lots of amenities. The apartment has more to offer than a  traditional hotel. Would highly recommend this place to anyone. Thank you Caleb and Keely! Enjoyed my stay at your Airbnb!!

Caleb and Keely’s place is comfortable and clean! They were clear with instructions for how to get in with the keyless entry and parking, they offered restaurant suggestions, and have Netflix/Hulu/amazon on their tv. I liked being close to downtown where I had my work meetings. For being a basement, they were very quiet at night. I would definitely recommend!
This was a great place for stay in Salem. Caleb and Keely have done a great job with this space and it’s in a really nice part of the city.

Caleb and Keely’s place was exactly as advertised. Clean well maintained and in a great location if your visiting downtown Salem or Willamette
We enjoyed our stay.
It is very beautiful and in a quiet area.

Caleb and Keely’s apartment is exactly as pictured - cute and clean!  But pictures don’t capture all of the special touches they have added to make your stay as pleasant as possible. All we can say is, “It was our pleasure.” Thanks again.

I was disappointed. Parking was difficult when I first arrived since other cars were occupying the spots next to the house because the hosts were having a gathering.  They were sitting at the kitchen table when I arrived and one host stared straight at me, then turned around. I never received as much as a text to acknowledge I was there or welcome me, or ask if I needed anything as I settled in. If they weren't on property looking right at me, I wouldn't hve thought this as strange. Then the noise started.
