Nowhere in the ad does it say you can hear upstairs noise, but you can hear it VERY CLEARLY, and after driving 8 hours, starting at 6 am, all I wanted to do was sleep... which I couldn't do. I was on the phone with my wife complaining about the noise when I got a message from the hosts apologizing for all the noise (still no welcome) I thought the timing was weird, especially for it to be the fist communication, as though my conversation had been heard while I was in my bedroom. I didn't want to deal with any drama so I decided to call airbnb the next day.  The next morning I went to shower and found ants and flies in the bathroom, both species were small but their presence at all was disappointing. When I contacted Airbnb about a resolution,  they said the host was offering me $20 and they would not refund me the cleaning fee for an unclean accomodation. The host could have avoided this true and honest review if they had played fairly. Good luck with this listing

Great location!! Looks exactly as pictures.  We were in town for our daughter's law school graduation at Willamette.  Super close to everything.  We ate out but the kitchen had the basic so we could have  cooked instead.  Would definitely stay again.
My stay was excellent, it was very clean and beautiful!

This is a very cute place. It is clean and feels super cozy. We weren’t there long, but didn’t hear noise from above. Lots of notes describing things, like what size mug to use for the coffee maker to make sure it doesn’t spill, etc.
Perfect stay!

I was in Salem looking for an inexpensive place to sleep while visiting family. It was cozy and a really nice place to recharge! It had everything I needed and special little touches essential for long distance travel.
What a little treasure in this spot. Super comfy, meticulously clean, very warm hosts. They sure know how to make you feel at home in this stylish apartment. Loved our stay!!!!

This is a charming place with wonderful hosts.  They made every effort to make sure the stay was good for us.  The kitchen is very well equipped for those who want to cook.  The location is great.  We enjoyed our stay there very much.

Great location in a quiet residential neighborhood, with all the comforts of home.
Hosts were quick and responsive to a couple of mishaps we encountered, very much enjoyed our stay.
Great space, close to all Salem has to offer. Clean, cozy and well thought out. Highly recommend Caleb and Keeleys apt.
We had the best time here! It was perfectly located and way above what we expected amenity and living wise. There were so many thoughtful touches and helpful tips! Would stay here again, definitely!
Nice space. Comfortable and clean.
First time at an AirBnB and it was great!

Amazing space! It was in a great quiet neighborhood, and shopping or food was very accesible. Caleb and Keely were so accommodating and very quick to respond to us. Thank you for your cute touches and cleanliness as well! Will be staying here again if we come back out West!

Very comfortable apartment, quite spacious, tastefully decorated.  Kitchen is nicely stocked, full size fridge and stove and small dishwasher make this very convenient for an extended stay. Bed and sofa are very comfortable and space is quite quiet.  Location is convenient to downtown and commercial areas and just a couple blocks from a large park.

Caleb and Keely's place was the perfect place for an extended trip to Salem. The location was perfect and the house was very clean. Caleb and Keely were extremely accommodating throughout the whole stay and were always available if I needed anything. I will definitely return to their place if I find myself in Salem again!

Wonderful apartment just as in the pictures.
Very friendly and helpful family.
Whenever back in Salem I would definitely choose it again.

Caleb and Keely's place was amazing. It was exactly as pictured, and felt even better than described! It's in the basement of their home, but it's so comfortable and cozy, it doesn't feel anything like a basement. Parking is on the side of their house. There are windows in the kitchen and bedroom, so it isn't dark and gloomy all the time. Their kitchen had everything you would need for a stay with regards to pots, pans, utensils, dishes, etc. The living room is very cozy, with an electric fireplace to make sure you stay nice and warm during the cold months. The bathroom was clean, the shower was great, and they provided everything you might need during the stay. The bedroom had a nice drawer to put your belongings with a small closet to hang your clothes. The bed and pillows were extremely comfortable and made it easy to fall asleep every night. Overall, Caleb and Keely's place was amazing. Everything was great, and we easily felt like home after we were able to get some groceries to stock the fridge. Overall, I would recommend people staying here whether it's for a short, or long-term stay.

The stay was amazing, perfect for a stay that allows you to get the feeling of a home without putting everything you own in a duffle bag. Great neighborhood which allowed for beautiful walks and near numerous groceries options.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Caleb and Keely's place for about two months this summer and had a great experience! We were a bit apprehensive about living in a basement, but the place is really well lit, and since it's so close to Bush Park it's easy to get outside. Also, Caleb and Keely redid the backyard while we were here, so now the backyard is a beautiful place to hang out and they were very gracious about sharing that space with us. The kitchen was fully stocked with all the utensils and cookware necessary to make just about anything. The bed and couch were very comfortable. The WiFi was fast and reliable. My girlfriend was taking an online class for the duration of our stay and never had a Zoom call drop. Caleb was always very available for any question we had, and though their family was upstairs, it was never really a bother to hear the kiddos running around. It was too bad that this summer everything was closed, because the location is really great, only about a 20 minute walk or quick drive to downtown. Overall, great little apartment for a short or long term stay!
Was a nice experience staying at Caleb and Keely’s place

This place is fantastic. I stayed here with 2 kids for a month and a half. The apartment is well designed even for a small place and makes the most out of the space available. At some point we even had several guests over and it still didn't feel crowded. Caleb and Keely really helped with all the travel adjustments and having a newborn. The place is located in a quite place in town but close to a lot of key points of interest, like grocery shopping, a really nice park just around the corner, and other places I needed like the hospital. Overall, during these times it's a good place to stay at for long term, very affordable. Thank you Caleb and Keely for being such wonderful hosts :)

A perfect basement apartment. Has everything you would need for a long stay. Lovely neighborhood near a beautiful park.

Caleb and Keely are so kind and truly went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable during my stay.

The apartment is great!! Everything is super clean and stylish. It’s a nice neighborhood with everything you need nearby. The hosts are easily accessible and very helpful! You do hear some movement upstairs but it’s not bad at all. Definitely recommend!

Perfect place to stay if you will be in Salem! The space was perfect for my husband and myself! Caleb & Keely were always available if we needed anything  and were very accommodating with our crazy schedule. We really enjoyed the location and took daily walks around beautiful Bush Park almost daily as it is just a block away. The neighborhood is very nice with beautiful flowers abounding! We are in Salem often and look forward to staying again soon!

Caleb and Keely offer a perfect space for a staycation. The apartment space is clean and well equipped with all that is needed during a stay. The location is perfect for a morning or evening walk. Grocery stores and the downtown area are in close proximity.
The hosts are kind and friendly. The space was clean and tidy.
It was a very nice place and I had a great stay!

Our stay at Caleb and Keely’s during the holidays was fantastic! The space was cozy and had anything we could have needed for our stay (even some board games to play!) They we’re fantastic hosts, very kind, and easy to communicate with. Check in was a breeze and the apartment was very private from the rest of the home. I definitely recommend staying with them however long your stay.
Great cozy space with everything you need for a month or longer. The location is pretty nice and is close to stores and other activities. The space is very easy to get to as well.

All the accommodations for a long-term stay including a washer and dryer. Great communication and fast responses with Caleb. Rarely hear the upstairs unit. Also, the Internet was able to handle working from home and various zoom calls.

This Airbnb is in the PERFECT location for a quiet family-oriented neighborhood, that's close to everything. Walking distance to parks and a couple restaurants, short drive for groceries or anything else you need. Beautiful staged, and everything you could need!

Keely and Caleb are the sweetest hosts and their place is adorable! So kind and made me feel right at home. Even brought by packages down. Everything was so clean when I got there and I had everything I needed in the kitchen, and I like to cook. Comfortable bed and living room. The neighborhood is so cute and safe. Bush park is a close walk and it's beautiful. But even more beautiful is their backyard which they happily shared with me and got to take a few meeting from the garden. I hope to come stay again!
Great place to stay and nice neighborhood!

Bill & Aimee really spent the time and thoughtful efforts into providing such a great, cozy, home-like experience for us. Anything we needed as far as amenities go were all provided especially items for our pup that we brought along which was a nice surprise. Glad we came across this bungalow and would definitely stay again next time we’re in town.

We enjoyed staying in the bungalow. The location is very convenient and within short walking distance to breweries, breakfast joints, and parks. The space is new, very clean, nicely decorated, and the hosts provided thoughtful touches. They were responsive and gave good tips (while respecting privacy). The fenced in yard was also a bonus. I recommend a stay!

Great little place centrally located so everything is close.  Cozy and comfortable, the house is private and comfortable.  It's hard to find a place with an enclosed yard and it makes it so much easier to have the pup with you.  Great neighborhood to walk in.

Aimee and Bill have done a great job of creating a private retreat with a beautiful aesthetic. This is a perfect amount of space for a couple. The neighborhood is close to amenities and downtown Salem -easy access to anything you need. We didn’t bring our dog, but this would have been an ideal set up for traveling with a pet! Thanks for a lovely stay - we will definitely come back next time we are in Salem!
Great post with quick and helpful communication. Highly recommended!
Very cute place, loved that it was pet friendly, would highly recommend!

Bill & Aimee have a stylish Bungalow with numerous extras including kitchen supplies and wonderful linens.  For those with dogs, this is a prime option with running space outside and care supplies available.
Such a cute place!  Very clean, quiet, and comfortable.  I’d stay again in a heartbeat!

Everything you could want with thoughtful extras. Bill and Aimee were always helpful if I had a question.  Really fun tiny house experience and so wonderful to have my dog with me.  Great location with so many options for eating out.  It was quiet and private with my own yard for my dog.  Great place to stay and explore Salem!

This place is great for a family with a young child. We put a pack-n-play in the living area and the fenced in yard is perfect for a toddler to run around. VERY clean, which is also nice for little hands that like to get into even hard to reach places to clean! A very nice stay overall.
Quiet and comfortable. The cottage was stocked with coffee and a full sized coffee pot, plus some snacks. I would definitely stay there when visiting Salem again.

We went to Salem for the gardens.  Specifically, the iris gardens.  Bill & Aimee's place was conveniently located both the gardens and for local dining.  It was a great place to stay for a long weekend.
Cute little home!! No real fridge or living quarters!! Made it tough to keep food available

Aimee and Bill’s sweet cottage is the perfect home base to explore Salem. The home is located minutes from downtown and only 15 minutes from numerous wineries. There are thoughtful touches throughout like the doggie amenities, snacks, grill, extra cozy blankets and toiletries. There is a ton of privacy as well. The cottage is accessed through a separate side entrance, and there is a portion of the yard that has been fenced off from the rest of the yard. Aimee and Bill are exceptionally welcoming hosts to boot! We had a very pleasant stay.
Bill and Aimee's cottage was perfect for what I needed.  It was clean and located in a quiet neighborhood

I seriously want to keep this place a secret, as it is just such a great location and they have it set up perfectly--but they had everything I needed/wanted, it is clean; and I will definitely stay again in the future!  I hadn't noticed that it was 'dog friendly', and I don't have a dog and I mentioned to them that, as a person who doesn't have dogs, I noticed that there isn't even a 'dog smell'.  So best of both worlds--as, though I'm not a 'dog person' myself, I'm glad there is a friendly place for them!  Thank you so much Bill and Aimee!

Perfect place for a small family! Their little home has everything you need within reach. Home is nicely organized and very modern. Only downfall was the wifi, but we only used it for the kiddos when we got back from being out all day. Thank you, we enjoyed our stay.
This place is adorable! It’s perfect for two people. There’s a small common area, a cute bedroom, and Bill and Aimee will make sure you are well taken care of!
The location is great for being in that area of Salem.  The hosts are very kind.
A cute little house that was perfect for our weekend getaway.

We have two small dogs, this fenced in little bungalow was absolutely perfect for our baby girls! The hosts really thought of everything in the house but we are pretty easy to please. The house was designed beautifully, warm, inviting, and comfortable. They have a mini fridge/freezer and portable ac which was sooooo needed and perfect! (I saw a heater and lots of extra blankets too so it will be fabulous in the winter as well) Check in was so easy! No coordinating with someone to try to make it there at an exact appointment time. Stress free and everything was ready and waiting when we got there! Great place to land for the weekend. Great location to all things you need. Wine country wasn’t too far of a trek and if you want to come home to the yard to drink a bottle with nice chairs and a fire pit table, that was great too! I loved the ambiance of the twinkle lights when we arrived, it was a breath of fresh air from a long work week. All in all we will be back, it was perfect!

Great host for dog lovers, with a lovely yard with grass and a good setup for dogs (doggy bed, food/water bowls). Not a great setup for cooking, but there is a hot plate and microwave. Very quick to get from the AirBNB to downtown restaurants and attractions, and you can walk to get groceries.
Very clean and nicely appointed. Tight space for 3 large bodies but great for solo, couple or plus small child.

Cute little hidden bungalow in Salem. It was fairly small but it was perfect for 2 people and 2 pups. Very relaxing. I appreciate how dog friendly they are. Dog bed and dog bowls were provided. Nice yard as well, however the fence is a bit tall and both of the dogs were able to escape. Friendly hosts!

This location is perfect! So close to downtown and pretty much everything you need. The bungalow was perfect for two people and a furry friend. They provided dog bowls and a dog bed if you need it! The backyard is so adorable and is perfect if you want to keep your dog back there and watch them run around. We had one single complaint and it is that when we went to lay down for the night we noticed a good amount of dog hair. We read the house rules and it said no dogs on the furniture so we complied but someone else did not. I also don’t know if that means the sheets hadn’t been cleaned prior to us coming which gave me a weird feeling when laying in the bed. Other than that, this place was very nice 😊
Experience was similar to photos

This is a sweet little place! Super clean with extra touches like chocolates, popcorn and really good teas.

It has the perfect fenced yard for dogs. Plus a comfy dog bed and bowls. It was really nice to have our dogs welcomed,

I would recommend this to anyone traveling through Salem.

Cozy little space.  Very stylish and well decorated!  It even came with a complimentary bottle of wine!  The location is not far from downtown Salem and provides easy access to a host of fine establishments.

What an adorable bungalow! Aimee and Bill had it all decorated and set up quite comfortably, including some fall decor for the season- it made it feel extra homy.
All things were thought of to make your stay easy- coffee, wine, snacks- and towels and blankets, my friend was excited over the Q-Tips 😉.
Even a dog bed and doggy bowls for my little one.
There were chairs and a BBQ outside and a small fire pit- with your own little fenced in yard area.
Bedding was nice and clean.
It was a great location and easy to find.
Great hosts- and they came to greet us and be sure we had what we needed- and even gave us tips for dinner and a winery.
Thank you for being great hosts!
I was here on business but had a friend with me who was babysitting my dog while I was at my event and the two of us had a lot of stuff - but still the bungalow fit us and was cozy!
Wonderful place to stay it is small but had everything we needed

Such a cozy and sweet space! Perfectly close to the natural foods store and downtown! Perfect for Willamette parents to visit :) The bed was super comfy and Aimee even provided an additional heater for those chilly nights. We loved the outdoor fire pit for evening relaxing. We used the crock pot to make a soup from thugs we bought at the Saturday Farmers Market downtown! It was so delicious.
Thanks for everything!!!!!
This was a cute little space, in a nice location in town. Great communication by hosts, with quick responses.
Wonderful cozy cottage. Very clean and very quick response to any questions. Great lil touches for our pup we will stay again!!
This was a wonderful place to stay while we were away from home.
The cottage was a fantastic place for us to stay during our holiday visit. Aimee and Bill’s place is super pet friendly, clean and comfortable. Will definitely stay here again if we are in town.

Cozy and tucked away this spot is nice and close to the main drag but doesn’t feel like it. Also a lovely center point between the mountains and the beach if your up for a drive! We really enjoyed our stay.
Was a overall good trip! No major complaints! Small things here and there like some of the dishes being slightly dirty, but besides that was a great place to stay!
A cozy, comfortable spot to stay! Absolutely everything in order, and great communication. We especially appreciated the generous, fenced space for our medium sized dog.

This is a lovely little place. It was so nice to have a big yard to hang out in. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was spotless. The Roku TV was a nice touch. The location is perfect (close to town but still very quiet). The hosts were very responsive and responded immediately to our queries. The kitchen is not really a full kitchen with just a hot plate and only one pot so if you want to cook full meals, it is a bit of a challenge. It is a bit small for the price but nice place especially if you have a dog. The yard is great as long as it’s good weather.

This place is a great find! Bill and Aimee have thought of everything and more. This bungalow has incredible amenities and is very well located in town. We loved having our own space that we could bring our pup to, and the private backyard space was a fantastic surprise. We will definitely keep this place in mind for next time.

Safe, quiet and secure. A great space for dogs, my dogs loved the yard. The owners are very friendly and communicate well.  Simple access to the house. The space is very clean...immaculate! Keep in mind that the house is only about 300sqf. It’s enough space for 2 adults and small dogs..maybe small kids...3 adults would be very crowded.
Quiet area and has sufficient space to be comfortable.  Easy access in and out with privacy in the back yard.  Worked really well for traveling with our dog.
Cozy little spot near central Salem. 45 minutes out to trail of ten falls. Super cute place that has everything you need. Highly recommend
Great cottage, fast communication, perfect location and pet friendly with private yard!

Bill and Aimee’s place is comfortable for 2 people, it would be a bit cramped with more. It’s on a quiet street which is nice with a parking space for guests. Bill and Aimee were quick to respond but we did not meet them.
It’s all about the yard. Thanks for the great retreat!
A charming and chic back house--a private big yard in front helped to open up the space! Great hosts as well!

Would totally stay here again! Cute private space, comfy bed, & it was the only place on our vacation that had its own fenced yard for our dog. It was so nice! Very close to everything in Salem. Aimee was very nice & gave us so many good recommendations for things to do, places to eat, etc.

We were in town visiting elderly parents, and due to covid precautions wanted a separate place to stay. The cottage is cute and tidy. Well laid out, perfect for 2. The windows all have screens and provide good cross breeze (there is also a fan and a mini a/c unit, we didn't need either). Plenty of privacy to have the door open to the fully fenced yard. Kitchen is efficient and has the basics, bed was extremely comfortable. Self check-in/out was easy. Would recommend.
Cute little place to stay, close to everything, comfortable bed!
Great location and sparkling clean.  Comfy and cozy bed.  Check in and check out were very easy and the owners responded quickly to any questions we had.   We would stay here again.
Very cozy and centrally located! Just enough space for two people, any more than that and it would be quite crowded. Thanks for a quiet and relaxing retreat!

We stayed with Bill and Aimee for more than two months and we couldn't have asked for a better place. It is a small space but 2 people were able to live comfortably, it is very cozy. the enclosed private yard is a huge plus and the area is beautiful.

We are pretty private people and Bill and Aimee gave us our space, but they were very quick to respond whenever we had questions.

We would definitely recommend this space for anyone, especially if your travelling with a 4 legged friend!
Aimee & Bill's petite hideaway was great. A little tight for our 5 week stay, but the fenced yard was like having another room. Great hospitality and friendliness. Thanks, guys!!
Bill and Aimee were wonderful hosts!

Very well appointed cottage with a very nice yard. Quiet and cozy, and excellent with a dog. Very clean. A bit tight, but for the most part worked out well for the two of us and Houdini (our 6 yr old coon-hound), on our two-day visit.

Hosts were incredibly responsive.

Bill & Aimee were great hosts with a beautiful place! It was the perfect place to stay with my pup and in a great location. Bill & Aimee were very responsive and kind, they also gave great recommendations of breweries and vineyards. I would love to  stay here again!
Great place for pets and stay during our travels to a friends wedding, thanks again.
Great place! Would definitely stay again

Fantastic and private get-away in Salem. This place is centrally located and close to just about everything. It has it’s own private yard and Aimee and Bill have lots of local knowledge and are happy to share it. We really enjoyed our stay and warm Salem welcome.

Bill and Aimee's cottage is exceptionally clean, well maintained, comfortable and cozy. There is also a lovely tranquil back yard in which to relax. Aimee was extremely helpful and welcoming and very willing to provide local information which might be useful. We enjoyed our short stay and would recommend this place to other guests.
Rita and Chris

Cute little backyard cottage, very nice yard if you have a small dog (like us).  The unit is great for a couple, not really big enough for 3 people unless one wants to sleep on a couch.  It’s a good sofa bed but not enough room to use it as such unless you want to give up all the main room floor space.  Well stocked kitchen with a single burner
The cottage was wonderfully appointed. Aimee and Bill were fabulous, recommended great things to do and places to eat. Bed was super comfy.
2nd Stay here. it was awesome. Aimee and Bill are wonderful hosts.  The house was perfect. I'll be staying again when I come back for work.
Cute place, convenient location, and great hosts!

This little hideaway is perfect for that couple looking for a quiet and romantic getaway. While the bungalow is in the hosts' backyard, there is a unexpected and welcome privacy. It sits behind the garage and offers a private yard that's perfect for enjoying pleasant spring and summer evenings. The place is equipped with everything you'll need for a cozy trip, and a bottle of wine likely will be waiting for you (it was for me). Bill and Aimee are outgoing and friendly, there if you need them and not when you prefer some privacy. The perfect balance.
A lovely tiny home! The private fenced yard would be perfect for doggos.
The house was clean and Bill and Aimee were quick to respond to any questions we had. It was a great location as well, and we appreciated that they let us bring our two pups!
I've stayed here a number of times for business trips. Bill and Aimee are wonderful hosts and the place is always perfect and has everything you need
Really clean and modern place with lots of privacy and friendly, accommodating hosts.
This is a great place! Once again, another great trip. Bill and Aimee are great.
Super cozy and cute

I stayed here for 3 weeks and loved it. It’s private and cozy, and conveniently located close to food and stores. Safe neighborhood and great for walking. Bill & Aimee are kind, thoughtful and eager to help if you need anything. I really appreciated the fully fenced yard for my dogs, and the bungalow is fully equipped with everything you need. Highly recommend.
Great place to stay and close to many places downtown . The owners were friendly and accommodating , with clear communication

i love how their place was fenced in. made it so easy for us to bring our pup! comfy bed too. we stayed there to be near some waterfalls we wanted to see. their place was 40 mins from silver falls state park. perfect lil tiny home and 5-9 mins to downtown where the good food and shops are.

Bill and Aimee were great hosts. This is an adorable tiny house with a private yard and entry. The bed was comfortable and Bill and Aimee were super helpful and kind (even helped us figure out extending our stay when I goofed and booked us to leave a day early - oops). We really enjoyed our stay at this cute cottage!
Friendly hosts and a great little spot in Salem!

Bill & Aimee, are amazing responsive hosts! They provide an attractive modern guest house. The property is quiet and private with amazing grounds. Our dogs were relaxed and felt at home in no time. We will return for another stay without hesitation.
Becky& Mike

Cozy, well equipped space with your own fenced in yard. Hosts are communicative and accommodating. Wonderfully located, a perfect spot for the weekend while doing the Oregon 70.3 Ironman event. Highly recommend and we will be back.
A little like staying in a construction zone, but comfortable.

The house is adorable and very conveniently located in a popular part of Salem. For our trip is was the perfect location putting us at the perfect distance to be close to so many restaurants, but also not right on the main strip to have to worry about road noise. Bill and Aimee were wonderful hosts, and checked in to make sure everything was going smoothly during the trip. The location also felt very secure with the fencing and passcode lock. Definitely would stay again!

We enjoyed the cottage with it’s lovely courtyard. The inside is small, as they noted in their ad, but comfortable. We had everything we wanted and needed. We will feel comfortable staying there again.

I required a place to reside while my house was being repaired after a water pipe leak. It felt like being in my own home and was only 2 miles away from my house, near to everything to which I’m accustomed. I’m grateful for their attention to detail, design, and cleanliness.
This is a great place with a private backyard. Great location! Bill and Aimee are awesome hosts.

This is a wonderful little retreat.  Private and generally quiet.  Great for a dog! Pleasant outside space.  Bed is super soft - like sleeping on a marshmallow! It is close to the main commercial avenue and near a lovely old cemetery.  I would not say it is a comfortable walk to any parks or attractions but for the cemetery which permits walking dogs on leash.  It is close to many standard suburban businesses but not a quaint old downtown.  Driving to downtown, the capital and municipal buildings and parks is short and easy though.  I will definitely stay again if in Salem.

This is a really lovely small home to stay in. Everything was clean and set up so well, the bed was super comfortable and the outside area is a great place to sit and relax. Hosts were great communicators. I would highly recommend this location.
Lovely cozy cottage that is comfortable and attractive. Bill and Aimee were great hosts - responsive, friendly and helpful.  It was perfect for our needs and we will visit here again.
As a single traveler, this cozy cabin fit my needs perfectly.

Had a very nice stay while visiting my daughter who is attending Willamette University.  Cozy bungalow, perfect for two people and a dog!  Close to restaurants and local parks.  Nice little mini fridge with a freezer that works!  Private yard for my dog so she could stretch her legs and play.  Very easy to communicate with Bill and Aimee and quick to reply to any requests.  Would recommend for anyone visiting Salem.
Came up to Salem for a basketball tournament. What drew us to the listing was that it was pet friendly. It was very clean and accommodating and a great location for where we had to travel to.

This is a wonderful location to come and just relax. The private yard with places to sit outside is inviting and sooo calm and quiet. The house is small, as mentioned in the description. It is set up efficiently though and everything is there for you without any clutter. Super clean. For a place to stay that is private, quiet, and welcoming this is a bargain. The hosts are remarkably friendly and focused on making sure you have everything you need to feel at home. Looking forward to staying there again.
A beautiful place in a great part of Salem. Great hosts.
Great place! Nice hosts! Thank you so much for a great stay!
The space is large and very comfortable. Plenty of privacy, and very easy access to the capital and downtown. 100% recommend to anyone staying in Salem. Great family. Great home.

This is an outstanding find! Christopher and Jackie's place was exactly what I needed after a really long day! My check in time changed throughout the day and they were very accommodating and responsive. Jackie met me in the driveway to get me settled into the space - even though it was well past 9pm. The unit is on the third floor of the house (so heed the warning about stairs) with a completely separate entrance.
The space is very clean and nicely appointed. Lots of pillows - which I love. They had very thoughtful touches; SOFT towels, a bag of good ground coffee, fans for both bedrooms, and a noise machine next to the queen bed to drown out any traffic noise. The bath was nice and deep - great for a relaxing tub. There is no TV (which was great for me) in the unit - instead they supplied a small bookshelf with a variety of books for any interest.
I frequently have to stay in Salem for work and Jackie and Christopher's space will be the first place I try to book from now on.

Jackie and Christopher were amazing hosts! It was my first time to Oregon and this was the perfect host and house. They were very nice and the location was amazing! Conveniently placed and a few minutes from downtown. Definitely would love to stay here again.

Can I please just move in? This AirBnb is so lovely, comfortable and a great location. It was hard to get out of bed in the morning. I arrived much later than expected and Jackie stayed up to greet me and show me the space. It’s beautiful and I only wish I could’ve stayed longer. They had a white noise machine next to the bed too which I’ve always wanted to try. Thank you!

This place is in a perfect location for exploring Salem. (It would also be great if you have to do any work in downtown Salem.) It is a very charming victorian home that has been tastefully updated. The kitchen is a huge plus, especially if you are trying to save money on dining! We would love to stay here again.

This is a beautiful space with its own private entrance, and especially wonderful for families - I came with my 5 year old son and he loved having his own little room. It was also very nice for me to have a living room to relax in after he went to bed. Lovely decorating with thoughtful touches, sparkling clean, nice soft beds and linens, lots of useful kitchen tools, deep tub for soaking. It's a little drafty when it's chilly as it's an older home but the heater is very fast and powerful and you have control over it. It's such a charming apartment and I was really pleased with it. Also a great location convenient to downtown and kind and welcoming hosts. I had an emergency where my wallet was missing and Jackie called the last place I used it without my even asking. Lovely place to stay. I highly recommend it!
This spot is great! In a very easy to get to part of Salem. The stay was quiet and the apartment was cute. Great value, great stay.

Great place and outstanding hosts!
I highly recommend.

This is a great place to stay when looking for a few nights in Salem. Walking distance to downtown and the state agency/Capitol buildings. The space is incredibly comfortable and relaxing -- has all the "things' you may need (and a great book selection that you didn't know you needed!)
Very cozy and cute space. My stay was very short, but if I ever need to stay in Salem again, this is the spot!

This was the perfect location near downtown Salem for what I was looking for. It was sparkling clean, comfortable, private and just as described. Jackie and Chris made themselves available as needed. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom was spacious and the kitchen has everything needed to prepare a lite meal. The only hiccup to my stay was the breaker switched off while the microwave was running. Definitely a great stay.

This is a beautiful and charming upstairs flat in a great location. Jackie and Christopher are doing some landscaping projects outside at the moment that complicate the access a bit, but the space and location are well worth it.

This air bnb was great! The space was super cozy and all around very nice to stay in! The only downsides would be the super steep stairs leading to the space and the creaky floors as it’s hard not to be too loud. I’m aware these are unfixable so it’s really no issue, just a heads up.
Very friendly hosts!!! A very clean and unique space.We loved the old house charm!!!
Great place to stay if you are in the Salem area! The space is great and spacious. The house is beautiful. Jackie and Christopher are so gracious. Highly recommend!

Perfect walking distance to the capital buildings and located in a really adorable neighborhood! The space is stylishly decorated but still comfy and welcoming. Jackie is an excellent hostess and very responsive: if I need to come to Salem again, this is where I will be staying!

Comfortable stay in a fantastic location. Lots of helpful little touches - like salt and pepper in the kitchen, travel-size toothpaste in the bathroom, and a residential parking guest pass - really made it a great experience.
We absolutely recommend this place. We will stay again, if given the opportunity.

Jackie and Christopher are the quintessence of warm, thoughtful hospitality.  We couldn't ask for better.  Besides their helpfulness and kindness, we experienced excellent accommodations--very clean, comfortable, fully equipped kitchen with excellent stove/oven and fridge, two nicely dedicated sleeping areas with very comfy beds, outstanding bathroom with a shower I want to beam over to our house!  The tone and tenor of the family was beautiful--truly a connected, loving family.  The northside location spurred me and my son to walk lots, including to the nearby downtown area, Riverfront, Willamette University campus, and State Capitol Building.  The truth is experiencing this family and their hospitality was in itself worth the very modest price of admission!
They were wonderful hosts! The location was perfect for where we needed to go the following day

Don't even hesitate to stay here. AMAAAZING accommodations with great views of the tree tops. Sun streams in come morning, comfy beds, and the shower is the bomb Jackie was a sweetheart and met our every need. I can;t wait to come back to this little oasis in Salem:)
I used this space for a boudoir shoot, and it was absolutely beautiful. It was very clean and well decorated and would be a very comfortable place to stay.
Very cute 3rd floor studio with kitchen, plenty of hot water and comfortable beds.

This was a home away from home experience! The suite is comfortable, extremely clean and full of charm. Christopher and Jackie are very friendly and accommodating, and communication is very quick. Having the kitchen was a huge plus for us, and we took full advantage of it. Small extras were appreciated (room fans some toiletries, extra towels, a few snacks and COFFEE! )

As the host have mentioned in their listing, there are quite a few stairs up to the suite, so if you have mobility issues concerns keep that in mind.

We hope to come back and stay here again definitely recommend it!
Nice home, great people
Amazing spot! Would absolutely stay again!
It’s a quite relaxing  neighborhood where we could find everything we wanted. Apartment is cute, it has everything for our one night stay. Overall it’s good !
Great place.

Great location if you want to be downtown. Stairs can be tricky (I should have packed lighter!). Nicely equipped kitchen, bathroom was beautifully decorated and charming. Main bed is a double so might be too cozy for a couple but comfy for one person, could definitely have another person in the twin and a third on the fold-out couch if needed. Wonderfully thoughtful touches, lots of pillows, blankets, fans, towels and more.
The space was as described, very clean, and also cute. We didn’t hear any noise from the house below. It’s a lovely place and close to downtown, easy street parking. We would stay again!
A wonderfully charming place to stay with all the amenities you could ever need!
Thank you so much for a delightful stay, Christopher & Jackie!  We’ll definitely stay again when next in town.
This was one of the best Airbnb experiences I've had, and I've had a lot of very positive Airbnb experiences.  Everything about Jackie and Christopher's place was delightful and comfortable.
This place was adorable and spotless. Great hospitality and they had everything I could’ve needed.

These hosts really embody the spirit of AirBnb: attentive, locally based and engaged with the space and guest which is exactly where I want my lodging dollars to go. The space is immaculately clean and furnished in a really cozy and homespun way.

Super cute studio. Very clean and comfortable. Everything you need is there. The WiFi isn’t the best but it does its job. The street is also a bit noisy but you are on the third floor so you have a bit of distance from the traffic sounds. Other than that Jackie was very accommodating and generous! I would highly recommend this place!
Great place.
Beautiful apartment

Adorable and cozy. All amenities you could hope for are all there and perfectly functional. Hosts were wonderful to communicate with.
One thing to be aware of are the amount of stairs. There are stairs on the deck and then a small, but steep & narrow flight to access the rooms. Those with any mobility issues should be wary.

This is a beautiful home and a really fun space to stay in. Jackie was responsive and helpful the whole stay and the house was wonderful. Craftsman style home, your own private entrance to the top floor and a real gem. I would definitely stay here again if I found myself back in Salem.

Such a lovely and comfortable place to live. You get your own kitchen and bathroom so you’re not sharing anything with anyone, which is super important to me. You also get a bunch of supplies of towels and blankets. I love the white noise machine beside one of the beds. The whole family is so welcoming and nice. Jackie is super responsive and accommodating, there’s really nothing negative about this place that I can think of. Would definitely come back!
Great place at great price! Sparkling clean!

Christopher and Jackie were great hosts. Very helpful - even recommended a mechanic because of a car problem.
Very comfortable place to stay. Hope to return.
Gorgeous space in a wonderful house. Clean, clean clean. Amazing stay.

Jackie and Christopher's place was beautiful, comfortable and clean. It was just as represented in the description and photographs. Jackie was lovely, flexible with check-in and available for any questions that we had. I highly recommend their place if you need a place to stay in Salem.
Super nice, super clean. Great value.
Great location with a great space and layout.
Very clean and cute space!
Quiet, spacious, and sparkling clean. The location is also very convenient. I look forward to staying here again on future trips.
5 starts all around.

Wonderful, super clean apartment with such a great view of the sunset! It was super cute and everything was provided for us including a parking pass. The beds were super comfy. Perfect as a rest stop on a road trip or as a base to explore the area around. Would def stay again! Thank you so much.
Sparkling clean, well appointed and centrally located.  This place is a winner!  I will return.
Beautiful little place. Very clean and comfortable.

Comfy beds and a very clean space. The hosts were easy to communicate with and the check in was super simple. We arrived late and they made accommodations for this. We would definitely stay here again, it was a short drive from the convention center too.
Great host that were super accommodating for my check in.  Very clean and nice space.   Jackie was an amazing host that was so nice though out my stay!

Adorable space, comfortable bed, clean and well-appointed. Would absolutely stay here again on another trip through Salem. Conveniently located. A little bit of traffic noise, but it wasn’t too loud, even on a Saturday night. Treetop views through the third-story windows.
Great space, friendly and helpful hosts. Conveniently located and very clean. Thank you!
Great, clean and cozy space with excellent location.
Place was great and cute. Highly recommend staying here.
Great place! Beautiful yard, clean place, and the beds were extremely comfortable! Would definitely come back!
I loved this place! It was cozy! It was in a good location and Jackie was super kind! Great spot! Highly recommend!
Awesome place!!! Super cute, great location, and comfy!
The space is immaculate and very comfortable.  The hosts were communicative and easy to work with.  I highly recommend it!
A fabulously charming little place, perfect for my stay! I would highly recommend 👍🏻

A great space!  Good location to the Convention Center and Chemeketa Center for Business & Industry.  Very accommodating with my check in time.  Quick response time to messages.  Beautiful home & yard, and a full size bathtub!  I will stay here again if my travels take me to Salem.
Great old house. Up on 3rd floor, quiet big space, 2 comfortable beds, kitchen, great bathtub and shower. Great communication from hosts — excellent time.
Great location in downtown Salem near capital and state buildings.  The most comfortable pillows!  Thank you Jackie and Christopher!
Such a charming place!
Very clean and homey space at a great price!  Was a perfect spot for the night.  The apartment has everything you might need and is very well appointed.  Highly recommended!
A very comfortable and stylish space, close to so many sights of Salem. You will enjoy your stay!

Everything was great!
Jackie was helpful and quick in responding.

We had such a relaxing and convenient stay in Jackie and Christopher’s adorable and comfortable place. Nice size bathroom with a deep tub for a bath and lots of privacy. It was so nice to just walk downtown past the capital to go out to dinner and check in/out so simply. Next time in Salem we would stay here again!
It was exactly what we expected from what we saw on air bnb. Very clean and perfect for our visit.
Christopher and Jackie’s Place is wonderful. They were accommodating with a schedule adjustment and Check in and the location to the Capitol is great. We will be back!

You can't go wrong with this lovely little apartment in the clouds.
We didn't want to leave. Thanks.
Loved this space. Cute, convenient, cozy and comfortable!
Great spot and cute as can be. Highly recommended!

What a charming AIRBNB in the heart of downtown Salem! It felt like we were at the top of the world on the third floor, among all the treetops and looking down on the neighborhood roofs. This is a stylish space with lots of room and a full kitchen. We were able to eat in and relax. We appreciated how bright it was with all the windows and all small touches in the decor and kitchen fully stocked with all kinds of amenities. Wonderful and kind hosts! Fantastic hospitality!
Very cute apartment. Be prepared to get your exercise with the stairs.
Such a cute, comfortable, clean space! We loved it.
Price for location is AMAZING. Having a useable kitchen is so nice, as it saves money vs eating out.
Great spot! Easy and convenient
Very responsive & welcoming hosts. Great location close to downtown & Willamette U. Comfortable and cozy get away. Lovely neighborhood.
If you enjoy old houses, this attic apartment is fantastic. It's well furnished with many items available in the kitchen.

Christopher and Jackie have a really nice place going. The space is super clean, beautifully decorated and super close to town. Way cheaper than expected and they were super helpful and answered any questions I had. Please stay here! So worth it for the price too. I didn’t wanna leave!
Really wonderful little place, close to downtown! Very cute and clean.

It’s very good location for visiting Williamette; the apartment is very clean and more spacious than it looks in the pictures. The last staircase is steep but short. The bathtub is one of the best I’ve been in- nice and deep with lots of hot water. There is road noise but really only in the morning. I didn’t use the white noise machine. It was a very enjoyable 3 nights. When I locked myself out, they promptly let me back in. Nice people!!
This Airbnb was sparkling clean, completely adorable, and super comfortable to stay in! Highly recommend.
Great hosts, beautiful place, and clean, will definitely be back and recommend to others!
Amazing! We had our private space, parking isn’t too bad, very clean and spacious, and comfortable!
Loved the natural light and built-in architectural features of this 3rd floor attic apartment. Plenty spacious; kitchen was well stocked. Super convenient to the Capitol.
Very cute guest suite on the top of a three story home. Very quaint and sparkling clean. Loved the charm of the place and was nice to have a small kitchen to make coffee in the morning!
Very cute space. Beautiful house and nicely located.

Beautiful space, gracious hosts, comfy linens and a luxuriously relaxing bathtub! That sentence only begins to describe this lovely listing and its hosts. We will be keeping them in mind for our future travels. :)
Great spot that is very convenient to the Capitol and downtown Salem. Very easy check-in check-out process. Hope to return next time I am in Salem for a extended stay.

If you're in to old house charm this place is for you! Noise from the street can be a bit much at times as the windows are original single pane. Furnishings fit the space and are cute. Bathroom is very spacious and the oversized bath tub is amazing. Parking is at a premium and is on the street.
A great spot.
Very clean, quiet and comfortable place to stay.
Great space, super clean and comfortable. Will be back!
Well equipped space with private access. Everything you could need. Wonderful unobtrusive but caring hosts. A great stay.

This apartment is perfect for a couple it is upstairs above the owners home. I did have teenage boys with me and they could hear them downstairs so I felt bad but location is downtown and convenient check in and parking is very easy.
Great value. It's centrally located in Salem close to many stores, restaurants, etc. Parking is easy. Nice bathroom and comfortable beds.

The house itself has some old world charm and some stairs (no biggie for this 45 year old nurse). Check-in was as described with pictures. I communicated about staying out first night via AirBNB. Parking on the side street with provided permit works well. The place is fairly private aside from seeing kids out back where the entrance is. Some white noise from the busier street was suitable for me (had it everywhere I’ve lived over past 20 years).
In all fairness I didn’t sleep on the beds because I spent the night at a friend’s house. The following day I chose to drive home early after napping on the sofa. I reported in person about leaving early to ensure lockup and inspection could be done . If circumstances were different between my friend and myself I’d stay again.
Such a cute and clean space and the beds are super comfortable!
It is a beautiful space with a huge bathtub, but also on an extremely busy street. Even with all the windows closed, I could hear traffic and I didn't get a restful night's sleep.
Cute apartment in great central location. Hosts were very helpful and communicated quickly.

Jackie greeted us at check in.  She is a very friendly hostess.  The place was super clean and cute.  It was easy to find and just as described.  We would definitely stay here again next time we're in town!

Absolutely perfect!!
You are "in" their home, but 100% private and you never feel like your invading someone's space. The apartment is decorated so nice and everything is clean and just really amazing.
I'm SO grateful we stayed here!!
Absolutely enjoyed my stay here. The unit is private, unique, and charming. I had everything that I need, will return back in the future

Thank you so much for letting me and my boyfriend stay in your amazing space. I loved all the quirky things about the space we stayed in, from original hardware to the windows! it was amazing thank you again. I will definitely be seeking this space out again in the future as I’ll be in Salem more often! This is definitely a great price for the space you get. The children that live at the house are very respectful as well as helpful! They told us where to go as they were playing outside their house!
Great home! Private entrance and comfortable space. Great for long stays. I Warm for the summer months, but there is a window box. Very close the the state capitol! Highly suggest.
Great little space with a nice view of Salem. Close to downtown.

I am a local that needed a last minute booking so I could work on my final exams out of my noisy house.
The place was clean and cozy! Communication was fast and friendly. I also learned about a whole new neighborhood that I hadn’t checked out before. It reminded me of the beautiful neighborhoods in Sellwood PDX and it was centrally located close to downtown.
I will definitely keep this place in the back of my mind when I need a break and I’ll let friends from out of town know that this spot is ideal!
The stairs are a little weird coming up but I also love the old quirks that come with old houses

This was one of the best Airbnb's I've stayed at in the PNW. Great central Salem location, scrupulously clean, cute modern design. Large (did I mention clean?) Bathroom.

Will definitely stay again.

This space is an adorable little 3rd story walk up, quaint and cute with everything you'll need for a long or short stay. There is a little road noise as mentioned in the description, but with the super comfortable bed, you won't notice at all. Wish I could have stayed longer!

We loved staying at Christopher and Jackie’s Airbnb. When we each arrived, each of said out loud that we would rent from them and live in the apartment if we could.
Check in directions were simple and the beds were so comfy.

PROS:

- Great location, super easy check-in, always available street parking, no in-person contact with hosts.
- The view from the top floor is nice.
- Bathroom is a good size and shower pressure was perfect.

CONS:

- I wouldn’t say it was dirty, but it wasn’t the cleanest it could have been — and I think this is important especially during a pandemic. The kitchen drawers, cabinets, and silverware were not properly cleaned (crumbs, leftover food stains, etc.) and there was left over food in the fridge from the people before us.

- If Jello was a bed, this is it. The beds were far too squishy for my partner and I. Yes, we tried both. We had four tiresome nights of tossing and turning. The mattresses sink in the middle, and both mattresses droop on the sides because the bed frames underneath are a smaller size.

- I cut my leg on a nail sticking out of the wicker basket in the living room within five minutes of arriving.

The condition of the space overall left me wondering how thoroughly it’s inspected after every use. Overall, I’d say it’s an okay spot for a quick stay, but I wouldn’t book again.
I love staying here when in Salem for work
This was such a lovely spot to stay. I definitely would recommend it. It was easy to locate, beautiful views, and the best bathtub ever!
Everything was perfect for our quick over nighter.

Awesome pitstop in our roadtrip up from San Diego to Seattle. We were provided a parking pass free of charge to park our U-haul for the night in front of the listing. One worry was safety of the neighborhood because we had a U-haul, but we had no issues there. Really cool home layout and the 2 A/Cs were great.

Christopher and Jackie had such a lovely home- exactly as advertised. The home is located in a nice quiet neighborhood and amenities are within a few minutes drive. The apartment was super clean and well furnished. There were plenty of clean towels which we definitely appreciated.. We were only in town for the night but it was just what we needed. Thanks again for welcoming us into your home!
Bigger than expected, perfect to sleep three people and great distance from Portland. We really enjoyed our stay at Jackie’s place!

This place has got to be the perfect example of staying at an attachment into someone's home. There are the flights of stairs but we were for warned. The street is quiet and never did we feel unsafe even when we arrived back late. The space is clean and soooo cute. The beds are a little soft but still very comfortable. We will for sure keep this place in mind when visiting family in town.
In the heart of downtown, steps yes, but the space is perfectly setup
Really cute place, loved to stay there! Really nice host.

Very nice space, exactly as advertised. Perfect for 2-3 people. Great location, walking distance to parks and downtown activities (well, those that exist during quarantine...). Christopher and Jackie were quickly responsive to all of our questions. I would highly recommend.
This is a very nice little attic apartment, comfortable and clean.
Great space close to downtown. Quick responses and clean!
Super cute space. Great value. Comfortable bed. Close to Willamette University. Larger space than I expected and a very roomy bathroom. Quiet neighborhood. Would stay here again.

We wanted an affordable, yet comfortable place to stay during our short visit to Salem. Jackie and Christopher's place exactly fit the bill and exceeded our expectations. The apartment was a little bigger than expected. The A/C was good at keeping it cool during our 90 degree visit. Parking was easy to find on Belmont each time. The place was very clean and well decorated with plentiful storage spaces and a rather large kitchen and bathroom. The tub is huge and deep. The water pressure is excellent. The fridge a good size. Jackie was always quick to answer our communications before and during our stay as well. The Wi-Fi was strong enough for what we needed. We loved the white-noise machine in the main bedroom and the fan was great too.

If I was asked what could be improved, I would say that having better room-darkening curtains in the bedroom would have made our stay more comfortable. The morning sun in the summer is powerful and we are used to darker curtains at home and at most hotels we visit. However, some people might be fine with their darkening ability.

The whole place is super cute and we will probably stay there the next time we are in Salem.
Wonderful space, great location, friendly family!
Great location, super comfortable unit.

my favorite three pros:

1. the mattresses were comfortable and the sheets/pillowcases smelled clean. i've been to a lot of airbnb and i swear most airbnb places have the worst mattresses. the larger bed was very nice.
2. the place was very clean. even checked behind the toilet seat and it was clean.
3. responsive hosts to my messages as late as 11 :30 pm and as early as 9 am.
4. has working ac/heater

overall, my partner and i just needed a place to sleep overnight for our road trip up north so the three pros i wrote above were basically the most important aspects i desired. i didn't really have any cons for my trip personally, but i can imagine the below may be potential cons for others. pretty minor stuff.

potential cons:

1. there's no tv. i didn't care for it, but maybe others do.
2. it's like a studio, so no walls between the beds.

5/5 rate from me, thanks.
Excellent customer service very clean, kind of a steep staircase to get up to the residence but it was well worth it. Nice comfortable beds great amenities 2 air conditioning units perfect
This place is very clean and well kept.  We would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Salem.
We had a wonderful stay at Christopher and Jackie’s place.  The apartment is adorable and very spacious, it’s centrally located, and close to everything.

Christopher & Jackie's Suite is adorable. The vintage architecture of this place is intact and has such charming character. Sparkling clean and a great value too. We loved the cozy feel of this place, the bedroom alcoves were the best.  We would definitely try for another stay here when we're in Salem.  Good communication and easy location, we recommend this stay to you.
Cozy, clean & comfortable accommodations.  Just what we needed after a long day of travel.

There was terrible wildfire smoke in Salem when I stayed.  Christopher and Jackie had sealed off the windows with towels and had a very nice air conditioning unit running when I arrived.  It was so nice to come in to nice, cool air when I arrived.  I didn’t cook, but the kitchen table was a nice spot for me to enjoy my take out meal.  The suite is on the top floor and is very cute.  There is a lot of charm.  There are original windows, which are beautiful, but do let in a bit of noise from the busy street in front.  The air conditioning was running, so there was white noise, but the traffic sounds didn’t disturb me while I was sleeping.  The bigger bed was just fine and I had no issue with being comfortable.  There were also darkening curtains or rollers in the windows to help block light if needed.  Chris and Jackie were very gracious in answering many questions I had.  Their check in was also very clear and easy.
This is a great place to stay. It has style and charm. We were very comfortable and everything is super easy as a guest here. We would definitely like to stay here again when in Salem.

Christopher and Jackie's suite is in the perfect location for what we needed. Plenty of street parking, and easily accessible. The suite is very cute, well decorated. The queen bed feels like a cloud. We were very comfortable there and highly recommend.
The apartment was beautiful and comfortable. The location was an easy distance to downtown.

A comfortable, clean, and cozy space. It was easy to find on-street parking (and there’s a residential pass that goes with the suite). The wi-fi was strong enough for me to be able to work while the kids did online school too! Would highly recommend!
Beautiful top floor of an old victorian home. Spacious. Overall a great place to stay.
Great spot!
Christopher and Jackie have a beautiful home! It's clear they put a lot of thought and effort into the place. We had a cozy short stay and thought it was so charming!
Not only was the space chic and immaculate, Christopher and Jackie provided all the amenities one needs for a quick trip, and were incredibly responsive and accommodating throughout our stay!
We loved this Airbnb!  It was beautifully decorated and furnished.  The hosts are great people, and the location was excellent.  One of the best Airbnbs we have ever stayed in.  You'll love it.
Great space and value
Good price, cozy, lots of charm. Will be back.
Super nice place and description was accurate. Very comfortable beds too. Steps were not an issue for us.
Very nice place

Nice location. We liked having a private entrance and although it is part of a big home, it felt separated from the rest of the house. They also provided great local tips which made our exploring a lot easier. Highly recommend
Great, immaculately clean place to stay in a great Salem neighborhood!
Spotless. Privacy. Well furnished. Historic location. Great people.
Alright place
Very nice, clean apartment on a tree-lined street in a quiet neighborhood.  Not having a TV really helps you relax.
Clean, quiet, great location. Was exactly what we needed in a place to stay during election week.
Very lovely place! Host was very accommodating. We would definitely choose to stay here again.
This cute attic space is perfect for 1 or 2 ppl with a fully  operational kitchen, luxurious shower and comfy beds. First value and experience!
Accommodating hosts, nice accommodation. The space is separate and self contained for those looking to social distance.

Clean and spacious, plenty of charm and character with updated amenities. Clear check in, and special care to extra needs like sheets and coffee! Would definitely recommend! Fair warning however, If you are tall like me watch your head! The attic charm comes at a price if you don't take care :)
Hosts were accommodating and friendly, the space is very quaint.
A great place and value. Recommend to anyone looking for a full apartment style rental.

Suuuuper clean and spacious! This home was beautiful and had everything we needed. I honestly think the pictures don’t do it any justice. We felt comfortable and at home, the neighborhood is quiet and beautiful. I would highly recommend this place and stay again!

Third floor apartment is a quaint updated space.
Lots of stairs.

Cute little apartment on top level of their home. Kids running around the yard, a little bit of a surprise, but it was cute to see kids outside playing tag instead of plugged into a device.
Amazing detail touches that make you feel right at home.
Lovely stay! Super clean and the step by step, contactless check-in was such a plus during Covid times.

I enjoy the minimalist touch this property brings. First glance the home was well kept and I could feel the family home environment that I needed for my wife and I and our two kids. The space was well staged, upkept and with modern touches all around.
My favoite thing about staying here on this property, was a feel of a escape from the world and able to unwind in the quite upstairs.
I felt welcomed onto the property. And i never once felt like a stranger. The house is in a nice neighborhood. there was a good working heater, stove top and refrigerator that my family prepared meals with, plenty of towels and blankets for us to use. I really enjoyed that there was not a television because i like the quiet get away staying here gave us. I would recommend staying here. And i also would consider staying here again in the furture.
-thank you Christopher and Jackie for the opportunity.
This was my first AirBNB and you have opened my eyes to opportunities that i will never be staying in a hotel out of town ever again.
Always a great stay!
Loved our stay!!!
Got everything planned! Parking pass was provided!

Christopher and Jackie’s place was as advertised. It was clean and well set up. I really appreciated the small, but well stocked kitchen so I didn’t have to eat out ever day. The location was really great for access to downtown and the Capitol area.  The hosts were also understanding and accommodating with my schedule. Would stay again.

What a lovely place to stay. I usually hesitate to stay places that are shared but there were no disturbances here - didn’t even hear anybody else. Being on the top level of the house with a separate entrance worked out great. Also, the entire family was welcoming. The kids even invited my own kid to play - sweet bonus!

If you have a student at Willamette this is the perfect place to stay during a visit. The location is close to campus and in a sweet neighborhood. The suite itself is full of charm and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. There are two alcoves that make up the bedrooms with thick curtains that provide privacy. The bathroom is huge and the kitchen is adorable with a fridge, stove, coffee maker, etc. - all that you would need or expect. There is A/C and black-out curtains which kept the space cool. It was the perfect place to spend the evening after a day out with our recent graduate. Check-in was a breeze with Jackie giving clear instructions on where to park and how to find the separate suite entrance. We had the good fortune of meeting the host and she is delightful. We wish we found this place sooner and will definitely stay here again if we come back to Salem.
Great stay. Seriously consider coming here
The cutest lil upstairs apartment!

Christopher and Jackie's place is super sweet. The alcoves where the beds are are charming. I was a little concerned about parking on the street with the things we needed to leave in the car, but it was fine. A very nice place to stay.
Showed up to a clean, air conditioned suite. Key, parking pass, everything else we might need laid out ready to go. No complaints.

Lovely house in a nice residential neighbourhood. The apartment has privacy, space, is clean, and was well stocked. As described and a very good option for anyone coming through Salem. The hosts were easy to deal with and communicated when needed. We loved our stay. Thank you.
Great place to stay. Everything was as described. It was great to have a few bottles of water in the fridge and coffee available with the Keurig in the morning. Street parking was easy.

This was a great place to stay. I was only there for a night, but Jackie was friendly and welcoming. The property was exactly as described and pictured, and the neighborhood seems like a nice area. Check-in was super easy, and communication was prompt. If you don’t mind the stairs, this place is perfect!
Thorough instructions, quaint place in great area for superb price! Would stay again
Fine for a quick overnight. Lots of stairs — pack lightly.
Welcoming and very comfortable. Loved the details and location. Perfect for our quick visit.
Cute and pristine!  Perfect for our stay in Salem. Many thoughtful touches. Had everything we needed and more.

This is a quiet haven right near the capitol and Willamette. Capitol Street was noisy until 9 but quiet after that. Nicely appointed kitchen. Comfortable, soft beds. It's a beautifully rehabed old house so many original touches. Stairs are steep so pack light.

This apartment was just as described and pictured—neat, clean, and comfortable.

It’s in a lovely area and we would definitely stay again.

The listing does a good job, in photos and words, this apartment. Pay attention to the stairs and the fact that the apartment is in the third floor. I found the apartment to be very comfortable and quiet. I used the bed in the main bedroom and I think it was very comfortable. I’m not a fan of futons as couches so I didn’t use it. But the upholstered chair was nice. Tall people (like me) be aware that there are coved ceilings which slope down and can cause you to bang your head if you’re not careful.

This place is a lovely little apartment, so clean and nice overlooking tree tops. As others have noted, lots of stairs to haul luggage up. But Jackie and family so nice and accommodating. They were a joy!  The apartment a bit warm on hot nights, but the air conditioners keep it cool during the day. Seek out the fans if conditioners too loud at night. Busy street out front, but nice safe feeling neighborhood. A very good value and feeling of privacy.
Such a great place to stay, host are very attentive. Definitely recommend!!
Room was cool and was spacious

Such an awesome space and great location. We were able to walk to dinner two of the nights we stayed here! The street wasn't loud and we were more than comfortable. A great start to our minimoon with such sweet hosts and adorable baby buns.
Place was great! Centrally located for all the activities we had planned for our girls trip. Clean, comfortable and Penny the pup was a wonderful greeter! Thanks to this lovely family!

My stay with Christopher and Jackie was exactly what I needed after a long day of traveling. The apartment is super cozy and beautifully decorated. I got a wonderful nights sleep after a long soak in the exquisite tub!
Lovely space!
Spotlessly clean, thoughtfully decorated, and everything we needed for our short stay in Salem. Highly recommend!
Clean, comfortable, attention to details, and well thought out.   Lots of nooks and crannies and charm galore!  I loved it and will be back.
This is a great place right in the middle of it all. Very clean and comfortable place, and nice people. Thanks again!!
The location was beautiful and clean. The place was easy to find with lots of food nearby. There was also lots of activities near by.
You can’t really get anything this well outfitted for the price. The only problem I could see would be the stairs, but that was fine for us. Really clean and tons of space.
Very beautiful home!  The upstairs apartment was super cozy and charming. The hosts were wonderful too!

A wonderful place to stay. Beautiful home, perfect apartment for our family of
3. Super location in this cool town. Plenty to do in the area. Will definitely try to book it again when we return!
Great little spot in Salem! Upstairs, private suite at the top of the house that has everything you need for a stay. Great spot and a great bargain.
Great space in cool craftsman, centrally located and comfortable. Hosts were easy to deal with and fast with communications.
Great space to relax and unwind at the end of the day!
Great place! Looking forward to coming back!
Perfect stay for a getaway in Salem! The place was super cute and cozy and location was also great.
The location was absolutely perfect!! The house is so beautiful and the air bnb is even cuter in person and more spacious than expected. Would 10/10 stay here again!

It's a great place for one to three people!  I loved the historical sense to the place, and the sleeping areas as well as the main area are lovely.  The bathroom and kitchen are great with plenty of function and use.  The noise outside isn't bad at all, even though it is on a busy street.  You are within walking distance to many places, and it is a nice little neighborhood.  I would definitely stay there again. Very comfortable, and the hosts were kind when I forgot a piece of clothing behind.
These hosts were so accommodating & kind! The space was exactly what we were looking for. The charm of the guesthouse & the proximity to downtown Salem couldn’t be beat! Would definitely recommend!
Amazing views and cutest little attic apartment!

We had a wonderful, relaxing weekend at Christopher & Jackie’s place.  Check-in was a breeze, and the stairs really aren’t that bad unless you have mobility issues.  The stairways are well lit, and we had no problems.  The place was spotless!  We didn’t use the kitchen facilities much, but we could see it was adequately equipped.  The bed was comfortable, and we slept very well.  Lots of extra towels were available too!  We would not hesitate to stay here again.  Many thanks!

This is a charming, well-appointed attic apartment. I enjoyed being within walking distance of downtown. Bring earplugs if you're sensitive to noise, as you can hear any car traffic on the streets below.
This is a great place with an excellent value price point. Very charming retreat and an easy 1 mile walk to downtown.

Very cute & lots of light.
Yes, stairs.
Owners were easy to communicate with & very accommodating.
Great place in centralized location with everything you need nearby. Plenty of space and amenities. I slept sound and woke refreshed. Will definitely stay again my next trip to Oregon.
Very clean and cozy. We really liked the alcoves with the beds. Super cute!
We enjoyed your place, it had all that we needed. Thanks
Awesome stay. They really have thought of everything to make our stay more comfortable.will definitely stay again next time I’m n the area.
One of the best value stays in Salem! This was a cozy Airbnb and we loved the location.
super cute and clean!

Christopher and Jackie were incredibly accommodating to our schedule and that made ALL the difference. The place itself is small but well-designed. It was quiet, easy to heat, and very clean. The room with the Queen bed has a nice pull-down shade plus a curtain so it stayed dark enough for me to sleep in. The other room does not get quite as dark. Street parking was decent. Wifi is decent in the living room, but not as strong in the main bedroom - we streamed music and shows just fine in the living room. Overall it's a great spot for its value comparatively.

This space was exactly what I needed while in Salem on a business trip. The location was great, and parking was easy with the pass that was provided. I felt very safe, which is always a consideration when I'm traveling solo. The apartment had everything that I could have wanted, and the bed was very comfortable. The kitchen was even well stocked! I will definitely stay here again next time I'm in Salem.

This is a charming Airbnb in the heart of Salem. Very convenient to downtown and the state Capitol buildings. The Airbnb itself was clean and well equipped — I loved the thoughtful extra snacks! I’ll definitely be back!
Nice space in a nice neighborhood. Owners responded within short periods of time. The stairway up to the area is narrow and steep, but well worth it.

Very cute studio with comfortable beds, there’s even an inflatable mattress if you need. Very kind hosts, had little snacks and oatmeal available and a kettle for hot water. The stairs are no joke, if you can’t do slightly steep stairs, this place may not work for you.
Super cute. Super clean. Great location. Spacious. Private. Highly recommended.

This is a really sweet, cozy and cute spot that feels a lot more spacious than the photos portray! There’s a closet for luggage/clothes in both rooms, toys for small kiddos (we brought our 3-year old and she loved the puzzles and younger toys), and a really nice suburban view with natural lighting from all the windows (all around except from the south). It is a tad bit noisy at night from the window in the queen bed bedroom but not a dealbreaker!

Before coming I read a few older reviews about the wifi and just want to note it hasn’t been changed yet~ It was pretty difficult watching shows let alone just checking email 😅
Charming apartment, very clean and great communication.
It was perfect. Exceptional hosts.
Christopher and Jackie’s place was cute and cozy. Everything was organized and comfortable.  It was perfect for our stay!
The hosts were communicative and accommodating. Would stay again!
Clean! Cozy! Convenient!  Great Bathroom! Kitchen is well stocked and very functional. Good value and great location.

Absolutely perfect stay, was easy to communicate with Christopher and Jackie. They made a special exception for our family that was very appreciated. The space itself was everything you need, clean and cosy. No Wifi issues, lots of little extras (oatmeal for breakfast, other snacks, makeup wipes). One of the best places we’ve stayed! Thank you 😊

This stay is delightful. Very well described in the listing. The bed and the shower are especially nice - comfortable and clean. The 3rd floor looks down over the whole neighborhood, which would be even more stunning when the trees have leafed out. Jackie was friendly and responsive.
clean, comfortable and well worth it!!!

A great place to stay while doing business or visiting family in Oregon's capital city. An old home tastefully remodeled. This apartment has all that you could need, comfort, just the right amount of space, full bathroom and a nice little kitchen.
Very quaint and a nice little place.
great hosts and fantastic communicators! Christopher and Jackie were able to accommodate a second car, and the rental is gorgeous!
Great location and lovely accommodations

My favorite Airbnb !

Christopher and Jackie and their young family hosted me for three days in Salem

I appreciate all the attention to detail that made my check in and departure really easy.


The space was clean and inviting. I slept well on the bed and appreciate the big, clean bathroom

Christopher and Jackie are attentive hosts who seem to have thought of everything!  Their home provided all the necessities and way beyond.  Comfy beds, soft towels, a nicely sized kitchen and living area with room for privacy with two beds are only some of the features of their place.  It was a very nice stay!
