Super convenient,   So comfortable and cute.   Coffee bar with supplied kuerigs was most appreciated after a week of traveling.   Great night sleep.
100% recommended. Lovely and quiet.
Such a lovely place, beautiful space, very kind hosts. Would highly recommend to the Airbnb community.
This place is adorable extra clean and warm to stay We loved our experience. Thanks a lot

Great place to stay.  The 2 bedrooms are very convenient and the kitchen had a few staples to help with any cooking you want to do.  Inside flight of stairs is quite steep but it is worth the climb if you are able.

Great stay while visiting family in the area. The hosts were welcoming and accommodating. Their home was very clean and charming, we enjoyed the beautiful landscaping and watching their bunnies over a morning coffee.
Charming, clean and great location. Just perfect for what we needed!
Great pad!

Cute little place in Salem, perfect for one night on our road trip. Super clean with everything you need. Bedrooms are separated by curtains because it’s an attic, so make note of that if privacy is a concern.

This apartment is located on the top floor of a charming historic house. Parking was plentiful, the neighborhood felt safe and while located on a busy street, a fan or noise machine wipes the sound away. Nice big bathroom, very clean and black out curtains. Great location if you work or are visiting the capital and near green spaces for walking or exercising. Would highly recommend.
Nice place!

Yes, stairs, but if that’s not a problem then this is a great, clean, cozy place. We appreciated the comfy bed and spacious bathroom. Parking was easy despite it being street parking. This is an older large home with a beautiful yard in a quiet neighborhood.  The host family resides here so communication couldn’t be easier. We come to Salem semi regularly to visit family and this was a perfect landing spot for us.
Cozy 3rd floor apartment.  It's a short walk to the Capitol and Willammette University where non-west coaster's may be impressed by a grouping of giant Sequoias.
Great place to stay.. pleasant locality..one of the best host(Jackie & Christopher) I have come across.

Such a great place! A whole cute little apartment upstairs, felt private and safe and luxurious. I walked downtown, took maybe 20 minutes or so, it was a beautiful day so that was great. Would have loved to spend more time there. Only suggestion i can think of is maybe having a couple more tea options would be nice. :) Thanks so much!
Amazing spot. Wish we could have stayed longer.

Delightful place, super clean and quiet. All as advertised. Last set of stairs are indeed steep, but not a problem for able-bodied folk. Location especially well suited for anyone who has business in the capitol.
Everything was just as described by the hosts. A lovely and very comfortable space .
This place was perfect for our group. A cool space on the top floor of a grand home. Loved it
Quaint, Classic older home with tons of charm and comfy bed!  Jackie and Christopher are the absolute best!!
Very nice accommodations! Easy and accurate communications. Be forewarned, the upper story apartment requires a serious stair climb - but worth it!  We would definitely consider a return visit!

Charming place in a great location in Salem.  We enjoyed having the kitchen to store and reheat our leftovers we’d collected on our road trip. Warm weather hasn’t been around yet this summer, but the upstairs apartment was already quite warm. However, there were fans and lots of windows to open to help cool down.

Very cute place. Big shower and tub, full kitchen with coffee. Great for a stop over. No TV. Surrounding area is impacted by homeless and there’s no secure area for vehicle so if you’re traveling alone or with valuables in car be aware of that. Host is responsive and accommodating.

What a lovely space! This is the perfect apartment for a small family or two people. I was traveling with my 17 year old son, so having a separate semi-private space for him was perfect. The living space is comfy, and the bathroom is bright cheery and spacious. Everything about the place was thoughtful, and tidy. There were really clear directions on how to get in and our expectation about the stairs was set. I love airbnb's like this there were it's personal and connected to real people, but you still have privacy. Jackie was super friendly and responsive!

This home is super cute and confortable. I slept in the small bed, which are often the kids bed so not as comfortable but this one was great. We were extra tired so my husband had the main bed and said it was fine.
They have a full size coffee make besides the coffee pods so if you need to fill your travel thermos it is easier.
I would come again if in the area.
We wanted to stay close to the waterfront and downtown area, and this location was just perfect.  The decor is really lovely and comfy.  We would definitely stay here again.

This is a very charming place. It has everything you need . . . a great location, a stocked kitchen, comfortable beds, closets with lots of hangers, beautiful decor, and it is the on the top floor of a vintage craftsman-style home. It was really hot the three days we were there, and there were three air conditioners. A beautiful garden was outside.

Great spot for a stop off. Clean and comfortable with a well stocked kitchen and great coffee and a good shower. Easy to park and 20 minutes walk to town in quiet neighbourhood. Top floor was very hot despite all the AC. Turned the noisy one off but then difficult to sleep. Was a very hot few days so am sure fine rest of year.

The place is really beautifull and clean, with very kind hosts.
High recommended
Such a sweet stay. Clear easy communication. Loved this place :)
We enjoyed our stay. It was convenient for us as we traveled to Washington from California. Easy on and off I5.
Clean, homey and spacious place to stay. Would definitely visit again!
Nice flat
Christopher and Jackie’s place is just as listed. Very clean and comfortable. Thanks for a great stay.
This place was super cute and cozy! Needed a place downtown, and this was just perfect. Very clean too.
Super cute space, everything you need and Chris and Jackie are very friendly!
One of my all time favorite Airbnb stays. Excellent communication from the host and clean, comfortable accommodations with all of the amenities we needed.
Awesome place and great price!
Great spot and close to town.
This was a perfect place for me on my quick trip to Salem. Would definitely stay again and for longer.
Cute space, great communicator!
Very nice place to stay.
A nice place to stay in Salem. Easy access and clean.
Great place! Would go again.

Amazing location for everything we did in town. Fairgrounds, freeway access and dinner with friends were all within 1-3 miles. The space was more than we could have hoped for as well. Clean and had everything we needed for easy meals. Thank you!

Absolutely loved this place. So charming and beautiful. Being on the third floor, you have a wonderful view from all sides of Salem. We just sat on the couch for a while and took in the city. Well stocked with everything you need and very private and cozy. Would absolutely love to come back.
We also braved the cold and walked to some restaurants, bars, and shops. Quick walk and totally worth it!
Super cute and fun space!  Definitely worth the climb.  Space was exactly as pictured. You can tell a lot of thought was put into this to make it such a cozy, warm retreat!  Thank you!!

We had so much fun here and there were board games AND toys and books for toddlers that I didn’t know would be there but my partner, my 2 year old daughter and me were able to enjoy them. I also loved the view (it snowed for a couple hours we were there) and we felt very cozy.

This home is conveniently located and walkable to restaurants, shopping, and Willamette University. It is well equipped with everything you would need. The space is on the top level of a historic home so has great views.
This apartment is so charming that I wish I could move right in! Cute neighborhood spot.
We really had a good time
Nice apartment on 3rd floor with a view.  Parking on street.  Straightforward arrangement.  Clean.  Comfortable beds.
If your looking for a cute clean, fully furnished, place to stay to that accommodates a couple comfortably, don’t mind street noise this is a great place to stay!
Definitely has that old house charm with updated bathroom. I would recommend.
Beautiful space.  We would definitely be happy to stay here again.
Such an adorable place full of charm and so close to downtown. We only stayed one night but it was comfortable and they had everything you need for your stay. We would definitely stay here again!
Have stayed here twice and had a wonderful experience each time, would definitely recommend!!!

Thank you for a great stay in Salem, Jackie! The space was very comfortable and relaxing. Close to downtown but with a tucked-away feel. Check-in was simple and parking was ample. I hope to stay here again and would highly recommend Jackie's place! Thanks!
This is a cute upstairs of an old house. If you don’t like older homes this is not for you. Be aware there are lots of stairs. The upstairs is bright and the neighborhood is good. Very quiet.

We really enjoyed our 9-day stay at Jackie's place. Clean, plenty of towels and blankets, and a great location. 15-20 minute walk to downtown. Jackie went out of her way to address additional requests we had. Would stay there again.
Nice place in a great location

Very comfortable and an ADORABLE apartment. Jackie was very accommodating and though we only stayed one night, I wish it was longer! We were in town to look at Willamette University and this was close and convenient. I would rent here again. Super easy to find and I appreciated the pictures detailing which door and stairs to take.
Walkable, cute and cozy lodgings, friendly host, cute and friendly outdoor cat named Nemo. This spot was wonderful for my short business stay in Salem!
Jackie's place was perfect for us, and she went above and beyond to accommodate our special needs. we will definitely return and highly recommend to others!
It was an absolute pleasure staying in this beautiful home! The owners communicated exactly what we needed to know. I would absolutely stay here again!!!

Patricia is an excellent host that goes above and beyond.  We enquired about staying at her home for attending a family wedding at a nearby vineyard.   Not only was the home location perfect, but she provided us with so many wonderful suggestions such as driving along the coast, hiking Silver Falls state park, and local wineries we extended our stay to allow time to explore Oregon.  Her home is warm, clean, beds are comfortable and linens are soft.  She provided all the kitchen amenities needed to enjoy an evening at home relaxing on her patio and hot tub.  After busy days exploring my boys enjoyed watching a movie in their tv work out room while we relaxed in the hot tub.  I highly recommend staying at their home and hope we can visit again.  My husband and I travel often for work and we are accustomed to Hilton, Omni and Starwood properties I would rate their home a 4 star hotel, but with her excellent feedback and costumer service I rate them at 5!

My family and I enjoyed our stay. The backyard is lovely, especially on a nice evening. Everything was comfortable and clean. The hosts’ communication was quick, and informational. The house is pretty segmented so it was hard for my family of 7 to all “hang” out in one room. Overall great accommodations!
Wonderful place to stay enjoyed the house and the gardens with the veggies and herbs

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this lovely home. We had a group of six (three couples), and we had plenty of space. We really enjoyed spending time in the backyard. The hot tub and fire pit were a perfect way to relax in the evenings. Joe was always very prompt with his responses. We would definitely stay at this home again!

My family and I flew in from all over for a wedding here and we truly enjoyed our stay. Everything is what you would expect from the photos and more! The house is so spacious and clean. We absolutely loved the back yard and fresh veggies from the garden! We appreciated all the amenities and little details. It was warm and welcoming and we enjoyed every part of the house during our stay.
Great place! We loved the back yard area and the beds were very comfy!
Beautiful hope, with a beautiful view and garden!  I would highly recommend this location and would love to stay there again if I am ever back in the area!

Beautiful home!  It was sparkling clean and had all the amenities my family needed.  Loved the gorgeous backyard.  Great location -  it is close to many wineries.  The hosts were wonderful and answered all our questions.

The home is beautiful and as advertised. The kitchen was fully equipped and the bonus garden out back added nicely to our dinner. The home is extremely clean and very tastefully appointed. Do are very comfortable and loved the extra touches throughout the home. The backyard is a beautiful area to hang out filled with flowers, vegetables and several sitting areas. Would highly recommend this home.

So glad we chose this place. It’s equidistant from Corvallis and Eugene so it was perfect for our trip. The place is very clean and comfortable. Patricia and joe are super responsive. Accessing the house is really easy. And the hot tub...👌

The beds are really comfortable and the shower in the master is really nice.

My only criticism is the price and tv area. It’s a little expensive and there wasn’t a great spot to watch football. But the other amenities made it worth every penny.
Beautiful home, equipped with all of the amenities you need to enjoy your time in wine country!  Joe and Patricia were great hosts!
Great place to stay in Salem and plenty of room for 4! Great backyard as well to enjoy the crisp fall weather.
Lots of room and great amenities.

This place is beautiful. What a great house for a family to rent in Salem. This is the best part of Salem and accommodation in the area is limited. We felt lucky to have such a great place to stay for the holidays. Well equipped kitchen, nice bathrooms, and the media room is really fun. Highly recommend.
Beautiful home, comfortable beds, excellent hosts that responded immediately to us. We would definitely stay there again! Thanks for a wonderful stay, Joe and Patricia!!
A beautiful home in a nice neighborhood with a pretty view of the water and open fields. The beds are comfortable and the kitchen is well stocked. We enjoyed our stay!
Absolutely beautiful home and perfect host. Do not pass the chance up to stay here, it will surprise you how nice this place and experience is!!!

If you need a place to stay in Salem, look no further than this lovely home!  The house was large and super clean.  The beds were very comfortable and the master bath was one of the best I have ever seen.  Every time we needed something while cooking for our large family, we found exactly what we needed in the large and extremely well stocked kitchen.  Lots of plates, cups, glasses, serving utensils, cookware, etc.  We enjoyed playing cards and games around the large dining table and the backyard was quite lovely, although due to rain we sadly didn't get to enjoy it as much as we would have liked.  But it would be a perfect spot to sit outside and enjoy the sunny weather, lots of seating and tables.  Again, if you need a house to host your family, pick this one, we were VERY happy with it!
This house is so beautiful & cozy! & the host is so sweet! The backyard is nice & big & so is the kitchen. The family & I enjoyed & would definitely recommend!

A real oasis and a lovely home for respite in Salem.  Close to wineries, parks, and other activities, too.  In spite of being nestled in the muddle of suburbia, the home has the feel of being tucked away and the decor has the charm of a Tuscan villa.  It’s spacious and we found everything as described.  The owners are very quick to respond to any questions and friendly.  Would absolutely stay here again.  I think it would be perfect for a women’s wine weekend or even a family reunion.
A great house and a great host!  The house is very nice and in a good/safe location.
Nice place, good views
Lovely. curbside appeal and beautifully apportioned interior.  Thank you
Great house! Very clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend!!!

Patricia’s place is beautiful and the back yard is amazing! Pictures don’t do it justice. It was the perfect location and home base for visiting with extended family in the area.  They even had a chilled bottle of wine ready and waiting for us upon arrival. I highly recommend staying here.

This place was one of the best Airbnb we have stayed at. It’s super clean. All the amenities were great. The wine Patricia and Joe graciously offered us was one of the best. We all had a great relaxing time. The house was nicely decorated and very cozy. Very thankful to be enjoying this place during COVID-19. Thanks!!!
Beautiful home with nice backyard and hot tub. The location was perfect for us. Host responded immediately to a question. I would highly recommend this rental.

Perfect place for a quiet retreat. Evenings relaxing in the amazing outdoor space and hot tub was total bliss. Location is also fantastic, close to stores, very easy to get to.
From booking through to the end of our trip, Patricia and Joe were the perfect hosts and we really appreciated all the little touches to make us feel totally welcome! Highly recommend and can’t wait to come back!
Such a beautiful home in a quiet neighborhood.  We had a great time.
An amazing place to stay! Very peaceful and comfortable, everything about it was just great! Definitely recommend and would stay here again!
The house was amazing.  Better than expected with very thoughtful touches.  I’ll definitely be back.
Patricia and Joe's house is wonderful.  Clean, cared for, beautiful backyard, comfortable beds, great layout and more. Loved it!

Beautiful, comfortable home.  Perfect for our girl's weekend of hiking, card playing and wine.  The only downside is the stereo is outdated and is only equipped with classical music and jazz.  I suggest bringing your ownwireless speaker.
Absolutely stay here.  Home and hosts are wonderful!
We were in town for a family wedding, and this was a great place to stay and all spend time together.  The backyard is beautiful and the perfect space to enjoy each other's company.

This house has everything you need! Fully stocked kitchen! They are very quick to respond to anything you need. The back yard is amazing and has fresh growing veggies to fill your salad with! A hot tub to warm you up! If I had one complaint it would be that the beds are all very firm. I am used to a soft sleep number bed so maybe I am spoiled! Other then that the house was 10 out of 10!
Not what I was hoping for.

Our stay at Patricia's place was great!
The bedrooms were all spacious and comfortable and the backyard was beautiful - a great place for families to hang out!
The host was very accommodating and responsive. I would definitely recommend staying here - especially in Fall (the country roads and miles of vineyards are gorgeous)!
A great place to be with family! Super clean and the hot tub and work out room/media room are a perfect hang out.

The house was beautiful and in a quiet, secluded neighborhood.   It was clean, well-stocked, and had everything we needed.  The hosts were very quick to respond and super helpful as well.  We will definitely be back next time we do another Willamette Valley weekend!
Great house, nice amenities. Perfect for a group getaway. We did not want for anything. Overall great stay
Beautiful home in a peaceful neighborhood, very clean, with a gorgeous backyard! We will definitely stay here again!

Just what we needed. We didn't want to stay in a hotel, and the house was perfect: a good kitchen with everything needed to cook real meals, plenty of space, two fireplaces. The master bedroom includes a comfortably firm king size bed and a large bathroom with a wonderfully spacious shower.

The location is kind of amazing: close to a good grocery store and other necessities, but the surrounding greenery, especially off the back of the house, gives it a tranquil, almost remote feel. Very peaceful.

We'd love to stay here again someday to take advantage of the tranquil backyard and barbecue. This time, it rained pretty much the whole time we were there, but that was ok—the house has plenty of good specs for relaxing.
Beautiful and peaceful home. I spent most of the weekend in the hot tub!
Amazing place - beautiful touches and great location. Hot Tub is great!!

This is a great place for many reasons. First, the hosts were responsive and have clearly taken care to provide guests with pretty much everything you need. The living spaces and bedrooms were comfortable. The kitchen was very well-stocked with utensils, dishes, cooking pots and pans, and herbs/spices.
And, the backyard is great! The house backs up to open space so the view is lovely. Plus, the fire pit and hot tub made it even better.
The only downsides were some traffic noise at night (we are light sleepers) and the stairs to the bedrooms were steep and shallow, which was difficult for my elderly mother. That said, we would definitely stay here again!!

This house has so much character and charm that it instantly feels like a home. The interior is so beautiful and comfortable. We especially loved the game/theater room upstairs where we spent a lot of family time with the kids. The backyard is very welcoming and sparingly spaced with a lovely view!
On top of that, the owners were so thoughtful and friendly which made the experience that much more memorable. Thank you for sharing your home with us. We look forward to returning on our next visit to OR.

Patricia's home was perfect for our 5 day trip. You're only ~15 minutes from downtown Salem, which is wonderful as the weather turns warm and there's more commuter traffic. The house itself is comfortable, clean, and makes great use of it's many spaces and unique layout. We especially loved having the multiple sitting rooms, so some of my party could stay up later and talk while others went to sleep. The backyard is incredible - we LOVED the hot tub, the seating area, and the cool breezes off the gully. I will say personally this is definitely a better spot for several adults, rather than children, as the house is nicely put together and contains a lot of stairs - but it would be acceptable for older children as well. Kitchen was stocked as much as needed for how much one typically cooks on a long vacation, without being overwhelming. Overall, this was a great value and I would definitely recommend.
Amazing house and location. Great communication from the host and thoughtful amenities provided.
We have stayed here multiple times now.  This is a great house with wonderful owners.  Easy to talk to and very responsive.  The house is always clean and comfy!

This place was wonderful to stay at. It was incredibly spacious and really peaceful. We were surprised by how much privacy there was in a neighborhood with quite a few homes close by.

The master bedroom was incredible with an absolutely beautiful shower. All bedrooms were really clean and spacious.

We would absolutely recommend this place to stay.

Without hesitation, we highly recommend staying in this beautiful home! A great location, beautiful scenery out back, not to mention a well appointed home! The living space opens to a wonderful deck area as well as a hot tub tucked in around the corner giving privacy. You may even be greeted with a wonderful bottle of wine from the owners vineyard !

Patricia and Joe’s place was absolutely beautiful and the perfect location and house for spending time with our immediate family. Their master bedroom/bathroom is so nice and the amenities were plentiful in each room and space. The outside patio and little organic garden was wonderful and we got to eat some fresh grown strawberries! I definitely recommend to anyone visiting the Salem area!
This place is wonderful, from the thoughtful suggestions to the comfortable beds and beautiful spacious house.  I would most definitely recommend this house.

Beautiful home with plenty of space for a family! High quality finishes and very clean. Air conditioning throughout with additional units in each bedroom. Easy access to Willamette Valley wine country.
Perfect place for our stay. They had AC units in every room so we slept very comfortably and the outdoor space was the perfect peaceful setting.
Incredible home and view. Making plans to check out this home during different seasons, I am sure it offers amazing views through out the year.
We loved the house and spent a lot of time hanging out in the back yard. Such a nice setup.

This home is beautiful! Plenty of space indoor and outdoor for a family. The kitchen is fully equipped for whatever you may need. The master bathroom is amazing and the hidden workout/tv room is a hidden gem. The staircase was a little scary for toddlers so bring baby gates if you can. Otherwise we loved our stay!

We enjoyed staying at this beautiful home in the heart of the Willamette valley.  Home was immaculate with plenty of space to relax as a family.  We especially  loved the backyard —- gorgeous roses, private oasis, comfortable seating areas surrounded by greenery. Master bedroom also incredibly comfortable with many amenities, including large master bath with dual vanities and dual showerheads. House was exactly as pictured and described in the listing. Thanks Patricia & Joe!
Excellent elegant space to spend wonderful family time. The perfect oasis to relax and enjoy the NW!
Beautiful home in a quiet neighborhood setting. House was great!!

The house offered a great backyard space with the hot tub, fire pit and seating area for everyone. It was a good location: close to downtown, silver falls and wineries. Inside was clean and comfortable. The beds were comfortable, and showers updated with great water pressure. The easy check out process was nice as Patricia didn’t require a lot of work for us. I would recommend her house.
Great communication and a great place to stay . Thank You.
Highly recommend! We loved our stay.

A beautiful home with plenty of space. The view out the backyard is serene and peaceful. There were 5 Adults staying at the property and we all felt like we had enough privacy to re-charge yet we could connect with each other to discuss things. The Hot Tub was a bonus that I enjoyed everyday.  Overall a great home in an ideal location for my travel purposes.
We have stayed here several times and appreciate all that the house has to offer. Communication has been stellar and I would highly recommend this place.

The home is just beautiful. We felt spoiled with such a lovely, comfortable home. We arrive and were greeted with a welcoming note and a bottle of wine which we thoroughly enjoyed. I would most definitely recommend this home if you’re looking for comfort, location, and cleanliness. Though we did not take advantage of the backyard, it is amazing. A must stay!
This home is a fantastic retreat!  Everything is clean and comfortable and the owners were very responsive. We would love to stay there again in the future.
great location and amazing host!
Great stay! Thank you for everything. Would definitely recommend.
A great place to stay with wonderful amenities and communicative hosts!
It was wonderful!  Thank you!
Absolutely loved this place!! The hot tub was amazing my whole experience was absolutely wonderful!! Felt like the whole family was at home❤️ Wonderful area and neighborhood!
wonderful home and comfortable beds. Great amenities!

This was the perfect home for our family while visiting Oregon. The hosts were very accommodating and responded to questions quickly. Would highly recommend and look forward to staying here again in the summer time!

Amazing property for a quiet post-holiday getaway for me and my family.  Perfect jumping off point for some time in wine country, with easy day trips to coast and Portland.  Great communication from the owners, would heartily recommend.

We were delighted with this spacious and well thought-out home. It had everything we needed to celebrate a safe New Year’s Eve, cook at home and relax. The fireplaces and entertainment room were favorites!
Patricia and Joe are wonderful hosts. They were very welcoming to our family. The house was warm, clean and comfortable. Thank you both for your lovely accommodations!

This house is very cute and well-maintained. The backyard is beautiful and the pictures don’t do it justice - loved the fire pit and hot tub areas especially. The master bedroom is wonderful, especially the double master shower. It was a perfect place to stay with two other couples for an Oregon wine country trip. We visited in the off season and were gifted with perfect weather and this gem of a house.
Comfortable beds and gorgeous master shower.
Amazing place, could not be anymore pleased with our stay.
This beautiful well kept home had all the amenities we look for. We will definitely be back!

Patricia and Joe were wonderful hosts and responded promptly to our questions. Their property was beautiful with a nice view in the back. We were able to see some goats and llamas which our child enjoyed. The house was well equipped. We stayed for 2 weeks and had everything we needed. The hot tub was a plus! The master bathroom was big and had two rain shower heads. The beds were comfortable also. The location was perfect in a quiet and safe neighborhood close to a lot of stores and restaurants. We had a relaxing time and truly enjoyed our stay. Thank you for being accommodating to all our requests.
A great place to stay. The pictures don't do justice to the house itself. I highly recommend staying there.

Patricia’s home is in a quiet location. The views from the backyard are beautiful, the kitten set up was the best we have experienced and the house was clean and comfortable.  We would definitely recommend a stay here!
Great spot with all the amenities.
Beautiful home and a great place to stay. We were very happy with everything!
The house is truly amazing! The home is huge and the backyard is lovely. The beds are super comfortable and it was all very clean.

Beautiful, clean property a handful of minutes from Oregon Wine country. Easy and quick access to downtown (10 minutes). The house feels bigger than pictured, and is lovely in every respect. Lots of space. Comfortable beds. Beautiful master bath. Charming neighborhood. Scenic back yard, with room to spread out, cook a meal, relax, and take in Oregon. The house had everything our family of five needed for an enjoyable stay.
Wonderful home. Great location for what we needed!
A beautiful house and setting with very attentive hosts! And just 10 min from the Zenith Vineyards, the wedding venue we were attending.
Everything was great as usual. This is my family’s home away from home.
Very clean house, freshly painted.  Comfy beds and nice view of open field behind the house.
Perfect home away from home. Every detail was thought of for us, which made our stay easy and hassle free!
Great location. Very clean. Beautiful view. Quiet neighborhood. Lots of space and rooms in the home.
Great view and place to relax great kitchen too

This is a perfect jump off point for Oregon Wine country. The property is well appointed and very comfortable. Patricia is also super helpful. I strongly recommend to any looking to experience the area!
House was great and we absolutely enjoyed our stay. Would definitely stay there again.

This is a lovely property - clean, quiet, and fully stocked with basic kitchen supplies. The hosts have really provided everything needed for a very pleasant stay. It has a rural feel with marvelous views from the back windows and yard and we spent a good deal of time just hanging out in the daytime and enjoying the fire pit in the evening. Wi-Fi was good; a few of us had to put in some work hours and it functioned well. The “office” provided an added bonus for making calls.

Wine country is close by. We didn’t take advantage of this as much as we would have liked but the hosts are able to advise as needed! The house is on a nice cul-de-sac and is very central; grocery stores etc. are just a short drive away. Thumbs up to “Roger That” BBQ which is close by. Check their hours - they’re limited - but it’s a tasty feed if you can fit it in.
Absolutely lovely home! We had a wonderful stay!
Great place to stay. Clean, easy check in and lot of space for activities.

One of our top Airbnbs, ever. Spent a week for a family thanksgiving. The house is lovely and well appointed. Plenty of room for all and we even had everything we needed for gourmet cooking, which can often be sparse in the rentals. It has lovely views, and with multiple fireplaces was super cosy to read and relax by. Great location for wine tasting, and the owners also have a lovely winery if you fancy a nice Oregon Pinot. We will be back!

the House was Beautiful and we especially loved the view of the from the picture window of the backyard area. The house was in the perfect neighborhood were we needed to be in, we were there for our sons wedding and everyone lived in that area of Salem.
Great house to stay at in Salem! Patricia was very responsive and gave very clear and specific instructions. The house was adorable and so comfortable!

Very clean and comfortable! The location suited us well as it was
only about 10 minutes to the wedding venue at Zenith Vineyards. Large spotless main bathroom and very comfortable bed and linens. Thanks for a great place to stay!

Amanda's apartment is beautiful, located downtown and a short walk away from almost everything! The creek outside is gorgeous, and we had a great time drinking cocoa and coffee and watching the snow fall during our stay! Amanda was friendly and helpful, all of her communication was really informative and she went out of her way to make sure we were happy with the place and had everything we needed. A gem of a place in Salem!
The pictures don’t do this place justice. Very quaint and quiet as well as a great location. We will be staying here on all our trips to Salem.
Amanda was very quick to respond. The space is right next to a creek which was really nice. The apartment is huge and there was coffee! Always a plus!

Relaxing, peaceful, creek side setting in the middle of the city! It was surprisingly quiet and it was a nice, home like condo where we had everything we needed to cook our own meals. It was so nice to be able to have our dog with us, as well! The host was flexible and willing to work with us, as our situation changed and we needed to stay a bit longer and add an extra vehicle. Very reasonable price for the stay, also. Highly recommend!
Very walkable to downtown amenities. Pleasant space. Great coffee drinking spot on patio above creek, weather permitting.
Was an awesome place great spot right near town and had a big space inside for family!

Amazing home. Amanda was very helpful and quick to reply gave very detailed information on the parking and apt which helped a lot ! Quick and simple check in also got to park in the back. Home was comfy, clean and perfect. The kitchen was stocked had plenty utensils, pots and whatnot. The best part was the sound of the water I enjoyed that very much ! The balcony was very peaceful. My dog was super happy plenty of space for her to run around. Will deft be coming back in the future ! Thank you Amanda

This Airbnb was clean, spacious, near the center of town and campus, and quiet.  Lovely location in that it was right overlooking a brook, it felt a bit desolate late at night when we would come home, and there were some street people about, but that was not a problem.  The only criticism we have is that the amenities were fine, but very minimal.  Unlike many air bnbs that we have stayed at it is really a full time rental space so felt a bit like a hotel.  But everything was comfortable, just don't expect books, food in the fridge/cupboards etc.
Quick responses from a friendly host. She was very friendly and accommodating and responded quickly to food and fun recommendations.

This place was great! Clean, near downtown and my favorite yoga studio and the offices I need to visit while working in Salem! Amanda responded quickly to any questions and the check in was smooth and easy! It is roomy, a great place on Mill Creek with a beautiful view, quiet, warm and comfortable. The kitchen is stocked with everything I needed if I did not want to go out to eat. I will definitely be back!

When my corporate employer said the hotels were full in the local area, I saw it as an opportunity. I knew there were options in and around Church St, but I found a little gem with this place. Simple, elegant, and right on the Mill River. Amanda was quick to respond, answered any questions I had promptly and accurately. I was within walking distance to food, entertainment and my meetings, making it very convenient for my three-night stay. I will be staying here again next time I'm in Salem. 👌
Pictures don’t so this location justice. The unit is very clean and has many amenities! If we’re ever back, we will definitely book again.
Great location, near downtown. Loved the creek view from the porch. Will definitely stay here again..
A great place to stay right in the middle of the town
Quiet neighborhood and the creek is absolutely amazing

Clean, convenient, reasonably comfortable. I was surprised by how much difference it made to not have any decoration at all in the place (as noted by another reviewer); it does take away from the experience. And I was really looking forward to staying by the creek, but turns out we had a fine view of the apartment complex on the other side, including someone's exterior floodlights that never shut off. We ended up having to shut all the blinds/curtains - so much for enjoying the creek. That said, it was indeed very clean and convenient to the Capitol, and the host was immediately responsive to my messages to schedule a stay.
Exactly what we needed, friendly & hot back to us quickly!
Great place to stay - quiet, comfortable with a beautiful view of the creek. Close to downtown and lots of restaurants - all walking distance!

This was a great rental.  The Mill Creek runs along the entire back of the property and if you open the windows, the sound of the running creek transforms the space.  Parking is private and convenient. Getting access to the property is very easy and straightforward.  Beds were comfortable, kitchen has all the necessities.  We were traveling with a senior who has issues with steps and this property made our stay very easy for her.  Thanks Amanda.

Clean, convenient, quiet, cozy.  Everything you want in a home away from home. Easy to find and close to everything. Can get as much or as little rushing water noise from creekside windows in both bedrooms. Makes for greatly restful sleep. Not too foofy, very minimalistic which we loved. Mr had spacious table inside and outside for working remotely. Great place, recommend for 2 couples, family and level entry for mobility challenged.  Each br has an adjoining bath. Just enough space and primacy for 2-4 people. Recommended.

The apartment was great!

We loved the balcony overlooking the creek!

Very neat and clean.  A good central location for downtown Salem.  Amanda was quick to respond and provided thorough and clear directions to the condo and for it's amenities.  A lovely view of Mill Creek.  The neighborhood was quiet.

Amanda's place is becoming my home-away-from-home place when I need to work in Salem. It has everything I need for a comfortable stay, close to the offices I need to visit, close to downtown and the yoga studio I enjoy. The condo is clean and has a wonderful patio to sit and listen to the creek and relax after a long day of work. Amanda is quick to respond and take care of any needs!
Great space … Lovely River location… Easy access walking distance to downtown

Amanda’s condo is simply a wonderful place to stay while in Salem.

Easy walk to downtown yet you feel like you’re in a tropical oasis overlooking the creek.

The condo has all the basics and makes one’s visit easy and comfortable.

Looking forward to our next stay!

Definitely a must stay
Place is Amazing
Great location
Great place to stay, especially for a few days.

This was the cutest spot to stay!  Complete with water view.   The place was very clean there was lots of room and it was just as she described.   Her directions were complete and very easy to follow for getting in and situated.
We didn’t stay at Amanda’s due to a chemical smell. Amanda was gracious and gave us a full refund.

This is an amazing gem of a place. It accommodated our larger size family and also allows us to entertain our local family for breakfast. We absolutely loved the sleeping to the sounds of the creek flowing by and having our meals on the patio with the creek flowing next to us. Amanda  was always available and willing to help us with any questions. Loved this place !!

Spacious condo with many wonderful features! We especially enjoyed walking to many of the downtown sights: restaurants, shopping, and events that Salem offers. The creek side location is beautiful and  the condo was dog friendly which meant we could ALL enjoy Salem:)! Since we stayed for two weeks, I also appreciated the laundry room!

The house was clean and spacious. Plenty of extra towels and linens. The back deck by the creek is a huge plus. To be able to have breakfast listening to the water running and the birds chirping was priceless.
Location is perfect if you don’t want to drive around, lot of places were within walking distance. We did not walk, but the area seems safe.
When you get to the house, make sure you follow the instructions Amanda gives you to find the parking spot. It is very tricky and I didn’t walk to the alley to see what it actually looked like, so it was hard for me to find it.
Incredible balcony and creek.  Makes a wonderful natural grey noise for sleeping.   Feels like your in the mountains.  Great place for my dog and I.  Hosts made sure I could park my tall van.

The apartment is very spacious.  It is very well located and less than a mile from a mall, a movie theater, and a farmer's market.  It also is close to several restaurants.  I would stay here again when I'm in Salem and would recommend it to others.
Thank you Amanda for hosting us!
Decent place for a quick nights rest.
Great place to stay!  Lots of cute cafes in walking distance. Beautiful porch to sit and enjoy the brook.

Fabulous place.  The sound of the river is so peaceful with a deck right there to enjoy .... no better place for happy hour or morning coffee.   Very spacious,  clean and Amanda was very responsive!!!!
Great place. Perfect location !
I highly recommend this place, and it’s right in the center of downtown, very close proximity to the Salem center mall.
Clean spacious with a great porch view overlooking Mill Creek. Easy access to downtown walking or driving. Overall great stay.
Very spacious and the sound of the stream is lovely.
The location was convenient, the beds were comfortable but it smelt like an old smokey or musty hotel room.  Good for the value but be aware that it does smell.

The apartment was lovely and exceptionally clean. I was able to hear the creek outside my window while I was falling asleep which was especially nice. The gas fireplace was very cozy on a blustery day, and there were plenty of extra pillows, blankets, and towels provided as well!

Amanda’s condo is spacious, clean and well equipped. Our visit was short, just one night. We really appreciated the coffee and filters so we could get our fix before heading out! The view of the creek and the trees in their fall colors was lovely.
Great place to stay in Salem

Hosts reply fast if something is needed or needs to be corrected. The place was super chill and relaxing. The creek is really peaceful. If you are a smoker the alley leads to a good walk around the streets. All in all a happy experience with these hosts.
Very roomy and accommodating

Amanda's condo on the creek was a comfortable and ideally situated home-away-from-home for our friends and us. The condo is nicely remodeled and roomy, and the back deck is a perfect morning coffee retreat, as the sounds of the creek are such a relaxing backdrop! Amanda is easy to communicate with, and responded to our questions promptly and courteously.

Everything is perfect! Full kitchen plenty of dishes to cook. The sound of the creek is so peaceful. Condo is much bigger than i expected very home feeling and we will be back very soon. Thank you for going above and beyond with this air bnb
Easy check in!

Our stay at Amanda’s was a great place for hanging with family.  Everyone had their own space but there was plenty of room to hang out as a group.  We enjoyed being close to downtown and how easy it was to get around.  We enjoyed the fireplace,too.  Great spot!
Simple, clean, and close to the Capitol. Good value.
This place was located walking distance from Downtown Salem, which made it super easy to get around. I was there for business and we did not have any issues.
Very  adequate  and  comfortable accommodations  with  easy  access  to Willamette University (our destination).
Quick responses !! Nice flooring !!
Excellent location.

Amanda was a very gracious host and we will definitely be back to stay in this adorable condo. It was spacious, we love the flooring and especially the sound of the water flowing by! It had all we needed!
Amanda's place is very clean with great touches to make you feel at home! Would stay here again.
Very spacious and great location!
We enjoyed our stay at the condo. We were there for 2 weeks and found it a convenient location for our work trip. We will definitely stay here again!

Amanda is an amazing communicator. we had no issue whatsoever looking for this place and the details of everything. never being in Oregon you can truly get confused going into downtown. But not us! super thankful for precise information with everything. The location was perfect for us. Best past is being right on the creek. loved listening to the river at night. So soothing. beds and rooms were cozy. amenities were great and I loved that there was even trail guides, City guides, books, games movies for the nights we fid stay in. This place is right in downtown too and alot of places are small walks away.. We will be staying here again the next time we are in Salem.

This place was very clean and well kept with nice, comfy furniture.  Even my discerning wife loved everything about this place!   This condo gave my family an oasis of joy during a difficult road trip. Thank you!
This place was amazing. Drinking coffee in the morning next to the creek was so relaxing!
Lots of room and extra towels. She even has laundry soap for you. Very nice and the condo was clean. Communication was so great I never even had to ask any questions

Relaxing atmosphere but definitely has character very calming sound of the creek at night like white noise when you sleep definitely makes for a peaceful night great lighting and recommend this place to anyone
Well-appointed property. Really cool having the creek right next door, great white noise for sleep.

This is such a great place to stay! It is very comfortable and clean, and has everything you could need. It is very centrally located, and the creek running behind it is so pleasant.  Amanda is a wonderful host.  We definitely plan on staying here again!
It was perfect and pet friendly. It was hard to make it our home, because it was so cozy

The apartment was bigger than what I expected and you can tell a lot of thought went into what was provided, from toiletries to games and movies! I only spent a night and we wish we could’ve spent more and enjoyed the beautiful creek.

I was so pleased with this stay! Despite being a condo in the city this stay felt relaxing and far away. I loved the view, the space, and the price!

I needed to ask for a couple of accommodations, including getting lost (!), but I got fast and kind help. I'm so thankful.
Functional, very clean, centrally located. Patio overlooks a lovely creek. Easy check in and check out.
Quiet, comfortable place. Love the creek!

We had a short notice trip to check out Oregon colleges as daughter received word of scholarship awards. Grandparents really wanted to come too. And then there is COVID. Our second floor apartment was ever so clean and cozy and had everything we needed to eat in and was perfectly located to pick up all the great local food from downtown. You can walk to the capital and shops. Beautiful view of creek from deck. Complex was quiet and kind. It was a wonderful stay and this little home made the trip fun, easy, way affordable to hotels. Beds are comfy. So much fun to be in a neighborhood so close to so much!!!

Amanda, your place was sooooo amazing! We enjoyed our stay tremendously! Your checkin and check out directions were spot on and so helpful to our time in Oregon. Thank you for being so thoughtful in every inch of your house. Blessings!

Beautiful house! Loved the creek that ran right by the house. Enjoyed the window open at night to be able to listen to it. Nice balcony to relax on while sipping a cocktail and listening to the creek. Very clean! Comfortable beds. Pet friendly. So we could bring our fur baby. Will absolutely stay here again!
wonderful apartment. A+ 5 stars very nice view of the creek .
Great location in very stylish and modern condo thoughtful touches and tones of natural light a very private and relaxing place
I don't feel qualified to write a review

Have stayed at this location twice now and will stay again the next time in Salem.  Close to shopping and parks.  Beds are very comfortable and the amenities are up to date.  The host always has a full kitchen, including spices and little extras that help when cooking.  The creek outside the sliding doors lends an outdoor feel to the place and cuts down on the city noise too.
Thanks again!

If you find yourself in Salem, this is a great place to stay. Easy parking, easy access to the first floor door and a great view of the creek.  Plenty of space in bedrooms and essentials in the kitchen and bath.
Peaceful mornings riverside with coffee and birds! Very clean, lots of space, and conveniently located!
Wonderful place with everything I needed. Very relaxing and well cared for place

The place was very nice and spacious. It’s conveniently located to many food places. Instructions were very clear and detailed. We love the sound of the creek flowing. It gives a calming and relaxing vibe. Over all, we enjoyed our stay.
Wonderful apartment, clean and well stocked.  Easy location to find and easy to walk to restaurants.  Enjoyed our stay.

The pictures do not do the place justice! It's sparkling clean with lots of extra amenities, if you forget your toothbrush or shampoo you are covered! Location is right near downtown making it very walkable.

The creekside location makes it very restful and all of the furniture and furnishings are super comfy.

Amanda was prompt with responses and her check in / check out information was really helpful!

Would totally stay again.

Bonus, dog friendly! (even though we left our pups at home, great to know we could have brought them!)

We enjoyed our stay, and the place is comfortable and quiet.  Location worked very well for us.  The covered parking was nice.  Enjoyed the creek by the condo.  We would definitely stay here again.  Amanda was really good at answering all of our questions before we booked.
wished we could have stayed a few more nights. had a difficult time finding but loved everything about the place once we found it.
Had a great time! Great spot

This is a great spot to relax and explore Salem! Plenty of room for everyone, close to everything and you can’t beat the awesome back patio right on the creek! Enjoy your coffee or dinner with the beautiful view and lulling water sounds.
Great first experience to using Airbnb ! the creek view was very relaxing.

Excellent experience. All is just as described. The creek is the greatest, and there is a beautiful canopy of trees over the porch. Very peaceful and restful. The condo is nicely appointed with every amenity you could possibly need. The owner and on site manager couldn't be nicer or more accommodating.
This is a rare quality of service and facility rarely found.
Accurately and honestly described, we had no issues whatsoever, the place is spacious and convenient.

This place was easy to find and exactly as the listing stated, check-in was easy. Nicely decorated and the perfect size for my family of five. The deck was great for our breakfast and the creek was peaceful. Would stay here again!
Clean a beautiful space, the creek was really special!
Great condo in a convenient location. Very clean and welcoming.

This place was great. Just what we needed for our 2 nights in Salem. Lots of blankets and super soft bed sheets! Loved that there was coffee to make too! Not in the best area of town, but we felt safe the whole time! The creek sounds and view were nice! Thanks again!
Lots of space, clean and peaceful on the creek.  We didn't have time to explore the neighborhood so can't comment on that particularly.

The best Air BnB in our experience. Close to downtown shopping and restaurants. Close to the university and capital and art museum. Easy drive to Portland. Super cozy and well appointed. Lots of room. Love it!!!! So much better than a hotel. Thank you! Our third time staying in one of Amanda's two Salem apartments. Both are wonderful.❤️💕❤️💕❤️
Great place. clean and spacious.  was perfect for our trip.

Our stay was amazingly convenient and fun for having two dogs! The place is quite spacious, there’s a beautiful view of the brook from the deck and almost every window! All our amenities were met! We like the temperature a bit low, and they had a killer AC unit that allowed us to make it as cool as we (and our dogs 😂) like it! Super pet friendly spot if your dogs are at slightly well behaved!(: We could have had two more people stay with us and been comfortable even with our dogs!

The apartment was absolutely wonderful and we found Amanda to be a very good and responsive host. The apartment was clean and comfortable and was stocked with just about everything we needed. We loved the little porch area overlooking the stream. We opted to stay in the bedroom with the window air conditioner which also blocked any noise from neighbors (it was Saturday night in a city after all). We were happy we had a private off-street parking spot given how close we were to the city folk milling about and nightlife. So, definitely a place to stay when in Salem.
Clean and spacious. The back patio made the whole place, quiet and peaceful on the river.
Very clean quiet place on a beautiful location. Close to amenities & restaurants.
Great location, no issues.

Amanda is very courteous, responsive and clear in her communications through the Air BNB platform. The accommodations are well represented. This is a very classic 1960-70s modern apartment building that still maintains that vibe. It has been cleaned up nicely and have a lovely little balcony overlooking the creek below. I would stay here again when we need two bedrooms and a kitchen.

We enjoyed our stay in this condo. The galley kitchen had everything we needed in it.  The living area and bedrooms were spacious.  There were plenty of towels! The decor was calm and soothing.  Having the creek to look at and listen to was an added bonus especially after a day of sightseeing and hiking!  For us, being close to the town center and the state capitol was a definite plus.  We did see homeless encampments in this area, but we never felt unsafe.  In fact at night we would walk to the center of town for dinner.  Salem does have a nice foodie vibe!
Comfortable, spacious well equipped. Nice view of the creek. Enjoyed the kitchen supplies. Easy street parking.
The place was okay. Could use a little more attention to detail. No art up. You can tell it’s just an air BnB but that’s fine. No place to read. No lamps. But it was clean and it had the nice deck.
Great place and close to everything. Will stay again.
Loved staying here.  My favorite was the sound of the creek outside of our place.

Comfortable beds, large living area. Questionable area as far as safety for traveling with children. Parking is a struggle for large vehicles and only street parking (timed) for any extra vehicle. Once you went outside on the patio next to the river, it was nice to feel like I wasn’t in downtown.
Wonderful clean place to stay!

Would recommend. Great location very clean and tidy place love the sound of the Creek the deck is amazing very relaxing specially at night short distance for some essentials as well as dining 10/10 we loved our stay thank you so much for everything! hope to stay again in the future! such great host! This place is much convenient than expected!

The apartment was great fit for us, very comfortable. We enjoyed the house and creek behind it.
Amanda was very communicative and responded fast

Great location downtown. Nice atmosphere with the creek right outside. Clean and welcoming.  Plenty of towels, comfy beds...the next best thing to being at home. Amanda was great...she kept in contact and was very clear about all aspects of the condo. I will definitely be staying with her again!
Was just like the pictures! Super clean and the hosts made check in and check out very easy. The creek right outside was beautiful! Would 100% stay again

I felt overall that this unit was a good value for what I received. I feel Amanda is very upfront about the area the unit is in, and what is available to you in the unit itself. The pictures are accurate, and not misleading at all. I greatly appreciated the detailed communication from Amanda before arriving at the unit, and also on the morning of check out. This helped me navigate everything I needed to know for arrival and getting settled in, as well as what to do upon checkout.

I enjoyed hearing the creek behind the unit, and on cooler nights the fireplace kept the living room warm. I also am in love with the softer bed in the back bedroom; so comfy for me, and the sheets were soft, too. If you like a firmer mattress, the front bedroom is probably for you. Each room (even the hall) has heat through baseboard heaters, so you can customize what you like. I used the smart tv in the living room, which was great for seeing the last episode of "Reacher". :) I didn't use any of the appliances in the kitchen, aside from the fridge and microwave, so I can't speak to that. But there were items there to use if you were cooking, and basic spices and oil in the cupboards. While I was staying there, I only saw one person the whole time, and things were nice and quiet overall. This location was only about 5 minutes from where I was attending a convention, so that was a plus for me! Yes, there are homeless people in the vicinity, but I didn't observe any issues when I was driving around, day or night (police, trash can fires, fights, panhandling, etc.).

IMO, this is a good place to stay if you are traveling for business or with one other person and using this spot as a home base. I would have liked at least one more lamp in the living room, because it is somewhat dark in the living room at night. I would book again if I needed to be in the area. :)

Amanda's place was great.  Her instructions were very clear, so we had no problem self-checkin and found the designated parking spot easily.  The rooms were very clean, and kitchen had everything we need.  The view from the living room was very nice.  It'd be very nice sitting in the patio if it was warmer seasons (we visited in Feb, so it was too cold to sit in the patio).  The location was the best!!  Walking distance to the downtown where all good restaurants are located.  When we come back to Salem, we will definitely stay in her place again.
great place. close to downtown. the river nearby is beautiful and serene.
Me and my family had a beautiful place to stay. Very nice and clean. Would recommended to anyone. Amanda was awesome to make our trip happen. Thanks again Amanda.
very nice and clean. Amanda was a great host
Easy walk to downtown and  close to Willamette U.
Great place! Wonderful location, nice and clean inside, has anything you might need. The river is very relaxing! Will stay again!

Amanda was a wonderful host! We were in town for a memorial service, and Amanda’s communication and clean apartment made the trip so much easier for us. I highly recommend their place and will look to stay there again next time we’re in town!

Great value, location close to lots of activities and restaurants. Designated parking spot, spacious accommodations, lovely creek. Only issue was with communication, the issue has since been resolved.
Great place, I really enjoyed falling asleep the sounds of the creek running right next to the place!

We had a ten-day stay at this unit and have nothing but good things to say. It’s in an older building, but very clean and up-to-date. Everything was in good working condition, kitchen is well-stocked, and we found everything we needed. Very roomy unit with near-by and well-lit parking. Conveniently located to stores and attractions in Salem (Capitol building, farmers’ market, Bush Pasture Park, etc.). We found this a very comfortable place so what more is there to say? Oh yes, the babbling sounds of Mill Creek provide pleasant “white noise” to lull you to sleep!
Spent one night here, dog friendly. Creek right outside was nice to listen to.
The condo is lovely and spacious, and the river running past made for a very restful night’s sleep.
I think Amanda’s stay is probably our favorite so far! Very clean. Waking up to the sounds of the creek was like a dream!! 🤩 highly recommend this place and hope to get back one day!
Lovely condo with an incredible creek side patio. Peaceful and relaxing environment.

Fabulous location near Oregon State Capitol, gorgeous creek swiftly running by outside the bedroom windows, clean and comfortable condo with modern appliances, covered car port and hosts who have every detail covered completely!

Definitely recommend staying here! Super nice and had a pleasant stay. It’s close to everything. Had a little issue when I got locked out, because the screen door automatically shut out on me, but they were very accommodating! They also removed that door so it won’t happen again. Great hosts!
Great place to stay quiet private and close to downtown

A beautiful location with the river out back. It is a nice, simple and practical home that fit all of our needs this weekend! It was a wonderful stay, easy check out and clear instructions for that and for how to get to the parking in the back!

I have stayed at this property twice now, I love the airbnb, well stocked and very comfortable, has everything you will need. The deck is awesome to sit out in the evenings with the sound of the creek rushing by. I highly recommend this airbnb, Amanda is a wonderful host, I stay here anytime I find it not booked when I am in Oregon. Candace
Great place to stay with everything you’d need
Thank you Amanda.

We had a wonderful stay. Place was clean, had plenty of towels, beds are comfortable. Enjoyed the fireplace as well as the creek! Kitchen is stocked well with amenities. Makeup towelettes, shampoo, conditioner and body soap were stocked. Close to downtown Salem , we walked around did some site seeing and enjoyed a few of the restaurants. I would definitely stay again! Oh and thank you for the popcorn :)
Very nice little spot, very clean with a great view
Cute and quant place. Clean. Adequately stocked of basics. Comfy beds. Loved the beautiful sound of the creek.
Wish we could have stayed longer! We stayed here for last night of a trip and it was wonderful. The space was clean and cozy, and sleeping to the sound of the creek right outside was rejuvenating.

Very spacious and serene spot near downtown Salem! Easy access to main roads and lots of restaurants and shopping near by. The neighbors were friendly and quiet, we barely heard any noise from the other condos. Lots of room to spread out and unpack, with a kitchen well equipped for cooking and a large dining table and scenic patio! Beds were decent and we had plenty of clean linens. Amanda was so gracious and accommodated an early check in for us which was so appreciated after a super early flight with a 5 year old! Great and friendly communication all around. Would stay here again!

Thanks to my excellent host, I was able to book this place at the last-minute. I was camping nearby when my tent flooded in a rainstorm and I needed some shelter until I could recover. Amanda was extremely responsive and helpful! I couldn’t have been more grateful for the clean, dry space and comfortable bed! Even if you’re not fleeing Mother Nature, I recommend this as a great choice at a great value. Don’t be fooled by the somewhat modest exterior of this building — once you’re inside this place is exceptionally charming! It’s spotlessly clean, spacious, and comfortable. One of the best features is the stream rushing below. You can sit on the balcony to enjoy it or just open the windows to hear the water. Be aware that if you have more than one vehicle, you may have some parking issues. There’s a dedicated space for one vehicle but other street parking is limited. I’ll mention a few other features that some may consider drawbacks (I do not): this is not an open floor plan, the rooms & hallway are somewhat awkwardly situated; the kitchen is relatively small with some older fixtures & appliances but all in perfect working order; the flat screen is a little small. Overall, this Airbnb was more than adequate and absolutely lovely. I would definitely stay here again.

Amanda’s communication was good and  she was prompt in her responses . The apartment was spacious with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The neighbors were quiet, however, we awoke to evidence of a homeless person who had clearly been sleeping out front of our door. We did not feel like the neighborhood was the safest.
Our wedding guests stayed here for my wedding weekend. I rented 4 apartments in the complex from Amanda to host them. All of were happy!

My husband and I had to make a stop in Salem from Los Ángeles and we were lucky enough to booked this place last minute. We arrive late at night and was easy to locate the place. We loved that it had a parking spot available for us which made things easier and safer especially when arriving late at night. Amanda was amazing in providing spot on instruction. The place was very clean and it had everything you needed for a comfortable stay. The balcony located right next to the river made a perfect spot for a delicious cup of coffee in the morning or anytime in the day. We definitely loved this place and we highly recommend it if you are visiting Salem.

The place was easy to find, directions and instruction were clear to understand. The deck was amazing right by the water and inside was very clean and beautiful! You wont regret the stay here.. Will definitely come back!!!
Amanda’s place is a wonderful place to stay in Salem. It’s close to everything , very clean and spacious home. Would definitely recommend to friends and family in the future.
Very clean and comfortable- already booked again for my next trip.
We had a nice stay. The bubbling brook was a plus! Nicely updated apartment.
We loved our stay! The creek was so lovely to see and hear. The furniture and bedding was very comfortable!  The parking was very convenient!
Loved this spot by the river, lovely to sit next to on the deck and listen to at night!

We had a great time :)  It happened to be some of the hottest days of the year so the large portable AC unit was greatly appreciated.  It was already running when we arrived so it was plenty cool indoors.  The porch with the river view was beautiful and definitely the highlight of the place.
The house was great. If your staying in the summer it only has one ac unit in the master bedroom. Other wise it was a great house and Amanda was wonderful in every way.
Amanda did everything she could to ensure our stay met our expectations
Comfortable and well appointed.  Since it's downtown,  close to a lot of what you need. Very roomy, and the creek flowing outside gives it a resort feel.  My 2nd stay here, and not my last!

Wonderful place.  Convenient location.  Great to have easy access to designated parking spot.  The creek was wonderful to listen to at night. Like a lullaby.  Spotlessly clean.  Well and thoughtfully equipped.  Outstanding responsiveness and communication.  Would absolutely repeat stay!!

The AirBnb was conveniently located in the heart of downtown Salem, close to plenty of places for brunch and explore. The place itself is right next to a creek with a soothing sound of running water, and patio to sit and enjoy your morning/evening tea or coffee. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Willamette Valley area.

The stream was nice, and the place worked well for our brief stay to drop off our son for the start up of school. There were a large number of homeless individuals around , one even staying right by parking.
perfect place
Perfect
Great stay! Great price!
Great place!!
Clean, quite, nicely furnished apartment in downtown.

We needed just one night to break up a longer trip. The kids loved the rainbow goldfish and hot chocolate provided! Great back deck with creek.  Amanda was incredibly easy to communicate with and provide additional information when requested!
Great communication and a wonderful experience. Great value and very helpful. Would definitely stay again. Thank you!
Absolutely perfect stay. Recommended 100%
The condo is spacious and clean. The creek is beautiful and nearby shopping at Salem Center is very convenient. We loved Minto Brown Island park.
Amanda was super helpful, the place was clean and spacious. She had thought of every small thing you could need.
I absolutely love this spot and stay here every time I visit! Its clean and such a comfortable bed I bought the same one for at home.
Beautiful location next to a creek, close to downtown.  Would definitely stay here again. :-)

Convenient location, close to lots of restaurants, downtown area. Great to have off-street and covered parking close to the front door.  Full kitchen very well-supplied with dishes, pots, utensils.  Quiet for sleep.  The creek was audible!  Safe mixed-use neighborhood. Nice linens and furniture. The temperature is adjustable for each room--very convenient for individuals.  Plenty of hot water.  Probably will be in Salem more  over next couple of years, so hope the unit will still be available.  Salem downtown is clearly appreciated and maintained--beautiful old buildings.
This place was clean and centrally located. Parking was easy. We will stay again when we come back to Salem.

My mom can’t walk up stairs, so this one level was a great 2 bedroom, 2 bath stay for us, but then add in that beautiful creek and it was just perfection! It had been very rainy, so the sound of the rushing water at night and then sitting on the porch with the beautiful fall trees was the perfect relaxation we needed. Everything was very clean, nicely remodeled unit. Instant communication with the owner. Felt very safe there even when I was by myself. 5 stars for everything!
The apartment was perfect. Had everything we needed. Very accommodating, and thoughtful.

We had a very comfy stay in your lovely spot  we so enjoyed the beauty of the flowing creek, the background sounds of the babbling brook made it feel like we were far from the city. All if our needs were adequately met, of we are in the area again we will definitely call on you.
This was a great unit at a very reasonable price. Amanda was communicative and provided great instructions.
Great place to stay. Easy walking distance to downtown, and nice to have parking. Clean, quiet, and comfortable.
Very quiet. Clean and very comfortable to say the least.

Very nice spacious apartment!  The kitchen is well equipped.  Comfortable beds.  Nice to have two baths - one with tub shower, one with walk-in.  I really appreciated being able to regulate the temperatures separately in each bedroom and the other spaces.  Amanda was super responsive to questions.  Even though the apartment is downtown it's very quiet on the creek and sits off the alley, rather than the street so the only cars that approach are those of the people who live in the complex.
Have stayed in Amanda's properties 7 times now. Always wonderful.  Clean, super comfortable beds, great price. This is where I stay ALWAYS!
Really nice setting, very comfortable!

Amanda was an awesome host! She was very responsive and helpful with any questions that came up. We enjoyed our stay at her place . We are very appreciative that she was able to accommodate our doggie to stay with us. Her place is very clean and welcoming.  We will definitely be staying at Amanda place again.
Great clean place right downtown!
Amanda was a wonderful host and we enjoyed our stay at her place during our travels. It was extremely easy to check in and the instructions were very clear. We had a very comfortable stay.
Great place and good host
Amanda is a great host. Apartment very nice and cozy. We enjoyed our stay there. Thank you Amanda!

In the Master Bedroom it had an ant issue. The ants were coming from the base board on the wall to the condo on the other side. Emailed Amanda and she had someone come over and spray. super fast and took care of the issue.

Other than that it was a great stay!!
Heaters in every room including the bathrooms. I liked the fact the heater was under the towels so when I got out of the shower it was like I was at a spa with heated towels!!

Perfect stay while we attended the fest at the fairgrounds.
Everything we needed was there!
Definitely worth the money.
We loved the place! It was a great value and Amanda was wonderful in her communication. We will certainly stay there again!
Thank you for a good birthday weekend
Quite, clean and very accessible.
Very spacious & convenient Airbnb definitely worth your stay

Very responsive. We booked last minute at a late hour and host was quick to respond to our messages.

Respect to details. When I saw the first message I was like “woah” a lot but after ready I was like “woahhhhh, she is reading my mind”. Answered everything before I got a chance to ask. Very helpful host
This space was close to our meeting area. Which was very convenient. Very quiet and peaceful. I easily feel asleep to the sound of the creek.
Easy access to local wine country!!
Amanda was a great host and the property was just perfect.
It worked. The heating was hard to figure out and the fireplace didn't work. It met our need.
Amanda was super.  Responsive and accommodating and very thorough. The place was clean and exactly as described. I would definitely stay again!  Andrea

Bargain price with corresponding quality. The biggest issue was an ant infestation. Considering it is early March and still cold, there shouldn’t have been ants coming out of the shower drain and seemingly through the master bedroom wall. Found ants throughout the apartment but extensively in the master bedroom bed and bath (including sheets and pillow). Not biting ants but still…
There also were people living on the balcony across the creek. Coolers, bbq, sofa and all. Also someone sleeping in a sleeping bag in the car port spot next to ours. I guess that is normal is western Oregon?
Other than the unexpected sleeping guest, the parking was good… once you found it. Carport at the end of a dead end alley that doesn’t come up on GPS. But once found, the secluded parking was a big benefit!
The kitchen was stocked with basics and snacks which was helpful.
Overall, A decent enough place to crash while spending the day out enjoying the sites but wouldn’t book here again.
The place was centrally located to where I needed to be it was great I love the view of the river I had a great time I would be back. thank you

I loved the creek! Amanda was very helpful when we wanted to an another night to our stay. Loved that they had quality toilet paper and even makeup wipes, and finally stayed in a place that provided extra towels!! Great attention to detail!!!

This space was fantastic. The furniture was super comfy and we had plenty of space to land in. We appreciated the space between bedrooms and the kitchen was well appointed. It was convenient to downtown Salem and the privacy was great. We will definitely stay here again when we come back to Salem.

Lillian's cottage was perfect for us! We were visiting the area (where we had previously lived and worked) so we knew the location would be perfect. Easy trips to the south, west, and north were important and this location fit the bill. What we didn't know about the location was the quality of the dog park and overall park just a minute or two away. What a beautiful park it is, we spent a lot of time with our dog there. A walk along the Willamette River restores body and soul.

Location aside, the cottage was very appealing. The house has tremendous character and charm and it has been very wonderfully appointed with decoration and function. The kitchen works great, the technology works wonderfully. It is spacious and cheerful, one feels at home right away.

Lillian was a very gracious hostess, we couldn't recommend this any more highly.

This is a fantastic house! Very comfortable and lots of space. Beds were cozy. it’s in a very private area, but you’re also close to downtown. We appreciated the extra thought she put into making us feel at home ( the chocolates and snack😜) . Would definitely stay here again if we’re in the area!! 👍🏼👍🏼

A wonderful home.  A lot thought was put in to making this a home away from home.  The owners thought of everything you may need and also every comfort.  The kitchen was very well stocked with everything for cooking meals,  It was very stylish and my 12 year grandson loved the loft. With the bedrooms on each side of the home it was private but yet it was open and spacious.
Great quiet spot to spread out and relax. Lillian and Joshua are the perfect hosts and could not have been more gracious.
Josh’s place is beautiful and spacious! It was also thoughtfully equipped. We had a nice stay. Thank you.

This was our second stay and it was great. We love the space and the separate and spacious bedrooms worked really well with our young kids who go to bed early. The location has worked well for us when we visit Salem too.

The cottage was clean and nicely laid out where you could have some privacy, but also common areas where all guest could comfortably come together and play games or hang out. The place is also pretty private with no neighbors right next door.

I would definitely stay here again.

Perfect location! Great for our family with two young kiddos to get away. Very central location and close to Minto Brown Park which was a big hit with the kids and our dog. Nicely appointed with everything we needed for our stay. We will definitely be back! Thank you Josh & Lilian!
