this is a nice quiet place.  the hosts are very helpful.  its close to parks and town and museums
The place is very clean and quite spacious. Lillian was quick and friendly on replies. And we had a great (short) visit and would highly recommend for a group in Salem.
Great space for our group. Everyone was comfortable and had a lovely stay.
Great place.  Super clean, comfortable and spacious with easy access to all Salem has to offer.
Very clean place, lots of space, convenient to a lot of restaurants and Fred Meyers as well as Trader Joe’s. I missed my Trader Joe’s. Very nice & beautiful place.

Great stay. Cute and stylish. Very quiet. We had a temporary problem with the WiFi and Lillian and Josh were really fast to investigate and fix. Great directions to find the place and check in process. Will definitely stay again.
Lillian is a wonderful hostess and we hope to stay again. The house is clean and well furnished. All you need for a cozy stay over a weekend or longer.
Very clean! Overall a great experience for our stay in Salem!

This house is in a great location (read the directions provided to find it).  Close to everything we needed and well appointed.  While the house has easy access for older occupants, there is a step up into one of the bedrooms and there isn’t a walk-in shower.  Otherwise roomy, clean and plenty of parking.  We didn’t bring a dog but the field out back makes it easy to provide some outdoor exercise for a pooch.

Lillian has done a fantastic job making this space so cute, inviting, and cozy. The huge couch in the living room was more than enough room for my family to comfortably have a movie night. The light and soft paint colors make the space feel huge, and the lovely touches like flowers and throw blankets make the space so inviting. We loved having a keurig, and the kitchen had all the tools we needed. This will be our airbnb every time we visit family in Salem! :)
Perfect space for our group! The place was clean, spacious and comfortable!
The house was very open, clean, and stylish. Comfortable and convenient!

Lillian was very responsive and nice about everything. Just know that you do not have TV unless you have Netflix or etc. We also had a big ant problem which someone would have to know about. It was a nice place other than those things.
Nice house, has everything in.
Second stay and hope to be back. Quiet and comfortable. Great place to stay.

Fantastic place! Clean, convenient to lots of places  and very spacious. We stayed for two weeks with our 4 1/2 year old granddaughter who lives in Dallas Oregon she did not want us to leave. We highly recommend this beautiful home.
Very nice place and easy to find and check in.
A great place to stay! Quiet area but easy access to so much. The host did a great job of making sure our needs were met! Fantastic!
This home has a very comfortable and private home away from home setting. It is very clean and has alot of room for guests.
We had a very comfortable stay.  It's super quiet and close to everything.   Communication was great and a nice large space.  Thanks Lillian!
Good place to stay.  Close to amenities but still quiet.
If you're looking for a clean and very well located place to stay while in Salem this is the place! Close to a lot of places to eat and downtown Salem. Thanks Lillian

This was our second time staying in Lillian's place. We love it there! While the location fits our needs wonderfully, with so many choices we wouldn't have stayed again if the house itself wasn't so nice. It is quiet, roomy, warm (for March when we were there first) and cool (for those 90 degree days that we had in August!) Everything you need is there, there is plenty of space for families and/or guests. For those with dogs (like us) the dog park down the road just a mile or so is fabulous. If you don't have dogs, the park is still a wonderful place to visit, miles and miles of trails for hiking and biking right along the Willamette River.

We have traveled all over the West and this is one of our favorite homes, if not the favorite, that we have rented.

The cottage well clean and well cared for. It’s close enough to town and Willamette University (10 minutes), but far enough to be very peaceful and quiet. The separated sleeping areas were a bonus for us, as they allowed a lot of privacy. We enjoyed our stay.
Stylish, clean and comfortable, we had a great one night stay.
Conveniently located to everything you could need.
A very spacious cottage.  Lillian responded quickly to my inquiries.

Lillian's place was cute, we enjoyed our time there.  If you know smart TV, you'll be ok.  AC didn't cool the whole place very well though.  But it was so convenient to friends we were visiting, so worked for us.
Lovely place in a nice quiet location.  Just be careful not to lock yourself out like I did late at night in the rain. The door locks automatically when closed, and it is very easy to do.
We had a fantastic time at Lillian’s. There’s a lovely park and trail up the street, which we frequented each morning. The home was spotless and very nicely decorated. Thanks again, Lillian!

Comfortable cottage in a quiet and beautiful neighborhood of Salem.  The house is located behind a small, 2-business office complex, not far from Downtown Salem.  The attorney's office and small management office will not affect your stay.  They are quiet only there during business hours.  It is also very convenient for shopping.  We were there for the birth of our Grandchild and it was very close to the Salem Hospital, which made it very convenient for us to go back and forth.  The price is more than fair for what the cottage offers.  There are two nice size bedrooms.  The Master is large and has a large sofa sectional to relax with a large television on the wall.  There is no cable TV but there are videos and both TV's are Smart TV's so if you have any streaming services, it will work fine. The Master bath is large but does not have a shower/bath.  You will have to use the second bathroom in the house to bathe.  The second Bedroom is nice size and is located on the opposite side of the Living Room, which is nice for couples and children.  It is nice to have a washer/dryer in the house.  There is a small kitchen but very useful.  We stayed in the house for three weeks and it was good for cooking simple meals.  I would recommend this house for two couples or a small family.  The host, Lillian, is very attentive and helpful.  She is quick to respond to your questions and helpful if you need anything.  We would definitely stay in this home again and recommend it.
Great place, close to downtown and easy to get to everything in Salem.
We loved everything about the cottage, it’s bigger than we expected! Very clean, very cozy. Each room and bathroom comes with heaters which is great!

The Croisan Cottage was an amazing home with very stylish furnishings. Lillian was very responsive to any needs during the stay. I would recommend this home to anyone looking for a quiet and and serene location.

This wonderful house is spotless, roomy and conveniently located.  Well equipped kitchen. Kids will enjoy a special place at the top of the stairs!  The neighborhood is very quiet with ample parking.  Owners address questions in a timely manner.  The parks nearby are a great place to take a walk.
Perfect location near beautiful parks and hiking. The Kays are delightful and their place is spotless, tasteful decor and best of all comfy.

Lillian was a great host! She responded quickly and was very helpful. Her place was beautiful, lots of thoughtful touches, clean and exactly as pictured. The third room was an upstairs loft/attic area that we didn't end up using, but the rest of the house was roomy and very comfortable. Lots of parking and nice outdoors area too. Would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay. Comfortable living & dining space for the family to gather. Beautiful area of Salem.
Nice place quiet..' cleaned and had everything I needed.. recommend this for any mom w kids...

Lillian’s place is very peaceful and beautiful. I had a long stay and it was very accommodating. Good stay for work, beautiful touches all around the cottage, and a lot of space to park. They have everything you could need for a nice stay.  10/10 would recommend . Only complaint was for a long stay the old dining set that was there it broke and being so close to nature ants were also a small issue.
Take pictures on arriving so you don't get charged four previous damages.. !
Understand that you are close to nature so you will find ants and spiders and the likes.
amazing.

This is a great place to stay. It is tucked behind an office, so it is very secluded and private...zero road noise and you can see the trains as they go by! Read the description carefully, I thought this was a 2 bath, but it is really a 1.5 bath....so one shower.
The home had a lot of space and had everything we needed! Close to restaurants, grocery stores and parks. I would definitely book Lillian's home again if I am in the area!

Great place to stay, Lillian and her husband were great hosts.  The place was clean and had everything we needed while we were there.  I will definitely stay here again on future trips if it's available.

Enjoyed this spacious cottage while visiting Salem.  This part of the country is beautiful.  Lillian had many special touches in place, you could tell energy was spent on decorating and making things just perfect for guests.  The unique floor plan allowed for separate space when we wanted it but also a large gathering room for the times our group was together just hanging out.  We enjoyed our time in Salem.
Great place. Super clean and easy instructions. EXTREMELY quiet and private parking set back from the street. Loved the place and would stay there again.

The house is bigger in person ! It was so roomy ,cozy & cute ! The couches are very comfortable 😌  loved that the master bedroom had its own sitting area complete with sectional . We stayed here over Thanksgiving break with our two kids and the house had everything we needed . Lilian offered some local tips for places to visit , silver falls was gorgeous ! We would definitely stay again if ever in the area .

Quiet, spacious get away! We enjoyed our extended stay at Lillian's home. It was very quiet clean &  spacious with ample parking. It is very nicely decorated and has a well equipped kitchen with everything we needed for our 10 day stay. This was especially great since we cooked most meals with everything being closed d/t COVID. I would highly recommend Lillian's place.
Great spot in Salem. Close to everything. Being next to the creek and field were perfect for the dog. Lilian was super responsive and went above and beyond to help us out! We will be back!!
Lovely place! our trip was short due to weather but still the time there was amazing.

I was pleasantly surprised at the space but was expecting an actual 3rd bed for sleeping arrangements. It was a blow up mattress but we made it work. Their wasn’t much that was missed in considering a stay, such as plenty of clean towels, toiletries and anything else you could need during a stay away from home. The only upset I had was the fact that the check out instructions weren’t understood clearly and unfortunately we got charged an extra cleaning fee and also we’re made to feel like my family were filthy people which we are not. I would recommend this place to someone else but sure to remind them about the check out instructions but we won’t be staying here again.

Lillian’s Place is in a particularly convenient location, and very private and spacious— with well-lighted parking.  While there were only two of us, the space can easily hold a family.  The large kitchen and dining area make this a good short or longer-term stay.

The stay was overall very enjoyable and I would recommend the place. My favorite upgrade to the house was the door keypad for check-in. The negatives. . . there were ants that we messaged the host about. I'm sure they already knew because there were ant traps. They were confined to a small part of the kitchen. So, not a huge deal, but that was something we could have used a bit of warning about. Google had a bit of trouble finding the place. So we poked around for about 5-6 minutes trying to find the house. The back half acre was "available," but a bit overgrown and stacked with cuttings from the ice storm. It would probably really nice after a mowing. There was a fire extinguisher, but my daughter found it only because she was being nosy in the cabinets near the back door. There were no tools for the fireplace, which made it precarious to manage the fire. Overall, it was a good place for the price, and a great location though.
Lillian was a great host! The place was cute, cozy & quiet. My crew was very comfortable there & we'll definitely stay there again if we come back to Salem.
Great communication from host. Good location. Clean and plenty of room.
This location is two miles from downtown Salem, secluded and private.  The immediate area is a residential and quiet. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back.
Great little house - very private and comfortable

This cottage was great for our family. It was clean and centrally located for everything that we needed. The host, Lillian, was very accommodating for our needs. I would definitely recommend this property to anyone.
Very accommodating! Perfect location, ESPECIALLY for the price! Plenty of amenities and a convenient check-in.
We enjoyed our stay. Quiet, lots of parking and home was really roomy.

This home is pretty cute inside! Much more spacious than I expected. Unfortunately our groups stay was less than satisfactory.

- No garbage bags in any garbage cans
- Used shower items and lufa in the shower from other people
- Washer & Dryer full of laundry
- Master bedroom blanket had stains and hair
- they request you clean your sheets and stuff when leaving instead of them cleaning it. Dryer had a full load of laundry from someone else was I supposed to fold their laundry? Host should always be the one taking care of cleaning and sanitizing blankets and sheets & dish ware for the next guest to ensure proper cleaning. I hope they can take some of this info and fix some things to ensure a better stay for the next guest. Also we did have a problem with the door not self locking so ask for the key to save you the hassle.
loved it being quite

Nicely decorated and spacious home.  Plenty of room for a family with all amenities one would need.  Very convenient to several golf courses and downtown areas.  We felt we got good value for cost of stay.

Host is friendly and communicates well! We had no problem, but if there was one I’m sure it would have been handled quickly. Clean and modern environment. Spacious and unique in the layout. Just take note only one shower.

Spacious, quiet and private. The bed was very comfortable and the house was cool in spite of the heat thanks to the ductless AC in the main bedroom. The dog friendly space was very nice. The place could easily accommodate a larger group (this time it was only me and my two dogs). The location was perfect for all the activities I was in town for.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The cottage is very spacious, and in a great location. Internet speed was fast, and we were able to work remotely without any issue (there is also a treadmill desk which was awesome). Lilian provided prompt communication for any questions we had. I would definitely stay here again.
Spacious house, tucked away, has everything you need.

I appreciate the communication , she did quickly . But there was spiders everywhere. Everyday when we woke up , there was spiders in tubs in sheets .
The pillows being used , on couch and bed . Are not being cleaned per guest . Sticky pillows .

Beautiful home, well maintained with great accommodations.  Home was in a convenient location and worked perfectly for our trip to Salem.  We loved that we could bring our dog, he enjoyed the house too.  Couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay!
Comfortable and cozy and very quiet. Highly recommend
What an absolutely amazing stay, we were taken away by the sheer size of the place and aesthetic. Wonderfully kept and surprisingly stocked with everything we needed.
Great place to stay in good location!
Nice area

We had a great stay! It was perfect for our family of 4 and 2 boxers. We had a small issue but Lillian was quick to respond and correct it. Really great and fast communication. Would definitely stay again my next time through. Thank You!

This was my first time using and Airbnb so wasn’t sure what to expect. This place is Super close to downtown Salem so anyone looking for that experience, this place is great. Try the Sassy Onion for lunch too 🤣
We went for a wedding so didn’t spend much time at the Airbnb. But it wasn’t quite what we expected...
-old office building converted to a “residential” place so not easy to find.
-if you stay over business days, expect traffic from the business in front of the “cottage”.
-the stairs to the loft area are open from the back as well so NOT small kid friendly as they could fall trough the stairs.
-the shower head is meant for someone 4’8”and under...my 6’3” husband had to literally shower on his knees 🤣
-no baking pans so if you plan on baking, bring your own pan. (I had Pillsbury cinnamon rolls)
-no sugar in the house so if you want sweetener in your coffee or tea, bring your own.
-the couch in the main family room is so worn out that you’ll fall into the cushions if you sit on the lounge part.
- the second bed was actually a full size, not a queen.

All in all, this place might be great for a family of bigger kids but with babies, it was difficult. The back door deadbolt wouldn’t catch so my 2 year old was always escaping. It’s decorated cute but the class tables are not the best with little ones. My 1 year old kept trying to eat the fake pears. If I could have relaxed and not constantly worry about what the babies were into, it might have been a different experience. But was cheaper than a hotel for my family of 6.

Great location, spacious and well equipped cottage.
Everything was clean, stocked, and Lillian was an extremely helpful host, will definitely be recommending this cottage to anyone we know visiting Salem!
Great place to stay. Very clean, comfortable beds, great location, and lots of room!! Highly recommend!

The pictures don’t do it justice. With the large couches I was afraid the house would be crowded but quite the opposite! So spacious - great when traveling with 2 small kids and they loved playing in the small loft upstairs.

It was so clean and such a unique layout. Magically close to downtown without being too close so we felt very safe.

Will absolutely be looking to book here on future visits 💕
nice quiet location. perfect for my husband and I and our 2 grown sons and dog. about a half mile from Miso Island park. lots of hiking available.
My husband and I stayed at Lillian’s while I was on a travel assignment. The location was great- 5 min drive to the hospital. Overall it was a good stay and met our needs.

We stayed at Lillian's cottage during the last week of repairs on our home. It was truly a wonderful stay. The cottage has a unique layout that we really enjoyed and we appreciated how spacious it was for all of our baby gear. The king size bed was super comfortable. We also loved how quiet it was. Great location really close to everything. The cottage was incredibly clean and had everything we needed.

Lillian was a fantastic host. Her communication was super speedy and she was just great to work with. We certainly felt lucky to be her guests. Thank you, Lillian!
Amazing host!!! Really happy I found this property. Very cozy and warm home!

Great place for our quick trip to Salem. The home was bigger than we expected, with plenty of room for our family to stretch out and get ready for the wedding. The dogs were happy with the large lot nearby. It was perfect for us.

Overall a good stay. Came in with family for a wedding and had the place for a few days. Large open space with all the basics. I do however have a few complaints. First, would be the mattresses, (sping most likely) which should have been replaced some years back. They were extremely uncomfortable and sunken in from the center so you could only sleep on half of the bed comfortably. Small ant infestation so I hope the owners take a look into that soon. If you plan on staying here I would suggest you rewash towels and sheets before using them since it seems they leave the laundry wet sometime before they can get it into the dryer leaving an unpleasant odor on them.
Nice quiet location, very clean, king bed was super comfy. Nice simple kitchen and a perfect place for dogs too. Thank you!

I would highly recommend this airbnb for anyone staying in Salem. We were only there for about 3 days and the space was more than enough for 3 people. It was very clean and more than comfortable, I didn’t want to leave!! The home is located in an area that felt very safe. We had no problems finding the airbnb or checking in/out. Thanks Lillian!
This was my first time and the whole process was easier then I thought. The communication was good, checking in went great, the stay was nice and checking out was easy. Thank you
Thank you for the great stay. Cool home, large but cozy very relaxing. Would definitely stay again!

Beautiful home tucked behind a business allowing lots of privacy. Spacious layout that was perfect for family vacation! Although you can tell the home is older, you can also tell that it has been taken care of and loved. The living spaces are updated, clean, and pretty. Lilian was very quick to answer our questions and keep us updated with any changes. Our only dislike was being responsible for some of the cleaning at the end, not because we are lazy but because we’d feel more comfortable coming into a home knowing everything had been completed by a company and not the people who stayed in it before.  But we are slight germaphobes!!
Super place to stay. Clean, convenient, and very comfortable.

Place was as expected. Well equipped, clean and quiet. Space was great for the two of us and our 2 dogs. Well equipped allowing us to eat our meals at home or go out.
The big grass area at the back of the parking lot was more overgrown than I had expected so we didn’t use it.
Felt like home.
Very secluded little cottage just outside of town.  Very quiet and peaceful. Was decently equipped though had some quirks. Was a great little place to lay our heads while in Salem.
We couldn’t have had a better stay! Private and spacious cottage that was a wonderful retreat in Salem.
Lillian was a great host. She was very responsive and accommodating
Good place to stay

We had a small family reunion with family from three states.  The house is very cozy and the layout encourages groups to form.  We spent evenings on the porch.  We ate “in” every meal and kitchen has everything you need to create an awesome meal.  We plan to use house for our yearly family reunion.
Great location that is close to everything. Clean, comfortable,  and accommodating space. Lillian was super helpful and informative. Definitely coming back.
Amazing location, clean, friendly and great communication. Highly recommend
Great location and very comfortable house.  Loved the fresh blackberries in the back.  Easy to communicate with.
Had a great time.   The place was spacious and everything was great.  It was a reasonable price and Lillian was very helpful and made everything go smoothly.  Would recommend to anyone.

This was a great place to stay.  The check-in was easy.  We found the place to be very clean and spacious.  Shortly after checking in, we found a couple of minor issues and contacted the owner.  They responded in person within 20 minutes and resolved the problem.  They made it clear that they wanted us to enjoy our stay and were committed to making that happen.  Overall, we were very happy with our experience and will stay there again when we return to Salem.

Great place! Very quiet location next to the creek which you can hear with the windows open. There is a huge parking lot all for this unit which is so rare is Salem to find a place with great parking.  My cats LOVED the loft upstairs with a window to look out, they didn’t want to leave!
We all enjoyed staying here and found it to be a comfortable AirBNB. We would definitely stay here again.
We were here for a pickleball tournament and the location was great. The layout of the house worked great for our family of 4.
It was a very unique place my kids could be as loud as they wanted very cute place and I loved the inside it was beautiful and peaceful.

My husband and I are from Eugene and had a concert to attend in Salem on Friday and decided to stay the whole weekend to wine tour on Saturday. This home is impeccable! Check-in was quick and easy. Everything worked perfectly and was like new. This home had everything you could possibly imagine. Very impressed by the little things, for example, makeup remover wipes.
Connie was very responsive and overall amazing!

Lots of nice touches throughout the house. Locate at quiet neighbourhood. Connie is very responsive and communicative during stay. The house is perfect for large parties and very nicely equipped. We are very happy with the stay.

Where do I start?  Connie was even more amazing than her beautiful home, and her home is immaculate.  There was not one thing that we needed, that wasn’t already there, and then some.  Her response time, even after 12:30am was just about immediate.  Our stay at Connie’s made our reunion with family & graduation celebration all the more special.  Now looking for a reason to return.  Great memories for sure!!
Place is as advertised, a very lovely home and has a peaceful vibe. Would definitely recommend and would stay again if back in area
This place was amazing! So clean, and spacious! We felt so comfortable and relaxed. And contacting the host was so easy and had quick response. We will definitely stay here again!

I picked this for my wife and her friends to go to a seminar.
They will definitely be coming back!
They were amazed at how nice and pretty and clean and well thought out everything was.
I got great husband points for my choice of this property:-)
Great place, great location!
Connie’s place was super-neat and clean. All accommodations were as advertised. Our group really appreciated the Keurig and Nespresso machines! Very easy to check in and out. Nicely done!
A beautiful home with lots of room and extra amenities located in a quiet nice neighborhood. :)

Excellent house with more than everything you’ll need for a comfortable stay. Very clean and Connie was a fantastic host. Great location - nice neighborhood and close to shopping and wineries. Will definitely stay here next time I’m in Salem.

This house is absolutely stunning. So clean inside and out! Connie is an amazing host also, she responds almost instantly and she is so sweet and understanding.

If you plan to stay in Salem, this is definitely the place to be!
Clean Stylish place. Almost looks like a model home with a lot of thoughtful touches.. Good selection of amenities.

Connie provided an immaculate and very well-furnished house that was comfortable for all 6 of us. The house is conveniently located for access to the Salem area and made felt like a home away from home. Our stay was a fantastic experience!
Beautiful big space, thoughtful touches everywhere! Comfortable and clean, and such a good value for the space. Super close to all the good things the Willamette valley has to offer!!

Connie's home is a relatively newly constructed house, tastefully and comfortably furnished. The kitchen is fully equipped and the bathrooms have all the amenities one needs. A gas-fired fireplace provides pleasant ambiance in the evenings, and an outdoor patio is a fun place to sit and chat. The living/dining/kitchen area is a large, pleasant and welcoming space to be with friends and to prepare and share meals. The entire hose was very clean. Our group had a wonderful time! I recommend it!

The house was perfect for our stay away from home. It is spacious, very clean, has all the necessities in the kitchen,  bedrooms and bathrooms, and is nicely decorated with a touch of class.  The neighborhood/location is nice, quiet and safe.  Connie, our host, was very accommodating and responded quickly to my questions.  I am very pleased with my airbnb choice and highly recommend Connie's place.
House was clean and beautiful with all the amenities and extras you could ask for. Connie was very quick to answer any questions we had and we had a lovely stay.

The house is beautifully arranged and very spacious. It appears all new and up to date.   We very much enjoyed our stay and appreciated the touches like toys and books for children, even a stroller for little ones.  We were especially thrilled with the coffee maker and supplies. Thank you for a wonderful stay   Anyone visiting this area would appreciate this home
What a wonderful place.  VERY Clean and decorated nicely!
Amazingly organized, clean and comfortable house. We enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it to travelers
Our stay at Connie's place was great! It was clean, nicely decorated and provided everything we needed. Connie was quick to answer any questions and was an excellent host.

Connie’s place was very nice and clean. I’m kinda picky when I stay at Airbnb’s I don’t like seeing a lot of personal items and clutter. There was definitely none of that. Very stylish home. I would definitely recommend.
This house is so nice! Super clean, and very spacious. A very good deal, especially when compared to hotel prices in the area.

Amazing stay! Stayed here for a weekend get away trip with friends and there was more then enough room for the 6 of us. Home was very clean had everything you’d need . It felt like a home away from home. Host is amazing communication was there . Highly recommend!!!
This house is amazing. Felt like a real vacation home. Connie was a great host and her response time was Great. I highly recommend this house.

This home feels like a home! Connie has thought about every detail! If you forgot something 99%chance she has thought of it! The entertainment options were very nice. And the beds are comfortable! We will most definitely be back in the future.

Beautiful, quiet, clean!
Amazing place to stay! Safe, secured, clean and all services well provided.
This place was excellent! Changed my mind about air b&bs.

This house has pretty much everything you would need for an awesome experience. The beds are very comfortable. Everything in the home is of quality. We loved the humidifiers that were in almost every room. The house is very spacious and close to stores/markets. We loved everything about it! 100% recommend it.

My family stayed here for several weeks while our home was repaired. This house is clean, comfortable, large and in a pretty and quiet neighborhood. I would recommend it to anyone as a “home away from home”!

We stayed at this house for a couple of months during our own home repairs. Everything was comfortable and clean and the house had everything that we needed in the kitchen. The neighborhood is very quiet and pleasant. We recommend this house!

It's my first time to use Airbnb,  Connie's house is located in a Safe, secured neighborhood , The house is clean and all services well provided. Connie always replies my questions quickly. We decided to extend our stay!
We extended one more week because of the nice,  cozy houseand secure neighborhood,  Connie always response our questions shortly.

The home was very clean and welcoming! Our host even checked in to see what time we'd be arriving so that she could have the home sanitized as well. The location is quiet and was perfect for our family visit to Oregon from CA. Our three boys loved the home - it was very spacious and the backyard was great to hang out in. The kitchen had all the essentials, all we had to do was get a few groceries. The upstairs 'kids room' came equipped with Netflix and toys! I would definitely recommend Connie's home.
We had a great stay. Clean, comfortable, spacious, and easy to cook in the kitchen. Connie was very responsive when we had questions.
Loved the house and location. I would definitely stay here again. House was very clean and kid friendly.
Great host and place, would recommend it highly. Would look to book again
Clean, great host, just over all a great experience
Very nice home in a convenient location for our trip. Will definitely book again next time we come that way.
Super clean and spacious!

A sparkling clean, spacious home that is perfect for your groups next visit to Salem! Located on a quiet cul de sac in north Salem, this home was so comfortable for me and my mom during her visit. Please check this place out!

The house is simply gorgeous. Loved the layout and the backyard was amazing. We had a great time and Connie was super helpful. She is extremely responsive and super helpful. We will definitely be coming back for sure.
Perfect place to stay! Very cozy house and not too far from stores. We really appreciated the fast responses she gave too!

This home was a beautiful and comfortable place to stay. The neighborhood was quiet. We would gladly stay at this home again. For reference; this was a group of five adults and only two of us were a couple traveling together, the space was set up nicely for comfort in this situation.
Spacious home with open floor plan, which was very nice for our group. The hosts were communicative and helpful.
Super chic and comfortable, beautifully decorated and hospital clean.
A Great place to relax and enjoy a peaceful clean house and neighborhood. The house is a dream house for me. I highly recommend Connie’s lovely home to any family or group!

Connie has a lovely home. There is enough space to feel relaxed and homely. The neighborhood is peaceful and everything was more than we can ask for. It is also more affordable than I expected for such a great home. Beyond grateful.

Connie’s home was amazing. Spacious and very comfortable. We ran into a problem with needing more blankets and she was fast at answering and helping us solve it. I would highly recommend this place. I felt safe and ver comfortable being there.
Had a great stay and would book again.

Connie’s home immaculate!
COVID-19 CLEAN!

It is located in a nice neighborhood in a quiet cul du sac.
It’s ten minutes from downtown Salem and I-5 Freeway and yet you are out ‘in the country’ where it’s quiet, where you can hear birds and chickens!!!
And you can see the stars at night.

This home is large enough for a family. Cozy enough for just me!
EVERYTHING you could need or want is provided.

A wonderful place to stay!
And Connie is great to work with.
I will hopefully be back!!
Beautiful place, conveniently located, spacious, and clean.
Very spacious and clean, and beautiful backyard to relax in! Host was very responsive to messages. Would stay here again!
Wonderful place to stay in clean and close to major highways.
Perfect home in a great neighborhood 👍🏽
Beautiful, clean, comfortable house. It was a perfect location for our needs and the hostess communicated with us in a very timely fashion. I hated to leave!

Very clean, spacious, and it felt like home. The location was very convenient to where we needed to be. There was enough space for everyone and the kids didn't feel confined like they would have if we stayed in a hotel. We made a great choice and would definitely recommend Connie's home to others.
Beautiful house and a great host. Everything was perfect!
Great place. Second time staying here and hope for many more to come.
House was beautiful, great location, clean and spacious. They're was however a questionable smell lingering in the house. Everything else was absolutely perfect.
Connie is the kindest of hosts, and the home is lovely. spacious, clean, located in a peaceful neighborhood, full of light, and a great little yard for little ones to play

We have stayed here twice; it’s the perfect location for back and forth family visiting between Silverton and Salem. Don’t miss Gruenfelter’s Hilltop orchard at the corner of Hazelgreen and the Salem Parkway for the best peaches in the whole world. We like EZ Orchards, Fin and Fowl, and tried La Lucciola for pizza this time. Kitchen very well prepped for all the food you’ll enjoy in the area in the summer.
The pictures do it justice. Its great.

Great house and very clean. Perfect for large family or even a couple couples with three full bathrooms. The kitchen is large and stocked with everything you need to make all your meals. Plus a very nice outdoor space. We would definitely stay there again.
This was our second time staying in this home. Everything was great. Excellent home in a good location. Convenient to just about everything.
Well equipped and very clean. We enjoyed our stay.
Beautiful home and a wonderful host! Worked perfectly for our family. We will definitely come back again.
Cozy comfortable home with lots of space.

This property is great! Not only is it as beautiful as the pictures show, but the beds are comfortable and the place was super clean!  The yard is inviting and private.  Check in could not have been easier (which we appreciated greatly considering our late arrival time). We loved staying here and would definitely highly recommend.

For the most part had a very nice stay, the home was great, clean and met our needs. One incident early in the stay on some misinformation had the potential to derail this stay, but it was resolved quickly, and without further incident.
An ideal place for our family trip to Salem. Comfortable, clean, spacious, tastefully decorated, and a responsive host too! I highly recommend Connie’s place!!

Positive: The house was very nice. It was clean and comfortable. There was plenty of space for our group of six and we didn’t feel cramped at all. The upstairs loft/sleeping area was great for the kids to hang out in and watch what they wanted to on TV. Although we didn’t use the backyard it looked nice and the furniture looked nice out there. It was located in a quiet neighborhood that wasn’t a far drive from downtown.

Negative: There were not a lot of extras out especially for a 6 day stay. Examples: One bathroom didn’t have a hand towel and there were no extras. There were only two dish towel left and no dish cloth for wiping counters. The fridge was quite small, for a six day stay with six people it was completely packed. The water was turned off by the water company while we were there. The notice said it was due to unpaid bills, the host said it was a clerical error and that it would be taken care of. The water did come back on a while later which was appreciated. I was unaware of the clerical error and when I saw the notice that the water was off for an unpaid bill I was rightfully upset and let the host know. I demanded it be taken care of or she put us up in another accommodation. She chastised me for being rude in my message and making demands. Again I didn’t know there was a clerical error and was concerned considering it was a Friday and I didn’t want to go with out water.
Very cozy home, comfortable beds, plenty of space. Well stocked. Fenced back yard. Private quiet neighborhood. Owners are quick to communicate.
Staying here was a great experience for our family. We made great use of all the home had and the memories are memories for a lifetime. So grateful for the use of this space.  Thanks so much!!

Connie was a wonderful host!
We stayed here for the holiday and had a wonderful time. They’re conveniently located and had a very comfortable place.

11/10 thank you!

I am actually still at Connie's place just had to split the listing for insurance purposes. I am staying at Connie's long term due to an insurance claim. Connie has been very communicative and helpful my entire stay!

Great place to stay and great host. Very responsive and accommodating with whatever I needed. This was my first long time stay and her first long time guest and everything went great. I love that there are children's dishes and silverware available for the stay. I would definitely use this host or location again and recommend this for any family that needs a place to stay. Only thing to mention is that the listing does not say that pets are not allowed upstairs or on furniture so keep that in mind when booking. There is a small gate at the bottom of the stairs to keep pets down, but a larger dog can easily jump over that.

We had a lovely 3 night stay here! It was very comfortable, very clean, and in a great location.
Nice towels and comfy beds are high on my list of must haves and these easily exceeded my expectations!
And other amenities were appreciated as well.
Our hosts were friendly and helpful.
Hope to travel that way again soon and will definitely make this our home if we do!!!
Great recommendations for winery visits and eats.
This is a clean and private space.  Jim and Jeanette have added a few nice touches to their hospitality.  For a quiet, clean, private stay you can’t go wrong here!
Very nice home-away-from-home​.  Hope to have a chance to stay there again.
Really nice place. Quiet and low key.  Convenient location. Nice people.
This is a very nice place to stay.  The room and bathroom were very clean.  Jeannette is very nice and easy to talk to.  I would recommend staying there!
Jeannette and Jim's place is immaculate, comfortable and offers great privacy. Check-in was super easy and communication was prompt and thorough. I would recommend staying at their place.
Very clean, quiet, and comfortable. Hosts were very welcoming and had great recommendations for the area. Would stay here again!
Comfortable, easy to get to, hosts are good communicators.
A very quiet and secure location. The rental utilized space well. Convenient parking. Easy to locate rental in a very nice neighborhood. Will stay again.
Such a wonderful home! Very spacious, clean, quiet and private. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Great!

It was a great place! Close enough to both Silver Falls and Pacific City for day trips.
Jeanette and Jim were very gracious and had extra amenities that enhanced our stay.
Beautiful and comfortable home away from home.

Jeannette's place is perfect for someone planning a short visit to Salem.  You get your own bathroom (with a shower/tub), a spacious counter and sink, a Keurig machine, and a super comfy bed in a quiet downstairs bedroom. There is also bright sitting room available for you!

Very comfortable private lower level of the house! Hosts were quick to respond and check in throughout my stay. I appreciated that, with current precautions in mind, in person contact was not required but was welcomed should I have needed it. Access to washer and dryer was a helpful bonus. Highly recommend!
It was a grate place to stay has fridge amenities the room all to my self and very clean.
Clean, safe and comfortable.

Very hospitable hosts, very clean, and attention to detail. My stay was amazing and the space was very private, allowing me to get work done.  Jim and Jeanette were very responsive to any contacts and needs. Definitely will stay there again!

This was my second stay at this location with Jeanette and Jim! Always a pleasure,  quiet, clean and a very comfortable bed! Will be sure to look and see if its available next time I need a place in Salem!

Jeanette and Jim were such great hosts, really communicative and friendly, and this was a great private spot to stay for a few days while visiting family in Salem. It was super clean, quiet, and access was easy. I enjoyed chatting with them one night after I arrived, but if you want to come and go without talking you will have plenty of space. I will definitely come back here when I want some space from my fam :) Also, they have a Peloton bike and treadmill for all of you Pelo people!

Jeannette and Jim are excellent hosts and responded to all my questions promptly. The room was clean, comfortable, quiet, and private, and it met all my needs. The neighborhood is beautiful and feels very safe. WiFi Internet was fast and reliable, so I could get some work done in between visits with my elderly mother.

I had a busy schedule so didn't get a chance to take advantage of the living room, but it looked like a very nice space for planning one's day or relaxing at the end of the day.

I've stayed at many hotels and motels in Salem over the years, and Jeannette and Jim's place offers a better combination of value, location, and comfort than anything else I've found. I hope their room will be available next time I'm in Salem.
Very reasonable rates. Great location. Quiet neighborhood. Space is cozy. Had all we needed for our stay.
A nice quiet place to stay.
The house is very nice, in a really nice and quiet neighborhood. Jim and Jeanette are really nice and communicate really well. The bed was super comfy. We would definatly stay again!
Great place to stay
Great service!

Amazing hospitality!  We weren’t there all that much but it was exactly what we needed!  The place is nice and clean and in a beautiful quiet neighborhood.  The house itself has an amazing garden that is stunning to look at!  Definitely a great place to stay if you’re in town!

Jim and Jeannette’s place is awesome! Very clean, very easy to find, very accommodating! They were very helpful and friendly and always made sure I had everything I needed! Felt very welcome from the beginning through the end of my stay! Quiet and comfortable spot! Great neighborhood. I will definitely be staying here again next time I’m in Oregon! Thank you!

My partner and I had a wonderful stay. We were able to come and go, but also were grateful to chat with our hosts and say hello to their sweet dogs for a bit. The room and bathroom were clean, and we made use of the mini fridge and Keurig. Hope we can stay again next time we are in town!
Expect wonderfully nice hosts, a clean bedroom, and bathroom

Beautiful space, great hosts, great neighborhood!!  This space is wonderful...very close to everything, but very provate and secure.  Would HIGHLY recommend this as a quiet getaway.  The hosts are wonderful as well.
This property is situated in a quiet, well manicured neighborhood.  Accommodations were comfortable and clean.  I’ll stay here when I visit in the future.
Very clean, and a beautiful house.  It is well located to the downtown area.

Convenient location, very cozy and clean room and bathroom. The dogs are indeed excited to see you, but they calm down pretty quickly after you get there and are in their own area. Would definitely stay here again!
Nice place in a pretty and safe neighborhood

Jeannette was so kind and welcoming to us during our stay! We were visiting salem for the first time and she gave us lots of suggestions on places to see and things to do. She made us feel like we were at a home away from home!

This is a really nice listing in a beautiful, safe neighborhood. The bedroom is quiet, very pretty and peaceful. The bed is very relaxing & comfortable. I loved having my own bathroom. She provided a refrigerator, microwave and Keurig Coffee maker. Its located downstairs which gives you a lot of Privacy. Located near Restaurants, shopping etc.
Thank you Jeanette for the lovely stay.
Wonderful  experience.  Beautiful home, yard, accomodations, and neighborhood.  Jeannette is friendly and attentive.  Great experience.
Great place.  Jeanette and her family are fantastic.  Perfect location to anywhere in Salem.  A+
Amazing, great bed and pillows, mini fridge, smoking hot shower, nice kitty. Highly recommend if you need a quiet place to stay
Wonderful location and very welcoming host, would book again if I ever find myself in Salem
great stay for the price

This was an exceptional place to stay! 5 stars across the board. Jeannette is very hospitable and was available to answer any questions I had.  I will definitely look to stay here again if I am back in Salem. Thank you.
Beautiful house in a nice neighborhood! And as a host Jeannette was super friendly and so welcoming.
Jeannette is an amazing host and so willing to help you with anything you need. All her critters are so adorable and it is such a great value. Highly recommend staying with her!!

Jeannette’s place was just perfect for my week business trip to Salem. It’s in a quiet beautiful neighborhood and is quiet, peaceful and clean. There’s a small fridge and a private bathroom so it was perfect. Thanks Jeannette.
Very quiet neighborhood. The bed was comfortable and although it’s in the same home as the owners, the accommodations were quite private.
Place was clean, bright and comfortable. Jeannette was the perfect hostess - friendly, warm and accommodating. Loved the stay!

Jeannette's place was perfect for us. The location was ideal for what we were doing and is in a nice, quiet, residential area. Her guest room is very nice and clean and the bed is comfortable. We were easily able to find her place and check in even though we arrived very late thanks to the information she sent us. We was kind to accommodate our very late check in. Jeanette has dogs who sometimes barked at us when we came and left each day but this didn't bother us, and they are contained behind a gate so they could not come downstairs to the guest room. We had a great stay and would definitely recommend Jeannette's place!

The space was good for my husband and I. We like that we had a mini fridge and microwave access right by our room. Jeannette was also very helpful, but not so much to where she was invading our privacy. Her friendly and helpful demeanor is greatly appreciated. We highly recommend!

Jeannette is a fantastic host! The room was so comfortable and private. The dogs welcome-barked me in (and out) and the kitty came to see what was up (very soft and fluffy). Nice bathroom and thoughtful amenities: microwave, fridge, Keurig, and some flatware, plates, and cups. Large closet. Great location for exploring in and around Salem!
Excellent place! Shana was a great host, and the space was very stylish. Fun to stay in!
The host is very nice and sweet. Offered good recommendations for local food. The space is comfortable for two people and very cute. Definitely would stay again.
This place is awesome! Like a private, cozy retreat. Lots of thoughtful touches, would definitely stay again.

Five ⭐️ across the board!  Being an Airbnb host myself, I can truly say Shana’s place is amazing!  We were in town  for our son’s graduation.  It was so nice to feel comfortable and at home during this busy weekend. Communication was great, amenities were top notch and the space is absolutely clean and adorable. I can’t say enough of the experience. We would highly recommend staying here. Thanks Shana for opening up your home!
Awesome spot, super clean and close to downtown.  Will stay again!

Beautiful little space for the night. Super clean, very thoughtful accents, and just a great experience. We were the free for only 1 night but could have stayed several more if we would have needed. Would definitely stay there again if I get back to the area. 10/10

Such an awesome little space!! So comfortable and homey, the sheets are out of this world, and she even added bottles of water for us, sparking water, and some snacks! Overall, an awesome first Airbnb experience! Thanks for the awesme place to stay!

Shana's revamped garage was the perfect place to stop and get some rest before heading out to Silver Falls State Park. The place was sparkling clean, comfortable, stylish, private, and stocked with all the amenities we needed to our short stay. Shana was a great host, welcoming and communicative, we definitely recommend staying at Shana's garage if you're passing through Salem!
This place is so aweome! Cute stylish clean space! I would stay here again anytime! Shana was the best with communication! A definite great stay!
A nice bright space and good shower.  Quiet street. Loved it.
Had an early morning meeting, needed somewhere to crash for the night. MUCH nicer than a hotel for the same price. Great place. Very cute.
Very stylish, clean place. Everything was thought of.

I loved staying in Salem for a weekend wedding. Shana's place is a lovely converted garage and was very comfortable for two people. Shana was very responsive to any questions or needs we had and had an excellent recommendation for local breakfast. I would definitely stay again!​

Shana’s place was so cute and clean. I love the style. Tons of thoughtful touches that made us feel so welcome. We had everything we needed and then some! I would highly recommend Shana’s to anyone needing a place in Salem. One of the best airBnB’s that we have stayed in.
This is a very clean place to stay with stylish rustic/farmhouse decorations. Shana quickly responds to questions.
The Garage is an amazing spot for a couple! It’s very stylish, close to downtown and Shana provides amazing amenities, local tips, and is very easy to communicate with.
Lovey place. Super private and clean. Had a good night’s sleep.
Beautiful place and Shana was a lovely host!
Well appointed and sparkling clean! Close to all gov't offices and great parks.

My daughter and I were in town for one night. I didn’t want to spend a lot and we didn’t need anything too fancy. Shana’s garage studio was perfect!! We were so pleasantly surprised! The decir and details are darling and it was a very comfortable space. Shana was quick to respond and helpful. As my daughter said, “too bad we aren’t staying longer!”

Really loved our stay, super relaxing, convenient location. Loved the style and layout. Owner gave is some food tips for the area. You can tell owner takes care of her place. If we are ever in this area again we will book again. Felt super safe and comfortable:)
Thank you so much, Shana! I felt at ease and comfortable in your space. Great customer service and strong hospitality!
First time using Airbnb. This was a great experience. We had everything we needed and more!
The space was super stylish and very comfortable. Felt very at home for the short time we were there. Also was very close to downtown! Will stay again for sure if we come to the area again.

Super quaint, immaculately clean, completely cozy, quiet, roomy, with coffee, a toaster oven, snacks, an amazing shower, and your own parking space. Great communication with host and key on site. What else is there? I Highly recommend a stay at The Garage!
Great stay. Very clean and comfortable
Great experience. Way better than any hotel stay.

Staying at Shana’s was like having a little home away from home. Everything was sparkling clean and very roomy. Even the shower had amazing water pressure!

If you’re traveling with two people and both like to read before bed, you may have to switch off each night for who has the bedside table with the lamp as there is only one proper nightstand with a lamp. The other side has a lovely bench but no light so it’s a little dark to read from just the lamp light. However, there’s always the overhead lights you’d just have to get out of bed to turn them off.
We just loved Shana's Garage! Clean, stylish and we had everything we needed.

The Garage was perfect. Everything we needed was there, it was super comfy and cozy and we’d be thrilled to go back. (Even got some design inspiration for our future project - the space was very well done)

Stopped overnight for my first time in Salem. Shana's place was cozy and had lots of amenities for comfort whether staying just an evening, or longer. Close to lots going on in downtown Salem, which is a wonderful little city :)
I really enjoyed my stay. The Garage is located in a nice quite neighborhood and was a great place to stay for my work trip.
Great space; so clean and comfortable
Outstanding location, comfort and cleanliness! We will definitely be back the next time we visit our kids in Salem!
Nicely appointed.  Convenient location.  Really good value.
Super cute, stylish, and cozy! Easy to check in and super clean!
Shana decorated The Garage like a pro. The lighting was perfect. Floor is a little chilly so bring your slippers. Excellent value!

Shana's converted garage is a work of art! We were running extremely late for check-in and Shana made accommodations to make the process easy and pain free. I only wish we had even more time to enjoy the thoughtfully decorated space but we will definitely look her way again if we stay in Salem. If you're reading this and visit the area, definitely check out Word of Mouth Bistro - as the name might imply, it's worth it.

One of the nicer garage conversions I’ve ever seen! Super comfy space for our little family (plus infant and terrier). The heater got the place nice and toasty in minutes and breakfast and showering were easy in the morning.
Sooo cute!! We loved this cute little space! Check in was a breeze compared to other air bnbs we’ve stayed at. We loved the privacy and the bagels!
Beautiful home! We really enjoyed staying there!

Shana's place was great. It had everything my wife and I needed for a delightful weekend staycation. The place was clean, tidy, and stylish, and was great for relaxing and being a home base for us to explore downtown Salem from (it is within comfortable walking distance). I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a private space for a couple or small family. We will definitely look up Shana again on our next stay in Salem.
This was the cutest place. Shannon has thought of everything. Outstanding decor and amenities
Very clean and comfy and everything to make it a good stay.
Amazing place. Within walking distance to Capital and good food(downtown). I would stay again.  Great deal and location
I loved staying in the garage. It is very spacious, clean, and comfortable. Also, within minutes of downtown. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Very cute and clean space! Host was gracious enough to take out extra bedding, supply food, and amenities!

Thanks to Shana for being a fantastic host.  The location was private and quiet, clean, and honestly just adorable.  I had everything I needed, and she was very responsive.   My schedule was a little erratic for when I'd be there and not be there, so the check-in and check-out was super convenient.  I definitely recommend this host and location!

Loved my stay at Shana's!  The garage has been so tastefully done and has everything you will need for your stay as well as thoughtful extras! Great communication, easy check in and clean! Would love to stay here again next time I'm in town.
We had a wonderful, albeit quick stay at the Garage. It’s exactly as advertised and we had everything we needed. Cozy, clean space and a very comfortable bed!
This garage cottage was all I was hoping for and more. It was comfy, clean, and quiet with every amenity one would need. I will definitely stay here again!

Shannon's place is fabulous. It was my second time staying there and it was just a great the second time as it was the first. I highly recommend it as a place to stay if you need one in Salem. Not only is it a very stylish room but it has everything that you need.

Detached garage transitioned to a fantastic living space, very tastefully decorated with ALL the touches (even a little Christmas tree!! :) . Quiet neighborhood, felt very safe and was conveniently located (for me!). Host was very easy to communicate with, check in/out very simple. A total gem that will definitely be saved to my list of favorites!!
Great place!
Beautiful space that is a gone away from home. A quick drive to local restaurants + things to do! Had some lovely local tips from Shana, will stay again next time I’m in Salem!
Comfortable place in a quiet neighborhood. Convenient to family, shopping and dining. Loved the neighbor’s Christmas decorations. Would definitely stay here again
Great accommodation. Super clean, stylish and very comfortable. We will gladly stay there again!
Perfect retreat after a day working in the Capitol. Super clean, quiet, calm - I loved the comfortable-yet-simple vibe. And the very comfy bed!
Wonderful garage with all the space and nice touches you could ask for. One of the best Airbnb's I've stayed at.
The garage is the cutest space! Comfy bed. Would definitely stay here again if in Salem!

I had a lovely stay here. I had my own parking spot, access to Hulu and Netflix, the kitchen was large, and there were even snacks and breakfast foods.

The accommodation has all the comforts of home. The furnishings were clean, the host very kind, and the neighborhood laid back and quiet.

I would absolutely recommend this place, it is the perfect space for an Airbnb.
The Garage is an excellent space! Kitchenette was cute and had anything we would need! Had a great nights sleep and even watched an episode on Netflix before bed! Definitely would recommend!

Shana's place, a renovated garage, is well-located near the Capitol and offers a good bed, a clean space, nice towels and a large and comfortable shower. The toaster oven and coffee maker were nice and the Wifi was solid. Bring slippers since the floor is poured concrete and pretty cold.

The host could work on communication with guests, the dog run aromas and heat level. In what I hope was a fluke, she called law enforcement when she saw (registered guest) in the backyard waiting for the key or further instructions, without calling me to confirm identity first. Police came out and asked for ID and proof of invitation. This was distressing and really put a shadow on the whole experience after a long day of work and travel. Shana and Airbnb are working on it, and I trust this won't happen to people in the future.
great place  to get a nice quiet rest while in salem..
An amazing little get away. Trendy and stylish, plenty of amenities, easy access and central location. We will definitely book here again!
My stay at The Garage was great. Would recommend to anyone looking for a nice place to stay. Very convenient if working around the downtown area.
Our 2nd time staying at the Garage! We'll definitely be back again!
Wonderful and convenient place to stay!

Shana's converted garage space was just as advertised - thoughtfully appointed, spotlessly clean (and I could tell she'd taken extra measures to ensure everything was sanitized). She was prompt in her communications, flexible about my need to reschedule and overall a pleasure to deal with. My kitty and I LOVED our stay!  Highly recommended.
It was great.
Shana’s Garage was exactly as pictured and spotlessly clean. The location is perfect for a business trip in Salem.
I’ve stayed here a couple of times and will continue coming back when traveling to Salem because the location is great, the space is comfortable and Shanna is very responsive and easy to work with.
Was a fantastic stay
Super easy check in, cute, clean, and cozy space. I got a great night of sleep! I was in the area for work and plan on staying here in the future
Great place, good location and very comfortable.  A place to be easy for an evening.  And Shana was a very communicative host.

Shana’s place is super cute and we got an excellent night sleep in the very cozy bed. The space is well appointed and very quiet and relaxing. It’s also close to downtown and anything you may need. Shana’s responsiveness was super fast and she was kind and accommodating. I highly recommend this place. We will be back!
Great space!! Clean, comfortable and spacious for a couple!
Very clean, spotless would be the word, very cute place. Decorated pleasingly. Absolutely no issues
We didn’t get much time in the space and we wish we could have enjoyed it more. My husband and I loved it! It’s so clean and cute!
The Garage is a convenient location for anyone needing a place to stay close in the city of Salem. It was quiet at night. Thank you for the stay.

The pictures don't do this cute little place justice. We stayed with our 13 month old and dog and it was very quiet and cozy for us. Shana let us check in a little early which I greatly appreciated! Thank you so much for a great stay!
Sooooo cute and exactly what we were looking for fantastic location very attentive host would definitely stay again!
Very spacious
Great location great shower and great towels.  Better than hotels you need to book this place for your adventures in Salem
Cute, clean and stylish. And the bed was so comfortable after a long day of travel.

A lovely , peaceful, well-appointed studio with a nice garden area to sit in.
Nice quiet neighborhood .
Shana is welcoming and responsive and we loved this place !
Charming accommodations and sparkling clean! Shana was a very attentive host.
The decor is adorable! Easy entry and good instructions to get in. The shower is gorgeous and the bed is comfy. Super clean as well

Cozy farmhouse with an extra comfy bed! The garage was one of the best, if not the best, air bnbs I have ever stayed in! There were nice extras I was not expecting (like a coffee maker, toaster oven, and hair dryer) available to use. I will absolutely make this my first preference for travel to Salem in the future.
Another lovely stay at this peaceful and very comfortable haven !
We have a lovely weekend at Shanas place. We found everything we needed and more. Super comfortable. Will stay here again!
Shana was super awesome! the garage was better than I expected. Everything was organized, spacious, and everything was spotless clean. I really love the design too. I would love to come back.
The Garage was the best hidden gem to stay at. My husband and I now want to remodel and have something similar! Thank you for a great stay, it was the perfect pit stop between Bend and the Coast!

The Garage is a gem! You’ll especially love the super comfortable bed and the giant shower. The location can’t be beat with a large side yard, table and chairs if you want to relax at home. We loved our stay and hope to stay there again when we are in Salem. Shana is an excellent communicator and very responsive.

This awesome space was well thought out and so homey! We really enjoyed staying and just have to mention the beds are super comfy! Just what we needed, a great nights sleep! We would definitely stay again!
Great place! Great price!

Shana's garage is a home away from home. She really has gone the extra mile to provide you with anything you might need. The atmosphere is calm and refreshing. The location is great.  The side patio was a bonus we weren't expecting and it was so nice to sit out in the morning and enjoy our coffee. Our 2 kids loved it and enjoyed the games provided. Overall amazing experience and we will definitelybe back.
A great location close to downtown, super clean, loved it!
Very clean and pleasant; nicely decorated. Shana was a great hostess. Highly recommended
Wonderful space! Very clean and comfortable and Shana was very quick to respond.

We loved our night at Shana’s place. The spot looks straight out of a magazine, and was wonderfully bright and clean. The bed was super comfortable and we slept super well. She responded very quickly to all messages too! Would highly recommend.
I had a very pleasant stay in a setting that you could consider a home away from home.  Great designs throughout and the perfect amount of space.  I would definitely recommend “The Garage.”
Great place near downtown Salem. Clean, comfortable, and had everything we needed. Would stay there again!
Such a lovely place! The space was so cute and extremely clean. I highly recommend Shana's place and will definitely stay there again next time I'm in the Portland area.
Awesome place!  Very clean, stylish and comfortable.  Shana was also very nice and helpful with local recommendations.  I'd stay again for sure.
This place was so pretty and it felt so comfy! We didn’t get to spend much time here, but we loved every second that we did!
Can’t go wrong here.  Excellent experience.  Comfortable, clean, welcoming.  Perfect!
We loved staying at the garage! Photos don’t do it justice. The bed was super comfy and neighborhood was quiet, Shana was super friendly and had such quick responses. We’ll be back :)

Absolutely recommend, everything is on point and couldn't be any better. The place is so cute and accomidating. I'll be back for sure, everything easily gets five stars, and the price is absolutely worth it for what you get.

Shana’s place was great! It had everything we needed, the shower is amazing and the bed was so comfortable too. She had a floor mattress that was perfect for my toddler and we loved having the little yard space for my him to run around.
Another wonderful stay with Shana! Highly recommend to anyone looking for an airbnb in the area 🙂

We were in town for only one night, and Shana’s Garage was perfect. The place is quite spacious and was plenty of room for the three of us. The Garage is located just a few minutes off I5 and is super close to downtown. Shana is quick to respond and was super helpful along the way. If we come back to Salem, we’d totally try to stay here again.
Super cute, cozy, perfect for a night away.

This place is so nice! We were not expecting Salem to be so cute, so it was nice to have a place close to downtown in a quiet neighborhood for us to relax. Everything we needed was at most a ~5 minute car ride away.
This is an awesome spot.  The garage apartment is beautifully constructed and super clean.  Check in was a breeze.  I would stay here again any time!
Perfect size for us and very clean! We were pleasantly surprised!
You can expect calm nights and cozy comfort.  This Garage is open and happy.
Very clean & nice
Great, clean stay and responsive host 😊

This is a great unit. Great design in this conversion from a garage to clean and well-appointed guest space.  Shana was super accommodating and responsive in communication.  Beautiful, safe neighborhood. We will definitely stay here again!
This place was great! Super cozy and inviting. Very close to all restaurants and bars, definitely staying here again.

My husband and I came up for a friends wedding. We reached out to Shana beforehand about COVID precautions and needed to bring our dog with us last minute. She was quick to reply, helpful, and friendly.

The Garage itself is a super cute refurbished garage with everything you need for a long weekend. We found the bed very comfortable. Night time was quite and peaceful which is important to us as we have a vocal dog when something goes bump in the night.

Great neighborhood with easy access to anything you need. Highly recommend staying here and would certainly make a booking if it’s available next time we’re in town.
The space is so cute and cozy. It was much better than I could have possibly expected. I loved my stay there a s Shana was a beautiful beam of light.
Perfect little spot in Salem!
Very cute converted garage!   Shana has everything you could need!   Very clean!

Clean, Comfortable and Quiet. Quick responses. Had the pleasure of staying last night at the *garage with my gf and we enjoyed it very much. Stylish touches, bed was even surprisingly awesome slept really well.  It was better then a hotel room most definitely. Will stay again if the opportunity arises.
great little spot all to yourself and very clean! felt like a little home!
Our stay was great. Fantastic location and walkable neighborhood. We loved being able to bring our dog.
Great place!  Quiet neighborhood.  Comfortable and clean.  I will stay again.
Super easy access. Close to businesses.

Really great space - roomy and comfortable. Kitchen includes cutlery, plates/bowls/cutting board, microwave and toaster oven, big sink, cleaning supplies. Bathroom and shower are totally equipped. The space was perfectly tidy and adorably decorated. The entrance is separate from the main house with the keys locked away at the door (you're given a code to open it), so everything is contact free. Thanks, Shana!

I was in town for my fathers funeral and with Covid and most everything being closed, I was able to get dinner and bring my Mom there to spend several hours, have dinner, and visit. Since visitors are not allowed at this time at my moms retirement facility.

This is one of those places where I wanted to write a review an hour into my visit, I was that impressed! So adorable - like straight off of HGTV cute - and stocked with everything you'd need for a stop in Salem. Shana and her family were really accommodating & kind toward me and my puppy. I'd stay again in a heartbeat!
I love this place! Reliable, well-stocked, super friendly... just a great experience overall. 100% recommend.

This space was very comfortable and stylish.  It was easy to find, and Shana responded very quickly to any messages I sent her.  There were tons of lovely little personal touches that showed Shana really wants her guests to be comfortable.  I may have to visit "The Garage" again!

Amazing place and fantastic host!!!

The Garage was perfect for our road trip stop over. Close to I-5 and Capital Building for an impromptu sightseeing. It was spacious. Garage conversion was thoughtfully done. Fully stocked amenities. Very clean. The bed sheets and towels smelled great!

Our host Shana was very responsive with replying and accommodating our additional needs. We would stay here again if another overnight trip comes up through Salem.

After a long day of driving, I was exhausted and so grateful for this comfy welcoming space. Shana's place was cozy and had everything I needed, and I slept super soundly to the sound of rain on the roof. One of the most pleasant places I've stayed. One thing to note: bring slippers for the cement floor, otherwise you may have chilly feet in the winter.
Very clean, exceptionally inviting, very comfortable.  Shana is quick to respond to questions and makes you feel like a welcome friend.  Very highly recommend!
Another wonderful stay with Shana at The Garage! Will always look to see if this is available first and to be honest, have planned trips around it.

I can’t recommend this space enough. It felt so welcoming, clean, spacious for a studio place and had everything that I needed and many extra little touches. I stayed in this space for a little solo weekend getaway and felt like it was the perfect place to rest and settle in. Thanks Shana!
Loved my stay here. It’s a very cute and stylish place. Everything was very clean and check in was super easy.  The bed is comfy too. I had a relaxing stay, would  recommend!
We love staying here.
We had a wonderful stay. Very comfortable and has all the amenities you need.
Excellent space, so beautifully redone, the bathroom is amazing, the bed is SO COMFY (I have a lot of back pain but not in this bed!) it’s really perfect. Please book this place.
Great place! Very clean and cozy, lots of amenities and a large space for two.
Lovely place!
Fantastic pet friendly space. 1000/10, will definitely be back!
Everything you could possibly need. Nice shower and a good bed, furnished nicely.

We had a great time, and Shana did an amazing job of fixing up the former "garage" space to make it a wonderful little AirBnB. The location is great — you can walk to downtown Salem in about 15 minutes. We were also super grateful to be able to bring our pets!

Shana’s place was awesome and I got really good rest from long flights from the East Coast. Shana updated me about the power outages in Salem due to the ice storm. She even offered to refund my fee if I decided to stay elsewhere, if the power does not get back on time. The power came back on time but I really appreciated Shana’s honesty and concern for her guest. The space was super clean and has a nice modern look. I highly recommend this place and I do not think there is any other place for this price close to the downtown Salem.
Enjoyed a very discrete and lovely stay!
Shana’s place is beautiful and so cozy! It’s the perfect place to stop for a few nights and feel completely at home.
This Airbnb is just wonderful! It’s a great value, close to downtown and an easy drive to hiking and sightseeing! I would love an opportunity to get back to Salem and stay at The Garage!!!
A lovely cozy comfortable place convenient to the capital and central Salem. Shana is a responsive host.
Perfectly lovely and clean place. Would and likely will stay again!
Clean. Well decorated. Private. Cozy!

Shana’s space was perfect for us! We were in Salem for two nights, and the apartment had everything we needed. There were a few welcome snacks, and several thoughtful touches throughout the apartment. It was very clean and organized, and we had no trouble finding anything. The Garage is in a great spot in Salem, just a short drive from the city center. Shana was easy to get in touch with, and her responses were very quick. I loved it!
Very clean and cute aesthetic. Communicative Host. Nice amenities. Would stay again 10/10
The studio was a really pleasant stay and much nicer than I expected for a converted garage. It was everything we needed for a short stay.

Shana was incredibly quick on her response time. The place was absolutely perfect and basically a mini apartment! It was such a great place to have as a "home base" for our travels. Would DEFINITELY stay again!

This refurbished garage is tastefully decorated and completely furnished.  In this compact layout, every amenity has been thought of.  Decorative touches fit the lodging.  The location is in an older neighborhood, quiet and serene.  It was perfect for our 2-night stay in Salem visiting relatives.  The host responded instantly when we had difficulty with the Wi-Fi.  I really liked the larger tile shower, and the bathroom had plenty of towels.  I would recommend with no hesitation.

Very lovely, comfortable spot in NE Salem! The bed was comfy. The bathroom was pretty and seemed recently remodeled. The place was a good size for the two of us. We really enjoyed our time here - close to the capitol and other amenities, clean, bright, and easy to have as a home base for our time in Salem.
So clean and cozy!
Cute garage conversion. very cozy and clean. we had a great stay!
Very clean and cozy spot! Great communication from the host - would definitely recommend staying here.
Clean home in a nice neighborhood! We used the extra beds for our kids and it was perfect. We would definitely stay again!

Great location being close to downtown Salem with lots of shops and eateries nearby. Small yet highly functional space. Clean and provided all the necessities for a short trip. 10/10 would stay again.
Cute little place a short walk to downtown Salem and conveniently placed for drives to all the wineries in the area. Had a wonderful stay here!

Great place to stay in Salem!
This was our first Airbnb but it won’t be our last.
Thanks Shana!
We will definitely recommend Shana’s place to anyone traveling to Salem. It was cozy and was well equipped.

We definitely recommend staying here! The place had everything we needed and was very comfortable. There was also very convenient parking right next to the door. Shana was friendly and great with communication.

super clean space. love the way it was decorated. the bed was super comfortable and the place was quite. they even had a hulu subscription so we got to watch our favorite shows. definitely staying again!

This place was one of the best I’ve been to (I’ve only been to 5 or so, so my opinion might not mean much). I loved the atmosphere as well. It was nice and private and had many essentials one would need. I would love to stay here again!
