spacious private space! bed was very comfy, shower and bathroom were nicely remodeled. would definitely stay again.
Super close to everything! Nice cute neighborhood. Was very peaceful and quiet we didn’t even hear a car drive by! Super easy access. Has everything you need!
The neighborhood is quiet even though it is walking distance to downtown. There are cute homes in the area and it was nice strolling the streets.
Would highly recommend! :)

Such a sweet place. It was cozy and spacious. For being a small space it felt like you could easily fit up to 6 people in there. It was perfect for us and our pup! Shana was communicative and helpful!
Shana has done a fabulous job converting her garage into a wonderful place to stay. There is AC and snacks waiting for you :) I would definitely stay again. I was very comfortable here.
The Garage is a charming and comfortable home away from home. The neighborhood is quiet and has easy access to downtown Salem. We will definitely stay again on our next visit.
Fantastic space and great host!

This was a fantastic place and I would definitely stay here again.  Bathroom had a big walk in shower, stocked with shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion, and lots of fluffy towels.  Bed was soft and comfy.  Small setup of coffee, sugar, and powdered creamer provided as well as a few snacks.  Also had a small outdoor seating area right outside the front door, ideal for parents to relax in with a baby sleeping inside.
This place is super cute with thoughtful touches. Easy access from car to door. Great central location, and Shana was helpful. Will definitely stay again if we find ourselves in Salem.

Shana’s place was great. All of the pictures were accurate. It was very clean and had everything you needed. The bed was cozy and pillows amazing. :) it was a great place to come back to and relax after a long day in the sun. Convenient and easy access. Communication was quick.

The Garage was perfect for our sweet little getaway to Salem Oregon to visit family. Easy to find, and communication by the host Shana about parking details and access were spot on. The garage converted into an adorable room was decorated very nice and all the amenities and included gave it a special touch. Definitely recommend and can’t wait to visit again!

Shana's Place met all of my expectations and more. Her place is centrally located on a quiet street. Plus she really has gone out of her way to make sure all of the little things are just right. If my travels take me to Salem again I will not hesitate to book with her.

This stay was comfortable and clean. It was bigger than we were expecting and we loved it.  The beds were comfortable and the kitchen had everything we needed. We enjoyed walking around the neighborhood and exploring Salem.  We’d love to stay again in the future.
great place to stay if you're in Salem. Very clean space and has everything you would need. definitely recommend.

This is a gem in the heart of downtown Salem. This is minutes from downtown and about 12 minutes from I-5. Top notch place to stay and worth every penny. Shana is so easy to work with and in and out was a breeze. I’ll be staying here anytime I’m back in Salem.
Great central location, comfy furniture and a great bathroom, everything someone could need is in there, and its a great place to come back to after a day out.
Great value and location. The space was very clean and the communication from Shana was perfect. We would highly recommend this place to anyone traveling to Salem.
Very comfortable open space studio! Had everything I needed for a few days in Salem. Great, convenient location.
Great little studio! Thanks!

Shana’s Garage was an hidden gem !
I didn’t expect the space to be as delightfully put together and at the same time extremely functional.
Everything was easy
The bed is comfortable, the shower and bathroom spacious and a cute couch sitting nook
This has to be one of my top five favorites in my pushing ten years of Airbnb stays.
It was superb.

The “garage” is a super cute place nestled near downtown Salem. It includes a comfy bed, an excellent shower and bathroom, and a cozy living space with all the things you need to unwind or crash as you visit Salem, shoot out to the coast, or visit friends a little further down the way in the area. The place has a lot of cute touches that make it feel a kind of like a home away from home. And we had a great stay, mostly because Shana was so communicative and cool. We definitely recommend this place to anyone headed to Salem or thereabouts!
Great low key place, with all the amenities, little kitchenette was perfect. Walking distance to downtown.
Would definitely recommend this place! Has everything you’d need. Super cozy and comfortable with a lot of amenities. Great little spot in Salem close to downtown.
Wonderful cozy cottage, definitely recommend!

Great place, very unique! Great value.  Loved that it was a private spot to stay in. Shana puts a cute, rustic touch to it and was very accommodating and quick to respond.  100%  recommended and Will be staying again!
We loved this cute little spot! It fit our needs very well for a one night stay.

The details have been put in place for your safe, cozy stay.

Comfy bed, nicely outfitted kitchenette, close location to the heart of town. Shana has manifested a traveler’s respite.
This is such a great space. Super cute, nicely updated and conveniently located. I was doing some research at Willamette University and found it made a great "home base." Highly recommend!

Shana was a great host. The house was exactly as described. It was a unique experience. It is closer to downtown. Shana has a great attention to detail in what guests want. I would recommend staying here.
Great place to stay in Salem with Privacy and near the main city area

Clean, quiet and comfortable.  Host was very helpful.  Good, convenient location; walking distance to downtown restaurants and state capital buildings.  Nice neighborhood; we felt very safe walking at night.  We didn't have a car and this place is a short Uber trip to Amtrak/bus station.

Clean, convenient, pet friendly is a huge plus for us, we take our dog everywhere and pet friendly always moves to the top of the line. The unit is comfortable, and good price. Very good straight forward communication and easy to access. We highly recommend this place and we would stay again!
Great
This was our 3rd time staying at The Garage, we always enjoy it. Great location near Willamette U

Their garage conversion makes the most perfect airbnb! It's decorated so beautifully and the shower is amazing! The host also is very responsive whenever someone has a question, overall a great place to stay.
clean, well stocked. nice little kitchenette, and overall great stay. courteous host. 10/10
Absolutely wonderful stay in a charming, quiet and nicely decorated Airbnb. Definitely recommend to anyone staying in Salem!

We enjoyed our week+ stay at Shana's "Garage" . It's a clean and cozy place. Love the little extras like snacks and coffee. The place truly felt like home. The location is a plus being close to the center of town.
Wonderful space central to Salem. Friendly host, a great place to explore from

The garage is such a great find! Shana is nice and response quick to our questions. My family (with 1 kid) stayed for a night on our road-trip and had a wonderful experience. The place is clean and beautiful just like the pictures, has everything thing we need and we really appreciate the snacks and bottle water in the mini fridge :) There are also some board games if you like. Super recommended and definitely will stay again!
Definitely would stay here again if ever in Salem.
This was an outstanding stay. It's roomy and cozy, in a good neighborhood, parking on drive-way, detached from main house, very quiet neighborhood and about 7 minutes to the freeway.
Stayed at the "Garage" for two nights. Cute place, spacious, and clean. Easy parking and very easy access to downtown Salem.
Great place to stay. Nice and clean, great value!

The garage is a super spacious and cozy place for our little family to stay. My wife, 5 month old and I stayed here while visiting friends and it was exactly what we were looking for. We even had a mishap or two that Shana was super understanding about. Highly recommend to anyone!
Quick stop for us but everything was perfect! Shana has a lovely place and is a great host!
Highly recommend The Garage! Cozy place with everything you could need. Great communication along the way!
Love this cozy spot, great location to downtown and Willamette University. Shaba is a great host & very responsive. We’ll be back!

Amazing little getaway in Salem! The garage was super comfy and clean. It has a cute little kitchen and coffee bar with utensils and everything you would need to have dinner there. Located in a quiet pretty area near the city center. Pleased to have found this place and would love to return again!
Comfortable. Clean. Cozy.
clean, spacious, comfortable, wonderfully designed and cozy great for a weekend or extended stay!

Quiet, comfortable, convenient place to spend a few snowy days in Salem! Good communication, everything was as expected from the photos. Hopefully the Garage will be available the next time I travel to Salem!

Shana was an amazing host with great communication which made our stay wonderful. she was also flexible with our schedule too! the actual room and bathroom were clean and organized with modern touches.
highly recommend!!!
Cute, super comfy, and immaculate. Lovely, attentive host…excellent communicator. Would love to stay there again.
Super sweet little converted spot! Bathroom especially well appointed with lots of clean fresh towels. Very comfortable, and easy access from the highway.
Great place to stay! Would definitely recommend to anyone!

Absolutely amazing stay. Cool garage with everything needed for comfort. Loved the open space. Parking was easy and location was close to everything needed. Had a great dinner at a pub down the street. Loved the open floor plan and would love to return.
Awesome shower, great location.
Great little place! Would definitely stay again.
We had a great stay at Shana's garage Airbnb. It was a perfect place to stay on our road trip. The space has nice amenities.

I had another pleasant stay at Shana's garage conversion. She added a nifty bench/storage basket at the food of the bed. Good job, Shana. My luggage thanks you.

The place remains a comfortable, well thought out, respite while in town. I travel alone and feel safe and able to ground myself when there.

Bring your own coffee if you're a coffee lovin' defender of the brew.
Everything was great. Enough space and privacy.
This place is amazing, so clean, has everything needed, very easy to get to.

Nicely laid out.  Clean, neat and inviting.  Nice neighborhood, quiet and felt safe to walk my dog.   I hope to stay here when every I am in town.   I actually scheduled my next work trip around the availability of the "Garage"
Great place. We had a small issue with the Internet, but I contacted Shana and she fixes it right away.
Great place. Quiet. Close to many places. We really like it at The Garage. Would definitely stay again.
Great place, perfect location!
Great place to stay, has everything you need for a weekend getaway
The Garage is thoughtfully decorated and supplied.  Shana was informative and responsive.  An excellent place to stay!
The Garage is comfortable and welcoming and had everything the 2 of us needed. Our daughter’s family lives close by and we will definitely stay here again
Awesome place to stay!!!
What a beautiful spot in the middle of Salem! It was quite, spacious and clean. I’d highly recommend.
Great little place

I loved the garage! I wish it was free for the rest of my time in Oregon!

Truly a fun experience and I enjoyed myself. I loved the small touchs like the coffee, sugar and creamer laid out. Also the bathroom was a stunning!
What a gem! Clean. Excellent attention to details. Huge bathroom. Quiet neighborhood. Modern furnishings in good taste. 5 stars! We will be back!
We had a lovely stay at Shana’s place while we were in Salem for a night. Everything was clean, nicely decorated, comfortable, and we had everything we needed. Thanks so much!
Considerate and kind hosts and really convenient location.

Adorable and roomy garage conversion. We were able to walk to the river, downtown, the capital and to Willamette University from this location. It's in a residential neighborhood so don't roll out of bed expecting Starbucks next door! Well equipped, roomy bathroom, comfy bed. Had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Easy check in, check out.
This is such a cute place to stay! Lots of nice touches and lovely to be able to bring our dog as well. Would 100% stay there again!
Great location and space!
This AirBnb was absolutely amazing. The host kept in touch with us and responded quickly when we had any questions. Our stay was so great

This was a great place to stay. Easy parking and unloading of gear from the car. Comfortable bed, nice shower. Communication was great and the unit was well stocked with everything we needed for a 2 night stay
Best value in Salem. Very comfortable, clean, quiet. So close to town and anything you need. Hope to stay every visit to Salem.

I was on a road trip with my 13 year old son and 2 year old grand nephew and stayed in Shana's garage apartment for a day on my way to Seattle. It was cozy and comfortable and exactly what we needed in a place which was a mid-point between the location we wanted to get to.  It was well decorated, well-stocked (the coffee and water quality was great), had a really nice bathroom and comfortable bedwear (i.e. blankets, sheets, etc). Overall we loved it. I would highly recommend it.
What a wonderful gem close to everything you need!  Host was wonderful!!@
Very cute & clean place. It also has two chairs set up outside with a small grass area. Great for taking the kids out to explore.
Comfortable, convenient, clean, and a great value! Shana's garage was an oasis for us on a hot weekend. Very accommodating and highly recommended!
Shanas place was great and just what I needed. She was very easy to communicate with too.
Shana is a wonderful host! The Garage is very comfortable and well equipped. The location is great too. We’d like to stay again on our next visit to Salem.

Beautiful space.

Quiet and comfortable.

Perfect for a stay in the area.
Lovely space close to downtown and the Wallace marine park where my husband was playing softball.  Quiet neighborhood.  Would definitely stay there again.
The Garage was perfect and Shana was a wonderful host! Love the location! Studio was comfortable and clean! Will definitely stay here again next time we're in Salem!

This was the perfect place for my stay. Open and roomy feel. I needed a place where I could work remotely and Shana’s Garage had great Wi-Fi. I had no problems connecting online. It was hot outside (in the 80s) -There is an air conditioner but I didn’t really need it as the garage stayed pretty cool on its own-very comfortable!  Little additions such as soft sheets and soft towels made this a very comfortable stay. The place is spacious and the extra large shower is one of the best features!

This garage was a pleasant surprise in every way-much bigger than I expected, more stylish touches, and the bathroom was like a spa retreat! It was a great place to stay in Salem, which was a nice town. We especially enjoyed Riverfront Park and walking the downtown area.
10/10 recommend. It had everything we needed, Shana was communicative, and the place was so clean. It was perfect for our girls trip.
Shana’s place was the perfect spot for a few days in Salem. It was quiet, clean, had everything I needed, and was overall very pleasant.
Very cozy and well done space. Would definitely recommend.
Shana’s place was lovely!! Fully stocked with everything you could need, clean, cozy, and great communication! Would recommend and stay again!!
This place has a put-together look. We had a great stay. We appreciate the host's hospitality.
Cozy, charming studio in the former garage. Close to I-5  (we stayed there while on a road trip). In a quiet, not-fancy but perfectly nice neighborhood. Recommended!
Such a creative space! They had absolutely everything you could need. Two single mattresses on top of each other was great for our daughter who went with us to look at college.
Clean, comfy & cozy converted garage stay in a working-class neighborhood close to downtown. Hosts were communicative & nice. The spacious shower was the highlight of our stay.
Shana’s spot is exactly as it is described. Everything you would need is provided and it is super clean. We wouldn’t hesitate to stay there against and hopefully we’ll get to.
The garage was perfect for our overnight stay. Everything was as described and we enjoyed a sound nights sleep.
Great place and a great host!
Wonderful spot! So creative with many thoughtful touches. Very close to a favorite breakfast spot too-- Word of Mouth. Would recommend :)
Absolutely great stay. Could not want anything else, she thought of it all!
Very nice place to stay. Wonderfully decorated. Hope to see you soon.

Great little garage that feels like it’s always been it’s own “mother in law” unit. Close (20-25 minute walk) to downtown, cool selection of restaurants and water holes and the beautiful capitol building. Would book again!
Perfect spot our weekend in Salem.   Loved staying at The Garage and will try to book again when we are in the area.  Thanks for making our stay so comfy.
Exactly what we were looking for in Salem.
Good
It was the perfect stay, just what I needed. Would book again

I wish I could give six stars, what a gem of a place. Just so comfortable, the host is very responsive, anything you could need is available and clearly explained. It's also very private which was great. I especially liked the outdoor seating which was comfortable. The mattress was so supportive that I wasn't aching from my long flight because of it. My flight landed so late that I didn't arrive until about two AM, but she was able to sort out a solution with me ahead of time. I would take this place over a hotel every time.
Quick in and out the next morning but stay was very nice.

This was honestly probably one of the best airbnbs I stayed at! The place was super clean, warm, came with a lot of amenities such as breakfast items and snacks and extra toiletries, and was very spacious. I highly recommend this Airbnb stay!
Cute and quiet space. Perfect for a quick stop or even staying a while. Nice host and clean atmosphere. Would return!

-FABULOUS-
The space is everything you see and more. So many lovely touches.
A++, and an excellent value.

The Garage is such a cute & comfortable space! It was great having the kitchen space to use for breakfast & coffee in the morning. We enjoyed spending time relaxing & watching TV in the living area. The bed was extremely comfortable. We would love to stay here again!
The owner is very attentive, response, quickly, and the home was lovely

This cozy place was full of little surprised with cute Halloween decorations and treats.!
Full of thoughtful details to ensure that our stay would be comfortable and warm. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend this to any one who would enjoy their complete privacy.
The Garage is a great place to stay!  Shana does a great job of adding little cute touches like Halloween decorations and some snacks. We will definitely be back as our daughter goes to Willamette
Excellent little studio. It was very comfortable, clean, and had everything we needed. Very cozy! Only wish we could've stayed longer!
Great place! We will definitely stay there again when in the area.

We really didn't spend any time here, just came up to Salem for a concert so we were only here to sleep and didn't use any of the features mentioned, but it was a clean comfortable place to rest. The bed was very comfortable, in my opinion!

Loved the trains rolling by all night too, apparently the tracks are just a block away. That was a cool surprise.

Great location! It was a little expensive with all the cleaning fees, etc. Otherwise I'd be happy to stay here again.
Just perfect for 2 people. Clean comfortable and has all the amenities needed plus some personal touches. This is our 2nd stay here and will definitely do it again.

My partner and I stayed here overnight, so not a long trip, but it was just what we needed! Easy to get to and to check in/check out, close to everything we wanted to do, and cozy. Would recommend to anyone looking to stay somewhere close to downtown Salem while still being somewhere quiet and private.
Shana’s AirBnB was perfect for our one night stay!  It was exactly as advertised…very cute!
So cozy and clean.  Great floor plan.  Super comfy bed and very nice bathroom.  We would stay again for sure!
Shana’s place was great! Clean, comfortable and well thought out for every anticipated need.

Cute and comfortable little place that is conveniently located.  This was my first Air BNB experience and I had a lot of questions and even a couple changes.  Shana made it easy!  Thank you so much and next time we are in Salem we hope to stay here again!
Great location, beautiful space. Clean and tidy and cozy. Would love to stay again!
Cozy, private , quiet and clean

It was very comfortable and warm as the weather was quite chilly. Shana was very easy to reach and was clear about everything. The bed was fantastic and I slept well as it was extremely quiet. I would stay again.

Susan Weiss

Absolutely loved the “garage”. Such a comfortable space.

I would recommend if you are prone to cold feet like I am and stay during the winter time, the floor is concrete which naturally is cold. Otherwise the space itself is nice and warm. My little piggies are just ice all the time anyways. Nothing that the place itself did to them. Lol

What a gorgeous spot!
Peaceful, beautifully decorated and such a large space.
Easy check in. Perfect stay
Exactly what I needed for a one night sleep away from home after attending a concert in Salem.
Such a comfortable place to stay! I felt at home as soon as i walked in, and would love to come back, again.
Super cozy and pretty, I’d definitely stay here again!
Great place! Very comfy bed and responsive host

The photos do not do justice, to this place. The “garage” is truly lovely, spacious and well laid-out, and the neighborhood is very quiet. You have your own offstreet parking space, three steps from the private entry into this fully detached garage which has been thoughtfully renovated.  I spent a wonderful week here in January, and stayed toasty warm. Genuinely comfortable bed and pillows. The owner provides shampoo and conditioner, soap, and a bounty of towels.  She is quick to communicate, respectful of privacy, and a nice person.  Great value, great place!

Great stay and just as described. It was clean, private and unique. The bed was very comfortable, kitchen well equipped, shower large and very nice. Overall, extremely comfortable. Host immediately responsive to questions. I recommend Airbnb!
A great find in Salem. Near the university. Clean, quiet and comfortable. Would return!
Shana's place was a great stay! Easy to find, clean, and comfy. Would definitely stay again ☺️

Just what I was looking for, everything I needed, comfy bed, great shower,
good central location. Going to come back in few months.

We loved our stay at the Garage! It was a perfect location for our weekend activities, and we felt right at home. Shana was friendly and communicative. Our 13-year-old daughter slept quite comfortably on the floor mattress, and we did as well on the main bed.  As someone else had mentioned, you may want to bring slippers or cozy socks as the concrete floor not covered with rugs is COLD! The bathroom sink took a little while to get hot water, but the weather was chilly. Ample blankets, towels, and washcloths and nice extras of some snacks, tea and coffee. We wish we could have stayed longer in this cozy little place and plan to book it the next time plans take us to Salem.
Everything I needed. Super nice bathroom, comfy bed, and a great location that made getting around Salem easy. I’d definitely stay again if I’m in Salem!
Great location. Cute place.
Clean, nice location, and great host.
Shana's garage was such a treasure. I would highly recommend staying if you get the chance! It was super cozy, quiet, and comfortable.
Quiet, cute and clean!  Perfect for what I was looking for.
I really enjoyed this space.  It was easy to get to.  Parking was great.   Decorated nicely and clean.  Will absolutely be looking to stay here again.
Very comfortable, spacious and well equipped  garage apartment. Not too far from the downtown activity but not walking distance for us. Very good location if you like vineyard visits.

I really enjoy staying here.  Quite, comfortable, clean.   I truly enjoy this place and will stay for work as often as it's available.  My only regret in sharing how great it is, is that it might not be available when I want it :)
Clean, great location/space. Close to downtown and accessible

We loved our stay at The Little Blue House! Norma is a great host, very kind and thoughtful! The house is super cute with lots of personality...and a very comfortable bed! There is lots of info available on a bookshelf about local attractions, too.
I had a wonderful stay and would love to come back again soon!   Very clean and nice!
Perfectly clean, lovely décor and special touches. Great location to access anything in downtown Salem and quiet!

Thank you for sharing your home with us. It was so close to Willamette University and the capital buildings which made our vacation super easy. The house felt private, quiet & safe in the cul de sac location. It was perfect.
Great host and location!
As advertised. Nicely appointed and comfortable. I'd gladly stay there again.
The little blue house will not disappoint, it is just as described in the post.  It was cozy, homey, and Norma was a great host.
Norma is a wonderful host. The little blue cabin  is an  amazing gem.

Great little house!
Super cute decorations and touches throughout.
Comfortable and cozy.
Easy walk in shower, nice hot water with plenty of pressure.
Norma was so kind
The Little Blue House is a great place to stay! The home is very clean and has many helpful amenities such as pots, plates, glasses,etc. Much recommended!
Norma's space was cozy and comfortable. She greeted me when I arrived and offered local tips and suggestions. Definitely would stay here again the next time I'm in the area.
Norma’s place was great! Super cute house, lots of extra fun funky vintage touches, super clean, And a great location. We’ll be back!

What an outstanding place to stay in Salem. If you have the opportunity to stay with Norma and Pete, I'd highly recommend it. They go above and beyond what most hosts have done in the past (like bring an unprepared desert dweller a pair of gloves) , and with a smile!
Had everything I needed, great place overall.
Cute place festively decorated. Quick responses and helped me with anything I needed.
Great place. Centrally located, comfortable and excellent host!

The Little Blue House is so cozy.  It was spotless.  The bed is extra comfortable.  I don't know what kind of mattress it is, but it's the best I've ever slept on.  The Little Blue House is very cute and just feels right.  I loved relaxing here at the end of a busy day.  The grocery store is a convenient walk away.    The neighborhood is very peaceful.  Everything important in Salem is close to this house.   I will stay here again on future visits to Salem.

We had a great stay here! Place was very cute, clean, and conveniently located. Norma was quick to communicate and very accomodating for our late arrival. Will definitely try to stay here again when we're back in town!
A clean, comfortable, attractively decorated, and perfectly situated little house!

Perfect little cottage in Salem, Oregon.
Norma and Pete's place is newly renovated and was the perfect choice for our visit to Salem, Oregon. It's clean and decorated with lots of interesting Oregon memorabilia. The living room is open and inviting, the bedroom is cozy and comfortable, the kitchen is bright and decorated with colorful and fun touches.
Norma met us at check-in and was lovely.
We were visiting family in Salem, and this cottage was perfect for my husband and I. It is close to the supermarket, downtown Salem is a few minutes by car and its centrally located for any trips to the coast, the mountains, the waterfalls or a day in Portland. We loved this cottage and hated to leave.

We enjoyed our stay at the little blue house.  It was very really clean and quaint.  We loved the location! The internet was very fast considering both my husband and I worked periodically from the house and both of us were on VPNs. Norma and Pete communicated well and were great hosts. We would stay here again for sure.
Not interested in writing a public review.

Very clean and uniquely decorated. Centrally located as well. The bed was very comfortable. Norma was wonderful and stayed communicative. Made my daughter's stay in Salem very comfortable. This place is darling! Definitely would rent it again whenever we have an overflow of people at our house!
Very cute and homey inside.  Doesn’t feel like your close to anyone.  It was cozy and had everything I needed.  I would absolutely come back and stay!!!!!

We had plans to stay at Norma’s to pick up my daughter from the college in May when we had to quickly change the date due to Covid-19. I am so thankful that Norma was able to accommodate the new dates. I am so grateful to have had a safe and clean place to stay while picking up my daughter. Norma was kind, responsive and helpful during this difficult time. The little Blue House had all the comforts of home, an excellent location, and was so comfortable, and since we were sheltering in place, we became very familiar with the Little Blue House! 😊
Thank you Norma for the home away from home and your kindness.

My wife and i stayed here for 8 weeks and absolutely loved it. Very private, surrounded by decorative and flower plants,  feels like living close to the nature yet with all modern amenities, quite and safe place. “Central location” Very convenient and near to grocery stores, restaurants, several attractions and parks. Whether your stay is short or long it is a great place to stay🥇! Enjoy👌

We loved the little blue house! Close to everything (hour from beach hour and 40 from ski resort, right in downtown). Great value and a great stay ! Would definitely stay again and we highly recommend! Norma and Pete are great very responsive and helpful but also very considerate about privacy, you wouldn’t regret booking the little blue house !
Cute, tidy home in a convenient location near downtown Salem. Perfect for a solo traveler or couple. Clean, quiet, and wifi was reliable enough for remote work and video conferencing.
We loved staying in the Little Blue House.  It's so cute and it had everything we needed.  We felt very at home and would definitely recommend Norma's place.
We had a great stay in the Little Blue House.  Hosts were friendly and accommodating! Location is perfect for visiting Willamette U.
Norma's place was wonderful, clean, and had all the necessities. The bed was incredibly soft and comfortable. Would definitely recommend this place.
This place is very homey! I really enjoyed my short stay here! Norma is also a great communicator!
this is a charming home, so sweet and charming.  All the extras and vintage details were so amazingly thought out!
Great place to stay!

Norman’s place is cozy , quiet, and a very comfortable place to come back to after a day out working or sight seeing.
The bed is super comfortable and there is plenty of space for a single or couple to stretch out in.
I didn’t do any cooking but you have all the gear you need if you wish to.
The location is very close to restaurants, shopping, etc. I thoroughly enjoyed “The Little Blue House.”
The little blue house was clean and cute and had a very comfortable bed. I had to make a last-minute change to my trip and Norma was very accommodating. Good location!
Norma's place was great! The location is really convenient, right by breweries and stores, and the place itself was clean and welcoming.
Beautiful cute little place with all the comforts of home.  Nicely decorated and the bed was comfortable.  A nice quiet refuge from our reunion chaos!

This was me and my girlfriends first time staying at an Airbnb and I’m so glad we chose the Little Blue House to start with. The house is clean, very comfortable and is located in a convenient area. Also Norma and Pete are super awesome hosts! Anything you need they are just minutes away! You will not be disappointed!
Amazing space.  Great location.  Easy check in.  Super clean. Excellent communication. Will return.
Thank you for warm and inviting place to stay! Check in was quick and easy. It was a great place for us to unwind for a couple days.
A very cozy, clean, and inviting home conveniently located in the heart of Salem. Would highly recommend.
Expect a quaint, styling little place near all the amenities of Salem. Tucked away off the busy streets. Quiet and cozy.
Such a beautiful stay, really comfy bed, quiet neighborhood, and great living room for netflix binge watching! Very clean and cute house! I wanna come back again!

It was a very cozy place. Everything is just like in the pictures. We had everything we needed and the hosts were very helpful and were great at communicating. It’s in a central area and in a very quiet and private area. We enjoyed our stay and would stay there again if we go back to Salem.
Norma’s place is amazing.
Norma’s place is amazing. And I would highly recommend staying there.
Real sweet spot, things have been thought through and feel the care!
The Little Blue House is a cozy and inviting place to stay! It had everything I needed and more. Defiantly have to keep this place in mind when I'm in Salem again.

This was a couple days we will never forget! We stayed right in time for the ice storm and lost power! We played cards by candlelight and laughed like we’ve never laughed! We made memories we will never forget! Pete and Norma were wonderful and came to check on us, bring flashlights and kept in touch! We definitely plan on staying again. The Little Blue House will forever be ingrained in our hearts!!
Very cute
Staying at The little Blue House felt like a hone away from home. Norma is a great host! We will be staying again. Thank you Norma! Kurt & Julie
It’s an adorable little getaway with everything I needed even down to the body wash. I look forward to returning soon.

The Little Blue House was immaculate and full of thoughtful touches, like brochures and local guides to area sights. It was immaculate and the house handbook was clear. We would definitely stay again!
Great location. Very clean.

This house is great - in a cul-de-sac off of Center Street - close to downtown Salem, the Oregon Capitol, Willamette U. The house is outfitted with every you need - washer/dryer, kitchen with all frig, stove, dishwasher, coffee maker, microwave and all the utensils and dishware.  It's decorated in an Oregon style with lots of fun artifacts from around Salem and Oregon.  New bathroom with roomy walk-in shower and plenty of towels, extra blankets, etc.  Recommend - and I'm going back again on my next visit.

The little blue house was perfect for our stay nice and close to downtown. The unit was fully furnished with everything we needed for great stay. Many little touches made it extra special. Bed was comfy and the kitchen was great to eat in. The area was a nice neighborhood. We would come stay again soon😃
A beautiful quaint home in a cozy neighborhood, felt right at home and the host were very accommodating. Highly, highly recommend!

This was me and my girlfriends second time staying at the Little Blue House and as usual, we had a great stay! I cannot recommend this House enough! Norma and Pete are awesome hosts! It is always a pleasure to stay here.

The Little Blue House exceeded all expectations. I booked it because my mom and sister were visiting from out-of-state for a long weekend. The house was safe, quiet, well-kept, clean, and roomy. It’s a great location for a visit to Salem - near downtown but tucked back on a quiet little street. Highly recommend.

The little blue house, or LBH as we like to call it, is a perfect home away from home, with all the comforts of home. A lovely bathroom, a comfy bed, extra towels and linen, a full kitchen, a welcoming living room, and even a washer and dryer. The location is one of its best features, on a quiet cul-de-sac, but close to downtown. We have stayed here twice, and plan to return on our next trip to Salem.

Thank you Norma & Peter!
This place is a comfy and inviting place to stay.  Quiet and peaceful location, but close too downtown & Willamette univ.  Great value and wonderful host.

Thanks to Norma and Josh for supporting our peaceful, restful and convenient stay. We loved being able to walk to the capitol and the river front area. The Little Blue House was also very convenient to the location of the family event we traveled to Salem for.

A lovely spot where we hope to stay again. Norma and her husband have remodeled and decorated it themselves and it retains a quirky vintage feel and decor. We were so comfortable and didn’t lack for anything thanks to the many thoughtful touches. It was extremely quiet for the location—the only noise we heard was the neighbors’ car, which is surprising given how central it is. Norma was an excellent host, even arranging to let me pick up some items I left accidentally a couple of days later.
Great spot. Quiet cul de sac, cute appointments, comfortable bed, great coffee. Highly recommend

Cozy, cute, and convenient!  The decor is fun, and the home is located near food/grocery options.  We were happy to learn it has air conditioning, which is so important during this hot summer.  Communication with Norma was smooth and quick.  You will love your stay at this sweet little house.

This Airbnb is perfect. Great location, easy access to anywhere in Salem, perfectly decorated.
Our daughter just moved to Salem, and this is definitely going to be our pick of where we stay when we come visit again!
Great place to stay. Communication was great. House was better than described. It was a very comfortable stay.
Wonderful place to stay
The best recommendation I can give is that we’ve stayed here twice. Great location and great house.
Beautiful home, accurate description, communicative host 💜

Value of the Little Blue House is OFF THE CHARTS! Location is wonderful.  Walk to Patty’s Off Center for a great breakfast.  Have killer espresso at Archive on Liberty and take your morning stroll on Minto Island.  THEN sleep very well in the very comfortable queen bed.  Enjoy Salem from the perfect vantage point: The Little Blue House.

Great space - clean, comfortable with everything you'll need for short or long stay.  I love having a washer and dryer, wonderful walk-in shower and a quiet neighborhood just a few blocks from downtown and the Capital as well as a Safeway about 3 blocks away.  This was my second stay and I'll be back next spring.
Great experience!.

Perfect little house filled with personality, comfort and personal touches to make you feel special. Wonderful value for your money and I highly recommend!  I would absolutely stay again in the future.
Perfect little home to stay in! Love the area!

A great place to stay in Salem!  The perfect location for intown business and touring the Willamette valley.  The house is well appointed for a stay and has delightfully quirky historic decorations.  Highly recommended.
Such a wonderful place!! Perfect location for checking out Salem! Will definitely be back!!

The Little Blue House is a sweet, cozy cottage in a perfect location for walking or driving to the best "must see" spots around historic downtown Salem.  The house is super clean, private and quiet with lots of fun personal touches.  We had a great stay!

This was my second stay at the Little Blue House. The House was clean , the bed very comfortable, and the neighborhood very quiet.
The house is close to downtown Salem and is close to parks, hiking trails, restaurants etc. a great place to come back to after a busy day enjoying Salem and the Willamette Valley. I totally enjoyed my stay.
My stay at the Little Blue House was cozy, quiet and super comfortable. Norma and Pete have created an amazing space that feels like home. I would definitely stay again  the next time I’m in Salem.

We have family in Salem and The little Blue House is the perfect place for us to stay. It’s close to the Saturday market, downtown, and a grocery store. Very clean space, comfy bed and all the amenities. The Hosts are nearby and made us feel welcome— the fun sauce is the vintage/retro decor! We’ll definitely be back.
Great place!  We’ll stay there again.

Everything was superb.  Even had fun searching thru the lockers to see what treasures they held.  Bring house slippers if you have sensitive feet or else you will track in alot of leaves if you don't leave your street shoes by the door.  (we stayed during the leaf drop season).  The decor was interesting and cute.  Lots of items for the visitor - we found out about and visited the Vinn Distillery thru the info magazines left for us to look at.  We would have never found out about if we hadn't looked!

The little blue house was a perfect place to explore Salem from. It is tucked away on a private street, but is close to everything. It is very clean and well appointed, and the Oregon themed decor was appreciated. After a long day of house hunting it was nice to come back to the cottage and have a glass of local Pinot noir in the cozy living room.

Everything about my four night experience at The Little Blue House was 5 Stars!  The house was as described, super clean, centrally located yet very private & quiet, and Norma was a quick communicator with a couple questions I had during my stay.   I look forward to my next trip to Salem and my next stay at The Little Blue House!

The Little Blue House was our home away from home. The perfect place to come back to after visiting with our inlaws. Comfy, cozy, quiet and safe. Just what we needed plus you cannot beat the value and its really cute and fun to look at the local inspired decor. We recommend The Little Blue House and hope to return ourselves! The hosts were great & attentive. Thank you Norma & Peter for making our 1st Airbnb experience a great one.
No complaints! The place is as pictured and described!
Cozy place that’s super convenient to downtown Salem. We loved it!

Everything about our stay was perfect! The house was clean and comfortable. The location is close to downtown, the Capitol, the hospital; and with easy access to  I-5. Norma was a wonderful host, making the check-in and out easy; plus, her communication was great. We would definitely stay here again.
Very cozy cottage for our holiday stay. The host also left a small gift for our daughter's birthday, very sweet. Nice location, quiet Cul de sac but close to everything.
Easy check-in, great location, as comfortable stay as we could hope for.
Perfect little house close to so many things in Salem. It’s on a dead end, so super quiet due to no through traffic. Norma was super communicative and responsive. Great little home away from home!

This home was absolutely amazing.
The memory’s and the nostalgia of the home was amazing 25/8
I will be returning soon thank you so much !

I loved the location. We were there visiting Willamette University. I loved that we could walk to the university, downtown, cafes, and shops easily. The bed was super comfortable and there were plenty of blankets to stay cozy in the winter. Norma and Pete were very responsive and helpful.
Cute little place that is totally stand alone centrally located. very walkable and close to some good restaurants. highly recommend

The pre-check in communication was timely and made getting access easy as the directions were clear. The host followed up to make sure we were in and settle and asked if we had any questions, a great touch. The home was easy to locate and being a small Court, gave us a sense of privacy. My wife is a light sleeper so we notice how quiet or loud a place is and the home as very quiet to relax and sleep.

The home is in a great location with grocery and health food shopping within 10 minutes and easy to navigate.
Everything in the home worked perfectly. The photos and description are consistent with what we experienced during our stay. We had one question about the entertainment system and the host answered quickly and resolved it without an issue. The weekend was great thanks to being in a such a nice home and interacting with great hosts.

We are going to be back in Salem later this year and hope to be able to stay if the place is available.
excellent location, excellent size, excellent amenities, excellent host, excellent airbnb.
Great place to stay!
Cute house with everything you will need during your visit. I enjoyed this air bnb very much. Will stay again since my family is close by! Thank you Norma & Pete!!!

Accurate listing
Clean
Close to downtown
💯

The little blue house is great for a more extended stay - washer/dryer, well equipped kitchen with a small fridge, full size stove, microwave, coffee maker, etc.  I think it's great for a single or couple.

Cute, well stocked, clean and nice location.
Thanks
Cozy house centrally located for exploring Salem.  Short walking distance to Willamette University, parks, restaurants, bookstores, and more!
This house is even cuter than the pictures!  Charming, fun details, cool points for the lockers :) and wow!  Flowers in the yard were blooming when we drove up!!  Fabulous place to stay in Salem!

I've stayed twice at The Little Blue House.  Both times, my experiences were outstanding.   Super clean, great ambiance & amenities, and a perfect centalized location in Salem.  As a professional that travels quite a bit, at the end of a day it's so nice to "Come Home" rather than go back to a hotel.  Thank you Norma & Pete!

I love the little blue house!  It's so cozy and comfortable.  Best of all is the pleasant neighborhood and convenient location.  We walked everywhere - downtown, restaurants, museums.  And Norma is a great host.  Perfect!
Worth every penny.

went for a conference at Willamette Uni. Wonderful stay! I recommend - wonderful responsive host. The house is super comfy, clean, convenient, quiet and the interior design is fun and tasteful. So glad the washer and dryer really work after a soaking rain!

Easy walk to Safeway, Starbucks, and a couple of great restaurants.
Cozy with lots of personal touches. Everything practical you'll need is here and the setting is quite pretty.
Great place for two. It was centrally located for everything we were doing.
Everything was as expected.  It was a cozy unit that was comfortably furnished.  We’d definitely book it again!

We had a lovely time at the Little Blue House. The house has some great character and history! It was very well maintained. Norma and her husband were very responsive. The place was perfect for our needs - just the right size and in a very convenient location to town.
Lovely place, convenient for me. Eclectic decor, nice little backyard area for morning coffee/evening relaxation. Very comfortable beds!
Great little house in a convenient location!
We loved the little blue house! very comfortable and stocked with everything you need. convenient location for salem and a number of trips. great host!
This place was great . Clean ,quiet,well located. 10 minutes from countless wineries . 1 hour to the beach , and a Safeway within walking distance.  Welcoming hosts and easy check in , check out
Very clean and comfy on a little hidden away street! Great A/C also!
Beautiful home exactly as described & pictured. It had everything we needed. Hosts were very communicative. It was very nice that it was also in a central location. We would definitely stay again!

The little blue house was perfect. The location was great, close to downtown and anywhere else you may need to go. It was easy to find, clean and very welcoming. It had everything you would need to have a comfortable stay. I will definitely look to stay here again when I return to Salem.
Comfortable, clean place, and helpful host.  Definitely will repeat.

The little blue house was perfect for us two. We had such a pleasant stay. It was centrally located which was perfect to accommodate our trip. The home was very comfy and cute. It felt just like our own home. Many memories were made here and we will definitely book again in the future :)
Awesome location! We loved walking downtown for dinner. The Airbnb was clean and very comfortable!
A delightful property with delightful hosts! The location is perfect for a parent visiting their child at Willamette. I look forward to staying with them again in the future.

We love this place. Our daughter lives in Salem, and this is where we stay when we visit her.
The Little Blue House is conveniently located, well stocked, has plenty of space, and the hosts are quick to respond if needed.
We’ve been longtime AirBnB users, and this is one of our favorites.

The Little Blue House is centrally located in Salem. The neighborhood is very quiet and close to everything.
The house is quaint, with a funky, hip vibe and very clean.
The Little Blue House will be our go to spot every time we’re in Salem.
Thank you.
Our stay at the Little Blue House was comfortable and relaxing. A great place to stay while visiting my child at Willamette.

Enjoyed our second trip to the Little Blue House - house was warm and cozy  during a very wet weekend.  Communication with host was easy with very prompt response, house was clean and the location was great!  Hope to return again!
We had a great stay! The location is central and on a quiet street. The house had charm and lovely touches. I recommend staying here!
Great location and the place was as advertised!
Norma was a great communicator and the stay exceeded my expectations. The home is cozy and welcoming and had everything I could have needed. Will definitely return.

The little blue house was such a beautiful and cozy get away. As soon as we walked in it immediately felt like home and it was so easy to settle in. The entry instructions were clear and easy as well! Everything was exactly as it was described in the listing. It’s pretty central to so many amenities in the area. Coffee shops, restaurants, grocery stores and ects.  It also so easy to get on and off freeways with them being just blocks away from the house. We were fortunate to call Norma and Pete’s little blue house our home for a few days. It truly helped solidify our decision to move our family to Oregon in the near future. Thank you Norma & Pete for opening your home to us. Our Anniversary trip to Oregon was AMAZING and we are so thankful that in some way you were apart of it.

The stay at the Little Blue House was exactly what I needed.  Easy, limited but attentive communication, nice comfortable little place, sufficiently equipped.  Really nice atmosphere in the house. Would stay there again!

I liked this place.  The bed was super comfy, but the biggest thing were the decorations AND the washer and dryer.  Not having to use a laundromat is always appreciated and it was here.  Easy to park, unload, hang out, etc.  It was nice and I recommend the stay.
This is a cozy little getaway in the middle of Salem. I really felt at home and would come back for sure.
the little blue house was the perfect place to rest our heads after exploring the Willamette valley!
We enjoyed our stay at this cute house. The location was perfect for our needs: a quiet area convenient to downtown.
Hosts were friendly, responsive and flexible. Place was clean, comfortable and welcoming. Will look to stay again.

I have now visited the little blue house more than once and it is becoming my preferred accommodation when in Salem! The house is lovely and in a central part of the city. I love the Oregon decor and it is very comfortable. Great stay!
Highly recommend! Very cozy place. Well worth the price, which matters a lot to me.
The little blue house met all of our expectations. It was cute, comfortable and clean. Great location! Norma was very clear in all communication. Would definitely stay again!

What a wonderful place! It’s a bit off the main road so it’s nice and secluded. It has a great look and you can tell she put a lot of touches to make it special.
The bed was comfortable and the kitchen and bathroom and laundry area were great to have.
We would absolutely stay here again, so I don’t want any of you booking it, OK?
Loved staying here! My daughter now has a new criteria for her first living space if she decided to go to Willamette University... absolutely fell in love with the house's charm!
Great location with a very beautiful garden. The place is clean and quiet. The host is a very nice and kind person. Strongly recommend!
Beautiful place

Evelyn is a great hostess. She is kind and respectful to her guests. She responds quickly to needs you may have as a gust and will give you space and privacy for you to feel comfortable at her house.
I stayed the month of August in her house and felt cold in the basement room where I stayed, but she provided an electric heater for me. Evelyn is accesible and caring. You will enjoy staying at her place.

Evelyn is an excellent host. The room almost feels like a separate apartment with a separate sitting room, makeshift kitchen and dining area, and huge bedroom with 2 chairs and table. Also, a nice patio in her great garden backyard. It’s cleaned once a week and very comfortable. Plus, Evelyn brings in fresh flowers from her garden often.
Evelyn and her AirBnb space is great, always everything I could ask for. Feels like my own place.
This is the end of my 3-month stay with Evelyn and everything has been perfect throughout my stay. Evelyn is very friendly, thoughtful, and helpful.  Definitely would stay here again!
Perfect location, perfect host. Great space with easy assess. Just great all around! I’ll be staying again actually.
Thanks too the amazing host for the space and amazing hospitality but I’ll be staying again as my work contract extends into the future.
Stay few different times over past month absolutely wonderful host, perfect work space and sleep space! I appreciated it all! Will stay again down the line. Thanks again!

I’ve stayed at many AIRBNB‘s around the world but never found one as comfortable and accommodating as Evelyn‘s place. It’s almost like having your own apartment. The bed was comfortable, there’s a sitting area,  almost separate kitchen area, and she thought of all the special touches like fresh flowers every few days, warm fresh baked cookies, and pleasant conversations.
Place was great, and the host's are very welcoming and respecting of space. I would recommend this place to anyone.
Expect quiet and tranquility and cleanliness when you stay at Evelyn’s she is lovely and her place is immaculate~

Evelyn's place was great value for staying in South Salem! It is relatively close to downtown and to some of the amenities on Commercial street. The room itself was very comfortable, and the kitchenette area had everything I needed for the weekend.

Evelyn was very welcoming even though I arrived a bit later than expected. I have never seen such a clean room (very clean towels also) and felt very safe about covid. The bed sheets are so comfortable and soft ! I definitely recommend, thank you!
Evelyn is a wonderful host, and the room was perfect. I enjoyed the quiet space and the backyard garden. I highly recommend this Airbnb.
GREAT PLACE !
Great place to stay! Near downtown, clean, and Evelyn is awesome!!
The room was very comfortable and private.
Evelyn provided a warm and accommodating welcome. Space was wonderful and had all the attributes and features to make it comfortable for an extended stay. Couldn't be better.

I was working a six-month contract and I stayed with Evelyn for the entire time. I had never stayed at an Airbnb for longer than a few days at a time, so I didn't know what to expect. Evelyn, however, could not have been a more perfect host! She keeps her house extremely clean, the accommodations were exactly what I needed, Evelyn was very helpful and accommodating for my work needs since I had to work remotely the entire time, and the location of the house is perfect to access places to eat, groceries, and my gym. Evelyn takes great pride (and rightly so!) in her backyard, which is absolutely beautiful. I never took advantage of sitting outside on the patio and I regret it. I could not recommend staying with Evelyn highly enough.

Great AirBNB! Lots of space, privacy, and very well stocked. Evelyn is very kind, pleasant to talk with, and keeps a beautiful garden. She and Aram were quick to help with anything needed. The bed is super comfortable too. Thanks!
This is such a gem! Great location, lovely room, and Evelyn is an amazing host!
There is a beautiful back yard and a wonderful outside seating area.
Evelyn's place is amazing! The whole place was extremely clean, and Evelyn was great at communicating every step of the way. I would stay there again for sure.
Great spot spot to stay.  Everything was super clean.

Evelyn was very warm and welcoming. She was available if I had any questions. I was extremely comfortable in her homey room. Spotlessly clean with beautiful sunken gardens outside the window. I stayed at her place when I was visiting my son who lived nearby.

One of the best AirBNB's to stay to. Ms. Evelyn was so generous to share some of her food and fruits. She also allowed me to keep my luggages until my other apartment was ready. It is a great location too since it is close to downtown!

Ms Evelyn is a perfect host! Thank you for your accommodation!
I appreciate the location because it is just 4 min drive from Salem Hospital. I work nights and the place was suitable for me as it is quiet. The house also offers clean, clear, distilled water👌🏼👍

I was fortunate to have stayed at Evelyn’s for several months while on work contracts at the local hospital. I was there for the transition into spring, so got to see all of her beautiful flowers bloom. Her yard should be showcased in Better Homes and Gardens if it hasn’t been already. Very convenient location, close to the hospital, and on sunny days, I enjoyed walking to work through Bush Pasture Park, which is also full of lovely blooms. Home is right down the street from Daynight Donuts, which has tons of donut varieties, and Umpqua ice cream, as well. Lots of restaurants nearby on S. Commercial St., too. The basement level of the home is shared with another long-term guest. He usually arrives later in the evening, but isn’t there every night. Evelyn recently had a new washer, dryer, and sink installed for the basement level. Everything you need for your stay can be accessed in the basement: large fridge, hot plate, small toaster oven, Keurig, ample shelving for non-perishables, etc.. The room itself is large as described, again with ample drawers and space to store things. The TV in the room has lots of Dish channels. Comfortable bed and blankets. Good A/C. Convenient off-street parking right up the driveway. No safety issues, and there are cameras on the property. Good neighborhood for walking, and the high school track is right across the street. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here; definitely book if you have the opportunity to stay, too.
Great place at a reasonable price. Host has thought of everything for your stay.
Quiet private quiet room in older super clean home! Perfect spot for a low key stay!
Evelyn is the best of hosts with a lovely home and garden.  She has thought of everything to make your stay comfortable and relaxing.

Parfait pour un séjourà Salem. Evelyn est une personne très accueillante, disponible et aux petits soins , tout en respectant l'intimité de ses hôtes. L'espace de vie et la chambre sont formidables. Emplacement très bien situé: beaucoup de choses sont accessibles à pieds (hôpital, commerces, Bush Park, centre ville).

Had such a wonderful stay. The room was cosy, clean and comfortable. All amenities are available for a comfortable stay for as long as you need. The back gardens were so pretty and peaceful and I thoroughly enjoyed sitting outside getting some afternoon sun. I will definitely rebook next time I am staying in Salem.
Clean and comfy place, I had a good experience.

Evelyn was such a great host! I travel for work so I’ve stayed at many airbnbs and hers had been one of my favorites! The room was very spacious and the garden was beautiful! I was working night shift and had to check out right before my last night shift and she let me do a much later check out. I’m bummed I found her listing at the end of my contract or else I’d be trying to stay there everytime! Thanks again Evelyn!
Comfortable , clean and convenient for a great price.  Loved having a kitchenette.
Evelyn is terrific.  Comfortable  and easy to find.
Great stay, super clean, made traveling easy.
Very quiet and clean.  The latch on the door wasn’t working and the host was quick to respond.
Perfect location for a traveler working at the local hospital. Evelyn was a lovely and friendly host!
Great location, very close to downtown Salem. Hosts keep it very clean, and it’s easy to access. Will be recommending to people to stay here when them come into town.
Krista's place is nice and very clean. She is very responsive and great at communicating. Would highly recommend to stay with her!
Absolute flawless check in and communication. The walkway was lit with cute cafe lights and the apartment is very spacies and comfortable with new finishings:)
What a great little spot! It was perfect for my quick overnight. Krista and her husband are awesome hosts. Clean apartment with everything I needed during my stay. I’d highly recommend this place!
Very clean. Great place to stay in Salem wether you need a place for a few nights or just passing through like we were.

The hosts have an eye for hospitality... so many thoughtful touches and attention to décor.  The space was clean and very comfortable!  Check in and check out was super easy, and the room was private and quiet.  Would definitely put as a top choice for my place to stay in Salem!

The cleanest Airbnb we’ve stayed at! Very comfy bed and thoughtful touches throughout. The hosts were very quick with communication and provided everything we needed for a fantastic stay. Would highly recommend!
Really enjoyed our stay
Great spot near downtown.  Walkable area with many amenities, near the river as well!  Excellent hosts!
Krista’s place is charming and a great value. She and her family are kind and friendly. The bed was comfy and the bathroom  with full tub was excellent. Loved the stocked little kitchenette as well.

Highly recommend! My fiancé and I had a great experience in this place. It was clean and well-stocked with extra items you may have forgotten. Krista's recommendations of resturants was very helpful and spot on! You will not be disappointed in your stay here.
Cozy, clean, comfortable and conscientious.  Nice touches to make our stay pleasurable.  Not huge, but just the right size for two people.

We got a last minute change in our travel plan that one additional person had to be added. Krista allowed us to stay with the third person without changing more. Too bad that we could stay only for one day. The neighborhood is nice and quiet and the charge is quite reasonable.
A delightful little room with a private bathroom and kitchenette.  The neighborhood is friendly, cute, and walkable.  We will definitely be back.

This cottage is very cute, clean, and comfortable. Krista was very helpful. The location to downtown Salem is very convenient, and the neighborhood is very quiet. Also…the neighbors are very nice. The shower head is awesome, as is the deep tub! Very cute and comfortable!
Super cute place. Very clean and updated space. We appreciated the attention to detail!
Cute comfortable unit. Slept great on the bed, no issues.

Very cute room with a private entrance! I got there a little later than I had hoped on check-in day, but getting into the room was easy and I was able to get settled pretty fast. The neighborhood seemed quiet and safe so I didn’t feel nervous about parking my car on the street either. Overall, it was a really nice overnight stay.

Krista’s space was so comfy!

Traveling alone this trip, I was looking for places that felt safe while still close to everything I wanted and this was perfect!

Close to everything I could need, but still in a family - friendly + quite neighborhood!

Space was gorgeously decorated, had everything I needed, and had an incredibly comfy bed! The parking situation was easy too!
Great location and wonderful space!

Such a cute space with all the information about check-in, check-out, and the neighborhood readily available. Thoughtful touches of coffee and tea in the kitchenette and a fantastic reading selection available. I was traveling solo with my baby for the first time and Krista and Lance assisted my bumbling through the door holding too many things. It was really special to feel so safe and the place is walking distance to good spots in town.
Wonderful place to stay.   Clean, comfortable and great location to walk to downtown.

This was a great place to stay, cozy and have all the essentials needed.
Krista’s hosting and communication is amazing.
A seriously adorable little bungalow. We loved our stay. The bed was super comfortable also.
I would recommend the Airbnb to anyone Krista is so sweet.
Perfect place in walking distance from downtown. Communication is prompt.
Clean and lovely place. Will definitely try to stay here in the future.
easy walking distance from places

This was the perfect little cozy spot for us to stay while visiting for a friend’s wedding. Krista did such a wonderful job making the space warm, welcoming and beautiful. She even set out a crib for our baby! The location is perfect, right in downtown next to amenities. We hope to visit again soon!

Krista’s place was perfect for us! It was cute, comfortable and super cozy! The communication was excellent as well and I would recommend this place to anyone. We also enjoyed one of the restaurant recommendations, so thanks again! :)
Cozy , clean, and comfortable!! Quiet neighborhood, easy parking and walking distance to downtown.
The space was super clean and the bed was very comfortable! Beautifully decorated and great amenities including the tub and shower!
Comfy stay, loved the bathtub, off street entrance at the back of the home (made our stay feel very safe) Family friendly neighborhood! Very clean.

The place is amazing. It is clean, comfortable, and very well decorated. It is equipped with everything you need for your stay, including a toaster, expresso machine, and coffee machine, microwave, fridge, heather (on the top of the forced air heating is the house). The bed is so comfortable, and everything is so clean that the whole apartment smells amazing. The place has been renewed and looks very fresh. Plus, it is close to grocery stores, restaurants, and to some touristic places in the city (you can go walking). The neighborhood is very friendly and perfect for a walk. The owners are extremely friendly and accommodated everything I needed. I really enjoyed my stay.

We had a short but sweet stay at Krista’s place on our way home from California and only wish we could have stayed longer to further enjoy the space! The bed was incredibly comfortable and a great reprieve after a long drive. The place is cute, cozy and clean, and had everything we needed and also some things we didn’t know we needed - the white noise machine was a nice surprise and got us to sleep so quickly! It was a wonderful visit and we would definitely stay there again when in Salem.

I absolutely loved my stay here! 🤩 The space is super charming and cozy. It’s very well kept clean with plenty of amenities. Krista quickly responded to any needs I had and was accommodating. Highly recommend to anyone looking in the area!
Very nice space. Though you can hear the footsteps up above the quiet hours are adhered to and you can't beat the location if you are touring in the Salem area. I would recommend this place.
The perfect place to stay while visiting Salem.  Very clean and comfy.
My time at Krista’s was lovely! They had everything I could need and more for a short stay.
Restful retreat. Super clean and stylish. Extremely restful sleep. Also the bathroom was posh and the shower was superior.

My partner and I stayed 4 nights. The place suited our needs perfectly- it was quiet, private, nicely located, and well-appointed. Krista responded quickly to all messages and otherwise gave us our space.  I would definitely stay here again, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a restful stay in lovely Salem.

Lovely stay and an award winningly comfortable bed!
Nice touches everywhere
Ill be back.
Thanks again

This place is just as advertised. Perfect location for my visit, very clean, comfortable and a friendly, walkable neighborhood.  Interesting decor, quality linens, comfy bed and chair.  I would stay again.
Such a lovely place on a lovely block in a wonderful location.

This is a most delightful and charming studio, in a quiet and picturesque neighborhood with close proximity to the downtown area. The mattress and bedding is superb and a white noise machine is available, creating excellent sleeping conditions.
very clean and spacious!

Wow! My husband and I stumbled on this place needing just a quick one night stay and I’m so happy we did! The AirBnb was immaculate, spacious and stylish. Our stay was short and quick, but I wish I could have stayed 5 more days! The host, Krista, was great at communicating and very accommodating. Highly recommend!

Newly renovated studio with extremely comfortable bed. Loved all the finishing touches. Only drawback was that we could hear people walking (and small children running) on the floor above us. Being a basement unit it is understandable and did not go on to late into the evening.  All in all beautiful place.
Bright, clean and cheerfully happy space with everything you might need. Krista is a welcoming and friendly host.
Perfect location in a quaint neighborhood. Close to everything. Apartment is spotless. We loved our stay.
The apartment, location, and hosts were incredible! Thank you, Krista and family!
I loved staying here!
Wonderful location and excellent stay! Very clean and perfect for two!
Perfect stay for my fiancé and I.  We came in for a 2 day truck show.  Close to downtown and plenty of great food! 10/10 would stay again
Cute clean and very comfortable

This place was everything I wanted. Conveniently located, clean and perfect for one person.
The host was flexible and friendly.
I would stay here again!

Everything was really clean and comfortable and the location was very convenient. Hosts were really nice and accommodating of my requests. I would definitely recommend for travel through the Salem Capitol area!
The place was so clean, cozy and comfortable! Krista was helpful and very kind! I would totally stay here again!
Clean, cozy, and comfy. Love the decor. Nice neighborhood, nice stay.

Krista was a fantastic host.  She exceeded my expectations.  She communicated extremely well and her unit was fully stocked, even with new toothbrushes!  This has been one of the best rental I’ve encountered.
Very comfortable place with everything i needed and prompt, clear responses to questions. Made my stay straightforward and simple.

Krista’s studio is wonderful! It’s a nice amount of space, and tastefully furnished. We loved the small details - a fresh clipping in the bathroom, wooden accents, art. The bed is very comfortable with plenty of pillows. The kitchenette is efficient with a microwave and mini fridge/freezer. The bathroom has a nice deep tub. Hope to return soon!
Krista’s place is amazing for 1-2 people looking for a walkable spot that is in a neighborhood, yet close to downtown. The space was clean and had great amenities, and an amazing shower/bathtub!
Helen defines Super Host. She took wonderful care of my daughter during her stay. It was more like my daughter was staying with a family member!
Very clean, lovely home .
Very convenient, modern home! Helen is very gracious & we felt at home, and enjoyed our stay!
Great home and Helen is a great host and was very responsive and made sure you are well taken care of.
Nice room, clean house, washer and dryer, very accommodating, and a positive attitude. 10/10
Clean, open space. Good area with easy access to the city. Very kind people.

Helen is a great and accommodating hostess and her home is very comfortable and attractive.  Great views of Mt. Hood off the deck.  Excellent West Salem location that is close to shopping and restaurants. The bed I used is super comfortable and the kitchen and laundry appliances are newer and easy to use.  Helen is real and speaks her mind with no bs!  She has a big heart and cares a great deal about her guests feeling safe and comfortable in her beautiful home.  I would not hesitate to stay there again!

Helen was an incredible host - very kind and gracious. She was very accommodating and made me feel at home. It felt like staying at a good friend’s place. On several occasions, she even cooked me dinner (which tasted fabulous btw). Her place was comfortable, clean, and a great location in Salem. I would highly recommend her to any Airbnb guests. Thanks Helen! :)
Overall a decent place to stay. Wouldn’t recommend a long stay.

I have enjoyed my stay here so much. Helen has been an amazing host. Her home is so comfortable and inviting. She is such a treat to be around and she really makes sure you are taken care of. You won’t be disappointed if you book here.

Absolutely what a gem Helen is. The room is perfect for anyone staying short term to long term. I felt very safe in her neighborhood. She has the cutest kitty named Lily, belly rubs for days. I would stay here again.

Well priced for the area. Helen is nice, clean, and respectable. The room and house give off a comfy home vibe.
Street parking. Located in a nice quiet neighborhood. Laundry in house. Easy straight shot to the grocery store and easy access to down town Salem. Highly recommend especially for solo travelers.
Helen was amazing
Great place

This is a great location for Ironman Oregon 70.3! Very good location on the other side of River Front Park. You can actually park in Wallace park and walk across the bridge to get to River Front Park. You can also have easy access to swim in the river. Gas, Coffee, Roth's grocery store are all within minutes of her place. She also let us put the bikes in the garage. She was a great host!
Great place to stay
A nice bedroom upstairs in her home, shared bath when another person has booked the 2nd bedroom.
Nos encanto todo!
Very welcoming, very friendly… she made me feel very comfortable and gave me my privacy just as I needed it. I would definitely rebook when I go to salem again

I stayed with Helen for a month while apartment hunting in Salem. Helen is the most hospitable and friendly host. I felt very welcomed, and so did my dog. The room was very cozy and clean, the neighborhood is very safe and quiet. Helen made my stay feel like home and I genuinely appreciated it since I am new to the area. Thank you Helen for giving me a warm welcome to Salem!

Travel nurse here. This place is 4 minutes from Salem hospital. I could leave at 6:40 and still stroll in on time before huddle started. Helen is accommodating and fun to talk to. Grocery shopping and restaurants are a mile or so down the road. I had a great time meeting the other guests as well. It was a great place to stay. Highly recommended.

I’m a night shift travel nurse and very much enjoyed my stay at Helen’s. She is very easy to communicate with, clean and quiet environment and Salem hospital is a short 10 minute drive away. Highly recommend!

Helen is an AMAZING host. She keeps the house super clean and is great with communication. The check-in is very straight forward and the house rules are all clearly written out. Helen is so accommodating and kind, I couldn’t have asked for a better host. Also, Lilly is the sweetest kitty :)

I enjoyed my stay at Helen’s place. Comfortable, quiet and clean area. Helen is kind and accommodating. Communication is great as well. The price, no one can beat, definitely great price. Loved it. Will come back sometime in near future.
Thank you Helen!

I had a great month-long stay at Helen’s. She was welcoming and friendly, and her place had everything I needed as a student (peaceful, spacious, clean, wifi, etc). I definitely would recommend staying at her place.
Helen was very nice and I enjoyed. Would rent again
Darlene and Earl treated me like family! Very appreciative for their thoughtful touches to my stay. Thanks for the warm welcome to Salem!

This was our first Airbnb experience and it went really well . Darlene n Earl are very friendly and warm hosts. They made us feel at home. The room is as pretty as shown in the picture and the house  is beautifully decorated . Will definitely stay here if we come to Salem again.

I had an amazing stay and felt very welcomed and very at home. Their house is beautiful and they are always willing to sit down and eat with you and share coffee or just chat. Would highly recommend!!

It was such a treat to stay in Darlene and Earl's home. They really are super hosts! Their careful thoughtfulness comes through in every way, from the water provided in the room to the exclusive use of a private bathroom. And the morning granola is TO-DIE for! They took great effort in making us feel at home and providing for our needs. We are so grateful to have had the opportunity to meet this welcoming and gracious couple.

Darlene has the touch for making you feel so welcome. The room is adorable, the bed very comfortable, the private bath has two sinks and a shower/bath. She serves her special homemade granola, which is to die for, and her husband makes the best coffee. It’s more like a bed and breakfast. Good value! I highly recommend this listing!

Thank you for a delightful stay!
We were so tired after a long hot summer day and concert at the Oregon State fair.
We came back to your welcoming air conditioned home , cozy bedroom with sparkling clean private bath, even homemade cookies!
After a restful night, my husband Don and I enjoyed our lively visit and yummy breakfast with you and Earl. Earl you make a mean cup of Joe and Darlene your crunchy granola was mixed just right.
Thank you for making our weekend getaway special..easy to see why your super host!
Your Airbnb is our choice in Salem Oregon!
Don and Jane Middleton
This has been the best place I have stayed with Airbnb. Darlene and Earl are awesome hosts. The granola in the morning was the best I’ve had. I would definitely stay there again.
