Darlene is so well worth your money. Her place is quiet and clean. She had a sweet little welcome note for us. She made us feel very comfortable and at home in her house. I highly recommend her home if you are visiting Salem.
Great hosts, very friendly and welcoming! Clean and comfortable home.
Quiet and comfortable
Clean, quiet, great location

Comfortable, clean, quiet, space was lovely and had a private bath that was the same. Hosts were kind and thoughtful, Earl even carrying in my suitcase. Quiet, safe neighborhood with great food options close by. I enjoyed my stay with Darlene and Earl very much and highly recommend if you're a quiet/private person who wants a nice comfortable stay in Salem.
Very comfortable, clean place. Hosts are quite friendly, but respected our privacy. Expect to be back.
Darlene and her husband are kind and engaging. We had a delightful stay in their home.

Wonderful house and exceptional hospitality. Very comfortable bed and Earl's fresh-brewed coffee was delicious!  No complaints at all.  Great value, too.  I highly recommend Darlene's and Earl's place for a relaxing home away from home.
Our preferred place to stay when visiting Salem. Highly recommended
Truly wonderful hosts and a sparkling clean and beautiful home in a great part of the city. Definitely two thumbs up! Thanks again.
Very nice room, quiet area, no traffic really.

Comfortable and spacious home, super comfortable bed, lovely neighborhood for walking, and kind and talented hosts. Earl makes delicious coffee and Darlene is a gifted baker--wonderful cinnamon rolls! Best of Salem hospitality and a good value. Highly recommend.
Second stay in this lovely home with super-comfy bed. Darlene and Earl are A-1 hosts and make delish cup of morning coffee. Highly recommend.

Earl and Darlene were such hospitable hosts! Not to mention the delicious breakfast they served 😋 They were so pleasant to speak to and made us feel so much at home. They basically treated us like family ♥️ Highly recommend!!!

Fantastic Airbnb. Perfectly clean bed and bath. Quiet, peaceful, well-appointed and tastefully decorated with many thoughtful touches. Great private space with private entry.  Loved it! I only stayed one night during a business trip, but I would be happy to stay again anytime.

I am so grateful that I got to stay here. It was peaceful + cozy and I loved how beautiful it was decorated + the bathroom was amazing! So clean & spacious! Jada was wonderful because I loved how she communicated with me! Very friendly + helpful! I would for sure recommend this place to everyone! Such a wonderful stay!! Helped me relax so much!! I am thankful!!
Quiet neighborhood with an easy private entrance.  I arrived late in the evening but had no problem finding it in the dark and rainy night. Very comfortable room with well stocked extras.
The perfect “cozy” place. Thank you for your hospitality!

The environment offered by this host is one that will make you feel at home! The hospitality shown is something you would find at a diamond star hotel and the room is extremely clean and very inviting. If you have the option to book this place and support a small business owner over a large corporation please do so! It is an experience you won’t forget not to mention very fast response times and the host is very accommodating.

If I had to put it on a scale of 1/10 it would be 100
A quiet and peaceful place to land indeed! Cute space and thoughtful amenities. Just what I needed. Would stay again!

The apartment is well equipped with everything you need and more. Wi-Fi worked great and tv was great. It was nice to have an off street parking spot. Half of the pillows in the bed are hard and half are soft. We preferred the soft ones. The hard ones were too hard. The bed was very comfortable. The room was very clean except for one cob web that was hanging from the ceiling. It was not a big deal to us though. I did not like that they had a Bible in the room. Hosts need to be aware that not everyone has their religion, this should be left out of the room.

Jada's bnb is perfect for 1-2 people. I stayed here while in Salem for work, and it was perfect to be able to access local amenities. Jada was very friendly and quick to respond to any message I sent. The private suite was comfortable, clean, and inviting. The designated parking spot is a bonus as well. I would definitely stay here again!
Great place!
The perfect cozy place for 2 people. We’re really pleased with our stay. Highly recommend!!

Cozy yet spacious suite. Cleverly tucked into the second floor of a small bungalow. It felt like its own space. Fine linens, plush towels, gourmet snacks and teas. Host was very responsive and graciously accommodated our last minute travel needs. Would highly recommend. Thank you Jada!
We stayed here for my birthday because my partner was training locally and we needed somewhere to stay for the night. Very cozy and peaceful for our lowkey evening.
It was such a cute little place, perfect for a night away and close to everything.
Jadas place was clean and comfortable. All around a fantastic stay. We hope to stay on our next visit to the area.
I loved this place! This was hands down the best Airbnb I’ve stayed in. The room felt like home and I wish I could’ve stayed longer. Next time I’m in Salem I will definitely book with Jada.

Jada’s place was as described and better.  Beautiful linens, healthy snacks, cool toiletries and nice coffee.   Very clean, quiet and just like the title “Cozy”.  We were only there for a short time but will definitely come back if in Salem again!

Quiet, cozy place to land- everything just as advertised. Perfect for our quick, one night stopover.. we didn’t get in until like 3am- and there was no issue there. Very accommodating host! Jada left us yummy (and healthy, too!) snacks, and there were little sleep melatonin gummies and soap samples and cough drops.. it was proper!

Jadas place was perfect for a quick sleep after spending the day in Portland. It had everything I needed.

There were quite a few bibles and MLM products around the place, which didn’t bother me much, but something to note.
What a wonderful little place.

From booking to checking in and out was super easy and Jada was on top of making sure I had all the details I needed. The Airbnb itself was super clean, quiet, nice and warm (but not overly hot), and exactly as pictured. I would definitely book again.
We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend Kathie's place.
Kathie's home is exceptional for its roominess, cleanliness, ease of use and excellent beds. Kathie was very responsive, and we enjoyed our stay.

Kathie was so welcoming and made us feel so comfortable. She was very quick to respond with any questions we had. The house was decorated beautifully and the atmosphere was very relaxing. I loved the outside area with lights for us to hang out and enjoy each other's company. Very beautiful home. Kathie went above and beyond on making sure we had everything needed for our stay.
Kathie's place was clean, comfortable, and had all the touches to make us feel right at home. I would 100% recommend a stay here.
House was very clean and close to downtown.
Great location and space. Quick responses. Awesome experience.
Kathie was very accommodating to all of our needs. Her home was decorated beautifully and my family had a wonderful stay here.
We stayed at Kathie house for 15 days she was nice and friendly, the house is beautiful clean nice decoration everything was great I would come back here again
Kathie is an excellent host and I highly recommend it! Great communication and such a convenient location. Way to go Kathie!
A beautiful, cozy home right near downtown.
Really nicely redecorated and a great alternative to a hotel.

Kathie was very communicative, accommodating and great about making our stay in Salem as comfortable as possible. From giving great local tips for kid's activities to providing everything accurately communicated in the listing.
Nice, cute place and responsive host!

We didn’t get to meet Kathie but loved staying in her house while in town for a wedding. It was very clean, comfortable, and convenient to downtown. The space is very nicely decorated and had all the amenities we needed. Check in was easy with the door keypad and she was quick to respond when booking.
Good location, clean and great amenities.
Great place.  Great location!   Great host!

Kathie’s home was a wonderful place for our family to come and visit our daughter attending college in Salem. The location was convenient for visiting downtown and had quick access I-5.  Kathie responded quickly to all my questions and the kitchen was well equipped for family meals together. Hope we can visit again soon.
Everything about our stay at Kathie’s was good.
This is a beautiful space with a thoughtful and kind host.
We had a quick trip and this house was perfect. It was a beautifully kept up old charmer, very clean, and conveniently located. We’d stay here again.
Great home, great value, would stay again when in the area.
Very clean and nice place!
We loved our stay here. The space was very warm, welcoming, clean and cute. Kathie anticipated all the nice little touches that made our home away from home a treat for a few days.
Perfect home. Very cute and clean. Must stay.
Beautiful home with all of the right touches and supplies! My family voted it their favorite AirBnB that we’ve ever stayed in. Kathie is so thoughtful. Absolutely recommend!
Very nice updated space. Everything was very well decorated. Beds were super comfortable. Thanks again.

Very clean and comfortable.   There were beautiful wood floors, a warm fireplace, and lots of space.  The shower felt great and the bed linens were very nice.   The Christmas tree, simply lit with white lights, was such a charming seasonal touch.  The check in was very easy.  The road that the property is located on is quite busy with traffic.  We stayed in the back room and it quieted down significantly at night and we slept with no disturbance.  This was a great choice for our stay and I would have enjoyed to have been there another night.

This cozy house is nicely styled with comfortable beds and a nice kitchen with washer/dryer.  There were even some toys for our grandkids who came to stay with us a couple of nights.  The street outside was busy but quieted down at night.  The location was great for us.

We were so impressed with the beautiful renovation of this Salem home. Kathie took care to modernize and put in high-end appliances. The house was spotless, and the beds were very comfortable. Kathie was responsive to all of our needs, and her dog Hilo was super cute and friendly. We had a wonderful stay. The house is on Market Street which is a busy thoroughfare, so if you are sensitive to sound, you might want to bring ear plugs. Getting in and out of the driveway wasn't as bad as we thought it would be.
Kathie's place is a charming home in the heart of Salem.  It's clean and bright with a delightful ocean theme.  You will thoroughly enjoy your stay!
Delightful place!  Host was great, home was adorable.  Exactly what we needed!  Exactly what it looks like in the listing.  We loved it!
Kathie’s place is a wonderful and stylish place to stay.
Nice house, but had to be quiet because owner lives in basement. She wasn’t prepared for our stay, so had to wait longer once there. Seemed like a nice lady, just a lot of surprises during stay.

Wow wow wow! This place is beautiful, peaceful, and the most comfortable beds I have slept in at an Airbnb! The only problem was I only got to spend one night! For sure and amazing value! There was every little detail and special touch you could imagine!!
Nice place

We spent 3 weeks at Kathie’s house and we wish we could have stayed longer!  The House is very clean. Washer & Dryer is awesome... The Bed was Huge & the most comfortable bed we have slept in anywhere on the road! We love to walk and my wife had the best 4 mile daily walk with beautiful lil houses & landscaping!! We were in Salem to visit our Granddaughter who is a Softball player & Pre- Med Student.  We were 5 minutes to Willamette U & Downtown Salem. Close to the 5 and many restaurants! Kathy was so accommodating for everything we needed! She is a Wonderful Lady & made our Stay amazing!! We will be back Next year!! So informative explaining all the Sights to visit!! Thank you Kathie!
Place was nice but the owner lives downstairs and was making a lot of noise until late at night.

Kathie's place was in a great location and she was very attentive to our needs. The place was so cute! The pictures do not do it justice. Everything was clean and inviting. Will book again if in the area.
Really cute, cozy home with lots of vintage charm, centrally located in Salem. We enjoyed our time here!

We were so grateful for Kathie’s space! We had a sudden change of plans and ended up needing a place to stay last minute. Kathie responded to us immediately and even told us we could check in at any time we needed!
Her home was clean, accommodating, and relaxing. We enjoyed time on the private patio, had a full kitchen to make dinner, and relaxed for the evening.
Kathie, thank you so much for sharing your space with us!
Very amazing Place and will definitely be booking later on.
Great stay, warm host, and very comfortable beds! Would love to come back in future! Thanks!
House is very cute and clean!

Kathie’s place was perfect for our 2 days stay in Salem: comfortable beds, plenty of room for the four of us, well equipped kitchen, AC (it was hot when we came) and a cute backyard. We would definitely recommend Kathie’s place to others.
Kathie was really nice & always willing to help.

This home was nice and messaging with Kathie was pleasant. But, there was no lock to the basement where she lives, and it made us feel uncomfortable to know that she could come up into the Airbnb at anytime, there felt a lack of personal security with that. She also had a dog that was barking and you could hear it plainly. The dog barked continuously outside at 2am which kept us up.
Nice charming place to stay.
Convenient location to freeway, clean, comfortable beds. Great place for overnight going to Salem event.
Kathie was very friendly and responds quick to any questions and concerns we had. Place was very nice. We really enjoyed our stay. Thanks again Kathie and hope we’ll come back again.

This was the perfect place for me and my Dad to stay. Inside is cozy, well designed, and had everything we needed. Hands down, the best equipped kitchen that I’ve ever had through Airbnb. Kathie was a great host too, making herself available to us as needed and friendly. We really appreciate her and her great home.
I loved how clean the house was ! Money worth spent, will definitely book again in the future !

Kathie's place was amazing! Clean, cute, cozy! We were attending an event at the Fairgrounds & it was the perfect location. Kathie was a great communicator & we would absolutely stay here again. Highly recommend if you're heading to Salem.
Very clean & convenient location.

Great hostess!  Was very accommodating to our needs and very responsive to our questions.  it allowed my team and I to focus on our work project by having a place to rest comfortably with all the amenities we needed.

The house was clean, beautifully decorated and in a convenient location. I especially liked that Kathie decorated the home for the fall and Thanksgiving season. Kathie was very responsive to questions and very friendly. We would definitely stay there again!

We appreciated Kathie’s lovely home! Traveling with kids can always be so complicated but we had a lot of room for our family of four. She had a travel crib available which was nice to have one less thing to pack and she had a few toys that even our 6 year old and 2 year old could both play with.

She had even decorated for Christmas which was so cozy and a nice touch!
Kathie is a great host & her place is charming! Very comfy bed & we had everything we needed. She has thought of everything!
Beautifully decorated cozy home.
We had a great overnight Xmas Eve stay @Kathie’s! Her home was perfect for us. I’d definitely recommend her home. Thank you!
Kathie’s place is as pictured. Clean and well kept up.  Kathie was responsive to all our needs and accommodating. Would recommend her place to anyone staying in Salem.
Kathie was very kind and communicative throughout the process. Checkin and checkout was easy, and the home is beautiful, well-equipped, and clean. Thanks for a great stay!

The house was very lovely. It was decorated nicely but no clutter.
Kitchen was stocked and beds were comfortable.

I was a bit disappointed.
Cleaning fee was as much as the stay
($100) and we still had to take the trash out. On two different occasions ants were roaming in the home.
The owner lives underneath and could hear upset children cry during the night.
Also located near a busy street, lots of outside noise.

Was not a very restful night :(
Great host, very very clean home. Super spacious TONS OF BEDDING/pillows. 10/10
Great stay! Super clean and comfy beds.
We enjoyed our stay at Kathie's place very much. After a long day it was so nice to come to a clean and cozy home to settle in for the night. great location and would love to come again .

The place is lovely, and very well appointed. It's a nice space. The bathroom is a little narrow but not unusable, and it's very comfortable.

Unfortunately, the large king-sized bed had hair on the sheets, and... ants. There were at least 3 dozen little sugar ants that were on and in the bed. I looked for fresh sheets but could not find them, and it was too late to move to a new location or do anything about it.

I looked back later and noticed that a review from the month prior mentioned the same things. Without the ants, I would rate this property as a 4.5... many fine things about it, good value, comfy. And getting ants in the Pacific NW in the winter is not unusual. But unsurprisingly, it changed the experience for me quite a bit. I could not recommend this property until the pests are confirmed to be dealt with.
Comfortable, cute and well maintained.  My family felt at home. Kathie was so friendly and flexible. We truly appreciate her. We will be staying again when visiting Salem.
Kathie was very accommodating and she had a lovely space. We enjoyed our stay!

This is a very cool house! Lots of supplies. We had 6 of us staying there and we were comfortable. The bathroom is a bit small but very functionable.
The location is great and easy to find but the driveway is small and only fits one vehicle. Backing out of the driveway can pucker you up as the road is busy. Overall we would stay there again!

Kathie’s place is clean, comfortable and well appointed. She has everything you’ll ever need and then the things you hadn’t thought about already on hand. She was kind, thoughtful and always responsive. Thanks for sharing your place Kathie, we’d come back anytime.
Kathie’s place was perfect for our group and she was very respectful and accommodating!
A good spot for downtime. Will come back again.

Perfect place to be. Relaxing sound of the water and wonderfully clean and neat. We had a wifi hotspot on our telephone and we set up the TV. You will love this place. There was plenty of room for our family of five. Three adults and 2 children. We all love the stream running directly behind the condo.
Amanda was really accommodating for a last minute booking — the apartment was really nice and spacious with convenient parking outside. And the creek view from the balcony is so cool!
Great value and comfort! Amanda did a super job communicating and all went well. Would definitely rent again.
Great value‼️My  favorite place at apartment was the balcony over looking the stream with all the lush foliage and trees

Nice space, with a great deck overlooking the creek.
Very convenient to downtown

The sound of the running creek is a peaceful from the deck of this condo. The host was very friendly and responded quickly to my emails. She made sure I had ample parking close by. The condo was neat ,  tidy and had everything I needed for a short stay. Beds were very comfy and the  linens were high quality. Downtown Salem is within walking distance.
Sparkling clean
I loved everything about this place, would recommend!

Just a block from downtown, great location to wander and close enough to Salem’s farmers market too! Dog friendly! Foggy loved it. The place itself was super clean and nice. Shampoo, conditioner and body wash provided which is always helpful. AC unit in the bedroom. Creek off the patio, it was nice opening the slider door and listening to it. Since this is close to downtown, once it gets dark there are homeless people but they stuck to themselves and didn’t bother us while we walked our dog. I’d definitely stay again! :)
It’s a great spot, a great place :-) rather large apartment with a beautiful creek running behind it. Could one ask for more!?

Accommodations were comfortable, clean, and close to amenities.  Loved the creek!  We had breakfast each morning out on the balcony.  I had forgotten to pack a couple items and was pleasantly surprised that the condo had them.  Every question asked was promptly answered.  This was our first Airbnb experience and for future travel I will look first to them for accommodations.

This place was incredibly clean and so close to stores and bars! The three other people in my group particularly enjoyed The Coin Jam, a bar with arcade games in the back that was minutes from the property.

Parking is great, there is ample space for food and belongings and the bathroom was spacious for even the four of us to get ready.

The host was great in the little time we needed her as the vast majority of the time it went flawlessly. The one small issue we had was resolved with open communication and great respect. She really has earned her superhost rating!

We greatly recommend this property for the type of group we had (two couples) and of course would stay again if given the opportunity! Our only regret is not staying longer!

Such a beautiful cozy place. Felt like home from the second you walk in. Very clean and has everything you will need while your there. The hosts are very nice and they are very good about being available to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Loved it and would defiantly stay again. Best Airbnb I’ve ever been in😊

Nice two bedroom right on the creek.
The area is kind of loud with interesting conversations and hang outs on the bridge next to the place.
Shades in the bedrooms don't block light very well and the windows do allow a good amount of outside noise in.
Large parking spot almost right outside the door.
Roomy place.
Nice place to stay. I love the brook right off the deck. The carpet must have been recently washed though, the house had a musty smell.

This place was absolutely delightful! Loved the babbling creek outside, the spaciousness of the space, how clean it was!! And for me, a Willamette parent who had to make a last minute/emergency trip up to Salem, it was PERFECT! I needed more nights which they sadly, did not have - (next place wasn’t nearly as perfect)!! I am already planning my next stay there.
We absolutely loved the sound of the river!! The location made it possible to walk to anywhere downtown. The place was very clean!
This was a cute place for a nights stay in Salem as we were passing by.
It’s a easy to find Airbnb with everything you need for a short stay. Perfect situated in Salem.

First off, this place was super clean, which I appreciate more than anything. Unfortunately, the space was sparsely furnished with no nightstands in one bedroom and no end tables or coffee table to set drinks on in the living room. I spent quite a bit of time in the home during our stay, and it was not conducive to actually living in the space. I had to pull a chair over to set a drink on by the couch, and I had nowhere to set my phone or a water while I slept besides the floor. There are no curtains in the bedrooms, so the light from outside came in through the blinds, which made it hard to sleep, even if I could have slept with all the yelling and screaming outside throughout the night. I don’t know where it was coming from, but I had to keep white noise playing to even get a little sleep. I was in town for a conference and ended up so exhausted during the day from lack of sleep to be able to focus. I really wish I could have left a better review because it was so clean and the location was close to downtown, but three days later I’m still exhausted and annoyed at the experience I had. Only stay here if you plan to drink or medicate yourself sleep.

This cute condo is in a location close to downtown Salem. There was lots of space and the ambient noise from the Mill Creek was relaxing. Amanda was always quick to respond and answer our questions during booking. Thanks!
Great location and wonderful space! Enjoyed our stay at the condo and loved the sound of the creek next to it! Highly recommend and would absolutely return, very clean as well, it was perfect!

Amanda’s place was perfect for us. We were two Mom’s visiting our college sons. The kitchen was well stocked with utensils, pans & dishes allowing us to make a home cooked meal for the boys. The location next to the stream was peaceful & beautiful. I’ll be staying at Amanda’s place again!
We stayed one night and it fit the bill.  Thanks!

Stayed in Salem for several days at Amanda's place! I was very pleased with host communication and hospitality, easy check in and the place had lots of extra perks that were great! Lots of extra blankets, and towels and the beds were very comfortable. The running creek behind the unit was relaxing and peaceful. Travel to Salem often and will be more than glad to return.
Amanda was easy and fast with communication and very helpful with all my requests!
Great Job to an Excellent Host
Great place to stay if you are in the Salem area. Very accommodating and great hospitality and not to mention super clean. The sound of the creek was amazing. 10/10 would recommend.

Cute condo alongside a creek which adds to the character and charm of the place. Super clean, neighborhood was fine, and close to downtown. Working with Amanda was so easy, she accurately described everything we needed to know. Highly recommend staying at this location.

What a fantastic place,  my daughter wants to live there forever.  The view is gorgeous with fall colored broad leaf maples over the creek. I enjoyed listening to the burble of the creek as I slept. The kitchen has all the tools I needed for cooking meals. It was perfect.
Just as shown and clean.  Nice to be able to hear the creek running at night.  We enjoyed our night there.
Great place great view would stay again
Excellent communication, well-stocked kitchen, good location
Peaceful, relaxing condo on the creek. The host is fast to all responses and very accommodating.full kitchen and very clean.
Great stay!  Very clean place!  We enjoyed hearing the sound of the river flowing while we slept.  The coffee was delicious and the beds were comfortable.
Beautiful home, easy check in, and great host that go above and beyond

This is a lovely space, very close to campus and everything central to Salem. It’s very nice to hear the creek outside the bedroom window. It’s a cozy, clean and warm space. It was perfect for my visit with my son, who attends Willamette.   I really enjoyed my time there. The parking space right next to apartment was also so convenient. Communication was excellent with hosts. I would stay here again.

Amanda & her team are amazing! This is the second place of Amanda’s that I’ve stayed & she does not disappoint. It was very comfortable, cozy yet spacious & perfect location for us. It was close to work, our favorite yoga studio & downtown. There is also a laundry facility on site - very convenient. We will definitely be back!
Place is very clean and convenient if you need to be downtown Salem area.

Great communication and super friendly to talk to. Offered to return a beloved Pooh bear that got left behind. Very thoughtful. Great place. Super clean and comfy beds. Super convenient for our short stay. Thx so much!!
Beautiful and comfy condo! Was very clean and pleasant to sleep. Beds were very comfy btw.
Very chill place

This Airbnb was spacious and clean and in a great location (quiet residential area but close to downtown). The "creek view" is more of a rushing river that was really close to the condo.  I loved the sound of the water at night. Enjoy!
Great location, very spacious condo. The stream is just outside the large deck .

Super cute and very clean! The creek is beautiful and I enjoyed falling asleep to the sound.

Accessibility to our vehicle and to surrounding businesses was a breeze.
Would definitely stay here again.
Great place, quiet and private. The creek outside created wonderful ambiance.
Amanda's condo was very homey. We had close access to all of Salem and we loved all the extra towels and bedding. Amanda was very responsive throughout the stay.
Had a great stay everything looked very modern and up to date it was a lovely condo and I’ll stay again in the future ☺️
This place is fantastic! Thank you.
Excellent location and apartment. The creek is right off the patio. Within walking distance to tons of restaurants and shopping.
Very nice, cozy and clean space to get a nice weekend off from the bug city! We loved it!
Great location near the Capitol, walking distance to Downtown amenities.
Amanda’s place is always clean & comfortable. Great location near downtown Salem.

Amanda's condo was spotless and had room for 5-6 people (if you use the living room sleeper sofa).  We could hear the creek in the master bedroom.  Lots of space in the living room, kitchen was well stocked and efficient to use; we used it for breakfast and dinner.   Our kids loved the supply of board and card games, plus snuggling in front of the TV.  WiFi worked perfectly.  The condo is close to the capitol and the river front park - just a few minutes drive to either; probably could have walked to the river.  I can see why it's a popular location to book.
Amazing location and very spacious and comfortable. The balcony overlooks a flowing stream, and is so relaxing. Walking distance to downtown Salem.

The view of the river was gorgeous.  The apartment is perfect for a short trip where you want to be comfortable and have easy access to downtown Salem, but maybe don't want to do your own cooking (limited kitchen amenities).  Overall we had a nice, quiet stay and Amanda was a pleasure to work with.

Amanda’s apartment is great! All you need, coffee, sugar, Splenda, toiletries. The best part is that you can hear the Creek from the  bedroom and living room. Also, it’s in walking distance of downtown in a sweet neighborhood.  Highly recommend.

Amanda's place was warm, convenient for downtown (not a pleasant walk into town though) and the beds were comfortable. It is quite dated though with a heavily stained living room carpet, shower doors that don't slide easily and quite dark. We did enjoy the sound from the creek running in front of the condo but not of the upstairs resident opening and closing his sliding doors every evening! The living room is sparsely furnished and there was only one bedside table in our room, would be helpful to have on one each side. Brenda was friendly in communication and was very responsive when we thought someone was in our parking space (they weren't).
We wouldn't stay here again, would opt for somewhere brighter and more modern.
It is good value though and the hosts seem like nice people.
Great place in my opinion
Very comfortable and relaxing! The creek outside is super nice and refreshing, and the place was perfect! Great location, too. We really enjoyed our stay here.
Awesome decor, incredibly accomodating, perfect location, and the creek running through the back yard area is absolutely breathtaking. I will definitely be coming back.
This place is a a dream, the rooms are large, the beds are cozy and the bathroom is spotless. I couldn’t have asked for anything more 💞
Lovely space close to the Capitol. It is NE Salem so it is not the nicest area of the city but the Creek right next to the place is amazing and makes up for that.
Place was in a great location for the capital of Oregon. Definitely recommend for a small family or couple.

We enjoyed our stay here it met our needs and had a great location we also loved that we were able to park right next to our condo when I travel alone sometimes it’s hard to get my luggage upstairs in through elevators but this was simple and easy.
But first and foremost I felt SAFE it’s been hard for me to find an affordable place in Salem that I wasn’t concerned for my safety.
This place is a great value
Very Spacious!  The creek out back was very relaxing to listen to as we were sitting on the deck!
Beautiful  look for the doors with keyless entry  and you will be fine
nice place !!

We loved staying in this space! The glass doors and everything else were very clean, there were plenty of extra linens and towels. We stayed nice and cool with the ac/fan setup. The balcony and creek were great as well, we enjoyed game night with the family on the deck. Overall it was a great escape!
Great location. Nice amenities.
A very relaxing home with deck overlooking a creek, excellent beds and well-appointed kitchen and bathroom.
Very clean just as described. Walked to breakfast in morning. Would stay here again.

Nicely redone in side and has linen and towels.  Does have a terrible smoke smell at the entry/kitchen possibly from the noisy tenants above. The bathroom and the kitchen have not been redone. Kind of a dark apartment.  Probably would not recommend for people that have children. Did not feel very secure and there was a homeless camp of 5-7 people just down the street a block away if that.  The creek sound was pleasant though from the apartment.
Amanda's place was very clean and the river view was quite nice and relaxing.
We love staying at Amanda’s, winter or summer, great place with all the touches and quick walk to downtown.

Clean and comfortable and close to downtown. But the location isn't great, with a lot of homeless folks hanging out too nearby for my liking (across the street). And the "Girls Girls Girls" sign in the house window across the street -- was that just pop art, or ... ?? And there's an upstairs flat above -- the guy was walking around at 3am, opening & closing his balcony door (audibly). And there really was no grass nearby for my dogs to pee on. Not a great fit for me. Might be fine for a business traveler.

We really enjoyed our stay at Amanda’s place. So much that we were ready to move in lol. The place itself was really nice and clean. The kitchen is fully stocked with, pots, pans, plates, cups, utensils. The beds were comfortable, the bathroom was spotless. But as awesome as the inside was the best part is definitely the creek running off the deck. It was so relaxing to just sit out there and listen to the water run.
Great place! We all enjoyed it. Communication was great.
A comfortable condo with comfortable beds and a relaxing deck overlooking the creek.

Great apartment for the price! In my brief research on apartments in Salem there was nothing close to the value this apartments provides. Cozy two separate bedrooms which are very useful when traveling with another couple. Full kitchen to your disposition, coffee equipment. TV with Roku in the living room. Great view at the creek from the balcony. You can hear it in one of the bedrooms too, so it's a great white noise for sleeping. There were some people who were homeless a block away from the apartment but it's understandable as it's few blocks from the downtown. The neighborhood is not sketchy nor dangerous. Definitely recommend.

I was in town working on the fires up toward Detroit. My cohorts and I were getting fed up with rampant theft at Double Tree, Hampton, and other hotels out by the interstate. Fire vehicles seemed to be targeted. Alas, I was able to find piece of mind here at Amanda's place. Plenty of parking for a vehicle off street. The creek provided a nice white noise. Good coffee amenities, and this is my primary morning mode so spot on Amanda. As everyone here has pointed out, there is a shelter or two close by. I had no problems with anyone. And also, the walls a bit thin, and the neighbor upstairs carries their weight in the feet. It's not excessive for an apartment, and the creek masks most of it. All and all a great place to stay. Thanks Amanda!
Very clean, very responsive, very easy to get to,  had everything we needed! I would definitely recommend this property to others!
Fantastic view of the stream from the living space and the deck
The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed for a weekend stay. Its location in relation to downtown was absolutely ideal.
Great place to stay. Clean and comfortable.

Amanda’s space was great! She’s very responsive and made check-in and out a breeze. We woke up and had our coffee listening to the nearby creek. Everything was wonderful and we’d stay again in a heartbeat!
Great place close to everything in Salem. Do I need to do in the surrounding area. FEMA close to downtown it is very relaxing and peaceful.

We stayed in Amanda’s apartment for the week. The place is super conveniently located within walking distance to a Safeway and restaurants.

There is a waterfront walking/running trail very close by. Bush Park is a few miles away.

We worked and went to school online for the week so WiFi was very important. The WiFi was great!

We wanted to get a feel for Salem as my daughter is interested in Willammette University, which unfortunately canceled their tours due to Covid-19. But we were still able to enjoy this sweet city and walk all around the perimeter of the school.

As others mention, this is a city and the location is right near downtown. So there is noise and people who are homeless since there are service organizations nearby. But we never felt unsafe and walked everywhere.
Always love staying here: great amenities, clean, comfy beds, and the creek!

My overall feel for the place was inviting. The location is idea decent for being close to downtown and access the local shopping areas is perfect.  The main critique was lack of comfortable sitting space. However the warmth of the unit made up for that, along with the sound of the rushing water made sleeping easy and peaceful.
This place is lowkey, clean, simple & accurately described. Sitting out on the balcony listening to music by the creek was serene. Will definitely be back when I’m in Salem again!
Stylish place with comfy beds and beautiful view of Mill creek. Everything is lovely there, great AirBNB!

Arriving to Amanda’s condo was fairly easy. It is keyless entry and was easy to enter. When we entered the kitchen/living room, it smelled like cat pee. I’m guessing an animal may have stayed there before we did. Luckily the bedrooms did not have the smell. We were going to stay in the bedroom in the back of the condo, closest to the river. It was freezing when we first got there so we turned the electrical heater in the room on while we went to the grocery store so it would be warm when we came back but it attracted ants. Ants came in through a hole in the window frame and got into my bag and were going under the bed. Luckily it was just my boyfriend and I, so the other bedroom was an extra room, so we switched. However it was much noisier in the other room. At night we could hear neighbors coughing up a storm while theyd go out to smoke. One night at 12:30 am we were woken up by blasting country music. A car had pulled up right outside the window to the bedroom and had its doors open, blasting music.
One night, we had just stopped at the condo to drop some things off and we heard the door unlock. Another couple had unlocked the door. The host had sent them the wrong information and gave them our condo address and door code. Fortunately we were home and decent when the other guests unlocked the door and our belongings weren’t disturbed. They seemed like nice people but it’s still unsettling knowing all my belongings and privacy might not have been safe. Then we weren’t sure if anyone else would end up showing up who might’ve been sent the wrong information too.
Overall, a disappointing stay. I would have left and got a hotel or something but I really didn’t want to spend any more money at that point.
The location was great for getting around and being close to amenities. The host had great communication and timely response!
Thanks so much. Great place and location. Very responsive to our questions and needs!
Lovely little spot. Exactly what we had hoped for. Amanda is a great host... super fast replies and thorough. Highly recommend!

We had a wonderful stay.
Great location.
Very cosy.

We will look to stay again next time we're in town.

This place was perfect! Very cozy and easy to relax. Modern and upkept apartment with everything I needed. Lots of natural light and we'll located feels like a private penthouse or cabin with the river view!
Clean, comfortable,  and great location! I felt right at home.
Wonderful place with everything I needed to feel at home
Great apartment and freindly host. Next to the creek, so it was very relaxing. Highly recommend this apartment and host!

Amandas place was spacious and has all the essentials you would need for a night stay! We found everything we needed to get away from Portland for the night. We were happy to be able to do laundry on site and cook our food in an accommodating kitchen. Thanks Amanda!
Great!

Amanda is very responsive and took care of my parents when the power went out. She went out of her way to get us in early. My parents reported that everything was perfect. I recommend Amanda’s place!!!

Dino Layton
This place was perfect for my family of 4 plus pup! Easy walking distance to downtown, shops, restaurants, easy to get to Willamette campus. Roomy, stylish, clean, and overlooking a charming stream!
If I could put more than 5 stars I would, amazing host. Incredible communication overall and a major help with getting the place booked and making sure we were doing well.
Lovely spot. I really enjoyed falling asleep to the sound of the creek! AC is nice and cold.
Perfect overnight stay in Salem at a great value.  Appreciate the cleanliness and convenient parking spot.  The running creek off of the patio was the star of the condo.  So relaxing and picturesque!

Amanda was awesome. Due to a medical emergency with my husband we were unable to make the trip to Oregon. Amanda still allowed my cousin and his fiance (who were sharing the house with us) to keep the reservation even though they weren't the ones who booked it. Amanda went out of her way to make sure they directly had all the communications the needed for their stay. They said the home was awesome with all the amenities they needed. They said the view from the deck was incredible. They thoroughly enjoyed their stay and my husband and I hope to experience if for ourselves soon!

Amanda’s Mill Creek condo is a jewel! Overlooking Mill Creek with a nice-sized deck - wonderful. And hearing the creek at night was very relaxing. We almost decided to skip the event we came down for to hang out on the deck longer!
Everything we could think of was provided. We have stayed in many Airbnbs and this place is right up there on our list. We will most definitely be back!

This is a great place close to plenty of great shops in the downtown area. There is a really nice deck that is great to sit and read or enjoy a meal. The condo is very clean and has plenty of amenities. We highly recommend it!

Clean, comfortable place right on the little creek that flows through Salem.  We stopped here for a quick overnight on a roadtrip from Vancouver to SF and it was as easy as could be.  Bonus - very close to the great children's museum!
Great properties, clean, well maintained, nice homey touches that make these a great choice.

This place is perfectly located to downtown Salem and the condo is so comfy that whether you’re visiting for business or pleasure you’ll be able to relax in comfort at the end of the day. Also the patio with a creek view is nice for waking up and enjoying a cup of coffee on!
Amanda’s apartment is fully stocked with everything you need! It was close to downtown, so it’s just a short drive to lots of restaurants and shops! Check in and check out was easy!

We stayed at the condo to move my daughter into college at Willamette University. The place was absolutely spotless! It had all the amenities you would need and to top it off an awesome creek running behind it with a beautiful deck to sit on and relax. Having the windows open at night and listening to the creek was an added bonus. The location to downtown Salem was perfect. We would definitely stay here again!
El lugar es excelente. Muy céntrico y relajado
This place is okay for short stays.
The creek out back is a rare treat for a downtown location. I was here for a working weekend visit, and it was perfect for that.
Nice location if you are visiting Willamette University!
This place is comfortable and well stocked. Amanda is really good at communication. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for a place in the area.
Great place to stay downtown. 15 minute walk the fairgrounds. The creek right behind the condo is lovely and sounds great in the evenings. Easy to get to and the host was wonderful.

I stayed in this apartment for 12 nights and would recommend this apartment for short stays. There were noisy tenants active in the apartment above at very late hours, which included screaming arguments. There are homeless people across the street, that did stand in and rummage through the apartments dumpster.  I am aware that there is a homeless issue in the cities but they are very close and active near/on this property. The apartment bedrooms were clean and comfortable, the kitchen and bathroom had a few issues with fixtures working well or as stated. The porch with the creek is a nice, large feature.

Such a great apartment with the creek right below the nice balcony, they have it set up with a table and chairs to sit and have your morning coffee and listen to the rushing water. The whole place is very clean and comfortable with all the needed accommodations and extras. Such a great value and we would love to stay again next time we’re in town.
Great place to stay in Salem
Our hosts and stay were great!  Communication, directions, access and location couldn’t be better for the price. Nice clean place, well kept and inviting.

This is in a good location in terms of getting to other places in town or heading out to Portland.  We have stayed in these condos a couple of times now and have enjoyed them and been very comfortable in them.   Amanda is great at getting back to you quickly about anything you might need.  They are very clean when you arrive.  Also the checking in  process and the checking our process is very simple and you are given very clear instructions.  Would definitely stay there again.  Thanks.

The apartment was a great fit for me.  The location and having Mill Creek off the balcony was awesome.  The place was quieter than I expected being just outside of downtown and being in an apartment complex.  The location made it very convenient and close to everything I needed. Will definitely look to stay here again.
Place is just minutes away from downtown Salem. Shopping and restaurants right at your fingertips. Even walking would have only taken 15 mins to get to downtown. Very convenient location.

Very comfortable and nice location near downtown. The listing talks about it being noisy because of location but I stayed almost a week and wasn’t bothered by noise at all. I did very much enjoy the sound of the creek lulling me to sleep at night. This is an excellent value and I will definitely be back!
Amazing
A quiet, lovely and enjoyable location to stay at. Accessto downtown is a plus.
Nice place, hosts were helpful and communicated quickly.
Great location. Well stocked kitchen and bathroom. Would stay here again!

Great place to stay! Had a minor issue and Amanda took care of it ASAP. Easy to get in and get out. In the heart of downtown close to the Capitol Mall. Nice big porch on the creekside. Neighbors were quiet. Would definitely stay again
Great location for access to downtown.  Host was very accommodating.
We had a great stay! It was very clean and and close to downtown.
Great place, beautiful scenery from the balcony, great location for Downtown Salem. Highly recommend staying here. This host goes above and beyond on amenities
Super cute condo. Very clean and tidy. I love the deck the view of the river. Amanda is quick to respond if you have any questions. I will recommend to others
Excellent place!  Better than you can see in the photos. Very recommend
Great location.  Stream was very nice.
Good value, nice accommodations
A nice place to stay and right near down town
Really cute place! Well stocked and very nice location.

Great little apartment in a nice central location in Salem. Only a short drive to any of the wineries in the area, or downtown. Amanda was a great host. Super communicative and gave great instructions on how to get to the apartment, and what to do for checkin/check out. Would definitely stay here again.

Coming from a small town I was a little concerned about being in the middle of town but everything was great and no problems. Definitely so much better than staying in a motel. Very clean and perfect size. Loved hearing the creek in the back.
Great location and the apartment itself is fairly spacious and well equipped and very clean

Amanda is a fantastic host that answered all the questions that I had and let us enjoy our stay otherwise. Her apartment is well laid out, well maintained and super functional! The patio by the water is a great place to catch a break while the kiddos nap. 💜
Great place and value.
Our wedding guests stayed here for my wedding weekend. I rented 4 apartments in the complex from Amanda to host them. All of were happy!

Amanda gave great instructions upon arrival. This was one of my few stops from San Diego CA to Blaine WA!  Honestly I had the best night sleep here the sound of the water was so calming and I enjoyed drinking coffee on the balcony!
A very cute place, perfect location, and clean! We are so happy we picked this host's condo! Would stay here again with no heaitation and enthusiastcally recommend to family and friends.
Lovely place
Great location near downtown and Wallace Marine Park! Very spacious and room for all!
Great little place to stay for pur wedding night. Thank you!
Nice place, great location for downtown shopping. Feels likes a bit of out of town  privacy,  while being right in the middle of town. Very clean
Great location next to downtown, host is fantastic! Nice little place perfect for a quick stay!
Enjoyed the stay

Beautiful place! Peaceful river below patio and bedroom
Coffee was great
Had all the kitchen needs for a week stay
Amanda is a great host, very responsive and helpful. Great place to stay in Salem, esp with a well-behaved dog. Really like being close to downtown and Willamette U. Thank you! We’ll be back!
What a great place to stay! Nice scenic creek that was right next to the apartment. Very spacious and had great amenities. Would definitely recommend to others.
Beautiful condo.
Enjoyed my stay very much.   Would recommend and will stay again.

This place is HUGE, with beautiful, minimalist decor. We loved having two sinks in the bathroom. Being right on the water was amazing. As described, it is in the middle of downtown, so you have to be prepared for city life and noises, but we found it was the perfect oasis.
The place was very clean and had plenty of space. The bed was comfortable and the views of the creek right outside were great!

Amanda’s place is always my first choice when I travel to Salem. It’s so comfortable, easy to find, love the view of the creek, the privacy & the responsiveness of the host. It’s close to so many amenities - restaurants, hiking, the office where my meetings are held. It’s home away from home! I’m grateful for this Airbnb while in Salem - I can even bring my dog & she is happy to be there, too!
Great location and value for our stay this weekend to attend our daughter's basketball game at Willamette. Excellent communication and response from Amanda. We look forward to staying here again!
Great air bnb conveniently located close to downtown.
The place is very spacious - plenty of room for my GF and I. Very clean, bedrooms were very comfortable.
Perfect for what I needed.  Lots of room and centrally located.
very spacious and was wonderful. definitely had a great stay
Great place to stay with plenty of walkability. The space was large, had great wifi, dedicated parking space, and the river sounds & views were peaceful.
Loved the place. This was a very clean place.  But there was a  very strong unpleasant odor of cigarettes smoke.
I recommend better privacy blinds. The sliding door blinds were broken or missing. Bathroom blind missing slat. Bedroom needs better darkening shades.

Hostess was great and the Condo was very accommodating.  The sound of the creek was amazing along with the falling of winter snow while there.  Plenty of space with extra blankets and supplies.  I would stay here again!!  Thank You Amanda for your hospitality!!!

We had a just a short stay to catch up on sleep for the second leg of our journey, but the beds and pillows were sooo comfy!  The water pressure was perfect to wash away the road, towels were great!  Thank you Amanda!
This stay was comfortable and spacious. Perfect for relaxing before and after our night in Salem! I would definitely book again :)
Amanda was very nice and responsive and helpful her place was a good fit for my kids and I we had fun. Thanks again Amanda 🙂 we had a good time.
Great stay with thorough instructions.
A peaceful setting in downtown Salem, near everything. The sounds of the creek and the view turn this location into an oasis. If you're visiting Salem, I highly recommend staying here.
Our host was very responsive and friendly the place was cute and clean and very organized

the place was great
clean beautiful surroundings

Amanda’s house is clean well stocked home. The view is lovely and it has a super convenient location. The  beds are very comfortable and with the sound of the creek we slept very well. I highly recommend staying here.
Thank you for providing us a place to stay while our bathrooms were remodeled.
This place is spacious and was very clean. The porch on the creek is adorable and relaxing.
Pictures Are accurate
Great place to stay...very clean...great communication! Thank you!
This place was great. Had everything we needed! The creek in the back was beautiful and peaceful.
Very clean, comfy beds, fantastic communication.

wonderful kitchen.  nicely appointed bathrooms. comfortable beds. plenty of storage for luggage. nice dining room table - good place to sit and drink tea and visit. loved the assigned parking space.  close to downtown and fun activities.
Very close to town. Very clean condo with a great view of the stream.
Check in was super easy, and didn't even have to have any interaction with the host. The place was clean and had lots of space. We may will seriously consider this place for next time.
Very clean condo in a very convenient location. Really takes care of everything you’d need
We enjoyed our stay in Salem. Great location. Very comfy bed. Quiet and pleasant b
This place is exactly what we needed after a long drive. A clean, relaxing apartment with a beautiful deck overlooking the creek.

This location was perfect. So central and on a beautiful quiet street. The first thing that hits you is how exceptional clean and comfortable this condo. Very inviting. The setting with the patio and creek are so peaceful. The beds were very comfortable. Definitely exceed expectations for the first time staying at an Airbnb. Amanda makes it so easy to communicate. Responds immediately.  Our stay was 11 days. This is a hidden gem.
This is the place to stay! My family had a great time!! Communication was GREAT and first class hospitality from the start!!! Great location and tons of suggested ideas for the area!
The place was perfect. Everything we needed and nothing extra we didn't. Amanda was super responsive when I had some questions about the place. I hope to come stay again.
Awesome place to stay if you want to relax and enjoy the river view, kitchen has everything you need to cook yourself a good dinner, everything is close by walking distance to downtown.

Everything was sparkling clean and comfortable. Perfect place to crash after a friend's wedding night full of dancing and eating. Kitchen fully stocked with pots and pans, utensils, etc. Comfy beds and blankets. Great view and lovely sound of the creek. Will definitely recommend and stay again in the future! Thank you, thank you!
Spacious and comfortable.
Loved this spot! We were able to use the second parking area. We did a quick over night and it was just what we needed. Host was easy to communicate with and replied super fast.

Amanda's place is so perfect! It feels like home away from home! I travel to Salem for work, and the condo is just a few blocks from my office. Being close to downtown is an added bonus - my husband and our Boston Terrier, Rosie, often join me and we enjoy the closeness of town and work. The condo is clean, comfortable, well-stocked with everything we need and plus a deck with a view of Mill Creek. We will definitely return!
Loved it! Had a nice view and was perfect for baby and me.

Great value option for two couples or two people. Location was fantastic with several restaurants within walking distance. Communication was A+.  Beds were super and the amount of linens available was perfect. Showers worked well and there’s plenty of hot water. Really a nice view of the creek from the deck.
Great location. Clean.
Lovely place in the heart of Salem.  The unit was very clean.  We would definitely stay here again.

Amanda's place was a perfect little condo in the heart of downtown Salem! Perfect for our family of four and our dog.

Would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends and family visiting in the area.
Great host. Cozy accomodation.  Very good location. Within walking distance to parks, malls and department stores.
Nice place close to downtown!!!

Amanda’s place was very clean with cute decor and everything I needed. The back patio overlooking the water was perfect. I spent the entire evening sitting out back at the table and looking at the water. Thank you, Amanda!
Lightning-fasr communication, super-helpful host. Thanks for everything!
Clean, cool, quiet place that’s close to the stare capitol! Great host communication and they had the AC on & blowing for us when we arrived, which was amazing in the 100 degree weather.
Amanda was very nice and willing to work with us after running into a couple of issues with the room.
Nice and quiet and clean.

I was returning my son to Willamette University, and needed a nearby 2 bedroom place to stay near school. The condo was quiet, sparkling clean, had every comfort of home, and the creek in back is gorgeous.
Was nice to have a fully equipped kitchen, as it is hard to dine out during the pandemic. Will definitely stay there again.
Great place. It had everything we needed. We made it our home away from home for 9 days.

Amazing view in the backyard!! Could not get over the creek! The condo is located in a great spot making it convenient to access some major stores and spots of interest. They do a great job with keeping the place incredibly clean and smelling good. Would highly recommend booking if in the area. One car parking only.
Clean, close in the city.  The creek side back porch is beautiful and such a great place for a quiet breakfast.  Beds were comfortable. Thanks Amanda for all your quick responses.

Amanda's place was exactly as described. It was very clean, quiet and comfortable at a great price point. She was extremely quick to respond, instantaneous actually, when we had minor difficulty with the automatic front door lock. The old neighborhood around the condo complex is eclectic and walkable. If not for the wildfire smoke, we would have enjoyed the back deck overlooking Mill Creek morning and evening.
Highly recommend Amanda's place for your stay in Salem.
Thanks Amanda
Nice and clean place. It was peaceful listening to the creek at night.
Very clean & tidy place with a nice view for a great price.

We enjoyed our stay in Sacramento. We We just needed a relaxing place for the evening so we could continue on our journey the following morning. This condo fit the bill. The sound of the creek outside our window was quite soothing, no extraneous noise and the bed was so comfortable.  We went on our way fully rested, just what we wanted.
Had a quick overnight in this apartment. It was a really easy check in and the space had everything we needed for a great night.

My husband and I were staying there to celebrate our first anniversary in Salem. It was an awesome and clean place to stay at! We were amaze on the amount of cooking utensils they have also we love the view and the sound the creek. We'll definitely stay there when we visit Salem again.
Great place!  Wonderful people!

This place worked great for us.  It wasn't fancy, but had room for 6 of us to eat and gather.  The beds were comfy and the stream out back made it feel like we were in the woods instead of close to town.
Lovely condo close to downtown and surrounding attractions. Highly recommend ~
I’d stay again! Great location

Very clean, well stocked with towels, toilet paper, shampoo,  body wash and all dishes, coffee maker, toaster, oven fridge.  Loved the location.  Its a bit older and only one bathroom has a shower but this place is great.
Great location, easy to walk to downtown Salem. It was lovely to sip coffee overlooking the creek.
Great place in center of town. Nice and clean.

My stay at Amanda’s place was just about  what I expected. The view from the balcony was what sold me on the stay, the beautiful little creak was an amazing morning view. However I would say the price of my stay was a bit much for the area and the community, Amanda’s place is technically a condo but situated as a small apartment complex with thin walls. The biggest issue I came across while staying here was that there was NO hot water to shower with. BOTH bathrooms do not even get a lukewarm temperature, so if you like to take a hot or even a WARM shower this is not  the place for you. Overall I would rate Amanda’s place as 3 stars

it's a it's a beautiful place to get away just to relax and if you love to fall asleep to the sound of Rushing Water this is ideal I recommend this for anybody who wants to experience and enjoy an Airbnb. Great location close to shopping quiet neighborhood
Clean , affordable, an downtown Salem.  Host was great.
Great place , super clean. Great host!
Nice place to stay. Close to downtown and the house was clean
Amanda’s place is extremely nice, warm and inviting
This was such a lovely stay while visiting family! We would definitely stay again!!
I love staying here. And I would definitely stay here again.
Great downtown place to stay
Great stay! Definitely worth checking out. Creek right outside is a big plus

Our stay was so enjoyable.  Having two full bathrooms and  plenty of towels and bedding was a plus.  The back patio was so soothing and relaxing! I will be staying there my next visit.  The hospitality was wonderful!
Good wifi. 10ms ping. ~30Mbps download.

This is an ideal place close to all the things you may need on a trip from Convenience Store, Grocery Store, to Mall, Park, Movie Theater and Thrift Store. This location is perfect and the relaxing sound of the creek it's something you truly have to experience. Our family recommends this for anyone whether you have a small family or single or a couple.

The condo unit has a very quiet and relaxing atmosphere. There is a creek running behind the unit and so peaceful. Nice to listen to at night or sit out and enjoy in the morning
The unit is fully equipped with supplies for kitchens, bedding, and bath essentials. Plenty of towels, blankets and pillows. Bed are very comfortable and TV options were available for entertainment as needed. I found accommodations to be perfect for what I needed during my visit. Responses to emails for questions and information were answered in a timely manner and very respectable
Great location to downtown Salem, and terrific speedy communication!

The ad fairly and accurately described the unit and location. We appreciated that honesty and straightforward info. There were no surprises and the condo worked well for us in town for the Ironman race close to the venue.
Such a simple and quaint experience. Amanda had excellent communication and made everything a breeze.
Amanda's place was very clean and the beds were comfortable. The window ac did a good job of cooling the rooms. Seating on the patio was relaxing as we drank coffee and listened to the creek.

Super clean place close to downtown and Willamette University. Comfortable beds and a lovely Mill Creek view.
AC was ample in the hot days.
If you need a place to stay in downtown Salem, this is a nice little condo. It was clean and equipped with everything we needed!

The apartment complex is older but the apartment was very clean and comfortable for a family of 6. It was nice having the parking space almost directly in front of the door.  It’s close proximity to downtown was so nice. We’d stay again for sure
Older place, but clean, good sized and convenient.
downtown
Great short stay at creek condo. Highlights were location (lovely walk to downtown restaurants) and falling asleep to the sound of the creek. We will be back! Thanks
Note that of the two bathrooms, one is accessed via one bedroom, the other opens directly into the hallway. Also, the couch lays flat to make a bed in the living room.
Great location, easy check-in and check-out, great communication!
Exactly as pictured and described.  Great location and close to everything.  We went to the Oregon State Fair which was just a quick Lyft trip.  Condo clean and comfortable.

Amanda's Large Creek View condo is just as advertised and super well-stocked. Clean. Spacious and uncluttered. Easy walking distance from downtown Salem. And with a wonderful flowing creek and wild blackberries in the back providing a nice nature vibe and wonderful "soundtrack" for falling asleep at night. It worked well as a base for my crew visiting family nearby.
Great place to stay!
The sound of the creek with morning coffee was just perfect!  Very clean abs served our needs!  Thankbyiu!
This place works great for us. It has everything we need for a home away from home.
I have stayed here multiple times. Clean, safe and quiet. The creek behind the apartment is very soothing. Great communication!

This was a great stay and a great location. It was exactly everything that was in the description. We didn’t use the kitchen much because there are lots of great places to eat. You must try Fork Forty and Busick Court.  There are a lot of Thrift stores and reuse places. A really neat shop to check out was called, Furbis.
The condo was nice, clean, and affordable. The bed and pillows in the master bedroom were so comfortable! I will be staying here again if I ever come back to Oregon. =)

Convenient location, with high quality bedding, towels, toiletries etc. which made the stay very comfortable. Slept well with the window open to hear the noise of the creek outside. We travelled with our dog so pet-friendly was a must and morning and evening walks with the dog were a breeze.  Would definitely stay again.

It felt like home away from home. So glad to get off the road and into a comfortable bed.  The view of the creek alone was my favorite part. But being able to cook breakfast and dinner for the kids. Amanda had board games and a Roku tv which we watched movies together. Pet friendly. And the location was absolutely ideal as you are centrally located to everything. Wish she wasn’t booked out so far so we could have stayed longer. It was a lucky chance we got to stay for 2 days. Thank you!
Ms. Amanda was very accommodating  and her place was comfortable with all the necessities.

Great place to stay, has everything you need! Very comfortable beds and lots of room. It can accommodate up to six easy. And the location is perfect if you’re wanting to explore the down town area. Our host made everything easy for check in and checkout and anything else you may need.  I’d stay here again for sure!
Wonderful  5 star stay. Clear communication for our whole stay. Very clean and had everything we needed.
Really enjoyed my stay, very spacious and quiet blackout curtains were helpful for working nights.

Spotlessly clean, great location, very quiet and spacious.
Private deck area overlooking one of Salem’s landscaped creeks is relaxing and great for morning coffee and wine-time.
Within walking distance of downtown and many good quality eateries.
Neighborhood has many restored bungalows and invites daily saunters along tree-lined streets.
The restful and lovingly cared for Capitol mall (oregon’s legislature) is within reach on foot.
In short, as advertised and more.

Apartment was clean and as listed. We enjoyed the porch with view and sounds of the river.
Kitchen has a microwave, toaster full range,large refrigerator, coffee maker and dishwasher.
There is a pack and play and a high chair for guests with children.
We had a wonderful stay with our two little ones (4 & 7). The walk to downtown was a breeze. We will definitely stay here again on a future visit!

Our stay here was very enjoyable! I loved the beds. They were so comfortable. The place was very clean. The bathrooms were stocked with body wash, shampoo, conditioner, and TP. There is also no shortage of blankets and towels! The view out back is beautiful. There is a stream in the back that was enjoyable to listen to at night.
This was a very comfortable stay, and would absolutely stay again.
Comfortable, clean, pleasant stay. Especially enjoyed the deck overlooking the fast flowing stream right in back of the living room and one bedroom.

The condo was very well organized, was generally clean and tidy and very spacious with lots of cooking implements and we loves the sound of the river at night. Perfect location, very cute street. I did feel the place needed some general maintenance which caused some discomfort - mainly, upon entering the place we were greeted with a strong mildewy smell which we needed to air out daily,  perhaps just a product of the heavy rain and old building but it did dampen the experience (pun intended) and if people are sensitive to mold or mold smells this might be an important heads up.

The condo was great, spacious and right by a beautiful creek, great parking and all that was needed to cook was provided. The location, as Amanada mentioned is centrally located, within 10 minutes of all we needed, with that came some local homeless folks in the area, but we had no issues at all.
The Condo is vintage ;) and very reasonably priced, we had a maintenance issue that Amanda resolved as soon as she could and she adjusted our fee for the inconvenience. We would stay again!
There was a strong foul order that needs to be managed. The creek view  in the back is lovely and the sound of rushing water is peaceful. Close to Williamette University and the Capital.
very clean very homey my family and I enjoyed every minute of our stay

Perfect location! Check out the foot bridge just to the north, at the end of Knapps street, if you are into walking a little.
The place was very clean, and the host clearly communicated all of the important details. Couldn't ask for more!

A wonderful experience staying here. It met our needs and was easy to locate, check-in and out was simple, and Amanda even made some last-minute changes for us as our plans changed.

A wonderful experience for us!

A completely functional 2 br apartment at a good price. The place was clean, the furniture functional (if sparse given the relatively large size of the living room) and the beds comfortable. The heat worked well, and having individual, silent units in each room is a plus.  The stream out back is a delight (nice to look at and creates a great sound).  The management company could use a few pointers as they missed some obvious things during turnover: missing coffee pot, bulbs burned out in bathroom, no soap/shampoo in the shower (or let people know to bring their own).  Overall, I'd stay in the unit again next time I'm in Salem.
Great place and Amanda is the best to work with.  Everything met our needs.  I would recommend this wo anyone.

We bought a home, with a 30 day escrow and no place to stay with a pet. New to the area, we found Creekside. These are very spacious units for the money spent, and we have stayed in 4 of them. They are clean, equipped with everything you would need, and works as a home away from home. Complete kitchen, bathrooms, and bedrooms..plus the added feature is a roaring brook…in California it would be a river, just outside the balcony.
If you can use a computer, iPad, or phone, you are set to sign-up for a non-person experience that is efficient and workable. We even pushed the limits by staying days beyond our original time which was worked out with Amanda…and was successful.
It is an inner city area, with a homeless population nearby. We didn’t have any issues with this and the homeless seemed to respect us as we did them.

Amanda's place is very spacious and clean. I loved that it has two full bathrooms, heater, and it's own parking spot right in front of the unit. My husband and I ordered dinner from Cozy Taberna. I recommend this place if you are staying at Amanda's place..
Amanda a very friendly and responsive host. Her apartment was clean and just as described. There were plenty of towels, extra blankets and pillows and she even had some microwave popcorn out for us.
Amazing place on the creek. Everything was clean and well stocked.
Great stay for our weekend get a way plus the advice Amanda gave us for things to do was a plus!
Great communication. The place has potential. Central location.
Central location for all our plans .  North, south and the coast !  Love the outside porch on the stream.  Had everything we needed .  Great communication too !
Excellent location, full kitchen, and beautiful creek view. Would stay here again.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Loved the great view of the creek from the balcony, we liked sitting out there in the mornings enjoying our coffee and tea listening to the peaceful sound of the creek running by. The beds were very comfortable, plenty of towels and toiletries. We mostly cooked breakfast but it has everything needed if you wanted to cook more. Amanda was very nice made sure our stay was a pleasant one.
Our wedding guests stayed here for my wedding weekend. I rented 4 apartments in the complex from Amanda to host them. All of were happy!
Great host exact like very clean and stocked great view.

The condo was excellent for our stay. It was centrally located for where we were going and was very clean and spacious for our group. Sitting on the back porch in the morning listening to the creek was such an added bonus. There is plenty of closet space and even though the temp was in the 90s during our stay, the condo stayed pretty cool considering there is only the A/C unit in the master. There are quite a few homeless people down the street, but they were friendly and non-invasive during the stay. We never felt like we were unsafe or anything. Highly recommend the condo! Kid friendly and lots of ammenities as far as entertainment goes!
This place was amazing! Clean, spacious and perfect for my family of 4. I’d highly recommend it and would stay here again.

This rental provided an ideal experience for our little family. Clean, clean, clean! Comfortable and cozy, attention to detail and a lovely view off the balcony.  Lots of cozy blankets, good products in the bathrooms, comfy beds.. I could go on and on, but maybe you should experience it for yourself. You won't regret it!
The condo was clean and had a good location.  Definitely was what we needed for our time in Salem.
Clean, central, nice parking space, and the creek behind the unit is peaceful.  Amanda’s place had everything we needed at a great value 👍

This was a great location, we walked over to check out the Capitol building. The deck overlooking the creek was nice to enjoy. It was a nice, spacious and clean condo perfect for what we needed. Thank you!
We had a lovely stay. The place was very clean and the beds were really comfortable. We enjoyed coffee each morning on the porch looking over the stream behind us.
Great communication. Near fun restaurants. Spacious!
I love staying here! This was my second time to book and it was just as comfortable as last time. This location is fantastic and the hosts are very communicative. I would definitely book again.
Nice spot with a river view and balcony. Was perfect for our stay while we were in town for a wedding.
Nice place to stay
Had a nice stay, we check in late and left early in the morning so we did not get to enjoy the area.  Amanda was great at communicating and check in was smooth with no issues.
Great place will stay again

Place was great and close to university our son is attending. Unit was clean and it was nice having a covered parking spot right in front of the unit. Back deck looking over the creek was really nice with a morning coffee.
Amanda was a pleasure to deal with. We were very happy with our choice!

A decent place to stay but completely unreliable internet. We were unable to stream anything or even use social media for any length of time. Tried reaching out to the host but didn't hear back about any troubleshooting during our stay.
Also was advertised as a safe neighborhood, and it may be for the Salem area, but as someone traveling from out of town there were quite a few homeless people camped outside a community center about 100 yards away and an apparent squatter house next door. We felt inside, but not walking/running around the neighborhood.

Nice accommodation in Salem.
The condo is very well furnished.
Although it is close to a homeless place, we have never been disturbed. The terrace with the view on the creek is very nice.
Amanda is a great host. She is very available and has been very helpful in the organization of our trip, including when we had to modify our travel dates.
We really recommend it!!
thanks! it was great.
It was a comfortable and nice stay!

A very affordable and easy stay for me and my parents! This place is clean and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. We really liked having a kitchen and staying together as a family in a 2 bedroom place instead of a hotel. The couch in the living room works great as an extra bed and is comfortable. SO much better as an option instead of a hotel. The neighborhood and creek behind is great.
Cozy, quiet, private and clean
Lots of room and everything you need
Perfect location, very cozy apartment, and wonderful communication!!
