Amanda is truly a Superhost, she responds in a timely manner if ever I have any questions. Her place is on a ground level, very homey, super clean, quiet and has comfortable queen size beds. There is an active creek in front of the balcony  with soothing sound. The Amenities as advertised are readily available, kitchen is well stocked. Covered assigned parking  space is directly across the unit entrance which makes it so convenient for unloading luggages. The unit is located in a well kept residential area of downtown so expect the usual scenery as like any other cities. We felt safe even with the house less shelter located about 2 blocks away. I would highly recommend Amanda and her place. Thank you Amanda for being so accommodating.

Convenient location for anywhere you would need to go in Salem. Place was well stocked and had everything we need. It was nice to have covered parking, especially with the rain. Bed was super comfy and it was nice to fall asleep to the sound of the creek outside. Big wall of windows looking out over the creek is probably very pretty in the spring with everything is green and the big deck would be nice to sit and enjoy the sound of the creek. Amanda was very easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend Amanda's place, it has everything you need in a convenient location at a great price.

Amanda was an amazing host!! She was really quick to respond to any questions and was also very flexible with us. The condo is older but is kept in immaculate condition with very comfortable beds that made for a great night's sleep. We have stayed in one of her other condos in the same complex before and we had a great experience that time too. Amanda's condo will be the first place we check if we need to stay in Salem again. Thank you Amanda!!
Wonder, clean place to stay.

Amanda was super friendly and helpful, provided great instructions for location, check-in, check-out, nearby attractions and helping us secure a second parking place for our stay.

Loved the river behind the property, the coziness and cleanliness of the place and provided amenities. The internet was a little slow at times but worked best in the living room. Would definitely stay again.
Amanda was super helpful and responded quickly.
Great place with a lovely creek behind it.

I went for a pamper. I found this spot to be healing and happy. The roaring water at the back made it wild and fun and wonderful! The neighborhood was perfect for long Luna walks. She is 18 this year. She loved this place. Thank you so much.

This property is exactly as described. It fit our family of five just fine. We appreciated the proximity to downtown Salem.

I especially enjoyed the extra touches like fans in the closets of both bedrooms, and the beautiful rippling brook behind the apartment. Lots of extra towels and comforters are also available in the hall closet.

Being in an apartment style complex - we expected to hear more noise from neighbors around us, but it was a very peaceful stay. Quiet and relaxing.

We opened the windows and plugged in our oil difffuser upon arrival to “freshen it up” - but we do that in several properties. We read the description carefully and knew to expect a dated building- so this didn’t bother or surprise us.

Amanda is a great host! Very kind and honest too, she let us stayed at her other unit while the unit we were supposed to stay at were being repaired. The place was clean, we love how we can hear the creek flowing from the bedroom window. Location is convenient because everything is walking distant. Really enjoyed our stay and we would definitely book again :) thank you for being an amazing host!

Absolutely loved the location and the place.  It was exactly what we needed for a getaway with my boyfriend and our dog.  Very easy to find.  Walking distance from downtown which made it easy for us as well.  The condo had everything we needed and wasn't over cluttered so it felt refreshing to be there.  The cost was very fair.  Anytime I head to Salem I will definitely try to stay here.
Exactly as advertised. Low rate. Great for a short business trip. Will definitely look too stay here again.
What a wonderful place to stay! I will definitely be back! Thanks so much!😊
It might be the 3rd time I book with Amanda's places. I think it says it all
Loved our stay here. It’s affordable and clean. Falling asleep to mill creek is nice.

Location was within 2 blocks of where I was working. It enabled me to walk to work while leaving my car on property. The fact that there was a dedicated parking space proved very helpful. Convenient to downtown and other amenities.

Aside from the small raised threshold at the front door, this listing was ideal for my son, who uses a mobility scooter. The halls are wide and the home is clutter free. The apartment did have an unpleasant odor. This listing could be enhanced  by an expert cleaning and the insulation of windows locks as the existing ones don’t properly lock..
The location of Amanda’s place is very close to downtown, the Capitol and Willamette University. The price is good for the budget traveler.
Great place

This is a very roomy and comfortable place and is exactly as described. Love that you have a parking place literally right outside the door. Easy to walk to grocery store, waterfront park area and tons of downtown shops and restaurants. Perfect for a visit with a Willamette University student. Well equipped kitchen, comfortable beds and plenty of extra linens and blankets. The host provides very detailed information and is quick to respond. We will definitely book again.
Nice private place.
Easy checkin and last minute booking for us.  Host very helpful.

Amanda was a proactive and responsive host. The space was comfortable and inviting. The two bathrooms were a plus. We did have a small issue with the heating, as we couldn’t get it to be cool enough in the bedrooms (in March); but, better for the heaters to work than not! Amanda was gracious when we told her and was going to look into it right away. We loved the layout of the kitchen, dining, and living rooms. Favorite part was the view of the creek—the patio looked nice! It was just too cold outside for us to use it.

Riley and Cory are really nice people.  They’re friendly and helpful, and really relaxed.  I was their first guest, and they did a fantastic job!  I’d definitely recommend staying with them if you’re looking for a simple, clean, inexpensive room!
Riley and Corey are great hosts.  They go out of their way to be accommodating in any way they can.  I’d definitely recommend them in the future.
Awesome place to stay. I recommend it to anybody staying in or around the salem Oregon area.
Nice location and good quality !
Awesome private room for the price and location in town. Neat and clean. Would recommend

It was great to have an affordable place to stay on my overnight trip to Salem.  I didn't get to see Riley, but he was helpful over the phone and by message. Cory met me while I was entering the room, and was friendly and helpful.  The bedroom is in a converted garage, but the bed was super comfortable, plenty of comfy pillows, extra fluffy blanket, and an adorable stuffed doggie.  Just in case it would be important to you, the kitchen does not have a microwave.  But there is a Vitamix! I didn't have occasion use it, but how cool is that?
Perfectly located, quick response and clean! Highly recommended
Easy to get to, quick responses, clean and comfortable. It’s a perfect place for travelers on a budget. If I was to pass through again I’d really hope to book this place again
My stay here was great! Just what I needed for a work trip!
It’s very convenient, as a guest, to have a parking spot in the driveway, and a separate entrance right next to it. I also appreciated being free to use the large kitchen.
Friendly, accommodating, easy to be comfortable here!
Easy, convenient, and the perfect place to stay in Salem!
A quaint and clean space which was perfect for my needs.  And Cory and Riley are attentive, terrific hosts.  I highly recommend this space if you are visiting the downtown Salem area.
Great place and very private. Room and bathroom were very clean. Cory was very friendly as well.  Would stay here again!
Private quiet space
It was nice and comfortable to stay here!
Thank you nice private space
Great value spot to crash for the night. Check in and location were great.
Stayed here again and it was great!!
Great place to stay the night
It was okay
Good host
Amazing stay as always. Can’t beat this location for the value. Close to shops and downtown.
Wonderful hosts

Second time staying at Riley and Cory's place, the place was perfect, clean, and cozy. I felt like home.
It was really nice seeing them again.
Affordable , quiet, comfy queen bed w plenty pillows, parking accessible. Easy check in and out! Great location access to a variety of places.
This place got the job done!

The room it self has a cool vibe with that light hanging above the bed and the private access was really nice. The bathroom has a lock which is a weird thing to be happy about but couple other places that I’ve been to didn’t. Very convenient and I look forward coming back again.
Quiet, peaceful room. Hosts were very nice and accommodating.
I would definitely recommend staying at this place.
Wonderful folks, nice quiet place to go to. 2nd stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay there again. Be forewarned their delicious aromas while they cook may make your tummy growl.
Been having to stay a few times. They are always cordial, responsive and helpful. Quiet comfortable place to read, relax and sleep.  Thanks so much Riley & Cory.
I had a wonderful stay here. I would definitely go back.
Wonderful time won’t disappoint!!
Good location and a quite room. Loved the private entrance and good parking at the home. I will stay there again if I am in town.
Simple room, good for a quick overnight stay. Excellent communication and easy check-in.
Nice place close to everything, and the hosts had lots of helpful tips for the area!
Perfect little spot for down time between clinical days (RN student).  The space was quiet, private, comfortable and has attentive hosts.  I would have no problem booking again if in the area.
I really enjoyed my time at Riley and Cory's place. It was exactly what I was needing and it was conveniently located!
Clean, comfy and affordable
Riley & Cory were so great! Loved our quiet, comfortable, private portion of the house, and they even gave me excellent local tips and let me pet Murphy.
Honestly, great communication, I felt completely welcomed, and the room was perfect! Would definitely recommend them!  Thank you! (:
The bedsheet and pillows are not clean and it's smells bad.
Comfy, cozy and private!
Kindest people and most lovely space ; easy check in as well :)
Great stay, great location. Real quiet area
Comfy bed, clean room, good AC, private entrance, good tv options
Comfy, cool and cozy.
Riley & Cory's place isn't fancy, but it was just what we were looking for during our stay in Salem; affordable, close to downtown but in the suburbs, and friendly hosts.

Did not meet Riley but he was in communication at all times and answered when I called to check in...i had a very restful night! The only thing is the door handle for the entrance is loose so be careful going in and out..
This place was perfect! I had to take a test in Salem so I drove there just to sleep, get up and go. It was quick and easy and the hosts responded right away. Thanks again!
Our stay was for two nights and it was very convenient location for us.  Host was very prompt on communication and helpful.

Although I didn’t meet Riley and Cory you would not know if they were there or not because the place is very quiet in a good way...you do have your own entrance and a lock on the bedroom door for security.  The bathroom is also right outside the bedroom with a shower.  It was Perfect and convenient. I would definitely recommend and stay again.
Great cost effective place to stay in Salem.
Great place to stay in Salem!
Can’t beat the bang for your buck and great location!

Definitely a great space for an outstanding price!  I appreciated Riley and Cory's quick communication and the flexibility they showed me during check in.  The room and bathroom featured some nice touches that showed these hosts were thoughtful and intentional about making the accommodations comfortable and helpful.  I would definitely stay here again!
Its really a clean nice room with totally seperate entry. Room is spacious. They are super quick in response as well. Prime location. Drivway parking instead street definitely another added bonus😁
Great for a quick stay! Awesome communication.
Very friendly and hospitable couple.
Amazing and clean quite, amazing hosts enjoy your time here. Quite clean comfortable always.
Room and bed we're a little small for the price but the neighborhood is beautiful and the location is great.
I enjoyed my stay would go back
Great spot in Salem! Convenient and close to everything. The room was clean and cozy!
Great, kind hosts and a pleasant private space
Riley was a very friendly host and he made me feel like I was staying at home! The room was also perfect as it had everything that I needed. I would definitely stay here again.
Clean. Great location. Easy check in. Comfortable. I would def stay here again!
Riley was extremely responsive and thoughtful. The place is comfortable and well equipped for business or fun.
Great place to stay

Riley was helpful and accommodating and the room was perfect for my overnight stay in Salem.
Easy check in, clean, comfortable and includes nice touches like a coffee maker, hot water kettle, and towels.

Thanks!
You can’t go wrong. Great location Nice room. Wonderful extra touches.  The laundry soap was a nice extra
Great room. Great amenities. Will stay again. Thanks.

An amazing value for a comfortable stay!  I love the privacy this room offers with its private entry.  The hosts have a mind for what travelers are looking for with the amenities they provide.  I was a returning visitor and would definitely return again for future visits to Salem.
Honestly a great little room. Really more than I asked for.
Was in town for business. Seamless checkin experience. Great location, accommodations, and value! Would definitely stay again.
Great location and stop for those road tripping and looking for a great room for a great price.
I’ve stayed here several times now, and every time it’s been a great stay!

This is a very basic room. Great host! However, the room has a strong musty odor which is concerning. The door knob is loose and we heard a lot of loud cursing during our stay. The quiet hours were respected though. Not a bad spot for an adult looking to stay a night but nothing fancy either.

Riley and Cory were great hosts! The room is comfortable and it was a bonus for us that there was a separate entrance. The house was quiet and we were not disturbed at all during our stay. All lot of great amenities to feel right at home too!

Riley and Cory are very friendly and will gladly answer questions or chat about anything. They gave us great recommendations about places to eat around the area. Overall, this is a great place to stay whether you are social or introverted person!

- Regan and Alyssa
It is a good corner

After Arriving A Day Later Than What I Was Expecting Riley Greeted Me & Helped Me With My Belongings & Getting In That Was Nice To See As Well As Fan ,Extra Blanket Min Fridge (Thou Did  Not Realize Untll Next Day That You Have To Turn It On ) Decor Items They Added As Well As Easy To Use Tv ,Loved Own Entrance & Exit As Well As Being Budget Friendly, As Well As A Pitcher Of Water He Had To Drink In Room It Did Get A Liitle Warm At Night But If I Got Hot I Just Opened The Window To Cool It Off,On A Main Road So You Will Hear Noise & Last If You Are A Walker (no car) shopping & grocery Stores Are 15 -30 Min Away Depending On How Fast You Walk.Would Stay Here Again.
Great space!
The owner was very supportive and caring.

Good value for what I needed, just one night to be close to the State Park. Everything was clean and had the essentials. Communication was great. Close to amenities in town and local hikes. Recommended!

Private entrance to room. Tv in room was great; no cable which was fine with me. Use of my own bathroom....the way I like it. Bed was creaky. Room had hangers, coffee stuff, filtered water. I had to use the hand soap in the shower.
I was a little disappointed that the host didn't greet me in person, but she stated it was because of Covid-19. I don't know if she was fully vaccinated, but I was.
The price was GREAT!
There wasn't any place to sit outside.
There was Air Conditioning-----thank God.
I would stay here again.
Close to town and the bed was comfortable. Thanks for providing a good value!
Very good location.  Great value and very nice neighborhood.  Nice room.  Will definitely stay again if in the Salem area.
Great room for the price.
A great place to stay in Salem. Riley was extremely helpful. The place is exactly as it was describe. I have wonderful time staying there. Will definitely stay there again if I am in the area.

The description is completely accurate and the hosts are the sweetest people you'll ever meet. As a woman traveling alone I felt very safe in this private room in a shared home. Lots of sweet touches! Thank you for the TV and Netflix! I was a little bummed that the room smelled like cigarette smoke because I had read in the description that smoking is only allowed outside. The only things that would have made the room even better is a new mattress. Light sleepers should know that this room faces a pretty busy neighborhood throughway.

Cute little room with a large TV and an almost private bath. Lots of personal touches like sunscreen, coffee, and candies! Very private, we almost didn’t know anyone else was home. I loved the separate entrance. The price is incredible and the room feels like you’re staying in your family’s spare room. It was perfect for our needs. I would definitely recommend this room!
Great price and location was perfect. Host were very nice. 5 stars
Very clean and private.
quiet neighborhood convenient to downtown & tbe highway.   Riley made it a very comfortable stay!

This was an ideal place for me, quiet, clean, thoughtful amenties and within walking distance of Amtrak, Greyhound and Safeway. The two hosts were wonderful to chat with. Had a very nice time and would definately stay here again if i go back to Salem.
It's a private room attached to the host's house. It'spretty private. Hosts do a good job communicating.
I’ve stayed here multiple times and it’s great!
Súper cómodo  y privado !

I spent three nights at Riley's place in Salem. It's really cozy and comfortable with lots of thoughtful touches. I was in the midst of work projects, and finished a couple of deadlines while I was there--the internet worked great. I loved that the room was safe and private, and also close to downtown.  It's an excellent value. I'd gladly stay again.
Very nice walkable neighborhood.  Riley is a super good host, very welcoming and accommodating.  Would definitely stay there again.

I stayed at Riley's house for a week, I had my own entrance to the bedroom from the driveway, and from the room I could access the rest of the house, like a bathroom that was for my use only. The room was very well equipped for a week, and it included coffee and tea, a little table, extra towels,  blankets, and a TV with Netflix. The kitchen was well equipped and there was access to the laundry too, although I didn't use it. Riley respected my privacy, and was always happy to adjust anything like more room in the fridge for my food or give me some recommendations for the life in the city.

Very nice hosts. Travelers should know that the house is not very sound or smell insulated. The room is next to the kitchen and you can smell and hear everything that happens in the house. I’m not particularly sound sensitive, but the smell was a bit much for me. This spot was an excellent value and perfect for what I needed—an affordable place to stay in Salem for several days.

Lots of nice little touches like chargers for your device. Hosts were very friendly and quick with replying to messages. The mattress is uncomfortable; my back didn’t feel good after two nights on in.
Great host! Fast communication! Private room in a great spot in the city. Walking distance to everything. 10/10

Riley is a friendly guy. He is easy going and is very welcoming. The room is pretty comfortable and in a good neighborhood. If you are looking for a a good place to stay, definitely check this place out. 😌

This was my first ever air b&b stay and I must say IT WAS A GREAT EXPERIENCE!! Everything from beginning to end was super easy. When we got there (very late at that)  we had our own side of the driveway, our own door to the room with our own pin.  The room itself was super cozy, very clean with a  comfy bed, we had access to our own bathroom, access to a kitchen, washer/dryer and even toiletries!! I had the pleasure of meeting Riley, Cory and even Delta (the cat) and they're such great peeps, I'm glad I was able to find them!!! I know where I'll be staying again when I do end up going back to Salem, hopefully they'll be available then!!
This a perfect spot if you are looking for peace and quiet for your stay. I work as a traveling nurse and this property is perfect when you have brief stays for a good sleep between shifts.

Perfect space for our week long stay, Riley had everything we could need in our room for us! The room and bathroom felt very private, and the separate entrance was nice since I am a night shift travel nurse and came home early in the mornings. Definitely recommend booking, host was very friendly, and great with communication. I would definitely stay again.
Perfect for what i needed.
Ruth was easy to communicate with and helpful. This place was simple and was good for a quick stay, and the yard is really nice!
I had a wonderful stay. It was simple and very quiet. The host is very kind and easy to communicate with. What a treat to be able to stay in this unique space.

Ruth's bunkhouse was a perfect fit for my needs. I have family a couple of blocks away and it was getting a little too crowded and crazy after the holidays. The bunkhouse was warm and cozy with eccentric decor and positioned in a fun garden/backyard. With no plumbing and a dry toilet, it might not be for everyone but I personally liked those touches and the effort to keep it green. Would recommend for someone looking for a simple, quiet, and affordable place to rest.

Ruth's Bunkhouse is great! It's a small space, but a great value for the location and she has made it very nice and cozy inside. Ruth was very hospitable and welcoming, and even added some nice little touches such as some snacks, tea, and coffee. Would definitely recommend staying here!
It’s more of a well-converted garden shed than a tiny house but if you don’t need much in terms of amenities and just want a place to crash, it’s very cozy and a great price!
Nice host, good location, great value.
Ruth, the host is lovely and very accommodating. I love the bungalow and it was very easy to get to where I needed to go. would deathly recommend staying there.
Had a great quick getaway. Really comfortable staying out in the bunkhouse. Communication was easy and felt very hospitable

My stay at Ruth’s was truly remarkable. She catered to me in a time of need and was incredibly respectful of COVID protocol. The space was perfect for a cute, self sustained getaway and Ruth/ her tiny home catered to all my necessities and beyond, especially for the price! I stayed for a week during a quarantine after weeks of fighting fires and found myself feeling a sense of home that brought tears to my eyes. Salem is a beautiful city with so much to see and explore and Ruth’s Airbnb was an amazing base to head out of hikes, and take (social distanced) walks. Thank you thank you thank you Ruth! It was the truest pleasure and I wish you luck on your future guests, as well as future stays when you explore the Southwest!

I had a great stay, Ruth is a fantastic host, and the place is really charming. Be sure to read the (very accurate) description of the place, because it isn't for everyone, I imagine. If you're comfortable living without some of your usual every day luxuries, you'll really enjoy staying at the bunkhouse.
Excellent communication.

The Bunkhouse is a delightful space that is something of a cross between a tiny house and a cabin. The area is comfortable and cozy and has a good selection of books. Furthermore, Ruth is a wonderful host. I highly recommend the Bunkhouse!

Nice little cabin feel. It was a really nice size for me and my little dog. She got to run around the yard too which was really convenient. There was some food and tea available that made my mornings and evenings extra special.

i absolutely loved staying at the bunkhouse. i felt so welcomed by ruth. she left many thoughtful touches, and her warmth is unparalleled. the bunkhouse is adorable and just what i needed to slow down and reconnect with myself. the space adapted well to my needs, and everything i needed was there. nice neighborhood to walk through with a creek nearby.

Ruth was very helpful and quick to respond.  I thought not having running water would be a huge hassle but it wasn't that bad and Ruth provided me with plenty if water. Overall I would 100% recommend and would stay again.
Really nice!
Beautiful tiny house in the heart of Salem! Ruth is so sweet and a fantastic host. I would gladly stay again.

This place is truly special to stay at. Ruth is an incredible host, supportive of a wonderful stay. Lots of heart and beautiful creativity in this space, that allows for quiet respite. Would definitely recommend if you are in the Salem area. I was fortunate to stay here for 3 months while finishing up grad school and easily found shower etc… and incredibly grateful to have been able to be hosted by Ruth.
The bunkhouse was a great spot for me to temporarily call home! Ruth was a responsive host and the home met all my needs.
The bunkhouse is a definite must if you are ok with a simple way of life. Communication was great and Ruth will go out oh her way to make sure you got what you need!

Jennifer is well on her way to being a Super Host. She is Very responsive, the home was spotless, plush linens and a chef's kitchen. Excellent location; close to downtown and adjacent to Bush Pasture Park. My new home in Salem!
Beautiful space, set right in the middle of town it was my first stay and my best one
Very comfortable stay!
Very clean, very comfortable and easy access to the capital and other central areas. Room was spacious
Super nice rooms, quiet and very comfortable.

Just what I needed.....I had been living in Salem for 3 months while working at Salem Health and had one more month to go.  While the initial hosts (not an airbnb) were nice the living conditions were not.  I rented from these airbnb hosts for the last month I was in Salem and it was wonderful.  The hosts are super nice, quick to respond, and always available for any needs.  As my month was ending, I felt more like I was staying with friends and in their warm welcoming home.  Highly recommend if you are visiting Salem or if working at Salem Health as it's a very close and in walking distance.

Outstanding value! A very nice room that was comfy and super clean. It was close to the convention center and saved my business considerable dollars. Jennifer is a wonderful host and made my check-in and stay very easy.
Great place to stay. Cute, clean and the bed was super comfortable. I would stay here again!
Super clean, quiet, lots of space and great location!
Recomendado!!!
Jennifer will definitely go the extra mile, she's a great hostess!
Jennifer was concerned with making my daughters stay special. I appreciate how Jennifer went out of her way to make my daughter comfortable.
I stayed there in preparation for a new job and it was a great place to crash! Home away from home! Thanks Jennifer!!

Jennifer and her family have a great place to stay, particularity if you are looking for a convenient location close to the State hospital  or state offices. The house setup itself is exactly the right mix of privacy and shared space.
really great place to rest my head

Jennifer really is a superhost!! This is an excellent listing! I give it a 10 star rating!
you get so much for the value of what you get for what you're spending. I love the room I was staying in the bed is very comfortable, I truly enjoyed having my privacy. And even though I shared a bathroom with another Airbnb guest it didn't feel like I was sharing it with anyone at all. Beautiful house, with a whole lot of amenities at your fingertips! my room is very private and I needed a two-day rest from a long work week as many hours and that's exactly what I got! Thank you so much Jennifer! I will stay here again and again. Very clean & Tidy and Wonderful host!!
Thanks so much for this beautiful play

Jennifer rents out 4 bedrooms and has a lovely living and dining room and a nice sized kitchen. There are 2 bedrooms per floor that share a bathroom. We stayed upstairs with a Craig who was very welcoming and his adorable 2 year old.

The mattress is extremely soft so if you have any back problems, this may be an issue.

Her house is located in a quiet neighborhood.

I love this place!
great location
Staying in Jennifers place was amazing, place is clean and calm, hope i will be able to visit this place again!
Lovely house with some very cool folks. Would definitely come back !
Enjoyed my stay, thank you!
Read the listing carefully.  Bathrooms are shared. Street parking is limited.  Bedroom was adequately furnished. Good window air conditioner.  Locks on doors ensure privacy.
The Airbnb was SPECTACTULAR and the hosts were very considerate & flexible with us. Would definitely rent again! :) And Craig was nice!
Jennifer was a great host!! Super accommodating and understanding as well!! Thank you Jennifer, we appreciate your hospitality!
Tuve una estancia agradable en el alojamiento de Jennifer. recomendable

Robert and Karen were very friendly and the venue exceeded our expectations.

Great location and it was a very clean & stocked house. A must stay if you're planning to visit the area.
Robert was an outstanding host.  His home is beautifully designed. From the first day to the last, Robert was always quick when communicating, providing the best hospitality throughout our stay.

Hands down THE best Airbnb experience we have EVER had. The home was more stunning than the pictures portray. The location was supreme (we had fresh cherries picked from a tree on an EMPTY lot every morning during our walk!). It could not have been more perfect! Every single thing we could possibly need was in this house. We lacked nothing!  Communication with Robert (who lives in Europe!) was always timely and we had a local contact if needed. In the age of COVID, Robert was more than understanding of our concerns and addressed them with the utmost respect & compassion. We were so sad leaving and are already trying to figure out when we can return. This vacation, which was difficult for us as we moved our son up to Salem for school & “adulting” was made less difficult by having this gorgeous home to return to each day after the hours of helping our son. We will be back!! Thank you Robert for trusting us in your ultra comfortable, showpiece of a home.

Roberts place exceeded our expectations. The house is beautifully designed and very thoughtfully put together; the upscale kitchen had all the appliances we needed, and the view was incredible. Robert is also very responsive and was glad to have an opportunity to meet in person. Would recommend this place without any reservation.

Roberts home is not only stunning both inside and out but the amenities, cleanliness and thoughtfulness that went into this BnB is top notch. My family and I loved our stay and can't wait to visit again. If you are coming to Salem, stop your search now. Robert's place is one of a kind and you won't be disappointed.
Such an amazing place. Robert was an amazing host and we couldn't have asked for anything more in our stay

An absolutely wonderful stay! The house is beautiful with many meaningful touches to the decoration. We stayed for a little over a month, and the house started to feel like home. Robert is an outstanding host who really cares about making the stay comfortable. The house is stocked with all kitchen/daily life essentials. Would recommend to anyone who is visiting Salem.

This is probably the best Airbnb we have stayed in.  It’s like living in a 1960’s movie set, or a museum, but with many modern touches.  Robert is a great communicator, and he has stocked the house with everything that you could possibly need.  The view is incredible, the beds are comfortable and the kitchen and bathrooms are clean.  We highly recommend this house.

My friend and I stayed in Robert’s home for 2 months. It was a beautiful home in a very safe neighborhood. The views were incredible! Robert was very quick to respond to any needs. We would love to come back! :)

Beautiful spotless home in a quiet neighborhood.  Awesome views, great period furnishings.  Comfortable sleeping accommodations.  Close to downtown,  Host very responsive to questions and all our needs.  Thumbs up...
One of a kind with amazing views!

Robert is an attentive, communicative host--simply the best I've encountered on AirB&B. The house is well appointed, and the kitchen well equipped with anything you need for cooking. The linens are top quality, and I appreciated having skylights in the bathrooms and walk-in closet.

The covered patio off the sunroom/kitchen has a table with comfortable chairs, and the grassy yard off the living room is perfect for tai chi or yoga. Overall, the property is impeccable, with beautiful landscaping. And the view . . . well, it's astounding. A delight to watch the sun change on the coastal range while looking out over the Willamette Valley and Minto-Brown Park.

Note that the bottom level of the house is an apartment; it has a separate entrance, and the tenant is quiet and respectful, but you will hear some noise and see her (and her small dog) in the yard below.

I was in search of renting a mid-century modern home in Oregon and immediately settled on Mulberry House when I saw the pictures of the home. Robert was very easy to communicate with (even though he lives in Paris and there is a considerable time difference) and he was very flexible when my dates shifted a bit. The home is lovely and exceeded my expectations. The gardens are tranquil and filled with flowering trees and I was delighted to be able to enjoy them during Spring. On one or two days, the temp reached the mid/high 80s and I was grateful for the option of turning on the AC for a bit. The kitchen was well outfitted and I was able to cook as I do at home. Minto Brown park is close by and I spent many afternoons walking around and exploring it. It was an idyllic two weeks and I am looking forward to renting again in the near future. 💓

It was a very stylish house. Very accurate with the photos. Perfect view and very good neighborhood.
Our team loved the place.

We rented Robert's house for the weekend during Willamette's graduation ceremonies. It was the ideal spot for our family to return to at the end of the day after enjoying Salem, wine country, and the coast. Since the graduation was virtual, the house even provided a nice backdrop as our daughter was spotlighted over zoom during the ceremony. The house is well equipped, clean, and has a super cool mid-century modern vibe. It is in a quiet neighborhood and has a gorgeous view of the sunset. If we ever return to Salem, I would definitely want to stay here again. I am an Airbnb host myself, so I know when it is done right. I highly recommend this house!
Beautiful home in Salem. Very clean with comfy beds and lots of space .

My family and I had a relaxing time at Robert’s home.  We were in Salem for a wedding.  We were able to relax with all the comforts of home. The house is conveniently located close to anything you may need in Salem.
Perfect place. The view and windows were amazing. Authentic and more than the photos can capture. Recommended x 10.

Could not be more wonderful. The house is spectacular, clean, stylish and a beautiful place to come home to.
Beds super comfortable. The place was spotless. Robert was the perfect host, we enjoyed meeting him.
Will return for sure, you won’t find a better airbnb.
Beautiful home!  excellent location, spotless and amazing views! will be back in the future!

This is a one of a kind place to stay while visiting Salem. Robert has done a wonderful job of making this home both stylish and comfortable. Check in was a breeze and communication with Robert is very easy. The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful, and super close to Minto Brown Park. My wife and baby and I enjoyed all of the spaces, including the outdoor patio and indoor fireplace. We would love to stay here again when we are in the area.
This is a beautiful place to stay when visiting Salem. Everything was very comfortable and well supplied.

Beautiful house, very clean. We loved the fireplace was great for visiting family. Everything went very smoothly. I may have missed it when booking this air bnb but my family and I weren’t aware that there is a permanent tenant living in the lower house. When we got to the air bnb we heard a dog bark downstairs as we were confused we read the guest book and it informed us then but not before booking. At first we were all confused  but now we know and we visit Salem often so we would 100% rebook for more family vacation.  Great house for friend and family to get together!

We so enjoyed our stay here! Robert is an excellent host, checks in with you and is quick to respond with any questions you may have.

And that view! Gorgeous. Would highly recommend this home and will be back someday.

Robert home is located in Salem only 7 minutes from the hospital that we were working for a contract. The home is equipped with every basic necessities needed. Beautiful home over looking the valley , very quiet and serene neighborhood. Loved waking up and looking over the valley from my bedroom. The house is in a very nice location driving to site seeing was easy no hassle, a must stay while in Oregon ! Although there’s a tenant downstairs and her cute dog 🐶, we didn’t have any issues with her , she is a lovely lady and her dog didn’t make any sound whatsoever. We were here for 8 weeks and staying here was all worth it ! Thank you Robert for opening your home to us !! And we hope to be back soon to visit Oregon !!

This home was absolutely beautiful, perfect for our group of 4. We loved the fireplace, the beautiful evening views and sunsets. The best place to come home to after exploring the Valley and wine tasting.

Great, special house just as the owner described. Beautiful, mid-century charm with spectacular landscape and views. Peaceful, quiet, everything you need. Minutes to downtown. We had a family gathering for a college graduation: all of us were extremely comfortable and vey taken aback by the quality and condition of the home and furnishings. Lucky to find such a unique, well-maintained and equipped place. Strongest recommendation.

I can't say enough about how much we enjoyed this airbnb.  There's light everywhere and the mid-century modern decor is fantastic.  There's a very well-equipped kitchen and a spectacular fireplace for those rainy nights.  We felt very comfortable and it was great to come back to every night.
Every word of praise for this home is well deserved. PERIOD!

The Mulberry house was everything and more! My family and I enjoyed the house so much!  After long days of sightseeing we were able to come back to the Mulberry house relax and spend time together sitting outside, playing games or watching Netflix. Very comfortable!!

Wonderful home. Well stocked kitchen, nice appliances and evening views to die for. Very centrally located for wine tasting, day trips to Portland, Newport Beach, Mount Hood and of course wine tasting. Comfortable beds and plenty of room to spread out. Neighborhood was nice and safe. I enjoyed walks admiring neighbors landscaping and quaint homes.

This stay was fantastic. Host cares about details so it was like having a vacation at home…except cooler! Home is decorated with mid century care and design work that takes trust and care. The kitchen and outside are suited for everything you need to enjoy meals at home. The area is easy and cool and a departure! Plenty of comfortable space. Recommend strongly for those who want to get completely away.
One of the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. Beautiful house, spacious and well stocked kitchen. Really recommend!

This place was everything as described - a tranquil location in a very quiet neighborhood - magnificent views of the distant mountains - and pitch perfect accommodations. Everything had been thought of - couldn't find fault of any sort. A really well equipped kitchen for cooks and two chill out spaces - one with TV and one without - this one essential for you to enjoy the calm and quality of the mid-century decor. Quite stunning.
We briefly met Colette - the downstairs neighbor - and Katie, her dog - after which we heard not a sound from below - no intrusion whatsoever - but very nice to know that there is a 'local' on hand if required.
I have no reservation in recommending this excellent property for an 'upscale' stay in Salem.

I stayed at Robert's place for about 2 weeks while my home in the area was being renovated. I was relieved to be able to leave my construction zone of a house and be welcomed with such a beautiful and comfortable place to settle into. It was absolutely spotless, beautifully furnished and the kitchen was not only as well stocked as my own, but with cookware of quality that you can actually use! I have found this to not be very common when staying at other BnB's, the few things that are supplied are often in a condition that makes it difficult to cook with. I found clear instructions and info posted throughout the home, making it easy to settle in and know how things work and what the expectations were. The neighborhood is absolutely beautiful and friendly and the view from the living spaces is incredible. I caught so many stunning sunsets while relaxing by the fireplace in the living room. I highly recommend a stay here, you won't be disappointed!
Another great stay. Highly recommended!
Always a great visit!

AMAZING. We stayed for an entire month and it had everything you could thing to need! So many beautiful touches, a super safe neighborhood near the busline and so many restaurants. This is the place to be.

I would 100% recommend staying here, I am so sad to be leaving. I was here for 6 weeks and I had everything I needed! It has tons of great amenities, like a fireplace, a garage, washer dryer, dishwasher, full kitchen, two TVs with Xfinity, and a super comfy king sized bed. The location was great. Judy was a great host and was always quick getting back to me and is just a friendly person. I really hope I can stay here again!

Our stay at Judy’s place was very comfortable and nice, (despite new rules around Coronavirus). The home is/was well equipped, with everything we needed for our extended stay. Having a kitchen set up that someone has taken care to include everything, as well as a washer and dryer in the unit, exceptional.
We enjoyed our stay, being able to walk to Bush Park and Roadhouse. The neighborhood felt very safe and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this duplex to others.
(A new barbecue was delivered, while we were there, but we didn’t get a chance to use it). The hosts responded to questions/inquiries quickly and were very helpful and accommodating.
Great choice for us. Thank you.

Judy’s place was really comfortable and location to downtown, Bush Park, and Minto Brown rec area was ideal. Lots of nice touches and Judy was very responsive and easy to communicate with!
Would definitely stay here again!
Pleasantly comfortable and cozy!
Very nice stay. Beautiful flowers in back yard.
Judy's place was very clean, easy to find, close to everything.  The neighborhood was nice and quiet. A great kitchen!
Great space!

Great place to relax and enjoy Salem. Judy’s place is quiet, clean, and beautifully updated. Added extras include a garage, back patio. and washing machine/dryer. With all of this and close proximity to downtown, Bush Pasture Park, and Minto Brown Island Park, you can’t go wrong
This place was a cute little place with such a homey vibe.
Beautiful space with lovely owners. Dog friendly which was a major plus. Would absolutely recommend staying here when you visit the Salem area.
Judy's space was exactly as described. Perfectly located with stylish accents, comfy and warm. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who is traveling in the area.

Everything was absolutely perfect, right down to the littlest details. Tealight candles, a beautiful backyard garden, and the most comfortable couch I've ever had the pleasure of lounging on. Beautiful view through the windows, and so much natural light. Such a wonderful experience!
Great host, great place!
Judy’s place was a great value. The place is clean and stylish. Judy had all of the thoughtful touches to really make the place feel like a home away from home.

Judy’s place offered perfect comfort, quietness and conveniences for the 10 days I stayed.  It is immaculately clean.  Kitchen is well-stocked.  Couch is great for watching tv and unwinding after a long work day.  Lovely fireplace.   Good mattress.  Nice shower.  Plenty of hangers - much appreciated for a longish stay.  Washer & dryer conveniently located & worked great.  Didn’t have any difficulty with onstreet parking.  Good restaurants nearby.  Judy responded very quickly to all communications and check-in was a breeze.

places is great!! fantastic views and super clean!! I just recommend always parking your car in the garage or in front of the garage because they do have issues with people stealing things out of cars on the street. all in all though I would definitely recommend this to someone else as a great place to stay if you're looking for a nice place in Salem!!!!

Judy was the pinnacle of hospitality. She was very helpful both before and during my stay with things like adjusting the dates of my stay and answering all my questions about the area. The space itself was wonderfully homey, and had everything I needed.

Judy and Fadd were great hosts and the place was amazing. It had everything I could possibly need for a 3 month stay and if anything came up, they were always there to help! Would recommend this stay x100000!

Great place with many thoughtful amenities
Great location and very comfortable. The best value I have seen on Airbnb
Wonderful place to stay. Very clean and Judy was very timely in all communications.

This is a wonderful home in a great location. We always have an extension cord with us so we were prepared when we needed to charge our phones when sitting on the sofa. Other than that small thing, the home is 100%!
Nice and clean. Great bedroom and living room.Perfect for 2 people.Easy access to downtown Salem area.Great communication with host.

This place is just as described. Comfortable landing pad in the middle of a cute and quiet, older neighborhood. Really appreciated the use of the garage, so we didn’t need to unload everything each evening. Bed and couch were comfortable. Grateful that the stairs from the back were easy for my older dog. Everything was really clean. We don’t travel to Salem often, but would stay here again.
Very clean and cutely decorated. Was a good stay!

My husband and I stayed at the duplex for a week while visiting our daughter in Salem. The unit is the perfect size for 2 people and is very private. It was very clean and had everything we needed for our stay, including pots, utensils, basic cooking spices, coffee pot and coffee, sugar, etc. Having a washer and dryer was an added bonus especially since we were there a full week. The king-size bed was comfortable, there were plenty of towels, and shampoo and conditioner as well as a blow dryer were provided. We appreciate that Judy graciously let us check in early given that we arrived on a morning flight.

This was our first ever airbnb and our family just loved this darling place!!! Very clean and put together! Little extra touches here and there- blow dryer, full set of appliances, washer and dryer and more!! The host were amazing and kind! Answered questions in a very timely manner and made sure everything was going OK!Definitely will be back and will be staying again!!
Great property and location.!  We really appreciated the cleanliness and having a place to garage our car.

Great home in a great location. We felt the description matched our expectations well. It was perfect for two with a relaxing living room, great TV, well equipped kitchen and comfortable bed. We enjoyed walking the neighborhood and the local restaurants.

Great little place just outside downtown Salem.  Kitchen very well stocked with cooking supplies and everything needed to make great meals at home.  The interior space is very nice and well maintained.  Only drawback is the AC is located in the living room, which meant the bedroom was a bit warm.  We would be happy to stay again!
Loved the location
Great location. Judy was very accommodating and responsive. The house was clean and well-stocked. No complaints.

We really enjoyed our stay here. It is well supplied and in an ideal location close to downtown, parks and local restaurants. It is also located just on the periphery of an older, well established neighborhood that includes many well cared for homes and the governor’s home. A nice location for strolls around the neighborhood.
We definitely recommend this place for a couple looking for a convenient home base.
No complaints
Judy's place is just as described. This is my second stay and I'll be back. It's nice have a full kitchen and the washer/dryer for extended stays. The place is always very clean and tidy.
The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because you could hear the neighbors.   You have to remember that when you're booking.  It is a duplex.

My family had a wonderful time staying in Judy’s home. It was filled with everything we needed including a pull out bed for one of our children. The house was clean, stylish and located in a great part of town walking distance to parks, downtown waterfront, and more. She was easy to communicate with and very kind. We will definitely stay here again!
This little place was a perfect weekend getaway!  Close to downtown, but nice and quiet!  The bed is comfy and the new kitchen is well stocked!  We would stay here again!

Great spot in a very pleasant neighborhood with a very decent coffee shop - gotta have my morning latte. Comfortable bed, plenty of relaxing seating for watching a movie, and  a well set up kitchen. We took an easy enjoyable walk to Bush Gardens and another just around the neighborhood.
Awesome place to stay, great location.

We stayed at judy and faddy's place for a month. The house was perfect in a quiet and serene neighborhood, with lots of trees and nature. There is an amazing view of the river that is a 5 minute walk from the house.
The house itself is perfect! The living room is cosy yet spacious, with an amazing fireplace and a very comfortable couch. The bedroom is also very spacious with lots of closet space. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything we needed and then some! The laundry room was so handy and easy to use, and the garage was just perfect. But above all that, what really shined through is Judy's and Faddy's generosity and kindness! Rarely do you have the privilege to be met by such genuine warm-heartedness as we have experienced from our lovely hosts. I would recommend anybody travelling to the area to grab this lovely airbnb if you get the chance. It is simply PERFECT! Hope (and plan) to come back next year and stay at this lovely airbnb!
Judy’s home was a great place to stay! Her home was clean and comfortable and had everything I needed. I really enjoyed staying there while visiting my daughter for the holiday’s.

Judy’s place was the perfect cozy spot! The neighborhood was safe and quiet, while also being close to downtown, tons of shops and restaurants, and an easy drive to I-5. The furnishings were all comfortable, and the house was very clean. We had a great stay, and will definitely look to stay here again in the future.

We stayed at Judy and Fadd's for 6 weeks during our own house remodel. It was a perfect location, was nicely furnished, and it had all of the amenities we needed. When an unexpected repair needed to be made, Judy and Fadd were very responsive, extremely considerate of our schedule, and made the repair quickly. We couldn't have had a better experience overall!

The Duplex is a wonderful space in a great walkable neighborhood. We really loved having a garage. The kitchen, WiFi, gas fireplace, comfortable bed, full size clothes washer and dryer, and closet space all made for a very good month long stay in Salem. I highly recommend this space.
Clean and well equipped.  Location is convenient.  I felt very at home here.

Judy's place was a lovely, cozy little spot to get away and relax. Everything I needed was right there and I was incredibly grateful for the quiet. Communication was great, home was sparkling clean and I would definitely stay again and will recommend it to others.

Location, Location, Location
The best location in Salem you can find on Airbnb. You can easily reach almost everything on your foot. We immensely enjoyed our morning walk in the park a couple of blocks away from the house. The gorgeous neighborhood that we enjoyed during our evening walk.
Please, next time you visit Salem, please, please visit the Deepwood Museum. The museum is an excellent example of preserving history.

Our visit was perfect! Communication with the host was easy and smooth. The house was very clean and comfortable, exactly what we needed for our trip. The house had all the comforts of home and was in a great location. Easy access to stores, restaurants and downtown Salem. We visit Salem twice a year for The Great Junk Hunt and we’ll definitely stay here again.

We absolutely loved staying here while visiting family in Salem. The neighborhood is perfect for taking walks and convenient to everything! We like long walks, so we could even walk downtown or to nearby bush park. It’s absolutely beautiful in the spring time and I’m sure it would be in the fall as well. We hope to stay here again next time we’re in town.

We liked the quiet, large 1 bedroom with cozy sectional couch and beautiful kitchen. Great location to explore Salem. Garage space was awesome. Neighborhood is cute, many historic bungalows and cute houses.

What a lovely home. It was cozy, clean, bed was comfortable and it had everything one would need. I’ve stayed in many homes that only had the bare essentials…… but this place lacked nothing. What a cute neighborhood too. I felt very safe staying on my own. I would definitely stay here again!

If you are looking for a wonderful stay in Salem, this is your place. Judy has made the home so comfy for you and your pup. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need, the king size bed is comfy and the neighborhood is fantastic.

The house is near the riverfront, great place to visit all the Willamette Wineries as well as waterfalls!
Our second stay here.  Having the garage is nice.  Having a washer and dryer is awesome!  Great place to stay!
We were very happy with our accommodations and would most definitely stay again.  Comfortable and clean.  We appreciated the great communication with our host.  10 out of 10 experience.
Very responsive.  Description was accurate.   Would rent again.
Clean, comfortable and quiet. Short walk to one of the best tea houses I've ever been to.

Lovely, clean, well-stocked duplex in a quiet neighborhood close to downtown Salem. One of the pluses of staying there was access to a private garage. The backyard is very small, maybe 10 x 20 ft, fenced, but shared with the other neighbor in the duplex. I took several walks around the neighborhood and walked a few blocks to Bush's Pasture Park. Lots of shopping and eating along Commercial St. and Liberty St. Riverfront Park is just a short drive away.
Wine country is just west of Salem and is worth seeing.
Great house/host.  Convenient location; lots of nearby shops and places to eat, walking distance to downtown. Clean and well-maintained house. Great communication from host.
Great location, close to downtown. Super clean.  Judy is very responsive and a great host.

This was just a heavenly stay after our long journey to Oregon from Iowa. Clean, comfortable and thoughtfully appointed! The neighborhood is adorable and was safe to walk our dog. Close to everything fun in Salem! Loved it.
Cute duplex and great location!
Wonderful cozy home close to downtown Salem. Had everything we needed and a great backyard garden. Highly recommend and would stay there again. Thank you Judy!
Quiet neighborhood, close to attractions.
it felt like we were right at home I would definitely stay there again would recommend it to anyone
What a sweet home!! It was so incredibly tidy and Judy was amazing!
We had a wonderful stay and hope to stay again when next in Salem!  Thank you!

This place was perfect for our stay in Salem. Well stocked, clean and very comfortable. The garage is a bonus! Quiet neighborhood that feels safe. Would definitely stay again if ever back in the area!
Great place to stay.  Walking to Bush Park and Riverfront Park is a short drive.  Nice restaurant around the corner.  Will stay again.

This was our second time staying at Judy’s place - it’s a perfect cozy spot for a couple. Nice and quiet, comfortable seating and bedding, and convenient to lots of stores and restaurants in Salem (and a quick drive to I5).
Perfect, clean, excellent place.  Nice proximity to the University and downtown.  Thank you.
Apartment is smartly set up, covers everything you need for a short stay.  Great location, close to main streets but the neighborhood is quiet and attractive.
A very nice place very comfortable and cozy.

I loved my stay at Judy's rental here in Salem, OR. The home felt like a family members, filled with all your necessities, like a cozy broken-in and fluffy leather couch, hard candies in baskets and cozy blankets. The small garden with a patio set in the back was a peaceful spot to have our coffees, and a walk around the neighborhood with the dog was a breath of fresh air. The neighbors were kind and chatty, and we spotted quite a few very happy cats lounging outside their houses which was so sweet.

Judy's home is incredibly clean, comfortable and quiet. This is our second time staying and we would definitely recommend it to others. Plenty of thoughtful touches and a very cozy vibe that feels like home.
Comfortable, quiet and well-stocked duplex, thanks Judy!
A great place to stay. Very attractive. Sufficiently roomy for two people. Also room to have a friend or two over there. Great neighborhood. Great value.

Judy’s place in salem is the perfect place to stay. The unit had easy access to downtown and is only an hour from the coast. Lots of cute businesses near by. The unit has an awesome bed, is well stocked with anything you will need and has laundry and a cozy loving room. Was perfect for a week long business trip. Easy on the street parking and location close to grocery stores made it convenient! Checkin was easy and Judy was very responsive ! Highly recommend when staying in salem!

We had a great stay at Judy’s! It was very clean and comfortable. We loved walking up to the main street with cute shops and restaurants. We slept well and look forward to returning next time we’re in Salem.
Our 2nd stay - so wonderful, and we plan to come back again soon! Thanks so much
I would stay there again in a heartbeat. It was so comfortable and felt like a home away from home.

Very nice place!
Small, but comfortable with everything you would want.
Friendly and responsive host!
Great location!
Nice quiet neighborhood but
still very close to downtown shopping and dining.
We have stayed here several time and look forward to coming again next month!
The house was clean and well appointed with everything you need. I had a great stay and would recommend this place.
We feel so comfortable here, having stayed several times.  Judy is great at responding to any questions right away.  Hope to come again in the late Spring!
Great place, convenient location, great host!

This space is great for couples or groups.
Thoughtful touches, a fully thought out kitchen and very tidy and cozy rooms.

We would absolutely stay here again!
My mom fell in love with this place. If we ever go back to Oregon we will definitely consider staying with Tim & Lisa again!!
Very clean and well taken care of place. Other tenants that live in the home are easy going and quiet that you hardly notice them.

We loved this house! I don’t even want to say how much we enjoyed it because it’s going to be all rented up when we want to stay again!

The kitchen is greatly equipped! Thoughtful touches in the bathroom and kitchen area. We loved the chalkboard wall and thankful wall.

My son loved the small space with tv and play station. My daughter claimed the hammock chair and enjoyed a book in it. I can’t wait to enjoy the deck during a summer stay.

It was very clean and the owners are super quick to respond!
Tim and Lisa's home was lovely and spacious. We especially loved "Tim's Cave". The home was very quiet and there were no issues with the other tenants on the property.
Sparkling clean!  Comfortable beds with all the amenities!  The kids loved the chalk board wall and loft!  We would stay again.

Great place for the value! Had three very comfy beds and lots of room. Easy access too. Parking is limited to two spaces due to other living on the property (you won’t run into them), but we parked nearby. Thanks to Tim and Lisa!
Great place to stay! Clean and accommodating

Excellent home! Very well maintained and very clean. Host responded quickly anytime I had a question. Close to downtown. Beds were comfortable and clean. I had no issues or complaints from my stay. Thanks again
Was very cute and felt at home!!!! We loved it there and would come back most definitely!!!!!
Great home away from home!
We enjoyed our stay here and we would stay here again.
Stay here and chill!
It is a good house for a family, good price/quality value, my son was able to do homeschooling from there and my husband was able to work from there. Kitchen has everything you need.
Nice little space and a great value for the money.   Hosts are awesome, respectful and communicated well.
Very neat clean and spacious place close to town. Recommend 👌🏼
The home is cute, but older with some unique design features that make it hard to access the upstairs area.
Tim & Lisa's place was very comfortable! We stayed there for one week and they have everything we need. It was not far from downtown. We had a great time! Thanks, Tim & Lisa!
Great place to go with family or friends to stay in and be cozy! We’ll definitely recommend.
Quaint place with a cozy feel.
Great place!!!
Very clean home with great hospitality.
This home is super clean, it has everything you need to cook,  it’s beautiful and really comfortable, my family and I enjoyed very very much.

Such a beautiful home. Me and my family were very comfortable during our stay. The rooms are great sizes and the bathroom was nice. Tim and Lisa are both great hosts! I was in town for my grandfathers funeral and they sent us a beautiful plant with a sweet note. It brought a smile to the entire family. Such a small gesture but meant a lot to us. Would definitely stay again. 10/10 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

While our stay had to be cancelled last minute due to an unforeseen snow storm, Tim and Lisa went out of their way to make sure we received a full refund and even called customer support on our behalf. I look forward to staying with them in the future.

Tim and Lisa’s home is a hidden gem! They are the sweetest host and responded to us very quickly. The house was so cute and clean! I loved having coffee on the swing on the front porch and even had a little fire pit in the yard for s’mores. Shower pressure and temperature were amazing if that’s something that is important to you! They have everything you need and more in their home! They went above and beyond to make sure we felt as comfortable as possible! Their home was a home away from home as a travel RN. It was the perfect long stay, even offered to have the house cleaned. During this pandemic and so much uncertainty we’re extremely grateful to have found Tim and Lisa’s home. Thank you both again!
The backyard is perfect for relaxing with the family

Great place to stay - clean and comfortable. Definitely appreciated having kitchen, laundry and a backyard. Hosts were very prompt and clear in communication. Be aware that the stairs to the second floor can be a little difficult, even for an able-bodied person.

Less then 10hour notice and there place was all ready for me and my teenagers to occupy,had no problem with anything, second floor steps are steep but are manageable using rail ..There’s a little cove with a Tv probably for little ones but I enjoyed the experience of being in there watching a movie thanks Tim/Lisa this house will be on my list of places to stay the next time I come to visit hopefully on better circumstances …Peace and love lots of hugs ..Adriana

A really nice stay in Salem! Plenty of room, great location, everything you need in the kitchen, comfortable beds and a nice outdoor patio. Working WiFi and laundry machines. We wished for more than a blanket on the bed and a working ice maker but were happy with the value and enough space for our whole family to be very comfortable. We will stay here again!
Excellent stay for the price!
Easy check-in, easy to communicate with hosts.
A lovely and tidy residence with plenty of room for 4 adults.  We found the bed in room 3 extremely comfortable.  Our wonderful and easy to work with.  We will stay here again.
Great home and great communication! Tim/Lisa were super sweet! The home was clean and very spacious!
Really cute, clean, in town spot in Salem!

I booked this while I was in town for my wedding from out of state. I was pleased with the amount of space the house had to offer along with its location. Very clean with a cute front porch with a bench swing along with a nice back deck. Would book again!

This was a great spot for 4 of us to come rest at during our trip. Everything was very clean, the kitchen was well stocked, and the beds were very comfortable. Tim and Lisa were also very helpful and responsive to messages. I’d love to visit again!
We really enjoyed our stay- thanks for allowing a last minute booking!

Nice and clean little rental. It’s got a fair bit of road noise that we did not anticipate from the photos . The stairs are very steep and not great for people who are challenged with stairs. The beds and linens were comfy and nice .  You have to back out onto a fairly busy street to get out of the drive. Overall it was a nice experience .

Well appointed home with accurate listing. Noisy street for upstairs so difficult sleep if that bothers you.  Very clean and comfortable otherwise with a good kitchen for cooking. Nice touches with seasonings, coffee and bottled water left for us. Centrally located.   Worked well for 6 adults.
What a relaxing stay,Tim and Lisa thought about everything you could need.

Tim and Lisa’s place was exactly as described. Such a clean, cozy home. Well stocked kitchen, comfy family room for watching movies. Great restaurants to eat at within just a few miles and easy access from the interstate.

We found Tim and Lisa’s home to be perfect for our family to be together for thanksgiving this year! The house was so cozy and clean. The linens and towels were high quality. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook a feast, and the large table was perfect for serving our family of 5+ our dad who lives in Salem. Tim and Lisa were awesome hosts!
Awesome stay! Thanks so much!

Everything was very well labeled and just as described. I think my other half may have greeted the hosts early during our stay, but the place was quiet and cozy and the beds were very comfortable and clean. Thanks for the stay!

Tim / Lisa, they respect the privacy of the guest very much, they are very nice, the house has everything that is needed, the cleaning is excellent in general, we really enjoyed staying in your home, thank you very much Tim / Lisa.
great value
Tim and Lisa’s house was very clean and organized. We enjoyed our stay. It was convenient for all of our needs.
This was a perfect home away from home. I will definitely look to come back next time I'm in Salem.
Best air bnb we stayed in
Adults and kids had a great time! Plenty of space to spread out inside and a yard to run around in as well.

Perfect place to stay. It’s better then the description by far.
And super quiet. I also love how CLEAN and COZY the place is.
Great stay!
Great place to stay very convenient location and everything you need
Great stay; nice, clean.  Be prepared to cover train and traffic sounds for sleep. Box fans are provided and will work to provide white noise, or bring your noise canceling earbuds.

This home was everything you saw in the pictures and more!! Comfy and coast I loved the memories that we made as a family there. I was really impressed with how well everything was set up and how clean the space was.
Great well kept house in a central location.
we had a very quiet amazing stay. very spacious very clean, we absolutely adored the chalk wall and inside swing

Large, very clean home with nice deck spaces. Great value. The house is on a busy road and near an intersection and the train that runs through Salem, so the road and train noise is noticeable and might impact lighter sleepers. We found a sound machine or earplugs helpful.
A great clean house!
Very clean and great location

The place is cozy, it feels homey, and is suitable for a small family. As far as i could tell, it felt safe
on the poperty but it is shared between a basement tenant and like a guest house tenant. That was a little surprising, but they seemed like kind people. I recommend the place but as far as i could tell there was no A.C. so fans are a necessity. The owners have supplied some fans but they aren't the best so be mindful of that. I have to say, overall this was a good stay, and there us a really cute community cat named Joe and i really wish i could have pet him but we kept missing each other.

This place was great for our weekend in Oregon! We were visiting Salem to explore different areas we are interested in moving to from out of state, and we were so happy to find this home. You are right next to a neighbor who is in a connected building and two who live below the house in the basement, but we didn’t hear a peep from either and the only interaction we did have was a really pleasant conversation. Lisa was very responsive to messages and accommodating for our early check in and late checkout! There was awesome outdoor spots around the whole house;  back deck, front porch, and side porch. Perfect internet connection, and even a Netflix account you can use! The master bed is really really firm, but huge and peaceful. The kitchen had all the essentials and a bunch of spices to use. We loved loved using the grill on the deck and sitting out there… which is where we met the BEST PART of the home… Joe the cat!! He was the sweetest boy and we spent a lot of time snuggling him and holding him like a baby. Overall, if you just need a private comfortable place to stay in Salem, this is it.
Great experience staying at their home

Clean place with good size rooms. Easy check-in and check-out process. All of the basic cooking ingredients are included, with lots of pots and pans. Outdoor space is nice and there is a great cat outside. Please note that the ceiling above the stairs are bit short and we had some folks accidentally walk into it.
Perfect place to stay while visiting for my sisters baby shower.

Wonderful home to stay at! Comfortable beds, well stocked kitchen, all of the things that you need to feel at home! We really enjoyed all of the personal touches and details, and the hosts were incredibly accommodating when we booked on *very* short notice.
Es un espacio acogedor , te sientes completamente en casa muy cómodo y con todo lo que necesario para una buena estadía
Great location! Very convenience! Cute house & comfortable beds🥰 Clean & very welcoming place✨　We loved our stay at their place♥ Highly recommended!!
wonderful place to stay, and very gracious hosts
Clean, cozy property for a great price!! Tim and Lisa were also very easy to communicate with. I loved the fact I could even do laundry on my long stay! Thank you!!
great simple space. clean and had everything we needed as a group of friends sharing the space.
Tim and Lisa’s place is great. They are very nice people and the Communication between us was great… If we’re ever back in the Salem area. We will book with Tim and Lisa.

Beautiful big house.
Well furnished
I’m not sure it’s a safety neighborhood to walk the evening.
Really nice and clean spot!

Highly recommend Kkoki Korean BBQ place near by. The rental had some sketchy areas near by but the rental itself was good and felt safe.
We were able to walk to the state fair from the house so the location was great for that.
The shower was smaller than what the ad stated and the water pressure was lacking but everything was very clean.
I was a bit put off by the paper requesting tips by the beds as the housekeeping service payment is added to the air bnb cost.
The kitchen was stocked well and the ice machine/water machine was a nice touch.
We also like the small TV nook upstairs.
Over all the place was nice

This was such a wonderful stay. My family & I truly felt comfortable. Everything about Tim/Lisa’s home was accurate. My main concern when I book a place is cleanliness but this home was spotless & felt so fresh, which made it so much easier to relax.

We loved the porch & swing.
This was a nice short visit & I highly recommend. It was the perfect amount of space for 5 people & the hosts were very easy to communicate with.

I would say parking is not the best but that’s understandable.
Overall great stay & I would book again when staying in Salem.
Great house and great location. Live craftsmen style houses and it did not disappoint.
Tim/Lisa’s home was clean, not far from the freeway, and had all of the accommodations my family needed to feel some sense of comfort during our uncomfortable trip to OR.
We'd stay here again! Great hosts and clean, nice place.
Great location. Well stocked, comfortable house. Would stay here again if we find ourselves in Salem again.
It was rad!
Great value, lots of room, clean, plenty of kitchen utensils, pots & pans, etc. We enjoyed our stay.
Great place, our family enjoyed their stay.

We stayed at Tim and Lisa's over the Christmas holiday as there were too many people at our in-laws.  Even though we basically used it as our crash pad, the house was lovely.  It was clean and quiet.  A perfect getaway from the craziness of our holiday family crowd.  Tim and Lisa were quick and responsive to our communications and we truly appreciated being able to stay there.
Cute and cozy home.
Great house for family, very well stocked kitchen.
We had a great stay at Tim’s house. Had no issues. Spacious with lots of kitchen ware. We will definitely be using this Airbnb again when inviting family.

Great to find a three bedroom one bath place in Salem. EV charger works (if you ask the host to tell someone on the property to turn it on) which was really why I selected this place. Nice to have a kitchen for our stay. Bedrooms upstairs are a little dicey for tall adults but I imagine perfect for children. Only two car parking locations and some fun turning around in the driveway but everyone in Salem is so sweet!
Place had everything we needed and more. We had a pleasant stay and wouldn’t mind booking again in the future.

Great place! MUCH bigger than we expected! We didn’t see it during daylight, but it looks like it has a great yard and big windows that would let in lots of light. Has everything you need - the one quirk (which she says in the listing) is the bathroom sink is the only sink. Not a problem for us - easy to do the few dishes we used. Better than a hotel for less!

Cassi has a great place, it's much more spacious than it appears in the pictures. There is a large backyard that our dog thoroughly enjoyed running around in, and the kitchen is well stocked with everything you need to make a small meal. Cassi was great about responding quickly, and accommodated our group of 4. There's a huge river park nearby that we ran down to that was really nice.

What a great place! Lots of room, sparkling clean, and a comfortable bed. It was a perfect location for us as we enjoyed the ~1.5 mile walk to downtown Salem through the park and surrounding neighborhoods. Fantastic value for the amount of space and number of beds available. Very quiet neighborhood. Our dog Betty slept comfortably and enjoyed the little lawn outside. Will save location for future visits to the area and definitely recommend to friends & family.

This was a great place to stay. Beautiful neighborhood, centrally located. It is a walk out basement with many windows so you don't feel like you're in a basement at all. It was very bright and spacious.

Our stay at the Bombshell Basement ahead of the Willamette Valley Marathon was fantastic, thanks to all the kindness and flexibility of our host, Cassi. She let us check in early and shower after the race. The space was HUGE and perfect for 3 girlfriends -- we each had our own little nook and privacy. I have mobility issues (I use a walker to get around), but going through the grass was fine and perfect once inside. Also, the bed was soooooo comfortable!!!
Cassi's place was wonderful! So clean and cozy, was way above my expectations. We were very pleased and enjoyed our stay. Would definitely reccomend.
This apartment has been great for our month+ stay! Spacious and in a lovely neighborhood, it was very comfortable. Cassi has been a gracious host and super easy to work with. Two thumbs WAY up!!

Cassi's place was great! Much bigger than the pictures suggest, immaculately clean and the bed was so comfy. There's a second bed - a twin - which is great for a second person if you won't want to share a bed. We stayed here for a triathlon and it was quiet and cool and the perfect place to put our feet up before the race.  And Cassi was super generous about check in and check out time so we could shower afterwards. Thanks so much Cassi!
This unit is in a beautiful neighborhood.  There are big windows looking out onto a large patio.  Good location for shopping nearby, and we enjoyed driving the scenic farmland areas around Salem.

What a fantastic find, in a great area!  Communication with the owner was great; self check-in was a breeze.
