This is essentially a full apartment with WAY more room than you will expect in a great residential area on a hill above the river valley.  Great walks for the dog and the kid that drove up from OSU to meet me for Thanksgiving.  Mere minutes to stores and restaurants - don’t think twice!

Clean, nicely decorated, super-convenient location and all the amenities (except one - heat - if you are planning a cold weather stay). Quiet neighborhood close to restaurants with everything you need for an extended stay. If you plan to stay at any time other than winter I think you will love it.
Lovely place, great location and well stocked.  Will definitely stay again.  Owner/manager had good communication and checked in without prompting or problem.  Great hosts!
Awesome place! Great neighborhood. Awesome host!
Fantastic place! If you are looking for an entire place to your self in Salem, this place has it all! Bright, open, and pet friendly!

Cassi was a very kind and helpful host - even offering backup shelter in the event that the recent winter storm takes out the power. For anyone wondering about the "Basement", this place is spacious and bright. We had a great stay!
Very nice place to stay, Cassi’s place has a nice backyard and views, tucked away on a quiet road, nice place to rest as a nightshift worker

Spacious, light filled basement apartment located in very quiet neighborhood.  Ample street parking was always available in front of unit.  Keypad with private code made check in super easy.  Unit had all that was needed for a comfortable stay....with plentiful coffee and food/munchie items.  Pet friendly, which was a super plus for me since I was in town for a dog show....with Fairgrounds only a short 15 minute drive from unit.

Really enjoyed our stay! The bedroom, kitchen and bathroom were sparkling clean!  Had all the amenities we needed for a comfortable stay, would highly recommend it and definitely would stay here again!
Heather's place was great!  Comfortable and super nice.  And so willing to be an accommodating host.  I would definitely use her again!!

I can't say enough about how great Heather and Nick are as hosts-- the communication was excellent and their place was incredibly comfortable and cozy. There were lots of thoughtful amenities (great coffee, filtered water, extra blankets and pillows, as well as a rack for hanging clothes) and they were so friendly and helpful as I got settled in my new location. If you're visiting Salem, or have friends or family coming to stay, I highly recommend Englewood Loft-- it's quiet, in a great location and hosted by wonderful people!
Comfortable, cozy, and clean! Communication was excellent and Heather & Nick are amazing hosts. I felt so at home and will definitely recommend this place to anyone staying in Salem!

Super clean and all the things you need for a little home away from home. I really appreciated the washer and dryer as I had to unexpectedly extend my stay! Heather also answered all of my messages within minutes.

I love this place! Comfortable space tucked up in among beautiful leafy trees, great kitchen, awesome cold water jugs in the fridge, and very convenient for Salem government travel. Wonderful hosts. I loved that they had a few books out to read, because with all the libraries & book shops being closed right now, I really miss books. That said, a tiny night light near the bed would make it even more awesome! :)
Such a cute space and larger than we thought! Very clean and adorable. Would love to stay again!
Very nice, private place.  Heather is a delight to work with and it was very clean.  Just what we needed for a quiet getaway.

Heather and Nick were amazing hosts! Their space is beautiful and has everything you need to feel right at home. They are also extremely friendly and gave us some great advice about our upcoming move to Salem. All-in-all, we really enjoyed our time at Heather and Nick's, and would absolutely stay again.
Expect a clean and comfortable space, great hospitality, easy check-in/out, and consistent communication from friendly hosts!

This is a really neat space and everything it claims to be. Heather was a really great host and was very quick to respond to any request. The place was exceptionally clean and they do a great job of making it a very welcoming space. It was extremely comfortable and little things like an awesome shower made for a very relaxing stay. The chickens are awesome. They won't bother you at all and it's neat to have them. One morning they were sitting at the bottom of the steps just waiting to say hello. But they will simply walk away and leave you alone. Definitely don't shy away if that is of any concern. It's a really nice, clean space and the hosts are great people as well.

I had a terrific stay at Heather's place. Everything I could think of was accommodated for, and it's a very fun and relaxing space to boot. Location is in a great neighborhood too. Definitely will check for availability with Heather the next time I'm in Salem.
A great stay with great amenities.

Super nice room in  a great neighborhood. Very quiet, and within 10 min in any direction to something you would want or need. The hosts are super nice, and the room was spotless. We unfortunately had to leave on short notice due to a family emergency, but when we come back, we'll be staying here again for sure!!
Super cute and functional space in walking distance from beautiful downtown Salem!

The loft was the perfect place to stay for a business trip to Salem. Super convenient location, instant communication with Heather, easy contactless entry. The space was so comfy and welcoming, even had a washer and dryer. Bonus points for the nice, quiet neighborhood, the resident hens and the Keurig, with its tower of cups. Loved everything!
Englewood loft was a wonderful little home away from home, and Heather and Nick made me feel welcome throughout my entire stay!
Wonderful spot, wonderful people.
We loved staying here! Exceeding expectations and hope to return in the future

We just spent 4 weeks at Heather's place while house hunting in the area. This was truly a home away from home and Heather and husband Nick made us feel like royalty. Nothing was to big an ask and we are sad to be leaving. The 4 resident chickens were the icing on the cake. Highly, highly recommend if you want a true Salem experience. Lovely place, great neighborhood and amazing hosts.
Everything about Heather’s place is great. It’s everything you want an Air BnB to be. Good location, clean, and a nice space. Would stay here again in a heart beat.

Englewood is an awesome place!! Heather and Nick are very nice and accommodating. The loft is cozy and cute. We had everything we needed for our stay. Location is very accessible to everything. Area was very quite which was very nice! The chickens are so cute!!

Engle wood Loft is the perfect Oasis in Salem to spend your time while visiting any time of year. I was there in the fall, more of the chilly time of year, and I can’t even begin to tell you how comfy and warm I was up in this cute studio loft! It had everything I needed for my 10 day stay while visiting family while I was in town. A fully stocked kitchen where I cooked dinner almost every night. I loved having a washer and dryer too, to get caught up on my laundry as well. The bed was so comfortable, and the studio was so quiet, it was perfect to get a great nights sleep, every night!  The only sounds I heard where the residents cute chickens clucking outside which I looked forward to greeting me every day when I came back to the studio. I love the Coffee selection provided for you , and I looked forward to making a new selection every day! There was so many extra touches throughout the studio to make you feel right at home. It was so clean and neat, and looked brand new! Heather and Nick are such great hosts, and were always so quick to respond and help with everything I needed during my stay! This wonderful loft is better than any hotel in Salem, I hope it’s available on every visit I have next time I’m in town! Thank you again for making my visit with my family so wonderful!
Wonderful communication. A very comfortable and cozy spot with everything needed to be comfortable! Thank you Heather!
Great host and a great home! Would gladly stay again.
This lovely loft was even better in person. The hosts were kind and thoughtful. The space was charming, clean, and cozy. And the chickens were a delight! Would definitely return.

very comfortable loft, warm, pleasant and well maintained - with everything needed for either a long stay or short stay. Heather was extremely responsive and helpful. The chickens are a wonderful greeting party every afternoon.
Heather's place was warm and welcoming. A lot of personal touches made for a memorable experience.

Clean, cozy, fully equipped, comfortable bed, quiet neighborhood, perfect for weeklong stay for my wife and me while visiting relatives. Fast WiFi and desk with nice view. Always felt at home. Heather was a gracious host. Highly recommend!

Perfect location/proximity to downtown! My husband and I stayed here to check out Salem and start looking for housing to move here. Heather and her husband  was so incredibly nice and easy to communicate with. The space was perfect! Would definitely stay there again.
A comfortable and fun place to stay in a nice downtown Salem neighborhood.
What a fantastic little gem just outside of Salem!  Looking forward to visiting again!

Heather and Nick have thought of everything. It is easy to find and you have your own parking space off the street. We had all information on how to enter and our door code sent to us prior to our arrival. We arrived after a ridiculous day of travel with no luggage to find a sweet note with my husband’s favorite candy and the loft was clean and simply adorable. We were so happy to see the washer and dryer so we could have clean clothes in the morning.
I texted Heather to let her know we were expecting our luggage to be delivered and they were so helpful keeping and eye out for the delivery. We truly enjoyed our stay and will be back if they will have us, the location is perfect for us.

What an adorable and comfortable place the Englewood Loft is!  Nestled in a quaint Northeast neighborhood that is exceptionally quiet, we were within minutes of everywhere we needed to go.  The loft is well appointed with everything you might need (or forget) and you might even be gifted with fresh eggs from the resident hens Maple, Willow, Aspen, Junie, Clover & Fern!   Having endured many consecutive and smoke-filled days over 100* in Idaho, we were delighted to be able to open the loft windows and enjoy the cool breezes that arrive in the late evenings.  My favorite thing first thing in the mornings was to sit at an open window with my cup of coffee, look out upon the beautiful neighborhood and listen to the hens clucking and trilling as they foraged in the yard.  I can't say enough about how sweet Heather is and we so enjoyed getting to know her!  Even though Heather and Nick live below the Loft, you have complete privacy above.  Wanna get away?  Come stay at the peaceful  Englewood Loft and restore your soul!  ❣

The best loft ever! It’s location is perfect you will ha everything so close. It’s fully equipped and super comfortable if you are traveling by yourself or with a +1. Heather is amazing and will try to help you to have a memorable experience.

I had a great stay at the Englewood Loft.  Heather and Nick went out of their way to make sure it felt like a home away from home.  Their location allows you to enjoy Salem while exploring surrounding areas including winery visits and an easy day trip to the coast.  Highly recommended.
Amazing people, amazing chickens, great space. This is a gem hidden in the town of Salem.

Absolutely loved this loft! Location was perfect, the amenities were plentiful and  Heather and Nick were very gracious hosts! The girls (aka chickens) were the best welcoming committee every time we returned from our adventures in Salem and the surrounding area.

This Airbnb exceeded all expectations. The pictures are accurate and Heather and Nick provided tons of amenities. Checking in and out was incredibly simple and I loved the location. It feels like you are in the suburbs but you are only a few blocks from the main roads. It was the best Airbnb experience I have ever had! Would highly recommend it!
great place to stay!  felt like home

Heather and Nicholas were perfect hosts, answering questions in a timely manner and keeping me informed about the area. The loft is spacious and welcoming, and they provide just about everything you could need as far as essentials. The chickens even provide their own welcome with patterned 'clucks' of approval. :)

All in all, I'll come back for another visit.

Such a great loft experience. It was very clean and had all the comforts of home. The hosts were extremely responsive and friendly, they even had fresh eggs for us from their friendly chickens. We will definitely stay here again next time we’re in town.

The loft is one of the nicest places we have stayed at in Salem! Heather is a wonderful communicator and hostess. The loft was clean, cozy and had all the amenities listed and more. The location was perfect for our needs. We give Heather a 5+ rating, thank you for making our stay  so enjoyable!😁
This place is clean, comfy and pretty private. I would recommend it for anyone planning to stay in Salem.

A very clean and well set up loft worked well for the two of it. It is above the main house and has lovely chickens in the back yard. We even got a few eggs compliments of the proprietor!
Thank you
David and Julie

Englewood Loft was the perfect cozy escape from the hectic parts of the holidays. I needed a space to retreat to between family gatherings, and it fit the bill nicely. The unit has all the amenities for some quiet living: kitchen, washer, dryer, and an awesome hot shower. The heating was able to keep up easily with the winter cold, and I could sit and play some video games during my downtime. A highlight of my comings and goings was getting to say hello and goodbye to Heather's chickens that I would occasionally pass by as they coo'd about the back yard. As you're coming and going, know that it's a little muddy (at least in rainy winter) and there's two gates. Would recommend trying to have at least one hand free and be cautious with any dress shoes. My host, Heather, was exceptionally friendly, kind, and responsive. I would whole heartedly recommend staying with Heather at Englewood Loft.

As comfortable as being home, super clean, and with thoughtful touches of hospitality throughout - a user friendly door code, a welcome of chocolates and fresh eggs, guest-mode Roku TV to access our streaming accounts, a wonderful collection of teas and coffee. Not to mention a fully appointed kitchen, large bathroom, washer and dryer with supplies, and off-street parking. Heather and Nick are doing it right, and from the heart. Didn’t get to meet Nick, but Heather is as sweet as she can be. We told her we might have our son over for a meal or two, and when we checked in lo and behold, an extra chair and the table set for three. We have found THE place to stay when we visit Salem! Thanks Heather and Nick – it was the best Airbnb experience we have had.

The Englewood Loft was a great place to stay while working in Oregon for the week. It was clean, quiet, great hosts, had everything I needed for the week. I would highly recommend this nice airbnb. I will stay here as often as I am in the area. The hosts were excellent and friendly. Candace
This was the perfect place for my week stay in Salem. It's clean, private, quiet, and cozy. The hosts had great communication. I highly recommend!
our stay there was amazing.
Really nice place!! Thanks for everything

My son and I loved our stay at Englewood Loft.  We were in town visiting family and it was the perfect location for us to be close to everyone and everything.  Heather and Nick were excellent hosts.  The communication was prompt and thorough, and the loft itself was warm, inviting and comfortable.  We had everything we need, and then some, including a bowl of fresh eggs.  Check in/out was seamless, off-street parking was great and we loved the sound of the chickens outside the window!  This is definitely a place I would love to stay at again in the future!

This is such a wonderful place to stay; It was like our home away from home. This air b& b was clean, quiet, accommodating and very, very, comfortable. My husband & I took walks in the neighborhood nearly every day & felt completely safe. We had our own parking space and you can just tell that the hosts have put a lot of time into thinking  about what their guests might need or want. We will hopefully get to stay here again at another trip up to visit relatives. Thank you both so much!

We will stay again! The loft is comfy, quiet, private and clean. It was close to all the areas we were visiting. Truly a home away from home. The host communicated well and replied promptly to our questions.

A clean and well-equipped studio space with good access to shops and public transport. A friendly and helpful host too. Just what I was looking for on my short trip for work. Would definitely stay here again.

This is our second time to stay with Heather and if she will have us won’t be our last.  It is such a cute, clean and perfectly located loft.  We come to visit family and it is a comfort to know we have a wonderful place to stay ran by wonderful people.
Great little loft for my stay in Salem. It was convenient to my class and to downtown. Cute neighborhood. Nice people and nice chickens. The space was clean and cozy and exactly what I’d hoped for!
This cozy place in NE Salem was a perfect location for attending a college reunion. We enjoyed it!!

Heathers place was exactly what we needed and more! It was a great location, the space was clean, bright, and warm. We came to Salem to travel around and apartment hunt and it was perfect. Thanks to heather for her kindness and all her great recommendations for what to do in the area!!

I loved staying in the loft. It was exceptionally clean, cozy and comfortable. This is the ideal retreat after a busy day.
I highly recommend!
My stay was great, has everything i needed, very quiet, great communication from hosts. Will definitely stay again when in Salem.  No complaints at all.

Heather’s apartment is cozy and comfortable and squeaky clean! There is a designated parking space off the street and right next to the gate that opens into the back yard and the independent apartment stairs.
There is a full size refrigerator and stove in the kitchen and also a full size washer/dryer in the large bathroom. Heather was easy to communicate with and a very nice woman! It was delightful to see the five healthy and happy chickens in the backyard when I left each morning. The Englewood apartment is a great place to stay when visiting Salem!
Very comfortable space. Heather did a great job taking care of all the details to ensure of a welcome stay. Thank you for opening your home to me. I loved it!

Heather's place was really cool and super cozy. It was pretty private, I rarely saw anyone when I was entering and exiting the location. I often saw their chickens in the yard during the day and it was really easy to get in/out of the yard without disturbing them. The place was fully stocked with an assortment of coffee flavors and they kindly provided some eggs fresh from their chickens! They also provided laundry detergent and dryer sheets which was great because I needed to do laundry during my stay. I would really recommend staying here especially if you plan to spend time downtown.

The loft is a perfect place to stay while in Salem. Within walking distance to downtown and the capital, it was perfect for our long weekend in Oregon. Heather even offered to let us meet their foster kittens (which I so wish we had taken her up on the offer)! It is so cozy and comfortable - plus it has a full kitchen and washer dryer so it can really be a home away from home. Will definitely look to stay here again next time we come to Salem! Thank you Heather and Nick!!

Beautiful spot with all the amenities. Wonderful host. I had to leave early due to some medical problems but the host was very gracious about my need to shorten my stay. I recommend the place to anyone.
ありがとうございます。

We loved staying in this peaceful and stylish loft! Having access to a washer and dryer was so helpful in winter's muddy weather. We really appreciated the Keurig, too. Great bed and shower! Would recommend and would DEFINITELY come back!! Thank u, Heather!

Many thanks for another lovely stay!

Heather is a friendly, responsive, caring host. The loft was sparkling clean, well-appointed, comfortable. The neighborhood is peaceful and quiet, yet close to restaurants and local attractions.
I’m very pleased with my stay and would recommend without hesitation.
Thank you :)
Great Location and Beautiful home.
Beautiful location directly on the river. Very peaceful.
Great
Simple place with everything we needed! Enjoyed the river view and the Roku TV. Nice hot shower and plenty of space.

First off... The negatives. Calling it a condo is a bit misleading. It's a unit in an apartment complex near a homeless hub. There was a homeless guy just outside the parking lot sleeping on an old couch. The internet didn't work for us in any of the bedrooms or the master bathroom. Had to use devices only in the living room. With that out of the way.... The inside is nice, clean and stylish. The glass doors leading to the balcony drown out the sound of the creek in the back if you don't want to hear it but also allow you to take it in when you're ready for it. Very clean and located close to a McDonald's and Safeway as well as the downtown mall even though that was closed. Body and hair care products were provided and felt nice. Lots of towels were on hand. Overall... I enjoyed my stay and the communication was second to none. Would recommend
Amanda's place was perfect for our weekend stay, will definitely book her spot again
Great stay! Very clean and stylish home with beautiful view! Great and helpful host
Amazing!!!

I was blown away by this hidden stylish gem! Even with COVID restrictions, my hubby, sister, and I were able to walk around downtown for essentials and admire the beauty of Salem. The condo is clean, stylish, and well stocked. Would love to stay here again.
Great place and location,  will definitely stay here again.

This Airbnb is absolutely perfect! Quiet, great location, super clean, and fully stocked with necessary amenities. Amanda was a lovely host and replied quickly. I would recommend for anyone staying in Salem.

Great big space and very clean! Looks like it has been recently renovated. Having curtains inside the room will greatly help block out the early morning sun during summer. Out of our 3 days stay, we heard a train passed by and it made a lot of noise but overall, we are happy we found this place and hoping to come back again in the future...
Beautiful home perfect for the night and lovely view.
Once you are in the rental it is a quiet getaway with a wonderful deck view. So clean and would 10/10 recommend.
Easy place to stay with family and pets! Very central and clean.

This place was so beautiful. When you walk in, everything was so clean. Very spacious. They had all the things we needed. My favorite little extra  was the Mini Blue Bunny Ice Cream Cones that we’re in the freezer. Great great touch. Our host was a great communicator. This will be the only place i book going forward when i go to Salem. Just a great place!!

This place is a perfect stay! My friends and I came across this place after taking a spontaneous adventure and decided to find a stay quite quickly. We came across this place and it was perfect! Pictures don’t do it justice! The communication between Amanda and Brenda was amazing! 10/10 recommend!
The inside was great, the location not the best.

Had a great time here! Amanda was so helpful and quick to respond to absolutely everything! Great location, easy to get around and to walk/drive to everywhere you'd want. Perfect for long stays with family too.

Loved staying here. Everything was clean and the patio overlooking the creek is amazing. Communication with Amanda was prompt when we had a question. Would recommend this place for anyone staying in Salem.

Amanda's place is in a great location! It's very clean and has everything you need for any length of stay. The creek off the big balcony is so nice and the condos are also very quiet at night. Loved our stay here!

Super cute updated apartment. A really great space and cute balcony with a view of the creek. Amanda provided tons of information and tips for the trip. The location is very close to down town which is super convenient, she is very honest about the cons of the location. I didn’t find it to be any worse than staying in another cities downtown area.
My one problem about the apartment was the very strong smell of cigarette smoke in the house.
Even with that being said I would still recommend this Airbnb.
Great place to stay
Amanda's condo was exactly as described, clean and spacious, and a good central location.
Very cool spot, super peaceful. Loved the view.
great place to stay with lots of space.

Amanda's place is big, clean, comfortable and the location cannot be beat! An incredible four minute walk through a cute neighborhood to get to the Boone Treasury. Super peaceful to sit on the deck and listen to the creek.
Modern hidden gem in great location. Walking distance from downtown! And who doesn't want to drink coffee while listening to the river?! Also a huge highlight, the beds are actually comfortable!!
Great location and facilities. Big deck outback over looking a picturesque stream.
Great place to stay.

Stopped off here for a night on our way to Astoria. We arrived late and left early so I can’t really speak to the location but we found the apartment to be clean spacious and comfortable.  The outside of the building is a little run down but don’t let that put  you off because inside the apartment is really nice. If we had had more time I would have enjoyed coffee on the balcony by the creek this morning.

This is a great place to stay. Very clean, simple, uncluttered and comfortable. Nice view of the water. Easy access to parking and into the apartment/condo from outside. Check in was simple and the neighborhood cute. Would definitely stay here again.
Our stay at the apartment was great. It’s in a great location for exploring the downtown area. It was clean, comfortable and had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend.

The place was close to everything and having two separate bedrooms and bathrooms was very nice. The deck overlooking the river was beautiful. The place needed more furniture and some style updates but it met our needs.
What a great place to stay. Very clean. Great location. Plus the hosts were great with answering you in a timely manner.

Great Place
Good location
Older unit but very clean. About 1/2 mile from downtown.  All the floor heaters kept us very warm.  We had a great stay.
Beautiful place close to downtown. Felt very safe during our stay. Amanda is an amazing host and I would definitely recommend this place to anyone going to Salem.

Great place to stay!  The view is wonderful and the host was great.  Our travel plans changed some and we arrived earlier than expected, earlier check in was accommodated without prior notice.  We would stay here again!

This condo was perfect for our needs. It was very clean and Amanda was quick to respond whenever we reached out. Only issue was that wifi was spotty in the bedroom, but very strong and was able to get work done from the living room. The space was very clean and there were even makeup wipes and plenty of towels. Would definitely stay here again when visiting the willamette valley.
Extra large apartment with nice view of Mill Creek. Two cars can fit in the single spot. Good value and clean!
Great hospitality
Amanda’s place was perfect for a couple night stay in Salem. Easy checkin, walkable to town, close enough to drive to vineyards, and super comfy beds to come back to at the end of the day!

Such a great stay and great experience, I absolutely love the property and the host! Very responsive, any thing I needed they were quick to provide! I have stayed at multiple places hosted by Amanda and have never once been disappointed! Thank you Amanda, Brenda and Aimee for the quick response and such great care! I look forward to the next stay!
Amanda was super communicative and flexible with my concerns about traveling during COVID. Her place worked perfectly for our quick overnight stay.

Great place to stay. Down town but in a quiet area. A little deceiving when you get there from the outside. Interior is awesome,  very clean, comfortable and cozy! Plenty of towels, linens. We loved it! Will definitely stay there again!
host was very nice and understanding.  unfortunately I wasn't able to stay.
Great location and we slept very well. Amanda was a great host and very responsive.
Amanda’s place was just wonderful and very comfortable.
Great place to stay! My work crew was more than comfortable!
The creek behind the apartment was like a cherry on top! The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. Having a designated parking spot was very nice as well.
A nice central location to everything around town.
Very accurate description of bnb and surrounding area. Knew exactly what to expect. Perfect for husband to work from while I helped with new baby. So nice not having to go out for every meal. Thanks.
One of the best Airbnbs we've stayed in! the host is also interactive and helpful! It was a wonderful longer term option as well. Thank you!

Our brief stay at Amanda’s place was wonderful. The beds were comfy and the location was convenient and easy on our road trip.

Thank you!
Beautiful place and very clean and organized. Loved the view!
The condo was bigger than expected and super easy to get around. whenever I had a question they were quick to respond. Would definitely go back.

We had a short notice trip to check out Oregon colleges as daughter received word of scholarship awards. Grandparents really wanted to come too. And then there is COVID. Our second floor apartment was ever so clean and cozy and had everything we needed to eat in and was perfectly located to pick up all the great local food from downtown. You can walk to the capital and shops. Beautiful view of creek from deck. Complex was quiet and kind. It was a wonderful stay and this little home made the trip fun, easy, way affordable to hotels. Beds are comfy. So much fun to be in a neighborhood so close to so much!!!
The place was very well located, the place itself was very nice and clean! The complex is a little rough but the inside of the apartment felt safe!
Great location very relaxing the sound of water outside your window. Close shopping near by.
Coffee shops within walking distance. Cute little bridge to the right
Great place to stay at, very nice and orderly. 5/5

Amanda’s place was very clean and peaceful, situated beside the creek. We enjoyed waking to the sound of the creek and birds in the morning. A heron was on duty several mornings and he was fun to watch.The kitchen is well equipped and we loved the layout of the apartment. Also the baseboard heaters in the bathrooms were great for warming the towels! We would definitely stay there again.
This is one of the coolest places I’ve stayed in. It is local to absolutely everything. The hosts are welcoming and friendly and have great communication with guests. Totally recommend this place
Perfect little getaway with many close spots!
If your looking for a cute little place to stay this place is a great place.  Love the creek in the back and the deck

Amanda’s condo is not a condo but a very old apartment building. Across the street is a homeless center. There are people sleeping on the sidewalks. If you want to walk to the store or downtown you have to walk through that. Once inside the apartment it is really nice and clean with a private patio that overlooks a creek. The rooms are good size  with comfortable beds.
This was a great place for us and our pup! It was clean and consistent!
Great place today! Needed somewhere in Salem for a night. Amanda’s place was nice, clean, and quiet. Also great communication from Amanda which was helpful!
Expect the best place inside
Great host and really comfortable stylish apartment.
Great place to stay when visiting Salem. I really appreciated all the communication before, during, and after our visit. Thank you.
Cleanly condo with all the needed amenities. The host is very communicative and made the process super easy.
Can't ask for more. Great communication, detailed instructions for entry and use. Convenient parking space. Inside, it has everything you could need to enjoy the stay...and it looks like new.
Great stay in Salem, clean and comfortable. Convenient location too as we were able to walk to dinner.

This is a great property. Real easy to get to off the freeway and in a quiet neighborhood. The condo was very clean, comfortable with well stocked cupboards of essentials such as cookware, dishes, and glasses. There is also coffee and tea. Don’t hesitate to consider this property.
Beautiful comfy apartment with everything you might need. We loved our stay and how convenient it was to downtown Salem and silver falls!

Nice charming condo in the heart of Salem. The creek right outside was amazing. If you are looking for a location to embrace all that is Salem it is perfect for you. Older but nicely updated, which we loved.
It's a great place😁

This place was great! Host was easy to communicate with. There were clear instructions for everything. Beds were so comfortable. The house was well stocked with bedding and towels and  even had some games for us to play. Loved the babbling brook behind the house. Loved our stay.
Your going to love it!
Great communicator and great space.  Was very accommodating when we had an extra vehicle.
Great stay.

Very clean and quiet. The beds were comfortable and the linens and blankets were soft and warm.  We just stayed overnight on our way back to the Portland airport from our vacation on the coast so we did not use the kitchen and therefore can’t speak to it. Thank you!
Nice little place on the creek, surrounding area is very Salem, but Amanda is up front about it. Having the creek in the back yard was a huge plus! Cool and comfortable, would stay again.

Nice comfortable and spacious.The deck  and river view is great to have. Amanda was easy to communicate with and responded quickly. Kitchen well stocked, comfy beds and nicely decorated. We felt very safe inside, however as is mentioned in description there are alot of homeless in the area.

Rooms were immaculate, the host responded very quickly. Only one downside was that they didn’t have central AC, so they use fans to send cool air from small AC from master bedroom. We stayed there on one of the hottest days in Salem. Especially kitchen got very hot and we were sweating until the cool breeze came in and cooled down the rooms. The creek nearby was very soothing.
Big place. Walking to downtown restaurants and bars
Great place to stay.
Generous sized condo with two beds and two baths. Well equipped kitchen if you plan to cook.  Location is pretty convenient to downtown Salem.

Lovely condo! Our family of 5 adults had more than enough room and comfort in this area, and the condo was absolutely spotless and beautifully decorated with plenty of storage if you’re staying for a while. We loved it- highly recommend staying here!
Comfortable condo, great communication, easy access to downtown!  Comfy beds (that's always an important one for me :)  )  Thanks so much, Amanda!
This property is centrally located and comfortable.  It has a nice porch overlooking a creek, comfortable beds and a plenty of supplies.

This is the perfect spot for a say in Salem. Located downtown there are tons of fun things to do that are walkable distance from the apartment. The building is a little older as others have said but It’s VERY nice inside and was cleaned spotless! I would highly recommended and will be staying again the next time we are in Salem.
Our stay was fantastic! Very easy check In process. It had everything we needed for our trip. Would recommend to anyone staying in Salem.
Large spacious very clean apartment.  Outside Building is a little rundown but don't let that fool you the unit is great.  Beautiful river and very peaceful.
Clean and inviting. perfect for the business woman who wants to call on downtown accounts! nice downtown location

Amanda's description of f her place is spot on. We enjoyed walking around in the area. it's close to a variety of restaurants & a movie theater. Great jump off point for touring near by environs.. She's a great host & responds promptly to any questions you have

The place is stylish, cute, and comfy. Window unit ACs kept the place nice and cool. We were only here one night but worked well for two couples. Like others have mentioned, its proximity to downtown is both good and bad--convenient location, but there are homeless people nearby.
Amanda was incredibly responsive and easy to work with.
Amanda covers everything inside, well prepared host.
Cute clean place to stay. Worked well for us as it was centrally located.
Wonderful location quite by the water yet right downtown. Booked sight this place in the past and continue to do so.

Amanda is indeed a super host who organized her place in an orderly manner. Her communication is superb, and her directions are very comprehensive. The cleanliness and sufficiency of house equipments cannot be overemphasized. Nice sit out at the back viewing the lake. Awesome experience indeed! I would truly recommend her for your future vacation stay.
Close to downtown.

This place is amazing!! Everything about it was spot on. It’s super clean. Beds were super comfortable. The shampoo and conditioner smelled so good. Plenty of towels and linen. The kitchen was super clean. Well stocked with everything to cook. The creek water running is such a bonus. You will feel like you’re in a spa. The location is literally 1 block away from downtown which is convenient for shopping and dinning. The neighbors are super quiet. It feels like you’re all alone which is nice. Reserved parking was great too. I would recommend this place 1000%.
Very clean and spacious apartment. Outside the apartment complex can look dated and a little spooky, but inside the apartment is top-notch. Very happy with our stay.
Everything was great! We were very happy with our stay.
We loved this condo. We were very comfortable and we loved the fantastic view of the creek.
this apartment is very cute and comfortable. there is plenty of space to cook, hangout and enjoy the house and creek behind it. Amanda was very communicative and responded fast.

As other reviewers have said this apartment is even nicer than the photos. It is tastefully decorated and has many extra little touches that made me feel welcome and well-cared for. Amanda is very responsive. Some of my favorite features: It’s on a quiet street without a lot of traffic but is convenient to downtown; the dedicated parking spot; the comfortable bed; the balcony that looks out over Mill Creek. I only wish I had found this place sooner as I have made several trips to Salem over the last few years and have never had as nice a place to stay as this apartment.

Amanda's place had everything we needed (as shown in the description) and she was super responsive whenever we had questions. The condo is very centric, super easy to find and check-in, and parking was a breeze. We'd definitely come back next time we're in Salem!
My family and I have stayed here before as always great location close to local shopping Creek behind the apartments the sound of Rushing Water puts them to sleep it's really enjoy your stay
great place, just as advertised!!

Probably one of my favorite airb's I had stayed at.  Very comfortable,  home away from home.  The hosts are extremely accommodating  and great with communication.  I hope to stay here again the next time I come to visit family.

Never stayed at a place that had such a full stocked kitchen. Loved the beds and pillows.  Nothing like being four blocks from town and listening to mill creek rushing by at night.   Great place to stay

This place worked very well for us. The location is great, and I LOVED having the sound and beauty of the river close by.
I can't think of anything I would add. There were towels galore, plenty of cookware, utensils, toiletries, etc. Games and movies, books, plenty of seating. The bed was the most comfortable I've slept in for YEARS--gonna miss that!
The baseboard heaters keep things nice and cozy (stayed in January), but could be hazardous if you have little ones I suppose.
The neighborhood was quiet, and the parking spot was convenient. Finding an on-street parking spot wasn't too difficult, but good to know that parking is limited to 90 minutes during business hours on weekdays.
I would stay here again in a heartbeat--thank you, Amanda!
Really nice apartment. 2 bathrooms, balcony and view of the river. Nice appliances and free parking. Cant go wrong. Great deal.

Amanda’s place was very clean and welcoming. Plenty of space. Although, as she mentions, there are homeless in the downtown area, I did not have any issues at her place. We felt safe and comfortable and the sound of the creek was nice and soothing! Easy check in, great communication!
Central location, clean, spacious, convenient amenities. Great communication!
Simple older apartment that’s been given a nice facelift. It worked well for us.
Great amenities, nice apartment.

Close to everything downtown Salem has to offer. Some nice updates to the inside of the apartment. Great communication with the host — we had a package delivered the day of check-in and they helped us track it down.

This is a full 2 bathroom, 2 bath apartment with lots of space to spread out and relax.  I was on a work trip for a conference at the Convention Center and made a point of walking rather than driving over to the space... was just under a 30 minute walk and a great way to get some fresh air.  I really enjoyed the creek sounds out the back patio and main bedroom.  Thank you for the perfect home away from home!

The place was exactly as described! My mom and I stayed for a couple nights and enjoyed each having our own bedroom and bathroom. The space was clean and well-maintained; the individual heaters in the bedrooms kept us warm at night. We enjoyed our stay here!
thank you
The best place to stay in Salem. So cozy and comfy, right over a creek. Our 6th time with Amanda. Always a joy and happy get away.❤️

Amanda is a great host. We had a little glitch at check in and Amanda was right on it and had it resolved right away. The apartment is clean and very comfortable and the location is close to great restaurants and bars. There is even a movie theatre down the street.

Communication was top notch!
Another great stay. Thank you!
Amanda’s place was so clean and comfortable. And it was quiet. We loved it.
great space!

Great place to call home base. coffee on the deck overlooking the creek was a wonderful way to start the day. We had everything we needed for a fun weekend and the host was very communicative and helpful. I would stay again.

Great all around great place. Very comfortable apartment with a wonderful view of the creek. A very walkable location to lots of good restaurants and shops.  Check-in/out couldn’t have been easier and communication was timely and helpful.
Very nice and comfortable place! Clean and easily accessible! Would definitely recommend staying here to all who are traveling to/through Salem.
Amanda was a great host! We loved the apartment and its closeness to the creek. The sound of the water coming from it was soothing. We had a great time.
What a wonderful visit we had staying at this condo in Salem. The creek in back was beautiful to listen to!!
This property was super clean and comfortable and convenient for our needs.  We were in town on business and had plenty of room to relax in the evenings.
The space was great! Clean, comfortable and the directions made it super easy to park and access the unit. We had a wonderful stay with enough room for 4.

Amanda’s place was amazing! We really enjoyed staying here. It was very well stocked and she even had coffee and creamer stocked for us which I loved! The communication was amazing and Amanda quickly responded to any question I had. The instructions for arrival and check out were very thorough! Seeing and hearing the water was a bonus! Would definitely recommend and stay here again!
Place was supper clean! Very close to everything. Amanda was available to answer questions right away. I highly recommend this place.
My stay at this location was absolutely wonderful. Everything I needed was provided, I was extremely comfortable during my visit. I would absolutely stay here again.
Home was welcoming and comfortable.  Owner was easy to communicate with and gave great instructions..  we will definitely be back.

Amanda is an amazing host.  I had a few questions for her and she was quick with a response.  The condo is a very cozy and comfortable place to spend time.  Not to mention the creek is beautiful and very relaxing to listen to.  Thanks again Amanda

Amanda’s condo is in a great location. Close to downtown, the Capitol and Willamette. Beautiful neighborhood. Very walkable. Clean condo with everything you need and Mill Creek running right behind it. Peaceful weekend. Will be back! I love staying in these condos. Thanks Amanda!
Amanda’s place is comfortable, clean, convenient, and has a nice deck along the creek with beautiful western tanager birds.
Easy stay and good value. I will check out Amanda’s place again next time I come to Salem.
Very comfortable, quiet place, in a central location.  Would absolutely stay again.
Great place !
Amanda was so great to work with! She was available to communicate, gave great tips and recommendations for my stay.
Great place to stay. Location is everything and we walked the downtown area easily. we particularly loved the balcony that overlooks the stream. We sat out there for coffee and meals it was great.

We appreciated the space, the flowing creek, and the location. Beds were comfortable, and so surfaces were well cleaned. Kitchen had the basics. I suggested to the host that they add an air filter, as the building is older, and someone with allergies might have issues. I would stay here again, as it was a lovely place to relax after visiting local family.
Our wedding guests stayed here for my wedding weekend. I rented 4 apartments in the complex from Amanda to host them. All of were happy!
Our stay in Salem was great. The listing was accurate, instructions were thorough and easy to follow. The balcony was a particular favorite. We would not hesitate to stay again!

Lovely space, beautiful balcony view! There was quiet a bit of homeless people in the area but that’s to be expected in downtown Salem. I appreciate the hosts communication and honesty about the space. We will definitely be staying here again!
Had a great time in Salem. This condo was extremely clean and in a very walkable location.
Delightful and well-appointed two bedrooms apartment within walking distance of restaurants. Super comfortable beds and responsive host. Great value for the money.
Great getaway for being so close to downtown area, not busy at all really and great view of river.

Comfortable space, nicely furnished, with all the amenities of home. Building is very quiet and conveniently located for downtown Salem. The building itself could use some TLC, but the apartment was very clean, comfortable, and well maintained inside!
A great place in a very convenient location - close to downtown and the river, very clean, and communication with Amanda was seamless. Would definitely stay here again!

Great family stay place. Enough room to keep your stuffs- luggages, clothes. Kitchen is well stocked up. Patio is a great addition. There are a few board games too. Everything was clean and tidy. Comfortable beds and linens. Amanda is polite and accommodating. We would visit again.

This is an older apartment complex that is very well taken care of. The unit was very clean and comfortable. Outside on the back deck you can hear the running creek which is so relaxing. We felt safe behind closed doors. The hostess was clear with her communication. One other comment I read mentioned the homeless issue nearby. I pretty much understand it is out of the owners control, but it is quite off putting just two blocks away in about every direction. We were not bothered by the folks, but the mess they leave is ugly and we were concerned about our vehicles although nothing bad happened.
Great cozy place to stay. very comfortable. Amanda was very responsive,  loved the calm sound of the creek flowing behind.
Very lovely and well stocked apartment in Salem with a nice balcony. We really enjoyed our stay :)
Centrally located, easy to walk to Willamette University and downtown, spacious apartment near the lovely river.
Quiet location and just as described.  Such a nice setting being able to sit on the porch and listen to the stream!
Amanda’s place was just what we needed! Plenty of space, private, and very comfortable home. We loved watching the river from the balcony.
A very clean and comfortable place to stay!  There were lots of little small touches and extras to make you feel right at home!

This place is exactly like the pictures and we'll worth it. It is very clean, located in a convenient location (downtown right next to the capitol), and the host is GREAT at communicating. we stayed with our pet and there was only a small extra fee of $15. If we weren't just passing through we would def stay again!

A large, well-appointed apartment with an incredible balcony overlooking Mill Creek — very peaceful evening perch. The neighborhood is convenient to downtown Salem, which served us well but also requires the caveat that the city’s meth heads are just beyond the doorstep (or were on our visit). V normal problem for all of us on the West Coast but I absolutely would not walk to evening outings or meals. We had zero problems, but it’s worth noting that if that kind of thing alarms you, you might want to seek a spot farther from downtown.
Nice stay.
Thank you! We had a good stay!

We really enjoyed our stay at Amanda’s place. It was a perfect place for our crew to stay in Salem and allowed my brother to get acquainted with his new city for the year. One thing that took us a little by surprise was some homeless encampment taking place right outside of the complex. We had no issues but it was a bit surprising when we pulled in after midnight. All that said, we would definitely stay there again.
The place was overall great besides the Wi-Fi
Clean and comfortable place to stay, with the added bonus of being well stocked with basic necessities.

Amanda was a great communicator and place was as described and convenient for Willamette. Shower did not drain and smelled slightly of smoke. As we were dropping kid at college we didn’t have time to ask her about the drain while we were there.
the hostess with the mostest I would say she knows what the heck she's doing couldn't ask for a better host thanks I will be coming again
We had a wonderful stay.  The beds were super comfy and the place was very clean.

A lovely place to stay. The view from the back patio is wonderful, with the sound of the creek and glimpses of wildlife being a highlight of my trip. Convenient location, reasonably priced, and comfortable to stay.
Perfect
Amanda’s place was nice, the beds were comfortable, and the deck would made a wonderful place to sit and enjoy a glass of wine.  Very close to downtown , but still quiet.  Thanks!

I so recommend this for those wanting a nice clean stay in a good location.  The communication and instructions could not have been better or quicker.  Not fancy outside but definitely everything we needed inside!

This place was great! We were in town for a wedding at the Heritage Center, so it was close to everything for us. And we really enjoyed sitting on the patio and listening to the creek in the evenings.
Amanda's place was a great retreat within walking distance of everything I needed in Salem.

Amanda’s place was very clean and even larger than it appeared in the photos. The bedrooms were spacious and much of the space appeared to be recently updated. The location was central and we were able to walk downtown.
Just as described. Great communication!
The apartment was perfect for our brief stay. It was very clean and spacious. Amanda was a gracious host and was prompt to answer all of our questions. We will be back again!

I was in town for a conference and this stay was amazing! The space has everything you need to enjoy a getaway weekend, or have a home base in Salem as you explore. The small details are what made this fantastic. From extra blankets, to spare feminine products, this place makes you feel like you are at home. The view from the deck overlooking Mill Creek was great for a morning coffee break. Overall, this is a great place. I wish I could have stayed longer!
Balcony is great! Having multiple bathrooms was much appreciated!
Spacious. Everything a person needs is there. Very clean.
great place and value
Best place to stay in downtown Salen .Quiet and clost to everything. Beautiful home .
Clear instructions large peaceful and quite
Very spacious and quiet location! We slept well on the comfortable beds!
Nice and clean 2 bedroom condo.  Listing completely accurate and we enjoyed our quick stay in Salem.
Was a perfect location for a very quick stay in Salem. As described! We will absolutely stay again during our trips to Salem and are so happy to have found this gem!

I love how pets are welcome, next time I would love to bring them. I like how there’s no carpet except for a beautiful simple rug in the living room. Butterfly 🦋 picture is adorable along with a lama picture on the door which I adore lamas or alpacas 😁.
The creek in the back was soothing to hear. And the most important is the neighbors really didn’t hear anything at all nice locations I would recommend and be back soon!
Amanda was very kind, very supportive during our stay. She was accommodating to our circumstances throughout our trip. Would recommend staying here.

Enjoyed my stay while working at the Capitol building.  As a bonus, I was able to walk to work and avoid paying parking in the blocks around the Capitol.  Instructions were very clear and detailed.   The space was very comfortable and clean.  I appreciated the sound of the creek out the back patio and enjoyed that view very much.  I will absolutely be staying here again.

The place was nice. About what you’d pay for a hotel. We liked having 2 bathrooms and separate bedrooms for the price.

There were many broken spots on the blinds that let a lot of light through.

It’s downtown Salem and you might be safe, but we heard tons of noise and there were homeless people digging in the trash everyday.

Host was very responsive with any issues that came up.

The apartment was so nice.  It is right on the Millcreek very close to downtown and the capital.  It was spacious and had everything that we needed. We enjoyed playing monopoly with our grandson. The TV even had Netflix loaded and ready to play. Great find.

I like this Airbnb. Located right next to the river and I even cracked the window so I could hear the water run. Defiantly got a good night sleep and all the toiletries were clean and well provided !!!
Great convenient location right near downtown Salem.  Nice roomy apartment with everything you need!  Hope to stay here again!  Thank you!

Amanda is an amazing host and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The apartment is centrally located in downtown Salem and you can get to many great restaurants and shopping by walking a few blocks. We were staying here while looking for a house after I relocated here for a new job. The rates were very reasonable and the apartment was large enough that we felt we had plenty of space. There is also a deck in the back that overlooks a large creek. If you are staying in Salem this a great choice to stay.

Great place. Great communication. Really loved it.

Only quibble - the shower wasn’t clean. It could use some bleach….
We only stayed a day because of family issues.  But the place was great.   We enjoyed our visit.
Great location and very friendly host!  Home was clean and spacious.

The condo exactly matched the description and the location is great - especially for downtown access. The kitchen was well stocked and furnishings were comfortable. I appreciated the clear instructions for finding the condo and check out (which was a breeze).

We loved our stay! Thank you Amanda for being so responsive. We loved how walkable the space was to a lot of local restaurants and breweries. The space was big enough and appropriate for our dog! Thanks so much! :)

Wonderful and responsive hostess. Very clean accomodations located in downtown Salem. Super convenient for restaurants and our destination. The bed is very comfy and the sound of the creek is just the perfect white noise. We felt lucky to find this place!
Location is a little sketch, but that is warned about, and its a great deal for a week stay. Comfortable, very spacious, loved the patio and large windows.

Amanda is a responsive and helpful host. The condo is close to West Salem and walkable to downtown, and we enjoyed exploring both places, finding great restaurants. The weather wasn’t conductive to being outside, but there is a deck we would have enjoyed in warmer weather.

Location was great, unit was easy to find, had everything we needed with a great price. The area is a little "run down", but that has nothing to do with the unit, just Salem in general. No safety issues, it was quiet and suited our purposes well. The provided ground coffee was appreciated!
Jennifer and Micheal are genuinely nice and thoughtful.  they will do their best to make your stay comfortable.
So clean and comfortable, with such generous and communicative hosts. Kitchen is well stocked for cooking up a feast, or eating takeout at the counter. And the park is just around the corner!
The perfect space to relax after a long days work (or play). Great location close to beautiful park for nice walks.

I had a lovely time at Jennifer's place! It provided just what I needed for my clinicals at Salem Health! Very clean, tons of storage space in the kitchen, fridge, and bathroom, and very private despite sharing the home with others. Jennifer was so welcoming and communicative, her son is super cute, and the dogs are very friendly once they get used to you! I walked to and from the hospital in 15 minutes which was a huge bonus. I'm looking forward to staying here again the next time I visit Salem! Thanks Jennifer!
The best of the best! Private room, easy check in, kitchen access, and basically a bathroom to yourself. Thanks Jennifer!
Ive stayed at several airbnb's and this one was fantastic.  Clean, newly remodled and tastefully furnished. Full kitchen with everything you could want. Great host.
Such a cute place!  It was clean and the check-in and check-out were very smooth!  If we are back in town we will definitely come back here.

Very comfortable bed. Very quaint old house. Jennifer was very nice and accommodating. There were two dogs and puppies on the premises. This was not a problem for me as I love dogs!
The AC unit in the bedroom blows very cold air. It felt good.

Jennifer was an excellent host! She communicated well and answered any questions I had promptly during our stay. She was very polite, had great energy and offered us great recommendations for our travels. The entire place was extra clean and organized. Jennifer even let us hold her two week old baby puppies which made our day! The Internet is super fast might I add!
Great hosts! Cute kid and dogs. Nice having the bathroom pretty much to myself. I hope to see you all again sometime (:

It was a comfortable room. I liked the code lock to the bedroom. It has AC, but the ceiling fan is enough to keep cool at night. Everything is labeled nicely, so there is no confusion. Would recommend.

Jennifer was extremely friendly and communicative. Check-in was a breeze, and Jennifer met me outside when I arrived for a house tour. The bed was super comfy, and the room had an AC (it was 100° outside when I was there). The place is right next to Bush Park, and I enjoyed walking through the park to downtown (~20 minutes) during my stay. Highly recommended!

Jennifer’s hospitality truly made this a home away from home. The house was cozy, clean, and in a great location. Great price for a full kitchen, everything you could possibly need, big bathroom, etc. I spent two weeks working remotely, perfect desk space in the room and never had an issue with WiFi.
Great place to rest! The space is super cozy and clean and the hosts are amazing! I Would stay here anytime :)

The house was fairly close to downtown, so the location nice; however, the neighborhood seemed a bit sketchy to me.  It wasn't the fault of the host but the next door neighbors were getting ready for a yard sale and, evidently in a fight, so I had to listen to a lot of fighting and swearing and loud people. The house layout is nice for privacy but the walls are very thin, and people/kids were up and running around by 6:00 in the mornings.  I was provided with the door code but no other information on the home which made my stay very uncomfortable.

Jennifer and her husband were very friendly and welcoming. The location was perfect for my job and close driving distance to many stores, restaurants, etc.
There was always parking on the street out front and it felt very private even though others are living in the house. Jennifer was very honest in regards to possible noise from her dogs and child but the noise was very minimal and did not affect my stay. The neighbor’s dog was noisy at times. Overall, I enjoyed my stay and would definitely come back. Thank you!
Very clean, great price and perfect for my two week stay. They were friendly and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again.
A pleasant place to stay! Everything was just clean!
Everything was great and just as described!
A great place for its value! Right next to a nice park that you can walk to.
very nice fun loving family. cozy, comfortable room. very spacious shared spaces. tons of Legos underneath the living room couch, loads of fun
Fantastic find! Jennifer and family are very kind and welcoming. The house is charming and the location is great. I highly recommend it!

Jennifer has a wonderful listing!! Great value and I love this house!!Surrounded by great food, and shopping. I loved this room, Great mattress, slept very well. Peaceful, and inviting. Loved the access to the kitchen, has microwave and coffee drip maker in room. Very clean bathroom, a lot of privacy, I had the bathroom to myself because no one was booked across the hall during my stay. Jennifer communicates very well, and definately is a superhost!
I would stay again and again. Craig the upstairs house quest was very friendly and helpful. Thank you Jennifer :)
I had a great stay at Jennifer home. I was able to sleep well and peacefully.

The house was adorable! Freshly renovated and was perfect for a mini get away in the middle of this crazy time. Matthew was quick to respond and make any necessary fixes! Couldn't recommend staying at his property more highly. Thanks so much for sharing this wonderful home!

Mathew was a very gracious host. He was very helpful with all of my questions and requests. Very easy to communicate with.
Mathews place was great with small touches that made it feel like home
Very clean and modern. Plenty of space and ample parking. Truly, this was a very comfortable setting . I would stay again in a heartbeat
Awesome place, even better host. Clean and spacious. Will definitely look for this place again next time I’m in Salem!

Matthew was a great host and the house was very clean and a good place to stay while in Salem. The home was spacious and he added nice little touches. He was very easy to communicate with and the location was central to many areas in town.
A very comfortable home
Great communication and easy to work with.

We had a great stay at Matthew’s. The house is in a great central location and was very comfortable after some long days out exploring. Matthew is a great host and goes above and beyond to make sure our stay went well.
Great place to hang out
Good stay! Excellent response time and good location for access to essentials.
Comfortable and uncomplicated. User friendly house. Enjoyed the fire pit. Close to stores and restaurants. Matthew was a generous and communicative host.

This home was beyond our expectations. Our host made us feel at home and responded very quickly to our questions. Without a doubt I would recommend. The place is sparkling clean and there is enough room for everyone to be comfortable. 10/10 thank you!

Matthew is an amazing host! Very quick to respond to anything that comes up or even just questions. His kindness and generosity is outstanding. Look no further. This place is Everything you could want when staying in an Airbnb.
Matthew definitely is available to help and accommodate.

Great location. Very clean and very thoughtful host. He got some cookies for the little ones and beer and wine for us. What else we could ask?
Very nice place.
Matthew was thoughtful and responsive. The house was clean, though we did not like the scented plugins.
Matthew was super flexible on a last minute stay. The place was exactly as described and his communications was highly responsive.
Place was great any problems and Matthew was quick to respond and very helpful.  I would stay there again.

Matthew is such an amazing host! Words can’t express how quick to respond and kind he was to us when we had to evacuate home during the Californian-fires of 2020. We had ended up in a Portland location we weren’t comfortable in and found Matthew’s place after searching for a place that felt much safer and Matthew was quick to help us out.

He called and we told him the situation, then he quickly helped us book an earlier time in the Airbnb app and made sure when we arrived a few days early that the place was not only spotless but he had also left us a thoughtful letter and a bottle of wine, it finally felt like after weeks of hardship back in California, we were feeling good about things again.

The fast internet, well set up kitchen, and cozy living room made it easy for three business people to both work remotely and still be comfortable. I highly recommend Matthew’s place if you’re a business person seeking easy access to the highway, amazing internet, and a super host who will not only accommodate your needs but also effectively communicate and make your stay problem free so you can focus on work or leisure!

Tons of cute restaurants nearby, we loved settling in at night around the fire pit or sitting inside and watching movies while ordering pie from the Shari’s nearby. Enjoy!
The host was very welcoming. I enjoyed the small mint chocolates kept in the room , plus the wine :)
This was a great space! I booked this as a surprise for my wife and Matthew was very responsive to what I was looking for Highly recommended.
Matthew was very caring for two weeks when two of our family homes burnt down in the Oregon Wildfires. We were in stock and homeless. He helped make us feel right at home. Greatly appreciated!

Matthew’s place was a perfect weekend home away from home. The house was easy to find, easy to access, thoroughly cleaned and well organized, and quite comfortable. There were thoughtful touches throughout the house to make the stay more comfortable (makeup remover wipes, extra toiletries, coffee creamer, etc.). I was happy to find fans for white noise as well! My teenagers were happy with the great WiFi and plenty of pillows. The house is also perfectly located for easy travel to shopping and local sightseeing. Overall we were very pleased with our stay and would recommend for anyone looking for a comfortable home base while traveling with a small family or on business.
Matthew was a great host and responded quickly, would stay there again!
Booked this super last minute ! Was able to check in right away and communication was excellent! Thank yOu Matthew! Thoughtful touches to the home ! Everything you need

Private home with an amazing host who is very understanding and communication is above all. House has a very nice fenced back yard inside the home you have plenty of space for a family with complete kitchen two full baths basement and a beautiful room with skylights upstairs to listen to the rain home is very close to the freeway entrance which is nice and many close by restaurants and stores.

Oh my goodness this place is not worth the money. The house was terribly unsanitized a d lots of hair in bath cabinetry. The electrical outlets were not working in upstairs bathroom had to use extensions. The dryer had an electrical short which caused breaker to constantly trip. There were no blinds or window cover in bathroom facing street side for privacy. Both Kitchens window did not have blinds and property is closed to a fwy. We felt unsafe. Back yard was not mowed and grass was over 2 ft tall. No patio furniture in back patio, Not with the money. Carpet stained and not professional steamed cleaned and sanitized.

The place was clean, however a tiny smell upstair. The host let us know before arrived of the odd smell.  The small window in the bathroom upstairs needs to have a curtain or some kind of conceal for privacy. The host had wine ready and it was good to have that especially after a long drive.  The location was a short drive to stores. Overall, my family appreciated the host’s hospitality.  He was a great communicator and a family-focus. He provided guidance on attractions in the area and that was very helpful.
Nice home quiet home. And Matthew is a great host

Matthew is amazing! He was extremely easy to communicate with and made my coworkers stay the best they could have! We booked this house for almost 2 months. He was very flexible with the booking as our work is unpredictable and credit limits were not high enough. Highly recommend staying at his house! He gave my coworkers a home away from home!

This is house is clean, comfortable, and very easy to find off the freeway! A/C and shower water pressure were especially awesome, and Matthew is the best possible host! Responsive, helpful, kind, and an all around great person. So happy to have met him and gotten to stay at such a well cared for home.
Great Home for family mathew is a great host highly recommend

I rented this place for my family while we were in town for a very sad event. The house was perfect for our us, centrally located and a sanctuary when we needed it. Everything necessary to run a house is provided. Despite being off a busy road, the house has great energy and is open and bright. The big backyard is definitely worth it. Thank you Matthew.
Great location.
Very accommodating and helpful, is everything it’s advertised to be! Amazing deal and great location. Thank you Matthew!
Matt was easy to deal with and the place did the trick.  Thx!
This place was comfortable and cool even in the hot weather. Beds were comfy as well, easy check in and good communication. Would recommend.

Matthew was a great host and very accommodating! Matthew was quick to respond when we had questions. There was a bottle of wine waiting for us when we got there, which was a treat. We traveled with 6 people. The place was spacious for all of us, the rooms were big. The hideabed was a king size with memory foam, very comfortable, you cannot feel any bars in the bed. Close to shops and easy to get on and off the freeway.
Nice clean place with comfy beds!
Place was just what we needed, and Matthew was a lovely host.  Communication was super smooth as well.

Great house and great host. We had a last minute change of plans and had to find somewhere to stay the same day. Matthew communicated with us and accommodated us very quickly. Nice house in a great location, close to stores and restaurants. Would definitely stay again.
Great place great host

The neighborhood is sketchy. I didn’t like leaving my car in the driveway! The bathrooms were lacking amenities. The upstairs bathroom didn’t have a towel rack, mirror, hair dryer or toilet paper holder. The shower fixture did not fit onto the holder, so it just hung from the pipe. Communication and Check in ran smoothly. There was a bottle of wine waiting for us.  I felt like I paid too much for this rental. $150 per night would have been more appropriate.
Matthew was very accommodating to my Work Crew there in Salem. Very easy to work with. Home was equipped with everything we needed.
Matthew & his team were Amazing working with me and my crew. Accommodated all of our needs. Provided flexibility & the home was perfect for our work in Salem.
Home was perfect for our family, host was super flexible and eager to make our stay great. Thank you!
Matt was a great host. The place was perfect!
great little cottage right off the 5.  comfortable and clean with privacy and space.  Host was extra attentive.  I'd stay again.
Great place! 5 stars!
Super nice hoost, good communication, nice house

Mathew’s bnb is a wonderful place large, nice yard, a good stay
Thanks

Matthew was a great host! Any time we had a question he was quick to give a response/ solution. The house was cute and comfy. I wasn’t expecting it to have a grill and it did so that was a plus. my children had so much fun playing in the big back yard! We loved it.
Amazing communication, and house was great as well. Would definitely stay again if in the area. Thank you.
The host was great and so was the place! 5 star!
Great location and space! We would stay here again when visiting the area!
Owner work and accommodate very will

Very clean and had everything we needed. Also very spacious and comfortable. Huge fenced back yard with patio furniture and shade umbrella. Very nice. Plenty of parking. Great for a family or group. I hope to return one day. Matthew was nice and communicated excellent. Highly recommend
Matt was a gracious host, always checking in to see if we needed anything. The house was in a great location near several restaurants. It was a great house and a very comfortable stay.
Nice big place very conveniently located next to the freeway. Fire pit looked awesome although we didn’t have time to use it. Host was very responsive to questions.
Matthew was a great, responsive host who helped us feel welcome!  The house was comfortable, well-supplied, and conveniently located, with plenty of parking.
Matt is the best and we love coming to his place. I think this is the 4th time and it’s been great every time! 5 stars!

We had a great stay here! Mathew was very helpful and was easy to communicate with. The home was very clean and organized with some thoughtful touches of wine and snacks! We would definitely stay there again.
We like it
Great location.

Matthews place is a dump!
Futon mattresses for “beds”.
There is black mold under the new caulking throughout the house, specifically the downstairs bathroom. Rotting subfloor in the upstairs bathroom, cobwebs throughout the house, sticky kitchen floor, baseboard trim literally falling off the walls, not to mention an active construction site on his property which makes the backyard useless and dangerous. Tons of homeless parading the streets/neighborhoods of this property
Loved the attention to detail and all the appointments!
Great place! Plenty of room for 4 adults all staying in separate rooms. Comfy beds!
Great host. Great stay.
House was as advertised. Matt was great to work with
Great house, close to freeway and main roads.  Perfect for our needs.

Matthew's home is such a lovely landing spot. He has been a gracious and kind host and I felt like I found a gem of a stay especially on a last minute booking. The place was super clean, comfortable and close to many places in Salem. I would love to come back again soon!
Great house and great host!
Beautiful landscaping. It was a home away from home. All the amenities were provided. Very comfortable and centrally located. The owners were very accommodating. I diffenately will be back!
Great place for family.  Was perfect "base of operations" for traveling around northern Oregon!

Joanies place was great. Easy to find. The house was spotless. There was plenty of room for all of us (6 adults). The kitchen was stocked with everything you could possibly need. Loved that each room had its own AC.
Would definitely stay there again.
Very clean, good location, lovely place

Great location, very close to the Salem Health hospital, and Walmart and Costco. Very nice layout and a pretty and functional backyard. Joanie is very responsive and helpful. She should be superhost! Will definitely stay again if visiting Salem.
nice location. individual climate in all rooms which is nice. very private.

We enjoyed our stay at this home over Christmas. The owner responded quickly to any questions that I had. I asked if she had a small Christmas tree , we would appreciate being able to use it. She left us a tree, lights and decorations to use. It was wonderful! We were within a short drive from downtown Salem. Great stay.
great place to stay
Joanie's place was a very comfortable  and spacious place to hang out at with great amenities nearby.  The neighborhood is quiet and beautiful. Highly recommended.

Overall clean, well furnished and decorated. Location in central Salem was helpful as well. Quiet neighborhood and host was responsive with communications.  We enjoyed our stay and would stay here again!
Joanie’s place is wonderful, warm and inviting. The perfect host.

The house is in a great location. Minutes away from downtown, Costco and the Hospital.
Super cute backyard perfect for enjoying the weather. A wonderful place would definitely stay here again.
Super convenient access to Willamette.  Our daughter lived in Keneko and this was so nice to get back and forth to campus when visiting.  Spacious digs.
Clean, neat, relaxing home. Large bedrooms and comfortable beds. Large kitchen, quiet neighborhood.
Great location and nice quiet neighborhood. House was cozy, and the kid toys in the bedroom were a great added bonus!
The house was very comfortable and had adequate kitchen essentials, the wifi was strong and the best were very comfortable.
It's a good place to stay. It's conveniently located near downtown.
Immaculate and fully stocked with everything you could possibly need.  Hosts were extremely thoughtful and accommodating.
This was a great house for our family of six. Our kids loved all the toys in the kids room and we enjoyed evening walks around the neighborhood. Joanie was very responsive and helpful.
