Very well maintained home, nice and clean, and provided everything we needed to enjoy for five days. We would've stayed longer but the unit was booked. Quick and easy access to downtown and all the different restaurants in the area (yes, foodie here!). Totally recommend Joanie's place.
Lovely home, very close to downtown. Spacious and cozy, clean. Owner is easily accessible, a text away.

This is the perfect home away from home for families. All the supplies you could possibly need were easily accessible, which added to the comfort of this stay. The hosts were responsive and made sure that our visit to Salem was delightful!

You can not check-in a minute early because the lock has a timer set. No gathering allow, if a friend or a family member are planing to stop by plan to do it at the street/outside. We were trying to be away from the house because we were uncomfortable. Also you have to be out of the house at 11:00 am, a Hotel is more accommodating.

We’ve spent one month with our two babies ( 20 months and newborn). The house is very convenient for families. There is all the necessary for cooking, and a dishwasher, there are quiet bedrooms for everybody, and even some toys for the children. The backyard is lovely and very nice with children too. We also had great use of the BBQ.
The location is very nice at <5 minutes walking from a playground, close to the hospital and the center of Salem which are also walking distance.
Joanie is a very reactive and helpful host and it’s been a pleasure to be their guests. I definitely recommend that house for family’s stay in Salem.

This place was absolutely adorable! It was very clean and comfy, easy to find and Joanie andwered every question I had very quickly. It was definitely worth the price! I now know we have a safe, clean great place to stay when I visit my Aunt and Uncles! Thank you Joanie!
Very clean and well stocked home. Definitely would stay again.
Joanie’s relaxing home was perfect for our stay. The townhouse was spotless, the yard beautifully kept, and everything we needed was provided. Joanie was very responsive and a wonderful host!

DEFINITELY stay here if you have kids! Joanie reached out before the trip offering all kinds of things like cribs, diaper genies, etc in case we needed them. Then when we arrived my 4-year old son was thrilled to find his closet was full of awesome toys!  Everything else was great, kitchen, washer/dryer, lovely little backyard. Will 100% stay here again next time we’re in town.
Great kitchen to make dinners or breakfasts on our own... helps save a little cash. It was worth it, especially considering hotels in the area were high.
Super cute and comfortable!! Joanie was very responsive and helpful.  The unit was large and quiet, we loved it!!
Great place to stay, most enjoyable 👍

5 stars is not enough!  The best positive feedback is a return customer and that’s exactly what we are.  We make an annual trip to Salem and make sure to book in advance so we can stay here.  Joanie goes above and beyond in the care she takes of her home and the extra touches.
Great house- comfortable, quiet, close to downtown and plenty of space for our family to spread out.
Everything was great! Joanie was easy to get in touch with and made it a nice stay. The house is comfortable, nice and quiet. Highly recommend and would definitely book again if back in the area.

Can’t express enough how satisfied I am with this rental. Cozy place with an amazing backyard and the carpet is so thick and soft. It reminded me of walking through fresh cut sod grass. I have a hardwood floors at my house. My family was making fun of me how much I talked about the carpet. Anyways if you are looking at other rentals and trying to make a decision, don’t pass this one up. You will be satisfied.
Great place to stay. Very quiet and peaceful with a lovely garden. Joanie was very helpful and accommodating.

We had an absolutely wonderful stay. Joanie was very considerate and specially organized a high chair and toys for my two grand babies. We could not have had a better time. Her place was spotless and very comfortable
Great place to stay. Really close to downtown Salem. Very inviting for people with small children, like taking the kids to the grandparents for the weekend. Great environment.
Great place thanks
The house is well located to reach most of Salem easily.  The yard and flowers were well attended.  This was a comfortable place to stay for a month.
This place was perfect for us! Clean, comfortable beds, well equipped with lots of conveniences. Communication with the host was great!
My staff and I were working long hours when we stayed at Joanie's place, and it felt very cozy and relaxing to come home to it every night.

If you have a family, stay at this place! There were toys for the kids. Thick padded carpet throughout that allowed the kids to play without driving ya nuts. Big beds, and a perfect location to get around the area with ease. We enjoyed our stay.
This was perfect! Brand new and I got to be the first! Michael was super friendly and responsive. Very roomy and comfortable! I would like to stay here again!
A great stay
You can expect a warm and accommodating host. The space is light and cheerful. The views lovely. Easy to make ourselves at home.
Great space, feels homey and very clean.

Michael was a very nice and friendly guy. Unfortunately we were most looking forward to the pool, and it was in process of switching chemical cleaners so we were unable to use it. Michael was super understanding and let us get a full refund and find a new spot to stay, if the pool had been useable this would’ve been a great getaway.

My husband and I stayed in this lovely apartment space for our honeymoon!

The apartment itself was much more spacious than we had anticipated. I really loved how much natural lighting came into the apartment. It was also very clean and well put together.

Besides the space itself, we really enjoyed that we were staying so close to downtown Salem (about 5 minutes away). There are so many things to do downtown, we easily spent two days of our trip roaming around the city.

Michael was a great host! He was always quick to respond, and even left us a nice surprise for when we checked in! He also took the time to give us a few recommendations for our week long trip.

Would definitely recommend this place to anyone!

Michael was a very hospitable host who greeted me upon my arrival, made sure I had everything I needed, and even gave me some local food recommendations. Place is air conditioned so it always feels cool, and the bed was super comfy.
Michael's guest house was beautiful, comfortable, and very clean. We did not make use of the pool, but it also looked clean. Michael was welcoming and responsive.
This is a very good place. The house is very clean and the owner is nice. I love here very much.
This was a great place to stay. Michael was very helpful and friendly. The place was comfortable and made a nice home for the 2 months I was there. Would recommend to anyone.
Michael was an excellent host and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at his very comfortable place. It was well equipped and conveniently located. Would highly recommend staying at Michael’s Airbnb.

Great spot- super clean & nice to have A/C. We did not use the pool, but it was a great option for the hot summer days. Towels were super fluffy and the bed was new and medium firm. We had a fantastic meal at Epilogue in downtown Salem and would suggest it to anyone visiting. We did not know the neighborhood but there were some tennis courts nearby and we took a  walk around the near by blocks to the sounds of chickens! We would recommend this as a great stay in Salem!
A comfortable place to stay with a welcoming and friendly host. Highly recommended!
Great experience all around, quick response and super clean and very nice upgrades!
very hospitable host with a awesome property. It has everything you think you'd need.
Sparkling clean and spacious. Luxury in every way!
Everything advertised you will get. Easy and prompt communication. This is a great host!!!
I really liked staying at Michael’s!! The place is very clean, bright, big and very nicely decorated. I will certainly stay at his place again as I come often to the area.

One of the best BnBs we’ve stayed in. Very roomy with well appointed fixtures and appliances.  The space was designed to be a BnB and it shows.   I advise using the directions from the AirBnb site and not GoogleMaps as we used.  We hope to stay there the next time we visit.
SUPER awesome spot!! If highly recommend this to anyone for sure, it's so clean and nice and very cozy! Has everything and more that you need for a short or extended stay! Very nice spot.
Really accommodating and friendly with whatever needs you may have! The place was extremely clean, beautiful, and modern.
Location is super walkable to downtown Salem. Wifi is great. Home is beautiful and very spacious. Plenty of street parking. Quiet block.

The host Michael was very accommodating and quick to reply to questions.
The place was great, very clean, comfortable and quiet, it had most of the necessities for our 2 night stay. Would definitely stay here again.
Very nice updated and clean place, all the finishing touches were there and a quiet neighborhood. Definitely will be back!
Great space. Very clean and comfortable.

This is one the best stays ever. If you ever want a clean & spacious place this is for you! I will be coming back because of how much time and effort he & his team put into this place. Thank you for having us stay Michael.

FIVE Stars! This place was everything it was billed to be, newly remodeled, well appointed, comfortable, a great location for remote working, close to everything, and a very gracious host. Looking forward to staying there again, THANK YOU Michael!!
Wonderful space.
I greatly enjoyed my stay - the convenience, ease of access, cleanliness - made it perfect! I will definitely look to staying here again.
Neat and clean space. It has all the amenities as described. Good location and cute neighborhood to walk around. Pool is a bonus for those visiting in summer.
Very cozy stay. Would gladly stay again next time we're in town.

Michael’s place was outstanding. It’s comfortable, easy access, close to town and an excellent facility. Michael was great to deal with and has high communication skills. He responded immediately to any questions that we had.  We will definitely stay at Michael’s place again.
This was one of the best Airbnb experiences I’ve had! The apartment was spacious and so clean. Communicating with Michael was easy. We will definitely book again the next time we visit Salem!

The place was incredibly clean and cozy, Michael is incredibly responsive and polite. Any time me or my guest needed anything he provided it with incredible speed. When he says you have the place to yourself, you really have it all to yourself. Never a knock on the door or intrusive behavior from either him or the other guests in the area. I would absolutely recommend this place, or any of Michael's, to anyone coming to visit Salem.
This home is just amazing!  It was so clean and the sun room was a incredible bonus.  The owner Michael was so amazing!
Place was extremely clean and neat upon arrival! Answered all my questions within minutes. Great service. Pool was awesome too.
Seemless check in and a place that is even better than advertised. Michael was invisible yet immediately responsive to all my needs.
really great stay! loved the area, super quiet and has everything you need. highly recommend staying here!
We were very impressed with the guest suite. It is fresh & modern. The finishes are beautiful. Includes bonus pool & washer & dryer. Would highly recommend.
Nice place
Place was great-clean,good location,swimming pool, modern.

We loved our stay in Michael's guest suite. The location was great, the suite was very modern, comfortable and inviting. We were able to contact Michael with any questions and he responded immediately. Most definitely felt like a home away from home as soon as we arrived.
A must stay if you are in the Salem area. Very quiet and comfortable and perfect for a couples getaway!
Great stay! Perfect location for visiting Willamette U and as a basecamp for day trips to wineries and hot springs. Spacious and clean. Thanks!

Absolutely perfect space for one or two people right near the heart of Salem.  The space is wonderfully renovated and sits in a quiet and cute neighborhood.  It takes about 2 minutes to drive into the shops and restaurants of the main city.  We enjoyed a dip in the swimming pool on a hot afternoon and made use of the new public tennis courts right across the street.  The space stayed cool during the hot days and felt very private and comfortable.
Great stay, cleaned and spacious. very quiet area, no complaints.
It was fun staying at Michael's place!
Excellent place to stay, great value! Would stay again!
Great place. Clean. Great location.

This pretty unit feels like a home away from home, is updated, well-appointed and extremely clean. The check-in is secure and Wi-Fi dependable. It is well located, and Michael communicates quickly. I will definitely stay here again!

Thanks for a wonderful stay at your Salem Suite. It had all the amenities one could ask for, and the overall accommodations were clean, bright, and functional. We appreciate your very updated methodology from the booking to the on site, to the entry procedure, and finally to the exiting process. Very ingenious!

We will definitely keep you on our Salem accommodations list for a return visit.

Again, thanks for the use of your suite!
Michael's place was in a fantastic location. It was clean and comfortable. My husband and I really enjoyed attending a concert nearby and having a night away to relax.
Great place to stay! Super clean, affordable, location is great and the host was amazing in communication! There would have gotten 6 stars if that was a rating! Excellent stay overall!
Easy check in and a beautiful home.

Michael est un hôte très attentif et sympathique, qui a tout fait pour que notre séjour se déroule dans les meilleures conditions. Le logement est spacieux et très bien équipé. Je recommande vivement !
Wonderful location, will be sure to stay again!
Great home, great location and great host!  Very pleased with the entire experience.

Stayed for the Thanksgiving holiday. Great little place, and Michael was EXTREMELY helpful! He went above and beyond when we needed to extend our stay. Looking forward to staying there again on future family visits.
Great stay. Salem is an interesting place to say the least. But this AirBnb was quite and comfortable.
The place is nestled down a quiet street. It was super clean and comfortable. Michael was on top of things communication wise. You can tell he really cares about guest satisfaction.
if I was able to check in on our agreed time it would have been perfect  but I had to stay somewhere else overnight because he had other guest in the house when he had said it be empty

This was our first long term airBNB experience. My husband and I were extremely comfortable in how this home is set up. The fenced backyard is filled with gorgeous flowers and we enjoyed hanging out in the backyard quite a bit! Andrea even reminded me to check the strawberry plants for delicious strawberries, which I thoroughly enjoyed! Having an office space was amazing, my husband was able to work from the office  without issue. Fresh cut lilacs were in season and on the table when we arrived, such a nice touch. We were able to take some nice walks around the neighborhood and stores were close by. Could not have asked for nicer hosts. This was the best airBNB experience I have had so far!
Helen is a Dynamo and made everything great for my stay! Nice deck to sit in the afternoons!
I reccomend Helen's Airbnb to anyone that likes first class stays.
Kindness and a very friendly woman with a heart of gold.

Helen is an exceptional host. She is an excellent communicator and very kind. The location is ideal for anyone who wants to experience Salem, and the house is well kept and super comfortable. I highly recommend Helen's Airbnb!
Host is very nice. Location is close to grocery stores and other things. This is a good option for long stays.

Helen is great. Always communicates well and fast via text. She really cares about providing a good clean place. I felt at home.

The other people staying in the other room (at different times while I was there) were both very quiet. I barely saw them. We did share the bathroom between our rooms, so you don't get your own bathroom. But, again, they were always gone, it was hardly a problem.

Lily the cat is adorable.

The house is on the far side of West Salem, so you'll always be driving in and across the bridge. Not the end of the world, but not walking distance to downtown. Bus route nearby.

The room was quiet and secure (she gives you a key to the door, which is nice, though I ended up just not even using it, since I felt so comfortable.)

The kitchen is clean, and it's totally cool to come down and fix food. Sometimes Helen is hanging out on the couch watching tv, but she's fine with folks coming down. I think she actually likes having people around.

I'd stay here again.
Helen is a wonderful person and host.  The house was clean and comfortable, communication was great, and good location.
Awesome little place in a great part of West Salem. Extremely comfortable and well thought out. Great value for the area and a super responsive host.
This was a beautiful home! Everything was so satisfying. The bed is amazing.
very nice and quiet place very clean I injoy staying in it

Had a great experience here. Everything was very clean. Cute little house and had everything we needed. Had a coffee maker and coffee there. That’s always a must for me 😊 nothing negative to say. Thanks!

Cute cottage that meets the needs of a busy traveler. All available amenities were clean and modern. The bathroom is a bit small and the street lights stream in a bit. Also very close to an industrial area so you don’t really get a neighborhood “feel”, but I felt safe and comfortable.
Really nice place in a great location. Brandon was super responsive and very helpful whenever something came up. If I ever have friends visit this will be the first place I recommend to them!
Nice small house good for 1 or a couple. The location is in the industrial part of town but not far from stores and restaurants.

This house is perfect for a longer stay! I had enough space to set up a work station and was even able to do laundry. The living room is great for relaxing at night and watching tv and the kitchen was stocked with any item necessary to make meals if you choose. The neighborhood is quiet and within a few days I felt at home. Check-in and check-out was very simple and easy. There’s lots of local restaurants and stores nearby as well as some national chains. I had a very enjoyable experience here!
Comfortable, clean and super cute place. Host was awesome. I would stay here again.
Great place, clean and had everything needed for a weekend away.

This cute cottage had everything my husband and I needed for our stay in Salem. First and foremost, it was very clean. Additionally, the bed was quite comfortable and the linens (both bed and bathroom) were spotless and soft. The location was convenient to downtown and the neighborhood was quiet. We slept very well.

I would also like to add that Brandon was very quick to respond to all my communications. Though we didn’t need anything once we arrived, I feel certain he would be Johnny-on-the-spot should assistance be required.

I would definitely consider this place again should our travels take us back to Salem.
Great place nice host
Great place with great location

Brandon was a fantastic host. I don’t think I honestly wanted or needed for anything. The place is clean and equipped with anything you can think of.

Not that this is SUPER important, but the pillows and throw blankets he had available were AMAZING. I actually had to look them up to get some for my house haha.

It was the perfect little place to stay for a visit. Also was really nice that he had shampoo, conditioner, and body wash, because I totally forgot mine. Thank you!!

Brandon’s place was fantastic. Well stocked bathroom, comfy couch, big TV. I only stayed for one night, but could have easily stayed there long term!

One thing to note:
The garage included is fantastic, but a bit small lengthwise. My car (15ft 4in) fit, but only just. It’d be great for additional non-car storage!
Amazing!!! So cozy and super cute! Everything you needed was there an shopping plus food so close. I personally cooked and wish I had this house as my own!
This clean & cute little bungalow was perfect for our trip to Salem! Would definitely stay again.
Great host convenient check in!
Great place!

It was so tidy and cute! The amenities are all new, I loved how close I was to the cafes and dining areas, and the kitchen was way bigger than expected! It was a super cozy house to spend some times away.

Nicely remodeled and very clean. Great deal for the space and location. The place was just super cute, from the little landscaped front and back yard, to the original wood floors. Host was very responsive to requests and little issues. Will definitely stay here again if available.
The house is just the cutest!  Centrally located to downtown Salem.  Super clean and comfortable.  Would stay here again!
This little home was very comfortable. Any thing you need is there.
Cute house with good stock.
The place was clean, great location and the owners were quick to respond. We had an amazing time!
This was a wonderful, clean spot in Salem with a great host!

It was a nice place and perfectly fit for two of us as a mid point on the way to our destination. The house is spacious, clean and well equipped. Definitely will stay here again when visiting Salem next time. It will be enjoyable for longer stay.
Brandon was great and responsive. The house was clean and had all the amenities travelers need. It's in a great location, easy access to parks and restaurants.

Brandon's house was great! The kitchen was well stocked with anything needed for cooking. The house was very clean and comfortable. Every need I had was met, and I would highly recommend this rental to anyone. Centrally located, great customer service, fantastic amenities.
Brandon’s place was absolutely perfect for s weekend getaway in Salem. It was clean, close to the waterfront park, near all the locations we were going to visit and in a safe area.
Great destination for our bike tour as we were helped to safely store our bikes.
Brandon’s place is cosy and comfortable. Our stay was simply great.
This place is perfect. I was solo, but for solo travelers or a couple? Perfect place.

Check-in and check-out were a breeze!  Everything in the house was clean and tidy. Towels and linens were high quality and soft. Nice lawn front and back. Kitchen is equipped with everything you would need for your stay. Neighborhood is quiet and friendly, and you can walk to multiple restaurants, bars, and breweries.  Private off-street parking and a garage!!
Very cute, charming, & clean, enjoyed my stay.
This is a nice, cozy one bedroom cottage.  It was clean and had everything you need for your stay.  My wife and I enjoyed our stay there.  It is close to shopping and easy to get too.
Great little house. Quiet and easy to get to
Had a wonderful stay in this small, private little house in a pretty sleepy area of Salem. The house was very clean, especially considering it's a older house. Highly recommended!
place was clean and perfect for our needs. very walkable . if needing to stay in the area again would definitely return .

Brandon‘s place in West Salem was a very welcoming retreat between two long drives. It was very clean with stylish decor. Everything you could possibly need was right there. Surprisingly comfortable. We got a good night’s sleep thanks to the quiet environment.

I would score everything as a ten. I don’t know how our stay could’ve been better. The place was extremely clean and the concern for us and our well-being extraordinary. It was very comfortable and there was nothing more we could’ve asked for. Thanks Renee and Brandon.
Loved the home! reminded me of a previous home I lived in. it was in a ideal location for me. close to downtown Salem it was easy to get around. it was perfect for me and my godson!

Incredible place, great communication! I had a medical procedure and I was allowed to check in a bit earlier which was sooo helpful. Such a cute, clean space! The bed was the most comfortable I have slept on in a while and there are even pans to cook with.

This is a great house within 5 minutes or less of Downtown Salem and with easy access to the highway to the Coast and I5 if needed. The place is spacious and the bed is comfy. If you're looking for a cozy place to stay while visiting Oregon, this is your place!
Love this stay, quiet neighborhood but small fixes would need to be made! Still beautiful and would stay longer if I could
Great little house for a weekend away. It was cozy and cute. Brandon was quick and helpful in his communication and we greatly appreciated that. Would absolutely rent again!
My husband and I enjoyed our stay at this house.  It was very clean and cozy. I would stay there again.
This location is beautiful and the cottage is worth it for a quiet getaway. It’s is very comfortable and the host is very quick to respond!
Well stocked, clean and comfy! Would stay here again.
This is a home away from home. It has all necessities and located in a beautiful place. Quiet neighborhood, comfortable bed, and wine glasses. This place is wonderful and I would book again 10/10.

we enjoyed this cute little house, perfect for two people. we would have preferred a walk- in shower for my husbands mobility problem, but he managed it.
Very nice and clean, fluffy towels and nice toiletries were appreciated! thanks
Great stay!
Cute house! Walking distance to restaurants and bars! Bed was very comfortable! Would definitely stay again!

Me and boyfriend Johnathan enjoyed our stay at your place! It was the perfect tiny cute home for us. We had walking access to restaurants, grocery store, and etc. Will definitely book here again next time in Salem.

This West Salem guesthouse truly lived up to and exceeded expectations. Easy check-in, quiet neighborhood, all the amenities, which made it perfect for work, rest, and relaxation. (An even bigger surprise: it was right around the corner from a wonderful used bookstore!) Would recommend this space without reservation and hope to return myself should my travels take me back to the Salem area.
This cute little house was cute and clean. It was in a convenient location for the events we planned on attending downtown and the hosts gave great recommendations.

This was the perfect home for my stay. Great location and looked just like the pictures. It was clean and just all around perfect for my weekend trip. Communication was great, and I will definitely book here again if it is available next time. Thank you again!

Charming little house. Plenty of room to move about. The house was perfect for my travel purposes. Very comfortable, safe and warm. An amazing find so close to City Center.

Will definitely stay again.
Clean, warm, welcoming, comfortable, safe, private, great amenities. Easy to book, communicate, check in and check out. Will definitely book again. Just what I needed. Thanks so much.
Brandon's house was cute and tidy and had everything that we needed for our stay. We would definitely considerer staying again.

A very well managed small house. There is a nice workable kitchen with a good collection of knives, plates, bowls, glasses, cups and table wear. There are a few pots with lids, some simple cutting board mats and two ways to make coffee. The host supplied complimentary coffee as well.

Accommodations are fine for a single or a couple. The bed was quite comfortable - a nice foam mattress.

The driveway can hold two cars easily and street parking is ample. We didn't have any issue with noise -there is a fairly busy street two blocks a way but it was really unobtrusive.

Close to multiple supermarkets. A very short ride to downtown Salem. Easy access to route 22 for a drive to Monmouth or Independence or Dallas OR (each about 25 minutes away).

The neighborhood is pleasant and mostly residential with some offices or commercial activity on the fringe (where the house is located) but I wold not call it "industrial" . We felt very much at ease.

The hosts are very considerate - many small details are provide for to make your stay hassle free. Overall a humble small house that will meet or exceed any reasonable expectations.
very clean and easy to find  would stay here again!
Great experience! I enjoyed my stay, the home was well appointed and comfortable. I will stay again.

Brandon and Renee's place is so cozy and conveniently located within two mile radius to shopping centers, restaurants, bars, banks and public services. It's so welcoming to arrive at a clean, neat and orderly  home. Amenities as advertised is readily available. The home is located in a quiet, safe residential area. Parking is located in the driveway beside the house which is so convenient for unloading luggage. Highly recommended for someone needing homely lodging away from home. Thank you Brandon and Renee for greeting us in a welcoming and friendly manner.
It felt just like home. would highly recommend.
Amazing!

Brandon was an awesome host!! We were visiting due to an unexpected family emergency and travelled from Utah. Brandon allowed us to arrive early so that we could get some rest after our travels before seeing family. During our stay, the water was having a hard time staying warm and Brandon was awesome about trying to get it fixed. He offered to come by late at night to take a look at it. Luckily, we didn’t need him to but for him to be willing to come by was awesome!! We will definitely be back next time we need to visit! Thanks so much for a wonderful stay!
Brandon was an exceptional host and very responsive when we had questions. Highly recommended.
Brandon’s place was perfect for a single person or a couple. It had everything we needed.
Excellent and clean!

Brandon's place was perfect for an overnight stay in Salem. It conveniently located and the parking right next to the entry made unloading and loading a breeze - so convenient. Brandon's home is very clean, comfortable and cozy - I felt right at home. Brandon's was a great host and I couldn't more highly recommend staying here.
Great place to stay. Warm and cozy and roomy and a good value. Kitchen was well appointed.
fantastic. zero complaints. very clean.
Great place for a quick getaway!

This place was absolutely perfect for a short two day stay for work. I used to live in Salem so am very familiar with the city, but it was nice to spend more time on the west side. The cottage was so cute and so cozy and so comfy and I felt right at home right away. It was easy to get to, nice off-street parking, and super quiet. Also very easy to get back across the bridge downtown. I would love to stay here again!
Fun stay, clear instructions, great home and location. Laundry was a nice plus! Walked to nearby Xicha Brewery and had a fun and delicious dinner. Would stay again.
Thanks for the op to stay!

Great house for a few nights in Salem -  Bathroom small but other areas of the house are fine.  Comfortable couch and bed.  Very convenient to anything within and hour of Salem.  From wineries, hiking, food and more!  Host was great and very helpful.
Everything you could ask for. Great small house with a really comfy couch and bed, tons of coffee, tea, oatmeal, and everything needed to cook a meal. 10/10 no complaints.

This is a great little house. It looks exactly like the pictures on the website. Everything was clean and fresh. There was an excellent spot by the kitchen for my computer to complete work right by a window.  I am a very lite sleeper, so I am always worried about noise. The house is in a quiet area with very little vehicle or foot traffic. I sleep like a baby on soft sheet in a comfy bedIt is very close to downtown, shopping, and restaurants. Brandon is a great host and if you need anything, he is very responsive. I highly recommend this house and give the host 5 stars!

I was in town for work and wanted a comfortable place to relax -- and play a little guitar!  This little cottage did the trick -- it was close to the grocery store and several restaurants.  The couch was cozy and I watched a movie, then played music to my heart's content :-). The bed was comfy too.  Quiet neighborhood, easy in and out.  Highly recommend, and will book again on future visits!
Easy check in. Prompt communication . Convenient location. Would book again.
Wonderful place to stay. Very comfortable and close to downtown Salem.
Beautiful house and wonderful hosts!

This is a nice, modern, spacious and clean home.  It’s a nice neighborhood and we felt safe.  The kitchen is well stocked with dishes etc.  There were several nice touches such as higher end appliances, supplies, etc.  The kitchen is huge.
This place is awesome super clean comfortable relaxing. Can’t say enough good about it. And Faith was extremely helpful and responsive.

Thank you for your gracious hospitality! The house was beautiful and we will remember this next time we visit Oregon! Very clean home and quiet neighborhood. Perfect for a family get away. Close to stores!
Beautiful, clean home! Checking in and out was easy. Definitely recommend!
Beautiful home just as the pictures show! Faith was so easy to work with! Definitely plan to book with her as we travel to Salem yearly!
Amazing place to stay
Really nice house
Faith’s place is in a great neighborhood. She is a wonderful host and we enjoyed our stay immensely!

This place was stellar. Tucked away in a cute little neighborhood. The Xmas lights around were great! The house was so cozy and welcoming with amazing little unexpected touches that went above and beyond to make the place that more likeable. Heated floors, fireplace, great open living room and kitchen. Master bedroom was open and a quiet place to relax at night and everyone had more than enough room to spread out around the house and have their own space to hunker in. Will be staying here anytime we come to Salem! Thank you.
This is a great place. Very spacious, comfortable, perfect for a family of more than two. The kitchen was well stocked with tools so we could cook easily. It was a great stay!
Great place to stay. Very nice.
Nice house Nice host good location
This home is so perfect! Clean, comfortable, and in a great location. I highly recommend this home!
Spacious with great location!

Her home was so beautiful I’m thinking of moving to Oregon now! Everything was perfect. Only problem was the wifi but that was the winter storms fault. Otherwise I hugely recommend to try out her home once! NO REGRETS!❤️
Great stay, very clean spacious open floor plan. Already booked another stay.
Great place to stay. Even better than the pictures and a very nice kitchen.
The spot is amazing, great for a family or for staycation. The house is big and has everything you need. If you are in the area this is a great spot.
Great place to stay. Very large house. Great separate master area.
Needed a place to stay to visit family in Salem. Faith provided an extremely clean and full of amenities air bnb. 5 stars. Would definitely recommend and stay here again. Thank you!

This home is absolutely fantastic. I loved how open and spacious the home layout is. When you walk in, the home smells fresh, clean and welcoming. My mouth dropped when I opened the door. Beautiful home!

The house is located in a beautiful neighborhood. It was very comfortable and had all we needed. Markets and other shops were close. Would be happy to stay there again! Only one thing that was missing was a TV in the rooms. Only one TV in the entire house.

One of the best Airbnb’s we have ever stayed in. Everything is nice - comfy beds with nice bedding, keurig works great, very cute neighborhood, great floor plan - just lovely. Like staying with friends. Our family lives in Salem and this will be our go-to place to stay.

Faith's house was easy to find, well located in Salem, and had a simple to use combination lock for the front door, nice security and no mysteries as to it's operation. The house looks almost new, with nice finishes and comfy furniture.  The kitchen is really big and easy to keep clean; we needed to make our own food so the kitchen was a must, and Faith's exceeded expectations. Great stay!

This house is what I had always envisioned a traditional Airbnb stay to be. The neighborhood is very upscale, quiet and safe and just a hop, skip and a jump to Costco, the Lancaster Mall and pretty much anyplace you need to be in the greater Salem area. The home is beautiful and private. Everything is well made including all furniture and amenities which are top-of-the-line and comfortable. The kitchen is well stocked and spacious. The showers are great! Comfortable beds, you name it. Everything you could possibly need is there and we truly felt at home. Faith is a true Airbnb professional. Very quick to respond to questions and very welcoming. If we find ourselves back in the Salem area in the future, we'll be checking on availability at this house for a return visit. 5 stars isn't enough, book with confidence!

Faith’s home is beautiful, spacious and comfortable. It’s all that it’s described to be. And located in a wonderful community. It was close to the I5 making our commutes easy, and near all the needed resources for food and accommodations. We would definitely come back to stay and share it with all our friends 😄

This is a very special house. It is very comfortable - from the cleanliness, to a very functional kitchen, to very comfortable beds, etc, etc.
Would not hesitate to stay here in the future!!

Beautiful home in a lovely neighborhood. Everything and more you need to have a relaxing time and enjoy visiting Salem Oregon. I can not wait to come back and spend more time here.
You will love this home.
Faith made it super easy for us to get in and out! The place was very clean and enjoyable. Plenty of room for our family of 6 with good wifi to add!!
The pictures don’t do this home justice. This four-bedroom, five bed, 2 1/2 bath home was very well kept and very clean. It was very comfortable and functional for our stay. Highly recommend!!!
Such a great spot. Perfect location! Beautiful home! We absolutely loved the space. It worked perfect for our family of 6 plus grandma!
Beautiful home, very clean, well stocked, in a quiet cul de sac, lovely neighborhood and great location accessible to I-5 and Salem.
Beautiful home with lots of room.  Close to many restaurants and shopping.  Definitely will tell friends and family about this one!
Great place, very clean. The only thing is extremely long checkout directions including getting the laundry going.
Such a beautiful and space home. It was stocked with all necessities, had comfy beds, and was perfect for our stay.
Beautiful house definitely one of the best rental houses i have stayed in.
Very clean and spacious

Perfect getway! The house is beautiful, the beds are comfy and there is plenty of room for relaxation. The host has thought of everything. Anything we needed was accessible and easy to find. We spent three days in luxury.
This is an amazing spot. It is large, clean, and about an hour drive to middle of wine country. It’s in a safe neighborhood. A must stay!
This house is well worth staying at looks just like the picture if not better I definitely recommend!
Faith’s home is beautiful! Plenty of blankets and towels too. We would definitely stay there again!

This home is beautiful, much better in person than in the photos.  The host thought of almost everything.  We found our stay to be comfortable and felt like it was one of the best Airbnb’s we have stayed in.  My family of 4 was very happy.  The master bathroom is incredible and luxurious (heated floors!).  The home was very clean, which is so important to us.  The neighborhood is beautiful, we felt very safe.  The host was very responsive, I had a special request and she graciously accommodated us.  I would 100% recommend this location, just book it!  I wish there was more than one tv, that was the only thing that could have made it better.  Even so, I would still rate it 5 stars!

Faith’s home was a great stay for us and bigger than expected.  Our family now has to reserve 2 hotel rooms whenever we travel.  This house is perfect for a family of 6 (or even more).  The price we paid was comparable to having to get 2 hotel rooms for the weekend but provides the atmosphere of a wonderful home.  The area is quiet and still within 5 minutes of anything we needed.  Great experience.
Great house and so close to many stores and restaurants.    Everything was perfect!!

Faith had great communication. The place is perfect for couples, families, and larger groups. The check out process was simple and what i would expect to do if I’m staying with family or friends! We would definitely book with her again!
Very comfortable clean & large home.  Enjoyable stay!
is a beautiful Home, very comfortable and very quiet. Nice area they have a lots of amenities for the Guest. For us was very relaxing vacation... Thank you very much I highly recommend...

Our stay at Faith's house in Salem was everything we wanted it to be.  The house was very comfortable and we had plenty of room, so the whole family was able to relax.  We liked the neighborhood and the Salem area.  We had a busy itinerary for our vacation, so we really appreciated the opportunity to relax.
Wonderful home for the 7 family members of my family.
Great house, very clean! Just like in the pictures. Would definitely stay there again!
Beautiful home, quiet neighborhood. Yard was smaller than expected, but it was a great stay!
The house is as beautiful as the pictures! Very quiet neighborhood! Would definitely stay here again!

Loved this house. It provided us a comfortable home with many extras. I forgot shampoo and conditioner, but it was available to use. The kitchen offered basic cooking supplies which allowed us to cook more meals. The only downside was having one small tv in the entire house.
Fantastic location.   Very spacious property.   Easy check-in.  A home away from home.
The house is beautiful and spacious. The host communicated well and the check in was super easy!
Five star rating all around!!!  Beautiful home, conveniently located, clean, every amenity plus some!!!  Truly the nicest Airbnb we have ever had the pleasure to stay at!!!!
This lovely place is a hidden gem indeed! Quiet and convenient and spacious - we had 6 adults and two wee ones and had plenty of room.  Don’t hesitate - just do it.
Wonderful home located in a very nice, quite neighborhood.

This is a good house for a large group, with four bedrooms and two and a half baths. The kitchen area and living room are very spacious. It is in a convenient location in south Salem, with convenient I-5 access.
Beautiful, clean house. It was a great place for our family to stay.
Well - from what my family said the home was great - exactly like pictured - great location - I did not make it to Portland due to American Airlines - I will try again next year -

This is a beautiful home that I can recommend highly. The location is great in a very nice neighborhood with plenty of shopping nearby (5min). It's easy and quick to get downtown (10min). The house is very clean and modern. The kitchen is excellent and we were able to prepare a wonderful birthday dinner. The living room has a gas fireplace that keeps the entire area cozy and warm. It turns on and off with a switch and we all loved this feature. The master bedroom and bath are deluxe; VERY nice. The modern laundry room and third bath are on the side of the house with the master. On the other side of the house are three bedrooms and another beautiful, full bath. great accommodations for everybody and privacy too. This a great value and we noticed no shortcomings.
Such a great place to stay! Plenty of space for everyone to be together, and then retreat to private areas!
Everything and more. Perfect way to get the ladies together from all over the west coast to spend time together! Clean. Comfy. Spacious. High tech.
Our stay was great. House was clean and just the way we imagined
We had an amazing time here in Salem!  This house is beautiful and spacious
Great home, nice location, clean & well stocked home. We enjoyed being able to fix family breakfast with the well stocked kitchen! Nicely furnished & very comfortable beds!
Simple and easy. Clean, good location

We loved the house and may even want to book it again for another trip.  It was very clean, comfortable, with a nice fireplace, spacious kitchen, and several bedrooms and bathrooms for the size of the home.  The location was convenient to downtown.  The door code was set for our phone number for ease of remembering and this was an amazing touch!
Great experience faith provided a great stay

Great house. Plenty of space for our family. We stayed for 3 nights. Other than what we think was a bird in the morning making a rattling on the chimney pipe we enjoyed the area. The house was clean, had what we needed plenty of towels and beds. Getting into the home was easy. The driveway was a little tricky with the angle and our larger vehicle but it worked. We would stay here again when we come to town and recommend this house to others staying in the area.
House as listed.  Nice, clean, comfortable and easy to find.

Hi Faith,
I just wanted to give you an Atta Boy for hosting us for three days at your Airbnb.
Beautiful home! Accommodated all eight of us. Close to freeway. All the amenities! Great value
Your next guest can expect a very clean, spacious rambler home. Main living area features an amazing kitchen, eating area and living room.
The master bedroom is large with an amazing king size bed. This home is in a Cal-de-sac which is very quite.
We will stay here again!!!
An absolutely immaculate home! Would definitely stay here again!
A wonderful 4 bedroom house with an amazing master bedroom/bath and kitchen
great stay, again.  and we will be back.
Perfect for our family visit to celebrate our son’s  graduation.  Comfortable, clean and everything you need is provided!   Thank you!

This home was a delight to stay in during our time in Salem.  Location is perfect for easy access to stores and restaurants, but in a quiet neighborhood for morning walks and porch time.  It was very clean and the kitchen was nicely appointed.  I would stay there again.
This is a beautiful house and a nice neighborhood
This home was perfect for our family, lots of space and the kids loved it too. Great location and perfect place to relax. We loved staying here and look forward to staying again!

This one is definitely a hidden gem. We loved our stay The house worked out perfectly! Well stocked big kitchen lots of bedrooms and bathrooms it was awesome. Very close to Costco and grocery stores. Highly recommend this place.
Great place , definitely come again

We had an amazing trip to Oregon and this home was everything we needed to complete our stay. Spacious, clean, and in a perfect location. We were there to celebrate our nephews wedding so there were 6 of us, we had plenty of room, enough beds for all of us. Host was super easy to communicate with. I would highly recommend this Airbnb!
The home was stocked with body wash, shampoo, conditioner, even body lotion.
We enjoyed our stay the house has plenty of room and is close to the highway.
was everything we expected and then some!
Good house with great kitchen and family room.  Good stay.
Very nice well kept up space 10/10 recommend!
Great central location for our trip to Oregon. Spacious and very comfortable home.
Beautiful house that was comfortable for our family of 6.
Fantastic place to stay, and explore from! Faith was fantastic, and helpful. The house was super clean, and we’ll stocked, with plenty of space for our party of six.
we had a great stay at Faith's. it was big and the rooms were good sized. it was well-appointed and had everything we needed for our stay.
The stay was perfect as usual! Thanks faith!
Faith's home is very comfortable, spacious and clean. We stayed there on a work trip and it sure beats staying at a hotel. I hope we get a chance to stay there again!
Faith's place was wonderful and exactly what my family and I needed for a little wedding weekend away.
Thank you
Nice place with more in the cupboards than most Airbnbs. Pretty up to date home. Faith was great with instructions and the stay was perfect for us!

We had a lovely stay at The Spacious Gem and found accommodations to be as described and very comfortable. Faith was quick to reply to our questions. If our plans bring us back to the area, we will would love to stay again.
This unit is everything it states and more. Very clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend!
Great house. Will definitely stay here again.

We felt right at home in this lovely house. This was the perfect place for us. We had 6 folks and there was plenty of space and room for all of us. We cooked 3 of the nights and the kitchen was stocked with all the necessary equipment we needed (loved that the fridge had the water and ice dispenser). We had plenty of towels in the linen closet (I hate it when you get rationed out one wash cloth and towel per quest). We also appreciated the desk having multiple outlets so all of our electronics could charge in a central location. Thank you Faith for making our vacation so enjoyable.
It was truly a spacious gem. Beautiful home in a great neighborhood. Looking forward to staying there the next time we’re in Salem.
Great place to stay. Hidden Gem.  Perfect for size for family/friends.  Close to both OSU and UofO campuses.
We really enjoyed our stay! It was great to have a place where our whole family could stay together. All the extra amenities were the best. Truly felt at home!
Awesome house. Very comfortable. Everything u need
It was great!
We had a great stay in Salem! Faith was very responsive and the home was perfect for our long weekend in Oregon!
Beautiful and clean. Beds were comfy. Nice neighborhood.
Thank you Faith. We enjoyed our stay and are looking forward to returning in the future. Home was clean, spacious, yet welcoming. Kitchen was beautiful and outfitted with everything we needed.

Faith's house is beautiful, well kept and appointed with personal times, breakfast foods, etc. The neighborhood is quiet, upscale, easy to find and access other areas of Salem. It was the perfect location for our visit, just 2 miles from my daughter's house! The kitchen had plenty of cooking implements, three choices for coffee production, (including the coffee for a few days)!

We had some trouble with the TV function, most likely due to our lack of experience with Smart TVs, and we don't have streaming accounts. However, since we were there for Christmas with the grandkids, we didn't need any additional entertaining!

We will definitely stay at this accommodation in the future if it's available!
This is a beautiful house in a great location. We loved our time here!

Great Place
Great Host
Highly recommended
The property was very accommodating and comfortable for our group.

We came to Salem Oregon and stayed at Faith's house for my Mother-in-law's memorial service. We had all our grown kids and their spouses. Faith's place was wonderful. It's so spacious and had almost everything we needed. It was a very comfortable place to stay for 7 adults!
Beautiful home. It was perfect for our family. Thank you.

This is the second time we stayed at this location. We’ve also stayed at one of her other properties in Salem. It’s always clean if I have any questions  they’ll answer me right away. This is a fantastic place! We will definitely be back. Thank you so much!!
House was spacious and very clean. Check in was very easy. Would definitely stay again
Andrea and Robert are exceptional hosts. Responsive, friendly and accommodating and have no hesitation in recommending a stay in their wonderful home. May be back in future if they'll allow 😁

This is the perfect housing for me while I search for a home here in Salem.  The desk and internet has helped me with research and business. The kitchenette is completely adequate for my cooking needs. There is plenty of storage.  Pleasant occasional  interactions with hosts.
Great place to stay while i looked for a home to buy. Convenient and the Internet was strong.  Andrea was very flexible with my length of stay.
Andrea and Robert were amazing hosts to our daughter who was interning over a 10 week period.  Beautiful home in beautiful neighborhood .  Highly recommend when staying in Salem.
First airbnb, Andrea was completely lovely. She went out of her way to make sure everything went smoothly! Would stay again if i found myself in Salem ♡
Enjoyed my two month stay! No complaints. Wonderful hosts! Great location to stores and hospital.
I stayed here for 10 week and it was lovely for the price. Andrea and Robert were great hosts.

Mina's home is 1930's vintage that she has put a lot of love and attention to and it speeks for itself.  Mina made me feel at home instantly and was very respectful. Verry good human. I would most definitely stay again.
Incredibly accommodating host, gorgeous, comfortable home, could have moved in & stayed! lol
Great host. Super clean. And great amenities. I will most definitely  stay again. Thank you mina...

Minas place is great.. historic and quaint.. even better is the hostess.. she is the 'hostess with the mostess' awesome fun person that makes u feel comfortable and pets u do ur work but always attentive to any need .. I don't want to recommend this place because I want it to be empty so I can come back haha but it's a great place I will love it

This is a real,old world home. Lots of privacy with your own entry, bathroom and bedroom with the run of downstairs. Lots of stores close by and 5 minutes from downtown Salem.  The hostess couldn't be nicer or more helpful.
This was perfect for what I needed as I am here for a short work assignment.  Coffee and food are close by.  Mina always checked in to see if i needed anything as this was my second stay here.
Perfect stay for my in-and-out work trip.

Mina’s place is great for checking out Salem! It’s in a quiet, safe area not too far from a brewery/ restaurant and a few other food options. Check-in was easy and Mina was pretty quick at responding to any needs that arose. Would definitely stay again if in town!
Great stay, great host!  Tons of space, lots of extras, very comfortable, great communication.  Highly recommend and would stay again.
This place is quiet, but close to all. Since there are limited options in West Salem, this is a great find. Very clean and inviting.
Mina's place is very clean, comfortable and well stocked with everything you need. The neighborhood is comfortable and very close to the shops and restaurants.
Mina’s place was great! Easy to find. Very clean. Comfy bed . Description was accurate. Would definitely stay with Mina again.
Hospitality was top-notch. I felt right at home the moment I stepped in the door. Had a very lovely stay and would rebook again if I'm in the area.

Mina's room was in a great location, convenient to South Salem where I was taking a class. Her house is on a corner lot, on a busy street during "rush hour" traffic, but it was quiet at bedtime. She had coffee and tea available and a small refrigerator. The bath was outside the bedroom door, easy access. I loved the shower! The bed was comfy. I slept fine.
There were several restaurants and a grocery store nearby...very convenient for grabbing a quick meal or a few groceries.
Overall, it was a pleasant stay for my one night visit to Salem.
Mina’s house was easy to check into, and had all supplies needed. The bathroom was awesome! It was nice to have a driveway spot and easy access through a separate door. Perfect for us adventurers!
Great value!! Super easy check-in, comfortable space with great separation from the rest of the house. Mina was great communicating with me and I look forward to staying at her place in the future.
Good location for downtown and west Salem. Older home with lots of character.

Great location in West Salem! From Mina’s we could walk over Union Street steel bridge, through Riverfront park and over the “taco” bridge to Minto-Brown Park and back. (About 3 miles). The space is adequate and comfortable, however no real kitchen facilities beyond fridge and microwave.

Great little apartment.  Very private and well-equipped.  Good location and friendly host.  The air-conditioner was turned on for my arrival on a hot day. Mina is in the process of getting the house and garage painted and the yard landscaped and things are a bit untidy at present.  However, that's not a problem because the accommodation itself is super.
As a traveling professional this was a perfect stay! Comfortable, A/C worked well during the heat wave, and checking in/out was simple. Thank you Mina for a wonderful stay!
Great little place, in the perfect part of town. Couldn't be happier with my stay!

Minas place is perfect for location and privacy. Mina was very thoughtful and provided many convenient items to help make my stay smooth. Even though I didn't talk face to face (which was perfect for me) I had the impression she would have helped with whatever I needed. 😀 Thank you foe a terrific stay

Really enjoyed Mina's place! We were in town for a race and her close location to downtown was perfect. It was quiet, clean, and overall great experience. Her communication around check-in and during the time we were there were very appreciated. If you're needing a room in Salem, go with Mina.
We were very comfortable with our stay. We'll be back!
Great place to stay in Salem! Super private even though it is a shared space, clean, and comfortable. Would stay again
Perfect stay for a wedding we went to in wine country.

I really loved this place and  thoroughly enjoyed staying here. Located in an older Victorian type home in a good neighborhood. It was always quiet and peaceful. The place itself is well appointed and Mina is a gracious host that is quick to communicate and easy to talk to. I will definitely be coming back.
Mina is a fantastic host! She went out of her way to make sure I was comfortable during my stay. I will definitely come back and stay here again
I experienced a convenient stay at Mina's. Mina is welcoming and fun to chat with. The room / area is private and equipped with all necessities. Recommended.

I stayed with Mina for a very quick over night on my way to Crater Lake. Before I even booked, Mina was communicative and nice. She accepted a late check in and provided very descriptive check in details for my arrival. The room was super clean, the air conditioner was left on for us, and the bed was super comfy. Bottled water, snacks, tea, and coffee were provided and much appreciated. My only complaint is that I wish we could've stayed longer!
Beautiful space as advertised, comfortable and clean. Good value.
A great place to stay!

Mina is a very accommodating and welcoming Airbnb host. She makes sure her guests are very comfortable and provides water, coffee, tea, chocolates and fruits. couldn't have asked for more. Bed was comfortable and loved the trader Joe essentials in the bathroom and the bidet!!!
Loved the accommodation; comfortable, private, reasonably priced, great location. Mina is indeed a super host!
Exactly as advertised/ cute, clean and has all you need!
We had a nice stay. Mina was very friendly and communicated well. You should know that the house is quite old. If you're ok with that, you'll enjoy your stay.

This spot is perfect for anybody passing through or needing a nice little getaway. The spot itself is really cute. Mina definitely went above and beyond to give that calm/cozy feel. The bed is super comfortable, plenty of blankets and pillows, a cute little TV, and the breakfast nook was perfect. 10/10.
Great place to stay at, it was very clean and private. Nice amenities and treats. Good location to stay while visiting Salem.
Everything was perfect and just what we needed for our overnight stay. Communication was great! And Mina was helpful answering my many questions!
I had a great time resting at Mina's rental. it was peaceful, had a clean bathroom only for me, a refrigerator and wifi.  Thank you Mina.
We woud book this house again.  very clean and nice
This is a beautiful home, very nicely furnished, and the host was extremely responsive.

Ashley's home was a wonderful haven in Salem. The home was super clean, spacious,  and bright! There were cleaning supplies available, check in was a breeze, and the home could not have been more convenient to the I-5! I would highly recommend to families!
very nice clean house the owner made it very simple to check in great house overall!

We were just here for a quick 1 night stop over in our long drive. It was the perfect spot for a restful night as it’s close to I-5 highway and saved us driving time. Also, for one night sleep, it was a prefect home - very clean, beautiful looking, nice mattresses etc which was all very useful and exactly what we needed. It also has a nice yard and fun touches like fish aquarium which we couldn’t enjoy as much because of lack of time but I am sure folks coming for longer, will utilize this and find it really nice to have a comfortable living in the house.
Very nice and clean home, I highly recommend this house to anyone looking for a place to stay in Salem.

clean and close to amenities
host is very friendly
Excellent host with great communication. The place was sparkling clean and very nice inside!!
Located close to i-5 beautiful home sorry about the

The house is very new and comfortably housed our family of 2 adults and 2 kids. Bed, bathroom and entertainment was great. I liked that we could park in the garage. We liked it and will come back.  One area of improvement could be in the kitchen which was very basic with one pot, few pans and plates/cups/glasses. It missed basic stuff like salt/sugar.
Thank you so much for everything! You’re Airbnb was absolutely perfect for my mom, kids and I! It’s absolutely beautiful and had everything we needed and more! 5 stars!
Very clean and friendly!

Ashley is such a wonderful host, and her home is very comfortable. The hold does not have all of the kitchen equipment that one would normally expect in an AirBnb, but that did not put a damper on our stay.
if your looking for a clean home away from home feel then this is the place for you.   Ashley is awesome!
Clean, easily accessible from Main Street just off of freeway, highly recommended.
This is a lovely home at a reasonable price. It is a good location for exploring the area around Salem.

Ashley’s place was exactly what my family and I needed for a relaxing trip to visit family.

The open layout allowed for us to eat and hang out and enjoy each other’s company. The rooms were all clean and spacious enough! The extra bonus of the huge backyard was a plus with my toddler!

Will definitely look for this place again during my next visit!
Great house.  Comfy beds.  Very central to restaurants and shopping.  Will stay again for sure.

Ashley’s house was great! Super clean. It was a great layout to have family over to visit during the day and after our kids were asleep. The only downside is that the kitchen supplies were limited. We had to borrow a few things from family.

As others have described, this is a very nice home, but without some of the usual amenities one typically finds in a vacation rental. No top sheets, only a blanket on each bed. This is uncomfortable during summer heat and didn't feel good to our party.  The kitchen is missing a number of basics such as extra kitchen linens, collander and other tools. The patio has a metal bench, with no cusions, so too hot to sit on during the day. There's no outside table and chairs for the patio and no BBQ, making the outside virtually unusable in the evenings. We found it unusual that only the main bedroom has a bed for a couple, and the others are twin beds. As long as you are aware of what's offered, it's a nice place that works for a particular audience.
Great home, very clean and it has a great location in south Salem.
Great house!  We're a family of four and house was great for week-long Salem visit.  There's huge couch in living room and big TV.  Huge windows let in lots of AM light.  Very clean!
Great location, Loved the house perfect for are family, would stay again.
Convenient location. Very clean, new home in what felt like a very safe area.

We enjoyed our stay, hosted by Ashley. Location is excellent, close to restaurants, stores and freeway. Quiet and safe feeling neighborhood.
New Costco being built within easy walking distance.
Home was very clean and had all needed amenities.
Clean place, easy check in and out. Decor random. Smaller two beds are more child sized bunk beds than adult twin but doable for short stay. Would stay again with my family.
Ashley was quick to respond and her home is beautiful!

Great family home away from home.  We were able to visit wineries, farms, pumpkin patches and more all while having the ability to homeschool and cook from home.  Excellent stay.  Excellent host.  Worth it.

A girls getaway to celebrate friendships of 40 years and a birthday! What a lovey home to come to at the end of the day and relax! The house is in an upscale, quiet  neighborhood with quick access to the freeway. The house is represented accurately according to pictures. We all slept soundly in the comfortable beds. Ashely was quick to respond to our questions through out our stay. We would recommend this house if you’re traveling to Salem in the near future.

This was a cozy place. We were welcomed with a bowl of fruit, candies and house slippers. It was easy to get in the house and very convenient for my commute as my stay was business. I plan to stay here again in the near future. Ashley was a great hostess and was really promoted at answering my questions.
Super clean and quite home! Would hands-down recommend! I look forward to staying here again in the future.
This home is super clean. My friends and I only stayed one night. It was a perfect location and easy to get to and from.

Comfortable beds and pillows but the house has bare bones accommodations otherwise. One 1/4 cookie sheet, one small sauce pan, no mixing bowls, etc. we were lucky we had aluminum foil in our rental car from elsewhere along our road trip so we could make dinner.

Location was quiet, easy to find and convenient for getting to and from the highway.
Fantastic home! We will be staying again.
VERT NICE!!! Clean and close to everything. Thank you Ashley.
Super convenient and easy place.
This is a really lovely place and Ashley was a great host.  My friends had stayed here when they were house hunting in the area and recommended it.   The stay was perfect.
Spacious home with a relaxing vibe. Clean and organized.
Very nice house, brand new, kitchen is fully loaded with toaster and hot water kettle. Great location and great layout. Already booked a second stay.
Great stay again. She was very accommodating to our requests. Would definitely stay here again.
Great location. Super clean and quiet. Not a lot of cooking tools, pand, bowls, etc. Fine if you don't want to cook, which we didn't. Very comfortable house.
Very nice play to stay and would highly recommend!!
Simple, clean, easy. Thanks !

The house was very clean and everything was in great shape. There was basic amenities and it met our needs. Not quite as homey as other air bnb’s we’ve stayed in before, just the basics. But I can’t complain!
Great house, clear communication with Ashley. Check in was a breeze. House was very clean & comfortable.
Ashley was a great host and the place was great! Would definitely recommend, clean and great location.
Exactly as described, great location, will be back!

Great place to stay with easy access to I-5 in Salem.  New house - very clean and spacious.  Garage was large and easily fit our SUV.  Perfect place for a 1 night stay on our road trip.  We would definitely stay there again.
Ashley is a great host thank you!
This house was clean and accommodating. Ashley responded quickly to questions. Location was convenient. I had a good experience overall and would stay again in the future.
Great beautiful home, Ashley was very responsive and accommodating. The home was very spacious, clean and central to many areas!  Great stay!!
Good location, clean house. mostly bare bones but still comfortable for short stay. Love that we can use the garage!
Great place!
My wife, daughter, and I were pleased with our stay at Ashley's home. It was spacious, clean, and had all the amenities we needed.
Great stay!

I stayed here for 3 months and it was wonderful! Amanda and her family are incredibly kind and responsive with any needs or changes you may have! The apartment was clean, well stocked, and very cozy. Even with a long term stay I really never needed anything extra, the apartment has everything you will need for the most part! It sits is a very cute neighborhood in Salem and has easy access to groceries and supplies! I would recommend and stay here again!
Great little place!

We had a great stay here! The space felt very home like, and had great amenities and accommodations for the price. Amanda is very easy to work with and is extremely helpful. The kitchen amenities were great and we enjoyed being able to cook dinner instead of eating out every night. The windows don’t seem to open so you can get fresh air but besides that this place was 5 stars!

This is a spacious, well-stocked, and lovely apartment! Towels were super soft, and the bed was very comfortable. Cannot BEAT the location - walk to the Willamette Heritage Center, to the weekly Community Market, to Safeway, to cute restaurants...all from a quiet, tree-lined street. Was nice to meet Kevin in person, and Amanda was wonderful to communicate with. You need a permit to park on the street for longer than 90 minutes...hopefully they will have more neighborhood permits to share...if they do - be sure to return them for future guests!

Amanda was a fantastic host and this is such a great spot to stay in Salem! Amanda went out of her way to put an AC unit in the day we arrived because the weekend was going to be particularly hot. THANK YOU!

Hard to beat the location if you want to enjoy downtown Salem. Overall, a comfortable stay with kind and flexible hosts.
My wife and I stayed here during our road trip, it was a nice place, clean, and had everything we needed.
Cute and quaint apartment to stay in. Centrally located to the city. Perfect for two people and very communicative hosts.

This charming unit was exactly what we needed for our stay in Salem. Check in was easy, with detailed instructions for everything, and great communication throughout our stay. This lower unit stays cool in the heat. Even though air conditioning was provided, it stayed at 70 degrees in 90+ degree weather. Many kitchen essentials, linens, closet space, and entertainment hooked up to the large TV, with fast internet for any other needs, were provided. Downtown was an easy walk, and has many shops and restaurants to satisfy anyone. Will definitely keep this place in mind when we come back. Thank you for sharing your space with us!

Amanda’s place is fantastic! The location is fantastic and about 5 blocks from my office in downtown Salem. It was very clean and nicely done. Amanda is very responsive and communication has been great!
Was a very cute home away from home me and my husband enjoy are stay

I stayed at Amanda’s multiple times in July 2021 and it was fantastic! It is in a great location near downtown Salem. It is clean, well-equipped and all-around just a wonderful place to stay! Amanda is a great host - she is responsive, directions are clear, etc. Highly recommend!!
Great central location! Very cute, and very clean!

Good location in a quiet neighborhood -- easy access to downtown and nearby parks.  Comfie bed and pretty well-equipped kitchen.  This is definitely a daylight basement apartment with low ceilings.  If you're tall, it won't work for you.  Very responsive hosts.  Very clean and well-maintained.
Good location, has all the basic necessities. Quiet neighborhood. Also have a parking spot. This is a basement in a house with two other units so you will hear all the noises unfortunately.
Host was always available when I had any questions or concerns about the place. very nice and friendly too

Amanda’s property is absolutely amazing.  A super cozy apartment with all the amenities you could ever hope for, they have even installed 2 large water heaters in the basement to accommodate all the units so you will never run out of hot water while showering like most multi unit Airbnb stays.  The unit was immaculate upon our arrival and we could not in the month we stayed there find one thing to complain about.  We even brought our newborn son home from the hospital to this apartment and Amanda was more than happy to accommodate us.  Five stars all around.  If you need somewhere to stay in Salem, look no further.
Best stay ever!!! Awsome communication  and accommodations!!!
Stay was great! Would stay again!

A super easy walk into downtown, plenty of room for street parking (thanks to the parking pass that you get), and a nice, clean place to stay. Would definitely stay again if I'm ever back in the area!
Place is very nice (for someone shorter than 6').  I did not see the information that the ceiling was 6'5" and the shower was 6'.  Even with all that I enjoyed the space.
Amanda was very easy to communicate with even when I had to change original plans. The room looked as it was described, very cute basement location.
This was a fine place for a one night stop over on our way to Washington.
Hidden gem!!!!

I stayed for a week at this basement apartment near the Capital. The pros are: includes kitchen, walkable to downtown and various eateries, and located in neighborhood of interesting historic homes. The cons are: no bedroom door so cannot be locked, windows cannot be opened so no fresh air, low ceiling (and especially low when taking shower), and during my stay, no extra supplies available as host out of state.
Great communication. Everything went smoothly. Everything was good.

This place is super clean and cute place, I really enjoyed staying out there and I had a very good stay over there, Amanda has provided me everything that I needed and provided me information that I wanted. I’d really love to stay here and looking forward to stay next time when I go to Salem, highly recommended this place. Thank you Amanda
Cozy stay in a great area.

The location is par excellence! Nice cozy apartment with everything you need. We were here for an entire month and enjoyed the urban downtown Salem life ie walking to eat, shop and just get out for fresh air. I would not hesitate recommending this apartment to anyone looking for a place to stay in Salem.
Wonderful spot! Great central location, easy to find. The host was amazing! Highly recommend staying with them!
Great place , loved hosts, & loved the hospitality. Highly recommend.

This home exceeded my expectations! I often stay in Salem to visit family, and absolutely loved how central and private the location was. Tressa's place was easy to find, had convenient parking by the front door, was clean and cozy when we entered, and had everything we could possibly need and more. She was very accomodating, and made our brief stay delightfully memorable. Will definitely come back the next time I'm in Salem!
Very clean, great value. Will definitely stay again if the opportunity arises.

A great place during our visit to Salem. The space was perfect for what we needed a big plus for having great coffee and as clean as could be.  Highly recommend it as you will be hard-pressed to find a better value.
A great place to stay! Very quiet neighborhood.
The place was perfect! Cozy with parking right in front and sparking clean. I would definitely stay here again!
Clean, easy check in, comfortable bed and soft linens. Had everything I needed including coffee!

Great little getaway with a rural vibe, chickens and a garden environment add to the experience.

Superb value, excellent hosts, you’ll enjoy it.

this was my very first airbnb experience and i was very nervous being in a new state. this place was exactly what I needed. extremely clean, great value, well decorated, amazing bedding, private bathroom and kitchen, tv, literally everything I needed! super cozy and comfortable. definitely will be back. landlords are extremely kind and helpful. thank you for making my experience memorable 🥰
Nice place, good location, would revisit.
Was a very great stay, luxurious space with nice amenities
Great place to stay. Clean, neat and provided everything we needed! Great stay!
Great place and definitely will go again if I get the opportunity! Loved my stay!!
Super clean, cute, and at a great price!

Our stay at Tressa's was perfect for us. The place was super clean and organized. It was a little hard to find the first time, but after that, no problem. The bed upstairs was super comfortable. We enjoyed ourselves and her place. We would recommend Tressa's place for anyone staying in the Salem area.

This is a wonderful cottage in Salem, and one that provides most of the comforts youll need. The instructions on arrival were quite helpful, and it is a wonderful place to stay in a beautiful part of the state. You will be happy you stayed here!
Awesome place! Comfy bed, cozy space with great views of the lush trees! Walking distance to downtown. Loved it and will definitely stay again!
Great location. The full kitchen was nice to have. I would stay there again.

This cottage is tucked away on a quiet gravel street that Google Maps isn’t quite sure how to navigate to, but Tressa sent us a map before check-in that made it very easy to find. It was very clean, and had everything we needed. I would absolutely recommend this cottage.
Tressa's cottage is the cutest little tiny home and its stocked full witg everything you need. Tressa is great with suggestions and quick responses! I would definitely stay here again!
Very cozy and cute place!
Awesome guesthouse. Was clean and Tressa was a great host!
Great location and such a cozy place!
Great place, nice location. Friendly host. Overall a fantastic visit.
Wonderful location and beautiful cottage
Awesome little space near downtown Salem!
this is a very cute spot/very clean and Ilove that it has its own little area to park your car...very private
Tressa's cottage provides a clean and comfortable home away from home in a quiet area of Salem. She has all the creature comforts of home.  I look forward to booking with her again!
Very clean, nice place, very comfortable bed. When I checked in A/C was on already which was very nice. Thank you!!! Would definitely stay again!

Everything we needed, we found here. Host thought of it ALL!
Off street parking a plus, but full size pickup was a tight fit.
