Overall exceeded our expectations and meet our every need!
Clean, comfortable, cozy, great location, great amenities - all as advertised! Would definitely stay again when in Salem.
The guest house is very cozy! A great place to stay if you're in town! Kind of difficult to find but its a nice stay! Would recommend to everyone!

This was a nice place to stay. The bed was very comfortable. The steps were steeper than normal, and didn’t have a stair gate at the top, which was a little scary traveling with a young child, but there was a good handrail. The kitchen had what I needed, and there was a nice screened porch at the back. It was a little tricky to find it, but the instructions provided were very helpful.
Tressa’s place is a great little cottage that was clean and very homey! We will definitely come back and stay in her Airbnb when we come back to Washington!

We absolutely loved staying at Tressa's place. She truly thought of everything you would need and it's one of the most equipped Airbnb kitchens we have experienced. It is exactly as described, has a dedicated parking spot, spotlessly clean, and a very comfortable bed. Although we didn't need anything during our stay we were confident that Tressa would have been of assistance. Highly recommended!!!
This place was very cute and perfect for a couple! A little bigger and better than I expected. The alleyway is definitely a little tight. Would recommend to stay here.

Tressa’s place was great! It was spacious than anticipated and was perfect for us. It was clean, private and quiet. The mattress was really comfortable. We would definitely like to stay here again when we visit Salem.

The cottage is a lovely little place to stay. Even though we didn't need much, it had everything we could need. It's a little tricky to find (especially in the dark), but once you arrive, it feels like a tiny home. It's easy to get around Salem from its location. We would stay at the cottage again, if the opportunity arises.

Also, it's no wonder Tressa is a Superhost: my boyfriend and I weren't able to make it for our first of three nights at the cottage due to me falling ill on the day we were supposed to travel, and she generously refunded us the first nights' stay. We highly recommend both Tressa and the cottage!

Cute and cozy. Couch was a nice place to curl up and watch movies. The loft bedroom was adorable and the bed was comfortable! Parking was a tad bit hard to find but other than that, no issues. Would stay again!
A great little stay in Salem. Easy checkin for what felt like a private retreat.
Very clean and located close to downtown.

This is possibly the best Airbnb I've ever stayed in. 1) It was very clean - no one else's hair or trash was in the cottage! 2) The furniture was comfortable - comfy bed, comforter, and couch! 3) There were blinds/curtains on the windows! These 3 basic things have not been met at many other Airbnbs, so I'm very happy they were met here. I would stay here again.
Great little cottage. Clean and quite. Lovely location
Super cute place for two people and you can’t beat the price!!
Clean, private and quiet. Everything I was looking for.
Great place, no complaints.
Great Stay! Easy Check In, Perfect Location. Very clean!
Tressa’s cottage was just as advertised. Very clean, great location, and actually was a larger space than expected. Getting a hold of her was easy and the bed was comfy. 100% would recommend!
Cute little guest house. Host was incredibly gracious and quick at responding
Not a bad place for a visit to Salem!
Very clean and well kept space. Cozy and warm. The bed was very comfortable. Definitely a little tricky to find, though Tressa provided a nice map for guidance.
Sweet little place, nice cozy kitchen, comfortable bed and couches. About 10 min off I5, an easy stopover. Tressa was super communicative and supportive for our visit.
was very impressed with  this place and was happy  to see a full fridge and ability to cook dinner there was very cozy and clean place 😀

Amazing little place with everything you need and more. Tressa is responsive and so easy to talk to. Would definitely refer anyone to stay here if they need a place close to downtown and in a cute little place with a wonderful homely feeling.

We absolutely love this place! The location is great and the place is clean and very nicely decorated. And the mattress is amazing! We always get a good night sleep when we stay here. We love it so much we’ve booked it several times!

This stay is great. It is located in a safe and convenient location, less than 10 minutes from down town Salem. It is secluded and cozy. Tressa was a great host, our flight was cancelled last minute and she was accommodating to extending our stay. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a comfortable, spacious, stay in Salem oregon.
The host is amazing and communicates well looking forward to a stay at her fun and cozy place in the future 😀
We’re returning guests and love Tressa’s place. It’s our home away from home!
It is just out of town enough to be quiet and neighborhoodly but close to everything.  The guest house is private and the space is very comfortable

This is such a perfect place for 1-3 people who are staying in Salem for a short or even longer time. It's looks small from the outside but once you get in, there's a very comfortable couch, dining area, kitchen area plus upstairs is a whole floor with a bathroom, desk, and extremely comfortable bed. It's spacious and clean, and the heating works great on both floors. The parking space is very conveniently located right outside the front door, and as the place is located in an alleyway, there's no street noise. But you're also still just a 5 minute drive to the downtown area with lots of restaurants and shops. Finally, Tressa was lovely and very communicative. Don't hesitate to book here if you're stopping through Salem!
Great private cottage, would stay here again!
This place was great!! Super clean and cozy. Check in is super simple. They even helped me find the alley to get in. Would donate stay again if i came back through town.
We’re repeat guests and this place has become our home away from home. Love it! It has everything we need and more. Very comfortable bed too!
Easy check in process. The Airbnb was clean and comfortable.
Tressa’s place is very comfortable and private. We love it! We’re return guests and it’s our go to place to stay in Salem!
lovely cottage in a really cute neighborhood. Perfect for 1 or 2 people to stay and enjoy the town
Amazing little cottage! It was perfect, bed was super comfortable, clean and nice shower and kitchen. Whole place was wonderful to stay in for a couple nights I would give it 10 stars if I could!! :)
Another awesome visit to Salem at Tressa’s place! So clean, convenient and comfortable!
Very cute little spot with all the amenities needed. Cozy cottage that I would definitely recommend to others.
Great location, cute and clean! Wonderful spot for a one-night stay like we did
Fun and cozy! Centrally located. Host was great to work with.
Very cute little cottage like guest house

I stayed for a week at Tressa's cottage for work and it worked out well. Comfortable bed, plenty of room, near hiking and bike trails, nice neighborhood. The kitchen was a bit lightly stocked in terms of kitchen implements, but it otherwise possessed the essentials.

We were frequent guests and love the place. Our son graduated from Willamette so we probably won’t be in Oregon for a while. We loved this place and it became our home away from home. It has everything you need and is clean and close to everything!

Tressa's cottage is cute and spotlessly clean.  It was a great place to relax. She gave us great info and a map finding the alley access.  The kitchen is well stocked but very small (one person at a time). The stairs are quite steep and hard to navigate, but the bedroom is large and the bed is very comfortable.
The space was clean and comfortable. Communication and instructions were clear. Great little find within minutes of lots of what Salem has to offer!

Cute little cottage. Easy to find alley access. Has its own parking area. Fully equipped kitchen. Large fridge. Easy access to Wi-fi and the TV was easy to figure out. I would definitely recommend Tressa and her cottage to a small party of 2-3 people. Very comfy. Good value for the price.
The bed was very comfortable; kitchen well stocked and we loved our time in Salem in a very quaint neighborhood.
This was a perfect little place for my needs.   It was near where I needed to be and I could come and go easily. Clean and comfortable.
Great location, super comfy bed, very responsive host!
Steep stairs up to bathroom and bed.  The place did not look like pictures on the outside of home.
This cottage was very sweet and comfortable and just what I needed for a quick weekend to Salem.
Great place, perfect for a one night stay. We were unfortunately there during a heat wave but there are 2 AC units that cooled the place down!
Bed is comfortable and place is clean. Air conditioning units are very loud!

This cottage provided a lovely stay for a week in Salem. Clean and well stocked with all you need. The location is tucked into a beautiful neighborhood. The 2 story set up is ideal if you are looking for a couple who both need to work from home. as there is a desk upstairs and dining table downstairs. The bed was very comfortable and that is usually what I look for when reading reviews. The kitchen has all the basics and a few extras, like a stand mixer. Tressa was very responsive with any questions. I will absolutely be coming back to this wonderful cottage!
A very clean and cute place! Loved the 2 air conditioners on both floors, had everything we needed. We would stay again if came back to Salem area.
Tressa was responsive and easy to work with.  Her home was lovely, quiet, and private.
It was a cute place located very close to a lot of things. Enjoyed the stay

Place was well equipped with all necessities and very clean inside (from the outside it appeared a bit dirty due to spider season, but inside was very well kept and clean). The couch was perfect to just relax. I think it's a great place for couples to stay and maybe even work for a few days. Host provided detailed directions and map which made the place easy to find.
I wouldn't recommend it if you have small kids/infants due to steep stairs and because you have to be extra careful to avoid bumping baby's head due to low ceilings at some places.
Great communication and check-in and check-out process.
Great spot with plenty of room and amenities.

My boyfriend and I only stayed one night as we were passing through Salem. It was well worth it though. This airbnb has everything you need and is located in a quiet area. It's also conveniently located near shopping. Tressa responds very quickly. We would like to stay here again for a longer visit in the future.
Place was very comfy :)
Great place!

Great location in a cute, quiet neighborhood, convenient to Willamette U/downtown/the capitol. Not ideal for very tall, large, or claustrophobic people, but clean, cozy, and affordable -- perfect for a home base for being away during the day. Comfortable bed.
I really appreciated that the space was so clean and quiet. Walking downtown was easy and enjoyable. Quite adequate for my short stay!
Hermosa casa, muy completa para pasar unos días. Muy buena comunicaconda y amabilidad de parte de la anfitriona.
I loved it it was very nice and cute lots of blankets to stay cozy and had all you would need for basic cooking it’s very clean and she texts back very fast

Very comfortable and easy to find.
Clean and spacious!
Highlights: Extremely responsive host, peaceful location, and a very comfortable bed.

Absolutely loved staying at this cottage! So perfect for what I needed and adorable! Squeaky clean, extremely comfortable bed, quiet and private and overall amazing. Grateful to have stayed here and highly recommend!

It was a nice airbnb. I think it could still use some work but I could see where they have really tried to improve the small space. Over all great experience and would like to use there space in the future.
Very lovely place , well described once got the plan ! Super host ! I advise this place !

Highlights (again): Quiet location, clean unit, very comfortable bed/bedding, and excellent communication with host. I also found the parking spot to be convenient and navigable with an attentively driven SUV.
We just had a quick, one night stay. Tressa responded so quickly to my questions! She was great. It was a very comfortable, enjoyable place to stay. We hope to reserve again.

I really enjoyed this little cottage.  I had to drive my bigger full-size quad cab truck and couldn't park right at the door, but that was really not a big deal.  Just found a spot on the street.    Tressa was great to communicate with, the cottage was very clean and well-stocked.  I plan on staying again.
Great host and comfortable place to stay. I would stay here again, and definitely recommend to others.
Great please super recommend it

Tressa's place was absolutely wonderful. There is a Brita pitcher in the fridge, unlisted but huge. A fullsize ironing board was such a welcomed surprise as most AirBnBs do not have those. Very private, very peaceful. It is an absolutely wonderful place to stay and worth every single penny.
Great place,complete close by

A quiet, cozy, clean, sunny cottage! The space upstairs with the desk was ideal -- I was on a work trip and needed to concentrate every day. The desk with the west-facing window was a perfect space for working! The spaces were clean, bright, and cozy, and Tressa was responsive and kind.

Lovely stay. Great neighborhood minutes away from downtown W. Salem, which is then just a 5 minute drive to downtown Salem.

Having a stove, laundry, and the just the square footage was a real treat for me and my pet companion.
Fay was sooo friendly! She communicated with me throughout the entire stay to make sure that the place was up to par and I was happy with the stay. House is wayyy nicer than the photos
This is perfect place to stay last minute or to explore Salem.    Thank you Fay for accommodating us last minute.  Beautiful home.  We will be back for sure.
This is a great 5-star stay with a comfortable bed and responsive hosts!
Everything we needed for a weekend of wine and delicious food. Thanks for welcoming us in and making sure we were taken care of.

Excellent stay while I was on the road. Felt just like home

I would definitely stay here again

Comfortable spot in West Salem.  Quiet neighborhood.  Great for exploring the surrounding area and wine touring.  Fay and Dan are welcoming hosts, and their communication was great.  Easy check in and check out.
Fay and Dan were super accomodating and friendly. Nice, restful location for Willamette parent's weekend!
Clean and comfortable.  Well stay here again !
Very comfortable and clean. Easy check in and in the better part of Salem.

You won't meet a kinder, more gracious and welcoming couple then Fay and Dan. I felt comfortable from day one. They were there when I had questions (one was "Can you be a witness at my wedding?" asked the day before said event, and they were both there to help us celebrate), and they also offered me plenty of privacy. It was a great balance. The condo was clean, roomy and well stocked. It's a great location if you're touring Williamette Valley wineries and downtown Salem is just eight minutes away over the river. Can't say enough about my experience and the friendliness exhibited by Fay and Dan.
This is a great space below a home. Well thought out and in a great neighborhood. We will definitely be back.
Great location. Very clean and comfortable. We and our dog felt right at home. Hosts were welcoming and comunicative.

This place is amazing, the bed is very comfy and they have everything you need. Kitchen and bathroom stocked well with everything you need. Extra bedding and an amazingly wonderful bed. We will visit and stay here again!
Very clean and easy to access basement apartment.
Excellent place not a good place to stay for tall people very low ceilings and doors

The place was clean and cute and in a nice area. It’s clearly advertised as a basement apartment, so I should have anticipated hearing all the noise and footsteps overhead. If that bothers you, heads up! If not, this is a nice little spot!
Great neighborhood.  Spacious and clean.
Very nice place place to stay and convenient to Salem. Fay and Dan were very helpful and friendly hosts.
Clean and great place to stay. Would stay again. Fay had great communication which made checkin super easy.
Great place
The lace is cozy, and the hosts communication is excellent.
Had a great stay! Very comfortable for my dog and I. Nice, safe neighborhood! Full kitchen, fridge and laundry. A/C works awesome even in this crazy heat! Highly recommend!
Excellent location and comfortable lodgings. We would highly recommend staying here if you’re in the area! Easy check-in/checkout and the area was clean and accommodating
Safe and quiet location. Easy street parking. Comfortable and clean. Great hospitality from Fay and Dan!
Thank you for sharing your home. It was beautiful and very clean :)
Wonderful Place :)
Thank you Fay!!
Fun stay and adorable place!
A great location to stay. The host was very responsive and accommodating throughout our extended stay. Will definitely be staying here again!

This flat was perfect for my rotation at Salem Health Hospital.  The location is perfect and the place is equipped with everything you need for an extended stay.  Very quite neighborhood and a beautiful park very close by. It was nice being able to park right next to the flat and not out on the street. Grocery stores, banks, restaurants, all very close by.  Would definitely recommend this property and host.

Looking for a small place to rest when you are not out exploring Oregon?  You found it!!   Amanda and Kevin were great!  I highly recommend this place for traveling adults but it may not be suitable for small children due to the creaky floors… but the house is over 100 years old with personality which makes it a cool place to stay.
100% recommend staying! Beautiful and quite neighborhood!! We definitely would stay again!!
Great, clean and easy place to stay! I was in for work and it was a perfect place to hang my hat at night!
Convenient location; nice unit. Bathroom is small.

Great house I loved my stay! Host was very responsive and accommodating.  The place was very clean and bed was super comfy. The kitchen, bedroom and the closet are roomy.  Parking available. Safe, quiet and cute neighborhood. As stated up front the laundry is around back of house you have to go outside. so if you have a long stay planned be aware. But wasn’t a problem for me in my 3 month stay at all. The bathroom and shower are very small which wasn’t a problem either for me but just so you know. As stated there is a smart TV. There is no cable or local tv but you can stream if you have a Streaming service account. Highly recommend staying here a charming comfortable home, fair price. I would stay here again!

This was a perfect place to stay in Salem. The area is cute and centrally located. The house is super cute and cozy- a perfect place for our family to stay ( we have two small kiddos). We would stay here again!

Great location as a traveling nurse, super close to hospital and downtown. Big closet, lots of room for storage. Upstairs unit is perfect for night shift sleeping, and I thought the bed was very comfortable.  Had all the kitchen things I needed. Shared washer/dryer with other two units but I didn’t have an issue. A bit expensive but seems to be comparable to the market.
Super cute apartment really close to downtown.  The one downside is that the bathroom is pretty small.

Lots of space for just me, easy walk to my downtown building. Cute and clean. Wall unit worked well. Appreciated additions like a Brita pitcher and small coffee pot.
At times wifi seemed a bit slow.
Overall, very pleasant stay.

I stayed here for 6 weeks during a clinical rotation. Whenever we needed help Amanda was very quick to respond. Walking to downtown is 6 minutes. The freeway is super close as well if you need to commute. Great location.
Cute little pad in the perfect, central location, and fantastic price!
Amanda was incredibly accommodating to our situation & longer stay.
Private, full kitchen, quiet neighborhood and close to downtown - great little spot

Furniture not comfortable. They did state in review sofa not comfortable but bed was horrible. If ur a nurse, this isn’t a good fit for rest and relaxation. I worked nights and the host messaged me numerous times while sleeping, staying my car was in a different parking spot, my car isn’t here. Host even messaged me when I moved out. Place is very dated meaning not comfortable. I’ve never had a host message me telling me water will be turned off not telling me how to flush a toilet. Hard pass. If ur staying for a night probably okay any longer your back will hurt.

Great place to stay. Amanda is friendly, responsive and accommodating .
Located in a nice neighborhood, the apartment is a short walk from downtown, so it's easy to get around and check out places.

This is a great place to stay! The location is convenient for guests to access different parts of the city. I stayed while an area power outage was going on. I still had a comfortable stay and the ability to use the stove top which is gas powered. The host was extraordinary! She met me during check in to walk me through everything in house.

I had a very special week at Sheri’s.  First of all, the house was immaculate, sizable, and very tastefully designed.  The price was remarkable for such a lovely experience.  Also, anytime I needed to communicate with Sheri, she responded very very quickly and always gave me informative answers.  I also appreciated the location of the house.  I could walk to a park, and then beyond the park to the downtown area.  Heading the other way, there were restaurants and a natural food store.  From so many perspectives, just excellent.
Convenient Salem location in a nice quiet neighborhood. Fully stocked kitchen and comfortable beds were appreciated, as well as the big couch in the living room by the fireplace. Great stay!

The house is in a beautiful neighborhood. Check in was easy and Sheri had great communication. The house design is beautiful. We enjoyed the nice lush lawn on a sunny day. The kitchen had everything we needed. This was amazing because we did all of our own cooking on vacation. I would definitely book this house again. I really appreciated the special touch she added, a bottle of wine with a congratulations of our anniversary. It definitely wasn't expected, made the place feel like home.

Sheri’s place was a true home away from home. The space was filled with all the modern conveniences, clean, and sprinkled with personal touches. It had everything we needed and more. The space was large with ample seating and had a cozy fireplace to congregate around. Also, the location was perfect—centrally located, yet on a quiet street.

Sheri was absolutely amazing, incredibly kind and quick with responses. What a fantastic retreat!
Very warm and comfortable house, with generous amenities. Everything is well ordered and easy to use. Location was very good for us.

This house and host are wonderful! The photos are accurate, the place was clean, and we were very comfortable here. Its a great, safe, location near lots of good food. The house is older, but with nice updates, like a powerful showerhead and stylish furnishings. We loved the fireplace, which actually does a wonderful job at heating the living room. The office came in handy as well. I'd recommend this place to anyone and we'd love to stay again.
An amazing stay with a super helpful and friendly host
The home has everything you need for a longer stay! And it’s a quiet and beautiful location.

We adored our stay at Sheri’s cottage. The home was outfitted with all the comforts of home. Sheri was a phenomenal host. It was centrally located close enough to explore all Oregon has to offer from Multnomah Falls, to Cannon Beach on the coast and to Crater Lake. We also enjoyed a few fantastic new restaurants in downtown Salem. Would absolutely stay here again.

My family and I thoroughly enjoyed are stay at this wonderful cottage. Sheri is a wonderful host. The neighborhood is lovely, quiet and convenient to downtown and other locations of interest. We would definitely stay here again without any reservation. Cathy

Sheri’s home was exactly as described and her communication was phenomenal throughout the entire stay. She always made sure everything was going great, and she left very detailed specific messages that left no questions unanswered. Her home was warm and welcoming and everything we needed for our stay. This is a great place to stay if you are visiting Salem. Right in the middle of everything. Thank you again!

the house was incredibly spacious and full of anything and everything we could possibly have needed for our stay. location was spot on and the back yard was a perfect place to sit outside and enjoy the warm weather.

Sheri's house in Salem is a very clean, comfortable and well-equipped two bedroom house in a lovely quiet neighborhood. The listing is accurate, and Sheri was very quick to respond to any of our communications with her. We look forward to staying there next time we visit Salem.
Very comfortable place and bed!  Best equipped kitchen ever!   Very clean and close in to parks!
This was a fantastic place for us to stay while visiting family, close to parks and a lovely neighborhood. We will definitely be back when we come to Salem again
The house had everything we needed for a great stay.  We have a well stocked kitchen and washer and dryer.
Cozy house at a good price in a great location.
best stay I've been able to experience only a hour away from the coast and the neighborhood is quiet and respectful to others quiet time
wonderful home A+ 100% . 5 Stars thank you.
Amazing place to stay! Sheri is the perfect host!

What a great house! It has all of the amenities to make this your home away from home. Sheri put thoughtful touches throughout to make the place cozy and inviting. We enjoyed coming back to a kitchen that allowed us to make nearly any dinner and lounging on the back porch, enjoying the beautiful fall weather. It is a perfect landing pad for your adventure.
Great place. Very neat, clean and well supplied. Shari responded quickly to our requests and was super helpful. Highly recommended.

A great place to stay for a weekend or a month! Sheri was very responsive to questions we had and made our stay very comfortable.
I would definitely stay here again!!! Thanks, Sheri!
👍
wonderful location, close to everything. Perfect for small family.

1950’s Charm is exactly that. Just the right size for a small group or couple. Well stocked with all you will need to be comfortable. Great location in a quiet neighborhood but near to major roads for access around and out of the city.
Great spot in Salem that is close to the city for a nice short drive to the main attractions. The house was nice and worked great for my wife and kids. Overall, great stay in Salem that I recommend
Sheri was awesome, and this house was perfect for our needs. Great experience.

Immaculately clean, excellent & convenient location, along with quick and seamless communication made our stay perfect, relaxing and enjoyable. There are so many amenities available,  and clear check in/out instructions made it simple and mistake proof. Would not hesitate to stay the next time we are in town!

Sheri's place was a great spot in a great neighborhood! It was super convenient to stores, restaurants, and I-5, while also feeling securely nestled in a residential area. The décor and small details made it feel especially cozy and welcoming. We enjoyed our time here, and would definitely consider staying here again when in the area.
The house is better than described!  Comfortable and cozy with everything you might need for a short or long stay.  Loved walking thru the neighborhood too.
Great neighborhood and great host. Sheri was very responsive to any needs/questions we had during our stay.

Overall great stay! This location was wonderful for my month long stay, being close to downtown and the hospital.  Sheri was a great host- both responsive and ensured I had all that I needed. Would highly recommend this house!
Great home! Has all the necessities. Quiet neighborhood. Host was helpful and communicative.

Sheri's place was worth every bit as it was and is listed. Also was nice having at least some form of substance in the kitchen for first arriving or for brewing a warm tea during the wonderful weather there.

This was our second stay at Sheri's. It is a great place to stay in Salem. The house is as advertised in the listing - safe quiet neighborhood; absolutely clean; and well-equipped. Communication with Sheri is consistently quick, clear, and responsive.

We are repeat tenants. Stayed four weeks this year. Great location for walking and biking.

Sheri does everything right.

My husband and I stayed at Sheri’s place for the local Ironman 70.3 race. It was close the the city and convenient for traveling to the race. Sheri was very communicative and responds quickly. We would stay again!

Really cozy home, perfect for families who want to feel at home away from home. The house has many commodities and extra towels, sheets and blankets which prevents having to frequently wash things all the time. Also the kitchen is pretty stocked up and gives you a variety of options which I enjoyed.

Sheri’s place is amazing. It’s very cozy with comfy beds, a well stocked kitchen and plenty of towels and linens. We love the neighborhood too - just a short walk to the park which makes for a lovely nightly stroll and a half hour commute (walking) to campus. Sheri’s detailed instructions were helpful when we needed to locate things in the house or figure out when to take out the trash. We can’t recommend  it place enough.
Gorgeous hidden gem in Salem! Clean and cozy with a great location and all the amenities. Amazing host! Definitely book this property for your visit to Salem.

Debbie an amazing hostess! The spave was better than the pictures and she was friendly and fun! You can expect a warm environment filled with joy and fun conversation! It exceeded my expectations on every level and was very private!
Worth for stay. Great yard. Nice room and quiet

Wonderful stay for myself and my cat at Debbie's. The space is very large and it was easy to drive up and move all my cat's gear in. So many nice touches with furnishings, an electric kettle (I brought some oatmeal for breakfast), and an electric fireplace. It exceeded my expectations and I would be happy to stay at Debbie's again the next time I am in town!

This is the best Airbnb we have ever been to, it was a great alternative to a hotel. The location was perfect for visiting central Salem. Debbie supplied us with a coffee maker, free tv, free wifi, snacks, great quality coffee grounds, and access to a fire pit which we very much enjoyed. This place had great hospitality and was honestly better than a hotel. We recommend this place to others and would definitely stay again!
Very cute space. Perfect for my needs
Debbie is very nice and accommodating. The spaces is great. Check in and out was a breeze. The bed was really comfortable.
Great stay, thumbs up on the price, prompt informative responses, cozy, clean, spacious and peaceful space. Highly recommend!

This was one of my best Airbnb experiences in a long time! Debbie was very thoughtful and responsive. The space was very clean, roomy, and private. Comfy bed, hot shower, and a nice backyard (with chicken coop) for my dog. Highly recommend!

Super clean, stylish space in a beautiful neighborhood. It was the perfect retreat during my wife's outpatient surgery nearby. Thoughtful touches like snacks and the use of the mini fridge were great! Thanks Debbie for a pleasant stay.
Great place for the evening! Quiet neighborhood and very clean and comfortable stay.

Debbie's home is lovely, comfortable, peaceful and a fantastic value! Lathe space, clean, very comfy bed, wonderful shower - and the yard is fabulous! Excellent location too - it feels like country glam in the city!

What a lovely spot! Tucked away in beautiful neighborhood close to town but not too close. We had a short stay, but the space was lovely and very comfortable. Will definitely rebook the next time we’re in Salem!
The was a great place for an overnight. I had an exam the next day; it was quiet, bright and effortless to stay. I recommend it.
I had a great stay. The unit is very well stock and very comfortable.
Beautiful setting with a great cozy room with a private entrance

Wonderful, clean and comfortable place to stay. Debbie is very good at communicating while still giving you privacy. My boyfriend and I had a very fun and relaxing stay. Would definitely stay here again, as well as recommend to family and friends. Thank you, Debbie!
Terrific host and wonderful space!
We were very pleased with all elements of our stay at Debbie's. The place is well-put-together, tasteful quality. Highly recommended!
Debbie was an incredible host. Everything was as described, location was great, her pets are adorable... we highly, highly recommend staying with Debbie!

Beautiful, clean and comfortable place located in a quiet neighborhood. Debbie is so kind, friendly and communicative. We feel relaxed and enjoyed our stay and will return if the opportunity arise in the future.
Debbie is a hostess extraordinaire! She thought of everything and made our stay cozy and comfortable. We truly felt at home!
Debbie’s place was great!

So cute! Such a nice host and cute pets!
So worth the stay.

What a lovely place, fantastic host, and truly wonderful location.  Easy check-in, accurate photos, quite neighborhood, and tasteful design make for a great vacation.  Debbie is a fantastic, accommodating, and thoughtful host.
Very clean, spacious, quiet, and private! Lovely host as well.

1000% recommended. Debbie does her best to make sure you have a pleasant stay plus more. You have total privacy of the suite and you even have access to the backyard. She has the best view of the neighborhood. If you’re lucky to run into Debbie during your stay, her hospitality is impeccable. Thank you!

This is a wonderful place for couples to stay. Very clean. Price and location is great. Debbie made it easy for us to access the Airbnb. To our surprised they had portable AC unit. That helped a lot in this heat.

Debbie’s place was perfect - exceptionally clean, everything I needed, a quick drive to all the best local places, plenty of space to feel restful and at ease during my two nights there. Debbie was great with communication - quick and responsive. Would definitely stay here again when coming through Salem. Highly recommend!
This is one of the best Air B&B I have stayed at. Debbie has a great set up for her guest.
Wonderful location in Salem and a nice little guest suite for a quiet night.
I loved this place so much! Very cute and clean. Also large fenced in yard which was great for my dog. Very beautiful and calm neighborhood. Debbie was super helpful!
Debbie is a super nice lady :) Beautiful home and comfortable stay! Her two cats are cute and said hi to me.
Very nice, clean, comfortable, and modern accommodation - immaculate.
Really clean! In a great neighborhood and was very quiet!
Debbie is an amazing host and is so very kind and accommodating. Her place is more than what we expected: cleanliness, super comfortable, close to downtown and things you may need.

Fresh eggs were a nice perk . The shower is to die for . Great neighborhood with easy access to apartment great TV . Shopping near by . Parks and golf near by as well. Loved it . Would recommend this one to anyone.
Debbie's guest suite is the first floor of very large home, and you scarcely know anyone else is there.   She is attentive and responsive to questions.  Very comfortable and clean.
Would recommend!  Great spot. Very clean and comfortable.  Debbie was great!
Such a cute place to stay in a really nice area, Debbie and her dog were absolutely amazing. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again
Great space and wonderful stay. Great area and quiet.
Great neighborhood with clean and very comfortable accommodations. Debbie was a great host. If we are ever back in Salem, this would be our first choice.
Cute space in a very quiet neighborhood. Close to downtown and parks. Debbie was very sweet and accommodating. We would stay again.
Lovely spot in a quiet residential neighborhood. Very homey and comfortable
loved the host Debbie, the place was beautiful and so cozy ❤️ want to go back soon and price paid for our mini getaway was awesome 👌 highly recommend this  place!!

This was the perfect place to stay for 10 days. It was really comfortable and Debbie was very thoughtful with how she set up the place. Debbie was incredibly accommodating and friendly. Would recommend!
Amazing! Very cozy place. I would totally stay again.
Debbie was a great host & very easy to communicate with , very helpful. Her place is so clean & beautiful.
Debbie's home is very comfortable, clean and private. We decided to stay an extra night since we enjoyed our stay so much.

I loved my stay at Debbie’s place in Salem..so much so, that I immediately booked another stay in a few weeks..the place is immaculate, the bed is luxurious, every detail is well thought out for comfort..Debbie is a great host

This was a very comfortable and quiet location to rest and get away for a few days.  Debbie was always there and responded quickly to any needs or requests we may have had.  It was well worth the value and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Debbie’s such a wonderful hostess and the space is gorgeous and comfortable. So wonderful.

Beautiful stay at quiet spacious 1BR. Lovely outdoor space in great neighborhood with nearby walking trails & parks which we took advantage of stretching our legs in before we hit the road.

The ONLY thing we would have changed was very minor, but should know if you drive an electric car: Both the other Airbnb's we stayed at were VERY communicative regarding the plugin for our electric car we were driving. Since we were checking in later than expected at this place, I didn't ask regarding where to plug in. But the other 2 were proactive in letting me know where and how to plugin to their places which I greatly appreciated so I was prepared when we arrived. We didn't end up charging and instead had to power up before leaving at the Salem supercharger which added drive time to our trip vs just charging overnight.

Otherwise, very lovely stay, would absolutely stay here again. Beautiful property.
Was an amazing stay and was just as described.

A wonderful getaway at Debbie’s welcoming and SPOTLESS guest suite.  Easy access, great communication, and even a visit from ‘hostess cat’ Luna!  We would come back here in a heartbeat.  Thanks Debbie!

Nice quiet comfortable place to sleep and stay.  Not a place for cooking meals. Spacious. Would have liked to sit outside in the evening if the weather was better (cold & rainy). Good for a couple or single. Very responsive host, clear communication, good access details made it very easy. Definitely will stay again.

Debbie’s guest suite will always be my go to place when I come to Salem. It is immaculately clean, in an amazingly beautiful neighborhood, and very private.  She is such a great host, always checking to make everything’s ok.  See my earlier review ..  if I say much more, I’m afraid It may not be available when I want to stay down the road
This was my third stay at Debbie’s guest suite.  It is such a private and relaxing place, and she is a wonderful host.  See my earlier reviews for more details.

This place is wonderful. I didn’t get to meet the owner as I had an extremely busy weekend. However, she was incredibly responsive and helpful through the app. The location of this is perfect. I am a young woman, who was traveling alone and despite getting back to the location late at night both nights, I felt completely safe here. The home is beautiful, quiet, and cozy.
The room was decorated very nicely. Everything was clean and neat. It has a small counter mini kitchen with a microwave and coffee maker. Quiet and safe neighborhoods. Great hostess.
This is great place in a lovely neighborhood. It’s all set up quite nicely and is very comfortable.
Amazing place especially if you love animals. The room is amazing and everyone was super friendly. Great accomodations.

We had a great stay for the couple nights we were here. It's a nice big bright spacious private room with ample storage available for unpacking if you'd like. It was very enjoyable to walk by the lovely garden when walking to and from the private entrance to our car in the driveway parking spot right by the gate. The chicken coup outside is not too far from the private entrance, but the chickens were all pretty quite and unobtrusive. I only ever noticed a bit of quiet chatter from them if I walked outside. Comfortable bed, nice TV with Netflix, and I especially appreciated the water dispenser with a jug of clean filtered water. Also, the room just smelled really nice and clean to me; it was subtle, but a great enhancement to the overall feel and ambiance of such a relaxing place to stay.
I really liked this place. Highly recommended. It was very well organized & communication with host was great. I especially liked the details & thoughfulness of the host reflected in the room.
Great accommodation, just as described.  Spacious, relaxing, well-equipped and clean.  Couldn't ask for anything else.  Good hostess, very accommodating.  Would certainly recommend highly.
It was a very enjoyable experience and we wouldn't hesitate to do it again.
We had a great time staying at Debbie's. The room/suite was spacious and super comfortable. The neighborhood was private and quiet. Would definitely come back.
The host was super communicative. Check-in was easy! Room was spacious, clean, quiet and comfortable! I highly recommend this stay!
Excellent place to stay! Host was communicative, and the place was located in a quiet neighborhood. Would definitely recommend if you're in town

Nice place on the south end of Salem. My mom and I stayed over for one night while riding the Willamette Scenic bikeway. I would say if you are riding the bikeway that the last couple of hills to the house are a grind at the the end of the day. Either way it was clean and comfortable place with an affordable yard and sweet pup 🐶.

Debbie is a gracious host and was very accommodating with our unique situation with having bicycles. We would definitely stay again!!
I great second night stay in Salem. Thank you Debbie for helping us work out the details.

We loved our suite in South Salem. It had all the amenities to make our stay super comfortable. It was very clean and well appointed. Our host Debbie was welcoming and attentive.
The site is quiet and lovely. We will always stay here when we are in South Salem.
Great overnight stay.  Very comfortable.  Very clean!  Definitely would want to return again in the future.  Debbie is very friendly and made us feel right at home!!
Great neighborhood! Quiet, private access, clean.. everything you want in an Airbnb.
Super friendly and responsive host, very clean house, and had all the amenities I could have needed. Highly recommend!
We stayed at Debbie’s to be close to family. It was a perfect location for us, comfortable, and clean. We’ll definitely stay here again next time we visit!

Debbie has a great and very neat location. The bed blankets were very soft. The small garden with chickens is really cool. The location is about 10 min drive to downtown. The communication with Debbie is very easy.
Just what we needed for our two night stay in Salem. Comfortable, clean, safe.  Beautiful home and yard.  Enjoyed observing the chickens as well as the friendly kitty who strolled by occasionally :)
Our stay was perfect for our needs.  Easy checkin and host was very accommodating.

My parents stayed and reported to me (I rented it for them and am now reviewing because they don't use the internet much). They loved the neighborhood. They loved Debbie's grace in offering her kitchen after their chat (even though they only had a two night stay). They loved her on property kitties and garden. They loved the cleanliness and thoughtfulness of the accommodations. They slept well.
great place and friendly host!
Very clean, very comfortable, very quiet and very easy instructions and check-in.  It was exactly as advertised and exactly what we wanted.
So happy I stayed here. It’s a great spot! Comfortable, clean, great location, and private. Debbie is a terrific host, quick and clear communication. Highly recommended.
We thoroughly enjoyed our overnight stay here.  It is a lovely, well-appointed and comfortable accommodation.  The neighborhood is quiet and private.
Very cozy and comfy suite. Great location. Beautiful surroundings. When returning to Salem next time this will be the place. Good communication with our host!

Debbie was a wonderful hostess!  She was very easy to communicate with and her place was perfect for a solo weekend!  Great for couples, too!  The bed was so comfortable :)  Beautiful property.  Very clean!:)
Debbie was an incredible host going above and beyond to make us feel welcome. Her house was immaculately clean and spacious. We loved staying and can't recommend her enough.

We had a lovely little getaway and were able to bring our 7 month old along. Debbie's place was clean and cozy! It fit our needs perfectly. We would love to come back to stay again. It was nice getting to meet Debbie in the morning too!
Debbie’s place was perfect! Very clean, comfortable and Debbie was super helpful and responsive. If I return to Salem, I would definitely stay here again!
Very clean, cozy, and spacious! Coffee bar & dishes/microwave for leftovers. We’ll definitely stay here again!

Debbie's cozy basement getaway is in a very quiet and beautifully tree-lined community in Salem. This home definitely met my high standards - exceptionally clean, very comfortable bed, great temperature control ability, quiet, a very nice little coffee/tea station, and great shower/water pressure. The wifi and linens were great, also. Easy access to everything in Salem, a parking spot right in front of the house, very private, and chickens (not roosters) in the yard!
Great location in Salem. Peace and quiet.

Great experience
Debbie is very friendly and and welcoming

Great place, it was lovely and pretty quiet too. One thing that I noticed was the linens had that "dryer sheets" perfumey smell, which bothered my sensitive nose. But if you like that kind of thing, great! The bed was very comfortable and it had nice amenities. Beautiful large shower too.
This is my 2nd time staying at Debbies, and I'm looking forward to the next time.
House was spacious and quiet. A great place for a quick getaway!
Super cute place

Well, I honestly thought I was no longer an “AirBnb girl” as I’ve been frequently disappointed with rentals of all kinds in various locations. Debbie’s place broke that cycle. Hands down, one of the cleanest, well appointed spaces I’ve had the pleasure to stay in. Like renters wrote before me, the bed and linens were fantastic! She created a very comfortable, cozy space with lovely, new furnishings. So much storage in the wonderful wall storage units, sweet table and benches to have some takeout or drink coffee, a warm electric fireplace and a super shower. All in a spacious suite layout.
Debbie is so friendly and kind and is incredibly responsive. Her home is located in a wonderful neighborhood and is a quick drive to town. So happy I gave AirBnb another try-thank you Debbie!
Debbie was a fantastic host! Very responsive, gave very helpful instructions before arrival, and helped out with whatever we needed. I would be happy to return and stay again!

if you are looking for a place to stay in South Salem, do yourself a favor and stay with Debbie. Extremely spacious, well appointed, spotless and comfortable, and in a beautiful quiet neighborhood. Though we only communicated through text, I found Debbie to be the best of hosts, friendly and responsive in every way. This is a real find.
Clean, quiet, just as described. Would stay again.
The space was peaceful and quiet. Highly recommend if you’re visiting Salem.
Excellent Airbnb. Quite neighborhood. Verry responsive and helpful host.  Will definitely stay here again.
Very nice place.  Quiet neighborhood.  Pretty yard.  Very comfortable.
It's my 3rd time staying there and I would highly recommend it.I'm sure I will be back sometime soon
My stay was comfortable, safe and enjoyable. Highly recommended.
Lily was a perfect host. She made us feel welcome and comfortable during our stay. The place was amazingly stylish, clean, and relaxing! I'm exciting about staying here again in the future.

Lily's place was lovely- was easy to find and check in to, was in a beautiful part of town, and had all the amenities we needed. She was so kind to communicate with, and always made sure we were very comfortable. We look forward to future visits here!

I was traveling for work.  Lily's  place was quiete and clean.  I stayed for a week and everything  was good.  Much better than a hotel.  Lily was was responsive and a good host.  I'd recommend staying here.

Lily’s Air Bnb is great! There are amazing features that beat a lot of other Air Bnb’s in the area such as the nice shower, the Bluetooth speakers in the bathroom, the hammock on the porch and the giant king sized bed. Definitely recommend this Air Bnb!
Clean, cute, and comfortable! Loved my stay here!
Had an amazing stay here! Everything was cute and clean, great value! Would definitely stay here again!

The studio was very clean and nicely decorated.  We enjoyed our stay with just a few items that should be noted.  The walkway to the studio is very steep, especially for those with knee issues and disabilities.  The second item was though there was a flat screen tv there was no access unless you streamed Netflix or something similar.  The other issue is the studio seems to be in a cellular dead zone and the wifi was unsecured.  Other then that the bed was super comfortable and the view lovely!
A great, comfy, clean and private little getaway nestled among perfectly manicured grounds. A great stay.
Lily was an amazing host and is very prompt in responding to your messages! Also this place has a nice backyard and little porch to sit outside and enjoy the views.

The accommodations were as advertised and very clean . The studio is  actually more  spacious then l expected. The decor is modern and relaxing. Checkin was easy. Lily responded promptly to all my texts and was very gracious about my young grandchildren visiting. The location was great for our needs with a nice walking park and a creek right around the corner in a quiet neighborhood.
Cute studio and nice neighborhood. Bed is really comfortable and studio is spacious. Lily is very responsive. Perfect getaway!
We had a great time I love the place I love the view, Unfortunately we couldn’t stay longer but thank you for having us

This place was cute, neat, and served it's purpose for my husband and I for our weekend conference trip. Check in was easy and Lily was very nice and got back to us very quickly. The location was also good and not too far from town, but far enough that it wasn't in the heart of the city. We had a few disappointments though, the first being there was a lot of thumping upstairs that seemed to go late into the night and start early in the morning (if you're used to having an upstairs neighbor, it might not be too much of a distraction). Our second disappointment was that both the Bluetooth music feature and the TV did not work. We tired several times to find the Bluetooth network as labeled on the instructions, but none of our devices could locate it, making us wonder if the name had been changed but had yet to be updated on the instructions. The same thing happened with the TV. We followed all the provided instructions and downloaded the Chromecast app so we could cast our screens onto the TV, but it kept saying the TV was under a different Wi-Fi network, and that there were no devices on the Airbnb Wi-Fi it could cast too. We felt like the price was a bit high as well, especially since none of the electronic features seemed to work correctly -- the initial cost per night seems low, but the cleaning and services fees were pretty high. If we have to come back to Salem we will probably get a hotel next time, as it will be cheaper and also provide breakfast. However, if you like the experience of staying in an Airbnb and enjoy the aesthetic of a cute and cozy room, this place is right up your alley.
Great stay! Host was amazing. Beautiful back yard and very comfortable bed! Nice and clean.
Clean and cozy basement space. Comfortable bed. Near a nice park. Quiet neighborhood. Lily was responsive and accommodating.
My stay was great.
Get ready for a relaxing stay at Lily's! She has created a comfortable, relaxing, beautiful space, complete with a small kitchen, comfortable bed, and nice lighting. I would absolutely stay again!

Stayed for 3 days at Lily’s place, the backyard view was nice, especially when watching 4th of July fireworks. The black out curtains was also perfect for us. Highly recommend staying here if you’re in Salem.
Great place to stay in Salem, Oregon! The bed was comfortable and Lily was quick to respond!
Nice little basement apartment
We found this apt last minute and we were so pleased with everything. It was so clean and comfortable.
The place was amazing I’ll definitely come back for sure

When we first arrived, Kristie greeted us in person. Then as we entered the unit it was immediately impressive, way better than the photos lead us to believe. The sofa bed was extremely comfortable, anything we needed was provided, and the place is close to a lot of great restaurants, parks, and museums. This has been our favorite stay so far!
Fantastic place to stay to ensure a great trip to Salem!

Kristies place was perfect for our needs as private, well appointed and spacious.  Excellent communications.  Super shower!  Very comfortable bed.  Spot on clean.  Great location to explore Salem and surrounding area.  Easy lockbox access just don’t lock the door by the doorknob as we did!  It’s easy to forget since this is how we lock our doors at home.  Great nearby breakfast suggestion is Patty’s Off-Center Pantry.  Enjoyed our stay at Grace House.

Great host.
Nice accommodations.
Nice nieghboorhood.
Thanks Kristie!
Byron and Coral

Kristie was a very nice and accommodating host, and her space was just lovely!  She thought of many nice touches and the area really felt homey and cozy. The location was central  and  perfect for day trips to many awesome locations. The outdoor patio was cozy and we spent many evenings enjoying the fire pit and the hot tub. We will definitely return and share this location with friends.

We enjoyed our stay. Kristie provided a comfortable and quaint getaway for us and we were very satisfied with the accommodations. Kristie is a gracious host. This bnb offered us a little oasis in our travels here in Oregon. Highly recommended!

This studio was absolutely ADORABLE! Plenty of space and everything we needed. You can tell Kristie has put time and effort into this space, and has thought of everything her guests may need. Check in and communication were flawless. Next time we are in town I hope this space is available!
Great place to stay. The host is nice and easy to communicate with. Would definitely come back.

We spent one month in Kristie place. The flat was very clean, with housekeeping during our stay which we appreciated a lot. The backyard is really lovely. No need of AC during the summer, the indoor temp was perfect despite the hot summer outside. The flat may be more adapted for shorter stays as the kitchen is small, but we managed it. Kristie is a wonderful host, very welcoming,helpful and reactive. We really felt like spending
time at a friend’s. We recommend this place.
This is a wonderful place to stay and the host is super great as well

Kristie is a phenomenal host! She has a pristine home equipped with anything and everything you need for a stay ranging everywhere from a weekend away to an extended multi month stay! Highly recommend.
CLEAN, stylish and creative space. Lots of nice touches and amenities. The effort shows. Recommended!
This was a very nice place in many ways. Great bed, bathroom and TV.
Amazing host! And beautiful home, close to many areas! I enjoyed my time there and so will everyone who books here!!
I enjoyed my stay here. I would recommend it.

Kristie's space was perfect for me! It was very close to the hospital where I was doing my assignment, and she provided so many nice little touches. Communication was great and I will definitely be back. Thank you so much!!!
Really enjoyed the place. Well kept and comfortable.

we needed a place to stay in between homes since ours sold and we absolutely loved stay here. The hosts communicate very well and the space is very comfy. it is the Basement so keep in mind you will hear anything going on upstairs. Everything is up to date and I absolutely loved that they had a washer and dryer in unit. made things so much easier during out stay. and thelocation is so close to many things as well!
Spacious, quirky but adorable little kitchenette, VERY comfortable king bed!! Close to town but feels tucked away and private. Kristie was responsive and kind.
Nice and clean and had everything we could need
Great place to stay. Close to things and very clean.
This is a great place to stay, nice and private, and exactly what my family and I needed.

Salem is a great pivot point to the surrounding area and this is great for that. We had day trips out to the coast, wine country, and spent a day downtown and the location is in the middle. I would walk over to the river and the park most mornings and found Salem very manageable.
The venue is great for several reasons, some big and some small. Having a parking space off street, fairly large space for what is essentially a studio basement apartment, large bathroom, modern decor, plenty of storage, w/d and separate sitting area. The space is comfortable for 2 to spend time and not be on top of each other.
Some considerations that explain our 4 stars on value as opposed to 5: It's a basement apartment so there isn't much light. There are plenty of lights, but as a natural light person it did start to get to me a bit. There is not a full kitchen. It's the "entire place", which means different things at different venues. There is street noise - while the location is in a neighborhood, it is on one of the main streets. Again, overall we liked the place, but there are some nuances.
A wonderful place to stay! Very accessible and convenient location. All of the amenities you could ask for already provided and good communication from hosts.
Lovely home and hostess! If we travel to Salem again, we will stay at Kristie’s again.
Can’t go wrong staying here. Super clean quiet neighborhood. Everything you need.

Kristie’s place was absolutely lovely. The space’s layout was perfect for our stay and it was well-appointed with anything we could think of needing. Even in the dead of summer when days got over 100 we were cool and comfortable. Kristie was incredibly flexible and gracious when our trip’s dates had to be changed, as well.

I LOVED this place!! It was such a cute and fancy layout. I loved the bar and the bathroom the most! There’s plenty of room to stretch out. I sincerely appreciated the washer and dryer after a long week of travels. I would definitely stay here again.
Kristie’s place is so cozy and such a convenient location. We really enjoyed our stay
Wonderful stay at Kristie’s place! Very clean and comfortable, in a cute neighborhood! We had such a great time visiting family and enjoyed this little place quite a bit!
I had a really great experience staying here. The communication was top tier and the space was beautiful. Well decorated and functional!

Awesome place to stay.  Kristie has done such a great job.  Very comfortable all the way around - convenient parking, great King-size bed, great large screen TV and an amazing shower.  While we didn't use it, the washer/dryer was appreciated also.  we also appreciated having both a freezer (for ice) and fridge - very functional small kitchenette.  Nice coffee shop w/breakfast sandwiches three blocks away.  Cute neighborhood to walk around in - felt very safe.  Short two mile ride to restaurants downtown and conveniently located to several vineyards (we enjoyed Willamette Vineyard).
Kristie was so welcoming! Very clean accommodations in a great location. Thanks for having us!!

Great space. Had privacy and didn't even know if anyone else was in the house it was so quiet. Kitchen has everything you need and was really nice making our sandwiches for our hike. No TV but we didn't spend almost any time in the room anyways. Too beautiful outside to want to stay inside!
amazing place!!!

Spacious clean home. We stayed in the main floor master bedroom - which is especially spacious. We went to one of their recommended local eateries - the French Press. Highly recommended. We would definitely stay here again.
This was a great room in Salem! Very private, quiet, and clean. Would definitely recommend!
Highly recommend if looking for a place to stay in Salem.
Spacious, comfortable, and quiet. A great value and I look forward to staying again.
Lots of privacy, very quiet, and very dark at night.
Great quiet place to work/study for several days! Large desk, comfortable chair, clean, nothing to improve!

This house is very easy to get to from the Interstate 5 and Highway 22. It's very close to the Oregon State Capitol Building in a quiet neighborhood. The street parking was easy. Check your email for the lockbox code the day you plan to check-in, it is an easy process to access the site. I stayed in Room 5 and it was amazingly quiet and peaceful.
Everything was so clean, modern, spacious , and bright! Would definitely return here.

Great place, very clean
Excellent location!

Loved this place! Was very clean, peaceful & quiet area, huge bedroom. Only thing i’d recommend is adding a Tv to the bedroom. Other than that it was a great experience and highly recommend staying here!
I didn’t stay for the night; but the place seemed great. Close to the I-5; the house is located in a quiet neighborhood.
Very clean, easy to find, and great location as it was close to my friend's house. Comfortable bed and quiet neighborhood.
Great value and comfort in nice shade-tree neighborhood. I look forward to future stays at Nick's Airbnb rental.
Very nice place to stay. Thank you.
Great location and accommodations. No complaints!

This house is AWESOME! I loved the master bedroom I was in. It's spacious and the bathroom is huge too! The desk is an awesome addition for anyone traveling for work. The house smelled great and the linens were fantastic - two things I'[m really big on. I slept like a baby and would definitely stay again.
I didn't get a chance to really explore the area, but the house is very close to a cool strip of shops and restaurants. I went to Bo and Vine for dinner (also highly recommend!)
Nick was a wonderful host and was super quick in responding to my inquiries. They even helped me find a Target :-)
Lovely house, lovely people, would stay again - highly recommend!
Quiet and convenient to area restaurants. Charming historical house

Great location—close to many parts of Salem, very quiet, and good value. Didn’t notice any other guests at the house until the last night of my stay. I stayed in guest room #5 and was happy that it had a mini fridge in the room and a nice desk for me to work at. Thanks Nick!
Everything we needed for a comfortable weekend was here. Safe and quiet neighborhood close to downtown. We'd stay here again!
Great location. Quiet neighborhood. Responded quickly and solved issue right away.
Second time staying here. Just as good as before. Quiet, clean, great communication. Would stay again.
Accommodations were comfortable and clean. Common space was very nice.
Very clean place , beautiful home , quiet neighborhood.

Beautifully renovated older house. Good communicators and very simple and secure in and out process.. Sparkling clean and very comfortable beds.


However, No TV to catch up on news ect..And If you like Keurig coffee machines that's great they have one but nothing to put in it. Bring your own I guess...
This is a lovely, clean home in a quiet location. It was perfect for our stay in Salem. Thank you!
It was accessible to outlet, close to OSU, and it’s safe neighborhood
We loved our stay. Everything was very clean!

Very good location and AirBnB. It was very quiet and didn't notice any other guests living in other rooms. Instructions were very clear and had no problem using the common space. The Keurig coffee machine is very good, however didn't have easy access to cream/sugar/sweetner, as the main fridge was out of service and had to go to basement and get it. However, it was a not big issue. The portable space heater kept the room warm and bathroom was great. Will stay here again for sure!
I will be staying again
I will keep coming back(:
Great find.  Clean, quite, comfortable.  If you need a place to stay in Salem I highly recommend this one.

The host is gracious and accommodating, but there are a few things that aren’t obvious in the listing. The first is that the property is under renovation, and it is a work in progress. This is made obvious by the new fridge with labels attached in the living room, and cracks in the plaster in one of the upstairs bedrooms. The second is that the neighbors are obnoxious. The report of a diesel pickup starting up at 3am may not be what you bargained for. Bring earplugs. The third is that ultra-Christian politics are abundantly in evidence on the property. The wifi router name is JESUS-SAVES. Whether this is good, bad or indifferent is a matter of personal preference, I wasn’t entirely comfortable with it. The fourth is that there are more house rules than you would expect. Shoes are forbidden inside, which you wouldn’t know until you have seen the front entrance, in daylight. Consumption of any alcohol on the premises is forbidden, which you wouldn’t know until you see the litany of house rules posted in the bathroom. Sorry, beer lovers. The place does smell clean, in a perfumey sort of way. It smells cleaner than it really is. You get the feeling that the housekeeping folks have a lot on their plate, and hose the place down with Febreze and call it good. At worst, however, it is a vastly better value than any of the local hotels. It is warm, comfortable, and affordable. On the balance, I recommend Nick’s place.
Great place
Great location, clean, spacious, quiet and awesome place to stay! I will be coming back the next time I am in Salem!
The stay was comfortable and clean. Check in and check out were easy and quick. The outlets stopped working during the visit and the bedroom lights similarly stopped working. Otherwise a good time.
A nice room (and a half) just off the kitchen on the first floor of a house.  Nice and quiet.  Very convenient to Willamette U.
Comfortable, quiet home with very responsive hosts. You'll enjoy your stay.
Loved the character of this older house, settled in a beautiful neighborhood. Great landing spot for a solo person, ample parking and generally quiet!
Great house, clean, comfortable, good location.
Great place, would definitely recommend.
A very comfortable room with access to kitchen and laundry. Quiet neighborhood. Needed to stay longer; hosts were very accommodating.
Great space.  Well decorated, comfortable, and well stocked kitchen with everything you need to cook comfortably.  Very clean.  Neil responded very quickly with every question that we had.

Neil was very responsive and tried to fix anything that went wrong in a timely manner. We had an ant problem but that was quickly fixed! The apartment is very clean and comes with almost everything needed for an extended stay.

This unit is really great as a home base for traveling around the area. We stayed here a month and we were more than satisfied. Everything in it was like brand new and extremely clean. The kitchen was well-stocked with cooking items and cleaning supplies. The mattresses and pillows were super comfortable and we slept great. The unit has some artful touches, so it felt homey, rather than sterile like many hotels. Neil is very responsive (although we didn’t need to bother him too much as everything we needed was there in the unit). As the listing says, it probably isn’t well-suited for little ones that crawl or walk, due to stairs and sharp corners, etc., but was just fine for our 5 month old, as he isn’t moving around yet. We felt very comfortable and well taken care of here. Would definitely recommend.
Perfect host! Great communication and service. The place is perfect, just as described. Safe and quiet area. Highly recommend.
Neil’s place was clean, comfortable and had everything you might need for an extended stay. Thanks

a very clean and quiet home near the heart of Salem. Fast internet with a working space provided. the beds could be a little more comfy but we are spoiled at home with an over the top soft mattress. communication with the host was flawless, anytime an issue arose we were notified promptly and it was addressed in a reasonable amount of time.
Comfortable stay.  Very accommodating host.

Would highly recommend this spot, especially when the farm stand is open! The hosts are easy going and helpful with awesome restaurants in the area and open with lots of ideas about anything you could want to do in Salem.

Kayla's spot is even more beautiful than the pictures (which are gorgeous themselves!). It is a relaxing & quiet little haven which was convenient for us as we saw family in Salem and Portland. The space is cozy and calming and was the perfect nook for us to curl up in between family gatherings. Also very convenient for groceries, activities, etc. in Salem. We appreciated how communicative and responsive Kayla was and had the great luck of getting to meet both Kayla and her partner, Robert, as well as their pups (who were super adorable and friendly). Kayla had left us thoughtful, high-quality surprises (food, tea, milk, coffee/espresso) in the kitchen which was well stocked with the basics (minus burner stovetop) and all we needed for our stay. We also loved that you could order food/drinks from the Airbnb which was a unique touch. And on top of all of that, we were greeted with homey touches like sweet scents + Christmas decorations. Excited to return!
This place was great! It is subterranean a bit so slippers are helpful for the cold floors. overall fantastic!
Such a charming space. Very comfortable bed, everything you need for a nice stay.

My good friend Caroline and I had an enjoyable stay at The Garden Flat at Botaneity. We were a bit frazzled upon arrival and Robert was more than kind to remind us it was about to be a new year and not to stress. Upon entering, the aroma of the place had us smiling big as it smelled like a piece of heaven. The kitchen was full of a variety of cookies, teas, hot chocolate and more complimentary goodies with upon request a s'mores experience and other food available for only a slight charge more. The TV had Netflix and Hulu which was appreciated after a day at Newport to come back to the place, make popcorn and relax together. There were countless lights, a heater, plenty of blankets, books and other misalanceous decor to take in. The fireplace made the trip in itself! We highly recommend playing around with the changing colors of the fireplace as that was one of our favorites from the trip. The bathroom was big yet comforting with plenty of towels and wash clothes. While we don't know Kayla and Robert personally, from our brief interaction and seeing them throughout our stay, we felt like we were always in good hands and welcomed at the place. They have two dogs which made us feel the love even more. They will be lighting the pathway in the coming time to make it easier to navigate the steps back to the place. There was only one minor manner that was discussed privately where we saw room for improvement to hopefully make your experience even better than ours. Please don't be afraid like we were to park in front of their house on the dirt path as that is what is encouraged by the host. It is a left turn after entering and is a quicker route to the place compared to parking straight ahead on the left. The common areas were inviting with gorgeous photos (which some of which are for sale we believe!) and cozy rugs. All in all, we could not recommend more to stay here if you're visiting Salem or the surrounding areas. You feel as if you're at home when staying here. They even make their own wine and have it available upon request for purchase. It doesn't get much better than that! These are genuine and heart warming individuals who have poured their all into their Paris inspired place. I hope you'll choose to support them just as we did. Thank you Kayla and Robert!

With all our love,
Benjamin and Caroline

This was such a luxurious little chateau stay with easy access to town, downtown, and the highway. As soon as you park, you’ll be met by aromatic evergreen and crisp Oregon air. Kayla has thought through every element from the overall aesthetic, blended textures, and soothing pallet to the soaps, scents, and soft linens. It’s a serene little hideaway I would suggest for couples or a mother-daughter trip such as ours. 🤍 “Aimer!”
Absolutely the most beautiful, relaxing and aesthetically pleasing place I’ve ever been. Kayla  has thought of everything that you could possibly need for such a perfect experience.

This was the perfect solo mom getaway for myself!  Such a beautiful and relaxing space, I didn’t feel like I was in a basement but more like a French loft somewhere ✨ and the French press coffee service was the cherry on top!
Nice space. Comfy bed. Very convenient location. Appreciated the extras.

What a lovely and inviting space. The furniture and textiles are beautiful and thoughtfully curated. Diffusers are placed throughout the rooms, and it smelled wonderful. It was a bit cool in the evenings, but with extra blankets and the provided space heater I was warm and cozy. A previous reviewer recommended bringing slippers, and this was a great idea.

I encountered Kayla and Robert a few times, and they were kind and welcoming. Kayla is quick to respond to any questions or concerns.
Loved this place, so gorgeous! The host was very responsive and helpful throughout our stay.
Top notch ambience and decor in a quiet setting. Spacious set up with a bedroom, living room, dining and large bathroom. Bonus was to be welcomed by chickens.
Kayla was a fabulous host.  The accommodations were charming, spotless and so cozy!

I stayed here during a work trip in Salem & it was perfect . Exactly as described , great location, and honestly a very safe place , which was important to me since I was traveling alone.
The best part , the bed was so comfortable, You really don’t realize how important this is until you have it.

Very cozy and inviting space! The chickens and pups were an added bonus! Kayla was very responsive and helpful with anything we needed! In a great location and had everything we could ask for. We really enjoyed our stay!

The location couldn't have been better!! We loved the decor and nice touches within the flat. Kayla's communication was top-notch - she accomodated us so graciously and we were thrilled to be able to stay here during our son's robotic tournament at the fairgrounds. If you're looking for an upscale stay - this is it! Super fun and a great place to make some memories. Thank you so much!!
We had a wonderful stay and everything was great!
Beautiful place! Highly recommend! It was clean and cozy!
A lovely Air B and B. Great location for all our activities for the weekend. We slept great on that mattress and were plenty warm with the fireplace.

This a great place to stay when in the Salem area.
Minutes from both Downtown & the Eola/Amity wine region.
Well appointed accommodation with pleasant sitting room, great bed, well laid out kitchen/dining area and bathroom.

If you are looking for a place to stay in Salem that is close to downtown and easy access to vineyards in the area, look no further! We had such a great experience staying here, and really enjoyed Kayla's farmstand with fresh pastries and coffee in the morning.
lovely Airbnb, very clean, well thought out in terms of comforts of home and charm.  location is close to downtown. would highly recommend both the airbnb and also the on-site farmstand.
This was the most beautiful and luxurious Airbnb! Had an amazing time and Kayla & her husband were so friendly and helpful!
A very nice basement space. Loved the Nespresso coffee maker and the fireplace!

Beautiful spot and such a warm, inviting place to stay! Far enough away from noise but still close to restaurants and shops! Also enjoyed hitting up a few suggested places from the hosts and they did not disappoint!

Strongly recommend. Very large space-seating area, kitchen table. Love the dogs that greeted us-especially the little who can barely he was so excited 😊 (Chickens were nice too). Kayla was a great host!
cute basement with lots of space and natural light. nice little stay for the weekend
Kayla was excellent @ response time and communication. Space did not work for us due to a few issues. However the host handle the graciously.

Kayla's rental was even better than it looks in photos! It was nothing short of amazing. The space is very well designed, offering a very cozy stay with all the essentials you need. It is also much more spacious than it appears in the photos.

She added very thoughtful touches, such as coffee and gf/df treats, which came in handy due to a late arrival and not quite having our bearings first thing in the morning. She and her husband also run a small shop and have their own wine label that we were able to enjoy while staying at her property!

Overall, we had such a lovely experience and would love to do it again!

We had a wonderful stay! The space was beautiful and comfortable. The bed was a bit soft for our tastes but we were still comfortable. There were lots of outlets for us to plug in our medical devices and our electronics. The space was cold but there was a space heater and electric fire place. We loved the chickens greeting us in the morning. We were greeted with soft light, beautiful soft scents, and soothing music, and a sweet treat (which seemed to be homemade).  Great thought and care went into this space. We would love to come here again.
Pretty much everything we expected. An absolutely gorgeous place!
