Loved the beauty, nature galore., flowers, marsh all of it.Gorgeous average. Took some walks, wound up on a golf course!  House smelled like a cellar, dank and musty. Shower needs a non slip mat. Angie is difficult to please, argumentative and non welcoming
Exactly as described. The birdsong is absolutely lovely. Just a couple miles from downtown Salem. Very easy and convenient.
Beautiful property! Everything was accurate to description, very lovely stay.
It was a great weekend! Such a beautiful and relaxing place.
Sorry my stay was cut short. I’d come back!
Cute house, very comfortable and well equipped.  Convenient neighborhood to Willamette and downtown.

A fun cute smaller beach themed house in down town Salem. 3 beds however no master bathroom and the main 2 are upstairs in a converted loft. Older home with narrow floor plan. Tight stairs to the second floor.

Livingroom and kitchen was excellent and modern. Creative laundry room hidden behind a "pantry" door which connects to the back yard. Trash can is on the smaller side so go trash build up on longer stays.

Plenty of toiletries and house stuffs.

Very lovely and comfortable home, had a great time with family over the weekend at our stay here. Communication was phenomenal, super smooth and easy instructions provided by a great host. Definitely recommend to stay here!

Angela was so quick to answer any questions I had. The house was very comfortable and the kitchen was well stocked!

I will definitely use our home again.
excellent home great choice to stay 5 stars.
Clean
Perfect for 2 couples!

Lovely, relaxing place to stay in Salem. Quiet neighborhood, walking distance from one of Salem's nicest parks too. The house has 3 terraces too, which we enjoyed during our stay.
Would happily stay here again!

If you’re looking for somewhere with fantastic air conditioning, a beautiful interior, and a host with great communication, this is your place! My family and I stayed here with our 1 year old son, and we were all so very comfortable and happy with our experience. Hands down we would stay here again!!
Great location and great place very comfortable. Angela has great communication. Thank you once again. Highly recommended!
Great house, very convenient!
Great location. Close to campus.  The rooms were nicely appointed and the kitchen had everything we needed.

Great house and nice location - very convenient to town. The kitchen was very well equipped. Communication with the host was great. Everything  was spotless. Neighbors were friendly. The only (minor) issue was that we were there in the summer and the upstairs bedrooms didn't quite get full AC. But the fans were very helpful.

Debbie’s home is actually the nicest Airbnb I’ve been to. It’s rare that you have a host as welcoming and accommodating as Debbie, the house is spotless clean, and located in a great neighborhood. The house and room are so spacious you’d think you’re there all alone. I had a wonderful stay here and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay in Salem.
Friendly pup and kitties to great you! Debbie was super helpful/responsive. No lock on the bedroom door. In a beautiful neighborhood close outside of Salem. Really enjoyed our stay!
This is a lovely home, sparkling clean and beautifully furnished. Located on a quiet street, the home offers all the comforts, and more, of a luxury hotel.
Loved our stay here! The place is so clean. Probably the cleanest Airbnb we’ve stayed at so far. Everything is just great. Highly recommended!
Debbie made us feel very welcome. Her house and stay is very inviting and comfortable. Close enough to Salem but just far enough out of town. Quiet and relaxing.

This is a first class place to stay.  Debbie was very friendly, welcoming and accommodating.    The place was spotless, and very comfortable.  Close to everything....the river, downtown and yet felt very removed.  Wonderful.

Debbie is a fantastic host offering high quality lodging.  The accommodations are both very spacious and private.  All furnishings are very new and in very good condition.  Everything was very clean.  She should be considered a super host.  The coffee she offered was excellent.  Nothing was lacking.
Charming abode with an even more charming guest.
Debbie was incredibly accommodating, nice, and generous. Would certainly consider staying at her place again!
Debbie's place was amazing. Her communication helped ease check-in and check-out. The space was sparkling clean and we loved getting to use the kitchen. This is on the top of our list to stay again!
This is the 2nd time I’ve stayed at Debbie’s and it was just as fantastic as the first time. Having 2 separate rooms really gives space to spread out and was quite enjoyable.

Great stay with a great host!  I usually rent whole units, but experiences like this where the host is so friendly and kind have me re-thinking that approach!  Wonderful stay, would highly recommend!!
The hostess is wonderful and was so helpful and kind!
I highly recommend this AirBnb location for anyone traveling to Salem, Oregon. Miss Debbie is an excellent host!
I do not think it is possible to have a cleaner room then what Debbie provided. I don’t have one single complaint. Every Airbnb should strive to be what Debbie’s is.

By far, the nicest place I’ve stayed and Debbie is an amazing host. She was so kind and hospitable; her home was very clean and welcoming, communication was clear as well as responsive and to top it off, we had furry greeters! Hands down would recommend this wonderful experience!

Debbie was very responsive to questions and instructions and such a pleasant hostess. Her house is so cozy and ever so clean. I had a very comfortable stay and enjoyed meeting and chatting with Debbie. Definitely will stay here again when in Salem. Thank you Debbie!!
Beautiful stay in a beautiful home. Would definitely come back.
Debbie is such a sweet lady and wonderful host with great communication. Beautiful and immaculate home with comfy beds and nice quiet location. Will definitely stay here again.

In a pinch, we needed a night to stay in for a procedure. The initial listing had been booked while in communication about the listing’s location (important for us for what we were in the area for), she offered another listing that wasn’t open at the time. We were grateful that Debbie was willing to open up dates for that listing.

Check in was super easy, we were greeted by the pups and a kitty. She was very friendly and accommodating giving us house rules when it came to the pets and we were sure to ensure the pets safety during our stay. Her space was beautiful and super clean from the common areas to the listing of two rooms with a Jack and Jill bathroom joining the two rooms. The bathroom had two doors that opens to each room so privacy is still present should you book the rooms with intentions of having two separate sleeping arrangements. I am unsure if the the doors locked from the bathroom. The beds were comfy and one of the rooms had a tv with a couch.

A perfect Airbnb.
Highly recommend this beautiful townhouse! It’s spacious and close to a lot of great places.

This is a great townhouse! There were a few glitches as it is a new listing, but Ray was super responsive. The place is beautiful, great for dogs, and very comfortable. The neighborhood is great for walking (you can walk to Safeway and a bar), it was super quiet and also close to I-5. I worked while I was there and wi-fi is strong and reliable. You also have your choice of many streaming services on TV!

Place is convenient located to grocery store, Walmart and plenty of restaurants. The pictures don’t do it justice. It’s super nice. Quiet neighborhood. It’s literally home away from home. Pillows were the best. It smells so nice and clean. Netflix and Amazon prime ready. My family and I had the most relaxing time ever.
Great place to stay. Ray was a great host. Communication was fast. Place was very clean. Would absolutely stay here again.
This is an amazing place to stay. Would absolutely recommend staying here.
Nice and roomy. Don’t turn the heat up as the bedrooms will be too warm.  Great location to get back to the busy stuff and freeway.

Stayed here for 10 nights, it’s an Excellent new townhouse near supermarket and many places to eat.  The place is super clean with plenty of space and while we can only speak to the master bedroom, the bed/pillows/bedding was super comfy. For TV viewers, there was access to Netflix, prime video, Hulu, etc… There’s also a great workspace with 2 monitors for those on work travel.  Very easy checkin process and our host was very attentive throughout the stay. We would definitely book this place again.
Spacious! Clean! Great communication with Ray.  Excellent place to stay for a couples trip!!
Thank you, Ray, for the wonderful place to stay while we finished out our OR jobs. Now on to TX! We loved your home and would stay again. :)
Wonderful 3 bedroom3 bath townhome! We had 5 adults and a baby and were very comfortable. Highly recommend.
A beautiful home with everything we needed to stay in while visiting family

The place was great! It was really clean and nice, very organized as well. There was so much room and they even had a blow up mattress in case you need another bed! The washer & dryer came in very handy and so did the back yard for my pup!

Sheets were dirty and covered in human hair. Most of the dishes were also dirty with food. Host charges a $95 cleaning fee for a dirty place. We left a night early as soon as we were able to secure alternate accommodations for the weekend. Traveler beware!

We loved this townhome! It was clean, comfortable and Ray was incredibly accommodating and very easy to communicate with. We will absolutely stay here again and look forward to doing so in the future.
Nice and new location.  Very clean and great location.  Would definitely recommend.
Thank you. We will certainly be back.

Ray and Tammy are great hosts. They are very responsive and offer a beautiful, spacious place, situated very well for visiting local wineries and downtown.

We look forward to visiting again soon!
Lovely new townhome in a nice quiet area, close to everything. It was clean and well furnished.
Beautiful townhouse. Easy accessibility and superb communication
Everything went smooth! Great place!

We had an excellent stay at Ray’s condo.  He accommodated our last minute booking over the holiday weekend.  It was convenient to Silver Falls State Park and Abiqua Falls for us.  The unit was clean, updated, spacious, and well appointed!
Would absolutely stay here again!

We had a great three night stay. The townhouse was beautiful with great amenities. The location was awesome. Downtown was a short drive away. We would definitely stay again when we are in the area in the future.
Ray's condo was the perfect retreat for my in-laws. We would definitely stay here again.
It was very clean, very nice neighborhood. I would stay here again

We were in town for the Ironman Oregon 70.3. This Airbnb was the perfect location for those wanting to be within a close drive to the venue but have all the comforts of home. This Air BNB was immaculate, comfortably fits three couples and had every kitchen gadget imaginable. This allowed us to cook all our meals in the home. A huge savings. Communication with the homeowners was great. We will be back!
Excellent all around.
Perfect place with everything you need. Great location! Very comfortable and spacious.

Ray's place was just perfect for us. located close to the major highways and grocery stores. He was also very accommodative with certain requests and his communication was prompt. would recommend Ray's place to anyone going through Oregon!

We used Ray’s place as home base for hiking around around the Salem/Portland areas & visiting the coast. It was a perfect location, we even hit the Willamette Vineyards one day (10 min via Uber!). Very close to shopping (.8 mile) and restaurants. Ray’s home exceeded our expectations. It was extremely clean, beautifully constructed and nicely decorated. Kitchen has almost anything you need/want (we even made a roast in the Instant Pot one night!) if you prefer eating in vs out. Master bath/shower is awesome and beds were very comfortable. Beware, drive is pretty steep, but there is alternative parking on the street that is flatter. We would go back to Ray’s place in the future, should we return to the area.

Ray’s place was just what we needed after 4 weeks of traveling.   It was very clean and well appointed. Spacious. Centrally located for our needs.  Nice safe neighborhood and very quiet. Just a note for anyone traveling with an older dog., The stairs are not carpeted and are manufactured wood so they are slippery for paws be prepared You may have to carry fur babies up and down the stairs
Our stay was amazing! The townhome was very spacious, clean, check in was smooth.

We had a fantastic relaxing stay, just what we needed. The place was roomy, beautiful, and clean. For our needs we were centrally located to all the places we needed to go. About 10 to 15 minutes from Downtown Salem and Willamette University. Loved having a kitchen and washer & dryer. Seating out on the back patio area would have been nice, to be honest it was too hot most of the time to have been able to take full advantage of that. Communication with Ray and Tammy was easy and they were very responsive and helpful. The place is close to grocery stores and basically anything you might need to stock the pantry. The place was as described in the advertisement. Except I wouldn’t say the 3rd room has a twin bed I would describe it as a full size bed. There is a TV for streaming and a few card/board games. Dinning room table fits 6 easily. We can’t wait to go back.


Things to do:

You must go and visit the Silver Falls Park, pack a picnic lunch and plan to stay all day, it’s incredibly beautiful and about a 30 minute drive give or take. The Gordon House (Frank Lloyd Wright last house he designed) was the next stop, and then Willamette Valley pies was the last stop on our way back to the Air B&B, and well worth it, for a piece of pie. We got an apple hand pie, Marion berry (Blackberry) hand pie, and a slice of Strawberry Rhubarb pie, they were all delicious..

The Yard food truck park was also a wonderful find lots of different types of food, wine, beer, and full bar.

Cozy Taverna is a wonderful tapas restaurant with a full bar in Downtown Salem everything we ate there was amazing. The goat cheese dumplings were to die for, you well need some garlic bread to sop up the sauce you will want to get every last drop. Squid ink pasta you must eat it all there, we had some leftover and reheating it later just wasn’t nearly as good as it was fresh. Flourless chocolate cake and the French Toast Desserts were heavenly. We did have some of the French Toast dessert leftover which was very yummy for breakfast the next morning.

Wild Pear is a small little cafe also in Downtown Salem it was great for lunch with a variety of food. My husband had a roast beef and blue cheese sandwich with fries, our daughter had the veggie wrap with half/half sweet potato and regular fries, and I had the heirloom tomato sandwich with the steak chili soup. We were all very happy with our meals.

Sassy Onion was a great brunch spot walking distance from Willamette University/Willamette Heritage Center. There our daughter had the berry french toast (blueberries and strawberries), you can get it with just one type of berries if you prefer. It did not need any syrup, but they have maple and marion berry if you have a sweeter tooth than us. I had their biscuits and gravy with bacon (reminded me of my Granny’s). My husband had the mess in a skillet (you can get it as a burrito as well) he had left overs (which is not like him), that was okay because I got to finish it off the next day for breakfast and it was delicious.

Roger that Barbecue was another great eatery. Check for their operating hours, closing time occurs when they run out of meat or at the posted closing time which ever happens first. They have a two meat combo with the choice of two sides. One combo feeds two people (trust me). My husband didn’t believe me or the staff and insisted on getting two combos and we had lots of leftovers. But there was no complaining about that since the pork ribs and beef brisket was amazingly delicious. The ribs fell off the bone and you didn’t need a knife to cut the brisket. I suggest you get the beans as one of your sides. The kick it up corn was mild with not much flavor, fries and tater tots were good.

We went to a couple wineries while we were visiting as well, both very lovely. Bethel Heights Vineyards and Bjornson Winery.

Bjornson we sat out on the balcony with beautiful views and stayed there for about 3 hours enjoying the tasting, views and meat and cheese plate we ordered.

Bethel Heights we sat inside (Because the shaded spots outside were taken). Not certain if they offered food or not, we had just eaten so we didn’t ask. We stayed for about two hours. Worth a call to ask about food or if you can bring your own.

There are many more things to do and see lots of good food around and of course a trip to Portland is only about an hour away.

Hope everyone who stays here enjoys it as much as we did.
Great place and location!  Highly recommend.
Didn't know it was a townhome when we rented it.  It does have a lot of stairs.  Loved the washer and dryer, appliances, bed was comfortable, bathroom was nice.  Fairly well appointed.
We had a great time exploring Oregon and visiting family. This place allowed us y to o regroup and relax each evening and morning.
This home is awesome, Clean, organized, great host
We had a great stay! It was very nice and clean. And when I reached out to Ray about a question he was very prompt and helpful.
We had a wonderful stay. The townhouse was a great place for my family and I to stay. The location was convenient. Beds were comfortable. The kitchen was a good size and we cooked often.
Very nice place!
This is a lovely, spacious home! It is bright, clean and near major stores and has easy access to I-5. The price is right, too. We would recommend it and would book it again.

Enjoyed our stay. The place had everything we need to prepare meals there. Shopping for groceries was easy because there was a store nearby. Ray was easy to get a hold of and responded quickly to my messages. I would definitely stay here again.

This location was close to stores and was very clean and quiet. We will definitely recommend people to stay here if they are in Salem for a visit. Place is as described and pictures were as well. Thank you Ray for having us at you home.
Very easy checkin and responsive host. Host was also incredibly and responsive and accommodating. Large rooms and warm home while it was cold outside. Large open spaces and large fenced back yard.

Kitchen and bathrooms had more items than any previous rentals I have used. Kitchen had many staple items.
It was well located for our plan to visit family. And plenty of room for entertaining.

We had a little issue with the door code, but Ray took total care of us. He has been the most gracious host for any location that we have stayed. We almost always use Airbnb when we travel so we have a lot of experience with hosts. Ray is the BEST.

If you want a great place to stay and a great host to work with, this is your place!
I would recommend! great location, space, amenities for family
Ray was very accommodating and made our long stay comfortable. He answered all the questions I had and made sure everything was going smooth throughout our 2 week stay. Thank you!
Ray is an awesome host!  I would encourage everyone to stay at his property!
Lovely experience, great place to stat when in Salem.
The location worked for us. The description was accurate.
We had a nice stay, the bed was very comfy.
Very nice place to stay, kitchen is great and having a small area outside for dog was helpful. Parking on street was most convenient for us.

The place was as described.  The yard was small and nearly completely bark dust, which was nice as it prevented mud, but tracked in if you BBQued, so be prepared to sweep if its dry or damp mop if its raining.  Ray and Tammy were responsive and very accommodating.  Their instruction book held all we needed to know.  Lots of children in the neighborhood who were very friendly as well.

Felt like coming home! Clean and welcoming. Easy check in and great instructions from the owner. Questions answered promptly. Uncluttered, simple decor that felt peaceful and homey.

Overall, Rays place was quiet, clean and perfect for our needs! We highly recommend it!
Nice and clean
It was nice stay

Don’s guest suite is amazing! He and his wife are extremely hospitable and kind and answered every question we had. The suite has every accommodation you could need for a short or long term stay. And the backyard waterfall pond has amazing views and is a nice peaceful way to end a day. Bed was comfortable, the suite was in excellent condition, and all the furnishings were modern and well taken care of.

My husband and I stayed 2 nights at Don’s airbnb. He and his wife are lovely people and the space exceeded our expectations.
It was spacious, clean and very cozy. The grounds were beautiful with 2 separate areas to relax and enjoy a glass of wine in the evening or a cup of coffee in the morning.
We definitely recommend this place. We will be back.

Don’s guest suite was just what I needed. Personal parking space, private entrance through a tranquil little garden area, cozy neighborhood vibe, and a very clean and comfortable space to work and relax in for the week. Had all the necessary amenities with some awesome extra perks, having dedicated laundry for the Airbnb on site was great too. Can’t do any better for the affordable price point too, highly recommend!
Very pleased with our stay. It was just what we needed. Don and his wife were so kind. I highly recommend their hidden treasure!
Really beautiful place to stay in a really nice safe neighborhood. It has everything you need and more. I loved my time there. Don and his wife are so nice!

Don’s basement suite was well appointed, comfortable and cozy. We slept well, could cook and relax inside or outside. The neighborhood was quiet. Everything worked and was as expected.

Having a glass of wine upon arrival by the pond was the perfect respite after a day of travel. As was the last cup of coffee this morning!

We’ll be back again!!!

Hidden Treasure was a travelers treat!  I was dropping off my daughter at Willamette University.  B & B was located about 10 minutes away in the hills of Salem.  The neighborhood is quiet and really pretty.  Good to see more of Salem’s neighborhoods.  Don had everything covered for our visited.  He  went above and beyond to make us feel welcome, safe and comfortable.

This is a great place to stay for a resonable price. Just across the river from downtown its a quick drive to anywhere in Salem and the surrounding area. My only complaint, which is no fault of the owner, would be that there are a few quite steep hills to get up to the house. The owners are friendly and checked in through airbnb or in person when we saw each other outside.
Don, thanks for the wonderful spot in Salem, we loved it so much we bought a house, lol. great location and nice and quiet. perfect and the fireplace was super cozy. cheers
Highly recommended, Very Clean. Extremely nice location.  Would stay there again. Host was very accommodating with our stay. Would definitely go back.
Love all the little touches around the house and the fireplace in the living room. We especially appreciated them having a box fan!
Este lugar esta súper recomendable!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️muy bien para descasar tiene todo lo que se nesecita
Had an amazing stay as always. Don and his wife are very friendly and go over and beyond to make you feel comfortable during your stay.
Don’s place is clean, tidy, cozy and private. A very convenient location with an eye for his guests comfort.
very comfortable quiet and relaxing, had everything that we could ever need
Great oasis in west Salem. Large and comfortable space, great host even left a welcome bottle of wine.

It's in a quiet neighborhood and the place is very clean and cozy. I really appreciated that they had pantry essentials stocked up for us (oatmeal, k-cup coffee, etc), especially because we got there really late and didn't get a chance to go pickup anything beforehand.
My wife and I enjoyed our stay. The accommodations were excellent.  Thanks Don!
Beautiful location, full suite with everything you need to stay a day or a week. the outdoor patio is the best feature, even when it's raining!
Wonderful, comfortable and clean...Don was very responsive to questions. I enjoyed my stay and hope to return the next time I am in Salem.
Dons place was great. Had one of the most comfortable beds I’ve come across in an Airbnb. I would definitely stay again.

This place couldn’t have been better! The kindest most wonderful hosts. Thoughtfully appointed. (With things like coasters and super soft tissues in every room, throws to snuggle up with, coffee and oatmeal… the list goes on!) Super easy parking. Felt so safe and secure with the locking system and motion light. Truly an incredible value. We will never stay anywhere else in Salem. Hidden Treasure is what this is. The best of Airbnb in this little hideaway.
The home is comfortable with everything you need. The neighborhood is quiet and beautiful for walking

This quaint little spot in west salem was like having a hotel suite! Everything was very clean. The living space has a gas fireplace that makes the time there very cozy. They have lots of movies and books to enjoy as well as satellite tv.  The bathroom is spacious with everything you need in case you forgot something. Kitchen is well equipped for dining in if you choose to do so. It wasn’t quite warm enough for us to enjoy the nice little outside area with a small water hole and trickling water that I totally would have enjoyed sitting by while reading a good book, but if I’m ever in the area in warmer weather… I look forward to that quaint spot for all guests.

It really is a Hidden Treasure. Everything you’ll ever need in a perfect little studio. Don is a great host, responded to my questions in a timely manner. He even accepted my request to cut my stay early. I appreciated that so much.
What a gem!  Super clean and inviting. Don was quick to respond to any questions, and the home is set in a beautiful and quiet neighborhood.
Great location with a very peaceful ambiance. Hosts were super accommodating and the suite is set up for anything you need during your stay.
In the area? You have to check this cute little home out! Clean, adorable and comfy! Will definitely stay again when in the area!!
Perfect little place lots of privacy & Don was great at answering any questions I had!
Absolutely a wonderful experience! Enjoyed everything about it! Thank you for sharing!
Great location in West Salem, nice area and great dealing with the owners…would definitely stay again.

This is my time staying here will conducting business in Salem. This place has me too spoiled to want to try anywhere else. it is comfortable and in a nice location. The host is friendly and quick to respond to any needs.
Nice location in West Salem. Very clean. A cozy space. The gas fireplace was good to have.

This was the perfect place for my husband and I to stay while we had our home remodeled.  On site parking, step in shower, washer and dryer and so clean.  The kitchen had everything we needed for cooking.

I really enjoyed my stay at Don's. The pictures and description are very accurate and the place was quiet and very easy to check into. It was the perfect place for me to kick back while working in Salem for the week.
The bed is ultra comfortable and the kitchen has everything you need to cook! Don was also super helpful with recommendations of walks in the area and places to eat.
Thanks again Don :) I'll be returning!
Super helpful, quick to respond, and everything was perfect.
Thoroughly enjoyed this space. Quiet, peaceful, great access to whichever direction I needed to go.  Just lovely ambiance!  Would definitely recommend this space and the host! 🙏🏼
This is a terrific place to stay. So quiet, relaxing, and very clean. Don is very responsive to any questions or needs throughout the visit. One of the best we have stayed at!!
It was a great place, Quiet and has all the amenities for a great stay. Minutes to downtown
A clean, comfortable, lovely place and nice and cool on an extremely hot weekend!
Our stay was great. The rental was super clean and comfortable. The location was great as well. We will definitely try to stay here on our next trip to Salem.
Great place

Don’s home is the perfect place to stay in west Salem. Beautiful setting, comfortable bed and furniture and a great little kitchenette that had everything I needed. One note for temperature sensitive folks is that the temperature is not adjustable but there is an extra fan, space heater, and fireplace to adapt as needed. I found it quite comfortable and the bottle of wine was a lovely gesture!
Hidden Treasure was wonderful! Highly recommend :)

Though we never met in person, Don was an excellent host, and the unit was fantastic. Incredibly spacious and comfortable with so many great amenities and attention to detail. We visit family in Salem at least once a year and have stayed in many Airbnbs all around town, but this one definitely ranked one of the highest. The only wonky (and very minor) thing is that the hot/cold settings are backwards on all of the faucets. Not a big deal once you realize it, but it always threw me off when I went to brush my teeth... The patio  with the charming pond/foundation is such a wonderful space to relax in!

Don was a perfect host, warm and welcoming. This is a gem of a place- having all we needed for a lovely private retreat. We appreciated and enjoyed the quality of the amenities as well as the accessibility to town and country. We’ll definitely use  this  cozy, well situated home for our out-of-town guests.

We enjoyed our stay here very much.  It was relaxing and enjoyable, and the backyard setting was beautiful and peaceful.  Don was helpful and informative and we had everything we needed. I would recommend it without hesitation.
Lovely spot not far from downtown Salem.

Our experience was a bit mixed. We were greeted with a great wine bottle, that was definitely a great treat. The place was spacious and cozy, and met most of our needs. Nonetheless, the internet reception was bad most of the time, and some of the utilities (towels, for example) were worn out, others of bad quality (garbage bags, toilet paper). In addition, there were no toddler accommodations available for our 4 y/o.
Great stay. Perfect hidden treasure.

We had a lovely time and your place is perfect. We were able to truly relax and it was great to be so close to my mom’s so we could visit daily. You’ve done a really nice job and have the perfect setting for a little getaway. Totally 5 stars!! Thank you so much!
Enjoyed staying at Don’s place, the mornings were pleasant and I really enjoyed the covered porch sipping on my coffee,  amenities such as washer/dryer were well appreciated
Nice location and amenities

We really enjoyed Don’s place and he was a wonderful host!  The accommodations were exactly what we expected including the complimentary bottle of wine.  The place was clean and very comfortable.  Don was very responsive to our questions and went out of his way to respond to our one request.  I highly recommend this accommodation.
Very nice place

This place was great! The pond outside was really lovely. We loved that the one couch was a recliner. It made for a very relaxing evening after a busy day. It really felt like a home away from home with everything we needed to cook meals and relax. Thanks Don!

From beginning to end it was a wonderful experience staying here. It was perfectly quiet and so peaceful. Don gave us several recommendations and suggestions of things to do. Being welcomed with a bottle of wine was special. Anyone wanting a quiet place to stay definitely needs to check out Don's place!

Stephanie is a great host, she has beautiful family, they’re kind, outgoing and responsible. her place is very clean and quiet, we had good time there. My son loves their back yard and her kids. Definitely recommend her place to stay.

Stephanie and her family were extremely nice and welcoming. Me and my family are on a road trip from Whibey island to Redding, CA we thought we could drive straight through but it’s a little harder with kids. So it was a last minute stay which she had no problem adjusting it for us and for that we are thankful! Her husband offered us coffee in the morning is was pleasant stay for last minute and very roomy for our family of 4.
A truly wonderful experience. Jessica and her family are super sweet and make very accommodating hosts.

Stephanie was an awesome host. She responded very quickly to messages and was very understanding about me arriving around 9:30pm. The tent and accommodations were exactly as described. I really enjoyed talking to her about travel experiences and other topics. Her kids are great and so is their sweet dog too. This is a great place at a great value in the Salem area for anyone needing to pay less money than a hotel costs. I would definitely recommend it to anyone needing  a place to crash. :)
Very friendly family and great hospitality!
Right by Salem Health and the river!
Victoria was a great host. Very fast to respond and addressed our concerns promptly. The location of the home was perfect for our needs.
Clean and nice. However my first night, there was a large gathering that was very loud until very late through the night and unable to sleep.
Wonderful host! Beautiful home!
Great location, and comfortable place.
Good place to stay. Well worth it
comfortable bed
Another cozy stay at Cecile’s, she is very accommadating and helpful. This is a great place for travel nurses.
Gret stay very comfy
Great location, cozy room and home environment.
Thank you very much for your generosity and cozy home environment. Enjoyed speaking with you!
Cozy room, really nice host, awesome neighborhood.
The room I got to stay in was the first room when you entered the house so I felt comfortable coming and going which I really appreciated. Cecile was a very pleasant and warm host.

Cecile was a wonderful host and her home was very clean. I never had any issues and I stayed for 2 weeks. I worked nights and she was very accommodating to my schedule, the room even had black out curtains. I could not have asked for a better air bnb! Thank you, Cecile!
Great location in south Salem. Easy access to room.
Perfect room in a beautiful home and neighborhood!

Had a very comfortable 2 night stay in a private room with a private bathroom right by the front door. Everything was really clean and comfortable. They have an amazing hot shower (seriously you could cook noodles with the hot water!) and nice black-out curtains!
If you are looking for a quiet, private, secluded hideaway, this is the place!
This was a beautiful house in a great part of Salem. I slept well there.
I had a lovely stay here! The place was clean, directions were clear on which room was mine, and everything went flawlessly. Would definitely recommend.
All good
great place kind people
Great room, nice house. It was very cozy and quiet.
A nice, small, private room in a house. Bed was comfortable and was a good value.
Really great location!

Expect a very quiet, suburban environment with the most cordial host. If you go out and return, be sure you try the key in the right house, not the neighbor’s. The houses in the neighborhood are similar.
Nice place, nice family

Celine was an excellent  host!! she greeted me when I arrived and I really liked that. It's an excellent Airbnb stay for the value of what you're spending. beautiful neighborhood, beautiful house, and most of all beautiful bedroom that you're staying in. Celine made me feel very comfortable in her home. Beautiful backyard to rest & relax. I would definitely stay here again.
Very nice family! Cecile is such a kind person! I’ll definitely be staying with her more through my visit here in OR.
Everything was great!
My time at Cecile's house was very comfortable and enjoyable. Cecile and her family are very friendly and welcoming and her house is super clean and quiet. It is a good option to stay in Salem.
The description was right on. I slept well. It reminded me of staying at a nice cousin's home. Cecile is very welcoming. Pleasant neighborhood to walk too.
Very comfortable place to stay! Clean and cozy room super quiet neighborhood. Definitely will stay here again for my next time visit!
Great place to stay and Cecile was an mazing host. Nice and clean. Very quiet location. I definetly will go back.

Wonderful home that feels so luxurious. Room is fantastic, was placed very well, and Cecile is an amazing host! Can't recommend this place enough for people needing luxury and cozy vibes! A truly unique home.
This home is beautiful, the host is thoughtful with accomodations, and the bed is so comfortable and the room smells great. Overall 10/10.
Perfect
Nice neighborhood
Wonder family
I would recommend this place very much worth the price.  Great experience
10/10 would recommend. Clean space, nice people!
Great place to stay
It was simple and clean, and has everything you need for cooking!
Great location in Salem Oregon. The place was super nice and cozy. The best thing ever was the creek right outside!
Just a one night stay at Amanda’s 1 bedroom, but everything went smooth! Great view from the back porch as well :)
Great place
Great
apartment was nice and right down town. Quiet for a night shifter. The laundry was good with the app.  No coins to hassle with.

I was traveling for work and appreciated having a calm, convenient place to which I could return each evening.  Amanda gave wonderful instructions for check-in and communicated throughout the process.  I will be coming to Salem for work in the future and anticipate more stays in this unit.
Amanda's apartment is located right over a creek giving it a nice relaxing feel. The apartment itself is clean and well equipped. Which was what I'm looking for

The view of the river was very cool. I could sip on coffee (provided by the host) and look out at the greenbelt and water flowing by. The town is very walkable and I took a foot bridge over the water, and found McMinnimans to have some dinner.  Then I walked downtown which only took 15 minutes. The place was clean and well stocked full of anything you needed for a long stay.
Perfect for what we were looking for. Amazing and communicative host and perfect spot for the stay. Walking distance to a lot of amenities!

Another great stay on the banks of Mill Creek in Salem.  There was a plumbing issue my first night but the host addressed the issue quickly with very little hassle. I always enjoy staying here when in Salem instead of the hotels.
the place was very roomy and conveniently located. if the weather had been nicer I would have walked to one of the local pubs for dinner.

Nice clean place. Close to downtown and shopping, quiet, nice deck with creek running by. Would recommend.

Candace

I was amazed how, once inside, it was so easy to forget that you were. The back porch is the most relaxing space.  I was in the area visiting a dear friend in the hospital, and having a relaxing place to go only 7 minutes away was perfect.  Bed is on the firm side, but everything else was very comfortable and felt like I was staying at a friend's house.  I definitely recommend it.
Great place for our two employees. No issue and Angela is a great host!

It's a joy to sleep to the sound of a rushing creek, so soothing. Everything was VERY clean and spacious, and the coffee was great! We liked being near downtown, and the host was very accommodating and responsive. We'll come again.

Super comfortable environment and living space ✨ The view of the creek from the photos doesn’t do it justice because you see and hear its beauty from literally 90% of the rooms! Super well stocked on simple amenities  and the beds are EVEN MORE COMFY. If you’re big on privacy, nature vibes, and truly relaxing this is the damn place🥺✨

A good place right next to downtown Salem.  The place was tucked in the corner so that almost all of the windows overlooked the creek.  Everything was well stocked, and the place was super clean.  There was a full set of pots and pans and kitchen utensils.  The beds were comfy memory foam.  I slept super well the whole month that my wife and I stayed here.

We really enjoyed our stay here. We especially liked the noise of the river which could be heard really easily, it was very calming and nice. Everything was super clean there were plenty of extra blankets and towels and even toothbrushes and toothpaste and other toiletries. Highly recommend.

Excellent location and beautifully supplied/furnished for an extended stay. I stayed for over a month and didn’t have to bring any kitchen equipment - just bought food/seasonings and everything else was provided. The coffee pot and tv are particularly nice, and she even supplied the shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. 10/10, would stay longer if I could!

Had an amazing stay here! Location is great as it's next to Williamette U and easy to find and the condo has a running creek that you can see and hear the whole time your there. The condo is spacious enough for 4-5 people and has plenty of amenities. I highly recommend!

This was the perfect place for my child and I to stay while we visited Willamette. Close proximity to the town and the university, walking distance to Riverside Park, everything we needed and more. The sound of the creek behind us was magical.
We had a good stay at Amanda's. The description of the place was spot on. Nothing fancy and the price point was good. Thanks
An amazing stay. The place has everything you need.

This is a wonderful place to stay that is a short walk to downtown. The unit is right on the end of the complex which provides a lot of privacy. There is a spacious deck that over looks a beautiful creek. This a great place to stay if you’re looking to be right in the heart of Salem.

Amanda has a beautiful place, very clean and easy to get to. I had some of the best sleep I've had in a while thanks to the sound of the creek that runs by her place.  very clean and organized,  exceeded all my expectations.  I would definitely stay there again.

I  felt right at home, the location was great and the place was very clean.The beds were very comfortable, and it had everything you need in the kitchen.  It was very relaxing, and Amanda was amazing! I definitely will stay here again and will recommend this Airbnb to anyone wanting a place to stay in Salem.

We ended up needing a last minute place to stay. Thankfully Amanda’s place was available. Very clean and ready for guests. We loved having the creek running right outside our bedroom window, it made for the best sleep! Location was close to a grocery store, so we were able to get a few supplies without feeling like we were having to run all over the place. Would definitely stay here again.
Clean, spacious, quiet and comfortable. Nice view of the river and trees out back. Full kitchen, very convenient.
Great place near the old historic district. Kitchen & bathroom were well stocked and loved the fresh coffee available. Appreciated all the clear directions to the place.

This was a great little place. It afforded adequate privacy and had everything I needed for a relaxing getaway, including the comforting sound of Mill Creek which runs through the back of the property. Amanda was a great host and quick to respond to messages from the time of booking to the day of checkout. I have no complaints and would definitely consider staying here again during my next trip to Salem.
We had a nice stay. Thanks for sharing your home with us.

Amanda was a great host who made my experience feel safe and secure. With both thorough info and quick replies, I felt confident in me and my 13 year old boy’s opportunity to have a great experience. The creek/water noise in the back were a great touch too!
The listing was just as described, and we enjoyed our stay. Great communication and easy check-in/check-out.

Our stay was excellent! The host was very responsive and the location was a perfect home base for our group in town for the Ironman.  The description of the property was very accurate and we found it to be  a good value.  Very clean and well stocked!  Even enough room to comfortably store our bikes for a week! Thank you!

This was a clean and easy place to stay.   It was fun being right on the creek and hearing the water running.  Host instructions were also easy to follow.  Our only complaint was the shower was slow to drain… seems to be old water pipes.
It was a very nice stay. We were in and out because we were only in town for an event but it was in a central location and the space was comfortable.
Creek view and quiet upstairs unit made for a nice stay in downtown Salem. Amanda was great to work with, quick to answer any questions we had.

This apartment is a wonderful Airbnb to stay in. It’s roomy, very clean, and well supplied with towels and dishes. It also has a creek running along the back of the complex. I loved being on the porch watching the water. We heard it at night while we slept. It’s close to the downtown area and the Saturday Market.  Excellent hosts.

If you like being near water, this is a rental you should definitely consider! The sound of it was so relaxing and there's a great covered balcony right over the creek. Very clean space, quiet complex, and super comfortable. Would stay again! Thank you!
pretty cozy spot especially with the creek flowing right there from back patio.

We had a nice time at Amanda's apartment. It is actually much bigger than it looks on the photo. There is everything you need to feel comfortable, with a nice terrace that is above a river which gives a sweet sound at night. Amanda was a good host and is easy to communicate with.
Really enjoyed the stream while drinking coffee. Very spacious and would stay here again!

The beds were SO comfy! The whole placed was clean and well maintained with nice dishes, coffee maker and much more.  The river running was very pleasant.  Our host had great communication and you could tell she really cared about our experience.

The apartment was older, as stated but clean and well-stocked with some nice extra touches like makeup wipes, lotion and coffee. The sound of the creek outside is wonderful and our apartment was quite private with a nice view, being at the top floor end. The only issues that would keep me from renting again were the cigarette smoke from the full-time tenant below- which could be smelled from inside the apartment, and the homeless group camped out on the sidewalk less than a 1/2 block from the apartment. I know that goes with being in downtown Salem and comes with the territory.
Amanda is a great host; thoughtful, communicative, and responsive. My stay at her quiet creek side get away was a very pleasant, relaxing experience.
A very spacious and comfy apartment in the Carson suburbs. Very well furnished and equipped with AC, fridge and kitchenware. Located right next to a stream!
Cute place to stay.  It was very clean, and the location was great for being central to a lot of things.  The creek was nice and relaxing.  Would definitely stay again!
Amanda is very thoughtful of her guests! We enjoyed our stay very much!
Was great place for the adult kids to stay while visiting for Christmas
Thanks Amanda for a comfortable convenient place to stay on our trip to Salem. 👍🏻💕
Great, private appointment. Fully stocked and equipped, very comfortable, good location

My partner and I absolutely loved this apartment. We will definitely be coming back for future stays in Oregon, hopefully for longer stays!

The sound of the creek right outside the balcony is really soothing, it’s a great place to get some fresh air throughout the day. Check-in was super easy and smooth, and Amanda was responsive and helpful. We had everything we needed in the apartment with extra linens and towels to spare.

We wouldn’t necessarily recommend to wander around nearby alone at night, as it’s a pretty active area where some people are unfortunately having to live outside. Just an fyi. But everyone we came across directly there was very friendly and respectful!

Heating was easy in the winter. We were a 10 to 15 minute walk from everything we needed to access downtown. Can’t recommend enough as a more affordable but still quite cozy stay in Salem.
Amanda was a lovely host to a lovely place. It was private, cleanly, comfy and overall just a great place to stay

Enjoyed my stay, everything was close by and the area felt safe despite being downtown. Most importantly, our host was very welcoming and attentive during, before and after our stay. Definitely would book again.

Great place to stay while my husband had to work in Salem. I work from home and was able to work here while my husband was down here for his work.
Super convenient location, easy check in and great communication with owner.
This is an older property but mostly updated. Bed was super comfortable and going to sleep with the sound of the creek is wonderful. Looks exactly like the photos, everything you need for a comfortable stay. Definitely recommend.

We enjoyed our stay! Honestly one of the cleanest Airbnb's we have stayed in :)
Easy to find, covered parking, and a balcony that overlooks a creek. Going to sleep and waking up to the sound of the creek was divine!

Very nice place to stay. This is our third time staying at one of Amanda's properties. This is a very nice unit. Looks exactly like the photos. Very nice with the river running on two sides of the unit. And super comfy bed. Plus the location is super convenient. Would certainly recommend to anyone looking to stay in the Salem area.
Amanda and Brenda were super communicative! We loved that we could bring our animals. What a perk! I’m glad we finally found a weekend when they weren’t booked!
Super easy to get to and get around from. Loved being able to hear the water at night.

The place was as described and a good value for a two bedroom place. Convenient location and easy check in. Thoughtful toiletries and supplies were provided. The bed was comfortable. Not a fancy place but very functional and the creek was a nice addition.
Quiet, clean and comfortable! This little apartment was within walking distance to where we needed to be downtown for business. Private and all around wonderful. Thank you!

I always enjoy staying at this location.  this was the first time for me in this particular apartment, though.  I found it to be just as nice as the others but even more private.   I appreciate the parking set up and save money by leaving my car here and walking to work.   I recommend any of the apartments at this location, but I will be on the lookout for this specific one in my future stays.

Amanda was a very responsive host - there was construction scheduled for the unit we booked, so she was able to arrange another unit and kept us in the loop the whole time. The place was easy to find and instructions were clear.  The running brook was louder than I expected but it was quite pleasant to listen to at night!  Thank you, Amanda!
Visited Salem for work. This unit was exactly what I needed.

Located in a very close proximity to services, shopping in downtown Salem.  The water was delightful off the balcony as there had been lots of rain which made for roaring rushing water background noise.  Access and parking are good, everyone we encountered was friendly and helpful.  If your looking for a great location to enjoy Salem from this could be a great pick.
This place is amazing. Loved being by the creek. Outdoor space looks right over it. It’s close to town, and we walked everywhere. We traveled with our lab, and Amanda was very accommodating.
Beautiful home and a great host!

This is one of the nicest "average" homes I've stayed at. Very modern updates to appliances and decor make it very esthetically pleasing. The beds were comfortable, and everything was clean. Aimee was an excellent host, I would recommend this stay to friends or family.
amazing air bnb ran by a very caring and kind woman.
Great stay! Super clean and felt like a cozy home.

If you are a four star hotel person, this might not be your spot. It is a quirky spot in a 120 year old house. But if you want space and a great value with everything you need, you will be pleased. Easy location to get to downtown, hospital, Willamette capital, and major Salem arterials. Really comfortable mattress. easy parking.

You can hear some normal noise from other unit in building, and may hear a train, but we had a nice quiet stay. Amanda was great with communication.

I stayed here for a full month while in town for work. This is a wonderful place. It is incredibly spacious, cozy, and has a lot of great touches. My favorite part was the full kitchen and the giant couch.

Located in a quiet, quaint neighborhood with blooming flowers and friendly neighbors, this historic home was just what we needed for our Salem stay. We stayed for 2 months and worked at the hospital, a 4 minute drive. It is a spacious 2 bedroom apartment with a large kitchen and easily accessible laundry in the basement. The fireplace/furnace was our favorite feature! Parking was not an issue on the street or shared driveway. Continently located minutes from grocery stores, restaurants, and wineries. Only 30 minutes to waterfalls and 1.5 hours to the coast! Great stay, Amanda was always available for questions and left the kitchen stocked with coffee and teas.

This place was in a great location and a very good neighborhood. Amanda and Kevin were very mindful of my work schedule when doing repairs on the space above me. Amanda was always quick to answer any questions. I highly recommend staying here.

Perfect location for a concert in downtown Salem. Walking distance to the Elsinore and near by bars / restaurants.

Apartment was clean and comfy. Just what was needed.
Great space in a cozy, walkable neighborhood, at a fantastic price!
Very comfortable and well equipped place to stay for a good price!
My fiancé and I stayed here for  close to 2 months while looking for a house to purchase. It was spacious and clean and had lots of places in walking distance which was very nice.

Very comfortable. Pleasant older home. I felt like I was staying with a friend. Good Mexican restaurant nearby.
I enjoyed meeting Cynthia, a fellow artist.
Great place to stay in Salem that is quiet and centrally located.  Cynthia was a friendly hostess and we really liked the superb shower, cozy fire and sweet cat!
very comfortable with my decision to stay there even if it was for one night. very sweet and helpful. wonderful pet cat as well. the privacy was wonderful.

Enjoyed my time staying in the iris room. It was nice and quiet, very comfortable, clean and I had restful sleep during my stay. It was a really great value and I recommend staying there. Cynthia was very nice and friendly too.

Cynthia is a wonderful host. I booked this place for my parents who have language barrier, so I was the main contact person. Cynthia is easy to communicate with and quick responds, my folks enjoyed their stay, comfortable bed, at a quiet neighborhood near by Bush park, great for neighborhood walk. When I picked my parents up, they already wanted to be back next time when they’re in Salem again.

Lovely stay in a cozy authentic style house! Located close to the city center and two blocks away from a big park. Very pleasant and welcoming host with a cute and super friendly cat. The room was spacious for two people, clean and warm. It is on the first floor as well as the bathroom. One can tell that it was very well sanitized and cleaned extra following some strict COVID protocol. Since it was Christmas, Cynthia put the fireplace on, which gave this house some extra charm. Big living room with a nice comfortable sofa was offered to us as a place we could hang out in the evening and watch some TV. All in all, we found good value in this place and, certainly, won't hesitate to stay there again in the future!
Cynthia’s house was very cozy and well situated.  Bed was comfortable, space was very clean. And Cynthia herself was the perfect host. Would definitely recommend!
Great value and great easy home for the night! Was wonderful. Enjoyed my stay and Cynthia was a communicative and helpful host. A great Airbnb!!
very warm and comfortable host….extremely accommodating
Mahalo nui! We really appreciated staying at your place, we definitely recommend.
A very wonderful host. She is very understanding, and I definitely recommend it.
pleasant abode for a stay in Salem….host is warm and friendly
She was great. Kitty was very friendly. Cute older house.
Super cute house AND cat, Cynthia is super sweet and very helpful, would definitely recommend this room and stay again!
Cynthia and Ember are wonderful hosts. Great value in a comfortable setting.

I needed a quick place to nap before a night shift at the hospital. Cynthia’s place was perfect— check in was easy, good communication,  very clean, and the bed was comfortable! Also, as someone who knows Salem (but doesn’t live there), the location was close to parks and a short drive from downtown and Willamette University.
Super helpful and kind host, definitely recommend this space!
Super cute spot, another comfy stay!
Another great stay

This was perfect! A clean, quiet comfortable home, a bedroom and bathroom all my own, and a sweet lovey kitty to snuggle with. Cynthia is very welcoming and friendly. Would definitely stay here again.
very warm comforters. I'd stay here again just to hang out with the cat. good private bathroom. cool flowers.

We had a fabulous stay with Cynthia at her lovely home. Her communication was excellent, the room comfortable, clean and a convenient  walk to downtown Salem and the train station! Would definitely  stay either her again!
Lovely place and an even more lovely host. I will definitely book here again if given the opportunity
very quiet and comfortable. I will be going back.
Clean, nice and quite place. Cynthia is welcoming host.
It is clean and warm place to stay.Cynthia is a thoughtful and understanding person.

A great place to stay at double the price!  Quiet neighborhood, beautiful home, and perfect amenities.  Being able to Level 2 charge my electric car overnight was fantastic.  I would very happily stay with Cynthia again.  Highly recommend!

This is a very pleasant, clean, quiet home. It's a very comfortable environment. Not spotless, but not dirty. It's comfortable. There was no TV in the room which made for a great night's sleep. I look forward to another stay.
Had a great time. Relaxing home and Cynthia is a very nice friendly host.
Quiet neighborhood, clean, just as advertised. Excellent value for the money.
Hi all… Cynthias place is a really great place to stay. Clean and comfy bed… And Cynthia is a great host, warm and very kind. I look forward to staying with her again in the near future…

Cynthia's Iris Room had everything I needed for a comfortable stay at a very reasonable price. It's obvious that she's put a lot of thought into making her guests feel welcome. There are cute little chalkboard labels on all the kitchen cupboards, so when I wanted to make some tea, I knew exactly where things were. Bonus: the friendly cat, Ember. Double bonus: the great Mexican restaurant just a few blocks away.
We enjoyed meeting our host, Cynthia, and spending some time chatting.  The room is accommodating and the house is charming.  We enjoyed an evening walk to the local park.
Cynthia is a nice host and the location is great.
Lovely room in the heart of Salem. Great place to stay.
Very homey loving environment. Cynthia made me feel very welcomed and at home.
Cynthia met me at the door, she was kind and welcoming. She walked me through the guest accessible space. The property was as described. As others have said, good value. I would stay again.

The location is very close to silver falls state park and has a Walmart down the street as well as a cheap gas station not too far away. The blinds kept the sun out and we had a great sleep in a comfy bed. The bathroom is outside the room but the host is very respectful of space and was open to allowing access to her kitchen and refrigerator for storage. Good neighborhood.
Super close to the waterfront and downtown.  Great room and bathroom with everything you need!  Cynthia is very welcoming and helpful.
We had a comfortable stay.
We loved staying here, it is very clean and comfortable.  I will stay here again and recommend it to others
great value. cynthia is a great person and nice to talk to.
Cynthia is a fantastic host! Her adorable, cozy home is close to downtown Salem. I highly recommend it and look forward to visiting again.
Clean and friendly home!
Great hostess, very welcoming, good location within walking distance of Bush Park.  Friendly cat an added perk.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay again.
Cynthia was a host that a great meaning to being home. I will be back for sure
Cynthia was lovely. great location. large room which was really clean.

The location was so close to the event I was in town for!  I felt right at home in Cynthia’s house.  I’m a cat lover so of course I was into the cat but you don’t have to be if cats are not your thing.  Not only did I have a homey place to stay but made plans for some painting lessons!  Thanks Cynthia!  I just may be back!
Our stay at Cynthia’s guest room was great. Very comfy bed and quiet house for a perfect night’s sleep. Salem was the perfect base for us to go to Silver Falls state park. Would stay here again 👍
Great host and accommodations. Good communication and friendly cat, but not overly so. Nice private bath & good value!

Beautiful room in a nice neighborhood. The house is really cozy and Ember is one of the sweetest cats we have seen ;-)
Cynthia is such a lovely person - so it’s an perfect Airbnb!
Cynthia's home is lovely and well located - close to downtown Salem.
Quiet, clean and comfortable - Cynthia is warm and welcoming. Her cat Ember is a little sweetheart!

Cynthia's home was cozy and clean. She is a lovely person and was accommodating to my late check-in and extra early check-out. I can't account for the the rest of the home, since I really only slept there, but the bed was comfortable, the bathroom clean, and the neighborhood quiet. I had a restful night's sleep and appreciated the AC in the extremely hot Salem temperatures! Excellent value, I would stay here again.
Good value - accommodating/friendly host

Cynthia is a wonderful host! Her historic home is cozy and inviting. Ember the cat is very friendly and sweet. This was the perfect place to stay for an art event I attended downtown. Convenient, comfortable, and a great value!
Cynthia gave us a warm wellcome!
Loved staying with Cynthia. Very friendly and helpful. Just like Embers her cat!
Very accommodating and friendly. Loved my stay!
Awesome
I had a great stay. Super comfortable and quiet. Cynthia is a great host and Ember her cat is adorable. I felt very welcome in her home. Would definitely stay again.
This was the perfect stop on my trip. Safe, quiet neighborhood. Cynthia is a great host and her cat Ember is sweet!
Great place, solid communication, and a super nice host. Definitely would recommend to anyone visiting or passing through Salem. Also has the cutest cat Ember to keep you company.
Great place to stay! Our host was super accommodating and made sure we felt at home. Highly recommend.
Cynthia was very warm and welcoming. Comfortable home with beautiful artwork and quilts.  Perfect for our needs.

I came into town for two nights for an event. Cynthia was a great host, very nice and ensured all went smoothly. The room was of good value and clean. If you don’t like cats, Ember will make sure you do by the time you leave. She had quite the personality on her and is so sweet. Just ask my GF. Now she wants one. Anyhow if I’m back in the area , I’d gladly stay again.
It’s nice to be able to stay with a great host repeat visits and this is certainly the case with Cynthia, her comfortable home and sweet kitty, Ember - like visiting a good friend!
Great stay - very comfortable bed, great shower and loved the kitty company.
The room was just what we needed: clean, comfortable, and affordable. The friendly house cat was a cute perk.

Cynthia’s space was perfect for what we needed, and easily walkable to the gardens where we attended a wedding. The iris room is lovely, and the paintings are so beautiful! Big appreciations to Cynthia for being communicative and welcoming to us.

This is a wonderful place to stay. Cynthia is wonderful and her amazing little cat is just adorable. We don't have nothing but good things to say. Everything was perfect. If needing a great place to stay while traveling, this is your Airbnb. 😊

The Iris Room is a great little place to stay in the heart of Salem. It's just minutes from the Capitol and downtown. The room itself is spacious. Enough bed to stretch out, a big desk to work at, and a good closet. The Internet is plenty fast for streaming, so I imagine that Zoom calls would be fine. The house is cute. I really liked how there are grab bars in the bathroom. It's a nice, thoughtful touch for those who may not be the most steady in the shower or getting up from the toilet. Cynthia is friendly and very helpful, too!
Cynthia is super sweet and welcoming. She was very understanding of my situation and was very accommodating for me. And a Side bonus her kitty is the sweetest!

Close to city center and parks.
Try the Mexican food at Rancho Miramar 3 blocks away. Cynthia a very pleasant host. Not ideal if you are sensitive to cats,but very economical. Good bed. Nice bathroom.
Very kind host! Enjoyed the room and the stay.

Clean and comfortable lodging in walkable South Salem neighborhood--and within short distance of Bush Park. Guest room is on first floor of home, has desk, original art work on walls, and the room is lockable. Cynthia is a gracious host and her cat is very sweet. I'll be back soon.
Clean, comfortable, desk to work on, and walkable neighborhood. Great Salem option.

Cynthia was a wonderful host, her house is spotless, the hot water is HOT and the bed is super comfortable. The art in the room was beautiful. All of which is very nice! But the real reason I liked staying here so much was Ember. Why spend more for a hotel when you can save AND make friends with a cat?

Excellent stay!

We were only there for overnight, but would certainly stay again if the need came up.

Ember was very friendly, and the water pressure in the shower was awesome!

Great place to stay if you have to stay over in Salem or nearby.

Thank you, Cynthia! :-)
The place is clean, perfect sized, and centrally located! Great place to stay and her cat Ember is a fantastic assistant!
We throughly enjoyed our stay here! It's in a great location, close to downtown Salem and Silver Falls State Park. Cynthia was very welcoming and Ember is friendliest cat I've ever met!

Cynthia was very accomodating, from check-in to her place. Room and shower were quite comfortable. Her cat Ember is a social gem, very uniquely social for a cat, and a treat for anyone who loves cats or has not had much experience with them.

Cynthia's room was perfect in all senses, she made us feel like home; super clean, and with the plus of having a lovely friendly and welcoming kitty, Ember.
thank you!
Cynthia is friendly and helpful.  The house is clean and close to downtown Salem. And if you like cats, Ember is a delight.
na
Spacious and comfortable place close to city center. I highly recommend Cynthia's place for my fellow travelers

I spent 7 hours at Cynthia and Embers beautiful home.

my car was being repaired. ordered dinner and showered and took a nap. felt right at home. I noticed the iris artwork on the walls and she told me they were her favorites. what caught my attention was the way the light was captured. gorgeous. I hope to take a class with you. I'm sorry for the short stay and thank you for rolling with the punches with me and thank you again!!
I have stayed before. The place is clean and comfortable, and Cynthia is a great host.
Great hostess and pleasant place to stay - highly recommended.
Cynthia home was just what I needed after a long drive. She even offered me dinner. So nice. Highly recommend Cynthia’s home. I’ll be back!!!
She was very responsive, and respectful. She was a very good host.
Cynthia was understanding that we had something come up and didn’t stay the night but I would definitely stay at her place😊 she was pretty nice overall.
The Iris room is always clean, and Cynthia is friendly and helpful.
As a repeat visitor, I can definitely recommend this Airbnb!

Cynthia's place is a perfect place to sleep for the night when in town for a conference. It's clean, quiet, and her kitty will snuggle with you if you leave the bedroom door open! (I consider that a plus) Cynthia is also very friendly!
Amazing! I would for sure look for iris room once I am back in town or when it’s available! Thank you Cynthia
I always find staying here comfortable and convenient.
Very pleasant host. Adequate lodgings but not private. Shared housing. Should have read the listing better. Our bad.
Always clean. Great host. And convenient to downtown.
Cynthia is very friendly and quick to respond on the Airbnb app. Nice place for the value. Clean. It would have been nice to have some coffee or tea provided for the morning. Overall, a good stay.

Cynthia and Ember (friendly kitty) were great hosts- very friendly and communicative. Ember loved visiting with us and did not hesitate to ask for pets. Cynthia was very responsive and easy to talk to.
Thank you very beautiful home.  A+
Prompt response to messages and a gracious host.
One of the nicest airbnbs I’ve stayed in. Probably the best place in/around Salem for the money. The room is really clean with nice touches added.
The bedroom was clean and comfortable. Location is convenient. Tauren was helpful and friendly.

I’ve been staying at Tauren’s  place for a couple months now, and I’ve loved it. I’m a travel healthcare worker and the location it’s just perfect. I definitely recommend this place. I’m extending my stay again for work.
My stay was amazing, great communication and the location is just perfect.
Excellent stay!  The home is absolutely gorgeous and Tauren is a wonderful host.

AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING! Everything was perfect! From the hosts, the home, the cleanliness of the home, even the other guests. Expect nothing but the best because that is what you will definitely receive. I was in the area on a travel nurse contract and I was more upset I had to leave such a peaceful place. I 1,000% would recommend this place to everyone and would definitely return if I’m ever in the area.
I loved my stayed here, it’s so convenient if you’re gonna be working near downtown. Definitely worth it.

Wonderful! This was my second stay here and it was fantastic! The house was beautiful and clean. I appreciated the room's natural light and view of the tops of the surrounding trees. The location was excellent; about a walkable mile from downtown and half a mile from a grocery store. Tauren and Mikos were great hosts; great communication and very accommodating. This is the place to stay in Salem 👍

I stayed here on a travel assignment for 3 months and it was absolutely peaceful and made me feel very safe. My room had a beautiful view over looking a garden which was great to wake up to. The house is kept tidy and the roommates were all very pleasant and easy to get along with. Most of them worked at the hospital I worked at so it was great being able to live with like minded professionals. If I ever come back to Salem I will definitely request to stay here again and again 😊

Enjoyed my stay at this beautiful historical home. House is clean, comfy, and the location felt safe. Tauren and Miko are wonderful host with excellent communication. Would definitely stay here if in the area again. Thank you! :)

This place is literally a hidden gem! The location is great. The owners are amazing. If you are worried about shared housing don’t be! Most here are nurses or in the medical field and always busy so you rarely see anyone in the house. Everything you need is here and if it’s not the owners will get what ever to make you comfortable. The place is always clean and everyone is respectful.
I’ve stayed at a lot of AirBnb’s and this has been my favorite. Highly recommend.
Home away from home.
Perfect. Everything was amazing & respectful.. would definitely stay any chance I get😉

This was the perfect place to stay while in Salem. The house was clean, spacious and everything you could need was provided. Although the common space was shared with others, there was plenty of storage in kitchen for food, etc. and the space was well thought out so that you can spend time with other people staying there or find a quiet area for yourself.  Tauren was very responsive to any needs that came while I was staying here!  I’ve stayed at several air bnbs while in Salem and this was the best one by far!
Tauren has created quite the place here. The home is gorgeous and super well done. Tauren is very responsive and a great communicator.

This is a beautiful, clean home. I travel for work and stayed there for a few weeks. There are a lot of things to do with hiking, and being  an hour from the coast/Portland, shopping and restaurants. Tauren takes the time to make sure you are comfortable and keeping the place in tiptop condition. Kings donut (get there early) and Word of mouth restaurant are worth going to. Also the tap room is a unique experience with good food. I would definitely stay here again if I come back to Oregon.

Beautiful and historic home!! Great communication!! Very clean and well taken care of. The owners are very attentive and have great communication with the guests. I would definitely stay here in the future!! Thanks so much for providing a great home away from home :)

Fantastic! I had a wonderful stay at Tauren's place! Exactly as advertised; beautiful room, beautiful house, very clean. Great communication from Tauren. Great location; about a walkable mile from downtown, half a mile to  Safeway and many restaurants on State street are a block or two away. Ample parking on Court Street. If you're going to Salem, I highly recommend Tauren's place!
We had a great time in the beautiful historic home on Court Street !

My stay at Tauren house was amazing,
if you're traveling to Oregon ,Salem!
please book Tauren house!!actually mansion,huge bedrooms!huge living rooms,dining room
everything in the house is new! and original! the mansion is always clean and quite .
and its within walking distance to salem hospital

AMAZING! This house is decorated in such a simplistic, modern theme. Very very clean and they had everything we needed for our stay. Check in and out was a breeze and the communication with the owner has been quick and informative. I will definitely be staying here again if I am in the area. If you are in the area, look no further because this place is easily accessible, close to the shops & restaurants and close to the highway if you are traveling.
I love that place so much because everything’s all organized especially clean. I would love to go there again in the future. Trust me, it is affordable and it’s way too “ a place to go” for real.

What a lovely, spacious, and clean place to stay. The decor is simple and elegant, and everything was just right for our long weekend there while visiting family nearby. Parking, entry, and checkout were very easy. Thanks!
This is such a quiet, lovely place to stay. It was cozy and very clean.

Renae and Caleb’s place was really nice: spacious, comfortable, conveniently located, and tastefully furnished. The beds, in particular, were super plush and comfy, which makes for good nights’ sleep after days of traveling. The kitchen and bathroom were well stocked, everything was in working order, and having a washer and dryer was a huge plus after a few days on the road. Check-in and check-out were super easy, and the hosts were unfailingly communicative and responsive with instructions and questions. We had a great stay and would recommend the place to anyone.

Looking for a modern house with great lighting, great bed, large TVs, responsive hosts, good space and washer and dryer too!! Look no further, this is the place.

I would recommend this to anyone needing an AirBNB in the greater Salem area!

Renae's place was exceptionally clean, affordable, and conveniently located to downtown. We were in town for the Oregon Ironman- we had plenty of space for our gear and a full kitchen for our meal prep. The space is extremely close to a very busy road which made it incredibly disruptive and hard to sleep. Make sure you bring a noise machine and/or ear plugs-- despite us both being very sound sleepers, it was extremely difficult to block out the constant traffic even into the early hours of the morning.
Great place, well equipped, great service from host
Great place.
Very responsive and communications host. Place was clean and just as described . Thank you for the stay :-)

This place is extremely clean, fully equipped, and a whole vibe!! Self check in was really simple and I love that the bedroom also had a lock. I enjoyed the kitchen being equipped and cooking up a meal. The area is really peaceful and quite. I’d say, out of all the bnbs my partner and I have stayed when we travel, this is a top one! Also, Oleg is a great host, responds real quick.  Highly recommend staying here! 😊

Oleg's place is located in a nice and quiet neighborhood in south Salem. I really enjoyed my stay here. Would stay again if I ever come back to Oregon. Great spot, clean place, comfortable bed and beautiful home!

Oleg is a great Host! Superior communication, suggestions, & assistance when needed. He has a lovely home in a very quiet, peaceful neighborhood. It reminded me of happy memories  where I grew up :). The full kitchen is beautiful, great coffee maker, extra amenities! I truly appreciated being able to do laundry on my trip! Pristine clean house, cozy living room for viewing TV, etc. Great Value altogether! I would stay here again & again. Thank you Oleg for all of your Hospitality. :)
Excellent hosts. Good communication and flexibility.
Quiet neighborhood. Quick checkin. Host is quick to address your concerns or questions. Laundry onsite. Close to groceries and going downtown is easy.
An absolutely amazing stay! Great communication, clean, safe neighborhood, all around an amazing place! I definitely recommend staying here!!!!
Great stay, communication was really great and check in/out was a breeze.  Would recommend for sure :)
Few kinks to work out for this new shared housing. Owners do not live there. The inside doors have no lock so you can’t secure your things from other room mates.
Staying at Shannon's place was a new experience for me.  I didn't know what to expect but was pleasantly surprised.
