The host was very quick to respond and everything was just great.  No problems. I highly recommend this host and site.
Shannon and Martin were gracious and available hosts. Great  location: 20 minute walk to Willamette University and downtown.
She's was a good host and the kids loved her doggo

The house was beautiful  and the room was very comfortable. Host was quick to respond and extremely helpful. Check in and check out we’re super simple. House was well furnished and had a bunch of things that made my stay super convenient. I will definitely stay here again if I come to town. Would highly recommend this place and host.
Lovely home to stay in. Very comfortable and clean! Oleg was an amazing host!!
great place to stay! Clean, new, and communication from the owner was great

Oleg is an excellent communicator! the value and what you get for this Airbnb is beyond...... In a great neighborhood close to everything that you need. I love that you can go for a walk or run, and feel safe. It's in a beautiful part of South Salem... The house is beautifully decorated , and I love all the amenities. This is my second stay.
it's pristine clean , and I love the kitchen!
If you love to cook this is the place to be. It's very quiet! Thank you Oleg for superior Hospitality.. I would stay again
& again. :)

Oleg's place is a great stay! Beautiful location, quiet neighborhood, great for walking, etc. Lovely part of south Salem and close to restaurants, shopping etc.
I've extended my stay more than once.
Best value, all amenities! Fully stocked kitchen great for cooking. Beautiful backyard, for relaxing. I loved the bedroom, everything is pristine Clean!
Best Amenity is having washer and Dryer for use. Thank you Oleg, you're the best Communicator as well. Will stay again & again. 🌻

Hi Oleg and Oksana! Thank you for allowing me to be sheltered in your very nice house! I dont have any suggestions coz everythings is great! Your place is peaceful especially that I am sleeping during day time. It is also clean and it seems all is brand new. I was able to cook and lundry my clothes too. These are two plus factors for me in renting an accommodation coz not all offers the same.

I would surely recommend your place for a place to stay and I would surely comeback and rent text time.
Great Airbnb, highly recommend

I stayed in room 3 at Oleg's place from April 27th - May 1st. I booked this stay last minute because I was going to be doing wild fire training near Salem.
On arrival I was expecting to find a stay that would be part of a house where the owners were there too. My expectations were not accurate since I did not really plan in a timely manner. The house is shared by othet guests staying there. So, the atmosphere is more like staying with roomates from college vs staying with a friend hosting your stay.
Quiet hours are from 10 PM to 7 AM. I was not aware of this the first night but Oleg did a great job of communicating that to me. When I arrived there were two other guests staying there.
We all pretty much minded ourselves. Despite my best efforts to be respectful. I found me being to loud at times for one of the prior guests. I did my best to enjoy my stay while still respecting other's enjlying there's Overall it was great place to stay if you need somewhere to lay your head at night. It's well cleaned. Has a washer and dryer. A kitchen with basic cookware, ample parking, and is located in a quiet safe suburbian neighborhood.

I would go again if I just need a simple place to stay. :))

Very private space in a very convenient location. River adds nice ambient noise and very nice scenery in the springtime.
Would stay again.
Wonderful place to stay. Beautiful creek.
Great place to stay. The creek was a nice touch. Relaxing.

Very clean space and very comfortable bed. Great location if you need to be downtown. The creek out back was lovely. Amanda is a great host. She is always responsive and let us check in early so we could get off the road during that ice storm! Great stay!

We stayed about 2 mos. Amanda was very responsive to our requests. She responded within 2 hours at most. More often I had a response within 1 hour. The place was clean and had everything we needed. I liked the location near the river. Made for a relaxing stay.
Exceeded our expectations. A large, clean, cozy house in a great location and super friendly host. Thank you Debbie!
BEAUTIFUL home! Clean, well-cared for, SO many personal touches that made us feel very welcomed! Would definitely stay again!

The house was very comfortable. In particular, the beds were more comfortable than what I have experienced at other airbnb's or hotels.

We appreciated having coffee on hand, and the house was VERY quiet.
Awesome!
It was cozy and I can tell the owner loves being an Airbnb host.  We will definitely be back.  The house was well stocked and comfortable.
As advertised, this is a great house to stay in.  Good bedroom to bathroom ratio, clean, roomy house, and an incredibly safe neighborhood
We had a wonderful stay at the home. It is very spacious and comfortable. Debbie is accommodating and has great communication. The neighborhood is safe and quiet.
My family and I had an amazing time staying in  Debbie’s lovely home!

Debbie and her place were fabulous! The house is so spacious and was perfect for our Bbq dinner we hosted as a rehearsal for our wedding. Everyone loved their comfortable rooms and each one had a bathroom to get ready in. Debbie even bought a larger grill when she heard we were having a crowd over. We couldn’t ask for anything more or a better more generous hostess. Thank you!
Debbie was super responsive, the house itself is beautiful, it was cleaner than any hotel or air B&B I’ve ever stayed in.  Would rent from her again without hesitation.

Debbie's place was welcoming and clean.  the water pressure was great and honestly the best towels I've ever used.  Softer than hotel ones and actually covered my body.  My family enjoyed sitting on the porch and deck.
Excellent home with lots of rooms and bathrooms. If you have a group that wants to stay together this is your place. Private bedrooms, lots of bathrooms and wonderful kitchen and group areas.
We loved Debbie's place- super cozy and comfy with plenty of room to spread out!
Very nice place, good location, Debbie was very nice and accommodating!

absolutely enjoyed our stay here for a few days. we needed a place while sorting things out after the sale of our home and this met all our expectations. beautiful historic home. close to many things and all the neighbors are lovely.

The Craftsman Cottage was perfect for our family. I was traveling with my dad and sister and it was great to have a home-away-from-home base to rest, recharge and connect.

It was conveniently located to all of our destinations, was very well stocked with all the necessities like towels & washcloths, kitchen basics like plates, glassware and pots & pans, as well as much-needed coffee pot and Keurig.

There was room from us to spread out and get rest, but also to come together in the living room and dining area. The Cottage was clean and we really liked the neighborhood.

We would stay here again. Thank you!
Great house for a quite stay near the city
The green cottage is very nice and clean! the kitchen is particularly cute!!

Comfortable home! Had a pack n play for our kiddo and was perfectly located in Salem! Perfect kitchen for preparing meals, and other amenities were appreciated like a washer and dryer and a/c! Lots of beautiful nature close by with Silver Falls SP!

This home is perfect as a "Home Base" for just about any trip type I could imagine. The common spaces are open and have ample seating, the beds are comfortable, the kitchen is highly functional, and everything is clean and well organized. I also greatly appreciate the simple check out steps, the proximity to many great food/drink options, and the AC (which saved us as we visited while the temperature reached triple digits multiple times!) Her communication was clear and it was overall a wonderful spot.
A lovely home! We had a great stay. Everything was clean, comfortable, and well stocked. The host was incredibly communicative, helpful, and kind.

This cute house was the perfect home base for dropping our kid off at college. We had plenty of space, air conditioning that worked (don’t forget to turn on the upstairs one as it does get warm up there), coffee, and a comfy recliner couch for our very tired feet. Would definitely come back.
This was a great place to stay while we were in town for a wedding. We loved the charming alcoves and the beds were so comfy!
Great host. Gave clear instructions. Everything was clean. Would definitely stay again.
Cute house, lots of traditional charm.  Great communication with the host.  I enjoyed roaming the neighborhood on morning walks.
Cute home, nice neighborhood, comfortable place to stay while visiting my daughter at college
Super sweet family! I recommend bringing some extra blankets for warmth and a speaker for music to help with the life noise upstairs.
They were amazing. I loved that they were will to let us check in late and it was easy going. Will stay again
Cute space, priced right,  great hosts. Just what we needed.
Cute place!
Quiet neighborhood. Basement unit. I generally don’t like foam mattresses. Additional amenities available for purchase. Comfy coach and living room space.
Nice place that served our needs.  Quiet neighborhood, easy parking and check-in, two beds, friendly hosts.

This was an incredible stay! The place was so charming and so cozy. The host was lovely - very kind and welcoming, with very quick and helpful communication. I absolutely recommend this place if you’re in the area! 10/10 (:

Tiffany and her family were very kind helpful hosts. The air b&b was in a great location and was decorated very nicely. This place was well equipped to sleep our family of 3 and would definitely sleep a family larger then ours. We would highly recommend this air b&b!

Cozy stay in a nice, quiet neighborhood.   Basement unit with a bedroom with king bed that is connected to the kitchen and bathroom areas, and there is an extra bed available in the main area. Great hosts and EXCELLENT communication (super fast response times!). We used the location to do a day trip to the coast and it was a great location to easily get to Depoe Bay and Yachats within the day.
I enjoyed my time in this Airbnb. it’s got a really cute look to it! It’s the bottom half of the hostess house in a friendly neighborhood.
Cool little spot for an overnight trip! We visited Willamette Valley Vineyards and stayed here after. Projector for a great movie watching experience and comfy beds. Nice family and good vibes!

Very cute space and Tiffany is very friendly and kind. It’s great having so much comfortable seating and being surrounded by so many beautiful items. The kitchenette is small but has the essentials like, small fridge, microwave, hot water kettle, coffee, and an espresso machine.
Bathroom is cute with a claw foot bathtub.
Only thing was the space didn’t have much room for storage or luggage. But was definitely still manageable.
Would stay again.
Very private, for being inside someone's home.
Overall a great stay! The basement unit in Tiffany’s home was cozy and clean, and she was a great host with great communication.

The space is amazing as long as you don’t care about sharing a living space and not being able to do laundry. Highly recommend this BnB for a one or two night stay. Not recommend for a week long space

Such a cute space that’s worth the price! The host was wonderful and provided us with clear expectations for the room along with all the information we needed. We appreciated the board games provided in the room that we enjoyed playing after exploring the downtown nearby.
It was a cute place
Great place to stay and rest, cozy rooms filled with decorations. The beds are also great.
Very considerate hosts and cute space. Beds were comfy. Loved the little coffee station and projector set up for movies.
Very cute place with a 1920’s vibe as described. In West Salem. Nice neighborhood.

Tiffany's basement studio is quaint and clean and she's very easy to reach! There are a ton of comfy sleeping options. We were only staying the night and didn't get a chance to use the projector system, but it looked like it would have been an awesome and cozy space to watch a movie.

Tiffany was extremely nice and an accomodating hostess who was always quick in communicating with us and answering any questions we had. Her place is lovely and comfortable, and we enjoyed our stay. Thank you Tiffany!
Quiet and nice place to stay.

Needed a place to crash between the gorge and Portland and this location worked. It’s in the basement of their home and they were there to greet us w their two beautiful babies.  The bed and pillows could be more comfortable for our liking, but it was only one night so it worked!

Absolutely recommend staying here! Tiffany was absolutely MORE than accommodating! The space was clean, cozy and extremely comfortable! If you’re looking for stay near Corvallis, Salem or Albany I suggest booking with Tiffany!
Slept well
Cozy and unique decor. Plenty of sleeping space if you are two or three people. I like the fact that there is beer and wine to purchase as well as beautiful hand poured all natural candles.

Omg we loved staying here not only was it super comfortable and clean but Tiffany and her family were amazing they were both very attentive very helpful Super polite they  made us feel like we were home ..  everything was very close by which made everything that much better.. differently recommended staying here :..

What a fun and cozy space! Loads of extras and Tiffany was great to communicate with.
I only slept there one night so I didn’t utilize all of the amenities. It is in a quiet neighborhood and I felt totally safe.
Great place to stay!

Such a neat stay! The noise from upstairs was to be expected. The kitchen is small and not very functional for more than a day or 2. But the projector and fireplace are downright fantastic! Love the funky decor and all the bedding is so comfortable. Very nice neighborhood. Would come back again for a movie night!
Best sleep I’ve had in a long time so many comfortable places to relax. Very cool location would definitely stay again
A wonderful place to lay our heads after a fun night in Salem!
Home Decor is Amazing! very comfy
Super cute space. Especially appreciative of being able to bring along the pups.

Great communication with Tiffany, very responsive and helpful. We were able to check in early, based on our early arrival. Nice neighborhood, very quiet.
Thank you!
Very cool place with lots of interesting eccentricities to look at.
Nice place, kitchen area a little tight, but lots of character and charm throughout

I loved my stay here! My place was fully stocked. Beautiful decor, comfy! I was 10 min from the hospital I worked at so the location was great! It is a basement apartment so it could be a little noisy if you work Night Shift, but other than that there were no issues! Compared to my friends renting in salem, it was slightly more money each month, but nothing major. I’d say it was worth it. Hosts are very friendly and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again!! I can’t say enough great things about it.

This was one of my favorite airbnbs that I've stayed in. Rachel put together a truly cozy place that was fully stocked and with many added details that were thoughtful. For example, there is a sound machine in the bedroom that plays nature sounds, there is a heated blanket. She included games, books, and even feed for the birds and squirrels outside. It was fun to watch the critters eat from the bedroom window or living room. Rachel also communicated well about any questions we had. Great location, very quite at night good neighborhood for jogging. Thank you!
Clean, cozy and well supplied. Quiet central location.

The cottage is centrally located in Salem and very close the some of Oregon's best wineries.

The place is secluded and very private. It is also very comfortable. The bed is very nice, the shower is great with plenty of hot water. The kitchen is pretty much full-size and nicely filled with dishes, cookware, and everything you need to cook meals.

Rachel is very accommodating and handles every request with grace. I loved staying here and will definitely book again.
Rachel’s place was perfect for me.  Comfortable, great kitchen space, private, great location.  Hoping I have a chance to stay here soon.
Great house and location.  Tons of space, lots of room for everyone.  Roddy and Hope were a pleasure to deal with and easy to communicate with.  Will definitely say again.
We had a fantastic stay here! It was clean, spacious, and welcoming.

IMPECCABLE!  Price values perfect for its location. Hosts are an awesome pair, easy to work with, very professional, response time was very impressive. Home was very clean upon our arrival. Home had no issues accommodate all sixteen of us with out an issue. Thanks you so very much to Hope and Roddy.

We rented this house for a month and it was perfect. It is in a great location close to downtown Salem and in a very nice neighborhood. Roddy was a fantastic host who was very responsive and even set up a weekly cleaning service for us. It is a beautiful home with lots of space and great for big groups. I highly recommend it and we will be back soon!

This vacation home is absolutely one of a kind! Area was clean and organized upon arrival. Spacious enough to comfortably accommodate our party of 16. Host is extremely helpful and was prompt to answer any questions we had. Definitely staying here again!
Large house with great location. Communication with hosts outstanding. I would stay there again
The Host were very helpful and amazing and easy to work with! Very friendly as well and respond quickly to any questions we had!
great house and great location
Huge house. Great communication with the owner. Highly reccomended. 10/10

Enjoyed our stay. This home is very comfortable and spacious. Perfect for a group or large family. Plenty of privacy, and multiple gatherings areas. TVs and appliances are modern. Would definitely stay again.
Great house for a gathering large or small. Would definitely stay there again
Very spacious house— super clean &  very reasonably priced, especially for larger groups! Would definitely recommend a stay here!
The house was beautiful, very modern and clean. Roddy was great, very responsive and helpful, and went above and beyond to assist. Would highly recommend staying here!
Home was beautiful, comfortably fit 12 of us guests with room to spare, awesome communication, great safe neighborhood. Accommodations were amazing. Would definitely stay again!
Amazing!!!! Thank you so much for everything. :)

Roddy and Hope were wonderful hosts! Great communication, very responsive and flexible. Would absolutely stay there again - and the house is even better in person! The photos are great but honestly don't do the house justice.
good

Roddy's is a fabulous place to stay. We were in Salem with other family members  for our son's wedding at a nearby winery. There is a ton of space and it provides plenty of privacy for those of us who go to bed early. The loft area upstairs was perfect for our bouncy, not so quiet grandkids. There was lots of space for us to congregate in the open kitchen and dining area and the unique plumbing and lighting fixtures were one of the highlights on our stay. Check in was simple. I would definitely choose Roddy's place again.
Wonderful,clean,and  inviting accommodations. Thank you very much.
Beautiful home in a nice neighborhood. Very convenient for all the things we wanted to do in Salem.
We were thrilled with the property. It was perfect for our needs and appreciated the thoughtful touches the host had added. We  highly recommend this property and host.
Really enjoyed the place, it's very nice and spacious.

This is an amazing house for events like family reunions and other large groups.  I subtracted one star for accuracy, because the place is so much bigger than I expected.   The neighborhood is quiet at night and very safe.  Stores are about a mile away.  Everything inside was perfectly clean.  Would definitely stay here again.
Wonderful place and location.
This place is awesome. Amazing home. Definitely would stay again.
The house was great! It was very spacious and relaxing. The communication from Roddy was excellent. I would definitely stay here again.

Hope was so great with the communication! We had made a couple adjustments to our reservation and everything went smoothly. House is very spacious and was perfect for our big group. Location is nice and the area is quiet. Would definitely book with them again :)
This black and white house was clean and spacious. We had plenty of space for our small team to lodge together for a weekend in Salem.

We had a group of our customers come up from California and six of them stayed in Roddy‘s house. They all were very comfortable and enjoyed this very nice and spacious home. The location was good, just on the outskirts of Salem. Great home for a good size group/family.

We selected this facility for our bridesmaids to stay in the evening before my wedding. It was an amazing house and had all the amenities we could need for a night stay.
Thank you
Great house to stay at, highly recommended for bigger groups!
Great place very big and spacious everything we needed was included.
Great location for a large group

My family rented this house for my wedding weekend in late September/early October. It is in a nice neighborhood and had plenty of space, and the hosts were incredibly kind and responsive to our needs. Having said that, the house did not appear to be clean on arrival (dirty linens/bedspreads, fingerprints on counters/tables, crumbs on the floor, cobwebs, etc. , and has some updating that needs to be done. The cleaning crew also crossed paths with my family on the day of checkout and were extremely rude and aggressive towards my mother for simply standing on the porch.
Loved it
The owners were very friendly and helpful. This house was a great place to stay.

This is an amazing home and very well decorated the main floor has great lighting from the windows and you can enjoy coffee or wine on your deck. This is a great place for families or a group of friends to gather. The hosts are amazing and very quick with communication. This is one of my favorite homes to stay at in Salem. Batman fans will appreciate the Batman bedroom. The basement has a really fun big room for families to hang out in.
We had an easy, complication-free stay! Lots of space, lots of beds, lovely home.
House is extremely large and fit all our needs.
Perfect for a large group. We only stayed one night, but it was a great space with lots of beds.
Amazing home. The host is awesome with quick communication. The house is so clean and spacious.
Amazing home and hosts. Lots of space in the home, and super clean.

Perfect house for family gatherings, extremely spacious, family friendly, and at home feeling. They were super attentive. We definitely would recommend and keep them in mind when booking in the future.
This is a wonderful home and set up really well for families. The host is always quick to communicate and respond to any need. Very clean!
There was plenty of space for our large family. Roddy was super easy to work with.

The stay was very nice but there were some things that were listed in the description that weren’t true when we got to the house. The house is very nice but there’s a lot of holes and chipped painting. The air mattresses were also no where to be found.
Very responsive hosts who cared that we were having a good stay.  I would not hesitate to book this house again.

I'm sorry to say there was not heat in the basement to heat two bedrooms, one bathroom and a main room. That left the bottom half of the house unusable during Christmas. One burner on the stove didn't work. Kitchen not stocked for 10-16 people. Sidewalk icy when we arrived - very slippery.
Roddy did give me a bit of a refund which helps but it is obvious the house is not monitored to be sure everything is ready for guests.
Everything was great during our stay. I particularly enjoyed the coffee and tea corner.

fine place, decor is a little out there, lots of nice spaces for a group to hang out in. Only nitpic is that the kitchen lacked a honing rod so knives aren't in the best condition so if you plan on cooking bring your own cutlery.
Perfect for our group attending a local convention. Great easy location and room for everyone!
Great house and perfect for larger groups.
Roddy was a warm and welcoming host. Reached out to make sure we got in ok and made sure we enjoyed ourselves. Would book again if needed. Book with Roddy and you won’t be disappointed

Appreciate your flexibility. The house was perfect. We had a great weekend. Lots of space for people. I was able to contact host with immediate response. If we are back in Salem I will book this place again!
Great place to stay with a large group. Roddy is easy to correspond with. I’d recommend.  Lots of beds.

Roddys place didn’t come without some downsides. For one. There is no actual designated work space so if that is a requirement there isn’t one at this time. Maybe one will be added in the future.

This is definitely phase 1 of a luxury home but the host has other homes that are luxurious and beautiful and I have no doubt this one will get there in time. Also the host is amazingly friendly and gracious. And when any issues arose the host took care of them quickly.

There are toys for children to play with which was a really nice thing to see. My son loved the train track and called this “Batman’s” house our entire stay.
Great location, clean and well put together space. The host was very welcoming and quick to respond with any questions. We enjoyed our stay immensely.

The stay was very comfortable. Everything that is required is available and kept in the right places. Place was clean and peaceful. Perfect for a family of four to stay for a couple of days. There was a safeway close by so it was helpful. Price was also reasonable. The environment with garden and flower beds added to the tranquility.
Angela was a great host and the house was better than expected!  Super clean, with cool retro-styled kitchen appliances, super comfy beds and pillows, bathroom was remodeled as well!

Three oaks was a wonderful stay. It was close to restaurants and coffee shops. We enjoyed the quiet neighborhood and parking right outside the home.

The home was clean and organized. We were able to find everything easily. I loved the heated floors! Very nice touch!
It’s a super cute little spot, well cared for and nicely appointed. The heated floors in the kitchen and bath were amazing and super comfy beds.

Cute house, has everything you need! (besides food and friends ;))
Lil tricky to get to the first time, but all good! Great deal!

The stay here was so nice, the house was so clean and organized and The beds are soo comfortable, I slept like a baby. The neighbor is so quiet and beautiful. I will definitely be staying here again .

Great home and very comfortable. We enjoyed our stay and found it to be well stocked-extra blankets, towels, and all the basic kitchen necessities. The back yard was very well kept and inviting. Check in and check out was easy. Host communicated instructions clearly and checked on us to make sure everything was going well.

We felt at home! The house was clean, cozy, and quiet. Well stocked with necessary items and amenities. Close walk to downtown and restaurants. Centrally located makes it easy to get around town. Bryan went above and beyond to make sure our stay was great- even after, when we accidentally left an item; he was able to return it to us before we ended our PNW travels. 100/10. Great spot. Great host. Great stay.
Bryan is super accommodating and responsive. Very easy check in/check-out of house. Overall good experience!

Bryan's home was lovely and cheerful as advertised. It was centrally located, making it very easy for us to get everywhere we needed to be in Salem. It was clean and Bryan checked in every day to make sure we had everything we needed. As we have family in Salem, we have reason to be there on a regular basis and now we know where we'll be staying! Thank you for a pleasant weekend!
We were in Salem for an event at the fairgrounds. This home was very close to restaurants and the grounds. The home is clean and comfortable with all the necessary amenities.
nice clean place, good location. Great communication from Bryan, would recommend this property for those needed 2 BR.  Nice kitchen and back yard.
This place was very cozy and clean

Bryan's home was very nice and comfortable. We had no problem finding his place, just a back alley entrance off the main streets. The place was open, neat and clean! Convenient to downtown Salem and destinations around the area.
My sister and I went for a walk about the neighborhood the 1st night it looked a little sketchy, but most houses around were well kept up and we did feel safe.
Bryan had plenty of plateware, silverware, pots and pans to use with a full kitchen. He also had a dishwasher and all supplies needed to use. He also has a washer and dryer with supplies! What else can you ask for. The shower had good pressure and the beds were quite comfortable.
We did make a few suggestions for him for future guests, and he said he would take this into consideration, so he is open.
I would highly recommend Bryan's home! He had a nice backyard and a little barbecue to enjoy outside privately as he had the means to do so!
Y’all will definitely get your moneys worth. Clean and location is great. So close to everything and anything in Salem. Beds are so comfortable.
Bryan was great to work with and the Airbnb was very clean!
Nice small home in a great location. Great service
We had a great stay at Brian's place. The house was very clean, and in a great location. The beds we very comfortable. His communication was on point. We would definitely stay here again.

The cleanness and modernness of the house exceeded our expectations. The floors are very attractive too. The beds were comfortable. One was a little firmer, one a little softer. Bryan was exceptionally responsive and even brought a fan that we requested for when we had the A/C off. We’d love to stay again.
Clean and comfortable. We felt relaxed and cozy.
Wonderful stay and host was able to accommodate us for an early check-in. Place was nice and comfortable, had everything we needed. We will stay here again.
Great stay!  Thank you Bryan!
Bryan was absolutely wonderful with communication it was a very clean stay and made me feel very welcome!
Thank your for share your house
Great location, cute place, clean, and just what we needed in proximity to the college to send out daughter off.

We loved the house. It is clean, cosy, and has all the necessary appliances. We loved the location, close to Willamette, yet very quiet. We really liked the neighborhood, with good coffee shops and cafes close by.
We enjoyed our stay! Bryan was excellent with communication!
It’s was great and we were right near the fairgrounds, comfortable beds and air conditioning.
Thanks for the stay
Very charming home, just what we needed.
Quick responses, easy check in and out process. Was comfortable for a couple days while in town for a procedure. Doable with a mini van but would be easier parking with smaller car. Would stay again.
Bryan has made good use of the space in this home. We had 3 adults stay and we had plenty of room.
We had a great stay! Bryan is a very attentive host and we appreciated his assistance. We would recommend this location to small families needing space rather than a hotel.

Séjour agréable chez Bryan avec un équipement fonctionnel. Le quartier est très calme. la maison est plutôt bien entretenue mais quelques équipements manquaient (pas de petite table dans le jardin, pas beaucoup de vaisselle, un petit tancarville aurait été apprécié pour sécher les serviettes de bain (Bryan nous a équipé d'un porte serviette suite à notre remarque à ce sujet). Bryan est un hôte serviable et nous le remercions.
We have stayed at Bryan’s home multiple times. If you are familiar with Salem, you will agree that this location is a great value. We will definitely stay again!

Bryan was a great host with quick, effective communication. the location was perfect for our venue at the fairgrounds, as well as quick access to all lpcations desired for food choices.
The house was perfect size for the 5 of us (2 adults, 1 @14, 2 @11). For the price, size, and seclusion, 100% better choice than a hotel.
Highly recommend if you love simple and enjoy saving money!
He was very responsive and flexible

This home was perfect for me and my family. The host was extremely accommodating and kind. It was very cozy and had all the basic needs and  necessities. It felt like home away from home! I definitely recommend staying in this lovely home!
Bryan fue muy atento, las indicaciones que nos dio tanto como en llegada y salida siempre fueron claras, fue muy amable y es un excelente anfitrión!!
Wonderful place and great host!
Clean and tidy apartment.
She was so kind and responsive!
Beautiful, clean, quiet, and nicely stocked. Host was attentive and easy to reach. We would definitely stay again!
We enjoyed a fantastic stay!  Everything was nice, new and clean.  Check-in went very smoothly and the location was very convenient.

Amazing location if you’re a healthcare worker. About 5 minutes to the hospital. Grocery stores, shopping, or parks were also very near. It was the cleanest air bnb I’ve ever stayed in and somehow it was so comfortable too. The attention to detail was impressive. Great parking situation. Neighborhood felt safe enough for a single renter too. Absolutely loved staying here!
The host was amazing. Extremely responsive to all our needs. Had to extend our stay and it was such an easy process.
it was very clean place will definitely stay again with them
Great communication.  Clean home with many thoughtful touches to make you feel at home.
Unbelievable place!  Super modern, great amenities, great location!

Adorable, cozy, affordable and great location.

Kitchen was well stocked with dishes/cooking utensils. As well as an abundance of pillows, blankets and towels.

For anyone visiting the area, I highly recommend this property. My travels to the Salem area are mainly business and I stay 2 weeks each visit. Mark and Svetlana are really quick at responding. I’ve had experience at staying a variety of Airbnbs and they have provided by far the most appliances and supplies. I enjoy making my own meals during my visit and I didn’t have to worry about not having the proper kitchen tool or utensil. Their property is as beautiful as their pictures.
Amazing space. Pictures are accurate and easy check in!
This was my second time staying at this property and I still enjoy it as I did the first time.
Such a beautiful home! Super clean and everything looks brand new. Very quiet area and they provided with lots of amenities. Would definitely come back next time we visit Salem.
Wonderful stay. Nice and clean and clear house rules.
Mark .& Svetlana were amazing hosts for the townhouse suite we rented from them. They were very helpful with any questions we had. The townhouse was awesome. Would highly recommend renting from them
The place is adorable! Well stocked and decorated. Would stay again! It’s very easy to get to and we really enjoyed our stay in Salem.
Hosts were great and accommodated our request! The place was super clean and location was quiet. Would definitely stay again.
Great place, has all the things you need for a nice time in Salem!
This was my first time in Salem and this place was perfect! It’s in a safe, quiet neighborhood. The place was very clean and had every amenity to make our stay very comfortable.
Nice and quiet place to stay. Quick to respond. Easy check in. Very comfortable and welcoming.
Awesome place to stay, really nice and clean.

A newer suburban area that was convenient for getting anywhere in Salem or the surrounding areas. We easily took day trips to the coast, Eugene and south Portland based from here. The place itself was as advertised, clean and kept up really well. The owners were always quickly responsive. It could easily sleep 6.
Great stay was perfect to come and go from.
Everything about this home is 5 Star. Very clean and comfortable, well equipped and near enough to major roads without actually being on a major road. Would highly recommend this home to anyone!

It was such a beautiful space for my little family and a couple of friends.  3 bedrooms with comfortable beds. My daughter loved it! There were games and books available and signing in to our streaming accounts was seamless. My friends stopped at the outlet malls before arriving and we stopped on our way back. It was a perfect 30 min drive from Silver falls, our true destination for our trip.  Such a comfortable and relaxing home to return to have that 7 mi trek! Lol loved it!

Amazing, cute and clean house. Mark & Svetlana go the extra mile and think of everything you could possibly need to make you feel right at home. They are excellent communicators and respond quickly with any of your questions or concerns.

When visiting South Salem, make sure you stay with Mark & Svetlana!
We had a great time and the place is beautiful.
Loved pur stay home is beautiful! Nice and cool and we loooved the fireplace😊 very relaxing!

So many nice things to say about the home Mark & Svetlana have put together here - truly a 5-star property across the board.

It is very roomy and open for a townhouse - we stayed here with 3 people, but the other reviews are accurate that this home could easily sleep up to 5-6 people.

It is extremely clean - and all the appliances and fixtures look modern and feel brand new. My girlfriend and I especially enjoyed sitting on the back deck/patio for morning coffee and an evening drink - the views of the surrounding hills were very beautiful! We were very comfortable here - it was cozy and felt just like home!

Mark & Svetlana were absolutely amazing hosts - they were very quick to respond to all our questions and also very accommodating. The entire house is very well stocked - we had everything we needed. Looking forward to staying here again soon!

Definitely what the pictures show. Very modern, they had everything you could need. My family had a very comfortable stay. They were very communicative and that's appreciated. I'd definitely stay here again.

I highly recommend this condo.  It is very clean and has everything you might need.  I do have one comment.  This condo has a Roku TV.  Be sure to bring your personal ID/Passwords for Providers or Networks that you might subscribe to such as Direct TV,  ESPN; Prime TV, Dish, etc.  We didn't have that information with us.  We wanted to watch Monday night Football, but weren't able without signing in.

This home was beautiful and very clean! It was the perfect size for myself and my guests! (There we’re five of us total) the kitchen had everything we needed to cook and the couch was super comfortable! We did have a slight issue with the internet connection but we had brought a lot of video games and board games to play so it wasn’t a huge gripe for us. The hosts were very responsive when I had any questions which is always wonderful as well.  Thank you so much for having us!
Highly recommend! I would happily stay there again in the future.

Your place was impeccably clean and comfortable.  I thought the mattress in the larger back bedroom was much more comfortable than the mattress in the Master.  Since there was plenty of room even though there were only two of us, we spread out which was wonderful.  Thank you.
Fantastic space and very comfortable. In town for a wedding and enjoyed our stay very much.

We were here for a family wedding. We loved your place! We felt like we were in our own home. It was clean and the layout was perfect!
This is a 5 Star Airbnb.
Thanks for making our time in Salem so nice Until next time. .....

Perfect place for a girls weekend…decorated so nicely with such a nice selection of coffee pods and teas. Our hosts were super responsive.
We highly recommend staying here and visiting the nearby Willamette valley winery too!

Excellent views and location, comfortable couch and bedrooms. We enjoyed our stay and felt very welcome. Would recommend this lovely home,  it was very clean and exactly what we needed. We made great memories here!
lovely place.

Svetlana & Mark
My family and I enjoy for the

Hope to come back in the

New Jersey
This place and location were perfect for our mother-daughters “hygge” weekend. The kitchen was well-stocked for cooking, and a comfortable place to just hang out. Highly recommend!
Loved staying here. So nice, very clean and comfortable. Everything we needed was there. Great communication. 10/10 recommend, would stay there again.
Wonderful stay! The townhouse was beautiful and well equipped. Location was nice and central. Everything was perfect!
The home is very lovely and quiet. Won't hesitate to come again

We spent a wonderful Christmas week at Mark and Svetlana’s with our adult children.  Despite some pretty dicey weather, the place was warm and cheerful with a good vibe coming from the electric fireplace and the big windows.  The furnishings are tasteful and the decor welcoming.  We really liked having enough space for us all to feel comfortable.  Two full baths and a powder room were perfect.  As it was the holidays, we did lots of cooking and the kitchen was very well fitted with nearly every gadget imaginable.  They even had an immersion blender which was handy as I made a big pot of soup to keep us warm and cozy.  We frequently visit Salem and would happily stay here again.
Really enjoyed the stay.  Place was very comfortable and convenient.  Would definitely recommend and would choose to stay here in the future.  Thank you
Great experience!

Beautiful and amazing home. Everything was as pictured and described but even better! The location and neighborhood was perfect and peaceful. We visit Oregon quite often so this will definitely be a place we try and come back to.
Great hosts and helpful to a stranded traveler who had the dates wrong on the reservation. Host found another quick option for us. Beautiful townhome and comfortable beds!

This place was perfect for us. It is clean comfortable & welcoming. It was bigger than it looked in the pictures. There are common walls on either side but we never heard the neighbors it felt very private. We will for sure look for this place again when we go back to Salem.

Our stay at Mark & Svetlana's South Salem townhouse was nothing short of perfect. We stayed there for 6 weeks after our baby was born in Salem Hospital. It was a long time to be away from our own home in the UK, and also such a precious time for our new little family, but we never felt like we were 'away' or missing any comforts. We felt so comfortable and 'at home' - we didn't want to leave! Mark & Svetlana also went above and beyond as hosts - and it all started with the most beautiful welcome gift for our new little bundle of joy. They were so thoughtful, kind and helpful. They were quick to respond to any question or need we had. Their home is beautifully furnished and has all the amenities you need to be more than comfortable. The area is peaceful, calm and clean. The neighbours are also super friendly. There are all the stores and shops you need close by. We cannot recommend Mark & Svetlana's home highly enough!!!
The place was lovely and fun! Very clean. Parking was not so great. The garage is not big enough for mid size car.

Really fun spot right in Salem. The place was nice and clean, parking is abundant and downtown Salem is a quick 5 minute drive down the road.

Ellen was very helpful and quickly responsive when we had questions. We would go back! It worked perfectly for us attending a wedding at a nearby vineyard.
Super cute place in a great location. Communication was super easy. Would definitely come again!

Immerse yourself in Wonderland! This place is spacious, has everything you need, and is so fun in its decor that you will feel transported. The location is excellent, within walking distance of the capital, downtown shopping, museums, public gardens, restaurants. Full private yard is a real treat, we spent hours sitting outside. There’s always a shady spot. Oh and the host is phenomenal!!
Fun decor and very convenient walking distance to Willamette U and good food. Not noisy for us.
Great location and an awesome space to come back to after a day of exploring. Perfect for parents visiting their kids that attend the University. Everything you need is very close to this Airbnb.

This was a fun little immersion into a whimsical world during a real-world work week.  Parking is off street and free - - the main road a block away didn't really make itself known at night - - and walkable to downtown in 20 mins or less.  I like the natural light in the reading nook, as well.
Perfect little apt for a visit with my college student.  I’ve found my go to place for future visits.
Ellen is a wonderful host who goes above and beyond to make sure her guest are comfortable.

Ellen's place was great, well decorated and had everything we needed. She is quick to respond and check-in/check-out was a breeze. The place is in a great location, a very easy walk to downtown. We would certainly stay here again if we find ourselves in Salem in the future.

Place was conveniently located within a mile of my event and near the best restaurants in Salem.  The setup of the rooms were perfect and the kitchen had every item that I needed and more.  The place was sparkling, temperature was easily controllable, ceiling fans in the kitchen and bedroom an added plus, and the décor was functional.  Thank you for a great experience and I will be back next year!  Ellen also reached out to ensure that I had no issues (of course, I had none!).
Great place to stay in Salem! The hosts are responsive and the place is clean and convenient! Couldn’t recommend more!

This was a lovely apartment in Salem and we had a great stay.

I felt like it was expensive for Salem but maybe that's the going rate? There aren't many options for accommodations in Salem and they are all expensive, so I can't imagine any being a better choice than this one.
Quiet, cozy, private and clean
It was a great place to stay in Salem! Very close to great places to eat and other attractions. The apartment was very well kept, clean, homey, and comfortable.
We stayed 6 nights and the apartment had everything we needed. Well appointed, comfortable and centrally located. Would definitely stay again.
Thanks

Ellen made every effort to insure my comfort. She asked midway about any items I might need and helped me when I was stuck figuring out the washer/dryer app. Apartment was super quiet and homey and I felt relaxed during my stay.
Such a cute lil cozy place! It had everything I needed and more! I especially loved the artwork and the makeup remover in the bathroom! Nice touch!
Thanks Ellen.. place was perfect for the holidays.

Ellen has been very responsive in offering several of her properties to fit my needs.  She reached out to me to offer extra nights when they were available.  The property was clean, easy to acccess and very organized.  I would definitely return to any of Ellens preoperties in the future. Thank you!.

Beautiful, updated, large apartment! We could have easily stayed much longer, as there is a spacious living room to enjoy in addition to the basic space needed. The shower and the kitchen were both large and brand new. Everything was clean, check in and out was very easy, and our host was very responsive. The bed was very comfortable. There were extra towels provided, which was nice. The only thing I would emphasize is to make note that it is indeed below another apartment.

This was a perfect place, close to downtown Salem. The host has amazing communication skills. It was nice because I was able to do my laundry before flying back home and there was detergent provided. I would definitely book here again.
Very clean, host was easily reached. Having a few chairs for the front porch would have been great

Michael is a superior host!  He was very thoughtful and personable, and even suggested some good local restaurants.  The  place was nicely decorated and spotlessly clean and was exactly what we needed for our stay for the Ironman race, as it was super convenient to the race location.  For others, it's near downtown Salem and so would be very convenient for any visit.  The kitchen had the perfect amount of supplies for 2 people and a little dining area with a table for 4, and the AC was great to have during the hot summer.  There's a dishwasher, and washer/dryer, as well, and so it has all the comforts of home.  It was also nice to be able to login to our personal accounts on Netflix and Disney Plus on the TV in the living room.  The home was much more spacious than you can tell from the photos, and the design makes a really good use of the space.  We will definitely be returning in future trips to Salem!
Awesome place!! Clean, modern and a short walk to the capitol and downtown! Great communication too!
Clean as a whistle, great location, and able to accommodate me at the last minute.  5 stars.
This place will exceed your expectations!
Nice place nice remodel
Beautiful home and was perfect for what we needed it for! Everything was clean and the check in/out was super easy!
The place is well maintained and neatly kept. Check in was easy and the host is superb and keeps you well informed. Thank you!!
Awesome place. Super clean, beautifully modern and comfortable. Highly recommend!

Beyond perfection. First class and then some. It just doesn’t get any better than this. Everything one would need for a long or short term stay. Clean, neat and tidy, quiet, not overly cluttered with furniture and other items like some airbnbs we’ve stayed in. Construction of this unit is top quality. Bed was so comfortable with European style bedding which is so much nicer than tangling top sheets and blankets etc.
would have loved to stay longer
Clean and fully renovated place. Exactly as described and very comfortable stay. Thank you!
One of the best hosts I’ve had. 100% recommend. Very nice place with quality accommodations. Well done

While we were generally satisfied, the home could have been better equipped in order to make our stay more comfortable. The biggest issue for us was the fact that the thermostat was set in such a way that the air conditioning could only be set for a maximum of two hours and then it would kick off. This meant that during the night the air conditioning would turn off automatically and we would wake up because it was too warm. So we ended up waking up several times during the night to set the ac for another two hours.
Sparkling clean, on a hot day it was nice and chilly AC worked great! Owner was beyond kind and was very patient with us and friendly! Would recommend.
Lovely compound and accommodating host. The pool was wonderful and the apartment had everywhere needed. Host was kind and communicative.

Really enjoyed staying here, it was perfect for what I needed. Michael was super helpful and clear, the place was clean and had everything I needed, and it's an ideal location for anybody with business at the state buildings or downtown. I didn't find many other clean, modern options in this price point so this was a great find. has a great modern thermostat - so many air bnbs I've stayed at have ancient heating systems and it was nice not to spend the trip fighting with temperature inside. Shower has good water pressure and there was little to no noise that transferred from the adjoining apt. Thank you Michael! Would stay here again.

Great place to stay for a visit; bit of a walk to things if it is raining but not too bad in fair weather.

The space was larger than expected from the photos and definitely felt new and clean.

Main reason I knocked it down to 4/5 is I had wanted to work a few days remotely here and there was not a dedicated workspace, only a kitchen table with dining room chairs which is not the most comfortable for extended hours. Also the wifi was spotty and far slower than 1Gbps as advertised. I think I clocked it in at about 80Mbps which would be fine by me if it were consistent.

Honestly a great place and I would recommend it if you are not planning to work remotely here.

We enjoyed our stay at Michael’s place. It was exactly as described! It was clean, comfortable, and a great location. We were able to walk to the capitol and restaurants. We would definitely stay here again!
The view was amazing, and the yard was very relaxing! Beautiful kitchen as well!!  The fire pit came with everything we needed to relax!!

This place was cute and comfortable.  The view was nice.  The parking was very tight with so many surrounding homes and apartments.  This place really isn't for dogs.  Many stairs that my dogs and I slipped on when it was wet outside, no place to walk them that was safe.  The description was incorrect regarding bringing dogs so I let the owner know, and she changed it.
A wonderful private and cozy retreate, right in the heart of the the city. We found it very charming and slept woderfuly there.
Love the cottage! I would definitely come back and enjoy a stay again. Thank you
Centrally located, cute, clean and well-appointed.  Be sure you are clear about bringing a pet and that those charges are included before you agree to the terms.  Otherwise, you'll love this place!!!
The backyard was better than I expected… gorgeous and so relaxing. Everything was very nice and I would love to stay again if ever in Salem.
A quiet and peaceful oasis, we’ll stocked and comfortable! We’d love to come back.

My husband, 2 toddler, newborn, and 2 dogs enjoyed our stay. We found Jolie’s home beautifully decorated and had everything needed for my family. The backyard was my favorite part of it. Loved our stay and would recommend for any family needing a getaway.

This was a great stay. The house was very clean and more spacious than I expected it to be. And I loved having a place to sit in the shade by the creek on an afternoon when I was tired. The space is the entire upper floor of the house and is completely self-contained with its own entrance. There are other renters downstairs — but we barely saw or heard them.

Nice and Cozy stay, the host is very responsive. Good stay for 2-3 people, for more people it gets congested. The second room is small, so it will be comfortable for one person. Having a washer, dryer and centralized air conditioner would be great for longer stays.
Beautiful and cozy little home. Very clean and beautiful backyard area. Will definitely stay.
Clean, quiet, and comfortable.  Perfect location if you're visiting a student at Willamette.  Appreciated the portable A/C for the warm summer nights.
Lovely home in a quite neighborhood
My family and some friends stayed here with children. We had a great time and enjoyed the home. Jolie is a great host!
Ended up going home (a few blocks for the Airbnb).
Great little spot with a beautiful backyard.

We had a great time staying in Jolie’s house, it was 5 star staying
Beautiful view, beautiful house
Thank you very much for hospitality, and for offering such a nice house
Beautiful place to stay!
Adorable place. Close to Willamette University. Sitting by the creek in the backyard was wonderful.
Jolie was an exceptional host, very communicative, helpful and the place has just an unbeatable magical backyard on the Mill Creek river, would happily stay here again if I am in town again.
Rented for 2 couples for a weekend stay. very comfortable and clean. nice place to stay.  parking is a challenge.

Jolie was easy to communicate with and the house was great. Parking was pretty right with two cars but we were able to make it work. Although you have the place to yourself, the outside space is shared and the home is attached to an downstairs renter; it was completely fine for us but something to be aware of if that isn’t comfortable for you. We didn’t use the outside space because it felt a bit awkward with it being shared and such but I’m sure we would have been fine to. Overall it was a great spot and the host was very responsive to messages.

The stay was lovely. Jolie was very kind and responsive to our inquiries and even went as far as seining by the home to show us how to properly work the lock on the door. Overall, the home was quite, clean, and welcoming.

Super clean and ample space for 3 people!
It made for a perfect stay in wet, fall weather in Salem. The kitchen was open and valuable and the garden quite enchanting! I only wish we got to enjoy the space for longer!
Great place!! Great people.  Very comfy.  Great view from the master bedroom.
Jolie is a kind and responsive host, and we were grateful to have found her place to stay at the last minute.
Worked well. Love creekside
Perfect in every way!!
awesome little nook
Great stay! Highly recommend!
We had a lovely stay! Jolie was attentive to our needs and created a very welcoming home.

This was a cozy and peaceful stay for a trip to visit family in Salem. The couch and bed were very comfortable, it’s location was close to lots of things in the area, and our dog loved looking out the window to watch the creek go by in the back. We will definitely try to stay again!

We were very pleased with how nice the house was. The outdoor space was great and the extra welcoming touches were greatly appreciated! We would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone who is visiting the area!
Thanks again!

We enjoyed our stay. I felt comfortable and welcome in your cozy little home.  We had a minor issue and our host was very responsive to our needs. We also unexpectedly had to extend our stay and Jolie was quick to respond and approve our request which greatly reduced our stress. I would stay there again.
If I could put 10 stars I would it was an amazing place to stay in and the outside was absolutely stunning. I strongly recommend this place if you are thinking about visiting Salem!!!
Definitely the pictures weren’t like what I saw in person. The location was a little hard to find. The neighbor wasn’t the friendliest. Host is really nice though.

Jolie place is inviting, clean, and cozy. The river view is amazing! Parking was a little tight but our 2 smaller cars fit just fine. There is a walkable neighborhood right nearby where we took the dog on walks.

It seems we were lucky to have found Jolie’s place available for some surprise travel due to a family emergency. This was a great place for our little family of three (incl. a two year old). We brought our own pack and play, and the rest was ready for us when we got there! Jolie provided some recommendations for food nearby that were spot on.
The house is so cute! It’s a comfortable little cottage and the backyard is gorgeous!! It is equipt with lots amenities (especially the kitchen) that makes the experience super relaxing.
It was such a cute place! We enjoyed the breath taking backyard.  Jolie was super responsive.  We definitely plan on going back again.

My wife and I stayed just for one night in this lovely flat on our trip at the west coast. However, it is really comfortable, well equipped and you could easily stay much longer.  Michael is a great host, who lives nearby.

We were in town for an event at Willamette University. This spot is close to campus. The space was comfortable and tastefully furnished and it was easy to park. The one thing that might not be to everyone's liking is that it is about a block from train tracks so you will hear trains pass by.

What a cute place! Plenty of room for two people (possibly even 3 or 4) and only a short drive to downtown Salem. One should know that the train runs right by the place. It wasn’t an issue for us (I enjoy the sound of trains), but for some light sleepers, it might be a problem. Michael was very attentive and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again.
Tastefully furnished and decorated. The pool is cute and welcomed after a hot day touring the local wineries. Everything is new. Great value for what you get.

This is an excellent stay for two people. Easy parking and check-in along with a clean and updated interior. As other reviewers have pointed out, this Airbnb is right next to the train tracks. You will hear cargo trains pass at least 3 or 4 times per night. If you're a light sleeper, definitely bring ear plugs. Apart from that, it's a quiet and peaceful neighborhood.
Loved the space and the area. Super clean and comfy. Michael is great. Perfect spot to stay for a vacation!

Great, central spot! Loved the space too. My only critique was it ran warm and I couldn’t set the AC to stay at a cool level. But, to be fair, it was extraordinarily hot for Salem and probably most any place would be warm.

Awesome place to stay! A lot of room for two people. Everything’s updated with a nice kitchen. Michael has great communication and is on top of check-in and check-out instructions. The pool was perfect for the hot weekend we were there. Would definitely stay here again!

I am a student who was on rotation in Oregon for six weeks and I couldn't have asked for a better place! Just being a single room place the high ceilings and open design make the place feel much bigger. It has everything you need to fully unwind after a long day and a nice full kitchen to prep for the week. I also thought it was styled really nicely, way better than a hotel room. If you need a place to stay especially for an extended time don't skip over this one! Michael is also there whenever you have a question and always willing to help in anyway he can. Great experience.
Both the upper and lower flat are modern, clean and well equipped.

Love the stay in Michael’s place. The location was perfect to me. Very comfortable, modern, and inviting in a quiet and cute neighborhood. I were able to contact Michel with any questions and he responded so quickly. Michael is great host. Highly recommend.

Wonderfully executed design, clean, comfortable.
Perfectly located for our stay needs in Salem. Micheal was attentive & kind! Will definitely stay here again when back to Salem!
Michael was such a great host with a beautiful apartment stay. Looking forward to visit again soon!
Such a nice, clean place. Modern amenities. This place is great for either a fun trip or work trip.
clean, comfortable apartment in a great location. would stay here again.

Michael’s space was perfect! It’s updated and modern and has just the right touch to make it feel warm and comfortable. The shower was lovely! The kitchen was lovely 😊 and the cold water in the fridge was a fabulous touch! The way that the windows face (I’m a fan of a fresh breeze) make for a perfect breeze and the rustling of the leaves on the trees was delightful to sleep in. The best part was the train coming through it reminded me of my childhood (it came through in the early evening not midnight just an fyi). Michael was communicative and the keyless entry was superb! I will most definitely be coming back again. Thank you!
Excellent apartment. Spotlessly clean and very comfortable. Close to downtown.
Loved staying here

This space was clean, spacious, adorable, & cozy!!! The bed was so comfortable that I fell asleep shortly after laying down. The couch & tv were perfect for lounging. I didn’t use the kitchen as I was only there for a short overnight but it was spacious and inviting! I was making my way from Los Angeles to Seattle, and Michael’s loft was only a few minutes from I-5 which was ideal for me! When I had questions, Michael answered incredibly fast, and was so kind when my tired brain asked dumb questions. I highly recommend this place!!

This Air BnB was tucked away which was nice. There is a train that passes by which is super cool to see! We got to walk to the Elsinore Theater from our Air BnB with no issues. Overall, pleasant stay because everything you need to do is there. You can wash your dirty laundry, shower, cook, and sleep!

Fantastic place.

Everything looks exactly like photos. Very clean. And he wasn’t kidding about new renovations. My brother wanted to buy the place to live in.

He was also incredibly responsive. We had a small hiccup when we arrived at 5 am and he replied right away.

We came for a weekend long JROTC competition at North Salem High School. We were delighted with the fact that it was a 4 min walk to the school and even in the dark we felt safe walking because the neighborhood was nice, quite, and safe feeling. Airbnbs sometimes have a few items you might need if you have forgotten them, but Michael's place was surprisingly generous with provisions! It was so clean it felt like we were the first people to ever use it! The bed was SO comfortable! The pool looked inviting, and in warmer weather, I'm sure it would be a really nice added amenity! I highly recommend staying here!
Great location and comfy stay. Parking is tough but location makes up for everything!

5 stars!

The space was beautiful and perfect for our event weekend. We would definitely recommend anyone staying in downtown Salem to check it out. Diana was responsive to our needs and very accommodating when we needed to adjust our departure on Saturday!
perfect location downtown
Great location and clean apartment! Would stay again
Loved the apartment. Clean. Bright. Close to everything downtown. Would love to stay again.
Great space in a great location! Very comfortable and charming. Will definately rent again.
Amazing location downtown, beautiful space and light, such a great stay. Diana is communicative and made everything easy. Will definitely being staying again on our next trip to Salem.

This is a great spot. It offers one a super cool opportunity to do a “city routine” in the big little town of Salem. The place itself is great. The tall ceilings give it the roomiest feel and it’s got it all, really. Plus Diana is wonderful, easy to connect with and responsive as well as responsible.
Super cute, easy to find and very cozy!

Our stay went seamlessly. The unit was exactly as advertised. The location is excellent for access to all downtown Salem has to offer. I would absolutely consider booking there again if I’m back in Salem.

cute little place, it was easy to find and i had no problems at all during my stay. downtown is really pretty and parking wasn’t as hard as i thought it’d be, there was accesible parking right behind the building :)

This place had a very stylish and comfortable living area, and the bed was very comfy. The ease of getting around downtown by foot from here was great. Diana gave clear and timely info on being in the space. My only caveat is that if you are not used to the sounds of living in a downtown building, then there might be more ambient noise than you are used to. That said, we would happily stay there again.
Great location and spacious place. Steps from many great restaurants and nice parks.

Diana was a great host, very good communication, friendly and willing to accommodate our needs.  Apartment was clean. well organized and supplied with all the necessities.  Thank you Diana for being so amazing.
A great downtown location. Apartment is basic but has plenty of space and everything you need.

Great find.  Love the location of this downtown condo.  It was perfect for my husband and I.  The pull out was very comfortable for our college daughter.  Thought it might be loud, but we didn't hear anything during our stay.  Would recommend this place to anyone.
Great little spot right in the heart of downtown.
The apartment was great and checking in couldn't have been any easier.
Great spot in the heart of downtown Salem.

Spacious apartment in Downtown Salem. Across the street from a great cafe and bar (Archive). Clean space. Apartment is in a large building complex so expect to hear apartment noises (not for light sleepers). Overall enjoyed my stay here and would be happy to return.
It was great! Very good location
Amazing everything it says it is wonderful host
This is a basic, nice apartment in the heart of downtown Salem. Perfect location, and comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.

Great location for a few night stay. This apartment puts you right in the middle of downtown for shops and restaurants. Being that it’s November it was a little chilly and drafty in the apartment. There were extra blankets which helped a lot. The downside of being central was the street noise of party goers smoking right outside at 3:45am which is not the owners fault but could get annoying with nightly disturbances of yelling, the elevator going up and down and flushing through the exposed pipes.  It was spacious and clean and had soaps and some kitchen items like coffee which was very nice.
Great place to stay , clean fun right down town
Loved the stay! Walkable to everything in downtown Salem and a very clean and quiet apartment. Diana was super responsive and amenable. Highly recommend.
Was a great place to stay!
Gtreat location and set up! Will be back!!

Loved it!
We’ll be back..

My husband and I wanted a place to stay in Salem after dinner out at a local restaurant so we could avoid an hour commute home late at night. This place fit the bill. We found free parking 2 blocks away and could walk to/from the restaurant. It was clean and had everything we needed (can’t speak to the kitchen other than using the coffee maker in the morning).  Some other reviews complain about noise. The apartment is next to the elevator and you can hear it from the apartment but it was not constant and it did not bother me. We would stay here again.

This is the cutest apartment! The location couldn’t get any better. It was so quick getting to many places downtown by foot. The apartment is really roomy and cozy. Loved the big windows. I recommend this stay!

Great place to stay for exploring downtown Salem. We were here for a concert at the Elsinore Theater. Walkable to all the cool places. Neat industrial feel to the place. Very clean. Expect some plumbing noises as pipes are exposed and early morning light coming in the windows. Minor things. Would stay again for sure

Diana's apartment was just what we needed while in Salem for a sports tournament. Time away from the teenagers with easy access to great food, drinks and coffee. We were able to walk everywhere and even when we had to drive everything was close in proximity. I was worried that the apartment would be loud but it wasn't, we slept great on a very comfortable bed without any outside noise. It was the prefect place for my husband and I. I must also say that Diana is amazing, we desperately needed a later checkout, she was allowed us to stay well beyond checkout time. Not to mention one night our daughter had to stay with us, as we traveled over a day earlier, and we were only booked as a 2 person. So friendly, informative, and flexible which we cannot thank her enough for!
Great urban stay.  Apartment is located near great shops and food. Apartment is airy with a unique "New York loft" feel. We only stayed one night but would definitely return again. Thank you.
Great location! Surrounded with many bars and restaurants at walking distance. The apartment itself was very nice and clean, definitely recommend.
Could have been a little cleaner, the fridge door was really bad I felt the need to clean it myself. There was hair everywhere. I’m a light sleeper, you could hear every conversation or car drive by.
It was a cool spot

Before all: Annie is a great host - super friendly and responsive. Since she does not live in town, some independent trouble-shooting is at times required (we encountered a few hiccups during our 3-night stay), but communication was always easy and swift.

The rental is immaculately clean, the beds are wonderful, the single AC/heater (once up and running) easily warms the whole apartment, and the kitchen (although in need of some TLC) provides not only all needed utensils but also spices and lots of cleanly packed (non-perishable) food supplies left behind by previous guests - a very welcome surprise. Parking and access (especially with luggage) are not great (during our stay the two stalls in front of the gate were always occupied by the vehicles of guests in the neighboring unit) but not a serious problem.

For longer stays, Annie's place offers a nice combination of comfort and quiet; for short-term visits, however, the high fixed fees drive the total per-night cost up quite a bit.
Great host and the location made commuting around Salem very easy. Very responsive and easy to communicate with.

Our stay at the Capitol Cabin could not have been better. Heather was a wonderful host. She communicated promptly and clearly and made the whole process very easy.
The house was impeccably clean, set up with top quality amenities and kitchen ware, with fun and interesting mid-century decor throughout to complement the architecture. We really appreciated the thought and care that went into creating this beautiful home. Definitely one of the best (of many) Airbnbs we have been to over the years. Thanks again for everything, Heather!
Super clean place and very cool
Heather’s place is a real gem. A unique house with a beautiful architecture. Everything was thoughtfully arranged and with some great extras, staying here was the highlight of our trip!

This place is an architectural gem. Kick back and enjoy the vinyl sounds of some classics. Get your groove on in this retro house that features the best parts of the 1970's (not the ugly stuff). So cool! Would book again. So many food choices within walking distance. Easy check-in and out. Heather is an actual super host.

Heather‘s Place is like an oasis in a part of the country that has gotten some awful heat The past few years. Her place is spacious, with a beautiful interior, walking distance to just about any need you have and most of all it has central air. Ahhhhhh!

Got a really good deal on this, but despite that, it seemed like an amazing location to stay. Me and my friends crashed here and found everything to be perfect for our uses. Would stay again and would recommend to people!
Heather was very proactive in her communication with us from booking. Adorable house in my hometown.

Beautifully furnished house that was so welcoming. You can tell the amount of care and thought put into every piece, from the pretty wallpaper in the bedroom, to the functional kettle. And the plants around the house gave me so much joy, I want them all! Also, for an Airbnb it is very environmentally thoughtful, and the host has made a big attempt to reduce waste as much as possible.

The home is beautiful with luxury beddings and modern furniture. The kitchen is very well stocked. We rested well and prepared many home cooked meals there. Yes I recommend. Yes I would like to come back and stay longer next time.
Such a beautiful place! We definitely recommend! It was easy to check in and the house is BEAUTIFUL

Really a perfect place to spend our last couple of nights with our daughter before moving her into Willamette! Located in a sweet little neighborhood about 10 min. south of campus, this unique place is one of the coolest airbnbs I’ve stayed in! If you appreciate retro 70s - MCM you need to book this place! From the dishes, to the gorgeous plants everywhere, we loved it all! Heather was super responsive, comfortable beds and bedding. The AC and good coffee beans were an added bonus!
Heather's place was beatiful and well-stocked. Heather was very kind and accommodating and a great communicator!
What a beautiful and unique house. Every part of it has so much thought put in to it, lots of character for sure! We will be back next year!
this place was fun and interesting and Heather was such a great host
Every detail & thought put into this home was amazing. Far exceeded our expectations! very nice neighborhood & Heather was great at staying in touch.

This house was perfect for our small group (2 couples) to stay for the weekend. the house is absolutely stunning with tons of natural light. all appliances and electronics worked well and were easy to figure out. The neighborhood was quiet and within walking distance of a nearby pub & grocery store. So happy we found this place and would go back again!
Great place to stay!

we absolutely loved staying here. What a gem of a place. It was so tastefully done and every little detail was thought through. The abundance of living plants, the well curated books, the focus on sustainable living made it memorable. The coffee and tea selection and the well equipped kitchen was a nice surprise. We would definitely want to come back to this  lovely retreat.

This place is even better in person. Every little detail has been taken care of—design and function all in one. It really was a luxurious stay in a beautiful space! The plants, the furniture, the thoughtful eco-friendly touches, all the coffee-making options… I would move into this house today if I could!
A beautiful, comfortable and stylish place with many eco touches that are super appreciated!!
The pictures do not do it justice. A perfect blend of modern and retro. This place is an experience you do not want to miss.
Our stay was awesome! Heather was very friendly and answered all our questions. The house has loads of character and everything was super clean. 5 stars all around!
This is a really cool mid-century modern home in a quiet neighborhood, and very cozy!
Very nice house and very comfortable

What a perfect place to stay as a parent visiting your Western Oregon University Wolf. Great atmosphere and the kitchen was a perfect place to create a home cooked meal for a kid missing the flavors of home.

If you’re a fan of mid-century and are visiting Salem, OR- book this place! Such a cool experience, great design and vibe. We found the home to be comfortable, extremely clean and welcoming- the size was perfect for my husband and I to feel like we had more than enough room. Heather is a fantastic host and I wouldn’t hesitate to re-book.
Cute details throughout the house. Really nice space.
Heathers place was perfect. We would definitely come back. She is easy to reach. You can tell that she cares about her home. Many small nice touches throughout the house.

This was easily one of the best AirBnB experiences we have ever had.  Heather has thought of every detail to make the home stylish and comfortable.  We loved it and would highly recommend to  other guests!!

A lovely place to stay when visiting Salem.   Perfect place in many ways.  Clean, well stocked, nice to have a washer and dryer.   Very quiet neighborhood surrounded by big trees.  And the record player was a hit!
Alloggio confortevole e ottima posizione
The Capitol Cabin was a great home base for a friend's wedding. In between activities the house provided a cozy and aesthetically pleasing place to rest.

Our trip was all about a family dinner (as my adult children live in Oregon and I live out of state). The kitchen was well equipped and the house was cozy so we could spend quality time together- whether they wanted to or not!  😂
