This place was wonderful! There were so many creative and thoughtful touches that made it a great experience. We enjoyed the nice quiet neighborhood, as well as being close to stores and parks. We will definitely stay here again if we are in the area.
Really cute place to stay in.

Heather's place was the perfect spot to land when my family and I needed to go to Salem for a family emergency. Easy, beautiful, and a good spot to unwind after spending time at the hospital (which was only 10 minutes away). It's also gorgeous, has a well stocked kitchen, and is near a health food store and good Thai food.
This place is beautiful. Heather’s attention to detail makes the house comfortable and cozy.
We had such a rejuvenating stay at Heather’s home. Excellent amenities, comfortable beds, great architecture and interior design, and many books to enjoy. Would definitely stay again!
Loved the mid-century vibe of this home!

There are such wonderful things to be said!  Location was great, cleanliness was great, decor was a great throwback with modern conveniences, kitchen was stocked with everything you could think of, beds were comfortable and the house temperature was perfect!  The house is smaller and more than 4 people would be a little cramped, but very much the houses of that era.  If I had any opportunity to go to Salem again, this place would be at the top of my list to stay!  The host was communicative every step of the way but never intrusive!

Highly recommend and will definitely be back. Heather's place was immaculate and so comfortable. I have very sensitive dust mite allergies and did not react at all the entire duration of my stay - she keeps it sparkling clean, even below the surface. She was a great communicator and did her best to be flexible with me during a recent winter storm. 10/10!
super nice and very quick responses. the house it incredible and totally worth the stay! 100/100

We absolutely loved the vibe at Heather's place..soo fun and had all the amenities we could have wanted. She was quick to communicate if we needed anything. Just such an awesome.. fun place to stay. Thanks!
Heather's like it quite nice. Well appointed and very clean. My stay was very short so I wasn't able to really enjoy it. But certainly a nice place in Salem.
My stay went smoothly. Thanks!
Mark is a great host! He is accomodating and provides clean towels and linens and always offers to share meals. He allows use of the kitchen and laundry which is awesome!
Mark was great and very kind and generous. Kind guy in a fun city!
I was looking for a place to touch base while I was in town. Perfect for just that.
I think the room was fairly priced and located in a good spot in Salem for easy access to food and stores.

A good accomdation for a single person looking for simple, no-frills room. In room microwave and mini-frige adds great convenience. My concern is that the description of this not quite accurate. The place advertises for a private bathroom and room air-conditioning which are both not true. I had to share bathroom with someone else and the room has no air-conditioning. Also, the room cannot lock from inside, which could be a concern as well.
Good place to stay when there are limited options and price is cheap. But be aware the host might not ever respond back to your messages.
Easy check-in, check out.  Nice to have off-street parking in the driveway.  Comfortable bed, clean room and bathroom, quiet - basic AirBnB.  Mark a friendly host.
Mark was a good host. Communicated well, and room was comfortable.

We were looking for a place to stay near downtown Salem, being close to the city was crucial as we were racing the Salem Ironman 70.3 race and this place was super convenient to the riverfront park. She was so welcoming and went above and beyond for anything we needed. The room had everything you needed and more, mini fridge stocked with water and yogurt, microwave, coffee maker, king size bed, beautiful bathroom, communal living room, kitchen, and washer dryer. This place had everything and more that we needed. We enjoyed it much more than a hotel.

Definitely recommend staying here if you are looking to visit Downtown Salem and want a nice clean and quiet place to stay. We look forward to coming back!

Huge thanks to Viviane who was there for every step of the check in process and had the cleanest house! The pictures on the Airbnb post and where I stayed were inaccurate due to remodels going on. The amenities were still fabulous and I loved having a granola bar and oatmeal in the bedroom so I didn’t have to go out for food when I woke up!! So thoughtful.
Viviane’s home was gorgeous. Wonderful hospitality, comfortable and beautiful accommodations, and great location. Couldn’t ask for better!

Great place to stay. Chris is great to stay with and does whatever she can to accommodate to your needs.
Great location with everything within a 10 minute drive
Clean space at good value!

Viviane’s house is modern minimalist on the inside. The space is very clean and my room was very calming. There is a massage chair in the room that I got to enjoy after a long day! Viviane is so sweet and is continuing to upgrade the house as well as the backyard! Would have stayed longer if I could. Great place to stay while in Salem.

Chris Viviane's home is exactly as described. I appreciate that this is a host that lives onsite. It made for a personable stay. Chris Viviane takes pride in offering an airbnb stay, and the art of hospitality. It is clear that cleanliness is highly valued too.
Amazing host. Cant say enough about my stay. Accompanied all my needs.
I have stayed here a few times now and have already booked again. Viviane is the best host and her Airbnb is by far my favorite to stay at.
Absolutely adorable 🥰

Viviane is a GREAT host. When I walked in she said “welcome home” .  The house is always clean and she provides you with everything you need. She basically has it set up like a hotel room for her guest. The price is really good for what you get. You have your own microwave, t.v., and fridge. She does allow you to use her kitchen and Fridge. She only ask for you to clean after yourself. Overall great place
Beautiful place to stay with many amenities. Viviane was also very communicative.
Second stay with her and it keeps getting better. Great host and amazing room)
I loved my stay…it’s a great location and Viviane is a thoughtful host with an immaculate and well-equipped place!!
This property is clean, secure. Host has great hospitality.
Everything was wonderful! Accommodations were cozy, clean, and accurate. I enjoyed my stay very much!
The perfect stay! Clean, quiet, and comfortable!

I loved my stay! The room has conveniences like a mini fridge, microwave, hangers for your clothes, towels and blankets. It was clean and bright. The bed was comfy and the neighborhood and house were quiet. The host was lovely too!
Great room to stay and wonderful host!
I really enjoyed my stay and I look forward to my next one. The place was clean and restful.
awesome place to stay. I felt like I was home.

Loved my stay in this cute, clean, quiet house. I normally just need a place to crash overnight on business trips and this house met all my needs, with a mini-fridge and microwave in the room. It really calms me to sleep under a ceiling fan so I was thrilled by that little extra. The short time there was so nice I am staying again next weekend when I come back through the area.

This stay was just as nice as the last time. I enjoy sleeping under a ceiling fan so chose to come stay again. Communication and ease was just as excellent - quick quiet stay was just what I was looking for. Will definitely keep this house in mind if I have to return to the area again.

My stay was great, i felt safe in the house and environment was quiet.  House is very clean, close to many  places I wanted to go. Viviane has warm heart, very welcoming..she communicates well. The house has easy access. I like that i park my car in the driveway👌.
Great host, great quiet neighborhood

For my surprise what you see at the pictures is what you indeed find at Miss Viviane Home; I was well received, and She is the Person who can teach you more that you could expect. Excellent Host. Clean, neat and peaceful place; and even though I was there in winter time, her House gives you an excellent base to move around and visit the Town.
I had a good sleep both days at Viviane's place. It was very quiet and clean right there. Nice house and the bathroom very clean.
The stay at Viviane’s was better than I expected! Safe area and the room was clean. She went above and beyond and had waters and snacks in the room which I really appreciated!!
Great place to stay. Vivian was an amazing host
Quite a comfortable home, newly renovated kitchen and this home is quite a stay! Nice view through the back slider, and very kind!
Friendly and beautiful home
Viviane's place was perfect!! I enjoyed my stay. I wish I would have found her place sooner as I'm locked in a contract somewhere else.  She made me feel right at home. I will definitely be back!!
Lovely stay! I would highly recommend this place. It’s quiet, very nice and Viviane is a lovely host 👏
It felt like home. I could come home from work and sleep peacefully.
I would definitely recommend. Quiet neighbor, peaceful stay. Clean environment very close to downtown.
Very clean
Vivian is super nice great host super clean rooms beautiful house
Awesome location and very serene. Gracious host.
Viviane is a wonderful host. Thanks so much for the great stay!
Clean quite and comfortable, great place to stay

Great place to stay in a wonderful neighborhood! Viviane is a wonderful hostess. The place is clean. Bed and pillows were comfortable. Love that there’s a fridge/freezer, microwave and even snacks in there! Very comfortable stay. I look forward to staying there again.
Another great stay - easy in and out.  Clean and quiet. There's a reason I love to stay here when I am passing through.

Viviane was a lifesaver for me and was able to offer me a room very last minute. The room and house were pristine and super comfortable. I chatted with Viviane a little as well and she was welcoming and very friendly. I recommend this place to anyone wanting to find a good deal in a very peaceful home!

Viviane and her son were amenable hosts! Her son answered any questions and let us put our drinks in the kitchen fridge. Mini fridge had some water which was refreshing after long travels and snacks for the morning! House is warm and tastefully decorated and same with the room. The room has a TV, armchair to the left of the bed, and a nightstand to the right. Closet has clothes hangars as well for longer stays.

10/10 would recommend and will be back soon!
Great comfortable beds. Very affordable

I loved staying here! Great room with everything I needed, the massage chair is awesome! Got some hot chocolate in the morning too! Couldn't wish for a better spent night. Thank you for having me over!😊
Thank you!
I had a great stay at Viviane’s place. I was able to sleep well and comfortable and get ready for work next day. I recommend her place 100%.

An amazing place, just as described and depicted in photos. Spotless, quiet, in a beautiful neighborhood. Viviane provided many amenities, including a snack bar and mini fridge in my room, and she was very responsive to all of my communication. I had everything I needed and I would not hesitate to stay here again!

This was my first time to use Airbnb .but Chris Viviane place My stay  their was Fabulous with short time booking , she welcomed me with big smile &what surprised me is to find everything in room as if I was at home , her home is good place to relax especially after long trip .I will definitely be back and I will tell everyone I know about it! The location is great in quiet neighborhood The room was so clean &organized excellent! Easy and great communication. Thanks again.

I only stayed one night for a quick business trip but it was great and I would definitely book again when in the area.  House was in a super nice, very beautiful area and it was quiet as well. The host was very attentive to my messages and made things really easy to check in & out. I arrived at the place and it was very clean and comfortable it had everything I needed for the night! Thank you so much for being flexible with my arrangements at such last minute  and making me feel at home, I appreciate it.

I would like to say that I forgot to ask the host how to check in, but surprisingly by the time I reached the door Chris Viviane had already prepared my check in automatically. Simply excellent. If you’re looking for that something special in a glorious quiet location. I loved it .
Closer to a lot of exciting places. Great location

Had an amazing experience with Viviane! I was in town for the Ironman 70.3 Oregon race. Her home is located in a beautifully manicured neighborhood 5 minutes from downtown Salem!  It has a gorgeous recently renovated kitchen, a large main sitting room overlooking the beautiful garden and the backyard. The house had full laundry service and a She is such a kind, hard-working hostess who had snacks, waters, a mini fridge and a microwave in my room. She even had fresh fruits, oatmeal, yogurt and bananas for us. The bathroom was stocked with soft towels and the bed was so comfortable and felt like I was sleeping on a cloud. I won’t hesitate to book again with her. Thank you Viviane again for everything!
Chris is a wonderful host who has done wonders remodeling this house.
Very clean, quiet and extra comfortable! Really was over the top. Host was very friendly and helpful! Very relaxing and very convenient location . I would recommend this place to anyone!

Place was spotless and Viviane was super nice and amazing host.  Neighborhood around the house is super quite and a great place to stay.  When I’m back in town for work,  I’ll be lining up the room again for sure.

Such a clean and bright place to stay! Also, the bedroom & private bathroom setup are AMAZING. This is a super nice price point for what it all entails. Also, plenty of street parking! Vivianne is SUPER SWEET and extremely accommodating and welcoming. I highly reccomend this place!

The room was more than you can ask for. It was clean and comfortable. Chris was very thoughtful with all the amenities in the room. The stay was very pleasant and would def recommend this over any hotel.
Very very beautiful space and home. It has everything you need for your comfort. Fifty minutes from Portland and over an hour from Eugene. I would stay here again if I am in the area.
Viviane was very kind and accommodating. One of the nicest Airbnb rooms I’ve ever stayed in! I’ve already booked with her again.

The room is beautiful! My husband and I just love the refrigerator, microwave and coffee pot that Viviene thoughtfully placed in our private room! The master bathroom is super clean, well lite and has a magical bathtub…just perfect after a busy long day of hiking!!!
I would definitely return and recommend Viviene’s place to my family and friends!
This was my second stay with Viviane and I’ve already booked another stay with her!

This is a great place to stay. The host is so kind and makes you feel at home. It is a very quiet neighborhood and feels very safe. I would highly recommend this Airbnb for your future stay in Salem, OR.
The room was amazing! The adjoining bathroom was incredible. Viviane was very attentive to my needs and did all she could to make my stay was an enjoyable one.

The house is in a quiet neighborhood, plenty of street parking since it's a corner lot. I work night shift so I have to sleep during the day. Master bedroom was clean, bathroom was clean, bed was so comfy. I like how there was a mini fridge and microwave in the room. Very convenient. Viviane was very welcoming. Quick response to text messages. I didn't take advantage of the kitchen but maybe next time when I'm back for another assignment. I enjoyed sitting in the back patio when the sun was out, drinking my morning coffee when I'm not working. Easy check-in and check-out. Her home was my home away from home on assignment. Thank you!
Great host

Everything was great! Definitely a little further away from interstate five and I anticipated. However, the neighborhood is peaceful. It’s a house that has a total of three rooms that are rented out through Airbnb. The shared bathroom is all the way on the other side of the house. So you have to go through the living room or kitchen to get to it. That wasn’t a big deal. The Only thing I struggled with was the strong laundry perfume scent of the sheets. The smell of them was so strong that it actually woke me up a few times Throughout the night.
Great host, safe neighborhood

This is my second stay at Viviene’s and I’ll say of the bat that I will return! She is a fantastic hostess. Her home is super clean and the neighborhood is  safe. Needless to say…I had a great stay!!!!
Great stay, clean and very comfortable
Worth every penny

This is like my third time staying a Chris place. I love staying there it’s like home away from home. The rooms have everything you need and it’s always quiet. I’ll most likely book again when i’m in Salem
the most comfortable stay.  quiet clean and private.  host was friendly. definitely will be my #1 choice of salem
I always enjoy my stay here
LOVED the bathroom! Tub was such a great escape from it all. Comfortable space, quiet homey space. Would definitely recommend and would definitely consider a return visit.
I always enjoy my stay here. I have been here multiple times. Very affordable and clean

Viviane was very communicative. The house was clean and quiet. There were small touches that made a big impact such as snacks, water bottles and toiletries. I would definitely stay with Viviane again.
Very nice outside area.  The apartment is well equipped and perfect for a monthly stay.

Really great cozy place.. SUPER clean !!! Sort of a funky place with character. The yard and the garden on the creek and the patio, were amazing !!!  Spent so much time outside and cooking on the grill. We were there for an Ironman race and the location was great, maybe only a mile to downtown.. Hope to stay here again next year for the same race again
Great place and an even more amazing owner! Very welcoming and helped with everything we needed
Home as described.  Cute home.  just what needed for a night.  only complaint was we can hear the upstairs renters when they walked around.  Other than that, we enjoyed our stay.

The Koi Condo is stylish & charming with personal touches and unexpected amenities like snacks, hot chocolate, cotton balls, & makeup removal pads. The backyard is an enchanting & idyllic oasis, including a visiting tuxedo kitty and bistro lights at night. The photos & posting are accurate except for a couple delightful additions like a fire pit with cute Adirondack chairs and a microwave. Communication from the host was clear and thorough. Keep in mind, it is a BASEMENT unit next to a creek with all that entails: low ceiling, uneven flooring, a surprisingly loud sump pump in the bathroom, a toilet requiring single ply toilet paper, exposed plumbing in the laundry room, and the occasional insect. The bedroom is very cozy, as pictured, with comfy linens and no windows. The occasional footsteps from upstairs could be heard. The sofa converts into a small twin sized bed. Even with these small inconveniences, we enjoyed our stay. P.S. Sybil's down the block is great for breakfast, especially during their 40th Anniversary celebration with 1980's pricing.

it is a lovely downstairs apartment with all the amenities one could ask for. we really enjoyed our stay. the owner is very considerate, friendly and easy going. we had absolutely no problems and would definitely stay again.

My husband and I stayed in this adorable airbnb for over a month, and it was such a wonderful place. The small touches (like snacks and toiletries) and the super responsive host really made the stay amazing. The view from the window is truly incredible.

It's worth noting that the noise-level from upstairs dramatically depends on the guests staying there. We were there awhile, so several guests came and went. Sometimes we barely heard them, other times it was super noticeable. Obviously, the host has no control over this - it's just something worth knowing.

The kitchen sink is also super teeny, but we were able to make it work even though we cooked 95% of our meals at the airbnb (just be super patient ;)).

Also, word to the wise, be suuuuper careful stepping out of the shower. It's much higher off the ground than it seems.

Definitely recommend this airbnb and host if you're in and around Salem.

Our stay was honestly perfect! A friend and i were in town for a wedding and we loved the feeling of coming back to a cozy spot! Also loved all the amenities they had, this place was so well equipped! Overall, a great stay!
This is a relaxing, cute little space. It was perfect for me during my work trip. Spend some time in the hammock watching the squirrels above you in the trees - you’ll be glad you did!
Nice place.  Good value
The place is cutely decorated, but it was very closterphobic. There is no window in the bedroom, and many locked entrences that made me feel unsafe. We also encountered many spiders.
Jolie was very nice and her hospitality is amazing!

Great cozy spot with a fun vibe and unique river view! Kitchen is dialed in and has everything you could think of, situated in a fun corner with plenty of great places to grub nearby within walking distance in case you didn't plan on cooking.

Amazing location and back yard.  Just a few minutes from Willamette University.  Funky basement apartment with ample room.  Nice amenities.  Upstairs neighbors were pretty loud, but turning on the box fan helped a lot with noise level.  Sump pump is super loud, don’t be startled when you flush (or shower)!   Looking forward to staying again.
Jolie's place was cute and relaxing. The backyard was so lovely and a beautiful space to hang out. Jolie was also extremely responsive to any and all questions I had during my stay!
We loved everything the place. It felt right at home, very cozy like described. We would be coming here again for sure.
super quiet area, beautiful refinished home and private location. Highly recommend!

Perfect self-contained stay for work. Unit had everything I needed, laundry room was shared and coin operated but machines worked great. The standout was the host. Victoria was extremely accommodating and responded right away to any messages. She also went a step beyond and mailed some affairs back to me that I had absent-mindedly left behind. If I'm ever down in Salem for an extended stay again, she'll be my first call.
Great communication, great host! lovely  room that has everything you need.

This is a lovely accommodation! Jillian’s description of the home and the amenities is quite accurate.

Exceptionally clean home.

Kitchen was well stocked (we did cook dinner and had everything we needed) and there were thoughtful touches such as spices, sweeteners, coffee and tea; appliances are all new and the double oven is great (used it!). Living room area is comfy and has a large TV; dining area will seat six comfortably. Bedrooms and bathrooms were lovely; plenty of towels and again nice touches such as quality soap, room spray, Q-tips and cotton rounds. Do note that the primary suite bathroom is open to the rest of the room (as noted in the listing) so there is no door to close that off from the rest of the room.

The home is on a fairly well-traveled street (also noted in the listing) but it didn’t bother us at all and it’s great to be just minutes from a great grocery store, Dutch Bros, plenty of other food options etc. We utilized street parking right in front of the home but there is back parking too if preferred. A/C worked well, all lighting was good, and I really appreciated bedside tables with built in USB ports and extra AC plugs.

All in all: Jillian has done a lovely job as a host and we would stay here again any time and would recommend to others as well! Thank you!

Jillian’s house is well appointed. She pays attention to all the small details. USB ports in the nitestands, lots of blankets and pillows, towels and washcloths.
I was somewhat apprehensive about the street parking but it was not an issue I felt my car was perfectly safe. The owner does live in the property but wasn’t intrusive at all. You can see her play with her pup in the yard which as endearing since I always miss my own dog when I travel. Would definitely recommend and stay here again!

Jillian was a great host. She communicated well, and met all expectations. I even forgot a couple important items, and she messaged me right away to let me know.
The house is beautiful. She has done a lovely job of decorating. Everything was well thought out and extremely organized! She has labels to help you find your way around the home. There were several convenient items which made our stay very smooth!
Very comfortable quiet neighborhood Very convenient places to eat
Nice house, has everything you need.

I loved the organization, and feel of this home. I didn’t have to “figure out” where anything was. That shows a lot of effort a detail.
It was like I’ve been there before.

Jillian was a great host with great choice in family games!
Great communication
Jillian was a wonderful host!  She did a great job decorating the house, and it had everything we needed.  We appreciated how well and quickly she communicated as well!  Our stay was wonderful!
La casa esta super bonita y muy acogedora la recomiendo 100%

The stay wasn’t perfect but Jillian was! She is a great communicator and wonderful host. Her house is super clean and the layout is awesome. Very spacious bedrooms with comfortable beds and cozy bedding. The kitchen had everything we need to cook meals and even had a lovely little coffee bar. This is a gem of a listing in West Salem, you won’t be disappointed!
It was a perfect place for my family to stay at during their Thanksgiving visit.   I would totally use this place again!

Our 5 night stay at Jillian's home was perfect.   She has setup a very nice home with everything in cabinets clearly labeled, light switches labeled.   The home is remodeled nicely, very well done.   Comfortable, and good value for our stay.    We had no complaints at all.    We'll very likely stay here again when we visit family in West Salem again next year.

Jillian is an excellent host. Her place has everything you need for a comfortable stay in Salem. It is quite lovely inside, and her taste is superb. She goes beyond in providing every kitchen and housekeeping item that you could ever need. (The only things missing are washer/dryer, and this is disclosed in the listing.) I had to work while I was in town, and she has two excellent dedicated work spaces available. I highly recommend her place.

We had a wonderful Christmas celebration here for our family who traveled from three different states. Jillian was proactive with weather warnings and offered a free night if we were able to travel early and avoid the freezing rain. Her beautiful place represents her caring demeanor with high quality snacks and coffee/ tea options. She even set up a real Christmas tree to complete our celebration.

The place in West Salem was ideal for us to visit our local family members and easy to find. Great location with hilly streets to get a good walk or run. Kitchen is well stocked with everything I needed to make meals. Bedrooms are roomy with bedding options for all sleep preferences.
Our stay was perfectly fine. The coffee bar was great.

Great home, wonderful accommodations!  Jillian thought of everything that someone might need. Home was clean, easy to find with plenty of parking. Location was perfect for our needs in West Salem. Our family settled in and enjoyed playing games (that are provided) and spending time together. Definitely would recommend this place and Jillian as a host!
This was a perfect getaway spot. Amazing home. Thank you.

Jillian‘s place was lovely, spacious and most importantly comfortable. My issue with many airbnbs is that the living room furniture isn’t comfortable. Also, her attention to giving you a healthful stay is reflected in her choice of soaps, organic treats, spices, coffees… We look forward to coming back.
If I could give a hundred stars, I would. We have stayed at many airbnbs, and this one is exemplary!  So much care has been taken to ensure comfort.

Beautiful place with lots of extras.  We loved the snacks and games available.  Definitely would stay again when visiting Salem.  Only downfall was the beds weren’t the most comfortable.  Thank you for a great stay!
Great place
I highly recommend staying here! it's spacious and exactly as described. More than enough room for our family of four
Super clean, comfy, wonderful stay!
Beautiful home with lots of space and everything needed for a relaxing stay.

Jillian's place was very comfortable and clean. The special touches were awesome. I was visiting for a business trip, and having coffee and a bowl of oatmeal in the morning was a real treat. The neighborhood is busy, but once inside, the place is peaceful, and private. The jetted tub was a real delight! She also has some really nice artistic decor. Over all, great value, responsive host, and very pleased. Thanks Jillian!

We had an amazing stay at Jillian’s place! Exactly as described. It was well cleaned upon arrival. Jillian was very communicative throughout the entire time from booking-checking out. It was a nice central stay for us while exploring around Oregon.
There is plenty of storage if you have an extended stay. Kitchen had all utensils, cookware you could think to use. As well as a few different coffee options, tea, and common spices.
We all felt this was a great deal and we would definitely stay again, and recommend to others!

Of note: the mattresses are all pretty firm/hard. We didn’t mind, but just to be aware.
great stay!
Great value! And comfy bed

The home was clean and the kitchen was very well stocked.  She even had a snack when we arrived and popcorn for the air popper!  Everything was clean and well labeled.  There was some road noise, but the sound machines were helpful.  Thank you!

Such a cute house! Perfect for families. The second and third bedrooms are in a separated part of the house that share a bathroom. All the kitchen drawers and cabinets are labeled - no hunting for supplies. Comfy stay and would highly recommend.
My wife I and our kids enjoyed this amazing place would stay here again
Jillian is an excellent host. And I will always look for her listing when in the area. Amazing shower.
I stayed only one night for business but I’ll definitely be back. Yvonne’s house and room was spotless, quiet and located in a nice neighborhood. Highly recommended!
She a super host!
Extremely comfortable!! Perfect place to rest up to continue my adventure!

Yvonne's rental was a one night stop on a long road trip and it's exactly what I needed. It was so quiet in the neighborhood and the frog sounds at night were such a welcome change from the noisy city I live in. The bed was comfy and the room was so dark at night I could sleep soundly. The home is large and well decorated and I had access to all the amenities to recharge. Parking is easy and I felt safe as a solo traveller in the neighborhood. This is a great value and I hope to make Yvonne's place a stop whenever I am in Salem.

Yvonne and her family were so warm and welcoming.  The house was secure,safe and beautifully decorated.  I felt really at home in my little room.  Since I was working nights the curtains were dark enough and the other residents were quiet enough to make for good daytime sleep.  Would 10/10 stay again!
Perfect stay. The home/room is very nice and clean. Would come here again!
Couldn’t have asked for a better stay. Great price, clean house, kind hosts. If I could stay here again I would!

This is an amazing place to stay in NW Salem. Place is very clean and Yvonne kept the bathrooms and ktchen stocked. Very modern kitchen and furniture. Very quiet, room was very comfortable. I definitely recommend it and plan to comwe back.
Wonderful host, super clean and quiet space. Great night sleep!
Yvonne's home is the perfect place for a traveler. The space is well taken care of and I felt very comfortable so it was easy to rest between shifts!
Very clean house and room! The host was very friendly and expressed sincerity! Highly recommend!
It was a nice stay. However, I was here only for sleeping. I did not use the kitchen or the living room. At a first glance, however, everything looked fine. The room was nice and comfortable.
I do recommend Yvonne's place. Most of the other people are long-term guests so they take great care of the place! she was available to answer any questions or help.
Easy and simple. Nice views and quiet part of town neighboring a wildlife refuge. Clean and considerate.
Excellent location for what I was looking for. Clean and comfortable space.

Yvonne’s home is beautiful and although she doesn’t live in the house (it’s only for people using Airbnb), she is truly great about quickly answering questions. The place is lovely and very comfortable !
This home was so clean, beautifully decorated and cozy. The hosts are easy to talk to and accommodating. The home is located in a nice area and close to everything. Highly recommended!
Beautiful home.  Friendly host.  I appreciated having such a quiet place to stay and relax after work.
Clean and comfortable!! Highly recommend
The room was comfortable and it was a nice neighborhood! I felt very safe. Would definitely stay here again!

Yvonne is a wonderful host.

I can only hope she will have an opening when I make my next trip.

If you are considering a stay, this is the place!

Yvonne rents several rooms out in a nice house that is fully equipped. The other tenants were very respectful and one gal was down for the same triathlon race that I was so it was nice meeting her. There is a backyard with some chairs where you can read which is quite nice.
Wonderful peaceful place to stay! Thank you again Yvonne!

Absolutely loved staying here! Room and entire house was immaculate, and in a nice area that felt very safe. Comfy bed and clean, bright bathroom. Fast, accurate communication. Would definitely stay here again!
Terrific stay as always! Other guests very respectful as well!
The best place during my trip so far! Cheap but super clean! People are nice there!
Very clean, beautiful place to stay. This home is SO comfortable! Hosts were attentive to all needs and excellent with communication.
2nd time staying here and the stay was perfect. Will continue to book with Yvonne!
Quiet. Easy. Quick access to Willamette university and Salem downtown. Easy walk to the pasture park.

This spacious apartment in downtown Salem is a perfect place to stay long-term.  I stayed in the two bedroom apartment on the second floor, both which have large windows that provide lots of natural light. The furnishings are new, attractive and comfortable.  Some great features of the apartment are a full-size washer/dryer, a very well appointed kitchen, and two attached private decks for outside seating.  Of course, one of the best things about this apartment is the location.  It is right in the middle of downtown Salem, close to restaurants and coffee places, shopping, the convention center and one block away from miles of walking trails along the Willamette River and Minto Island Park.  Within a half a block is an excellent coffee shop called Isaac's that features great coffee drinks and the best cinnamon rolls I have ever had!  I highly recommend this apartment.

The condo is very nice inside, clean, and well equipped. the location of very convenient to downtown Salem, but it is on a narrow and there is no view except for the alley.

Angela was very accommodating and made sure everything went smoothly. I would definitely stay here again.
Wonderful location!  The space was clean and quiet.  I would stay here again if I am ever in Salem.
Check in was smooth and was in a nice neighborhood. Absolutely love the sauna!
Great place to stay, quiet and near downtown. Love the sauna!
The decorating is on point.  The check in process was flexible and very "turn key". I had a very nice stay at Cindy's Nook.
great stay
This is a very comfortable place - cushy carpet, nice bed, extremely quiet and peaceful. The host was friendly and quick to respond to questions. I’d definitely stay again.
Nice location in Salem off of Commercial.  Quiet downstairs area going through the garage.

The location was great, the unit was clean, and the sauna was a bonus. However, it's awkward when so many of the promised appointments (the heater, the WiFi, and the television) don't work and you have to address them with the property manager, as well as AirBnB.

Initially, the property manager came over around 6pm on Friday and we tried to get things working. We were unsuccessful in fixing the problems. No service workers were available to fix the heater, and I was promised a space heater the next day, and they would also attempt to fix the internet.

The property manager delivered the space heater the next day. I was away from the unit and simply asked them to leave the heater in a safe place outside my door and that I'd bring it inside when I got back to the unit at 6pm that evening.

They sent me a note via AirBnB messaging stating they were troubled that I wouldn't give them access to my unit, and that they thought it was strange. I messaged them that I didn't know, nor did they tell me, that they needed access. I called them trying to get clarification and they became angry telling me that they'd bent over backwards for me, and that it's been extremely inconvenient for them trying to fix these things, and I should have let them in the unit when I wasn't there.

They made me feel that these problems were mine and that I should just deal with it. I checked out at 9am on Sunday morning. The bad energy from this experience really tainted my entire weekend. A more understanding attitude by the property manager would have done so much to make this better.
It's a lovely place to stay. Everything you could want, including sauna (!), and the cheerful yellow door welcomes you in!

We came out for a family emergency and the hotels in the area were sold out or costly during the weekend we were arriving so we decided on Cindy’s nook.  This feels like a little cottage away, but close to restaurants and stores.  Prefect for the two of us and what we needed.  Angela was a great host, very responsive.  The kitchenette worked perfectly for us, as we weren’t cooking meals.   It was so comfortable and cozy, much better then a hotel so we canceled our hotel room and extended our stay.

Don’t pass this up.
Super cute, well decorated and a great location in a nice neighborhood.
Prior to checking in Angela sent a video showing how to use the keyless entry which was brilliant and super helpful.

This is my 2nd time staying here.
I’ll book again anytime I’m in the area.

This space is super cozy and immediately feels like your own little space. It is basically a finished basement, with a private entryway through the garage. It has a small window so there is opportunity for sunlight if you want it. My stays felt really private and quiet. There’s a little fireplace that keeps the place warm and the floor is carpeted which feels really nice. If there were people staying upstairs during my stay, I never heard a sound. It’s right off a main St. where a lot of grocery shops and restaurants are and probably about 5/6 mins from the hospital. Unsure of airport but I would recommend a car.
This place is most appropriate for singles, couples and for families with small infants who cannot crawl around and make messes and get into things yet (unsure if kids allowed though)
The host is very clear with instructions, I was sent a step by step video and they personalize the key pad code just for you so it will be difficult to forget.
I Would 100% recommend to others
perfect for my visit
Good stay

This was a wonderful space. Just as an FYI, the ceiling was a bit short in parts for my 6'8" spouse, but he was able to stand up fully in most of the space. Our one disappointment was that the sauna did not appear to be working at the time of our visit, but otherwise, the space was clean, comfortable, centrally located, and in a quiet neighborhood.
Check in was very easy. Location and parking were great. Place was clean and quiet. I would definitely stay again!
Alisa and her husband are wonderful, caring and considerate hosts.  She was very helpful in many ways, and the whole yard was an amazing garden.
Alisa and her husband are wonderful, caring and considerate.  The room is comfortable, and the yard is an amazing garden paradise.
Stay was very comfortable and simple, nothing fancy. close to all services and any functions you might need
Great for a short term or long term stay, would definitely stay again.
Finding one night stay is rare.  The place is very nice and clean. Thank you.

Alisa was an amazing host. Check in was smooth and my stay was very comfortable. Grapes are grown on the property and the hosts did not hesitate to share constantly. I would love to stay here again. The location is perfect.

I call this place the House of Lost Men. It's three small rooms in a row, the owner doesn't live there, though there are two cats. Fortunately the other two guys were quiet: one loud person could make this place not-so-great. The owner Elisa communicated well, and fast, and checked in on the place a couple/few times a day. Good location in West Salem: near Safeway, and restaurants, and a nice cafe to hang out in, and pretty quick drive into downtown Salem, and/or heading north or south on 99. The room is small: the bed takes up most of the space. The bed was lumpy and sagged at the one corner, so I felt like I was sleeping with my head below my feet sometimes. it's also squeaky: I felt bad for the other two guys staying there every time I had to get in or out of bed. The room on the end also had a super loud squeaky door. I had my own bathroom across the hall, which was nice. No outside lock on the door: I could lock it when I was in, but when I left it remained unlocked. The kitchen had everything, and I hardly saw the other two guys. This felt more like a european hostel room rather than, say, a bedroom.  I don't know, I'm kind of new at this. The room was smaller than I expected. Elisa and her son were nice. Airbnd seems to think and 'ok' rating is a bad thing, but...it was ok.
The place is so clean and well equipped! It is private and comfortable. The host is very nice and stayed up for me to show me around even when I arrived at 2am in the middle of the night!

Alisa and her family were great. The place was lovely and super convenient with a grocery, Cafe, and restaurants/bars, gas station, auto mechanic, massage place, book store, and all kinds of stuff within walking distance. Super convenient for bus routes, and close to downtown, right off the highway.
Was very comfortable and welcoming.
Lovely space, with cool art adorning all the walls. Diana was quick to respond to all my questions and was an accommodating host. The location is superb - I could walk everywhere I needed to go.

First of all this is such an amazing place to stay, the whole room is bigger than the pictures show! It was really clean, had even a pitch filter! Super easy to access did not had any issue at all. I loved this place a lot, it’s super near to the park where the river is and you can walk everywhere. People is so friendly! Diana was very polite even when my bf forgot some shoes I got him for his birthday. She let me go and take them after we check out. I recommend you to get pizza from the place down the apartment, it’s so delicious! Love this place and will definitely book it again when I come back to salem. Thank you Diana!

We were in Salem for four nights. The studio apartment was perfect for what we needed. The location is fantastic. In the heart of old downtown, within walking distance of a dozen great restaurants. An easy drive to the coast or hundreds of wineries. We will definitely stay here again.
Unique and fun stay. Great host, great experience!
What a blast! You cannot beat the location or amenities. Rooftop patio, record player, high ceilings, endless coffee, cozy atmosphere - and all in the center of downtown Salem.
This is such a cool spot! Felt like a museum.

This studio was perfect for my solo trip to Salem. Check-in was very easy, the studio is in a great location, yet in a very quiet building. You're walking distance to fabulous restaurants and shops, and there is free 3-hour street parking, making it easy to explore the area by car if you wish. I would definitely stay here again!
Well-located studio that was clean and full of character.
wonderful place and quick communication, thank you so much!
Great location in downtown Salem. Interesting space. Well kept. Diana was very responsive to a very last minute request.

Loved the space and location!  Walking distance to the Elsinore theater and right in the historical area.  Very comfortable bed and cushy couch.  Clean and quite a bit of room actually.  Lots of good places to eat and drink close by.
We loved the decorations! Very comfortable and hip spot with great food near by. We loved getting takeout and eating it on the roof! Lovely!
Diana was very helpful. The apartment was in a great location and very comfortable!
A fun, comfortable, and clean studio in the heart of downtown. We were able to walk to dinner, and over to a nearby park to watch the sunset. Would definitely return!
Ubicación, accesibilidad, todo el apartamento de forma general muy recomendado

Our stay was so easy and comfortable. It was so quiet even though we were in the city which offered us so many options for restaurants etc. Enjoyed using the rooftop on a warm summer night which was great. Directions were perfect too.
This location was so fun and the apartment was really clean and well decorated! The host was very communicative and helpful!

Would recommend this place unreservedly. Great proximity to everywhere I needed to be in downtown Salem, comfortable couch and sleep area, great workspace, and amazing rooftop access. And Diana is such an accommodating and kind host.
Enjoyed my stay at Diana’s studio. The bed was very comfortable and decor was fun and lively. Great location downtown Salem.
The place was great.  Check in was easy and the building itself is located right downtown.  Everything that you would need is in walking distance.  Great stay!

Right downtown, easy walking to everything. Place was clean and simple. No immediate outside windows, so if you are claustrophobic, might not be right for you. I didn't have an issue with that. I would stay here again. The parking is a little odd, there is a garage nearby that you can park overnight.

Such a cute little spot! Was perfect for us as a couple. Check in was super easy, and we got parking right out front. Kitchen and bathroom were very clean and stocked with everything that was needed. Living room/sleeping area was super cozy and love the plants and designs. Location was exactly what we needed. 5 minute walk to Elisnore Theater, lots of walkable restaurants, and they also had a bar downstairs open late that served food. The host was responsive, friendly, and gave clear instructions. Would absolutely recommend if you need a quaint room in this location.

The place was great, just a few suggestions. The heating remote must be within 10 feet of the wall unit. It took us a while to figure this out because the remote holder is near the door and we kept attempting to make it work from there or from the bed-both which are too far away from the unit.
Also a reading light or lamp next to the bed would be fabulous. Reading in bed with the over head lights wasn’t the greatest.
Otherwise the place is great. Love the location and the treats!
I will stay here again! My stay was quiet and perfect for my needs.
It was very comfortable and the host communicates very well!
Great private studio with nice little touches. The host is helpful and quick to communicate. I especially liked the location near lots of restaurants and shops.  Just 1 night, nice stay.
Great stay
Very nice place. Would stay there again.

Diana's place was absolutely perfect for what I needed! Walking distance from the Convention Center, close to a lot of great restaurant options, easy to find, and super cute and comfortable. I parked my car at the Chemeketa Parkade just around the corner and experienced no issues whatsoever. Highly recommend! Thank you, Diana :)
Had a great time. Thanks for hosting us.
Perfect place for a stay in Salem. Right downtown and close to lots of restaurants and shops. Would definitely stay again. Very clean and nicely decorated! Thank you.
Great location! Lots of places to go to nearby.
Great location around shops, restaurants & groceries.  Apartment decor was cool and well laid out & very secure.  Both beds weee very comfy. Would stay again!
The home was very comfortable and cute. It is in a perfect location close to a lot. They were helpful and very quick to respond. Would definitely stay there again!
it is a nice place for stay and the owner is friendly
Wonderful stay, very clean house with everything you might need and a friendly fast responding host! This house is in a great central location for family activities.
It was cute, affordable and clean with good location. One room contains 3 single beds one over the other in a very small room. That is good for kids, but not for adults.
super cute, very well stocked and organized. :)
Very clean and organized
Great place to stay. Quiet comfortable place for our family of 8.  Wonderful beds and very clean.
We had an excellent stay with our family.  It’s a cozy home.  It was very conveniently located for our activities and shopping needs.

Exactly as advertised, was a great place to stay - very clean and spacious.

Thank you!
Cute house with a great backyard and kitchen area.

We found everything we needed and more. This house has been nicely remodeled, and nearly everything inside is new.  Very clean and neat, including both the basic necessities as well as some nice extras.
This was the perfect space for our weekend in Salem. The house was clean, and cozy. Beds were comfortable.  The seating area in the back was perfect!! Highly recommend!
It was beautifully decorated and welcoming. Even if it was booked for work it was nice and relaxing. Loved it! Host was amazing! Very nice and helpful.
Had a really nice relaxing weekend with friends here. The living room is super comfy, the kitchen was great for cooking as well as for playing board games, and all the bedrooms were comfortable.
Great location and place to stay!! very comfortable and clean.  We enjoyed our stay!!
Nice quiet area, clean house, fire pit and BBQ were awesome amenities. Highly recommended.
very safe and good, condition to stay with family,neighbor hood is very quiet and drug free
Great retreat! Look forward to my next visit!
Super cute home! It felt very inviting and didn’t lack anything. Would definitely recommend to anyone and choose to stay again.
Good location and super quiet neighborhood.

We had a great time in Salem over the Thanksgiving week. The house is tucked away into a private location but, close to everything we needed.  We felt very comfortable and would definitely recommend this super cute house!

We really enjoyed our stay!  The location is close to all the stuff we wanted to do.  The house is very comfortable, clean, and well appointed.  When we had questions, Jolie or Jessie were prompt in getting back to us.  We highly recommend this  place.
Great place with comfy beds and clean space! Definitely recommend staying here

We travelled to Salem for a gymnastics competition and needed a place to relax before and after the big day.  Our girls felt very comfortable in Jolie's home and liked the decor and little details about the house.  The weather was so wet, dark and rainy that we had no idea there was a river at the back of the property.  She filled the house with everything one would need for a comfortable stay- cozy blankets to watch a movie, candles, nice linens and towels, etc. We'll definitely book again next year!
The house was exactly as it looked in the photos. There was some really cute geese in the neighborhood. Super easy access to wineries, shopping, and food.
The home was for the most part very clean.  It is slightly difficult to find at first, however; it is away from traffic and very quiet.

A great stay! I was in town for a volleyball tournament and stayed here with other coaches. It was the perfect location, could walk to a couple local places if you wanted. So welcoming and a great place to connect with friends for the weekend! Jolie was amazing as well, such great communication!

Our family enjoyed our stay in Salem. The street is very narrow and a little tricky to find initially, but it's a quiet location right by the creek. Jolie was very responsive to our needs! The king and queen beds were very comfortable, but the bunkbeds might be best for kids - our young adult daughters didn't sleep great on the bunk mattresses.
Super cozy spot! Will be back again. Thanks!

Great place to stay at! We came from Arkansas to get married here in Oregon and we had an Awesome stay! They made us feel at home. Communication was great with them, I had a question and they were on top of it replying fast and exactly what I needed to know. You will feel like you’re at home staying here! I recommend this place 100%. Everything was great!
Nice place to sleep!
Will come back to this same house. great location and close to my family.
Very clean, great location and easy to find.  I would totally stay there again.
Perfect location for Salem stay.
South Salem visitors will be very happy with this rental.
Beautiful home. Perfect size and ina. lovely area. Fell nothing less than what the photos show! Extremely clean and will be staying here again soon.

Terrific home, clean, nice furnishings, quiet neighborhood. The home was just as advertised, terrific. We would return for sure if we need a place in Salem and will highly recommend Pedro’s home to anyone. They were friendly and responded very quickly to our requests.  We wish them much success with their business.
Remarkable! Serene setting, a most pleasant place for a short/long stay.
Very clean and modern home. It was a very simple place, but had everything we needed and more! Definitely would stay again!
Pedro’s house was perfect while we were waiting for our home to get finished being built! He was super easy to work with and we would definitely recommend to a friend!

We had a great stay at Pedro's house, it looked just like the pictures and we felt right at home. The community is very nice to walk around, and quiet if you're walking with a stroller. There are also a couple of restaurants within a reasonable walk. if the Oregon weather cooperates.

One thing to note - there is a parking pad for one car, but it isn't very long, so a larger car you will need to park on the street. We didn't have any problems with the street parking, but just something to keep in mind.
Very clean place. Great location in a nice neighborhood with walking paths nearby. Pedro checked on how we were doing and answered all our questions. Would stay here again!

My family stayed at Thu’s place for a weekend getaway, the hospitality that was provided by the family was amazing. Thu had AMAZING communication, the place was very spacious, clean and comfortable. If you are looking for a getaway place my family highly encourages you guys to go
Check out Thu’s place.
Beautiful home with great hosts. Very spacious and clean. It might be my top Airbnb I’ve stayed at. Hosts were very accommodating. A recommend for anyone needing a stay in the area.

Clean, roomy and cheerful home. Quiet and peaceful place to sleep. Full of beautiful flowers to look at. Nice backyard with vegetable garden. Thanks for sharing your blueberries, we enjoyed them. Bob was a great host, we were welcomed with wonderful hospitality. Thanks for a lovely time.
Very clean and quiet home in a great location. I highly recommend!
Exceptional stay. Highly recommended. Will stay again if we ever come back. Great for family or business stay.

Very clean house with comfortable beds! Thu was kind and catering towards us :)
also the backyard is so cute!

What a beautiful home, with a very peaceful back deck for relaxing, a nice living room and big kitchen. The beds were perfect and provided a great few nights of sleep..
we needed to be in Salem for the weekend to help our daughter get all the last minute details done before her wedding.. and
Thu was awesome, and kind, she was accommodating and bent over backwards to make sure we had everything we needed to make our weekend a little easier and less stressful, she has great communication and fast response times with her messages.
Thu genuinely cares for the people who stay in her home and she put in a lot of effort to make sure our stay was enjoyable !
This neighborhood is quiet and peaceful and Thu is amazing, I would highly recommend this home over and over again..

Thank you for a lovely home to stay in during a fun but stressful time for our family! It was the oasis that we needed. The vase of hydrangeas, wine and snacks were a sweet touch and we appreciate the permission to share some of your delicious blueberries!

This place is amazing! The house is super clean, the kitchen well stocked and the beds are comfy. The neighborhood is very quiet and it’s pretty close to I-5. The back patio is the perfect place to hang out. We will definitely be booking this place again!!
This was a great place to stay. The host was very communicative and accommodating!
We can’t recommend this house enough!  It is a beautifully decorated and clean home with a great back patio. The host has thought of everything to make your stay feel like home!

I can't say enough good things about this stay. The house is large, clean, incredibly homey and comfortable. We had everything we needed and more, communication with the hosts was easy, fast, and friendly, and we are so happy to have found a place near family that we are looking forward to staying at again. Highly recommend!
Great place! Highly recommend!
Nice and clean place in a quiet neighbor.
Excellent location, beautiful home, great communication, and a lovely welcoming bottle of wine starts off any trip right!
House was clean and well stocked. Nice touch having snacks available. We needed them with our busy schedule.

Great place to stay. It was exactly what we were looking for. The home was spacious and very clean. The rooms were nice and comfortable. Loved the extra touches they provided such as coffee, tea and a bottle of wine.
The host was very friendly and communicated with us to make sure we had everything we needed. Would definitely stay there again.
If I could give a 10 star on some things I would. Super good communication. Clean home close to everything. Thank you Tru I would love to rent again next time I am in town.

We had an excellent stay with Thu and Jonathan! My wife and I stayed for a month while exploring the Salem area. We traveled with our two young boys and the house was not only clean and comfortable, but the location was great for easily accessing the surrounding area. Clean, safe neighborhood with a great park/playground just around the block. The hosts had great suggestions for things to do around the city (kid friendly too). Thu was very responsive to any requests, but all of what we needed was already provided when we arrived. Great for long stays with family, we would highly recommend to others!
This place fit our needs well. The check in process was easy and the host was very responsive. Exactly what we needed and the snacks, coffee, and tea available were a welcome surprise
Thu was a great host, definitely recommend!!

Circular driveway and easily visible house.  My stay here was pretty much perfect except for a weird heat wave in the middle.  Fans were provided by Alisa to help.  I felt safe on the property and it was quiet.  Multiple fruits grown on the property and shared with guests.  Would totally stay again!  Thanks Alisa!
Great stay. Let me store my bike inside out of the rain. Thank you!
Alisa and her husband are considerate, caring and good communication;  and the room was comfortable.
Viviane was a gracious host and very accomodating to make your stay a wonderful experience. Her home was very clean and tidy.  Bedroom was small but quite comfortable.

After searching for a few days, I was so relieved to find Viviane's place! The house is located in a beautiful & quiet neighborhood and THE ROOM and HOUSE is true to the pictures!!! SUPER CLEAN!! I loved having my own little refrigerator in the room (even though she is very accommodating with the big one in the shared kitchen), the microwave, the private television, and Viviane added a special treat....a massage cushion that I absolutely enjoyed and NEEDED!!!
I am definitely using Viviane again and will be glad to refer her place to my family and friends!!!
Very quiet and comfortable stay. Highly recommend!
主人是一个非常热情友好优雅的女士，房间里面配备的设施很充足，床住着非常舒适，得到了充分的休息，感谢这次住宿和旅行。
Wonderful hospitality!!!!

This accommodation was fabulous!  You will be very pleased to have such a positive experience, from the hospitality to the physical space, to the superb cleanliness, and on top of that, the value!  A very enjoyable, pleasant experience…you won’t be disappointed!

What a fantastic stay!  My room came exactly as advertised.  Incredibly clean and tidy with all the little extras that make a stay in Viviane's home stand out.  I really appreciated the massaging chair, the extra bottles of water (chilled in the in-room refrigerator), yogurt and ramen noodles! But wait, there's more!  The bathroom was immaculate and the living room was a particularly nice place to relax and meet any other guests and/or Viviane.  And ready-to-brew coffee in the morning to grab on your way out.  Bed was super comfy too!  I just can't say enough good things about my experience and I will definitely be back!
Viviane' s place is very good and well planned. Kitchen was amazing and with great coffee. It was pleasure to stay there and the host's attention was great.
If looking a private room to stay in Salem this should be in your options.

Viviane's home is lovely. The room is comfortable, and she is very thoughtful with accommodations (e.g., the refrigerator in the room, microwave, snacks). Check in is easy and everything is very clean and organized. Thank you!
An economical option vs local hotels.  Nice quite room in West Salem.  Easy check-in/out!
Clean room very organized.
Excellent, excellent place for traveling professionals. Easy checkin, great location and quiet! Love my stay!!

I enjoyed my stay. I need rest and I rested well. Viviane provides a safe space to rest your head for the night - or enjoy a longer stay, where they place feels like your own. Special touches with a card welcoming her guess made me feel welcomed immediately.

Thank you Viviane.
Viviane is very kind and welcoming. Her home is pristine! I very much recommend.
Wonderful room, very clean and quiet.

This was exactly what I wanted for my overnight stay in Salem.  Clean, comfortable, cozy, and convenient.  Plus, the in-room snacks and refreshments ... and massage chair cushion were pleasant bonuses.   I would definitely want to stay here again for my next trip through Salem.
Nice, clean, good neighborhood

Clean air in a quiet neighborhood. Easy room to relax into with a massage chair to die for! Bed is set low to the ground and the bathroom is across the house. Viviane was so kind and welcomed me into her beautiful home!

I have stayed with Viviane on multiple occasions when I come into town for work. Each visit has been perfect, the home is beautiful and Viviane is extremely kind and welcoming. I’m very bummed I won’t be working in the area anymore and getting to stay at her Airbnb. I highly recommend booking with her!
Had the pleasure to stay with Viviane again, and as always, I was met with great hospitality. She even followed up to make sure I made it home safely. I highly recommend staying here!
Ms. Viviane is a great hostess, communications were excellent.
Beautiful property, great location, unbeatable value.  Lots of nice little extras.  Vivian was gracious and flexible to my unique needs. I will definitely return if the opportunity presents.
Thank you, Viviane! It’s always great staying with you!
The nicest person I’ve met she was like mother to me lmao thank u for caring for me and listening to my problems, also giving me good advice.
Nicest Airbnb experience I've ever had so far. Very peaceful.

Viviane's place is amazing. The house is nice and super clean, it definitely makes you feel like it's your house. Her instructions are easy to follow and very welcoming. I loved how she had a microwave, a small fridge and some snacks in the room. Highly recommend booking with her, plus the pricing is amazing!

Great place to stay, and extremely affordable. Comfy bed and a great style to the room. Plenty of hot water for a good shower. Extra blankets and towels as well as snacks and fast Wi-Fi, smart tv. Will definitely stay again when I need to, great host and room. Highly recommended.
I didn't not end up staying at this Airbnb
Chris Viviane was an excellent host! She had a very straightforward check-in and check-out process. Her home was very welcoming and had great accommodations.
Vivian was great! it was clean and quiet and much appreciated.

Chris (Viviane) is a great host, She is very friendlyandwe shared some tips and ticks as fellow hosts. Chris gives Clear communication, easy directions, exact access to listing, very comfortable bed and room. The neighborhood overlooks Salem and is a very nice area in West Salem. Well worth the price and amenities.
Until next time.
Dave, RN

I highly  recommend  Vivian's  place, great location, house is very attractive inside, well decorated, clean and bright. Comfortable bed,   nice size room, easy to find. very reasonably price, I would stay again!🙂
The place was very great and welcoming. Not a too far from Portland either if you'd like to visit.
Chris is super welcoming and friendly. House is very clean. She always answers when contacted. Definitely a stay I would recommend.
Such a comfortable room and bed. I got lots of sleep. The house was quiet. Viviane was welcoming and she had clear instructions as to how to get in. I enjoyed my stay.
I always come here, and feel right at home. I feel safe and secure, and can rest so well as a travel nurse who works third shift.
Great place, clean, quiet.

So clean and comfy. Vivian was not home but helped me get in after booking a very last minute stay later in the evening. Her house is lovely and welcoming. Good snacks. Comfy bed. Clean bathroom. Soft towels. A great place to sleep.
My stay at Chris's was very quick, but the place was beautiful, bed comfortable and I slept well. My request for a late check-in was kindly accommodated. I wouldn't hesitate to stay again.

if you're reading this , look no further! This is the best spot , and the price is amazing for the quality. Everything is perfect and you most likely wont even see anyone else in the house. i come and go a few times a day still havent seen any other occupants.. I've heard them coming and going a few times but just a bedroom door closing and that's it. best value I've ever come across on airbnb. 6 stars if I could

This was my first time staying at Chris’s (Vivian’s) place.  I felt at home from the moment I walked through the front door.  The room was great and the bed was really comfortable.  Her home overall was really clean and I truly felt at home.  I will be going there regularly as my second home away from home for work!  Thank you Chris!!
This was my second week staying here and it keeps getting better.  I met Chris’s son this time.  What a fine young man he is.  Looking forward to many more stays in the coming weeks and months.
My third stay there in a month and Great as usual!
Overall great experience.
Great location, great host and a great place!
Clean, cute.  Near a busy road and no outside sitting area.  Otherwise fully equipped and host was very prompt and helpful.
Very nice and cozy place with everything you need for a nice and comfortable stay. Host answers very fast and makes it super easy to check in and out. Súper recomendable
Very clean, and Ellen is very professional!!
Close to downtown Salem. Safe building. Comfy bed.  VERY clean. Nice touches. Even had food on hand in the freeze and pantry. Ellen was super responsive. Would stay here again!

Great apartment, convenient location and amazing host! Ellen and Tori thought of everything with this place. The apartment is completely equipped with everything you need and more, there is even a popcorn popper.

I stayed here for a month while relocating to Salem. Ellen reached out to me a couple of times during my stay to ensure I had everything I needed. She offered recommendations for delicious restaurants within walking distance and was a great area resource. I’d definitely stay there again.
Alisa and her husband are very caring and considerate.  The room and house are clean and comfortable
A great value AirBnB.  Very clean and tidy, and accessible hostess.  Recommended.
wonderful location.
I think this is really a hidden gem. You can see the river from the kitchen! It's a beautiful spot.
Nice location with good access to restaurants and markets.
I had a very good stay at Alisa's place. I slept well and it was very quiet. Thank you Alisa.
Great place, great hosts, lovely people. God bless
Great host, clean, etc

she was so kind, and when I forgot to get some butter for my grilled cheese sandwich she let me use some of hers. The bed was a reminder of sleeping on my daughter's bed with her when she first got her big girl bed at age 6.

It is a very quiet place if that is what you are lookingfor.  Just  a few minutes walk to the grocery store and burger place as well ad a pizzaplace. If you want healthyfood it's acrossa streetfrom a subway. I felt very safe there.

It was nice. Instructions were clear, and the host’s responses were very fast. Also it was very nice that they had a washer and dryer on site, plus a kitchen, and there was shopping and a bus stop close by. The room itself was small, which is just fine at the price. My one complaint is that there were ants in the specific room I stayed in. The room looked clean, though, and they had us take our shoes off at the entrance. Overall, it was a good stay for the price.

The house is so charming! Immaculately maintained, most impressed with the cleanliness of the bathrooms. It was comfortable and felt like home away from home. We would love to revisit when we have time to enjoy the nearby restaurants and park! One of my favorite stays!
Great and comfortable place.
Amazing home, beautifully designed. Great patio. The host was very quick to respond. Perfect stay!
Great house and the patio with fireplace is very nice. Super clear and host is a quick and supportive communicator.

Very comfortable home with a great sectional for media night. We (family of 3 sons and a dog) were visiting family in south Salem for Thanksgiving. So festive to find a Christmas tree in the living room. We enjoyed little details like dimmer switches for all the lights and a gas range. Rishel's home is in a quiet neighborhood - felt like we had our own cul-de-sac. The backyard is fully fenced which was great for our dog. Would love to stay again.
This is lovely and comfortable. My husband and I enjoyed our stay. Along with being pet friendly and close to my place of employment, we are happy we chose this home to stay in.

Our son's house wasn't large enough to accommodate our families, so this house was perfect! Part of our family stayed here and had a very short commute to our son's house. We felt at home here, and should our whole family travel cross country again we will definitely be staying here again. Thank you Rishel for being a great host!

We love the house it felt like home!
I recommend it 100%
I didnt want to leave! Amazing host and was kind enough to ship my key i forgot! Will def stay here again if im in Salem! :D

Everything was great & as advertised. They went above and beyond to welcome us with complementary snack basket, cold drinks in the refrigerator, and anything you may have forgotten at home. there’s a hot tub on the deck, which looks very inviting we didn’t use it, but it was tempting. And a really nice sitting area in the backyard very private. Would definitely recommend staying there.

I came to Salem to visit with my grandchildren and Emily provided games for us to play which was perfect.  She was so flexible with my changing schedule while there. The room is beautiful and has unique spaces (ie small loft area).  Definitely an excellent host and space

great place! i worry about saying too many nice things, cause i want to come back without it being all booked up ;)  space was much bigger than i expected!  loft was super cute, closet was huge! bathroom and kitchenette was great (really appreciated the separate freezer, and all the utensils)  big comfy bed, easy check-in, friendly host! i never even got to try to hot tub, but you can bet i’llbe back to give it a soak! two thumbs up!

We had such a lovely time here at Emily's.  The place is really clean and well maintained. The amenities and the complimentary treats were well thought out and very much appreciated. The place was very spacious with a nice walk in closet.  The bed was super comfortable with good quality pillows and bedding.  We wish we would have had more time to enjoy the outdoor space of the hot tub and fire pit. But we did have breakfast on the peaceful deck surrounded by beautiful trees. Her place was also very close to Blacksheep Cafe & Catering which we discovered had amazing food!  Thank you Emily for your thoughtfulness and making our stay enjoyable.  We look forward to staying here again.  😍😍
We had a great stay! The room had everything you needed to be comfortable. It was clean and quiet.
Spacious room, clean room at a great price.

Emily’s place was amazing!!
Very spacious, clean, organized, i didn’t feel cluttered with furniture or wall decor, very simple and calming. The room it self felt like sleeping in a cabin out in the woods, the only thing missing was the indoor fireplace, but hey; why have an indoor fireplace when they provide a outdoor fireplace place!
The hot tub was amazing, having that privacy balcony along with the tub, couldn’t get any better. Place was quiet, and I had good sleep through out the night.
Emily was amazing in communicating, and make sure we had everything we needed.
I will definitely book this place again to stay.
I highly recommend this place for anyone who is coming into town and looking for a place.
Thank you again.
Great place to stay. Peaceful, quiet and clean. Very comfortable.
Nice and quiet, easy stay.
Great place! Enjoyed my stay!
Felt very welcome, safe, and comfortable here. Check in was easy, the space was beautiful, and they had complimentary snacks and drinks available. Would absolutely stay here again!

Emily's place was one of my favorite airbnbs so far! Being able to hot tub morning and night and have the cozy fire place was so welcoming and like a little vacation spa. Emily was so nice and helped me when I broke a plant holder and needed sheets. She was friendly and responsive. Thank you I will definitely be booking again.
Great set up, comfortable bed and very clean. Would have taken advantage of the back yard if I had more time. Highly recommend!
Thank u Emily:) we had a very nice stay. We are very grateful to the extras that were available for us as well :) thank you:)

This was a mostly comfortable place to stay l for a couple of nights. The space was just as described. The only problem we ran into was that the small heater was very insufficient to heat the full room, so it was very cold in the room.

Great indoor space. Loved the hot tub. But…. There isn’t landscaping in the backyard to prevent sliding and sloshing in mud. Had to track it in the room, go everywhere with dirty shoes, and struggle with dirty dog paws 🐾 FYI
I enjoyed my stay.

Emily’s place was great! Loved the decor! Very private, and spacious!! She was such a sweetheart, too, leaving a note and treats for my pup! The electric fireplace was warm and welcoming when I arrived, and she even had an extra space heater placed near the bed just in case. Very thoughtful. And very communicative! It’s super close to all kinds of shopping and restaurants, too.
I enjoyed my stay.The hottub was a nice amenity for the evening.I will recommend this to anyone for a short stay.Thanks

great value. room was spacious, well thought out, had a lot of amenities that most airbnbs of a similar price don't have.

definitely wouldstay again
My stay was fantastic. It was quiet, and the outdoor space was also private and great to hang out in. Definitely would recommend.

Overall, we had a great stay! The hot tub was relaxing and well,... hot. We stayed inside most of our stay and it was quiet and peaceful so we were able to take afternoon naps! For the price, this was a very nice, relaxing stay.

We feel like in home at Emily’s place, nice neighborhood it was easy to access the house the private room is well equipped, beautiful and clean place, beautiful private space The back yard is beautiful and illuminated with garland light …. Definitely will love to stay again at this beautiful paradise. Thank you Emily
This was the perfect place to hide out from a big winter storm. We stayed cozy with the two space heaters and looooved having access to the jacuzzi!

We had a great stay at Emily’s place! It was exactly as advertised. Clean, spacious, cozy, private, and very quiet. We had everything that we might need available to us, and Emily even provided an additional space heater and some blankets, as they were experiencing a bit of a cold spell at the time. The location is great, and is conveniently located to getting to the freeway, as well as shopping and restaurants. Emily was a friendly host, and was very communicative with us!

We look forward to staying here again!
I really enjoyed my stay here. The neighborhood was quiet, the bed was comfortable, and there are 5-6 great restaurants within 10 minutes. I would happily stay here again.
It's was during the rains. path.was very muddy and slick..almost fell several times..

Candice is an awesome host. We really enjoyed our stay with her. The canopy is super cute. She was kind enough to let us do a load of laundry. Bathroom was shared, but also very clean and nice. Overall a great stay in Salem!
Lovely, clean, and well-placed stay. Unbeatable value, would come back.
The location is close to Willamette and a very nice park.
Everything was as advertised! Comfortable bed and accessible/easy to find. No complaints

Nice room with a lot of space. As it says, the ceiling is pretty low in the attic room. The bed was comfortable and the room was clean.
