The neighborhood was very quiet and just a short drive from downtown. Candice wasn't around while I stayed so there was a lot of privacy for me as a guest. Also, the cat was very friendly! Would stay here again!

Candice has prepared a nice accommodation for guests with many thoughtful amenities. She is welcoming and so helpful in directing travelers to best routes to meeting sites.
It was very reasonable and a great stay.

Everything was amazing. Candice is extremely friendly and provided everything you need whether your on the road or just passing through. Local recommendations were provided as well as anything else you can ask for.

Candice's home is centrally located in Salem. She was friendly and her son was cute. Our room, as described, had a low ceiling, but since we are relatively short people, that did not present a problem. There was coffee and tea available in the bedroom, and the bed was very comfortable.

Great experience! Candice and her son met us, made us welcome in their home then let us have the space to rest. Available when needed. Most important-comfy bed and pillows!  Host was quick to respond to my questions, great communication. We were here for a very short stay, we appreciate the unique and adorable rental space. Would definitely stay again ❤️
Candace was great!

a verry pleasant we felt right at home. for you taller gentlemen just note that the ceilings are tapered are still low.  I'm 6'2 and and my head rubs but no big deal. the bed was one of the most comfortable we had slept in. and the lady and her 5yr old son where super nice. and where quite while we where sleeping. if you are looking for a pleasant place to crash for the night this is it.
Great place, highly recommend. The accommodations were great for a shared space. Had the upstairs all to ourselves. Very welcoming environment, had a wonderful stay.
One of the best stays I’ve had in Salem definitely recommended and would come back ! 5 stars

Great host. Very receptive and accommodating. Stayed at her wonderful little cottage home in South Salem. Home is located in one of the coolest neighborhoods Salem has to offer. Very clean with great parking and other amenities. Highly recommended.

What a pleasant place to stay in Salem! This is not a party house, you are in a nice neighborhood and this is the place to be if you want a quiet, peaceful stay and blend in with the equally peaceful neighbors. Very clean and well appointed with everything you need, this host knows how to create a wonderful Salem stay, 5 minutes from downtown, capital, WU, parks, and countless shopping and restaurant options along Commercial Street.

This is a cute house in a well established quiet neighborhood, easy to find and had everything we needed.  The garage is very nice to have as it was raining when we arrived and were able to load and unload our things out of the rain.  The king size bed was comfortable and has nice sheets, blankets and pillows.  The kitchen was well stocked and had everything you would need for your stay.  We had booked it for three nights but had to leave the first morning as we had a family emergency.  We will book this again when we return to Salem to see family and friends.  Love this place.
Judy's house is thoughtfully and well equipped. It is in a good neighborhood. We stayed here for a week and the house was a great home base for us.

Judy’s place was a great little cottage to stay in. The bed was very comfortable, the kitchen had everything we needed, and the attached garage was a nice bonus (especially in Oregon weather). The location is great - just minutes from Dutch Brothers and other local establishments, with plenty of other shops and restaurants a short drive away.

There were many thoughtful touches that added to the comfort; scent free laundry detergent, kleenex, and plenty of towels, hand towels, wash cloths, dish towels and dish rages too. The beds and bed linens were very comfortable as well. It was also so nice to be able to pull into the clean and tidy garage to unload and load the car. I would definitely stay with Judy in the brick house again.
Loved staying at this cozy and cute cottage! Judy was a wonderful host and the house was immaculate. Very quiet neighborhood close to lots of amenities. Definitely would recommend.
Great place, simple and efficient layout, well stocked. Clear instructions from host on how to use things. Clean.
Clean, well stocked, comfortable home a few blocks  away from Bush Park. Five minutes drive from downtown, restaurants, and markets.

Our stay was short and sweet but the house was comfortable and quiet. It had everything we needed. The bed was very comfortable. We were able to walk to breakfast and were close to pretty much anything we wanted to do.

Always a pleasure to stay at the Fir Street Cottage. Our 2nd stay and everything was just as smooth as our 1st stay. We needed to check out a few days early and it wasn’t a problem. Non-stay days were refunded and the host was more than flexible with the check-out time.
What a cute little space to spend a weekend! Close to Minto Brown for the dogs, and  lose to downtown too. Perfect space.
Everything was as advertised

We had an incredible stay. Clean, cute as could be, excellent kitchen for cooking, great family area. There were a few very minor things that could be improved and I let Stacy and Justin know and they were committed to fixing them. The neighborhood is close to downtown Salem, very close to Willamatte U and walking distance to some bars. We took dogs and a toddler and infant and it worked out great! The bathtub is nice and low so easy for my older family member with knee pain to get in and out of. My kids loved the tub. Washer and dryer worked fabulous. The hosts were excellent at communicating! I couldn’t recommend more. I was safe and comfortable as we went in the winter and the heater works well! We will be back!
A very cute place with all the comforts of home.
Great place. Nice and clean and really comfortable beds. We really recommend this place. Thank you Stacey and Justin for sharing your beautiful place with us!!!
Such a cozy, charming place.
We had everything we needed and Avery was quick to respond to questions and very accommodating to us. Thanks for providing such a clean and convenient place for us to stay!
Simple and clean, Avery’s place was conveniently located in Salem where it was an easy drive to everything we needed.
clean and calm area for the price. it felt like a college hangout area
Nice little house in a beautiful neighborhood.

Diane was a great host,she was very responsive and was very kind answering all of our questions. The room ,the place were so amazing with such a beautiful view, and really calm and quite for a a blissful evening with your loved one..We will definately book this place the next time we are in Salem.

Beautiful home! Very clean and easy to be comfortable in. Diane was very quick to respond to any messages and was wonderful to chat with. Will definitely book here again next time we’re in West Salem!
Very clean and peaceful place .I highly recommend if anyone wants a quite and relaxing get away
Gorgeous Airbnb that is very well kept. Hosts are very attentive and quick to fix any issues or problems that arise. Will definitely be a returning customer.
Great place, cozy and quiet.
The accommodations were clean and comfortable. The hosts were friendly and helpful. We love the location and hope to come again.
Super easy check-in, and responsive communication. Will definitely book again!
Cozy apt in a very good location
clean room, plenty of space. hosts were very friendly and responsive to my questions . overall a nice spot !
We had a nice time at Andrew’s Airbnb. The downstairs unit was super cute and very clean. We really appreciated his timely communication and the ease of check in/out.
Great find. Fabulous price for such a nice place. Everything seemed new and nicely decorated. Linens were comfortable. Convenient location and nice neighborhood.
Awesome place. Perfect for my needs. Andrew was a great host.
Great location and easy to check in and check out! Andrew was responsive and helpful with all our questions with the booking. Highly recommend staying at this beautiful studio on Belmont!!
Fantastic, cozy, and comfy
A homey place to have a snow day!
Great place, clear instructions for entry, and a 20 minute walk to downtown.
Cozy spot for work in Salem. Close to downtown and easy parking. Comfy bed and nice lighting!
The place was comfortable and in an excellent location. Andrew was very responsive and helpful and would stay here again next time in Salem👍
Very nice space. Was great for a bisy work trip to Salem.
Great stay at Andrew’s! Loved meeting their cat. Would stay again
Great place, gave clear and easy instructions on accessing the property.
Nice, clean place with easy access and clear instructions. The place is to downtown Salem and Willamette University.

Elle and Cam were absolutely wonderful hosts. Their home was gorgeous and so comfortable. Elle stayed in contact with us when needed and was so helpful and kind. We were in town while looking for an apartment, pre move, and we couldn't have possibly felt more welcome and at home. Thank you again, Cam and Elle, for your continued kindness and welcoming us into your beautiful home
Thank you so much for a peaceful home in a beautiful neighborhood very close to the park.  Everything was very clean.  And the hosts were very communicative and attentive.

Cam & Elle were great hosts. Very responsive in communication. The house is in a nice neighborhood that felt safe and was very quiet. Big couches in the living room were a great place to relax at the end of the day. The upstairs is accessed with a steep staircase with a low overhead so pay attention to the instructions. The beds were comfortable, and while we are not used to sleeping in a full size bed the mattress was very comfortable and we enjoyed a good nights sleep. The house is an older home, and if you're looking for something fancy then this might not be the place for you. But if your looking for a clean, well equipped house where you can feel at home then I would recommend you consider this rental. If you have any questions I encourage you to reach out to Cam and Elle, they are more than willing to help make your stay the best possible. They even gave us a recommendation of a local park where we could enjoy some time with our grandchildren.

Diane is super nice host . And the house is super clean , new and quiet . 5mins drive to Salem center . That house is my dream house . 😆  we definitely will stay at Diane’s house again . That’s 5star house .
Thank you for hosting my crew. It was nice to get an extension immediately from you when our plans changed. You worked well with us and would love to stay there personally next time I'm in the area!
This home is so beautiful and spacious. I really enjoyed staying here, it was very quiet and comfortable. I will be staying again!
Perfect, welcoming stay

Very nice comfortable home. I could tell the owner is very conscious about making sure everything you need is provided for. The beds are extremely comfortable. Great neighborhood. Would definitely stay here again!
Easy, clean, fabulous!  Thanks for the stay!
very clean and comfortable
Very nice

A very cute, spacious, and comfortable place to stay. We stayed with our 2 year old and 7 year old and had plenty of room. The surrounding areas outside were safe and homeless free. All neighbors were extremely friendly and we had 0 issues during our 2 night stay.  Would not hesitate to stay again and highly recommend!
The apartment was spotless.   Mark & Svetlana are quick to respond.  No traffic noise, Parking was very close, check-in/check-out was a breeze.  This place fit our needs well.
I had a very comfortable time here with my family，highly recommend to everyone

Mark and Svetlana's place was just what I needed. I was traveling for work, and I felt right at home here. It was unusual, but I had tons of questions for them. Not only did they answer immediately, but they made an effort to help me as much as they possibly could. Great place to stay, even better hosts. I would absolutely recommend them.
Beautiful decor, very spacious loft apartment. Amazing attentive host. Would stay here again! The Pac-Man arcade game was hit with my daughter and husband

We had an absolute blast. The attention to detail, the great communication, and all amenities were 5 star! The plants were so beautiful, and made the space very inviting and cheerful! We felt like we had everything we would ever need for our weeks stay. The fact that we could walk downstairs for a meal made it that much better! We will recommend it to family and friends!
Obsessed with the vibe of this Airbnb. Beautiful decorative touches! The shower is definitely the most beautiful I’ve ever seen! Hope to stay again next time I’m in Salem

We had a wonderful stay at this historical retreat. If you're into history and architecture and things of the like you'll definitely enjoy this huge home. The beds were very comfortable and Lillian was very communicative and accommodating. The place exceeded our expectations and was close to everything Salem has to offer. We highly recommend this abode!!

A great location, very cool place. Loved the exposed brick and eclectic decor! It was only 2 of us, but the large family room/dining area was great and Lillian has stocked the place with games! We had a few family members come over while we were staying there to have dinner and play games. It was such a great setup! Will definitely go back!

This place is so cool! amazing style, clean, the coolest shower ever.
plenty of space!!
Unique cozy little spot that you might never have found if you just pass by. This space had everything you need for a relaxing stay and the location was great!
Lillian is a great host.  Open communication lines and quick responses to all messages.  A delight

My husband and I would live in this place! The decor and set up was stunning! Definitely a larger space than we needed, but it's so beautiful! The shower with plants and the old fashioned pull flush toilet were probably my favorite features. There is some noise/music that travels from the restaurant as Lillian mentions, but it died down before we were going to bed, so we slept soundly. We were also able to easily order food from downstairs when we didn't feel like cooking. Our dogs appreciated having a new dog bed and toys to play with, as well as room to wrestle! This will be our new go to for visiting Salem!

This was a fantastic stay! The location just minutes from downtown was amazing, and of course being right above McMenamins couldn't be better. The space was cozy and there were a lot of small touches. The beds were super comfortable and the shower was fabulous. If you are a light sleeper, I did hear some noise from downstairs at night, but it was fine for me! I parked on the street, which was fine overnight- if you'll be around during the day you might need to move your car after a while. Overall, there was a ton of room, a beautifully designed space, and great amenities. I hope to be back in this space again- highly recommend!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Lillian’s. It was everything we expected and more. All of the touches that have been added make the whole place feel homey and modern at the same time. We loved the stained glass and the history of the building.
You can hear a bit of restaurant noice but it did not bother us. It was muted and actually made us feel cozy. We did eat downstairs one night and the staff and food was awesome. The space is large and has everything anyone may need during their stay. We will definitely stay again when in Salem.

Lillian's place was so amazing. It was beyond our expectations. Right up our alley, funky and unique.  We are also Mcmenamins junkies so the location above Mcmenamins was the frosting.  (although unfortunately on this trip we didn't even get to go down there due to our time constraints). Lillian was very responsive as well. We spend a lot of time in Salem and so definitely will be back.  Love love love the vibe.  Thanks Lillian!!

So much space!  Even bigger than it appears in photos.  Historic, eclectic feel - very charming and cozy.  Super convenient location - close to downtown and Riverfront Park. The shower is fantastic!  Really appreciated the dog bed, dishes and toys - so thoughtful.  Highly recommend.

The place is nice and well decorated. Beds were comfy! We did not get the code for check in and took nearly an hour to get a response from the host so we could get in. The noise from the bar downstairs was considerable, more than previous reviewers noted.

We loved our stay at the Downtown Loft! It was in a great location with plenty of parking. The entire space was clean and comfortable, and we had everything we needed. It was perfect. The amount of space and beautiful decor made us feel right at home. Next time we travel to the area, we would absolutely stay in the Loft again.
Such a charming, spirited unit! Absolutely fun! Thank you for the cute decorations - that fridge is amazing.

The parking is tight and it is pretty loud at night being right downtown. The space and history of the place was unique. It was difficult to plan meals with not having a kitchen. The shower was nice but having a limited number of towels and kitchen items.. we were having to do laundry and clean dishes early the next morning. Also, advertising a record player but not having any records was a bummer. We went and purchased some across the street only to find player is broken.
Wonderful space. We had 5 adults and we had plenty of space.  It was a terrific place for us to hang out and visit.
Great vibe, clean, and had everything we needed. Very happy with our choice.
Wonderful space in a historic building. Lillian was helpful and super friendly. Highly recommend!
Super cute place.

This space is SO BIG! I wish I had invited more friends to join us! The PacMan machine plays more than just PacMan! We had Galaga tournaments and had so much fun!
The shower was beautiful with live plants decorating the inside! We loved it!
Chris is a very accommodating host. The kitchen and house are well stocked and the space worked for our large family of 6. Thanks again, Chris!
Great stay! Plenty of room; tons of games; very sweet host. Quiet neighborhood. Great for multi families as separate sleeping areas;  video gamers would love this place!

Christopher’s place was just what we needed. It was roomy and comfortable. We were able to spread out and relax before we had to head out to our obligations in Salem.

Christopher was very communicative and proactive with checkin.

I’d recommend the place if you are in the Salem area!!
Awesome place

Very clean and comfortable space. You will never be bored here! Decor is funky and eclectic. There are tons of games and books. Christopher has thought of everything. There is plenty of cookware and spices, lots of extra towels and toiletries. We had a lovely rainy weekend here!

This was our second stay here during our displacement from our own home in town. I enjoy being in a space that’s large enough my fiancé can work from “home” while my toddler and I kept busy in other parts of the house. The kitchen was well stocked with pots, pans, plate ware and also a drying rack to hand wash dishes or a dish washer if that’s your preference. There are so many restaurants less than 5 minutes away: Ventis, Five Guys, Subway, Straight from New York pizza, Jamba Juice. Super convenient. The shower gets amazingly hot water. Super appreciated having a washer and dryer on hand for our extended stay.
Wonderful space! Lots of games, beautiful kitchen. just what I needed.

Chris is a very accommodating host. We’ve been staying here while displaced from our own home, so it’s literally been home away from home. Any questions we have had throughout our stay have been answered very quickly. We’ve easily cooked meals here with his kitchen having most utensils/pots/ pans and what not that we need. Very close to downtown where I work has made it an extremely convenient stay.

Every tv we have used has had Netflix logged in which we’ve enjoyed. My fiancé works from home and has been able to easily set up his computer and use the wifi without any connection errors. The downstairs arcade area is a nice disconnect from the upstairs allowing for quiet working and loud playing. The laundry room is also down there and has a nice folding table to organize it all.

It has felt like home. Thank you.

Such a convenient stay, so close to many restaurants, grocery/ convenient stores. Home has so much space for a family to spread out. Many board games to entertain yourselves with; including Mouse Trap! There’s also a jetted tub and massage chair I’ve found myself in more often then I imagined.

Christopher was very proactive and responsive. We felt at home and enjoyed walking our dogs at Clark Creek park. The house had a wide assortment of games and entertainment options. The Pac-Man in the basement rec room was especially fun. The home was clean and provided adequate space for our family.

We stayed here for just a little over a month off and on while having repairs done at our own house. It was such a nice comfortable stay (fully functioning kitchen, washer dryer downstairs, two showers, plenty of space) Chris was a super cool host and comes across as a really respectful person. Won’t hesitate to stay again if needed.
was nice
Can’t wait to come back in the summer!!
Really cool house 😊 really spacious and comfortable. Definitely would stay again.

Christopher was one of the best hosts we’ve experienced with air bnb. We traveled for our boy’s basketball tournament and he was flexible with check in and check out. The house was fully stocked with everything we needed and more. The house itself was spacious enough for 3 families. Very eclectic and lots of cool history in the house. The boys said it was like a museum. Cool stuff in every room and lots of games. Water was always hot with the many showers that were taken and plenty of towels. Close to restaurants and easy access to the freeway. Chris was very responsive and we appreciated that very much! We would definitely stay here again! The complimentary wine and beer was a nice surprise after a long day of travel and games. Thank you so much Christopher! We would definitely stay here again.

Fun unique house kept us all comfortable and entertained. Christopher thought of everything and was generous with amenities. Great communicator and house was spotlessly clean. Overall was a cozy place to spend a night passing through town on a road trip.
Chris was such a pleasant host. Friendly and responsive with helpful solutions that exceeded our needs.
PHENOMENAL HOST!!!! Couldn’t ask for a better air bnb experience!!!!!
Prefect for my quarterly visit with my grandsons ! It’s was comfortable, had everything you needed, felt like home , will stay again when I return in two months , thanks Chris
loved our stay and will be back!

We stayed for a local weightlifting competition and this place was perfect! The host was super responsive and helpful and the location was perfect. He even told us what back road to use to get to our destination. If we come back next year I hope to stay at the same place!
This is an awesome place. If you have kids there is space for them and the adults..loved the upgraded bathrooms! Water pressure was super fabulous!!!!
Christopher was a great host.  The house literally has everything.

We stayed at Darren's place for Christmas while visiting family in Salem, and we couldn't have had a better experience. We greatly appreciated his proactive assistance as we dealt with travel delays, and the flexibility he offered with checking in and out. The home itself is very comfortable, cozy and clean throughout, and we appreciated Darren's kind gesture of installing Christmas decorations before our arrival including a Christmas tree for us to enjoy during our stay — making it feel like home for us. We would definitely consider booking this place with Darren again!
Clean and comfortable!

All around 5 star experience. Casey and his family are fantastic hosts - very friendly and responsive. They even left a welcome note and treats. The place looks exactly like it does in the photos and was well-stocked with everything needed for our stay just shy of a week. It’s a short drive to everything in town, but many stores and restaurants are within walking distance. It’s near a busy main street but road noise is buffered because the house is tucked away on a nice wooded street and next to a park. The wifi held up well under the data demands of telework, gaming & streaming. If you’re looking for somewhere clean (NO allergens! No pets, dust mites, heavy fragrances), spacious, well stocked, on a quiet residential street and with an awesome host, this is the one.

We loved this adorable home! It was so clean, well decorated and so close to so many great restaurants and shopping. We will absolutely stay again the next time we are in Salem. Thank you for a lovely weekend stay!
Nice view of the park. Great communication. Would definitely recommend to anyone. Clean and peaceful.

Wonderful place to stay. Nicole’s place was very clean, in a great location and I had everything I needed for my trip. There were very thoughtful details inside. She’s a great communicator and I felt safe and secure in the apartment.
Thank you!
Very comfy!!!
Great place. Would stay again.
Nicole was very responsive, apartment as described. Great place to stay for 1-2 people. Will recommend to others.

Nicole was very responsive and I appreciated that she checked-in with me during my stay. She also put out some vases with flowers which were a lovely touch. I felt safe, comfortable, and would stay again given the opportunity!
It was a very clean and nice apartment with a great view from the balcony. Nicole communicated really well and ensured that we had everything we needed.

Nicole was a wonderful host. She reached out with clear instructions on how to enter the building. The space was very cute and clean with excellent views and very walkable to great food and coffee. I would most certainly stay there again if/when I return to the area!

Needed a nice, quiet place to rest during the days between working back to back 12 hour shifts-this was perfect!  I was able to easily check in, slip right into bed and off to dreamland in the comfy bed.  Will def book again
Great location, very clean and lots of small details make this place a great stay. Nicole even had fresh cut flowers in the bedroom and bathroom. We will definitely stay again.
Had an eviction notice on door, not very friendly neighbors. Did not want an air bnb in their complex.
Peaceful and beautiful. Clean home and Nicole is extremely responsive!!

Nicole's place was perfect for our needs. Located very well for our needs this trip, near multiple restaurants and coffee shops, and walking distance to the theater our event was being held at. Very private and secure accommodations, with a full kitchen and everything we needed to truly make ourselves at home. Nicole even had some yummy fruit and snacks available for us! Adjacent to a beautiful waterfront park with geese and an old fashioned carousel... You really can't go wrong with this location. Parking can be a challenge in the area, but it's worth the effort to work out the timing with the 3 hour limitations. Overall, this was one of the best stays we've had through AirBnB!!
fantastic relaxing trip

My family and I needed a place to hold our Thanksgiving celebration because the venue we reserved call us a week before Thanksgiving to let us know they made a mistake and didn't realize that they booked us on Thanksgiving day and stated they are not open! I contacted Michelle and asked if we coukd have our Thanksgiving dinner at her place! she agreed! Her home is beautiful and spacious and we loved how each room had its own personality! the house was clean and perfect to accommodate all of us! Michelle was there to answer any questions I had and informed me not to hesitate to contact her anytime. my family had a wonderful time! thank yoy Michelle for having us crat special memories at your home! the Spot is THE SPOT!

ALSO her rules of house are funny! the roof is off limits!! lol 🤣

Quick overnight trip in a beautiful location.  Elegant living spaces with really fun bedrooms.  Luckily we had no need for the 4th room, but the air bnb description does state that this is a 4 bedroom home for rent, and we found that the 4th bedroom (the cloud room) was empty and did not have a bed or anything in it for sleeping.  Also worth noting that two of the bedrooms share a jack-and-jill type bathroom which ended up being great for us.  Everything was well stocked and beautifully decorated, and the host was great at communicating with me before our stay.  Overall we would stay here again as we enjoyed our time and stay in the area!

Absolutely loved our stay! We stayed there for Christmas. It had everything for a comfortable stay. All necessities were present. The host was very helpful and responsive. The only thing on my wishlist would be a coffee maker. But other than that the house is absolutely perfect for a little getaway!!! We will definitely stay there again!
Place was absolutely great and definitely worth while
We had a great stay. this place is extremely comfortable. I would go back again.

Michelle was a top notch host. Super friendly and accommodating. Her home was amazing. Super clean and super relaxing. If you asked if I would stay there again I’d say shut up and take my money lol. Thank you for a relaxing stay Michelle.

Michelle had a lovely home, it was clean and the unique decor in each room was a great touch! The beds and sofa were also very comfy. We came to the area for our daughters basketball tournament and the location of this home was close to each place she played. Michelle was quick to respond when we needed to get in touch with her as well! We would definitely stay again.
Stayed again for a week while home was getting some work done and amazing as always.
I slept so well on  bed, the place was cozy and quiet, and very relaxing

I absolutely loved staying at the Central Salem Hideaway Studio! It’s super clean, charming and warm. My check-in was a breeze and we were so impressed by how nicely appointed the studio was, especially for the amazing price point. We were in town for a quick visit and it was so centrally located and easy to get downtown! We will definitely stay here again when we need to stay in town.

What a beautiful, cozy, and warm space. The perfect place to stay when in the State Capitol. A GREAT price for this space. Close to delicious restaurants, the River front park and carousel, downtown shopping and the beautiful capital. The hosts are responsive, helpful and warm. They give clear instructions and offer excellent communication. The space is clean and inviting- matches pictures perfectly. It has everything you need for comfort and peace right in the heart of the city!
My lady and I enjoyed a single night at Ali’s, would definitely recommend for anyone passing through the area.
Very cozy. Bed was super comfortable. The shower is nice — plenty of hot water. Nice neighborhood.
Very easy to get along with and the room is amazing definitely better than any hotel I’ve been in!

What a beautiful getaway my partner and i had. We just started a night but even then the room was a lovely space to enjoy, the hosts were even kind enough to leave us some goodies to share our one night together. Everything was spotless and very comfortable! Thank you again would love to come back someday!
A lovely little private area! I walked to a nearby donut shop in the morning and it was such a peaceful walk through the neighborhood! Love the location and the hosts were attentive.
Ali's place had everything we needed. It was cute and clean.  We would stay here again!

The area was clean and cozy with its own private entrance. Big shower and it’s own washer and dryer machines. Place was comfortable. Ali was super responsive and made it possible to check in an hour early. Thank you
This place is a gem!  Everything you need, great value, just as described, close to good food, would definitely stay here again!
Great little place within walking distance to downtown.

Ali created an amazing stay especially given it is a private studio style room in the basement. There was never noise from the upstairs and it was very conveniently located. She was also a very responsive and helpful host. I would recommend staying here if you’re in need of somewhere quiet and close to downtown! Price was also great for what we received.

Ali’s place has everything you would need for a long stay. The compact kitchen was well laid out and stocked with everything we could have needed. The shower had great pressure, and plenty of hot water, the little table perfect for two. So many restaurants and activities close by. We only stayed one night but would have been comfortable there for a much longer stay. Private, peaceful, a perfect stay. Very responsive to our questions about checkin. Thank you!

What a gem! Ali’s hideaway space was perfect and so much more than expected. Not only was the place pristine, shower was spotless, amenities were even more than we needed, and we felt right at home. My husband even remarked, as we entered the space, “this just looks exactly like you’d want an Air BnB to look!” While other Air BnBs may have provided unique experiences, this was by far the most full and professional accommodations we’ve ever stayed at.

This space had 100% private access and no need to see anyone else in the house.

Ali’s was always on top of her communication, giving us full instructions before we arrived as well as setting the expectation for our departure.

We would definitely stay here again. Thank you!
This was the perfect spot for me to spot with my daughter for the night in the way up to Seattle for the holidays. It was super clean, cozy, and safe. Ali was very responsive and helpful as a host!
Awesome hosts and place! Would definitely recommend!
Our stay here was great! Location was awsome, place was private and clean, check in was easy and the hosts were fantastic! Definitely recommend and hope to stay again!

When we arrived, the lock was a bit tricky to get unlocked. We had to try it several times before it unlocked. In addition, the instructions for locking it were not quite clear, but Ali was very responsive to my messages.
The location and price were ideal for our needs - should I return to Salem (and I would like to) I would definitely stay with Ali again! Thank you, Ali!

Really cute lil studio, perfect for single or double use. Bed was comfy, and that little heating unit worked well!

The only downside is being a basement, you can hear the majority of footsteps going over you. Once I put in my noice cancelling headphones though, I was fine!

Very affordable and cute stay!
This is a great place to stay. It was very comfortable and had all the essentials.
This was a really great find for me in a city where i frequently need a place to stay where i can work, sleep well and have the comforts of home.

Excellent stay for us! We needed something simple and cozy while town for a work event. The location and everything in the little apartment were perfect. Just what we were joining for and all the little touches and great communication were icing on top. Would highly recommend!
Ali, thanks for your place. It was perfect
Quick easy checkin, clear communications, very comfortable bed.
Cute little studio!! Loved all the little details, was very clean and Ali was so very nice!
Ali makes you feel like family, and “reminds” us that home is where we journey.
It was totally amazing! Ali is great and i felt really comfortable in this nice studio! Thank you so much!
Had a great stay for our anniversary! Would definitely stay here again!
I absolutely loved the location and the place. It was so cute and cozy! Will definitely stay again the next time I’m in town for work.
Ali’s place is very clean and well-equipped with all the needed amenities. Parking and check-in are super easy. Will definitely stay again if I have the chance to visit the area!

This place is absolutely worth the money! Clean, quite and very nice space.
Plus Ali was very accommodating, even when my plans to come alone changed to me being in my wife along and I forgot to communicate before arriving, Ali was very understanding and kind.

This is my second time in Oregon and I’m happy I stayed here. The Airbnb is in the basement, so it offers privacy from the house that is attached. It was very clean and Ali did a great job communicating with me. The electric stovetop was having some issues and Ali quickly came to the rescue and made accommodations for a replacement. I enjoyed my stay here and I would recommend to any couples for a cozy hideaway!
Perfect place to stay, especially for a single person in town on business. Ali was very communicative and accomodating. I'll definitely stay here again next time I'm in Salem!
Ali’s place was perfectly located for what I needed. It’s also super cute and clean, bed was comfortable, has everything you need! Thanks for a great stay!
Great place to stay. Close to Willamette and Downtown Salem. Walkable. Hosts were very responsive.

Was able to book on a short notice and hosts were absolutely accommodating and responsive.  Couldn't have asked for a better experience with communication and hospitality! Space is beautiful and inviting.  Appreciate all the details provided with the check in/out process.  Thank you!
amazing place. Ali is supr accommodating with my early arrival and check-in was a breeze. would definitely stay here again.
For the two of us and for what we needed, this was the perfect place. Relaxed. Private.  Super nice and totally helpful and responsive hosts. Sweet family. Perfect. And great value, too.
Great location close to downtown. Safe neighborhood.
We enjoyed our stay, and would definitely say again!

This was a perfect place for a quick overnight stay. The space was as advertised, and very clean and tidy. The price was fantastic, and there were several nice touches; complimentary chocolates, popcorn, and water, a wireless phone charger. Would definitely stay here again!
I told Ali I’m definitely coming back! Her place was so great, very clean, and very comfortable. Highly recommended!
Thank you. We had a really nice stay.

The place was absolutely beautiful and nothing short of amazing. The owners were awesome with communicating and very welcoming. With All new appliances and everything you could need. The layout was beautiful. Highly recommend. Very cozy home and will definitely stay again when visiting Salem!
This place was remarkable. Grace was very responsive when we needed help with the internet. I highly recommend ! The place is beautiful and cozy.

Lovely place. Bedding comfortable. House was spotless. We ate out, but kitchen seemed stocked for cooking at home, if desired. Close to Willamette University was a plus. Grace was responsive to questions. Nice private home, host in front house.

It’s very over price and it does not even have TV in your bedroom which is cost $100 for that price you should expect to have at least TV lol
One room upstairs doesn’t even have a wall
It’s not private at all and it doesn’t have second bedroom which is annoying
Wonderful place, very modern and well put together.
This was a perfect place for my needs. It was clean. It felt private even though it’s in a neighborhood near a school. Great place to relax after a busy day.

We had a lovely stay. The pictures were accurate and everything was really clean and tidy. Close to restaurants and easy access to get around Salem. Grace was friendly and responsive. We would totally stay there again if we come to Salem.

Grace’s place is super clean and very cozy! The kitchen was well appointed and the beds very comfortable. The soft fluffy blankets and awesome snack bowl were a bonus. I highly recommend you try Grace’s place should your travels bring you to Salem!

We cannot say enough about how cute and cozy this place was.  The kitchen, although small, had everything you needed to cook a great meal. The two king-size beds were wonderfully comfortable! The bathroom made me feel like I was at a spa. We’ll be back!

I loved my stay at Far East Escape! I did have a slight issue getting into the building but Ellen was so responsive that it basically didn’t happen. The amenities in the pantry basically saved me as I came in on Christmas Eve and everything was closed! The bed was comfortable, I felt right at home with all the adorable decor!
We found the space to be just as described. Very pleasant! Ellen was an excellent communicator and very accommodating.
Owners were awesome hosts. Much appreciated.

This place is located in a quiet residential area. It’s walkable and there is a small park a few blocks away. The cute dishes, great vacuum & neighborhood were the highlights. There were some challenges. There were ant traps in the living room, but ants in the bathroom/kitchen. I sprayed, it helped. There was pet hair EVERYWHERE, even inside of the tea kettle and the beds. I removed the sheets to wash them and was absolutely horrified by the mattress cover. It should be disposed of ASAP. I provided my own mattress cover/bedding/pillows. The bed frame is broken, so it feels/sounds like sleeping on an old rollaway bed. The shower is too small to extend a leg. The seating in the living room is not comfy, but that’s where the only tv is. There is not a complete set of cookware. I really wanted to love this cute place, but it’s just not as nice as it looks. I’d recommend it for a photo shoot or IG worthy sleepover, but not for a long term stay.
Nice place to stay, very accommodating host!

We went down Salem to spend time with friends and families on Christmas . Natalia’s private place really impressed us . It has private kitchen , private bathroom and cozy bedroom . It is Close to the central Salem as well . Easy to find the location . Highly recommendation. Natalia is a super nice host . Easily communicated with her .
Very clean and large.
Very clean, newer apartment with comfortable bed, nice kitchen and bathroom.  Very accommodating hosts.

Lots of space for this rental. My stay was quiet and I enjoyed having the private entrance. I was in the area for work and wasn't done until past 9pm, I liked having a clean, cozy apartment to come to after a long day.
such a great place. will stay again!! beautiful home and the host was so great
Beautiful home and just as presented. Very clean. Diane was responsive to all questions we sent in advance. Thank you very much.
Thank you for everything. I enjoy the stay

Delphin was very responsive to my contacts. Her Airbnb seemed beautiful and perfectly fit my needs. Unfortunately, weather in the Blues and Cascade passes precluded travel. I definitely look forward to booking with Delphin when I am able to travel to Salem again.
great stay. great guy. I would gladly stay here again.
Beautiful home. With a super comfy bed. Love the pillows!!

Super cute place and very clean and comfortable!!! Yvonne was so accommodating to make my stay feel like home. Located in a great neighborhood too and close to stores for necessities!!
Thank you Yvonne!
Mason and Kim
Beautiful and clean home
Delphine was very accommodating! She went above and beyond - I would book again.
Delphine's house is very beautiful, safe and with much attention to detail. I highly recommend it

My husband stayed in one of the rooms available and it was clean and as advertised.  Delphin was very responsive and very helpful.  Great location in West Salem.  Beautiful house. He will be staying there again next week.
Great place! Nice hosts!
Quiet, peaceful !
As always I had a restful stay at Delphin place. I enjoyed my stay at his place.
The place is very quiet and beautiful. The surroundings were quiet just what I was looking for after a day of work. The house outside and inside is very beautiful .
I have visited Delphin place several times now and always feel comfortable there. It is a very quiet place where you can sleep peacefully and get ready for the next day of work.
I visited Delphin's place again because it is peaceful and beautiful. The house is always quiet and the neighbors are noiseless. I recommend Delphin's place if you are looking to have a good sleep.
Staying at Delphin house has been always great. I recommend her place for anybody looking to rest comfortably.

As always that I have been at Delphin's place I enjoyed my stay there. After a very tired day of work sleeping in the beautiful bed provided and the tranquility gives me a very restful time. I recommend greatly Delphin's house.

I have been several times at Delphin place and always had been a great stay. Very quiet and clean place. I met Delphin this time and he was very kind, nice and attentive. Great place to stay if you want to rest and have quietness  after a busy day.
Excellent experience start to finish. Really flexible dude, wonderful house.
Great location with SUPER helpful and flexible host. Excellent experience all around.
Quiet place!
I was able to sleep comfortably at Sara-Adam's home again after hard work days. I am very happy with the time I spend in your house Sara-Adam.
Great place, clean, quiet
I  have been several times at Sara-Adam place. I always have been able to sleep well and comfortable. I recommend her place greatly.
This was a great choice for lodging compared to any hotel. The apartment was clean, homey, and easy to check into. This was my first Airbnb experience and will definitely not be the last!

It was a quick stay for me as it was for one night and I arrived just in time for bed and had to wake up early in the morning.  It was easy to find, clean and comfortable.  There was a little road noise but nothing that affected my sleep.
Once more, I had a great rest at Sara-Adam's place. After a very busy day it is always great to sleep comfortably.

Very nice host talked to Adam a few times nice people made me feel at home
some noise from freeway buy turned fan on and didn't bother me good place to stay
I visited once again Sara-Adam's place and had a great time resting and sleeping. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a quiet place.
Alexis was super helpful with accommodating me even after my flight was delayed and I was not able to check in till very late.  Her cat is also super cute!

Joey's place was pristine! I rented it for a work retreat and wish we had more downtime in the space. Huge entertaining and dining area. The main bedroom had THE most comfortable bed and a huge soaking tub. Would recommend taking a good long soak. Will definitely rent again next time I am in Salem!
the home was big and beautiful.  the host was very helpful and responsive. it was a great stay in a nice peaceful neighborhood. I would recommend anybody to stay.
Joey was a great host and I can't wait to visit again. Thank you Joey😁
Clean and very updated. Master bedroom mattress and pillows extremely comfortable. Kind and responsive host. Near wine country and hiking.
Quite possibly the nicest airbnb I’ve stayed at. The driveway is pretty steep & the stairs are impressive and steep, which may be hard for someone with knee issues. Absolutely wonderful evening!

This host has several properties in the area. I stayed in the spacious guest room in the host's primary residence. It's a beautifully restored older home with lovely decor, and is clean, neat, and well maintained. The host is friendly and is well informed about the town of Salem. I appreciated the no-pet policy due to allergies. Future guests may wish to know the host prefers to leave the front door of the home unlocked except overnight. If that's not a concern, this accommodation is highly recommended.
The food alone was worth what we paid for the stay, Dave is an amazing cook! His dog Phoenix was energetic but a sweetheart. We felt right at home in a clean jack and Jill setup. 11/10 no question!

Ellie’s place exceeded expectations. It was calm and peaceful inside with tall ceilings, nice decor, comfortable furniture. The huge backyard was cute, especially at night with the backyard lights which was great for the warm spring evening. Id like to come back to the listing for a weekend to tour the wineries in the Salem area Willamette Valley
